40020006	À hunu kpɛɛnɛ wiciri guuru gu kɑmbɛ. À di bɔrɔ fɔ yom kɑ ǹ go cɛ hebu kunɑ kɔnu. À cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ wom go cɛ hɑnu kulu wom si hɛ fɔ kulu tɛ?
40020007	Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑnɑ i zɑɑ gbei sɛ no. À cii ǹ sɛ: Wom mo, wɑ kpei ɑ lɑmbu. Wom du hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ.
40020008	Wiciri kɑmbu bɑ tɔ. Hundikpɛ di cii ngɑ nooru jisikɔ sɛ: Gbeiteeri yom di cɛɛ kɑ ǹ bɑnɑ. N mɑ sinti zɑ kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ bɔrɔ yom di gɑɑ kɑlɑ sintine bɔrɔ yom gɑɑ.
40020009	Sɑɑ kɑ beerem kɑ ǹ zɑɑ wiciri guuru gu kɑmbɛ di kɑɑ, ɑfɔ kulu du gɑɑnomɑize zɑɑri fɔ bɑnɑndi.
40020010	Kɑ sintine bɔrɔ yom di mo kɑɑ, ǹ tɑmmɑ ǹ gɑ ngei bɑnɑ kɑ bisɑ yɑ di. Ammɑ ngei mo gɑɑnomɑize zɑɑri fɔ bɑnɑndi no bɔrɔ fɔ kulu du.
40020011	Kɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ bɑnɑ yɑ di, cɔfɔ ǹ go gunugunu hundikpɛ di gɑɑ.
40020012	Ǹ cii: Kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ bɔrɔ yom wɔ guuru fɔ hinne no ǹ nɑ gbei tɛ. Ǹ nɑ ǹ sɑsɑbɑndi ndɑ i yom, i yom kɑ i nɑ hɑnu fɑrigɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ dunguɛ zɑɑ.
40020013	Ammɑ hundikpɛɑ tu kɑ cii ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ sɛ: Kpɑɑsi, ɑ si ǹ zee. I sɑbɑ gɑɑnomɑize zɑɑri fɔ bɑnɑndi bɔm. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
40020014	N ŋmɔne zɑɑ kɑ kpei, ni ndɑ kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ bɔrɔ yom wɔ no. A go bɑɑ yɑ bɑnɑ sɑrɑ fɔ.
40020015	À hɑlɑli ɑ sɛ yɑ tɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ go bɑɑ ndɑ ɑ ŋmɔne. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ? A gomini tɛyom gɑɑ no, n bine futu bɑ?
40020016	Yɑ no kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ bɔrɔ yom kɑɑ ci sintine bɔrɔ yom. Sintine bɔrɔ yom mo kɑɑ ci kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ bɔrɔ yom. Ǹ go kɑ iboobo cɛɛ, ɑmmɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ǹ suubɑ si bɑ.
40020017	Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu go kpei Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ, ɑ̀ kpeindɑ coobɑɑbɑize wei cindi hinkɑ di kɑmbu.
40020018	À cii ǹ sɛ: Gunɑ, i go ziji Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ. Hɛɛ Adɑmize, ǹ gɑ ɑ dɑm gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom kɑmbɛ. Ǹ bine gɑ ɑ ciiti kɑ zeeri kɑ ɑ wi.
40020019	Ǹ gɑ ɑ dɑm dimi cindei kɑmbɛ. Ǹ kɑɑ dondɑ hɛɛ kɑ ɑ bulɑɑlɑ. Ǹ gɑ ɑ kɑnji. Jiribi hinzɑntɛ no ɑ kɑɑ tunu.
40020020	Zɑbɑdi koo yom nyɑ kɑɑ Yesu dɔ ndɑ ngɑ koo yom. À sɔmbu ɑ̀ jine kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ hɛ fɔ.
40020021	Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ifɔ n go bɑɑ? Wei di cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N mɑ tu ɑ koo hinkɑ wɔ sɛ ǹ mɑ gɔrɔ, ɑfɔ n kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ, ɑfɔ mo n kɑmbɛwo gɑɑ n kpetɛrɛ kunɑ.
40020022	Ammɑ Yesu tu kɑ cii: Wom si bei hɛ kɑ wom go ŋmɑɑrɛ. Tɑɑbi kɑ ɑ bɑ hɑm, wom hini kɑ ɑ̀ hɑm bɑ? Mirɑndiyom kɑ ɑ bɑ du, wom hini kɑ du ɑ̀ bɑ? Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: I hini.
40020023	Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Cimi no, wom gɑ ɑ tɑɑbi hɑm. Mirɑndiyom kɑ ɑ bɑ du, wom kɑɑ du ɑ̀. Ammɑ ɑ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ ndɑ ɑ kɑmbɛwo gɑɑ gɔrɛ di ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ɑ dɔ no ɑ̀ hunu. Ammɑ beerem kɑ ǹ sɛ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ nɑ ɑ̀ hinsɑ, ǹ ŋmɔne no.
40020024	Kɑ coobɑɑbɑize wei di mɑɑ ngɑ di cɔfɔ ǹ bine tɔ ihinkɑ di sɛ.
40020025	Ammɑ Yesu nɑ ǹ kulu cɛɛ kɑ cii: Wom bei kɑ dimi cindei hinikpɛ yom go kɑ ngei dɑbɑri cɛbɛ dimi cindei bɔm. Gɑɑbikoni yom mo go kɑ ngei dɑbɑri cɛbɛ ǹ bɔm.
40020026	Ammɑ ɑ̀ si ci yɑ di wom gɑme. Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ ci ibeeri wom kunɑ, ɑkpɛ mɑ ci wom gbeiize.
40020027	Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ ci jinɑ wom kunɑ kɑlɑ ɑkpɛ mɑ ci wom sɛ tɑm.
40020028	Hɛɛ Adɑmize, yɑ nɑ kɑɑ bɔrɔ mɑ tɑmtɛrɛ ɑ sɛ. Ammɑ ɑ kɑɑ no yɑ tɑmtɛrɛ kɑ ɑ hundi no beerem sɛ. A kɑɑ no yɑ ci fɑnsɑ hɛ jɑmɑ guribi.
40020029	Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu go hunu Yeriko kpɑɑrɑ, jɑmɑ bɑkɑrɑ nɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ.
40020030	Cɔfɔ dɑnɑm hinkɑ fɔ mo go gɔrɔ fɔndɑ hɑngɑ gɑɑ. Ǹ mɑɑ ǹ cii Yesu go bisɑ. Cɔfɔ ǹ kuwɑ kɑ cii: E Kpe, ni Dɑfidi ize, n mɑ suuji cɛbɛ i sɛ.
40020031	Jɑmɑ di deeni ǹ gɑɑ kɑ cii ǹ mɑ dɛnjɛ. Ammɑ ǹ go kuwɑ ndɑ gɑɑbi kɑ tɔntɔnu. Ǹ cii: E Kpe, ni Dɑfidi ize, n mɑ suuji cɛbɛ i sɛ.
40020032	Yesu cɛ kɑ ǹ cɛɛ. À cii: Ifɔ no wom go bɑɑ yɑ tɛ wom sɛ?
40020033	Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe i go bɑɑ no i moo yom wɔ mɑ feeri.
40020034	Sisibi nɑ Yesu dii. A nɑ ǹ moo yom hɑmɑ. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ǹ tɛ moo. Ǹ nɑ Yesu gɑnɑ.
40021001	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ mɑɑni Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ ǹ tɔ Betɑfɑji kpɑɑrɑ tondi kuku fɔ dɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Olibe zugu. Yesu nɑ coobɑɑbɑize hinkɑ dɔntɔm.
40021002	À cii ǹ sɛ: Wom mɑ kpei kpɑɑrɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono wom jine. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ wom kɑɑ di fɑrikɑ nyɑ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono hɔɑntɛ ndɑ binci hɑiwɑsu fɔ. Wom mɑ ǹ feeri kɑ kɑɑndei ɑ sɛ.
40021003	De bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ hɛ fɔ cii wom sɛ, wom mɑ cii Kpe yɑ gundɑ ǹ murɑdu. À gɑ ǹ yeti ɑkpɛ sɛ ndɑ wɑɑsi.
40021004	Ngɑ di kulu tɛ zɑmɑ hɛ kɑ ɑndebi cii mɑ tɔ sɛ. À cii:
40021005	Wɑ cii Sionɑ koo hundiyo sɛ: Gunɑ, n Kpe go kɑɑ n dɔ. Bɔrɔ bɑɑnɔ no. À goono fɑrikɑ bɔm, fɑrikɑ binci hɑiwɑsu bɔm.
40021006	Coobɑɑbɑize yom di kpei kpɑɑrɑ di. Ǹ tɛ zɑngɑ Yesu nɑ ǹ no fɔndɔ ǹ mo tɛ.
40021007	Ǹ kɑɑndɑ fɑrikɑ nyɑ di ndɑ binci hɑiwɑsu di kɑ ngei jiine yom dɛcɛ ǹ bɔm. Yesu kɑɑru fɑrikɑ binci hɑiwɑsu bɔm.
40021008	Jɑmɑ di kunɑ bɔrɔ boobo go kɑ ngei jiine yom dɑɑru fɔndɑ bɔm. Afɔ yom mo go tuuri kɔsu yom pɑti ko kɑ ǹ dɑɑru fɔndɑ bɔm.
40021009	Jɑmɑ mo goono jine ko kpei. Jɑmɑ goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ mo. Ǹ kulu go kuwɑ ko cii: “I go kɑ n sifɑ, Dɑfidi Ize. Bɑrikɑkpɛ no Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ Kpe mɑɑ gɑɑ. I go kɑ Ikpɛ sifɑ, Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ hɑli sɑmɑu.”
40021010	Kɑ ɑ̀ go huro Yerusɑlɛm, wɑngɑrɑ di kulu lɑɑkɑli tunu kɑ cii: Mee no bɔrɔ kpɛ?
40021011	Jɑmɑ bɑkɑrɑ go cii: Yesu wɔ ɑndebi no, wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu Nɑzɑrɛtu kpɑɑrɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu.
40021012	Yesu huro Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ. À nɑ neerɑkɔ yom ndɑ deikɔ yom gɑɑrɛ ǹ mɑ hunu Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ. À nɑ nooru bɑrimekɔ yom tɑbulu yom ndɑ gutu neerɑkɔ yom citɑ yom hɑngɑsɑndi.
40021013	A cii ǹ sɛ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ go cii: “Ǹ gɑ ɑ gɔrɛ dɔ cɛɛ no ɑduwɑ tɛyom dɔ”. Ammɑ wom wɔ, wom nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ lɔkɔ zee yom ŋmɔne.
40021014	Dɑnɑm yom ndɑ sumbɑrikɔ yom kɑɑ Yesu dɔ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ. À nɑ ǹ kulu no bɑɑni.
40021015	Ammɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom di mɑmɑci yom kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ. Ǹ mɑɑ koo yom mo kɑ ǹ go jinde zɑɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ ko cii: I go kɑ n sifɑ Dɑfidi Ize. À gɑɑ no, ǹ bine tɔ.
40021016	Ǹ cii Yesu sɛ: N go mɑɑ hɛ kɑ koo yom wɔ go cii bɑ? Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Oò, ɑ go mɑɑ. Wom nɑ wɔne coo bɑ? "Koo cɛnɑ yom ndɑ nɑnɑndi yom mee gɑɑ no, ǹ nɑ sifɑyom gɔrɛndi.”
40021017	Cɔfɔ Yesu nɑ ǹ nɑm kɑ hunu wɑngɑrɑ di kunɑ. À kpei Betɑni kpɑɑrɑ kɑ kɑni nodi.
40021018	Susubɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go ye wɑngɑrɑ di kunɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ hɛrɛɛ.
40021019	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ di jee nyɑ fɔ fɔndɑ jɛrɛ gɑɑ. À kpei ɑ̀ dɔ, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ di hɛ fɔ kulu ɑ̀ gɑɑ kɑlɑ kɔsu. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ize bɑ ɑfɔ mɑ si tɛ n gɑɑ pɑi. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ jee nyɑ di kɔgu.
40021020	Mɑmɑci nɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom dii. Ǹ cii: Mɛtɛ mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ jee nyɑ di kɔgu dɑ?
40021021	Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Cimi no, ɑ go cii wom sɛ, de wom gundɑ nɑɑne, wom si siikɑ mo, ɑ̀ nɑ ci hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ jee nyɑ wɔ sɛ hinne no wom kɑɑ tɛ. Ammɑ bɑ wom bumbum, de wom cii tondi kuku wɔ sɛ, gɑnɑ kɑ kɑm buulɑ wɔ kunɑ, dom ɑ̀ kɑɑ tɛ.
40021022	Hɛ kulu mo kɑ wom go ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑduwɑ kunɑ, de wom go nɑɑne, wom kɑɑ du ɑ̀.
40021023	Yesu huro Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go cooɑndi gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hã: Hini fɔ no n go hɛ yom wɔ tɛ ndɑ? Mee yɑ nɑ n no hini wɔ?
40021024	Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Hɛɛ mo, ɑ wom hã hɛ fɔ. De wom nɑ ɑ̀ cii ɑ sɛ, hɛɛ mo yɑ cii wom sɛ hini kɑ ɑ go hɛ yom wɔ tɛ ndɑ.
40021025	Mirɑndiyomɑ kɑ Yohɑnnɑ tɛ, mɑni no ɑ̀ hunu, Ikpɛ dɔ no dee wɑlɑ iburɑdɑm yom dɔ no? Cɔfɔ ǹ sendi cɛrɛ gɑme kɑ cii: De i cii Ikpɛ dɔ no ɑ̀ hunu, ɑ̀ kɑɑ cii i sɛ yɑ di gɑɑ, ifɔ sɛ no wom mɑnɑ ɑ nɑɑne?
40021026	Ammɑ de i cii iburɑdɑm yom dɔ no ɑ̀ hunu jɑmɑ wɔ no i go hɑmburu zɑmɑ ǹ kulu tɑbɑi Yohɑnnɑ yɑ ɑndebi no.
40021027	Ǹ tu Yesu sɛ kɑ cii: I si bei. Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Yɑ no hɛɛ mo, ɑ si cii wom sɛ hini kɑ ɑ go hɛ yom di tɛ ndɑ.
40021028	Ammɑ mɛtɛ no wɔne himɑ wom sɛ? Bɔrɔ fɔ yɑ gundɑ koo hɑibɔrɔ hinkɑ. À kɑɑ sintinɑ dɔ kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A koo, hunkunɑ n mɑ kpei gbei tɛ ɑ lɑmbu kunɑ.
40021029	Koo di tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: A si kpei. Ammɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tuubi, ɑ̀ kpei.
40021030	Bɑɑbɑ kɑɑ ihinkɑntɛ di mo dɔ. À cii ngɑ mo sɛ yɑ di. Koo di mo tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii. A kpei, bɑɑbɑ. Ammɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ kpei.
40021031	Ǹ bɔrɔ hinkɑ di kunɑ, mee yɑ nɑ bɑɑbɑ di binebɑɑ tɛ? Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Sintine bɔrɔ di. Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, ɑlikɑsi tɑkɔ yom ndɑ weikuru yom go wom jinɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɑ kunɑ.
40021032	Yohɑnnɑ kɑɑ no wom dɔ cɛyom susu fɔndɔ kunɑ. Wom mɑnɑ ɑ̀ cimɑndi. Ammɑ ɑlikɑsi tɑkɔ yom ndɑ weikuru yom nɑ ɑ̀ cimɑndi. Wom mo, kɑ wom di ngɑ di, ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu wom mɑnɑ tuubi kɑ ɑ̀ cimɑndi.
40021033	Wɑ mɑɑ yɑɑse wɔne mo kpɛɛnɛ. Hundikpɛ fɔ yɑ goono kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ lɛzɛ̃ tuuri yom tilɑm. À nɑ ǹ kɑkɑ. À nɑ guusu fɔ fɑnsi lɛzɛ̃ hɑri kɑnkɑmyom sɛ. À no tɑndɑ fɔ mo tɛ. À nɑ lɑmbuɑ dɑm hɑifɑri yom kɑmbɛ kɑ nɑɑru. À kpei lɑɑbu ŋmɑni.
40021034	Sɑɑ kɑ tuuriize kɔsuyom wɑtɛ tɔ, ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɑnyɑ yom dɔntɔm hɑifɑri di yom dɔ ǹ mɑ ngɑ lɛzɛ̃ize yom zɑɑ.
40021035	Hɑifɑri yom di nɑ ɑ̀ bɑnyɑ yom di dii. Ǹ nɑ ɑfɔ bulɑɑlɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑfɔ wi. Ǹ nɑ ɑfɔ mo cetu cetu ndɑ tondi yom.
40021036	Hundikpɛɑ ye kɑ bɑnyɑ fɔ yom mo dɔntɔm kɑ ǹ bɑ kɑ bisɑ sintine ŋmɔne yom di. Hɑifɑri yom di tɛ ngei mo sɛ yɑ di.
40021037	Ammɑ kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ koo dɔntɔm ǹ dɔ kɑ cii: Ǹ kɑɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ ɑ koo sɛ.
40021038	Ammɑ kɑ hɑifɑri yom di koo di, ǹ cii cɛrɛ sɛ: Bɔrɔ wɔne yɑ ci tubukɔɑ. Wɑ kɑɑ i mɑ ɑ̀ wi. Tubuɑ mɑ ci i ŋmɔne.
40021039	Cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ dii kɑ cetu lɑmbuɑ bɑndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ wi.
40021040	To. Sɑɑ kɑ hundikpɛɑ kɑɑ, ifɔ no ɑ̀ kɑɑ tɛ hɑifɑri yom di sɛ?
40021041	Beerem cii ɑ̀ sɛ: À mɑ wiyom futu tɛ bɔrɔ lɑlɔ yom wɔ sɛ kɑ hɑifɑri teji yom zɑɑ ngɑ lɑmbuɑ sɛ. Beerem wɔ gɑ ɑ̀ tuuriize yom kɔsu kɑ ɑ̀ no ɑ̀ sɛ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nini. Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ yom cii:
40021042	“Tondi kɑ fuu cinikɔ yom hungu, ngɑ yɑ ci mimbɑri cire tondi sintine. Zɑ Kpe dɔ no wɔne hunu. A tɛ mɑmɑci mo i moo yom sɛ.” Wom nɑ ngɑ di coo bɑ?
40021043	À sɛ no, ɑ go cii wom sɛ kɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ wɔ, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑndi wom gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ no dimi fɔ sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ gbei tɛ ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ himɑ.
40021044	Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ kɑm tondi wɔ bɔm, ɑkpɛ tutubu no. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bɔm tondɑ kɑm mo, tondɑ gɑ ɑkpɛ fufu no.
40021045	Sɑɑ kɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom mɑɑ yɑɑse yom di, ǹ go bei ngei gɑɑ no ɑ̀ go sendi.
40021046	Ǹ go ceeci ngei mɑ ɑ̀ dii ɑmmɑ ǹ go hɑmburu jɑmɑ zɑmɑ beerem go tɑbɑi Yesu yɑ ɑndebi no.
40022001	Yesu tu ǹ sɛ ndɑ yɑɑse yom kpɛɛnɛ.
40022002	À cii: Bɛɛnɛ kpetɛrɛ himɑ mo zɑngɑ gɑndɑkpɛ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hije tɛ ngɑ koo sɛ.
40022003	À nɑ ngɑ bɑnyɑ yom dɔntɔm ǹ mɑ kpei beerem cɛɛ ǹ mɑ kɑɑ hije di dɔ ɑmmɑ beerem hungu kɑ kɑɑ.
40022004	À nɑ bɑnyɑ fɔ yom mo dɔntɔm kpɛɛnɛ kɑ cii: Wɑ cii beerem kɑ ɑ nɑ ǹ cɛɛ di sɛ: Gunɑ, ɑ nɑ ŋmɑɑri tɛ. A nɑ hɑuyeji yom ndɑ memunu nɑɑsɔ yom wi. À nɑ hɛ kulu sɔlu kɔ. Wɑ kɑɑ hijɑ dɔ.
40022005	Ammɑ ngei wɔ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ dɑm hɛ fɔ. Ǹ nɑ ngei kpeiyom tɛ. Afɔ kpei ngɑ fɑri. Afɔ mo kpei ngɑ tenku.
40022006	Afɔ yom mo nɑ bɑnyɑ yom dii kɑ ǹ woo. Ǹ nɑ ǹ wi.
40022007	Kɑ gɑndɑkpɛ di mɑɑ ngɑ di, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ bine tɔ hɑli ɑ̀ futu. À nɑ ngɑ wɑngɑri yom dɔntɔm Ǹ yom di wi kɑ ǹ wɑngɑrɑ di kulu tɔnu.
40022008	Bine ɑ̀ cii ngɑ bɑnyɑ yom sɛ: Hijɑ sɔlu kube ɑmmɑ beerem kɑ ɑ nɑ ǹ cɛɛ, ǹ mɑnɑ tɔ.
40022009	Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ kpei dɛbɛ yom bɔm, bɔrɔ kulu kɑ wom di wom mɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ hijɑ dɔ.
40022010	Bɑnyɑ yom di hunu kɑ kpei dɛbɛ yom bɔm. Ǹ nɑ beerem kulu kɑ ǹ di cɛɛ kɑ meigu zɑ ilɑlɔ yom hɑli ihinno yom. Hije fuuɑ tɔ ndɑ bɔrɔ.
40022011	Gɑndɑkpɛɑ huro kɑ gunɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go ŋmɑɑ. À di bɔrɔ fɔ nungu di kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hije kpɛ dɑm.
40022012	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpɑɑsi, mɛtɛ n tɛ kɑ huro nee, n sindɑ hije kpɛ? Ammɑ bɔrɔ di mɑnɑ mee feeri kɑ sendi.
40022013	Gɑndɑkpɛ di cii gbeiize yom di sɛ: Wɑ ɑ̀ hɔ cee ndɑ kɑmbɛ kɑ zɑɑ. Wɑ ɑ̀ cetu tɛrɛ kube kunɑ. Nungu di no hɛ̃ni ndɑ hinje kɑɑmɑyom goono.
40022014	Ǹ go kɑ iboobo cɛɛ ɑmmɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ǹ suubɑ si bɑ.
40022015	Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom kpei sɑwɑrɑ kɑ ngei mɑ Yesu hiri ɑ̀ sendi yom gɑɑ.
40022016	Ǹ nɑ ngei coobɑɑbɑize yom ndɑ Hirodu bɑndɑ bɔrɔ yom dɔntɔm ɑ̀ dɔ kɑ cii: Coobɑɑbɑ, i bei kɑ ni yɑ ci cimikpɛ. N go beerem cooɑndi Ikpɛ fɔndɑ bɔm ndɑ cimi. N sindɑ bɑɑbɑɑ. N si iburɑdɑm yom tɑkɑri gunɑ.
40022017	Ngɑ di sɛ, cii i sɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ himɑ n sɛ. À hɑlɑli bɔrɔ mɑ ɑlikɑsi bɑnɑ Kɑisɑ sɛ bɑ wɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɑlɑli?
40022018	Zɑ kɑ Yesu bei hɑnyɑ fute kɑ ǹ gundɑ, ɑ̀ cii: Ifɔ sɛ no wom go kɑ ɑ bubure, munɑfici yom?
40022019	Wɑ ɑ cɛbɛ ɑlikɑsi wɔkɔkɔize fɔ. Ǹ kɑɑndɑ ɑ̀ sɛ dinɑri wɔkɔkɔize fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cɛbɛ.
40022020	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Mee bɔm no ǹ tɛ nooru wɔ gɑɑ ndɑ jeeri wɔ?
40022021	Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kɑisɑ ŋmɔne no. Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ Kɑisɑ hɛ yom no Kɑisɑ sɛ. Wɑ Ikpɛ hɛ yom mo no Ikpɛ sɛ.
40022022	Kɑ ǹ mɑɑ yɑ di, cɔfɔ mɑmɑci nɑ ǹ dii. Ǹ nɑ Yesu nɑm kɑ dirɑ.
40022023	Hɑnu ngɑ di no, Sɑdusi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ go cii bukɔ tunondiyom si, ǹ kɑɑ Yesu dɔ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ cii:
40022024	Coobɑɑbɑ, Moisi cii de bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ du hɛiyom bu, ɑ̀ cɛɛnɛ mɑ ɑ̀ wɛndɛ hiji kɑ hɛi ndɑ, bukɔɑ sɛ.
40022025	Cɛɛnɛ ndɑ bɛɛrɛ iye goono i kunɑ. Sintinɑ hiji. À bu, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɛi. À nɑ ngɑ wɛndɑ nɑm ngɑ cɛɛnɛ sɛ.
40022026	Ihinkɑntɛ di ndɑ ihinzɑntɛ mo tɛ yɑ di kɑlɑ iyɑntɛ gɑɑ.
40022027	Ǹ kulu bɑndɑ, weibɔrɔ di mo bu.
40022028	Tunɑndiyom hine, bɔrɔ iye di kunɑ, mee wɛndɛ no zɑmɑ ǹ kulu nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ wɛndɛ?
40022029	Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wom go dɛrɛ fɑ kɑ wom si fɑhɑm ndɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ yom ndɑ Ikpɛ dɑbɑri.
40022030	Bukɔei tunɑndiyom hine, ǹ si hiji, ǹ si hijɑndi. Ammɑ beerem bo goono zɑngɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom kɑ ǹ goono bɛɛnɛ kunɑ.
40022031	Ammɑ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ bukɔei tunɑndiyom, Ikpɛ cii:
40022032	“Hɛɛ wɔ, hɛɛ yɑ ci Abulɛmɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ, Isɑɑkɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ ndɑ Yɑkɔfu ŋmɔne Ikpɛ”. Wom no ngɑ di coo bɑ? Ikpɛ mɑnɑ ci bukɔei ŋmɔne Ikpɛ ɑmmɑ bɑhunɑ yom ŋmɔne no.
40022033	Kɑ jɑmɑ di mɑɑ ngɑ di, mɑmɑci nɑ ǹ dii ndɑ ɑ̀ cɛbɛ yom di.
40022034	Ammɑ kɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom mo mɑɑ Yesu nɑ Sɑdusi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom mee hɔ, ǹ meigu dɔ fɔ.
40022035	Ǹ kunɑ ɑfɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Moisi fɔndɑ beikɔ fɔ nɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ bubure.
40022036	À cii: Coobɑɑbɑ, wɔ fɔ yɑ ci meire bɑmbɑtɑ Moisi fɔndɑ kunɑ?
40022037	Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: "N mɑ bɑɑ Kpe n ŋmɔne Ikpɛ ndɑ n bine kulu ndɑ n hundi kulu ndɑ n lɑsɑbu kulu”.
40022038	Ngɑ di yɑ meire beeri. Ngɑ di mo yɑ ci meire sintine.
40022039	Ihinkɑntɛ mo himɑ meire di kɑ ɑ̀ cii: “N mɑ bɑɑ n gɔrɔkɑsine zɑngɑ n bɔm”.
40022040	Meire hinkɑ wɔ bɔm nɑ Moisi fɔndɑ kulu ndɑ ɑndebi yom sendi yom kulu go kɔtɔ.
40022041	Ammɑ zɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom go meigu, Yesu nɑ ǹ hã kɑ cii:
40022042	Ifɔ no Mɛsiyɑ himɑ wom sɛ? Mee ize no? Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Dɑfidi ize no.
40022043	Yesu mo cii ǹ sɛ: Mɛtɛ no Dɑfidi nɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ Kpe, Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ kɑ cii:
40022044	Kpe cii ɑ Kpeɑ sɛ, n mɑ gɔrɔ ɑ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ hɑli yɑ n ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ yom tɛ n cee yom dɛcɛyom dɔ.
40022045	De Dɑfidi go kɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ Kpe, mɛtɛ ɑ̀ tɛ kɑ ci ɑ̀ Ize?
40022046	Bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ mɑnɑ hini kɑ tu ɑ̀ sɛ bɑ sendi kpɛsɛ fɔ. Zɑ hɑnu ngɑ di mo no bɔrɔ kulu hɑmburu ndɑ ɑ̀ hãyom.
40023001	Yesu sendi jɑmɑ di sɛ ndɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ kɑ cii:
40023002	Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom go gɔrɔ Moisi nungu kunɑ.
40023003	Ngɑ di sɛ, hɛ yom kulu kɑ ǹ cii wom sɛ, wɑ ǹ jɛ kɑ ǹ tɛ. Ammɑ wɑ si tɛ ndɑ zɑngɑ ǹ tɛgbei yom goono ndɑ, zɑmɑ ngei wɔ go cii no ɑmmɑ ǹ si tɛ.
40023004	Ǹ go jɛrɔ timɔ hɔ kɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑyom gɑɑbu kɑ dɛcɛ beerem jɛsɛ bɔm. Ammɑ ǹ si bɑ kɑ ngei kɑmbeize fɔ dɑm kɑ jɛrɔɑ zinji.
40023005	Ǹ go kɑ ngei gbei yom kulu tɔ no beerem mɑ di sɛ. Ǹ go tirɑize beeri yom kɑ ɑyɑ yom goono ǹ kunɑ dɑm. Ǹ go kɑ ngei kpɛ hɑngɑ tɑɑlɑm hɛɑndi kɑ tɔntɔnu.
40023006	Jine gɔrɛ dɔ bɛɛrɛkpɛ no ǹ go bɑɑ jingɑru ŋmɑɑyom dɔ. Ǹ go bɑɑ jine gɔrɛ dɔ bɛɛrɛkpɛ Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu yom kunɑ.
40023007	Ǹ go bɑɑ mo no beerem mɑ cini kɑ ngei fɔɔ hebu bɑtumɑ yom kunɑ. Ǹ go bɑɑ mo beerem mɑ ngei cɛɛ Coobɑɑbɑ, Coobɑɑbɑ.
40023008	Ammɑ wom wɔ, wom mɑ si tu ǹ mɑ wom cɛɛ cɛbɛkɔ zɑmɑ Bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku hinne yɑ ci wom Cɛbɛkɔ, ngɑ yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ. Wom wɔ, wom kulu nyɑize yom no.
40023009	Wom mɑ si bɔrɔ fɔ kulu cɛɛ bɑɑbɑ hɑndunyɑ wɔ kunɑ zɑmɑ Bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku hinne yɑ ci wom Bɑɑbɑ. Ngɑ yɑ ci wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ.
40023010	Wom mɑ si tu mo ǹ mɑ cii wom sɛ cɛbɛkɔ yom zɑmɑ Bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku hinne yɑ ci wom cɛbɛkɔ, ngɑ yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ.
40023011	Ammɑ wom kunɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ beeri kɑ bisɑ wom kulu, ngɑ yɑ kɑɑ ci wom gbeiize.
40023012	Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɔm bɛɛrɑndi ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ yeti gɑndɑ. Bɔrɔ kulu mo kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ngɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi.
40023013	Ammɑ kɑito wom, Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom, munɑfici yom. Wom go bɛɛnɛ kpetɛrɛ dɑɑbu beerem sɛ. Wom si huro wom bumbum, wom si nɑm beerem kɑ ǹ bɑ huro mo sɛ ǹ mɑ huro.
40023014	Kɑito wom, Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom, munɑfici yom. Wom go sokoni yom hɑibɑrikɑ yom ŋmɑɑ. Wom go kɑ ɑduwɑ kuku tɛ wom mɑ himɑ zɑngɑ gɑnɑkɔ hinno yom. Ngɑ di sɛ no, ǹ kɑɑ wom ciiti kɑ jɑɑsɑ ǹ kulu.
40023015	Kɑito wom, Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom, wom munɑfici yom. Wom go tɛku ndɑ gɑndɑ yɑɑli kɑ du bɑ bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku kɑ bɛrɛ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑkpɛ bɛ, wom go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ nungu kɑ ǹ go hɑnyɑ futu yom bɔnɑndi ŋmɔne ize ce hinkɑ kɑ bisɑ wom.
40023016	Kɑito wom, dɑnɑm yom kɑ ǹ go dɑnɑm yom cendi. Wom go cii bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ ze ndɑ Ikpɛ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ci hɛ fɔ. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ ze ndɑ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ di wurɑ, ɑ̀ ze di gɑ ɑ̀ dii.
40023017	Sɑmu yom ndɑ dɑnɑm yom no wom bɑrɑ. Ǹ kunɑ wɔ fɔ yɑ beeri ndɑ ɑfɔ, wurɑ no de wɑlɑ Ikpɛ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go wurɑ di hɑlɑɑlɑndi no?
40023018	Wom go cii bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ ze ndɑ gɑrɑndi bɑndɑ tɑndɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ci hɛ fɔ. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ ze ndɑ gɑrɑndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono gɑrɑndi bɑndɑ tɑndɑ bɔm, ɑ̀ ze di gɑ ɑ̀ dii.
40023019	Sɑmu yom ndɑ dɑnɑm yom no wom bɑrɑ. Ǹ kunɑ wɔ fɔ yɑ beeri ndɑ ɑfɔ, hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ ǹ gɑrɑndi no dee wɑlɑ gɑrɑndi bɑndɑ tɑndɑ no kɑ ɑ̀ go gɑrɑndi hɛ hɑlɑɑlɑndi?
40023020	Ngɑ di sɛ, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ze ndɑ gɑrɑndi bɑndɑ tɑndɑ, ɑkpɛ ze ndɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono ɑ̀ bɔm mo.
40023021	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ze ndɑ Ikpɛ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ, ɑkpɛ ze ndɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go gɔrɔ ɑ̀ kunɑ mo.
40023022	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ze ndɑ bɛɛnɛ mo ɑ̀ go ze ndɑ Ikpɛ kɑrigɑ noyɑ ndɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go gɔrɔ ɑ̀ bɔm.
40023023	Kɑito wom, Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom, munɑfici yom. Wom go gɑbu ndɑ mɑɑri ndɑ yɑzi yom zɑkɑ. Ammɑ wom go fɔndɑ ŋmɔne hɛ beeri yom nɑm zɑngɑ cɛyom susu ndɑ suuji ndɑ nɑɑne. Nge yom yɑ himɑ wom mɑ tɛ dom, ɑmmɑ wom mɑ si zɑkɑ di mo nɑm.
40023024	Wom dɑnɑm yom kɑ wom go dɑnɑm yom cendi, wom go filifiliwɑ sɔgu kɑ yoo gonu.
40023025	Kɑito wom, Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom, munɑfici yom. Wom go gulɑize ndɑ combu bɑndɑ nyunu ɑmmɑ ǹ kunɑ go tɔ ndɑ zeetɛrɛ ndɑ bɔm hiniyom zɑme.
40023026	Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ, dɑnɑm kɑ n go ci, n mɑ gulɑize di ndɑ combu di kunɑ nyunu jinɑ, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ mo mɑ hinne.
40023027	Kɑito wom, Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom, munɑfici yom. Wom himɑ no zɑngɑ sɑɑrɛ yom kɑ ǹ kpɑrɑndi. Ǹ go boori moo gɑɑ ɑmmɑ ǹ kunɑ ǹ tɔ ndɑ bukɔ biri yom ndɑ ziibi dimi kulu.
40023028	Yɑ no wom mo, moo gɑɑ wom go himɑ beerem sɛ bɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ cɛsusu ɑmmɑ kunɑ kunɑ wom tɔ ndɑ munɑficitɛrɛ ndɑ bɔrɔlɑlɔtɛrɛ.
40023029	Kɑito wom, Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom, munɑfici yom. Wom go ɑndebi yom sɑɑrɛ yom cini. Wom go bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu yom sɑɑrɛ yom tɑɑlɑm.
40023030	Wom go cii: De i goono i cɛɛ yom wɑtɛ dom, i si meigu ndei kɑ ɑndebi yom wi.
40023031	Zɑngɑ yɑ wom go sɛdɑ wom bɔm noyɑ kɑ wom yɑ ci beerem kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑndebi yom wi ize yom.
40023032	Wom go wom cɛɛ yom bɑtɑ tɔnɑndi.
40023033	Gondi yom, gɑzɑmɑ ize yom no wom bɑrɑ. Mɛtɛ wom tɛ kɑ kɔmɑ nini ciiti kunɑ, nungu kɑ ǹ go hɑnyɑ futu yom bɔnɑndi?
40023034	À sɛ no, gunɑ hɛɛ wɔ ɑ go ɑndebi yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom ndɑ cɛbɛkɔ yom dɔntɔm wom dɔ. Wom bine gɑ ɑfɔ yom wi kɑ ǹ kɑnji. Afɔ yom mo wom gɑ ǹ bulɑɑlɑ wom mɑrgɑ fuu yom kunɑ. Wom gɑ ǹ guruguzɑndi wɑngɑrɑ ndɑ wɑngɑrɑ yom kunɑ.
40023035	À sɛ no, bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu kuri kulu kɑ ɑ̀ munu hɑndunyɑ wɔ kunɑ ɑ̀ bɑnɑndi mɑ kɑm wom bɔm. Kuri wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ munu hunu zɑ Abɛli kɑ ɑ̀ ci bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu gɑɑ kɑlɑ Zɑkɑri Bɑlɑsi koo kɑ wom wi Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ ndɑ gɑrɑndi bɑndɑ tɑndɑ gɑme.
40023036	Cimi no, ɑ go cii wom sɛ, hɛ nge yom di kulu kɑɑ kɑm zɑmɑni wɔ bɔm.
40023037	E Yerusɑlɛm, Yerusɑlɛm, ni kɑ n go ɑndebi yom wi kɑ beerem kɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔm n dɔ cetu ndɑ tondi. Ce mɛrɛjɛ no ɑ go bɑɑ yɑ n koo yom meigu zɑngɑ gɔrɔngɔnyɑ cini kɑ ngɑ ize yom meigu ngɑ fɑtɑ yom cire. Ammɑ wom mɑnɑ tu.
40023038	Gunɑ, ǹ nɑ wom fuu nɑm kɔnu.
40023039	A go cii wom sɛ, wom si di hɛɛ kpɛɛnɛ zɑ mɑɑsɑ kɑlɑ wom mɑ cii: Binekɑɑnekpɛ no wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ Kpe mɑɑ gɑɑ.
40024001	Yesu bine hunu Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom mɑɑni ɑ̀ dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cɛbɛ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ cinɑri yom.
40024002	Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wom go di hɛ yom wɔ kulu bɑ? Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, bɑ tondi fɔ si cindi tondi bɔm kɑ ǹ si ɑ̀ kɑru kɑ see.
40024003	Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu go gɔrɔ Olibe zugu tondi kukuɑ bɔm, coobɑɑbɑize yom di kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ kɑmbu. Ǹ cii: Cii i sɛ sɑɑ kɑ hɛ yom di kɑɑ tɛ. Alɑmu fɔ mo yɑ tɛ n kɑɑyom gɑɑ ndɑ zɑmɑni beeniyom gɑɑ?
40024004	Cɔfɔ Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ si wom dɛrɑndi.
40024005	Bɔrɔ boobo go kɑɑ ndɑ ɑ mɑɑ kɑ cii: Hɛɛ yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ. Ǹ bine kɑɑ bɔrɔ boobo dɛrɑndi.
40024006	Wom kɑɑ mɑɑ wɑngu yom bɑɑru ndɑ wɑngu yom kɔsɔngu. Wom lɑɑkɑli mɑ si tunu. Tilɑsi no nge yom di mɑ tɛ ɑmmɑ beeniyom mɑnɑ tɔ jinɑ.
40024007	Dimi kɑɑ tunu kɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ dimi. Kpetɛrɛ yom kɑɑ tunu kpetɛrɛ gɑɑ. Hɛrɛɛ ndɑ bɑlɑu kɑɑ tɛ. Gɑndɑ zinji yom kɑɑ tɛ nungu ŋmɑni ŋmɑni.
40024008	Hɛ nge yom di kulu bɔnei sintiyom no.
40024009	À bɑndɑ ǹ kɑɑ wom dɑm kɑmbɛ kɑ wom bɔnɑndi. Ǹ kɑɑ wom wi. Hɑndunyɑ dimi kulu mo kɑɑ hungu wom ɑ mɑɑ sɑbu sɛ.
40024010	Bɔrɔ boobo kɑɑ dɛrɛ. Ǹ kɑɑ cɛrɛ dɑm kɑmbɛ kɑ hungu ngei cɛrɛ ndɑ cɛrɛ.
40024011	Andebi tɑngɑri tɑngɑri boobo kɑɑ tunu kɑ bɔrɔ boobo dɛrɑndi.
40024012	Bɔrɔlɑlɔtɛrɛ kɑɑ tɛ kɑ bɑ. Bɔrɔ boobo bɑɑkɑsine kɑɑ ye ndɑ bɑndɑ.
40024013	Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hini suuru kɑlɑ mee, ǹ gɑ ɑkpɛ kɑɑ tɑɑbi yom di kɑmbɛ.
40024014	Ǹ kɑɑ Bɑɑru Hinno fɛɛ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɑ bɔm hɑndunyɑ kulu ɑ̀ mɑ tɛ sɛdɑ dimi cindei kulu sɛ. Cɔfɔ beenɑntɛ mɑ kɑɑ.
40024015	Andebi Dɑniɛlo sendi kɑ simbɑ ndɑ fɛntɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑlɑkɑ tɛ. Wom kɑɑ di ɑ̀ go cɛ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go coo, ɑ̀ mɑ fɑhɑm fɑ.
40024016	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go cɛ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ beerem kɑ ǹ goono Yude lɑɑbu mɑ zuuru kɑ kpei tondi kuku yom bɔm.
40024017	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono fuu yɔlɔ bɔm, ɑ̀ mɑ si zumbu kɑ huro ngɑ fuu kunɑ kɑ hɛ fɔ zɑɑ.
40024018	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono fɑri mo mɑ si ye bɑndɑ kɑ ngɑ kpɛ zɑɑ.
40024019	Ammɑ kɑito weibɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ gundɑ kunu ndɑ weibɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ go nɑnɑndi hɑnu nge yom di.
40024020	Wom mɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ wom zuure mɑ si tɛ hɑrigu wɑtɛ wɑlɑ hulonzom hɑnu hine.
40024021	Guruguze bɑmbɑtɑ kɑɑ tɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ tɛ zɑ hɑndunyɑ sinjiyom hɑli kɑ kɑɑ mɑɑsɑ. Ngɑ di bɑndɑ ɑ̀ dimi si tɛ kpɛɛnɛ pɑi.
40024022	De bine ǹ si hɑnu nge yom di dunguriɑndi ǹ si bɑhunɑ bɑ ɑfɔ kɑɑ tɑɑbi yom di kɑmbɛ. Ammɑ suubɑntɛ yom sɑbu sɛ ǹ kɑɑ hɑnu nge yom di dunguriɑndi.
40024023	Bine, bɑ de bɔrɔ fɔ go cii wom sɛ: Gunɑ, Mɛsiyɑ go nee wɑlɑ gunɑ ɑ̀ go yɔngɔ wɑ si ɑ̀ no cimi.
40024024	Mɛsiyɑ tɑngɑri tɑngɑri yom ndɑ ɑndebi tɑngɑri tɑngɑri yom kɑɑ tunu. Ǹ gɑ ɑlɑmu bɑmbɑtɑ yom ndɑ mɑmɑci yom cɛbɛ hɑli de ɑ̀ hini kɑ tɛ, ǹ kɑɑ bɑ suubɑntɛ yom dɛrɑndi.
40024025	Gunɑ, ɑ jinɑ kɑ cii wom sɛ kɔ.
40024026	Ngɑ di sɛ, de ǹ go cii wom sɛ: Gunɑ, ɑ̀ goono gɑnji kunɑ, wɑ si hunu. Wɑlɑ ǹ go cii: Gunɑ, ɑ̀ goono fuu yom kpɛsɛndi yom kunɑ, wɑ si ɑ̀ no cimi.
40024027	Zɑngɑ bɛɛnɛ cini tɛ nyɑlɑu zɑ weenuhune kɑ kpei weenukɑne, yɑ no hɛɛ, Adɑmize mo, ɑ kɑɑyom.
40024028	Nungu kɑ jifɑ goono, nungu di no yobereku yom cini meigu.
40024029	Hɑnu nge yom di tɑɑbi futuɑ bɑndɑ, “mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ weenu kɑɑ ye kube. Hɑndu si ngɑ kɑɑri no. Hɑndɑriyɑize yom kɑɑ kɑm zɑ bɛɛnɛ. Bɛɛnɛ dɑbɑri yom kɑɑ zinji.”
40024030	A gɑɑ no hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ ŋmɔne ɑlɑmu kɑɑ hunu bɛɛnɛ kunɑ. Hɑndunyɑ dimi yom kulu mo kɑɑ wuuru. Ǹ kɑɑ di hɛɛ, Adɑmize, ɑ go kɑɑ bɛɛnɛ buru yom bɔm ndɑ dɑbɑri ndɑ deizɑ bɑmbɑtɑ.
40024031	Sɑɑ di gɑɑ yɑ ɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom sɑmbɑ ndɑ kuluu funsuyom beeri. Ǹ gɑ ɑ ŋmɔne suubɑntɛ yom meigu zɑ hɑndunyɑ cɛnjɛ tɑɑci kulu gɑɑ kɑlɑ bɛɛnɛ, zɑ ɑ̀ mee nee hɛrɛ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ mee yɑ hɛrɛ.
40024032	Ammɑ wom mɑ dendeni yɑɑse kɑ jee nyɑ di go wom no. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ cɛnɑ yom bɑɑni ɑ̀ go kɔsu teji fiyo, wom go bei kɛdiɑ go mɑɑni.
40024033	Yɑ no wom mo, sɑɑ kɑ wom go di hɛ nge yom di kulu, wom mɑ bei kɑ hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ go mɑɑni mee gɑɑ noyɑ.
40024034	Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, zɑmɑni wɔne si beeni pɑi kɑlɑ de hɛ nge yom di kulu mɑ tɛ.
40024035	Bɛɛnɛ ndɑ gɑndɑ kɑɑ beeni ɑmmɑ ɑ sendi yom si beeni pɑi.
40024036	Ammɑ hɑnu ngɑ di ndɑ ɑ̀ lɔkɑci bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ si ɑ̀ bei, bɑ bɛɛnɛ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom. A Bɑɑbɑ ngɑ fɔlɔnku go kɑ ɑ̀ bei.
40024037	Ammɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ tɛ Nowe hɑnu yom gɑɑ di, yɑ no hɛɛ Adɑmize mo, ɑ kɑɑyom.
40024038	Zɑngɑ zɑ tunfɑnɑ hɑri mɑnɑ kɑɑ beerem go ŋmɑɑ, ǹ go hɑm, ǹ go hiji, ǹ go hijɑndi kɑlɑ hɑnu kɑ Nowe huro hɑrihiɑ kunɑ.
40024039	Ǹ mɑnɑ hɛ fɔ kulu dɑm sɑɑlu kɑlɑ tunfɑnɑ hɑri di nɑ ǹ jirisi kɑ kɑɑ kɑ ǹ kulu ŋmɑɑ. Zɑngɑ yɑ no, hɛɛ Adɑmize mo, ɑ kɑɑyom.
40024040	Lɔkɑci ngɑ di hɑibɔrɔ hinkɑ kɑɑ goono fɑri. Ǹ gɑ ɑfɔ zɑɑ kɑ ɑfɔ nɑm.
40024041	Weibɔrɔ hinkɑ kɑɑ fufu tondi gɑɑ. Ǹ gɑ ɑfɔ zɑɑ kɑ ɑfɔ nɑm.
40024042	Ngɑ di sɛ, wom mo bɑtu zɑmɑ wom si bei lɔkɑci kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ wom Kpe go kɑɑ.
40024043	Ammɑ wom mɑ wɔne bei kɑ de hundikpɛ bei sɑɑ kɑ zee go kɑɑ, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ bɑtu. À si nɑm ɑ̀ mɑ ngɑ fuu funu.
40024044	À sɛ no, wom mo wɑ sɔlu zɑmɑ lɔkɑci kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ wom si tɑmmɑ, ɑ̀ gɑɑ no hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ go kɑɑ.
40024045	Mee yɑ ci tɑm nɑɑnekpɛ, lɑɑkɑlɑntɛ kɑ ɑ̀ kpe nɑ ɑ̀ jisi kɑ ngɑ fuu tɑm yom kulu dɑm ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ ɑ̀ mɑ ǹ no ǹ ŋmɑɑri lɔkɑci kɑ ɑ̀ himɑ?
40024046	Binekɑɑnekpɛ no, tɑm ngɑ di kɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kpe go kɑɑ, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ gɑru ɑ̀ mo tɛ yɑ di.
40024047	Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, ɑ̀ gɑ ngɑ hɑibɑrikɑ kulu dɑm ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ.
40024048	Ammɑ de tɑm lɑlɔ wɔ go cii ngɑ bine kunɑ: A kpe wɔ si kɑɑ tɑmbɑ.
40024049	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ mo kɑ ngɑ kpɑɑsi tɑm yom kɑru. À mo ŋmɑɑ ko hɑm ndɑ bɑjiwi yom.
40024050	Tɑm ngɑ di, ɑ̀ kpeɑ go kɑɑ no hɑnu kɑ ɑ̀ si bɑtu, lɔkɑci kɑ ɑ̀ si bei.
40024051	Kpeɑ gɑ ɑ̀ dumbu ihinkɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑ dɑm munɑfici yom bɑndɑ. Nungu di no hɛ̃ni ndɑ hinje kɑɑmɑyom goono.
40025001	Bine ǹ go bɛɛnɛ kpetɛrɛ himɑndi zɑngɑ hundiyo wei kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ hɑru bei. Ǹ nɑ ngei fitilɑ yom zɑɑ. Ǹ hunu kɑ kpei hɑruhiji kubeyom.
40025002	Ǹ kunɑ gundɑ igu lɑɑkɑlɑntɛ ndɑ igu sɑmɔ.
40025003	Sɑmɔ yom di nɑ ngei fitilɑ yom zɑɑ. Ǹ mɑnɑ jii zɑɑ.
40025004	Ammɑ lɑɑkɑlɑntɛ yom di nɑ ngei jii yom zɑɑ gɑɑsu yom kunɑ ndɑ ngei fitilɑ yom.
40025005	Kɑ hɑruhiji jɛ, cɔfɔ ǹ kulu dusungu kɑ jiibi.
40025006	Ciini bindi cɔfɔ cilili tɛ: Gunɑ, hɑruhijɑ go kɑɑ. Wɑ tunu kɑ ɑ̀ kube.
40025007	Ǹ kulu tunu kɑ ngei fitilɑ yom hinsɑ kɑ zɑɑ.
40025008	Cɔfɔ sɑmu yom di cii lɑɑkɑlɑntɛ yom di sɛ: Wɑ i no wom jii yom di gɑɑ zɑmɑ i fitilɑ yom go bu.
40025009	Ammɑ lɑɑkɑlɑntɛ yom di cii ǹ sɛ: Awo. À mɑnɑ wɑsɑ i yom mo hɑli ndɑ wom sɛ. Wɑ kpei neerɑkɔ yom dɔ kɑ dei wom bɔm sɛ.
40025010	Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ go kpei deiyom, cɔfɔ hɑruhijɑ kɑɑ. Wɔ kɑ yom sɔlu kɔ, ǹ huro hijɑ dɔ ndɑ hɑruhijɑ. Cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ gɑmbuɑ mee dɑɑbu.
40025011	À bɑndɑ no cindei kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ hɑru bei mo kɑɑ kɑ cii: Kpe, kpe feeri i sɛ.
40025012	Ammɑ ɑ̀ tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, ɑ si wom bei.
40025013	Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ bɑtu zɑmɑ wom si hɑnu bei. Wom si lɔkɑci bei kɑ hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ go kɑɑ.
40025014	Bɛɛnɛ kpetɛrɛ himɑ no zɑngɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑru kɑ kpei lɑɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ mooru. À nɑ ngɑ bɑnyɑ yom cɛɛ kɑ ngɑ hɑibɑrikɑ yom dɑm ǹ kɑmbɛ.
40025015	À nɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu koko gu no ɑfɔ sɛ. À nɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu koko hinkɑ no ɑfɔ mo sɛ. À nɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu koko fɔ no ihinzɑntɛ sɛ. À nɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu no hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hini. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑɑru kɑ kpei lɑɑbu ŋmɑni.
40025016	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu koko gu no di, ɑ̀ kpei tenku ndɑ. À du ɑnzɛrɛfu koko gu kpɛɛnɛ ɑ̀ bɔm.
40025017	Yɑ no, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu koko hinkɑ no di mo, ɑ̀ du ɑnzɛrɛfu koko hinkɑ kpɛɛnɛ ɑ̀ bɔm.
40025018	Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu koko fɔ no di wɔ, gɑndɑ no ɑ̀ fɑnsi kɑ ngɑ kpeɑ nooru dɑm kɑ tugu.
40025019	Hɑli kɑ jɛ tɑm yom di kpe kɑɑ nooru kɑbuyom ǹ dɔ.
40025020	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu koko gu no di kɑɑ. À kɑɑndɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu koko gu kpɛɛnɛ ɑ̀ bɔm kɑ cii: Kpe, n nooru neyɑ kɑ n no ɑ sɛ. Gunɑ, n noorɑ nɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu koko gu hɛi kpɛɛnɛ ɑ̀ bɔm.
40025021	À kpeɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: À boori bɑnyɑ hinno, nɑɑnekpɛ. N tɛ nɑɑnekpɛ hɛ fɔ cɛnɑ gɑɑ, ɑ gɑ iboobo dɑm n kɑmbɛ. Huro n kpe fɑihã kunɑ.
40025022	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu koko hinkɑ no di mo kɑɑ. À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe, n noorɑ neyɑ kɑ n no ɑ sɛ. Gunɑ, n noorɑ nɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu koko hinkɑ hɛi kpɛɛnɛ ɑ̀ bɔm.
40025023	A kpeɑ cii ngɑ mo sɛ: À boori, bɑnyɑ hinno nɑɑnekpɛ. N tɛ nɑɑnekpɛ hɛ fɔ cɛnɑ gɑɑ. A gɑ iboobo dom n kɑmbɛ. Huro n kpe fɑihã kunɑ.
40025024	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu koko fɔ no di mo kɑɑ. À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe, ɑ nɑ n bei kɑ ni bɔrɔ gɑɑbɔ no. N wi no nungu kɑ n mɑnɑ dumɑ kɑ meigu nungu kɑ n mɑnɑ see.
40025025	Kɑ ɑ hɑmburu, gɑndɑ kunɑ no ɑ nɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu koko fɔ di dɑm kɑ tugu. Gunɑ, n ŋmɔne neyɑ.
40025026	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ kpe di tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Bɑnyɑ lɑlɔ, yofuno. N bei kɑ ɑ cini wi no nungu kɑ yɑ nɑ dumɑ kɑ meigu, nungu kɑ yɑ nɑ see.
40025027	Ngɑ di sɛ, ɑ̀ himɑ n mɑ ɑ nooru jisi nungu ko ɑ̀ mɑ tɔntɔnu. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ yɑ du hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑ ŋmɔne ndɑ ɑ liibɑ.
40025028	Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu koko fɔ di tɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ no bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ iwei di sɛ.
40025029	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ no ɑ̀ mɑ goono bɑyom kunɑ. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ mo bɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ tɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
40025030	Wɑ bɑnyɑ kɔnu wɔ cetu tɛrɛ kube kunɑ, nungu kɑ hɛ̃ni ndɑ hinje kɑɑmɑyom goono.
40025031	Sɑɑ kɑ hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ go kɑɑ ɑ deizɑ kunɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ dntɔneize hɑlɑɑlɑ yom kulu ɑ bɑndɑ, ɑ kɑɑ gɔrɔ ɑ kɑrigɑ deizɑkpɛ bɔm.
40025032	Hɑndunyɑ dimi kulu kɑɑ meigu ɑ jine. A gɑ ǹ fee cɛrɛ zɑngɑ kurukɔ cini kɑ ngɑ feeji yom fee ndɑ hɑncine yom.
40025033	A kɑɑ feeji yom jisi ɑ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ kɑ hɑncine yom jisi ɑ kɑmbɛwo gɑɑ.
40025034	Hɛɛ Kpe, ɑ kɑɑ cii beerem kɑ ǹ goono ɑ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ sɛ: Wɑ kɑɑ wom kɑ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ nɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm wom gɑɑ. Wom mɑ kpetɛrɑ tubu kɑ ǹ sɔlu wom sɛ zɑ hɑndunyɑ sinjiyom.
40025035	A mɑɑ hɛrɛɛ, wom nɑ ɑ no ŋmɑɑri. A mɑɑ jo, wom nɑ ɑ no hɑri. A ci yo, wom nɑ ɑ kunfɑ.
40025036	A gɔrɔ bumbum, wom nɑ jiine dɑm ɑ gɑɑ. A gɔrɔ kɑ zɛnjɛ, wom nɑ ɑ kunfɑ. A gɔrɔ kɑsu kunɑ, wom kɑɑ di hɛɛ.
40025037	Sɑɑ di bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu kɑɑ tu kɑ cii: Kpe, sɑɑ fɔ no i di ni, n go mɑɑ hɛrɛɛ, i nɑ n no ŋmɑɑri wɑlɑ n go mɑɑ jo, i nɑ n no hɑri?
40025038	Sɑɑ fɔ no i di ni yo kɑ n kunfɑ wɑlɑ bumbum kɑ jiine dɑm n gɑɑ?
40025039	Sɑɑ fɔ no i di ni, n go zɛnjɛ wɑlɑ n goono kɑsu kunɑ i kpei n dɔ?
40025040	Hɛɛ mo Kpe, yɑ kɑɑ tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, zɑ kɑ wom nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ɑ nyɑizei ŋmɔne icɛnɑ fɔ sɛ, wom nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ɑ sɛ noyɑ.
40025041	Bine, ɑ kɑɑ cii wɔ kɑ yom goono ɑ kɑmbɛwo gɑɑ sɛ: Wɑ gɑnɑ ɑ sɛ wom lɑɑliɑntɛ yom. Wɑ kpei huro nini kɑ ɑ̀ si bu pɑi kɑ ǹ sɔlu Ibilisi ndɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔneize yom sɛ.
40025042	A mɑɑ hɛrɛɛ, wom mɑnɑ ɑ no ŋmɑɑri. A mɑɑ jo, wom mɑnɑ ɑ no hɑri.
40025043	A ci yo, wom mɑnɑ ɑ kunfɑ. A gɔrɔ bumbum, wom mɑnɑ jiine dɑm ɑ gɑɑ. A go zɛnjɛ kɑ gɔrɔ kɑsu kunɑ, wom mɑnɑ ɑ kunfɑ.
40025044	Ngei mo bine kɑɑ tu ɑ sɛ kɑ cii: Kpe, sɑɑ fɔ no i di ni, n go mɑɑ hɛrɛɛ wɑlɑ n go mɑɑ jo? Sɑɑ fɔ no i di ni, n ci yo wɑlɑ n goono bumbum wɑlɑ n go zɛnjɛ wɑlɑ n goono kɑsu kunɑ, i mɑnɑ n kunfɑ?
40025045	A kɑɑ tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, zɑ kɑ wom mɑnɑ ɑ̀ tɛ icɛnɑ yom wɔ ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ sɛ wom mɑnɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ɑ sɛ noyɑ.
40025046	Ngei wɔ kɑɑ kpei ciiti kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni kunɑ. Ammɑ bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu yom wɔ mo kɑɑ huro hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni kunɑ.
40026001	À kɑɑ tɔ sɑɑ kɑ Yesu nɑ meecine nge yom di tɛ kɑ beeni, ɑ̀ cii ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ:
40026002	Wom bei kɑ jiribi hinkɑ gɑme Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru no. Hɛɛ Adɑmize, ǹ bɑ kɑ ɑ dɑm kɑmbɛ kɑ ɑ kɑnji.
40026003	Gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom meigu gɑrɑndikɔ beeri kɑtɑ kunɑ. À mɑɑ no Kɑifɑ.
40026004	Ǹ go sɑwɑrɑ ngei mɑ Yesu dii ndɑ cɛmbɛrɛ kɑ wi.
40026005	Ammɑ ǹ ci: À mɑ si tɛ jingɑruɑ hine zɑmɑ butugu mɑ si tɛ jɑmɑ di gɑme sɛ.
40026006	Yesu goono Betɑni kpɑɑrɑ Simɔ jire fɔ fuu kunɑ.
40026007	Weibɔrɔ fɔ mo kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ ndɑ kɔlibɛ kpɑrɛ fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ ɑlibɑti. À mefɔ ndɑ wɑidi dimi fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cɑɑdɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. À kɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ munu Yesu bɔm sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go gɔrɔ ŋmɑɑyom dɔ.
40026008	Ammɑ kɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom di ɑ̀, cɔfɔ ǹ bine tɔ. Ǹ cii: Ifɔ yɑ ci wɑidi wɔ sɑrɑyom mɑɑsɑ?
40026009	À himɑ no dom, ǹ mɑ wɑidi wɔ neerɑ cɑɑdɑ kɑ nooru di fɑrisi tɑlikɑ yom sɛ.
40026010	Zɑ kɑ Yesu bei sendi kɑ ǹ go tɛ, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ no wom go wei wɔ tɑɑbɑndi? Gbei hinno no ɑ̀ go tɛ ɑ sɛ.
40026011	Tɑlikɑ yom bo goono ndɑ wom sɑɑ kulu ɑmmɑ hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ si bo goono ndɑ wom sɑɑ kulu.
40026012	Ammɑ wei wɔ, ɑ̀ wɑidi wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ munu ɑ bɔm, ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ no ɑ gɑɑhɑm fijiyom sɛ.
40026013	Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, nungu kulu kɑ ǹ kɑɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɔ fɛɛ hɑndunyɑ kulu kunɑ, ǹ kɑɑ hɛ kɑ weibɔrɔ wɔ mo tɛ deede kɑ hɔngɔɑ̀.
40026014	Coobɑɑbɑize wei cindi hinkɑ di ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Yudɑ Isikɑriɔtu, ɑ̀ kpei gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom dɔ.
40026015	À cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ no wom gɑ ɑ no yɑ Yesu dɑm wom kɑmbɛ? Cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ nooru ɑnzɛrɛfu wɔkɔkɔ wɑrɑnzɑ no ɑ̀ sɛ.
40026016	Zɑ sɑɑ di no ɑ̀ go ceeci zɑngɑ ngɑ mɑ tɛ kɑ Yesu dɑm kɑmbɛ.
40026017	Buuru Kɑsɑmi Si jingɑru hɑnu sintinɑ, coobɑɑbɑize yom di kɑɑ sendi Yesu sɛ. Ǹ cii: Mɑni no n go bɑɑ i mɑ Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru wɔ sɔlu n mɑ ŋmɑɑ?
40026018	Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wɑ kpei wɑngɑrɑ ŋmɑne dɔ. Wom mɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ. Coobɑɑbɑ cii ngɑ lɔkɑci mɑɑni. À kɑɑ Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru tɛ n kpɑɑrɑ ndɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom.
40026019	Coobɑɑbɑize yom di tɛ zɑngɑ Yesu cii ǹ mɑ tɛ. Ǹ nɑ Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru ŋmɑɑri sɔlu.
40026020	Wiciri kɑmbu tɔ, ɑ̀ go gɔrɔ kɑ ŋmɑɑ ndɑ coobɑɑbɑize wei cindi hinkɑ di.
40026021	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ go ŋmɑɑ, ɑ̀ cii: Cimi no, ɑ go cii wom sɛ, wom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ gɑ ɑ dɑm kɑmbɛ.
40026022	Cɔfɔ ǹ bine sɑrɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. Ǹ kulu sinti kɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ cii: Kpe, hɛɛ no? Kpe, hɛɛ no?
40026023	À tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ dɑm combu ɑ bɑndɑ, ɑkpɛ yɑ gɑ ɑ dɑm kɑmbɛ.
40026024	Hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ go kpei ndɑ zɑngɑ ǹ hɑntum ɑ bɔm. Ammɑ kɑito bɔrɔ kpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ hɛɛ, Adɑmize dɑm kɑmbɛ. À boori dom ǹ mɑ si ɑkpɛ hɛi pɑi.
40026025	Yudɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm kɑmbɛ mo tu kɑ cii: À nɑ ci hɛɛ no Coobɑɑbɑ? Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ni, n nɑ ɑ̀ cii.
40026026	Kɑ ǹ go ŋmɑɑ Yesu nɑ buuru zɑɑ kɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm ɑ̀ gɑɑ. A nɑ ɑ̀ zenji zenji kɑ fɑrisi coobɑɑbɑize yom di sɛ kɑ cii: Wɑ tɑ, wɑ ŋmɑɑ. Wɔne yɑ ci ɑ gɑɑhɑm.
40026027	À nɑ gulɑize fɔ mo zɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu. À nɑ ngɑ di mo no ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wom kulu mɑ ɑ̀ hɑm.
40026028	Wɔne yɑ ci ɑ kuri, ɑlikɑwɑli teji tɛyom ŋmɔne kɑ ɑ̀ munu bɔrɔ boobo guribi dulum yɑɑfɑyom sɑbu sɛ.
40026029	Ammɑ ɑ go cii wom sɛ, ɑ si lɛzɛ̃ hɑri wɔ hɑm kpɛɛnɛ kɑlɑ hɑnu kɑ ɑ yɑɑrɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hɑm ndɑ wom ɑ Bɑɑbɑ kpetɛrɛ kunɑ.
40026030	Kɑ ǹ nɑ betu fɔ tɛ, ǹ hunu kɑ kpei Olibe zugu tondi kuku dɔ.
40026031	Yesu bine cii ǹ sɛ: Wom kulu kɑɑ du dɛrɛyom kɔbɛ ɑ gɑɑ ciini wɔ. Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ go cii: “A kɑɑ kurukɔ kɑru. Kuru feeji yom mo kɑɑ kɑru kɑ see.”
40026032	Ammɑ ɑ tunɑndiyom bɑndɑ, ɑ wom jinɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu.
40026033	Cɔfɔ Piɛɛ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Bɑ de ǹ kulu du dɛrɛyom kɔbɛ n gɑɑ, hɛɛ wɔ ɑ si du dɛrɛyom kɔbɛ n gɑɑ pɑi.
40026034	Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Cimi no ɑ go cii n sɛ, ciini wɔ hɑli gɔrɔngɔ cɑ n gɑ ɑ ze ce hinzɑ.
40026035	Piɛɛ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Bɑ de yɑ bu n bɑndɑ, ɑ si n ze. Coobɑɑbɑize yom di kulu cii yɑ di.
40026036	Yesu bine ndɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom di tɔ nungu fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Gɛtɑsemɑni. À cii ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ: Wɑ gɔrɔ nee hɑli yɑ kpei yɔngɔ kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ.
40026037	À nɑ Piɛɛ ndɑ Zɑbɑdi koo hinkɑ boi ngɑ bɑndɑ. Yesu bine sinti kɑ sɑrɑ. À lɑɑkɑli go tunu kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
40026038	Bine, ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Binesɛrɛ bɑmbɑtɑ nɑ ɑ bine dii kɑlɑ ɑ̀ tɔ bu gɑɑ. Wɑ gɔrɔ nee kɑ bɑtu ndɑ hɛɛ.
40026039	À kpei jinɑ cɛnɑ, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ jɛndɛbiri kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ. À cii: A Bɑɑbɑ, de ɑ̀ hini kɑ tɛ n mɑ nɑm tɑɑbi wɔ mɑ bisɑ kɑ mooru hɛɛ. Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu ɑ̀ mɑ si ci hɛ kɑ ɑ go bɑɑ kɑlɑ hɛ kɑ n bine go bɑɑ.
40026040	À kɑɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom di dɔ kɑ ǹ gɑru ǹ go jiibi. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii Piɛɛ sɛ: To. Wom mɑnɑ hini kɑ bɑtu ndɑ hɛɛ bɑ guuru fɔ?
40026041	Wom mo bɑtu ko kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ zɑmɑ wom mɑ si huro suiyom kunɑ. Bine, cɛ tu ɑmmɑ gɑɑhɑm yɑ hinɑbunu no.
40026042	À ye kɑ kpei ce hinkɑntɛ kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ. À cii: A Bɑɑbɑ, de ɑ̀ si tɛ tɑɑbi wɔ mɑ mooru hɛɛ kɑlɑ yɑ ɑ̀ hɑm, n binebɑɑ mɑ tɛ.
40026043	Kɑ Yesu kɑɑ ɑ̀ ye kɑ ǹ gɑru jiibi gɑɑ zɑmɑ ǹ moo yom tim.
40026044	À nɑ ǹ nɑm kpɛɛnɛ kɑ kpei kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ ce hinzɑntɛ ndɑ sendi fɔlɔnku yom.
40026045	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ kɑɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom di dɔ kɑ cii: Mɑɑsɑnkulu, wom jiibi kɑ hulonzom bɑ? Gunɑ, lɔkɑci mɑɑni. Hɛɛ Adɑmize, ǹ go kɑ ɑ dɑm dulumkoni yom kɑmbɛ.
40026046	Wɑ tunu. I mɑ kpei. Gunɑ, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ dɑm kɑmbɛ di, ɑ̀ tɔ kpɑɑrɑ.
40026047	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go sendi, cɔfɔ Yudɑ iwei cindi hinkɑ di ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ. Bɔrɔ boobo goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ndɑ tɑkubɑ yom ndɑ goobu yom. Gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom yɑ nɑ ǹ dɔntɔm.
40026048	Yudɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm kɑmbɛ di, ɑ̀ nɑ jɑmɑ di no ɑlɑmu fɔ kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ jɛrɛbɛ sumsum, ngɑ noyɑ. Wɑ ɑ̀ dii ɑ̀ mɑ boori.
40026049	Zɑ ǹ mɑɑni Yesu dɔ cɔfɔ Yudɑ cii: Fɔɔ, Coobɑɑbɑ. À hiyɑ ko kɑ ɑ̀ jɛrɛbɛ sumsum kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
40026050	Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A kpɑɑsi, ifɔ yɑ kɑɑndɑ ni? Cɔfɔ beerem nɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ Yesu bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ dii.
40026051	Beerem kɑ ǹ goono ndɑ Yesu, ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ nɑ tɑkubɑ hoobu. À nɑ gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ bɑnyɑ fɔ beri kɑ hɑngɑ fɔ kɑɑ.
40026052	Cɔfɔ Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N tɑkubɑ di yeti ɑ̀ nyɑ kunɑ. Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go tɑkubɑ zɑɑ, tɑkubɑ yɑ gɑ ɑ̀ hɑlɑci.
40026053	N tɑmmɑ ɑ si hini kɑ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ mɑɑsɑ no, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ no ɑ̀ bisɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize kuru wei cindi hinkɑ?
40026054	Ammɑ de yɑ no, mɛtɛ no Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ yom kɑɑ tɛ kɑ tɔ kɑ ǹ cii tilɑsi kɑlɑ de yɑ di mɑ tɛ?
40026055	Lɔkɑci ngɑ di no Yesu cii jɑmɑ di sɛ: Wom kɑɑ kɑ ɑ dii ndɑ tɑkubɑ yom ndɑ goobu yom zɑngɑ zee? Hɑnu kulu mo ɑ go gɔrɔ wom gɑme ko cooɑndi Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ, wom mɑnɑ ɑ dii.
40026056	Ammɑ wɔne wɔ kulu go tɛ no zɑmɑ ɑndebi yom tirɑ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ yom mɑ tɔ sɛ. Cɔfɔ coobɑɑbɑize yom di kulu nɑ ɑ̀ nɑm kɑ zuuru.
40026057	Beerem kɑ ǹ nɑ Yesu dii kpeindɑɑ̀ Kɑifɑ gɑrɑndikɔ beeri dɔ, nungu kɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom go meigu.
40026058	Piɛɛ nɑ Yesu hɑmine, zɑ nungu mooru kɑlɑ gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ kɑtɑ dɔ. À huro kɑ gɔrɔ gbeiteeri yom dɔ kɑ di zɑngɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ beeni ndɑ.
40026059	Gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom ndɑ Yuifu yom ciiti dumbukɔ yom go tɑngɑri sɛdɑ fɔ ceeci Yesu bɔm ngei mɑ du kɑ ɑ̀ wi.
40026060	Ammɑ ǹ mɑnɑ du ɑ̀, bɑ kɑ tɑngɑri sɛdɑkpɛ boobo kɑɑ. Hɑli kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ no tɑngɑri sɛdɑkpɛ hinkɑ fɔ kɑɑ.
40026061	Ǹ cii: Bɔrɔ kpɛ yɑ cii ngɑ hini kɑ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ zeeri kɑ ye kɑ ɑ̀ cini jiribi hinzɑ gɑme.
40026062	Cɔfɔ gɑrɑndikɔ beeri di tunu kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N si tu ndɑ hɛ fɔ kulu bɑ? Hɛ fɔ sɛdɑ beerem wɔ go tɛ n bɔm?
40026063	Ammɑ Yesu go dɛnjɛ. Bine gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: A go kɑ n dɑm, n mɑ ze ndɑ Ikpɛ Hundikpɛ. N mɑ cii i sɛ de ni yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ, Ikpɛ Ize.
40026064	Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Ni, n nɑ ɑ̀ cii. Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu ɑ cii wom sɛ kpɛɛnɛ, zɑ mɑɑsɑ wom kɑɑ di hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ mo gɔrɔ Dɑbɑrikpɛ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ. Wom kɑɑ di mo ɑ go kɑɑ bɛɛnɛ buru yom bɔm.
40026065	Cɔfɔ gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ nɑ ngɑ kpɛ pɑti pɑti Yesu sendi ngɑ di sɑbu sɛ. A cii: A nɑ Ikpɛ sendi yɑmu kɑ ɑ̀ cɛnɑndi. Sɛdɑ fɔ no i go bɑɑ kpɛɛnɛ? Gunɑ, mɑɑsɑnkulu wom mɑɑ ɑ̀ sendi yɑmɔ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ kɑ Ikpɛ cɛnɑndi.
40026066	Mɛtɛ ɑ̀ himɑ wom sɛ? Ǹ tu kɑ cii: À tɔ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ wi.
40026067	À gɑɑ no ǹ go yɔlɔ tufɑ ɑ̀ moodumɑ gɑɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ lunkutɛ kɑ ɑ̀ dɛmbɛ dɛmbɛ.
40026068	Ǹ go cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Andebitɛrɛ tɛ i sɛ, Mɛsiyɑ. Mee yɑ nɑ n kɑru?
40026069	Piɛɛ goono hundi bɑtumɑ kunɑ ko gɔrɔ. Cɔfɔ gbeiize hundiyo fɔ kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ kɑ cii. Ni bine, n goono Yesu Gɑlile lɑɑbu bɔrɔ di bɑndɑ.
40026070	Ammɑ Piɛɛ ze ǹ kulu jine kɑ cii: Yɑ nɑ bei hɛ kɑ n go cii.
40026071	Kɑ ɑ̀ go hunu hundi bɑtumɑ kunɑ ko kpei kɑtɑ dɔ, hundiyo ŋmɑni fɔ mo di ɑ̀. Ngɑ mo cii beerem kɑ ǹ goono nungu di sɛ: Bɔrɔ kpɛ goono Yesu Nɑzɑrɛtu bɑndɑ.
40026072	Piɛɛ yɑɑrɑ kɑ ze. À cii: A si bɔrɔ kpɛ bei.
40026073	Hɑli cɛnɑ beerem kɑ ǹ goono nungu di mɑɑni kɑ cii Piɛɛ sɛ: Siikɑ si ni mo, n goono beerem di kunɑ zɑmɑ bɑ n dɛɛnɛ sendi gɑɑ ǹ go kɑ n bei.
40026074	Cɔfɔ Piɛɛ sinti kɑ bɔm lɑɑliyom tɛ kɑ ze. À cii: A si bɔrɔ kpɛ bei. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ gɔrɔngɔ cɑ.
40026075	Bine Piɛɛ hɔngɔ Yesu sendɑ kɑ Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Hɑli gɔrɔngɔ cɑ, n gɑ ɑ ze ce hinzɑ. Piɛɛ hunu tɛrɛ ko hɛ̃ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
40027001	Kɑ mo bo gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom kulu ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom sɑwɑrɑ Yesu bɔm ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ wi.
40027002	Kɑ ǹ nɑ Yesu hɔ ǹ kpeindɑɑ̀ kɑ dɑm Pɔnse Pilɑtu kɑmbɛ, lɑɑbu gɑɑbikoni fɔ.
40027003	Yudɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Yesu dɑm kɑmbɛ, sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ di ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ ciiti kɑ zeeri, ɑ̀ himɑ ngɑ bɔm sɛ sisibi. À kpeindɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu wɔkɔkɔ wɑrɑnzɑ di gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom dɔ.
40027004	A cii: A nɑ dulum tɛ kɑ ɑ nɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ tɑɑli dɑm kɑmbɛ. Ammɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: I yom wɔ i bɑ fɔ. À ci n sendi.
40027005	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ noorɑ cetu Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ hundi kunɑ. Bine, ɑ̀ kpei kɑ ngɑ bɔm hɔ kɑ kɔtɔ.
40027006	Gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom di nɑ noorɑ zɑɑ ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɑlɑli ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ dɑm jisiri kunɑ zɑmɑ kuri deiyom nooru no.
40027007	Ǹ sɑwɑrɑ kɑ kusu tɛkɔ fɔ fɑri dei ndɑ noorɑ yo yom fijiyom sɛ.
40027008	À sɛ no kɑlɑ hunkunɑ ǹ go cii fɑri ngɑ di sɛ, kuri fɑri.
40027009	Yɑ no ǹ nɑ sendɑ tɔnɑndi kɑ ǹ cii ɑndebi Yeremi mee gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cii: “Ǹ nɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu wɔkɔkɔ wɑrɑnzɑ zɑɑ, nooru hɛ kɑ ǹ dɑm ɑ̀ gɑɑ, kɑ Isirɑilɑ ize fɔ yom nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
40027010	Ǹ nɑ kusu tɛkɔ fɔ fɑri dei ndɑ zɑngɑ Kpe nɑ ɑ no fɔndɔ.”
40027011	Yesu cɛ gɑɑbikonɑ jine. À nɑ Yesu hã kɑ cii: Ni no Yuifu yom Kpe bɑ? Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ni, n cii.
40027012	Kɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom go kɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɛ fɔ kulu cii.
40027013	Pilɑtu bine cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N si mɑɑ sendi boobo wɔ kɑ ǹ go sɛdɑ n bɔm no?
40027014	À mɑnɑ tu ɑ̀ sɛ bihi kɑlɑ gɑɑbikoni di mɑmɑci ndɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
40027015	Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru kulu gɑɑ bine, gɑɑbikoni di cini kɑsuize fɔ tɑm jɑmɑ sɛ wɔ kɑ ǹ go bɑɑ ǹ mɑ tɑm.
40027016	Kɑsuize fɔ goono mo kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Bɑrɑbɑ. Bɔrɔ kulu yɑ nɑ ɑ̀ bei.
40027017	Bine kɑ ǹ meigu, Pilɑtu cii jɑmɑ di sɛ: Wɔ fɔ wom go bɑɑ yɑ tɑm, Bɑrɑbɑ dee wɑlɑ Yesu di kɑ ǹ go cii ɑ̀ sɛ Mɛsiyɑ?
40027018	Pilɑtu cii yɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ bei kɑ cɛnsɛ yɑ nɑm ǹ nɑ Yesu dɑm kɑmbɛ.
40027019	Sɑɑ kɑ Pilɑtu go gɔrɔ ciiti kɑrigɑ bɔm ɑ̀ wɛndɛ nɑ bɔrɔ fɔ dɔntɔm ɑ̀ dɔ kɑ cii: N mɑ si hɛ fɔ kulu tɛ Bɔrɔ Cɛsusu wɔ sɛ. Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ tɑɑbi kɑlɑ kɑlɑ hunkunɑ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ bɔrɔ di hɑndiri kunɑ.
40027020	Ammɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom nɑ jɑmɑ di bɛrɛ ǹ mɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ ǹ mɑ Bɑrɑbɑ tɑm kɑ Yesu wi.
40027021	Gɑɑbikoni di tu kɑ cii ǹ sɛ: Bɔrɔ hinkɑ di, wɔ fɔ no wom go bɑɑ yɑ tɑm? Cɔfɔ ǹ cii: Bɑrɑbɑ, Bɑrɑbɑ.
40027022	Pilɑtu mo cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ no yɑ tɛ Yesu di mo sɛ kɑ ǹ go cii ɑ̀ sɛ Mɛsiyɑ? Ǹ kulu cii: Ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji. Ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji.
40027023	Ammɑ gɑɑbikonɑ cii: Ifɔ sɛ? Hɛ lɑlɔ fɔ no ɑ̀ tɛ? Cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ jinde zɑɑ kɑ kuwɑ ndɑ gɑɑbi kpɛɛnɛ kɑ cii: Ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji. Ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji.
40027024	Pilɑtu go di ngɑ si du hɛ fɔ kulu kɑlɑ kɑ kɔsɔngu di go tɔntɔnu. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ hɑri kɑɑ kɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ yom nyunu jɑmɑ di jine. À cii: Hɛɛ wɔ, tɑɑli si ɑ bɔm Bɔrɔ Cɛsusu wɔ wiyom gɑɑ. À ci wom sendi.
40027025	Cɔfɔ jɑmɑ di kulu tu kɑ cii: À kuri bɑnɑndi mɑ kɑm i bɔm ndɑ i koo yom bɔm.
40027026	Pilɑtu bine nɑ Bɑrɑbɑ tɑm ǹ sɛ. Kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Yesu bulɑɑlɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm kɑmbɛ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji.
40027027	Gɑɑbikoni di wɑnguize yom kpeindɑ Yesu ciiti kɑtɑ. Wɑnguize yom kuru meigu ɑ̀ bɔm.
40027028	Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ jiine yom kɑɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ kɑ kpɛ siini kuku fɔ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ.
40027029	Ǹ nɑ kɑriji cɛ zɑngɑ bɔmtɔbɛ kɑ didiji ɑ̀ bɔm gɑɑ. Ǹ nɑ sɑɑri fɔ mo dɑm ɑ̀ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ kunɑ. Ǹ sɔmbu ɑ̀ jine kɑ ɑ̀ hɑɑru. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ fɔɔ kɑ cii: Fɔɔ, Yuifu yom Kpe.
40027030	Ǹ nɑ yɔlɔ tufɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Ǹ nɑ sɑɑri di zɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sɔtɛ ndɑ, bɔm gɑɑ.
40027031	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɑɑru kɑ beeni, ǹ nɑ kpɛ kuku di kɑɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ bumbum jiine yom dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ. Ǹ kpeindɑɑ̀ tɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji.
40027032	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ hunu cɔfɔ ǹ kube ndɑ Sileni bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Simɔ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tilɑsi ɑ̀ mɑ Yesu bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ zɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ jɛrɛ.
40027033	Ǹ tɔ nungu fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Gologɑtɑ. À feeriji yɑ ci Bɔm Kurumbu nungu.
40027034	Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ no hɑri mɔrɔ kɑ ǹ meigu ndɑ gɑdusɑndi sɑfɑri ɑ̀ mɑ hɑm. Kɑ Yesu nɑ ɑ̀ tɑbɑɑ ɑ̀ hungu kɑ hɑm.
40027035	Kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji ǹ nɑ tɛtɛ tɛ ɑ̀ jiine yom bɔm kɑ du kɑ ǹ fɑrisi. Ǹ nɑ ngɑ di tɛ zɑmɑ Sendi yom kɑ ɑndebi cii mɑ tɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cii: "Ǹ nɑ ɑ jiine yom fɑrisi ngei gɑme. Ǹ nɑ tɛtɛ tɛ ɑ jiine yom bɔm.”
40027036	Ǹ hɑnnɑ kɑ gɔrɔ ɑ̀ dɔ nungu di ko bɑtu.
40027037	Ǹ nɑ sɑbɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑ hɑntum. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji ɑ̀ bɔm dɔ bɛɛnɛ kɑ cii: BƆRƆ WƆ YA CI YESU, YUIFU YOM KPE.
40027038	Ǹ nɑ zee beeri hinkɑ fɔ mo kɑnji ɑ̀ bɑndɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑfɔ kɑnji ɑ̀ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑfɔ mo kɑnji ɑ̀ kɑmbɛwo gɑɑ.
40027039	Bisɑkɔ yom mo go kɑ ɑ̀ woo kɑ cɔɔrɔ.
40027040	Ǹ go cii: Ni, n cii n hini kɑ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ zeeri kɑ yɑɑrɑ kɑ cini jiribi hinzɑ gɑme. De ni, n ci Ikpɛ Ize n mɑ n bɔm fɑɑbɑ. N mɑ zumbu bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ wɔ bɔm.
40027041	Yɑ no gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom, nge yom mo go kɑ ɑ̀ hɑɑru.
40027042	Ǹ cii: À nɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom fɑɑbɑ fɑ, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ si hini kɑ ngɑ bɔm fɑɑbɑ. De Isirɑilɑ Kpe no, ɑ̀ mɑ zumbu mɑɑsɑnkulu bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ wɔ bɔm. I gɑ ɑ̀ no cimi.
40027043	À nɑɑne Ikpɛ gɑɑ. Ikpɛ mɑ ɑ̀ fɑɑbɑ mɑɑsɑnkulu de Ikpɛ go bɑɑ fɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ cii ngɑ yɑ ci Ikpɛ Ize.
40027044	Zee beeri yom di mo kɑ ǹ kɑnji ndɑ, ngei mo nɑ ɑ̀ woo zɑngɑ yɑ di.
40027045	Ammɑ zɑ zɑɑri bɔm bindi cɔfɔ kube tɛ lɑɑbu di kulu kunɑ kɑlɑ wiciri guuru hinzɑ.
40027046	Wiciri guuru hinzɑ di cɔfɔ Yesu kuwɑ ndɑ jinde beeri. À cii: “Eli, Eli lɑmɑ sɑbɑtɑni”. À feeriji yɑ ci, “A ŋmɔne Ikpɛ, ɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ, ifɔ sɛ n zuuru ɑ gɑɑ”?
40027047	Cɔfɔ ɑfɔ yom kɑ ǹ goono nungu di kɑ ǹ mɑɑ ngɑ di, ǹ cii: Bɔrɔ kpɛ go Eli cɛɛ.
40027048	Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ǹ kunɑ ɑfɔ zuuru kɑ kpei sɑku zɑɑ kɑ miti dufɛ̃ mɔrɔ kunɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ kɔtɔ sɑɑri gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛllɛ Yesu sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ sumsum.
40027049	Ammɑ cindei go cii: Wɑ nɑm. I mɑ di hɑli Eli go kɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ fɑɑbɑ no.
40027050	Kɑ Yesu ye kɑ kuwɑ kpɛɛnɛ ndɑ jinde beeri, ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ hundi tɑm.
40027051	Cɔfɔ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ lɑbude kɔɔtu ihinkɑ zɑ bɛɛnɛ kɑlɑ gɑndɑ. Gɑndɑ mo zinji. Tondi beeri yom kɔɔtu.
40027052	Sɑɑrɛ yom feeri. Hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ boobo mo kɑ ǹ bu tunu.
40027053	Ǹ hunu sɑɑrɛ yom kunɑ Yesu tunɑndiyom bɑndɑ kɑ huro wɑngɑrɑ hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ. Ǹ hunu tɛrɛ jɑmɑ sɛ.
40027054	Wɑnguize yom jinehune fɔ ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ go Yesu bɑtu. Kɑ ǹ di gɑndɑ zinji yom di ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ go tɛ, ǹ hɑmburu kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. Ǹ cii: Siikɑ si bɔrɔ kpɛ wɔ, Ikpɛ Ize no.
40027055	Weibɔrɔ boobo mo goono hɑli jinɑ ko gunɑ. Zɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu no ǹ nɑ Yesu gɑnɑ ko tɑmtɛrɛ ɑ̀ sɛ.
40027056	Ǹ kunɑ no Mɑriɑmɑ Mɑgɑdɑliɑ goono ndɑ Mɑriɑmɑ, Yɑkɔfu ndɑ Yose nyɑ ndɑ Zɑbɑdi koo yom, ǹ nyɑ.
40027057	Wiciri tɔ, Alimɑte kpɑɑrɑ hɑibɑrikɑkpɛ fɔ mo kɑɑ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Yosɛfu. Yesu coobɑɑbɑize no ngɑ mo.
40027058	Bɔrɔ di yɑ kpei Pilɑtu dɔ kɑ Yesu bukɔ ŋmɑɑrɛ. Pilɑtu nɑ fɔndɔ no ǹ mɑ bukɔ di no ɑ̀ sɛ.
40027059	Yosɛfu nɑ bukɔɑ zɑɑ kɑ dɑm cɛsɛnjɛ hinnɑntɛ kunɑ.
40027060	À nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm tondi sɑɑrɛ teji fɔ kɑ ǹ zozobu kunɑ. Kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ tondi bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ gungure kɑ sɑɑrɛ di mee dɑɑbu ndɑ, ɑ̀ dirɑ.
40027061	Mɑriɑmɑ Mɑgɑdɑliɑ ndɑ Mɑriɑmɑ wɔ di mo goono nungu di ko gɔrɔ sɑɑrɛ di jine.
40027062	Kɑ ɑ̀ mo bo sɔluyom hɑnu bɑndɑ cɔfɔ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom nɑ cɛrɛ meigu kɑ kpei Pilɑtu dɔ.
40027063	Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: I jinɑ, i hɔngɔ kɑ sɑɑ kɑ zɑmbɑntɛ wɔ go hunɑ ɑ̀ cii jiribi hinzɑntɛ ngɑ tunu.
40027064	Ngɑ di sɛ, n mɑ fɔndɔ no ǹ mo sɑɑrɛ di bɑtu kɑlɑ jiribi hinzɑntɛ di. Ngɑ di mɑ tɛ zɑmɑ hɑnibɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom mɑ kɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ zee ciini kɑ cii beerem sɛ, ɑ̀ tunu bu kunɑ. Ngɑ di bɑ si kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ zɑmbɑ di, ɑ̀ kɑɑ jɑɑsɑ sintine wɔne.
40027065	Pilɑtu cii ǹ sɛ: Wom gundɑ bɑtukɔ yom. Wɑ kpei kɑ ɑ̀ dɑhirɑndi ihinno zɑngɑ wom hini kulu.
40027066	Ǹ kpei. Ǹ nɑ sɑɑrɛ di dɑhirɑndi kɑ sɛdɑ dɑm tondɑ gɑɑ. Ǹ nɑ bɑtukɔ yom dɑm mo.
40028001	Hulonzom hɑnu hine bisɑ. Jiribi iye ŋmɔne hɑnu sintine kɑ ɑ̀ cii ɑlɑhɑdi, kɑ mo bɑ bo Mɑriɑmɑ Mɑgɑdɑliɑ ndɑ Mɑriɑmɑ wɔ di kɑɑ sɑɑrɛ di gunɑyom.
40028002	Cɔfɔ gɑndɑ zinjiyom bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ tɛ. Kpe dɔntɔneize fɔ yɑ zumbu zɑ bɛɛnɛ kɑ kɑɑ tondɑ gungure kɑ gɑnɑndi. À go gɔrɔ ɑ̀ bɔm.
40028003	À tɑkɑri go himɑ zɑngɑ bɛɛnɛ nyɑlɑu. À jiine mo ikpɑrɛ no tɑi tɑi tɑi.
40028004	Hɑmburu nɑ bɑtukɔ yom dii kɑlɑ ǹ go gɑsi. Ǹ ye zɑngɑ bukɔ yom.
40028005	Bine Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di cii weibɔrɔ yom di sɛ: Wom wɔ, wɑ si hɑmburu zɑmɑ ɑ bei Yesu kɑ ǹ kɑnji di no wom go ceeci.
40028006	Ammɑ ɑ̀ si nee zɑmɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi zɑngɑ ɑ̀ cii di. Wɑ kɑɑ di nungu kɑ Kpe kɑni.
40028007	Wom mɑ kpei ndɑ wɑɑsi kɑ cii ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme. À bine go kɑ ǹ jinɑ kɑ kpei Gɑlile lɑɑbu. Wom kɑɑ di ɑ̀ nungu di. Gunɑ, ɑ cii wom sɛ.
40028008	Cɔfɔ ǹ hunu sɑɑrɛ di dɔ ndɑ wɑɑsi ndɑ hɑmburu ndɑ binekɑɑne bɑmbɑtɑ. Ǹ zuuru kɑ kpei bɑɑru no ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ.
40028009	Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ go kpei bɑɑru di no ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom di sɛ, cɔfɔ Yesu nɑ ǹ kube. À cii: A go wom fɔɔ. Ǹ mɑɑni ɑ̀ dɔ kɑ sɔmbu ɑ̀ jine. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ cee yom dii kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi.
40028010	Bine Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ si hɑmburu. Wɑ kpei bɑɑru no wom nyɑize yom sɛ ǹ mɑ kpei Gɑlile lɑɑbu. Ǹ kɑɑ di hɛɛ nungu di.
40028011	Weibɔrɔ yom di go kpei. Sɑɑ di no bɑtukɔ yom mo ŋmɔne ɑfɔ yom huro wɑngɑrɑ kɑ deede gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom sɛ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ.
40028012	Kɑ ǹ meigu ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom kɑ sɑwɑrɑ, ǹ nɑ nooru beeri no bɑtukɔ yom di sɛ.
40028013	Ǹ cii: Wom mɑ cii ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom yɑ kɑɑ ciini kɑ ɑ̀ zee sɑɑ kɑ wom go jiibi.
40028014	De gɑɑbikonɑ mɑɑ yɑ di, i hini kɑ ɑ̀ suurɑndi kɑ wom kɑɑ tɑɑbi kunɑ.
40028015	Ǹ nɑ noorɑ tɑ kɑ tɛ zɑngɑ ǹ cii ǹ mɑ cii di. Bɑɑru ngɑ di yɑ kɑru kɑ see Yuifu yom gɑme hɑli hunkunɑ.
40028016	Ammɑ coobɑɑbɑize wei cindi fɔ di kpei Gɑlile lɑɑbu tondi kuku fɔ bɔm, nungu kɑ Yesu jisi ǹ mɑ kpei.
40028017	Kɑ ǹ di ɑ̀, ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi ɑmmɑ ɑfɔ yom siikɑ.
40028018	Yesu mɑɑni ǹ dɔ kɑ sendi ǹ sɛ. À cii: Hini kulu no ǹ nɑ ɑ no bɛɛnɛ ndɑ gɑndɑ.
40028019	Ngɑ di sɛ wom mɑ kpei dimi yom kulu ǹ mɑ tɛ coobɑɑbɑize yom. Wom mɑ ǹ mirɑndi Bɑɑbɑ ndɑ Ize ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ.
40028020	Wom mɑ ǹ cooɑndi ǹ mɑ hɛ yom kulu tɛ kɑ ɑ nɑ wom no ǹ fɔndɔ. Hɛɛ mo, ɑ bo goono wom bɑndɑ sɑɑ kulu kɑlɑ zɑmɑni beenɑntɛ. Ami.
41001001	Bɑɑru Hinno Yesu Mɛsiyɑ Ikpɛ Ize bɔm, ɑ̀ sintiyom neyɑ.
41001002	Zɑngɑ ɑndebi yom hɑntum ngei tirɑ yom kunɑ kɑ cii: Gunɑ, ɑ go bɔrɔ fɔ sɑmbɑ n jine, wɔ kɑ ɑ gɑ n fɔndɔ sɔlu.
41001003	Ngɑ yɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kuwɑ gɑnji kunɑ. À jinde cii: Wom mɑ Kpe fɔndɑ sɔlu. Wom mɑ ɑ̀ fɔndɔize yom cɛɑndi.
41001004	Yohɑnnɑ kɑɑ ko beerem mirɑndi gɑnji kunɑ. À go wɑɑzu beerem mɑ tuubi kɑ bɛrɛ dulum yɑɑfɑyom sɑbu sɛ kɑ du mirɑndiyom.
41001005	Yude lɑɑbu bɔrɔ kulu ndɑ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ bɔrɔ kulu hunu kɑ kpei ɑ̀ dɔ. Yohɑnnɑ nɑ ǹ mirɑndi Yudum isɑ kunɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ngei dulum yom cii.
41001006	Yohɑnnɑ go kpɛ fɔ dɑm kɑ ǹ tɛ ndɑ yoo hɑmini. À gundɑ kunɑcendi kuuru ŋmɔne fɔ ngɑ cɛntɛ gɑɑ. À go doo ndɑ gɑnji yu ŋmɑɑ.
41001007	À go wɑɑzu kɑ cii: À go kɑɑ ɑ bɑndɑ, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ hɛɛ gɑɑbi. Yɑ nɑ tɔ yɑ ye gɑndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɑɑmu yom kɑɑ ɑ̀ sɛ.
41001008	Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ nɑ wom mirɑndi ndɑ hɑri. Ngɑ wɔ, ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ no ɑ̀ kɑɑ wom mirɑndi.
41001009	Jiribi nge yom di kunɑ no, ɑ̀ kɑɑ tɔ Yesu kɑɑ zɑ Nɑzɑrɛtu kpɑɑrɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu. Yohɑnnɑ nɑ ɑ̀ mirɑndi Yudum isɑ kunɑ.
41001010	Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ hunu hɑri kunɑ, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ di bɛɛnɛ go feeri. Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ go zumbu ɑ̀ bɔm zɑngɑ gutu.
41001011	Cɔfɔ jinde fɔ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ kɑ cii: Ni yɑ cii ɑ Ize Binegɑnji. N gɑɑ nɑ ɑ du ɑ binekɑɑne.
41001012	Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ nɑ Yesu fum gɑnji kunɑ.
41001013	À tɛ jiribi weitɑɑci gɑnji di kunɑ. Setɑm go kɑ ɑ̀ sui. Ngɑ ndɑ gɑnji hɑm yom no. Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom nɑ ɑ̀ sɑjo.
41001014	Ǹ nɑ Yohɑnnɑ dɑm kɑmbɛ. À bɑndɑ Yesu kpei Gɑlile lɑɑbu kɑ Bɑɑru Hinno fɛɛ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ bɔm.
41001015	À cii: Lɔkɑci tɔ. Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ mɑɑni. Wɑ tuubi. Wɑ nɑɑne Bɑɑru Hinno gɑɑ.
41001016	Kɑ ɑ̀ go Gɑlile buulɑ gɑnɑ, ɑ̀ di Simɔ ndɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛnɛ Andɛrɛ. Ǹ go biriji see buulɑ kunɑ zɑmɑ sɔrɔkɔ yom no.
41001017	Cɔfɔ Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ ɑ gɑnɑ. Zɑngɑ sɔrɔkɔ cini ciifi ceeci, ɑ kɑɑ wom tɛ bɔrɔ ceecikɔ yom.
41001018	Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ǹ nɑ ngei biriji yom nɑm kɑ Yesu gɑnɑ.
41001019	À bisɑ nodi kɑ tɔ jinɑ cɛnɑ, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ di Yɑkɔfu, Zɑbɑdi koo ndɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛnɛ Yohɑnnɑ. Ngei mo goono hɑrihi fɔ kunɑ ko biriji yom hinsɑ.
41001020	Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ nɑ nge yom mo cɛɛ. Ǹ nɑ ngei bɑɑbɑ Zɑbɑdi nɑm hɑrihiɑ kunɑ ndɑ gbeiteeri fɔ yom kɑ Yesu gɑnɑ.
41001021	Ǹ huro Kɑpɛnɑum kpɑɑrɑ. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ huro Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu kunɑ hulonzom hɑnu kɑ cooɑndi.
41001022	Bɔrɔ kulu go mɑmɑci ndɑ Yesu cɛbɛ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ǹ cooɑndi no zɑngɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ hini. À mɑnɑ cooɑndi zɑngɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom.
41001023	Ǹ mɑrgɑ fuuɑ kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ goono kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ hɔllɛ. Cɔfɔ hɔllɛ di kɑɑti.
41001024	À cii: Wɑ i nɑm. Ifɔ yɑ goono ni ndɑ i yom gɑme, Yesu Nɑzɑrɛtu? N kɑɑ n mɑ i hɑlɑci no? A go kɑ n bei. Ni yɑ Ikpɛ ŋmɔne hɑlɑɑlɑ no.
41001025	Yesu deeni ɑ̀ gɑɑ kɑ cii: Dɛnjɛ. N mɑ hunu bɔrɔ kpɛ bɑndɑ.
41001026	Cɔfɔ hɔllɛ di nɑ ɑ̀ zinji zinji ndɑ gɑɑbi kɑ kuwɑ ndɑ jinde beeri. À gɑɑ no ɑ̀ hunu ɑ̀ bɑndɑ.
41001027	Mɑmɑci nɑ ǹ kulu dii kɑlɑ ǹ nɑ cɛrɛ hã kɑ cii: Ifɔ no wɔne? Cɛbɛ teji fɔ dimi no wɔne? Bɑ hɔllɛ yom, Yesu go kɑ ǹ no mei ndɑ hini. Ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ sendi gɑnɑ.
41001028	Yesu bɑɑru hunu mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu ndɑ ɑ̀ hundɑntɛ kulu.
41001029	Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ǹ hunu Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuuɑ kunɑ. Ǹ kpei huro Simɔ ndɑ Andɛrɛ fuu. Yɑkɔfu ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ goono ǹ bɑndɑ.
41001030	Simɔ hɑnzure weibɔrɔ bine go kɑni ndɑ gɑɑwɑse. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ sendi tɛ Yesu sɛ.
41001031	Yesu mɑɑni kɑ ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ dii kɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ gɑɑwɑse di bisɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ. À bɑndɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ǹ yɑrɛ.
41001032	Wiciri kɑmbu tɔ, weenu kɑm. Ǹ kɑɑndɑ Yesu sɛ zɛnjɛkom yom kulu ndɑ hɔllɛkpɛ yom.
41001033	Wɑngɑrɑ di sukutum kulu meigu fuuɑ mee gɑɑ.
41001034	À nɑ bɔrɔ boobo no bɑɑni kɑ ǹ go tɑɑbi ndɑ doori ŋmɑni ŋmɑni. À nɑ hɔllɛ boobo mo gɑɑrɛ. À mɑnɑ tu hɔllɛ yom sɛ ǹ mɑ sendi zɑmɑ hɔllei mo gɑ ɑ̀ bei.
41001035	Yesu tunu zɑ ɑsubɑ beeri kɑ hunu. À kpei gɑnji kunɑ, nungu kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu si ko kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ nodi.
41001036	Zɑ Simɔ ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ, ǹ kulu kpei ɑ̀ ceeciyom.
41001037	Kɑ ǹ di ɑ̀, ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Bɔrɔ kulu go kɑ n ceeci.
41001038	Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: I mɑ kpei kpɑɑrɑ fɔ ndɑ cɛrɛ yom kunɑ yɑ du kɑ bɑɑru fɛɛ nungu yom di mo zɑmɑ ngɑ di sɛ no ɑ kɑɑ.
41001039	À go wɑɑzu ǹ mɑrgɑ fuu yom kunɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu kulu. À nɑ hɔllɛ yom mo gɑɑrɛ beerem bɑndɑ.
41001040	Jire fɔ kɑɑ sɔmbu Yesu jine kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: De n bɑɑ, n hini kɑ ɑ hinnɑndi.
41001041	Sisibi bine nɑ Yesu dii. À nɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ sɛllɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hɑmɑ. À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A go bɑɑ, n mɑ hinne.
41001042	Kɑ Yesu sendi yɑ di, cɔfɔ mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ jiretɛrɑ nɑ ɑ̀ tɑm. À hinne.
41001043	Yesu nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm ndɑ gɑɑbi. À gɑɑ no ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ tɑm ndɑ wɑɑsi.
41001044	À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N mɑ lɑɑkɑli n mɑ si ɑ̀ cii bɔrɔ fɔ kulu sɛ. Ammɑ n mɑ kpei kɑ n bɔm cɛbɛ gɑrɑndikɔ sɛ. N mɑ sɑrɑɑ kɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cii di tɛ n hinneyom sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ tɛ beerem sɛ sɛdɑ.
41001045	Ammɑ kɑ bɔrɔ di hunu, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ sinti kɑ Yesu bɑɑru fɛɛ nungu kulu. Sɑɑ di gɑɑ Yesu si hini kɑ huro wɑngɑrɑ di kunɑ tɛrɛkpɑrɛ, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ cɛ gɑnji fɔ kunɑ. Beerem hunu nungu kulu kɑ kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ.
41002001	À tɛ jiribi yom, Yesu ye kɑ huro Kɑpɛnɑum wɑngɑrɑ. Cɔfɔ beerem mɑɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ goono fuu.
41002002	Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ bɔrɔ boobo meigu kɑlɑ tɛrɛ si bɑ hundɑ mee mɑɑnɑntɛ. À nɑ ǹ wɑɑzu ndɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ.
41002003	Beerem kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ. Ǹ kɑɑndɑ mɔngɔlɔ fɔ kɑ bɔrɔ tɑɑci nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ.
41002004	Kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ du kɑ mɑɑni Yesu dɔ bɔrɔ bɑyom sɑbu sɛ, ǹ kɑɑru kɑ fuuɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ Yesu goono bɔm feeri kɑ ɑ̀ funu. Ǹ nɑ dɑɑrɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ mɔngɔlɑ goono ko kɑni zumɑndi fuuɑ kunɑ.
41002005	Kɑ Yesu di nɑɑne kɑ ǹ gundɑ, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii mɔngɔlɔ di sɛ: A koo, ɑ nɑ n yɑɑfɑ ndɑ n dulum yom.
41002006	Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ fɔ yom bine go gɔrɔ nodi kɑ lɑsɑbu ngei bine kunɑ.
41002007	Ǹ cii: Ifɔ sɛ no bɔrɔ kpɛ go sendi yɑ wɔ? À go kɑ Ikpɛ sendi yɑmu kɑ ɑ̀ cɛnɑndi no. Mee yɑ hini kɑ bɔrɔ yɑɑfɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ dulum yom de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Ikpɛ ngɑ fɔ?
41002008	Yesu go bei ngɑ bine kunɑ kɑ ǹ go lɑsɑbu ngɑ di tɛ ngei binei kunɑ. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ wom go lɑsɑbu wɔne tɛ wom bine yom kunɑ?
41002009	Wɔ fɔ yɑ fɑɑlɑ kɑ bisɑ, bɔrɔ mɑ cii mɔngɔlɔ sɛ, ɑ nɑ n yɑɑfɑ ndɑ n dulum yom wɑlɑ bɔrɔ mɑ cii, tunu kɑ n dɑɑri cɛnɑ zɑɑ kɑ dirɑ?
41002010	Bine wom mɑ bei kɑ hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ gundɑ hini hɑndunyɑ kunɑ kɑ bɔrɔ yɑɑfɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ dulum yom. À gɑɑ no ɑ̀ sendi mɔngɔlɑ sɛ.
41002011	À cii: Tunu kɑ n dɑɑri cɛnɑ zɑɑ kɑ kpei fuu.
41002012	Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ tunu. À nɑ ngɑ dɑɑri cɛnɑ zɑɑ kɑ hunu ǹ kulu jine. Mɑmɑci nɑ ǹ kulu dii. Ǹ nɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi kɑ cii: I mɑnɑ di wɔne dimi bɑ ce fɔ.
41002013	Yesu ye kɑ hunu kpɛɛnɛ ko buulɑ gɑnɑ. Jɑmɑ di kulu nɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ. À nɑ ǹ cooɑndi.
41002014	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go bisɑ, ɑ̀ di Lefi Alifɛ koo kɑ ɑ̀ go gɔrɔ bɑɑlici ɑlikɑsi tɑyom dɔ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A gɑnɑ. À tunu kɑ Yesu gɑnɑ.
41002015	À kɑɑ tɔ, Yesu go gɔrɔ kɑ ŋmɑɑ Lefi fuu kunɑ. Alikɑsi tɑkɔ boobo ndɑ dulumkoni boobo ndɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom go ŋmɑɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ. Ngei yɑ ci bɔrɔ tutumɑ kɑ ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ.
41002016	Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɑ bɔrɔ yom di ɑ̀ go ŋmɑɑ ndɑ ɑlikɑsi tɑkɔ yom ndɑ dulumkoni yom. Cɔfɔ ǹ cii ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ no ɑ̀ go ŋmɑɑ kɑ hɑm ndɑ ɑlikɑsi tɑkɔ yom ndɑ dulumkoni yom wɔ?
41002017	Kɑ Yesu mɑɑ ngɑ di, ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Beerem kɑ ǹ gundɑ bɑɑni, ǹ si bɑɑ lokotoro kɑlɑ beerem kɑ ǹ sindɑ bɑɑni. Yɑ nɑ kɑɑ bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu yom cɛɛ ǹ mɑ tuubi ɑmmɑ dulumkoni yom.
41002018	Yohɑnnɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom bine ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɑ bɔrɔ yom go meehɔ zɑɑ hɑnu wɔ. Cɔfɔ ǹ kɑɑ cii Yesu sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ Yohɑnnɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɑ bɔrɔ yom go meehɔ zɑɑ ɑmmɑ ǹ coobɑɑbɑize yom si meehɔ zɑɑ?
41002019	Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Hɑruhiji kpɑɑsi yom si hini kɑ meehɔ zɑɑ sɑɑ kɑ hɑruhijɑ goono ndei. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ? Sɑɑ kulu kɑ hɑruhijɑ goono ndei, ǹ si meehɔ zɑɑ.
41002020	Ammɑ hɑnu yom kɑɑ kɑɑ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ kɑɑ hɑruhijɑ gɑnɑndi ǹ dɔ, ǹ kɑɑ meehɔ zɑɑ hɑnu ngɑ di.
41002021	Bɔrɔ si zɑɑrɑ teji dumbɑri tɑɑ jiine zeenɔ gɑɑ, zɑmɑ dumbɑri di gɑ izeenɑ jɛrɛ fɔ zɑɑ no. Pɑti di kɑɑ tɔntɔnu.
41002022	Yɑ no bɔrɔ si dufɛ teji dɑm hɑmburu zeenɔ yom kunɑ zɑmɑ dufɛ gɑ ǹ bɔgu no. Dufɛ di kɑɑ bɑmbɑri. Hɑmburu yom mo kɑɑ sɑrɑ. Ammɑ ǹ go dufɛ teji dɑm hɑmburu teji kunɑ.
41002023	À kɑɑ tɔ Yesu ndɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom go fɑri yom tooru hulonzom hɑnu hine, ngɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom. Fɔndɑ bɔm coobɑɑbɑize yom sinti kɑ cɛtɛ yom pɑti.
41002024	Cɔfɔ Fɑrisi fɔndɑ bɔrɔ yom cii Yesu sɛ: Gunɑ, ifɔ sɛ ǹ go tɛ yɑ di hulonzom hɑnu hine hɛ kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ hɑlɑli?
41002025	Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wom coo bɑ hɛ kɑ Dɑfidi tɛ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono tilɑsi kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ hɛrɛɛ, ngɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ bɔrɔ yom?
41002026	À huro Ikpɛ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ gɑrɑndikɔ beeri Abiɑtɑ wɑtɛ. À nɑ buuru jisɑntɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci sɑrɑɑ ŋmɑɑ. À mɑnɑ hɑlɑli ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ ŋmɑɑ kɑlɑ gɑrɑndikɔ yom hinne sɛ. Dɑfidi nɑ ngɑ bɑndɑ bɔrɔ yom mo no.
41002027	Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Bɔrɔ sɛ no Ikpɛ nɑ hulonzom hɑnu tɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ bɔrɔ tɛ hulonzom hɑnu sɛ.
41002028	Ngɑ di sɛ no, hɛɛ Adɑmize, hɛɛ yɑ ci hulonzom hɑnu Kpe mo.
41003001	Yesu huro Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuuɑ kunɑ kpɛɛnɛ. Bɔrɔ fɔ mo goono nodi kɑ ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ bu.
41003002	Cɔfɔ Yuifu yom go Yesu gunɑ kɑ di hɑli ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ no bɑɑni hulonzom hɑnu hine, ngei mɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑ.
41003003	Yesu cii bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ bu di sɛ: Tunu ǹ kulu jine.
41003004	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: À hɑlɑli bɔrɔ mɑ ihinno tɛ hulonzom hɑnu hine bɑ wɑlɑ ilɑlɔ? À mɑ hundi fɑɑbɑ wɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ɑ̀ wi? Ǹ kulu tɛ sɑkɑi.
41003005	Yesu nɑ ǹ gunɑ kɑ cɛɛrɛ ndɑ bine. À bine sɑrɑ ndɑ ǹ binesɛndɛ di. À cii bɔrɔ di sɛ: N kɑmbɛ sɛllɛ. À nɑ ɑ̀ sɛllɛ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ tɛ bɑɑni zɑngɑ kɑmbɛwo di.
41003006	Kɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɑ bɔrɔ yom hunu, mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ǹ sɑwɑrɑ ɑ̀ bɔm ndɑ Hirodu bɑndɑ bɔrɔ yom ngei mɑ ɑ̀ wi.
41003007	Cɔfɔ Yesu nɑ ngɑ bɔm cendi ndɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom kɑ ye buulɑ mee gɑɑ. Bɔrɔ bɑkɑrɑ hunu zɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu ndɑ Yude lɑɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ.
41003008	Ǹ hunu mo zɑ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ ndɑ Idume lɑɑbu ndɑ Yudum isɑ bisɑntɛ ndɑ Tiru wɑngɑrɑ ndɑ Sidom wɑngɑrɑ hundɑntɛ. Kɑ bɔrɔ bɑkɑrɑ mɑɑ hɛ yom kɑ Yesu go tɛ, ǹ kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ.
41003009	À cii ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ ǹ mɑ du hɑrihi cɛnɑ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ jisi ngɑ sɛ jɑmɑ di mɑ si ngɑ gɑmɑ.
41003010	À nɑ bɔrɔ boobo no bɑɑni hɑli beerem kɑ ǹ gundɑ guruguze lɑlɔ yom go kuriyo ɑ̀ bɔm ngei mɑ du kɑ ɑ̀ hɑmɑ.
41003011	Sɑɑ kɑ hɔllɛ yom di ɑ̀, ǹ jɛndɛbiri ɑ̀ sɛ. Ǹ kuwɑ kɑ cii: Ni wɔ, ni yɑ Ikpɛ Ize no.
41003012	Yesu mo nɑ ǹ dɑm ndɑ gɑɑbi kɑ cii ǹ mɑ si ngɑ mɑɑ fɛɛ.
41003013	À bɑndɑ Yesu kɑɑru tondi kuku fɔ bɔm kɑ beerem kɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑ cɛɛ. Ǹ kpei ɑ̀ dɔ.
41003014	À nɑ bɔrɔ wei cindi hinkɑ suubɑ kɑ ǹ mo goono ngɑ bɑndɑ, ngɑ mɑ ǹ dɔntɔm ǹ mɑ kpei bɑɑru fɛɛ.
41003015	Ǹ mɑ du hini mo kɑ zɛnjɛkom yom no bɑɑni. Ǹ mɑ hɔllɛ yom gɑɑrɛ beerem bɑndɑ mo.
41003016	Bɔrɔ wei cindi hinkɑ di kɑ ɑ̀ suubɑ ǹ mɑɑ yom neyɑ: Simɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ no mɑɑdɛcɛ Piɛɛ
41003017	ndɑ Yɑkɔfu, Zɑbɑdi koo ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ, Yɑkɔfu cɛɛnɛ. À nɑ ǹ no mɑɑdɛcɛ Bɔnɑje. À feeriji yɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛyom himɑ bɑɑnɑ.
41003018	À nɑ Andɛrɛ suubɑ mo ndɑ Filipu ndɑ Bɑtelemɑ ndɑ Mɑtiyu ndɑ Tomɑ ndɑ Yɑkɔfu, Alifɛ koo ndɑ Tɑde ndɑ Simɔ Kɑnɑnɑ bɔrɔ
41003019	ndɑ Yudɑ Isikɑriɔtu mo kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Yesu dɑm kɑmbɛ. Ǹ huro fuu fɔ kunɑ.
41003020	Jɑmɑ di ye kɑ meigu kpɛɛnɛ kɑlɑ Yesu ndɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom mɑnɑ hini bɑ kɑ ŋmɑɑ.
41003021	Kɑ Yesu fuuize yom mɑɑ ngɑ di, cɔfɔ ǹ kɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dii, zɑmɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ bɔm yɑ see.
41003022	Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom hunu zɑ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ. Ǹ cii: Bezɑbulɑ no ɑ̀ bɔm, hɔllɛ yom kpɛ. Bezɑbulɑ ngɑ di no, ɑ̀ go hɔllɛ yom gɑɑrɛ ndɑ.
41003023	Yesu nɑ jɑmɑ cɛɛ kɑ sendi ǹ sɛ ndɑ yɑɑse yom. À cii: Mɛtɛ Setɑm tɛ kɑ hini kɑ ngɑ bɔm gɑɑrɛ?
41003024	De kpetɛrɛ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ ngɑ bɔm kɑ fee ihinkɑ, kpetɛrɛ ngɑ di si hini kɑ cɛ.
41003025	De bine fuu gɑɑbɑ ndɑ ngɑ bɔm, ɑ̀ fee ihinkɑ. Fuu ngɑ di si hini kɑ cɛ.
41003026	De Setɑm gɑɑbɑ ndɑ ngɑ bɔm ɑ̀ fee ihinkɑ. À si hini kɑ cɛ. À kpetɛrɛ tɔ ngɑ mee noyɑ.
41003027	Bɔrɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ huro bɑliji fuu kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ jiine yom kuu de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ɑkpɛ hɔ jinɑ. Sɑɑ ngɑ di ɑ̀ du kɑ ɑ̀ jiine yom kuu.
41003028	Cimi no, ɑ go cii wom sɛ, Ikpɛ gɑ iburɑdɑm yom yɑɑfɑ ndɑ dulum kulu ndɑ ǹ sendi yɑmɔ kɑ ǹ go kɑ Ikpɛ cɛnɑndi ndɑ.
41003029	Ammɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go sendi yɑmu kɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ cɛnɑndi, ɑkpɛ si du yɑɑfɑyom pɑi. Ammɑ ciiti kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ beeniyom goono ɑ̀ bɔm.
41003030	Yesu sendi zɑngɑ yɑ zɑmɑ ǹ go cii ɑ̀ gundɑ hɔllɛ.
41003031	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cɛɛnɛ yom ndɑ ɑ̀ nyɑ kɑɑ cɛ tɛrɛ kɑ bɔrɔ dɑm ɑ̀ mɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ.
41003032	Bɔrɔ boobo bine gɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm bindi. Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Gunɑ, n nyɑ ndɑ n cɛɛnɛ yom no tɛrɛ yɑ, ǹ go kɑ n ceeci.
41003033	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Mee yɑ ci ɑ nyɑ, wɑlɑ mee yom yɑ ci ɑ cɛɛnɛ yom?
41003034	À nɑ beerem kɑ ǹ gɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm bindi gunɑ kɑ cɛɛrɛ. À cii: Gunɑ, ɑ nyɑ ndɑ ɑ cɛɛnɛ yom neyɑ.
41003035	Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ Ikpɛ binebɑɑ tɛ, ɑkpɛ yɑ ci ɑ cɛɛnɛ ndɑ ɑ weimɑ ndɑ ɑ nyɑ.
41004001	Yesu ye ko cooɑndi buulɑ jɛrɛ gɑɑ. Jɑmɑ bɑkɑrɑ fɔ meigu ɑ̀ dɔ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ huro hɑrihi fɔ kunɑ kɑ gɔrɔ buulɑ bɔm. Jɑmɑ di kulu mo cɛ buulɑ mee gɑɑ.
41004002	À gɔ kɑ ǹ cooɑndi hɛ boobo yɑɑse yom kunɑ. À cooɑndiyomɑ kunɑ ɑ̀ go cii ǹ sɛ:
41004003	Wɑ hɑngɑ dɑm. Gunɑ, dimiize seekɔ fɔ hunu kɑ dimiize yom see.
41004004	Seeyomɑ gɑɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ tɔ dimiize fɔ yom kɑm fɔndɔ jɛrɛ gɑɑ. Bɛɛnɛ ciro yom kɑɑ kɑ ǹ kulu ŋmɑɑ.
41004005	Afɔ yom mo kɑm tondi dɑɑru bɔm, nungu kɑ lɑɑbu boobo si. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ cɔfɔ ǹ zei zɑmɑ gɑndɑ di sindɑ lɑɑbu no.
41004006	Sɑɑ kɑ weenu hunu kɑ dungu, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ kɔgɑndi zɑmɑ ǹ sindɑ kɑɑji hinno.
41004007	Afɔ yom mo kɑm kɑriji nyɑ yom kunɑ. Kɑriji nyɑ yom beeri kɑ ǹ dii. Ǹ mɑnɑ hɛi.
41004008	Afɔ yom mo kɑm lɑɑbu hinno kunɑ. Ǹ go zei. Ǹ go beeri kɑ tɔntɔnu hɑli ǹ go bɑrikɑ hɛi mo. Afɔ yom hɛi ize wɑrɑnzɑ. Afɔ yom hɛi ize weidu. Afɔ yom mo hɛi ize zɑngu.
41004009	Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ hɑngɑ dɑm kɑ mɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ mɑɑ fɑ.
41004010	Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu ye kɑmbu, beerem kɑ ǹ goono ɑ̀ hundɑntɛ ndɑ coobɑɑbɑize wei cindi hinkɑ di nɑ ɑ̀ hã yɑɑse di feeriji.
41004011	A cii ǹ sɛ: Wom sɛ no Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ kpetɛrɛ duje beiyom no, ɑmmɑ tɛrɛ bɔrɔ yom sɛ hɛ kulu yɑɑse kunɑ no ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ǹ sɛ.
41004012	Ngɑ di tɛ no zɑmɑ "gunɑyom gɑɑ ǹ mɑ gunɑ, ɑmmɑ ǹ si di. Mɑɑyom gɑɑ ǹ mɑ mɑɑ ɑmmɑ ǹ si fɑhɑm. De ɑ̀ nɑ ci yɑ, ǹ kɑɑ bɛrɛ ɑ dɔ kɑ du dulum yɑɑfɑyom."
41004013	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Wom mɑnɑ fɑhɑm ndɑ yɑɑse wɔne no? Dee mɛtɛ wom tɛ kɑ fɑhɑm ndɑ yɑɑse yom kulu dɑ?
41004014	Dimiize seekɔɑ go kɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ see.
41004015	Dimiizei kɑ ǹ see kɑmbu, ngei yɑ ci nungu kɑ ǹ go kɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ see. Kɑ beerem go mɑɑ, Setɑm kɑɑ mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ kɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ kɑ ǹ see ǹ bine yom kunɑ kɔm.
41004016	Yɑ di no dimiizei kɑ ǹ kɑm tondi dɑɑrɑ bɔm mo, ngei yɑ ci beerem kɑ ǹ mɑɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ tɑ mo mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ndɑ binekɑɑne.
41004017	Ammɑ ǹ sindɑ kɑɑji ngei kunɑ. Bɑndɑ fɔ gɑnɑkɔ yom no. Sɑɑ kɑ tɑɑbi wɑlɑ guruguze kɑɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ sɑbu sɛ, mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ cɔfɔ ǹ kɑmbɑ.
41004018	Dimiizei kɑ ǹ see kɑriji yom kunɑ, ngei yɑ ci beerem kɑ ǹ go mɑɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ.
41004019	Ammɑ zɑmɑni wɔ kɑrihã ndɑ hɑibɑrikɑ yom fɑfɑguɛ ndɑ hɛ bɑɑyom futu go huro. Ǹ go kɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ nɑɑni hɑli ɑ̀ si bɑrikɑ hɛi.
41004020	Dimiizei mo kɑ ǹ go see lɑɑbu hinno kunɑ, ngei yɑ ci beerem kɑ ǹ go mɑɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ. Ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ tɑ. Ǹ go bɑrikɑ hɛi. Afɔ yom hɛi ize wɑrɑnzɑ. Afɔ yom hɛi ize weidu. Afɔ yom mo hɛi ize zɑngu.
41004021	Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Beerem si fitilɑ diiɑndi kɑ gɑɑsu gum ɑ̀ bɔm, wɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm kɑni dɔ cire. Ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ diiɑndi no kɑ jisi fitilɑ dɛcɛyom dɔ. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
41004022	Hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono tugɑntɛ ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ. Hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono dɑɑbɑntɛ mo ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ bei kɑ jisi tɛrɛkpɑrɛ.
41004023	Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ hɑngɑ dɑm kɑ mɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ mɑɑ fɑ.
41004024	À cii ǹ sɛ kpɛɛnɛ: Wɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ hɛ kɑ wom go mɑɑ. Neesiji kɑ wom go neesi ndɑ, ngɑ no ǹ kɑɑ neesi ndɑ wom sɛ. Ǹ kɑɑ tɔntɔnu wom sɛ ɑ̀ gɑɑ mo.
41004025	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ no. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ mo, bɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ tɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Dimiize kɑ ɑ go zei ngɑ bɔm sɛ yɑɑse neyɑ
41004026	À cii mo: Yɑ wɔ no Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ bɑrɑ zɑngɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ dimiize see.
41004027	À go jiibi kɑ tunu ciini ndɑ zɑɑri. Dimiizɑ zei kɑ beeri ngɑ bɔm sɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ bei zɑngɑ no.
41004028	Gɑndɑ go kɑ ize hɛi ngɑ bɔm sɛ, sintine kɔsu, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ kpɑri, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ cɛtɛ, cɔfɔ moodɑmyom.
41004029	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nini, mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ go kɔmɑ dɑm ɑ̀ kunɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ tɔ wiyom.
41004030	Yesu cii kpɛɛnɛ: Ifɔ no i mɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ himɑndi ndɑ, wɑlɑ yɑɑse fɔ no i gɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ?
41004031	À himɑ no zɑngɑ mutɑru yɑzi dimi fɔ mogure. Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ see gɑndɑ bɔm ɑ̀ cɛnɑ ndɑ dimiize kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono hɑndunyɑ kunɑ.
41004032	Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ see, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ɑ̀ zei. À beeri kɑ bisɑ tuuriize yom kulu. À go kɑmbɛ beeri yom tɛ hɑli bɛɛnɛ ciro yom hini kɑ gɔrɔ ɑ̀ kɔsu kunɑ.
41004033	Yɑɑse boobo gɑɑ zɑngɑ nge yom di, Yesu sendi ǹ sɛ ndɑ zɑngɑ ǹ hini kɑ mɑɑ ɑ̀ sɛ.
41004034	À mɑnɑ sendi ǹ sɛ yɑɑse si ɑmmɑ kɑmbu ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ kulu feeri ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ.
41004035	Hɑnu ngɑ di kɑ wiciri tɔ, ɑ̀ cii ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ. I mɑ kpei yɑ hɛrɛ tɛrɛ.
41004036	Kɑ ǹ nɑ jɑmɑ di tɑm, coobɑɑbɑize yom nɑ Yesu zɑɑ hɑrihiɑ kunɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ goono. Hɑrihi fɔ yom mo goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ.
41004037	Cɔfɔ hɛo beeri fɔ tunu buulɑ bɔm. Hɑri boosu yom go hɑrihiɑ kɑɑru kɑ huro ɑ̀ kunɑ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ go tɔ ndɑ hɑri kɔ.
41004038	Yesu wɔ goono bɑndɑ kɑ hɑngɑsu ko jiibi funukɔ citɑ bɔm. Cɔfɔ coobɑɑbɑize yom nɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Coobɑɑbɑ, n bɑ si ndɑ i hɑlɑciyom bɑ?
41004039	À tunu kɑ deeni hɛo di gɑɑ. À cii buulɑ sɛ: N mee dii, dɛnjɛ. Hɛo di cɛ, nungu tɛ sɑkɑi.
41004040	Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ wom go hɑmburu zɑngɑ yɑ wɔ? Mɛtɛ no, wom sindɑ nɑɑne no?
41004041	Hɑmburu nɑ ǹ dii kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. Ǹ cii cɛrɛ sɛ: Mee dimi no bɔrɔ wɔ hɑli bɑ hɛo ndɑ buulɑ go kɑ ɑ̀ sendi gɑnɑ?
41005001	Ǹ tɔ buulɑ yɑ hɛrɛ tɛrɛ Gɑdɑrɑncei lɑɑbu.
41005002	Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu hunu hɑrihiɑ kunɑ, mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ hɔllɛ fɔ hunu sɑɑrɛ yom dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ kube.
41005003	À gɔrɛ dɔ goono sɑɑrɛ yom kunɑ. Bɔrɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ ɑ̀ hɔ bɑ ndɑ nyɔri.
41005004	Ce boobo ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɔ ndɑ seseri ndɑ nyɔri yom. À nɑ nyɔri yom pɑti. À nɑ seseri yom ceeri ceeri. Bɔrɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ ɑ̀ foorɑ.
41005005	Ciini ndɑ zɑɑri ɑ̀ goono sɑɑrɛ yom kunɑ ndɑ tondi kuku yom bɔm ko kɑɑti. À go kɑ ngɑ bɔm leebɑndi ndɑ tondi yom.
41005006	Kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Yesu hunne hɑli jinɑ, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ zuuru kɑ kɑɑ sɔmbu ɑ̀ jine.
41005007	À kuwɑ ndɑ jinde beeri kɑ cii: Ifɔ yɑ goono hɛɛ ndɑ ni gɑme Yesu, Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɛ bisɑ ǹ kulu, ɑ̀ ŋmɔne Ize? A go kɑ n ŋmɑɑrɛ Ikpɛ gɑndɑ n mɑ si ɑ bɔnɑndi.
41005008	Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Hunu bɔrɔ kpɛ bɑndɑ hɔllɛ wɔ.
41005009	Yesu nɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ cii: Mɛtɛ n mɑɑ? À tu Yesu sɛ kɑ cii: A mɑɑ no Jɑmɑ zɑmɑ i bɑ no.
41005010	Hɔllɛ di bine go Yesu ŋmɑɑrɛ tɑkɑkɑ ɑ̀ mɑ si ngei gɑɑrɛ kɑ kɑɑ lɑɑbuɑ kunɑ.
41005011	Kpisɔ gɑɑ bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ mo goono tondi kuku fɔ dɔ ko kurum.
41005012	Hɔllɛ yom di kulu nɑ Yesu ŋmɑɑrɛ kɑ cii: I yeti i mɑ huro kpisɔ gɑɑ wɔ kunɑ.
41005013	Yesu bine tu ǹ sɛ. Kɑ ǹ hunu cɔfɔ ǹ huro kpisɔ gɑɑ di kunɑ. Kpisɔ gɑɑ di kulu pito ko gungure zɑ tondi bɔm kɑ kɑm buulɑ di kunɑ. Hɑri nɑ ǹ ŋmɑɑ. Kpisɔ yom di tɔ zɑngɑ dubu hinkɑ sɑrɑ.
41005014	Ǹ kurukɔ yom zuuru kɑ kpeindɑ bɑɑru wɑngɑrɑ ndɑ kpɑɑrɑ kɑmbu yom kunɑ. Beerem hunu kɑ kpei di hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ.
41005015	Ǹ kɑɑ Yesu dɔ kɑ di bɔrɔ di kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ hɔllɛ, ɑ̀ go gɔrɔ. À nɑ jiine dɑm. À goono ngɑ lɑɑkɑli gɑɑ. Cɔfɔ hɑmburu nɑ ǹ dii.
41005016	Beerem kɑ ǹ jine ngɑ di tɛ, ǹ deede beerem sɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ hɔllɛkpɛ di ndɑ kpisɔ yom di.
41005017	Cɔfɔ ǹ sinti ko Yesu ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ hunu ngei lɑɑbu.
41005018	Yesu bine huro hɑrihi kunɑ. Bɔrɔ di kɑ Yesu nɑ hɔllɑ gɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ Yesu ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ tu ngɑ mɑ gɔrɔ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ.
41005019	Ammɑ Yesu mɑnɑ tu ɑ̀ sɛ. À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpei fuu n kpɑɑsi yom dɔ. N mɑ deede ǹ sɛ hɛ kulu kɑ Kpe tɛ n sɛ ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ sisibi n sɛ.
41005020	Bɔrɔ di kpei fuu kɑ sinti ko deede Dekɑpoli lɑɑbu hɛ kulu kɑ Yesu tɛ ngɑ sɛ. Mɑmɑci nɑ bɔrɔ kulu dii.
41005021	Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu ye kɑ buulɑ dem hɑrihiɑ kunɑ, bɔrɔ bɑkɑrɑ meigu ɑ̀ dɔ. Ngɑ mo goono buulɑ mee gɑɑ.
41005022	Cɔfɔ Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ jinɑ yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Yɑiru, ɑ̀ kɑɑ. Kɑ ɑ̀ di Yesu cɔfɔ ɑ̀ sɔmbu ɑ̀ jine.
41005023	À ŋmɑɑrɛ ndɑ kɑnkɑmi kɑ cii: A koo hundiyo bɑ bu. A go kɑ n ŋmɑɑrɛ n mɑ kɑɑ kɑ n kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ ɑ̀ bɔm ɑ̀ mɑ du bɑɑni kɑ hunɑ.
41005024	Yesu nɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ. Bɔrɔ bɑkɑrɑ di mo dɛcɛ Yesu bɑndɑ ko kɑ ɑ̀ kɑnkɑm.
41005025	Weibɔrɔ fɔ mo goono kɑ kuri go dooru ɑ̀ sɛ hɑli jiiri wei cindi hinkɑ.
41005026	À tɑɑbi sɑfɑrikpɛ boobo dɔ. À nɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ wi. Ammɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ du ɑ̀ gɑɑ bɑɑni kɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ doori di go tɔntɔnu.
41005027	Kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Yesu bɑɑru ɑ̀ kɑɑ jɑmɑ di kunɑ bɑndɑ bɑndɑ kɑ Yesu kpɛ hɑmɑ.
41005028	À go cii: De ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ kpɛ hinne hɑmɑ ɑ kɑɑ du bɑɑni.
41005029	Moo miilɑ fɔ, kuri dooruyom di cɛ kɑ kɔgu. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ mɑɑ ngɑ gɑɑhɑm kunɑ kɑ ngɑ du ngɑ guruguzɑ bɑɑni.
41005030	Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ Yesu mɑɑ ngɑ kunɑ kɑ dɑbɑri hunu ngɑ gɑɑ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ zogu kɑ jɑmɑ di gunɑ. À cii: Mee yɑ nɑ ɑ kpɛ hɑmɑ?
41005031	À coobɑɑbɑize yom cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N go di jɑmɑ go kɑ n koli. N mɑ hã hɑli mee yɑ nɑ n hɑmɑ?
41005032	Yesu nɑ moo cɛɛrɛ kɑ hundi kɑ di bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ.
41005033	Weibɔrɔ di mo kɑɑ ndɑ hɑmburu ndɑ gɑsiyom kɑ ɑ̀ bei hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ngɑ dɔ. À sɔmbu Yesu jine kɑ cimi kulu cii ɑ̀ sɛ.
41005034	Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A koo hundiyo, nɑɑne kɑ n gundɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ n no bɑɑni. Kpei ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne. N mo du bɑɑni n guruguzɑ gɑɑ.
41005035	Kɑ Yesu go sendi, cɔfɔ Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ jinɑ di hundi bɔrɔ yom kɑɑ kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N koo hundiyɑ bu. Ifɔ sɛ n go Coobɑɑbɑ tɑɑbɑndi kpɛɛnɛ?
41005036	Kɑ Yesu mɑɑ sendɑ kɑ ǹ cii, ɑ̀ cii Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ jinɑ di sɛ: Si hɑmburu. N mɑ nɑɑne dee.
41005037	Yesu mɑnɑ tu bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ ngɑ dum kɑlɑ Piɛɛ ndɑ Yɑkɔfu ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ, Yɑkɔfu cɛɛnɛ.
41005038	Ǹ tɔ Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ jinɑ di hundi kɑ di yuguyugu ndɑ bɛrɛɛ kɑ beerem go hɛ.
41005039	Kɑ Yesu huro ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ wom go yuguyugu wɔ tɛ? Ifɔ sɛ wom go hɛ? Hundiyo di mɑnɑ bu fɑ. À go jiibi no.
41005040	Cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ Yesu hɑɑru. Ammɑ Yesu nɑ ǹ kulu kɑɑ tɛrɛ. À nɑ koo di bɑɑbɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ nyɑ ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ boi. Ǹ huro nungu kɑ koo di go kɑni.
41005041	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ hundiyɑ kɑmbɛ dii kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Tɑlitɑ kumi. À feeriji yɑ ci, hundiyo ɑ cii n sɛ, tunu.
41005042	Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ cɔfɔ hundiyɑ tunu kɑ dirɑ. Hundiyo di gundɑ jiiri wei cindi hinkɑ. Ǹ kulu mɑmɑci kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
41005043	Yesu nɑ ǹ dɑm kɑ cii ǹ mɑ si ɑ̀ cii bɔrɔ fɔ kulu sɛ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ǹ mɑ hundiyo di no ŋmɑɑri ɑ̀ mɑ ŋmɑɑ.
41006001	Yesu hunu nungu di kɑ kɑɑ ngɑ lɑɑbu. À coobɑɑbɑize yom mo nɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ.
41006002	Kɑ hulonzom hɑnu tɔ, ɑ̀ sinti kɑ cooɑndi Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu kunɑ. Bɔrɔ boobo mɑɑ ɑ̀ sendɑ. Ǹ mɑmɑci kɑ cii: Mɑni no hɛ yom wɔ go hunu bɔrɔ sɛ? Hɑikusutɛrɛ fɔ dimi no ɑ̀ du? Mɑni no dɑbɑri gbei yom wɔ go hunu kɑ ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ yom go tɛ?
41006003	Bɔrɔ kpɛ sece di no. Mɑriɑmɑ koo no, Yɑkɔfu ndɑ Yose ndɑ Yudɑ ndɑ Simɔ bɛɛrɛ no. À weimɑ yom mo goono i gɑme nee. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ? À gɑɑ no, Yesu tɛ ǹ sɛ dɛrɛyom hɛ.
41006004	Ammɑ Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Andebi sindɑ bɛɛrɛ ngɑ lɑɑbu kunɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ dimi yom kunɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ hundi kunɑ.
41006005	Yesu mɑnɑ hini kɑ dɑbɑri gbei fɔ kulu tɛ nungu di kɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ zɛnjɛkom fɔ yom bɔm kɑ ǹ no bɑɑni.
41006006	À mɑmɑci ndɑ ǹ zɑm kɑ nɑɑne di. Yesu go coobɑɑbɑize yom dɔntɔm ǹ mɑ kpei ihinkɑ hinkɑ. À go kpɑɑrɑ yom yɑɑli ko cooɑndi.
41006007	À nɑ coobɑɑbɑize wei cindi hinkɑ di cɛɛ kɑ sinti kɑ ǹ dɔntɔm ǹ mɑ kpei ihinkɑ hinkɑ. À nɑ ǹ no hini hɔllɛ yom bɔm.
41006008	À nɑ ǹ dɑm ǹ mɑ si hɛ fɔ kulu zɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci guziri kɑlɑ goobu hinne. Ǹ mɑ si bɑ fɔɔlɔ zɑɑ, bɑ ŋmɑɑri, bɑ nooru ǹ zɑlifɔntɔ yom kunɑ.
41006009	Ǹ mɑ tɑɑmu dɑm ɑmmɑ ǹ mɑ si kpɛ jinde hinkɑ dɑm.
41006010	Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Nungu kulu kɑ wom huro fuu kunɑ, wom mɑ gɔrɔ kɑlɑ wom tunuyom.
41006011	Beerem kulu mo kɑ ǹ si wom yotɛrɛ tɑ kɑ ǹ si hɑngɑ dɑm wom sɛ, sɑɑ kɑ wom kɑɑ ko gɑnɑ nungu di, wom mɑ tɛ ǹ sɛ, wom cee si wom kɑmbɛ si. Ngɑ di mɑ tɛ ǹ sɛ sɛdɑ. Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ Sodom ndɑ Gomorɑ kpɑɑrɑ yom kɑɑ tɛ dɑɑmɑ ciiti hɑnu kɑ bisɑ kpɑɑrɑ di.
41006012	Kɑ ǹ kpei, ǹ nɑ bɑɑru di fɛɛ kɑ cii beerem mɑ tuubi.
41006013	Ǹ nɑ hɔllɛ boobo gɑɑrɛ beerem bɑndɑ. Ǹ nɑ jii tusu zɛnjɛkom boobo gɑɑ kɑ ǹ no bɑɑni.
41006014	Kpe Hirodu mɑɑ Yesu bɑɑru zɑmɑ ǹ nɑ Yesu bɑɑru fɛɛ nungu kulu. Hirodu bine cii: Mirɑndikɔ Yohɑnnɑ no kɑ ɑ̀ tunu bukɔei gɑme. À sɛ no dɑbɑri gbei yom go tɛ ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
41006015	Ammɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom cii: Eli no. Bɔrɔ fɔ yom mo cii: Andebi fɔ no zɑngɑ dom ɑndebi yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ.
41006016	Ammɑ kɑ Hirodu mɑɑ hɛ nge yom di ɑ̀ cii: Yohɑnnɑ di kɑ ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ bɔm kɑɑ, ngɑ no Ikpɛ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme.
41006017	À cii yɑ zɑmɑ dom di Hirodu bumbum yɑ nɑ beerem dɑm ǹ nɑ Yohɑnnɑ dii kɑ hɔ. À nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm kɑsu no ngɑ cɛɛnɛ Filipu wɛndɛ Hirodɑ sɑbu sɛ, domi Hirodu nɑ ɑ̀ hiji.
41006018	Yohɑnnɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: À mɑnɑ hɑlɑli n mɑ n cɛɛnɛ wɛndɛ zɑɑ.
41006019	À sɛ no, Hirodɑ bine go tɔ Yohɑnnɑ sɛ. À go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ ɑ̀ wi ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ si hini.
41006020	Hirodu go hɑmburu Yohɑnnɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bei Yohɑnnɑ bɑrɑ bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu, bɔrɔ hɑlɑɑlɑ. À nɑ ɑ̀ dii ndɑ lɑɑkɑli. Sɑɑ kulu kɑ Hirodu mɑɑ hɛ kɑ Yohɑnnɑ cii ɑ̀ cini hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ ndɑ binekɑɑne.
41006021	À zɑɑri kɑɑ. Hirodu nɑ ngɑ hɛiyom zɑɑri kpɑtɑ tɛ ngɑ gɑɑbikoni yom sɛ ndɑ wɑnguize yom hɑikusu yom ndɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu bɔrɔ beeri yom sɛ.
41006022	Cɔfɔ Hirodɑ bumbum koo hundiyo huro bɑtu kɑ gɑɑni. À kɑɑni Hirodu sɛ ndɑ beerem kɑ ngɑ ndei go ŋmɑɑ. Cɔfɔ Hirodu cii hundiyo di sɛ: N mɑ ɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ hɛ kulu kɑ n go bɑɑ. A gɑ ɑ̀ no ndɑ.
41006023	À ze hundiyɑ sɛ kɑ cii: Hɛ kulu kɑ n nɑ ɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ gɑ n no ndɑ, hɑli ndɑ ɑ kpetɛrɛ jɛrɛ fɔ.
41006024	Cɔfɔ hundiyɑ hunu. À kpei kɑ ngɑ nyɑ hã: Ifɔ no yɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ dɑ? À nyɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Cii Mirɑndikɔ Yohɑnnɑ bɔm.
41006025	Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ koo hundiyɑ huro ndɑ wɑɑsi kɑ kpei Hirodu dɔ. À cii: Mirɑndikɔ Yohɑnnɑ bɔm no ɑ go bɑɑ. N mɑ ɑ no mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ pɛrɛnti kunɑ.
41006026	Kpeɑ bine sɑrɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. Ammɑ ze kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ sɑbu sɛ ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ŋmɑɑri dɔ, ǹ sɑbu sɛ, ɑ̀ si bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ hungu ɑ̀ sɛ.
41006027	Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ kpeɑ nɑ ngɑ dogɑrei ŋmɔne ɑfɔ dɔntɔm ɑ̀ mɑ kpei kɑɑndɑ Mirɑndikɔ Yohɑnnɑ bɔm. Dogɑri di bine kpei kɑsuɑ kunɑ.
41006028	À nɑ Yohɑnnɑ bɔm kɑɑ kɑ kɑɑndɑ pɛrɛnti fɔ kunɑ. À nɑ ɑ̀ no koo hundiyɑ sɛ. Ngɑ mo nɑ ɑ̀ no ngɑ nyɑ sɛ.
41006029	Kɑ Yohɑnnɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom mɑɑ ngɑ di, ǹ kɑɑ bukɔɑ zɑɑ kɑ kpei dɑm sɑɑrɛ kunɑ.
41006030	Diyɑ yom mo meigu Yesu dɔ. Ǹ deede ɑ̀ sɛ hɛ kulu kɑ ngei tɛ ndɑ cooɑndiyom kulu kɑ ngei tɛ.
41006031	Cɔfɔ Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ kɑɑ kɑmbu nungu kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu si kɑ hulonzom bɑndɑ fɔ. Beerem go kpei, ǹ go ye kɑlɑ Yesu ndɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom mɑnɑ du dɑɑmɑ bɑ kɑ ŋmɑɑ.
41006032	À gɑɑ no ǹ huro hɑrihi fɔ kunɑ kɑ kpei kɑmbu nungu kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu si.
41006033	Ammɑ bɔrɔ boobo di ǹ go kpei. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ bei mo. Beerem zuuru cee gɑɑ wɑngɑrɑ ndɑ wɑngɑrɑ kɑ ǹ jinɑ nunguɑ dɔ kɑ meigu Yesu dɔ.
41006034	Kɑ Yesu hunu hɑrihiɑ kunɑ ɑ̀ di jɑmɑ bɑkɑrɑ. Sisibi nɑ ɑ̀ dii ǹ sɛ zɑmɑ ǹ himɑ no zɑngɑ feeji yom kɑ ǹ sindɑ kurukɔ. Yesu sinti kɑ ǹ cooɑndi hɛ boobo bɔm.
41006035	Kɑ weenu bɑ kɑm, ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ kɑ cii: Nungu wɔ gɑnji kunɑ no. Lɔkɑcɑ mo mooru.
41006036	Ǹ tɑm ǹ mɑ kpei nee cɛsɑntɛ tungɑ yom kunɑ ndɑ kpɑɑrɑ kunɑ kɑ ngei ŋmɑɑri dei. Ǹ sindɑ ŋmɑɑri fɔ kulu kɑ ŋmɑɑ.
41006037	Ammɑ Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wom bumbum, wɑ ǹ no ŋmɑɑri ǹ mɑ ŋmɑɑ. Ngei mo cii ɑ̀ sɛ: I mɑ kpei ŋmɑɑri dei hɑndu ɑhɑku bɑnɑndi ŋmɔne kɑ ǹ no ǹ mɑ ŋmɑɑ no?
41006038	Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Buuru mɛrɛjɛ no wom sɛ? Wɑ kpei gunɑ. Kɑ ǹ bei, ǹ cii: Igu ndɑ ciifi hinkɑ.
41006039	Yesu nɑ ǹ no mei ǹ mɑ ǹ kulu gɔrɛndi sɛtɛ sɛtɛ subu gɑni fɔ kunɑ.
41006040	Ǹ gɔrɔ kɑ sɛsɛrɛ sɛtɛ sɛtɛ bɔrɔ zɑngu zɑngu bɔrɔ weigu weigu.
41006041	Kɑ Yesu nɑ buuru gu di ndɑ ciifi hinkɑ zɑɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ bɛɛnɛ gunɑ kɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm ǹ gɑɑ. À nɑ ǹ zenji zenji ko no ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ ǹ mɑ fɑrisi jɑmɑ di sɛ. Ǹ nɑ ciifi hinkɑ mo fɑrisi ǹ kulu sɛ.
41006042	Ǹ kulu ŋmɑɑ kɑlɑ ǹ kungu.
41006043	Ǹ nɑ buuru zenje ndɑ ciifi cindɑ meigu cilɑ cɛnɑ wei cindi hinkɑ mefɔ.
41006044	Nge yom kɑ ǹ ŋmɑɑ hɑibɔrɔ dubu gu sɑrɑ no.
41006045	Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom tilɑsi ǹ mɑ huro hɑrihi. Ǹ mɑ jinɑ kɑ kpei ngɑ sɛ yɑ hɛrɛ tɛrɛ Betɑsɑidɑ kpɑɑrɑ hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ jɑmɑ di tɑm.
41006046	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ tɑm, ɑ̀ kpei tondi kuku fɔ bɔm kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ.
41006047	Wiciri kɑmbu tɔ, hɑrihiɑ goono buulɑ bindi bindi. Yesu mo goono buulɑ mee gɑɑ ngɑ fɔ.
41006048	Yesu di ǹ go tɑɑbi ndɑ hɑrihiɑ funuyom zɑmɑ ǹ goono hɛo bɑndɑ. Ciini guuru hinzɑ no Yesu go dirɑ buulɑ bɔm kɑ kpei ǹ dɔ. À tɛ zɑngɑ ngɑ mɑ bisɑ ǹ cɔrɔ gɑɑ.
41006049	Ammɑ ngei wɔ kɑ ǹ di ɑ̀ go dirɑ buulɑ bɔm, ǹ tɑmmɑ zɑngɑ gɑndɑ bukɔ fɔ no. Ǹ tunu ndɑ kuwɑ.
41006050	Ǹ kulu di ɑ̀, ǹ lɑɑkɑli tunu kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ sendi ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wom lɑɑkɑli mɑ kɑni. Hɛɛ no. Wɑ si hɑmburu.
41006051	Yesu huro ǹ dɔ hɑrihiɑ kunɑ. Cɔfɔ hɛo di kɑni. Mɑmɑci nɑ ǹ dii hɑli ǹ ci mɔsɔ.
41006052	Ǹ mɑnɑ fɑhɑm kɑ simbɑ ndɑ buuru gu di zɑmɑ ǹ binei yɑ sendi.
41006053	Kɑ ǹ tɔ yɑ hɛrɛ tɛrɛ Gɛnɛsɑrɑtɑ lɑɑbu, ǹ cɛ nodi buulɑ mee gɑɑ.
41006054	Ǹ hunu hɑrihiɑ kunɑ. Cɔfɔ beerem nɑ Yesu bei.
41006055	Ǹ zuuru kɑ kpei lɑɑbu di nungu kulu. Ǹ sinti kɑ kɑɑndɑ ɑ̀ sɛ doorikom yom dɑɑri yom kunɑ nungu kulu kɑ ǹ go mɑɑ ǹ ci ɑ̀ goono.
41006056	Nungu kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go kpei kpɑɑrɑ kunɑ no, wɑngɑrɑ kunɑ no wɑlɑ tungɑ kunɑ no beerem go doorikom yom jisi hebu bɑtumɑ yom kunɑ. Ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ nɑm doorikom yom mɑ bɑ ɑ̀ kpɛ hɑngɑ hɑmɑ. Beerem kulu kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɑmɑ du bɑɑni.
41007001	Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom mo ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ fɔ yom kɑ ǹ hunu zɑ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ, ǹ meigu Yesu dɔ.
41007002	Kɑ ǹ di ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize fɔ yom go ŋmɑɑ ndɑ kɑmbɛ ziibɔ, wɑtom ǹ mɑnɑ kɑmbɛ nyunu, ǹ cii tɑɑli no.
41007003	Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom ndɑ Yuifu yom kulu si cini ŋmɑɑ de ǹ mɑnɑ kɑmbɛ nyunu sã sã ǹ cɛɛ yom ɑlɑɑdɑ bɔm.
41007004	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ hunu hebu mo kulu ǹ si ŋmɑɑ de ǹ mɑnɑ kɑmbɛ nyunu. Alɑɑdɑ boobo ŋmɑni ŋmɑni goono kɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ zɑɑ, zɑngɑ gulɑize nyunuyom ndɑ combu nyunuyom ndɑ kusu nyunuyom ndɑ tɑbulu nyunuyom.
41007005	Bine, Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom nɑ Yesu hã kɑ cii: Ifɔ sɛ no n coobɑɑbɑize yom si cɛɛ yom ɑlɑɑdɑ gɑnɑ ɑmmɑ ǹ go ŋmɑɑ ndɑ kɑmbɛ yom kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ nyunu?
41007006	Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Esɑyi nɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ wom bɔm cɑu cɑu, wom munɑfici yom, zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Jɑmɑ wɔne mee gɑɑ no ǹ go bɛɛrɛ tɛ ɑ sɛ, ɑmmɑ ǹ bine yom si ɑ gɑɑ.
41007007	Ǹ go kɑ ɑ bɛɛrɑndi no kɔnu, Cɛbe yom kɑ ǹ go tɛ mo iburɑdɑm yom ɑlɑɑdɑ yom no."
41007008	Zɑ kɑ wom nɑ Ikpɛ meire nɑm, wom go kɑ iburɑdɑm yom ɑlɑɑdɑ gɑnɑ, wɑtom combu nyunuyom ndɑ gulɑize nyunuyom. Alɑɑdɑ boobo mo kɑ ǹ himɑ yɑ di wom gɑ kɑ ǹ tɛ.
41007009	Yesu cii ǹ sɛ kpɛɛnɛ: Dɑhiri wom go hungu Ikpɛ meire yom zɑmɑ wom mɑ wom ŋmɔne ɑlɑɑdɑ gɑnɑ sɛ.
41007010	Moisi cii: "N mɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ n bɑɑbɑ ndɑ n nyɑ sɛ". À cii kpɛɛnɛ: "Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɑɑbɑ wɑlɑ ngɑ nyɑ woo, n mɑ ɑ̀ wi".
41007011	Ammɑ wom wɔ, wom go cii: De bɔrɔ cii ngɑ bɑɑbɑ wɑlɑ ngɑ nyɑ sɛ, hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ himɑ yɑ n gɑɑ ndɑ, ngɑ yɑ ci kɔbum, wɑtom ɑkpɛ go cii: A nɑ ɑ̀ sɑrɑɑ Ikpɛ sɛ kɔ.
41007012	Wom mɑnɑ nɑm ɑkpɛ mɑ hɛ fɔ tɛ ngɑ bɑɑbɑ sɛ kpɛɛnɛ wɑlɑ ngɑ nyɑ sɛ.
41007013	Wom go kɑ Ikpɛ Sendi tɛ kɔnu ndɑ wom ɑlɑɑdɑ kɑ wom jisi. Wom go hɛ boobo tɛ zɑngɑ yɑ di.
41007014	Yesu nɑ jɑmɑ di cɛɛ kɑ cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ sɛ, wom kulu. Wɑ fɑhɑm mo.
41007015	Hɛ fɔ kulu si tɛrɛ kɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ huro bɔrɔ kunɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ bɔrɔ ziibɑndi. Ammɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go hunu bɔrɔ kunɑ, ngɑ yɑ bɔrɔ ziibɑndi.
41007016	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ hɑngɑ dɑm kɑ mɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ mɑɑ fɑ.
41007017	Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu hunu jɑmɑ di kunɑ kɑ huro fuu kunɑ, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom nɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ simbɑ ndɑ yɑɑse di.
41007018	À cii ǹ sɛ: Wom mo zɑngɑ yɑ no wom si fɑhɑm? Wom si bei bɑ, kɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono tɛrɛ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ huro bɔrɔ kunɑ ɑ̀ si hini kɑ bɔrɔ ziibɑndi?
41007019	À si huro bɔrɔ bine kunɑ kɑlɑ gunde kunɑ, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ɑ̀ ye kɑ hunu. À gɑɑ no, ŋmɑɑri kulu tɛ hɑlɑli.
