41007020	Yesu cii: Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go hunu bɔrɔ kunɑ, ngɑ yɑ go bɔrɔ ziibɑndi.
41007021	Zɑ bɔrɔ bine kunɑ no lɑsɑbu lɑlɔ yom go hunu ndɑ zinɑ ndɑ meiguyom zɑ ǹ mɑnɑ hiji ndɑ bɔrɔ wiyom.
41007022	Zeetɛrɛ mo go hunu zɑ bɔrɔ bine kunɑ ndɑ hɛ bɑɑyom futu ndɑ hɑnyɑ fute ndɑ cɛmbɛrɛ cɛmbɛrɛ ndɑ hɑwizetɛrɛ ndɑ moo futu ndɑ sendi yɑmɔ ndɑ bɔmbɛɛrɛ ndɑ sɑmutɛrɛ.
41007023	Hɛ lɑlɔ yom wɔ dimi kulu go hunu zɑ bine kunɑ ko bɔrɔ ziibɑndi.
41007024	Kɑ Yesu tunu nungu di ɑ̀ kpei Tiru ndɑ Sidom lɑɑbu yom. Kɑ ɑ̀ hurɑ fuu fɔ kunɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ bɑɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ bei, ɑmmɑ Yesu si hini kɑ tugu.
41007025	Ammɑ weibɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ koo hundiyo gundɑ hɔllɛ mɑɑ Yesu bɑɑru. À kɑɑ sɔmbu ɑ̀ jine.
41007026	Weibɔrɔ di bɑrɑ no dimi cindi, Sirifenesi lɑɑbu bɔrɔ no. A go Yesu ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ hɔllɛ di gɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ hunu ngɑ koo hundiyɑ bɑndɑ.
41007027	Cɔfɔ Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Nɑm koo yom mɑ kungu jinɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hegu ǹ mɑ koo yom ŋmɑɑri zɑɑ kɑ cetu hɑnsiize yom sɛ.
41007028	Weibɔrɔ di mo tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Cimi no Kpe, ɑmmɑ hɑnsiize yom go koo yom ŋmɑɑri buruburu yom kɑ ǹ go kɑm tɑbulu ciire ŋmɑɑ.
41007029	À gɑɑ no Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Sendi wɔ sɑbu sɛ, kpei. Hɔllɑ hunu n koo hundiyɑ bɑndɑ.
41007030	Weibɔrɔ di bine kpei fuu. À gɑru ngɑ koo hundiyɑ gɑ kɑni dɑɑri bɔm ndɑ bɑɑni. Hɔllɛ di mo hunu koo di bɑndɑ.
41007031	Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu hunu Tiru ndɑ Sidom lɑɑbu yom kunɑ, ɑ̀ kpei Gɑlile buulɑ dɔ. À gɑnɑ Dekɑpoli lɑɑbu.
41007032	Ǹ kɑɑndɑ ɑ̀ sɛ lutu bɛbɛ fɔ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ no bɑɑni.
41007033	Kɑ Yesu nɑ ɑ̀ cendi kɑmbu kɑ hunu ndɑɑ̀ jɑmɑ kunɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ kɑmbeize yom dɑm ɑ̀ hɑngɑ yom kunɑ. À tufɑ ngɑ kɑmbeize gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dɛɛnɛ hɑmɑ.
41007034	À nɑ bɛɛnɛ gunɑ kɑ binejisi. À cii: Efɑtɑ. À feeriji yɑ cii: feeri.
41007035	Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ hɑngɑ yom feeri. À dɛɛnɛ kɔrɔfɑ mo feeri, ɑ̀ go sendi ihinno.
41007036	Yesu nɑ ǹ dɑm ǹ mɑ si cii bɔrɔ fɔ kulu sɛ. Ammɑ zɑngɑ Yesu hungu ndɑ ǹ sɛ, yɑ no ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ fɛɛ.
41007037	Mɑmɑci bine nɑ beerem dii kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. Ǹ cii: À gɑ hɛ kulu tɛ ihinno. À go nɑm lutu yom go mɑɑ. À go nɑm bɛbɛ yom go sendi.
41008001	Hɑnu nge yom di kunɑ kɑ jɑmɑ bɑkɑrɑ meigu ɑ̀ dɔ kpɛɛnɛ, ǹ sindɑ hɛ fɔ kulu ǹ mɑ ŋmɑɑ. Cɔfɔ Yesu nɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom cɛɛ ngɑ dɔ.
41008002	À cii ǹ sɛ: Sisibi go kɑ ɑ dii jɑmɑ wɔ sɛ zɑmɑ ǹ jiribi hinzɑ neyɑ kɑ ǹ go gɔrɔ ɑ dɔ. Ǹ sindɑ hɛ fɔ kulu kɑ ŋmɑɑ.
41008003	De bine ɑ nɑ ǹ tɑm ndɑ hɛrɛɛ ǹ mɑ kpei ngei kpɑɑrɑ yom, ǹ kɑɑ mɔngɔ fɔndɔ bɔm. Hɑli nungu mooru no ɑfɔ yom hunu.
41008004	Yesu coobɑɑbɑize yom bine tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Mɑni bɔrɔ hini kɑ jɑmɑ wɔ kungɑndi ndɑ ŋmɑɑri nee gɑnji wɔ kunɑ?
41008005	Yesu mo nɑ ǹ hã kɑ cii: Buuru mɛrɛjɛ no wom sɛ? Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Buuru iye.
41008006	Yesu bine nɑ jɑmɑ dɑm ǹ mɑ gɔrɔ gɑndɑ. Kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ buuru iye di zɑɑ, ɑ̀ sɑɑbu. À nɑ ǹ zenji zenji kɑ no ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ ǹ mɑ fɑrisi jɑmɑ di sɛ. Coobɑɑbɑize yom nɑ ǹ fɑrisi jɑmɑ di sɛ.
41008007	Ǹ gundɑ ciifi cɛnɑ fɔ yom mo. Kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm ǹ gɑɑ ɑ̀ cii ǹ mɑ ngei mo fɑrisi jɑmɑ di sɛ.
41008008	Jɑmɑ di ŋmɑɑ kɑlɑ ǹ kungu. Ǹ nɑ zenje yom kɑ ǹ cindi meigu kɑ cilɑ beeri iye tɔnɑndi.
41008009	Beerem kɑ ǹ ŋmɑɑ tɔ zɑngɑ bɔrɔ dubu tɑɑci. À bɑndɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ tɑm.
41008010	Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ Yesu huro hɑrihi, ngɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom. Ǹ kpei Dɑlimɑtu lɑɑbu. Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom go ɑlɑmu fɔ ŋmɑɑrɛ (Gunɑ Mɑtiyu 16:1-4)
41008011	Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom hunu kɑ sinti kɑ kɑkɔ ndɑ Yesu. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ bɛɛnɛ ɑlɑmu fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sui sɛ.
41008012	Yesu bine nɑ binejisi kunɑ kunɑ kɑ cii: Ifɔ sɛ no zɑmɑni beerem wɔ go kɑ ɑlɑmu fɔ hã? Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, Ikpɛ si zɑmɑni wɔ beerem no ɑlɑmu.
41008013	Kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ nɑm ɑ̀ ye kɑ huro hɑrihiɑ kunɑ kɑ kpei yɑ hɛrɛ tɛrɛ.
41008014	Coobɑɑbɑize yom bine dinigɑ kɑ buuru zɑɑ. Buuru gudɑ fɔ hinne no ǹ sɛ hɑrihiɑ kunɑ.
41008015	Yesu nɑ ǹ dɑm kɑ cii: Wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom ndɑ Hirodu buuru kɑsɑmi.
41008016	Cɔfɔ coobɑɑbɑize yom di ciine cɛrɛ sɛ kɑ cii: À go cii yɑ zɑmɑ i sindɑ buuru sɛ no.
41008017	Zɑ kɑ Yesu mo bei ǹ gɑɑ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ no wom cii cɛrɛ sɛ kɑ wom sindɑ buuru sɛ nɑ? Wom si bei no? Wom si fɑhɑm no? Binesɛndɛ wɔ goono wom gɑɑ kpɛɛnɛ?
41008018	Moo yom go wom sɛ, wom si di no? Hɑngɑ yom go wom sɛ, wom si mɑɑ no? Wom si hɔngɔ no bɑ?
41008019	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ nɑ buuru gu di zɑɑ kɑ zenji zenji bɔrɔ dubu gu di sɛ cilɑ cɛnɑ mɛrɛjɛ no wom tɔnɑndi ndɑ cindɑ? Ǹ cii ɑ sɛ: Iwei cindi hinkɑ.
41008020	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ nɑ buuru iye di mo zɑɑ kɑ zenji zenji bɔrɔ dubu tɑɑci di sɛ, cilɑ beeri mɛrɛjɛ no wom tɔnɑndi ndɑ cindɑ? Ǹ cii: Iye.
41008021	Cɔfɔ Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Mɛtɛ no wom si fɑhɑm no?
41008022	Yesu kɑɑ Betɑsɑidɑ kpɑɑrɑ. Ǹ kɑɑndɑ ɑ̀ sɛ dɑnɑm fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ dɑnɑm di hɑmɑ.
41008023	Yesu nɑ dɑnɑm di kɑmbɛ dii kɑ kpeindɑɑ̀ kpɑɑrɑ bɑndɑ. Kɑ ɑ̀ tufɑ ɑ̀ moo yom gɑɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ yom dɛcɛ ɑ̀ bɔm kɑ hã de ɑ̀ go di hɛ fɔ.
41008024	Dɑnɑm di gunɑ bɛɛnɛ. À cii: A go di beerem ɑmmɑ ɑ go di ei no zɑngɑ tuurinyɑ yom kɑ ǹ go dirɑ.
41008025	Yesu bine ye kɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ kpɛɛnɛ ɑ̀ moo yom gɑɑ kɑ cii ɑ̀ mɑ gunɑ bɛɛnɛ. À ye kɑ tɛ moo. À go di hɛ kulu sã sã.
41008026	Yesu nɑ ɑ̀ tɑm ɑ̀ mɑ kpei fuu. À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N mɑ si huro kpɑɑrɑ kunɑ. N mɑ si ɑ̀ cii bɔrɔ fɔ kulu sɛ.
41008027	Yesu mo kpei Kɑsɑriɑ Filipu lɑɑbu kpɑɑrɑ yom, ngɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom. Fɔndɑ bɔm bine ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom hã kɑ cii: Mee no beerem go cii hɛɛ dɑ?
41008028	Ǹ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Mirɑndikɔ Yohɑnnɑ. Ammɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom gɑ cii Eli. Afɔ yom mɑ gɑ cii dɑm ɑndebi yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ nɑ.
41008029	Yesu mo nɑ ǹ hã kɑ cii: Wom bine, mee no wom go cii hɛɛ dɑ? Piɛɛ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Ni nɑ Mɛsiyɑ.
41008030	Cɔfɔ Yesu nɑ ǹ dɑm ǹ mɑ si ngɑ bɑɑru cii bɔrɔ fɔ kulu sɛ.
41008031	À gɑɑ no, ɑ̀ sinti kɑ ǹ cooɑndi kɑ cii: Tilɑsi hɛɛ Adɑmize ɑ mɑ tɑɑbi boobo hɑm. Mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom ndɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom, ǹ mɑ hungu hɛɛ kɑ ɑ wi. Ammɑ yɑ ye kɑ tunu jiribi hinzɑntɛ.
41008032	Meecine ngɑ di, Yesu nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ nɑ tɛrɛkpɑrɛ. Piɛɛ ye ndɑ Yesu kɑmbu kɑ sinti kɑ ɑ̀ kɔnkɔm.
41008033	Ammɑ Yesu bɛrɛ kɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom gunɑ. À nɑ Piɛɛ kɔnkɔm kɑ cii: Ye ɑ bɑndɑ Setɑm zɑmɑ n lɑsɑbu yom mɑnɑ ci Ikpɛ ŋmɔne yom, kɑlɑ iburɑdɑm yom ŋmɔne yom.
41008034	Yesu nɑ jɑmɑ di ndɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom cɛɛ kɑ cii ǹ sɛ: Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ ɑ gɑnɑ ɑ̀ mɑ hungu ngɑ bɔm sɛ. À mɑ ngɑ bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ zɑɑ mo kɑ ɑ gɑnɑ.
41008035	Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ gɑ bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ ngɑ hundi fɑɑbɑ, ɑkpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ dɛrɑndi. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ hundi dɛrɑndi ɑ sɑbu sɛ ndɑ Bɑɑru Hinno sɑbu sɛ, ɑkpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ fɑɑbɑ.
41008036	Hɑnfɑni fɔ nɑ bɔrɔ sɛ bɑ de ɑ du hɑndunyɑ kulu, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ hundi dɛrɑndi?
41008037	Hɛ fɔ no, bɔrɔ kɑɑ no kɑ ngɑ hundi fɑnsɑ ndɑ?
41008038	Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go mɑɑ hɑwi ndɑ hɛɛ ndɑ ɑ sendi yom zɑmɑni beerem hɑnyɑ fute kɑ ǹ ci zɑngɑ zinɑteeri yom gɑme, hɑwi gɑ ɑ dii ndɑ ɑkpɛ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ kɑɑ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ deizɑ kunɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize hɑlɑɑlɑ yom, hɑwi gɑ ɑ dii ndɑ ɑkpɛ.
41009001	Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Cimi no ɑ gɑ cii wom sɛ bɔrɔ fɔ yom kɑ ǹ go cɛ nee, ǹ si bu tɑbɑɑ pɑi kɑlɑ ǹ mɑ di Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ mɑ kɑɑ ndɑ dɑbɑri.
41009002	Jiribi idu bɑndɑ Yesu nɑ Piɛɛ ndɑ Yɑkɔfu ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ boi ngɑ bɑndɑ. À kpeindei kɑmbu ngei hinne tɑndi kuku fɔ bɔm. À tɑkɑri bɛrɛ ǹ jine.
41009003	À jiine yom mo bɛrɛ kɑ kɑɑri ikpɑrɛ tɑi tɑi kɑ bɔrɔ si hɑndunyɑ wɔ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ hini kɑ jiinei kpɑrɑndi zɑngɑ yɑ di.
41009004	Cɔfɔ Eli ndɑ Moisi hunutɛrɛ ǹ sɛ ko sendi ndɑ Yesu.
41009005	À gɑɑ no, Piɛɛ sendi Yesu sɛ kɑ cii: Coobɑɑbɑ ɑ̀ boori i mɑ gɔrɔ nee. I mɑ bukɑ hinzɑ tɛ, ɑfɔ n sɛ, ɑfɔ Moisi sɛ, ɑfɔ mo Eli sɛ.
41009006	Piɛɛ mɑnɑ fɑhɑm ndɑ hɛ kɑ ngɑ mɑ cii zɑmɑ ǹ hɑmburu kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
41009007	Buru fɔ mo kɑɑ kɑ ǹ dɑɑbu. Cɔfɔ jinde fɔ hunu zɑ buru di kunɑ kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kpɛ yɑ ci ɑ Ize Binegɑnji. Wɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ.
41009008	Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ cɔfɔ coobɑɑbɑize yom di zogu zogu ngei cɔrɔ yom gɑɑ. Ǹ mɑnɑ di bɔrɔ fɔ kɑlɑ Yesu hinne ngei bɑndɑ.
41009009	Kɑ ǹ go zumbu tondi kukuɑ bɔm Yesu nɑ ǹ dɑm ǹ mɑ si hɛ nge yom di cii bɔrɔ fɔ kulu sɛ kɑlɑ sɑɑ kɑ ngɑ, Adɑmize kɑɑ tunu bukɔei gɑme.
41009010	Ǹ nɑ sendi ngɑ di jɛ kɑ cɛrɛ hã hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci tunu bukɔei gɑme.
41009011	Ǹ nɑ Yesu hã kɑ cii: Ifɔ sɛ nɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom go cii kɑlɑ de Eli mɑ kɑɑ jinɑ?
41009012	Yesu mɑ tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii. Cimi no Eli mɑ kɑɑ jinɑ kɑ ye kɑ hɛ kulu gɔrɛndi. Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii mɑ hɛɛ Adɑmize bɔm ɑ mɑ tɑɑbi boobo hɑm. Ǹ kɑɑ hungu hɛɛ.
41009013	Ammɑ ɑ go cii wom sɛ mo Eli kɑɑ kɔ. Ǹ bine tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ hɛ kulu kɑ ǹ bɑɑ, ndɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii ɑ̀ bɔm.
41009014	Kɑ Yesu kɑɑ coobɑɑbɑize cindei dɔ, ɑ̀ di jɑmɑ bɑkɑrɑ ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom nɑ ǹ dɑm bindi. Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom mo go kɑkɔ ndei.
41009015	Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ kɑ jɑmɑ di ɑ, mɑmɑci nɑ n dii. Ǹ zuuru kɑ kpei kɑ ɑ fɔɔ.
41009016	Yesu nɑ ǹ hã kɑ cii: Ifɔ bɔm nɑ wom go kɑkɔ ndei?
41009017	Cɔfɔ jɑmɑ di kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Coobɑɑbɑ ɑ kɑɑndɑ ɑ koo n dɔ. À gundɑ hɔllɛ bɛbɛ.
41009018	Nungu kɑ ɑ̀ tunu ɑ̀ sɛ kulu, ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ̀ zinji kɑ ɑ̀ fufu hɑli ɑ̀ mee mo kufu kɑru. À mo hinje kɑɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ kɔgu gbɑm. Ngɑ nɑ ɑ cii n coobɑɑbɑize yom wɔ sɛ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑrɛ ɑmmɑ ǹ mɑnɑ hini.
41009019	Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: zɑmɑni wɔ beerem, wom zɑm kɑ nɑɑnekɔ yom, kɑlɑ sɑɑ fɔ nɑ ɑ bo goono ndɑ wom? Kɑlɑ sɑɑ fɔ no, ɑ bɑ wom jɛrɛ? Wɑ kɑɑndɑ ɑ sɛ koo di.
41009020	Ǹ kɑɑndɑ ɑ̀ sɛ. Zɑ hɔllɑ di Yesu, mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ nɑ koo di zeeri kɑ ɑ̀ fufu. Kɑɑ di kɑm gɑndɑ ko gungure. À mee go kufu kɑru.
41009021	Yesu nɑ koo di bɑɑbɑ hã kɑ cii: Zɑ sɑɑ fɔ nɑ wɔne nɑ ɑ̀ di? Bɑɑbɑ di cii: Zɑ ɑ̀ goono icɛnɑ.
41009022	Sɑɑ kulu mɑ nini kunɑ ndɑ hɑri yom kunɑ no ɑ̀ cini kɑ ɑ̀ zeeri ngɑ mɑ ɑ̀ wi. Ammɑ de n hini kɑ hɛ fɔ tɛ, sisibi mɑ n dii i sɛ.
41009023	Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: De n hini kɑ nɑɑne fɑ, hɛ kulu hini kɑ tɛ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne sɛ.
41009024	Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ koo di bɑɑbɑ wuuru kɑ cii: Kpe, ɑ gɑ nɑɑne. N mɑ ɑ gɑɑ ndɑ ɑ nɑɑne bunɔ.
41009025	Kɑ Yesu di jɑmɑ di kulu go zuuru kɑ kɑɑ ngɑ dɔ, ɑ̀ deeni hɔllɛ di gɑɑ kɑ cii: Hɔllɛ bɛbɛ, ɑ go kɑ n mei n mɑ hunu koo wɔ bɑndɑ. N mɑ si kɑɑ ɑ̀ bɔm kpɛɛnɛ.
41009026	Kɑ hɔllɑ kuwɑ ɑ̀ nɑ koo di zinji kɑ ɑ̀ fufu kɑ hunu ɑ̀ bɑndɑ. Koo di tɛ zɑngɑ bukɔ kɑlɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom cii ɑ̀ bu nɑ.
41009027	Ammɑ Yesu nɑ ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ dii kɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi. À tunu kɑ cɛ.
41009028	Yesu hurɑ fuu kunɑ. Lɑbu kunɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom nɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ cii: Ifɔ sɛ no i yom wɔ, i mɑnɑ hini kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑrɛ dɑ?
41009029	Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wɔne dimi si hunu kɑlɑ ndɑ ɑduwɑ ndɑ meehɔ.
41009030	Kɑ ǹ hunu nungu di ǹ gɑnɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu kɑ bisɑ. Yesu si bɑɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ bei.
41009031	À nɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom cooɑndi kɑ cii ǹ sɛ: Ǹ bɑ hɛɛ Adɑmize dɑm beerem kɑmbɛ. Ǹ gɑ ɑ wi. Wiyomɑ bɑndɑ, jiribi hinzɑntɛ ɑ kɑɑ tunu.
41009032	Ammɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom mɑnɑ fɑhɑm ndɑ sendi ngɑ di. Ǹ hɑmburu mo ndɑ ɑ̀ hãyom.
41009033	Yesu bine kɑɑ Kɑpɛnɑum kpɑɑrɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono fuu fɔ kunɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom hã kɑ cii: Kɑkɔ fɔ nɑ wom go tɛ fɔndɑ bɔm?
41009034	Ǹ mɑnɑ hɛ fɔ kulu cii zɑmɑ ǹ kɑkɔ ndɑ cɛrɛ nɑ fɔndɑ bɔm bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ibeeri.
41009035	Yesu bine gɔrɔ. À nɑ coobɑɑbɑize wei cindi hinkɑ di cɛɛ kɑ cii ǹ sɛ: De bɔrɔ fɔ gɑ bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ ci jinɑ, ɑkpɛ mɑ ci ǹ kulu kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ. À mɑ tɑmtɛrɛ ǹ kulu sɛ.
41009036	À nɑ kɑɑ cɛnɑ fɔ zɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm ngei bindi kunɑ. À nɑ ɑ̀ jɛndɛ kɑ cii coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ:
41009037	Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go koo cɛnɑ zɑngɑ wɔne tɑ ɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ, ɑkpɛ go kɑ ɑ tɑ. Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ tɑ mɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci hɛɛ nɑ ɑkpɛ tɑ bɑ, ɑmmɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm no ɑ̀ tɑ.
41009038	Yohɑnnɑ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Coobɑɑbɑ, i di bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hɔllɛ yom gɑɑrɛ ndɑ n mɑɑ. Ammɑ ɑ̀ si kɑ i gɑnɑ. I bine, i hungu ndɑ ɑ̀ sɛ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ si kɑ i gɑnɑ.
41009039	Ammɑ Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wɑ si hungu ndɑ ɑ̀ sɛ. Bɔrɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ dɑbɑri gbei tɛ ɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ kɑ mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ ɑ sendi yɑmu.
41009040	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si gɑɑbɑ ndɑ i yom, i sɛ nɑ ɑ̀ goono.
41009041	Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go wom no gulɑize fɔ hɑri yeenɔ ɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ zɑmɑ wom ci Mɛsiyɑ ŋmɔne yom sɛ, cimi nɑ ɑ go cii wom sɛ ɑkpɛ wɔ ɑ̀ tukunsi si dɛrɛ ɑ̀ sɛ.
41009042	Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ koo cɛnɑ yom wɔ kɑ ǹ gɑ nɑɑne ɑ gɑɑ ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ dɛrɑndi, ǹ mɑ fufuyom tɑndi hɔ ɑkpɛ jinde gɑɑ. Ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ cetu buulɑ kunɑ mɑ, ɑ̀ bisɑ.
41009043	De bine n kɑmbɛ fɔ yɑ ci n dɛrɑndikɔ, n mɑ ɑ̀ dumbu. N mɑ hurɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni kunɑ leebɑntɛ ɑ̀ bisɑ, n mɑ gundɑ kɑmbɛ hinkɑ ǹ mɑ n cetu nini kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ buyom kunɑ, nungu kɑ ǹ go hɑnyɑ futu yom bɔnɑndi.
41009044	Nungu wɔ ɑ̀ hɑnjeri yom si bu, ɑ̀ nini mo si wi pɑi.
41009045	De bine n cee yɑ ci n dɛrɑndikɔ n mɑ ɑ̀ dumbu. N mɑ huro hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni kunɑ ndɑ cee fɔ ɑ̀ bisɑ, n mɑ gundɑ cee hinkɑ ǹ mɑ n cetu nini kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ buyom kunɑ, nungu kɑ ǹ go hɑnyɑ futu yom bɔnɑndi.
41009046	Nungu wɔ ɑ̀ hɑnjeri yom si bu, ɑ̀ nini mo si wi pɑi.
41009047	De bine n mɑɑ fɔ yɑ ci n dɛrɑndikɔ n mɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ. N mɑ huro Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ kunɑ ndɑ moo fɔ ɑ̀ bisɑ, n mɑ gundɑ mɑɑ hinkɑ ǹ mɑ n cetu nungu kɑ ǹ go hɑnyɑ futu yom bɔnɑndi.
41009048	Nungu wɔ ɑ̀ hɑnjeri yom si bu, ɑ̀ nini mo si wi pɑi.
41009049	Ǹ kɑɑ bɔrɔ kulu hinsɑ ndɑ nini zɑngɑ ǹ go gɑrɑndi hɛ hinsɑ ndɑ ciiri.
41009050	Ciiri yɑ hɛ hinno no. Ammɑ de ciiri tɑru hɛ fɔ nɑ ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ hinsɑ ndɑ?
41009051	Wom mɑ gundɑ ciiri wom kunɑ. Wom mɑ gɔrɔ mɑ ndɑ bɑɑni cɛrɛ gɑme.
41010001	Zɑ nungu di Yesu tunu kɑ kɑɑ Yude lɑɑbu kɑlɑ Yudum isɑ bisɑntɛ. Bɔrɔ boobo ye kɑ meigu ɑ̀ dɔ. À nɑ ǹ cooɑndi kpɛɛnɛ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ cini cooɑndi.
41010002	À gɑɑ nɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ. Kɑ ɑ̀ sui sɛ, ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ cii: À hɑlɑli bɔrɔ mɑ ngɑ wɛndɛ fee?
41010003	Yesu mɑ tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Fɔndɔ fɔ nɑ Moisi nɑ wom no?
41010004	Ǹ cii: Moisi tu bɔrɔ mɑ hije wiyom tirɑ nɑ kɑ du kɑ ngɑ wɛndɛ fee.
41010005	Ammɑ Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Moisi nɑ fɔndɔ ngɑ di hɑntum wom sɛ no wom binesɛndɛ sɑbu sɛ.
41010006	Ammɑ zɑ tɑkɑyom sintine Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ tɛ nɑ "hɑibɔrɔ ndɑ weibɔrɔ.
41010007	À sɛ nɑ hɑibɔrɔ gɑ ngɑ bɑɑbɑ ndɑ ngɑ nyɑ nɑm kɑ dɔbu ngɑ wɛndɛ gɑɑ.
41010008	Ǹ bɔrɔ hinkɑ di, ǹ kɑɑ tɛ gɑɑhɑm fɔ." Zɑngɑ yɑ ǹ si tɛ ihinkɑ kpɛɛnɛ ɑmmɑ gɑɑhɑm fɔlɔnku.
41010009	Ngɑ di sɛ hɛ kɑ Ikpɛ hɔ cɛrɛ gɑɑ, bɔrɔ mɑ si ɑ̀ fee.
41010010	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ goono fuu kunɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom go kɑ ɑ̀ hã kpɛɛnɛ kɑ simbɑ sendi ngɑ di.
41010011	À cii ǹ sɛ: Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ngɑ wɛndɛ fee kɑ ɑfɔ ŋmɑni hiji, ɑkpɛ gɑ wɛndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ fee zinɑ.
41010012	De bine wɛndɛ mɑ yɑ gɑ ngɑ kunye fee kɑ ɑfɔ ŋmɑni hiji, ɑ̀ go zinɑ.
41010013	Ǹ kɑɑndɑ ɑ̀ sɛ koo cɛnɑ yom ɑ̀ mɑ ǹ hɑmɑ. Ammɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom nɑ kɑɑndɑkɔ yom yɑɑyɑ.
41010014	Kɑ Yesu di yɑ di, ɑ̀ bine tɔ. À cii coobɑɑbɑize yom di sɛ: Wɑ nɑm koo cɛnɑ yom mɑ kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ. Wɑ si ǹ gɑnji. Beerem zɑngɑ koo cɛnɑ yom wɔ, ǹ ŋmɔne no Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ.
41010015	Cimi no ɑ gɑ cii wom sɛ, bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ si Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ tɑ zɑngɑ koo cɛnɑ, ɑkpɛ si huro ɑ̀ kunɑ pɑi.
41010016	Cɔfɔ Yesu nɑ ǹ zɑɑ ngɑ jɛndɛ kunɑ. À nɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ ǹ bɔm kɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm ǹ gɑɑ.
41010017	Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu hunu kɑ huro fɔndɔ hɑibɔrɔ fɔ zuuru kɑ kɑɑ sɔmbu ɑ̀ jine. À nɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ cii: Coobɑɑbɑ hinnɑ, ifɔ nɑ yɑ tɛ kɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni tubu?
41010018	Cɔfɔ Yesu tu kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ n gɑ kɑ ɑ cɛɛ ihinno? Bɔrɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ ci ihinno kɑlɑ Bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku. Ngɑ yɑ ci Ikpɛ.
41010019	N go meire yom bei. "N mɑ si zinɑ. N mɑ si bɔrɔ wi. N mɑ si zee. N mɑ si tɛ tɑngɑri sɛdɑ. N mɑ si bɔrɔ fɔ kulu zɑmbɑ. N mɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ n nyɑ ndɑ n bɑɑbɑ sɛ."
41010020	À tu Yesu sɛ kɑ cii: Coobɑɑbɑ, meire yom wɔ kulu no ɑ gɑnɑ zɑ ɑ goono hɑiwɑsuize.
41010021	Yesu bine nɑ ɑ̀ gunɑ ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine. À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Hɛ fɔ nɑ n gɑziɑ. Kpei, n mɑ n hɑibɑrikɑ kɑ n gundɑ neerɑ kɑ nooruɑ fɑrisi tɑlikɑ yom sɛ. N kɑɑ du hɑizici jisɑntɛ bɛɛnɛ kunɑ. N mɑ kɑɑ kɑ bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ zɑɑ kɑ ɑ gɑnɑ.
41010022	Ammɑ bɔrɔ di moojine diibi ndɑ sendɑ. À dirɑ ndɑ binesɛrɛ zɑmɑ hɑibɑrikɑ no ɑ̀ gundɑ hɑli ǹ ci mɔsɔ.
41010023	Yesu nɑ ngɑ hundɑntɛ gunɑ kɑ cɛɛrɛ. À cii ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ: À gɑɑbu fɑ hɑibɑrikɑntɛ yom mɑ hurɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɑ kunɑ.
41010024	Coobɑɑbɑize yom mɑmɑci ndɑ Yesu sendi. Yesu ye kɑ cii ǹ sɛ: A koo yom, ɑ̀ gɑɑbu fɑ beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ ngei bɔm no hɑibɑrikɑ yom sɛ ǹ mɑ huro Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ kunɑ.
41010025	À fɑɑlɑ yoo sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ bisɑ sɑnɑ fune kunɑ ndɑ hɑibɑrikɑntɛ mɑ hurɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɑ kunɑ.
41010026	Coobɑɑbɑize yom mɑmɑci kɑlɑ kɑlɑ ndɑ ngɑ di. Ǹ cii cɛrɛ sɛ: Dee mee yɑ hini kɑ du fɑɑbɑ dɑ?
41010027	Yesu nɑ ǹ gunɑ kɑ cii: Iburɑdɑm yom dɔ ngɑ di si hini kɑ tɛ ɑmmɑ Ikpɛ wɔ dɔ hɛ kulu hini kɑ tɛ.
41010028	Piɛɛ sinti kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Gunɑ i nɑ hɛ kulu nɑm kɑ n gɑnɑ.
41010029	Yesu mo tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, bɔrɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ fuu nɑm wɑlɑ cɛɛnɛ yom wɑlɑ bɛɛrɛ yom wɑlɑ weimɑ yom wɑlɑ bɑɑbɑ wɑlɑ nyɑ wɑlɑ wɛndɛ wɑlɑ kɑɑ yom wɑlɑ fɑri yom ɑ sɑbu sɛ ndɑ Bɑɑru Hinno sɑbu sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ si du ei kɑ bisɑ zɑngu.
41010030	Mɑɑsɑ gɑɑ ɑkpɛ du fuu yom ǹ mɑ bisɑ zɑngu ndɑ cɛɛnɛ yom ndɑ bɛɛrɛ yom ndɑ weimɑ yom ndɑ nyɑ yom ndɑ koo yom ndɑ fɑri yom. À du ei mo ndɑ guruguze yom. Zɑmɑni mɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ du hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni.
41010031	Ammɑ sintine bɔrɔ boobo kɑɑ ci kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ bɔrɔ yom. Kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ bɔrɔ yom mo kɑɑ ci sintine bɔrɔ yom.
41010032	Ǹ goono fɔndɔ bɔm ko kpei Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ. Yesu nɑ jinɑ tɑ kɑ kpei. Coobɑɑbɑize yom mo mɑmɑci. Ǹ goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ndɑ hɑmburu. Hɑli jinɑ ɑ̀ cɛ kɑ coobɑɑbɑize wei cindi hinkɑ di cɛɛ kɑ ye kɑmbu. À sinti kɑ cii ǹ sɛ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ kɑɑ tɔ ngɑ.
41010033	À cii ǹ sɛ: Gunɑ, Yerusɑlɛm no i go ziji yɑ. Nodi no ǹ kɑɑ hɛɛ Adɑmize dɑm gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom kɑmbɛ. Ǹ bine gɑ ɑ ciiti kɑ zeeri kɑ ɑ wi. Ǹ gɑ ɑ dɑm dimi cindei kɑmbɛ.
41010034	Ǹ kɑɑ dondɑ hɛɛ kɑ ɑ bulɑɑlɑ. Ǹ kɑɑ yɔlɔ tufɑ ɑ gɑɑ. Ǹ gɑ ɑ wi ɑmmɑ jiribi hinzɑntɛ ɑ kɑɑ tunu.
41010035	Yɑkɔfu ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ mo, Zɑbɑdi koo yom, ǹ mɑɑni Yesu dɔ kɑ cii: Coobɑɑbɑ, i bɑɑ nɑ n mɑ tɛ i sɛ hɛ kɑ i gɑ n ŋmɑɑrɛ.
41010036	Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ wom gɑ bɑɑ yɑ tɛ wom sɛ?
41010037	Ǹ bine cii ɑ sɛ: N mɑ tu i sɛ i mɑ gɔrɔ, ɑfɔ n kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ, ɑfɔ mɑ n kɑmbɛwo gɑɑ n deizɑ kunɑ.
41010038	Ammɑ Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wom si bei hɛ kɑ wom gɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ. Tɑɑbi kɑ ɑ bɑ hɑm, wom hini kɑ ɑ̀ hɑm bɑ? Mirɑndiyom kɑ ɑ bɑ du, wom hini kɑ du ɑ̀ bɑ?
41010039	N cii Yesu sɛ: I hini. Yesu mo cii ǹ sɛ: Cimi no wom gɑ ɑ tɑɑbi hɑm. Mirɑndiyom kɑ ɑ bɑ du, wom kɑɑ du ɑ̀.
41010040	Ammɑ ɑ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ wɑlɑ ɑ kɑmbɛwo gɑɑ gɔrɛ di ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ɑ dɔ nɑ ɑ̀ hunu. Ammɑ beerem kɑ ǹ sɛ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ nɑ ɑ̀ hinsɑ, ǹ ŋmɔne nɑ.
41010041	Kɑ coobɑɑbɑize wei di mɑɑ ngɑ di, ǹ bine tɔ Yɑkɔfu ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ sɛ.
41010042	Ammɑ Yesu nɑ ǹ kulu cɛɛ ngɑ dɔ kɑ cii ǹ sɛ: Wom bei kɑ dimi cindei hinikpɛ yom gɑ kɑ ngei dɑbɑri cɛbɛ ndɑ bɔmbɛɛrɛ dimi cindei bɔm. Ǹ gɑɑbikoni yom mo go kɑ ngei hini cɛbɛ beerem bɔm.
41010043	À mɑ si ci yɑ di wom gɑme ɑmmɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ ci ibeeri wom kunɑ, ɑkpɛ mɑ ci wom sɛ gbeiize.
41010044	Wom kunɑ mɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ ci jinɑ, ɑkpɛ mɑ ci wom kulu tɑm.
41010045	Hɛɛ, Adɑmize yɑ nɑ kɑɑ bɔrɔ mɑ tɑmtɛrɛ ɑ sɛ. Ammɑ ɑ kɑɑ no yɑ tɑmtɛrɛ kɑ ɑ hundi nɑ beerem sɛ. A kɑɑ nɑ yɑ ci fɑnsɑ hɛ jɑmɑ gurubi.
41010046	Ǹ tɔ Yeriko wɑngɑrɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu gɑ hunu Yeriko ndɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom jɑmɑ bɑkɑrɑ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ. Dɑnɑm fɔ mo kɑ ǹ ci ɑ̀ sɛ Bɑtime Time kɑɑ, ɑ̀ gɑ gɔrɔ fɔndɑ jɛrɛbɛ ko bɑrɑ.
41010047	Kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ ǹ ci Yesu Nɑzɑrɛtu nɑ, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ sinti kɑ kuwɑ. À cii: Yesu ni Dɑfidi ize, n mɑ suuji cɛbɛ ɑ sɛ.
41010048	Cɔfɔ jɑmɑ di deeni ɑ̀ gɑɑ kɑ cii ɑ̀ mɑ dɛnjɛ. Sɑɑ di gɑɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kuwɑ ndɑ gɑɑbi kɑ tɔntɔnu. À cii: Ni Dɑfidi ize, n mɑ suuji cɛbɛ ɑ sɛ.
41010049	Yesu cɛ. À nɑ mei nɑ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ. Ǹ nɑ dɑnɑm di cɛɛ kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Himmɑ dɑm kɑ tunu. À gɑ kɑ n cɛɛ.
41010050	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ kpɛ kɑɑ kɑ cetu hɑli jinɑ. À hɑme kɑ tunu kɑ kɑɑ Yesu dɔ.
41010051	Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Ifɔ no n go bɑɑ yɑ tɛ n sɛ? À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A Jinɑ, yɑ tɛ moo.
41010052	Cɔfɔ Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpei, n nɑɑne nɑ n nɑ bɑɑni.
41010053	Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ tɛ mɑɑ. À nɑ Yesu gɑnɑ fɔndɑ kunɑ.
41011001	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ mɑɑni Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono Betɑfɑji ndɑ Betɑni kpɑɑrɑ yom jɛrɛ gɑɑ, ǹ tɔ tɑndi kuku fɔ dɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Olibe zugu. À nɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom ŋmɔne ihinkɑ dɔntɔm.
41011002	À cii ǹ sɛ: Wom mɑ kpei kpɑɑrɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono wom jine. À mee gɑɑ wom di fɑrikɑ binci hɑiwɑsu fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono hɔɑntɛ. Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑnɑ kɑɑru ɑ̀ bɔm bɑ ce fɔ. Wom mɑ ɑ̀ feeri kɑ kɑɑndɑ.
41011003	De bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ wom hã: Ifɔ sɛ wom go kɑ ɑ̀ feeri, wom mɑ cii Kpe yɑ gundɑ ɑ̀ murɑdu. À gɑ ɑ̀ yeti ɑkpɛ sɛ ndɑ wɑɑsi.
41011004	Coobɑɑbɑize hinkɑ bine kpei. Ǹ nɑ fɑrikɑ binci hɑiwɑsu fɔ gɑru tɛrɛ. À goono hɔɑntɛ hundi fɔ mee gɑɑ fɔndɔize fɔ dɔ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ feeri.
41011005	Bɔrɔ fɔ yom kɑ ǹ gɑ cɛ nodi, ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ yom nɑ ǹ hã kɑ cii: Ifɔ sɛ wom go fɑrikɑ binci di feeri?
41011006	Coobɑɑbɑize yom di cii ǹ sɛ zɑngɑ Yesu nɑ ǹ no fɔndɔ. Beerem di nɑ ǹ nɑm mo.
41011007	Ǹ kpeindɑ fɑrikɑ binci hɑiwɑsu Yesu dɔ. Ǹ nɑ ngei jiine yom dɛcɛ ɑ̀ bɔm. Cɔfɔ Yesu kɑɑru ɑ̀ bɔm.
41011008	Bɔrɔ boobo mo nɑ ngei jiine yom dɑɑru fɔndɔ bɔm. Bɔrɔ fɔ yom nɑ tuuri kɔsu yom pɑti kɑ dɑɑru fɔndɑ bɔm kɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ.
41011009	Beerem kɑ ǹ goono Yesu jine ko kpei ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ kɑ kɑɑ, ǹ kulu go kuwɑ kɑ cii: "Ikpɛ, i gɑ kɑ n sifɑ. Bɑrikɑkpɛ nɑ Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ Kpe mɑɑ gɑɑ.
41011010	Bɑrikɑkpɛ nɑ i bɑɑbɑ Dɑfidi kpetɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ. Ikpɛ, i gɑ kɑ n sifɑ, Ni, kɑ n goono bɛɛnɛ hɑli sɑmɑu."
41011011	Yesu huro Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ. Kɑ ɑ̀ hurɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ ɑ̀ nɑ moo cɛɛrɛ kɑ hɛ kulu gunɑ. Zɑ kɑ wiciri kɑmbu tɔ ɑ̀ hunu kɑ kpei Betɑni kpɑɑrɑ, ngɑ ndɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize wei cindi hinkɑ.
41011012	Mo bo sɑɑ kɑ ǹ hunu Betɑni kpɑɑrɑ, Yesu mɑɑ hɛrɛɛ.
41011013	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ jee nyɑ fɔ hunne hɑli jinɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ kɔsu. À mɑɑni ɑ̀ dɔ kɑ gunɑ hɑnibɑ ngɑ du ɑ̀ gɑɑ ize. À tɔ ɑ̀ dɔ. À mɑnɑ hɛ fɔ kulu gɑru ɑ̀ gɑɑ kɑlɑ kɔsu, zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci jee hɛiyom wɑtɛ.
41011014	À bine cii jee nyɑ sɛ: Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu si n ize ŋmɑɑ kpɛɛnɛ pɑi. À coobɑɑbɑize yom di mɑɑ yɑ di.
41011015	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ tɔ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ, Yesu hurɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ. À sinti kɑ neerɑkɔ yom ndɑ deikɔ yom kɑ ǹ goono nungu di gɑɑrɛ kɑ ǹ kɑɑ tɛrɛ. À nɑ nooru bɑrimekɔ yom tɑbulu yom hɑngɑsɑndi ndɑ gutu neerɑkɔei citɑ yom.
41011016	À mɑnɑ tu bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ hɛ fɔ zɑɑ kɑ hurɑ ndɑɑ̀ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ.
41011017	À nɑ ǹ cooɑndi kɑ cii: Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii, "A gɔrɛ dɔ yɑ dimi kulu ŋmɔne ɑduwɑ tɛyom dɔ nɑ". À nɑ ci cimi nɑ bɑ? Ammɑ wom wɔ, wom nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ "lɔkɔ zee yom ŋmɔne".
41011018	Kɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom mɑɑ yɑ di, ǹ ceeci zɑngɑ ngei mɑ tɛ kɑ ɑ̀ wi. Ǹ hɑmburu Yesu zɑmɑ jɑmɑ di kulu go mɑmɑci ndɑ ɑ̀ cɛbɑ.
41011019	Sɑɑ kɑ wiciri kɑmbu tɔ, ɑ̀ hunu wɑngɑrɑ kunɑ.
41011020	Susubɑ kɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom di gɑ bisɑ ǹ di jee nyɑ kɔgu kɑlɑ kɑɑji yom gɑɑ.
41011021	Cɔfɔ Piɛɛ hɔngɔ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ jinɑ kɑ tɛ. À cii Yesu sɛ: Coobɑɑbɑ, gunɑ jee nyɑ di kɑ n nɑ ɑ̀ lɑɑli, ɑ̀ kɔgu.
41011022	Yesu tu coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ kɑ cii: Wɑ gundɑ nɑɑne Ikpɛ gɑɑ.
41011023	Cimi nɑ ɑ gɑ ci wom sɛ, bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ cii tɑndi kuku wɔ sɛ, gɑnɑ kɑ kɑm buulɑ wɔ kunɑ, de ɑkpɛ si siikɑ ngɑ bine kunɑ ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne hɛ yom wɔ kɑ ngɑ go cii yɑ tɛ, ngɑ di kɑɑ tɛ.
41011024	À sɛ nɑ, ɑ go cii wom sɛ hɛ kulu kɑ wom ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑduwɑ kunɑ, wom mɑ nɑɑne kɑ wom du ɑ̀. Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ tɛ wom sɛ.
41011025	Sɑɑ kɑ wom gɑ cɛ kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ mɑ, de hɛ fɔ goono wom ndɑ bɔrɔ fɔ gɑme, wom mɑ ɑ̀ yɑɑfɑ zɑmɑ wom Bɑɑbɑ mo kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ ɑ̀ mɑ wom yɑɑfɑ ndɑ wom tɑɑli yom.
41011026	Ammɑ de wom si yɑɑfɑ, yɑ no wom Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ ɑ̀ si wom yɑɑfɑ ndɑ wom tɑɑli yom.
41011027	Ǹ ye kɑ kɑɑ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu gɑ yɑɑli Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ, gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom, ǹ kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ.
41011028	Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Hini fɔ nɑ n gɑ hɛ yom wɔ tɛ ndɑ? Mee yɑ nɑ n nɑ hini wɔ n mɑ hɛ yom wɔ tɛ?
41011029	Yesu mɑ tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Hɛɛ mɑ ɑ wom hã hɛ fɔ, wom mɑ tu ɑ sɛ. Hɛɛ mo yɑ cii wom sɛ hini kɑ ɑ gɑ hɛ yom wɔ tɛ ndɑ.
41011030	Mirɑndiyomɑ kɑ Yohɑnnɑ tɛ, Ikpɛ dɔ no ɑ̀ hunu dee wɑlɑ iburɑdɑm yom dɔ? Wɑ tu ɑ sɛ.
41011031	Cɔfɔ ǹ sendi cɛrɛ gɑme kɑ cii: De i cii Ikpɛ dɔ nɑ ɑ̀ hunu ɑ̀ kɑɑ cii, yɑ di gɑɑ ifɔ sɛ i mɑnɑ ɑ̀ nɑ cimi?
41011032	Ammɑ iburɑdɑm yom dɔ no ɑ̀ hunu i mɑ cii yɑ di no? To. Ǹ go hɑmburu jɑmɑ di nɑ zɑmɑ ǹ kulu tɑbɑi kɑ Yohɑnnɑ yɑ ɑndebi no cimi ndɑ ɑfɔ.
41011033	Ǹ tu Yesu sɛ kɑ cii: I si bei. Yesu mɑ cii ǹ sɛ: Yɑ nɑ hɛɛ mɑ ɑ si cii wom sɛ hini kɑ ɑ gɑ hɛ yom di tɛ ndɑ.
41012001	Yesu sinti kɑ sendi ǹ sɛ ndɑ yɑɑse yom. À cii: Bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ lɛzɛ tuuri yom tilɑm. À nɑ ǹ kɑkɑ. À nɑ guusu fɔ fɑnsi lɛzɛ hɑri kɑnkɑmyom sɛ. À nɑ tɑndɑ fɔ mɑ tɛ. À nɑ lɛzɛ lɑmbuɑ dɑm hɑifɑri fɔ yom kɑmbɛ kɑ nɑɑru. À kpei lɑɑbu ŋmɑni.
41012002	Sɑɑ kɑ tuuriizei kɔsuyom wɑtɛ tɔ, ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɑnyɑ fɔ dɔntɔm hɑifɑri yom di dɔ ɑ̀ mɑ ngɑ lɛzɛ zɑɑ kɑ ǹ kɔsu.
41012003	Hɑifɑri yom di nɑ bɑnyɑ dii kɑ bulɑɑlɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ yeti kɑmbɛ kɔnu.
41012004	À ye kɑ bɑnyɑ fɔ dɔntɔm ǹ gɑɑ. Ǹ nɑ ngɑ mo kɑru bɔm gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ woo.
41012005	Lɑmbukpɛɑ ye kɑ ɑfɔ dɔntɔm kpɛɛnɛ. Ǹ nɑ ngɑ wɔ wi. Yɑ di nɑ ǹ tɛ bɑnyɑ bɑɑbɑ sɛ. Ǹ nɑ ɑfɔ yom kɑru. Ǹ nɑ ɑfɔ yom wi.
41012006	Lɑmbukpɛɑ gundɑ koo gudɑ fɔ, ɑ̀ binegɑnji. À nɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔm ǹ dɔ kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ kɑ cii: Ǹ gɑ ɑ koo wɔ bɛɛrɑndi.
41012007	Ammɑ hɑifɑri yom di cii ngei gɑme: Bɔrɔ wɔne yɑ ci tubukɔɑ. Wɑ kɑɑ i mɑ ɑ̀ wi. Tubuɑ mɑ ci i ŋmɔne.
41012008	Cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ dii, kɑ cetu lɑmbuɑ bɑndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ wi.
41012009	Yɑ di gɑɑ, mɛtɛ lɑmbukpɛɑ kɑɑ tɛ dɑ? À kɑɑ hɑifɑri yom di wi kɑ lɑmbuɑ nɑ bɔrɔ ŋmɑni yom sɛ.
41012010	Ikpɛ Sendɑ hɑntumɑntɛ cii: Tondi kɑ fuu cinikɔ yom hungu, ngɑ yɑ tɛ mimbɑri cire tondi sintine.
41012011	Kpe dɔ no wɔne hunu. À tɛ mɑmɑci mo i moo yom sɛ. À nɑ ci wom nɑ ngɑ di coo bɑ?
41012012	Ǹ bine ceeci ngei mɑ ɑ̀ dii ɑmmɑ ǹ hɑmburu jɑmɑ, zɑmɑ ǹ bei kɑ ngei gɑɑ nɑ ɑ̀ nɑ yɑɑse cii. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ nɑm kɑ dirɑ.
41012013	Ǹ nɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ fɔ yom dɔntɔm Yesu dɔ ndɑ Hirodu bɑndɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ sui ɑ̀ mee sendi yom kunɑ.
41012014	Kɑ ǹ kɑɑ cɔfɔ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Coobɑɑbɑ, i bei kɑ ni yɑ ci cimikpɛ. N sindɑ bɑɑbɑɑ. N si kɑ iburɑdɑm yom tɑkɑri gunɑ. Ikpɛ fɔndɑ bɔm no n go cooɑndi ndɑ cimi. À hɑlɑli bɔrɔ mɑ ɑlikɑsi bɑnɑ Kɑisɑ sɛ bɑ, wɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɑlɑli? I mɑ bɑnɑ dee wɑlɑ i mɑ si bɑnɑ?
41012015	Zɑ kɑ Yesu nɑ ǹ munɑficitɛrɛ bei, ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ wom go kɑ ɑ sui? Wɑ kɑɑndɑ ɑ sɛ dinɑri wɔkɔkɔize fɔ yɑ di.
41012016	Ǹ kɑɑndɑ ɑ̀ sɛ. À cii ǹ sɛ: Mee bɔm nɑ ǹ tɛ nooru wɔ gɑɑ ndɑ jeeri wɔ? Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kɑisɑ ŋmɔne nɑ.
41012017	À gɑɑ nɑ Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wɑ Kɑisɑ hɛ yom nɑ Kɑisɑ sɛ, Ikpɛ hɛ yom mo Ikpɛ sɛ. Ǹ kulu mɑmɑci ndɑ ɑ̀ sendɑ.
41012018	Sɑdusi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ go cii bukɔei tunɑndiyom si, kɑɑ Yesu dɔ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ cii:
41012019	Coobɑɑbɑ, Moisi hɑntum i sɛ kɑ de bɔrɔ bɛɛrɛ bu kɑ wɛndɛ fɔ nɑm, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ koo nɑm, cɛɛnɑ mɑ wɛndɑ zɑɑ kɑ du hɛiyom ndɑ, ngɑ bɛɛrɑ sɛ.
41012020	To. Cɛɛnɛ ndɑ bɛɛrɛ iye goono. Sintine nɑ wɛndɛ fɔ zɑɑ. À bu. À mɑnɑ hɛi.
41012021	Ihinkɑntɛ nɑ wɛndɑ zɑɑ. Ngɑ mɑ bu. À mɑnɑ hɛi. Ihinzɑntɛ mo yɑ di.
41012022	Bɔrɔ iye di kulu nɑ wɛndɑ zɑɑ. Ǹ mɑnɑ hɛi. Ǹ kulu bɑndɑ weibɔrɔ di mɑ bu.
41012023	Bukɔei tunɑndiyomɑ hine, sɑɑ kɑ ǹ tunu ǹ kunɑ mee wɛndɑ nɑ zɑmɑ ǹ bɔrɔ iyɑ kulu nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ wɛndɛ?
41012024	Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wom gɑ dɛrɛ fɑ zɑmɑ wom si fɑhɑm ndɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ yom ndɑ Ikpɛ dɑbɑri.
41012025	Sɑɑ kɑ bukɔei kɑɑ tunu ǹ si hiji, ǹ si hijɑndi. Ammɑ beerem bɑ goono zɑngɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom kɑ ǹ goono bɛɛnɛ kunɑ.
41012026	Kɑ simbɑ ndɑ bukɔei tunɑndiyom, tirɑ kɑ Moisi hɑntum kunɑ Ikpɛ sendi ɑ̀ sɛ kubu fɔ kunɑ kɑ cii: "Hɛɛ yɑ ci Abulɛmɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ ndɑ Isɑɑkɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ ndɑ Yɑkɔfu ŋmɔne Ikpɛ". À nɑ ci wom nɑ ngɑ di coo bɑ?
41012027	Ikpɛ mɑnɑ ci bukɔ yom ŋmɔne Ikpɛ ɑmmɑ bɑhunɑ yom ŋmɔne no. Ngɑ di sɛ wom goono dɛrɛyom beeri kunɑ.
41012028	Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ fɔ mɑ mɑɑ ǹ gɑ kɑkɔ. Kɑ ɑ̀ di Yesu tu ǹ sɛ ihinno, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ Yesu hã kɑ cii: Meire yom kulu kunɑ wɔ fɔ yɑ ci meire sintine?
41012029	Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: "E Isirɑilɑ, Kpe i ŋmɔne Ikpɛ yɑ Kpe fɔlɔnku nɑ.
41012030	N mɑ bɑɑ Kpe n ŋmɔne Ikpɛ ndɑ n bine kulu ndɑ n hundi kulu ndɑ n lɑsɑbu kulu, ndɑ n gɑɑbi kulu." Meire sintinɑ noyɑ.
41012031	Ihinkɑntɛ mɑ neyɑ: "N mɑ bɑɑ n gɔrɔkɑsine zɑngɑ n bɔm". Meire fɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ wɔne yom.
41012032	Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: À boori Coobɑɑbɑ. N nɑ cimi cii zɑmɑ Ikpɛ fɔlɔnku yɑ goono. Afɔ ŋmɑni si kɑlɑ ngɑ.
41012033	Bɔrɔ mɑ bɑɑ Kpe ndɑ ngɑ bine kulu ndɑ ngɑ fɑhɑm kulu ndɑ ngɑ hundi kulu ndɑ ngɑ gɑɑbi kulu. Bɔrɔ mɑ bɑɑ ngɑ gɔrɔkɑsine mo zɑngɑ ngɑ bɔm. Wɔne bisɑ gɑrɑndi hɛ kukurɑntɛ kulu ndɑ sɑrɑɑ dimi dimi kulu.
41012034	Kɑ Yesu di Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔɑ tu ndɑ lɑɑkɑli, ɑ̀ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N mɑnɑ mooru Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ. Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑnɑ tu kɑ Yesu hã hɛ fɔ kpɛɛnɛ.
41012035	Yesu goono cooɑndiyom gɑɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii: Mɛtɛ nɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom go cii Mɛsiyɑ yɑ Dɑfidi ize no?
41012036	Dɑfidi bumbum sendi Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ kɑ cii: Kpe cii ɑ Kpe sɛ, N mɑ gɔrɔ ɑ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ hɑli yɑ n ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ yom tɛ n cee yom dɛcɛyom dɔ.
41012037	Dɑfidi bumbum go kɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ no Kpe, yɑ di gɑɑ mɛtɛ ɑ̀ tɛ kɑ ci ɑ̀ ize? Jɑmɑ di kulu bine ye ndɑ hɑngɑ dɑmyom ɑ̀ sɛ.
41012038	Cɛbɛ di kunɑ no ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom kɑ ǹ go fɑɑriŋmɑɑ kɑ yɑɑli ndɑ kpɛ kuku. Ǹ gɑ bɑɑ mo ǹ mɑ cini kɑ ngei fɔɔ hebu bɑtumɑ yom kunɑ.
41012039	Ǹ go bɑɑ jine gɔrɛ dɔ bɛɛrɛkpɛ Yuifu mɑrgɑ fuu yom kunɑ ndɑ jine gɔrɛ dɔ bɛɛrɛkpɛ jingɑru ŋmɑɑyom dɔ.
41012040	Ǹ go weibɔrɔ sokonei hundi yom hɑibɑrikɑ yom ŋmɑɑ. Ǹ gɑ kɑ ɑduwɑ kuku tɛ ko himɑ zɑngɑ gɑnɑkɔ hinno yom. Ǹ gɑ ǹ ciiti ifutu futu kɑ jɑɑsɑ ǹ kulu.
41012041	Yesu gɔrɔ nooru jisiyom dɔ jine ko gunɑ zɑngɑ jɑmɑ gɑ nooru dɑm. Hɑibɑrikɑntɛ boobo nɑ nooru boobo dɑm.
41012042	Weibɔrɔ sokoni tɑlikɑ fɔ mo kɑɑ. À nɑ tɑngɑ hinkɑ dɑm.
41012043	Cɔfɔ Yesu nɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom cɛɛ kɑ cii ǹ sɛ: Cimi nɑ ɑ gɑ cii wom sɛ, weibɔrɔ sokoni tɑlikɑ wɔ nɑ nooru dɑm kɑ bisɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go nooru dɑm nee.
41012044	Ngei wɔ ǹ nooru dɛcɛ bɔm no ǹ dɑm ɑmmɑ wei wɔ ɑ̀ dɑm ɑmmɑ wei wɔ ɑ̀ hinɑ no ɑ̀ dɑm. Hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ noyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ hunɑ ndɑ.
41013001	Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu gɑ hunu Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Coobɑɑbɑ, gunɑ kɑ di tondi yom wɔ dimi fɑ ndɑ cinɑri yom wɔ.
41013002	Yesu bine tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: N gɑ di cinɑri bɑmbɑtɑ yom wɔ? Bɑ tondi fɔ si cindi tondi bɔm kɑ ǹ si ɑ̀ kɑru kɑ see.
41013003	Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu gɑ gɔrɔ Olibe zugu tondi kukuɑ bɔm Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ jine, Piɛɛ ndɑ Yɑkɔfu ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ ndɑ Andɛrɛ, ǹ kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ kɑmbu kɑ ɑ̀ hã.
41013004	Ǹ cii: Cii i sɛ sɑɑ kɑ hɛ yom wɔ kɑɑ tɛ? Alɑmu fɔ yɑ kɑɑ tɛ sɑɑ kɑ hɛ yom wɔ bɑ tɔ?
41013005	Cɔfɔ Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ si wom dɛrɑndi.
41013006	Bɔrɔ boobo yɑ kɑɑ ndɑ ɑ mɑɑ kɑ cii: Hɛɛ yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ. Ǹ bine kɑɑ bɔrɔ boobo dɛrɑndi.
41013007	Sɑɑ kɑ wom kɑɑ mɑɑ wɑngu yom bɑɑru ndɑ wɑngu yom kɔsɔngu, wom lɑɑkɑli mɑ si tunu. Tilɑsi nɑ, nge yom di kulu mɑ tɛ, ɑmmɑ beeniyom mɑnɑ tɔ jinɑ.
41013008	Dimi kɑɑ tunu kɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ dimi. Kpetɛrɛ kɑɑ tunu kpetɛrɛ gɑɑ. Gɑndɑ zinji yom kɑɑ tɛ nungu ŋmɑni ŋmɑni. Hɛrɛɛ ndɑ butugu kɑɑ tɛ. Hɛ nge yom di bɔnei sintiyom nɑ.
41013009	Ammɑ wom wɔ, wɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ wom bɔm zɑmɑ ǹ kɑɑ wom dɑm Yuifu yom ciiti dumbukɔ yom kɑmbɛ. Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu yom kunɑ no ǹ kɑɑ wom bulɑɑlɑ. Ǹ kɑɑ kpeindɑ wom gɑɑbikoni yom jine ndɑ gɑndɑkpɛ yom jine ɑ sɑbu sɛ zɑmɑ wom mɑ tɛ ǹ sɛ sɛdɑ.
41013010	Sintine jinɑ kɑlɑ de ǹ mɑ Bɑɑru Hinno fɛɛ dimi yom kulu sɛ.
41013011	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ kɑɑ kpeindɑ wom kɑ wom dɑm kɑmbɛ, wom mɑ si dirigo ndɑ hɛ kɑ wom kɑɑ cii. Ammɑ wom mɑ sendi hɛ kɑ ǹ kɑɑ wom nɑ lɔkɑci ngɑ di kunɑ. À mɑnɑ ci wom yɑ gɑ sendi bɑ, ɑmmɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ no.
41013012	Cɛɛnɛ ndɑ bɛɛrɛ kɑɑ cɛrɛ dɑm kɑmbɛ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ wi, bɑɑbɑ mo ngɑ koo. Koo yom mo kɑɑ tunu kɑ ngei bɑhɛi yom dɑm kɑmbɛ ǹ mɑ ǹ wi.
41013013	Ǹ kulu bine kɑɑ hungu wom ɑ mɑɑ sɑbu sɛ, ɑmmɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hini suuru kɑlɑ mee, ǹ gɑ ɑkpɛ kɑɑ tɑɑbi di kunɑ.
41013014	Andebi Dɑniɛlo sendi kɑ simbɑ ndɑ hɛ lɑlɔ kɑ Ikpɛ fɛntɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑlɑkɑ tɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go coo, ɑ̀ mɑ fɑhɑm fɑ. Wom kɑɑ di ɑ̀ gɑ cɛ nungu kɑ ɑ̀ si himɑ ɑ̀ mɑ goono. Sɑɑ kɑ wom go di ɑ̀ go cɛ nungu di kunɑ, beerem kɑ ǹ goono Yude lɑɑbu mɑ zuuru kɑ kpei tɑndi kuku yom bɔm.
41013015	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono fuu yɔlɔ bɔm, ɑ̀ mɑ si zumbu kɑ huro ngɑ fuu kunɑ kɑ hɛ fɔ zɑɑ.
41013016	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono fɑri mɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ si ye bɑndɑ kɑ ngɑ kpɛ zɑɑ.
41013017	Ammɑ kɑito weibɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ gundɑ kunu ndɑ weibɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ gɑ nɑnɑndi hɑnu nge yom di.
41013018	Wom mɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ wom zuure mɑ si tɛ hɑrigu wɑtɛ.
41013019	Hɑnu nge yom di guruguze hɑnu no, guruguze kɑ ɑ̀ dimi mɑnɑ tɛ zɑ hɑndunyɑ sintiyom kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tɑkɑ hɑli kɑ kɑɑ mɑɑsɑ. À dimi si tɛ mɑ pɑi.
41013020	De Kpe mɑnɑ hɑnu nge yom di dunguriɑndi, ǹ si bɑhunɑ bɑ ɑfɔ kɑɑ tɑɑbi yom di kɑmbɛ. Ammɑ suubɑntɛ yom kɑ ɑ̀ suubɑ sɑbu sɛ, ɑ̀ nɑ hɑnu yom di dunguriɑndi.
41013021	Sɑɑ di no, bɑ de bɔrɔ fɔ cii wom sɛ: Gunɑ, Mɛsiyɑ gɑ nee, wɑlɑ gunɑ, ɑ̀ go yɔngɔ, wom mɑ si ɑ̀ nɑ cimi.
41013022	Mɛsiyɑ tɑngɑri tɑngɑri yom ndɑ ɑndebi tɑngɑri tɑngɑri yom kɑɑ tunu. Ǹ gɑ ɑlɑmu yom cɛbɛ ndɑ mɑmɑci yom hɑli de ɑ̀ hini kɑ tɛ, ǹ kɑɑ bɑ suubɑntɛ yom dɛrɑndi.
41013023	Ammɑ wom wɑ, wom mo lɑɑkɑli ndɑ wom bɔm. Gunɑ, ɑ jinɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kulu cii wom sɛ.
41013024	Ammɑ hɑnu nge yom di kunɑ tɑɑbi futu wɔ bɑndɑ, "weenu kɑɑ bɛrɛ kɑ tɛ kube. Hɑndu si ngɑ kɑɑri no.
41013025	Hɑndɑriyɑize yom kɑɑ kɑm zɑ bɛɛnɛ. Bɛɛnɛ dɑbɑri yom kɑɑ zinji."
41013026	À gɑɑ nɑ ǹ kɑɑ di hɛɛ, Adɑmize go kɑɑ buru yom bɔm ndɑ dɑbɑri bɑmbɑtɑ ndɑ deizɑ.
41013027	Sɑɑ di gɑɑ, yɑ ɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom sɑmbɑ ǹ mɑ ɑ suubɑntɛ yom kɑ ǹ goono hɑndunyɑ cɛnjɛ tɑɑci kulu meigu nungu kɑ goono kulu zɑ gɑndɑ mee kɑlɑ bɛɛnɛ mee.
41013028	Ammɑ wom mɑ dendeni yɑɑse kɑ jee nyɑ gɑ wom nɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ wom di ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ cɛnɑ yom gɑ kɔsu teji fiyo, wom go bei kɛdiɑ gɑ mɑɑni.
41013029	Yɑ nɑ, wom mɑ sɑɑ kɑ wom kɑɑ di hɛ nge yom di go tɛ wom mɑ bei kɑ hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ gɑ mɑɑni mee gɑɑ noyɑ.
41013030	Cimi no ɑ gɑ cii wom sɛ zɑmɑni wɔne si beeni pɑi kɑlɑ de hɛ nge yom di kulu mɑ tɛ.
41013031	Bɛɛnɛ ndɑ gɑndɑ kɑɑ beeni, ɑmmɑ ɑ sendi yom si beeni pɑi.
41013032	Ammɑ hɑnu ngɑ di ndɑ ɑ̀ lɔkɑci bɔrɔ fɔ kulu si ɑ̀ bei, bɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom kɑ ǹ goono bɛɛnɛ, bɑ Izɑ bumbum kɑlɑ Bɑɑbɑ ngɑ fɔ.
41013033	Wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli. Wom mo bɑtu. Wom mo kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ zɑmɑ wom si bei sɑɑ kɑ lɔkɑcɑ kɑɑ kɑɑ.
41013034	À himɑ no zɑngɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑru kɑ ngɑ hundi nɑm. À nɑ ngɑ hini nɑ ngɑ bɑnyɑ yom sɛ. À nɑ ɑfɔ kulu nɑ ɑ̀ gbei. À nɑ bɑtukɔɑ mo dɑm ɑ̀ mɑ bɑtu.
41013035	Ngɑ di sɛ wom mɑ bɑtu zɑmɑ wom si bei sɑɑ kɑ hundikpɛ di kɑɑ kɑɑ, wiciri nɑ wɑlɑ ciini bindi nɑ wɑlɑ gɔrɔngɔ hɛni nɑ wɑlɑ susubɑ nɑ.
41013036	Hɑli bɑ ɑ kɑɑ mefɔ mefɔ ɑ mɑ si wom gɑru jiibi gɑɑ.
41013037	Hɛ kɑ ɑ go cii wom sɛ wɔ, bɔrɔ kulu sɛ no ɑ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cii, wɑ bɑtu.
41014001	À cindi jiribi hinkɑ Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru nɑ ndɑ Buuru Kɑsɑmi Si jingɑru mɑ tɔ. Gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ceeci zɑngɑ ngei mɑ tɛ kɑ Yesu dii ndɑ cɛmbɛrɛ kɑ wi.
41014002	Ammɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ mɑ si tɛ jingɑruɑ hine zɑmɑ yuguyugu mɑ si tɛ jɑmɑ kunɑ.
41014003	Yesu goono Betɑni kpɑɑrɑ Simɔ jire fɔ fuu kunɑ kɑ gɔrɔ ŋmɑɑyom dɔ. Cɔfɔ weibɔrɔ fɔ kɑɑ ndɑ kɔlibɛ kpɑrɛ fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ ɑlibɑti. À mefɔ ndɑ wɑidi cɑɑdɑntɛ dimi fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ sɛ nɑdi. Weibɔrɔ di nɑ kɔlibɑ bɔgu kɑ wɑidi munu Yesu bɔm.
41014004	Bɔrɔ fɔ yom kɑ ǹ goono fuu di kunɑ, ǹ bine tɔ. Ǹ cii cɛrɛ gɑme: Ifɔ yɑ ci wɑidi wɔ sɑrɑyom mɑɑsɑ?
41014005	À himɑ no dom ǹ mɑ wɑidi wɔ neerɑ jiiri fɔ bɑnɑndi sɑrɑ kɑ nooru di fɑrisi tɑlikɑ yom sɛ. Ǹ nɑ sendi ngɑ di bɔgu weibɔrɔ di bɔm.
41014006	Ammɑ Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ ɑ̀ nɑm. Ifɔ sɛ wom go kɑ ɑ̀ tɑɑbɑndi? Gbei hinno no ɑ̀ tɛ ɑ sɛ.
41014007	tɑlikɑ yom bo goono ndɑ wom sɑɑ kulu. Sɑɑ kɑ wom bɑɑ kulu wom hini kɑ ihinno tɛ ǹ sɛ. Ammɑ hɛɛ wɔ ɑ si bo goono ndɑ wom sɑɑ kulu.
41014008	Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci wei wɔ hinɑ, ngɑ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ. A fijiyom wɑidi no ɑ̀ jinɑndi ɑ gɑɑ.
41014009	Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ nungu kulu kɑ ǹ kɑɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɔ fɛɛ hɑndunyɑ mee ndɑ mee ǹ kɑɑ hɛ kɑ weibɔrɔ wɔ mo tɛ deede kɑ hɔngɔɑ̀.
41014010	À gɑɑ no Yudɑ Isikɑriɔtu coobɑɑbɑize wei cindi hinkɑ di ŋmɔne ɑfɔ, ɑ̀ kpei gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom dɔ zɑmɑ ngɑ mɑ Yesu dɑm ǹ kɑmbɛ.
41014011	Kɑ ngei mɑ mɑɑ yɑ di, ǹ bine yee. Ǹ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli zɑɑ kɑ ngei gɑ ɑ̀ bɑnɑ. Yudɑ gɑ ceeci zɑngɑ ngɑ mɑ tɛ kɑ Yesu dɑm ǹ kɑmbɛ.
41014012	Buuru Kɑsɑmi Si jingɑru hɑnu sintinɑ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ mɑ Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru di feeji wiyom tɔ. À coobɑɑbɑize yom cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Mɑni nɑ n go bɑɑ i mɑ Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru sɔlu n mɑ ŋmɑɑ?
41014013	À nɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom ŋmɔne ihinkɑ dɔntɔm kɑ cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ kpei wɑngɑrɑ. Hɑibɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hoobu hɑri jɛrɛ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ wom kube. Wom mɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ.
41014014	Nungu kɑ ɑ̀ dɔ ɑ̀ hurɑ wom mɑ cii hundikpɛɑ sɛ: Coobɑɑbɑ cii, mɑni fuu kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ɑ zumbu kɑ Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru ŋmɑɑri ŋmɑɑ ndɑ ɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom?
41014015	À kɑɑ wom cɛbɛ jidɑmbisɑ beeri fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hinsɑ kɑ jisi. À kunɑ nɑ wom mɑ jingɑruɑ ŋmɑɑri sɔlu i sɛ.
41014016	Coobɑɑbɑize yom di kpei. Ǹ huro wɑngɑrɑ kunɑ. Ǹ nɑ hɛ kulu gɑru zɑngɑ Yesu nɑ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ. Ǹ nɑ Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑruɑ ŋmɑɑri sɔlu.
41014017	Wiciri kɑmbu tɔ, Yesu kɑɑ ndɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize wei cindi hinkɑ di ngɑ bɑndɑ.
41014018	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ gɑ gɔrɔ kɑ ŋmɑɑ cɔfɔ Yesu cii: Cimi nɑ ɑ gɑ cii wom sɛ wom kunɑ ɑfɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ŋmɑɑ ndɑ hɛɛ, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ dɑm kɑmbɛ.
41014019	Coobɑɑbɑize yom di bine sinti kɑ sɑrɑ. Ǹ kulu gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hã ɑfɔ fɔ, bɔrɔ wɔne gɑ cii: Hɛɛ nɑ? Bɔrɔ wɔne go cii: Hɛɛ no?
41014020	Ammɑ Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wom bɔrɔ wei cindi hinkɑ wɔ kunɑ ɑfɔ nɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ kɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ dɑm combu ɑ bɑndɑ.
41014021	Cimi nɑ, hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ go kpei ndɑ zɑngɑ ǹ hɑntum ɑ bɔm. Ammɑ kɑito bɔrɔ kpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ hɛɛ, Adɑmize dɑm kɑmbɛ. À boori dɑm ǹ mɑ si ɑkpɛ hɛi pɑi.
41014022	Kɑ ǹ go ŋmɑɑ, cɔfɔ Yesu nɑ buuru zɑɑ kɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm ɑ̀ gɑɑ. À nɑ ɑ̀ zenji zenji kɑ fɑrisi ǹ sɛ. À cii: Wɑ tɑ, wɑ ŋmɑɑ. Wɔne yɑ ci ɑ gɑɑhɑm.
41014023	À nɑ gulɑize fɔ mo zɑɑ. Kɑ ɑ̀ sɑɑbu, ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ no ǹ sɛ. Ǹ kulu hɑm.
41014024	À cii ǹ sɛ: Wɔne yɑ ci ɑ kuri, ɑlikɑwɑli teji tɛyom ŋmɔne kɑ ɑ̀ munu bɔrɔ boobo gurubi.
41014025	Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, ɑ si lɛzɛ hɑri hɑm kpɛɛnɛ kɑlɑ hɑnu kɑ ɑ yɑɑrɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hɑm Ikpɛ kpetɛrɑ kunɑ.
41014026	Kɑ ǹ nɑ betu fɔ tɛ ǹ hunu kɑ kpei Olibe zugu tondi kukuɑ bɔm.
41014027	À gɑɑ nɑ Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wom kulu kɑɑ du dɛrɛyom kɔbɛ ɑ gɑɑ ciini wɔ. Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "A kɑɑ kurukɔ kɑru kɑ wi. Feeji yom kɑɑ kɑru kɑ see.
41014028	Ammɑ ɑ tunɑndiyom bɑndɑ, ɑ wom jinɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu.
41014029	Cɔfɔ Piɛɛ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Bɑ de ǹ kulu du dɛrɛyom kɔbɛ, hɛɛ wɔ ɑ si du.
41014030	Yesu mɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Cimi nɑ ɑ go cii n sɛ, hunkunɑ bɑ ciini wɔ hɑli gɔrɔngɔ cɑ jinde hinkɑ n gɑ ɑ ze ce hinzɑ.
41014031	Ammɑ Piɛɛ ye kɑ cii ndɑ gɑɑbi: Bɑ de yɑ bu n bɑndɑ nɑ, ɑ dee si n ze pɑi. Cindei mɑ kulu ci yɑ di.
41014032	Ǹ kɑɑ nungu fɔ kɑ ǹ ci ɑ̀ sɛ Gɛtɑsemɑni. Yesu bine cii ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ: Wɑ gɔrɔ nee hɑli yɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ.
41014033	À nɑ Piɛɛ ndɑ Yɑkɔfu ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ boi ngɑ bɑndɑ ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ sinti kɑ kɑnkɑm. À lɑɑkɑli tunu kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
41014034	À cii ǹ sɛ: Binesɛrɛ nɑ ɑ bine dii kɑlɑ ɑ tɔ bu gɑɑ. Wom mɑ gɔrɔ nee kɑ bɑtu.
41014035	À kpei jinɑ cɛnɑ, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ jɛndɛbiri kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ. À cii, de hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ tɛ nɑ, lɔkɑci wɔ mɑ mooru ngɑ.
41014036	À cii: Bɑɑbɑ, ɑ Bɑɑbɑ, hɛ kulu yɑ hini kɑ tɛ n dɔ. N mɑ tɑɑbi wɔ moorɑndi ɑ gɑɑ. Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu ɑ̀ mɑ si cii hɛ kɑ ɑ gɑ bɑɑ, kɑlɑ hɛ kɑ n bine gɑ bɑɑ.
41014037	Yesu bine kɑɑ. À nɑ ǹ gɑru ǹ go jiibi. À cii Piɛɛ sɛ: Simɔ, n go jiibi no? N mɑnɑ hini kɑ bɑtu guuru fɔ?
41014038	Wom mo bɑtu ko kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ, zɑmɑ wom mɑ si huro suiyom kunɑ. Bine gɑ bɑɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ, ɑmmɑ gɑɑhɑm yɑ hinɑbunu nɑ.
41014039	À ye kɑ kpei. À nɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ ndɑ sendi fɔlɔnku yom di.
41014040	À bɛrɛ kɑ ye coobɑɑbɑize yom di dɔ. À ye kɑ ǹ gɑru jiibi gɑɑ zɑmɑ ǹ mɑɑ yom tim. Ǹ mɑnɑ bei zɑngɑ ngei tu ɑ̀ sɛ.
41014041	À kɑɑ kpɛɛnɛ ce hinzɑntɛ. À cii ǹ sɛ: Mɑɑsɑnkulu wom jiibi kɑ hulɑnzom bɑ? À wɑsɑ. Lɔkɑci tɔ. Gunɑ, hɛɛ Adɑmize ǹ gɑ kɑ ɑ dɑm dulumkoni yom kɑmbɛ.
41014042	Wɑ tunu, i mɑ kpei. Gunɑ, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ dɑm kɑmbɛ, ɑ̀ tɔ kpɑɑrɑ.
41014043	Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu go sendi, cɔfɔ Yudɑ iwei cindi hinkɑ di ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ kɑɑ. Jɑmɑ bɑkɑrɑ goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ndɑ tɑkubɑ yom ndɑ goobu yom. Gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom yɑ nɑ ǹ dɔntɔm.
41014044	Yudɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm kɑmbɛ nɑ jɑmɑ di no ɑlɑmu fɔ kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ jɛrɛbɛ sumsum, ngɑ noyɑ. Wɑ ɑ̀ dii ɑ̀ mɑ boori kɑ kpeindɑɑ̀.
41014045	Sɑɑ kɑ Yudɑ kɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑɑni Yesu dɔ ndɑ wɑɑsi kɑ cii: Coobɑɑbɑ, Coobɑɑbɑ. À hiyɑ ko kɑ ɑ̀ jɛrɛbɛ sumsum.
41014046	À gɑɑ no ǹ nɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ ɑ̀ bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ dii.
41014047	Coobɑɑbɑize yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ bine nɑ tɑkubɑ hɑɑbu. À nɑ gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ bɑnyɑ fɔ beri kɑ hɑngɑ fɔ kɑɑ.
41014048	Ammɑ Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wom kɑɑ kɑ ɑ dii ndɑ tɑkubɑ yom ndɑ goobu yom zɑngɑ zee.
41014049	Hɑnu kulu ɑ gɑ gɔrɔ wom gɑme ko cooɑndi Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ, wom mɑnɑ ɑ dii. Ammɑ ɑ̀ tɛ no zɑmɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ yom mɑ tɔ sɛ no.
41014050	Cɔfɔ coobɑɑbɑize yom di kulu zuuru kɑ ɑ̀ nɑm.
41014051	Hɑiwɑsu fɔ mɑ nɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ ndɑ gurijinde. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ dii.
41014052	Ammɑ ɑ̀ kɔmɑ kɑ zuuru bumbum kɑ ngɑ gurijindɑ nɑm.
41014053	Ǹ kpeindɑ Yesu gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ dɔ. Gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom, ǹ kulu go meigu ɑ̀ dɔ.
41014054	Piɛɛ nɑ Yesu hɑmine zɑ nungu mooru kɑlɑ gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ kɑtɑ dɔ. À gɔrɔ hundi kunɑ gbeiteeri fɔ yom dɔ ko cɑɑni nini fɔ dɔ.
41014055	Gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Yuifu yom ciiti dumbukɔ yom kulu go sɛdɑ fɔ ceeci Yesu bɔm ngei mɑ du ɑ̀ kɑ wi. Ǹ bine mɑnɑ du ɑ̀.
41014056	Bɔrɔ boobo tɛ tɑngɑri sɛdɑ Yesu bɔm ɑmmɑ ǹ sɛdɑ yom mɑnɑ sɑbɑ.
41014057	Bɔrɔ fɔ yom tunu kɑ tɛ tɑngɑri sɛdɑ ɑ̀ bɔm.
41014058	Ǹ cii: I mɑɑ ɑ̀ cii ngɑ gɑ Ikpɛ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ kɑ ǹ cini ndɑ kɑmbɛ zeeri. Ngɑ gɑ iteji cini mo kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ndɑ kɑmbɛ jiribi hinzɑ gɑme.
41014059	Bɑ mɑɑsɑ ǹ sɛdɑ mɑnɑ sɑbɑ.
41014060	Gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ tunu kɑ cɛ ǹ kulu jine. À nɑ Yesu hã kɑ cii: N si tu ndɑ hɛ fɔ kulu bɑ? Hɛ fɔ sɛdɑ beerem wɔ gɑ tɛ n bɔm?
41014061	Ammɑ Yesu go dɛnjɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɛ fɔ kulu cii. Gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ nɑ ɑ̀ hã kpɛɛnɛ kɑ cii: Ni yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ Bɑrikɑkpɛ Izɑ bɑ?
41014062	Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Hɛɛ yɑ ci. Wom bine kɑɑ di hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ mo gɔrɔ Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Dɑbɑrikpɛ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ. Wom kɑɑ di ɑ gɑ kɑɑ zɑ bɛɛnɛ buru yom bɔm.
41014063	À gɑɑ no gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ nɑ ngɑ kpɛ pɑti pɑti Yesu sendi ngɑ di sɑbu sɛ. À cii: Sɛdɑ fɔ no i go bɑɑ kpɛɛnɛ?
41014064	Wom mɑɑ sendi yɑmɔ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ kɑ Ikpɛ cɛnɑndi. Mɛtɛ ɑ̀ himɑ wɔm sɛ? Cɔfɔ ǹ kulu nɑ ɑ̀ ciiti kɑ zeeri kɑ cii ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ wi.
41014065	Cɔfɔ bɔrɔ fɔ yom kɑm ko yɔlɔ tufɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ moojine dɑɑbu ko kɑ ɑ̀ lunkutɛ. Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Andebitɛrɛ tɛ. Dogɑri yom mɑ nɑ kɑmbɛ dɑm kɑ ɑ̀ dɛmbɛ dɛmbɛ.
41014066	Sɑɑ di Piɛɛ wɔ goono hundi bɑtumɑ kunɑ, cɔfɔ gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ gbeiize hundiyo yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ kɑɑ.
41014067	À di Piɛɛ go cɑɑni. À nɑ Piɛɛ gunɑ kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ni bine, n goono Yesu Nɑzɑrɛtu bɑndɑ.
41014068	Ammɑ Piɛɛ nɑ Yesu ze kɑ cii: A si ɑ̀ bei. A si fɑhɑm mo ndɑ hɛ kɑ n gɑ cii. Piɛɛ hunu hundi bɑtumɑ kunɑ kɑ kpei kɑtɑ dɔ. À gɑɑ no, gɔrɔngɔ cɑ jinde fɔ.
41014069	Gbeiize hundiyo fɔ nɑ ɑ̀ gunɑ kpɛɛnɛ. À sinti kɑ cii beerem kɑ ǹ goono nungu di sɛ: Bɔrɔ kpɛ beerem di ŋmɔne ɑfɔ nɑ.
41014070	Piɛɛ yɑɑrɑ kɑ Yesu ze. Hɑli cɛnɑ beerem di mo kɑ ǹ goono hundi kunɑ cii Piɛɛ sɛ: Siikɑ si, ni mo n goono beerem di kunɑ zɑmɑ ni yɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu bɔrɔ nɑ. Bɑ n dɛɛnɛ sendi gɑɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ n bei.
41014071	À gɑɑ nɑ, Piɛɛ sinti kɑ bɔm lɑɑliyom tɛ kɑ ze. À cii: A si bɔrɔ kpɛ kɑ wom gɑ cii wɔ bei.
41014072	Cɔfɔ gɔrɔngɔ cɑ kpɛɛnɛ ce hinkɑntɛ. Bine Piɛɛ hɔngɔ sendɑ kɑ Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Hɑli gɔrɔngɔ cɑ jinde hinkɑ n gɑ ɑ ze ce hinzɑ. Kɑ Piɛɛ hɔngɔ ngɑ di ɑ̀ go hɛ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
41015001	Kɑ mɑ bo mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jine yom meigu ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ Yuifu yom ciiti dumbukɔ yom kulu kɑ sɑwɑrɑ. Kɑ ǹ nɑ Yesu hɔ, ǹ kpeindɑɑ̀ Yesu kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm Pilɑtu kɑmbɛ.
41015002	Pilɑtu nɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ cii: Ni, n ci Yuifu yom Kpe bɑ? Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Ni, n cii.
41015003	Gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑ ndɑ hɛ boobo, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɛ fɔ kulu cii.
41015004	Pilɑtu nɑ ɑ̀ hã kpɛɛnɛ kɑ cii: N si tu bɑ? Gunɑ, hɛ boobo kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ n tɔnyɑ ndɑ.
41015005	Ammɑ Yesu mɑnɑ tu ɑ̀ sɛ bihi kɑlɑ Pilɑtu mɑmɑci.
41015006	Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru kulu gɑɑ bine, Pilɑtu cini kɑsuize fɔ tɑm ǹ sɛ wɔ kɑ jɑmɑ bɑɑ ǹ mɑ tɑm.
41015007	Bɔrɔ fɔ goono kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Bɑrɑbɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm kɑsu kunɑ ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ nɑ lɑɑbu fɔndɔ yom hunguɛ tɛ. Lɑɑbu fɔndɔ hunguɛ kunɑ nɑ ǹ nɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom wi.
41015008	Jɑmɑ di tunu ndɑ kuwɑ. Ǹ sinti ko kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ tɛ ngei sɛ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ dɔnɑ kɑ tɛ.
41015009	Pilɑtu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Yuifu yom Kpeɑ no wom bɑɑ yɑ tɑm wom sɛ?
41015010	Pilɑtu cii yɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ bei kɑ cɛnsɛ yɑ nɑm gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm kɑmbɛ.
41015011	Ammɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom nɑ jɑmɑ di bɛrɛ ǹ mɑ Pilɑtu ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ Bɑrɑbɑ tɑm ngei sɛ, ɑ̀ bisɑ.
41015012	Pilɑtu mɑ tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Yɑ di gɑɑ, ifɔ no wom go bɑɑ yɑ tɛ ndɑ bɔrɔ kɑ wom go cɛɛ Yuifu yom Kpe?
41015013	Jɑmɑ di kuwɑ kpɛɛnɛ kɑ cii: À kɑnji. À kɑnji.
41015014	Pilɑtu cii ǹ sɛ: Ilɑlɔ fɔ no ɑ̀ tɛ? Ammɑ ǹ nɑ jinde zɑɑ kɑ kuwɑ kpɛɛnɛ ndɑ gɑɑbi kɑ cii: À kɑnji. À kɑnji.
41015015	Kɑ Pilɑtu mɑ go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ jɑmɑ wɔ bine kɑɑnɑndi, ɑ̀ nɑ Bɑrɑbɑ tɑm jɑmɑ di sɛ. Kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Yesu bulɑɑlɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ Yesu dɑm kɑmbɛ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji.
41015016	Wɑnguize yom kpeindɑ Yesu ciiti kɑtɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono gɑɑbikoni hundi kunɑ. Ǹ nɑ wɑnguize yom kuru fɔ kulu meigu ɑ̀ bɔm.
41015017	Ǹ no kpɛ siini kuku fɔ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑriji cɛ zɑngɑ bɔmtɔbɛ kɑ didiji ɑ̀ bɔm gɑɑ.
41015018	Cɔfɔ ǹ sinti ko kɑ ɑ̀ fɔɔ kɑ cii: Fɔɔ, Yuifu yom Kpe.
41015019	Ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ sɔtɛ bɔm gɑɑ ndɑ sɑɑri. Ǹ go yɔlɔ tufɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Ǹ gɑ sɔmbu kɑ jɛndɛbiri ɑ̀ sɛ gɑndɑ.
41015020	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɑɑru kɑ beeni, ǹ nɑ kpɛ siini di kɑɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ bumbum jiine yom dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ. Ǹ kpeindɑɑ̀ tɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji.
41015021	Fɔndɔ bɔm ǹ kube ndɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Simɔ, Sileni bɔrɔ nɑ. Alɛsɑndi ndɑ Lufu bɑɑbɑ nɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hunu zɑ gɑnji kunɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tilɑsi ɑ̀ mɑ Yesu bundu gɑɑrɑntɑ zɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ jɛrɛ.
41015022	Ǹ kpeindɑ Yesu nungu fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Gologɑtɑ. À feeriji yɑ ci Bɔm Kurumbu nungu.
41015023	Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ nɑ dufɛ ndɑ mire sɑfɑri dimi fɔ meiguɑntɛ ɑ̀ mɑ hɑm ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ hɑm.
41015024	Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ jiine yom fɑrisi. Ǹ nɑ tɛtɛ tɛ kɑ di hɛ kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu du.
41015025	Susubɑ guuru ɛgɑ no, ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji.
41015026	Ǹ nɑ sɑbɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑ hɑntum ɑ̀ bɔm dɔ kɑ cii: YUIFU YOM KPE.
41015027	Ǹ nɑ zee beeri hinkɑ fɔ mɑ kɑnji ndɑ Yesu. Ǹ nɑ ɑfɔ kɑnji ɑ̀ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑfɔ mɑ kɑnji ɑ̀ kɑmbɛwo gɑɑ.
41015028	Ǹ nɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ hɑntumɑntɛ tɔnɑndi kɑ ɑ̀ cii: "Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm bɔrɔ lɑlɔ yom sɛtɛ kunɑ".
41015029	Bisɑkɔ yom mo go kɑ ɑ̀ woo kɑ cɔɔrɔ. Ǹ cii: E ni, n cii n hini kɑ Ikpɛ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ zeeri kɑ yɑɑrɑ kɑ cini jiribi hinzɑ gɑme.
41015030	N mɑ n bɔm fɑɑbɑ kɑ zumbu bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ wɔ bɔm.
41015031	Yɑ no gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom mo, ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ hɑɑru ngei gɑme kɑ cii: À nɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom fɑɑbɑ fɑ, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ si hini kɑ ngɑ bɔm fɑɑbɑ.
41015032	Wɑ nɑm Mɛsiyɑ, Isirɑilɑ Kpe ɑ̀ mɑ zumbu mɑɑsɑnkulu bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ wɔ bɔm i mɑ di, i mɑ du kɑ cimi no ɑ̀ sɛ Zee beeri hinkɑ kɑ ǹ kɑnji ndɑ Yesu, ngei mo go kɑ ɑ̀ woo.
41015033	Sɑɑ kɑ weenu tɔ bɔm bindi, cɔfɔ kube tɛ lɑɑbu kulu kunɑ kɑlɑ wiciri guuru hinzɑ.
41015034	Wiciri guuru hinzɑ di Yesu kuwɑ ndɑ jinde beeri kɑ cii: "Eli, Eli lɑmɑ sɑbɑtɑni". À feeriji yɑ ci, "A ŋmɔne Ikpɛ, ɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ, ifɔ sɛ n zuuru ɑ gɑɑ"?
41015035	Bɔrɔ fɔ yom kɑ ǹ goono nungu di kɑ ǹ mɑɑ ngɑ di, ǹ cii: Gunɑ, ɑ̀ go Eli cɛɛ.
41015036	ŋmɔne ɑfɔ bine zuuru ndɑ wɑɑsi kɑ sɑku miti hɑri mɔrɔ kunɑ. À nɑ ɑ̀ kɔtɔ sɑɑri gɑɑ kɑ sɛllɛ ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ sumsum. À cii: Wɑ nɑm. I mɑ di hɑli Eli go kɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ zumɑndi no.
41015037	Ammɑ Yesu kuwɑ ndɑ jinde beeri fɔ kɑ ngɑ hundi tɑm.
41015038	À gɑɑ no Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ lɑbude kɔɔtu ihinkɑ zɑ bɛɛnɛ kɑlɑ gɑndɑ.
41015039	Wɑnguize yom jinehune fɔ goono Yesu jine. Kɑ ɑ̀ di Yesu kuwɑ zɑngɑ yɑ kɑ ngɑ hundi tɑm, ɑ̀ cii: Siikɑ si Bɔrɔ kpɛ wɔ Ikpɛ Ize no.
41015040	Weibɔrɔ fɔ yom mo goono hɑli jinɑ kɑ gunɑ. Mɑriɑmɑ Mɑgɑdɑliɑ goono ǹ kunɑ ndɑ Mɑriɑmɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Yɑkɔfu cɛnɑ ndɑ Yose nyɑ ndɑ Sɑlome.
41015041	Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu goono Gɑlile lɑɑbu, weibɔrɔ yom di nɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ kɑ tɑmtɛrɛ ɑ̀ sɛ ndɑ ɑfɔ yom mo kɑ ǹ ziji Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ Yesu bɑndɑ.
41015042	Wiciri tɔ kɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci hulonzom hɑnu sɔluyom hine.
41015043	À sɛ no Yosɛfu Alimɑte kɑɑ. Bɔrɔ beeri fɔ no Yuifu yom ciiti dumbukɔ yom kunɑ. Ngɑ mo ɑ̀ go kɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ bɑtu. À hurɑ Pilɑtu dɔ ndɑ yɑrutɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ Yesu bukɔɑ.
41015044	Mɑmɑci nɑ Pilɑtu dii hɑli Yesu bu kɔ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ wɑnguize yom jinehune cɛɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hã hɑli ɑ̀ jɛ kɑ bu.
41015045	Kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ cimi jinehunɑ dɔ, ɑ̀ nɑ bukɔɑ no Yosɛfu sɛ.
41015046	Yosɛfu nɑ cɛsɛnjɛ dei. À nɑ Yesu kɑɑ bundu gɑɑrɑntɑ gɑɑ kɑ cɛsɛnjɛ dɑm ɑ̀ gɑɑ. À nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm tondi sɑɑrɛ fɔ kɑ ǹ zozobu kunɑ. À nɑ tondi bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ mo gungure kɑ sɑɑrɛ di mee dɑɑbu.
41015047	Mɑriɑmɑ Mɑgɑdɑliɑ ndɑ Mɑriɑmɑ Yose nyɑ, ǹ di nungu kɑ ǹ gɑ Yesu dɑm.
41016001	Hulonzom hɑnuɑ bisɑ. Mɑriɑmɑ Mɑgɑdɑliɑ ndɑ Mɑriɑmɑ Yɑkɔfu nyɑ ndɑ Sɑlome, ǹ nɑ wɑidi hɛo kɑɑnekpɛ yom dei ngei mɑ kpei kɑkɑsu Yesu bukɔɑ gɑɑ.
41016002	Susubɑ zɑ ndɑ hine jiribi iye ŋmɔne hɑnu sintine kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑlɑhɑdi, ǹ kɑɑ sɑɑrɛ di dɔ sɑɑ kɑ weenu hunu.
41016003	Ǹ go cii cɛrɛ gɑme, mee yɑ tondɑ gungure kɑ gɑnɑndi i sɛ sɑɑrɛ di mee gɑɑ?
41016004	Tondi di beeri nɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. Ammɑ kɑ ǹ gunɑ ǹ di ǹ nɑ tɑndɑ gungure kɑ gɑnɑndi.
41016005	Kɑ ǹ hurɑ sɑɑrɑ kunɑ, ǹ di hɑiwɑsu fɔ ndɑ kpɛ kpɑrɛ kuku, ɑ̀ go gɔrɔ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ hɛrɛ. Mɑmɑci nɑ ǹ dii.
41016006	Ammɑ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ si mɑmɑci. Yesu Nɑzɑrɛtu kɑ ǹ kɑnji, ngɑ no wom go ceeci. À tunu. À si nee. Wɑ di nungu kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm.
41016007	Ammɑ wɑ kpei cii ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom ndɑ Piɛɛ sɛ Yesu go wom jinɑ ko kpei Gɑlile lɑɑbu. Wom kɑɑ di ɑ̀ nungu di zɑngɑ ɑ̀ cii wom sɛ.
41016008	Weibɔrɔ yom di hunu ndɑ wɑɑsi. Ǹ zuuru zɑ sɑɑrɑ dɔ. Gɑsiyom ndɑ mɑmɑci nɑ ǹ dii. Ǹ mɑnɑ hɛ fɔ kulu cii bɔrɔ fɔ sɛ zɑmɑ ǹ hɑmburu nɑ. [
41016009	Yesu tunu nɑ susubɑ zɑ ndɑ hine jiribi iye ŋmɔne hɑnu sintinɑ hine kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑlɑhɑdi. Mɑriɑmɑ Mɑgɑdɑliɑ sɛ no ɑ̀ jinɑ kɑ hunutɛrɛ, weibɔrɔ di kɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ɑ̀ nɑ hɔllɛ iye gɑɑrɛ.
41016010	Mɑriɑmɑ ngɑ di kpei bɑɑru cii beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ dɑm goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ. Ǹ bine gɑ sɑrɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ kɑ hɛ.
41016011	Ngei mɑ kɑ ǹ mɑɑ bɑɑru kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hunɑ, Mɑriɑmɑ di ɑ̀ mɑ, mɑnɑ cimɑndi ɑ̀ sendɑ gɑɑ.
41016012	À bɑndɑ nɑ Yesu hunutɛrɛ tɑkɑri ŋmɑni kunɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom ŋmɔne ihinkɑ fɔ sɛ kɑ ǹ gɑ dirɑ fɔndɔ bɔm kɑ kpei kpɑɑrɑ kɑmbu fɔ.
41016013	Bɔrɔ wɔne yom mo kpei deede cindei sɛ ɑmmɑ ǹ mɑnɑ cimɑndi ngei mɑ sendɑ gɑɑ.
41016014	Hɑli cɛnɑ Yesu hunutɛrɛ iwei cindi fɔ sɛ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ gɑ ŋmɑɑ. À nɑ ǹ kɔnkɔm ndɑ ǹ zɑm kɑ nɑɑne ndɑ ǹ gɔgɔsɛndɛ zɑmɑ beerem kɑ ǹ di ɑ̀, ɑ̀ tunɑndiyom bɑndɑ, ǹ mɑnɑ cimɑndi ɑkpɛ yom sendi gɑɑ.
41016015	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ kpei hɑndunyɑ kulu kunɑ kɑ Bɑɑru Hinno fɛɛ dimi kulu sɛ.
41016016	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑɑne, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ mirɑndi mo, Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ fɑɑbɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ nɑɑne, Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ ciiti kɑ zeeri.
41016017	Alɑmu yom neyɑ kɑ ǹ bo goono beerem kɑ ǹ nɑɑne bɑndɑ. A mɑɑ gɑɑ ǹ kɑɑ hɔllɛ yom gɑɑrɛ. Ǹ kɑɑ sendi ndɑ cinɛ teji yom.
41016018	Ǹ kɑɑ gondi yom dii. Bɑ de ǹ kɑɑ hɛ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bɔrɔ wi hɑm, ɑ̀ si ǹ wi. Ǹ kɑɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ doorikom yom bɔm ǹ mɑ du bɑɑni.
41016019	Kɑ Kpe sendi ǹ sɛ kɑ beeni cɔfɔ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ sombu kɑ kpeindɑɑ̀ bɛɛnɛ. À gɑ gɔrɔ Ikpɛ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ.
41016020	Coobɑɑbɑize yom di mo kpei bɑɑru fɛɛ nungu kulu. Kpe goono ǹ bɑndɑ ko gbei tɛ ndei ko Sendɑ tɑbɑtɑndi ndɑ ɑlɑmu yom kɑ ɑ̀ go tɛ. Ami.]
42001001	E Teofilu, bɔrɔ boobo nɑ kokɑri tɛ kɑ bɛ yom kɑ ǹ tɛ i gɑme hɑntum, bɛ yom kɑ i go tɑbɑi.
42001002	Ǹ deede bɛ yom kɑ ngei di ndɑ moo zɑ sintine kom. Ǹ ci Ikpɛ sendi gbeiteeri yom mo kɑ bɑɑru di no i sɛ.
42001003	À sɑbɑ ɑ sɛ mo yɑ hɑntum n sɛ bɛ nge yom di bɔm zɑ ǹ sintiyom kɑlɑ mɑɑsɑ zɑmɑ ɑ nɑ ǹ gunɑ gunɑ cɑu cɑu.
42001004	Ni, ɑ jinɑ Teofilu, ɑ go hɑntum n sɛ zɑmɑ bɛ yom kɑ ǹ nɑ n cooɑndi ndɑ, n mɑ ǹ tɑbɑtɑndiyom bei.
42001005	Yude gɑndɑkpɛ Hirodu wɑtɛ, gɑrɑndikɔ fɔ goono kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Zɑkɑri. Ngɑ ndɑ Abiɑ bɑrɑ no sɑrɑyom. À wɛndɛ mɑɑ no Elisɑbɛti. Ngɑ yɑ ci Aɑrɔ bɑndɑ fɔ.
42001006	Ǹ bɔrɔ hinkɑ di kulu cɛɑntɛ susu yom no Ikpɛ jine. Ǹ go Kpe meire yom ndɑ ɑ̀ sendikpɑrɛ yom kulu gɑnɑ, tɑɑli si ǹ gɑɑ.
42001007	Ammɑ ǹ sindɑ koo zɑmɑ Elisɑbɛti sindɑ hɛiyom. Ǹ kulu mo yɑ zeeni.
42001008	Hɑnu fɔ Zɑkɑri go gɑrɑndikɔtɛrɛ tɛ Ikpɛ jine zɑmɑ ɑ̀ fuu gɑɑ no ɑ̀ tɔ.
42001009	Ndɑ zɑngɑ gɑrɑndikɔtɛrɛ ɑlɑɑdɑ goono ndɑ, ɑ̀ tɔ Zɑkɑri mɑ huro Ikpɛ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ kɑ wɑidi tɔnu kɑ sɑrɑɑ.
42001010	Bɔrɔ jɑmɑ kulu goono tɛrɛ ko kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ wɑidi tɔnuyom lɔkɑci di.
42001011	Cɔfɔ Kpe ŋmɔne dɔntɔneize fɔ fɑitɑ Zɑkɑri sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go cɛ bɑndɑ tɑndɑ sɛ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ bɛrɛ kɑ wɑidi sɑrɑɑ.
42001012	Kɑ Zɑkɑri di ɑ̀, ɑ̀ lɑɑkɑli tunu. Hɑmburu nɑ ɑ̀ dii.
42001013	Ammɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Zɑkɑri, n mɑ si hɑmburu zɑmɑ Ikpɛ nɑ n ŋmɑɑrɛ tɑ. N wɛndɛ Elisɑbɛti kɑɑ koo hɑibɔrɔ fɔ hɛi. N gɑ ɑ̀ no mɑɑ Yohɑnnɑ.
42001014	N kɑɑ fɑihã kɑ tɛ binekɑɑne. Bɔrɔ boobo kɑɑ fɑihã ɑ̀ hɛiyom sɑbu sɛ.
42001015	À kɑɑ tɛ bɔrɔ beeri Ikpɛ jine. À si dufɛ̃ hɑm, ɑ̀ si bɑji hɑm. À kɑɑ tɔ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ bɑ zɑ ɑ̀ nyɑ gunde.
42001016	À gɑ Isirɑilɑ ize boobo bɛrɛ kɑ yeti Kpe dɔ, ǹ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ.
42001017	À kɑɑ dirɑ Ikpɛ jine ndɑ Eli biyɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ dɑbɑri zɑmɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ bɑɑbɑ yom bine yom bɛrɛ ǹ koo yom dɔ hɛrɛ. À gɑ Ikpɛ hunguɛkpɛ yom mo bɛrɛ ǹ mɑ cɛɑntɛ susuyom hɑikusutɛrɛ gɑnɑ. À kɑɑ jɑmɑ sɔlɑntɛ meigu Kpe sɛ mo.
42001018	Zɑkɑri cii Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di sɛ: Ifɔ gɑɑ no, ɑ gɑ ngɑ di bei zɑmɑ ɑ zeeni. A wɛndɛ mɑ jiiri bɑ.
42001019	Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di tu Zɑkɑri sɛ kɑ cii: Hɛɛ no Jibirilu. A go cɛ Ikpɛ jine. Ikpɛ yɑ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm yɑ kɑɑ sendi n sɛ kɑ bɑɑru hinno wɔ cii n sɛ.
42001020	Gunɑ, n kɑɑ tɛ bɛbɛ. N si du kɑ sendi kɑlɑ hɑnu nge yom di mɑ tɔ zɑmɑ n mɑnɑ cimɑndi ɑ sendei gɑɑ. A sendi yom kɑɑ tɔ ngei lɔkɑci kunɑ.
42001021	Jɑmɑ di nɑ Zɑkɑri bɑtu. Mɑmɑci nɑ ǹ dii ndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ jɛ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ Ikpɛ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ.
42001022	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu ɑ̀ si hini kɑ sendi ǹ sɛ. Jɑmɑ di bei kɑ diyom fɔ no Zɑkɑri di Ikpɛ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ. Ndɑ kɑmbɛ no ɑ̀ sendi ǹ sɛ, ɑ̀ tɛ bɛbɛ.
42001023	Sɑɑ kɑɑ Zɑkɑri gbei hɑnu yom beeni, ɑ̀ kpei ngɑ fuu.
42001024	Jiribi nge yom di bɑndɑ, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ wɛndɛ Elisɑbɛti kunu. À hɑndu gu ɑ̀ go gum.
42001025	À go cii: Gomini no Kpe tɛ ɑ sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ moo dɔ gunɑ kɑ hɑwi wɔ kɑɑ ɑ gɑɑ beerem gɑme.
42001026	Hɑndu iduɑntɛ Ikpɛ nɑ dɔntɔneize Jibirilu dɔntɔm kpɑɑrɑ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Nɑzɑrɛtu, Gɑlile lɑɑbu.
42001027	Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di kpei hundiyo fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si hɑru bei dɔ. À sɔgɔ mo Dɑfidi dimi fɔ no kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Yosɛfu. Hundiyɑ mo mɑɑ no Mɑriɑmɑ.
42001028	Cɔfɔ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di huro nungu kɑ hundiyɑ goono, ɑ̀ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A gɑ kɑ n fɔɔ, ni kɑ Ikpɛ gɑ kɑ n nɑ gomini. Kpe goono n bɑndɑ. Weibɔrɔ yom kunɑ n gɑɑ no Ikpɛ nɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm.
42001029	Kɑ Mɑriɑmɑ mɑ di Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ lɑɑkɑli tunu ɑ̀ sendɑ sɑbu sɛ. À nɑ ngɑ bɔm hã hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci fɔɔyom wɔne dimi.
42001030	Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di bine cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Mɑriɑmɑ, si hɑmburu zɑmɑ gomini no n du Ikpɛ dɔ.
42001031	Gunɑ, n kɑɑ kunu. N kɑɑ koo hɑibɔrɔ fɔ hɛi. N gɑ ɑ̀ no mɑɑ Yesu.
42001032	À kɑɑ tɛ bɔrɔ beeri. Ǹ bine gɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ Kpe kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɛ bisɑ ǹ kulu, ɑ̀ ize. Kpe Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ no ɑ̀ cɛɛ Dɑfidi kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ.
42001033	À kɑɑ kpetɛrɛ ŋmɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ beeniyom Yɑkɔfu dimei bɔm, beeniyom si. À kpetɛrɛ sindɑ mee.
42001034	Bine, Mɑriɑmɑ cii Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di sɛ: A si hɑru bei, mɛtɛ ngɑ di tɛ kɑ tɛ?
42001035	Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di mo tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ yɑ kɑɑ zumbu n bɔm. Kpe kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɛ bisɑ ǹ kulu, ɑ̀ dɑbɑri mɑ gɑ n dɑɑbu ndɑ ngɑ bicire. À sɛ no, ize hɑlɑɑlɑ di kɑ n kɑɑ hɛi, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ no Ikpɛ Ize.
42001036	Gunɑ, n nyɑize Elisɑbɛti ngɑ mo du koo hɑibɔrɔ fɔ kunu ɑ̀ zeene kunɑ. Elisɑbɛti kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ hɛiyom, mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ngɑ hɑndu iduɑntɛ kunɑ.
42001037	Ikpɛ cɛ, bɛ fɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ si hini kɑ tɛ.
42001038	Mɑriɑmɑ mo cii: Gunɑ, hɛɛ yɑ Kpe kɔngɔ no. À mɑ tɛ ɑ sɛ zɑngɑ n mee wɔ nɑ ɑ̀ cii. Cɔfɔ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di gɑnɑ ɑ̀ dɔ.
42001039	À gɑɑ nɑ Mɑriɑmɑ tunu kɑ kpei ndɑ wɑɑsi tondi kuku yom dɔ Yude lɑɑbu wɑngɑrɑ fɔ kunɑ.
42001040	Mɑriɑmɑ huro Zɑkɑri fuu kɑ Elisɑbɛti fɔɔ.
42001041	À kɑɑ tɔ Elisɑbɛti mɑɑ Mɑriɑmɑ fɔɔ di, cɔfɔ koo di kɑ ɑ̀ goono ɑ̀ gunde kunɑ yɔgɔi. Elisɑbɛti mɑ tɔ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ.
42001042	Elisɑbɛti kuwɑ ndɑ jinde beeri kɑ cii: Ikpɛ nɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm n gɑɑ weibɔrɔ yom kunɑ. Izeɑ mɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono n gundɑ kunɑ, Ikpɛ nɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
42001043	Hɛɛ yɑ ci mee kɑ ɑ Kpe nyɑ kɑɑ ɑ dɔ?
42001044	Gunɑ, zɑ n ŋmɔne fɔɔyom di kɑm ɑ hɑngɑ, cɔfɔ kɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono ɑ gunde kunɑ yɔgɔi no ndɑ binekɑɑne.
42001045	Binekɑɑnekpɛ nɑ weibɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne zɑmɑ hɛ yom kɑ Kpe cii ɑ̀ sɛ, ǹ kɑɑ tɔ.
42001046	Cɔfɔ Mɑriɑmɑ mɑ cii: A bine yɑ go Kpe bɛɛrɑndi.
42001047	A bine go fɑihɑ̀ mɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ, ɑ Fɑɑbɑkɔ.
42001048	À nɑ ngɑ kɔngɔɑ bɔm yetiyom gɑndɑ gunɑ hɑli zɑmɑni yom kulu kɑɑ cii ɑ sɛ binekɑɑnekpɛ.
42001049	Dɑbɑri kulu Kpɛ, ɑ̀ nɑ hɛ beeri yom tɛ ɑ sɛ. À mɑɑ yɑ hɑlɑɑlɑ mo no.
42001050	À suujɑ mɑ bo dɑɑru zɑmɑni kɑ kpei zɑmɑni beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ hɑmburu Ikpɛ bɔm.
42001051	À nɑ dɑbɑri cɛbɛ ndɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ. Beerem kɑ ǹ gundɑ lɑsɑbu fɑɑri ŋmɔne yom ngei bine yom kunɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ kɑru kɑ see.
42001052	À nɑ hinikpɛ yom zeeri zɑ ǹ kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ yom bɔm. À nɑ tɑlikɑ yom bɛɛrɑndi.
42001053	À nɑ hɛrɛɛkomei kungɑndi ndɑ bɛ hinno yom. A nɑ hɑibɑrikɑntei mo tɑm kɑmbɛ kɔnu.
42001054	À nɑ Isirɑilɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑ̀ tɑm gɑɑ. À hɔngɔɑ̀ ndɑ ngɑ suuji, zɑngɑ ɑ̀ jinɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cii i cɛɛ yom sɛ
42001055	ndɑ Abulɛmɑ sɛ ndɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ mo sɛ, beeniyom si.
42001056	Mɑriɑmɑ gɔrɔ Elisɑbɛti dɔ zɑngɑ hɑndu hinzɑ sɑrɑ. À bɑndɑ ɑ̀ ye ngɑ kpɑɑrɑ.
42001057	À tɛ mo, Elisɑbɛti hɛiyom lɔkɑci tɔ. À nɑ kɑɑ hɑibɔrɔ fɔ hɛi.
42001058	À gɔrɔkɑsine yom ndɑ ɑ̀ fuuize yom mɑɑ zɑngɑ Kpe nɑ ngɑ suuji beeri cɛbɛ ɑ̀ sɛ. Ǹ kulu fɑihɑ̀ ndɑ Elisɑbɛti.
42001059	À kɑɑ tɔ jiribi ɑhɑkuɑntɑ hine ǹ kɑɑ kɑ izecire di dɑmbɑngu. Ǹ tɑmmɑ ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ Zɑkɑri, ɑ̀ bɑɑbɑ mɑɑ.
42001060	Ammɑ ɑ̀ nyɑ cii, Awo. Ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ Yohɑnnɑ.
42001061	Ngei mɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N dimi yom kunɑ bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ sindɑ mɑɑ wɔ.
42001062	Cɔfɔ ǹ sendi ɑ̀ bɑɑbɑ sɛ ndɑ kɑmbɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hã ɑ̀ mɑ cii zɑngɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ ǹ mɑ koo di no mɑɑ.
42001063	Zɑkɑri cii ǹ mɑ ngɑ nɑ hɑntumyom dɔ. À nɑ wɔne hɑntum ɑ̀ gɑɑ: Yohɑnnɑ yɑ ci ɑ̀ mɑɑ. Cɔfɔ ǹ kulu mɑmɑci.
42001064	Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ Zɑkɑri meeɑ fiti. À dɛɛnɑ kɔrɔfɑ feeri hɑli ɑ̀ go sendi ko kɑ Ikpɛ sifɑ.
42001065	Ǹ gɔrɔkɑsine yom kulu hɑmburu. Nungu kulu Yude lɑɑbu tɑndi kukuei cɛsuɑntɛ, beerem nɑ bɛ nge yom di fɑɑji tɛ.
42001066	Beerem kulu mɑɑ hɛ nge yom di. Ǹ nɑ ǹ lɑsɑbu ngei bine yom kunɑ kɑ cii: Ifɔ no koo wɔ kɑɑ ci? Kpe kɑmbɛ bine goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ.
42001067	À bɑɑbɑ Zɑkɑri mo tɔ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ. À nɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ kɑ cii:
42001068	I mɑ Kpe, Isirɑilɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ sifɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ sɑɑle dɑm ngɑ jɑmɑ gɑɑ kɑ ǹ fɑnsɑ.
42001069	À nɑ fɑɑbɑ dɑbɑrikpɛ fɔ mo tunɑndi i sɛ ɑ̀ tɑm Dɑfidi dimi kunɑ.
42001070	Ikpɛ jinɑ kɑ sendi ngɑ ɑndebi hɑlɑɑlɑ yom mee gɑɑ zɑ dom zɑmɑni yom kunɑ.
42001071	À cii ɑ̀ mɑ i kɑɑ i ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ yom kɑmbɛ ndɑ beerem kulu kɑ ǹ binei gɑ hungu i yom.
42001072	A mɑ suuji tɛ mɑ I cɛɛ yom sɛ. A mo hɔngɔ ngɑ ɑlikɑwɑli hɑlɑɑlɑ,
42001073	ɑlikɑwɑli kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ zeyom I cɛɛ Abulɛmɑ sɛ.
42001074	À mɑ i kɑɑ mɑ i ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ yom kɑmbɛ, hɑli i mɑ tɑmtɛrɛ ɑ̀ sɛ, hɑmburu si.
42001075	I mɑ dirɑ ɑ̀ jine hɑlɑɑlɑtɛrɛ kunɑ ndɑ cɛɑndiyom susu kunɑ jiribi yom kulu kɑ i go hunɑ.
42001076	Oò, ni mo ɑ koo, ǹ gɑ n cɛɛ Kpe kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɛ bisɑ ǹ kulu ɑ ŋmɔne ɑndebi. Kpe jine nɑ n kɑɑ dirɑ kɑ ɑ̀ fɔndɔ yom sɔlu.
42001077	N gɑ ɑ̀ jɑmɑ nɑ fɑɑbɑ beiyom ǹ dulum yom yɑɑfɑyom gɑɑ.
42001078	Fɑɑbɑ wɔ hunu Ikpɛ bine suuji dɔ. Suuji kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ kɑɑri fɔ zɑngɑ mɑ boyom kɑɑri kɑɑ i dɔ zɑ bɛɛnɛ.
42001079	Ngɑ mɑ yɑ kɑɑ kɑɑri beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ gɑ gɔrɔ kube kunɑ ndɑ bu bicire kunɑ. À gɑ i cee yom dɑm bɑɑni fɔndɔ kunɑ.
42001080	Koo di beeri ko du gɑɑbi biyɑ kunɑ. À gɔrɔ gɑnji yom kunɑ kɑlɑ hɑnu kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɔm kɑɑtɛrɛ Isirɑilɑ izei sɛ.
42002001	À kɑɑ tɔ hɑnu nge yom di meire fɔ hunu Kɑisɑ Agusitu dɔ ǹ mɑ kɑbukɑbu tɛ ɑ̀ kpetɛrɛ lɑɑbu yom kulu mee ndɑ mee.
42002002	Kɑbukɑbu sintinɑ tɛ no sɑɑ kɑ Kirim go ci Siriɑ lɑɑbu gɑɑbikoni.
42002003	Bɔrɔ kulu kpei ngɑ wɑngɑrɑ kɑ ngɑ mɑɑ no.
42002004	Yosɛfu mo tunu zɑ Nɑzɑrɛtu kpɑɑrɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu. À kpei Yude lɑɑbu Dɑfidi kpɑɑrɑ fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Bɛtɛlɛm. Yosɛfu yɑ Dɑfidi bɑndɑ no, Dɑfidi dimi mo no.
42002005	À kpei kɑ ngɑ mɑɑ no, ngɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ hundiyo Mɑriɑmɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ kunu.
42002006	À kɑɑ tɔ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ goono nodi, ɑ̀ sɑbɑ ndɑ Mɑriɑmɑ hɛiyom lɔkɑci tɔ.
42002007	Mɑriɑmɑ no ngɑ koo hɑibɔrɔ sintine hɛi. À nɑ ɑ̀ didiji ndɑ fɑtɑlɑ fɔ. À nɑ ɑ̀ kɑnɑndi gɑribɑ fɔ kunɑ zɑmɑ tɛrɛ si yo yom fuuɑ kunɑ.
42002008	Lɑɑbu di kunɑ memunu kurukɔ yom goono gɑnji kunɑ ko kɑni. Ǹ go kɑ ngei memunu yom bɑtu ciini.
42002009	Cɔfɔ Kpe dɔntɔneize fɔ fɑitɑ ǹ sɛ. Kpe deizɑ hɑɑgɑ kɑ ǹ hundi. Hɑmburu nɑ ǹ dii kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
42002010	Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ si hɑmburu zɑmá wɑ gunɑ, bɑɑru hinno no ɑ kɑɑndɑ wom sɛ. Bɑɑru wɔ kɑɑndɑ bɔrɔ kulu sɛ fɑihã bɑmbɑtɑ.
42002011	Hunkunɑ no Dɑfidi kpɑɑrɑ kunɑ, ǹ nɑ fɑɑbɑkɔ bei wom sɛ. Ngɑ yɑ ci Kpe Mɛsiyɑ.
42002012	Wɔne yɑ ci ɑlɑmu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ wom gɑ ɑ̀ bei. Wom kɑɑ di izecire kɑ ǹ nɑ fɑtɑlɑ fɔ didiji ɑ̀ gɑɑ, kɑ ɑ̀ kɑnɑndi gɑribɑ fɔ kunɑ.
42002013	Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize bɑkɑrɑ fɔ kɑɑ kɑ tɔntɔnu Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize fɔ di gɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ sifɑ. Ǹ cii:
42002014	Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɛ bisɑ ǹ kulu, deizɑ mɑ ci ɑ̀ ŋmɔne. Bɑɑni mo goono hɑndunyɑ bɔm beerem gɑme kɑ Ikpɛ gɑ mɑɑ kɑɑni ǹ dɔ.
42002015	À kɑɑ tɔ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom gɑnɑ kurukɔei dɔ kɑ ye bɛɛnɛ. Cɔfɔ kurukɔei mo cii cɛrɛ sɛ: I mɑ kpei Bɛtɛlɛm kɑ di bɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ, bɛ wɔ kɑ Kpe nɑ i no ɑ̀ bɑɑru.
42002016	Ǹ kpei ndɑ wɑɑsi. Ǹ nɑ Mɑriɑmɑ ndɑ Yosɛfu gɑru nodi ndɑ izecire di, ɑ̀ go kɑni gɑribɑ fɔ kunɑ.
42002017	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ di ɑ̀, ǹ deede sendi kɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di cii ǹ sɛ kɑ simbɑ koo di.
42002018	Beerem kulu kɑ ǹ mɑɑ deede di mɑmɑci ndɑ bɛ kɑ memunu kurukɔei go cii ǹ sɛ.
42002019	Mɑriɑmɑ mo go kɑ ngɑ di kulu jɛ kɑ ǹ lɑsɑbu ngɑ bine kunɑ.
42002020	Memunu kurukɔ yom di ye. Ǹ go kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi ko kɑ ɑ̀ sifɑ ndɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ǹ mɑɑ kɑ di zɑngɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize nɑ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ.
42002021	Jiribi ɑhɑkuɑntɛ tɔ kɑ ǹ mɑ kɑɑ di dɑmbɑngu. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ dɑm Yesu, mɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di cii zɑ ɑ̀ nyɑ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ kunu zɑɑ.
42002022	Sɑɑ kɑ Mɑriɑmɑ hinnɑndiyom jiribi yom kube ndɑ zɑngɑ Moisi fɔndɑ goono ndɑ, Yosɛfu ndɑ Mɑriɑmɑ nɑ koo di zɑɑ. Ǹ kpeindɑ koo di Yerusɑlɛm zɑmɑ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ cɛbɛ Kpe sɛ.
42002023	Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ zɑngɑ bɛ kɑ ǹ hɑntum Kpe fɔndɑ kunɑ goono ndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cii: "Koo hɑibɔrɔ sintine kulu, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ hɑlɑɑlɑndi nɑ Kpe sɛ".
42002024	Ǹ kpei mo kɑ gɑrɑndi kɑ ǹ hɑntum Kpe fɔndɑ kunɑ tɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci zɑngɑ "kɔlɛnjɛ hinkɑ wɑlɑ gutu hinkɑ".
42002025	Gunɑ mo, bɔrɔ fɔ goono Yerusɑlɛm kunɑ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Simeyɔ. Bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu fɔ no kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ. À go kɑ Isirɑilɑ Yɑmɑrɑndikɔ bɑtu. Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ goono ɑ̀ bɔm.
42002026	Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ mo Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ gɑɑ kɑ ngɑ wɔ si bu kɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ di Kpe ŋmɔne Mɛsiyɑ jinɑ.
42002027	Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ bine nɑ bɔrɔ di boi kɑ kpeindɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ. Yesu hɑikusu yom mɑ kpeindɑ Yesu zɑmɑ ǹ mɑ tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ zɑngɑ fɔndɑ ŋmɔne ɑlɑɑdɑ goono ndɑ.
42002028	À gɑɑ no Simeyɔ nɑ koo di tɑ ngɑ jɛndɛ kunɑ kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu. À cii:
42002029	Mɑɑsɑnkulu Kpe, n mɑ tu n bɑnyɑ mɑ kpei ndɑ bɑɑni zɑngɑ n Sendɑ cii.
42002030	A di n fɑɑbɑ ndɑ ɑ moo,
42002031	fɑɑbɑ kɑ n nɑ ɑ̀ sɔlu hɑndunyɑ kulu jine.
42002032	Kɑɑri yɑ kɑɑ hɛ kulu kɑɑtɛrɛ dimi yom sɛ. Deizɑ mo no n jɑmɑ sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Isirɑilɑ.
42002033	Mɑmɑci nɑ Yosɛfu ndɑ Yesu nyɑ dii ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ go cii ɑ̀ bɔm.
42002034	Simeyɔ nɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm ǹ gɑɑ. À cii ɑ̀ nyɑ Mɑriɑmɑ sɛ: Gunɑ, ǹ nɑ koo wɔ no Isirɑilɑ ize boobo kɑmyom ndɑ ǹ tunuyom sɛ. À kɑɑ tɛ ɑlɑmu kɑ ǹ kɑɑ hunguɑ̀.
42002035	Oò, ni bumbum mo, tɑkubɑ gɑ n hundɑ gooru zɑmɑ bine boobo lɑsɑbu yom mɑ hunutɛrɛ.
42002036	Andebi weibɔrɔ fɔ mo goono kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Annɑ, Fɑnuɛli koo hundiyo no. Asɑre dimi no. Weibɔrɔ no kɑ ɑ̀ zeeni. À hundiyotɛrɛ bɑndɑ ɑ̀ gɔrɔ ndɑ ngɑ kunye jiiri iye.
42002037	À bɑndɑ ɑ̀ gɔrɔ sokoni kɑlɑ ɑ̀ zeene tɔ jiiri wɑhɑku cindi tɑɑci. À mɑnɑ gɑnɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ tɑmtɛrɛ Ikpɛ sɛ ciini ndɑ zɑɑri ndɑ meehɔ ndɑ ɑduwɑ.
42002038	Lɔkɑci ngɑ di kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ Kpe sɑɑbu kɑ Yesu sendi tɛ beerem kulu sɛ kɑ ǹ go bɑtu Ikpɛ mɑ Yerusɑlɛm fɑnsɑ.
42002039	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ hɛ kulu kɑ Kpe fɔndɑ cii tɔnɑndi, ǹ ye Gɑlile lɑɑbu hɑli ǹ kpɑɑrɑ Nɑzɑrɛtu.
42002040	Kɑɑ di gɑ beeri ko du gɑɑbi biyɑ kunɑ. À gɑ tɔ ndɑ hɑikusutɛrɛ. Ikpɛ gomini mɑ goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ.
42002041	Jiiri kulu mo ɑ̀ hɑikusu yom cini kpei Yerusɑlɛm Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru kulu gɑɑ.
42002042	Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu tɔ jiiri wei cindi hinkɑ ngɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ hɑikusu yom kpei Yerusɑlɛm ndɑ zɑngɑ jingɑru di ŋmɔne ɑlɑɑdɑ goono ndɑ.
42002043	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ jingɑru jiribi yom tɔnɑndi, ǹ go ye ngei kpɑɑrɑ ɑmmɑ Yesu wɔ gɔrɔ Yerusɑlɛm. Yosɛfu ndɑ Yesu nyɑ mɑnɑ bei.
42002044	Ǹ go tɑmmɑ ɑ̀ goono nɑɑrukɔ boobo di kunɑ. Ǹ tɛ jiribi fɔ fɔndɔ, cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ ceeci ngei nyɑize yom dɔ ndɑ ǹ kpɑɑsi yom dɔ.
42002045	Kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ di ɑ̀, ǹ bɛrɛ kɑ ye Yerusɑlɛm kɑ kpei kɑ ɑ̀ ceeci.
42002046	À kɑɑ tɔ jiribi hinzɑ bɑndɑ, ǹ di ɑ̀ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ. À gɑ gɔrɔ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom bindi kunɑ kɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ǹ sɛ ko kɑ ǹ hã sendi.
42002047	Beerem kulu kɑ ǹ gɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ, mɑmɑci go kɑ ǹ kulu dii ndɑ ɑ̀ fɑhɑm di ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ go tu kɑ yeti beerem di sɛ.
42002048	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hɑikusu yom di ɑ̀, mɑmɑci nɑ nge yom mo dii. Cɔfɔ nyɑ di ci: Koo wɔ, ifɔ sɛ ǹ tɛ i sɛ zɑngɑ yɑ dɑ? Gunɑ, hɛɛ ndɑ n bɑɑbɑ i lɑɑkɑli kulu tunu. I go dirɑ kɑ n ceeci.
42002049	Cɔfɔ Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ wom go kɑ ɑ ceeci? Wom mɑnɑ bei kɑ kɑlɑ de yɑ ɑ sɑɑlu wi ɑ Bɑɑbɑ ŋmɔne ɑsiiri yom gɑɑ bɑ?
42002050	Ammɑ ǹ mɑnɑ fɑhɑm ndɑ sendi kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ cii ǹ sɛ.
42002051	Yesu zuli ǹ bɑndɑ kɑ kpei Nɑzɑrɛtu. À gɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ ǹ sɛ. À nyɑ go hɛ yom wɔ kulu kɑ ǹ tɛ jɛ ngɑ bine kunɑ.
42002052	Yesu go beeri hɑikusutɛrɛ ndɑ gɑɑhɑm kunɑ ndɑ bɛɛrɛ Ikpɛ jine ndɑ beerem jine.
42003001	Kɑisɑ Tiberi kpetɛrɛ ŋmɑɑyom jiiri wei cindi guɑntɛ, sɑɑ di no Pɔnse Pilɑtu mo go ci Yude gɑndɑkpɛ. Hirodu go ci Gɑlile lɑɑbu gɑɑbikoni. À cɛɛnɛ Filipu mo go ci Iture lɑɑbu ndɑ Tɑkoni lɑɑbu gɑɑbikoni. Lisɑniɑ mo go ci Abilɛm lɑɑbu gɑɑbikoni.
42003002	Hɑnɑnu ndɑ Kɑifɑ mo go ci gɑrɑndikɔ beeri yom. Sɑɑ di no Ikpɛ Sendɑ kɑɑ Zɑkɑri koo Yohɑnnɑ sɛ gɑnji kunɑ.
42003003	Yohɑnnɑ kpei lɑɑbu kulu kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑni Yudum isɑ ko bɑɑru fɛɛ. À go cii beerem mɑ tuubi kɑ bɛrɛ dulum yɑɑfɑyom sɑbu sɛ kɑ du mirɑndiyom.
42003004	Zɑngɑ ɑndebi Esɑyi hɑntum kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ fɔ go kuwɑ gɑnji kunɑ. À jinde cii: Wom mɑ Kpe fɔndɔ sɔlu tɛ. Wɑ ɑ̀ fɔndɔize yom cɛɑndi.
42003005	Ǹ kɑɑ gooru lutu. Tondi kuku kulu ndɑ gure beeri kulu, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ yeti gɑndɑ. Nungu kɑ ɑ̀ siiri, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ cɛɑndi susu. Fɔndei kɑ ǹ gundɑ gure ndɑ lɔmɑ, ǹ gɑ ǹ bɑndɑ sɑsɑbɑndi.
42003006	Iburɑdɑm kulu kɑɑ di Ikpɛ fɑɑbɑ.
42003007	À cii jɑmɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ngei mirɑndi sɛ: Gɑzɑmɑ dimi yom, mee yɑ nɑ wom kɑɑbɑɑru wom mɑ zuuru binetɔnɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑɑ sɛ?
42003008	Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ wom tɛgbei yom cɛbɛ kɑ ǹ gɑ sɑbɑ ndɑ tuubiyom. Wom mɑ si sinti ko cii wom bine kunɑ: I gundɑ i bɑɑbɑ Abulɛmɑ. A gɑ cii wom sɛ Ikpɛ hini kɑ tondi yom wɔ bɛrɛ kɑ tɛ ize yom Abulɛmɑ sɛ.
42003009	Ǹ bine nɑ deesi dɑm tuurinyɑ yom kɑɑji gɑɑ kɔ. Ngɑ di sɛ tuurinyɑ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ si ize hinno hɛi, ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ dumbu ko cetu nini kunɑ.
42003010	Jɑmɑ di nɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ cii: De yɑ di no, mɛtɛ i mɑ tɛ dɑ?
42003011	À tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ kpɛ jinde hinkɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ nɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ ŋmɑɑri mɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ tɛ yɑ di bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ sɛ.
42003012	Alikɑsi tɑkɔ yom mo kɑɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ngei mirɑndi. Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Coobɑɑbɑ, mɛtɛ i mɑ tɛ dɑ?
42003013	Yohɑnnɑ mo tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wom mɑ si bɑ tɑ kɑ bisɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm ǹ mɑ tɑ.
42003014	Wɑnguize yom mo nɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ cii: I yom mo bine, mɛtɛ i mɑ tɛ dɑ? Yohɑnnɑ tu ngei mo sɛ kɑ cii: Wom mɑ si kɔm ko tɑ. Wom mɑ si bɔrɔ tɔnyɑ. Wom bine mɑ yee ndɑ wom bɑnɑndi.
42003015	Ammɑ jɑmɑ di goono bɑtuyom gɑɑ. Ǹ kulu mɑ go lɑsɑbu ngei binei kunɑ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ hɑli ngɑ no Mɛsiyɑ di.
42003016	Cɔfɔ Yohɑnnɑ tu ǹ kulu sɛ kɑ cii: Hɛɛ wɔ ɑ go wom mirɑndi ndɑ hɑri. Ammɑ bɔrɔ fɔ go kɑɑ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ hɛɛ gɑɑbi. Yɑ nɑ tɔ yɑ ɑ̀ tɑɑmu yom kɑɑ ɑ̀ sɛ. Ngɑ wɔ ɑ̀ kɑɑ wom mirɑndi ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ ndɑ nini mɑ.
42003017	À funsu gɑɑsu goono ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ. À gɑ ngɑ fɑruyom dɔ hinnɑndi sã sã kɑ ngɑ mɔsɔngu dɑm boo. Ammɑ duuɑ wɔ, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ tɔnu ndɑ nini kɑ ɑ̀ si wi.
42003018	Ndɑ himmɑ noyom boobo kpɛɛnɛ no Yohɑnnɑ nɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu tɛ jɑmɑ sɛ.
42003019	Ammɑ Yohɑnnɑ deeni Hirodu kɑ ɑ̀ ci lɑɑbu gɑɑbikoni gɑɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ cɛɛnɑ Filipu wɛndɛ Hirodɑ zɑɑ. Yohɑnnɑ deeni ɑ̀ gɑɑ mɑ ɑ̀ gbei lɑlɔ yom kulu kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ sɛ.
42003020	Hirodu nɑ wɔne tɔntɔnu ilɑlɔ kulu bɔm sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Yohɑnnɑ dii kɑ dɑm kɑsu kunɑ.
42003021	À kɑɑ tɔ sɑɑ kɑ Yohɑnnɑ go beerem kulu mirɑndi, ɑ̀ nɑ Yesu mo mirɑndi. Kɑ Yesu go kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ cɔfɔ bɛɛnɛ feeri.
42003022	Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ mo zumbu ɑ̀ bɔm zɑngɑ gutu. Cɔfɔ jinde fɔ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ kɑ cii: Ni yɑ ci ɑ Ize Binegɑnji. N gɑɑ no ɑ du ɑ binekɑɑne.
42003023	Yesu bumbum gundɑ jiiri wɑrɑnzɑ sɑrɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sinti ko cooɑndi. Beerem go tɑmmɑ Yosɛfu koo no, Yosɛfu kɑ ɑ̀ ci Heli ize,
42003024	Mɑtɑtu ize, Lefi ize, Mɑliki ize, Yɑnnɑ ize, Yosɛfu ize,
42003025	Mɑtɑtiɑ ize, Amosu ize, Nɑhumɑ ize, Esiliɑ ize, Nɑgɑi ize,
42003026	Mɑɑtu ize, Mɑtɑtiɑ ize, Semɑi ize, Yosɛfu ize, Yudɑ ize,
42003027	Yoɑnɑ ize, Lezɑ ize, Zorobɑbe ize, Sɑlɑtilu ize, Neli ize,
42003028	Mɑliki ize, Adi ize, Kosɑm ize, Elimodɑm ize, Erɑ ize,
42003029	Yose ize, Eliezu ize, Yorim ize, Mɑtɑtu ize, Lefi ize,
42003030	Simeyɔ ize, Yudɑ ize, Yosɛfu ize, Yonɑm ize, Eliɑkim ize,
42003031	Meleɑ ize, Mennɑ ize, Mɑtɑtu ize, Nɑtɑm ize, Dɑfidi ize,
42003032	Yɑsɑi ize, Obe ize, Boɑzu ize, Sulumi ize, Nɑɑsɑm ize,
42003033	Aminɑdɑbu ize, Arɑm ize, Esirɑm ize, Fɑresi ize, Yudɑ ize,
42003034	Yɑkɔfu ize, Isɑɑkɑ ize, Abulɛmɑ ize, Tɑrɑ ize, Nɑkoru ize,
42003035	Seruku ize, Tɑgɑu ize, Fɑleku ize, Eberu ize, Sɑlɑ ize,
42003036	Kɑinɑm ize, Afɑkɑdu ize, Sem ize, Nowe ize, Lɑmeku ize,
42003037	Mɑtusɑlɑ ize, Henoku ize, Yɑredu ize, Mɑleyɑ ize, Kɑinɑm ize,
42003038	Enosu ize, Setu ize, Adɑmu ize, Ikpɛ ize.
42004001	Yesu tɔ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ. Kɑ ɑ̀ hunu Yudum isɑ dɔ, Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ nɑ ɑ̀ boi ko kpeindɑɑ̀ gɑnji kunɑ.
42004002	Nungu di nɑ Ibilisi go kɑ ɑ̀ sui jiribi weitɑɑci. À mɑnɑ bɛ fɔ kulu ŋmɑɑ jiribi nge yom di kulu. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kube jiribi weitɑɑci ɑ̀ mɑɑ bɛrɛɛ.
42004003	Cɔfɔ Ibilisi cii ɑ̀ sɛ: De ni Ikpɛ Ize no, cii tondi wɔ mɑ bɛrɛ buuru.
42004004	Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii, "Bɔrɔ si hunɑ ndɑ ŋmɑɑri hinne, ɑmmɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ kulu".
42004005	Ibilisi kpeindɑ Yesu tɑndi kuku fɔ bɔm. Moo miilɑ fɔ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ cɛbɛ hɑndunyɑ wɔ kpetɛrɛ yom kulu.
42004006	Ibilisi cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A gɑ n no hini wɔ kulu ndɑ kpetɛrɛ yom wɔ deizɑ zɑmɑ hɛɛ no ǹ no ndɑ. Hɛɛ mo, ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ no bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ bɑɑ sɛ.
42004007	Bine de n nɑ ɑ bɛɛrɑndi ɑ̀ kulu ye n ŋmɔne.
42004008	Yesu mo tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: N mɑ ye ɑ bɑndɑ, Setɑm. Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii, "N mɑ Ikpɛ n ŋmɔne Kpe bɛɛrɑndi. N mɑ tɑmtɛrɛ ngɑ hinne sɛ."
42004009	Ibilisi bine kpeindɑ Yesu Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dɛcɛ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ yɔlɔ bɔm. À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: De ni Ikpɛ Ize no, n mɑ zimbi gɑndɑ zɑ nee.
42004010	Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Ikpɛ gɑ ngɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom no fɔndɔ ǹ mɑ n hɑlɑsi.
42004011	Ǹ gɑ n tɛmbɛ ngei kɑmbɛ yom kunɑ n cee mɑ si sɑm tondi gɑɑ."
42004012	Yesu mo tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Ikpɛ Sendɑ cii, "N mɑ si Ikpɛ n ŋmɔne Kpe, sui".
42004013	Sɑɑ kɑ Ibilisi nɑ suiyom kulu beeni, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ɑ̀ fee ndɑ Yesu bɑndɑ fɔ.
42004014	Yesu ye kɑ kpei Gɑlile lɑɑbu Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɑbɑri kunɑ. À bɑɑru mo hunu lɑɑbu di mee ndɑ mee kulu.
42004015	Yesu go cooɑndi ǹ mɑrgɑ fuu yom kunɑ. Ǹ kulu nɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi.
42004016	Yesu kɑɑ Nɑzɑrɛtu kpɑɑrɑ nungu kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ biiri. Ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɔne ɑlɑɑdɑ goono ndɑ, ɑ̀ huro Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu kunɑ hulonzom hɑnu hine. À tunu kɑ cɛ kɑ coo.
42004017	Cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ tirɑ kɑ Esɑyi hɑntum sɛllɛ ɑ̀ sɛ. Kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ feeri, ɑ̀ di nungu fɔ kɑ ǹ hɑntum kɑ cii:
42004018	"Kpe Biyɑ goono ɑ bɔm. À sɛ no ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɑm yɑ tɑlikɑ yom wɑɑzu ndɑ Bɑɑru Hinno. À nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm yɑ beerem kɑ ǹ bine yom go sɑrɑ no bɑɑni. À nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm mo yɑ kɑɑ feeriyom bɑɑru no tɑm yom sɛ. À mɑ dɑnɑm yom no moo. Beerem mo kɑ ǹ kɑnkɑm, yɑ ǹ feeri kɑ tɑm.
42004019	Yɑ Kpe jiiri gomini bɑɑru fɛɛ."
42004020	À gɑɑ nɑ ɑ̀ nɑ tirɑ di dɑɑbu. À nɑ ɑ̀ yeti Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu di gbeiteeri fɔ sɛ kɑ gɔrɔ. Beerem kulu kɑ ǹ goono Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuuɑ kunɑ nɑ moo sinji Yesu gɑɑ.
42004021	Yesu sinti kɑ sendi ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Ikpɛ Sendi wɔ kɑ wom mɑɑ, hunkunɑ no ɑ̀ tɔ.
42004022	Ǹ kulu go tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ sɛdɑ. Ǹ kulu go mɑmɑci ndɑ sendi kɑɑnɔ yom kɑ ǹ go hunu ɑ̀ mee. Ǹ go cii: Bɔrɔ kpɛ yɑ Yosɛfu koo no. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
42004023	Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Siikɑ si, wom gɑ ɑ yɑɑse zɑngɑ yɑ wɔ kɑ cii: Sɑfɑrikpɛ wɔ n mɑ n bɔm sɑfɑru. Hɛ yom kulu kɑ i mɑɑ ǹ cii n go tɛ Kɑpɛnɑum kpɑɑrɑ, n mɑ ǹ tɛ nee wɔ mo kɑ ɑ̀ ci n lɑɑbu.
42004024	Bine Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, ǹ si ɑndebi kulu tɑ ɑ̀ lɑɑbu kunɑ.
42004025	Ammɑ ɑ cii wom sɛ, sokoni boobo goono Isirɑilɑ lɑɑbu Eli wɑtɛ sɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ bɛɛnɛ dɑɑbu hɑli jiiri hinzɑ ndɑ hɑndu idu. Hɛrɛɛ bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ tɛ mɑ lɑɑbu di kulu kunɑ.
42004026	Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu Ikpɛ mɑnɑ Eli dɔntɔm sokonei bɑ ɑfɔ dɔ kɑlɑ Sidom lɑɑbu sokoni fɔ dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono Sɑletɑ kpɑɑrɑ.
42004027	Elise wɑtɛ mɑ nɑ jire boobo goono Isirɑilɑ lɑɑbu. Ǹ mɑnɑ bɑ ɑfɔ hinnɑndi kɑlɑ Nɑɑmɑnu, Siriɑ lɑɑbu bɔrɔ.
42004028	Beerem kulu kɑ ǹ goono Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuuɑ kunɑ kɑ ǹ mɑɑ bɛ nge yom di, cɔfɔ ǹ tɔ ndɑ bine fute.
42004029	Ǹ tunu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑrɛ kɑ kɑɑ kpɑɑrɑ kunɑ. Ǹ kpeindɑ Yesu hɑli tondi kuku fɔ hɑngɑ gɑɑ, tɑndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɔm ǹ nɑ ngei kpɑɑrɑ tɛ zɑmɑ ngei mɑ ɑ̀ jindo gɑndɑ.
42004030	Ammɑ ǹ bindi kunɑ nɑ Yesu gɑnɑ kɑ bisɑ.
42004031	Yesu kpei Kɑpɛnɑum kpɑɑrɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu. À go beerem cooɑndi hulonzom hɑnu yom hine.
42004032	Bɔrɔ kulu go mɑmɑci ndɑ Yesu cɛbɛ di zɑmɑ ɑ̀ sendi gundɑ hini.
42004033	Ǹ mɑrgɑ fuuɑ kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ goono kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ hɔllɛ. À kuwɑ ndɑ jinde beeri.
42004034	À cii: Wɑ i nɑm. Ifɔ yɑ goono ni ndɑ i yom gɑme Yesu Nɑzɑrɛtu? N kɑɑ n mɑ i hɑlɑci no? A go kɑ n bei. Ni yɑ Ikpɛ ŋmɔne Hɑlɑɑlɑ no.
42004035	Yesu deeni ɑ̀ gɑɑ kɑ cii: Dɛnjɛ. N mɑ hunu bɔrɔ kpɛ bɑndɑ. Cɔfɔ hɔllɛ di nɑ ɑ̀ zeeri jɑmɑ di bindi kunɑ kɑ hunu ɑ̀ bɑndɑ. À mɑnɑ ɑ̀ mɛrɛ.
42004036	Mɑmɑci nɑ ǹ kulu dii. Ǹ go sendi cɛrɛ sɛ kɑ cii: Sendi fɔ dimi no wɔne? A go mei ndɑ hini ndɑ dɑbɑri hɔllɛ yom bɔm. Ǹ go hunu mo.
42004037	Yesu bɑɑru gɑ kpei lɑɑbu di hundɑntɛ kulu.
42004038	Yesu tunu kɑ hunu Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuuɑ kunɑ kɑ kpei huro Simɔ fuu. Simɔ hɑnzure weibɔrɔ go kɑni ndɑ gɑɑwɑse futu fɔ. Ǹ nɑ Yesu ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ sɑbu sɛ.
42004039	Yesu gungum ɑ̀ bɔm. À deeni gɑɑwɑse gɑɑ, cɔfɔ gɑɑwɑse di bisɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ weibɔrɔ di tunu kɑ ǹ yɑrɛ.
42004040	Sɑɑ kɑ weenu gɑ kɑm beerem kulu kɑ ǹ gundɑ doorikom yom kɑ ǹ gɑ tɑɑbi ndɑ dɑɑri ŋmɑni ŋmɑni, ǹ kɑɑndei Yesu dɔ. À nɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ ǹ kulu bɔm ɑfɔ fɔ kɑ ǹ nɑ bɑɑni.
42004041	Hɔllɛ yom mo go hunu bɔrɔ boobo bɑndɑ ndɑ kuwɑ. Ǹ cii: Ni yɑ Mɛsiyɑ nɑ, Ikpɛ Ize. Yesu mɑ deeni ǹ gɑɑ. À si tu ǹ sɛ ǹ mɑ sendi zɑmɑ ǹ gɑ bei kɑ ngɑ yɑ Mɛsiyɑ nɑ.
42004042	Kɑ mo go bo Yesu hunu kɑ kpei gɑnji kunɑ. Bɔrɔ boobo go huro ɑ̀ ceeciyom gɑɑ kɑlɑ ǹ tɔ ɑ̀ dɔ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ dii kɑ jɛ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ si gɑnɑ ngei dɔ.
42004043	Ammɑ Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Kɑlɑ de, yɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu tɛ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɑ bɔm wɑngɑrɑ cindei mɑ sɛ. À sɛ no Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm.
42004044	À bine gɑ wɑɑzu mo Gɑlile lɑɑbu Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu yom kunɑ.
42005001	À kɑɑ tɔ Yesu goono ko cɛ Gɛnɛsɑrɑtɑ buulɑ mee gɑɑ. Bɔrɔ boobo di go kɑ ɑ̀ kɑnkɑm zɑmɑ ngei mɑ mɑɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ.
42005002	Cɔfɔ Yesu di hɑrihi hinkɑ goono buulɑ mee gɑɑ. Sɔrɔkɔ yom bine yɑ hunu ǹ kunɑ ko kɑ ngei tɑɑru yom nyunu.
42005003	Yesu huro hɑrihi hinkɑ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono Simɔ sɛ. À nɑ Simɔ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ hunu jobu gɑɑ cɛnɑ. À go gɔrɔ hɑrihi di kunɑ kɑ jɑmɑ di cooɑndi.
42005004	Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu cɛ ndɑ sendɑ cɔfɔ ɑ cii Simɔ sɛ: Tɔ jinɑ bɑrɑ bindi kɑ n tɑɑru hiri kɑ du ciifi.
42005005	Ammɑ Simɔ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A Jinɑ, i nɑ gbei tɛ ciini kulu. I mɑnɑ hɛ fɔ kulu dii. Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu n sendɑ bɔm ɑ gɑ ɑ tɑɑru biri.
42005006	Kɑ Simɔ nɑ tɑɑru di hiri, ǹ nɑ ciifi boobo fɔ dimi kuu. Cɔfɔ tɑɑru di gɑ pɑti.
42005007	Ǹ nɑ kɑmbɛ tɛ ngei kpɑɑsi yom sɛ wɔ kɑ yom goono hɑrihi fɔ kunɑ ǹ mɑ kɑɑ kɑ ngei gɑɑ. Ǹ kɑɑ mɑ kɑ hɑrihi hinkɑ di tɔnɑndi ndɑ ciifi kɑlɑ ǹ gɑ jisi.
42005008	Kɑ Simɔ Piɛɛ di ngɑ di cɔfɔ ɑ̀ sɔmbu Yesu sɛ kɑ cii: Kpe, mooru hɛɛ zɑmɑ hɛɛ yɑ dulumkoni no.
42005009	Mɑmɑci nɑ Piɛɛ ndɑ beerem kulu kɑ ǹ goono ɑ̀ dɔ dii ciifɑ diire kɑ ǹ go tɛ di sɑbu sɛ.
42005010	Yɑ no bɑ Yɑkɔfu ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ, Zɑbɑdi koo yom kɑ ǹ ci Simɔ bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ yom gbei kunɑ. Yesu bine cii Simɔ sɛ: Si hɑmburu. Zɑ mɑɑsɑ n kɑɑ tɛ bɔrɔ ceecikɔ.
42005011	Kɑ hɑrihi yom di tɔ jobu gɑɑ, ǹ nɑ hɛ kulu nɑm kɑ Yesu gɑnɑ.
42005012	À kɑɑ tɔ kɑ Yesu goono wɑngɑrɑ fɔ kunɑ, cɔfɔ bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ jiretɛrɛ boosu ɑ̀ gɑɑ, di Yesu. À kɑɑ jɛndɛbiri ɑ̀ sɛ. À ŋmɑɑrɛ kɑ cii: Kpe, de n bɑɑ n hini kɑ ɑ hinnɑndi.
42005013	Yesu mo nɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ sɛllɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hɑmɑ. À cii: A go bɑɑ. N mɑ hinne. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ cɔfɔ jiretɛrɛ di nɑ ɑ̀ tɑm.
42005014	Yesu nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm kɑ cii: N mɑ si ɑ̀ cii bɔrɔ fɔ kulu sɛ. Ammɑ n mɑ kpei kɑ n bɔm cɛbɛ gɑrɑndikɔ sɛ. N mɑ sɑrɑɑ kɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cii di tɛ n hinneyom sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ tɛ ǹ sɛ sɛdɑ.
42005015	Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu bɑɑru kɑ simbɑ Yesu go hunu kɑ tɔntɔnu. Bɔrɔ bɑkɑrɑ gɑ meigu kɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ. Ǹ du bɑɑni mɑ ngei dɑɑri yom gɑɑ.
42005016	Ammɑ Yesu gɑ kɑ ngɑ bɔm cendi kɑ kpei gɑnji kunɑ ko kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ.
42005017	À kɑɑ tɔ kɑ Yesu go cooɑndi hɑnu fɔ, Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom go gɔrɔ nungu di. Ǹ hunu zɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu kpɑɑrɑ kɑmbu yom kunɑ ndɑ Yude lɑɑbu ndɑ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ. Kpe dɑbɑri hunutɛrɛ kɑ ǹ nɑ bɑɑni.
42005018	Bine bɔrɔ fɔ yom kɑɑndɑ mɔngɔlɔ fɔ dɑɑri cɛnɑ bɔm. Ǹ go wetere ngei mɑ huro fuu kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm Yesu jine.
42005019	Ammɑ ǹ mɑnɑ du nungu kɑ hɛrɛ bɑndɑ ngei mɑ huro ndɑ, bɔrɔ bɑyom sɑbu sɛ. Ǹ kɑɑru fuu di bɛɛnɛ kɑ mɔngɔlɔ di zumɑndi dɑɑri cɛnɑ bɔm fuu fune fɔ kunɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ zumɑndi jɑmɑ di bindi kunɑ Yesu jine.
42005020	Kɑ Yesu di ǹ nɑɑne, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii bɔrɔ di sɛ: Hɑru wɔ, ɑ nɑ n yɑɑfɑ ndɑ n dulum yom.
42005021	Cɔfɔ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom sinti kɑ lɑsɑbu ngei bine yom kunɑ. Ǹ gɑ cii: Mee nɑ bɔrɔ kpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ Ikpɛ sendi yɑmu kɑ ɑ̀ cɛnɑndi? Mee yɑ hini kɑ bɔrɔ yɑɑfɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ dulum yom de ɑ̀ nɑ ci Ikpɛ ngɑ fɔ?
42005022	Bine zɑ kɑ Yesu nɑ ǹ lɑsɑbu yom bei, ɑ̀ tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Ifɔ sɛ wom gɑ lɑsɑbu wom bine yom kunɑ?
42005023	Wɔ fɔ yɑ fɑɑlɑ kɑ bisɑ, bɔrɔ mɑ cii ɑ nɑ n yɑɑfɑ ndɑ n dulum yom wɑlɑ tunu kɑ cɛ kɑ dirɑ?
42005024	Ammɑ wom mɑ bei kɑ hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ gundɑ hini kɑ bɔrɔ yɑɑfɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ dulum yom hɑndunyɑ kunɑ. À gɑɑ no, ɑ̀ cii mɔngɔlɔ wɔ sɛ: A go cii n sɛ, tunu kɑ cɛ kɑ n dɑɑri cɛnɑ zɑɑ. N mɑ kpei fuu.
42005025	Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ cɔfɔ ɑ̀ tunu kɑ cɛ ǹ kulu jine. À nɑ dɑɑrɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɔm ɑ̀ kɑni zɑɑ kɑ kpei fuu. Kpeiyom gɑɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi.
42005026	Mɑmɑci nɑ ǹ kulu dii hɑli ǹ go kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi. Ǹ hɑmburu kɑlɑ kɑlɑ ko cii: I di mɑmɑci hɛ yom hunkunɑ.
42005027	Nge yom di bɑndɑ Yesu hunu fuu di kunɑ. À di ɑlikɑsi tɑkɔ fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Lefi kɑ ɑ̀ go gɔrɔ bɑɑlici ɑlikɑsi tɑyom dɔ. Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A gɑnɑ.
42005028	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ bɛ kulu nɑm. À tunu kɑ Yesu gɑnɑ.
42005029	Lefi nɑ yɑrɛ bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ ngɑ fuu kunɑ. Alikɑsi tɑkɔ bɑɑbɑ ndɑ bɔrɔ ŋmɑni yom mo go gɔrɔ ko ŋmɑɑ ndei.
42005030	Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom go gunugunu Yesu coobɑɑbɑize yom gɑɑ. Ǹ cii: Ifɔ sɛ wom go ŋmɑɑ kɑ hɑm ndɑ ɑlikɑsi tɑkɔ yom ndɑ dulumkoni yom?
42005031	Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Beerem kɑ ǹ gundɑ bɑɑni si bɑɑ lokotoro kɑlɑ beerem kɑ ǹ sindɑ bɑɑni.
42005032	Yɑ nɑ kɑɑ bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu yom cɛɛ ǹ mɑ tuubi ɑmmɑ dulumkoni yom.
42005033	Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Yohɑnnɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom cini meehɔ zɑɑ ko kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ. Yɑ mo no Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom ɑmmɑ ǹ ŋmɔne yom go ŋmɑɑ kɑ hɑm. Ifɔ sɛ no?
42005034	Yesu mo cii ǹ sɛ: Wom hini kɑ nɑm hɑruhiji kpɑɑsi yom mɑ meehɔ zɑɑ sɑɑ kɑ hɑruhiji goono ndei bɑ?
42005035	Ammɑ hɑnu yom kɑɑ kɑɑ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ kɑɑ hɑruhiji di zɑɑ ǹ dɔ. Ǹ kɑɑ meehɔ zɑɑ hɑnu nge yom di.
42005036	Yesu nɑ yɑɑse wɔne tɛ ǹ sɛ mo kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ si zɑrɑ teji dumbɑri dɑm jiine zeenɔ gɑɑ zɑmɑ zɑrɑ tejɑ kɑɑ pɑti. Izeenɔ mɑ si sɑbɑ ndɑ iteji.
42005037	Yɑ no bɔrɔ si dufɛ̃ teji dɑm hɑmburu zeenɔ yom kunɑ zɑmɑ dufɛ̃ gɑ ǹ bɔgu no. Dufɛ̃ di kɑɑ bɑmbɑri. Hɑmburu yom mo sɑrɑ.
42005038	Ammɑ ǹ gɑ dufɛ̃ teji dɑm hɑmburu teji kunɑ. Ǹ kulu mɑ kɑimɑ.
42005039	Bɔrɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ hɑm kɑ mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ dufɛ̃ teji zɑmɑ ɑkpɛ go cii izeenɔ di yɑ kɑɑni kɑ bisɑ.
42006001	À kɑɑ tɔ hulonzom hɑnu hinkɑntɛ hine hɑndu kunɑ Yesu go fɑri yom tooru kɑ bisɑ. À coobɑɑbɑize yom mɑ go cɛtɛ yom pɑti kɑ wɔɔrɔ ngei kɑmbɛ yom kunɑ kɑ ŋmɑɑ.
42006002	Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ fɔ yom cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ wom go tɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɑlɑli bɔrɔ mɑ tɛ hulonzom hɑnu bine?
42006003	Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wom coo bɑ, bɛ kɑ Dɑfidi tɛ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ bɛrɛɛ ngɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ bɔrɔ yom?
42006004	À huro Ikpɛ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ kɑ buuru jisɑntɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci sɑrɑɑ zɑɑ kɑ ŋmɑɑ. À nɑ ngɑ bɑndɑ bɔrɔ yom mo no. À mɑnɑ hɑlɑli bɔrɔ fɔ kulu sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ ŋmɑɑ kɑlɑ gɑrɑndikɔ yom hinne sɛ.
42006005	À cii ǹ sɛ mo: Hɛɛ Adɑmize, hɛɛ yɑ ci hulonzom hɑnu Kpe mo.
42006006	À kɑɑ tɔ ɑ̀ hurɑ Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu kunɑ hulonzom hɑnu fɔ hine kpɛɛnɛ kɑ cooɑndi. Bɔrɔ fɔ mo goono kɑ ɑ̀ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ bu.
42006007	Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom gunɑ kɑ di hɑli ɑ̀ go bɑɑni no hulonzom hɑnu hine. Ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ gunɑ zɑmɑ ngei mɑ du hɛ kɑ ngei mɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑ ndɑ.
42006008	Ammɑ Yesu nɑ ǹ lɑsɑbu yom bei. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ bu di sɛ: Tunu kɑ cɛ nee wɔ ǹ kulu jine. À tunu kɑ cɛ.
42006009	Yesu bine cii ǹ sɛ: À wom hã hɑli ɑ̀ hɑlɑli bɔrɔ mɑ ihinno tɛ hulonzom hɑnu hine bɑ wɑlɑ ilɑlɔ? À mɑ hundi fɑɑbɑ wɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ɑ̀ hɑlɑci?
42006010	Cɔfɔ Yesu nɑ ǹ kulu gunɑ kɑ cɛɛrɛ. À cii bɔrɔ di sɛ: N kɑmbɛ sɛllɛ. À nɑ ɑ̀ sɛllɛ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ tɛ bɑɑni zɑngɑ kɑmbɛwo di.
