42006011	Ammɑ ǹ kulu bine tɔ. Ǹ go sɑwɑrɑ ngei gɑme hɛ kɑ ngei mɑ tɛ Yesu sɛ.
42006012	À kɑɑ tɔ hɑnu nge yom di Yesu kpei tondi kuku fɔ bɔm kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ. Ciini kulu ɑ̀ hiyɑ kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ.
42006013	Kɑ mo bo ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom cɛɛ ngɑ dɔ. À nɑ bɔrɔ wei cindi hinkɑ suubɑ ǹ kunɑ kɑ ǹ no mɑɑ diyɑ.
42006014	Ngei neyɑ, Simɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ no mɑɑdɛcɛ Piɛɛ ndɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛnɛ Andɛrɛ ndɑ Yɑkɔfu ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ ndɑ Filipu ndɑ Bɑtelemɑ,
42006015	ndɑ Mɑtiyu ndɑ Tomɑ ndɑ Yɑkɔfu. Alifɛ koo ndɑ Simɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Zelote,
42006016	ndɑ Yudɑ, Yɑkɔfu cɛɛnɛ ndɑ Yudɑ Isikɑriɔtu kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ɑmɑɑnɑ ŋmɑɑkɔ.
42006017	Kɑ ɑ̀ zumbu ndei ɑ̀ cɛ gbɑrɑ fɔ bɔm, nungu kɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize boobo goono. Bɔrɔ bɑkɑrɑ fɔ goono kɑ ǹ hunu zɑ Yude lɑɑbu ndɑ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ ndɑ Tiru ndɑ Sidom wɑngɑrɑ yom ko ǹ goono tɛkɔ mee gɑɑ. Ǹ kɑɑ ko hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ du bɑɑni mo ǹ doori yom gɑɑ.
42006018	Beerem kɑ hɔllɛ yom go kɑ ǹ tɑɑbɑndi kɑɑ kɑ du bɑɑni.
42006019	Jɑmɑ di kulu gɑ wetere ngei mɑ ɑ̀ hɑmɑ zɑmɑ dɑbɑri fɔ go hunu ɑ̀ gɑɑ ko kɑ ǹ kulu no bɑɑni.
42006020	Cɔfɔ Yesu nɑ bɔm tunɑndi kɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom gunɑ. À cii: Binekɑɑnekpɛ yom no, wom tɑlikɑ yom zɑmɑ wom sɛ nɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ goono.
42006021	Binekɑɑnekpɛ yom no, wom kɑ wom go mɑɑ hɛrɛɛ mɑɑsɑ, zɑmɑ wom kɑɑ kungu. Binekɑɑnekpɛ yom no, wom kɑ wom go hɛ̃ mɑɑsɑ zɑmɑ wom kɑɑ hɑɑru.
42006022	Binekɑɑnekpɛ yom no wom, sɑɑ kɑ beerem hungu wom, sɑɑ kɑ ǹ kɑɑ fee ndɑ wom kɑ wom woo, sɑɑ kɑ ǹ kɑɑ wom mɑɑ furu zɑngɑ hɛ fɔ lɑlɔ, hɛɛ Adɑmize sɑbu sɛ.
42006023	Hɑnu ngɑ di wom mɑ fɑihɑ̀. Wom mɑ munyɑ mo zɑmɑ wom kɑɑ du tukunsi beeri bɛɛnɛ kunɑ. Yɑ no ǹ cɛɛ yom mo tɛ ɑndebi yom sɛ.
42006024	Ammɑ kɑito wom hɑibɑrikɑntɛ yom zɑmɑ wom du wom yɑmɑrɑndiyom kɔ.
42006025	Kɑito wom kɑ wom kungu zɑmɑ wom kɑɑ mɑɑ hɛrɛɛ. Kɑito wom kɑ wom go bɑɑru mɑɑsɑ zɑmɑ wom kɑɑ goono bɛrɛɛ ndɑ hɛ̃ni kunɑ.
42006026	Kɑito wom, sɑɑ kɑ bɔrɔ kulu go kɑ ihinno cii wom gɑɑ zɑmɑ zɑngɑ yɑ no, ǹ cɛɛ yom tɛ ɑndebi tɑngɑri tɑngɑri yom sɛ.
42006027	Ammɑ ɑ go cii wom sɛ, wom kɑ wom go hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ sɛ, wom mɑ bɑɑ wom ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ yom. Wom mɑ ihinno tɛ beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ bine gɑ hungu wom.
42006028	Beerem kɑ ǹ go wom lɑɑli, wom mɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm ǹ gɑɑ. Wɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ beerem kɑ ǹ go wom woo sɛ.
42006029	De bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ n sɑm jɛrɛbɛ fɔ gɑɑ, n mɑ jɛrɛbɛ hinkɑntɛ mo gɑɑru ɑ̀ sɛ. De bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ n kpɛ gɑndɑ tɑ, n mɑ si hungu ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ n kpɛ bɛɛnɛ tɑ.
42006030	Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ n ŋmɑɑrɛ n mɑ ɑ̀ no. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ n hɑibɑrikɑ zɑɑ mo, n mɑ si ɑ̀ hã ndɑ.
42006031	Zɑngɑ wom go bɑɑ beerem mɑ tɛ wom sɛ, wom mo, wɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ǹ sɛ yɑ di.
42006032	De beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ bɑɑ wom, ngei nɑ wom gɑ bɑɑ, sɑɑbuyom fɔ no wom kɑɑ du? Bɑ dulumkoni yom mo go bɑɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go bɑɑ ngei.
42006033	De wom go kɑ ihinno tɛ beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ ihinno tɛ wom sɛ, sɑɑbuyom fɔ no wom kɑɑ du? Yɑ no bɑ dulumkoni yom mɑ gɑ tɛ.
42006034	De wom gɑ beerem gɑrɔ kɑ wom gɑ bei ǹ kɑɑ bɑnɑ, sɑɑbuyom fɔ nɑ wom kɑɑ du? Bɑ dulumkoni yom mɑ gɑ dulumkoni yom gɑrɔ zɑmɑ ngei mɑ du ɑ̀ sɛ.
42006035	Ammɑ wom mɑ bɑɑ wom ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ yom. Wɑ ihinno tɛ. Wɑ gɑrɔ kɑ si hɛ fɔ kulu bɑtu. Wom tukunsi kɑɑ beeri. Wom kɑɑ tɛ Kpe kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɛ bisɑ ǹ kulu, ɑ̀ ŋmɔne ize yom. Ikpɛ gɑ gutulu yom ndɑ bɔrɔ lɑlɔ yom cɛbɛ ngɑ gomini.
42006036	Ngɑ di sɛ wɑ ci suujɑntɛ yom zɑngɑ wom Bɑɑbɑ mɑ ci suujɑntɛ.
42006037	Wɑ si ciiti. Ǹ si kɑɑ wom ciiti mɑ. Wɑ si ciiti kɑ zeeri. Ǹ si kɑɑ wom ciiti kɑ zeeri mɑ. Wɑ yɑɑfɑ. Ǹ kɑɑ wom yɑɑfɑ mɑ.
42006038	Wɑ nɑ. Ǹ kɑɑ wom nɑ mɑ. Neesiji hinno kɑ ǹ kɑnkɑm kɑ sisiji hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ tɔ kɑ munu, yɑ nɑ Ikpɛ kɑɑ wom nɑ wom jɛndɛ kunɑ ndɑ bɑyom.
42006039	À nɑ yɑɑse wɔne mɑ tɛ ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Dɑnɑm hini kɑ dɑnɑm cendi bɑ? Ǹ bɔrɔ hinkɑ di kulu kɑɑ kɑm guusu kunɑ. À nɑ ci cimi nɑ bɑ?
42006040	Coobɑɑbɑize si bisɑ ngɑ cooɑndikɔ. Ammɑ coobɑɑbɑize kulu kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ himɑ ngɑ cooɑndikɔ.
42006041	Ifɔ sɛ n gɑ di subuize kɑ ɑ̀ goono n nyɑize mɑɑ kunɑ, ɑmmɑ n si di bundu kɑ ɑ̀ goono n bumbum mɑɑ kunɑ?
42006042	Mɛtɛ n tɛ kɑ hini kɑ cii n nyɑize sɛ, cɛ yɑ subuize wɔ kɑɑ n sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ goono n mɑɑ kunɑ zɑ kɑ n si di bundu kɑ ɑ̀ goono n bumbum moo kunɑ? Munɑfici, bundu wɔ kɑɑ n moo kunɑ jinɑ. À gɑɑ no, n di ihinno kɑ subuize di kɑ ɑ̀ goono n nyɑize moo kunɑ kɑɑ.
42006043	Tuurinyɑ hinno si hini kɑ ize lɑlɔ hɛi. Yɑ no tuurinyɑ lɑlɔ si hini kɑ ize hinno hɛi.
42006044	Ǹ go tuurinyɑ kulu bei ɑ̀ ŋmɔne ize gɑɑ. Bɔrɔ si jeeize yom kɔsu kɑriji nyɑ gɑɑ. Bɔrɔ si lɛzɛ̃ize kɔsu mo dɛnfɛnɛ kɑriji gɑɑ.
42006045	Bɔrɔ hinno, ɑ̀ bine jisiri hinno kunɑ no ɑ̀ gɑ ihinno kɑɑ tɛrɛ. Bɔrɔ lɑlɔ mo, ɑ̀ bine jisiri lɑlɔ kunɑ no ɑ̀ gɑ ilɑlɔ kɑɑ tɛrɛ. Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ goono ko tɔ bine kunɑ, ngɑ no mee go sendi.
42006046	Ifɔ sɛ no wom go kɑ ɑ cɛɛ Kpe, Kpe ɑmmɑ wom si tɛ bɛ kɑ ɑ go cii?
42006047	Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ ɑ dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go mɑɑ ɑ sendi yom ko kɑ ǹ dɑm ngɑ tɛgbei kunɑ, ɑ gɑ wom cɛbɛ bɛ kɑ ɑkpɛ go himɑ.
42006048	À himɑ no zɑngɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ ngɑ fuu cini. À fɑnsi hɑli ɑ̀ guusu. À nɑ fuu di kpɛsɛ furu tondi bɔm. Gooru yom tɔ hɑli hɑri dendi kɑ kɑɑ ifutu futu. À nɑ fuuɑ kɑru. Ammɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hini kɑ ɑ̀ zeeri zɑmɑ tondi bɔm no ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ cini.
42006049	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ ɑ sendi yom, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ǹ dɑm ngɑ tɛgbei kunɑ, ɑkpɛ himɑ no zɑngɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ fuu cini gɑndɑ kpɑrɛ bɔm. À mɑnɑ fɑnsi kɑ kpɛsɛ tɛ. Hɑri dendi kɑ kɑɑ ifutu futu kɑ fuu di kɑru. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ kɑm. À kɑm kɑ tutubu.
42007001	Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu nɑ ngɑ meecine yom kulu tɛ kɑ beeni jɑmɑ di sɛ kɑ ǹ go hɑngɑ dɑm, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ɑ̀ huro Kɑpɛnɑum kpɑɑrɑ.
42007002	Wɑnguize yom jinehune fɔ mo goono kɑ ɑ̀ bɑnyɑ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bine go bɑɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ sindɑ bɑɑni kɑlɑ ɑ̀ bɑ bu.
42007003	Kɑ wɑnguize yom jinehune di mɑɑ Yesu bɑɑru, ɑ̀ nɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu fɔ yom dɔntɔm ɑ̀ dɔ. Ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑ kɑ bɑnyɑ di no bɑɑni.
42007004	Ǹ kɑɑ Yesu dɔ. Ǹ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ tɑkɑkɑ kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ di tɔ n mɑ ngɑ di tu ɑ̀ sɛ.
42007005	À go bɑɑ i dimi. À nɑ Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu cini i sɛ mo.
42007006	Yesu bine kpei ǹ bɑndɑ. Ammɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ mooru ndɑ wɑnguize yom jinehune di kpɑɑrɑ kɑ wɑnguize yom jinehunɑ nɑ ngɑ kpɑɑsi yom mo dɔntɔm ɑ̀ dɔ. À cii Yesu sɛ: Kpe, n mɑ si n bɔm tɑɑbɑndi zɑmɑ yɑ nɑ tɔ n mɑ huro ɑ fuu kunɑ.
42007007	À sɛ no ɑ mɑnɑ lɑsɑbu ɑ tɔ yɑ kɑɑ n dɔ. Ammɑ n mɑ sendi fɔlɔnku cii, ɑ bɑnyɑ di mo kɑɑ du bɑɑni.
42007008	Hɛɛ mo, wɑnguize fɔ hini cire no ɑ goono. Wɑnguize yom mo goono ɑ cire. De ɑ cii ɑfɔ sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ kpei, ɑ̀ kpei. De ɑ cii ɑfɔ mo sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ. De ɑ cii ɑ bɑnyɑ mo sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ tɛ wɔ, ɑ̀ tɛ.
42007009	Kɑ Yesu mɑɑ sendi nge yom di, ɑ̀ mɑmɑci ndɑ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ bɛrɛ jɑmɑ di kɑ ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ dɔ hɛrɛ kɑ cii: A go cii wom sɛ, bɑ Isirɑilɑ kunɑ yɑ nɑ du nɑɑne beeri yɑ wɔ.
42007010	Beerem kɑ wɑnguize yom jinehune dɔntɔm ye fuu kɑ gɑru bɑnyɑ di du bɑɑni jirijiri.
42007011	À kɑɑ tɔ ɑ̀ mo bo Yesu go kpei kpɑɑrɑ fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Nɑi. À coobɑɑbɑize yom ŋmɔne iboobo ndɑ jɑmɑ bɑkɑrɑ gɑ kpei ɑ̀ bɑndɑ.
42007012	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ go tɔ wɑngɑrɑ birini mee dɔ, cɔfɔ beerem gɑ bukɔ fɔ mo zɑɑ ko hunu ndɑ. Bɔrɔ di ngɑ fɔ nɑ ɑ̀ nyɑ nɑ ɑ̀ hɛi. Sokoni mo no nyɑ di. Wɑngɑrɑ bɔrɔ boobo goono nyɑ di bɑndɑ.
42007013	Kɑ Kpe di weibɔrɔ di, cɔfɔ sisibi nɑ ɑ̀ dii ɑ̀ sɛ. À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Si hɛ̃.
42007014	Yesu mɑɑni kɑ dɑɑri kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ǹ nɑ bukɔɑ dɑm hɑmɑ. À zɑɑkɔei cɛ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii: Hɑiwɑsu, ɑ go cii n sɛ n mɑ tunu.
42007015	Cɔfɔ bukɔ di tunu kɑ gɔrɔ. À sinti ko sendi. Yesu nɑ ɑ̀ yeti ɑ̀ nyɑ sɛ.
42007016	Hɑmburu nɑ ǹ kulu dii. Ǹ go kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi ko cii: Andebi beeri fɔ tunu i gɑme. Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ jɑmɑ kunfɑ.
42007017	Hɛ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ɑ̀ bɑɑru kpei nungu kulu Yude lɑɑbu kulu kunɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ hundɑntɛ lɑɑbu mo kulu kunɑ.
42007018	Yohɑnnɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom kpeindɑ Yohɑnnɑ sɛ hɛ yom di kulu bɑɑru.
42007019	Yohɑnnɑ bine nɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom ŋmɔne ihinkɑ cɛɛ. A nɑ ǹ dɔntɔm Yesu dɔ kɑ cii: Ni, n ci wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑ di wɑlɑ bɔrɔ teji nɑ i mɑ bɑtu?
42007020	Kɑ ǹ tɔ Yesu dɔ ǹ cii: Mirɑndikɔ Yohɑnnɑ nɑ i dɔntɔm n dɔ. À cii i mɑ n hã de ni, n ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑ di wɑlɑ dee bɔrɔ teji no i mɑ bɑtu?
42007021	Lɔkɑci ngɑ di kunɑ Yesu nɑ bɔrɔ boobo no bɑɑni ǹ zɛnjɛ yom ndɑ ǹ doori yom gɑɑ. À nɑ hɔllɛ yom gɑɑrɛ beerem bɑndɑ. À no dɑnɑm boobo mo no moo.
42007022	À gɑɑ no Yesu tu Yohɑnnɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ kɑ cii: Wɑ kpei cii Yohɑnnɑ sɛ bɛ yom wɔ kɑ wom di ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ wom mɑɑ. Dɑnɑm yom go tɛ moo. Leebɑntɛ yom go dirɑ. Jire yom go du hinnɑndiyom. Lutu yom go mɑɑ. Ǹ go bukɔ yom tunɑndi. Ǹ gɑ Bɑɑru Hinno mo wɑɑzu tɛ tɑlikɑ yom sɛ.
42007023	Binekɑɑnekpɛ no bɔrɔ kɑ yɑ nɑ tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ dɛrɛyom hɛ.
42007024	Sɑɑ kɑ beerem kɑ Yohɑnnɑ dɔntɔm go dirɑ, Yesu sinti kɑ sendi Yohɑnnɑ bɔm jɑmɑ di sɛ. À cii: Ifɔ no wom kpei gunɑ gɑnji kunɑ? Sɑɑri kɑ hɛo go zinji no bɑ?
42007025	Ifɔ no wom kpei gunɑ? Bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go jiine bɑɑnɔ dɑm no? Gunɑ, beerem kɑ ǹ go jiine hinno yom dɑm di kɑ ǹ go hunɑ hɑndunyɑ kɑɑne kunɑ, gɑndɑkpɛ yom nungu yom dɔ no ǹ goono.
42007026	Ammɑ ifɔ no wom kpei gunɑ? Andebi fɔ? Oò, ɑ go cii wom sɛ ɑ̀ bisɑ ɑndebi kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
42007027	Ngɑ yɑ ci wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bɔm ǹ hɑntum kɑ cii: "Gunɑ, ɑ go bɔrɔ fɔ sɑmbɑ n jine wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ n fɔndɔ sɔlu n jine".
42007028	A go cii wom sɛ, iburɑdɑm yom kunɑ weibɔrɔ mɑnɑ bɔrɔ fɔ hɛi kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑndebi kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ Mirɑndikɔ Yohɑnnɑ. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci icɛnɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ kunɑ, ɑ̀ bɛɛrɛ bisɑ Yohɑnnɑ ŋmɔne.
42007029	Beerem kulu ndɑ ɑlikɑsi tɑkɔ yom kɑ ǹ go mɑɑ ngɑ di, ǹ nɑ sɛdɑ tɛ Ikpɛ cɛyom susu sɛ zɑ kɑ ǹ du Yohɑnnɑ mirɑndiyom.
42007030	Ammɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ beikɔ yom hungu miilɑ kɑ Ikpɛ gundɑ ǹ sɛ zɑmɑ ǹ mɑnɑ nɑm Yohɑnnɑ mɑ ngei mirɑndi.
42007031	Kpe bine cii: Ifɔ no ɑ mɑ zɑmɑni wɔ bɔrɔ yom himɑndi ndɑ? Hɛ fɔ dimi no zɑmɑni wɔ bɔrɔ yom himɑ?
42007032	Ǹ himɑ no koo yom kɑ ǹ go gɔrɔ hebu bɑtumɑ kɑ cɛrɛ cɛɛ. Ǹ cii: I nɑ gɑɑsiɑ kɑru wom sɛ, wom mɑnɑ gɑɑni. I nɑ bɛrɛɛ dɔɔni yom tɛ wom sɛ, wom mɑnɑ hɛ̃.
42007033	Mirɑndikɔ Yohɑnnɑ kɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ buuru ŋmɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ dufɛ̃ hɑm kɑlɑ wom go cii ɑ̀ gundɑ hɔllɛ.
42007034	Hɛɛ Adɑmize kɑɑ, ɑ go ŋmɑɑ, ɑ go hɑm kɑlɑ wom go cii, gunɑ ŋmɑɑri bɑɑkɔ no, dufɛ̃ hɑmkɔ no. Alikɑsi tɑkɔ yom ndɑ dulumkoni yom kpɑɑsi no.
42007035	Ammɑ Ikpɛ hɑikusutɛrɛ cɛɑntɛ susu hunutɛrɛ ɑ̀ tɛgbei yom kulu gɑɑ.
42007036	Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ Yesu ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ ŋmɑɑ ndɑ ngɑ. Yesu huro Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ di fuu kunɑ kɑ gɔrɔ ŋmɑɑyom dɔ.
42007037	Weibɔrɔ dulumkoni fɔ mo goono wɑngɑrɑ di kunɑ. Kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Yesu goono Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ di fuu kunɑ ko gɔrɔ, ɑ̀ kɑɑndɑ kɔlibɛ kpɑrɛ fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ ɑlibɑti. Kɔlibɛ di tɔ ndɑ wɑidi.
42007038	À cɛ bɑndɑ Yesu cee yom dɔ hɛrɛ. À go hɛ̃. À sinti kɑ Yesu cee yom nyunu ndɑ ngɑ mundi. À go kɑ ǹ hɑɑbu ndɑ ngɑ bɔm hɑmini. À go kɑ ɑ̀ cee yom sumsum kɑ wɑidi di munu ǹ gɑɑ.
42007039	Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ di kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Yesu cɛɛ ŋmɑɑyom dɔ, ɑ̀ di ngɑ di. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ngɑ bine kunɑ: De bɔrɔ wɔ ɑndebi no, dom ɑ̀ bei weibɔrɔ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ngɑ hɑmɑ mee no ndɑ wɔ kɑ dimi no. Weibɔrɔ di yɑ dulumkoni no.
42007040	Yesu mo tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Simɔ, ɑ gundɑ hɛ fɔ kɑ ɑ cii n sɛ. Simɔ cii: Coobɑɑbɑ, sendi.
42007041	Yesu cii: Gɑrɔnyɑ fɔ gundɑ gɑrɔkoni hinkɑ. Bɔrɔ fɔ gundɑ gɑrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ jiiri fɔ ndɑ jɛrɛ bɑnɑndi. Bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ mo ŋmɔne bisɑ hɑndu ndɑ bɑnɑndi.
42007042	Ammɑ kɑ ǹ sindɑ hɛ fɔ kɑ bɑnɑ, gɑrɔnyɑ di nɑ gɑrɔ yom yɑɑfɑ ǹ kulu sɛ. Bɔrɔ hinkɑ di kunɑ mee yɑ bɑɑ gɑrɔnyɑ di kɑ bisɑ ɑfɔ?
42007043	Simɔ tu kɑ cii: A tɑmmɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ̀ nɑ gɑrɔ beeri di yɑɑfɑ no. Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N lɑsɑbu sɑbɑ.
42007044	Cɔfɔ Yesu bɛrɛ weibɔrɔ di dɔ bɛrɛ kɑ cii Simɔ sɛ: N go di weibɔrɔ wɔ? A huro n fuu kunɑ, n mɑnɑ ɑ no hɑri kɑ ɑ cee yom nyunu. Ammɑ wei wɔ nɑ ɑ cee yom nyunu ndɑ ngɑ mundi. À nɑ ɑ cee yom hɑɑbu ndɑ ngɑ bɔm hɑmini.
42007045	N mɑnɑ ɑ sumsum ɑmmɑ wei wɔ zɑ ɑ huro ɑ̀ mɑnɑ cɛ ndɑ ɑ cee yom sumsumyom.
42007046	N mɑnɑ jii toli ɑ bɔm gɑɑ, ɑmmɑ wei wɔ nɑ wɑidi munu ɑ cee yom gɑɑ.
42007047	À sɛ no, ɑ go cii n sɛ: Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ yɑɑfɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ dulum boobo zɑmɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑkɑsine beeri. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ yɑɑfɑ cɛnɑ, ɑ̀ bɑɑkɑsine cɛnɑ no.
42007048	Cɔfɔ Yesu cii weibɔrɔ di sɛ: A nɑ n yɑɑfɑ ndɑ n dulum yom.
42007049	Beerem kɑ ǹ go ŋmɑɑ ndɑ Yesu sinti kɑ sendi ngei bine yom kunɑ kɑ cii: Mee nɑ bɔrɔ kpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go bɔrɔ yɑɑfɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ dulum yom?
42007050	Yesu cii weibɔrɔ di sɛ: N nɑɑne nɑ n fɑɑbɑ. Kpei ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne.
42008001	Ngɑ di bɑndɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ tɔ Yesu gɑ wɑngɑrɑ yom kulu ndɑ kpɑɑrɑ yom kulu yɑɑli ko bɑɑru fɛɛ. À gɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu tɛ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ bɔm. Coobɑɑbɑize wei cindi hinkɑ di goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ.
42008002	Weibɔrɔ fɔ yom kɑ ǹ du bɑɑni ǹ hɔllɛ yom gɑɑ ndɑ ǹ doori yom gɑɑ mo goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ. Weibɔrɔ yom di ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ yɑ ci Mɑriɑmɑ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Mɑgɑdɑliɑ, weibɔrɔ di kɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ hɔllɛ iye hunu.
42008003	Yoɑni kɑ ɑ̀ ci Suzɑ wɛndɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go ci Hirodu ŋmɔne yerimɑ mo goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ. Suzɑnɑ ndɑ ɑfɔ yom mo kɑ ǹ go tɑmtɛrɛ Yesu sɛ ndɑ ngei hɑibɑrikɑ yom mo goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ.
42008004	Jɑmɑ bɑkɑrɑ hunu zɑ wɑngɑrɑ yom kulu ko meigu Yesu dɔ. À nɑ yɑɑse wɔ tɛ kɑ cii:
42008005	Dimiize seekɔ fɔ hunu kɑ ngɑ dimiizei see. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go see, dimiize fɔ yom kɑm fɔndɔ jɛrɛ gɑɑ. Bisɑkɔ yom go tɑɑmu. Bɛɛnɛ ciro yom mo nɑ ǹ ŋmɑɑ.
42008006	Dimiize fɔ yom mo kɑm tondi dɑɑru bɔm. Kɑ ǹ zei ǹ kɔgu zɑmɑ ǹ si du yeeni.
42008007	Afɔ yom mo kɑm kɑriji nyɑ yom kunɑ. Ǹ kulu tunu mefɔ ɑmmɑ kɑriji yom nɑ ǹ dii.
42008008	Afɔ yom mo kɑm lɑɑbu hinno kunɑ. Ǹ tunu kɑ hɛi ize zɑngu. Kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ hɛ nge yom di cii, ɑ̀ nɑ jinde zɑɑ kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ hɑngɑ dɑm kɑ mɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ mɑɑ fɑ.
42008009	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom di nɑ ɑ̀ hã bɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci yɑɑse di feeriji.
42008010	Yesu cii: Wom sɛ no, Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ kpetɛrɛ duje beiyom no. Ammɑ bɔrɔ cindei wɔ yɑɑse kunɑ no ǹ sendi ǹ sɛ zɑmɑ, "Gunɑyom gɑɑ ǹ mɑ si di, Mɑɑyom gɑɑ mo ǹ mɑ si fɑhɑm".
42008011	Yɑɑse di feeriji neyɑ. Dimiize yɑ ci Ikpɛ Sendɑ.
42008012	Wɔ kɑ yom goono fɔndɔ jɛrɛ gɑɑ, ngei yɑ ci beerem kɑ ǹ go mɑɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ. À bɑndɑ Ibilisi go kɑɑ kɑ Sendɑ kɑɑ ǹ bine yom kunɑ hɑli ǹ mɑ si nɑɑne kɑ du fɑɑbɑ.
42008013	Wɔ kɑ yom goono tondi dɑɑrɑ bɔm mo, ngei yɑ ci beerem kɑ, sɑɑ kɑ ǹ mɑɑ Sendɑ ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ tɑ no ndɑ fɑihã. Ǹ bine sindɑ kɑɑji. Bɑndɑ fɔ gɑnɑkɔ yom no. Suiyom lɔkɑci gɑɑ cɔfɔ ǹ go ye bɑndɑ.
42008014	Wɔ kɑ yom goono kɑriji yom kunɑ mo, ngei yɑ ci beerem kɑ ǹ go mɑɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ. Ammɑ hundi wɔ kɑrihã ndɑ hɑibɑrikɑ yom ndɑ hɑndunyɑ fɑɑriŋmɑɑyom nɑ ǹ dii. Ǹ si bɑrikɑ hɛi kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ tɔ.
42008015	Ammɑ wɔ kɑ yom goono lɑɑbu hinno kunɑ, ngei yɑ ci beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ mɑɑ Sendɑ. Ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ jɛ ngei bine yom kunɑ ihinno cimi ndɑ ɑfɔ. Ǹ go bɑrikɑ hɛi mɑ suuru kunɑ.
42008016	Bɔrɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ fitilɑ diiɑndi kɑ gɑɑsu gum ɑ̀ bɔm wɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm dɑɑri cire. Ammɑ fitilɑ dɛcɛyom dɔ no ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ jisi hɑli beerem kɑ ǹ go huro mɑ di ɑ̀ kɑɑri.
42008017	Hɛ fɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono tugɑntɛ ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ. Hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono dɑɑbɑntɛ mo ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ bei kɑ jisi tɛrɛkpɑrɛ.
42008018	Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ zɑngɑ wom go mɑɑ zɑmɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ no. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ mo, bɑ bɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go tɑmmɑ ngɑ gundɑ, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ tɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
42008019	Yesu nyɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛnɛ yom kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ, ɑmmɑ ǹ mɑnɑ hini kɑ mɑɑni ɑ̀ dɔ bɔrɔ bɑyom sɑbu sɛ.
42008020	Bɔrɔ fɔ yom cii Yesu sɛ: N nyɑ ndɑ n cɛɛnɛ yom go cɛ tɛrɛ. Ǹ go bɑɑ ngei mɑ di ni.
42008021	Yesu bine tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: A nyɑ ndɑ ɑ cɛɛnɛ yom, ngei yɑ ci beerem wɔ kɑ ǹ gɑ hɑngɑ dɑm Ikpɛ Sendɑ sɛ. Ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm ngei tɛgbei kunɑ mo.
42008022	Hɑnu nge yom di gɑme, ɑ̀ kɑɑ tɔ Yesu huro hɑrihi fɔ kunɑ, ngɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: I mɑ kpei buulɑ yɑ hɛrɛ tɛrɛ. Ǹ kpei.
42008023	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ go funu ko kpei, Yesu wɔ go jiibi. Cɔfɔ hɛo futu fɔ tunu buulɑ bɔm. Hɑrihi di go tɔ ndɑ hɑri kɑlɑ ǹ huro kɑtɑru kunɑ.
42008024	Coobɑɑbɑize yom mɑɑni Yesu dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi. Ǹ cii: I Jinɑ, i Jinɑ, i go hɑlɑci. Yesu tunu. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ deeni hɛo di ndɑ buulɑ boosu yom di kɑ ɑ̀ go teeni gɑɑ. Ǹ kɑni, nungu tɛ sɑkɑi.
42008025	Yesu bine cii coobɑɑbɑize yom di sɛ: Mɑni wom nɑɑne? Hɑmburu nɑ ǹ dii. Ǹ go mɑmɑci kɑ cii cɛrɛ sɛ: Mee dimi no bɔrɔ kpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑ hɛo ndɑ buulɑ mei? Ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ sendi gɑnɑ mo.
42008026	Ǹ tɔ yɑ hɛrɛ tɛrɛ Gɑdɑrɑncei lɑɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ tenji ndɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu.
42008027	Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu zumbu gɑndɑ, wɑngɑrɑ di hɑibɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ hɔllɛ yom zɑ jɛyom nɑ ɑ̀ kube. À si jiine dɑm. À si fuu kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ kɑlɑ sɑɑrɛ yom kunɑ.
42008028	Kɑ ɑ̀ di Yesu ɑ̀ kuwɑ kɑ jɛndɛbiri ɑ̀ jine. À kuwɑ ndɑ jinde beeri kɑ cii: Ifɔ yɑ goono hɛɛ ndɑ ni gɑme, Yesu Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɛ bisɑ ǹ kulu Ize? A gɑ kɑ n ŋmɑɑrɛ n mɑ si ɑ bɔnɑndi.
42008029	Yesu nɑ hɔllɛ di dɑm ɑ̀ mɑ hunu bɔrɔ di bɑndɑ. Zɑ jɛyom no hɔllɛ nɑ ɑ̀ dii. Ǹ nɑ bɔrɔ di bɔ ndɑ nyɔri yom ndɑ seseri yom ko lɑɑkɑli ndɑ. Kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ hɔyom di pɑti, hɔllɛ di nɑ ɑ̀ fum gɑnji kunɑ.
42008030	Yesu nɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ cii, mɛtɛ n mɑɑ? À cii, Jɑmɑ. À cii yɑ zɑmɑ hɔllɛ boobo yɑ goono ɑ̀ bɔm.
42008031	Hɔllɛ yom di bine go Yesu ŋmɑɑrɛ tɑkɑkɑ ɑ̀ mɑ si ngei dɑm ngei mɑ kpei guusu kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ mee kunɑ.
42008032	Kpisɔ gɑɑ bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ bine go kurum tondi kuku fɔ bɔm. Hɔllɛ yom di go Yesu ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ nɑm ngei sɛ ngei mɑ huro kpisɔ yom di kunɑ. Yesu tu ǹ sɛ.
42008033	Hɔllɛ yom di bine hunu bɔrɔ di bɑndɑ kɑ huro kpisɔ yom di kunɑ. Kpisɔ gɑɑ di go pito ko gungure zɑ tondi bɔm kɑ kɑm buulɑ kunɑ. Hɑri nɑ ǹ ŋmɑɑ.
42008034	Ǹ kurukɔ yom di hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ. Ǹ zuuru kɑ kpei bɑɑru deede wɑngɑrɑ kunɑ ndɑ kpɑɑrɑ kɑmbu yom kunɑ.
42008035	Beerem hunu kɑ di bɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ. Ǹ kpei Yesu dɔ. Ǹ nɑ bɔrɔ di kɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ hɔllɛ yom di hunu gɑru Yesu cee dɔ. À go gɔrɔ ngɑ lɑɑkɑli gɑɑ. Jiine mo go ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Cɔfɔ hɑmburu nɑ ǹ dii.
42008036	Beerem kɑ ǹ go di hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ, ǹ deede ǹ sɛ zɑngɑ ǹ nɑ hɔllɛkpɛ di no bɑɑni.
42008037	Cɔfɔ Gɑdɑrɑncei lɑɑbu bɔrɔ kulu nɑ Yesu ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ hunu ngei lɑɑbu zɑmɑ hɑmburu yɑ go kɑ ǹ dii kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. Yesu huro hɑrihiɑ kunɑ kɑ bɛrɛ kɑ ye.
42008038	Bɔrɔ di kɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ hɔllɛ yom di hunu nɑ Yesu ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ tu ngɑ mɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ. Ammɑ Yesu nɑ ɑ̀ tɑm.
42008039	À cii: Kpei fuu. Ǹ mɑ deede hɛ kulu kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ ǹ sɛ. À kpei fuu kɑ fɛɛ wɑngɑrɑ di kulu kunɑ hɛ kulu kɑ Yesu tɛ ngɑ sɛ.
42008040	À kɑɑ tɔ kɑ Yesu ye kɑ kɑɑ jɑmɑ di nɑ ɑ̀ kube zɑmɑ ǹ kulu go kɑ ɑ̀ bɑtu no.
42008041	Cɔfɔ, bɔrɔ fɔ mo kɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Yɑiru, Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ jinɑ nɑ. À sɔmbu Yesu jine ko kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑ ngɑ kpɑɑrɑ.
42008042	Koo hundiyo fɔlɔnku no ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ zɑngɑ jiiri wei cindi hinkɑ. Ngɑ yɑ bɑ bu. Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu go kpei kpɑɑrɑ di, jɑmɑ di go kɑ ɑ̀ kɑnkɑm.
42008043	Weibɔrɔ fɔ mo goono kɑ kuri go dooru ɑ̀ sɛ hɑli jiiri wei cindi hinkɑ. À nɑ ngɑ hɑibɑrikɑ kulu wi lokotoro yom dɔ. Ǹ bɑ ɑfɔ mɑnɑ hini kɑ ɑ̀ no bɑɑni.
42008044	À mɑɑni bɑndɑ bɑndɑ kɑ Yesu kpɛ hɑngɑ hɑmɑ. Moo miilɑ fɔ cɔfɔ kuri dooruyom di cɛ.
42008045	Cɔfɔ Yesu hã kɑ cii: Mee yɑ nɑ ɑ hɑmɑ? Kɑ bɔrɔ kulu ze, Piɛɛ ndɑ wɔ kɑ yom goono Yesu bɑndɑ cii: I Jinɑ, jɑmɑ yɑ nɑ n koli ko kɑ n kɑnkɑm. N du kɑ hã wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ n hɑmɑ?
42008046	Ammɑ Yesu cii: Bɔrɔ fɔ bine nɑ ɑ hɑmɑ zɑmɑ ɑ bei kɑ dɑbɑri hunu ɑ gɑɑ.
42008047	Kɑ weibɔrɔ wɔ di ngɑ si du kɑ tugu, ɑ̀ kɑɑ Yesu dɔ ndɑ gɑsiyom. À sɔmbu ɑ̀ jine kɑ cii jɑmɑ kulu jine sɑbɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ngɑ nɑ Yesu hɑmɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ ngɑ du bɑɑni moo miilɑ fɔ.
42008048	Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A koo hundiyo, n lɑɑkɑli mɑ si tunu. N nɑɑne nɑ n no bɑɑni. Kpei ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne.
42008049	Kɑ Yesu goono sendi gɑɑ, Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ jinɑ di kpɑɑrɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kɑɑ kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N koo hundiyɑ bu. N mɑ si Coobɑɑbɑ tɑɑbɑndi.
42008050	Ammɑ kɑ Yesu mɑɑ yɑ di ɑ̀ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Si hɑmburu. N mɑ nɑɑne dee. À kɑɑ du bɑɑni.
42008051	Yesu huro fuuɑ kunɑ. À mɑnɑ tu bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ huro kɑlɑ Piɛɛ ndɑ Yɑkɔfu ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ ndɑ koo di bɑɑbɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ nyɑ.
42008052	Ǹ kulu go hɛ̃ ko bɛrɛɛ. Cɔfɔ Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ si hɛ̃ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ bu. À go jiibi no.
42008053	Cɔfɔ ǹ go Yesu hɑɑru zɑmɑ ǹ bei kɑ ɑ̀ bu no.
42008054	Ammɑ Yesu nɑ ǹ kulu kɑɑ tɛrɛ. À nɑ koo di kɑmbɛ dii kɑ cii: Hundiyo, tunu.
42008055	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ hundi ye ɑ̀ gɑɑ. À tunu mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ. Yesu cii ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ no ŋmɑɑri ɑ̀ mɑ ŋmɑɑ.
42008056	Hundiyɑ bɑhɛi yom go mɑmɑci ɑmmɑ Yesu nɑ ǹ dɑm ǹ mɑ si cii bɔrɔ fɔ kulu sɛ bɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ.
42009001	Yesu nɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize wei cindi hinkɑ di cɛɛ ǹ mɑ meigu. À nɑ ǹ no dɑbɑri ndɑ hini hɔllɛ yom kulu bɔm ndɑ bɑɑni noyom doori yom bɔm.
42009002	À nɑ ǹ dɔntɔm ǹ mɑ kpei bɑɑru fɛɛ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ bɔm kɑ doorikom yom mo no bɑɑni.
42009003	À cii ǹ sɛ mo: Wom mɑ si hɛ fɔ kulu zɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci guziri, bɑ goobu yom, bɑ fɔɔlɔ, bɑ ŋmɑɑri, bɑ nooru. Wom bɑ ɑfɔ mo mɑ si gundɑ kpɛ jinde hinkɑ.
42009004	Fuu kulu kɑ wom huro, wom mɑ gɔrɔ ɑ̀ kunɑ kɑlɑ wom tunuyom.
42009005	Beerem kulu mo kɑ ǹ si wom yotɛrɛ tɑ sɑɑ kɑ wom kɑɑ ko gɑnɑ nungu di wom mɑ tɛ ǹ sɛ, wom cee si wom kɑmbɛ si zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ tɛ ǹ sɛ sɛdɑ.
42009006	Ǹ kpei ko dirɑ kpɑɑrɑ ndɑ kpɑɑrɑ ko Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu tɛ. Ǹ nɑ zɛnjɛkom yom no bɑɑni nungu kulu.
42009007	Hirodu mo kɑ ɑ̀ ci lɑɑbu gɑndɑkpɛ mɑɑ bɛ kulu kɑ Yesu go tɛ zɑmɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom go cii, Yohɑnnɑ no Ikpɛ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme.
42009008	Bɔrɔ fɔ yom mo go cii Eli yɑ hunutɛrɛ. Afɔ yom mo cii, zɑ dom ɑndebi yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ yɑ tunu.
42009009	Hirodu cii: Hɛɛ bine yɑ nɑ Yohɑnnɑ bɔm kɑɑ ɑmmɑ mee no bɔrɔ wɔne kɑ ɑ go mɑɑ ǹ go hɛ yom wɔ cii ɑ̀ gɑɑ? Hirodu go ceeci ngɑ mɑ di ɑ̀.
42009010	Kɑ diyɑ yom ye kɑ kɑɑ, ǹ deede Yesu sɛ hɛ kulu kɑ ngei tɛ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ boi kɑ ye ndei kɑmbu gɑnji kunɑ, kpɑɑrɑ fɔ dɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Betɑsɑidɑ.
42009011	Kɑ jɑmɑ bɑkɑrɑ di bei, ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ. À bine nɑ ǹ tɑ kɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ sendi tɛ ǹ sɛ. Beerem mo kɑ ǹ go bɑɑ bɑɑni ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ no bɑɑni.
42009012	Weenu sinti ko kɑm. Cɔfɔ coobɑɑbɑize wei cindi hinkɑ di kɑɑ Yesu dɔ kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Jɑmɑ wɔ tɑm ǹ mɑ kpei kpɑɑrɑ yom kunɑ ndɑ ǹ hundɑntɛ tungɑ yom kunɑ. Nungu yom di ǹ mɑ gɔrɔ kɑ du ŋmɑɑri zɑmɑ nee wɔ gɑnji kunɑ no i goono.
42009013	Ammɑ Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wom bumbum, wɑ ǹ nɑ ŋmɑɑri ǹ mɑ ŋmɑɑ. Coobɑɑbɑize yom di mo cii: I buuru mɑnɑ bisɑ igu. I ciifi mɑnɑ bisɑ ihinkɑ. Kɑlɑ de i mɑ kpei ŋmɑɑri dei jɑmɑ wɔ kulu sɛ.
42009014	Ammɑ jɑmɑ tɔ zɑngɑ hɑibɔrɔ dubu gu. Yesu cii ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ: Wɑ ǹ gɔrɛndi sɛtɛ sɛtɛ, bɔrɔ weigu weigu.
42009015	Coobɑɑbɑize yom di tɛ yɑ di, ǹ nɑ ǹ kulu gɔrɛndi.
42009016	Yesu nɑ buuru gu di zɑɑ ndɑ ciifi hinkɑ di. A nɑ bɛɛnɛ gunɑ kɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm ǹ gɑɑ. À nɑ ǹ zenji zenji. À nɑ ǹ nɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ ǹ mɑ ǹ fɑrisi jɑmɑ di sɛ.
42009017	Ǹ kulu ŋmɑɑ kɑ kungu. Zenje yom kɑ ǹ cindi ǹ nɑ ǹ meigu cilɑ cɛnɑ wei cindi hinkɑ.
42009018	À kɑɑ tɔ Yesu gɑ kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ kɑmbu. À coobɑɑbɑize yom goono ɑ̀ dɔ. À nɑ ǹ hã kɑ cii: Mee no jɑmɑ wɔ go cii hɛɛ dɑ?
42009019	Coobɑɑbɑize yom tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Mirɑndikɔ Yohɑnnɑ. Ammɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom go cii Eli. Afɔ yom mo go cii dom ɑndebi yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ yɑ tunu bu kunɑ.
42009020	Yesu cii ngei mo sɛ: Wom bine, mee no wom cii hɛɛ? Cɔfɔ Piɛɛ tu kɑ cii. Mɛsiyɑ, Ikpɛ ŋmɔne.
42009021	Yesu nɑ ǹ dɑm ǹ mɑ si ɑ̀ cii bɔrɔ fɔ kulu sɛ.
42009022	À cii mo: Tilɑsi hɛɛ, Adɑmize yɑ tɑɑbi boobo hɑm. Mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom ndɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom, ǹ mɑ hungu hɛɛ kɑ ɑ wi. Jiribi hinzɑntɛ mɑ Ikpɛ mɑ ɑ tunɑndi.
42009023	À cii ǹ kulu sɛ mo: De bɔrɔ fɔ go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ ɑ gɑnɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ hungu ngɑ bɔm sɛ. À mɑ ngɑ bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ zɑɑ hɑnu kulu kɑ kɑ ɑ gɑnɑ.
42009024	Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ ngɑ hundi fɑɑbɑ ɑkpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ dɛrɑndi. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ngɑ hundi dɛrɑndi ɑ sɑbu sɛ, ɑkpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ fɑɑbɑ.
42009025	Hɑnfɑni fɔ nɑ bɔrɔ sɛ bɑ de ɑ̀ du hɑndunyɑ kulu ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɔm dɛrɑndi wɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ hɑlɑci?
42009026	Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ mɑɑ hɑwi ndɑ hɛɛ ndɑ ɑ sendi yom, hɛɛ mo Adɑmize, hɑwi gɑ ɑ dii ndɑ ɑkpɛ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ kɑɑ ɑ deizɑ kunɑ ndɑ Bɑɑbɑ ŋmɔne kunɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize hɑlɑɑlɑ yom hɑwi gɑ ɑ dii ɑkpɛ sɛ.
42009027	Ammɑ cimi nɑ ɑ go cii wom sɛ, bɔrɔ fɔ yom go cɛ nee kɑ ǹ si bu tɑbɑɑ pɑi kɑlɑ ǹ mɑ di Ikpɛ kpetɛrɑ.
42009028	À kɑɑ tɔ sendi nge yom di bɑndɑ, zɑngɑ jiribi ɑhɑku sɑrɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Piɛɛ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ ndɑ Yɑkɔfu boi ngɑ bɑndɑ. À kɑɑru tondi kuku fɔ bɔm kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ.
42009029	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ ɑ̀ moodumɑ tɑkɑri bɛrɛ. À jiine yom mo bɛrɛ kɑ kpɑrɛ tɑi tɑi zɑngɑ bɛɛnɛ nyɑlɑu.
42009030	Cɔfɔ bɔrɔ hinkɑ gɑ. Moisi ndɑ Eli nɑ kɑ ǹ gɑ fɑɑji ndɑ Yesu.
42009031	Nge yom yɑ hunutɛrɛ deizɑ kunɑ. Ǹ gɑ sendi Yesu bu bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ bɑ tɛ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ.
42009032	Ammɑ Piɛɛ ndɑ ɑ̀ bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ yom mo, dusungu go kɑ ǹ gɑmɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ moo hɛi ǹ di Yesu deizɑ. Ǹ di bɔrɔ hinkɑ mo kɑ ǹ gɑ cɛ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ.
42009033	A kɑɑ tɔ kɑ bɔrɔ hinkɑ di gɑnɑ Yesu dɔ, Piɛɛ cii Yesu sɛ: A Jinɑ, ɑ̀ boori i mɑ gɔrɔ nee. I mɑ bukɑ hinzɑ tɛ, ɑfɔ n sɛ, ɑfɔ Moisi sɛ, ɑfɔ mɑ Eli sɛ. Ammɑ Piɛɛ mɑnɑ fɑhɑm hɛ kɑ ngɑ go cii.
42009034	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ sendi ngɑ di tɛ nɑ, buru fɔ mɑ kɑɑ kɑ ǹ dɑɑbu. Hɑmburu nɑ ǹ dii kɑ ǹ gɑ huro burɑ kunɑ.
42009035	Jinde fɔ bine hunu zɑ buru di kunɑ kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kpɛ yɑ ci ɑ Ize Binegɑnji. Wɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ.
42009036	Sɑɑ kɑ jinde di cɛ, Yesu ngɑ fɔ nɑ. Coobɑɑbɑize yom di hini ngei mee. Ǹ mɑnɑ deede bɔrɔ fɔ kulu sɛ hɛ kɑ ǹ di hɑnu nge yom di.
42009037	À kɑɑ tɔ kɑ mɑ bɑ ǹ gɑ zumbu tondi kuku di bɔm, bɔrɔ boobo kɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kube.
42009038	Cɔfɔ jɑmɑ di kunɑ hɑibɔrɔ fɔ nɑ jinde zɑɑ kɑ cii: Coobɑɑbɑ, ɑ gɑ kɑ n ŋmɑɑrɛ n mɑ ɑ kɑɑ hɑiwɑsu wɔ gunɑ, zɑmɑ ngɑ hinne no ɑ sɛ.
42009039	Gunɑ, hɔllɛ yɑ cini kɑ ɑ̀ dii, mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑti. Hɔllɑ yɑ cini kɑ ɑ̀ zinji kɑ ɑ̀ fufu hɑli ɑ̀ mee mɑ kufu kɑru. À cini kɑ ɑ̀ guruguzɑndi kɑlɑ dɑcɑti nɑ, ɑ̀ gɑ gɑnɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
42009040	À bine nɑ n coobɑɑbɑize yom ŋmɑɑrɛ n mɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑrɛ ɑmmɑ ǹ mɑnɑ hini.
42009041	Yesu tu kɑ cii: E zɑmɑni wɔ beerem, wom zɑm kɑ nɑɑnekɔ yom, wom siirekpɛ yom, kɑlɑ sɑɑ fɔ nɑ ɑ bɑ goono ndɑ wom? Kɑlɑ sɑɑ fɔ no ɑ mɑ wom jɛrɛ? N mɑ kɑɑndɑ n koo di nee wɔ.
42009042	Ammɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go mɑɑni ndɑ koo di, cɔfɔ hɔllɛ di nɑ ɑ̀ zeeri kpɛɛnɛ kɑ ɑ̀ fufu ifutu futu. Ammɑ Yesu deeni hɔllɛ di gɑɑ. À nɑ koo di no bɑɑni kɑ ɑ̀ yeti ɑ̀ bɑɑbɑ sɛ.
42009043	Ǹ kulu mɑmɑci ndɑ Ikpɛ dɑbɑri bɛɛrɛkpɛ. Ǹ kulu go mɑmɑci ndɑ hɛ kulu kɑ Yesu go tɛ. Yesu cii ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom di sɛ:
42009044	Wom wɔ, wom mɑ sendi yom wɔ dii ɑ̀ mɑ boori zɑmɑ hɛɛ Adɑmize, ǹ bɑ kɑ ɑ dɑm beerem kɑmbɛ.
42009045	Ammɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom di mɑnɑ fɑhɑm ndɑ sendi di. À gɑ tugɑntɛ ǹ sɛ hɑli ǹ mɑnɑ hini kɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ. Ǹ gɑ hɑmburu mɑ ndɑ ǹ mɑ Yesu hã sendi di.
42009046	Kɑkɔ wɔne mo tunu coobɑɑbɑize yom di gɑme, ǹ mɑ bei ǹ kunɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ beeri ndɑ bɔrɔ kulu.
42009047	Ammɑ zɑ kɑ Yesu go kɑ ǹ bine yom lɑsɑbu bei, ɑ̀ nɑ kɑɑ fɔ zɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cɛɑndi ngɑ jɛrɛ gɑɑ.
42009048	À bine cii ǹ sɛ: Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ koo cɛnɑ zɑngɑ wɔne tɑ ɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ, ɑkpɛ go kɑ ɑ tɑ. Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ ɑ tɑ, ɑ̀ gɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm tɑ. Wom kunɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cɛnɑ ndɑ wom kulu, ɑkpɛ yɑ ci ibeeri.
42009049	Cɔfɔ Yohɑnnɑ mɑ tu kɑ cii: A Jinɑ, i di bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hɔllɛ yom gɑɑrɛ ndɑ n mɑɑ. I bine hungu ndɑ ɑ̀ sɛ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ si kɑ i gɑnɑ.
42009050	Yesu bine cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Wɑ si hungu ndɑ ɑ̀ sɛ, zɑmɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si gɑɑbɑ ndɑ i yom, i sɛ no ɑ̀ goono.
42009051	À kɑɑ tɔ lɔkɑci bɑ tɔ kɑ ǹ mɑ Yesu sombu bɛɛnɛ. Lɔkɑci ngɑ di Yesu nɑ ngɑ bumbum guuri zɑɑ ngɑ mɑ kpei Yerusɑlɛm.
42009052	À jinɑ kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom sɑmbɑ. Kɑ ǹ go kpei ǹ huro Sɑmɑriɑncɛ yom kpɑɑrɑ fɔ kunɑ kɑ zumbuyom dɔ hinsɑ ɑ̀ sɛ.
42009053	Ammɑ kpɑɑrɑ di beerem mɑnɑ Yesu tɑ zɑmɑ ǹ bei Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ no ɑ̀ nɑ guuri zɑɑ ngɑ mɑ kpei.
42009054	Kɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom di yɑ di, Yɑkɔfu ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ cii: Kpe, n bɑɑ i mɑ cii nini mɑ zumbu zɑ bɛɛnɛ kɑ ǹ ŋmɑɑ bɑ, zɑngɑ Eli tɛ?
42009055	Ammɑ Yesu bɛrɛ coobɑɑbɑize yom di dɔ hɛrɛ kɑ ǹ kɔnkɔm. A cii: Wom si bei biyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dimi no wom bɑrɑ.
42009056	Hɛɛ Adɑmize, yɑ nɑ kɑɑ kɑ iburɑdɑm yom hundi yom hɑlɑci ɑmmɑ kɑ ǹ fɑɑbɑ. À gɑɑ no ǹ kpei kpɑɑrɑ ŋmɑni fɔ kunɑ.
42009057	À kɑɑ tɔ kɑ ǹ go kpei fɔndɔ bɔm, bɔrɔ fɔ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe, ɑ gɑ n gɑnɑ nungu kɑ n go kpei kulu.
42009058	Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kɑɑbi yom gundɑ guusu yom. Bɛɛnɛ ciro yom mo gundɑ gɔrɛ dɔ. Ammɑ hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ sindɑ nungu kɑ ɑ mɑ ɑ bɔm dɛcɛ.
42009059	Yesu cii ɑfɔ mɑ sɛ: A gɑnɑ. Ammɑ ngɑ mɑ cii: Kpe, tu ɑ sɛ jinɑ yɑ kpei kɑ ɑ bɑɑbɑ fiji.
42009060	Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Nɑm bukɔ yom mɑ ngei bukɔ yom fiji. Ammɑ ni wɔ, n mɑ kpei kɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ bɑɑru fɛɛ.
42009061	Afɔ mɑ cii: A gɑ n gɑnɑ Kpe, ɑmmɑ n mɑ tu ɑ sɛ jinɑ yɑ beerem kɑ ǹ goono ɑ fuu kunɑ too.
42009062	Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ hɑukumbu gɑɑ kɑ zogu kɑ bɑndɑ gunɑ, ɑkpɛ si tɔ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ sɛ.
42010001	Nge yom di bɑndɑ, Kpe nɑ bɔrɔ weiye suubɑ kpɛɛnɛ. À nɑ ǹ dɔntɔm ngɑ jine. À nɑ ǹ dɔntɔm ihinkɑ hinkɑ wɑngɑrɑ yom kulu kunɑ ndɑ nungu yom kulu kɑ ngɑ bumbum bɑ kɑɑ.
42010002	À cii ǹ sɛ: Fɑri wiyom bɑ gumo ɑmmɑ gbeiteeri yom si bɑ. Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ Hemɑrukpɛ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ ngɑ gbeiteeri yom sɑmbɑ ngɑ hemɑru kunɑ.
42010003	Wɑ kpei. Gunɑ, ɑ gɑ wom dɔntɔm nɑ zɑngɑ feejiize yom sɑgɑli yom bindi bindi.
42010004	Wom mɑ si bɑ zɑlifɔntɔ zɑɑ, bɑ fɔɔlɔ, bɑ tɑɑmu yom. Fɔndɔ bɔm mo wom mɑ si bɔrɔ fɔ kulu fɔɔ.
42010005	Ammɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ wom hurɑ wom mɑ cii: Bɑɑni mɑ gɔrɔ hundi wɔ kunɑ.
42010006	De bɑɑniize fɔ goono nungu di wom bɑɑni di kɑɑ zumbu ɑ̀ gɑɑ. De ɑ̀ nɑ ci yɑ mɑ, wom bɑɑni mɑ ye wom gɑɑ.
42010007	Wɑ gɔrɔ hundi fɔlɔnku kunɑ kɑ ŋmɑɑ kɑ hɑm hɛ kulu kɑ hundi di bɔrɔ yom nɑ wom no. Gbeiteeri himɑ ɑ̀ mɑ du ngɑ bɑnɑndi. Wom mɑ si hundi hundi tɛ.
42010008	Kpɑɑrɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ wom hurɑ mɑ, de beerem go wom tɑ, wom mɑ ŋmɑɑ bɛ kɑ ǹ kɑɑndɑ wom sɛ.
42010009	Wom mɑ doorikom yom kɑ ǹ goono no bɑɑni. Wom mɑ cii ǹ sɛ: Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ mɑɑni wom gɑɑ.
42010010	Ammɑ kpɑɑrɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ wom huro, de beerem si wom tɑ, wom mɑ kpei ɑ̀ sɔɔrɔ yom bɔm.
42010011	Wom mɑ cii: Bɑ wom kpɑɑrɑ kuso kɑ ɑ̀ dɑɑbu i cee yom gɑɑ, i go kɑ ɑ̀ kɔkɔbɛ wom gɑɑ, zɑngɑ i cee si, i kɑmbɛ si. Ammɑ wom mɑ wɔne bei mɑ, Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ mɑɑni wom gɑɑ.
42010012	A gɑ cii wom sɛ, hɑnu ngɑ di Sodum kpɑɑrɑ ciiti tɛ dɑɑmɑ kɑ bisɑ kpɑɑrɑ ngɑ di ŋmɔne.
42010013	Kɑito ni, Kɔlɑzim kpɑɑrɑ. Kɑito ni, Betɑsɑidɑ kpɑɑrɑ. Dɑbɑri gbei yom kɑ ǹ tɛ wom kunɑ, de ǹ nɑ ǹ tɛ Tiru wɑngɑrɑ ndɑ Sidom wɑngɑrɑ, dɑm ɑ̀ si jɛ ǹ mɑ tuubi kɑ soojiine dɑm kɑ gɔrɔ boosu kunɑ.
42010014	Ammɑ ciiti hɑnu bine Tiru ndɑ Sidom ciiti tɛ dɑɑmɑ kɑ bisɑ wom.
42010015	Ni mɑ Kɑpɛnɑum kpɑɑrɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ n bɛɛrɑndi hɑli bɛɛnɛ, ǹ gɑ n cɛnɑndi hɑli ciyomɑ.
42010016	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hɑngɑ dɑm wom sɛ, ɑ̀ go hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ sɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hungu wom, ɑ̀ go hungu hɛɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hungu hɛɛ, ɑ̀ go hungu wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm.
42010017	Bɔrɔ weiye di ye kɑ kɑɑ ndɑ binekɑɑne kɑ cii: Kpe, bɑ hɔllɛ yom bumbum nɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ i sɛ n mɑɑ gɑɑ.
42010018	Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: A di Setɑm go kɑm zɑ bɛɛnɛ zɑngɑ bɛɛnɛ nyɑlɑu.
42010019	Gunɑ, ɑ nɑ wom no hini wom mɑ gondi yom ndɑ dem yom tɑɑmu. Wom mɑ hini Ibɛrɛ, ɑ̀ dɑbɑri kulu bɔm. Hɛ fɔ kulu si wom mɛrɛ.
42010020	Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu wom mɑ si fɑihɑ̀ ndɑ kɑ hɔllɛ yom gɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ wom sɛ, ɑmmɑ wom mɑ fɑihã zɑmɑ ǹ nɑ wom mɑɑ yom hɑntum bɛɛnɛ kunɑ.
42010021	Lɔkɑci ngɑ di kunɑ Yesu fɑihã Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ. À cii: E Bɑɑbɑ, ɑ gɑ kɑ n sɑɑbu, ni kɑ n ci bɛɛnɛ ndɑ gɑndɑ Kpe. N nɑ hɛ yom wɔ tugu hɑikusu yom ndɑ fɑhɑmkpɛ yom sɛ. N nɑ ǹ kɑɑtɛrɛ kɑɑ cɛnɑ yom sɛ. Oò Bɑɑbɑ, ngɑ di yɑ kɑɑni n sɛ.
42010022	A Bɑɑbɑ yɑ nɑ bɛ kulu dɑm ɑ kɑmbɛ. Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu si bei mee yɑ ci Ize kɑlɑ de Bɑɑbɑ. Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu si bei mee yɑ ci Bɑɑbɑ kɑlɑ de Ize ndɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ go bɑɑ yɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ.
42010023	Yesu bɛrɛ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom dɔ hɛrɛ kɑmbu kɑ cii ǹ sɛ: Binekɑɑnekpɛ yom yɑ ci beerem kɑ ǹ moo yom go di bɛ kɑ wom gɑ di.
42010024	A go cii wom sɛ ɑndebi boobo ndɑ hɑndunyɑ kpe bɑɑbɑ gɑ bɑɑ ngei mɑ di bɛ yom kɑ wom go di wɔ, ǹ bine mɑnɑ di ei. Ǹ go bɑɑ mɑ ngei mɑ mɑɑ hɛ yom ko wom go mɑɑ wɔ, ǹ bine mɑnɑ mɑɑ rei.
42010025	Cɔfɔ Moisi fɔndɑ beikɔ fɔ tunu kɑ ɑ̀ sui. A cii: Coobɑɑbɑ, ifɔ nɑ yɑ tɛ kɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni tubu dɑ?
42010026	Yesu bine cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ifɔ no ǹ hɑntum Moisi fɔndɑ tirɑ kunɑ? Ifɔ nɑ n gɑ coo?
42010027	A tu kɑ cii: "N mɑ bɑɑ n Kpe, n ŋmɔne Ikpɛ ndɑ n bine kulu ndɑ n hundi kulu ndɑ n gɑɑbi kulu ndɑ n lɑsɑbu kulu. N mɑ bɑɑ n gɔrɔkɑsine mo zɑngɑ n bɔm."
42010028	Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N tuyom boori. N mɑ tɛ yɑ di, n kɑɑ hunɑ.
42010029	Ammɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ ngɑ bɔm cɛɑndi susu, ɑ̀ cii Yesu sɛ: Mee yɑ ci ɑ gɔrɔkɑsine?
42010030	Yesu tu kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ fɔ zumbu zɑ Yerusɑlɛm kɑ kpei Yeriko. À kɑm zee futu yom kɑmbɛ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ kɔnu kɑ ɑ̀ mɛrɛ mɛrɛ. Ǹ bisɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑm. À si bukɔ, ɑ̀ si bɑhunɑ.
42010031	Yɑɑliyom gɑɑ bine, gɑrɑndikɔ fɔ mo nɑ fɔndɑ gɑnɑ kɑ zuli. Kɑ ɑ̀ di bɔrɔ di cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cɛsu kɑ bisɑ.
42010032	Lefi bɔrɔ fɔ mɑ tɔ nodi. Kɑ ɑ̀ di ɑ̀, ngɑ mo cɛsu kɑ bisɑ.
42010033	Ammɑ Sɑmɑriɑncɛ fɔ nɑ fɔndɔ di gɑnɑ kɑ tɔ ɑ̀ dɔ. Kɑ ɑ̀ di ɑ̀, cɔfɔ sisibi nɑ ɑ̀ dii kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
42010034	À mɑɑni kɑ jii ndɑ dufɛ̃ dɑm nungu yom kɑ ɑ̀ mɛrɛ gɑɑ kɑ ǹ didiji. À nɑ ɑ̀ dɛcɛ ngɑ memunu bɔm kɑ kpeindɑ yɑ yom zumbuyom dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɑjo.
42010035	Mo bo, ɑ̀ nɑ dinɑri wɔkɔkɔize hinkɑ kɑɑ kɑ no fuukpɛ di sɛ. À cii: N mɑ ɑ̀ sɑjo. Hɛ kulu kɑ n gɑ wi, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ bɑnɑ n sɛ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ ye kɑ kɑɑ.
42010036	Bɔrɔ hinzɑ wɔ kunɑ, mee no n go tɑmmɑ ngɑ yɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑm zee yom di kɑmbɛ gɔrɔkɑsine?
42010037	Moisi fɔndɑ beikɔ di tu kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ di kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ suuji tɛ. Cɔfɔ Yesu cii ɑ sɛ: Kpei, ni mo n mɑ tɛ yɑ di.
42010038	Ǹ goono fɔndɔ bɔm ko kpei. À kɑɑ tɔ Yesu huro kpɑɑrɑ fɔ kunɑ. Cɔfɔ weibɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Mɑɑtɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ kubeni ngɑ fuu kunɑ.
42010039	Mɑɑtɑ gundɑ cɛɛnɛ fɔ mɑ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Mɑriɑmɑ.A gɑ gɔrɔ gɑndɑ Yesu jine kɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ̀ sendɑ sɛ.
42010040	Ammɑ Mɑɑtɑ wɔ fuu kunɑ gbei ŋmɑni ŋmɑni yɑ nɑ ɑ̀ lɑɑkɑli zɑɑ. Mɑɑtɑ bine kɑɑ Yesu dɔ kɑ cii: Kpe, n bɑ si bɑ ndɑ kɑ ɑ cɛɛnɛ wɔ nɑ ɑ nɑm ɑ fɔlɔnku yɑ yɑrɛ tɛ? N mɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ, ɑ̀ mɑ ɑ gɑɑ.
42010041	Yesu bine tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Mɑɑtɑ, Mɑɑtɑ n gɑ kɑ n lɑɑkɑli tunɑndi kɑ kɑ n bɔm bitɑndi ndɑ hɛ bɑɑbɑ.
42010042	Ammɑ hɛ fɔlɔnku hinne yɑ ci tilɑsi. Mɑriɑmɑ bine nɑ ihinno suubɑ wɔ kɑ ǹ si ɑ̀ tɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
42011001	À kɑɑ tɔ Yesu goono nungu fɔ ko kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ beeni, ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe, n mɑ i cɛbɛ ɑduwɑ tɛyom zɑngɑ Yohɑnnɑ nɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom cɛbɛ.
42011002	Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Sɑɑ kɑ wom gɑ kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ, wom mɑ cii: I Bɑɑbɑ, ni kɑ n goono bɛɛnɛ, n mɑɑ mɑ ci hɑlɑɑlɑ. N kpetɛrɛ mɑ kɑɑ. N binebɑɑ mɑ tɛ hɑndunyɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ go tɛ bɛɛnɛ.
42011003	N mɑ i no i ŋmɑɑri mɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bo.
42011004	N mɑ i yɑɑfɑ ndɑ i dulum yom zɑmɑ i yom mo bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ tɑɑli tɛ i sɛ, i gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ yɑɑfɑ. N mɑ si kpeindɑ i yom suiyom dɔ ɑmmɑ n mɑ i kɔm Ilɑlɔ kɑmbɛ.
42011005	À cii ǹ sɛ kpɛɛnɛ: Wom kunɑ, mee yɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ kpɑɑsi kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ kpei ɑ̀ dɔ ciini bindi. À kɑɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpɑɑsi, n mɑ ɑ gɑrɔ buuru hinzɑ.
42011006	A kpɑɑsi fɔ yɑ hunu zɑ nɑɑru kɑ kɑɑ ɑ dɔ, ŋmɑɑri fɔ mɑ kulu si ɑ sɛ.
42011007	Cɔfɔ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono fuu kunɑ di, ɑ̀ gɑ tu ngɑ kpɑɑsi di sɛ kɑ cii: N mɑ si ɑ tɑɑbɑndi. A nɑ ɑ fuu dɑɑbu kɔ. Hɛɛ ndɑ ɑ koo yom go kɑni. A si hini kɑ tunu kɑ ɑ̀ no n sɛ.
42011008	Yesu cii: A go cii wom sɛ ɑ̀ si tunu kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ sɛ bɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑ̀ kpɑɑsi. Kɑnkɑmi di sɑbu sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ tunu kɑ ɑ̀ no bɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ bɑɑ.
42011009	Hɛɛ wɔ ɑ̀ go cii wom sɛ: Wo ŋmɑɑrɛ, ǹ kɑɑ wom nɑ. Wo ceeci, wom kɑɑ du. Wɑ kobi, ǹ kɑɑ feeri wom sɛ.
42011010	Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go ŋmɑɑrɛ, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ no. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go ceeci mo, ɑ kɑɑ du. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kobi mo, ǹ kɑɑ feeri ɑ̀ se.
42011011	Wom kunɑ, bɑɑbɑ fɔ yɑ gɑ ngɑ koo no tondi de ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ buuru? Wɑlɑ de ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ ciifi ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ no gondi?
42011012	De koo di nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ gunguri ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ no dem?
42011013	Bine, wom kɑ wom ci bɔrɔ lɑlɔ yom, wom ŋmɑɑni kɑ hɛ hinno no wom koo yom sɛ. Yɑ mo no wom Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ, beerem kɑ ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ, ɑ̀ gɑ ǹ no ndɑ.
42011014	Yesu go hɔllɛ bɛbɛ fɔ gɑɑrɛ. À kɑɑ tɔ, sɑɑ kɑ hɔllɛ di gɑ hunu, bɛbɛ di go sendi. Jɑmɑ di mɑmɑci ndɑ.
42011015	Ammɑ ǹ kunɑ ɑfɔ yom cii Bezɑbulɑ hɔllɛ yom kpe nɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hɔllɛ yom gɑɑrɛ ndɑ.
42011016	Afɔ yom mo, kɑ ɑ̀ bubure sɛ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hã bɛɛnɛ ɑlɑmu.
42011017	Ammɑ ngɑ wɔ, zɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ǹ lɑsɑbu yom bei, ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Kpetɛrɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ ngɑ bɔm kɑ fee ihinkɑ, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ hɑlɑci. Fuu mɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ ngɑ bɔm, fuu di kɑm no.
42011018	De bine Setɑm mɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ ngɑ bɔm, mɛtɛ nɑ ɑ̀ kpetɛrɛ tɛ kɑ cɛ? Wom go cii ndɑ Bezɑbulɑ dɑbɑri no ɑ gɑ hɔllɛ yom gɑɑrɛ.
42011019	Ammɑ hɛɛ wɔ, de Bezɑbulɑ dɑbɑri nɑ ɑ go hɔllɛ yom gɑɑrɛ ndɑ, wom ŋmɔne ize yom wɔ hɛ fɔ no ǹ gɑ kɑ ǹ gɑɑrɛ ndɑ? À sɛ no, ǹ kɑɑ tɛ wom ciitikɔ yom.
42011020	Ammɑ de Ikpɛ kɑmbeize dɑbɑri gɑɑ no ɑ gɑ hɔllɛ yom gɑɑrɛ, siikɑ si Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ tɔ wom dɔ.
42011021	Sɑɑ kɑ bɑliji nɑ wɑngu sɔlu kɑ kɑ ngɑ hundi bɑtu, ɑ̀ hɑibɑrikɑ yom gundɑ kpɛsɛrɛ.
42011022	Ammɑ kɑ bɑliji fɔ kɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑbi ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ zeeri kɑ ɑ̀ wɑngu jiinei kɑɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ, wɑngu jiinei kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ ǹ kɑɑbɑ tɛ. Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ kuu kɑ ɑ̀ kulu fɑrisi.
42011023	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si ɑ bɑndɑ, ɑkpɛ gɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ hɛɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si meigu ndɑ hɛɛ mo, ɑkpɛ yɑ seekɔ nɑ.
42011024	Sɑɑ kɑ hɔllɛ hunu bɔrɔ fɔ bɑndɑ, nungu kɔgɔ yom nɑ ɑ̀ go dirɑ ko hulonzom dɔ ceeci, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ si du ɑ̀. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ go cii: A fuu kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ɑ hunu no, ɑ kɑɑ ye.
42011025	Sɑɑ kɑ hɔllɛ di ye fuu di kunɑ ɑ̀ gɑ gɑru ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɑɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ booriɑndi.
42011026	À bine kpei hɔllɛ iye kpɛɛnɛ zɑɑ ngɑ bɑndɑ. Ngei wɔ hɑnyɑ fute bisɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɔne. Ǹ kɑɑ huro kɑ gɔrɔ nodi. Bɔrɔ ngɑ di kɔkɔrɑ jɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ sintine goonoyom.
42011027	À kɑɑ tɔ kɑ Yesu gɑ sendi nge yom di tɛ, weibɔrɔ fɔ jɑmɑ di bindi bindi nɑ jinde zɑɑ kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Binekɑɑnekpɛ yɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gunde nɑ n jɛrɛ ndɑ fɑfɑ kɑ n nɑni.
42011028	Yesu bine cii: Awo. Binekɑɑnekpɛ yom yɑ ci beerem kɑ ǹ go hɑngɑ dɑm Ikpɛ sendi sɛ ko kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ.
42011029	Sɑɑ kɑ jɑmɑ go meigu ko Yesu kɑnkɑm, ɑ̀ sinti kɑ cii: Zɑmɑni wɔ bɔrɔ lɑlɔ yom, ǹ gɑ kɑ ɑlɑmu hã. Ikpɛ bine si zɑmɑni wɔ no ɑlɑmu ŋmɑni fɔ kɑlɑ ɑndebi Yonɑsi ɑlɑmu.
42011030	Zɑngɑ Yɑnɑsi ci Ninife bɔrɔ yom sɛ ɑlɑmu, yɑ nɑ hɛɛ mo Adɑmize, ɑ tɛ zɑmɑni wɔ sɛ ɑlɑmu.
42011031	Weenukɑne sɛ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ hɛrɛ weibɔrɔ gɑndɑkpɛ fɔ kɑɑ tunu ciiti hɑnu hine ndɑ zɑmɑni wɔ bɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ ciiti kɑ zeeri. Zɑ hɑndunyɑ mee yom no ɑ̀ kɑɑ mɑɑ Sɑlomɔ hɑikusutɛrɛ. Gunɑ, bɔrɔ fɔ gɑ, kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ Sɑlomɔ.
42011032	Ninife bɔrɔ yom kɑɑ tunu ciiti hɑnu hine ndɑ zɑmɑni wɔ bɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ ciiti kɑ zeeri zɑmɑ ǹ tuubi Yɑnɑsi bɑɑru fɛɛyom gɑɑ. Gunɑ, Bɔrɔ fɔ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ Yɑnɑsi.
42011033	Bɔrɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ fitilɑ diiɑndi kɑ ɑ̀ tugu, wɑlɑ kɑ gɑɑsu gum ɑ̀ bɔm. Ammɑ fitilɑ dɛcɛyom dɔ no ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ jisi hɑli beerem kɑ ǹ go huro, ǹ mɑ du kɑ di ɑ̀ kɑɑri.
42011034	Moo goono no zɑngɑ fitilɑ gɑɑhɑm gɑɑ. Ngɑ di sɛ de n moo go boori, n gɑɑhɑm mɑ kulu tɔ ndɑ kɑɑri noyɑ. Ammɑ de n mɑɑ ci ilɑlɔ, n gɑɑhɑm mɑ tɔ ndɑ kube noyɑ.
42011035	Ngɑ di sɛ, n mɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑɑri kɑ ɑ̀ goono n kunɑ ɑ̀ mɑ si tɛ kube.
42011036	Bine, de n gɑɑhɑm sukutum kulu tɔ ndɑ kɑɑri kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ kube bɑ nungu fɔ, ɑ̀ kulu hɑɑgɑ zɑngɑ sɑɑ kɑ fitilɑ gɑ kɑ n nɑ ngɑ kɑɑri gɑɑ.
42011037	Kɑ Yesu gɑ sendi Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ ɑ̀ mɑ zɑɑri ŋmɑɑri ŋmɑɑ ngɑ kpɑɑrɑ. Yesu hurɑ kɑ gɔrɔ ŋmɑɑrɑ dɔ.
42011038	Kɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ di Yesu mɑnɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ yom nyunu jinɑ ɑlɑɑdɑ bɔm kɑ du kɑ ŋmɑɑ, mɑmɑci nɑ ɑ̀ dii.
42011039	Ammɑ Kpe cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Wom wɔ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom, gulɑize bɑndɑ ndɑ combu bɑndɑ nɑ, wom gɑ nyunu. Ammɑ kunɑ kunɑ wom tɔ ndɑ zeetɛrɛ guuri ndɑ hɑnyɑ fute.
42011040	Sɑmu yom, wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ bɑndɑ tɛ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ kunɑ mɑ tɛ nɑ?
42011041	Ammɑ bɛ kɑ ɑ̀ goono wom sɛ, wom mɑ ɑ̀ sɑrɑɑ. Ngɑ di gɑɑ, hɛ yom kulu hinne wom sɛ.
42011042	Ammɑ kɑito wom, Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom zɑmɑ wom gɑ tuuri kɑmisikpɛ zɑkɑ kɑɑ ndɑ gɑnji tuuri ndɑ feekɔsu kulu. Wom bine gɑ sɑɑle kɑɑ ciiti ndɑ Ikpɛ bɑɑkɑsine gɑɑ. Nge yom yɑ himɑ wom mɑ tɛ dɑm, ɑmmɑ wom mɑ si zɑkɑ di mɑ nɑm.
42011043	Kɑito wom, Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom, zɑmɑ jine gɔrɛ dɔ bɛɛrɛkpɛ nɑ wom gɑ bɑɑ Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu yom kunɑ. Wom go bɑɑ jɑmɑ mɑ wom fɔɔ bɑtumɑ kunɑ.
42011044	Kɑito wom, Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom, zɑmɑ wom goono no zɑngɑ sɑɑrɛ mɛnɑntɛ yom. Beerem go dirɑ ǹ bɔm, ǹ si bei.
42011045	Cɔfɔ Moisi fɔndɑ beikɔ fɔ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Coobɑɑbɑ, hɛ yom wɔ ciiyom gɑɑ n go kɑ i woo no.
42011046	Yesu bine cii: Kɑito wom mo Moisi fɔndɑ beikɔ yom. Wom go beerem jɛɛjɛ jɛrɔ beeri ɑmmɑ wom wɔ, bɑ wom kɑmbeize fɔ si lɑmbɑ jɛrɔ yom gɑɑ.
42011047	Kɑito wom, zɑmɑ wom go ɑndebi yom sɑɑrɛ yom cini, nge yom kɑ wom cɛɛ yom wi.
42011048	Sɛdɑ no wom go tɛ yɑ. Wom go tu mo wom cɛɛ yom gbei gɑɑ zɑmɑ ngei wɔ nɑ ɑndebi yom wi. Wom mo, wom go kɑ ǹ sɑɑrɛ yom cini.
42011049	À sɛ no Ikpɛ hɑikusutɛrɛ mo cii: A kɑɑ ɑndebi yom ndɑ diyɑ yom dɔntɔm ǹ dɔ. Ǹ gɑ ɑfɔ yom wi, ǹ gɑ ɑfɔ yom mo guruguzɑndi.
42011050	Andebi yom kulu kɑ ǹ kuri munu, zɑ hɑndunyɑ sinjiyom, ɑ̀ bɑnɑndi mɑ kɑm zɑmɑni wɔne ize yom bɔm.
42011051	Kuri wɔ hunu zɑ Abɛli kɑlɑ Zɑkɑri kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ wi gɑrɑndi bɑndɑ tɑndɑ dɔ ndɑ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ gɑme. Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, zɑmɑni wɔne ize yom, ǹ kuri bɑnɑndi kɑɑ kɑm wom bɔm.
42011052	Kɑito wom, Moisi fɔndɑ beikɔ yom zɑmɑ wom nɑ beire lɑntɑnɑize zɑɑ. Wom bumbum mɑnɑ huro. Beerem mo kɑ ǹ bɑ hurɑ, wom nɑ ǹ gɑnji.
42011053	Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu go hɛ nge yom di cii ǹ sɛ no, Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom, ǹ bine sinti kɑ tɔ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. Ǹ sinti kɑ ɑ̀ mee hã hɛ boobo bɔm.
42011054	Ǹ go tɛ zɑngɑ kuse ɑ̀ sɛ. Ǹ gɑ ceeci ngei mɑ ɑ̀ dii ndɑ sendi kɑ ɑ̀ hunu ɑ̀ mee hɑli ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑ.
42012001	Sɑɑ di no jɑmɑ bɑkɑrɑ gɑ meigu kɑlɑ ǹ go cɛrɛ tɑɑmu. Yesu sinti kɑ cii ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ jinɑ: Wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom buuru kɑsɑmi kɑ ɑ̀ ci munɑficitɛrɛ.
42012002	Hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono tugɑntɛ ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ. Hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono dɑɑbɑntɛ ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ feeri.
42012003	À sɛ no, bɛ kulu kɑ wom cii kube kunɑ, ǹ kɑɑ mɑɑ ngɑ di kɑɑri kunɑ. Hɛ kɑ wom ciine hɑngɑ kunɑ mo fuu kunɑ, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ fɛɛ fuu yom yɔlɔ yom bɔm.
42012004	Ammɑ ɑ go cii wom sɛ ɑ kpɑɑsi yom, wɑ si hɑmburu gɑɑhɑm wikɔ yom. Gɑɑhɑm wiyom di bɑndɑ ǹ si hini kɑ hɛ fɔ kulu tɛ kpɛɛnɛ.
42012005	Ammɑ ɑ wom kɑɑbɑɑru, wɔ kɑ wom mɑ hɑmburu. Wom mɑ hɑmburu wɔ kɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ wi, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ dɑbɑri kɑ wom cetu nini kunɑ, nungu kɑ ǹ go bɑnyɑ futu yom bɔnɑndi. Cimi nɑ ɑ gɑ cii wom sɛ, wom mɑ hɑmburu ngɑ.
42012006	Ǹ cini bulɑngɑ ciro gu neerɑ dɑlɑ hinkɑ. À nɑ ci cimi nɑ bɑ? Ammɑ ǹ kunɑ bɑ ɑfɔ si kɑ Ikpɛ dinigɑ.
42012007	Wom wɔ, bɑ wom bɔm hɑmini, ǹ nɑ ǹ kulu kɑbu. Ngɑ di sɛ wom mɑ si hɑmburu. Wom bisɑ bulɑngɑ ciro bɑɑbɑ.
42012008	Ammɑ ɑ go cii wom sɛ, bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go cii ngɑ yɑ ɑ ŋmɔne nɑ iburɑdɑm yom jine, hɛɛ Adɑmize mo, ɑ kɑɑ cii ɑkpɛ yɑ ɑ ŋmɔne no Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom jine.
42012009	Ammɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ ze iburɑdɑm yom jine, ɑ gɑ ɑkpɛ ze Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom jine.
42012010	Bɔrɔ kulu mo kɑ ɑ̀ go sendi kɑ hungu hɛɛ Adɑmize, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ yɑɑfɑ ndɑ. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ sendi yɑmu kɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ cɛnɑndi, ǹ si ɑ̀ yɑɑfɑ ndɑ pɑi.
42012011	Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ kɑɑndɑ wom Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu yom jine ndɑ gɑɑbikoni yom jine ndɑ hinikpɛ yom jine, wom mɑ si dirigo ndɑ zɑngɑ wom kɑɑ tu kɑ yeti wɑlɑ ndɑ hɛ kɑ wom kɑɑ cii.
42012012	Lɔkɑci di bumbum kunɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kɑɑ wom cɛbɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ himɑ wom mɑ cii.
42012013	Cɔfɔ jɑmɑ di bindi kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Coobɑɑbɑ, cii ɑ bɛɛrɛ sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ tubu fɑrisi ndɑ hɛɛ.
42012014	Ammɑ Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: E bɔrɔ kpɛ, mee yɑ nɑ ɑ jisi yɑ tɛ wom ciitikɔ kɑ wom fɑrisime yom tɛ wom sɛ?
42012015	Yesu cii ǹ sɛ mo: Wɑ lɑɑkɑli. Wɑ fee ndɑ bɑɑyom futu zɑmɑ bɔrɔ hundi si kɔrɔgɔ ɑ̀ hɑibɑrikɑ bɑyom gɑɑ.
42012016	À nɑ yɑɑse wɔne mo tɛ ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Hɑibɑrikɑntɛ fɔ fɑri yom kɑɑndɑ ɑ̀ sɛ liibɑ boobo.
42012017	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ sendi ngɑ bine kunɑ kɑ cii: Ifɔ yɑ tɛ? A sindɑ nungu kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ɑ mɑ ɑ fɑri bɑrikɑ kulu wɔ meigu.
42012018	À bine cii: To. Wɔne no ɑ tɛ. A gɑ ɑ boo yom bɔgu no kɑ ibeeri beeri yom cini. Ǹ kunɑ no ɑ gɑ ɑ fɑri bɑrikɑ kulu ndɑ ɑ hɑibɑrikɑ meigu.
42012019	Sɑɑ di gɑɑ, yɑ cii ɑ bɔm sɛ, ɑ hundi hɑibɑrikɑ boobo goono ɑ sɛ jisɑntɛ jiiri boobo ŋmɔne. Yɑ hulonzom. Yɑ ŋmɑɑ. Yɑ hɑm. Yɑ fɑihã.
42012020	Ammɑ Ikpɛ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Sɑmu, ciini wɔ ǹ gɑ n hundi zɑɑ. Hɛ yom di kɑ n sɔlu, mee sɛ no ǹ kɑɑ goono?
42012021	Zɑngɑ ɑ̀ bɑrɑ noyɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hɑibɑrikɑ meigu ngɑ bɔm sɛ, Ikpɛ jine no ɑkpɛ si ci hɑibɑrikɑntɛ.
42012022	Cɔfɔ Yesu cii ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ: A sɛ no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, wɑ si kɑrihã wom hundi yom sɛ ndɑ hɛ kɑ wom kɑɑ ŋmɑɑ wɑlɑ wom gɑɑhɑm yom sɛ ndɑ hɛ kɑ wom dɑm.
42012023	Hundi bisɑ ŋmɑɑri. Gɑɑhɑm mo bisɑ jiine kɑ dɑm.
42012024	Wom mɑ gɑɑrugɑɑru yom gunɑ. Ǹ si dumɑ. Ǹ si wi. Ǹ bine sindɑ jisiri, ǹ sindɑ boo. Ikpɛ bine go kɑ ǹ ŋmɑɑrɑndi. Hɑli yɑ mɑ wom, wom kɑ wom bɛɛrɛ bisɑ ciro.
42012025	Wom kunɑ mee no ɑ̀ kɑrihã kunɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ kɑmbɛ kɑru fɔ tɔntɔnu ngɑ kuyom gɑɑ?
42012026	Ngɑ di sɛ, zɑ kɑ wom si hini bɑ hɛ fɔ pitici, ifɔ sɛ wom go kɑrihã ndɑ cindɑ?
42012027	Wom mɑ gunɑ zɑngɑ boosi yom go beeri. Ǹ si gbei tɛ. Ǹ si silli tɛ. Ammɑ ɑ go cii wom sɛ bɑ Sɑlomɔ ɑ̀ deizɑ kulu kunɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ tɑɑlɑm zɑngɑ ǹ kunɑ ɑfɔ.
42012028	Ammɑ Ikpɛ go subu tɑɑlɑm zɑngɑ yɑ di, subu kɑ ɑ̀ goono gɑnji kunɑ hunkunɑ kɑ subɑ ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ tɔnu. Hɑli yɑ mɑ wom nɑɑne cɛnɑkpɛ yom ɑ̀ si kɑɑ jiine dɑm wom gɑɑ no?
42012029	Wom wɔ, wom mɑ si ceeci hɛ kɑ wom mɑ ŋmɑɑ wɑlɑ hɛ kɑ wom mɑ hɑm. Wom mɑ si kɑrihã ndɑ.
42012030	Hɛ nge yom di kulu no hɑndunyɑ dimi kulu gɑ ceeci. Wom Bɑɑbɑ bine bei wom gundɑ hɛ nge yom di murɑdu.
42012031	Ammɑ wom mɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ ceeci. Ikpɛ kɑɑ hɛ nge yom di kulu tɔntɔnu wom sɛ.
42012032	Kuru cɛnɑ, n mɑ si hɑmburu zɑmɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑni wom Bɑɑbɑ sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ wom nɑ kpetɛrɛ.
42012033	Wɑ hɛ kɑ wom gundɑ neerɑ kɑ sɑrɑɑ. Wom mɑ zɑlifɔntɔ yom tɛ wom bɔm sɛ kɑ ǹ si zeeni, hɑizici no bɛɛnɛ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ si zobu. Bɛɛnɛ kunɑ no ǹ goono, nungu kɑ zee si mɑɑni. Nɑnɑbɑnu mo si ɑ̀ sɑrɑ.
42012034	Nungu kɑ wom hɑizici goono, nungu di no wom bine mo goono.
42012035	Wom kunɑcendi yom mɑ goono wom cɛntɛ yom gɑɑ. Wom fitilɑ yom mo dii.
42012036	Wom bumbum mo, wom mɑ himɑ bɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ ngei kpe bɑtu ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑ zɑ hije dɔ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ kɑɑ kɑɑ kobi, ǹ mɑ feeri ɑ̀ sɛ ndɑ wɑɑsi.
42012037	Binekɑɑnekpɛ yom yɑ ci tɑm yom kɑ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ kpeɑ kɑɑ, ɑ̀ gɑ ǹ gɑru ǹ gɑ bɑtu. Cimi nɑ ɑ gɑ cii wom sɛ, ɑ̀ gɑ ngɑ kunɑcendi hɔ kɑ tɑm yom gɔrɛndi ŋmɑɑri dɔ. À kɑɑ tɑmtɛrɛ ǹ sɛ.
42012038	Ciini bindi bɑtuyom hinkɑntɛ wɑlɑ bɑtuyom hinzɑntɛ gɑɑ, de ɑ̀ gɑ kɑɑ kɑ ǹ gɑru yɑ di, tɑm nge yom di yɑ ci binekɑɑnekpɛ yom.
42012039	Ammɑ wom mɑ wɔne bei, de hundikpɛ bei lɔkɑci kɑ zee kɑɑ, dɑm ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ bɑtu. À si nɑm ɑ̀ mɑ ngɑ fuu funu.
42012040	Ngɑ di sɛ wom mo, wɑ sɔlu. Lɔkɑci kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ wom si tɑmmɑ no hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ gɑ kɑɑ.
42012041	Cɔfɔ Piɛɛ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe, i sɛ no n go yɑɑse wɔ tɛ dee wɑlɑ ǹ kulu sɛ?
42012042	Kpe cii: Tɑ. Mee yɑ ci bɑndɑbɔrɔ nɑɑnekpɛ ndɑ lɑɑkɑlɑntɛ? Ngɑ no ɑ̀ kpe nɑ ɑ̀ jisi kɑ ngɑ tɑm yom kulu dɑm ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ ɑ̀ mɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ ŋmɑɑri lɔkɑci kɑ ɑ̀ himɑ.
42012043	Binekɑɑnekpɛ no tɑm ngɑ di kɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kpeɑ kɑɑ, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ gɑru ɑ̀ mo tɛ yɑ di.
42012044	Cimi no ɑ gɑ cii wom sɛ, ɑ̀ gɑ ngɑ hɑibɑrikɑ kulu dɑm ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ.
42012045	Ammɑ de tɑm wɔ go cii ngɑ bine kunɑ ɑ̀ kpe wɔ si kɑɑ tɑmbɑ, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ sinti kɑ bɑnyɑ yom di ndɑ kɔngɔ yom di kɑru. À gɑ ŋmɑɑ ko hɑm kɑ bugu.
42012046	Tɑm ngɑ di, ɑ̀ kpeɑ kɑɑ kɑɑ no hɑnu kɑ ɑ̀ si bɑtu, lɔkɑci kɑ ɑ̀ si bei. À kpeɑ gɑ ɑ̀ dumbu ihinkɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑ dɑm zɑm kɑ nɑɑne ize yom bɑndɑ.
42012047	Tɑm wɔ go kɑ ngɑ kpeɑ binebɑɑ bei ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ sɔlu. À mɑnɑ tɛ mo zɑngɑ kpeɑ binebɑɑ goono ndɑ. À gɑɑ no, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ bulɑɑlɑ ce boobo.
42012048	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ bei mo, kɑ ɑ̀ go bɛ yom tɛ kɑ ǹ tɔ goobu, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ bulɑɑlɑ, ɑ̀ ce si bɑ. Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ no iboobo, ǹ gɑ iboobo dɛcɛ ɑ̀ bɔm. Bɔrɔ kulu mo kɑ ǹ nɑ iboobo tɑlifi ɑ̀ gɑɑ, ǹ dɛcɛ ɑ̀ bɔm kɑ tɔntɔnu.
42012049	A kɑɑ no yɑ nini furu hɑndunyɑ bɔm. A bɑɑ yɑ ǹ jinɑ kɑ nini di funsu.
42012050	A gundɑ mirɑndiyom fɔ kɑ ǹ mɑ ɑ mirɑndi ndɑ. A goono kɑnkɑmi kunɑ mo hɑli ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ tɔnɑndi.
42012051	Wom mɑ si tɑmmɑ ɑ kɑɑ bɑɑni dɑm hɑndunyɑ bɔm no. A go cii wom sɛ, ɑ kɑɑ no kɑ feefee dɑm.
42012052	Zɑ mɑɑsɑ bɔrɔ gu kɑ ǹ goono fuu fɔ, ǹ kɑɑ fee. Ihinzɑ kɑɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ ihinkɑ. Ihinkɑ kɑɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ ihinzɑ.
42012053	Bɑɑbɑ kɑɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ koo hɑibɔrɔ. Koo hɑibɔrɔ kɑɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ bɑɑbɑ. Nyɑ kɑɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ koo hundiyo. Koo hundiyo kɑɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ nyɑ. Kunye nyɑ kɑɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ ngɑ hɑnzure. Koo wɛndɛ kɑɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ ngɑ hɑnzure weibɔrɔ.
42012054	Yesu cii jɑmɑ di mɑ sɛ: Sɑɑ kɑ wom go di buru tunu weenukɑne, ndɑ wɑɑsi wom cini cii hɑri go kɑɑ. À kɑɑ mo.
42012055	Sɑɑ kɑ wom mɑɑ weenukɑne sɛ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ hɛrɛ hɛo go funsu wom cini cii, kɔndi kɑɑ tɛ. À tɛ mo.
42012056	Munɑfici yom, wom go gɑndɑ ndɑ bɛɛnɛ tɑkɑri yom bei kɑ kɑɑ cɛrɛ. Ifɔ sɛ no wom si hini kɑ lɔkɑci wɔ mo bei kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ cɛrɛ?
42012057	Ifɔ sɛ mo no wom bumbum, wom si ciiti ndɑ bɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ?
42012058	Sɑɑ kɑ n gɑ kpei ciitikɔ dɔ n zojikɑri bɑndɑ, fɔndɑ bɔm no n mɑ guruje kɑ n bɔm kɑɑ ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ. À mɑ si tɛ ɑ̀ mɑ du kɑ kpeindɑ ni ciitikɔ jine, ciitikɔɑ mɑ mɑ n dɑm dogɑri kɑmbɛ, dogɑri di mɑ n dɑm kɑsu.
42012059	A go cii n sɛ kɑ n si hunu nodi pɑi kɑlɑ de n nɑ ɑ̀ kulu bɑnɑ, bɑ tɑngɑ si cindi.
42013001	Lɔkɑci ngɑ di bɔrɔ fɔ yom goono nodi kɑ deede Yesu sɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ Gɑlile lɑɑbu bɔrɔ yom sɛ. Ǹ cii Pilɑtu dɑm ǹ mɑ ǹ wi kɑ ǹ kuri meigu ndɑ ǹ gɑrɑndi yom kuri.
42013002	Yesu bine tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wom tɑmmɑ Gɑlile bɔrɔ nge yom di ci dulumkoni yom kɑ bisɑ Gɑlile bɔrɔ kulu zɑmɑ ǹ tɑɑbi zɑngɑ yɑ di?
42013003	A go cii wom sɛ, ɑwo. Ammɑ de wom mɑnɑ tuubi, wom kulu kɑɑ hɑlɑci zɑngɑ yɑ di.
42013004	Wɑlɑ wom tɑmmɑ bɔrɔ wei cindi ɑhɑku wɔ kɑ ǹ bɔm Silowe jidɑmbisɑ kɑm kɑ ǹ wi, ngei yɑ ci dulumkoni yom kɑ bisɑ Yerusɑlɛm bɔrɔ kulu?
42013005	A go cii wom sɛ, ɑwo ɑmmɑ de wom mɑnɑ tuubi wom kulu kɑɑ hɑlɑci zɑngɑ yɑ.
42013006	Yesu nɑ yɑɑse wɔ mo tɛ kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ fɔ gundɑ jee nyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tilɑm ngɑ lɛzɛ̃ lɑmbu kunɑ. À bine kɑɑ kɑ ize ceeci ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Ammɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ du.
42013007	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii lɛzɛ̃ lɑmbu hɑrifɑrɑ sɛ: Gunɑ, jiiri hinzɑ noyɑ kɑ ɑ go kɑɑ kɑ ize ceeci jee nyɑ wɔ gɑɑ. A si du. N mɑ ɑ̀ dumbu. Ifɔ sɛ ɑ̀ goono gɑndɑ wɔ gɑɑ kɔnu bɔm?
42013008	Lɛzɛ̃ lɑmbu hɑrifɑrɑ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Kpe, ɑ̀ nɑm jinɑ jiiri wɔ, ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ fɑnsi kɑ hundi kɑ tɑɑci dɑm.
42013009	Hɑnibɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ hɛi. De ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɛi n mɑ ɑ̀ dumbu.
42013010	Hulonzom hɑnu fɔ hine nɑ Yesu gɑ cooɑndi Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ kunɑ.
42013011	Cɔfɔ weibɔrɔ fɔ goono nungu di kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ hɔllɛ. À gɑ weibɔrɔ di zɛnjɑndi ɑ̀ tɔ jiiri wei cindi ɑhɑku. À gɑɑhɑm goono kunkunɑntɛ. À si hini kɑ tunu ngɑ bɔm gɑɑ bɑ cɛnɑ.
42013012	Kɑ Yesu di ɑ̀, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Wei wɔ, ǹ nɑ n kɑɑ zɛnjɛ wɔ kunɑ.
42013013	Cɔfɔ Yesu nɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ yom dɛcɛ ɑ̀ bɔm. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ tunu kɑ sɛllɛ. À gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu.
42013014	Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu hɑikusu di bine tɔ ndɑ kɑ Yesu nɑ wei di nɑ bɑɑni hulonzom hɑnu hine. À cii jɑmɑ di sɛ: Jiribi idu goono ɑ̀ hɑlɑli bɔrɔ mɑ gbei tɛ. À sɛ nɑ hɑnu nge yom di wom mɑ kɑɑ kɑ du bɑɑni, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci hulɑnzom hɑnu hine.
42013015	Kpe mo tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Munɑfici yom, wom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ fɔ si cini kɑ ngɑ hɑu wɑlɑ ngɑ fɑrikɑ feeri tɑlɑlɑ dɔ kɑ kpeindɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hɑngɑndi hulɑnzom hɑnu hine bɑ?
42013016	Bɔrɔ wɔ bine kɑ ɑ̀ ci Abulɛmɑ koo weibɔrɔ kɑ Setɑm nɑ ɑ̀ hɔ ɑ̀ jiiri wei cindi ɑhɑku noyɑ, ɑ̀ himɑ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ hɔyom wɔ kunɑ hulonzom hɑnu hine. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
42013017	Kɑ Yesu nɑ sendi ngɑ di cii, hɑwi nɑ ɑ̀ zojikɑri yom kulu dii. Jɑmɑ kulu fɑihã ndɑ hɛ deizɑkpɛ yom kɑ Yesu gɑ tɛ.
42013018	Cɔfɔ Yesu cii: Ifɔ no Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ himɑ? Hɛ fɔ nɑ ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ himɑndi ndɑ?
42013019	À himɑ nɑ zɑngɑ mutɑru yɑzi dimi fɔ mogure kɑ bɔrɔ nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ kɑ dumɑ ngɑ lɑmbu kunɑ. À beeri kɑ tɛ tuuri nyɑ bɑmbɑtɑ. Bɛɛnɛ ciro yom go gɔrɔ ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ yom bɔm.
42013020	Yesu cii kpɛɛnɛ: Hɛ fɔ no ɑ gɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ himɑndi ndɑ?
42013021	À himɑ no zɑngɑ buuru kɑsɑmi kɑ weibɔrɔ zɑɑ kɑ dɑm buuru hɑmini zɑkɑ mee hinzɑ kunɑ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ kulu tunu.
42013022	Yesu nɑ ngɑ diro tɛ kɑ kpei Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ. Fɔndɔ di bɔm ɑ̀ nɑ wɑngɑrɑ yom ndɑ kpɑɑrɑ yom tɑɑru kɑ cooɑndi.
42013023	Cɔfɔ bɔrɔ fɔ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe, beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ du fɑɑbɑ, ǹ mɑnɑ bɑ nɑ?
42013024	Ammɑ Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wom mɑ guruje kɑ huro ndɑ mee kɑnkɑmɑntɛ. A gɑ cii wom sɛ, iboobo kɑɑ ceeci ngei mɑ huro, ɑmmɑ ǹ si hini.
42013025	Sɑɑ kɑ hundikpɛ tunu kɑ ngɑ gɑmbu dɑɑbu, wom mɑ wom goono tɛrɛ. Sɑɑ di nɑ wom sinti kɑ gɑmbuɑ kɑru kɑ cii: Kpe, Kpe feeri i sɛ. Ngɑ mɑ kɑɑ tu wom sɛ kɑ cii: A si wom bei. A si bei nungu kɑ ɑ̀ bɔrɔ yom nɑ wom.
42013026	À gɑɑ nɑ, wom bɑ cii: I ŋmɑɑ, i hɑm n jine. N cooɑndi mɑ i sɔɔrɔ yom bɔm.
42013027	Cɔfɔ hundikpɛɑ kɑɑ cii: A gɑ cii wom sɛ, ɑ si bei nungu kɑ ɑ̀ bɔrɔ yom nɑ wom. Wɑ gɑnɑ ɑ sɛ, wom kulu hɛ lɑlɔ gbeiteeri yom.
42013028	Wom kɑɑ hɛ̃. Wom kɑɑ hinje kɑɑmɑ mɑ sɑɑ kɑ wom kɑɑ di Abulɛmɑ ndɑ Isɑɑkɑ ndɑ Yɑkɔfu ndɑ ɑndebi yom kulu goono Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ kunɑ, ɑmmɑ tɛrɛ nɑ ǹ nɑ wom furu.
42013029	Beerem kɑɑ hunu weenuhune ndɑ weenukɑne ndɑ weenuhune sɛ kɑmbɛwo bɛrɛ ndɑ weenuhune sɛ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ bɛrɛ kɑ gɔrɔ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ kunɑ.
42013030	Gunɑ, kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ bɔrɔ yom goono kɑ ǹ kɑɑ ci sintine bɔrɔ yom. Sintine bɔrɔ yom mo goono kɑ ǹ kɑɑ ci kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ bɔrɔ yom.
42013031	Hɑnu ngɑ di mo Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ fɔ yom kɑɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N bɔm cendi kɑ hunu nee zɑmɑ Hirodu go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ n wi.
42013032	Yesu bine cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ kpei cii cɛmbɛrɛkpɛ di sɛ, gunɑ hunkunɑ ndɑ subɑ ɑ go hɔllɛ yom gɑɑrɛ. A go bɑɑni no. Jiribi hinzɑntɛ yɑ ɑ bɑtɑ tɔnɑndi.
42013033	Ammɑ kɑlɑ de hunkunɑ ndɑ subɑ ndɑ subɑsi mo yɑ dirɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ si himɑ ɑndebi mɑ bu kɑlɑ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ kunɑ.
42013034	E Yerusɑlɛm, Yerusɑlɛm, n gɑ ɑndebi yom wi. N gɑ beerem kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ dɔntɔm n dɔ cetu ndɑ tondi. Ce mɛrɛjɛ no ɑ bɑɑ yɑ n ŋmɔne ize yom meigu zɑngɑ gɔrɔngɔ nyɑ cini kɑ ngɑ ize yom meigu ngɑ fɑtɑ yom cire. Ammɑ wom mɑnɑ tu.
42013035	Gunɑ, ǹ kɑɑ wom fuu nɑm kɔnu. Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, wom si di hɛɛ pɑi kɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ tɔ wom mɑ cii: Bɑrikɑkpɛ no bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ Kpe mɑɑ gɑɑ.
42014001	A kɑɑ tɔ hulonzom hɑnu fɔ bine Yesu huro Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom hɑikusu yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ fuu kunɑ kɑ ŋmɑɑ. Ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ gunɑ gunɑ.
42014002	Cɔfɔ bɔrɔ fɔ goono ɑ̀ jine kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ yeeni funsi.
42014003	Yesu bine sendi Moisi fɔndɑ beikɔ yom sɛ ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom sɛ. A cii: A hɑlɑli ǹ mɑ bɑɑni no hulonzom hɑnu bine dee?
42014004	Ammɑ ǹ dɛnjɛ. Yesu nɑ kɑmbɛ dɑm kɑ doorikom dii kɑ ɑ̀ no bɑɑni. Bine, ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ tɑm.
42014005	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Wom kunɑ, mee no de ɑ̀ fɑrikɑ wɑlɑ ɑ̀ hɑu kɑm guusu kunɑ hulonzom hɑnu hine ɑ̀ si ɑ̀ kɑɑ mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ?
42014006	Ǹ mɑnɑ hini kɑ hɛ fɔ kulu tu sendi ngɑ di bɔm.
42014007	Yesu nɑ yɑɑse tɛ jɑmɑ di sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ di zɑngɑ ǹ go suubɑ kɑ gɔrɔ jine gɔrɛ dɔ bɛɛrɛkpɛ bɔm ŋmɑɑrɑ dɔ.
42014008	À cii ǹ sɛ: Sɑɑ kɑ bɔrɔ gɑ n cɛɛ hije buci dɔ n mɑ si gɔrɔ jine gɔrɛ dɔ bɛɛrɛkpɛ bɔm. Hɑnibɑ beerem kɑ ǹ cɛɛ kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ goono kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɛ bisɑ n ŋmɔne.
42014009	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ wom cɛɛ, ni ndɑ ɑkpɛ, ɑ̀ mɑ si kɑɑ kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kpɛ no citɑ. Hɑwi gɑ n dii ndɑ n mɑ kpei gɔrɔ bɑndɑ.
42014010	Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ n cɛɛ ndɑ ŋmɑɑri, n mɑ kpei gɔrɔ bɑndɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ n cɛɛ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ ɑ̀ mɑ cii n sɛ: Kpɑɑsi, kɑɑru bɛɛnɛ kɑ tɔntɔnu. Ngɑ di bɛɛrɛ tɛ n sɛ beerem kulu jine kɑ ni ndei goono ŋmɑɑrɑ dɔ.
42014011	Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ngɑ bɔm bɛɛrɑndi, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ yeti gɑndɑ. Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ngɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi.
42014012	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ ndɑ ŋmɑɑrɑ mo, Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Sɑɑ kɑ n go wiciri ŋmɑɑri tɛ, n mɑ si n kpɑɑsi yom cɛɛ wɑlɑ n cɛɛnɛ yom ndɑ n bɛɛrɛ yom wɑlɑ n hɑikusu yom wɑlɑ n gɔrɔkɑsine hɑibɑrikɑntɛ yom hɑli ngei mɑ bɑ n cɛɛ ndɑ ŋmɑɑri kɑ bɑnɑ.
42014013	Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ n go beerem cɛɛ ndɑ jingɑru ŋmɑɑri, n mɑ tɑlikɑ yom cɛɛ ndɑ leebɑntɛ yom ndɑ sumbɑrɑntɛ yom ndɑ dɑnɑm yom.
42014014	N kɑɑ tɛ binekɑɑnekpɛ zɑmɑ ǹ si hini kɑ bɑnɑ n sɛ. À gɑɑ nɑ, Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ yeti n sɛ bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu yom bukɔei tunɑndiyom wɑtɛ.
42014015	Beerem kɑ ǹ goono ŋmɑɑri di dɔ n ŋmɔne ɑfɔ mɑɑ sendi nge yom di. À gɑɑ no ɑ̀ cii Yesu sɛ: Binekɑɑnekpɛ no, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑri ŋmɑɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ kunɑ.
42014016	Yesu bine cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ wiciri ŋmɑɑri beeri fɔ tɛ kɑ bɔrɔ boobo cɛɛ ndɑ.
42014017	Wiciri ŋmɑɑrɑ lɔkɑci tɔ. À nɑ ngɑ bɑnyɑ dɔntɔm ɑ̀ mɑ kpei cii beerem kɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ sɛ: Wɑ kɑɑ zɑmɑ ǹ nɑ hɛ kulu sɔlu kɔ.
42014018	Ammɑ ɑfɔ fɔ kulu kɑɑndɑ ngei kɔbɛ. Sintine bɔrɔ di cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Fɑri fɔ no ɑ dei. Tilɑsi kɑlɑ yɑ kpei di ɑ̀. A go kɑ n ŋmɑɑrɛ, n mɑ gɑfɑrɑ tɛ ɑ sɛ.
42014019	Afɔ mɑ cii: Hɑuyeji yom no ɑ dei ihinkɑ hinkɑ gu. A go kpei kɑ ǹ yɑɑse gunɑ. A go kɑ n ŋmɑɑrɛ n mɑ gɑfɑrɑ tɛ ɑ sɛ.
42014020	Afɔ mo cii: Wɛndɛ fɔ no ɑ hiji. Ngɑ di sɛ, ɑ si hini kɑ kɑɑ.
42014021	Bɑnyɑ di bɛrɛ kɑ ye. À nɑ kɔbɛ sendi yom deede ngɑ kpeɑ sɛ. Cɔfɔ hundikpɛ di bine tɔ. A cii ngɑ bɑnyɑ sɛ: Kpei ndɑ wɑɑsi kpɑɑrɑ sɔɔrɔ yom bɔm ndɑ fɔndɔize yom bɔm. N mɑ kɑɑndɑ tɑlikɑ yom nee ndɑ leebɑntɛ yom ndɑ sumbɑrɑntɛ yom ndɑ dɑnɑm yom.
42014022	Bɑnyɑ di cii: Kpe, zɑngɑ n cii wɔ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ. Tɛrɛ bine yɑ kɑɑ cindi.
42014023	Kpeɑ mɑ cii ngɑ bɑnyɑ sɛ: Hunu kɑ kpei dɛbɛ yom bɔm ndɑ kɑkɑ yom cɔrɔ yom gɑɑ, n mɑ beerem tilɑsi ǹ mɑ huro zɑmɑ ɑ hundi mɑ du kɑ tɔ.
42014024	A cii wom sɛ beerem di kulu kɑ ɑ cɛɛ, ǹ bɑ ɑfɔ si tɑbɑɑ ɑ wiciri ŋmɑɑrɑ gɑɑ.
42014025	Jɑmɑ bɑkɑrɑ go meigu kɑ Yesu gɑnɑ. À bɛrɛ ǹ dɔ hɛrɛ kɑ cii ǹ sɛ:
42014026	Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ ɑ dɔ, de ɑ̀ si hungu ngɑ bɑɑbɑ ndɑ ngɑ nyɑ ndɑ ngɑ wɛndɛ ndɑ ngɑ koo yom ndɑ ngɑ cɛɛnɛ yom ndɑ bɛɛrɛ yom ndɑ ngɑ weimɑ yom ndɑ bɑ ngɑ bumbum hundɑ mo, ɑ̀ si hini kɑ tɛ ɑ coobɑɑbɑize.
42014027	Bɔrɔ kulu mo kɑ ɑ̀ si ngɑ bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ zɑɑ kɑ ɑ gɑnɑ, ɑ̀ si hini kɑ tɛ ɑ coobɑɑbɑize.
42014028	Mee nɑ wom kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ jidɑmbisɑ cini, ɑ̀ si gɔrɔ jinɑ kɑ nooru kɑ ngɑ wi lɑsɑbu. À mɑ di hɑli ngɑ gundɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ wɑsɑ kɑ jidɑmbisɑ di beeni ndɑ.
42014029	Hɑnibɑ bɑ de ɑ̀ nɑ jidɑmbisɑ kpɛsɛ furu, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hini kɑ ɑ̀ bɔm wi. Beerem kɑ ǹ di ɑ̀, ǹ mɑ si dondɑɑ̀.
42014030	Ǹ kɑɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kpɛ sinti jidɑmbisɑ ciniyom, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hini kɑ ɑ̀ beeni.
42014031	Wɑlɑ kpe fɔ yɑ bɑ kpei wɑngu kpe fɔ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ si gɔrɔ jinɑ. À mɑ gunɑ de ngɑ hini kɑ kpei ɑ̀ gɑɑ ndɑ bɔrɔ dubu wei, cɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ bɔrɔ dubu wɑrɑnkɑ?
42014032	De ɑ̀ nɑ ci yɑ mo, zɑ cɛ goono nungu mooru ɑ̀ mɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom sɑmbɑ kɑ ǹ mɑ bɑɑni ŋmɑɑrɛ.
42014033	Ngɑ di sɛ, wom kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ si ngɑ bɛ kulu nɑm, ɑ̀ si hini kɑ tɛ ɑ coobɑɑbɑize.
42014034	Ciiri boori ɑmmɑ de ciiri tɑru, hɛ fɔ nɑ ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ hinsɑ ndɑ?
42014035	À si boori gɑndɑ sɛ, ɑ̀ si tɛ tɑɑci. Ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ furu tɛrɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ hɑngɑ dɑm kɑ mɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ mɑɑ fɑ.
42015001	Alikɑsi tɑkɔ yom kulu ndɑ dulumkoni yom mɑɑni ɑ̀ dɔ kɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ.
42015002	Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom go gunugunu kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ di go dulumkoni yom tɑ. À go ŋmɑɑ ndei mo.
42015003	Cɔfɔ Yesu nɑ yɑɑse wɔne tɛ ǹ sɛ kɑ cii:
42015004	Mɛtɛ no wom kunɑ bɔrɔ kpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ feeji zɑngu kɑɑ tɛ, de ɑfɔ dɛrɛ ɑ̀ sɛ? À gɑ weigɑ cindi ɛgɑ nɑm gɑnji kunɑ kɑ kpei feeji kɑ ɑ̀ dɛrɛ di ceeci kɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ di ɑ̀. À nɑ ci cimi nɑ bɑ?
42015005	Kɑ ɑ̀ di ɑ̀, ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ̀ dɛcɛ ngɑ jɛsɛ bɔm. À bine gɑ kɑɑni mɑ.
42015006	Kɑ ɑ̀ ye fuu ɑ̀ go kɑ ngɑ kpɑɑsi yom cɛɛ ndɑ ngɑ gɔrɔkɑsine yom. À go cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ fɑihã ndɑ hɛɛ zɑmɑ ɑ di ɑ feeji di kɑ ɑ̀ dɛrɛ.
42015007	A go cii wom sɛ, yɑ mo no fɑihã goono bɛɛnɛ kunɑ dulumkoni fɔlɔnku sɑbu sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tuubi. À bisɑ bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu weigɑ cindi ɛgɑ gɑndɑ kɑ ǹ sindɑ tuubi murɑdu.
42015008	Zɑngɑ sendi, weibɔrɔ fɔ gundɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu tɑngɑ wei. Kɑ ɑfɔ dɛrɛ ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ̀ go fitilɑ diiɑndi kɑ ngɑ fuu hɑɑbu. À go kɑ ɑ̀ ceeci ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ di ɑ̀. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
42015009	Kɑ ɑ̀ di ɑ̀, ɑ̀ go kɑ ngɑ kpɑɑsi yom cɛɛ ndɑ ngɑ gɔrɔkɑsine yom kɑ cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ fɑihɑ̀ ndɑ hɛɛ zɑmɑ ɑ di ɑ tɑngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dɛrɛ.
42015010	A go cii wom sɛ, yɑ no fɑihã goono Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom jine dulumkoni fɔlɔnku sɑbu sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tuubi.
42015011	Yesu bine cii: Bɔrɔ fɔ gundɑ koo hɑibɔrɔ hinkɑ.
42015012	Icɛnɑ cii ngei bɑɑbɑ sɛ: Bɑɑbɑ, n mɑ ɑ no ɑ bɑ n hɑibɑrikɑ wɔ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑ ŋmɔne. Cɔfɔ bɑɑbɑ di nɑ ngɑ hɑibɑrikɑ fɑrisi ǹ sɛ.
42015013	À tɛ jiribi yom, icɛnɑ nɑ ngɑ ŋmɔne kulu meigu. À hunu kɑ kpei lɑɑbu ŋmɑni hɑli nungu mooru. Nungu di no ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɑɑbɑ tubu di kɑru kɑ see bɛnɛbɛnɛ kunɑ.
42015014	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ kulu wi kɑ beeni, cɔfɔ bɛrɛɛ bɑmbɑtɑ kɑɑ lɑɑbu di kunɑ. Bɑnji sinti kɑ kɑɑ hɑiwɑsu di gɑɑ.
42015015	À kpei kɔrɔgɔ lɑɑbu di ize yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ gɑɑ. Bɔrɔ di nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm ɑ̀ mɑ cini kpei kpisɔ yom kurum ngɑ fɑri tɛrɛ yom kunɑ.
42015016	À go miilɑ ngɑ mɑ ngɑ gunde tɔnɑndi ndɑ kɔɔtɑ kɑ kpisɔ yom di go ŋmɑɑ. Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑnɑ ɑ̀ no hɛ fɔ.
42015017	Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ lɑɑkɑli ye ɑ̀ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ cii: A bɑɑbɑ gundɑ gbeiize yom fɑ kɑ ǹ gundɑ ŋmɑɑri ndɑ bɑyom. Hɛɛ mo ɑ go nee ko bu ndɑ hɛrɛɛ.
42015018	A kɑɑ tunu no kɑ kpei ɑ bɑɑbɑ dɔ kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A bɑɑbɑ, ɑ nɑ dulum tɛ bɛɛnɛ sɛ. A nɑ dulum tɛ n sɛ mo.
42015019	Yɑ nɑ tɔ n mɑ ɑ cɛɛ n koo hɑibɔrɔ kpɛɛnɛ. N mɑ ɑ dii zɑngɑ n gbeiize yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ.
42015020	À tunu bine kɑ kpei ngɑ bɑɑbɑ dɔ. Zɑ ɑ̀ goono hɑli nungu mooru, ɑ̀ bɑɑbɑ di ɑ̀. Sisibi nɑ ɑ̀ dii kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. À zuuru kɑ kpei huro ɑ̀ jɛndɛ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sumsum kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
42015021	Ammɑ koo di cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Bɑɑbɑ, ɑ nɑ dulum tɛ bɛɛnɛ sɛ. A nɑ dulum tɛ n sɛ. Yɑ nɑ tɔ n mɑ ɑ cɛɛ n koo kpɛɛnɛ.
42015022	Bɑɑbɑ di cii ngɑ bɑnyɑ yom sɛ: Wɑ kɑɑndɑ kpɛ kuku kɑ ɑ̀ boori kɑ bisɑ kpɛ kulu kɑ dɑm ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Wom mɑ kɑmbɛ kɔlibɛ fɔ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ ndɑ tɑɑmu ɑ̀ cee yom gɑɑ.
42015023	Wɑ kɑɑndɑ hɑuize hɑngɑndi nɑsɔ di mo kɑ wi, i mɑ ŋmɑɑ kɑ fɑihã.
42015024	A koo wɔ go. À bu. À bine ye hundi gɑɑ. À dɛrɛ no, ǹ ye kɑ di ɑ̀. Cɔfɔ ǹ sinti kɑ fɑihã.
42015025	À koo hɑibɔrɔ sintine goono fɑri. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ye fuu ko mɑɑni hundi cɔfɔ ɑ̀ go mɑɑ dɔɔni ndɑ gɑɑni.
42015026	À nɑ gbeiize yom kunɑ ɑfɔ cɛɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hã hɛ kɑ no.
42015027	À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N cɛɛnɛ yɑ kɑɑ. N bɑɑbɑ nɑ hɑuize hɑngɑndi wi zɑmɑ ɑ̀ di ɑ̀ ndɑ bɑɑni.
42015028	Koo hɑibɔrɔ sintine di bine tɔ. À si bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ huro. À bɑɑbɑ hunu tɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ huro.
42015029	Ammɑ ɑ̀ tu ngɑ bɑɑbɑ sɛ kɑ cii: Gunɑ, jiiri bɑ kɑ ɑ gɑ tɑmtɛrɛ n sɛ. Bɑ ce fɔ yɑ nɑ n meire yom dɑɑrum ɑmmɑ n mɑnɑ ɑ nɑ hɑnciniize bɑ ce fɔ yɑ fɑihɑ̀, hɛɛ ndɑ ɑ kpɑɑsi yom.
42015030	Ammɑ bɔrɔ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci n kɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ n hɑibɑrikɑ wi weikuru yom dɔ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ. Ǹ nɑ hɑuize hɑngɑndi wi ɑ̀ sɛ.
42015031	Ammɑ bɑɑbɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A koo, n goono ɑ bɑndɑ sɑɑ kulu. Hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑ ŋmɔne, n ŋmɔne no.
42015032	Ammɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ i bine mɑ kɑɑni kɑ fɑihɑ̀. N cɛɛnɛ wɔ, ɑ̀ bu nɑ. À bine ye hundi gɑɑ. À dɛrɛ, i ye kɑ di ɑ̀.
42016001	Yesu cii ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom mo sɛ: Hɑibɑrikɑntɛ fɔ yɑ goono kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ bɑndɑbɔrɔ fɔ. Cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ bɑndɑbɔrɔ di beri ɑ̀ dɔ kɑ cii ngɑ yɑ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hɑibɑrikɑ wi.
42016002	Kpeɑ mo nɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ifɔ yɑ ci wɔne kɑ ɑ gɑ mɑɑ ǹ gɑ cii n gɑɑ wɔ? N mɑ kɑɑndɑ ɑ sɛ n bɑndɑbɔrɔtɛrɛ murɑdu tirɑ yom, zɑmɑ n si bɑndɑbɔrɔtɛrɛ tɛ kpɛɛnɛ.
42016003	Bɑndɑbɔrɔ di cii ngɑ bine kunɑ: Mɛtɛ ɑ tɛ zɑmɑ ɑ kpeɑ bɑ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ ɑ bɑndɑbɔrɔtɛrɛ? A si hini kɑ fɑrimi mo. Hɑɑwi gɑ ɑ dii ndɑ bɑrɑ.
42016004	To. A bei hɛ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ tɛ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ gɑ ɑ kɑɑ bɑndɑbɔrɔtɛrɛ ǹ mɑ ɑ tɑ beerem hundi kunɑ.
42016005	À nɑ ngɑ kpeɑ gɑrɔkoni yom cɛɛ ɑfɔ fɔ. À cii sintine bɔrɔ di sɛ: Mɛrɛjɛ no ɑ kpe go kɑ n gɑrihã?
42016006	Bɔrɔ di cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Jii neesiji zɑngu fɔ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N mɑ tirɑ zɑɑ kɑ gɔrɔ ndɑ wɑɑsi. N mɑ hɑntum weigu.
42016007	À cii ɑfɔ mo sɛ: Ni bine, mɛrɛjɛ no n gɑɑ? À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Mɔsɔngu hɑmini neesiji zɑngu fɔ. À cii ngɑ mo sɛ: N mɑ n tirɑ zɑɑ kɑ hɑntum wɑhɑku.
42016008	Kpeɑ bine nɑ bɑndɑbɔrɔ cimi zɑmkɔ sifɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ lɑɑkɑli. Ǹ wɑtɛ kunɑ zɑmɑni wɔ ize yom lɑɑkɑli bisɑ kɑɑriize yom lɑɑkɑli.
42016009	Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ go cii wom sɛ, wom mɑ hɑibɑrikɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ sɑbɑ tɛ kpɑɑsi, zɑmɑ sɑɑ kɑ wom kɑɑ gɑziɑ ǹ mɑ wom tɑ gɔrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ beeniyom kunɑ.
42016010	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci nɑɑnekpɛ hɛ fɔ pitici kunɑ, nɑɑnekpɛ mo no hɛ fɔ bɑmbɑtɑ kunɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ sɑbɑ hɛ fɔ cɛnɑ pitici kunɑ, ɑ̀ si sɑbɑ hɛ fɔ bɑmbɑtɑ kunɑ.
42016011	Ngɑ di sɛ, de wom mɑnɑ tɛ nɑɑnekpɛ yom hɑibɑrikɑ kɑ ɑ̀ si sɑbɑ kunɑ, mee yɑ gɑ ihinno tɑlifi wom gɑɑ?
42016012	De wom mɑnɑ tɛ nɑɑnekpɛ yom hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci bɔrɔ fɔ ŋmɔne kunɑ, mee yɑ kɑɑ wom no bɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci wom ŋmɔne?
42016013	Gbeiize si kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ tɑmtɛrɛ kpe hinkɑ sɛ. À kɑɑ hungu ɑfɔ kɑ bɑɑ ɑfɔ wɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑ kɑɑni ɑfɔ sɛ kɑ dondɑ ɑfɔ. Wom si hini kɑ tɑmtɛrɛ Ikpɛ sɛ ndɑ hɑibɑrikɑ sɛ mefɔ.
42016014	Kɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom mo mɑɑ hɛ nge yom di, ǹ nɑ Yesu hɑɑru zɑmɑ ǹ bɑrɑ nooru bɑɑkɔ yom.
42016015	Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wom wɔ bɔrɔ fɔ yom no kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ ngei bɔm cɛɑndi susu iburɑdɑm yom jine ɑmmɑ Ikpɛ gɑ wom bine yom bei. Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ bɛɛrɛ iburɑdɑm yom dɔ, fɛntɛ hɛ no Ikpɛ jine.
42016016	Moisi fɔndɑ ndɑ ɑndebi yom tirɑ yom lɔkɑci goono kɑlɑ Yohɑnnɑ wɑtɛ. Zɑ wɑtɛ di nɑ, ǹ go Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu tɛ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ bɔm. Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu gɑ gɑɑbi tɛ kɑ huro ɑ̀ kunɑ.
42016017	Ammɑ ɑ̀ fɑɑlɑ bɛɛnɛ ndɑ gɑndɑ sɛ ǹ mɑ beeni, ndɑ biiriize tombi fɔlɔnku mɑ dɛrɛ Moisi fɔndɑ gɑɑ.
42016018	Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ngɑ wɛndɛ fee kɑ ɑfɔ ŋmɑni hiji, ɑkpɛ go zinɑ. Bɔrɔ kulu mo kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ weibɔrɔ kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ fee hiji, ɑkpɛ go zinɑ.
42016019	Hɑibɑrikɑntɛ fɔ goono kɑ ɑ̀ cini kpɛ siini kuku dɑm ndɑ tɑɑfɛ bɑɑnɔ cɑɑdɑntɛ kɑ fɑɑriŋmɑɑ hɑnu kulu.
42016020	Bɑrɑkɔ fɔ mo goono kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Lɑzɑɑ, kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ ndɑ bii. Ǹ cini kɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ kɑ kɑɑndɑɑ̀ hɑibɑrikɑntɛ di hundi mee ɑ̀ mɑ kɑni.
42016021	À go hini ngɑ mɑ kungu ndɑ hɑibɑrikɑntɑ ŋmɑɑri buruburu yom kɑ ǹ go kɑm zɑ tɑbulu bɔm. Bɑ hɑnsi yom mɑ gɑ kɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bii yom lɔɔgu.
42016022	À kɑɑ tɔ bine, bɑrɑkɔ di bu. Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ kɑ dɑm Abulɛmɑ jɛndɛ kunɑ. Hɑibɑrikɑntɛ di mo bu. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ fiji.
42016023	À goono ciyomɑ bɔnɛ kunɑ. À nɑ bɔm tunɑndi kɑ di hɑli jinɑ Abulɛmɑ ndɑ Lɑzɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono Abulɛmɑ jɛndɛ kunɑ.
42016024	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ kuwɑ kɑ cii: Bɑɑbɑ Abulɛmɑ, n mɑ dii ɑ sisibi kɑ Lɑzɑɑ dɔntɔm ɑ̀ mɑ ngɑ kɑmbeize tusu hɑri kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dɛɛnɛ wɔ yeenɑndi. À gɑ di bɔnɛ nini wɔ kunɑ.
42016025	Ammɑ Abulɛmɑ cii: À kɑɑ, n mɑ hɔngɔ kɑ n du n hɑibɑrikɑ n hɑndunyɑ wɑtɛ. Lɑzɑɑ mo du doorei. Mɑɑsɑ ngɑ wɔ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ suurɑndi nee. Ni mɑ, ǹ go kɑ n bɔnɑndi.
42016026	Ngɑ di bɑndɑ, Ikpɛ nɑ guusu bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ sinji wom ndɑ i yom gɑme. Beerem kɑ ǹ go bɑɑ ngei mɑ hunu nee kɑ kpei wom dɔ wɑlɑ wom dɔ kɑ kɑɑ i dɔ, ǹ si hini kɑ bisɑ.
42016027	Hɑibɑrikɑntɛ di bine cii: A gɑ kɑ n ŋmɑɑrɛ nɑ bɑɑbɑ Abulɛmɑ, n mɑ Lɑzɑɑ dɔntɔm ɑ bɑɑbɑ fuu.
42016028	A gundɑ cɛɛnɛ ndɑ bɛɛrɛ gu. A mɑ sɛdɑ tɛ ǹ sɛ hɑli ngei mo mɑ si kɑɑ guruguze nungu wɔ kunɑ.
42016029	Abulɛmɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ǹ gundɑ Moisi ndɑ ɑndebi yom, ǹ mɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ǹ sɛ.
42016030	Ammɑ hɑibɑrikɑntɛ di cii: Awo, bɑɑbɑ Abulɛmɑ. De bukɔ yom kunɑ ɑfɔ kpei ǹ dɔ ǹ kɑɑ tuubi.
42016031	Abulɛmɑ mɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: De ǹ si hɑngɑ dɑm Moisi ndɑ ɑndebi yom sɛ, ǹ si hini kɑ ǹ bɛrɛ mo bɑ de bɔrɔ fɔ tunu bukɔei gɑme.
42017001	Yesu cii ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ: Sɑɑ kulu sɑbɑbu yom goono kɑ ǹ hini kɑ beerem dɛrɑndi. Ammɑ kɑito bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ dɔ dɛrɑndiyom hunu.
42017002	Ǹ mɑ fufuyom tondi hɔ ɑ̀ jinde gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cetu tɛku kunɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ icɛnɑ yom wɔ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ dɛrɑndi.
42017003	Wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ wom bɔm. De n nyɑize nɑ tɑɑli tɛ n sɛ n mɑ ɑ̀ kɔnkɔm. De bine ɑ̀ tuubi n mɑ ɑ̀ yɑɑfɑ.
42017004	De ɑ̀ nɑ tɑɑli tɛ n sɛ ce fɔ fɔ hɑli ce iye zɑɑri fɔ kunɑ, ngɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ n dɔ ce iye zɑɑri kunɑ kɑ cii, ɑ tuubi, n mɑ ɑ̀ yɑɑfɑ.
42017005	Diyɑ yom mo cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe, n mɑ nɑɑne tɔntɔnu i sɛ.
42017006	Ammɑ Kpe cii: De wom gundɑ nɑɑne zɑngɑ mutɑru yɑzi dimi fɔ moogure wom hini kɑ cii dirimi nyɑ wɔ sɛ: N mɑ n bɔm dɔgu kɑ n bɔm tilɑm buulɑ wɔ kunɑ. À wom sendi gɑnɑ.
42017007	Ammɑ mee nɑ ɑkpɛ wom kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mo gundɑ bɑnyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go fɑri wɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ memunu yom kurum. Sɑɑ kɑ bɑnyɑ hunu zɑ gɑnji kunɑ ɑ̀ si cii bɑnyɑ di sɛ: Kɑɑ ndɑ wɑɑsi kɑ ŋmɑɑ.
42017008	Ammɑ ɑ̀ gɑ wɔne cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N mɑ ɑ ŋmɔne wiciri ŋmɑɑri sɔlu ɑ sɛ. N mɑ n kunɑcendi hɔ kɑ ɑ no ɑ ŋmɑɑri hɑli yɑ ŋmɑɑ kɑ hɑm. À bɑndɑ ni mɑ n mɑ ŋmɑɑ, n mɑ hɑm. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
42017009	À kɑɑ bɑnyɑ di sɑɑbu bɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ tɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm? Awo.
42017010	Yɑ nɑ, wom mo sɑɑ kɑ wom nɑ hɛ kulu tɛ kɑ ǹ nɑ wom dɑm, wom mɑ cii: Iyom wɔ, bɑnyɑ kɔnu yom no. Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tilɑsi i gɑɑ i mɑ tɛ, i nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ.
42017011	À kɑɑ tɔ kɑ Yesu go kpei Yerusɑlɛm ɑ̀ gɑnɑ Sɑmɑri lɑɑbu ndɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu kɑ bisɑ.
42017012	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go huro kpɑɑrɑ fɔ kunɑ jire wei nɑ ɑ̀ kube.
42017013	Ǹ cɛ hɑli jinɑ kɑ jinde zɑɑ kɑ cii: Yesu, i ŋmɔne Jinɑ, n mɑ suuji cɛbɛ i sɛ.
42017014	Zɑ Yesu di ei, ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ kpei, wom bɔm cɛbɛ gɑrɑndikɔ yom sɛ. À kɑɑ tɔ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ gɑ kpei ǹ nɑ ǹ hinnɑndi.
42017015	Ammɑ kɑ ǹ kunɑ ɑfɔ di ngɑ du bɑɑni, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ bɛrɛ kɑ ye. À go kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu ndɑ jinde beeri.
42017016	À jɛndɛbiri Yesu cee dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɑɑbu. Sɑmɑriɑncɛ no.
42017017	Yesu tu kɑ cii: Iwei di du hinnɑndiyom. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ? Ɛgɑ bine, mɑni ǹ goono?
42017018	Yo wɔ bɑ si, bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑnɑ bɛrɛ kɑ ye kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu bɑ?
42017019	Cɔfɔ Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Tunu kɑ kpei. N nɑɑne nɑ n no bɑɑni.
42017020	Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom mo nɑ Yesu hã lɔkɑci kɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ no mɑ kɑɑ. Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ si kɑɑ ndɑ moo gɑɑ diyom.
42017021	Ǹ si cii mɑ: Gunɑ nee wɑlɑ gunɑ yɔngɔ. Cimi nɑ, Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ goono wom gɑme kunɑ.
42017022	Yesu cii coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ: Jiribi yom gɑ kɑɑ kɑ wom kɑɑ bɛɛjɛ wom mɑ di hɛɛ Adɑmize hɑnu yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ, ɑmmɑ wom si di ɑ̀.
42017023	Ǹ kɑɑ cii wom sɛ, gunɑ ɑ̀ go nee, wɑlɑ gunɑ ɑ̀ go yɑ hɛrɛ. Wom mɑ si ǹ gɑnɑ mɑ.
42017024	Zɑngɑ bɛɛnɛ nyɑlɑu cini tɛ kure fɔ kɑ kɑɑri kɑlɑ yɑ hɛrɛ kure, yɑ no hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ bɑrɑ ɑ hɑnu hine.
42017025	Ammɑ tilɑsi ɑ mɑ guruguze kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. Zɑmɑni wɔ beerem mɑ hungu hɛɛ mo.
42017026	Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ Nowe wɑtɛ, yɑ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ tɛ hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ hɑnu yom hine.
42017027	Beerem go ŋmɑɑ. Ǹ go hɑm. Ǹ go wɛndɛ hiji. Ǹ go hijɑndi kɑlɑ hɑnu kɑ Nowe huro hɑrihi kunɑ. Cɔfɔ tumfɑnɑ hɑri kɑɑ kɑ ǹ kulu mɑlɑkɑ.
42017028	Yɑ no zɑngɑ Lotu wɑtɛ mɑ, beerem gɑ ŋmɑɑ. Ǹ go hɑm. Ǹ go dei. Ǹ go neerɑ. Ǹ go tilɑm tɛ. Ǹ go cini.
42017029	Ammɑ hɑnu kɑ Lotu hunu Sodum kpɑɑrɑ kunɑ, nini ndɑ ɑlibɑro kɑm zɑ bɛɛnɛ. À nɑ ǹ kulu ŋmɑɑ.
42017030	Yɑ mo yɑ kɑɑ tɛ hɛɛ Adɑmize, sɑɑ kɑ ɑ hunutɛrɛ.
42017031	Hɑnu ngɑ di bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono fuu yɔlɔ bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ ngɑ jiine yom fuu kunɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ si zumbu kɑ ǹ zɑɑ. Yɑ no bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono fɑri, ɑ̀ mɑ si ye bɑndɑ kɑ ngɑ jiine yom zɑɑ.
42017032	Wom mo hɔngɔ Lotu wɛndɛ.
42017033	Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go ceeci kɑ ngɑ hundi fɑɑbɑ, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ dɛrɑndi. Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ dɛrɑndi mo ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ hɑlɑsi.
42017034	A go cii wom sɛ, ciini kunɑ bɔrɔ hinkɑ bo goono dɑɑri fɔ bɔm. Ǹ gɑ ɑfɔ zɑɑ kɑ ɑfɔ nɑm.
42017035	Weibɔrɔ hinkɑ bo sɑbɑ kɑ fufu. Ǹ gɑ ɑfɔ zɑɑ kɑ ɑfɔ nɑm.
42017036	Bɔrɔ hinkɑ bo goono fɑri fɔ kunɑ, ǹ gɑ ɑfɔ zɑɑ kɑ ɑfɔ nɑm.
42017037	Coobɑɑbɑize yom cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Mɑni no dɑ, Kpe? Cɔfɔ Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Nungu kɑ jifɑ goono, nungu di no yobereku yom cini meigu.
42018001	Yesu nɑ yɑɑse wɔne mo tɛ ǹ sɛ kɑ cɛbɛ kɑ ɑ̀ himɑ bɔrɔ mɑ cini kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ sɑɑ kulu, ɑ̀ mɑ si fɑrigɑ.
42018002	À cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑngɑrɑ fɔ gundɑ ciitikɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɑmburu Ikpɛ. À mɑnɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu dɑm mɑ.
42018003	Weibɔrɔ sokoni fɔ mɑ goono wɑngɑrɑ di kunɑ. À cini kpei bɔrɔ di dɔ kɑ cii: N mɑ fɑɑsɑ ɑ sɛ ndɑ ɑ zojikɑri wɔ.
42018004	À hungu bɑndɑ fɔ. Ammɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ɑ̀ cii ngɑ bine kunɑ: A si hɑmburu Ikpɛ. A si beerem dɑm mɑ.
42018005	Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu zɑmɑ wei wɔ gɑ kɑ ɑ kɑnkɑm ɑ kɑɑ fɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ sɛ, zɑmɑ kɑɑyom cɛyom si wɔ, ɑ̀ mɑ si ɑ fɑrigɑndi.
42018006	Kpe cii: Wɑ hɑngɑ dɑm hɛ kɑ ciitikɔ zɑm kɑ cɛɑntɛ susu wɔ gɑ cii.
42018007	Ikpɛ kɑɑ fɑɑsɑ ngɑ suubɑntɛ yom sɛ, nge yom kɑ ǹ go hɛ̃ ɑ̀ gɑɑ ciini ndɑ zɑɑri. À go suuru tɛ mo ǹ sɛ. À nɑ ci cimi nɑ bɑ?
42018008	A gɑ cii wom sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ fɑɑsɑ ǹ sɛ ndɑ wɑɑsi. Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ kɑɑyom wɑtɛ ɑ kɑɑ nɑɑnekpɛ yom gɑru hɑndunyɑ bɑ?
42018009	Yesu nɑ yɑɑse wɔne mɑ tɛ bɔrɔ fɔ yom sɛ kɑ ǹ gɑ tɑmmɑ hɑli ngei yɑ bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu yom no. Ǹ si bɔrɔ cindɑ dɑm hɛ fɔ.
42018010	À cii: Bɔrɔ hinkɑ kpei Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ. Afɔ yɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ no. Afɔ mo ɑlikɑsi tɑkɔ no.
42018011	Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ di cɛ kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ ndɑ ngɑ bɔm. À cii: E Ikpɛ, ɑ gɑ kɑ n sɑɑbu ndɑ kɑ hɛɛ wɔ yɑ nɑ ci zɑngɑ iburɑdɑm cindei kɑ ǹ ci kɔmkɑtɑkpɛ yom wɑlɑ zɑm kɑ cɛsusu yom ndɑ zinɑteeri yom. Yɑ nɑ ci mɑ zɑngɑ ɑlikɑsi tɑkɔ wɔ.
42018012	A go meehɔ zɑɑ ce hinkɑ hɑnuize fɔ kunɑ. A gɑ zɑkɑ kɑɑ mɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ gundɑ kunɑ.
42018013	Alikɑsi tɑkɔ di mo cɛ hɑli jinɑ. À mɑnɑ bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ bɔm tunɑndi bɑ kɑ bɛɛnɛ gunɑ. Ammɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ngɑ jɛndɛ kɑru ndɑ binesɛrɛ kɑ cii: E Ikpɛ, n mɑ suuji cɛbɛ ɑ sɛ, hɛɛ dulumkoni.
42018014	A gɑ cii wom sɛ bɔrɔ wɔne zumbu ngɑ fuu kunɑ ndɑ cɛɑndiyom susu kɑ bisɑ wɔ di. Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ngɑ bɔm bɛɛrɑndi, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ yeti gɑndɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ngɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ mo, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi.
42018015	Ǹ kɑɑndɑ Yesu sɛ kɑɑ cɛnɑ yom ɑ̀ mɑ ǹ hɑmɑ. Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom di ei ǹ nɑ kɑɑndɑkɔ yom yɑyɑ.
42018016	Yesu nɑ ǹ cɛɛ kɑ cii: Wɑ nɑm kɑɑ cɛnɑ yom mɑ kɑɑ ɑ dɔ. Wɑ si ǹ gɑnji. Beerem zɑngɑ koo cɛnɑ yom wɔ, ǹ ŋmɔne no Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ.
42018017	Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ si Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ tɑ zɑngɑ koo cɛnɑ, ɑkpɛ si huro ɑ̀ kunɑ pɑi.
42018018	Cɔfɔ Yuifu jinɑ fɔ nɑ Yesu hã kɑ cii: Coobɑɑbɑ hinno, ifɔ yɑ tɛ kɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni tubu?
42018019	Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ n go kɑ ɑ cɛɛ ihinno? Bɔrɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ ci ihinno kɑlɑ Bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku. Ngɑ yɑ ci Ikpɛ.
42018020	N go meire yom bei kɑ ǹ cii: ^N mɑ si zinɑ. N mɑ si bɔrɔ wi. N mɑ si zee. N mɑ si tɛ tɑngɑri sɛdɑ. N mɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ n bɑɑbɑ ndɑ n nyɑ sɛ."
42018021	Bɔrɔ di cii: Meire yom wɔ kulu no ɑ gɑnɑ zɑ ɑ goono hɑiwɑsuize.
42018022	Kɑ Yesu mɑɑ ngɑ di, ɑ̀ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Hɛ fɔ nɑ n gɑziɑ. N mɑ hɛ kulu kɑ n gundɑ neerɑ kɑ nooru di fɑrisi tɑlikɑ yom sɛ. N kɑɑ du hɑizici jisɑntɛ bɛɛnɛ kunɑ. N mɑ kɑɑ kɑ ɑ gɑnɑ mo.
42018023	Ammɑ kɑ Yuifu yom jinɑ di mɑɑ sendi nge yom di, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ bine sɑrɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ zɑmɑ hɑibɑrikɑ no ɑ̀ gundɑ hɑli ǹ ci mɔsɔ.
42018024	Kɑ Yesu di ngɑ di, ɑ̀ bine go sɑrɑ. À cii: À gɑɑbu fɑ hɑibɑrikɑntɛ yom mɑ huro Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ kunɑ.
42018025	À fɑɑlɑ yoo sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ huro kɑ bisɑ sɑnɑ fune kunɑ ndɑ hɑibɑrikɑntɛ mɑ huro Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ kunɑ.
42018026	Beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ hɑngɑ dɑm Yesu sɛ cii: Dee mee yɑ hini kɑ du fɑɑbɑ dɑ?
42018027	Yesu tu kɑ cii: Hɛ yom kɑ ǹ si hini kɑ tɛ iburɑdɑm yom dɔ, Ikpɛ cɛ dɔ ǹ hini kɑ tɛ.
42018028	Cɔfɔ Piɛɛ cii: Gunɑ, i nɑ hɛ kulu nɑm kɑ n gɑnɑ.
42018029	Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ bɔrɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ fuu nɑm wɑlɑ ngɑ bɑhɛi yom wɑlɑ ngɑ cɛɛnɛ yom wɑlɑ ngɑ bɛɛrɛ yom wɑlɑ ngɑ wɛndɛ wɑlɑ ngɑ koo yom Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ sɑbu sɛ
42018030	kɑ ɑ̀ si du ǹ cine kɑ tɔntɔnu ndɑ bɑyom lɔkɑci wɔ kunɑ. Zɑmɑni kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ mo ɑ̀ du hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni.
42018031	Kɑ Yesu nɑ iwei cindi hinkɑ boi ngɑ bɑndɑ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Gunɑ, I go kpei Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ. Hɛ kulu mo kɑ ɑndebi yom hɑntum hɛɛ Adɑmize bɔm, ǹ gɑ ǹ kulu tɔnɑndi.
42018032	Ǹ gɑ ɑ dɑm dimi cindei kɑmbɛ. Ǹ kɑɑ dondɑ hɛɛ. Ǹ gɑ ɑ woo. Ǹ kɑɑ yɔlɔ tufɑ ɑ gɑɑ.
42018033	Ǹ gɑ ɑ bulɑɑlɑ. Ǹ gɑ ɑ wi. Ammɑ jiribi hinzɑntɛ ɑ kɑɑ tunu.
42018034	Coobɑɑbɑize yom mɑnɑ fɑhɑm ndɑ hɛ nge yom di. Sendi di tugu ǹ sɛ, kɑlɑ ǹ mɑnɑ fɑhɑm ndɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ cii ǹ sɛ.
42018035	À kɑɑ tɔ sɑɑ kɑ Yesu mɑɑni Yeriko wɑngɑrɑ, dɑnɑm fɔ go gɔrɔ fɔndɑ jɛrɛbɛ ko bɑrɑ.
42018036	Kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ jɑmɑ go bisɑ, ɑ̀ hã hɛ kɑ no.
42018037	Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Yesu Nɑzɑrɛtu yɑ go bisɑ.
42018038	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ kuwɑ kɑ cii: Yesu, ni Dɑfidi ize, n mɑ suuji cɛbɛ ɑ sɛ.
42018039	Beerem kɑ ǹ goono jine deeni ɑ̀ gɑɑ kɑ cii ɑ̀ mɑ dɛnjɛ. Ammɑ ɑ̀ kuwɑ ndɑ gɑɑbi kɑ tɔntɔnu kɑ cii: Dɑfidi ize, n mɑ suuji cɛbɛ ɑ sɛ.
42018040	Yesu cɛ kɑ mei no ǹ mɑ kɑɑndɑ ngɑ sɛ.
42018041	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑni Yesu dɔ, Yesu nɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ cii: Ifɔ n go bɑɑ yɑ tɛ n sɛ? À cii: Kpe, yɑ tɛ moo.
42018042	Cɔfɔ Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N moo mɑ tɛ. N nɑɑne nɑ n nɑ bɑɑni.
42018043	Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ bɔrɔ di tɛ moo. À nɑ Yesu gɑnɑ kɑ kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi. Kɑ jɑmɑ di kulu di ngɑ di, ǹ nɑ Ikpɛ sifɑ.
42019001	Yesu huro Yeriko wɑngɑrɑ kɑ gɑnɑ kɑ bisɑ.
42019002	Cɔfɔ bɔrɔ fɔ gɑ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Zɑke, ɑlikɑsi tɑkɔ yom hɑikusu nɑ. Hɑibɑrikɑntɛ nɑ.
42019003	À gɑ ceeci ngɑ mɑ di wɔ kɑ yɑ ci Yesu di. Ammɑ ɑ̀ si hini kɑ di ɑ̀ ndɑ bɔrɔ bɑyom zɑmɑ gɑzere nɑ.
42019004	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ zuuru kɑ kpei jine. À kɑɑru dirimi nyɑ fɔ bɔm ngɑ mɑ du kɑ di ɑ̀ zɑmɑ nungu di nɑ Yesu bɑ bisɑ.
42019005	Kɑ Yesu tɔ tuurinyɑ di dɔ ɑ̀ gunɑ bɛɛnɛ kɑ di Zɑke. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Zɑke, zumbu ndɑ wɑɑsi zɑmɑ hunkunɑ yɑ gɔrɔ n fuu kunɑ.
42019006	Zɑke zumbu ndɑ wɑɑsi. À nɑ Yesu kube ndɑ binekɑɑne.
42019007	Kɑ beerem di ngɑ di, ǹ kulu gɑ gunugunu kɑ cii: À hurɑ dulumkoni dɔ kɑ zumbu ɑ̀ dɔ.
42019008	Ammɑ Zɑke cɛ nodi kɑ cii Kpe sɛ: Gunɑ Kpe, ɑ go kɑ ɑ hɑibɑrikɑ jɛrɛ nɑ tɑlikɑ yom sɛ. De bine ɑ dɛrɛ bɔrɔ fɔ sɛ ɑmɑɑnɑ dɔ, ɑ go kɑ ɑ̀ cine tɑɑci no ɑ̀ sɛ.
42019009	Cɔfɔ Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Hunkunɑ fɑɑbɑ tɔ fuu wɔ kunɑ, zɑmɑ bɔrɔ kpɛ wɔ Abulɛmɑ no.
42019010	Hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ kɑɑ no yɑ ceeci hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ dɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ fɑɑbɑ.
42019011	Ammɑ kɑ ǹ go mɑɑ hɛ nge yom di, Yesu nɑ yɑɑse fɔ tɔntɔnu ǹ sɛ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑni Yerusɑlɛm. Beerem mɑ gɑ tɑmmɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ di bɑ hunutɛrɛ mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ no.
42019012	Ngɑ di sɛ no Yesu cii: Bɔrɔ beeri fɔ kpei lɑɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ mooru kɑ du kpetɛrɛ kɑ kɑɑ.
42019013	À nɑ ngɑ bɑnyɑ yom ŋmɔne iwei cɛɛ kɑ wurɑ nooru no ǹ sɛ hɑndu tɑɑci bɑnɑndi sɑrɑ. À cii: Wom mɑ tenku hɑli ɑ kɑɑ.
42019014	Ammɑ ɑ̀ lɑɑbu beerem hunguɑ̀. Ǹ nɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom sɑmbɑ ǹ mɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: I si bɑɑ bɔrɔ wɔne mɑ i mei.
42019015	À kɑɑ tɔ, ɑ̀ du kpetɛrɛ kɑ ye fuu. À bɑndɑ ɑ̀ nɑ beerem dɑm ǹ mɑ kpei bɑnyɑ yom di cɛɛ ngɑ sɛ. Nooru kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ du kɑ di hɛ kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu du tenku gɑɑ.
42019016	Bɔrɔ sintine kɑɑ kɑ cii: Kpe, n nooru iwei hɛi ɑ̀ bɔm.
42019017	Kpe cii ɑ̀ sɛ: À boori bɑnyɑ hinno, zɑmɑ n tɛ nɑɑnekpɛ hɛ fɔ cɛnɑ kunɑ, n mɑ wɑngɑrɑ wei mei.
42019018	Bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ kɑɑ kɑ cii: Kpe, n nooru nɑ igu hɛi ɑ̀ bɔm.
42019019	Kpe cii bɔrɔ ngɑ di sɛ: Ni mɑ, n mɑ wɑngɑrɑ gu mei.
42019020	Afɔ mɑ kɑɑ. À cii: Kpe, gunɑ n nooru neyɑ kɑ ɑ du kɑ tugu fɑtɑlɑ kunɑ.
42019021	A nɑ ngɑ di tɛ nɑ zɑmɑ ɑ hɑmburu ni. Ni yɑ bɔrɔ gɑɑbɔ no. Hɛ kɑ n mɑnɑ dɑm nɑ n cini zɑɑ. Hɛ kɑ n mɑnɑ dumɑ no, n cini wi.
42019022	Kpe cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A gɑ n ciiti ndɑ n mee sendi, bɑnyɑ lɑlɔ. N bei kɑ hɛɛ wɔ bɔrɔ gɑɑbɔ nɑ. A gɑ zɑɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ mɑnɑ dɑm. A gɑ wi hɛ kɑ ɑ mɑnɑ dumɑ.
42019023	Dee ifɔ sɛ n mɑnɑ ɑ nooruɑ dɑm nungu kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ hɛi zɑmɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ ye kɑ kɑɑ yɑ dɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑ ŋmɔne ndɑ ɑ̀ liibɑ?
42019024	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ goono ɑ̀ dɔ: Wom mɑ nooru wɔ zɑɑ kɑ nɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ du liibɑ wei sɛ.
42019025	Beerem di cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ammɑ kpe, ɑ̀ gundɑ liibɑ wei kɔ.
42019026	A go cii wom sɛ: Bɔrɔ kɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑndɑ, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ no. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ mo, bo hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ tɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
42019027	Ammɑ wom mɑ kɑɑndɑ ɑ ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ yom nee kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ bɑɑ yɑ ngei mei. Wom mɑ ǹ wi ɑ jine.
42019028	Kɑ Yesu nɑ hɛ nge yom di cii, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ hurɑ ǹ jine kɑ ziji ko kpei Yerusɑlɛm.
42019029	A kɑɑ tɔ Yesu mɑɑni Betɑfɑji kpɑɑrɑ ndɑ Betɑni kpɑɑrɑ, tondi kuku fɔ dɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Olibe zugu. A nɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom ŋmɔne ihinkɑ dɔntɔm.
42019030	À cii ǹ sɛ: Wom mɑ kpei kpɑɑrɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono i jine. Sɑɑ kɑ wom go huro ɑ̀ kunɑ wom kɑɑ di fɑrikɑ binci hɑiwɑsu fɔ goono hɔɑntɛ kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑnɑ kɑɑru ɑ̀ bɔm bɑ ce fɔ. Wom mɑ ɑ̀ feeri kɑ kɑɑndɑ nee.
42019031	De bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ wom hã ifɔ sɛ wom go kɑ ɑ̀ feeri, wom mɑ cii: Kpe yɑ gundɑ ɑ̀ murɑdu.
42019032	Coobɑɑbɑize hinkɑ di kɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔm kpei. Ǹ nɑ hɛ kulu gɑru zɑngɑ Yesu nɑ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ.
42019033	Kɑ ǹ go fɑrikɑ binci hɑiwɑsu di feeri, fɑrikɑkpɛ yom cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ wom go kɑ ɑ̀ feeri?
42019034	Ǹ tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Kpe yɑ gundɑ ɑ̀ murɑdu.
42019035	Ǹ kpeindɑ fɑrikɑ binci hɑiwɑsu di Yesu sɛ. Ǹ nɑ ngei jiine yom dɛcɛ ɑ̀ bɔm. Ǹ nɑ Yesu mo dɛcɛ ɑ̀ bɔm.
42019036	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono fɔndɔ bɔm, beerem go kɑ ngei jiine yom dɑɑru fɔndɑ bɔm.
42019037	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ mɑɑni Olibe zugu tondi kuku zuli kunɑ, coobɑɑbɑize yom bɑyom kulu gɑ fɑihã. Ǹ gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ sifɑ ndɑ jinde beeri kɑ simbɑ ndɑ dɑbɑri gbei kulu kɑ ǹ di.
42019038	Ǹ go cii: "Bɑrikɑkpɛ nɑ, Dɑbɑrikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ Kpe mɑɑ gɑɑ. Bɑɑni mɑ tɛ bɛɛnɛ. Deizɑ mo mɑ tɛ bɛɛnɛ kunɑ hɑli sɑmɑu."
42019039	Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ fɔ yom mo kɑ ǹ goono jɑmɑ di bindi kunɑ cii Yesu sɛ: Coobɑɑbɑ, n mɑ n coobɑɑbɑize yom kɔnkɔm.
42019040	Ammɑ Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: A gɑ cii wom sɛ, de beerem wɔ dɛnjɛ tondi yom kɑɑ kuwɑ ndɑ wɑɑsi.
42019041	Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu mɑɑni hɑli ɑ̀ di wɑngɑrɑ, ɑ̀ hɛ̃ wɑngɑrɑ di gɑɑ.
42019042	À cii: Ni mo, n sibei bɑ hunkunɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ kɑɑndɑ bɑɑni zɑmɑ mɑɑsɑ ǹ tugu n moo yom sɛ.
42019043	Hɑnu yom go kɑɑ n gɑɑ kɑ n ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ yom kɑɑ birini kuku cini kɑ n hundi. Ǹ gɑ n koli kɑ hundi kɑ n kɑmkɑm cɔrɔ yom kulu gɑɑ.
42019044	Ǹ gɑ n zeeri gɑndɑ mɑ, ni ndɑ n kɑɑ yom n bumbum kunɑ. Ǹ si tɑndi fɔ nɑm tondi bɔm zɑmɑ lɔkɑci kɑ Ikpɛ kɑɑ n dɔ, n mɑnɑ ɑ̀ bei.
42019045	Kɑ Yesu huro Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ ɑ̀ sinti kɑ nodi neerɑkɔ yom ndɑ deikɔ yom gɑɑrɛ kɑ kɑɑ tɛrɛ.
42019046	À cii ǹ sɛ: Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii, "A gɔrɛ dɔ yɑ ɑduwɑ tɛyom dɔ no". Ammɑ wom wɔ, wom nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ "lɔkɔ zee yom ŋmɔne".
42019047	Hɑnu kulu Yesu gɑ cooɑndi Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ. Ammɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom go ceeci ngei mɑ ɑ̀ wi.
42019048	Ǹ mɑnɑ du kɑ hɛ fɔ tɛ zɑmɑ jɑmɑ di kulu gɑ sɑɑle dɑm Yesu sendi gɑɑ kɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ.
42020001	À kɑɑ tɔ hɑnu nge yom di ŋmɔne ɑfɔ Yesu gɑ jɑmɑ cooɑndi Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ. À gɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu tɛ. Cɔfɔ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ.
42020002	Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Cii i sɛ hini fɔ nɑ n gɑ hɛ yom wɔ tɛ ndɑ? Mee yɑ nɑ n no hini wɔ?
42020003	Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Hɛɛ mɑ, ɑ wom hã hɛ fɔ. Wom mɑ cii ɑ sɛ.
42020004	Mirɑndiyom kɑ Yohɑnnɑ tɛ, Ikpɛ dɔ no ɑ̀ hunu dee wɑlɑ iburɑdɑm yom dɔ?
42020005	Cɔfɔ ǹ sendi cɛrɛ gɑme kɑ cii: De i cii Ikpɛ dɔ no ɑ̀ hunu ɑ̀ kɑɑ cii, yɑ di gɑɑ ifɔ sɛ no i mɑnɑ ɑ̀ nɑɑne?
42020006	Ammɑ de i cii iburɑdɑm yom dɔ no ɑ̀ hunu, jɑmɑ wɔ kulu gɑ i cetu ndɑ tondi yom zɑmɑ jɑmɑ tɑbɑi kɑ Yohɑnnɑ yɑ ɑndebi no.
42020007	Cɔfɔ ǹ tu Yesu sɛ kɑ cii ngei si bei nungu kɑ mirɑndiyom di hunu.
42020008	Yesu mɑ tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Hɛɛ mo, ɑ si cii wom sɛ hini kɑ ɑ go hɛ yom wɔ tɛ ndɑ.
42020009	Yesu bine sinti kɑ yɑɑse wɔ tɛ jɑmɑ di sɛ. A cii: Bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ lɛzɛ̃ tuuri yom tilɑm. À nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm hɑifɑri fɔ yom kɑmbɛ kɑ nɑɑru lɑɑbu ŋmɑni kɑ jɛ.
