42020010	Sɑɑ kɑ tuuriize kɔsuyom wɑtɛ tɔ, ɑ̀ nɑ bɑnyɑ fɔ dɔntɔm hɑifɑri yom di dɔ ǹ mɑ ngɑ lɛzɛ̃ize no ɑ̀ sɛ. Ammɑ hɑifɑri yom di nɑ ɑ̀ kɑru kɑ ɑ̀ yeti kɑmbɛ kɔnu.
42020011	Lɑmbukpɛ di nɑ bɑnyɑ fɔ dɔntɔm kpɛɛnɛ. Hɑifɑri yom di nɑ ngɑ mɑ kɑru. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ woo. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ yeti kɑmbɛ kɔnu.
42020012	À nɑ bɑnyɑ hinzɑntɛ dɔntɔm ɑmmɑ ǹ nɑ ngɑ mɑ mɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ cetu tɛrɛ.
42020013	Lɑmbukpɛɑ cii: Mɛtɛ ɑ tɛ? A bei. A gɑ ɑ kɑɑ binegɑnji dɔntɔm. Hɑnibɑ de ǹ di ngɑ wɔ, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ dɑm.
42020014	Ammɑ kɑ hɑifɑri yom di ɑ̀, ǹ sendi cɛrɛ sɛ kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ wɔne yɑ ci tubukɔ. Wɑ kɑɑ, i mɑ ɑ̀ wi. Tubu di mɑ ci i ŋmɔne.
42020015	Cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ cetu lɑmbuɑ bɑndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ wi. Yɑ di gɑɑ mɛtɛ lɑmbukpɛɑ di kɑɑ tɛ hɑifɑri yom di sɛ?
42020016	À kɑɑ gbeiteeri yom wi kɑ lɑmbuɑ nɑ bɔrɔ ŋmɑni yom sɛ. Kɑ ǹ mɑɑ yɑ di cɔfɔ ǹ cii: Ikpɛ mɑ si tɑ.
42020017	Yesu nɑ ǹ gunɑ kɑ cii: Dee ifɔ yɑ ci wɔne kɑ ǹ hɑntum feeriji? "Tondi kɑ cinikɔ yom hungu, ɑ̀ tɛ cinɑri mimbɑri cire tɑndi sintine."
42020018	Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ kɑm tɑndi di bɔm, ɑkpɛ tutubu no. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bɔm tondɑ kɑm, tɑndɑ gɑ ɑ̀ fufu.
42020019	Lɔkɑci ngɑ di no gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom ceeci ngei mɑ ɑ̀ dii. Ǹ bine hɑmburu jɑmɑ di zɑmɑ ǹ bei ngei bɔm no Yesu nɑ yɑɑse cii.
42020020	Ǹ go Yesu lɑɑkɑli gunɑ. Ǹ nɑ ceekpɛrɛtɑɑsi yom dɔntɔm ǹ mɑ ngei bɔm tɛ zɑngɑ bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu yom. Ǹ go kɔbɛ fɔ ceeci ɑ̀ gɑɑ sendi fɔ dɔ zɑmɑ ǹ mɑ du kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm gɑɑbikoni kɑmbɛ ndɑ ɑ̀ dɑbɑri kunɑ.
42020021	Cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ cii: Coobɑɑbɑ, i bei kɑ n go sendi bɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ. N go cooɑndi cɑu cɑu. N si bɑɑbɑɑ tɛ ɑmmɑ n gɑ cooɑndi Ikpɛ fɔndɑ bɔm ndɑ cimi.
42020022	À hɑlɑli i sɛ i mɑ ɑlikɑsi bɑnɑ Kɑisɑ sɛ bɑ wɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɑlɑli?
42020023	Zɑ kɑ Yesu nɑ ǹ cɛmbɛrɛ bei, ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ wom gɑ kɑ ɑ bubure?
42020024	Wɑ ɑ cɛbɛ dinɑri wɔkɔkɔize fɔ. Mee bɔm ndɑ mee jeeri nɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ wɔ? Ǹ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Kɑisɑ ŋmɔne nɑ.
42020025	Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Ngɑ di sɛ wom mɑ Kɑisɑ hɛ yom nɑ Kɑisɑ sɛ, Ikpɛ hɛ yom mɑ Ikpɛ sɛ.
42020026	Ǹ si hini kɑ Yesu dii ndɑ ɑ̀ sendi yom jɑmɑ di jine. Ǹ gɑ mɑmɑci ndɑ zɑngɑ Yesu tu kɑ yeti, ǹ dɛnjɛ.
42020027	Sɑdusi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ fɔ yom mɑ kɑ ǹ gɑ cii bukɔei tunɑndiyom si, ǹ kɑɑ Yesu dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hã.
42020028	Ǹ cii: Coobɑɑbɑ, Moisi hɑntum i sɛ kɑ cii de bɛɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ wɛndɛ bu, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ kɑɑ nɑm, ɑ̀ cɛɛnɛ mɑ wɛndɑ zɑɑ kɑ du hɛiyom ngɑ bɛɛrɛ di sɛ.
42020029	Cɛɛnɛ ndɑ bɛɛrɛ iye goono. Sintine nɑ wɛndɛ fɔ zɑɑ. À bu. À mɑnɑ hɛi.
42020030	Ihinkɑntɛ nɑ wɛndɑ zɑɑ. Ngɑ mɑ bu, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɛi.
42020031	Ihinzɑntɛ mɑ nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ yɑ di kɑlɑ iyɑntɑ. Ǹ bu, ǹ mɑnɑ hɛi.
42020032	Ǹ kulu bɑndɑ weibɔrɔ di mɑ bu.
42020033	Ngɑ di sɛ tunɑndiyomɑ hine, ǹ kunɑ mee wɛndɛ nɑ zɑmɑ ǹ bɔrɔ iye kulu nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ wɛndɛ?
42020034	Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Zɑmɑni wɔ beerem gɑ hiji, ǹ go hijɑndi.
42020035	Ammɑ beerem kɑ ǹ lɑsɑbu ǹ tɔ ǹ mɑ du bɑ zɑmɑni kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ kunɑ ndɑ bukɔei tunɑndiyom kunɑ, ǹ si hiji, ǹ si hijɑndi.
42020036	Ǹ si hini kɑ bu kpɛɛnɛ. Ǹ sɑbɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom. Ikpɛ ize yom mo no zɑ kɑ ǹ tɛ tunɑndiyom ize yom.
42020037	Ammɑ bukɔ yom kɑɑ tunu. Moisi bumbum nɑ ngɑ di cɛbɛ kubu dɔ, nungu kɑ ɑ̀ dɔ ɑ̀ gɑ Kpe cɛɛ kɑ cii: "Abulɛmɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ ndɑ Isɑɑkɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ ndɑ Yɑkɔfu ŋmɔne Ikpɛ^.
42020038	Ammɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci bukɔ yom ŋmɔne Ikpɛ nɑ bɑ. Ngɑ yɑ ci bɑhunɑ yom ŋmɔne Ikpɛ zɑmɑ ngɑ wɔ dɔ ǹ kulu gɑ hunɑ.
42020039	Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ fɔ yom mɑ tu kɑ cii: Coobɑɑbɑ, n sendi ihinno.
42020040	À bɑndɑ, ǹ mɑnɑ tu kɑ ɑ̀ hã hɛ fɔ kulu kpɛɛnɛ.
42020041	Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Mɛtɛ ǹ tɛ kɑ cii Mɛsiyɑ yɑ Dɑfidi ize no?
42020042	Dɑfidi bumbum cii Sɑmu yom tirɑ kunɑ: "Kpe cii ɑ Kpe sɛ, n mɑ gɔrɔ ɑ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ,
42020043	hɑli yɑ n ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ yom tɛ n cee yom dɛcɛ yom dɔ".
42020044	Dɑfidi bumbum gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ Kpe, mɛtɛ ɑ̀ tɛ kɑ ci ɑ̀ ize?
42020045	Sɑɑ kɑ jɑmɑ di kulu go hɑngɑ dɑm, ɑ̀ sendi ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ.
42020046	À cii: Wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom kɑ ǹ gɑ fɑɑriŋmɑɑ kɑ yɑɑli ndɑ kpɛ kuku. Ǹ gɑ bɑɑ ǹ mɑ cini kɑ ngei fɔɔ hebu bɑtumɑ yom kunɑ. Ǹ gɑ bɑɑ jine gɔrɛ dɔ bɛɛrɛkpɛ yom mɑ Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu yom kunɑ ndɑ jine gɔrɛ dɔ bɛɛrɛkpɛ jingɑru ŋmɑɑyom dɔ.
42020047	Ngei yɑ gɑ weibɔrɔ sokoni yom fuu yom kuu. Ǹ gɑ kɑ ɑduwɑ kuku tɛ kɑ himɑ zɑngɑ gɑnɑkɔ hinno yom. Ǹ kɑɑ du ciiti ifutu futu.
42021001	Kɑ Yesu nɑ bɔm tunɑndi ɑ̀ di hɑibɑrikɑntɛ yom gɑ kɑ ngei sɑrɑɑ yom dɑm nooru jisiyom dɔ.
42021002	À di weibɔrɔ sokoni tɑlikɑ fɔ mɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go tɑngɑ hinkɑ dɑm.
42021003	Cɔfɔ Yesu cii: Cimi nɑ ɑ gɑ cii wom sɛ sokoni tɑlikɑ wɔ nɑ nooru dɑm kɑ bisɑ bɔrɔ kulu.
42021004	Ngei wɔ ǹ nooru dɛcɛ bɔm no ǹ dɑm kɑ sɑrɑɑ Ikpɛ sɛ ɑmmɑ wei wɔ no ngɑ hinɑ dɑm. Hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ noyɑ ɑ̀ mɑ hunɑ ndɑ.
42021005	Bɔrɔ fɔ yom go kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ sendi tɛ kɑ cii: Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɑɑlɑm ndɑ tɑndi hinno yom ndɑ sɑrɑɑ yom.
42021006	Yesu cii: Kɑ simbɑ ndɑ bɛ yom kɑ wom gɑ gunɑ, hɑnu yom gɑ kɑɑ kɑ bɑ tɑndi fɔ si cindi tɑndi bɔm kɑ ǹ si ɑ̀ kɑru kɑ see.
42021007	Ǹ nɑ Yesu hã kɑ cii: Coobɑɑbɑ, sɑɑ fɔ nɑ hɛ nge yom di kɑɑ tɛ dɑ? Alɑmu fɔ yɑ tɛ sɑɑ kɑ hɛ nge yom di bɑ kɑɑ?
42021008	Yesu bine cii: Wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli ǹ mɑ si wom dɛrɑndi. Bɔrɔ boobo yɑ kɑɑ ndɑ ɑ mɑɑ kɑ cii: Hɛɛ yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ. Lɔkɑci bine tɔ. Wom mɑ si ǹ gɑnɑ.
42021009	Sɑɑ kɑ wom kɑɑ mɑɑ ǹ mɑ wɑngu yom bɑɑru ndɑ lɑɑbu yom wɑngu kɔsɔngu, wom mɑ si hɑmburu. Tilɑsi nɑ hɛ nge yom di kulu mɑ tɛ, ɑmmɑ beeniyom mɑnɑ tɔ jinɑ.
42021010	Yesu cii ǹ sɛ mɑ: Dimi kɑɑ tunu kɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ dimi. Kpetɛrɛ kɑɑ tunu kpetɛrɛ gɑɑ.
42021011	Gɑndɑ zinjiyom bɑmbɑtɑ yom kɑɑ tɛ nungu ŋmɑni ŋmɑni. Hɛrɛɛ ndɑ bɑlɑu yom ndɑ hɑmbure bɛ yom kɑɑ goono. Alɑmu bɑmbɑtɑ yom kɑɑ tɛ kɑ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ.
42021012	Ammɑ hɑli yom di kulu tɛ, ǹ kɑɑ wom dii kɑ wom Ǹ kɑɑ wom dɑm Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu yom kɑmbɛ kɑ wom dɑm kɑsu. Ǹ kɑɑ kpeindɑ wom gɑndɑkpɛ yom jine ndɑ lɑɑbu gɑɑbikoni yom jine ɑ mɑɑ sɑbu sɛ.
42021013	Ngɑ di kɑɑ tɛ wom sɛ sɛdɑ.
42021014	Ngɑ di sɛ wɑ zɑɑ wom bine yom kunɑ, wom mɑ si jinɑ kɑ lɑsɑbu ndɑ zɑngɑ wom kɑɑ tu kɑ cii.
42021015	Hɛɛ bumbum, ɑ wom no mee kɑ sendi ndɑ hɑikusutɛrɛ. Bine, wom zojikɑri yom kulu si hini kɑ tu wom sɛ wɑlɑ kɑ hungu wom sɛ.
42021016	Ammɑ wom bɑhɛi yom ndɑ wom cɛɛnɛ yom ndɑ wom bɛɛrɛ yom ndɑ wom hɑikusu yom ndɑ wom kpɑɑsi yom, ǹ kɑɑ wom dɑm kɑmbɛ mɑ. Ǹ kɑɑ wom bɔrɔ fɔ yom wi.
42021017	Ǹ kulu kɑɑ hungu wom ɑ mɑɑ sɑbu sɛ.
42021018	Ammɑ wom bɔm hɑmini bɑ ɑfɔ si hɑlɑci.
42021019	Wom mɑ cɛ ɑ̀ mɑ boori. À gɑɑ no wom kɑɑ du wom hundi yom.
42021020	Sɑɑ kɑ wom kɑɑ di wɑnguize yom nɑ Yerusɑlɛm koli kɑ hundi wom mɑ bei kɑ Yerusɑlɛm hɑlɑciyom mɑɑni noyɑ.
42021021	Beerem kɑ ǹ goono Yude lɑɑbu mɑ zuuru kɑ kpei tondi kuku yom kunɑ. Beerem kɑ ǹ goono wɑngɑrɑ bindi kunɑ mɑ mɑ zuuru kɑ hunu. Beerem kɑ ǹ goono gɑnji yom kunɑ mo, ǹ mɑ si huro wɑngɑrɑ di kunɑ.
42021022	Fɑɑsɑ hɑnu yom hine noyɑ hɑli hɛ kulu kɑ ǹ hɑntum mɑ tɔ.
42021023	Ammɑ kɑito weibɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ gundɑ kunu, ndɑ weibɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ gɑ nɑnɑndi hɑnu nge yom di. Kɑnkɑmi bɑmbɑtɑ yɑ kɑɑ tɛ hɑndunyɑ kunɑ ndɑ binetɔnɛ jɑmɑ wɔ gɑɑ.
42021024	Ǹ kɑɑ kɑm tɑkubɑ mee kɑɑnu cire. Ǹ gɑ ǹ dɑm tɑmtɛrɛ kɑ kpeindei hɑndunyɑ dimi kulu kunɑ. Dimi cindei kɑɑ Yerusɑlɛm tɑɑmu kɑlɑ dimi cindei lɔkɑci mɑ kube.
42021025	Alɑmu yom mo kɑɑ tɛ weenu ndɑ hɑndu ndɑ hɑndɑriyɑize yom kunɑ. Hɑndunyɑ kunɑ mo, dimi yom kulu lɑɑkɑli kɑɑ tunu kɑ biti kɑlɑ kɑlɑ tɛku kɔsɔngu bɑmbɑtɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ boosu yom sɑbu sɛ.
42021026	Beerem gɑ ngei hundi kɑɑ ndɑ hɑmburu, hɛ yom kɑ ǹ go mɑɑ ǹ go kɑɑ hɑndunyɑ bɔm sɑbu sɛ. Bɛɛnɛ dɑbɑri yom kɑɑ zinji.
42021027	Cɔfɔ ǹ kɑɑ di hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ go kɑɑ buru bɔm ndɑ dɑbɑri ndɑ deizɑ bɑmbɑtɑ.
42021028	Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ hɛ nge yom di sinti kɑ tɛ, wɑ wom bɔm yom tunɑndi kɑ gunɑ bɛɛnɛ. Wom fɑnsɑyom go mɑɑni.
42021029	Yesu nɑ yɑɑse wɔne mɑ tɛ ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wom mɑ jee nyɑ gunɑ ndɑ tuurinyɑ yom kulu.
42021030	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ sinti kɑ fiyo, wom bumbum di ko bei kɑ kediɑ mɑɑni kɔ.
42021031	Yɑ nɑ bɑ wom mɑ, sɑɑ kɑ wom gɑ di bɛ nge yom di gɑ tɛ, wom mɑ bei kɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ mɑɑni.
42021032	Cimi nɑ ɑ gɑ cii wom sɛ, zɑmɑni wɔ si beeni pɑi kɑlɑ ǹ kulu mɑ tɔ.
42021033	Bɛɛnɛ ndɑ gɑndɑ kɑɑ beeni, ɑmmɑ ɑ sendi yom si beeni pɑi.
42021034	Wom bumbum, wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ wom bɔm hɑli wom bine yom si tim ndɑ butuguyom ndɑ buguyom ndɑ hundi kɑrihã yom. Hɑnu ngɑ di mɑ si kɑɑ wom sɛ jirise kunɑ.
42021035	À kɑɑ kɑɑ no zɑngɑ kuse hɑndunyɑ bɔrɔ kulu bɔm.
42021036	À sɛ no, wom mo bɑtu. Wom mo ŋmɑɑrɛ wom mɑ du dɑbɑri kɑ kɔmɑ hɛ nge yom di kulu kɑ ǹ bɑ tɛ gɑɑ. Wom mɑ du kɑ cɛ mo hɛɛ Adɑmize jine.
42021037	Zɑɑri kulu Yesu cini cooɑndi Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ. Ciini ɑ̀ cini hunu kɑ kpei gɔrɔ tondi kuku bɔm kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Olibe zugu.
42021038	Susubɑ zɑ ndɑ hine bɔrɔ kulu cini kpei ɑ̀ dɔ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ kɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ.
42022001	Buuru Kɑsɑmi Si jingɑru bine kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru gɑ mɑɑni.
42022002	Gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom gɑ ceeci zɑngɑ ngei mɑ tɛ kɑ Yesu wi. Ammɑ jɑmɑ di nɑ ǹ gɑ hɑmburu.
42022003	Setɑm huro Yudɑ bine kunɑ, Yudɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ mɑɑ dɛcɛ Isikɑriɔtu. À goono coobɑɑbɑize wei cindi hinkɑ kunɑ.
42022004	Yudɑ kpei sendi gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom sɛ ndɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ bɑtukɔ yom sɛ zɑngɑ ngɑ gɑ ɑ̀ dɑm ǹ kɑmbɛ.
42022005	Cɔfɔ ǹ bine gɑ yee. Ǹ cii ngei gɑ ɑ̀ nɑ nooru.
42022006	Yudɑ tu. Zɑ sɑɑ di nɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ceeci ngɑ mɑ Yesu dɑm ǹ kɑmbɛ, jɑmɑ di mɑ si bei.
42022007	Buuru Kɑsɑmi Si jingɑru hɑnu tɔ, hɑnuɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ ǹ gɑ Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru feeji wi.
42022008	Yesu bine nɑ Piɛɛ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ dɔntɔm kɑ cii: Wɑ kpei, wom mɑ Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru ŋmɑɑri sɔlu tɛ i mɑ ŋmɑɑ.
42022009	Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Mɑni nɑ n gɑ bɑɑ i mɑ ɑ̀ sɔlu?
42022010	À cii ǹ sɛ: Gunɑ, sɑɑ kɑ wom go huro wɑngɑrɑ kunɑ, hɑibɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hɑɑbu hɑri jɛrɛ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ wom kube. Wom mɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ kɑlɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ɑ̀ huro.
42022011	Wom mɑ cii hundikpɛ di sɛ: Coobɑɑbɑ cii n sɛ, mɑni fuu kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ɑ zumbu kɑ Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru ŋmɑɑri ŋmɑɑ ndɑ ɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom?
42022012	À kɑɑ wom cɛbɛ jidɑmbisɑ fuu beeri fɔ, kɑ ɑ̀ hinsɑ. À kunɑ no wom mɑ jingɑruɑ ŋmɑɑri sɔlu.
42022013	Ǹ kpei nodi. Ǹ nɑ hɛ kulu gɑru zɑngɑ Yesu cii ǹ sɛ. Ǹ nɑ jingɑruɑ ŋmɑɑri sɔlu.
42022014	Sɑɑ kɑ lɔkɑci tɔ, Yesu gɔrɔ ndɑ diyɑ wei cindi hinkɑ.
42022015	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: A gundɑ guuri kɑlɑ kɑlɑ yɑ Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru ŋmɑɑri wɔ ŋmɑɑ wom bɑndɑ zɑ yɑ nɑ guruguze.
42022016	A go cii wom sɛ, ɑ si ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑ kpɛɛnɛ kɑlɑ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ tɔnɑndi Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ kunɑ.
42022017	Kɑ Yesu nɑ gulɑize fɔ zɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu, ɑ̀ cii: Wɑ wɔne zɑɑ kɑ fɑrisi wom gɑme.
42022018	A go cii wom sɛ, ɑ si lɛzɛ̃ hɑri hɑm kpɛɛnɛ kɑlɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ mɑ kɑɑ.
42022019	Kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ buuru zɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu, ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ zenji zenji kɑ ɑ̀ fɑrisi ǹ sɛ. À cii: Wɔne yɑ ci ɑ gɑɑbɑm kɑ ɑ go no wom sɑbu sɛ. Wom mɑ wɔne tɛ kɑ hɔngɔ hɛɛ.
42022020	Yɑ nɑ ɑ̀ nɑ gulɑize fɔ mɑ zɑɑ wiciri ŋmɑɑri di bɑndɑ kɑ cii: Wɔne yɑ ci ɑ kuri ɑlikɑwɑli ŋmɔne teji tɛyom kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ munu wom sɑbu sɛ.
42022021	Ammɑ gunɑ, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ ɑ dɑm kɑmbɛ, ɑ̀ go ŋmɑɑ ndɑ hɛɛ.
42022022	Hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ go kpei ndɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ gɔrɛndi. Ammɑ kɑito bɔrɔ kpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɑm kɑmbɛ.
42022023	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom sinti kɑ cɛrɛ hã: Mee no bɔrɔ kpɛ i kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑ wɔne tɛ?
42022024	Kɑkɔ fɔ mo tunu ǹ gɑme ngei mɑ bei ngei kunɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ibeeri.
42022025	Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Dimi cindei kpe yom go kɑ ngei hini cɛbɛ ndɑ bɔmbɛɛrɛ ngei beerem bɔm. Ngei kɑ ǹ go hini cɛbɛ beerem bɔm, ǹ go kɑ ǹ cɛɛ ihinno tɛkɔ yom.
42022026	À mɑ si ci zɑngɑ yɑ wom gɑme. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ibeeri kɑ bisɑ wom kulu ɑ̀ mɑ ci icɛnɑ kulu kulu. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci jinɑ ɑkpɛ mɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go tɑmtɛrɛ.
42022027	Mee yɑ ci ibeeri nee, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go tɑmtɛrɛ dee wɑlɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go gɔrɔ kɑ ŋmɑɑ? À nɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ gɔrɔ kɑ ŋmɑɑ no bɑ? Ammɑ hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ goono wom gɑme kɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go tɑmtɛrɛ.
42022028	Ammɑ wom, wom yɑ ci beerem kɑ ǹ bo goono ndɑ hɛɛ ɑ bubure yom kunɑ.
42022029	A sɛ no, hɛɛ mo ɑ go kpetɛrɛ jisi wom sɛ zɑngɑ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ nɑ ɑ̀ jisi ɑ sɛ.
42022030	À gɑɑ no wom mɑ ŋmɑɑ kɑ hɑm ndɑ hɛɛ ɑ tɑbulu dɔ ɑ kpetɛrɛ kunɑ. Wom mɑ gɔrɔ mɑ kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ yom bɔm kɑ Isirɑilɑ dimi wei cindi hinkɑ ciiti.
42022031	Kpe cii: Simɔ, Simɔ gunɑ, Setɑm ŋmɑɑrɛ ngɑ mɑ du wom kɑ zinji zɑngɑ mɔsɔngu.
42022032	Ammɑ hɛɛ mo, ɑ nɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ n sɛ zɑmɑ n nɑɑne mɑ si gɑziɑ. Ni mo, sɑɑ kɑ n kɑɑ bɛrɛ kɑ ye n mɑ n nyɑize yom nɑ gɑɑbi.
42022033	Cɔfɔ Piɛɛ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe, ɑ sɔlu kɑ n gɑnɑ kɑ kpei hɑli kɑsu wɑlɑ bu.
42022034	Ammɑ Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Piɛɛ, ɑ cii n sɛ, hɑli gɔrɔngɔ cɑ hunkunɑ n gɑ ɑ ze ce hinzɑ kɑ cii n si ɑ bei.
42022035	À cii ǹ sɛ mo: Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ nɑ wom dɔntɔm zɑlifɔntɔ si, fɔlɔ si, tɑɑmu si, hɛ fɔ nɑ wom gɑziɑ bɑ? Ǹ cii: Bɑ bɛ fɔ.
42022036	À cii ǹ sɛ: Ammɑ mɑɑsɑnkulu bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ zɑlifɔntɔ ɑ̀ mɑ zɑɑ. Wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ fɔlɔ ɑ̀ mɑ zɑɑ. Wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ tɑkubɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ngɑ jiine neerɑ kɑ tɑkubɑ dei.
42022037	A gɑ cii wom sɛ: Sendi wɔne kɑ ǹ hɑntum kɑlɑ de ɑ̀ mɑ ɑ̀ tɔnɑndi ɑ dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cii, "Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ lɑsɑbu fɔndɑ dɑɑrumkɔ yom kunɑ". Hɛ yom kɑ ǹ hɑntum ɑ bɔm, ǹ gundɑ ǹ tɔnɑndiyom.
42022038	Cɔfɔ ǹ cii: Kpe, gunɑ nee tɑkubɑ hinkɑ. A cii ǹ sɛ: A wɑsɑ.
42022039	Kɑ ɑ̀ hunu ɑ̀ kpei Olibe zugu tondi kukuɑ dɔ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ dɔnɑ kɑ cini tɛ. À coobɑɑbɑize yom mo nɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ.
42022040	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ nungu di ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Wom mɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ kɑ wom mɑ si huro suiyom kunɑ.
42022041	À felem ndei zɑngɑ tɑndi cetuyom moore sɑrɑ. À sɔmbu kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ kɑ cii:
42022042	Bɑɑbɑ, de n bɑɑ, n mɑ tɑɑbi wɔ moorɑndi ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu ɑ̀ mɑ si ci ɑ binebɑɑ ɑmmɑ n ŋmɔnɛ mɑ tɛ. [
42022043	Cɔfɔ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize fɔ fɑitɑ ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ no gɑɑbi.
42022044	Kɑ binesɛrɛ bɑmbɑtɑ nɑ Yesu dii, ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ ndɑ niyɑ. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ sunje ye zɑngɑ kuri kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ toli gɑndɑ.]
42022045	Aduwɑ tɛyom bɑndɑ ɑ̀ tunu kɑ kɑɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom dɔ. À nɑ ǹ gɑru ǹ go jiibi binesɛrɛ sɑbu sɛ.
42022046	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ wom go jiibi? Wɑ tunu kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ wom mɑ si huro suiyom kunɑ.
42022047	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ sendi, cɔfɔ jɑmɑ fɔ kɑɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Yudɑ iwei cindi hinkɑ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ, ɑ̀ goono jɑmɑ di jine. À mɑɑni Yesu dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sumsum.
42022048	Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Yudɑ, hɛɛ Adɑmize nɑ n go dɑm kɑmbɛ yɑ ndɑ sumsumyom?
42022049	Sɑɑ kɑ beerem kɑ ǹ goono Yesu hundɑntɛ di hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑ tɛ, ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe, i mɑ beri ndɑ tɑkubɑ nɑ?
42022050	Cɔfɔ ǹ kunɑ ɑfɔ nɑ gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ bɑnyɑ beri kɑ ɑ̀ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ hɑngɑ kɑɑ.
42022051	Ammɑ Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wɑ nɑm. Cɔfɔ Yesu nɑ bɔrɔ di hɑngɑ hɑmɑ kɑ ɑ̀ no bɑɑni.
42022052	Gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ bɑtukɔ yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom kɑɑ Yesu dɔ. À cii ǹ sɛ: Wom kɑɑ kɑ ɑ dii ndɑ tɑkubɑ yom ndɑ goobu yom zɑngɑ zee?
42022053	Hɑnu kulu mɑ ɑ go gɔrɔ wom dɔ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ, wom mɑnɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ ɑ gɑɑ. Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ wom ŋmɔne lɔkɑci tɔ. Kube dɑbɑri ŋmɔne lɔkɑci mo tɔ.
42022054	Ǹ nɑ Yesu dii kɑ ɑ̀ boi. Ǹ kpeindɑ Yesu gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ fuu kunɑ. Piɛɛ nɑ Yesu hɑmine zɑ nungu mooru.
42022055	Ǹ nɑ nini fɔ funsu hundi bɑtumɑ kunɑ nungu kɑ beerem meigu kɑ gɔrɔ. Piɛɛ gɔrɔ ǹ gɑme kunɑ.
42022056	Cɔfɔ gbeiize hundiyɑ fɔ di ɑ̀, ɑ̀ go gɔrɔ nini dɔ. Hundiyo di nɑ mɑɑ sinji Piɛɛ gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gunɑ. A cii: Bɔrɔ kpɛ mɑ goono Yesu bɑndɑ.
42022057	Ammɑ Piɛɛ nɑ Yesu ze kɑ cii: Wei wɔ, ɑ si ɑ̀ bei.
42022058	À tɔntɔnu cɛnɑ kpɛɛnɛ bɔrɔ fɔ mo di ɑ̀ kɑ cii: Ni mo n goono beerem di kunɑ. Ammɑ Piɛɛ cii: E hɑru wɔ, ɑ si ǹ kunɑ.
42022059	À tɔ zɑngɑ guuru fɔ sɑrɑ, ɑfɔ mo tɑbɑtɑndi kɑ cii: Cimi no bɔrɔ kpɛ mɑ goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ zɑmɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu bɔrɔ nɑ.
42022060	Piɛɛ ye kɑ cii: E hɑru wɔ, ɑ si bei hɛ kɑ n gɑ cii wɔ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ sendi mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ gɔrɔngɔ cɑ.
42022061	Cɔfɔ Kpe bɛrɛ kɑ Piɛɛ gunɑ. Bine, Piɛɛ hɔngɔ Kpe sendɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cii ngɑ sɛ: Hɑli gɔrɔngɔ cɑ n gɑ ɑ ze ce hinzɑ.
42022062	Piɛɛ hunu tɛrɛ kɑ hɛ̃ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
42022063	Beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ Yesu dii, ǹ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hɑɑru. Ǹ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑru.
42022064	Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ moo hɔ ko kɑ ɑ̀ sɑm. Ǹ cii: N mɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ. Mee yɑ nɑ n kɑru?
42022065	Ǹ nɑ sendi ŋmɑni yom mo cii ɑ̀ gɑɑ ndɑ woobi yom.
42022066	Kɑ mo bo mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom ndɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom meigu. Ǹ kɑɑndɑ Yesu ngei ciiti dumbukɔ yom dɔ.
42022067	Ǹ cii: De ni Mɛsiyɑ nɑ, n mɑ cii i sɛ. Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: De ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ cii wom sɛ, wom si cimɑndi bɑ cɛnɑ.
42022068	De bine ɑ go wom hã wom si tu ɑ sɛ. Wom si ɑ nɑm mɑ yɑ kpei.
42022069	Ammɑ zɑ mɑɑsɑ hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ kɑɑ gɔrɔ Ikpɛ Dɑbɑrikpɛ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ.
42022070	Cɔfɔ ǹ kulu cii: Ni wɔ bine, Ikpɛ Ize nɑ? Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wom bumbum go cii, hɛɛ yɑ ci ngɑ.
42022071	Ǹ cii: Sɛdɑ fɔ nɑ i gɑ bɑɑ kpɛɛnɛ? I yom bumbum, i mɑɑ ngɑ di ɑ̀ mee kunɑ.
42023001	Jɑmɑ kulu tunu kɑ kpeindɑ Yesu Pilɑtu dɔ.
42023002	Ǹ sinti kɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑ kɑ cii: I nɑ bɔrɔ gɑru ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ i dimi bɛrɛ kɑ hungu ǹ mɑ Kɑisɑ ɑlikɑsi bɑnɑ. À gɑ cii mɑ ngɑ yɑ Mɛsiyɑ nɑ, Kpe fɔ.
42023003	Pilɑtu nɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ cii: Ni, n ci Yuifu yom Kpe bɑ? Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Ni, n cii.
42023004	Cɔfɔ Pilɑtu cii gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom sɛ ndɑ jɑmɑ sɛ: Yɑ nɑ di tɑɑli fɔ kulu bɔrɔ kpɛ gɑɑ.
42023005	Ammɑ ǹ cɛ tɑkɑkɑ kɑ cii: À gɑ jɑmɑ cooɑndi Yude lɑɑbu kulu zɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ sinti kɑlɑ nee kɑ kɑ ǹ bɛrɛ.
42023006	Kɑ Pilɑtu mɑɑ ǹ nɑ Gɑlile sendi tɛ, ɑ̀ hã hɑli Gɑlile lɑɑbu bɔrɔ nɑ.
42023007	Kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ ǹ cii Hirodu dɑbɑri dɔ bɔrɔ nɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ sɑmbɑ Hirodu dɔ. Jiribi nge yom di no Hirodu mo goono Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ.
42023008	Kɑ Hirodu mɑ di Yesu, ɑ̀ bine gɑ yee kɑlɑ kɑlɑ zɑmɑ zɑ jɛyom no ɑ̀ go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ di ɑ̀. À mɑɑ bɑɑru boobo kɑ simbɑ ndɑ Yesu. À go bɛɛjɛ mo ngɑ mɑ di ɑlɑmu fɔ mɑ tɛ Yesu dɔ.
42023009	À hiyɑ kɑ Yesu hã ndɑ sendi boobo, ɑmmɑ Yesu mɑnɑ bɛ fɔ kulu cii kɑ yeti ɑ̀ sɛ.
42023010	Gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom mo ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom, ǹ go cɛ nodi kɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑ ilɑlɔ lɑlɔ.
42023011	Hirodu mo ndɑ ɑ̀ wɑnguize yom nɑ Yesu cɛnɑndi. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɑɑru. Ǹ nɑ jiine cɑɑdɑntɛ fɔ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ. À bɑndɑ Hirodu nɑ ɑ̀ sɑmbɑ Pilɑtu dɔ kpɛɛnɛ.
42023012	Hɑnu ngɑ di no Pilɑtu ndɑ Hirodu nɑ kpɑɑsitɛrɛ tɛ bɑ kɑ ibɛrɛtɛrɛ jinɑ kɑ goono ǹ gɑme.
42023013	Pilɑtu bine nɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom meigu ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom ndɑ jɑmɑ di.
42023014	À cii ǹ sɛ: Wom kɑɑndɑ bɔrɔ kpɛ ɑ dɔ zɑngɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go jɑmɑ bɛrɛ. Gunɑ, ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ hã wom jine. Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ mɑnɑ di tɑɑli fɔ kulu bɔrɔ kpɛ gɑɑ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ wom go kɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑ ndɑ.
42023015	Yɑ no Hirodu mo, zɑmɑ ɑ nɑ wom sɑmbɑ ɑ̀ dɔ. Gunɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ di bɛ fɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ wi.
42023016	Ngɑ di sɛ ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ bulɑɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɑm. [
42023017	À tilɑsi Pilɑtu gɑɑ ɑ̀ mɑ bɔrɔ fɔ tɑm ǹ sɛ jingɑru wɔ gɑɑ.]
42023018	Cɔfɔ jɑmɑ di kulu sɑbɑ kɑ kuwɑ. Ǹ cii: N mɑ nɑm ǹ mɑ bɔrɔ kpɛ wi. N mɑ Bɑrɑbɑ tɑm i sɛ.
42023019	Bɑrɑbɑ wɔ bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm kɑsu zɑmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ lɑɑbu fɔndɔ hunguɛ tɛ wɑngɑrɑ di kunɑ. Ǹ nɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom wi mo hunguɛ di kunɑ.
42023020	Ngɑ di sɛ zɑ kɑ Pilɑtu go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ Yesu tɑm Pilɑtu ye kɑ sendi jɑmɑ di sɛ kpɛɛnɛ.
42023021	Ammɑ ǹ kuwɑ kɑ cii: À kɑnji. À kɑnji.
42023022	Ce hinzɑntɛ kpɛɛnɛ Pilɑtu cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ? Hɛ lɑlɔ fɔ no ɑ̀ tɛ? Yɑ nɑ di ɑ̀ gɑɑ bɛ fɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ wi. Ngɑ di sɛ ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ bulɑɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɑm.
42023023	Ammɑ ǹ cɛ tɑkɑkɑ kɑ Pilɑtu ŋmɑɑrɛ ndɑ jinde beeri kɑ cii: Ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji. Jɑmɑ ndɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom kuwɑ kɑ hini Pilɑtu.
42023024	Pilɑtu cii hɛ kɑ ǹ ŋmɑɑrɛ ngɑ yɑ tɛ.
42023025	Bɔrɔ kɑ ǹ dɑm kɑsu lɑɑbu fɔndɔ hunguɛ ndɑ bɔrɔ wiyom di sɑbu sɛ, jɑmɑ go ŋmɑɑrɛ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ tɑm. Pilɑtu nɑ bɔrɔ ngɑ di tɑm. À nɑ Yesu mo dɑm ǹ kɑmbɛ zɑngɑ ǹ bine gɑ bɑɑ.
42023026	Kɑ ǹ go kpeindɑ Yesu ǹ kube ndɑ Simɔ Sileni bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hunu gɑnji kunɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tilɑsi ɑ̀ mɑ bundu gɑɑrɑntɑ zɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ jɛrɛ Yesu bɑndɑ.
42023027	Jɑmɑ bɑkɑrɑ go kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ ndɑ weibɔrɔ yom. Ǹ go bɛrɛɛ ɑ̀ sɑbu sɛ.
42023028	Yesu bɛrɛ kɑ ǹ gunɑ kɑ cii: Yerusɑlɛm hundiyo yom, wɑ si hɛ̃ ɑ gɑɑ. Ammɑ wɑ hɛ̃ wom bɔm gɑɑ ndɑ wom koo yom gɑɑ.
42023029	Gunɑ, hɑnu yom go kɑɑ kɑ ǹ gɑɑ ǹ kɑɑ cii: Binekɑɑnekpɛ yom nɑ weibɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ si hini kɑ hɛi ndɑ weibɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ hɛi ndɑ fɑfɑ yom kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ nɑnɑndi.
42023030	"Ǹ kɑɑ sinti kɑ cii tondi kuku yom sɛ, wɑ kɑm i bɔm. Ǹ kɑɑ cii gure beeri yom sɛ, wɑ i dɑɑbu."
42023031	De ǹ go hɛ yom wɔ tɛ tuuri gɑni yom sɛ, ifɔ yɑ kɑɑ tɔ tuuri kɔgɔ yom?
42023032	Ǹ nɑ hɛ lɑlɔ tɛkɔ hinkɑ fɔ mo boi ǹ mɑ ǹ wi Yesu bɑndɑ.
42023033	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ tɔ nungu fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Bɔm Kurumbu, ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji. Yɑ nɑ hɛ lɑlɔ tɛkɔ hinkɑ mo. Ǹ nɑ ɑfɔ kɑnji Yesu kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑfɔ mɑ kɑnji ɑ̀ kɑmbɛwo gɑɑ.
42023034	Yesu cii: Bɑɑbɑ, n mɑ ǹ yɑɑfɑ zɑmɑ ǹ si bei hɛ kɑ ngei gɑ tɛ. Ǹ nɑ tɛtɛ tɛ ɑ̀ jiine yom bɔm kɑ ǹ fɑrisi.
42023035	Jɑmɑ di gɑ cɛ ko gunɑ. Hinikpɛ yom mɑ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hɑɑru kɑ cii: À nɑ ɑfɔ yom fɑɑbɑ. À mɑ ngɑ bɔm fɑɑbɑ de ngɑ yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ, Ikpɛ ŋmɔne Suubɑni.
42023036	Wɑnguize yom mɑ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hɑɑru. Ǹ mɑɑni kɑ hɑri mɔrɔ sɛllɛ ɑ̀ sɛ.
42023037	Ǹ cii: De ni Yuifu yom Kpe no, n mɑ n bɔm fɑɑbɑ ni bumbum.
42023038	Yesu bɔm dɔ mɑ hɑntum fɔ goono kɑ ǹ tɛ ndɑ Gɑrɛku cinɛ ndɑ Lome cinɛ ndɑ Ebulu cinɛ kɑ cii. BƆRƆ KPƐ YA CI YUIFU YOM KPE.
42023039	Hɛ lɑlɔ tɛkɔ yom kɑ ǹ kɑnji, ɑfɔ nɑ Yesu woo kɑ cii: De n ci Mɛsiyɑ n mɑ n bɔm fɑɑbɑ, ni bumbum ndɑ i yom mo.
42023040	Ammɑ ihinkɑntɛ nɑ ɑ̀ kɔnkɔm kɑ cii: N si hɑmburu Ikpɛ bɑ, ni kɑ n goono ciiti fɔlɔnku cire?
42023041	I yom wɔ ciiti kɑ i go du wɔ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ ndɑ hɛ kɑ i tɛ. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kpɛ mɑnɑ hɛ lɑlɔ fɔ kulu tɛ.
42023042	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii Yesu sɛ: Kpe, n mɑ hɔngɔ hɛɛ sɑɑ kɑ n huro n kpetɛrɛ kunɑ.
42023043	Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Cimi nɑ ɑ go cii n sɛ, hunkunɑ n bo goono ɑ bɑndɑ Nungu Hinno bɛɛnɛ kunɑ.
42023044	À tɔ zɑngɑ zɑɑri weenu bɔm bindi, cɔfɔ kube tɛ lɑɑbu kulu kunɑ kɑlɑ wiciri guuru hinzɑ.
42023045	Weenu kube. Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ lɑbude kɔɔtu bindi kunɑ.
42023046	Cɔfɔ Yesu kuwɑ ndɑ jinde beeri kɑ cii: Bɑɑbɑ, ɑ gɑ kɑ ɑ hundi dɑm n kɑmbɛ. Kɑ Yesu nɑ ngɑ di cii, ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ hundi tɑm.
42023047	Kɑ wɑnguize yom jinehune di hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ, ɑ̀ nɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi kɑ cii: Hɑlɑbɑdɑ, bɔrɔ kpɛ wɔ bɔrɔ cɛsusu nɑ.
42023048	Jɑmɑ di kulu gɑ meigu ko gunɑ. Kɑ ǹ di hɛ yom kɑ ǹ tɛ, ǹ gɑ bɛrɛɛ. Ǹ ye wɑngɑrɑ kɑ kɑ ngei jɛndɛ kɑru binesɛrɛ sɑbu sɛ.
42023049	Beerem kulu kɑ ǹ nɑ Yesu bei ndɑ weibɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ nɑ Yesu dum zɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu ǹ cɛ hɑli jinɑ. Ǹ gɑ gunɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go tɛ.
42023050	Gunɑ, bɔrɔ fɔ goono kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Yosɛfu. Ngɑ mɑ yɑ Yuifu yom ciiti dumbukɔ yom hɑikusu fɔ. Bɔrɔ hinno no. Bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu mɑ nɑ.
42023051	Bɔrɔ ngɑ di mɑnɑ tu ndɑ ǹ sɑwɑri ndɑ ǹ tɛgbei. Alimɑte bɔrɔ nɑ, Yuifu yom wɑngɑrɑ fɔ. Ngɑ mɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ nɑ ɑ̀ go bɑtu.
42023052	Bɔrɔ ngɑ di yɑ kɑɑ Pilɑtu dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ Yesu bukɔɑ.
42023053	Kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ zumɑndi, ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm cɛsɛnjɛ kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm tɑndi sɑɑrɛ fɔ kunɑ kɑ ǹ zozobu. Ǹ mɑnɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu dɑm sɑɑrɛ di kunɑ bɑ ce fɔ.
42023054	Hulonzom hɑnu sɔlu hine no, hulonzom hɑnu bɑ huro.
42023055	Weibɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ dum zɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu, ǹ nɑ Yosɛfu gɑnɑ kɑ di sɑɑrɛ di ndɑ zɑngɑ ǹ nɑ bukɔɑ dɑm ɑ̀ kunɑ.
42023056	Kɑ weibɔrɔ yom di bɛrɛ kɑ ye, ǹ nɑ yɑzi yom ndɑ wɑidi yom sɔlu. Hulonzom hɑnu hine ǹ hulonzom zɑngɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cii.
42024001	Ammɑ jiribi iye ŋmɔne hɑnu sintine kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑlɑhɑdi susubɑ zɑ ndɑ bine weibɔrɔ yom di kɑɑ sɑɑrɛ di dɔ. Ǹ kɑɑndɑ yɑzi yom kɑ ǹ sɔlu.
42024002	Ǹ kɑɑ gɑru ǹ nɑ tondɑ gungure kɑ gɑnɑndi sɑɑrɑ mee gɑɑ.
42024003	Kɑ ǹ huro sɑɑrɑ kunɑ, ǹ mɑnɑ Kpe Yesu bukɔ gɑru.
42024004	À kɑɑ tɔ kɑ weibɔrɔ yom di go biti ndɑ hɛ ngɑ di, cɔfɔ hɑibɔrɔ hinkɑ gɑ cɛ ǹ jɛrɛ gɑɑ. Ǹ gundɑ jiine yom kɑ ǹ go hɑɑgɑ.
42024005	Kɑ hɑmburu nɑ ǹ dii ǹ nɑ bɔm gum gɑndɑ. Hɑibɔrɔ hinkɑ di cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ wom gɑ bɑhunɑ ceeci bukɔ yom gɑme?
42024006	À si nee. À tunu. Wom mɑ hɔngɔ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono Gɑlile lɑɑbu, zɑngɑ ɑ̀ sendi wom sɛ.
42024007	Wom mɑ hɔngɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cii, kɑlɑ de ǹ mɑ ngɑ Adɑmize, dɑm dulumkoni yom kɑmbɛ. Ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji. Jiribi hinzɑntɛ ɑ̀ mɑ tunu kpɛɛnɛ.
42024008	Cɔfɔ weibɔrɔ yom di hɔngɔ Yesu sendi yom.
42024009	Kɑ ǹ gɑnɑ sɑɑrɑ dɔ ǹ kpei hɛ nge yom di deede coobɑɑbɑize wei cindi fɔ di sɛ ndɑ gɑnɑkɔ kulu sɛ.
42024010	Weibɔrɔ yom di neyɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ hɛ yom di cii diyɑ yom sɛ: Mɑriɑmɑ Mɑgɑdɑliɑ ndɑ Joɑnɑ ndɑ Mɑriɑmɑ Yɑkɔfu nyɑ, ndɑ weibɔrɔ fɔ yom mɑ.
42024011	Ammɑ weibɔrɔ yom di sendi yom go himɑ ǹ sɛ zɑngɑ jendi. Ǹ si sendi yom tu cimi.
42024012	Ammɑ Piɛɛ tunu kɑ zuuru kɑ kpei sɑɑrɛ di dɔ. À lingo. À di cɛsɛnjɛ go jisi kɑmbu. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ dirɑ ko mɑmɑci ngɑ bine kunɑ ndɑ hɛ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ.
42024013	Gunɑ hɑnu ngɑ di, coobɑɑbɑize yom ŋmɔne ihinkɑ fɔ mo go dirɑ fɔndɔ bɔm. Ǹ go kpei kpɑɑrɑ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Emɑsu. Kpɑɑrɑ di ndɑ Yerusɑlɛm moore tɔ kilomɛti wei cindi fɔ.
42024014	Ǹ go sendi cɛrɛ sɛ ko fɑɑji hɛ yom di kulu kɑ ǹ tɛ bɔm.
42024015	À kɑɑ tɔ bine kɑ ǹ goono fɑɑji di gɑɑ ko sendi, cɔfɔ Yesu bumbum mɑɑni ko dirɑ ǹ bɑndɑ.
42024016	Ammɑ ǹ moo yom birikɑ kɑlɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ bei.
42024017	A cii ǹ sɛ: Sendi fɔ dimi no wom go tɛ cɛrɛ sɛ wom dirɑ wɔ kunɑ? Ifɔ sɛ wom moodumɑ yom gɑ binesɛrɛ cɛbɛ?
42024018	Cɔfɔ ɑfɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Celopɑ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: N fɔlɔnku hinne yɑ goono Yerusɑlɛm, yɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ bei hɛ yom wɔ kɑ ǹ tɛ jiribi yom wɔ gɑme?
42024019	À cii ǹ sɛ: Hɑli hɛ fɔ dimi yom? Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Hɛ yom kɑ ǹ tɛ kɑ simbɑ Yesu Nɑzɑrɛtu, ɑndebi fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ dɑbɑri gbei kunɑ ndɑ sendi kunɑ Ikpɛ jine ndɑ jɑmɑ kulu jine.
42024020	Ngɑ nɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ i hinikpɛ yom nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm kɑmbɛ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑ kɑ wi. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji.
42024021	I yom wɔ i tɑmmɑ bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ Isirɑilɑ kɑɑ kɑmbɛ. Ammɑ kpɛɛnɛ ndɑ ngɑ di kulu, zɑ hɛ yom di tɛ hunkunɑ yɑ ci ɑ̀ jiribi hinzɑntɛ.
42024022	Ammɑ i kunɑ weibɔrɔ fɔ yom mo nɑ i jirisi kɑ ǹ tunu zɑ ɑsubɑ beeri kɑ kpei sɑɑrɑ dɔ.
42024023	Kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ di bukɔɑ ǹ kɑɑ kɑ cii Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom fɑitɑ ngei sɛ. Ǹ go cii mo ɑ̀ go hunɑ.
42024024	Bɔrɔ fɔ yom kɑ ǹ goono i kunɑ, ngei mɑ kpei sɑɑrɑ dɔ. Ǹ nɑ hɛ kulu gɑru mo zɑngɑ weibɔrɔ yom di nɑ ɑ̀ cii, ɑmmɑ bɔrɔ di wɔ, ǹ mɑnɑ di ɑ̀.
42024025	Cɔfɔ Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: E fɑhɑm zɑmkɔ yom, wom bine yom si wɑɑsu kɑ nɑɑne hɛ kulu kɑ ɑndebi yom cii.
42024026	À himɑ no Mɛsiyɑ mɑ guruguze wɔne yom gɑɑ kɑ huro ngɑ deizɑ kunɑ. À nɑ ci cimi nɑ bɑ?
42024027	Zɑ Moisi gɑɑ kɑlɑ kɑ kpei ɑndebi yom kulu gɑɑ, ɑ̀ sinti kɑ fɑsɑli ǹ sɛ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ yom kulu kunɑ, hɛ yom kɑ ǹ goono kɑ simbɑ ndɑ ngɑ bumbum.
42024028	Kɑ ǹ gɑ mɑɑni kpɑɑrɑ, nungu kɑ ǹ gɑ kpei, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ tɛ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ go bisɑ ngɑ hinne.
42024029	Ammɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tilɑsi kɑ cii: N mɑ gɔrɔ ndɑ i yom nee zɑmɑ wiciri kɑmbu mɑɑni. Weenu bɑ kɑm. À hurɑ kɑ gɔrɔ ǹ dɔ.
42024030	À kɑɑ tɔ bine kɑ ɑ̀ goono tɑbulu gɑɑ ǹ bɑndɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ buuru zɑɑ kɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm ɑ̀ gɑɑ. A nɑ ɑ̀ zenji zenji kɑ fɑrisi ǹ sɛ.
42024031	Cɔfɔ ǹ moo yom feeri. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ bei. Ammɑ ɑ̀ ye kɑ dɛrɛ ǹ sɛ.
42024032	Cɔfɔ ǹ cii cɛrɛ sɛ: À nɑ ci i bine yom fɑihã bɑ, sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ sendi i sɛ fɔndɑ bɔm ndɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ yom fɑsɑli sɛ?
42024033	À gɑɑ no, ǹ tunu kɑ ye Yerusɑlɛm. Ǹ nɑ iwei cindi fɔ di gɑru ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ meigu ǹ bɑndɑ.
42024034	Ǹ gɑ cii: Cimi no, Ikpɛ nɑ Kpe tunɑndi. À fɑitɑ Simɔ sɛ mɑ.
42024035	Bɔrɔ hinkɑ mo deede hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ fɔndɑ bɔm ndɑ zɑngɑ ngei nɑ ɑ̀ bei buuru di zenjiyom gɑɑ.
42024036	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ go hɛ nge yom di cii, Yesu bumbum go cɛ ǹ bindi kunɑ. À cii ǹ sɛ: Lɑɑkɑli kɑne mɑ gɔrɔ wom bɑndɑ.
42024037	Ǹ hɑmburu kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. Ǹ tɑmmɑ gɑndɑ bukɔ nɑ ngei di.
42024038	À cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ wom bine kɔsu? Ifɔ sɛ wom go lɑsɑbu yom wɔ tɛ wom bine yom kunɑ?
42024039	Wɑ gunɑ, ɑ kɑmbɛ yom ndɑ ɑ cee yom. Hɛɛ no. Wom mɑ ɑ hɑmɑ kɑ di, zɑmɑ gɑndɑ bukɔ sindɑ gɑɑhɑm ndɑ biri zɑngɑ ɑ gundɑ zɑngɑ wom go di.
42024040	Ngɑ di ciiyom gɑɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ yom cɛbɛ ǹ sɛ ndɑ ngɑ cee yom.
42024041	Ammɑ ǹ fɑihɑ̀ ndɑ ǹ mɑmɑci sɑbu sɛ ǹ si tu cimi no. À gɑɑ no Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wom gundɑ hɛ fɔ nee kɑ ŋmɑɑ bɑ?
42024042	Ǹ nɑ ciifi dumbɑri bɑndɑntɛ fɔ no ɑ̀ sɛ ndɑ yu fɛntu cɛnɑ fɔ.
42024043	À nɑ ǹ zɑɑ kɑ ŋmɑɑ ǹ jine.
42024044	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Sendi yom kɑ ɑ cii wom sɛ, sɑɑ kɑ ɑ goono wom dɔ neyɑ. Hɛ kulu kɑ ǹ hɑntum ɑ bɔm Moisi fɔndɑ kunɑ ndɑ ɑndebi yom tirɑ yom kunɑ ndɑ Sɑmu yom tirɑ kunɑ, kɑlɑ de ǹ mɑ ǹ kulu tɔnɑndi.
42024045	À nɑ ǹ lɑɑkɑli feeri hɑli ǹ mɑ fɑhɑm ndɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ yom.
42024046	À cii ǹ sɛ: Ǹ hɑntum kɑ cii mɑ, yɑ no kɑlɑ de hɛɛ, Mɛsiyɑ yɑ guruguze. A mɑ tunu mo bukɔei gɑme jiribi hinzɑntɛ.
42024047	Ǹ mɑ wɑɑzu tɛ ɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ hɑndunyɑ dimi kulu sɛ kɑ cii beerem mɑ tuubi dulum yɑɑfɑyom sɑbu sɛ.
42024048	Wom bine yɑ ci hɛ yom wɔ sɛdɑ yom.
42024049	Gunɑ, hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ Bɑɑbɑ ɑlikɑwɑli nɑ ɑ bɑ dɔntɔm wom gɑɑ. Ammɑ wom mɑ gɔrɔ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ kunɑ hɑli Ikpɛ mɑ bɛɛnɛ dɑbɑri dɑm wom gɑɑ.
42024050	À nɑ ǹ boi hɑli Betɑni kpɑɑrɑ. À nɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ sombu bɛɛnɛ kɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm ǹ gɑɑ.
42024051	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm ǹ gɑɑ, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ fee ndei kɑ ziji bɛɛnɛ.
42024052	Ngei mɑ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi. Ǹ bɛrɛ kɑ ye Yerusɑlɛm ndɑ fɑihã bɑmbɑtɑ.
42024053	Sɑɑ kulu ǹ goono Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ kɑ Ikpɛ sifɑ ndɑ sɑɑbuyom. Ami.
43001001	Sendi goono sintine kom. Sendɑ mo goono Ikpɛ bɑndɑ. Sendɑ yɑ ci Ikpɛ.
43001002	À goono, ngɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ sintine kom.
43001003	Ngɑ yɑ nɑ hɛ kulu tɑkɑ. Hɛ fɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ tɑkɑ mɑnɑ tɛ de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ndɑ Sendi di.
43001004	À kunɑ no hundi goono. Hundi mo yɑ ci iburɑdɑm yom kɑɑri.
43001005	Kɑɑri go hɑɑgɑ kube kunɑ. Kube mo mɑnɑ hinɑɑ̀.
43001006	Ikpɛ nɑ bɔrɔ fɔ dɔntɔm, ɑ̀ mɑɑ no Yohɑnnɑ.
43001007	À kɑɑ tɛ sɛdɑ ɑ̀ mɑ sɛdɑ kɑɑri bɔm zɑmɑ bɔrɔ kulu mɑ nɑɑne ɑ̀ dɔ.
43001008	Ngɑ wɔ mɑnɑ ci kɑɑri wɔ bo, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ ɑ̀ mɑ tɛ sɛdɑ kɑɑri bɔm.
43001009	Kɑɑri wɔne yɑ ci kɑɑri cimikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ hɑndunyɑ kɑ kɑɑri bɔrɔ kulu gɑɑ.
43001010	À goono hɑndunyɑ. Ngɑ mo yɑ nɑ hɑndunyɑ tɛ ɑmmɑ hɑndunyɑ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ bei.
43001011	À kɑɑ ngɑ ŋmɔne yom dɔ ɑmmɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ tɑ.
43001012	Ammɑ beerem kulu kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɑ kɑ nɑɑne ɑ̀ mɑɑ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ no dɑbɑri ǹ mɑ ci Ikpɛ ize yom.
43001013	Ǹ mɑnɑ ǹ hɛi kuri dɔ wɑlɑ iburɑdɑm bineibɑɑi dɔ wɑlɑ hɑibɔrɔ binebɑɑ dɔ. Ammɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ hɛi Ikpɛ dɔ.
43001014	Sendi di bine tɛ gɑɑhɑm. À gɔrɔ i gɑme. I di ɑ̀ deizɑ, deizɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Ize fɔlɔnku ŋmɔne kɑ ɑ̀ hunu zɑ Bɑɑbɑ dɔ. À tɔ ndɑ gomini ndɑ cimi.
43001015	Yohɑnnɑ tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ sɛdɑ. À nɑ ngɑ jinde zɑɑ kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kpɛ bɔm no ɑ go wɔne cii, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ ɑ bɑndɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ jinɑ mo. À goono zɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ɑ hɛi.
43001016	I kulu du bɑ ɑ̀ tɔyom gɑɑ. I du gomini mo gomini bɔm.
43001017	Moisi gɑɑ no Ikpɛ nɑ fɔndɑ no, ɑmmɑ gomini ndɑ cimi hunu Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ.
43001018	Bɔrɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ di Ikpɛ bɑ ce fɔ. Ize fɔlɔnku kɑ ɑ̀ goono Bɑɑbɑ jɛndɛ kunɑ, ngɑ yɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ.
43001019	Sɛdɑ bine neyɑ kɑ Yohɑnnɑ tɛ sɑɑ kɑ Yuifu yom nɑ gɑrɑndikɔ yom ndɑ Lefi bɔrɔ yom dɔntɔm zɑ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ hã. Ǹ cii: Ni, ni no mee?
43001020	À bine cii ndɑ ngɑ mee, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ze. À cii: Hɛɛ wɔ, yɑ nɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ.
43001021	Ǹ bine nɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ cii: To, ni no mee? Ni no Eli? À cii: Yɑ nɑ ci ngɑ. Ǹ cii: Ni no ɑndebi di? À tu kɑ cii. Awo.
43001022	Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Yɑ di gɑɑ, cii i sɛ ni no mee? N mɑ cii zɑmɑ i mɑ kpei yɑɑrɑ beerem kɑ ǹ nɑ i dɔntɔm sɛ. Ifɔ n go cii ni bumbum n bɔm?
43001023	À tu ndɑ sendi kɑ ɑndebi Esɑyi hɑntum kɑ cii: "Hɛɛ yɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ jinde go kuwɑ gɑnji kunɑ kɑ cii: Wom mɑ Kpe fɔndɔ cɛɑndi."
43001024	Beerem kɑ ǹ dɔntɔm mo Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom no.
43001025	Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ cii: Ifɔ sɛ n go mirɑndi de n mɑnɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ, n mɑnɑ ci Eli, n mɑnɑ ci ɑndebi di?
43001026	Yohɑnnɑ bine tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: A go mirɑndi ndɑ hɑri ɑmmɑ bɔrɔ fɔ go cɛ wom bindi kunɑ kɑ wom si ɑ̀ bei.
43001027	Ngɑ yɑ ci wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ ɑ bɑndɑ. À nɑ ɑ jinɑ. Yɑ nɑ tɔ yɑ ye gɑndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɑɑmu yom kɑɑ.
43001028	Nge yom di tɛ Betɑbɑrɑ kpɑɑrɑ Yudum isɑ bisɑntɛ, nungu kɑ Yohɑnnɑ go mirɑndi hɑri kunɑ.
43001029	À mo bo, Yohɑnnɑ di Yesu go kɑɑ ngɑ dɔ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii: Gunɑ, Ikpɛ Feejiize kɑ ɑ̀ go hɑndunyɑ dulum kɑɑ.
43001030	À bɔm no ɑ̀ go wɔne cii: À bɑndɑ bɔrɔ fɔ go kɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ jinɑ, zɑmɑ ɑ̀ goono zɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ɑ hɛi.
43001031	Hɛɛ wɔ, yɑ nɑ ɑ̀ bei. Ammɑ zɑmɑ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ Isirɑilɑ sɛ no, ɑ kɑɑ ko mirɑndi ndɑ hɑri.
43001032	Yohɑnnɑ bine tɛ sɛdɑ kɑ cii: A di Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ go zumbu zɑ bɛɛnɛ zɑngɑ gutu kɑ gɔrɔ ɑ̀ bɔm.
43001033	Hɛɛ wɔ, yɑ nɑ bei. Ammɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm yɑ mirɑndi ndɑ hɑri. À cii ɑ sɛ: Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bɔm n kɑɑ di Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ go zumbu kɑ gɔrɔ ɑ̀ bɔm, ngɑ yɑ kɑɑ mirɑndi ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ.
43001034	A bine di ko tɛ sɛdɑ mo bɔrɔ kpɛ wɔ Ikpɛ Ize no.
43001035	Mo yɑɑrɑ kɑ bo, Yohɑnnɑ go cɛ ndɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom ŋmɔne ihinkɑ.
43001036	Kɑ ɑ̀ go Yesu gunɑ ɑ̀ go bisɑ, ɑ̀ cii: Gunɑ, Ikpɛ Feejiizɑ.
43001037	Coobɑɑbɑize hinkɑ di mɑɑ Yohɑnnɑ go sendi yɑ di. Ǹ nɑ Yesu gɑnɑ.
43001038	Yesu zogu kɑ di ei ǹ go dɛcɛ ngɑ bɑndɑ. À cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ wom go ceeci? Ǹ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Coobɑɑbɑ, mɑni n goono ndɑ gɔrɛ? Coobɑɑbɑ feeriji yɑ ci cooɑndikɔ.
43001039	À cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ kɑɑ di. Ǹ kpei. Ǹ di nungu kɑ ɑ̀ goono ndɑ gɔrɛ. Ǹ gɔrɔ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ zɑ wiciri guuru tɑɑci zɑkɑ.
43001040	Bɔrɔ hinkɑ di kɑ ǹ mɑɑ Yohɑnnɑ go sendi kɑ ǹ nɑ Yesu gɑnɑ, ǹ kunɑ ɑfɔ neyɑ, Andɛrɛ, Simɔ Piɛɛ cɛɛnɛ.
43001041	Ngɑ yɑ jinɑ kɑ di ngɑ bɛɛrɛ Simɔ kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: I di Mɛsiyɑ. Mɛsiyɑ mɑɑ feeriji yɑ ci Kirisiti, Ikpɛ Suubɑni.
43001042	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ kpeindɑ Simɔ Yesu dɔ. Yesu nɑ ɑ̀ gunɑ kɑ cii: Ni no Simɔ, Yonɑsi koo. Mɑɑsɑ ǹ gɑ n cɛɛ Sefɑ. À mɑɑ feeriji yɑ ci Piɛɛ.
43001043	Mo bo Yesu bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ kpei Gɑlile lɑɑbu. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ di Filipu. À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A gɑnɑ.
43001044	Filipu bine Betɑsɑidɑ bɔrɔ no, Andɛrɛ ndɑ Piɛɛ kpɑɑrɑ no.
43001045	Filipu di Nɑtɑni kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: I di wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bɔm Moisi hɑntum fɔndɑ kunɑ ndɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bɔm ɑndebi yom mo hɑntum. Ngɑ yɑ ci Yesu Nɑzɑrɛtu bɔrɔ, Yosɛfu koo.
43001046	Nɑtɑni cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Hɛ fɔ hinno hini kɑ hunu Nɑzɑrɛtu dee? Filipu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Kɑɑ di.
43001047	Yesu di Nɑtɑni go kɑɑ ngɑ dɔ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ sendi ɑ̀ bɔm kɑ cii: Gunɑ, Isirɑilɑ bɔrɔ noyɑ ndɑ cimi kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ gulinci.
43001048	Nɑtɑni cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Mɑni n nɑ ɑ bei? Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Zɑ Filipu mɑnɑ n cɛɛ, ɑ di ni sɑɑ kɑ n goono jee nyɑ di cire.
43001049	Nɑtɑni tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Coobɑɑbɑ,ni yɑ Ikpɛ Ize no. Ni yɑ Isirɑilɑ gɑndɑkpɛ no.
43001050	Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: N go nɑɑne dee zɑmɑ ɑ cii ɑ di ni jee nyɑ di cire? N kɑɑ di hɛ fɔ yom kɑ ǹ beeri kɑ bisɑ wɔne yom.
43001051	Yesu bine cii ɑ̀ sɛ. Cimi cimi, ɑ go cii wom sɛ, hɑnu fɔ wom kɑɑ di bɛɛnɛ feeri. Wom kɑɑ di Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom mo go kɑɑru ko zumbu ɑ bɔm, hɛɛ Adɑmize.
43002001	Jiribi hinzɑntɛ fɔ tɛ hije Kɑnɑ kpɑɑrɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu. Yesu nyɑ goono hije di dɔ.
43002002	Ǹ nɑ Yesu ndɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom mo cɛɛ hijɑ dɔ.
43002003	À bine kɑɑ tɔ dufɛ̃ gɑziɑ. Yesu nyɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ǹ sindɑ dufɛ.
43002004	Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Wei wɔ, ifɔ yɑ goono hɛɛ ndɑ ni gɑme kɑ simbɑ ndɑ ngɑ di? A lɔkɑci mɑnɑ kɑɑ jinɑ.
43002005	À nyɑ di cii gbeiize yom sɛ: Wɑ tɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ cii wom sɛ.
43002006	Tondi gulɑ idu bine goono hɑri dɑmyom dɔ. Ǹ nɑ ǹ jisi no Yuifu yom hinnɑndiyom ɑlɑɑdɑ sɛ. Afɔ kulu yɑ neesiji zɑngu zɑkɑ.
43002007	Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ gulɑ yom wɔ tɔnɑndi ndɑ hɑri. Ǹ nɑ ǹ tɔnɑndi kɑlɑ ǹ hɑngɑ.
43002008	À cii ǹ sɛ: Mɑɑsɑnkulu wɑ kuu kɑ kpeindɑɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrikpɛ dɔ. Ǹ kpeindɑɑ̀.
43002009	Ŋmɑɑrikpɛ di nɑ hɑri kɑ ɑ̀ ye dufɛ tɑbɑɑ. À bine mɑnɑ bei nungu kɑ ɑ̀ hunu. Ammɑ gbeiize yom di kɑ ǹ nɑ hɑri di kuu bei. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ hɑruhiji di cɛɛ.
43002010	À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Dufɛ̃ hinno no bɔrɔ kulu cini jinɑ kɑ fɑrisi. Sɑɑ kɑ bɔrɔ kulu hɑm kɑ kungu, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ǹ mɑ kɑɑndɑ wɔ kɑ si kɑɑni. Ammɑ ni wɔ, dufɛ hinno no ǹ jisi hɑli mɑɑsɑ.
43002011	Alɑmu yom ŋmɔne sintine noyɑ kɑ Yesu tɛ Kɑnɑ kpɑɑrɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu. À nɑ ngɑ deizɑ kɑɑtɛrɛ. À coobɑɑbɑize yom nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ mo.
43002012	Ngɑ di bɑndɑ ɑ̀ kpei Kɑpɛnɑum kpɑɑrɑ. À nyɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛnɛ yom ndɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom kpei ɑ̀ bɑndɑ. Ǹ mɑnɑ gɔrɔ kpɑɑrɑ di kɑ jɛ.
43002013	Yuifu yom Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru bine mɑɑni. Yesu kpei Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ.
43002014	Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ no, ɑ̀ no beerem gɑru kɑ ǹ go hɑuyeji yom ndɑ feeji yom ndɑ gutu yom neerɑ. Nooru bɑrimekɔ yom mo go gɔrɔ nodi.
43002015	À nɑ bulɑɑlɑ tɛ ndɑ kɔrɔfɔ. À nɑ ǹ kulu gɑɑrɛ kɑ kɑɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ zɑ feeji yom hɑli hɑuyeji yom di. À nɑ nooru bɑrimekɔ yom mo nooru kulu see kɑ tɑbulu yom hɑngɑsɑndi.
43002016	À cii gutu neerɑkɔ yom sɛ: Wom mɑ hɛ yom wɔ kɑɑ nee. Wɑ si ɑ Bɑɑbɑ gɔrɛ dɔ tɛ dei kɑ neerɑ dɔ.
43002017	À coobɑɑbɑize yom hɔngɔ kɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "N gɔrɛ dɔ niyɑ nɑ ɑ bine dii".
43002018	Ngɑ di sɛ Yuifu yom tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Zɑ kɑ n go tɛ zɑngɑ yɑ, ɑlɑmu fɔ no n gɑ i cɛbɛ?
43002019	Yesu bine tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wɑ Ikpɛ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ zeeri, jiribi hinzɑ gɑme ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi.
43002020	À gɑɑ no Yuifu yom cii: Jiiri weitɑɑci cindi idu no ǹ tɛ kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ cini, ni wɔ, n gɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi jiribi hinzɑ gɑme no?
43002021	Ammɑ Yesu cɛ go sendi no ngɑ gɑɑhɑm bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ bɑrɑ zɑngɑ fuu.
43002022	À sɛ no, sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tunu bukɔ yom gɑme, ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom hɔngɔ kɑ ɑ̀ jinɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cii. Ǹ cimɑndi Ikpɛ Sendɑ gɑɑ ndɑ sendɑ mo kɑ Yesu jinɑ kɑ cii.
43002023	Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu goono Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru di dɔ, bɔrɔ boobo nɑɑne ɑ̀ mɑɑ gɑɑ kɑ ǹ di ɑlɑmu yom kɑ ɑ̀ go tɛ.
43002024	Ammɑ Yesu wɔ mɑnɑ nɑɑne ǹ gɑɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ go bɔrɔ kulu bine bei.
43002025	À si bɑɑ ǹ mɑ bɔrɔ fɔ sɛdɑ ngɑ sɛ mo zɑmɑ ɑ̀ bumbum go bei hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɔrɔ kunɑ.
43003001	Ammɑ bɔrɔ fɔ goono Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Nikodim. Yuifu yom jinɑ fɔ no.
43003002	À bine kɑɑ Yesu dɔ ciini kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Coobɑɑbɑ, i go bei ni wɔ, ni yɑ cooɑndikɔ no kɑ ɑ̀ hunu zɑ Ikpɛ dɔ. Bɔrɔ si hini kɑ ɑlɑmu yom wɔ tɛ kɑ n go tɛ kɑlɑ de Ikpɛ goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ.
43003003	Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Cimi cimi ɑ go cii n sɛ: De ǹ mɑnɑ bɔrɔ hɛi iteji, ɑ̀ si hini kɑ di Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ.
43003004	Nikodim cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Mɛtɛ ǹ tɛ kɑ hini kɑ bɔrɔ hɛi sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ zeeni kɔ? À hini kɑ huro kpɛɛnɛ ngɑ nyɑ gunde ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ hɛi?
43003005	Yesu mo tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Cimi cimi ɑ go cii n sɛ, de ǹ mɑnɑ bɔrɔ hɛi hɑri ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ, ɑ̀ si hini kɑ huro Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ kunɑ.
43003006	Hɛ kɑ ǹ hɛi gɑɑhɑm dɔ, gɑɑhɑm no. Hɛ kɑ ǹ hɛi Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ, biyɑ no.
43003007	N mɑ si mɑmɑci ndɑ kɑ ɑ go cii n sɛ, tilɑsi kɑlɑ ǹ mɑ n hɛi iteji.
43003008	Hɛo go fɑɑru nungu kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ. N go mɑɑ ɑ̀ yɔgɔi ɑmmɑ n si bei zɑ mɑni ɑ̀ go hunu wɑlɑ nungu kɑ ɑ̀ go kpei. Yɑ mo no bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ǹ hɛi Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ.
43003009	Nikodim tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Mɛtɛ no wɔne hini kɑ tɛ?
43003010	Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Ni yɑ Isirɑilɑ cooɑndikɔ no, ɑmmɑ n si fɑhɑm ndɑ hɛ yom wɔ bɑ?
43003011	Cimi cimi ɑ go cii n sɛ, hɛ kɑ i bei no i go cii. Hɛ kɑ i di mo ɑ̀ sɛdɑ no i go tɛ. Wom bine si kɑ i sɛdɑ tɑ.
43003012	Wom si nɑɑne de ɑ go hɑndunyɑ hɛ yom sendi tɛ wom sɛ. To. Mɛtɛ wom tɛ kɑ nɑɑne de ɑ go bɛɛnɛ ŋmɔne yom sendi tɛ wom sɛ?
43003013	Bɔrɔ kulu mɑnɑ kɑɑru bɛɛnɛ kɑlɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ zumbu zɑ bɛɛnɛ, wɑtom hɛɛ Adɑmize kɑ ɑ goono bɛɛnɛ kunɑ.
43003014	Zɑngɑ Moisi nɑ gondi sombu bɛɛnɛ gɑnji kunɑ, yɑ no tilɑsi ǹ mɑ hɛɛ, Adɑmize mo sombu.
43003015	Ngɑ di mɑ tɛ no zɑmɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne ɑ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ si hɑlɑci ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ du hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni.
43003016	Ikpɛ bɑɑ hɑndunyɑ beerem kɑlɑ kɑlɑ hɑli ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ no ngɑ Ize fɔlɔnku. Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ si hɑlɑci ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ du hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni.
43003017	Ikpɛ mɑnɑ ngɑ Izɑ dɔntɔm hɑndunyɑ ɑ̀ mɑ hɑndunyɑ beerem ciiti kɑ zeeri bo. Ammɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔm hɑndunyɑ beerem mɑ du fɑɑbɑ ɑ̀ dɔ.
43003018	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ, ǹ si ɑ̀ ciiti kɑ zeeri. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ nɑɑne ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ ciiti kɑ zeeri kɔ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ nɑɑne Ikpɛ Ize fɔlɔnkuɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ.
43003019	Ciiti kɑ zeeri yɑ ci kɑ kɑɑri kɑɑ hɑndunyɑ ɑmmɑ kube sɑbɑ beerem sɛ kɑ bisɑ kɑɑri zɑmɑ ǹ gbei yom ilɑlɔ yom no.
43003020	Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go gbei lɑlɔ tɛ, ɑkpɛ go hungu kɑɑri. À bine si kɑɑ kɑɑri dɔ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ gbei yom mɑ si hunutɛrɛ.
43003021	Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go cimi gbei tɛ, ɑ̀ go kɑɑ kɑɑri dɔ hɑli ɑ̀ gbei yom mɑ hunutɛrɛ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ tɛ no Ikpɛ kunɑ.
43003022	Nge yom di bɑndɑ, Yesu ndɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom kɑɑ Yude lɑɑbu. À gɔrɔ nodi ko mirɑndi.
43003023	Yohɑnnɑ mo go mirɑndi Enɔ gooru kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑni Sɑlim kpɑɑrɑ, zɑmɑ nodi gundɑ hɑri boobo. Beerem go kɑɑ nungu di ɑ̀ mɑ ngei mirɑndi.
43003024	Ǹ mɑnɑ Yohɑnnɑ dɑm kɑsu jinɑ.
43003025	Kɑkɔ fɔ mo tunu Yohɑnnɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom ndɑ Yuifu yom gɑme kɑ simbɑ ndɑ hinnɑndiyom ɑlɑɑdɑ.
43003026	Ǹ kɑɑ Yohɑnnɑ dɔ kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Coobɑɑbɑ, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono n bɑndɑ hɑli Yudum isɑ bisɑntɛ, ngɑ kɑ n tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ sɛdɑ, gunɑ ɑ̀ go mirɑndi. Ǹ kulu bine go kpei ɑ̀ dɔ.
43003027	Yohɑnnɑ tu kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kulu si hini kɑ du hɛ fɔ kulu kɑlɑ de ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ no ndɑ zɑ bɛɛnɛ.
43003028	Wom bumbum, wom go tɛ ɑ sɛdɑ kɑ ɑ cii yɑ nɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ, ɑmmɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm Mɛsiyɑ jine.
43003029	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ weihiji, ngɑ yɑ ci hɑruhiji. Ammɑ hɑruhiji kpɑɑsi kɑ ɑ̀ goono ɑ̀ dɔ ko hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ, ɑ̀ go fɑihã kɑlɑ kɑlɑ hɑruhijɑ jinde sɑbu sɛ. À binekɑɑne noyɑ, ɑ̀ tɔ mo.
43003030	Kɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ tɔntɔnu, hɛɛ mo yɑ zobu.
43003031	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ goono hɛ kulu bɔm. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hunu hɑndunyɑ, hɑndunyɑ bɔrɔ no. À bo sendi no hɑndunyɑ hɛ yom bɔm. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ ɑ̀ goono hɛ kulu bɔm.
43003032	À go tɛ sɛdɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ di ndɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ bɔm. Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mo si kɑ ɑ̀ sɛdɑ tu.
43003033	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ sɛdɑ tu, ɑkpɛ wɔ nɑ ngɑ sɛdɑ dɑm noyɑ kɑ Ikpɛ yɑ ci cimikpɛ.
43003034	Ngɑ wɔ kɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔm, Ikpɛ sendi no ɑ̀ go cii zɑmɑ Ikpɛ si kɑ ɑ̀ no Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ ndɑ neesiji.
43003035	Bɑɑbɑ go bɑɑ Ize. À nɑ hɛ kulu dɑm ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ kunɑ mo.
43003036	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne Ize di gɑɑ gundɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si nɑɑne Izɑ gɑɑ si du hundi pɑi, ɑmmɑ Ikpɛ binetɔnɛ goono ɑ̀ bɔm.
43004001	Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom mɑɑ ǹ go cii Yesu go du coobɑɑbɑize yom kɑ mirɑndi kɑ bisɑ Yohɑnnɑ.
43004002	Ammɑ Yesu bumbum si beerem mirɑndi. À coobɑɑbɑize yom no.
43004003	Sɑɑ kɑ Kpe mɑɑ ngɑ di, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ hunu Yude lɑɑbu kɑ ye Gɑlile lɑɑbu.
43004004	Tilɑsi bine kɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ gɑnɑ Sɑmɑri lɑɑbu.
43004005	À tɔ Sɑmɑri lɑɑbu kpɑɑrɑ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Sikɑru. À mɑɑni gɑndɑ fɔ dɔ kɑ Yɑkɔfu nɑ ngɑ koo Yosɛfu no.
43004006	Dee fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Yɑkɔfu ŋmɔne mo goono lɑɑbu di kunɑ. Kɑ Yesu fɑrigɑ ndɑ diro di, ɑ̀ gɔrɔ dee di hɑngɑ gɑɑ. Zɑɑri bindi zɑkɑ.
43004007	Sɑmɑriɑncɛ weibɔrɔ fɔ kɑɑ hɑri guru. Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: À no hɑri yɑ hɑm.
43004008	À coobɑɑbɑize yom di mo kpei kpɑɑrɑ kɑ ŋmɑɑri dei.
43004009	Sɑmɑriɑncɛ weibɔrɔ di cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ni Yuifu, mɛtɛ n tɛ kɑ ɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ hɑri kɑ hɑm, hɛɛ Sɑmɑriɑncɛ weibɔrɔ? Yuifu yom ndɑ Sɑmɑriɑncɛ yom gɑme ǹ sindɑ sɑbɑ.
43004010	Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: De n nɑ Ikpɛ noyom bei ndɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go sendi n sɛ kɑ cii ɑ no hɑri yɑ hɑm, dom ni bumbum, n gɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ hɑri kɑ hɑm. À gɑ n no hɑri hundikoni.
43004011	Weibɔrɔ di cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe, n sindɑ hɛ fɔ kɑ n mɑ guru ndɑ. Dee di bine guusu. Mɑni no n gundɑ hɑri hundikoni wɔ?
43004012	N beeri kɑ bisɑ i cɛɛ Yɑkɔfu no kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ i no dee wɔ? Ngɑ bumbum bine hɑm ɑ̀ gɑɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ koo yom ndɑ ɑ̀ memunu yom.
43004013	Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ hɑri wɔne hɑm, ɑ̀ ye kɑ mɑɑ jo.
43004014	Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ hɑri kɑ ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ no hɑm, ɑ̀ si mɑɑ jo pɑi. Hɑri kɑ ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ no ɑ̀ kɑɑ ye fɔci ɑkpɛ kunɑ, ɑ̀ mo boosu kɑ tɔ kɑlɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni gɑɑ.
43004015	Weibɔrɔ di cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Hɑru wɔ, ɑ no hɑri ngɑ di zɑmɑ yɑ si mɑɑ jo kpɛɛnɛ. Yɑ si kɑɑ hɑri guru nee mo kpɛɛnɛ.
43004016	Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpei, n mɑ n kunye cɛɛ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑ nee.
43004017	Weibɔrɔ di tu kɑ cii: A sindɑ kunye. Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N gundɑ cimi kɑ n cii n sindɑ kunye.
43004018	Kunye gu no n du. Bɔrɔ kɑ n gundɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci n kunye. Yɑ di gɑɑ, n nɑ cimi cii.
43004019	Weibɔrɔ di cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Hɑru wɔ, ɑ di ni wɔ ɑndebi no.
43004020	I cɛɛ yom nɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi tondi kuku wɔ bɔm. Wom Yuifu yom mo, wom go cii kɑlɑ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ no bɔrɔ mɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi.
43004021	Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Wei wɔ, n mɑ ɑ nɑɑne. Lɔkɑci go kɑɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ci tondi kuku wɔ bɔm, wɑlɑ Yerusɑlɛm no wom kɑɑ Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi.
43004022	Wom go hɛ kɑ wom si bei bɛɛrɑndi. I yom wɔ, i bei hɛ kɑ i go bɛɛrɑndi zɑmɑ zɑ Yuifu yom dɔ no fɑɑbɑ hunu.
43004023	Ammɑ lɔkɑci go kɑɑ. À bine kɑɑ kɔ, sɑɑ kɑ bɛɛrɑndikɔ cimi cimi kɑɑ Bɑɑbɑ bɛɛrɑndi Biyɑ kunɑ ndɑ cimi kunɑ. Beerem wɔ dimi no Bɑɑbɑ go ceeci ǹ mɑ ci ngɑ bɛɛrɑndikɔ yom.
43004024	Ikpɛ yɑ Biyɑ no. Beerem kɑ ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi, ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi Biyɑ kunɑ ndɑ cimi kunɑ.
43004025	Weibɔrɔ di cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A bei kɑ Mɛsiyɑ go kɑɑ, wɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Ikpɛ Suubɑni. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ hɛ kulu kɑɑtɛrɛ i sɛ.
43004026	Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Hɛɛ wɔ, kɑ ɑ go sendi n sɛ, hɛɛ yɑ ci ngɑ.
43004027	Sɑɑ di no ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom kɑɑ. Mɑmɑci nɑ ǹ dii ndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go sendi ndɑ weibɔrɔ di. Ammɑ bɑ ɑfɔ mɑnɑ cii, ifɔ n go ceeci wɑlɑ ifɔ sɛ n go sendi ɑ̀ sɛ?
43004028	Weibɔrɔ di no ngɑ guru gɑɑsu jisi kɑ kpei wɑngɑrɑ. À cii wɑngɑrɑ hɑibɔrɔ yom sɛ:
43004029	Wɑ kɑɑ di bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cii ɑ sɛ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ jinɑ kɑ tɛ. À mɑnɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ dee?
43004030	Cɔfɔ beerem hunu wɑngɑrɑ kɑ kɑɑ Yesu dɔ.
43004031	À gɑɑ no ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom mo go kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ kɑ cii: Coobɑɑbɑ, ŋmɑɑ.
43004032	Ammɑ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Hɛɛ wɔ ɑ gundɑ ŋmɑɑri fɔ kɑ wom si ɑ̀ bei.
43004033	Coobɑɑbɑize yom cii cɛrɛ sɛ: Bɔrɔ fɔ kɑɑndɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ŋmɑɑri no?
43004034	Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: A ŋmɑɑri yɑ ci wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm yɑ ɑ̀ binebɑɑ tɛ, yɑ ɑ̀ gbei mo tɔnɑndi.
43004035	Wom yɑ cini cii hɑndu tɑɑci yɑ goono hɑli hemɑru. À nɑ ci yɑ no bɑ? A go cii wom sɛ, wɑ bɔm tunɑndi kɑ fɑri yom gunɑ. Ǹ kpɑrɛ kɔ kɑ tɔ wiyom.
43004036	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go fɑri wi du tukunsi. À go liibɑ meigu hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni sɛ, hɑli bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go dumɑ ndɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go wi, ǹ mɑ fɑihã mefɔ.
43004037	Yɑ no sendi wɔne cimi no kɑ ɑ̀ cii, ɑfɔ go dumɑ, ɑfɔ go wi.
43004038	À nɑ wom dɔntɔm wiyom hɛ kɑ wom mɑnɑ ɑ̀ tɑɑbi tɛ. Bɔrɔ fɔ yom yɑ nɑ ɑ̀ tɑɑbi tɛ. Wom huro ǹ tɑɑbi kunɑ.
43004039	Wɑngɑrɑ ngɑ di, Sɑmɑriɑncɛ boobo nɑɑne Yesu gɑɑ weibɔrɔ di sendɑ sɑbu sɛ. Weibɔrɔ di tɛ sɛdɑ kɑ cii: Hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ jinɑ kɑ tɛ, ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ cii ɑ sɛ.
43004040	Sɑɑ kɑ Sɑmɑriɑncɛ yom kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ, ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ gɔrɔ ngei dɔ. À gɔrɔ nungu di jiribi hinkɑ.
43004041	Bɔrɔ boobo nɑɑne kɑ tɔntɔnu Yesu bumbum sendɑ sɑbu sɛ.
43004042	Cɔfɔ ǹ cii weibɔrɔ di sɛ: À mɑnɑ ci hɛ kɑ n cii di sɛ no i go nɑɑne bo ɑmmɑ i bumbum mɑɑ ɑ̀ sɛ. I go bei bɔrɔ kpɛ hɑlɑbɑdɑ hɑndunyɑ Fɑɑbɑkɔ no, Mɛsiyɑ no.
43004043	Jiribi hinkɑ di bɑndɑ, Yesu tunu zɑ nungu di kɑ kpei Gɑlile lɑɑbu.
43004044	Yesu bumbum cii kɑ ɑndebi sindɑ bɛɛrɛ ngɑ lɑɑbu kunɑ.
43004045	Ngɑ di sɛ, sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ Gɑlile lɑɑbu. Gɑlile bɔrɔ yom nɑ ɑ̀ kube ihinno kɑ ǹ di hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ jingɑru fɔ jiribi yom gɑɑ. Ngei mo kpei jingɑruɑ dɔ.
43004046	Yesu ye Kɑnɑ kpɑɑrɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu nungu kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ hɑri bɛrɛ dufɛ. Kɑpɛnɑum kpɑɑrɑ gundɑ bɔrɔ beeri fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ koo sindɑ bɑɑni.
43004047	Kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ ǹ cii Yesu hunu zɑ Yude lɑɑbu kɑ kɑɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu, ɑ̀ kpei ɑ̀ dɔ. À nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑ kɑ ngɑ koo no bɑɑni zɑmɑ ɑ̀ bɑ bu.
43004048	Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: De wom mɑnɑ di ɑlɑmu yom ndɑ mɑmɑci yom wom si nɑɑne pɑi.
43004049	Bɔrɔ beeri di cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe, n mɑ kɑɑ hɑli ɑ koo wɔ bu.
43004050	Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpei, n koo go hunɑ. Bɔrɔ di bine nɑɑne sendɑ kɑ Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ. À kpei.
43004051	Kɑ ɑ̀ go kpei cɔfɔ ɑ̀ tɑm yom nɑ ɑ̀ kube. Ǹ kɑɑndɑ bɑɑru wɔne ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: N koo go hunɑ.
43004052	À nɑ ǹ hã lɔkɑci fɔ no ɑ̀ tɛ dɑɑmɑ. Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Bi zɑɑri guuru fɔ no gɑɑwɑsɑ bisɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
43004053	Bɑɑbɑ di hɔngɔ kɑ lɔkɑci ngɑ di no Yesu cii ngɑ sɛ: N koo go hunɑ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑɑne, ngɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ fuu kulu.
43004054	Alɑmu hinkɑntɛ noyɑ kɑ Yesu tɛ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu Yude lɑɑbu kɑ kɑɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu.
43005001	Ngɑ di bɑndɑ Yuifu yom jingɑru fɔ tɔ. Yesu kpei Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ.
43005002	Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ kunɑ Feeji yom Hundi mee jɛrɛ gɑɑ gundɑ bɑngu fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Ebulu cinɛ kunɑ Betɑsedɑ. Nungu di gundɑ tɑfɑɑ gu.
43005003	Tɑfɑɑ yom di cire no doorikom boobo goono ko kɑni. Dɑnɑm yom ndɑ simbɑrukɔ yom ndɑ mɔngɔlɔ yom mo goono ǹ kunɑ. [Ǹ go hɑri tunɑndiyom bɑtu.
43005004	Ǹ go bɑtu no zɑmɑ lɔkɑci kɑ kɑɑ lɔkɑci Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize fɔ cini zumbu bɑnguɑ kunɑ kɑ hɑri di tunɑndi. Zɛnjɛkom kɑ ɑ̀ jinɑ kɑ huro sɑɑ kɑ hɑri di tunu, ɑ̀ du bɑɑni zɑngɑ ɑ̀ doori bɑrɑ ndɑ kulu.]
43005005	Zɛnjɛkom fɔ goono nungu di kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ bɑɑni jiiri weitɑɑci ihinkɑ si.
43005006	Yesu di zɛnjɛkom di go kɑni. Zɑ kɑ Yesu bei kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ bɑɑni zɑ jɛyom, ɑ̀ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N bɑɑ n mɑ du bɑɑni bɑ?
43005007	Zɛnjɛkom di tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Kpe, ɑ sindɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ɑ dɑm bɑngu wɔ kunɑ sɑɑ kɑ hɑri di tunu. Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ go kpei mo, cɔfɔ bɔrɔ fɔ go kɑ ɑ jinɑ no.
43005008	Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Tunu, n dɑɑri cɛnɑ zɑɑ kɑ dirɑ.
43005009	Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ bɔrɔ di du bɑɑni. À nɑ ngɑ dɑɑri cɛnɑ zɑɑ kɑ dirɑ. Hulonzom hɑnu hine no.
43005010	À sɛ no Yuifu yom cii bɔrɔ di kɑ Yesu no bɑɑni sɛ: Hulonzom hɑnu hine no. À mɑnɑ hɑlɑli n sɛ n mɑ n dɑɑri cɛnɑ zɑɑ.
43005011	À tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ no bɑɑni, ɑ̀ cii ɑ sɛ no: N dɑɑri cɛnɑ zɑɑ kɑ dirɑ.
43005012	Bine ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ cii: Mee no bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cii n sɛ n dɑɑri cɛnɑ zɑɑ kɑ dirɑ?
43005013	Ammɑ bɔrɔ di mɑnɑ bei mee yɑ nɑ ngɑ no bɑɑni zɑmɑ Yesu hunu jɑmɑ di kunɑ.
43005014	Nge yom di bɑndɑ, Yesu di bɔrɔ di Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ. À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Gunɑ, n du bɑɑni. N mɑ si dulum tɛ kpɛɛnɛ hɑli hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ jɑɑsɑ wɔne, ɑ̀ mɑ si tɔ ni kpɛɛnɛ.
43005015	Bɔrɔ di kpei cii Yuifu yom sɛ kɑ Yesu yɑ nɑ ngɑ no bɑɑni.
43005016	A sɛ no Yuifu yom nɑ Yesu guruguzɑndi. Ǹ ceeci ngei mɑ ɑ̀ wi zɑmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ hɛ nge yom di tɛ hulonzom hɑnu hine.
43005017	Ammɑ Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii, A bɑɑbɑ go gbei tɛ hɑli mɑɑsɑ. Hɛɛ mo, ɑ go gbei tɛ.
43005018	Ngɑ di sɛ no Yuifu yom ye kɑ ceeci ngei mɑ ɑ̀ wi. À mɑnɑ ci zɑmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ hulonzom hɑnu hine sɑrɑ bo, ɑmmɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ cii Ikpɛ yɑ ngɑ Bɑɑbɑ no ko kɑ ngɑ bɔm sɑsɑbɑndi ndɑ Ikpɛ.
43005019	Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Cimi cimi, ɑ go cii wom sɛ, hɛɛ Ize, ɑ si hini kɑ hɛ fɔ kulu tɛ ɑ bɔm gɑɑ. Ammɑ ɑ go tɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ di ɑ Bɑɑbɑ go tɛ. Hɛ kɑ Bɑɑbɑ go tɛ, hɛɛ Ize mo, ɑ go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ.
43005020	Bɑɑbɑ go bɑɑ hɛɛ, Izɑ. À go kɑ ɑ cɛbɛ hɛ kulu kɑ ngɑ bumbum go tɛ. À gɑ ɑ cɛbɛ gbei yom mo kɑ ǹ beeri kɑ bisɑ wɔne yom zɑmɑ wom mɑ mɑmɑci.
43005021	Zɑngɑ Bɑɑbɑ go bukɔ yom tunɑndi kɑ ǹ hunɑndi, yɑ no hɛɛ Izɑ mo, ɑ go hundi no bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ bine go bɑɑ sɛ.
43005022	Bɑɑbɑ si bɔrɔ fɔ kulu ciiti ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ciiti kulu no ɑ sɛ, hɛɛ Izɑ.
43005023	À nɑ ɑ̀ no ɑ sɛ zɑmɑ ǹ kulu mɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ hɛɛ, Izɑ sɛ zɑngɑ ǹ go bɛɛrɛ tɛ Bɑɑbɑ sɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si bɛɛrɛ tɛ hɛɛ Izɑ sɛ, ɑ̀ si bɛɛrɛ tɛ Bɑɑbɑ mo kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm sɛ.
43005024	Cimi cimi, ɑ go cii wom sɛ, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ sendi sɛ, ɑ̀ nɑɑne mo wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm, ɑkpɛ gundɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni. À si kɑɑ ciiti dɔ ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ bu gɑɑ kɑ tɔ hundi dɔ.
43005025	Cimi cimi, ɑ go cii wom sɛ, lɔkɑci go kɑɑ, ɑ̀ bine kɑɑ kɔ sɑɑ kɑ bukɔ yom kɑɑ mɑɑ ɑ jinde, hɛɛ Ikpɛ Ize. Beerem kɑ ǹ mɑɑ ɑ jinde, ǹ kɑɑ hunɑ.
43005026	Zɑngɑ Bɑɑbɑ gundɑ hundi ngɑ bumbum kunɑ, yɑ no ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ no hɛɛ Ize, ɑ mɑ gundɑ hundi ɑ bumbum kunɑ.
43005027	À nɑ ɑ no hini mo yɑ ciiti tɛ zɑmɑ hɛɛ yɑ Adɑmize no.
43005028	Wɑ si mɑmɑci ndɑ wɔne. Lɔkɑci go kɑɑ sɑɑ kɑ beerem kulu kɑ ǹ goono sɑɑrɛ yom kunɑ kɑɑ mɑɑ ɑ jinde.
43005029	Ǹ kɑɑ hunu. Wɔ kɑ yom nɑ ihinno tɛ, ǹ kɑɑ tunu hundi sɛ. Ammɑ wɔ kɑ yom nɑ ilɑlɔ tɛ ǹ kɑɑ tunu ciiti sɛ.
43005030	A si hini kɑ hɛ fɔ tɛ ɑ bɔm gɑɑ. A go ciiti nɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ go mɑɑ bɔm. A ciiti mo cɛyom susu no, zɑmɑ ɑ si kɑ ɑ ŋmɔne binebɑɑ ceeci kɑlɑ Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm, ɑ̀ binebɑɑ.
43005031	De hɛɛ, yɑ go tɛ ɑ bɔm sɛdɑ, ɑ sɛdɑ mɑnɑ ci cimi.
43005032	Bɔrɔ fɔ ŋmɑni yɑ go tɛ ɑ sɛdɑ. A bei sɛdɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go tɛ ɑ sɛ mo, cimi no.
43005033	Wom nɑ beerem dɔntɔm Yohɑnnɑ dɔ. À bine tɛ sɛdɑ cimi sɛ.
43005034	Ammɑ hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci iburɑdɑm sɛdɑ no ɑ go du ɑmmɑ ɑ go wɔne yom cii no zɑmɑ wom mɑ du fɑɑbɑ.
43005035	Yohɑnnɑ wɔ fitilɑ no kɑ ɑ̀ go dii ko kɑɑri no. Wom mo, wom bɑɑ wom mɑ fɑihã ndɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑri bɑndɑ fɔ.
43005036	Ammɑ hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ gundɑ sɛdɑ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ beeri kɑ bisɑ Yohɑnnɑ ŋmɔne. Gbei yom kɑ Bɑɑbɑ nɑ ɑ no yɑ tɔnɑndi. Gbei yom no di bumbum kɑ ɑ go tɛ ngei yɑ go tɛ sɛdɑ kɑ Bɑɑbɑ yɑ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm.
43005037	Bɑɑbɑ mo kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm, ɑ̀ bumbum tɛ ɑ sɛdɑ. Wom mɑnɑ mɑɑ ɑ̀ jinde bɑ ce fɔ. Wom mɑnɑ di ɑ̀ moodumɑ mo bɑ ce fɔ.
43005038	À sendi si gɔrɔ wom kunɑ zɑmɑ wom si nɑɑne wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔm.
43005039	Wom go ceeci Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ yom kunɑ zɑmɑ wom go tɑmmɑ wom du ǹ dɔ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni. Ngei bine yɑ go tɛ ɑ sɛdɑ.
43005040	Ammɑ wom si bɑɑ mo wom mɑ kɑɑ ɑ dɔ kɑ du hundi.
43005041	A si bɛɛrɛ ceeci iburɑdɑm dɔ.
43005042	Ammɑ ɑ go wom bei, wom sindɑ Ikpɛ sɛ bɑɑkɑsine wom kunɑ.
43005043	Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ kɑɑ no ɑ Bɑɑbɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ. Wom si kɑ ɑ tɑ. De bɔrɔ fɔ ŋmɑni kɑɑ ngɑ bɔm mɑɑ gɑɑ, wom gɑ ɑ̀ tɑ.
43005044	Mɛtɛ wom tɛ kɑ nɑɑne wom kɑ wom go bɛɛrɛ ceeci cɛrɛ gɑɑ, wom si bɛɛrɛ ceeci kɑ ɑ̀ go hunu zɑ Ikpɛ fɔlɔnku dɔ?
43005045	Wom mɑ si tɑmmɑ ɑ kɑɑ wom beri Bɑɑbɑ dɔ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go wom beri yɑ ci Moisi kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ wom gundɑ nɑɑne.
43005046	De wom nɑ Moisi nɑɑne, dom wom gɑ ɑ nɑɑne zɑmɑ Moisi hɑntum ɑ bɔm.
43005047	Ammɑ de wom si cimɑndi Moisi hɑntumyom gɑɑ, mɛtɛ wom tɛ kɑ cimɑndi ɑ sendi yom gɑɑ?
43006001	Ngɑ di bɑndɑ Yesu kpei Gɑlile buulɑ sɛ yɑ hɛrɛ tɛrɛ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ, Tiberiɑ buulɑ.
43006002	Bɔrɔ bɑkɑrɑ nɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ zɑmɑ ǹ di ɑ̀ ɑlɑmu yom kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ zɛnjɛkom yom bɔm.
43006003	Yesu kɑɑru tondi kuku fɔ bɔm ko gɔrɔ ndɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom.
43006004	Yuifu yom Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru mɑɑni.
43006005	Kɑ Yesu nɑ bɔm tunɑndi ɑ̀ di jɑmɑ bɑkɑrɑ go kɑɑ ngɑ dɔ. À cii Filipu sɛ: Mɑni no i du buuru kɑ dei beerem wɔ mɑ ŋmɑɑ?
43006006	À nɑ ngɑ di cii Filipu sɛ no kɑ ɑ̀ bubure zɑmɑ ngɑ bumbum go bei hɛ kɑ ngɑ bɑ tɛ.
43006007	Filipu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Buuru dubu hinkɑ wɔne si wɑsɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ du ɑ̀ gɑɑ cɛnɑ cɛnɑ.
43006008	Andɛrɛ, Simɔ Piɛɛ cɛɛnɛ, ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ cii ɑ̀ sɛ:
43006009	Hɑiwɑsu fɔ goono nee kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ buuru gu kɑ ǹ tɛ ndɑ hɑmini dimi ŋmɑni fɔ ndɑ ciifi cɛnɑ hinkɑ. Ammɑ ifɔ no ngɑ di bɑ tɛ bɔrɔ nyɑkɑkɑ wɔ sɛ?
43006010	Yesu mo cii: Wɑ beerem gɔrɛndi. Nunguɑ dɔ gundɑ subu gɑni boobo. Ǹ gɔrɔ zɑngɑ hɑibɔrɔ dubu gu.
43006011	Yesu nɑ buuru yom di zɑɑ kɑ sɑɑbu. À nɑ ǹ fɑrisi coobɑɑbɑize yom di sɛ. Coobɑɑbɑize yom mo fɑrisi beerem kɑ ǹ go gɔrɔ sɛ. Yɑ no ɑ̀ nɑ ciifi yom di mo fɑrisi zɑngɑ sɑrɑ beerem go bɑɑ.
43006012	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ kungu ɑ̀ cii ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ: Wɑ dumbɑri yom kɑ ǹ cindi kunnɑ, zɑmɑ hɛ fɔ kulu mɑ si sɑrɑ.
43006013	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ kulu ŋmɑɑ kɑ kungu, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ǹ nɑ buuru gu kɑ ǹ tɛ ndɑ hɑmini ŋmɑni di dumbɑri cindi yom kunnɑ cilɑ cɛnɑ wei cindi hinkɑ mefɔ.
43006014	Kɑ beerem di ɑlɑmu kɑ Yesu tɛ, ǹ cii: Bɔrɔ kpɛ hɑlɑbɑdɑ, ɑndebi di kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑ hɑndunyɑ.
43006015	Zɑ kɑ Yesu bei ǹ bɑ kɑɑ kɑ ngɑ dii kɑ tɛ gɑndɑkpɛ, ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɔm cendi kɑ kpei tondi kukuɑ bɔm kpɛɛnɛ ngɑ fɔ.
43006016	Sɑɑ kɑ wiciri kɑmbu tɔ, ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom zumbu buulɑ jobu gɑɑ.
43006017	Ǹ huro hɑrihi fɔ kunɑ. Ǹ bɑ buulɑ dem kɑ kpei Kɑpɛnɑum kpɑɑrɑ hɛrɛ. Ciini tɔ kɔ. Yesu bine mɑnɑ kɑɑ ǹ dɔ jinɑ.
43006018	Hɛo bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ mo tunu, cɔfɔ buulɑ go boosu.
43006019	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ hɑrihi funu kilomɛti gu wɑlɑ idu cɔfɔ ǹ di Yesu go dirɑ buulɑ bɔm. À go mɑɑni hɑrihiɑ gɑɑ. Cɔfɔ hɑmburu nɑ ǹ dii.
43006020	Ammɑ Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Hɛɛ no. Wɑ si hɑmburu.
43006021	A gɑɑ no ǹ tu ngei mɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ hɑrihiɑ kunɑ. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ hɑrihiɑ tɔ jobu kɑ ɑ̀ dɔ ǹ go kpei.
43006022	À mo bo jɑmɑ kɑ ǹ goono buulɑ sɛ yɑ hɛrɛ tɛrɛ, ǹ di kɑ hɑrihi fɔlɔnku yɑ goono nodi. Ǹ di mo Yesu mɑnɑ huro hɑrihiɑ kunɑ ndɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom ɑmmɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom di hinne yɑ kpei.
43006023	Ammɑ hɑrihi ŋmɑni fɔ yom mo hunu zɑ Tiberiɑ kpɑɑrɑ. Kpɑɑrɑ di mɑɑni nungu kɑ ǹ nɑ buuru di ŋmɑɑ Kpe sɑɑbuyom bɑndɑ.
43006024	Ngɑ di sɛ, kɑ jɑmɑ di zɑ Yesu hɑli ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom si nungu di, ngei mo huro hɑrihi yom kunɑ. Ǹ kpei Kɑpɛnɑum kpɑɑrɑ ko Yesu ceeci.
43006025	Kɑ ǹ di ɑ̀ hɑli buulɑ bisɑntɛ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Coobɑɑbɑ, sɑɑ fɔ ǹ kɑɑ nee?
43006026	Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Cimi cimi, ɑ go cii wom sɛ wom go kɑ ɑ ceeci, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci zɑmɑ wom di ɑlɑmu yom sɛ. Ammɑ wom go kɑ ɑ ceeci zɑmɑ wom nɑ buuru ŋmɑɑ kɑ kungu.
43006027	Wɑ gbei tɛ, ɑ̀ mɑ si ci ŋmɑɑri kɑ ɑ̀ hɑlɑci sɛ ɑmmɑ ŋmɑɑri kɑ ɑ̀ bo goono kɑlɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni sɛ. Ŋmɑɑrɑ wɔ no hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ kɑɑ wom no zɑmɑ ɑ gɑɑ no Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ sɛdɑ dɑm.
43006028	Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ifɔ i mɑ tɛ kɑ gbei tɛ Ikpɛ sɛ?
43006029	Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wɔne yɑ ci gbei kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ Ikpɛ sɛ, wom mɑ nɑɑne wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔm.
43006030	À sɛ no ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Yɑ di gɑɑ ɑlɑmu fɔ no n gɑ i cɛbɛ hɑli i mɑ di ɑ̀, kɑ du kɑ nɑɑne n gɑɑ? Gbei fɔ n kɑɑ tɛ?
43006031	I cɛɛ yom nɑ mɑɑnɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ŋmɑɑri dimi fɔ ŋmɑɑ gɑnji kunɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "À nɑ ǹ no buuru kɑ ɑ̀ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ ǹ mɑ ŋmɑɑ".
43006032	Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Cimi cimi, ɑ go cii wom sɛ Moisi mɑnɑ wom no buuru kɑ ɑ̀ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ. Ammɑ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ go wom no buuru cimikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ.
43006033	Ikpɛ buuru yɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go hɑndunyɑ no hundi.
43006034	Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Yɑ di gɑɑ Kpe, i no buuru ngɑ di hɑnu kulu.
43006035	Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Hɛɛ yɑ ci buuru hundikoni. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ ɑ dɔ, ɑ̀ si mɑɑ hɛrɛɛ pɑi. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ nɑɑne mo, ɑ̀ si mɑɑ jo pɑi.
43006036	Ammɑ ɑ cii wom sɛ wom di hɛɛ. Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu wom mɑnɑ nɑɑne.
43006037	Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ Bɑɑbɑ go kɑ ɑ no yɑ kɑɑ ɑ dɔ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ ɑ dɔ mo, ɑ si ɑ̀ gɑɑrɛ.
43006038	A hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ. A mɑnɑ hunu yɑ ɑ binebɑɑ tɛ ɑmmɑ kɑ tɛ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm binebɑɑ.
43006039	Wɔne yɑ ci Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm binebɑɑ. Bɔrɔ fɔ fɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ no, bɑ ɑfɔ mɑ si dɛrɛ ɑ sɛ, ɑmmɑ yɑ ǹ tunɑndi hɑnu beenɑntɑ.
43006040	A dɔntɔmkɔ binebɑɑ neyɑ, bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go di hɛɛ, Izɑ kɑ nɑɑne ɑ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ du hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni. Hɛɛ mo, ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi hɑnu beenɑntɑ.
43006041	Yuifu yom go gunugunu ɑ̀ sendɑ bɔm zɑmɑ ɑ̀ cii ngɑ yɑ ci buuru kɑ ɑ̀ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ.
43006042	Cɔfɔ ǹ cii: Yesu wɔ Yosɛfu koo no. I go kɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑbɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ nyɑ bei. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ? Dee mɛtɛ ɑ̀ tɛ kɑ cii ngɑ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ?
43006043	Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii. Wɑ si gunugunu wom gɑme.
43006044	Bɔrɔ kulu si hini kɑ kɑɑ ɑ dɔ, de Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm mɑnɑ ɑ̀ cendi. A bine gɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi hɑnu beenɑntɑ.
43006045	Andebi yom nɑ wɔne hɑntum ngei tirɑ yom kunɑ kɑ cii: "Ǹ kulu kɑɑ du cɛbɛ yom Ikpɛ dɔ". À sɛ no bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go mɑɑ Bɑɑbɑ sɛ ko dendeni ɑ̀ dɔ, ɑkpɛ go kɑɑ ɑ dɔ.
43006046	À mɑnɑ ci zɑngɑ bɔrɔ fɔ di Bɑɑbɑ no bo, kɑlɑ de wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu zɑ Ikpɛ dɔ, cɛ yɑ di Bɑɑbɑ.
43006047	Cimi cimi ɑ go cii wom sɛ, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go ko ɑ nɑɑne, ɑ̀ gundɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni.
43006048	Hɛɛ yɑ ci buuru hundikoni.
43006049	Wom cɛɛ yom nɑ mɑɑnɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ŋmɑɑri dimi fɔ ŋmɑɑ gɑnji kunɑ. Ǹ bu.
43006050	Wɔne yɑ ci buuru hundikonɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ hɑli bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ si bu.
43006051	Hɛɛ yɑ ci buuru hundikoni kɑ ɑ̀ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ. Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go ŋmɑɑ buuru wɔne gɑɑ, ɑ̀ bo hunɑ no, beeniyom si. Buuru kɑ hɛɛ wɔ ɑ kɑɑ no, ɑ gɑɑhɑm no. A gɑ ɑ gɑɑhɑm no zɑmɑ hɑndunyɑ mɑ hunɑ.
43006052	À gɑɑ no Yuifu yom nɑ kɑkɔ tɛ ngei gɑme kɑ cii: Mɛtɛ ɑ̀ tɛ kɑ i no ngɑ gɑɑhɑm i mɑ ŋmɑɑ?
43006053	Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Cimi cimi, ɑ go cii wom sɛ, de wom si hɛɛ, Adɑmize gɑɑhɑm ŋmɑɑ, de bine wom si kɑ ɑ kuri hɑm, wom sindɑ hundi wom kunɑ.
43006054	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ gɑɑhɑmɑ ŋmɑɑ kɑ ɑ kuri hɑm, ɑ̀ gundɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni. A gɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi mo hɑnu beenɑntɑ.
43006055	A gɑɑhɑm wɔ ŋmɑɑri no ndɑ cimi. A kuri mo hɑmyom hɑri no ndɑ cimi.
43006056	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ gɑɑhɑm ŋmɑɑ, kɑ ɑ kuri hɑm, ɑ̀ goono ɑ kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ. Hɛɛ mo, ɑ goono ɑkpɛ kunɑ.
43006057	Zɑngɑ Bɑɑbɑ hundikpɛ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm, ɑ go hunɑ Bɑɑbɑ sɑbu sɛ. Yɑ no bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ ŋmɑɑ, ɑkpɛ mo ɑ̀ kɑɑ hunɑ ɑ sɑbu sɛ.
43006058	Buuru neyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ. À mɑnɑ ci zɑngɑ mɑɑnɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ŋmɑɑri dimi fɔ kɑ wom cɛɛ yom ŋmɑɑ kɑ bu. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ buuru wɔ ŋmɑɑ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ hunɑ, beeniyom si.
43006059	Yesu nɑ sendi nge yom di cii Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu kunɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go cooɑndi Kɑpɛnɑum kpɑɑrɑ.
43006060	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ beeni, ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom ŋmɔne iboobo cii: Sendi wɔ gɑɑbu. Mee yɑ hini kɑ hɑngɑ dɑm sendi wɔ sɛ?
43006061	Zɑ kɑ Yesu bei ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom go gunugunu sendi ngɑ di bɔm, ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Sendɑ nɑ wom dɛrɑndi no?
43006062	Dee, mɛtɛ no yɑ sɑɑ kɑ wom di hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ go kɑɑru bɛɛnɛ, nungu kɑ ɑ dom gɔrɔ?
43006063	Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ yɑ hunɑndi. Gɑɑhɑm si hɛ fɔ kulu hinsɑ. Sendi yom kɑ ɑ go cii wom sɛ bɑrɑ no biyɑ ndɑ hundi.
43006064	Ammɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom goono wom kunɑ kɑ ǹ si nɑɑne. Yesu bei zɑ sintine beerem kɑ ǹ si nɑɑne. À bei mo bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ngɑ dɑm kɑmbɛ.
43006065	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii: À sɛ no, ɑ go cii wom sɛ kɑ bɔrɔ kulu si hini kɑ kɑɑ ɑ dɔ de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ɑ Bɑɑbɑ yɑ nɑ ɑ no ndɑ.
43006066	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ mɑɑ ngɑ di, ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom ŋmɔne iboobo nɑ ngei bɔm cendi. Ǹ si kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ kpɛɛnɛ.
43006067	À sɛ no Yesu cii iwei cindi hinkɑ di sɛ: Wom mo bine, wom bɑɑ wom mɑ kpei bɑ?
43006068	Simɔ Piɛɛ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Kpe, mee dɔ no i mɑ kpei? N gundɑ sendi yom kɑ ǹ kɑɑndɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni.
43006069	I bine go nɑɑne. I go bei mo kɑ ni, n ci Mɛsiyɑ, Ikpɛ Hundikpɛ Ize.
43006070	Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Hɛɛ yɑ nɑ wom suubɑ, wom bɔrɔ wei cindi hinkɑ wɔ. Ammɑ wom kunɑ ɑfɔ Ibilisi ŋmɔne no.
43006071	Yudɑ Isikɑriɔtu, Simɔ koo bɔm no ɑ̀ nɑ sendi ngɑ di tɛ zɑmɑ ngɑ yɑ bɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm kɑmbɛ. Iwei cindi hinkɑ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ noyɑ.
43007001	Ngɑ di bɑndɑ Yesu go Gɑlile lɑɑbu yɑɑli. À si bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ dirɑ Yude lɑɑbu zɑmɑ Yuifu yom go ceeci ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ wi.
43007002	Bine Yuifu yom jingɑru fɔ mɑɑni kɑ ɑ ci Bukɑ yom ŋmɔne.
43007003	A gɑɑ no ɑ̀ cɛɛnɛ yom cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Tunu nee kɑ kpei Yude lɑɑbu zɑmɑ n coobɑɑbɑize yom mo mɑ di gbei yom kɑ n go tɛ.
43007004	Bɔrɔ si hɛ fɔ tɛ tugɑntɛ de ɑ̀ go bɑɑ ǹ mɑ ngɑ bei. Zɑ kɑ n go wɔne yom tɛ, n mɑ n bɔm kɑɑtɛrɛ hɑndunyɑ sɛ.
43007005	Bɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛnɛ yom mɑnɑ nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
43007006	Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: A lɔkɑci mɑnɑ tɔ jinɑ, ɑmmɑ wom lɔkɑci goono sɔlɑntɛ sɑɑ kulu.
43007007	Hɑndunyɑ si hini kɑ hungu wom. Ammɑ hɑndunyɑ go hungu hɛɛ zɑmɑ ɑ go tɛ ɑ̀ sɛdɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gbei yom bɑrɑ ilɑlɔ yom.
43007008	Wom wɔ, wɑ kpei jingɑruɑ dɔ. Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ si kpei mɑɑsɑ zɑmɑ ɑ lɔkɑci mɑnɑ tɔ jinɑ.
43007009	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ di cii ǹ sɛ, ɑ̀ gɔrɔ Gɑlile lɑɑbu.
43007010	Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛnɛ yom kpei jingɑruɑ dɔ, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ngɑ mo kpei. À mɑnɑ kpei tɛrɛkpɑrɛ ɑmmɑ tugu kunɑ.
43007011	Yuifu yom nɑ ɑ̀ ceeci jingɑruɑ dɔ. Ǹ cii: Mɑni ɑ̀ goono?
43007012	Kɑkɔ bɑmbɑtɑ tunu jɑmɑ di gɑme kɑ simbɑ ndɑ Yesu. Bɔrɔ fɔ yom cii bɔrɔ hinno no. Afɔ yom mo cii: Awo, ɑ̀ go jɑmɑ fɑfɑgu no.
43007013	Ammɑ bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ mɑnɑ sendi ɑ̀ bɔm tɛrɛkpɑrɛ Yuifu yom hɑmbure sɑbu sɛ.
43007014	Hɑli jingɑruɑ bindi bindi Yesu kpei Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ ko cooɑndi.
43007015	Yuifu yom mɑmɑci kɑ cii: Mɛtɛ ɑ̀ tɛ kɑ ŋmɑɑni tirɑ hɑntumyom, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ du cooɑndiyom?
43007016	Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: A cɛbɛyom mɑnɑ ci ɑ ŋmɔne ɑmmɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm, ɑ̀ ŋmɔne no.
43007017	De bɔrɔ fɔ go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ Ikpɛ binebɑɑ tɛ, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ cɛbɛyom bei de Ikpɛ ŋmɔne no wɑlɑ de ɑ go sendi no ɑ bɔm gɑɑ.
43007018	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go sendi ngɑ bɔm gɑɑ, ɑ̀ bɔm bɛɛrɛ no ɑ̀ go ceeci. Ammɑ Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ngɑ dɔntɔmkɔ bɛɛrɛ ceeci, ngɑ wɔ Cimikpɛ no. Zɑm kɑ cɛsusu si ɑ̀ kunɑ mo.
43007019	Moisi nɑ wom no fɔndɑ ɑmmɑ wom bɑ ɑfɔ si fɔndɑ gɑnɑ. Ifɔ sɛ wom go ceeci kɑ ɑ wi?
43007020	Jɑmɑ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: N gundɑ hɔllɛ. Mee yɑ go ceeci ngɑ mɑ n wi?
43007021	Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: A nɑ gbei fɔ tɛ, wom kulu mɑmɑci.
43007022	Moisi nɑ wom no bɑngudɑmyom. À mɑnɑ ci Moisi dɔ no ɑ̀ go hunu ɑmmɑ wom cɛɛ yom ɑlɑɑdɑ no. À sɛ no wom go hɑibɔrɔ dɑmbɑngu hulonzom hɑnu hine.
43007023	Ǹ go hɑibɔrɔ dɑmbɑngu hulonzom hɑnu hine zɑmɑ ǹ mɑ si Moisi fɔndɑ dɑɑrum. Ifɔ sɛ wom bine go tɔ ɑ sɛ ndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ bɔrɔ no bɑɑni sã sã hulonzom hɑnu hine?
43007024	Wɑ si ciiti ndɑ moo diyom, ɑmmɑ wɑ ciiti cɛɑntɛ susu tɛ.
43007025	Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom cii: À mɑnɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ǹ go ceeci ǹ mɑ wi di no bɑ?
43007026	Gunɑ, ɑ̀ go sendi tɛrɛkpɑrɛ ɑmmɑ ǹ si hɛ fɔ kulu cii ɑ̀ sɛ. Gɑɑbikoni yom go bei cimi no bɔrɔ wɔne yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ bɑ?
43007027	Ammɑ bɔrɔ wɔne i go kɑ ɑ̀ bei. I go bei mo nungu kɑ ɑ̀ bɔrɔ no. Ammɑ Mɛsiyɑ wɔ, sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ kɑɑ bɔrɔ kulu si bei nungu kɑ ɑ̀ bɔrɔ no.
43007028	À gɑɑ no, Yesu nɑ jinde zɑɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go cooɑndi Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ. À cii: Wom go kɑ ɑ bei. Wom bei mo nungu kɑ ɑ̀ bɔrɔ no hɛɛ. A mɑnɑ kɑɑ ɑ bɔm miilɑ sɛ. Ammɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm, ngɑ wɔ Cimikpɛ no. Wom bine si ɑ̀ bei.
43007029	Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ go kɑ ɑ̀ bei, zɑmɑ ɑ̀ dɔ no ɑ hunu. Ngɑ mo yɑ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm.
43007030	Ǹ bine nɑ ɑ̀ ceeci ngei mɑ ɑ̀ di. Ammɑ bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ mɑnɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ ɑ̀ bɔm zɑmɑ ɑ̀ lɔkɑci mɑnɑ tɔ jinɑ.
43007031	Jɑmɑ di kunɑ bɔrɔ boobo nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Ǹ cii: Mɛsiyɑ wɔ, sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ, ɑlɑmu yom kɑ bɔrɔ wɔne go tɛ, Mɛsiyɑ kɑɑ tɛ kɑ bisɑ yɑ di dee?
43007032	Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom mɑɑ jɑmɑ di go hɛ nge yom di gunugunu tɛ ɑ̀ bɔm. Cɔfɔ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom ndɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom nɑ dogɑri yom dɔntɔm ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ dii.
43007033	Yesu bine cii ǹ sɛ: A goono wom dɔ bɑndɑ fɔ jinɑ. À bɑndɑ yɑ kpei wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm dɔ.
43007034	Wom gɑ ɑ ceeci. Wom si di hɛɛ. Nungu kɑ ɑ goono mo wom si hini kɑ kɑɑ nodi.
43007035	Sendi ngɑ di gɑɑ Yuifu yom cii ngei gɑme: Mɑni ɑ̀ bɑ kpei kɑ i si hini kɑ di ɑ̀? Wɑlɑ beerem wɔ dɔ no ɑ̀ bɑ kpei, nge yom kɑ ǹ kɑru kɑ see dimi cindei lɑɑbu?
43007036	Ifɔ yɑ ci sendi wɔne feeriji kɑ ɑ̀ cii: Wom gɑ ɑ ceeci. Wom bine si di hɛɛ. Nungu kɑ ɑ bo goono mo wom si hini kɑ kɑɑ?
43007037	Jingɑru beeri ŋmɔne jiribi beenɑntɛ Yesu cɛ kɑ jinde zɑɑ. À cii: De bɔrɔ fɔ mɑɑ jo, ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑ ɑ dɔ kɑ hɑm.
43007038	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne ɑ gɑɑ, hɑri hundikoni isɑ yom kɑɑ dendi ɑkpɛ kunɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii.
43007039	Ammɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ di cii kɑ simbɑ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ, wɔ kɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ kɑɑ du. Ikpɛ mɑnɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ no jinɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ Yesu bɛɛrɑndi jinɑ.
43007040	À gɑɑ no kɑ jɑmɑ di mɑɑ sendi ngɑ di cɔfɔ bɔrɔ fɔ yom cii: Bɔrɔ kpɛ, hɑlɑbɑdɑ ɑndebi no.
43007041	Afɔ yom cii: Mɛsiyɑ no. Ammɑ ɑfɔ yom mo cii: Awo, zɑ Gɑlile no Mɛsiyɑ go hunu dee?
43007042	Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii Mɛsiyɑ go kɑɑ zɑ Dɑfidi bɑndɑ kunɑ. À mɑ hunu Bɛtɛlɛm kpɑɑrɑ, nungu kɑ Dɑfidi gɔrɔ dom. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
43007043	Ngɑ di sɛ, feefee tɛ jɑmɑ di kunɑ Yesu sɑbu sɛ.
43007044	Ǹ kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom bɑɑ ngei mɑ ɑ̀ dii ɑmmɑ bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ mɑnɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ ɑ̀ bɔm.
43007045	Dogɑri yom bine kpei gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom dɔ. Ngei mo cii ǹ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ wom mɑnɑ kɑɑndɑ?
43007046	Dogɑri yom tu kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑnɑ sendi zɑngɑ bɔrɔ di bɑ ce fɔ.
43007047	Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom bine tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Yɑ di gɑɑ wom mo, ɑ̀ nɑ wom fɑfɑgu no?
43007048	Hinikpɛ yom di ŋmɔne bɑ ɑfɔ wɑlɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom di ŋmɔne bɑ ɑfɔ nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ bɑ?
43007049	Ammɑ jɑmɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si fɔndɑ bei lɑɑliɑntɛ yom no.
43007050	Nikodim kɑ ɑ̀ ci Fɑrisi fɔndɔ beerem ŋmɔne ɑfɔ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ Yesu dɔ ciini, ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ:
43007051	I fɔndɑ, ɑ̀ go bɔrɔ ciiti bɑ zɑ ǹ mɑnɑ mɑɑ hɛ kɑ ɑkpɛ cii kɑ bei hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ?
43007052	Ǹ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Ni mo, ni Gɑlile bɔrɔ no bɑ? Ni mo, n mɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ yom ceeci kɑ di kɑ ɑndebi mɑnɑ hunu Gɑlile lɑɑbu. [
43007053	Cɔfɔ bɔrɔ kulu kpei ngɑ kpɑɑrɑ.
43008001	Ammɑ Yesu kpei Olibe zugu tɑndi kuku dɔ.
43008002	Zɑ ɑsubɑ ɑ̀ ye kɑ kpei Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ. Jɑmɑ kulu mo kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ. À gɔrɔ kɑ ǹ cooɑndi.
43008003	Cɔfɔ Moisi fɔndɔ cooɑndikɔ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom kɑɑndɑ weibɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ dii zinɑ gɑɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm jɑmɑ di bindi kunɑ.
43008004	Ǹ cii Yesu sɛ: Coobɑɑbɑ, ǹ nɑ weibɔrɔ wɔ dii no ɑ̀ go zinɑ.
43008005	Moisi fɔndɑ kunɑ ɑ̀ nɑ i no meire i mɑ weibɔrɔ wɔ dimi cetu ndɑ tondi. Ni mo bine, ifɔ no n go cii?
43008006	Ǹ nɑ ngɑ di cii no kɑ ɑ̀ sui, domi ngei mɑ du sɑbɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑ. Ammɑ Yesu go gungum. À hɑntum gɑndɑ gɑɑ ndɑ kɑmbeize zɑngɑ ɑ̀ si mɑɑ ǹ hãyom di.
43008007	Kɑ ǹ hiyɑ ko kɑ ɑ̀ hã, Yesu mo tunu kɑ cɛ. À cii ǹ sɛ: Wom kunɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ dulum ɑ̀ mɑ jinɑ kɑ tondi zɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cetu.
43008008	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ gungum kpɛɛnɛ ko hɑntum gɑndɑ gɑɑ.
43008009	Ngei mo kɑ ǹ mɑɑ Yesu sendɑ, cɔfɔ ǹ bine kunɑ sendi nɑ ǹ dii. Ǹ hunu ɑfɔ ɑfɔ zɑ bɔrɔ zeenɔ yom gɑɑ kɑlɑ icɛnɑ yom. À cindi Yesu ngɑ fɔ ndɑ weibɔrɔ di kɑ ɑ̀ goono bindi kunɑ.
43008010	Yesu tunu. À mɑnɑ di bɔrɔ fɔ kulu kɑlɑ weibɔrɔ di. À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Wei wɔ, mɑni n tɔnyɑkɔ yom? Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑnɑ n ciiti kɑ zeeri no?
43008011	À tu kɑ cii: Awo Kpe, bɑ ɑfɔ. Cɔfɔ Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Hɛɛ mo, ɑ si kɑ n ciiti kɑ zeeri mo. Kpei. N mɑ si dulum tɛ kpɛɛnɛ.]
43008012	Yesu sendi ǹ sɛ kpɛɛnɛ kɑ cii: Hɛɛ yɑ ci hɑndunyɑ kɑɑri. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ gɑnɑ, ɑkpɛ si dirɑ kube kunɑ ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ du kɑɑri hundi ŋmɔne.
43008013	Bine Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N bɔm sɛdɑ no n go tɛ. N sɛdɑ mɑnɑ ci cimi.
43008014	Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Bɑ de ɑ bɔm sɛdɑ no ɑ go tɛ, ɑ sɛdɑ yɑ cimi no zɑmɑ ɑ bei nungu kɑ ɑ hunu ndɑ nungu kɑ ɑ go kpei. Ammɑ wom, wom mɑnɑ bei nungu kɑ ɑ hunu wɑlɑ nungu kɑ ɑ go kpei.
43008015	Wom go ciiti no zɑngɑ iburɑdɑm yom go tɛ. Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ si bɔrɔ fɔ kulu ciiti.
43008016	De bine, ɑ go ciiti mo, ɑ ciiti yɑ cimi no. A mɑnɑ ci ɑ fɔlɔnku ɑmmɑ hɛɛ ndɑ Bɑɑbɑ no kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm.
43008017	Ǹ bine hɑntum wom ŋmɔne fɔndɑ kunɑ kɑ bɔrɔ hinkɑ sɛdɑ yɑ cimi no.
43008018	A bumbum sɛdɑ no ɑ go tɛ, Bɑɑbɑ mo kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm go tɛ sɛdɑ ɑ bɔm.
43008019	À gɑɑ no ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Mɑni n bɑɑbɑ? Yesu tu kɑ cii: Wom si ɑ bei. Wom si ɑ Bɑɑbɑ bei mo. De wom nɑ ɑ bei dom, wom gɑ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ mo bei.
43008020	Yesu nɑ sendi nge yom di cii sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go cooɑndi Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ nooru jisiyom dɔ. Bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ dii zɑmɑ ɑ̀ lɔkɑci mɑnɑ tɔ jinɑ.
43008021	Yesu cii ǹ sɛ kpɛɛnɛ: A go kpei. Wom bine gɑ ɑ ceeci. Wom kɑɑ bu mo wom dulum kunɑ. Wom si hini kɑ kɑɑ nungu kɑ ɑ go kpei.
43008022	À gɑɑ no Yuifu yom cii: À gɑ ngɑ bɔm wi no, zɑmɑ ɑ̀ cii i si hini kɑ kɑɑ nungu kɑɑ ngɑ go kpei?
43008023	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Wom yɑ gɑndɑ wɔ ŋmɔne yom no. Hɛɛ wɔ bɛɛnɛ ŋmɔne no. Wom yɑ hɑndunyɑ wɔ ŋmɔne yom no. Hɛɛ wɔ yɑ nɑ ci hɑndunyɑ wɔ ŋmɔne.
43008024	À sɛ no, ɑ cii wom sɛ wom kɑɑ bu wom dulum yom kunɑ. De wom mɑnɑ cimɑndi kɑ Hɛɛ yɑ ci, wom kɑɑ bu no wom dulum yom kunɑ.
43008025	Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Yɑ di gɑɑ, ni no mee? Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Hɛɛ yɑ ci hɛ kɑ ɑ cii wom sɛ zɑ sintine.
43008026	A gundɑ hɛ boobo kɑ ɑ cii wom bɔm kɑ wom ciiti mo. Ammɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ dɔntɔm, Cimikpɛ no. Hɛ kɑ ɑ mɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ mo, ngɑ no ɑ go cii hɑndunyɑ sɛ.
43008027	Ǹ mɑnɑ fɑhɑm kɑ Bɑɑbɑ bɔm no ɑ̀ go sendi ngei sɛ.
43008028	Cɔfɔ Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Yɑ di gɑɑ sɑɑ kɑ wom kɑɑ hɛɛ Adɑmize sombu bɛɛnɛ sɑɑ di wom kɑɑ bei kɑ Hɛɛ yɑ ci. A si hɛ kulu tɛ mo ndɑ ɑ bɔm ɑmmɑ ɑ go sendi no ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ nɑ ɑ cɛbɛ.
43008029	Wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm goono ɑ bɑndɑ. Bɑɑbɑ mɑnɑ ɑ nɑm ɑfɔ zɑmɑ hɛɛ wɔ, hɑnu kulu ɑ go tɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑni ɑ̀ sɛ.
43008030	Kɑ Yesu nɑ nge yom di cii cɔfɔ bɔrɔ boobo nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
43008031	Yesu cii Yuifu yom kɑ ǹ nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ sɛ: De wom bo gɔrɔ ɑ sendi kunɑ, wom yɑ ɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom no cimi ndɑ ɑfɔ.
43008032	Wom kɑɑ cimi bei. Cimi no, ɑ kɑɑ wom fɑnsɑ.
43008033	Ǹ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: I yom yɑ Abulɛmɑ bɑndɑ yom no. Bɑ ce fɔ, i mɑnɑ gɔrɔ kɑ tɛ bɔrɔ fɔ tɑm. Mɛtɛ n tɛ kɑ cii n gɑ i fɑnsɑ?
43008034	Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ bo dulum tɛ, dulum tɑm no.
43008035	Ammɑ tɑm si bo gɔrɔ fuu kunɑ sɑɑ kulu ɑmmɑ koo bo gɔrɔ ɑ̀ kunɑ sɑɑ kulu.
43008036	Ngɑ di sɛ, de hɛɛ Ize, ɑ nɑ wom fɑnsɑ, siikɑ si wom ci bɔrɔcini yom.
43008037	A go bei wom yɑ Abulɛmɑ bɑndɑ yom no. Ammɑ wom go ceeci kɑ ɑ wi zɑmɑ ɑ sendɑ si gɔrɔ wom kunɑ.
43008038	Hɛ kɑ ɑ di ɑ Bɑɑbɑ dɔ no ɑ go sendi. Wom mo, hɛ kɑ wom di wom bɑɑbɑ dɔ, ngɑ no wom go tɛ.
43008039	Ǹ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: I bɑɑbɑ no Abulɛmɑ. Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: De wom yɑ ci Abulɛmɑ ize yom, dom wom gɑ Abulɛmɑ gbei yom tɛ.
43008040	Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ wom go ceeci kɑ ɑ wi, hɛɛ kɑ ɑ nɑ cimi cii wom sɛ kɑ ɑ mɑɑ Ikpɛ dɔ. Abulɛmɑ mɑnɑ ngɑ di tɛ.
43008041	Wom wɔ, wom bɑɑbɑ gbei yom no wom go tɛ. Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: I mɑnɑ ci zinɑ ize yom. Bɑɑbɑ fɔlɔnku no i sɛ, Ikpɛ.
43008042	Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: De Ikpɛ yɑ ci wom bɑɑbɑ, dom wom bɑɑ hɛɛ zɑmɑ Ikpɛ dɔ no ɑ hunu kɑ kɑɑ. Yɑ nɑ kɑɑ ndɑ ɑ bɔm ɑmmɑ ngɑ yɑ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm.
43008043	Ifɔ sɛ wom si fɑhɑm ndɑ ɑ sendi? Wom si fɑhɑm no zɑmɑ wom si hini kɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ sendi sɛ.
43008044	Ibilisi yɑ ci wom bɑɑbɑ. Wom bine go bɑɑ wom mɑ wom bɑɑbɑ bineibɑɑi yom tɛ. Ngɑ wɔ, bɔrɔ wikɔ no zɑ sintine. À mɑnɑ himmɑ tɛ cimi kunɑ zɑmɑ cimi si ngɑ wɔ kunɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go tɑngɑri cii, ɑ̀ go sendi ngɑ bumbum bɔm zɑmɑ tɑngɑrikpɛ no. Tɑngɑri bɑɑbɑ mo no.
43008045	Hɛɛ mo, zɑmɑ ɑ go cimi cii sɛ, wom si ɑ nɑɑne.
43008046	Wom kunɑ, mee yɑ gɑ ɑ zeeri ndɑ dulum? De ɑ go cimi cii, ifɔ sɛ wom si ɑ nɑɑne?
43008047	Ikpɛ ŋmɔne cɛ go hɑngɑ dɑm Ikpɛ Sendi yom sɛ. Wom si hɑngɑ dɑm zɑmɑ wom mɑnɑ ci Ikpɛ ŋmɔne yom.
43008048	Yuifu yom bine tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: À nɑ ci i gundɑ cimi bɑ, kɑ i go cii ni yɑ Sɑmɑriɑncɛ no, n gundɑ hɔllɛ mo?
43008049	Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: A sindɑ hɔllɛ, ɑmmɑ ɑ go kɑ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ bɛɛrɑndi. Wom go kɑ ɑ woo.
43008050	Ammɑ hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ si kɑ ɑ bɔm bɛɛrɛ ceeci. Bɔrɔ fɔ goono kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ bɛɛrɛ ceeci. À go ciiti mo.
43008051	Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ sendɑ jɛ, ɑ̀ si bu pɑi.
43008052	Cɔfɔ Yuifu yom cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Mɑɑsɑnkulu i go bei n gundɑ hɔllɛ. Abulɛmɑ bu. Andebi yom mo bu. Ammɑ ni wɔ, n go cii de bɔrɔ go kɑ n sendɑ jɛ, ɑkpɛ si bu tɑbɑɑ pɑi.
43008053	N bɛɛrɛ bisɑ i cɛɛ Abulɛmɑ no kɑ ɑ̀ bu? Andebi yom mo bu. Mee no n go kɑ n bɔm jisi?
43008054	Yesu tu kɑ cii: De ɑ go kɑ ɑ bɔm bɛɛrɑndi, ɑ bɛɛrɛ mɑnɑ ci hɛ fɔ kulu. A Bɑɑbɑ yɑ go kɑ ɑ bɛɛrɑndi, ngɑ kɑ wom go cii ngɑ yɑ ci wom ŋmɔne Ikpɛ.
43008055	Wom bine si ɑ̀ bei. Hɛɛ wɔ ɑ go kɑ ɑ̀ bei. De bine, ɑ go cii ɑ si ɑ̀ bei, ɑ himɑ tɑngɑrikom noyɑ zɑngɑ wom. Ammɑ ɑ go kɑ ɑ̀ bei. A go kɑ ɑ̀ Sendɑ jɛ mo.
43008056	Wom bɑɑbɑ Abulɛmɑ bine kɑɑni kɑlɑ kɑlɑ kɑ ngɑ mɑ di ɑ hɑnu. À bine di ɑ̀. A fɑihã mo.
43008057	Yuifu yom cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N mɑnɑ tɔ jiiri weigu jinɑ. Ngɑ no, n di Abulɛmɑ?
43008058	Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ zɑ ǹ mɑnɑ Abulɛmɑ hɛi, hɛɛ wɔ Hɛɛ yɑ ci.
43008059	Sendi ngɑ di sɑbu sɛ no, ǹ nɑ tondi yom zɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cetu. Ammɑ Yesu tugu kɑ hunu Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ kɑ bisɑ ǹ bindi. Yɑ no ɑ̀ dirɑ.
43009001	Bisɑyom gɑɑ Yesu di bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɛi ndɑ dɑnɑmtɛrɛ.
43009002	À coobɑɑbɑize yom nɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ cii: Coobɑɑbɑ, mee yɑ nɑ dulum tɛ, bɔrɔ kpɛ no dee wɑlɑ ɑ̀ bɑhɛi yom no kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɛi dɑnɑm?
43009003	Yesu tu kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kpɛ mɑnɑ dulum tɛ, yɑ no ɑ̀ bɑhɛi yom mo. Ammɑ wɔne tɛ dee no zɑmɑ Ikpɛ gbei yom mɑ hunutɛrɛ ɑ̀ dɔ.
43009004	Kɑlɑ de yɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm gbei yom tɛ zɑ weenu goono. Ciini go tɔ sɑɑ kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu si hini kɑ gbei tɛ.
43009005	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ goono hɑndunyɑ kunɑ, hɛɛ yɑ go ci hɑndunyɑ kɑɑri.
43009006	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ nge yom di cii, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ɑ̀ nɑ yɔlɔ tufɑ gɑndɑ kɑ bɔtɔgɔ tɛ ndɑ ngɑ yɔlɔ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ bɔtɔgɔ di dɛcɛ dɑnɑm di moo yom bɔm.
43009007	À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpei nyunu Silowe bɑngu. Silowe feeriji yɑ ci Dɔntɔnukɔ. À kpei nyunu. À bɛrɛ kɑ ye. À go di sã sã.
43009008	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ gɔrɔkɑsine yom ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ dɔnɑ kɑ cini bei ngɑ yɑ dɑnɑm, ǹ cii: À nɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɔrɔ kɑ bɑrɑ di noyɑ bɑ?
43009009	Bɔrɔ fɔ yom cii: Ngɑ no. Bɔrɔ fɔ yom mo cii: Awo. Himɑcɛrɛ dee no. Ngɑ bumbum cii: Hɛɛ no.
43009010	Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Yɑ di gɑɑ, mɛtɛ n moo yom tɛ kɑ feeri?
43009011	À tu kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Yesu, ngɑ yɑ nɑ bɔtɔgɔ tɛ kɑ dɛcɛ ɑ moo yom bɔm. À cii ɑ sɛ: Kpei Silowe bɑngu kɑ nyunu. A kpei nyunu. Cɔfɔ ɑ go di.
43009012	Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Mɑni bɔrɔ di goono? À tu kɑ cii: A si bei.
43009013	Ǹ kɑɑndɑ bɔrɔ di kɑ ɑ̀ dom gɔrɔ dɑnɑm Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom dɔ.
43009014	Hulonzom hɑnu hine no Yesu nɑ bɔtɔgɔɑ tɛ kɑ bɔrɔ di moo yom feeri.
43009015	Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom mo nɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ cii: Mɛtɛ ɑ̀ tɛ kɑ n moo yom feeri? À cii ǹ sɛ: Bɔtɔgɔ no ɑ̀ dɛcɛ ɑ moo yom bɔm, ɑ nyunu. Cɔfɔ ɑ go di.
43009016	À sɑbu sɛ no Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ fɔ yom cii: Bɔrɔ kpɛ mɑnɑ hunu Ikpɛ dɔ zɑmɑ ɑ si hulonzom hɑnu hine kɑbiɑ. Ammɑ ɑfɔ yom mo cii: Mɛtɛ dulumkoni tɛ kɑ hini kɑ ɑlɑmu wɔne yom dimi tɛ? Cɔfɔ feefee tɛ ǹ gɑme.
43009017	Ǹ cii dɑnɑm di sɛ kpɛɛnɛ: Ni mo, ifɔ n cii ɑ̀ bɔm ndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ n moo yom feeri? À cii: Andebi nɑ.
43009018	Yuifu yom mɑnɑ cimɑndi ɑ̀ sendɑ gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dom gɔrɔ dɑnɑm ɑmmɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ go di. Kɑlɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ bɑhɛi yom cɛɛ.
43009019	Ǹ nɑ ǹ hã kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kpɛ wom koo di bɑ kɑ wom go cii wom nɑ ɑ̀ hɛi dɑnɑm? Mɛtɛ ɑ̀ go di mɑɑsɑ dɑ?
43009020	À bɑhɛi yom tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: I dee go bei kɑ i koo no. Dɑnɑm mo no ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɛi.
43009021	Ammɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ko di mɑɑsɑ i si ngɑ di bei wɑlɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ moo yom feeri. Wɑ ngɑ bumbum hã. Sɑwɛrɛ no. À kɑɑ sendi ngɑ bɔm sɛ.
43009022	À bɑhɛi yom di sendi yɑ di zɑmɑ ǹ go hɑmburu Yuifu yom. Ǹ go hɑmburu zɑmɑ Yuifu yom nɑ mefɔ tɛ. Ǹ cii de bɔrɔ fɔ cii ndɑ ngɑ mee Yesu yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ, ǹ gɑ ɑkpɛ gɑɑrɛ ngei mɑrgɑ fuu.
43009023	À sɛ no, ɑ̀ bɑhɛi yom di cii: Sɑwɛrɛ no. Wɑ ngɑ bumbum hã.
43009024	Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom nɑ bɔrɔ di kɑ ɑ̀ dom gɔrɔ dɑnɑm cɛɛ kpɛɛnɛ. Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N mɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi. I go bei bɔrɔ di wɔ dulumkoni no.
43009025	À tu kɑ cii: De dulumkoni no, ɑ si bei. Hɛ fɔlɔnku no ɑ bei, dom di ɑ bɑrɑ no dɑnɑm ɑmmɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ go di.
43009026	Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ kpɛɛnɛ: Ifɔ no ɑ̀ tɛ n sɛ? Zɑngɑ mɛtɛ no ɑ̀ tɛ kɑ n moo yom feeri?
43009027	À tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: A nɑ ɑ̀ cii wom sɛ kɔ. Wom mɑnɑ hɑngɑ dɑm. Ifɔ sɛ wom go bɑɑ wom mɑ mɑɑ kpɛɛnɛ? Wom go bɑɑ wom mɑ tɛ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom no?
43009028	Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ woo kɑ cii: Ni yɑ ci ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize, ɑmmɑ i yom wɔ Moisi coobɑɑbɑize yom no.
43009029	I yom wɔ, i go bei kɑ Ikpɛ sendi Moisi sɛ. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kpɛ i mɑnɑ bei nungu kɑ ɑ̀ bɔrɔ no.
43009030	Bɔrɔ di tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: A mɑmɑci kɑ wom si bei nungu kɑ bɔrɔ no ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ moo yom feeri.
43009031	I go bei kɑ Ikpɛ si hɑngɑ dɑm dulumkoni yom sɛ. Ammɑ de bɔrɔ go hɑmburu Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ binebɑɑ tɛ, ɑkpɛ sɛ no Ikpɛ go hɑngɑ dɑm.
43009032	Zɑ hɑndunyɑ tɑkɑyom i mɑnɑ mɑɑ ǹ mɑ cii bɑ ce fɔ ǹ nɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ǹ hɛi dɑnɑm moo yom feeri.
43009033	De bɔrɔ kpɛ mɑnɑ hunu Ikpɛ dɔ ɑ̀ si hini kɑ hɛ fɔ tɛ.
43009034	Ǹ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Zɑ ǹ nɑ n hɛi n tɔ ndɑ dulum yom. Ngɑ no n go kɑ i cɛbɛ? Cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑrɛ.
43009035	Yesu mɑɑ bɑɑru kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑrɛ. Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu di ɑ̀, ɑ̀ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N go Ikpɛ Ize nɑɑne bɑ?
43009036	À tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Mee no yɑ Kpe, yɑ du kɑ nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ?
43009037	Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N di ɑ̀ kɔ. Wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go sendi n sɛ, ngɑ no.
43009038	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii: Kpe, ɑ go nɑɑne. À nɑ Yesu bɛɛrɑndi mo.
43009039	Yesu cii: Ciiti sɛ no ɑ kɑɑ hɑndunyɑ wɔ kunɑ zɑmɑ beerem kɑ ǹ si di, ǹ mɑ di. Beerem mo kɑ ǹ go di, ǹ mɑ ye dɑnɑm yom.
43009040	Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ, ǹ mɑɑ sendi nge yom di. Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: I yom mo dɑnɑm yom no?
43009041	Yesu mo cii ǹ sɛ: De wom yɑ dɑnɑm yom no, kulu wom sindɑ dulum. Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ wom go cii, i go di. À sɛ no wom dulum go gɔrɔ wom bɔm.
43010001	Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si huro feeji kɑli kunɑ ndɑ mee ɑmmɑ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑru no ndɑ nungu fɔ ŋmɑni, kulu zee no, bɔrɔ kɔmkɔ.
43010002	Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go huro ndɑ mee feeji yom kurukɔ no.
43010003	Kɑli di mee bɑtukɔ cini feeri ɑ̀ sɛ. Feeji yom mo go mɑɑ ɑ̀ jinde. À go kɑ ngɑ feeji yom cɛɛ ndɑ ǹ mɑɑ yom kɑ ǹ kɑɑ tɛrɛ.
43010004	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ngɑ feeji yom kulu kɑɑ tɛrɛ, ɑ̀ go dirɑ ǹ jine. Ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ zɑmɑ ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ jinde bei.
43010005	Ǹ si yo gɑnɑ pɑi. Ammɑ ǹ zuuru ɑ̀ sɛ no zɑmɑ ǹ si yo jinde bei.
43010006	Yesu nɑ yɑɑse wɔne wi ǹ sɛ ɑmmɑ ǹ mɑnɑ fɑhɑm ndɑ sendi kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ǹ sɛ.
43010007	Yesu cii ǹ sɛ kpɛɛnɛ: Cimi no ɑ go cii wom sɛ, hɛɛ yɑ ci feeji yom kɑli mee.
43010008	Ǹ kulu kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ jinɑ, zee yom no, bɔrɔ kɔmkɔ yom, ɑmmɑ feeji yom mɑnɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ǹ sɛ.
43010009	Hɛɛ wɔ, hɛɛ yɑ ci mee di. De bɔrɔ fɔ go huro ndɑ ɑ dɔ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ du fɑɑbɑ. À kɑɑ huro. À kɑɑ hunu. À kɑɑ du kure dɔ mo.
43010010	Zee wɔ si kɑɑ kɑlɑ zeetɛrɛ. À kɑɑ kɑ bɔrɔ wi kɑ hɛ kulu hɑlɑci. Hɛɛ wɔ ɑ kɑɑ no domi ǹ mɑ du hundi. Ǹ mɑ du ɑ̀ mo ndɑ bɑyom.
43010011	Hɛɛ yɑ ci kurukɔ hinno. Kurukɔ hinno go kɑ ngɑ hundi no ngɑ feeji yom sɑbu sɛ.
43010012	Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go gbei tɛ bɑnɑndi sɛ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci kurukɔ. Feeji yom mo mɑnɑ ci ɑ̀ ŋmɔne yom. Kɑ ɑ̀ go di sɑgɑli go kɑɑ, ɑ̀ go feeji yom nɑm kɑ zuuru. Sɑgɑli di mo go huro feeji yom kunɑ kɑ ǹ hɑɑme. À go kɑ ǹ kɑru kɑ see.
43010013	Gbei tɛkɔ wɔ go zuuru zɑmɑ bɑnɑndi gbei no ɑ̀ go tɛ. À bɑ si ndɑ feeji yom.
43010014	Hɛɛ wɔ, kurukɔ hinno no. A go kɑ ɑ feeji yom bei. Ngei mo go kɑ ɑ bei.
43010015	Zɑngɑ Bɑɑbɑ go kɑ ɑ bei, hɛɛ mo ɑ go Bɑɑbɑ bei. A go kɑ ɑ hundi no mo ɑ feeji yom sɑbu sɛ.
43010016	A gundɑ feeji ŋmɑni yom kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ci kɑli wɔ ŋmɔne yom. Kɑlɑ de yɑ kɑɑndei. Ǹ kɑɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ jinde sɛ. Ǹ kɑɑ tɛ kuru fɔlɔnku kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ kurukɔ fɔlɔnku.
43010017	À sɛ no, ɑ Bɑɑbɑ go bɑɑ hɛɛ zɑmɑ ɑ go kɑ ɑ hundi no, yɑ ye kɑ ɑ̀ tɑ kpɛɛnɛ.
43010018	Bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ tɑ ɑ gɑɑ, ɑmmɑ hɛɛ yɑ gɑ ɑ̀ no ndɑ ɑ bɔm. A gundɑ hini kɑ ɑ̀ no. A gundɑ hini mo kɑ ye kɑ ɑ̀ tɑ. A Bɑɑbɑ dɔ no ɑ du meire wɔne.
43010019	À sendi yom sɑbu sɛ feefee ye kɑ tunu Yuifu yom gɑme.
43010020	Ǹ ŋmɔne iboobo cii: À gundɑ hɔllɛ. Hɔllɔkom no. Ifɔ sɛ wom go hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ?
43010021	Bɔrɔ fɔ yom mo cii: Sendi yom wɔ mɑnɑ ci hɔllɛkpɛ sendi yom. Hɔllɛ si hini kɑ dɑnɑm yom moo yom feeri mo.
43010022	Hinnɑndiyom jingɑru go tɛ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ. Hɑrigu wɑtɛ no.
43010023	Yesu bine go yɑɑli Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ Sɑlomɔ tɑfɑɑ cire.
43010024	Yuifu yom bine nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm bindi kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ. Hɑli sɑɑ fɔ cine no n nɑm i mo goono siikɑ kunɑ? De ni yɑ Mɛsiyɑ no, n mɑ cii i sɛ tɛrɛkpɑrɛ.
43010025	Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: A nɑ ɑ̀ cii wom sɛ kɔ. Wom mɑnɑ nɑɑne. Gbei yom kɑ ɑ go tɛ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ, ngei yɑ go tɛ ɑ sɛdɑ.
43010026	Ammɑ wom wɔ, wom si nɑɑne zɑmɑ wom si ɑ feeji yom kunɑ zɑngɑ ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ cii wom sɛ.
43010027	A feeji yom go mɑɑ ɑ jinde. A go kɑ ǹ bei. Ngei mo go kɑ ɑ gɑnɑ.
43010028	A go kɑ ǹ no hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni. Ǹ si hɑlɑci pɑi. Bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ si ǹ kɔm ɑ kɑmbɛ.
43010029	A Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ no ndei, ɑ̀ beeri kɑ bisɑ hɛ kulu. Bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ si hini kɑ ǹ kɔm ɑ Bɑɑbɑ kɑmbɛ kunɑ.
43010030	Hɛɛ ndɑ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ, i kulu ɑfɔ no.
43010031	Yuifu yom ye kɑ tondi yom zɑɑ kpɛɛnɛ kɑ ɑ̀ cetu.
43010032	Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: A nɑ wom cɛbɛ gbei hinno boobo kɑ ǹ hunu ɑ Bɑɑbɑ dɔ. Gbei yom wɔ kunɑ wɔ fɔ sɛ no wom go kɑ ɑ cetu?
43010033	Yuifu yom tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: À mɑnɑ ci gbei hinno sɑbu sɛ no, i go kɑ n cetu ɑmmɑ zɑmɑ n go kɑ Ikpɛ cɛnɑndi. Ni kɑ n ci bɔrɔ, n go kɑ n bɔm tɛ Ikpɛ.
43010034	Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Ǹ nɑ wɔne hɑntum wom fɔndɑ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cii, "Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ cii wom sɛ wom bɑrɑ no ikpɛ yom". À nɑ ci yɑ no bɑ?
