43010035	À nɑ ǹ cɛɛ ikpɛ yom, nge yom kɑ ǹ dɔ Ikpɛ Sendɑ kɑɑ. Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ si hini kɑ tunu.
43010036	Yɑ no hɛɛ wɔ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ hɑlɑɑlɑndi kɑ ɑ dɔntɔm hɑndunyɑ kunɑ, wom go cii ɑ go kɑ Ikpɛ cɛnɑndi zɑmɑ ɑ cii hɛɛ yɑ ci Ikpɛ Ize?
43010037	De ɑ si kɑ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ gbei yom tɛ, wɑ si ɑ nɑɑne.
43010038	Ammɑ de ɑ go kɑ ǹ tɛ, bɑ kɑ wom si kɑ ɑ nɑɑne, wɑ cimɑndi gbei yom gɑɑ. Wom mɑ bei, wom mɑ nɑɑne mo, kɑ Bɑɑbɑ goono ɑ kunɑ. Hɛɛ mo, ɑ goono ɑ̀ kunɑ.
43010039	Sendi ngɑ di sɛ no ǹ ceeci kpɛɛnɛ ngei mɑ ɑ̀ dii, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ kɔmɑ ǹ kɑmbɛ.
43010040	À kpei hɑli Yudum isɑ bisɑntɛ nungu kɑ Yohɑnnɑ jinɑ kɑ mirɑndiyom tɛ. À gɔrɔ nungu di.
43010041	Bɔrɔ boobo kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ kɑ cii: Cimi no, Yohɑnnɑ mɑnɑ ɑlɑmu bɑ ɑfɔ tɛ. Ammɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ cii bɔrɔ kpɛ gɑɑ, kulu cimi no.
43010042	Bɔrɔ boobo kɑ ǹ goono nungu di nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
43011001	Bɔrɔ fɔ goono kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ bɑɑni. Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Lɑzɑɑ, Betɑni bɔrɔ no, Mɑriɑmɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɛ Mɑɑtɑ kpɑɑrɑ.
43011002	Mɑriɑmɑ yɑ ci weibɔrɔ di kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ wɑidi munu Kpe bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ cee yom hɑɑbu ndɑ ngɑ bɔm hɑmini. À hɑime no Lɑzɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ bɑɑni.
43011003	À sɛ no ɑ̀ weimɑ yom nɑ bɔrɔ fɔ dɔntɔm ɑ̀ mɑ kpei cii Yesu sɛ: Bɔrɔ kɑ n go bɑɑ di, ɑ̀ sindɑ bɑɑni.
43011004	Kɑ Yesu mɑɑ ngɑ di ɑ̀ cii: Zɛnjɛ ngɑ di mɑnɑ ci bu ŋmɔne ɑmmɑ Ikpɛ deizɑ ŋmɔne no. Zɛnjɛ wɔ dɔ no, hɛɛ Ikpɛ Ize yɑ du bɛɛrɛ.
43011005	Yesu go bɑɑ Mɑɑtɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛnɛ ndɑ Lɑzɑɑ.
43011006	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ bɑɑru Lɑzɑɑ sindɑ bɑɑni, ɑ̀ gɔrɔ jiribi hinkɑ kpɛɛnɛ nunguɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono.
43011007	À bɑndɑ no ɑ̀ cii coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ: I mɑ ye Yude lɑɑbu.
43011008	Coobɑɑbɑize yom cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Coobɑɑbɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ jɛ Yuifu yom nɑ n ceeci ngei mɑ n cetu ndɑ tondi yom. N tu kɑ ye nungu di kpɛɛnɛ?
43011009	Yesu tu kɑ cii: Zɑɑri kunɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ci guuru wei cindi hinkɑ no? De bɔrɔ fɔ go dirɑ zɑɑri, ɑ̀ si kɑti zɑmɑ ɑ̀ go di hɑndunyɑ wɔ kɑɑri.
43011010	Ammɑ de bɔrɔ fɔ go dirɑ ciini, ɑ̀ bo kɑti zɑmɑ kɑɑri si ɑ̀ kunɑ.
43011011	Sendi nge yom di bɑndɑ, ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: I kpɑɑsi Lɑzɑɑ go jiibi ɑmmɑ ɑ go kpei kɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi.
43011012	À coobɑɑbɑize yom cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe, de ɑ̀ go jiibi no, ɑ̀ kɑɑ du bɑɑni.
43011013	Ammɑ ɑ̀ buyom sendi no Yesu tɛ. Coobɑɑbɑize yom mo tɑmmɑ hɑhɑbiyɑ sendi no ɑ̀ tɛ.
43011014	À gɑɑ no Yesu sendi ǹ sɛ tɛrɛkpɑrɛ kɑ cii: Lɑzɑɑ bu.
43011015	Ammɑ wom sɑbu sɛ ɑ go fɑihã ndɑ kɑ ɑ si nungu di, zɑmɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ no wom gɑ ɑ nɑɑne. Ammɑ i mɑ kpei ɑ̀ dɔ.
43011016	Tomɑ bine kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Tɑwe, ɑ̀ cii ngɑ kpɑɑsi coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ: I yom mo i mo kpei kɑ bu ɑ̀ bɑndɑ.
43011017	Kɑ Yesu tɔ kpɑɑrɑ, ɑ̀ gɑru Lɑzɑɑ bu. À tɛ jiribi tɑɑci sɑɑrɛ kunɑ.
43011018	Betɑni kpɑɑrɑ bine mɑɑni Yerusɑlɛm no zɑngɑ kilomɛti hinzɑ sɑrɑ.
43011019	Yuifu yom boobo kɑɑ Mɑɑtɑ ndɑ Mɑriɑmɑ dɔ kɑ ǹ yɑmɑrɑndi ndɑ ǹ hɑime buyom.
43011020	À sɛ no, sɑɑ kɑ Mɑɑtɑ mɑɑ bɑɑru Yesu go kɑɑ, ɑ̀ kpei kɑ ɑ̀ kube. Ammɑ Mɑriɑmɑ wɔ goono fuu ko gɔrɔ.
43011021	Mɑɑtɑ cii Yesu sɛ: Kpe, de n goono nee, dom ɑ hɑime wɔ si bu.
43011022	Ammɑ bɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ bei hɛ kulu kɑ n go ŋmɑɑrɛ Ikpɛ gɑɑ, Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ tu n sɛ.
43011023	Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N hɑimɑ kɑɑ tunu kpɛɛnɛ.
43011024	Mɑɑtɑ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: A bei kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ tunu tunɑndiyomɑ hine, hɑnu beenɑntɛ.
43011025	Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Hɛɛ yɑ ci tunuyom ndɑ hundi. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne ɑ gɑɑ, bɑ ɑkpɛ bu, ɑ̀ kɑɑ hunɑ.
43011026	Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go hunɑ kɑ nɑɑne ɑ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ si bu pɑi. N go cimɑndi ngɑ di gɑɑ dee?
43011027	Mɑɑtɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Oò Kpe, ɑ go nɑɑne kɑ ni, n ci Mɛsiyɑ, Ikpɛ Ize kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑ hɑndunyɑ.
43011028	Kɑ Mɑɑtɑ sendi yɑ di cɔfɔ ɑ̀ kpei kɑ ngɑ cɛɛnɛ Mɑriɑmɑ cɛɛ tugu kunɑ. À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Coobɑɑbɑ kɑɑ nee. À bine go kɑ n cɛɛ.
43011029	Zɑ Mɑriɑmɑ mɑɑ, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ tunu ndɑ wɑɑsi kɑ kpei ɑ̀ dɔ.
43011030	Yesu mɑnɑ huro kpɑɑrɑ kunɑ jinɑ, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ goono nungu kɑ ɑ̀ dɔ Mɑɑtɑ nɑ ɑ̀ kube.
43011031	Yuifu yom bine kɑ ǹ goono ndɑ Mɑriɑmɑ fuu kunɑ ko kɑ ɑ̀ yɑmɑrɑndi, ǹ di ɑ̀ tunu ndɑ wɑɑsi kɑ hunu. Ǹ dɛcɛ ɑ̀ gɑɑ kɑ cii: Sɑɑrɛ di dɔ no ɑ̀ go kpei hɛ.
43011032	Sɑɑ kɑ Mɑriɑmɑ tɔ Yesu dɔ, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ jɛndɛbiri ɑ̀ jine. À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe, de n goono nee, dom ɑ hɑime wɔ si bu.
43011033	Yesu di Mɑriɑmɑ go hɛ. À di Yuifu yom mo kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ kɑ kɑɑ, ǹ go hɛ. Yesu binejisi. À bine go sɑrɑ.
43011034	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii: Mɑni wom nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm? Ǹ tu kɑ cii: Kpe, kɑɑ di.
43011035	Yesu hɛ.
43011036	À gɑɑ no, Yuifu yom cii: Wɑ gunɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ Lɑzɑɑ.
43011037	Ammɑ ǹ kunɑ ɑfɔ yom cii: Ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ dɑnɑm moo yom feeri, ɑ̀ si hini kɑ tɛ bɑ, kɑ bɔrɔ kpɛ mo mɑ si bu?
43011038	Yesu binejisi kpɛɛnɛ. À kpei sɑɑrɛ di dɔ. Tondi guusu fɔ no. Ǹ nɑ tondi bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ dɛcɛ ɑ̀ mee gɑɑ.
43011039	Yesu cii: Wɑ tondɑ gɑnɑndi. Mɑɑtɑ, bukɔɑ weimɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe, ɑ̀ fumbu kɔ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ jiribi tɑɑci no nee.
43011040	Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A cii n sɛ kɑ de n go nɑɑne n kɑɑ di Ikpɛ deizɑ. À nɑ ci yɑ no bɑ?
43011041	Ǹ nɑ tondɑ gɑnɑndi nunguɑ dɔ kɑ ǹ nɑ bukɔɑ dɑm. Yesu nɑ bɔm sombu bɛɛnɛ kɑ cii: Bɑɑbɑ, ɑ go kɑ n sɑɑbu zɑmɑ n mɑɑ ɑ sɛ.
43011042	Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ go bei kɑ n go mɑɑ ɑ sɛ sɑɑ kulu. Ammɑ jɑmɑ wɔ kɑ ǹ go cɛ nee sɑbu sɛ no ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ sendi, domi ǹ mɑ nɑɑne kɑ ni, n nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm.
43011043	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ di cii, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ jinde zɑɑ ndɑ gɑɑbi kɑ cii: Lɑzɑɑ, hunu tɛrɛ.
43011044	Bukɔɑ bine hunu. À cee yom ndɑ ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ yom goono didijɑntɛ ndɑ cɛsɛnjɛ. À moodumɑ goono dɑɑbɑntɛ ndɑ zɑrɑ. Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ ɑ̀ feeri. Wɑ ɑ̀ nɑm ɑ̀ mɑ kpei.
43011045	Yuifu yom kɑ ǹ kɑɑ Mɑriɑmɑ dɔ, ǹ ŋmɔne iboobo di hɛ kɑ Yesu tɛ. À gɑɑ no ǹ nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
43011046	Ammɑ ǹ kunɑ ɑfɔ yom kpei Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom dɔ kɑ cii ǹ sɛ hɛ kulu kɑ Yesu tɛ.
43011047	À gɑɑ no gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom mo ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom ǹ nɑ ciiti dumbukɔ yom meigu. Ǹ cii: Ifɔ i mɑ tɛ? Bɔrɔ kpɛ go ɑlɑmu boobo tɛ.
43011048	De i nɑ ɑ̀ nɑm ɑ̀ go tɛ yɑ di, ǹ kulu gɑ ɑ̀ nɑɑne. Lomɑncei bine kɑɑ kɑɑ, n gɑ i Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ ndɑ i dimi zeeri.
43011049	Ǹ kunɑ ɑfɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Kɑifɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ gɑrɑndikɔ beeri jiiri wɔ, ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Wom si hɛ fɔ kulu bei.
43011050	Wom si fɑhɑm kɑ bei i hɑnfɑni no bɔrɔ fɔ mɑ bu jɑmɑ sɛ dimi sunsɑm kulu mɑ si hɑlɑci.
43011051	À mɑnɑ ɑ̀ cii ngɑ bɔm gɑɑ. Ammɑ zɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ gɑrɑndikɔ beeri jiiri wɔ, ɑ̀ nɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ kɑ cii Yesu bɑ bu dimi sɛ.
43011052	À mɑnɑ ci dimi wɔ sɛ hinne ɑmmɑ Ikpɛ ize yom mo kɑ ǹ kɑru kɑ see ǹ mɑ meigu kɑ tɛ ɑfɔ.
43011053	Zɑ hɑnu ngɑ di ǹ sɑwɑrɑ ngei mɑ ɑ̀ wi.
43011054	À sɛ no, Yesu si dirɑ tɛrɛkpɑrɛ Yuifu yom kunɑ. À hunu nungu di kɑ kpei lɑɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑni ndɑ gɑnji fɔ. À huro wɑngɑrɑ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Efɑhim, nungu kɑ ɑ̀ gɔrɔ ndɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom.
43011055	Yuifu yom Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru bine mɑɑni. Kpɑɑrɑ hundɑntɛ bɔrɔ boobo kpei Yerusɑlɛm kɑ ngei bɔm hinnɑndi zɑ jingɑruɑ mɑnɑ tɔ.
43011056	Ǹ nɑ Yesu ceeci. Ǹ go cɛ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ kɑ cii cɛrɛ sɛ: Mɛtɛ no ɑ̀ himɑ wom sɛ? À si kɑɑ jingɑru wɔ dɔ no?
43011057	Gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom nɑ fɔndɔ no. Ǹ cii de bɔrɔ fɔ bei nungu kɑ Yesu goono, ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑ cii ngei sɛ domi ǹ mɑ du kɑ ɑ̀ dii.
43012001	Jiribi idu hɑli Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑruɑ tɔ, Yesu kɑɑ Betɑni kpɑɑrɑ. Nungu di no Lɑzɑɑ goono, bɔrɔ kɑ Yesu tunɑndi bukɔ yom gɑme.
43012002	Ǹ nɑ ŋmɑɑri tɛ Yesu sɛ. Mɑɑtɑ nɑ ŋmɑɑri fɑrisi. Lɑzɑɑ mo yɑ ci beerem kɑ ǹ go ŋmɑɑ ndɑ Yesu ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ.
43012003	Mɑriɑmɑ nɑ wɑidi cɑɑdɑntɛ dimi fɔ kilo zemine kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ nɑdi zɑɑ. À nɑ ɑ̀ munu Yesu cee yom bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ cee yom hɑɑbu ndɑ ngɑ bɔm hɑmini. Fuu di tɔ ndɑ wɑidi hɛo kɑɑnɔ.
43012004	Ammɑ Yesu coobɑɑbɑize yom kunɑ ɑfɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Yudɑ, Isikɑriɔtu bɔrɔ, Simɔ koo goono ŋmɑɑrɑ dɔ. Ngɑ yɑ bɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm kɑmbɛ.
43012005	À cii: Wɑidi wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nooru tɔ zɑngɑ jiiri fɔ bɑnɑndi, ifɔ sɛ ǹ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ neerɑ kɑ nooruɑ no tɑlikɑ yom sɛ?
43012006	Ammɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ngɑ di cii zɑmɑ ɑ̀ go sisibi tɑlikɑ yom sɛ no, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ sendi zɑngɑ yɑ zɑmɑ zee no. Nooru fɔɔlɔ goono ɑ̀ sɛ no. À nɑ nooru kɑ ɑ̀ goono fɔlɔ di kunɑ zɑɑ.
43012007	Yesu bine cii: Wɑ ɑ̀ nɑm. À nɑ wɑidi wɔ jisi no ɑ fijiyom hɑnu sɛ.
43012008	Tɑlikɑ yom bo goono wom bɑndɑ sɑɑ kulu, ɑmmɑ hɛɛ, ɑ si bo goono wom bɑndɑ sɑɑ kulu.
43012009	Yuifu bɑkɑrɑ mɑɑ bɑɑru Yesu goono Betɑni kpɑɑrɑ. Cɔfɔ ǹ kɑɑ nodi. Ǹ mɑnɑ kɑɑ Yesu hinne sɑbu sɛ ɑmmɑ ǹ mɑ di Lɑzɑɑ mo kɑ Yesu tunɑndi bukɔ yom gɑme.
43012010	Gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom sɑwɑrɑ ngei mɑ Lɑzɑɑ mo wi.
43012011	bɑɑ ngei mɑ ɑ̀ wi no zɑmɑ ɑ̀ sɑbu sɛ no Yuifu yom jɑmɑ boobo hunu ǹ bɑndɑ kɑ nɑɑne Yesu gɑɑ.
43012012	À mo bo jɑmɑ bɑkɑrɑ kɑɑ jingɑruɑ dɔ. Ǹ mɑɑ bɑɑru Yesu go kɑɑ Yerusɑlɛm.
43012013	Ǹ nɑ dɑbinɑ nyɑ kɑmbɛ yom zɑɑ kɑ hunu wɑngɑrɑ kunɑ. Ǹ kpei kɑ ɑ̀ kube. Ǹ go kuwɑ kɑ cii: Ikpɛ, i go kɑ n sifɑ. Bɑrikɑkpɛ no Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ Kpe mɑɑ gɑɑ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Isirɑilɑ Kpe.
43012014	Yesu du fɑrikɑ binci hɑiwɑsu fɔ. À gɔrɔ ɑ̀ bɔm, zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii:
43012015	"N mɑ si hɑmburu, Sionɑ koo hundiyo. Gunɑ, n Kpe go kɑɑ. À go gɔrɔ fɑrikɑ binci hɑiwɑsu fɔ bɔm."
43012016	À coobɑɑbɑize yom bine mɑnɑ fɑhɑm ndɑ hɛ nge yom di. Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ Yesu bɛɛrɑndi, ɑ̀ gɑɑ no ǹ hɔngɔ kɑ ǹ nɑ hɛ nge yom di hɑntum ɑ̀ bɔm. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɔnɑndi ɑ̀ sɛ mo.
43012017	Jɑmɑ kɑ ǹ goono Yesu dɔ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Lɑzɑɑ cɛɛ sɑɑrɑ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi bukɔ yom gɑme, ǹ go tɛ sɛdɑ.
43012018	À sɛ no jɑmɑ di kpei kɑ ɑ̀ kube zɑmɑ ǹ mɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑlɑmu wɔ tɛ.
43012019	À gɑɑ no Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom cii cɛrɛ sɛ: Wom di kɑ wom si du hɛ fɔ kulu. Gunɑ, hɑndunyɑ kulu kpei ɑ̀ bɑndɑ.
43012020	Beerem kɑ ǹ kɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi jingɑruɑ dɔ, ǹ kunɑ Gɑrɛku fɔ yom mo goono.
43012021	Ǹ kɑɑ Filipu dɔ Betɑsɑidɑ bɔrɔ no, Gɑlile lɑɑbu. Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ni, kɑ n ci jinɑ. I go bɑɑ i mɑ di Yesu.
43012022	Filipu mo kpei. À cii Andɛrɛ sɛ. Andɛrɛ ndɑ Filipu mo cii Yesu sɛ.
43012023	Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Lɔkɑci kɑɑ ǹ mɑ hɛɛ, Adɑmize bɛɛrɑndi.
43012024	Cimi cimi ɑ go cii wom de mɔsɔngu mogure fɔ mɑnɑ kɑm lɑɑbu kunɑ kɑ bu, ɑ̀ bo gɔrɔ no ngɑ fɔ. Ammɑ de ɑ̀ bu, ɑ̀ go kɑ ize boobo hɛi.
43012025	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ ngɑ hundi, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ dɛrɑndi. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hungu ngɑ hundi hɑndunyɑ wɔ kunɑ, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ jɛ hɑli hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni.
43012026	De bɔrɔ go tɑmtɛrɛ ɑ sɛ, ɑ̀ mɑ ɑ gɑnɑ. Nungu kɑ ɑ goono, ɑ gbeiize mo kɑɑ goono nungu di. De bɔrɔ go tɑmtɛrɛ ɑ sɛ, Bɑɑbɑ gɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi.
43012027	Mɑɑsɑ ɑ hundi go tɑɑbi. Ifɔ yɑ cii? Bɑɑbɑ, n mɑ ɑ kɑɑ lɔkɑci wɔ kunɑ no? Ammɑ ɑ̀ sɛ no ɑ kɑɑ lɔkɑci wɔ.
43012028	Bɑɑbɑ, n mɑ n mɑɑ bɛɛrɑndi. Cɔfɔ jinde fɔ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ kɑ cii: A nɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi. A gɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi mo kpɛɛnɛ.
43012029	Jɑmɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono nungu di mɑɑ yɑ di. Ǹ cii: Bɛɛnɛ kɑɑtiyom no. Afɔ yom cii: Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize fɔ yɑ sendi ɑ̀ sɛ.
43012030	Yesu tu kɑ cii: Jinde wɔne mɑnɑ hunutɛrɛ ɑ sɑbu sɛ, ɑmmɑ wom sɑbu sɛ no.
43012031	Mɑɑsɑ no hɑndunyɑ ciitiyom tɔ. Mɑɑsɑnkulu hɑndunyɑ wɔ kpe, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ cetu tɛrɛ.
43012032	Hɛɛ mo, de ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ sombu bɛɛnɛ, ɑ kɑɑ bɔrɔ kulu cendi ɑ dɔ.
43012033	Kɑ ɑ̀ go sendi zɑngɑ yɑ, bu dimi kɑ ɑ̀ bɑ tɛ no ɑ̀ go cɛbɛ.
43012034	Jɑmɑ di tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: I mɑɑ bɑɑru fɔndɑ kunɑ kɑ Mɛsiyɑ bo hunɑ no beeniyom si. Mɛtɛ ni wɔ, n go cii, kɑlɑ ǹ mɑ Adɑmize sombu bɛɛnɛ? Mee yɑ ci Adɑmize?
43012035	Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Kɑɑri cindi lɔkɑci cɛnɑ kpɛɛnɛ wom bindi kunɑ. Wɑ dirɑ zɑ sɑɑ kɑ wom gundɑ kɑɑri domi kube mɑ si wom jirisi. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go dirɑ kube kunɑ, ɑ̀ si bei nungu kɑ ngɑ go kpei.
43012036	Wom mɑ nɑɑne kɑɑri gɑɑ zɑ sɑɑ kɑ wom gundɑ kɑɑri domi wom mɑ tɛ kɑɑriize yom. Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu nɑ sendi nge yom di cii, ɑ̀ dirɑ kɑ kpei tugu ǹ sɛ.
43012037	Ammɑ bɑ kɑ Yesu nɑ ɑlɑmu boobo tɛ ǹ jine, ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu ǹ mɑnɑ nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
43012038	À tɛ no domi ǹ mɑ ɑndebi Esɑyi sendi tɔnɑndi kɑ ɑ̀ cii: "Kpe, mee yɑ nɑ i bɑɑru cimɑndi? Mee sɛ mo no Kpe nɑ ngɑ kɑɑtɛrɛ?"
43012039	À sɛ nɑ, ǹ si hini kɑ nɑɑne zɑmɑ Esɑyi cii kpɛɛnɛ.
43012040	"À nɑ ǹ mɑɑ yom dɑnɑndi. À nɑ ǹ bine yom sendɑndi zɑmɑ ǹ mɑ si di ndɑ ngei moo yom. Ǹ mɑ si fɑhɑm ngei bine yom dɔ hɑli ǹ mɑ bɛrɛ ɑ dɔ, hɑli yɑ ǹ no bɑɑni."
43012041	Esɑyi nɑ wɔne yom cii zɑmɑ ɑ̀ di Yesu deizɑ kɑ sendi ɑ̀ bɔm.
43012042	Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu sɑɑ di bɑ hɑikusu yom kunɑ ǹ bɑyom nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Ammɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom sɑbu sɛ, ǹ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ cii ndɑ ngei mee zɑmɑ ǹ mɑ si ngei kɑɑ Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu.
43012043	Ǹ go bɑɑ bɛɛrɛ iburɑdɑm dɔ kɑ bisɑ Ikpɛ dɔ bɛɛrɛ.
43012044	Ammɑ Yesu nɑ jinde zɑɑ kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne ɑ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ɑ gɑɑ no ɑ go nɑɑne ɑmmɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm gɑɑ.
43012045	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go di hɛɛ mo, ɑ̀ go di wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm.
43012046	Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ kɑɑ no zɑngɑ kɑɑri hɑndunyɑ kunɑ domi bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne ɑ gɑɑ ɑ̀ mɑ si gɔrɔ kube.
43012047	De bɔrɔ fɔ go mɑɑ ɑ sendi yom, ngɑ ɑ̀ si kɑ ǹ nɑɑne, hɛɛ wɔ ɑ si ɑ̀ ciiti bo. Yɑ nɑ kɑɑ kɑ hɑndunyɑ ciiti ɑmmɑ kɑ hɑndunyɑ fɑɑbɑ.
43012048	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hungu hɛɛ, ɑ̀ si kɑ ɑ sendi tu mo, ɑkpɛ gundɑ ɑ sendi yom kɑ ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ ciiti. Sendi kɑ ɑ cii, sendɑ yɑ gɑ ɑ̀ ciiti hɑnu beenɑntɑ.
43012049	Yɑ nɑ sendi ɑ bɔm gɑɑ, ɑmmɑ Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm. Ngɑ bumbum nɑ meire no ɑ sɛ, hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ himɑ yɑ cii ndɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ himɑ yɑ sendi.
43012050	A go bei mo kɑ ɑ̀ meire yɑ hundi no kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni. À sɛ no, hɛ yom kɑ ɑ go cii, ɑ go cii no zɑngɑ Bɑɑbɑ cii ɑ sɛ.
43013001	Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑruɑ bɑ tɔ. Yesu go bei ngɑ Iɔkɑci tɔ ngɑ mɑ hunu hɑndunyɑ wɔ kunɑ kɑ kpei Bɑɑbɑ dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ ngɑ ŋmɔne yom kɑ ǹ goono hɑndunyɑ, ɑ̀ go bɑɑ rei kɑlɑ beenɑntɛ.
43013002	Ǹ goono ŋmɑɑri gɑɑ. Ibilisi nɑ hɑnyɑ lɑlɔ dɑm kɔ Yudɑ Isikɑriɔtu bɔrɔ, Simɔ koo bine kunɑ ɑ̀ mɑ Yesu dɑm kɑmbɛ.
43013003	Yesu go bei Bɑɑbɑ nɑ hɛ kulu dɑm ngɑ kɑmbɛ. A go bei mo ngɑ hunu Bɑɑbɑ dɔ. À go ye mo Bɑɑbɑ dɔ.
43013004	À tunu ŋmɑɑrɑ bɔm kɑ ngɑ kpɛ yom kɑɑ kɑ jisi kɑmbu. À nɑ zɑrɑ fɔ zɑɑ kɑ hɔ ngɑ cɛntɛ gɑɑ.
43013005	À bɑndɑ ɑ̀ nɑ hɑri dooru gɑɑsu fɔ kunɑ kɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom cee yom nyunu. À nɑ ǹ hɑɑbu ndɑ zɑrɑ di kɑ ɑ̀ hɔ ngɑ cɛntɛ gɑɑ.
43013006	À gɑɑ no, ɑ̀ kɑɑ Simɔ Piɛɛ dɔ. Piɛɛ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ni Kpe, ngɑ no n mo kɑ ɑ cee nyunu?
43013007	Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Hɛ kɑ ɑ go tɛ wɔ, n si ɑ̀ fɑhɑm mɑɑsɑ ɑmmɑ hɑli cɛnɑ n gɑ ɑ̀ fɑhɑm.
43013008	Piɛɛ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Pɑi no, n si ɑ cee yom nyunu. Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: De ɑ mɑnɑ n nyume, hɛ kulu si hɛɛ ndɑ ni gɑme.
43013009	Simɔ Piɛɛ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ɑ cee yom hinne no n mɑ nyunu ɑmmɑ ndɑ ɑ kɑmbɛ yom, ndɑ ɑ bɔm mo.
43013010	Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nyume kɔ, cee yom hinne no ɑ̀ mɑ nyunu, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ hinne sã sã. Wom hinne ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci wom kulu.
43013011	À cii yɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ bei bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ngɑ dɑm kɑmbɛ. À sɛ no, ɑ̀ cii wom kulu mɑnɑ hinne.
43013012	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ cee yom nyunu kɑ beeni ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ jiine yom dɑm. À ye kɑ gɔrɔ. À cii ǹ sɛ: Wom fɑhɑm ndɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ tɛ wom sɛ wɔ?
43013013	Wom go kɑ ɑ cɛɛ Coobɑɑbɑ. Wom go kɑ ɑ cɛɛ Kpe. Wom ciiyom boori zɑmɑ yɑ no hɛɛ.
43013014	Ngɑ di sɛ, de ɑ nɑ wom cee yom nyunu, hɛɛ Kpe, hɛɛ Coobɑɑbɑ, wom mo wom mɑ cɛrɛ cee yom nyunu.
43013015	A nɑ wom no deedɑndi wom mɑ tɛ zɑngɑ ɑ tɛ wom sɛ.
43013016	Cimi cimi, ɑ go cii wom sɛ, tɑm si bisɑ ngɑ kpe. Yɑ no bɔrɔ mo si bisɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ sɑmbɑ.
43013017	De wom go kɑ nge yom di bei, wom yɑ binekɑɑnekpɛ yom no de wom go kɑ ǹ tɛ.
43013018	À mɑnɑ ci wom kulu sendi no ɑ go tɛ. A go bei beerem kɑ ɑ suubɑ ɑmmɑ kɑlɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ mɑ tɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cii: "Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go buuru ŋmɑɑ ndɑ hɛɛ, ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ ceekpɛrɛ tunɑndi ɑ gɑɑ".
43013019	Zɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ go cii wom sɛ zɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ tɛ, domi sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ tɛ wom mɑ nɑɑne kɑ Hɛɛ yɑ ci.
43013020	Cimi cimi, ɑ go cii wom sɛ, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ go dɔntɔm tɑ, ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ tɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ tɑ mo, ɑ̀ go wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm tɑ.
43013021	Kɑ Yesu sendi yɑ di, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ binejisi. À tɛ sɛdɑ kɑ cii: Cimi cimi ɑ go cii wom sɛ, wom kunɑ ɑfɔ gɑ ɑ dɑm kɑmbɛ.
43013022	Coobɑɑbɑize yom go cɛrɛ gunɑ ndɑ siikɑ. Ǹ mɑnɑ bei bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sendi ɑ̀ go tɛ.
43013023	Ammɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom kunɑ ɑfɔ kɑ Yesu bine go bɑɑ, ɑ̀ go gɔrɔ kɑ lɑmbɑ Yesu gɑɑ.
43013024	Simɔ Piɛɛ sendi ɑ̀ sɛ ndɑ kɑmbɛ ɑ̀ mɑ Yesu hã bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sendi ɑ go tɛ.
43013025	Ngɑ mo kɑ ɑ̀ go lɑmbɑ Yesu gɑɑ, ɑ̀ cii: Kpe, mee no?
43013026	Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Ngɑ yɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ dumbɑri fɔ tusu kɑ no. À nɑ dumbɑri di tusu, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ no Yudɑ Isikɑriɔtu bɔrɔ, Simɔ koo sɛ.
43013027	Sɑɑ kɑ Yudɑ nɑ dumbɑri di tɑ, ɑ̀ gɑɑ no Setɑm huro ɑ̀ bine kunɑ. Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Hɛ kɑ n go tɛ, n mɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ wɑɑsi.
43013028	Ammɑ beerem kɑ ǹ goono ŋmɑɑrɑ dɔ, bɑ ɑfɔ mɑnɑ fɑhɑm hɛ kɑ sɛ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ cii Yudɑ sɛ.
43013029	Afɔ yom tɑmmɑ zɑ kɑ Yudɑ sɛ no nooru fɔɔlɔ goono, Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ no ɑ̀ mɑ dei hɛ kɑ ngei bɑɑ jingɑruɑ sɛ wɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ hɛ fɔ no tɑlikɑ yom sɛ.
43013030	Kɑ Yudɑ nɑ dumbɑrɑ tɑ, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ hunu ndɑ wɑɑsi. Ciini mo tɔ.
43013031	Sɑɑ kɑ Yudɑ hunu, ɑ̀ gɑɑ no Yesu cii: Mɑɑsɑnkulu hɛɛ Adɑmize, ɑ du bɛɛrɛ. Ikpɛ mo du bɛɛrɛ ɑ kunɑ.
43013032	Zɑ kɑ Ikpɛ du bɛɛrɛ ɑ kunɑ, Ikpɛ mo gɑ ɑ bɛɛrɑndi ngɑ bumbum kunɑ. À gɑ ɑ bɛɛrɑndi, ɑ̀ si jɛ.
43013033	Koo cɛnɑ yom, ɑ goono ndɑ wom bɑndɑ fɔ. Wom gɑ ɑ ceeci. Zɑngɑ ɑ cii Yuifu yom sɛ, nungu kɑ hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ go kpei, ǹ si hini kɑ kpei. Mɑɑsɑ ɑ go kɑ ɑ̀ cii wom mo, wom sɛ.
43013034	A go wom no meire teji, wom mɑ bɑɑ cɛrɛ. Zɑngɑ ɑ bɑɑ wom, wom mo, wom mɑ bɑɑ cɛrɛ.
43013035	Wɔne dɔ ǹ kulu kɑɑ bei kɑ wom yɑ ɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom no de wom gundɑ cɛrɛ bɑɑkɑsine.
43013036	Simɔ Piɛɛ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe, mɑni n go kpei? Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Nungu kɑ ɑ go kpei, n si hini kɑ ɑ gɑnɑ mɑɑsɑ, ɑmmɑ hɑli kɑ jɛ n gɑ ɑ gɑnɑ.
43013037	Piɛɛ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe, ifɔ sɛ ɑ si hini kɑ n gɑnɑ mɑɑsɑ? A gɑ ɑ hundi no n sɑbu sɛ.
43013038	Yesu mo tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: N gɑ n hundɑ no ɑ sɑbu sɛ doo? Cimi cimi ɑ go cii n sɛ, hɑli gɔrɔngɔ cɑ n gɑ ɑ ze ce hinzɑ.
43014001	Wɑ si nɑm wom bine yom mɑ sɑrɑ. Wom go kɑ Ikpɛ nɑɑne. Wom mɑ ɑ nɑɑne mo.
43014002	Gɔrɛ dɔ boobo goono ɑ Bɑɑbɑ hundi kunɑ. De ɑ̀ si, dom ɑ cii wom sɛ. À go kpei gɔrɛ dɔ hinsɑ wom sɛ no.
43014003	De bine ɑ kpei gɔrɛ dɔ hinsɑ wom sɛ, ɑ ye kɑ kɑɑ kɑ wom zɑɑ ɑ bɑndɑ. Nungu kɑ ɑ goono wom mo, wom mɑ goono.
43014004	Wom bei nungu kɑ ɑ go kpei. Wom go fɔndɔ bei mo.
43014005	Tomɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe i si bei nungu kɑ n go kpei. Mɛtɛ i tɛ kɑ fɔndɑ bei?
43014006	Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Hɛɛ yɑ ci fɔndɔ ndɑ cimi ndɑ hundi. Bɔrɔ kulu si du kɑ tɔ Bɑɑbɑ dɔ kɑlɑ ndɑ ɑ dɔ.
43014007	De wom nɑ ɑ bei, dom wom nɑ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ mo bei. Zɑ mɑɑsɑ bine wom go kɑ ɑ̀ bei, wom di ɑ̀ mo.
43014008	Filipu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe, i cɛbɛ Bɑɑbɑ. Ngɑ di wɑsɑ i sɛ.
43014009	Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Zɑ jɛyom no ɑ goono ndɑ wom Filipu, ngɑ no n mɑnɑ ɑ bei? Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ di hɛɛ, ɑ̀ di Bɑɑbɑ. Dee mɛtɛ ni wɔ, n tɛ kɑ cii yɑ wom cɛbɛ Bɑɑbɑ?
43014010	N mɑnɑ nɑɑne no kɑ ɑ goono Bɑɑbɑ kunɑ, Bɑɑbɑ mo goono ɑ kunɑ? Sendi yom kɑ ɑ go cii wom sɛ, ɑ si kɑ ǹ cii ɑ bɔm gɑɑ ɑmmɑ Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono ɑ kunɑ, ngɑ yɑ go gbei tɛ.
43014011	Wɑ ɑ nɑɑne hɛɛ wɔ, Bɑɑbɑ kunɑ no ɑ goono. Bɑɑbɑ mo goono ɑ kunɑ. De ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci yɑ, wɑ ɑ nɑɑne bɑ gbei yom di sɑbu sɛ.
43014012	Cimi cimi ɑ go cii wom sɛ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne ɑ gɑɑ, gbei yom kɑ ɑ go tɛ, ngɑ mo ɑ̀ gɑ ǹ tɛ. Gbei yom kɑ ǹ beeri kɑ bisɑ wɔne yom ɑ̀ gɑ ǹ tɛ zɑmɑ ɑ go kpei Bɑɑbɑ dɔ.
43014013	Hɛ kulu kɑ wom go ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ, ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ tɛ, domi Bɑɑbɑ mɑ du bɛɛrɛ ɑ kunɑ, hɛɛ Ize.
43014014	De wom nɑ hɛ fɔ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ, ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ tɛ.
43014015	De wom go bɑɑ hɛɛ, wom mɑ ɑ meire yom gɑnɑ.
43014016	Hɛɛ mo, ɑ kɑɑ Bɑɑbɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ wom no Gɑɑkɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bo gɔrɔ wom kunɑ, beeniyom si.
43014017	Ngɑ yɑ ci cimi Biyɑ kɑ hɑndunyɑ si hini kɑ ɑ̀ tɑ zɑmɑ hɑndunyɑ si di ɑ̀. À si ɑ̀ bei mo. Ammɑ wom wɔ, wom go kɑ ɑ̀ bei zɑmɑ ɑ̀ go gɔrɔ ndɑ wom. À kɑɑ goono wom kunɑ mo.
43014018	A si wom nɑm kɔyɔ yom. A ye kɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ.
43014019	Lɔkɑci cɛnɑ cindi, hɑndunyɑ si di hɛɛ kpɛɛnɛ. Ammɑ wom wɔ wom kɑɑ di hɛɛ. Zɑ kɑ ɑ go hunɑ wom mo, wom kɑɑ hunɑ.
43014020	Hɑnu ngɑ di no, wom kɑɑ bei ɑ goono ɑ Bɑɑbɑ kunɑ. Wom kɑɑ bei wom goono ɑ kunɑ. Hɛɛ mo ɑ goono wom kunɑ.
43014021	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ ɑ meire yom ko kɑ ǹ gɑnɑ, ɑkpɛ go bɑɑ hɛɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ hɛɛ, ɑ Bɑɑbɑ mo go bɑɑ rɑ. Hɛɛ mo, ɑ go bɑɑ rɑ. A gɑ ɑ bɔm kɑɑtɛrɛ ɑ̀ sɛ.
43014022	Yudɑ ŋmɑni fɔ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Isikɑriɔtu bɔrɔ di, ɑ̀ cii Yesu sɛ: Kpe, mɛtɛ n tɛ kɑ n bɔm kɑɑtɛrɛ i sɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci hɑndunyɑ sɛ?
43014023	Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: De bɔrɔ fɔ go bɑɑ hɛɛ, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ sendi gɑnɑ. A Bɑɑbɑ mo go bɑɑ rɑ. I kɑɑ kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ. I gɑ i gɔrɛ dɔ tɛ ɑ̀ dɔ.
43014024	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si bɑɑ hɛɛ, ɑ̀ si ɑ sendi yom gɑnɑ. Sendi wɔ kɑ wom go mɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ɑ ŋmɔne ɑmmɑ Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm, ɑ̀ ŋmɔne no.
43014025	A nɑ nge yom di cii wom sɛ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ go gɔrɔ ndɑ wom.
43014026	Ammɑ Gɑɑkɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ wɔ kɑ Bɑɑbɑ gɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔm ɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ wom cɛbɛ hɛ kulu. À kɑɑ wom hɔngɑndi mo hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ cii wom sɛ.
43014027	A go lɑɑkɑli kɑne nɑm wom sɛ. A go wom no ɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne. Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ si wom no bo zɑngɑ hɑndunyɑ cini no. Wɑ si nɑm wom bine yom mɑ sɑrɑ. Wɑ si nɑm wom bine yom mɑ hɑmburu mo.
43014028	Wom mɑɑ kɑ ɑ cii wom sɛ, ɑ go kpei. A ye kɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ. De wom bɑɑ hɛɛ, dom wom fɑihã ndɑ kɑ ɑ cii ɑ go kpei Bɑɑbɑ dɔ zɑmɑ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ bisɑ hɛɛ.
43014029	Mɑɑsɑ ɑ nɑ ǹ cii wom sɛ zɑ ǹ mɑnɑ tɛ, domi sɑɑ kɑ ǹ kɑɑ tɛ wom mɑ nɑɑne.
43014030	A si sendi iboobo ndɑ wom kpɛɛnɛ zɑmɑ hɑndunyɑ kpe go kɑɑ. À sindɑ hɛ fɔ kulu ɑ dɔ.
43014031	Ammɑ hɑli hɑndunyɑ mɑ bei kɑ ɑ go bɑɑ Bɑɑbɑ, zɑngɑ Bɑɑbɑ nɑ ɑ no fɔndɔ, yɑ no ɑ go tɛ. Wɑ tunu, i mɑ dirɑ nee.
43015001	Hɛɛ wɔ, hɛɛ yɑ ci lɛzɛ nyɑ kpɛsɛ cimi cimi. A Bɑɑbɑ mo yɑ ci ɑ̀ fɑrikɔ.
43015002	Kɑmbɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono ɑ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ si ize hɛi, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ. Kɑmbɛ kulu mo kɑ ɑ̀ go ize hɛi, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ hinsɑ domi ɑ̀ mɑ hɛi kɑ tɔntɔnu.
43015003	Wom wɔ, wom hinne kɔ sendɑ kɑ ɑ cii wom sɛ sɑbu sɛ.
43015004	Wɑ gɔrɔ ɑ kunɑ. Hɛɛ mo ɑ bo gɔrɔ wom kunɑ. Tuuri kɑmbɛ si hini kɑ ize hɛi ngɑ bɔm gɑɑ, de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ gɔrɔ tuuri kpɛsɛ gɑɑ. Yɑ no wom mo, wom si hini pɑi de wom mɑnɑ gɔrɔ ɑ kunɑ.
43015005	Hɛɛ wɔ, hɛɛ yɑ ci kpɛsɑ. Wom mo, wom yɑ ci kɑmbɛ yom. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go gɔrɔ ɑ kunɑ, hɛɛ mo ɑ go gɔrɔ ɑkpɛ kunɑ, ɑkpɛ wɔ go hɛi ize boobo. De wom fee ndɑ hɛɛ, wom si hini kɑ hɛ fɔ kulu tɛ.
43015006	De bɔrɔ fɔ si gɔrɔ ɑ kunɑ, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ cetu tɛrɛ zɑngɑ tuuri kɑmbɛ yom. Ǹ kɔgu no. Ǹ go kɑ ǹ meigu kɑ ǹ dɑm nini kɑ ǹ tɔnu.
43015007	De wom go gɔrɔ ɑ kunɑ, ɑ sendi yom mo go gɔrɔ wom kunɑ, wɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ hɛ kɑ wom go bɑɑ. Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ tɛ wom sɛ.
43015008	Ǹ go ɑ Bɑɑbɑ bɛɛrɑndi wɔne gɑɑ, wom mɑ ize boobo hɛi. Wom kɑɑ tɛ ɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom.
43015009	Zɑngɑ Bɑɑbɑ bɑɑ hɛɛ, hɛɛ mo ɑ bɑɑ wom. Wom mo gɔrɔ ɑ bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ.
43015010	De wom go kɑ ɑ meire yom gɑnɑ, wom bo gɔrɔ ɑ bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ, zɑngɑ hɛɛ mo, ɑ nɑ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ meire yom gɑnɑ. A go gɔrɔ mo ɑ̀ bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ.
43015011	A nɑ nge yom di cii wom sɛ no domi ɑ binekɑɑne mɑ gɔrɔ wom kunɑ, wom binekɑɑne mo mɑ tɔ.
43015012	A meirɑ neyɑ, wom mɑ bɑɑ cɛrɛ zɑngɑ ɑ bɑɑ wom.
43015013	Bɑɑkɑsine fɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ, bɔrɔ mɑ ngɑ hundi no ngɑ kpɑɑsi yom sɑbu sɛ.
43015014	Wom bɑrɑ no ɑ kpɑɑsi yom de wom go tɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ go wom dɑm.
43015015	A si wom cɛɛ tɑm yom kpɛɛnɛ, zɑmɑ tɑm si bei hɛ kɑ ngɑ kpe go tɛ. Ammɑ ɑ nɑ wom cɛɛ kpɑɑsi yom zɑmɑ ɑ nɑm wom bei hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ mɑɑ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ dɔ.
43015016	Wom mɑnɑ ɑ suubɑ. Hɛɛ yɑ nɑ wom suubɑ kɑ wom gɔrɛndi domi wom mɑ kpei kɑ ize yom hɛi. Wom ize yom mo, ǹ mɑ gɔrɔ domi hɛ kulu kɑ wom kɑɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ Bɑɑbɑ dɔ ɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ wom no ndɑ.
43015017	A go wom dɑm nge yom di zɑmɑ wom mɑ bɑɑ cɛrɛ.
43015018	De hɑndunyɑ bine hungu wom, wom mɑ bei kɑ ɑ̀ bine jinɑ kɑ hungu hɛɛ.
43015019	De wom yɑ hɑndunyɑ ŋmɔne yom no, to, hɑndunyɑ go bɑɑ ngɑ ŋmɔne yom. Wom mɑnɑ ci hɑndunyɑ ŋmɔne yom, ɑmmɑ ɑ nɑ wom suubɑ hɑndunyɑ kunɑ. À sɑbu sɛ no hɑndunyɑ bine go hungu wom.
43015020	Wom mɑ hɔngɔ sendi wɔne kɑ ɑ cii wom sɛ, tɑm si bisɑ ngɑ kpe. De ǹ nɑ ɑ guruguzɑndi, ǹ kɑɑ wom guruguzɑndi mo. De ǹ nɑ ɑ sendɑ gɑnɑ, wom ŋmɔne mo, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ.
43015021	Ammɑ ǹ gɑ nge yom di kulu tɛ wom sɛ ɑ mɑɑ sɑbu sɛ zɑmɑ ǹ si bei wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm.
43015022	De yɑ nɑ kɑɑ kɑ sendi ǹ sɛ mo, dom ǹ si gundɑ dulum. Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ ǹ sindɑ kɔbɛ ngei dulum sɛ.
43015023	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bine go hungu hɛɛ, ɑ̀ bine go hungu ɑ Bɑɑbɑ mo.
43015024	De yɑ nɑ gbei yom tɛ ǹ jine kɑ bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ ŋmɑni mɑnɑ tɛ, dom ǹ si gundɑ dulum. Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ ǹ di hɛɛ. Ǹ bine go hungu hɛɛ ndɑ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ mo.
43015025	Ammɑ ngɑ di tɛ no zɑmɑ Sendɑ kɑ ǹ hɑntum ǹ fɔndɑ kunɑ ɑ̀ mɑ tɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cii: "Ǹ bine hungu hɛɛ, sɑbɑbu si".
43015026	Sɑɑ kɑ Gɑɑkɔɑ kɑɑ, wɔ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ dɔntɔm wom sɛ zɑ Bɑɑbɑ dɔ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ tɛ ɑ sɛdɑ. Ngɑ yɑ ci cimi Biyɑ, kɑ ɑ̀ go hunu zɑ Bɑɑbɑ dɔ.
43015027	Wom mo, wom kɑɑ tɛ ɑ sɛdɑ yom zɑmɑ zɑ sintine wom goono ndɑ hɛɛ.
43016001	A nɑ nge yom di cii wom sɛ no zɑmɑ wom mɑ si hɑitɑ.
43016002	Ǹ kɑɑ wom gɑɑrɛ Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu yom kunɑ. Go, lɔkɑci go kɑɑ kɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ wom wi, ɑ̀ tɑmmɑ gbei no ngɑ go tɛ Ikpɛ sɛ.
43016003	Ǹ gɑ nge yom di tɛ zɑmɑ zɑ Bɑɑbɑ, zɑ hɛɛ ǹ si i bei.
43016004	Ammɑ ɑ nɑ nge yom di cii wom sɛ no domi sɑɑ kɑ lɔkɑci kɑɑ kɑɑ, wom mɑ hɔngɔ kɑ ɑ nɑ ǹ cii wom sɛ. Yɑ nɑ ǹ cii wom sɛ zɑ sintine zɑmɑ wom goono ndɑ hɛɛ.
43016005	Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ go kpei wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm dɔ. Wom kunɑ bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ si ɑ hã: Mɑni n go kpei?
43016006	Ammɑ zɑ kɑ ɑ nɑ nge yom di cii wom sɛ, wom bine yom tɔ ndɑ binesɛrɛ.
43016007	Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu ɑ go cimi cii wom sɛ, ɑ kpeiyom tɛ wom sɛ hɑnfɑni. De yɑ nɑ kpei, Gɑɑkɔɑ si kɑɑ wom dɔ. Ammɑ de ɑ kpei, ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔm wom dɔ.
43016008	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ kɑɑ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ hɑndunyɑ wɔ beerem zeeri ndɑ dulum ndɑ cɛyom susu ndɑ ciiti.
43016009	À gɑ ǹ zeeri ndɑ dulum zɑmɑ ǹ si nɑɑne ɑ gɑɑ.
43016010	À gɑ ǹ zeeri ndɑ cɛyom susu zɑmɑ ɑ go kpei ɑ Bɑɑbɑ dɔ. Wom si di hɛɛ kpɛɛnɛ.
43016011	A gɑ ǹ zeeri ndɑ ciiti zɑmɑ ǹ nɑ hɑndunyɑ wɔ kpe ciiti.
43016012	A gundɑ hɛ boobo kɑ cii wom sɛ kpɛɛnɛ ɑmmɑ wom si hini kɑ ǹ jɛrɛ mɑɑsɑ.
43016013	Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ ngɑ wɔ kɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci cimi Biyɑ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ wom boi cimi kulu kunɑ. À si sendi ndɑ ngɑ bɔm ɑmmɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ cii. À kɑɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ go kɑɑ mo deede wom sɛ.
43016014	À gɑ ɑ bɛɛrɑndi zɑmɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ ŋmɔne zɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ deede wom sɛ.
43016015	Hɛ kulu kɑ Bɑɑbɑ gundɑ, ɑ ŋmɔne no. À sɛ no, ɑ go cii Biyɑ gɑ ɑ ŋmɔne zɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ deede wom sɛ.
43016016	À cindi cɛnɑ, wom si di hɛɛ. À cindi cɛnɑ kpɛɛnɛ wom kɑɑ di hɛɛ zɑmɑ ɑ go kpei Bɑɑbɑ dɔ.
43016017	A coobɑɑbɑize yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ yom cii cɛrɛ sɛ: Ifɔ ɑ̀ go cii i sɛ wɔ: À cindi cɛnɑ wom si di hɛɛ, ɑ̀ cindi cɛnɑ wom kɑɑ di hɛɛ zɑmɑ ɑ go kpei Bɑɑbɑ dɔ?
43016018	À gɑɑ no coobɑɑbɑize yom go cii: Ifɔ no ɑ̀ go cii wɔ: À cindi cɛnɑ? I si bei hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go cii.
43016019	Yesu bine bei ǹ go bɑɑ ngɑ hãyom. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Wom go cɛrɛ hã kɑ simbɑ ndɑ wɔne kɑ ɑ cii: À cindi cɛnɑ wom si di hɛɛ, ɑ̀ cindi cɛnɑ kpɛɛnɛ wom kɑɑ di hɛɛ?
43016020	Cimi cimi ɑ go cii wom sɛ, wom kɑɑ hɛ. Wom kɑɑ bɛrɛɛ ɑmmɑ hɑndunyɑ kɑɑ fɑihã. Wom mo wom kɑɑ goono binesɛrɛ kunɑ ɑmmɑ wom binesɛrɛ kɑɑ ye fɑihã.
43016021	Sɑɑ kɑ weibɔrɔ go hɑizɛnyɛ tɛ, ɑ̀ gundɑ binesɛrɛ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ lɔkɑci yɑ tɔ. Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ koo di hɛi, ɑ̀ si hɔngɔ ngɑ binesɛrɛ di kpɛɛnɛ. Ammɑ ɑ̀ bine go kɑɑni koo kɑ ɑ̀ hɛi hɑndunyɑ kunɑ sɑbu sɛ.
43016022	Wom mo, mɑɑsɑ wom goono binesɛrɛ kunɑ ɑmmɑ ɑ ye kɑ di wom. Wom bine yom kɑɑ kɑɑni. Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mo si wom binekɑɑne di kɑɑ.
43016023	Hɑnu ngɑ di wom si ɑ hã hɛ kulu kpɛɛnɛ. Cimi cimi ɑ go cii wom sɛ hɛ fɔ kulu kɑ wom kɑɑ Bɑɑbɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ wom no ndɑ.
43016024	Hɑli mɑɑsɑ wom mɑnɑ hɛ fɔ kulu ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ. Wɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ. Wom kɑɑ du zɑmɑ wom binekɑɑne di mɑ tɔ.
43016025	A nɑ nge yom di cii wom sɛ yɑɑse kunɑ. Lɔkɑci go kɑɑ kɑ ɑ si sendi wom sɛ kpɛɛnɛ yɑɑse kunɑ ɑmmɑ Bɑɑbɑ sendi no ɑ kɑɑ tɛ wom sɛ tɛrɛkpɑrɛ.
43016026	Hɑnu ngɑ di, wom kɑɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ. A si cii wom sɛ ɑ kɑɑ Bɑɑbɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ wom sɛ.
43016027	Bɑɑbɑ bumbum go bɑɑ wom zɑmɑ wom bɑɑ hɛɛ. Wom bine nɑɑne kɑ Ikpɛ dɔ no ɑ hunu.
43016028	Bɑɑbɑ dɔ no ɑ hunu kɑ kɑɑ hɑndunyɑ kunɑ. Mɑɑsɑ ɑ go hunu hɑndunyɑ kɑ ye Bɑɑbɑ dɔ.
43016029	À coobɑɑbɑize yom cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Gunɑ, mɑɑsɑnkulu n go sendi tɛrɛkpɑrɛ. N si yɑɑse bɑ ɑfɔ dɑm.
43016030	Mɑɑsɑ i go bei kɑ n go hɛ kulu bei. N si bɑɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ n hã. À sɛ no, i go cimɑndi kɑ Bɑɑbɑ dɔ no n hunu.
43016031	Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Mɑɑsɑnkulu no wom nɑɑne?
43016032	Gunɑ, lɔkɑci go kɑɑ. À bine kɑɑ kɔ. Wom kɑɑ kɑru kɑ see. Bɔrɔ kulu mɑ ngɑ jɛndɛ zɑɑ. Wom gɑ ɑ nɑm ɑ fɔlɔnku. Ammɑ ɑ si ɑ fɔlɔnku zɑmɑ Bɑɑbɑ goono ndɑ hɛɛ.
43016033	A nɑ nge yom di cii wom sɛ no domi wom mɑ du lɑɑkɑli kɑne ɑ kunɑ. Wom kɑɑ du tɑɑbɑndiyom hɑndunyɑ kunɑ ɑmmɑ wɑ tɛ himmɑ. A gɑɑŋmɑɑ hɑndunyɑ bɔm.
43017001	Yesu nɑ sendi nge yom di cii. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ bɔm tunɑndi bɛɛnɛ kɑ cii: E Bɑɑbɑ, lɔkɑci tɔ. N mɑ hɛɛ, n ŋmɔne Ize, bɛɛrɑndi domi hɛɛ n ŋmɔne Ize, ɑ mɑ n bɛɛrɑndi.
43017002	Zɑngɑ n nɑ ɑ no hini iburɑdɑm kulu bɔm, domi beerem kulu kɑ n nɑ ɑ no yɑ n no hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni.
43017003	Hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni bine neyɑ, ǹ mɑ n bei, ni Ikpɛ Cimikpɛ fɔlɔnku. Ǹ mɑ hɛɛ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ bei mo, hɛɛ wɔ kɑ n dɔntɔm.
43017004	A nɑ n bɛɛrɑndi hɑndunyɑ kunɑ. Gbei kɑ n no ɑ sɛ yɑ tɛ, ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ tɔnɑndi.
43017005	Mɑɑsɑ ni Bɑɑbɑ, ɑ bɛɛrɑndi n bɑndɑ ndɑ deizɑ kɑ ɑ gundɑ n dɔ zɑ hɑndunyɑ mɑnɑ tɛ.
43017006	A nɑ n mɑɑ kɑɑtɛrɛ beerem sɛ kɑ n nɑ ɑ no hɑndunyɑ kunɑ. Ǹ tɛ n ŋmɔne yom. N bine nɑ ɑ no ndei. Ǹ nɑ n sendɑ gɑnɑ.
43017007	Mɑɑsɑ ǹ bei hɛ kulu kɑ n nɑ ɑ no, n dɔ no ɑ hunu.
43017008	A nɑ ǹ no sendi yom kɑ n nɑ ɑ no. Ǹ bine nɑ ǹ tɑ. Ǹ bei ndɑ cimi n dɔ no ɑ hunu. Ǹ cimɑndi mo kɑ ni yɑ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm.
43017009	Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ go ŋmɑɑrɛ ǹ sɛ. A si ŋmɑɑrɛ hɑndunyɑ sɛ ɑmmɑ beerem sɛ kɑ n nɑ ɑ no zɑmɑ n ŋmɔne yom no.
43017010	A ŋmɔne mo kulu n ŋmɔne no. N ŋmɔne mo kulu, ɑ ŋmɔne no. A du bɛɛrɛ ǹ kunɑ.
43017011	A si hɑndunyɑ kunɑ kpɛɛnɛ ɑmmɑ ngei wɔ goono hɑndunyɑ kunɑ. Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ go kɑɑ n dɔ. E Bɑɑbɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ, n mɑ ǹ jɛ n mɑɑ gɑɑ, nge yom kɑ n nɑ ɑ no, domi ǹ mɑ ci ɑfɔ zɑngɑ i yom.
43017012	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ goono ndei hɑndunyɑ kunɑ, hɛɛ wɔ ɑ nɑ ǹ jɛ no n mɑɑ gɑɑ. A nɑ beerem kɑ n nɑ ɑ no jɛ. Ǹ kunɑ bɑ ɑfɔ mɑnɑ dɛrɛ, kɑlɑ hɑlɑci izɑ, domi Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ mɑ tɔ.
43017013	Mɑɑsɑ ɑ go kɑɑ n dɔ. A go kɑ nge yom di cii hɑndunyɑ kunɑ domi ǹ mɑ du ɑ binekɑɑne tɔnɑntɛ ǹ kunɑ.
43017014	A nɑ ǹ no n Sendɑ. Hɑndunyɑ bine go hunguei zɑmɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ci hɑndunyɑ ŋmɔne yom, zɑngɑ yɑ nɑ ci hɑndunyɑ ŋmɔne.
43017015	A si ŋmɑɑrɛ n mɑ ǹ kɑɑ hɑndunyɑ, ɑmmɑ n mɑ ǹ moorɑndi Ilɑlɔ.
43017016	Ǹ mɑnɑ ci hɑndunyɑ ŋmɔne yom zɑngɑ yɑ nɑ ci hɑndunyɑ ŋmɔne.
43017017	N mɑ ǹ hɑlɑɑlɑndi cimi gɑɑ. N Sendɑ yɑ ci cimi.
43017018	Zɑngɑ n nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm hɑndunyɑ kunɑ, yɑ no hɛɛ mo ɑ nɑ ǹ dɔntɔm hɑndunyɑ kunɑ.
43017019	A go kɑ ɑ bɔm hɑlɑɑlɑndi ǹ sɑbu sɛ, domi ngei mo, n mɑ ǹ hɑlɑɑlɑndi cimi gɑɑ.
43017020	A si ŋmɑɑrɛ nge yom hinne sɛ ɑmmɑ beerem mo sɛ kɑ ǹ kɑɑ nɑɑne hɛɛ ǹ sendi yom gɑɑ.
43017021	Ǹ kulu mɑ ci ɑfɔ zɑngɑ ni Bɑɑbɑ, n goono ɑ kunɑ, hɛɛ mo ɑ goono n kunɑ. Ngei mo mɑ ci ɑfɔ i kunɑ, domi hɑndunyɑ mɑ du kɑ nɑɑne kɑ ni yɑ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm.
43017022	Deizɑ kɑ n nɑ ɑ no, ɑ nɑ ǹ no ndɑ, domi ǹ mɑ ci ɑfɔ zɑngɑ i yom i ci ɑfɔ.
43017023	A goono n kunɑ, ni mo goono ɑ kunɑ domi ǹ mɑ tɔ kɑ ci ɑfɔ. À gɑɑ no hɑndunyɑ mo mɑ bei ni yɑ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm. N bɑɑ rei zɑngɑ n bɑɑ hɛɛ.
43017024	E Bɑɑbɑ, beerem kɑ n nɑ ɑ no, ɑ go bɑɑ nungu kɑ ɑ goono ǹ mɑ goono ndɑ hɛɛ. Ǹ mɑ di mo ɑ deizɑ kɑ n nɑ ɑ no zɑmɑ n bɑɑ hɛɛ zɑ hɑndunyɑ mɑnɑ tɛ.
43017025	E Bɑɑbɑ Cɛsusukpɛ, hɑndunyɑ mɑnɑ n bei. Ammɑ hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ nɑ n bei. Nge yom mo bei kɑ ni yɑ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm.
43017026	nɑm ǹ nɑ n mɑɑ bei. A gɑ ɑ̀ nɑm ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ bei kpɛɛnɛ domi bɑɑkɑsinɑ kɑ n go bɑɑ hɛɛ ndɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ gɔrɔ ǹ kunɑ, hɛɛ mo ɑ mɑ gɔrɔ ǹ kunɑ.
43018001	Kɑ Yesu nɑ nge yom di cii, ɑ̀ kpei ndɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom hɑli Kedom gooru bisɑntɛ. Yesu ndɑ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom huro lɑmbu fɔ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono nungu di.
43018002	Yudɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm kɑmbɛ nɑ nunguɑ bei zɑmɑ Yesu cini meigu ndɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom lɑmbu di kunɑ.
43018003	Yudɑ bine kɑɑndɑ wɑnguize yom ndɑ dogɑri yom kɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom dɔntɔm. A nɑ ǹ boi ngɑ bɑndɑ. Ǹ kɑɑ ndɑ fitilɑ yom ndɑ yugulɑ yom ndɑ wɑngu jiine yom.
43018004	Zɑ kɑ Yesu bei hɛ yom kɑ ǹ bɑ tɔ ngɑ, ɑ̀ mɑɑni kɑ cii ǹ sɛ: Mee no wom go ceeci?
43018005	Ǹ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii. Yesu Nɑzɑrɛtu bɔrɔ. Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Hɛɛ yɑ ci. Yudɑ mo kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm kɑmbɛ goono ǹ dɔ.
43018006	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ, Hɛɛ yɑ ci, cɔfɔ n ye ndɑ bɑndɑ kɑ kɑm gɑndɑ.
43018007	Yesu yɑɑrɑ kɑ ǹ hã kpɛɛnɛ: Mee no wom go ceeci? Ǹ cii: Yesu Nɑzɑrɛtu.
43018008	Yesu tu kɑ cii: A cii wom sɛ Hɛɛ yɑ ci. De hɛɛ no wom go ceeci, wom mɑ nɑm bɔrɔ wɔne yom mɑ ngei kpeiyom tɛ.
43018009	À tɛ no zɑmɑ sendi wɔne mɑ tɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cii: Beerem kɑ n nɑ ɑ no ǹ kunɑ bɑ ɑfɔ mɑnɑ dɛrɛ ɑ sɛ.
43018010	Simɔ Piɛɛ gundɑ tɑkubɑ. À nɑ ɑ̀ hoobu kɑ gɑrɑndikɔ beeri tɑm fɔ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ hɑngɑ dumbu. Tɑm di mɑɑ no Mɑlɛku.
43018011	Yesu cii Piɛɛ sɛ: Tɑkubɑ di yeti ɑ̀ nyɑ kunɑ. Tɑɑbi kɑ Bɑɑbɑ nɑ ɑ no, ɑ si gulɑize di hɑm no?
43018012	Wɑnguize yom kuru ndɑ wɑnguize yom hɑikusu fɔ ndɑ Yuifu yom ŋmɔne dogɑri yom, ǹ nɑ Yesu dii kɑ hɔ.
43018013	Ǹ kpeindɑ Yesu Hɑnɑnu dɔ sintine zɑmɑ Kɑifɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ gɑrɑndikɔ beeri jiiri wɔ, Hɑnɑnu hɑnzure no.
43018014	Kɑifɑ bine yɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Yuifu yom cɛbɛ kɑ hɑnfɑni no bɔrɔ fɔ mɑ bu jɑmɑ sɛ.
43018015	Simɔ Piɛɛ nɑ Yesu gɑnɑ ndɑ coobɑɑbɑize fɔ mo. Coobɑɑbɑize ngɑ di wɔ gɑrɑndikɔ beeri nɑ ɑ̀ bei. À huro gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ kɑtɑ kunɑ ndɑ Yesu.
43018016	Ammɑ Piɛɛ wɔ go cɛ tɛrɛ hundi mee gɑɑ. Coobɑɑbɑize wɔne kɑ gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ nɑ ɑ̀ bei hunu kɑ sendi hundi mee bɑtukɔɑ sɛ. À nɑ Piɛɛ hurɑndi.
43018017	Hundiyo fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci hundi mee bɑtukɔɑ cii Piɛɛ sɛ: Ni bine, ni yɑ bɔrɔ kpɛ coobɑɑbɑize yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ nɑ? Piɛɛ cii: Yɑ nɑ ci.
43018018	Tɑm yom ndɑ dogɑri yom di nɑ nini funsu ko cɛ nungu di zɑmɑ yeeni go tɛ. Ǹ gɑ cɑɑni. Piɛɛ goono ǹ dɔ mɑ kɑ kɑ cɑɑni.
43018019	Gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ nɑ Yesu hã ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom ndɑ ɑ̀ cɛbɛ yom bɔm.
43018020	Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ sendi no tɛrɛkpɑrɛ hɑndunyɑ sɛ. Sɑɑ kulu ɑ cini cooɑndi Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu yom kunɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ, nungu kɑ Yuifu yom kulu cini meigu. Bine yɑ nɑ hɛ fɔ cii tugu kunɑ.
43018021	Ifɔ sɛ n gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hã? N mɑ hã ǹ hɛ kɑ ɑ cii ǹ sɛ bɔm, nge yom kɑ ǹ nɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ sɛ. Gunɑ, ngei wɔ gɑ bei hɛ kɑ ɑ cii.
43018022	Kɑ Yesu sendi zɑngɑ yɑ, cɔfɔ dogɑri yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go cɛ nungu di, ɑ̀ no ɑ̀ sɑm. À cii: Yɑ no n go tu gɑrɑndikɔ beeri sɛ?
43018023	Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: De sendi lɑlɔ nɑ ɑ tɛ, n mɑ tɛ ilɑlɔ sɛdɑ. Ammɑ de sendi hinno no ɑ tɛ, ifɔ sɛ no n go kɑ ɑ kɑru?
43018024	À gɑɑ no, Hɑnɑnu nɑ ɑ̀ hɔ kɑ sɑmbɑ Kɑifɑ gɑrɑndikɔ beeri dɔ.
43018025	Simɔ Piɛɛ gɑ cɛ nodi ko cɑɑni. À sɛ nɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ni bine, ni yɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ no? À ze kɑ cii: Yɑ nɑ ci.
43018026	Gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ tɑm yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ kɑ Piɛɛ nɑ ɑ̀ nyɑize hɑngɑ dumbu, ɑ̀ cii: A di ni ndɑ bɔrɔ kpɛ lɑmbu kunɑ. À nɑ ci cimi nɑ bɑ?
43018027	Piɛɛ yɑɑrɑ kɑ Yesu ze. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ gɔrɔngɔ cɑ.
43018028	Susubɑ zɑ ndɑ hine, Yuifu yom nɑ Yesu boi zɑ Kɑifɑ dɔ kɑ kpeindɑ lɑɑbu gɑɑbikoni ciiti kɑtɑ kunɑ. Ngei bumbum mɑnɑ huro kɑtɑ kunɑ domi ǹ mɑ si ziibi sɑbu sɛ, zɑmɑ ǹ mɑ du kɑ Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru ŋmɑɑri ŋmɑɑ.
43018029	Pilɑtu hunu kɑ kpei ǹ dɔ. À cii: Tɔnyɑ fɔ nɑ wom gɑ tɛ bɔrɔ kpɛ bɔm?
43018030	Ǹ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: De bɔrɔ kpɛ mɑnɑ ci hɛ lɑlɔ tɛkɔ dom i si ɑ̀ dɑm n kɑmbɛ.
43018031	À gɑɑ no, Pilɑtu cii ǹ sɛ: Wom bumbum mɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ciiti wom fɔndɑ kunɑ. Yuifu yom cii ɑ̀ sɛ: I sindɑ fɔndɔ i mɑ bɔrɔ wi.
43018032	Ǹ cii yɑ domi sendɑ kɑ Yesu cii, ɑ mɑ tɔ. Sendɑ gɑ cɛbɛ buyom dimi kɑ ɑ̀ bɑ tɛ.
43018033	Pilɑtu ye kɑ huro ciiti kɑtɑ kunɑ. À nɑ Yesu cɛɛ kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ni, n ci Yuifu yom Kpe bɑ?
43018034	Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: N bɔm gɑɑ no n go wɔne cii dee wɑlɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom yɑ nɑ ɑ̀ cii n sɛ?
43018035	Pilɑtu tu kɑ cii: Hɛɛ mo, Yuifu no? N dimi ndɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom nɑ n dɑm ɑ kɑmbɛ. Ifɔ n tɛ?
43018036	Yesu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: A kpetɛrɛ mɑnɑ ci hɑndunyɑ wɔ ŋmɔne. De ɑ kpetɛrɑ yɑ hɑndunyɑ wɔ ŋmɔne no, dom ɑ tɑm yom tɑngɑm domi ǹ mɑ si ɑ dɑm Yuifu yom kɑmbɛ. Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ kpetɛrɑ mɑnɑ ci nee ŋmɔne.
43018037	Pilɑtu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Yɑ di gɑɑ ni gɑndɑkpɛ no? Yesu mo tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Ni, n ci hɛɛ yɑ Kpe no. Hɛɛ wɔ, wɔne sɛ no ǹ nɑ ɑ hɛi. Wɔne sɛ mo no ɑ kɑɑ hɑndunyɑ zɑmɑ yɑ tɛ sɛdɑ cimi sɛ. Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ ci cimi ŋmɔne, ɑ̀ bo hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ jinde sɛ.
43018038	Pilɑtu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ifɔ yɑ ci cimi? Kɑ Pilɑtu nɑ ngɑ di cii, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ɑ̀ ye kɑ hunu kpɛɛnɛ kɑ kpei Yuifu yom dɔ. À cii ǹ sɛ: Yɑ nɑ di tɑɑli fɔ kulu ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
43018039	Ammɑ wom gundɑ ɑlɑɑdɑ Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru hine yɑ bɔrɔ fɔ tɑm wom sɛ. Yɑ di gɑɑ, wom mɑ suubɑ. Wom bɑɑ yɑ Yuifu yom Kpe di tɑm wom sɛ?
43018040	Ǹ kulu kuwɑ kpɛɛnɛ kɑ cii: Awo. À nɑ ci bɔrɔ ngɑ di, ɑmmɑ Bɑrɑbɑ. Bɑrɑbɑ wɔ bine zee beeri no.
43019001	À gɑɑ nɑ Pilɑtu cii ǹ mɑ Yesu dii kɑ bulɑɑlɑ.
43019002	Wɑnguize yom nɑ kɑriji cɛ zɑngɑ bɔmtɔbɛ kɑ didiji ɑ̀ bɔm gɑɑ. Ǹ nɑ kpɛ siini kuku fɔ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ.
43019003	Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Fɔɔ, Yuifu yom Kpe. Ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ sɑm sɑm.
43019004	Pilɑtu ye kɑ hunu kpɛɛnɛ kɑ cii ǹ sɛ: Gunɑ, ɑ gɑ kɑɑndɑ bɔrɔ di wom sɛ tɛrɛ domi wom mɑ bei kɑ yɑ nɑ di ɑ̀ gɑɑ tɑɑli kulu.
43019005	Yesu bine hunu tɛrɛ ndɑ kɑriji bɔmtɔbɛ di ndɑ kpɛ siini kuku di. Pilɑtu cii ǹ sɛ: Gunɑ, bɔrɔ di go.
43019006	Sɑɑ kɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ dogɑri yom di ɑ̀, ǹ kuwɑ kɑ cii: À kɑnji, ɑ̀ kɑnji. Pilɑtu cii ǹ sɛ: Wom bumbum mɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji zɑmɑ hɛɛ wɔ, yɑ nɑ di tɑɑli fɔ kulu ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
43019007	Yuifu yom tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: I gundɑ fɔndɔ. I fɔndɑ kunɑ bine, ɑ̀ himɑ ɑ̀ mɑ bu no zɑmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɔm tɛ Ikpɛ Ize.
43019008	Sɑɑ kɑ Pilɑtu mɑɑ sendi ngɑ di, ɑ̀ hɑmburu kɑ tɔntɔnu.
43019009	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ huro ciiti kɑtɑ kunɑ kɑ cii Yesu sɛ: Ni mɑni bɔrɔ no? Ammɑ Yesu mɑnɑ tu kɑ yeti ɑ̀ sɛ.
43019010	Pilɑtu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N si sendi ɑ sɛ no? N si bei ɑ gundɑ hini kɑ n kɑnji bɑ, ɑ gundɑ hini kɑ n tɑm?
43019011	Yesu tu kɑ cii: N si du hini fɔ kulu ɑ bɔm de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci zɑ bɛɛnɛ no ǹ nɑ n no ndɑ. À sɛ no bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ dɑm n kɑmbɛ, ɑ̀ gundɑ dulum kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ n ŋmɔne.
43019012	Zɑ sɑɑ di Pilɑtu ceeci ngɑ mɑ ɑ̀ tɑm. Ammɑ Yuifu yom go kuwɑ kɑ cii: De n nɑ bɔrɔ kpɛ tɑm n mɑnɑ ci Kɑisɑ kpɑɑsi. Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ ngɑ bɔm tɛ kpe, Kɑisɑ no ɑ̀ go hungu.
43019013	Kɑ Pilɑtu mɑɑ sendi nge yom di, ɑ̀ kɑɑndɑ Yesu tɛrɛ. À gɔrɔ ciiti kɑrigɑ bɔm, nungu fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Dɛbɛ Tondi, Ebulu cinɛ kunɑ mo Gɑbɑtɑ.
43019014	Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru sɔluyom hɑnu hine no zɑngɑ zɑɑri mɑɑnɑntɛ zɑkɑ. À cii Yuifu yom sɛ: Gunɑ, wom Kpe go.
43019015	Ammɑ ǹ kuwɑ: À kɑɑ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ. À kɑnji, ɑ̀ kɑnji. Pilɑtu cii ǹ sɛ: Hɛɛ yɑ mɑ wom Kpe Gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom di tu kɑ cii: I sindɑ kpe fɔ kɑlɑ Kɑisɑ.
43019016	À gɑɑ no, ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm ǹ kɑmbɛ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji. Ǹ nɑ Yesu boi kɑ kpeindɑ.
43019017	Yesu hunu kɑ ngɑ bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ jɛrɛ. Ǹ kpeindɑɑ̀ nungu fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Bɔm Kurumbu, Ebulu cinɛ no ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ no Gologɑtɑ.
43019018	Nungu di no ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji, ngɑ ndɑ bɔrɔ hinkɑ fɔ, bɔrɔ fɔ fɔ ɑ̀ cɔrɔ kulu gɑɑ. Yesu mo goono bindi kunɑ.
43019019	Pilɑtu nɑ hɑntum fɔ tɛ kɑ dɑm bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ gɑɑ. Ngɑ no ǹ hɑntum neyɑ: YESU NAZARA, YUIFU YOM KPE.
43019020	Yuifu jɑmɑ nɑ hɑntum di coo zɑmɑ nungu kɑ ǹ nɑ Yesu kɑnji di wɑngɑrɑ jɛrɛ gɑɑ nɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɑntum ndɑ Ebulu cinɛ ndɑ Gɑrɛku cinɛ ndɑ Lomɑncɛ cinɛ.
43019021	Yuifu yom gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom di cii Pilɑtu sɛ: Si hɑntum Yuifu yom Kpe, ɑmmɑ ǹ mɑ hɑntum: À cii ngɑ yɑ Yuifu yom Kpe no.
43019022	Pilɑtu tu kɑ cii: Hɛ kɑ ɑ hɑntum, ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ hɑntum kɔ.
43019023	Sɑɑ kɑ wɑnguize yom nɑ Yesu kɑnji ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ jiine yom zɑɑ kɑ ǹ tɛ gusɑm tɑɑci. Wɑnguize fɔ kulu du gusɑm fɔ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ kpɛ kuku kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ tɑɑ di zɑɑ, zɑɑrɑ nɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ tɑɑ zɑ bɛɛnɛ kɑlɑ gɑndɑ.
43019024	Ǹ cii cɛrɛ sɛ: I mɑ si ɑ̀ pɑti ɑmmɑ i mɑ tɛtɛ tɛ ɑ̀ bɔm bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ du ɑ̀. Ǹ tɛ yɑ di domi Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ mɑ tɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cii: "Ǹ nɑ ɑ jiine yom fɑrisi ngei gɑme. Ǹ nɑ tɛtɛ tɛ ɑ kpɛ bɔm."
43019025	Yesu bundu gɑɑrɑntɑ jɛrɛ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ nyɑ gɑ cɛ ndɑ ɑ̀ nyɑ cɛɛnɛ Mɑriɑmɑ, Celopɑ wɛndɛ ndɑ Mɑriɑmɑ Mɑgɑdɑliɑ.
43019026	Kɑ Yesu di ngɑ nyɑ ndɑ coobɑɑbɑize kɑ ɑ̀ bine bɑɑ, ǹ go cɛ nodi, ɑ̀ cii ngɑ nyɑ sɛ: Wei wɔ, gunɑ n koo.
43019027	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii coobɑɑbɑize di sɛ: Gunɑ n nyɑ. Zɑ lɔkɑci ngɑ di, coobɑɑbɑize di nɑ Yesu nyɑ zɑɑ ngɑ kpɑɑrɑ.
43019028	Ngɑ di bɑndɑ zɑ kɑ Yesu bei hɛ kulu tɛ kɔ domi ǹ mɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ tɔnɑndi, ɑ̀ cii: A go mɑɑ jo.
43019029	Gulɑ fɔ bine goono nodi kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ ndɑ hɑri mɔrɔ. Ǹ nɑ sɑku fɔ miti ɑ̀ kunɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ kɔtɔ tuuri kɑmbɛ fɔ gɑɑ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ hisope. À nɑ ɑ̀ sɛllɛ ɑ̀ mee dɔ.
43019030	Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu nɑ hɑri mɔrɔ di tɑ, ɑ̀ cii: À beeni. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ bɔm gum kɑ ngɑ hundi tɑm.
43019031	Hulɑnzom hɑnu sɔluyom hine no. Yuifu yom nɑ Pilɑtu ŋmɑɑrɛ ǹ mɑ bukɔ yom di cee yom ceeri. Ǹ mɑ bukɔ yom kɑɑ mo domi ǹ mɑ si gɔrɔ bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ gɑɑ. Hulonzom hɑnu di hɑnu beeri no ǹ sɛ.
43019032	À gɑɑ nɑ, wɑnguize yom kɑɑ kɑ sintine bɔrɔ di cee yom ceeri ndɑ wɔ kɑ ǹ nɑ ngɑ ndɑɑ̀ kɑnji.
43019033	Ammɑ kɑ ǹ tɔ Yesu dɔ ǹ di ɑ̀ bu kɔ. Ǹ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ cee yom ceeri.
43019034	Ammɑ wɑnguize yom kunɑ ɑfɔ nɑ ɑ̀ cɔrɔ gɑɑru ndɑ kɑmbɑi. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ kuri ndɑ hɑri hunu.
43019035	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ di ɑ̀, ɑ̀ tɛ sɛdɑ. À sɛdɑ bine cimi no. Ngɑ wɔ bei ngɑ gɑ cimi cii zɑmɑ wom mo, wom mɑ nɑɑne sɛ.
43019036	Nge yom di tɛ no domi ǹ mɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ tɔnɑndi kɑ ɑ̀ cii: "Ǹ si ɑ̀ biri yom, bɑ ɑfɔ ceeri".
43019037	Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii kpɛɛnɛ: "Ǹ kɑɑ di wɔ kɑ ǹ gɑɑru".
43019038	Nge yom di bɑndɑ, Yosɛfu Alimɑte bɔrɔ, Yesu coobɑɑbɑize nɑ tugɑntɛ Yuifu yom hɑmbure sɑbu sɛ, ɑ̀ nɑ Pilɑtu ŋmɑɑrɛ ngɑ mɑ Yesu gɑɑhɑm kɑɑ bundɑ gɑɑ. Pilɑtu tu ɑ̀ sɛ. À gɑɑ no, ɑ̀ kpei Yesu gɑɑhɑmɑ kɑɑ.
43019039	Nikodim mo, bɔrɔ kɑ zɑ sintine ɑ̀ kɑɑ Yesu dɔ ciini, ngɑ mɑ kɑɑ. À kɑɑndɑ mire, wɑidi dimi fɔ ndɑ ɑlowe, wɑidi dimi fɔ mɑ kɑ ɑ̀ time tɔ zɑngɑ kilomɛti weitɑɑci cindi gu sɑrɑ.
43019040	Ǹ nɑ Yesu gɑɑhɑmɑ zɑɑ kɑ dɑm cɛsɛnjɛ kunɑ ndɑ wɑidi hɛo kɑɑnɔ yom zɑmɑ Yuifu yom fijiyom ŋmɔne ɑlɑɑdɑ no.
43019041	Lɑmbu fɔ goono nungu di kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji. Lɑmbu di kunɑ tɑndi guusu sɑɑrɛ teji fɔ goono kɑ bɑ ce fɔ ǹ mɑnɑ bɔrɔ dɑm ɑ̀ kunɑ.
43019042	Ǹ nɑ Yesu dɑm sɑɑrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ mɑɑni nungu di zɑmɑ Yuifu yom sɔluyom hɑnu bɑ tɔ.
43020001	Jiribi iye ŋmɔne hɑnu sintine kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑlɑhɑdi, Mɑriɑmɑ Mɑgɑdɑliɑ kɑɑ sɑɑrɛ di dɔ zɑ mo mɑnɑ bo. À di ǹ nɑ tondi gɑnɑndi sɑɑrɑ mee gɑɑ.
43020002	À zuuru kɑ kɑɑ Simɔ Piɛɛ ndɑ coobɑɑbɑize di kɑ Yesu bine bɑɑ dɔ. À cii ǹ sɛ: Ǹ nɑ Kpe kɑɑ sɑɑrɛ kunɑ. I si bei nungu kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm.
43020003	À gɑɑ nɑ Piɛɛ hunu ndɑ coobɑɑbɑize wɔ di. Ǹ kpei sɑɑrɑ dɔ.
43020004	Ǹ bɔrɔ hinkɑ kulu gɑ zuuru. Coobɑɑbɑize wɔ di zuuru kɑ bisɑ Piɛɛ. À jinɑ kɑ tɔ sɑɑrɑ dɔ.
43020005	À gungum. À di cɛsɛnjɛ gɑndɑ ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ huro.
43020006	Simɔ Piɛɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go dɛcɛ ɑ̀ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ tɔ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ huro sɑɑrɛ di kunɑ. À di cɛsɛnjɑ gɑndɑ.
43020007	Fɑtɑlɑ kɑ ǹ didiji ɑ̀ bɔm gɑɑ, ɑ̀ si cɛsɛnjɑ kunɑ ɑmmɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɑɑbu kɑ jisi kɑmbu.
43020008	Coobɑɑbɑize di kɑ ɑ̀ jinɑ sɑɑrɑ dɔ sintine, ngɑ mɑ hurɑ. À di. À nɑɑne.
43020009	Sɑɑ ngɑ di ǹ si Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ wɔ bei jinɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cii ɑ̀ himɑ Yesu mɑ tunu bukɔ yom gɑme.
43020010	Coobɑɑbɑize yom ye ngei kpɑɑrɑ.
43020011	Ammɑ Mɑriɑmɑ wɔ gɑ cɛ tɛrɛ sɑɑrɛ di jɛrɛ gɑɑ kɑ hɛ. Kɑ ɑ̀ goono hɛ̃ni gɑɑ, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ gungum kɑ sɑɑrɑ kunɑ gunɑ.
43020012	À di Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize hinkɑ fɔ ndɑ jiine kpɑrɛ. Ǹ gɑ gɔrɔ, ɑfɔ bɔm dɔ, ɑfɔ cee dɔ, nungu kɑ ǹ nɑ Yesu gɑɑhɑm kɑnɑndi.
43020013	Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom di cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Wei wɔ, ifɔ sɛ n go hɛ̃? À cii ǹ sɛ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ Kpe zɑɑ. A bine si bei nungu kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm.
43020014	Kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ di cii, ɑ̀ ye ndɑ bɑndɑ. À di Yesu gɑ cɛ nungu di ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ bei hɑli Yesu nɑ.
43020015	Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Wei wɔ, ifɔ sɛ n gɑ hɛ? Mee nɑ n go ceeci? Mɑriɑmɑ tɑmmɑ hɑli lɑmbukpɛ di nɑ, ɑ̀ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Hɑru wɔ, de ni, n nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ, cii ɑ sɛ nungu kɑ n nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm yɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ.
43020016	Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Mɑriɑmɑ. Ngɑ mɑ bɛrɛ kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ ndɑ Ebulu cinɛ: Lɑbuni. À feeriji yɑ ci coobɑɑbɑ.
43020017	Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Si ɑ hɑmɑ zɑmɑ ɑ mɑnɑ kpei bɛɛnɛ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ dɔ jinɑ. Ammɑ n mɑ kpei ɑ nyɑizei dɔ. N mɑ cii ǹ sɛ ɑ gɑ kpei bɛɛnɛ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ, wom Bɑɑbɑ dɔ, ɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ, wom ŋmɔne Ikpɛ dɔ.
43020018	Mɑriɑmɑ Mɑgɑdɑliɑ kpei deede coobɑɑbɑize yom di sɛ kɑ ngɑ di Kpe. À bine cii ǹ sɛ hɛ yom kɑ Yesu cii ngɑ sɛ.
43020019	Jiribi iye hɑnu sintine kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑlɑhɑdi, wiciri kɑmbu tɔ. Nungu kɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom gɑ meigu ɑ̀ gɑmbu yom goono dɑɑbɑntɛ Yuifu yom hɑmbure sɛ. Cɔfɔ Yesu kɑɑ cɛ ǹ bindi kunɑ kɑ cii ǹ sɛ: Lɑɑkɑli kɑne mɑ gɔrɔ wom bɑndɑ.
43020020	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ di cii, ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ cɛbɛ ngɑ kɑmbɛ yom ndɑ ngɑ cɔrɔ. Coobɑɑbɑize yom fɑihã kɑ ǹ di Kpe.
43020021	Yesu ye kɑ cii ǹ sɛ kpɛɛnɛ: Lɑɑkɑli kɑne mɑ gɔrɔ wom bɑndɑ. Zɑngɑ Bɑɑbɑ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm, hɛɛ mɑ ɑ gɑ wom dɔntɔm.
43020022	Sendi ngɑ di bɑndɑ, ɑ̀ funsu ǹ gɑɑ kɑ cii: Wom mɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ tɑ.
43020023	Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ wom nɑ ɑ̀ yɑɑfɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ dulum yom, ǹ gɑ ǹ yɑɑfɑ ɑ̀ sɛ. Bɔrɔ kulu mo kɑ wom mɑnɑ ɑ̀ yɑɑfɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ dulum yom, ǹ si ǹ yɑɑfɑ ɑ̀ sɛ.
43020024	Ammɑ Tomɑ iwei cindi hinkɑ di kunɑ ɑfɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Tɑwe, ɑ̀ si ǹ dɔ sɑɑ kɑ Yesu kɑɑ.
43020025	À gɑɑ no coobɑɑbɑize cindei cii ɑ̀ sɛ: I di Kpe. Ammɑ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: De yɑ nɑ di kɑngɑrɑ yom di bidɑlɑ ɑ kɑmbɛ yom gɑɑ, de yɑ nɑ ɑ kɑmbeize dɑm kɑngɑrɑ yom di bidɑlɑ gɑɑ, de yɑ nɑ ɑ kɑmbɛ dɑm ɑ̀ cɔrɔ gɑɑ, ɑ si ɑ̀ nɑɑne pɑi.
43020026	Jiribi ɑhɑku bɑndɑ, coobɑɑbɑize yom ye kɑ meigu fuu di kunɑ kpɛɛnɛ. Tomɑ goono ǹ kunɑ. Gɑmbu yom go dɑɑbu. Cɔfɔ Yesu kɑɑ kɑ cɛ ǹ bindi kunɑ. À cii: Lɑɑkɑli kɑne mɑ gɔrɔ wom bɑndɑ.
43020027	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii Tomɑ sɛ: N kɑmbeize mɑɑnɑndi nee kɑ gunɑ ɑ kɑmbɛ yom. N kɑmbɛ mɑ mɑɑnɑndi kɑ dɑm ɑ cɔrɔ gɑɑ. N mɑ si zɑm kɑ nɑɑne ɑmmɑ n mɑ nɑɑne.
43020028	Tomɑ tu kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A Kpe, ɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ.
43020029	Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Zɑ kɑ n di hɛɛ, n nɑɑne. Binekɑɑnekpɛ yom no beerem kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ di ɑmmɑ ǹ gɑ nɑɑne.
43020030	Yesu nɑ ɑlɑmu boobo fɔ yom tɛ kpɛɛnɛ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom jine kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ hɑntum tirɑ wɔ kunɑ.
43020031	Ammɑ ǹ nɑ hɛ wɔne yom hɑntum nɑ domi wom mɑ nɑɑne kɑ Yesu yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ, Ikpɛ Ize. À nɑɑneyom gɑɑ mo, wom mɑ du hundi ɑ̀ mɑɑ gɑɑ.
43021001	Nge yom di bɑndɑ, Yesu nɑ ngɑ bɔm kɑɑtɛrɛ kpɛɛnɛ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ Tiberiɑ buulɑ jɛrɛ gɑɑ. Zɑngɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɔm kɑɑtɛrɛ neyɑ.
43021002	Simɔ Piɛɛ ndɑ Tomɑ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Tɑwe, ndɑ Nɑtɑni, Kɑnɑ kpɑɑrɑ bɔrɔ Gɑlile lɑɑbu ndɑ Zɑbɑdi koo yom ndɑ ɑ̀ coobɑɑbɑize yom ŋmɔne ihinkɑ, ǹ goono cɛrɛ bɑndɑ.
43021003	Simɔ Piɛɛ cii ǹ sɛ: A go kpei ciifi ceeci. Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: I yom mo, i go kɑ n gɑnɑ. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ǹ hunu kɑ huro hɑrihi. Ciini ngɑ di ǹ mɑnɑ du hɛ fɔ kulu.
43021004	Mo bo, Yesu go cɛ jobu gɑɑ. Ammɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom mɑnɑ bei hɑli Yesu no.
43021005	Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Koo yom wɔ, wom gundɑ ŋmɑɑri bɑ? Ǹ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Awo.
43021006	À cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ biriji see hɑrihiɑ sɛ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ, wom kɑɑ du. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ see. Mɑɑsɑ ǹ mɑnɑ hini kɑ ɑ̀ cendi ndɑ ciifi bɑyom.
43021007	Cɔfɔ coobɑɑbɑize di kɑ Yesu bine bɑɑ, ɑ̀ cii Piɛɛ sɛ: Kpe no bo. Zɑ Simɔ Piɛɛ mɑɑ kɑ Kpe no, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ kpɛ dɑm, zɑmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ no. À zimbi buulɑ kunɑ.
43021008	Coobɑɑbɑize cindei mo kɑɑ hɑrihi cɛnɑ fɔ kunɑ. Ǹ mɑnɑ mooru ndɑ tɛrɛ kɑlɑ zɑngɑ kɑmbɛ kɑru zɑngu hinkɑ sɑrɑ. Ǹ goono ko birijɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ ndɑ ciifi cendi.
43021009	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ zumbu gɑndɑ, ǹ di denji nungu kɑ ǹ nɑ ciifi ndɑ buuru dɛcɛ ɑ̀ bɔm.
43021010	Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ kɑɑndɑ ciifi kɑ wom du kunɑ ɑfɔ yom.
43021011	Simɔ Piɛɛ huro hɑrihiɑ kunɑ kɑ birijɑ cendi. À kɑɑndɑɑ̀ jobu gɑɑ. À tɔ ndɑ ciifi bɑmbɑtɑ bɑmbɑtɑ, gudɑ zɑngu ndɑ weigu cindi hinzɑ. Bɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ yɑ di, birijɑ mɑnɑ pɑti.
43021012	Yesu cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ kɑɑ sɔntɑkɑɑ. Coobɑɑbɑize yom di kunɑ bɑ ɑfɔ mɑnɑ tu kɑ ɑ̀ hã: Ni no mee? Ǹ bei kɑ Kpe nɑ.
43021013	Yesu mɑɑni kɑ buuru di zɑɑ kɑ no ǹ sɛ. Yɑ no ciifi mo.
43021014	À tɛ ce hinzɑntɛ noyɑ kɔ kɑ Yesu nɑ ngɑ bɔm kɑɑtɛrɛ ngɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ bukɔ yom gɑme tunuyom bɑndɑ.
43021015	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ ŋmɑɑ kɑ beeni, Yesu cii Simɔ Piɛɛ sɛ: Simɔ Yonɑsi koo, n go bɑɑ hɛɛ kɑ bisɑ wɔne yom bɑ? À tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Oò Kpe. N bei kɑ ɑ go bɑɑ ni. Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N mɑ ɑ feejiize yom kurum.
43021016	Yesu ye kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ kpɛɛnɛ ce hinkɑntɛ: Simɔ Yonɑsi koo, n go bɑɑ hɛɛ? À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Oò Kpe, n bei kɑ ɑ go bɑɑ ni. Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N mɑ ci ɑ feeji yom kurukɔ.
43021017	À ye kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ kpɛɛnɛ ce hinzɑntɛ: Simɔ Yonɑsi koo, n go bɑɑ hɛɛ? Piɛɛ bine go sɑrɑ ndɑ kɑ Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ ce hinzɑntɛ n go bɑɑ hɛɛ? Piɛɛ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii; Kpe, n go hɛ kulu bei. N go bei kɑ ɑ go bɑɑ ni. Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N mɑ ɑ feeji yom kurum.
43021018	Cimi cimi, ɑ go cii n sɛ, sɑɑ kɑ n goono hɑiwɑsu n cini kunɑcendi hɔ n bɔm sɛ. N cini kpei nungu kulu kɑ n gɑ bɑɑ, ɑmmɑ sɑɑ kɑ n kɑɑ zeeni, n gɑ n kɑmbɛ yom sɛllɛ no. Bɔrɔ fɔ ŋmɑni gɑ n hɔ kɑ kpeindɑ ni nungu kɑ n si bɑɑ.
43021019	À nɑ ngɑ di cii no kɑ cɛbɛ bu dimi kɑ Piɛɛ gɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi ndɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ Yesu nɑ ngɑ di cii, ɑ̀ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A gɑnɑ.
43021020	Ammɑ Piɛɛ zogu. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ di coobɑɑbɑize di kɑ Yesu bine bɑɑ, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ lɑmbɑ Yesu gɑɑ ŋmɑɑrɑ dɔ. À cii: Kpe mee yɑ go kɑ n dɑm kɑmbɛ?
43021021	Kɑ Piɛɛ di coobɑɑbɑize di, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii Yesu sɛ: Kpe, bɔrɔ bine ifɔ yɑ kɑɑ tɔ rɑ?
43021022	Yesu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: De ɑ go bɑɑ ɑ̀ mɑ gɔrɔ kɑlɑ yɑ kɑɑ, mɑni ɑ̀ di ni? Ni dee, n mɑ ɑ gɑnɑ.
43021023	Sendi ngɑ di yɑ kɑru kɑ see nyɑizei gɑme, wɑtom coobɑɑbɑize ngɑ di si bu pɑi. Yesu mɑnɑ cii coobɑɑbɑize di si bu bɑ, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ cii Piɛɛ sɛ: De ɑ gɑ bɑɑ ɑ̀ mɑ gɔrɔ kɑlɑ yɑ kɑɑ, mɑni ɑ̀ di ni?
43021024	Coobɑɑbɑize ngɑ di yɑ tɛ nge yom di sɛdɑ. À bine nɑ ǹ hɑntum. I bei ɑ̀ sɛdɑ yɑ cimi nɑ.
43021025	Hɛ dimi boobo goono kpɛɛnɛ kɑ Yesu tɛ. De ǹ nɑ ǹ hɑntum ɑfɔ ɑfɔ, dɑm ɑ tɑmmɑ hɑndunyɑ bumbum si hini kɑ tirɑ yom kulu kɑ ǹ hɑntum jɛ. Ami.
44001001	E Teofilu, ɑ jinɑ kɑ tirɑ hɑntum n sɛ. Tirɑ sintine kunɑ ɑ hɑntum hɛ kulu kɑ Yesu tɛ ndɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ cooɑndi bɔm.
44001002	A hɑntum hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ko cooɑndi kɑlɑ hɑnu kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ kɑ kpeindɑɑ̀ bɛɛnɛ. Hɑli ɑ̀ ziji kɑ kpei bɛɛnɛ ɑ̀ nɑ fɔndɔ yom no Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ gɑɑ diyɑ yom kɑ ɑ̀ suubɑ sɛ.
44001003	À guruguze bɑndɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɔm cɛbɛ bɑhunɑ diyɑ yom di sɛ kɑ ǹ no sɛdɑ tɑbɑtɑntɛ boobo. À nɑ ngɑ bɔm cɛbɛ ǹ sɛ jiribi weitɑɑci ko sendi Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ bɑɑru bɔm.
44001004	Hɑnu di kɑ ǹ nɑ cɛrɛ meigu bɑndɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ nɑ mei ǹ mɑ si hunu Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ ɑmmɑ ǹ mɑ Bɑɑbɑ ɑlikɑwɑli bɑtu, ɑlikɑwɑli kɑ wom mɑɑ ɑ dɔ.
44001005	Cimi no Yohɑnnɑ mirɑndi ndɑ hɑri. Ammɑ ǹ kɑɑ wom mirɑndi ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ jiribi yom wɔ kunɑ, ɑ̀ si jɛ.
44001006	Kɑ diyɑ yom nɑ cɛrɛ meigu ǹ nɑ Yesu hã kɑ cii: Kpe, lɔkɑci ngɑ di no, n ye kɑ kpetɛrɛ dɑm Isirɑilɑ kɑmbɛ bɑ?
44001007	Yesu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: À nɑ ci wom yɑ zɑmɑni yom wɑlɑ ɑliwɑti yom bei kɑ Bɑɑbɑ jisi ngɑ bumbum hini gɑɑ.
44001008	Ammɑ wom kɑɑ du dɑbɑri sɑɑ kɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ zumbu wom bɔm. Wom yɑ kɑɑ ci ɑ sɛdɑ yom Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ ndɑ Yude lɑɑbu kulu kunɑ ndɑ Sɑmɑri lɑɑbu kulu kɑlɑ hɑndunyɑ mee ndɑ mee.
44001009	Kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ sendi nge yom di tɛ, jɑmɑ go kɑ ɑ̀ gunɑ, cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ gɑndɑ bɔm. Buru fɔ mɑ nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dɛrɑndi ǹ mɑɑ yom sɛ.
44001010	Ǹ go moo sinji bɛɛnɑ gɑɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ziji kɑ kpei bɛɛnɛ. Cɔfɔ hɑibɔrɔ hinkɑ ndɑ jiine kpɑrɛ tɑi tɑi gɑ cɛ ǹ jɛrɛ gɑɑ.
44001011	Ǹ cii: Gɑlile lɑɑbu hɑibɔrɔ yom, ifɔ sɛ wom go cɛ nee ko bɛɛnɛ gunɑ? Yesu wɔ kɑ ǹ zɑɑ wom jine kɑ kpeindɑɑ̀ bɛɛnɛ, zɑngɑ wom di ɑ̀ go ziji kɑ kpei bɛɛnɛ, zɑngɑ yɑ di no ɑ̀ ye kɑ kɑɑ.
44001012	À gɑɑ nɑ ǹ ye Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ zɑ tɑndi kuku fɔ dɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Olibe zugu. Tondi kukuɑ mɑɑni Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ, hulonzom hɑnu fɔndɑ kuyom sɑrɑ.
44001013	Kɑ ǹ hurɑ wɑngɑrɑ ǹ kɑɑru kɑ hurɑ fuu fɔ jidɑmbisɑ kunɑ, nungu kɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom go bɑtu. Piɛɛ gɔrɔ nodi ndɑ Yɑkɔfu ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ ndɑ Andɛrɛ ndɑ Filipu ndɑ Tomɑ ndɑ Bɑɑtɛlɛmi ndɑ Mɑtiyu ndɑ Yɑkɔfu, Hɑlife koo, ndɑ Simɔ Zelote ndɑ Yudɑ, Yɑkɔfu koo.
44001014	Beerem wɔ kulu tɛ mefɔ ko himmɑ dɑm ɑduwɑ gɑɑ ndɑ ŋmɑɑrɛyom. Ǹ goono weibɔrɔ yom bɑndɑ ndɑ Mɑriɑmɑ, Yesu nyɑ ndɑ Yesu cɛɛnɛ yom.
44001015	Hɑnu nge yom di kunɑ no, Piɛɛ tunu coobɑɑbɑize yom bindi kunɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ meigu tɔ zɑngɑ bɔrɔ zɑngu ndɑ wɑrɑnkɑ sɑrɑ.
44001016	Piɛɛ cii: Nyɑize hɑibɔrɔ yom, ɑ̀ tilɑsi Ikpɛ Sendi wɔ kɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ jinɑ kɑ cii Dɑfidi mee gɑɑ mɑ tɔ. À sendi Yudɑ bɔm, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ huro Yesu diikɔ yom jine.
44001017	Ǹ nɑ Yudɑ kɑbu i kunɑ. À bine du ngɑ bɑ gbei wɔne kunɑ.
44001018	Yudɑ bine nɑ bɑtumɑ dei ndɑ dulum bɑnɑndi. À kɑm, ɑ̀ bɔm nɑ ɑ̀ jinɑ. À gunde kulubɑ bɔgu. À gunde kunɑ jiine yom kulu kɑru kɑ see.
44001019	Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ bɔrɔ kulu du ngɑ di bɑɑru hɑli ǹ go bɑtumɑ wɔ cɛɛ ngei cinɛ kunɑ, Akɑlidɑmɑ, wɑtom kuri fɑri.
44001020	Ǹ hɑntum Somu yom tirɑ kunɑ kɑ cii: "À gɔrɛ dɔ mɑ tɛ gbɑrɑ. Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ si gɔrɔ ɑ̀ kunɑ." Somu yom tirɑ cii kpɛɛnɛ: "Bɔrɔ fɔ mɑ mɑ ɑ̀ gbei zɑɑ."
44001021	Ngɑ di sɛ, bɔrɔ fɔ mɑ ci sɛdɑ. Sɛdɑ wɔ mɑ ci bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono beerem bɑndɑ ndɑ i yom sɑɑ kɑ Kpe Yesu go huro kɑ hunu i bindi kunɑ.
44001022	Beerem nge yom di goono i bɑndɑ zɑ mirɑndiyom kɑ Yohɑnnɑ tɛ gɑɑ, kɑlɑ hɑnu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ ǹ nɑ Yesu zɑɑ bɛɛnɛ. Akpɛ yom kunɑ, bɔrɔ ngɑ di mɑ ci sɛdɑ ndɑ i yom bukɔei tunɑndiyom gɑɑ.
44001023	Cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ bɔrɔ hinkɑ dɑm ǹ jine, Yosɛfu kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Bɑɑsɑbɑ, kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ no mɑɑ dɛcɛ Yusitu, ngɑ ndɑ Mɑtiɑ.
44001024	Ǹ nɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ kɑ cii: Ni Kpe, n go kɑ ǹ kulu bine bei. N mɑ i cɛbɛ bɔrɔ hinkɑ wɔ kunɑ wɔ kɑ n suubɑ.
44001025	N mɑ ɑ̀ suubɑ domi ɑkpɛ mɑ du ngɑ bɑ gbei wɔ kunɑ ndɑ diyɑtɛrɛ kɑ Yudɑ bɑ si ndɑɑ̀ kɑ kɑm hɑli ɑ̀ kpei ngɑ bɔm nungu dɔ.
44001026	Ǹ bine nɑ tɛtɛ kɑru. Cɔfɔ suubɑyom di kɑm Mɑtiɑ bɔm. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɔntɔnu diyɑ wei cindi fɔ di gɑɑ.
44002001	Sɑɑ kɑ Pɑntɛkotu jingɑru tɔ, ǹ kulu meigu ndɑ bine fɔ nungu fɔlɔnku dɔ.
44002002	Mefɔ mefɔ, kungu fɔ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ zɑngɑ hɛo futu kungu. À nɑ fuuɑ kulu tɔ nungu kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ǹ goono kɑ gɔrɔ.
44002003	Dɛɛnɛ yom mo zɑngɑ nini bɛllɛ fɑitɑ ǹ gɑɑ. Ǹ feefee ndɑ cɛrɛ kɑ zumbu ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ fɔ kulu bɔm.
44002004	Cɔfɔ ǹ kulu tɔ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ. Ǹ sinti ko sendi ndɑ cinɛ ŋmɑni ŋmɑni zɑngɑ Biyɑ gɑ kɑ ǹ no ǹ mɑ sendi.
44002005	Yuifu yom kɑ ǹ gɑ hɑmburu Ikpɛ goono Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ. Ngei yɑ hunu hɑndunyɑ dimi kulu kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ cire.
44002006	Kɑ ǹ mɑɑ kunguɑ, bɔrɔ boobo meigu. Ǹ kulu sindɑ ngei bɔm zɑmɑ bɔrɔ kulu go mɑɑ ǹ go sendi ngɑ cinɛ kunɑ.
44002007	Ngɑ di go kɑ ǹ jirisi. Mɑmɑci mɑ gɑ kɑ ǹ dii. Ǹ go cii cɛrɛ sɛ: Gunɑ, beerem wɔ kulu kɑ ǹ gɑ sendi Gɑlile bɔrɔ yom no. À nɑ ci cimi nɑ bɑ?
44002008	Dee, mɛtɛ i kulu tɛ ko mɑɑ ǹ go sendi ndɑ i cinɛ yom kɑ ǹ kunɑ ǹ nɑ i hɛi?
44002009	Pɑtɑncei ndɑ Medɑncei ndɑ Elɑmitɑncei ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ goono Mesopotɑmi lɑɑbu ndɑ gɔrɛ, ndɑ Yude lɑɑbu ndɑ Kɑpodoce lɑɑbu ndɑ Pontu lɑɑbu ndɑ Azi lɑɑbu i go mɑɑ ǹ gɑ sendi ndɑ i cinɛ.
44002010	Beerem mɑ kɑ ǹ hunu Filiji lɑɑbu ndɑ Pɑmfili lɑɑbu ndɑ Eziputu lɑɑbu ndɑ Libi kure kɑ ɑ̀ goono Sileni jɛrɛ gɑɑ, ndɑ Lomɑncɛ yo yom kɑ ǹ ci Yuifu yom ndɑ yo yom kɑ ǹ bɛrɛ kɑ Yuifu yom fɔndɔ gɑnɑ,
44002011	ndɑ Kɛlɛtɑncei ndɑ Alɑbi yom mo, i go mɑɑ ǹ sendi ndɑ i cinɛ mo. I kulu go mɑɑ ǹ go kɑ Ikpɛ gbei bɑmbɑtɑ yom sendi i cinɛ yom kunɑ.
44002012	À go kɑ ǹ kulu jirisi. Ǹ mɑnɑ bei lɑsɑbu kɑ ngei tɛ. Ǹ gɑ cii cɛrɛ sɛ: Ifɔ yɑ ci wɔne?
44002013	Ammɑ ɑfɔ yom nɑ dondɑcɛrɛ tɛ kɑ cii: Bɑji nɑ ǹ hɑm kɑ bugu.
44002014	Cɔfɔ Piɛɛ tunu ndɑ coobɑɑbɑize wei cindi fɔ di kɑ jinde zɑɑ. A cii ǹ sɛ: Yuifu yom hɑibɔrɔ yom ndɑ wom kulu kɑ wom goono Yerusɑlɛm ndɑ gɔrɛ, wom mɑ wɔne bei. Wom mɑ hɑngɑ dɑm mo ɑ sendi yom sɛ.
44002015	Bɑji mɑnɑ beerem di wi zɑngɑ wom gɑ tɑmmɑ zɑ kɑ susubɑ guuru ɛgɑ no.
44002016	Ammɑ wɔne yɑ ci hɛ kɑ ɑndebi Zoelɑ sendi. Zoelɑ dɔ Ikpɛ cii:
44002017	"À kɑɑ tɔ, kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ hɑnu yom gɑɑ, ɑ gɑ ɑ Biyɑ zumɑndi iburɑdɑm kulu bɔm. Wom koo hɑibɔrɔ yom ndɑ wom koo hundiyo yom kɑɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ. Wom hɑiwɑsu yom kɑɑ di diyom. Wom hɑizeenu yom mo kɑɑ hɑndiri yom tɛ.
44002018	Hɑnu nge yom di mo no, ɑ gɑ ɑ Biyɑ dɑɑru ɑ bɑnyɑ yom bɔm ndɑ ɑ kɔngɔ yom bɔm. Ǹ kɑɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ mo.
44002019	Yɑ kɑɑ mɑmɑci yom cɛbɛ hɑli bɛɛnɛ kunɑ ndɑ ɑlɑmu yom hɑli gɑndɑ bɔm kɑ ǹ ci kuri ndɑ nini ndɑ dullu.
44002020	Weenu kɑɑ ye kube. Hɑndu mo kɑɑ ye kuri. À kɑɑ tɛ hɑli Kpe hɑnu bɑmbɑtɑ deizɑkpɛɑ kɑɑ.
44002021	À kɑɑ tɔ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go Kpe mɑɑ cɛɛ ɑ̀ du fɑɑbɑ."
44002022	Isirɑilɑ hɑibɔrɔ yom, wɑ hɑngɑ dɑm sendi wɔne yom sɛ. Yesu Nɑzɑrɛtu, ngɑ yɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ Ikpɛ tɑbɑtɑndi wom jine. À nɑ ɑ̀ tɑbɑtɑndi dɑbɑri gbei yom gɑɑ ndɑ mɑmɑci yom ndɑ ɑlɑmu yom kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ ɑ̀ dɔ wom bindi kunɑ. Wom bumbum, wom go kɑ ngɑ di bei.
44002023	Yesu wɔ, ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm wom kɑmbɛ no Ikpɛ miilɑ bɔm ndɑ ɑ̀ beiyom kɑ ɑ̀ jisi bɔm. Wom nɑ ɑ̀ dii kɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ gɑɑ. Wom nɑ ɑ̀ wi ndɑ bɔrɔ lɑlɔ yom kɑmbɛ yom.
44002024	Ammɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ bu guruguze kɑmbɛ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ si hini kɑ tɛ bu mɑ ɑ̀ dii kɑ jɛ.
44002025	Dɑfidi sendi ɑ̀ bɔm kɑ cii: "A go di Kpe ɑ jine wɑti kulu. Zɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono ɑ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ, ɑ si zinji.
44002026	À sɛ no, ɑ goono binekɑɑne kunɑ. A dɛɛnɛ mo huro fɑihã kunɑ. Hɑli yɑ mo ɑ gɑɑhɑm mo kɑɑ gɔrɔ bɛɛjɛ kunɑ.
44002027	A bɛɛjɛ yɑ ci n si ɑ hundɑ nɑm ciyomɑ. N si tu n Hɑlɑɑlɑ mo mɑ fumbu.
44002028	N nɑm ɑ mɑ hundi fɔndɔ yom bei. N gɑ ɑ tɔnɑndi ndɑ binekɑɑne n goonoyom gɑɑ."
44002029	Nyɑize hɑibɔrɔ yom, wɑ tu ɑ sɛ yɑ cii wom sɛ tɛrɛkpɑrɛ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ dom cɛɛ Dɑfidi. À bu, ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ fiji mo. À sɑɑrɛ goono i bindi kunɑ hɑli kɑ kɑɑ hunkunɑ.
44002030	Dɑfidi bine ci ɑndebi. À bei mo kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli tɛ ngɑ sɛ ndɑ zeyom. À cii Dɑfidi bɑndɑ yom kunɑ Ikpɛ gɑ Mɛsiyɑ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme kɑ ɑ̀ gɔrɛndi Dɑfidi kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ bɔm.
44002031	Kɑ Dɑfidi di wɔne ɑndebitɛrɛ kunɑ, ɑ̀ sendi Mɛsiyɑ tunɑndiyom bɔm. À cii: "Ikpɛ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ nɑm ciyomɑ. À gɑɑhɑm mo mɑnɑ di fumbi dɔ."
44002032	Yesu wɔ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi. I kulu yɑ ci ɑ̀ sɛdɑ yom.
44002033	Ngɑ di sɛ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi ngɑ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ. À nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli tɑ Bɑɑbɑ dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ. À nɑ hɛ kɑ wom go di ko mɑɑ zumɑndi.
44002034	Dɑfidi bumbum mɑnɑ kpei bɛɛnɛ bo ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ cii: "Kpe cii ɑ Kpe sɛ, n mɑ gɔrɔ ɑ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ
44002035	hɑli yɑ n ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ yom tɛ n cee dɛcɛyom dɔ."
44002036	Wɑ nɑm Isirɑilɑ fuu kulu mɑ bei siikɑ si, kɑ Yesu kɑ wom kɑnji, Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ Kpe ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ.
44002037	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ mɑɑ ngɑ di, sendɑ nɑ ǹ bine yom gooru. Ǹ cii Piɛɛ ndɑ diyɑ cindei sɛ: Nyɑize hɑibɔrɔ yom, mɛtɛ i mɑ tɛ?
44002038	Piɛɛ cii ǹ sɛ: Wom mɑ tuubi. Ǹ mɑ wom bɔrɔ fɔ fɔ kulu mirɑndi Yesu Mɛsiyɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ wom dulum yɑɑfɑyom sɑbu sɛ. Wom kɑɑ du Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Ikpɛ noyom.
44002039	Alikɑwɑli di wom ŋmɔne no ndɑ wom koo yom ŋmɔne. Yɑ no beerem kɑ ǹ go mooru, ǹ kulu mo Kpe i ŋmɔne Ikpɛ gɑ ǹ cɛɛ ngɑ dɔ.
44002040	Ndɑ sendi fɔ yom kpɛɛnɛ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ dɑm kɑ ǹ nɑ himmɑ. À cii: Wom mɑ du fɑɑbɑ kɑ fee ndɑ zɑmɑni wɔ beerem siirɑntɛ yom.
44002041	Beerem kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ sendɑ tɑ ndɑ binekɑɑne, ǹ nɑ ǹ mirɑndi. Hɑnu ngɑ di Ikpɛ nɑ bɔrɔ dubu hinzɑ sɑrɑ tɔntɔnu ǹ sɛ.
44002042	Ǹ gɑ moo yeti diyɑ yom cɛbɛyom gɑɑ ndɑ nyɑize bine fɔ meiguyom ndɑ buuru zenjeyom ndɑ ɑduwɑ tɛyom.
44002043	Hɑmburu nɑ bɔrɔ kulu dii. Ikpɛ nɑ mɑmɑci yom ndɑ ɑlɑmu yom tɛ diyɑ yom dɔ.
44002044	Beerem kulu kɑ ǹ nɑɑne goono cɛrɛ bɑndɑ. Hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono ǹ sɛ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ meigu kɑ tɛ ɑfɔ.
44002045	Ǹ nɑ ngei hɑibɑrikɑ yom ndɑ ngei jiine yom neerɑ kɑ noorɑ fɑrisi ngei gɑme bɔrɔ fɔ fɔ bɑnji bɔm.
44002046	Hɑnu kulu mo ǹ goono cɛrɛ bɑndɑ kɑ moo yeti ndɑ bine fɔ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ. Ǹ go buuru zenji ngei fuu yom kunɑ. Ǹ gɑ meigu kɑ ngei ŋmɑɑri ŋmɑɑ ndɑ binekɑɑne ndɑ bine fɔ.
44002047	Ǹ go kɑ Ikpɛ sifɑ. Ǹ du gɑɑkuri bɔrɔ kulu dɔ. Hɑnu kɑ kɑɑ hɑnu mo Kpe go kɑ ǹ tɔntɔnu Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ sɛ beerem kɑ ǹ du fɑɑbɑ.
44003001	Hɑnu fɔ Piɛɛ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ go kpei Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ ɑduwɑ tɛyom zɑkɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci zɑɑri guuru hinzɑ.
44003002	Bɔrɔ fɔ goono kɑ ɑ̀ cee yom si tɛ zɑ ɑ̀ nyɑ gunde. Hɑnu kulu beerem cini kɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ kɑ jisi hundi mee kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Ihinno. Hundi mee gɑɑ no mɔngɔlɔ di cini bɑrɑ wɔ kɑ yom go huro Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ sɛ.
44003003	Kɑ mɔngɔlɑ di Piɛɛ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ bɑ huro Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ, ɑ̀ bɑrɑ ǹ sɛ.
44003004	Piɛɛ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ nɑ mɑɑ sinji ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Cɔfɔ Piɛɛ cii: I gunɑ.
44003005	Cɔfɔ mɔngɔlɑ nɑ ǹ gunɑ ko tɑmmɑ hɑli ngɑ du hɛ fɔ ǹ gɑɑ.
44003006	Ammɑ Piɛɛ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A sindɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu. A sindɑ wurɑ. Ammɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ gundɑ, ngɑ no ɑ go kɑ n no. Yesu Mɛsiyɑ Nɑzɑrɛtu mɑɑ gɑɑ, tunu kɑ dirɑ.
44003007	Cɔfɔ Piɛɛ nɑ ɑ̀ dii ɑ̀ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ cee yom ndɑ ɑ̀ ceemo yom kulu du gɑɑbi.
44003008	À sɑru kɑ tunu. À go dirɑ. À huro Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ Piɛɛ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ bɑndɑ. À go dirɑ kɑ sɑru ko kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu.
44003009	Bɔrɔ kulu di ɑ̀ go dirɑ kɑ kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu.
44003010	Ǹ bei kɑ ngɑ yɑ cini gɔrɔ ko bɑrɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ mee gɑɑ, mee kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Ihinno. Mɑmɑci nɑ ǹ kulu dii. Ǹ gɑ fɑihã ndɑ hɛ kɑ tɛ mɔngɔlɑ sɛ.
44003011	Kɑ mɔngɔlɔ di gɑ Piɛɛ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ kɑmbɛ dii, bɔrɔ kulu zuuru kɑ kpei ǹ dɔ tɑfɑɑ fɔ cire, tɑfɑɑ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Sɑlomɔ tɑfɑɑ. Ǹ gɑ mɑmɑci kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
44003012	Kɑ Piɛɛ di yɑ di, ɑ̀ cii jɑmɑ sɛ: Isirɑilɑ hɑibɔrɔ yom, ifɔ sɛ no wom go mɑmɑci ndɑ ngɑ di? Ifɔ sɛ wom go kɑ i gunɑ dee zɑngɑ i bumbum dɑbɑri gɑɑ nɑ wɑlɑ i ŋmɔne Ikpɛ gɑnɑyom gɑɑ nɑ, bɔrɔ wɔ go hini kɑ dirɑ?
44003013	Abulɛmɑ ndɑ Isɑɑkɑ ndɑ Yɑkɔfu ǹ kulu ŋmɔne Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci i cɛɛ yom ŋmɔne Ikpɛ, ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ gbeiize Yesu bɛɛrɑndi. Ngɑ no wom dɑm kɑmbɛ. Wom nɑ ɑ̀ ze mo Pilɑtu jine sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ guuri zɑɑ ngɑ mɑ ɑ̀ tɑm.
44003014	Wom nɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑkpɛ ndɑ Cɛsusukpɛ ze. Ammɑ wom ŋmɑɑrɛ ǹ mɑ tu wom sɛ ǹ mɑ bɔrɔ wikɔ tɑm.
44003015	Wom nɑ Hundikpɛ wi ɑmmɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme. I yom yɑ ci wɔne sɛdɑ.
44003016	Yesu mɑɑ gɑɑ nɑɑne nɑ bɔrɔ kɑ wom go di ko bei no gɑɑbi. Nɑɑne kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ Yesu gɑɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ bɔrɔ wɔ no bɑɑni sã sã wom kulu jine.
44003017	Mɑɑsɑ gɑɑ nyɑizei, ɑ bei kɑ wom ndɑ wom hinikpɛ yom nɑ ngɑ di tɛ zɑm kɑ bei kunɑ.
44003018	Ammɑ Ikpɛ nɑ hɛ yom kɑ ɑ̀ jinɑ kɑ cii ngɑ ɑndebi yom kulu mee gɑɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑ guruguze. Yɑ di no ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ tɔnɑndi.
44003019	Ngɑ di sɛ, wom mɑ tuubi kɑ bɛrɛ zɑmɑ Ikpɛ mɑ wom dulum yom tusu. Sɑɑ di gɑɑ bɑɑni lɔkɑci yom mɑ zumbu zɑ Kpe dɔ.
44003020	À mɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔntɔm mo, ngɑ kɑ ǹ jinɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑru no wom sɛ.
44003021	Yesu wɔ tilɑsi no ɑ̀ mɑ gɔrɔ bɛɛnɛ hɑli hɛ yom kulu yeyom lɔkɑci mɑ tɔ. Lɔkɑci ngɑ di Ikpɛ sendi zɑ dom zɑmɑni ngɑ ɑndebi hɑlɑɑlɑ yom mee gɑɑ.
44003022	Cimi nɑ Moisi cii i cɛɛ yom sɛ: "Kpe wom ŋmɔne Ikpɛ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ ɑndebi fɔ tunɑndi zɑngɑ hɛɛ wom sɛ wom nyɑizei kunɑ. Wom kɑɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ ndɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ cii wom sɛ.
44003023	À kɑɑ tɛ mo bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ si hɑngɑ dɑm ɑndebi di sɛ, ɑ̀ hɑlɑci kpɑrɑkɑtɑkɑ jɑmɑ bindi kunɑ."
44003024	Andebi yom kulu mo zɑ Sɑmuɛli gɑɑ ndɑ wɔ kɑ yom kɑɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ, ǹ kulu kɑ ǹ sendi, ǹ nɑ jiribi nge yom di bɑɑru deede.
44003025	Wom mo, wom yɑ ci ɑndebi yom ize yom ndɑ ɑlikɑwɑli ŋmɔne yom kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ ndɑ i cɛɛ yom. À cii Abulɛmɑ sɛ: "Hɑndunyɑ fuu kulu kɑɑ du bɑrikɑ n bɑndɑ fɔ dɔ."
44003026	Kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ gbeiize Yesu tunɑndi, wom dɔ no ɑ̀ jinɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔm. À nɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔm zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm wom kulu gɑɑ kɑ wom bɔrɔ fɔ fɔ kulu bɛrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ ngɑ gbei lɑlɔ yom nɑm.
44004001	Sɑɑ kɑ Piɛɛ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ go sendi jɑmɑ sɛ, gɑrɑndikɔ yom ndɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ bɑtukɔ ndɑ Sɑdusi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom kɑɑ ǹ dɔ.
44004002	Ǹ kulu lɑɑkɑli tunu ndɑ hɛ kɑ Piɛɛ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ gɑ jɑmɑ cooɑndi ndɑ, kɑ wɑɑzu bukɔei tunɑndiyom bɔm Yesu mɑɑ gɑɑ.
44004003	Ǹ nɑ ǹ dii kɑ dɑm kɑsu kɑlɑ subɑ zɑmɑ wiciri kɑmbu bɑ tɔ.
44004004	Ammɑ ǹ bɔrɔ boobo kɑ ǹ mɑɑ sendɑ, ǹ nɑɑne. Cɔfɔ gɑnɑkɔ yom bɑ kɑ tɔntɔnu, zɑngɑ hɑibɔrɔ dubu gu sɑrɑ.
44004005	À kɑɑ tɔ kɑ mo bo, Yuifu jinɑ yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom nɑ cɛrɛ meigu Yerusɑlɛm kunɑ.
44004006	Gɑrɑndikɔ beeri fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Hɑnɑnu goono ǹ gɑme. Kɑifɑ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ ndɑ Alɛsɑndi ndɑ beerem kulu kɑ ǹ gɑ ci gɑrɑndikɔ beeri dimi yom goono ǹ gɑme mo.
44004007	Ǹ kɑɑndɑ Piɛɛ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ kɑ ǹ dɑm ngei bindi. Ǹ go kɑ ǹ hã kɑ cii: Dɑbɑri fɔ dimi gɑɑ wɑlɑ mɑɑ fɔ dimi gɑɑ no wom go kɑ ngɑ di tɛ?
44004008	Cɔfɔ Piɛɛ tɔ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ. À cii ǹ sɛ: Wom ci mɑrgɑ jinɑ yom ndɑ Isirɑilɑ hɑikusu yom.
44004009	Hunkunɑ wom go kɑ i hã tɛyom hinno kɑ i tɛ mɔngɔlɔ di sɛ ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ tɛ kɑ du bɑɑni.
44004010	Wom kulu ndɑ Isirɑilɑ jɑmɑ kulu mɑ bei, kɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ Nɑzɑrɛtu kɑ wom kɑnji, Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme. À mɑɑ gɑɑ no mɔngɔlɔ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ cɛ wom jine du bɑɑni sã sã.
44004011	Yesu wɔ yɑ tɛ "tondi kɑ wom cinikɔ yom hungu kɑ furu. Ngɑ yɑ ci mimbɑri cire tɑndi sintine."
44004012	Kɑlɑ ɑ̀ dɔ hinne nɑ bɔrɔ gɑ du fɑɑbɑ. Mɑɑ fɔ kulu si kpɛɛnɛ bɛɛnɛ cire kɑ Ikpɛ no iburɑdɑm sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ tilɑsi i mɑ du fɑɑbɑ.
44004013	Ǹ di Piɛɛ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ yɑrutɛrɛ. Mɑmɑci nɑ ǹ dii zɑmɑ ǹ bei kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ du cooɑndiyom, ǹ ci tɑlikɑ yom mɑ. Ǹ bei mo kɑ ǹ goono Yesu bɑndɑ dom.
44004014	Zɑ kɑ ǹ di mɔngɔlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ du bɑɑni go cɛ ngei jɛrɛ gɑɑ, ǹ mɑnɑ du hɛ fɔ kulu kɑ cii.
44004015	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ Piɛɛ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ no mei ǹ mɑ hunu ciiti dumbukɔ mɑrgɑ dɔ, cɔfɔ ǹ sɑwɑrɑ ngei gɑme.
44004016	Ǹ cii: Mɛtɛ i mɑ tɛ beerem wɔ sɛ? Cimi no, ɑlɑmu beeri fɔ tɛ ǹ dɔ. À kpɑrɛ mo Yerusɑlɛm bɔrɔ kulu sɛ. Cimi no i si hini kɑ ɑ̀ ze mɑ.
44004017	Ammɑ ɑlɑmu bɑɑru wɔ mɑ si see kɑ tɔntɔnu jɑmɑ kunɑ kpɛɛnɛ. À sɛ no i mɑ hungu ǹ sɛ ndɑ moocire, ǹ mɑ si sendi bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ sɛ kpɛɛnɛ Yesu mɑɑ bɔm.
44004018	À gɑɑ nɑ, ǹ nɑ ǹ cɛɛ kɑ hungu ǹ sɛ pɑti pɑti ǹ mɑ si sendi wɑlɑ kɑ cooɑndi Yesu mɑɑ gɑɑ.
44004019	Ammɑ Piɛɛ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Wɑ gunɑ wom bine dɔ kɑ cii hɑli ɑ̀ sɑbɑ Ikpɛ dɔ i mɑ wom sendi gɑnɑ, ɑ̀ bisɑ i mɑ mɑɑ Ikpɛ sɛ.
44004020	I si hini kɑ zɑm kɑ sendi hɛ kɑ i di ndɑ hɛ kɑ i mɑɑ bɔm.
44004021	Ammɑ ǹ hungu Piɛɛ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ sɛ ndɑ moocire kpɛɛnɛ. À bɑndɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ tɑm. Ǹ mɑnɑ hini kɑ ǹ tɑɑbɑndi jɑmɑ sɑbu sɛ zɑ kɑ bɔrɔ kulu go kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi ndɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ.
44004022	Bɔrɔ di kɑ ɑ̀ bɔm bɑɑni ɑlɑmu wɔ tɛ, ɑ̀ zeene tɔ zɑngɑ jiiri weitɑɑci.
44004023	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ tɑm, Piɛɛ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ kpei gɑnɑkɔ yom dɔ kɑ deede hɛ kulu kɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom cii ǹ sɛ.
44004024	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ mɑɑ ǹ sɛ, cɔfɔ ǹ kulu sɑbɑ kɑ jinde zɑɑ mefɔ Ikpɛ sɛ. Ǹ cii: Kpe, n ci Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ bɛɛnɛ ndɑ gɑndɑ tɑkɑ kɑ tɛku tɛ ndɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono ǹ kunɑ.
44004025	N sendi n gbeiize Dɑfidi mee gɑɑ kɑ cii: "Ifɔ sɛ dimi cindei go hɔllɔ? Ifɔ sɛ hɑndunyɑ jɑmɑ go lɑsɑbu kɔnu kɔnu yom tɛ?
44004026	Hɑndunyɑ gɑndɑkpɛ yom tunu mefɔ. Hinikpɛ yom mo go diibi kuru tɛ. Ǹ go gɑɑbɑ ndɑ Kpe ndɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɔne Mɛsiyɑ."
44004027	Yɑ no Hirodu ndɑ Pilɑtu Pɔnse mo nɑ diibi tɛ ndɑ dimi cindei ndɑ Isirɑilɑ lɑɑbu jɑmɑ. Ǹ go gɑɑbɑ ndɑ n Gbeiize hɑlɑɑlɑ Yesu kɑ n dɑm Mɛsiyɑ.
44004028	Ǹ mɑ du kɑ tɛ hɛ kulu kɑ n kɑmbɛ ndɑ n miilɑ jinɑ kɑ jisi.
44004029	Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ Kpe, gunɑ sendi yom kɑ ǹ cii ndɑ moocire. N mɑ n tɑm yom no gɑɑbi ǹ mɑ n sendi bɑɑru no ndɑ yɑrutɛrɛ.
44004030	N mɑ n kɑmbɛ sɛllɛ bɑɑni noyom mɑ tɛ ndɑ ɑlɑmu yom ndɑ mɑmɑci yom n Gbeiize hɑlɑɑlɑ Yesu mɑɑ gɑɑ.
44004031	Kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ kɑ beeni, nungu kɑ ǹ meigu di zinji. Ǹ kulu tɔ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ. Cɔfɔ ǹ go kɑ Ikpɛ Sendi cii mo ndɑ yɑrutɛrɛ.
44004032	Bɔrɔ boobo kɑ ǹ nɑɑne, ǹ kulu tɛ bine fɔ ndɑ hundi fɔ. Bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ si cii hɑibɑrikɑ yom di ngɑ ŋmɔne yom no. Ammɑ hɛ yom kulu kɑ ǹ goono ǹ sɛ, ǹ kulu ŋmɔne yom no ǹ cɛrɛ gɑme.
44004033	Diyɑ yom kɑɑndɑ sɛdɑ ndɑ dɑbɑri bɑmbɑtɑ Kpe Yesu tunɑndiyom bukɔei gɑme bɔm. Cɔfɔ gomini bɑmbɑtɑ zumbu ǹ kulu bɔm.
44004034	Ǹ kunɑ bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ mɑnɑ zɑm hɛ fɔ zɑmɑ beerem kɑ ǹ gundɑ fɑri yom wɑlɑ fuu yom nɑ ǹ neerɑ kɑ kpeindɑ nooru jɑmɑ dɔ.
44004035	Ǹ nɑ nooru di jisi diyɑ yom jine ko fɑrisi bɔrɔ fɔ kulu sɛ ndɑ zɑngɑ bɔrɔ fɔ fɔ kulu bɑnji goono ndɑ.
44004036	Bɔrɔ fɔ goono kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ no Yose. Diyɑ yom nɑ ɑ̀ no mɑɑdɛcɛ Bɑɑnɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ feeriji yɑ ci Yɑmɑrɑndiyom Ize. Ngɑ yɑ ci Lefi bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu zɑ Kuburu hɔndɛ tɑɑsi.
44004037	À nɑ ngɑ fɑri kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ neerɑ. À kpeindɑ nooru di kɑ jisi diyɑ yom jine.
44005001	Bɔrɔ fɔ goono kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Anɑni. Ngɑ ndɑ ngɑ wɛndɛ Sɑfiɑ nɑ gɑndɑ fɔ neerɑ.
44005002	À nɑ noorɑ jɛrɛ fɔ jɛ kɑ kpeindɑ cindɑ kɑ ɑ̀ jisi diyɑ yom jine. À wɛndɛ bei.
44005003	Ammɑ Piɛɛ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Anɑni, ifɔ sɛ no Setɑm nɑ n bine tɔnɑndi yɑ wɔ dimi? N nɑ tɑngɑri tɛ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ sɛ fɑ kɑ n nɑ n gɑndɑ neerɑ kɑ ɑ̀ noorɑ jɛrɛ fɔ jɛ. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
44005004	Zɑ n mɑnɑ ɑ̀ neerɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ci n ŋmɔne no? Mɑɑsɑ kɑ n nɑ ɑ̀ neerɑ, noorɑ n ŋmɔne no. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ? Mɛtɛ n tɛ kɑ miilɑ wɔ dimi dɑm n bine kunɑ? À mɑnɑ ci beerem sɛ no n nɑ tɑngɑri tɛ ɑmmɑ Ikpɛ sɛ.
44005005	Kɑ Anɑni mɑɑ sendi nge yom di, ɑ̀ kɑm kɑ bu. Hɑmburu bɑmbɑtɑ nɑ mɑɑkɔ yom kulu dii.
44005006	Cɔfɔ hɑiwɑsu yom tunu kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm cɛsɛnjɛ kunɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ kɑ kpei fiji.
44005007	Zɑngɑ guuru hinzɑ bisɑ, ɑ̀ gɑɑ no ɑ̀ wɛndɑ kɑɑ hurɑ. À mɑnɑ bei hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ.
44005008	Piɛɛ sendi ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: N mɑ cii ɑ sɛ, nooru wɔne sɑrɑ no wom nɑ gɑndɑ neerɑ? À tu kɑ cii: Mm, nooru yɑ di sɑrɑ nɑ.
44005009	Piɛɛ bine cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Mɛtɛ wom tɛ kɑ mɑɑ cɛrɛ sɛ kɑ Ikpɛ Biyɑ sui? Gunɑ, beerem kɑ ǹ nɑ n kunye fiji, ngei no fuu mee yɑ. Ǹ kɑɑ kɑ n zɑɑ.
44005010	Mefɔ mefɔ, Sɑfiɑ mo kɑm Piɛɛ jine kɑ bu. Hɑiwɑsu yom huro kɑ gɑru ɑ̀ bu. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ kɑ kpei fiji ɑ̀ kunye jɛrɛ gɑɑ.
44005011	Hɑmburu bɑmbɑtɑ nɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ bɔrɔ kulu dii ndɑ beerem kulu kɑ ǹ go mɑɑ bɑɑru ngɑ di.
44005012	Alɑmu boobo ndɑ mɑmɑci boobo go tɛ jɑmɑ bindi kunɑ diyɑ yom kɑmbɛ yom gɑɑ. Ǹ kulu goono mefɔ tɑfɑɑ fɔ cire, tɑfɑɑ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Sɑlomɔ tɑfɑɑ.
44005013	Ammɑ bɔrɔ cindei kunɑ, bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ mɑnɑ tu ngɑ mɑ meigu ndei. Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu jɑmɑ go kɑ ǹ bɛɛrɑndi kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
44005014	Beerem kɑ ǹ go nɑɑne Kpe gɑɑ, hɑibɔrɔ ndɑ weibɔrɔ, ǹ go tɔntɔnu ndɑ bɑyom.
44005015	Ǹ kpeindɑ zɛnjɛkom yom kɑ ǹ jisi dɑɑri ndɑ tɛnjɛrɛ yom bɔm dɛbɛ yom gɑɑ. Ǹ nɑ ngɑ di tɛ domi sɑɑ kɑ Piɛɛ kɑɑ kɑ bisɑ, ɑ̀ biyɑ mɑ du kɑ zumbu ǹ kunɑ ɑfɔ yom bɔm.
44005016	Bɔrɔ boobo hunu kpɑɑrɑ yom kɑ ǹ goono Yerusɑlɛm hundɑntɛ. Ǹ kɑɑndɑ zɛnjɛkom yom ndɑ beerem kɑ hɔllɛ yom go kɑ ǹ tɑɑbɑndi. Ǹ kulu mɑ du bɑɑni.
44005017	À gɑɑ no gɑrɑndikɔ beeri di tunu ndɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ, wɑtom Sɑdusi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom. Ǹ tɔ ndɑ cɛnsɛ.
44005018	Ǹ nɑ diyɑ yom dii kɑ ǹ dɑm kɑsu.
44005019	Ammɑ Kpe dɔntɔneize fɔ mo kɑɑ ciini kɑ kɑsu di mee yom feeri kɑ ǹ kɑɑ tɛrɛ.
44005020	À cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ kpei cɛ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ kɑ sendi yom kulu kɑ ǹ goono kɑ simbɑ hundi wɔ bɔm bɑɑru no jɑmɑ sɛ.
44005021	Kɑ ǹ mɑɑ ngɑ di, susubɑ zɑ ndɑ hine ǹ huro Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ kɑ cooɑndi. Ammɑ gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ mɑ kɑɑ ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ goono ɑ̀ dɔ. Ǹ nɑ Yuifu yom ciiti dumbukɔ yom cɛɛ ndɑ Isirɑilɑ jɑmɑ hɑikusu yom kulu. Ǹ nɑ beerem dɑm ǹ mɑ kpei kɑsu di kunɑ kɑ kɑɑndɑ diyɑ yom di.
44005022	Dogɑri yom kpei, ɑmmɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ǹ gɑru kɑsuɑ kunɑ. Ǹ bɛrɛ kɑ ye kɑ kɑɑndɑ bɑɑru.
44005023	Ǹ cii: Cimi nɑ i nɑ kɑsuɑ gɑru dɑɑbɑntɛ mɑm mɑm mɑm. Bɑtukɔ yom mɑ gɑ cɛ ɑ̀ mee yom gɑɑ. Kɑ i nɑ ǹ feeri i mɑnɑ di bɔrɔ fɔ kulu kɑsu kunɑ.
44005024	Kɑ gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ bɑtukɔ ndɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom mɑɑ bɑɑru di, ǹ mɑnɑ bei lɑsɑbu kɑ ngei mɑ tɛ diyɑ yom di bɔm ndɑ nungu kɑ sendɑ kpei cɛ.
44005025	Bɔrɔ fɔ kɑɑ cii ǹ sɛ: Gunɑ, beerem di kɑ wom dɑm kɑsu, ǹ gɑ cɛ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ kɑ jɑmɑ cooɑndi.
44005026	Cɔfɔ bɑtukɔɑ ndɑ dogɑri yom kpei kɑɑndei mɔsɔ mɔsɔ zɑmɑ ǹ gɑ hɑmburu hɑnibɑ jɑmɑ gɑ ǹ cetu.
44005027	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ kɑɑndei, ǹ nɑ ǹ dɑm mɑrgɑ ciiti dumbukɔ yom jine. Gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ nɑ ǹ hã kɑ cii:
44005028	I nɑ wom no mei pɑti pɑti wom mɑ si cooɑndi mɑɑ wɔ bɔm. À nɑ ci cimi nɑ bɑ? Gunɑ, wom nɑ Yerusɑlɛm tɔnɑndi ndɑ wom cɛbɛ yom. Wom go bɑɑ mo wom mɑ bɔrɔ di kuri dɛcɛ i bɔm.
44005029	Piɛɛ ndɑ diyɑ cindei tu kɑ cii: Tilɑsi i mɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ, i mɑ iburɑdɑm sendi gɑnɑ.
44005030	I cɛɛ yom ŋmɔne Ikpɛ nɑ Yesu tunɑndi, wɔ kɑ wom kɑnji kɑ wi tuuri gɑɑ.
44005031	Ikpɛ nɑ Yesu wɔ bɛɛrɑndi ngɑ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ci Hinikpɛ ndɑ Fɑɑbɑkɔ. Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ nɑ zɑmɑ Isirɑilɑ ize yom mɑ tuubi kɑ du yɑɑfɑyom ngei dulum yom gɑɑ.
44005032	I go ci hɛ nge yom di sɛdɑ yom. Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kɑ Ikpɛ no wɔ kɑ yom go kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ sɛ, ngɑ mo yɑ ci sɛdɑ.
44005033	Kɑ jɑmɑ mɑɑ sendi nge yom di ǹ binei futu. Ǹ sɑwɑrɑ mo ngei mɑ Piɛɛ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ wi.
44005034	Ammɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ fɔ goono Yuifu yom ciiti dumbukɔ yom bindi kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Gɑmɑli. Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ no kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ bɛɛrɛ jɑmɑ kulu dɔ. À tunu kɑ cɛ ǹ jine kɑ mei no ǹ mɑ diyɑ yom kɑɑ tɛrɛ bɑndɑ fɔ.
44005035	À cii jɑmɑ di sɛ: Isirɑilɑ hɑibɔrɔ yom, wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ hɛ kɑ wom bɑ tɛ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ beerem wɔ.
44005036	Zɑ hɑnu nge yom di mɑnɑ kɑɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Tɛudɑ tunu. À nɑ ngɑ bɔm jisi hɛ fɔ. À bɑndɑ no zɑngɑ bɔrɔ zɑngu tɑɑci meigu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ wi. Beerem kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ kulu gɑɑrɛ. Ǹ gbei tɛ kɔnu mo.
44005037	Tɛudɑ bɑndɑ, Gɑlile bɔrɔ fɔ mo kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Yudɑ tunu kɑbukɑbu lɔkɑci wɑtɛ. À nɑ bɔrɔ boobo cendi ngɑ bɑndɑ. Ngɑ mo hɑlɑci. Beerem mo kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ mo ǹ kulu seesee.
44005038	Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ go cii wom sɛ, wom mɑ sɑɑle kɑɑ beerem wɔ gɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑm ǹ mɑ kpei. De gɑnɑyom wɔ wɑlɑ gbei wɔ go hunu iburɑdɑm yom dɔ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ beeni.
44005039	Ammɑ de zɑ Ikpɛ dɔ no ɑ̀ go hunu, wom si hini kɑ ɑ̀ beenɑndi. Wɑ lɑɑkɑli wom mɑ si gɑɑbɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ.
44005040	Yuifu yom ciiti dumbukɔ yom nɑ ɑ̀ sendɑ tu. Ǹ nɑ diyɑ yom cɛɛ kɑ ǹ sɔtɛ. À bɑndɑ ǹ nɑ diyɑ yom no mei ǹ mɑ si sendi Yesu mɑɑ gɑɑ. Cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ ǹ tɑm.
44005041	Diyɑ yom bine nɑ ngei bɔm cendi kɑ gɑnɑ ciiti dumbukɔ yom mɑrgɑ jine. Ǹ go fɑihã ndɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ lɑsɑbu ǹ tɔ cɛnɑndiyom Yesu mɑɑ sɑbu sɛ.
44005042	Hɑnu kulu Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ ndɑ fuu yom kulu kunɑ, ǹ mɑnɑ cooɑndiyom nɑm ndɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu tɛyom kɑ cii Yesu yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ.
44006001	Jiribi nge yom di no coobɑɑbɑize yom go bɑ kɑ tɔntɔnu. Ammɑ Yuifu yom kɑ ǹ go Gɑrɛku cinɛ sendi go gunu wɔ kɑ yom go Ebulu cinɛ sendi gɑɑ. Ǹ go gunu no zɑmɑ Ebulu cinɛ sendikɔ yom nɑ sɑɑle kɑɑ ǹ sokoni yom gɑɑ fɑrisime fɔ kunɑ kɑ ǹ cini tɛ hɑnu kulu.
44006002	Iwei cindi hinkɑ di nɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom kulu cɛɛ kɑ cii ǹ sɛ: À mɑnɑ himɑ i mɑ Ikpɛ sendɑ nɑm kɑ kpei ŋmɑɑri fɑrisi.
44006003	À sɛ no nyɑizei, wom mɑ gunɑ wom kunɑ bɔrɔ iye kɑ ǹ gundɑ sɛdɑ hinno kɑ ǹ tɔ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ ndɑ hɑikusutɛrɛ. Wom mɑ ǹ suubɑ domi i mɑ du kɑ ǹ dɑm ŋmɑɑrɑ fɑrisiyom.
44006004	Ammɑ i mo sɑɑle dɑm ɑduwɑ tɛyom ndɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ ŋmɔne gbei gɑɑ.
44006005	Sendi ngɑ di kɑɑni jɑmɑ kulu sɛ. Ǹ nɑ Tifɑnu suubɑ. Tifɑnu wɔ tɔ ndɑ nɑɑne ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ. Yɑ no ǹ nɑ Filipu ndɑ Poloko ndɑ Nikɑno ndɑ Timo ndɑ Pɑmenɑ ndɑ Nikolɑ, Antiɔku wɑngɑrɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bɛrɛ kɑ Yuifu yom fɔndɔ gɑnɑ suubɑ.
44006006	Ǹ nɑ ǹ cɛɑndi diyɑ yom jine. Kɑ diyɑ yom nɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ kɑ beeni, ǹ nɑ ngei kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ ǹ bɔm gbei di sɛ.
44006007	Ikpɛ Sendɑ mɑ go kɑru kɑ see nungu kulu ndɑ bɑyom. Coobɑɑbɑize yom mo bɑ kɑ tɔntɔnu bututu Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ kunɑ. Yuifu yom gɑrɑndikɔ boobo mo nɑ nɑɑne fɔndɑ gɑnɑ.
44006008	Tifɑnu wɔ tɔ ndɑ nɑɑne ndɑ dɑbɑri. À nɑ mɑmɑci ndɑ ɑlɑmu bɑmbɑtɑ yom tɛ beerem gɑme.
44006009	Ammɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom tunu kɑ ǹ cii ǹ sɛ Bɔrɔcini Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ kunɑ, Sileni bɔrɔ yom no ndɑ Alɛsɑndiɑ bɔrɔ yom. Cilici lɑɑbu Yuifu yom mo ndɑ Azi ŋmɔne yom goono ǹ gɑme. Ǹ kulu tunu kɑ kɑkɔ ndɑ Tifɑnu.
44006010	Ammɑ ǹ mɑnɑ hini kɑ ɑ̀ zeeri zɑmɑ ɑ̀ go sendi ndɑ hɑikusutɛrɛ kɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ go kɑ ɑ̀ no.
44006011	À gɑɑ no, ǹ nɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom bɑnɑ ǹ mɑ sendi wɔne cii: I mɑɑ Tifɑnu wɔ nɑ Moisi ndɑ Ikpɛ sendi yɑmu kɑ ǹ cɛnɑndi.
44006012	Ǹ nɑ jɑmɑ di ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom zukum hɑli ǹ kɑm Tifɑnu bɔm. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ dii kɑ kpeindɑɑ̀ mɑrgɑ ciiti dumbukɔ yom dɔ.
44006013	Ǹ kɑɑndɑ tɑngɑri sɛdɑ yom kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ di si cɛ ndɑ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ wɔ ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ sendi yɑmu kɑ ǹ cɛnɑndi.
44006014	I mɑɑ ɑ̀ cii Yesu Nɑzɑrɛtu di kɑɑ Nungu wɔ zeeri. Alɑɑdɑ yom mo kɑ Moisi nɑ i no ɑ̀ gɑ ǹ bɑrime.
44006015	Beerem kɑ ǹ go gɔrɔ mɑrgɑ ciiti dumbukɔ yom dɔ, ǹ kulu go moo sinji Tifɑnu gɑɑ. Tifɑnu moodumɑ himɑ ǹ sɛ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize moodumɑ.
44007001	Yuifu yom gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ cii: Yɑ no hɛ yom bɑrɑ?
44007002	Tifɑnu tu kɑ cii: Nyɑize hɑibɔrɔ yom ndɑ bɑɑbɑ yom, wɑ hɑngɑ dɑm kɑ mɑɑ ɑ sɛ. Ikpɛ deizɑkpɛ hunutɛrɛ i cɛɛ Abulɛmɑ sɛ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono Mesopotɑmi lɑɑbu hɑli ɑ̀ kpei gɔrɔ Hɑrɑm lɑɑbu.
44007003	Ikpɛ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: "Hunu n lɑɑbu kunɑ ndɑ n dimi kunɑ. N mɑ kpei lɑɑbu fɔ kɑ ɑ gɑ n cɛbɛ kunɑ."
44007004	Abulɛmɑ bine hunu Kɑlɛdɑncei lɑɑbu kɑ kpei gɔrɔ Hɑrɑm lɑɑbu. Nungu di no ɑ̀ bɑɑbɑ bu. À bɑndɑ Ikpɛ kpeindɑ Abulɛmɑ lɑɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ wom gɑ gɔrɔ hɑli mɑɑsɑ.
44007005	Ikpɛ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ nɑ gɑndɑ hɛ fɔ kulu ɑ̀ mɑ tubu, bɑ cee dɛcɛyom dɔ sɑrɑ. Ammɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii ngɑ gɑ ɑ̀ no lɑɑbu ɑ̀ mɑ ci ɑ̀ ŋmɔne ndɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ yom ŋmɔne mo. Sɑɑ ngɑ di Abulɛmɑ sindɑ koo jinɑ.
44007006	Yɑ no Ikpɛ sendi kɑ cii: À bɑndɑ yom kɑɑ yotɛrɛ tɛ lɑɑbu ŋmɑni fɔ kunɑ. Ǹ gɑ ǹ tɛ tɑm yom kɑ ǹ tɑɑbɑndi jiiri zɑngu tɑɑci.
44007007	"Dimi kɑ ɑ̀ dɔ ǹ nɑ ǹ tɛ tɑm yom, hɛɛ yɑ gɑ ɑ̀ ciiti. Ngɑ di bɑndɑ, Abulɛmɑ bɑndɑ yom kɑɑ hunu kɑ tɑmtɛrɛ ɑ sɛ nungu wɔ kunɑ."
44007008	Ikpɛ nɑ Abulɛmɑ no ɑlikɑwɑli kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ bɑngudɑmyom ci sɛdɑ. Yɑ no kɑ Abulɛmɑ nɑ Isɑɑkɑ hɛi ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑmbɑngu jiribi ɑhɑkuɑntɛ hine. Isɑɑkɑ mo nɑ Yɑkɔfu hɛi kɑ ɑ̀ dɑmbɑngu. Yɑkɔfu mɑ nɑ cɛɛ wei cindi hinkɑ hɛi kɑ ǹ dɑmbɑngu.
44007009	Cɛɛ yom di cɛnsɛ ndɑ Yosɛfu. Cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ neerɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom sɛ ǹ mɑ kpeindɑɑ̀ Eziputu lɑɑbu. Ammɑ Ikpɛ goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ.
44007010	Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ ɑ̀ tɑɑbi kulu kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ gɑɑkuri ndɑ hɑikusutɛrɛ Fɑrɑɔ jine kɑ ɑ̀ ci Eziputu gɑndɑkpɛ. Fɑrɑɔ mɑ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ Eziputu lɑɑbu ndɑ ngɑ fuu kulu gɑɑbikoni.
44007011	Ammɑ hɛrɛɛ fɔ tɛ Eziputu lɑɑbu ndɑ Kɑnɑnɑ lɑɑbu kulu kunɑ kɑ tɛ kɑnkɑmi bɑmbɑtɑ. I cɛɛ yom mɑnɑ du hɛ fɔ kulu kɑ ŋmɑɑ.
44007012	Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ Yɑkɔfu mɑɑ mɔsɔngu goono Eziputu lɑɑbu, ɑ̀ nɑ i cɛɛ yom dɔntɔm sintine.
44007013	Ce hinkɑntɛ Yosɛfu nɑ ngɑ bɔm kɑɑtɛrɛ ngɑ bɛɛrɛ yom ndɑ ngɑ cɛɛnɛ sɛ. Fɑrɑɔ mo du kɑ Yosɛfu fuuize yom bei.
44007014	Yosɛfu bine nɑ nyɑizei dɑm ǹ mɑ kpei kɑ ngɑ bɑɑbɑ Yɑkɔfu cɛɛ ndɑ ngɑ fuuize yom kulu. Ǹ tɔ zɑngɑ bɔrɔ weiye cindi gu.
44007015	Yɑkɔfu mo kpei Eziputu lɑɑbu, nodi ɑ̀ bu. Yɑ no i cɛɛ yom mo.
44007016	Ǹ kɑɑndɑ ǹ bukɔ yom Sɑcimɑ kpɑɑrɑ kɑ ǹ fiji, nungu fɔ kɑ Abulɛmɑ dei ndɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu Hɑmoru koo yom dɔ Sɑcimɑ kunɑ.
44007017	Alikɑwɑli kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ ndɑ Abulɛmɑ ɑ̀ tɔnɑndiyom lɔkɑci mɑɑni. Sɑɑ ngɑ di jɑmɑ mo go tɔntɔnu Eziputu lɑɑbu kɑ hɛi kɑ cɛrɛ hɛi.
44007018	Kɑlɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ tɔ gɑndɑkpɛ fɔ tunu kɑ ɑ̀ si Yosɛfu bei.
44007019	Gɑndɑkpɛ wɔ yɑ nɑ i dimi yom zɑmbɑ kɑ i cɛɛ yom guruguzɑndi. À nɑ ǹ tilɑsi ǹ mɑ ngei koo yom furu kɑ nɑm ǹ mɑ bu.
44007020	Lɔkɑci ngɑ di no, ǹ nɑ Moisi hɛi. Koo di boori Ikpɛ jine kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɑndi hɑndu hinzɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑbɑ fuu kunɑ.
44007021	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ furu, Fɑrɑɔ koo hundiyo nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ. À nɑ ɑ̀ biiri zɑngɑ ngɑ bumbum koo.
44007022	Ǹ nɑ Moisi dendenɑndi Eziputu lɑɑbu beire kulu. À gundɑ dɑbɑri ɑ̀ sendi yom dɔ ndɑ ɑ̀ tɛyom dɔ.
44007023	Sɑɑ kɑ Moisi gundɑ jiiri weitɑɑci ɑ̀ miilɑ ngɑ bine kunɑ ngɑ mɑ kpei kɑ ngɑ nyɑize yom kɑ ǹ ci Isirɑilɑ ize yom kunfɑ.
44007024	A di Isirɑilɑ ize fɔ kɑ ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ lɑlɑce. À huro kɑ fɑɑsɑ ngɑ nyɑizɑ kɑ ǹ go lɑlɑce sɛ. À nɑ Eziputɑncɛ di kɑru kɑ wi.
44007025	À tɑmmɑ ngɑ nyɑize yom fɑhɑm kɑ Ikpɛ kɑɑ fɑɑbɑ tɛ ǹ sɛ no ndɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ. Ammɑ ǹ mɑnɑ fɑhɑm.
44007026	Hɑnu kɑ ɑ̀ dɛcɛ, ɑ̀ gɑru Isirɑilɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom gɑ zogu. À wetere ngɑ mɑ ǹ sɑsɑbɑndi. À cii ǹ sɛ: Hɑibɔrɔ yom, wom bɑrɑ no nyɑize yom. Ifɔ sɛ wom go kɑ ilɑlɔ tɛ cɛrɛ sɛ?
44007027	Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ilɑlɔ tɛ ngɑ kpɑɑsi di sɛ, ɑ̀ nɑ Moisi fum. À cii: Mee yɑ nɑ n dɑm hinikpɛ ndɑ ciitikɔ i sɛ?
44007028	N gɑ bɑɑ n mɑ ɑ wi zɑngɑ n nɑ Eziputu bɔrɔ di wi bii nɑ?
44007029	Moisi bine zuuru sendi ngɑ di sɑbu sɛ. À kpei yotɛrɛ ko gɔrɔ Midiɑ lɑɑbu, nungu kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ koo hɑibɔrɔ hinkɑ hɛi.
44007030	Sɑɑ kɑ jiiri weitɑɑci bisɑ, Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize fɔ hunu ɑ̀ sɛ Sinɑi tɑndi kuku dɔ gɑnji kunɑ. À hunu ɑ̀ sɛ kubu fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go dii bɛllɛ kunɑ.
44007031	Kɑ Moisi di ɑ̀, ɑ̀ mɑmɑci ndɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ di. À go mɑɑni kɑ gunɑ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Kpe jinde kɑ ɑ̀ go cii:
44007032	"Hɛɛ yɑ ci n cɛɛ yom ŋmɔne Ikpɛ, Abulɛmɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ, Isɑɑkɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ, Yɑkɔfu ŋmɔne Ikpɛ." Cɔfɔ Moisi gɑ gɑsi. À mɑnɑ tu kɑ gunɑ kpɛɛnɛ.
44007033	Kpe cii ɑ̀ sɛ: "N mɑ n tɑɑmu yom kɑɑ n cee yom gɑɑ zɑmɑ nungu kɑ ɑ̀ bɔm n gɑ cɛ wɔ gɑndɑ hɑlɑɑlɑ no.
44007034	Cimi no ɑ di kɑnkɑmi kɑ ɑ jɑmɑ du Eziputu lɑɑbu. A mɑɑ ǹ dureyom mɑ. A kɑɑ zumbu yɑ ǹ fɑɑbɑ sɛ. Mɑɑsɑ n mɑ kpei. A gɑ n dɔntɔm Eziputu lɑɑbu."
44007035	Ammɑ jɑmɑ hungu Moisi sɛ. Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Mee yɑ nɑ n dɑm hinikpɛ ndɑ ciitikɔ? Ngɑ nɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔm zɑngɑ kpe ndɑ fɑɑbɑkɔ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize kɑmbɛ dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hunutɛrɛ ɑ̀ sɛ kubɑ kunɑ.
44007036	Moisi yɑ nɑ ǹ kɑɑ Eziputu lɑɑbu. À nɑ mɑmɑci yom ndɑ ɑlɑmu yom tɛ Eziputu lɑɑbu kunɑ ndɑ Tɛku Ciire kunɑ ndɑ gɑnji kunɑ hɑli jiiri weitɑɑci.
44007037	Ngɑ yɑ ci Moisi di kɑ ɑ̀ cii Isirɑilɑ ize yom sɛ: "Kpe, wom ŋmɔne Ikpɛ kɑɑ ɑndebi fɔ tunɑndi zɑngɑ hɛɛ wom sɛ wom nyɑizei kunɑ. Wom kɑɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ."
44007038	Ngɑ yɑ ci Moisi di kɑ ɑ̀ goono Isirɑilɑ mɑrgɑ kunɑ gɑnji kunɑ i cɛɛ yom bɑndɑ sɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize sendi ɑ̀ sɛ zɑ tondi kuku bɔm kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Sinɑi. Ikpɛ meecine hundikoni yom no ɑ̀ du kɑ no i sɛ.
44007039	Ammɑ i cɛɛ yom si bɑɑ ngei mɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ Moisi sɛ ɑmmɑ ǹ go hunguɑ̀. Ǹ go kɑ ngei bine yeti Eziputu lɑɑbu hɛrɛ.
44007040	Ǹ cii Aɑrɔ sɛ: "N mɑ tooru yom tɛ i sɛ kɑ ǹ mo dirɑ i jine. N mɑ ngɑ di tɛ zɑmɑ Moisi wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ i kɑɑ Eziputu lɑɑbu, i mɑnɑ bei hɛ kɑ du ɑ̀."
44007041	Jiribi nge yom di no ǹ nɑ tooru fɔ tɛ zɑngɑ hɑuize kɑ gɑrɑndi tɛ ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Ǹ fɑihã ndɑ ngei kɑmbɛ gbei.
44007042	Ammɑ Ikpɛ bɛrɛ kɑ ǹ nɑm ǹ mɑ bɛɛnɛ hɛ yom bɛɛrɑndi zɑngɑ ɑndebi yom nɑ ɑ̀ hɑntum ngei tirɑ kunɑ. Ǹ cii: "E Isirɑilɑ dimi, wom mɑnɑ gɑrɑndi yom tɛ ɑ sɛ bɑ ndɑ memunu yom ndɑ sɑɑrɑ yom hɑli jiiri weitɑɑci gɑnji kunɑ. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
44007043	Wom nɑ tooru fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Molokɑ kuuru bukɑ zɑɑ ndɑ tooru fɔ zɑngɑ hɑndɑriyɑize kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Lɑmifɑ. Wom nɑ ǹ himɑndiyom tɛ zɑmɑ wom mɑ sɔmbu ǹ sɛ. Ngɑ di sɛ nɑ, ɑ kɑɑ wom zɑɑ kɑ kpeindɑ wom hɑli Bɑbiloni lɑɑbu sɛ yɑ hɛrɛ."
44007044	Gɑnji di kunɑ no i cɛɛ yom gundɑ kuuru bukɑ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci sɛdɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ nɑ mei no Moisi sɛ. À cii ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ bukɑ di tɛ deedɑndi kɑ ɑ̀ di bɔm.
44007045	I cɛɛ yom mo kɑ ǹ kɑɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ du ɑ̀. Ǹ kɑɑndɑ bukɑ di Yɑsuɑ bɑndɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ dimi cindei lɑɑbu ŋmɑɑ, nge yom kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ gɑɑrɛ i cɛɛ yom jine. Bukɑ di goono mo kɑlɑ Dɑfidi wɑtɛ.
44007046	Dɑfidi du gomini Ikpɛ jine. À nɑ Ikpɛ ŋmɑɑrɛ ngɑ mɑ gɔrɛ dɔ cini Yɑkɔfu ŋmɔne Ikpɛ sɛ.
44007047	Ammɑ Sɑlomɔ yɑ nɑ fuu cini ɑ̀ sɛ.
44007048	Ammɑ Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɛ bisɑ ǹ kulu, ɑ̀ si gɔrɔ fuu kɑ iburɑdɑm cini ndɑ kɑmbɛ kunɑ. Zɑngɑ ɑndebi cii:
