44007049	"Bɛɛnɛ yɑ ci ɑ kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ. Gɑndɑ mo ci ɑ cee dɛcɛyom dɔ. Kpe cii, fuu fɔ dimi no wom kɑɑ cini ɑ sɛ? Mɑni yɑ ci nungu kɑ yɑ hulonzom?
44007050	A kɑmbɛ yɑ nɑ hɛ yom wɔ kulu tɛ. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?"
44007051	Wom gɔgɔsɛndɔ yom, wom bine yom ndɑ wom hɑngɑ yom mɑnɑ du bɑngudɑmyom. Wom go gɑɑbɑ sɑɑ kulu ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ. Hɛ kɑ wom cɛɛ yom tɛ, ngɑ no wom mo, wom go tɛ.
44007052	Wom cɛɛ yom nɑ ɑndebi yom guruguzɑndi. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ? Andebi yom kɑ ǹ kɑɑndɑ Cɛsusukpɛ kɑɑyom bɑɑru, wom nɑ ǹ wi. Wom ci ɑ̀ dɑm kɑmbɛkpɛ yom ndɑ ɑ̀ wikɔ yom.
44007053	Wom nɑ Moisi fɔndɑ tɑ kɑ Ikpɛ sɑmbɑ ngɑ dɔntɔneize yom kɑmbɛ gɑɑ ɑmmɑ wom mɑnɑ fɔndɑ gɑnɑ.
44007054	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ mɑɑ hɛ nge yom di, ǹ bine futu sendi di sɑbu sɛ. Ǹ go hinje kɑɑmɑ bine fute sɑbu sɛ kɑ kuriyo Tifɑnu gɑɑ.
44007055	Ammɑ Tifɑnu wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ moo sinji bɛɛnɛ gɑɑ. À di Ikpɛ deizɑ. À di Yesu mo go cɛ Ikpɛ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ.
44007056	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii: Gunɑ, ɑ go di bɛɛnɛ go feerɑntɛ. Adɑmize gɑ cɛ Ikpɛ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ.
44007057	Jɑmɑ tunu kɑ kuwɑ ndɑ jinde beeri kɑ ngei hɑngɑ yom dɑɑbu. Ǹ didibi ɑ̀ gɑɑ mefɔ kɑ ɑ̀ kukusu.
44007058	Ǹ nɑ Tifɑnu wɑfɑ kɑ cendi kɑ kpeindɑɑ̀ kpɑɑrɑ bɑndɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ cetu cetu ndɑ tɑndi kɑ wi. Sɛdɑ yom nɑ ngei jiine yom jisi sɑwɛrɛ fɔ jine kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Sɑuli.
44007059	Kɑ ǹ go Tifɑnu cetu kɑ wi, ɑ̀ go Yesu mɑɑ cɛɛ kɑ cii: E Kpe Yesu, ɑ hundi wɔ tɑ.
44007060	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ sɔmbu kɑ kuwɑ ndɑ jinde beeri. À cii: Kpe, n mɑ si dulum wɔ dɛcɛ ǹ bɔm. Sendi nge yom di bɑndɑ, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ kɑni.
44008001	Tifɑnu wiyomɑ sɑbɑ Sɑuli sɛ. Hɑnu ngɑ di ǹ nɑ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ bɔrɔ yom guruguzɑndi kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. Ǹ kulu kɑru kɑ see Yude lɑɑbu ndɑ Sɑmɑri lɑɑbu mee ndɑ mee kunɑ. Diyɑ yom di hinne yɑ cindi.
44008002	Ikpɛ gɑnɑkɔ yom nɑ Tifɑnu fiji kɑ bɛrɛɛ bɑmbɑtɑ tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ.
44008003	Ammɑ Sɑuli nɑ hɑsɑrɔ tɛ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ sɛ. À huro fuu fuu kɑ hɑibɔrɔ yom ndɑ weibɔrɔ yom dii kɑ ǹ dɑm kɑsu.
44008004	Ngɑ di sɛ no beerem kɑru kɑ see. Ǹ go dirɑ kpɑɑrɑ ndɑ kpɑɑrɑ kɑ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ sendɑ wɑɑzu tɛ.
44008005	Filipu mo zumbu Sɑmɑri lɑɑbu wɑngɑrɑ fɔ kunɑ kɑ Mɛsiyɑ bɑɑru fɛɛ.
44008006	Jɑmɑ nɑ sɑɑle dɑm Filipu sendi yom gɑɑ ndɑ bine fɔ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ mɑɑ ko di ɑlɑmu boobo kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ.
44008007	Ǹ di hɔllɛ yom hunu beerem bɑndɑ ndɑ kɑɑtiyom. Mɔngɔlɔ boobo ndɑ leebɑntɛ boobo mo du bɑɑni.
44008008	À gɑɑ no binekɑɑne bɑmbɑtɑ huro wɑngɑrɑ di kunɑ.
44008009	Bɔrɔ fɔ bine goono wɑngɑrɑ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Simɔ. À cini mondɑbɑru tɛ ko Sɑmɑri jɑmɑ jirisi. Simɔ nɑ ngɑ bɔm jisi zɑngɑ bɔrɔ beeri fɔ.
44008010	Bɔrɔ kulu zɑ icɛnɑ hɑli ibeeri go sɑɑle dɑm ɑ̀ sendi gɑɑ kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kpɛ wɔ Ikpɛ dɑbɑri nɑ ibɑmbɑtɑ.
44008011	Ǹ nɑ sɑɑle dɑm ɑ̀ sendɑ gɑɑ zɑmɑ zɑ jɛyom no ǹ go mɑmɑci ndɑ ɑ̀ mondɑbɑru tɛyom.
44008012	Ammɑ ǹ nɑɑne Bɑɑru Hinno gɑɑ sɑɑ kɑ Filipu go wɑɑzu Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ ndɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ mɑɑ bɔm. Ǹ nɑ ǹ kulu mirɑndi, hɑibɔrɔ yom ndɑ weibɔrɔ yom.
44008013	Simɔ bumbum nɑɑne. Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ mirɑndi, ɑ̀ go gɔrɔ Filipu bɑndɑ ndɑ bine fɔ. À gɑ di ɑlɑmu yom ndɑ dɑbɑri gbei yom kɑ ǹ go tɛ. À mɑmɑci.
44008014	Diyɑ yom kɑ ǹ goono Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ mɑɑ bɑɑru Sɑmɑri bɔrɔ yom nɑ Ikpɛ sendɑ tɑ. Cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ Piɛɛ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ dɔntɔm ǹ gɑɑ.
44008015	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ tɔ Sɑmɑri bɔrɔ yom dɔ ǹ nɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ gɑnɑkɔ yom sɛ ǹ mɑ du Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ.
44008016	Ǹ nɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ ǹ sɛ nɑ zɑmɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ mɑnɑ zumbu ǹ kunɑ bɑ ɑfɔ bɔm jinɑ. Mirɑndiyom hinne no ǹ du Kpe Yesu mɑɑ gɑɑ.
44008017	Sɑɑ di no Piɛɛ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ nɑ kɑmbɛ yom dɛcɛ ǹ bɔm, cɔfɔ ǹ du Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ.
44008018	Sɑɑ kɑ Simɔ di Ikpɛ nɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ no diyɑ yom kɑmbɛ yom dɛcɛyom gɑɑ, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ nooru boobo sɛllɛ Piɛɛ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ sɛ.
44008019	À cii: Wom mɑ ɑ no hini wɔ domi bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bɔm ɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ, ɑkpɛ mɑ du Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ.
44008020	Piɛɛ bine cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ni ndɑ n nooru kulu mɑ hɑlɑci, domi n tɑmmɑ n hini kɑ Ikpɛ noyom dei no ndɑ hɑibɑrikɑ boobo.
44008021	N sindɑ bɑ, n sindɑ hɛ kulu ɑsiiri wɔ kunɑ zɑmɑ n bine mɑnɑ sɑbɑ Ikpɛ jine.
44008022	Ngɑ di sɛ, n mɑ tuubi kɑ bɛrɛ n hɑnyɑ fute sɛ. N mɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ Ikpɛ gɑɑ ɑ̀ mɑ n yɑɑfɑ ndɑ n bine lɑsɑbu yom de ɑ̀ go bɑɑ.
44008023	A gɑ di n gundɑ hɑnyɑ fute hɔɔtɔ zɑngɑ tee. N goono mo zɑm kɑ cɛsusu kuse kunɑ.
44008024	Simɔ tu kɑ cii: Wom mɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ sɛ Kpe dɔ hɛ kɑ wom cii wɔ bɑ ɑfɔ mɑ si tɔ hɛɛ.
44008025	Piɛɛ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ tɛ sɛdɑ kɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ cii. Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ go ye Yerusɑlɛm, ǹ go Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu tɛ Sɑmɑri lɑɑbu kpɑɑrɑ kɑmbu yom sɛ.
44008026	Kpe ŋmɔne dɔntɔneize fɔ sendi Filipu sɛ. À cii: N mɑ tunu kɑ kpei weenukɑne sɛ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ hɛrɛ fɔndɑ bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ go hunu zɑ Yerusɑlɛm kɑ kɑɑ Gɑzɑ lɑɑbu. Gɑnji fɔndɔ nɑ.
44008027	Filipu tunu kɑ kpei. Gunɑ, ɑ̀ di bɔrɔ fɔ fɔndɑ bɔm. Etopi lɑɑbu bɔrɔ no, mɑntɑm fɔ nɑ. Gɑɑbikoni mɑ nɑ Kɑndɑtɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Etopi weibɔrɔ gɑndɑkpɛ cire. Ngɑ yɑ go lɑɑkɑli ndɑ Etopi gɑndɑkpɛ ŋmɔne hɑibɑrikɑ kulu. À kɑɑ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi.
44008028	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go ye ngɑ kpɑɑrɑ, ɑ̀ gɔrɔ ngɑ tɔrɔkɔ kunɑ ko tirɑ kɑ ɑndebi Esɑyi hɑntum coo.
44008029	Cɔfɔ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ sendi Filipu sɛ kɑ cii: Kpei, mɑɑni tɔrɔkɔ di gɑɑ.
44008030	Filipu zuuru kɑ kpei ɑ̀ dɔ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Etopi bɔrɔ di go tirɑ kɑ ɑndebi Esɑyi hɑntum coo. À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N gɑ fɑhɑm ndɑ hɛ kɑ n gɑ coo bɑ?
44008031	Bɔrɔ di tu kɑ cii: Mɛtɛ ɑ tɛ kɑ fɑhɑm de bɔrɔ fɔ mɑnɑ ɑ cɛbɛ? À bine nɑ Filipu cɛɛ ɑ̀ mɑ hurɑ ko gɔrɔ ngɑ jɛrɛ gɑɑ.
44008032	Ikpɛ tirɑ di kunɑ nungu kɑ ɑ̀ go coo neyɑ: "Ǹ kpeindɑɑ̀ wiyom dɔ zɑngɑ feeji. Zɑngɑ feejiize kɑ ɑ̀ go dɛnjɛ ɑ̀ cobukɔ jine, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ngɑ mee feeri.
44008033	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ cɛnɑndi, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ du ciiti, cimi ŋmɔne. Mee yɑ gɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ yom bɑɑru deede zɑmɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hundi kɑɑ hɑndunyɑ?"
44008034	Bɔrɔ mɑntɑm di cii Filipu sɛ: A gɑ n hã, mee bɔm nɑ ɑndebi go sendi yɑ wɔ dimi? À go sendi ngɑ bɔm nɑ dee, wɑlɑ bɔrɔ fɔ ŋmɑni bɔm no?
44008035	À gɑɑ nɑ Filipu nɑ mee feeri kɑ sinti ɑ̀ sɛ ndɑ Ikpɛ sendi ngɑ di. À nɑ Yesu bɑɑru wɑɑzu tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ.
44008036	Kɑ ǹ gɑ kpei fɔndɔ bɔm, cɔfɔ ǹ fɑku hɑri fɔ gɑɑ. Bɔrɔ mɑntɑm di cii: Gunɑ, hɑri go. Ifɔ yɑ gɑnji ǹ mɑ ɑ mirɑndi? [
44008037	Filipu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: De n go nɑɑne ndɑ n bine kulu, ɑ̀ tɛ. Bɔrɔ mɑntɑm di tu kɑ cii: A go nɑɑne kɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ yɑ ci Ikpɛ Ize."
44008038	Filipu nɑ mei no ǹ mɑ tɔrɔkɔ di cɛɑndi. Ngɑ ndɑɑ̀ zumbu hɑri di kunɑ. Filipu nɑ ɑ̀ mirɑndi.
44008039	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ hunu hɑri di kunɑ, Ikpɛ Biyɑ nɑ Filipu zɑɑ. Mɑntɑm di mɑnɑ di ɑ̀ kpɛɛnɛ, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ diro tɛ ndɑ fɑihã.
44008040	Cɔfɔ Filipu go Azotu wɑngɑrɑ. Zɑ wɑngɑrɑ di ɑ̀ nɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu tɛ kpɑɑrɑ kulu sɛ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ tɔ Kɑsɑriɑ wɑngɑrɑ.
44009001	Ammɑ Sɑuli mɑnɑ cɛ ndɑ sendi futu yom kɑ cii ǹ mɑ Kpe coobɑɑbɑize yom wi. À kpei gɑrɑndikɔ beeri dɔ.
44009002	À nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ ngɑ no tirɑ yom Dɑmɑku Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu yom sɛ. À ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ nɑm de ɑ̀ du Yesu fɔndɔ gɑnɑkɔ yom, hɑibɔrɔ yom wɑlɑ weibɔrɔ yom, ɑ̀ mɑ ǹ hɔ kɑ kpeindei Yerusɑlɛm.
44009003	À tɛ mo ɑ̀ goono fɔndɔ bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ go mɑɑni Dɑmɑku wɑngɑrɑ. Mefɔ mefɔ kɑɑri hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ kɑ tɛ mɑɑle ɑ̀ hundɑntɛ.
44009004	Sɑuli kɑm gɑndɑ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ mɑɑ jinde fɔ go sendi ngɑ sɛ kɑ cii: Sɑuli, Sɑuli ifɔ sɛ no n go kɑ ɑ guruguzɑndi?
44009005	À tu kɑ cii: Ni no mee, Kpe? Kpe mo cii: Hɛɛ no Yesu di kɑ n go guruguzɑndi. À gɑɑbu n sɛ n mɑ gooru yom hɛ zi.
44009006	Sɑuli gɑ gɑsi ndɑ mɑmɑci. À cii: Kpe, ifɔ no n go bɑɑ yɑ tɛ? Kpe mo cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Tunu kɑ huro wɑngɑrɑ wɔ kunɑ. Nodi no ǹ cii n sɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ himɑ n mɑ tɛ.
44009007	Ammɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ dum, mɑmɑci nɑ ǹ dii mee gɑɑ. Ǹ go mɑɑ jindɑ ɑmmɑ ǹ mɑnɑ di bɔrɔ fɔ kulu.
44009008	Ǹ nɑ Sɑuli tunɑndi hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ cɛ. À moo yom feeri ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ di bɔrɔ fɔ kulu. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ dii kɑ ɑ̀ cendi kɑlɑ Dɑmɑku wɑngɑrɑ.
44009009	À tɛ jiribi hinzɑ ɑ̀ si di, ɑ̀ si ŋmɑɑ, ɑ̀ si hɑm.
44009010	Coobɑɑbɑize fɔ goono Dɑmɑku wɑngɑrɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Anɑni. Kpe sendi ɑ̀ sɛ diyom kunɑ kɑ cii: Anɑni. Anɑni tu kɑ cii: Kpe, hɛɛ neyɑ.
44009011	Kpe cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Tunu kɑ kpei fɔndɑ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Cɛɑntɛ dɔ. N mɑ Tɑlisu bɔrɔ di ceeci kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Sɑuli. À goono Yudɑ fuu kunɑ ko kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ.
44009012	Diyom kunɑ Sɑuli di bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Anɑni go huro kɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ ngɑ bɔm ngɑ mɑ du kɑ di.
44009013	Anɑni tu kɑ cii: Kpe, ɑ mɑɑ bɔrɔ boobo dɔ hɛ lɑlɔ kulu kɑ bɔrɔ di tɛ n hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kɑ ǹ goono Yerusɑlɛm sɛ.
44009014	Bɑ nee mo bine ɑ̀ gundɑ hini gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom dɔ kɑ beerem kulu hɔ kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ n mɑɑ cɛɛ.
44009015	Ammɑ Kpe cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpei, domi bɔrɔ di gbei jiine suubɑntɛ no kɑ ɑ suubɑ ɑ̀ mɑ kpeindɑ ɑ mɑɑ dimi cindei jine ndɑ gɑndɑkpɛ yom jine ndɑ Isirɑilɑ ize yom jine.
44009016	A gɑ ɑ̀ cɛbɛ tɑɑbi bɑɑbɑ kɑ tilɑsi ɑ̀ mɑ hɑm ɑ mɑɑ sɑbu sɛ.
44009017	Anɑni hunu kɑ kpei. À hurɑ fuu di kunɑ kɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ Sɑuli bɔm. À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A nyɑize Sɑuli, Kpe Yesu di kɑ ɑ̀ fɑitɑ n sɛ fɔndɑ bɔm kɑ n gɑnɑ kɑ kɑɑ, yɑ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔm n mɑ du kɑ di. N mɑ tɔ mo ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ.
44009018	Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ mɑ hɛ fɔ zɑngɑ kpɑitɑ hunu Sɑuli moo yom kunɑ kɑ kɑm gɑndɑ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ du kɑ di kpɛɛnɛ. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ tunu. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ mirɑndi mo.
44009019	À ŋmɑɑ mo, ɑ̀ gɑɑbi ye ɑ̀ gɑɑ. À gɑɑ nɑ, ɑ̀ tɛ jiribi fɔ yom coobɑɑbɑize yom bɑndɑ kɑ ǹ goono Dɑmɑku wɑngɑrɑ.
44009020	Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ huro Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu yom kunɑ kɑ Mɛsiyɑ bɑɑru fɛɛ. À go cii Yesu yɑ Ikpɛ Ize no.
44009021	Beerem kulu kɑ ǹ go mɑɑ ɑ̀ sendi yom mɑmɑci. Ǹ gɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kpɛ yɑ gɑ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ di beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ Yesu mɑɑ cɛɛ hɑlɑci. À kɑɑ nee mo zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ǹ hɔ kɑ kpeindei gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom dɔ. À nɑ ci cimi nɑ bɑ?
44009022	Ammɑ Sɑuli go gɑɑbi dɑm kɑ tɔntɔnu. À go tɑbɑtɑndi kɑ Yesu wɔ Mɛsiyɑ nɑ. À gɑ sendi kɑlɑ Yuifu yom kɑ ǹ goono Dɑmɑku wɑngɑrɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ sindɑ ngei bɔm.
44009023	Kɑ jiribi boobo bisɑ, Yuifu yom nɑ meetosi tɛ ngei gɑme ngei mɑ ɑ̀ wi.
44009024	Ammɑ ǹ meetosɑ bɑɑru tɔ Sɑuli dɔ. Ciini ndɑ zɑɑri ǹ gɑ wɑngɑrɑ di hundi mee yom bɑtu ngei mɑ ɑ̀ wi sɛ.
44009025	Ammɑ hɑnu fɔ ciini coobɑɑbɑize yom nɑ Sɑuli zɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ zumɑndi yɛmbɛ bɑndɑ cilɑ beeri fɔ kunɑ.
44009026	Sɑɑ kɑ Sɑuli tɔ Yerusɑlɛm ɑ̀ ceeci ngɑ mɑ huro coobɑɑbɑize yom kunɑ ɑmmɑ ǹ kulu go hɑmburɑ̀. Ǹ si nɑɑne hɑli ngɑ mɑ coobɑɑbɑize nɑ.
44009027	Ammɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ nɑ ɑ̀ boi ko kpeindɑɑ̀ diyɑ yom dɔ. Bɑɑnɑbɑ deede ǹ sɛ zɑngɑ Sɑuli di Kpe fɔndɑ bɔm. À deede ǹ sɛ zɑngɑ Kpe sendi ɑ̀ sɛ ndɑ zɑngɑ Sɑuli wɑɑzu Yesu mɑɑ gɑɑ Dɑmɑku bɔrɔ yom sɛ ndɑ yɑrutɛrɛ.
44009028	Sɑuli gɔrɔ gɑnɑkɔ yom bɑndɑ ko kpei ko ye Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ. À go sendi Kpe Yesu mɑɑ gɑɑ ndɑ yɑrutɛrɛ.
44009029	À sendi kɑ kɑkɔ ndɑ Yuifu yom kɑ ǹ cini Gɑrɛku cinɛ sendi. Ammɑ ngei wɔ ceeci ngei mɑ ɑ̀ wi.
44009030	Sɑɑ kɑ nyɑizei mo bei yɑ di, ǹ nɑ Sɑuli dum kɑ kpeindɑɑ̀ Kɑsɑriɑ wɑngɑrɑ zɑmɑ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔm Tɑlisu kpɑɑrɑ.
44009031	Cɔfɔ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ yom kɑ ǹ goono Yude lɑɑbu ndɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu ndɑ Sɑmɑri lɑɑbu, ǹ kulu du lɑɑkɑli kɑne. Ǹ go nɑɑne cini ko dirɑ Kpe hɑmbure kunɑ. Ǹ go tɔntɔnu mo Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ yɑmɑrɑndiyom gɑɑ.
44009032	À kɑɑ tɔ Piɛɛ go kpɑɑrɑ kɑmbu yom yɑɑli. À kpei hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom mo dɔ kɑ ǹ goono Lidɑ kpɑɑrɑ.
44009033	Kpɑɑrɑ di kunɑ no ɑ̀ nɑ bɔrɔ fɔ gɑru kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Ene. Jiiri ɑhɑku ɑ̀ go kɑni ngɑ dɑɑri bɔm domi ɑ̀ cee ndɑ ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ bu.
44009034	Piɛɛ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ene, Yesu Mɛsiyɑ go kɑ n no bɑɑni. Tunu kɑ n kɑni dɔ hinsɑ. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ tunu kɑ cɛ.
44009035	Lidɑ bɔrɔ yom ndɑ Sɑrɔ lɑɑbu bɔrɔ yom kulu di ɑ̀. Ǹ bɛrɛ mo kɑ Kpe gɑnɑ.
44009036	Yopɑ kpɑɑrɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom kunɑ nɑ weibɔrɔ fɔ goono kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Tɑbitɑ. À mɑɑ di feeriji yɑ ci Dokɑsɑ. À cini gbei hinno ndɑ sɑrɑɑ bɑɑbɑ tɛ.
44009037	Sɑɑ di nɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ bɑɑni kɑ bu. Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ nyume kɑ beeni, ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ jisi jidɑmbisɑ fɔ kunɑ.
44009038	Zɑ kɑ Lidɑ kpɑɑrɑ mɑɑni Yopɑ kpɑɑrɑ, coobɑɑbɑize yom du Piɛɛ bɑɑru kɑ ɑ̀ goono Lidɑ. Ǹ nɑ bɔrɔ hinkɑ dɔntɔm ɑ̀ dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑ ngei dɔ ndɑ wɑɑsi.
44009039	Piɛɛ tunu kɑ beerem di gɑnɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ Yopɑ kpɑɑrɑ, ǹ kpeindɑɑ̀ jidɑmbisɑ kunɑ. Sokoni yom kulu go hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hundi. Ǹ go Piɛɛ cɛbɛ kpɛ yom ndɑ jiine yom kɑ Dokɑsɑ tɛ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono ǹ bɑndɑ.
44009040	Piɛɛ bine nɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑɑ tɛrɛ. À bɑndɑ ɑ̀ sɔmbu kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ bɛrɛ bukɔɑ dɔ hɛrɛ kɑ cii: Tɑbitɑ, tunu. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ moo yom feeri. Kɑ ɑ̀ di Piɛɛ, ɑ̀ tunu kɑ gɔrɔ.
44009041	Piɛɛ nɑ kɑmbɛ no ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ dii kɑ tunɑndi. À nɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom ndɑ sokoni yom cɛɛ kɑ ɑ̀ cɛbɛ ǹ sɛ bɑhunɑ.
44009042	Yopɑ kpɑɑrɑ bɔrɔ yom kulu mɑɑ bɑɑru di. Bɔrɔ boobo mo nɑɑne Kpe gɑɑ.
44009043	Piɛɛ nɑ jiribi boobo tɛ Yopɑ kpɑɑrɑ kunɑ kuuru wikɔ fɔ dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Simɔ.
44010001	Bɔrɔ goono Kɑsɑriɑ wɑngɑrɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Koniliyu. Ngɑ yɑ ci wɑnguize yom jinehune fɔ wɑnguize yom sɛtɛ fɔ kunɑ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Itɑli ŋmɔne.
44010002	Bɔrɔ di bine Ikpɛ gɑnɑkɔ hinno no kɑ ɑ̀ hɑmburu Ikpɛ, ngɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ fuu kulu. À go sɑrɑɑ bɑɑbɑ tɛ jɑmɑ gɑɑ. À gɑ kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ mɑ Ikpɛ gɑɑ hɑnu kulu.
44010003	À goono zɑɑri guuru hinzɑ zɑkɑ, cɔfɔ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize fɔ fɑitɑ ɑ̀ sɛ tɛrɛkpɑrɛ. À hurɑ ɑ̀ dɔ kɑ cii: Koniliyu.
44010004	Koniliyu gunɑ. Hɑmburu nɑ ɑ̀ dii mɑ. À cii: A jinɑ, ifɔ no? Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N ŋmɔne ɑduwɑ yom ndɑ n sɑrɑɑ yom tɔ bɛɛnɛ hɑli Ikpɛ hɔngɔ ǹ gɑɑ.
44010005	Mɑɑsɑ bine n mɑ beerem dɔntɔm Yopɑ kpɑɑrɑ kɑ Simɔ cɛɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Piɛɛ.
44010006	À goono Simɔ kuuru wikɔ kpɑɑrɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ fuu goono tɛku mee gɑɑ. À kɑɑ cii n sɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ himɑ n mɑ tɛ.
44010007	Sɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di sendi ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ dirɑ, Koniliyu nɑ ngɑ gbeiize hinkɑ cɛɛ ndɑ wɑnguize fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go tɑmtɛrɛ ɑ̀ sɛ. Sojɑ mo Ikpɛ gɑnɑkɔ nɑ.
44010008	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ hɛ kulu deede ǹ sɛ, ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ dɔntɔm Yopɑ kpɑɑrɑ.
44010009	À mɑ bɑ, ǹ goono fɔndɔ bɔm kɑ mɑɑni kpɑɑrɑ gɑɑ. Lɔkɑci ngɑ di zɑngɑ zɑɑri bindi cine, Piɛɛ tunu kɑ kɑɑru fuuɑ bɔm kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ.
44010010	À mɑɑ hɛrɛɛ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ gɑ bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ ŋmɑɑ. Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ beerem gɑ ŋmɑɑri tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ, Ikpɛ nɑ Piɛɛ lɑɑkɑli zɑɑ.
44010011	À di bɛɛnɛ go feerɑntɛ. À di hɛ fɔ zɑngɑ tɑɑfɛ bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ go zumbu. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ cɛnjɛ tɑɑci dii ko kɑ ɑ̀ zumɑndi gɑndɑ.
44010012	Cee tɑɑcikpɛ dimi kulu ndɑ gɑnjihɑm yom ndɑ nɑrɑntɛ yom ndɑ bɛɛnɛ fɑtɑkpɛ yom goono ɑ̀ kunɑ.
44010013	Jinde fɔ mo sendi Piɛɛ sɛ kɑ cii: Piɛɛ, tunu kɑ wi kɑ ŋmɑɑ.
44010014	Ammɑ Piɛɛ cii: À mɑnɑ ci yɑ no, Kpe. Yɑ nɑ hɛ fɔ ŋmɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɑlɑli wɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ziibi bɑ ce fɔ.
44010015	Jindɑ ye kɑ kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ ce hinkɑntɛ kɑ cii: Hɛ kɑ Ikpɛ hinnɑndi n mɑ si cii ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɑlɑli.
44010016	Ngɑ di tɛ hɑli ce hinzɑ. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ǹ nɑ hɛ di kɑ ɑ̀ himɑ tɑɑfɛ cendi kɑ ye ndɑɑ̀ bɛɛnɛ.
44010017	Piɛɛ go biti ko lɑsɑbu ngɑ bine kunɑ ndɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ngɑ diyom kɑ ɑ̀ di feeriji. Ammɑ lɔkɑci ngɑ di, beerem kɑ Koniliyu dɔntɔm kɑɑ. Ǹ jinɑ kɑ Simɔ hundi hã. Ǹ go cɛ hundɑ mee gɑɑ.
44010018	Ǹ nɑ beerem cɛɛ kɑ ǹ hã hɑli Simɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Piɛɛ goono fuu.
44010019	Bine zɑ Piɛɛ go lɑsɑbu ndɑ diyomɑ, Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Gunɑ, bɔrɔ hinzɑ go kɑ n hã.
44010020	N mɑ zumbu gɑndɑ kɑ ǹ gɑnɑ. N mɑ si hɛ fɔ kulu siikɑ domi hɛɛ yɑ nɑ ǹ dɔntɔm.
44010021	Piɛɛ mɑ zumbu gɑndɑ kɑ kpei beerem kɑ Koniliyu dɔntɔm dɔ. À cii ǹ sɛ: Gunɑ, hɛɛ neyɑ. Hɛɛ yɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ wom gɑ hã di. Ifɔ yɑ ci wom kɑɑyom wɔ sɑbɑbu?
44010022	Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Koniliyu, wɑnguize yom jinehune fɔ, bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu nɑ, ɑ̀ sɑbɑ, ɑ̀ gɑ hɑmburu Ikpɛ. À gundɑ sɛdɑ hinno mɑ Yuifu dimi kulu dɔ. Ikpɛ yɑ sendi ɑ̀ sɛ ngɑ dɔntɔneize hɑlɑɑlɑ fɔ gɑɑ. À cii ɑ̀ mɑ n cɛɛ n mɑ kɑɑ ɑ̀ kpɑɑrɑ ɑ̀ mɑ du kɑ mɑɑ bɑɑru n dɔ.
44010023	Piɛɛ nɑ ǹ hurɑndi kɑ ǹ nɑ zumbuyom dɔ. À mɑ bɑ ɑ̀ tunu kɑ ǹ gɑnɑ kɑ kpei. Yopɑ kpɑɑrɑ nyɑize fɔ yom mɑ nɑ ǹ dum.
44010024	À mɑ yɑrɑ kɑ bɑ, ǹ hurɑ Kɑsɑriɑ wɑngɑrɑ. Koniliyu mɑ gɑ kɑ ǹ bɑtu. À nɑ ngɑ fuuize yom ndɑ ngɑ kpɑɑsi yom meigu.
44010025	Sɑɑ kɑ Piɛɛ tɔ kɑ hurɑ, Koniliyu nɑ ɑ̀ kube. À jɛndɛbiri ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi.
44010026	Ammɑ Piɛɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N mɑ tunu kɑ cɛ n cee gɑɑ domi hɛɛ mɑ bɔrɔ nɑ zɑngɑ ni.
44010027	Kɑ Piɛɛ go sendi ndɑ Koniliyu, ǹ huro hundi kunɑ. Piɛɛ di beerem meigu bututu.
44010028	A cii ǹ sɛ: Wom bumbum bei ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɑlɑli Yuifu mɑ kpɑɑsitɛrɛ tɛ ndɑ dimi ŋmɑni wɑlɑ kɑ hurɑ ɑ̀ hundi kunɑ. Ammɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ cɛbɛ yɑ si cii bɔrɔ mɑnɑ hɑlɑli wɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ jisi ziibɑntɛ.
44010029	Ngɑ di sɛ mo no ɑ kɑɑ. Yɑ nɑ hungu sɑɑ kɑ wom nɑ ɑ cɛɛ. A gɑ wom hã mo, sɑbɑbu fɔ sɛ nɑ wom nɑ ɑ cɛɛ?
44010030	Koniliyu bine cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Jiribi tɑɑci kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ zɑngɑ mɑɑsɑncine wiciri guuru hinzɑ zɑkɑ, ɑ nɑ meehɔ zɑɑ kɑ kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ ɑ fuu kunɑ. Cɔfɔ ɑ di bɔrɔ fɔ kɑɑ cɛ ɑ jine ndɑ jiine kpɑrɛ tɑi tɑi.
44010031	À cii: Koniliyu, Ikpɛ mɑɑ n ŋmɔne ɑduwɑ. À hɔngɔ n sɑrɑɑ tɛyom mɑ.
44010032	Mɑɑsɑ n mɑ bɔrɔ fɔ dɔntɔm Yopɑ kpɑɑrɑ kɑ Simɔ cɛɛ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Piɛɛ. À goono Simɔ kuuru wikɔ kpɑɑrɑ tɛku mee gɑɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ n dɔ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ sendi n sɛ.
44010033	Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ nɑ bɔrɔ dɔntɔm ɑ̀ mɑ n cɛɛ. Ni mɑ, ɑ̀ boori kɑ n kɑɑ wɔ. Mɑɑsɑ bine i bɔrɔ kulu neyɑ Ikpɛ jine zɑmɑ i mɑ hɑngɑ dɑm n sɛ. I mɑ mɑɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ bɔm Kpe nɑ n nɑ mei.
44010034	Piɛɛ bine nɑ ngɑ mee feeri kɑ cii: Cimi nɑ, ɑ di Ikpɛ wɔ si bɑɑbɑɑ tɛ.
44010035	Ammɑ hɑndunyɑ dimi kulu kunɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hɑmburu Ikpɛ kɑ cɛyom susu gbei tɛ, ɑkpɛ wɔ Ikpɛ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɑ.
44010036	Wom gɑ Sendɑ bei kɑ ɑ̀ ci Bɑɑru Hinnɑ kɑ Ikpɛ sɑmbɑ Isirɑilɑ ize yom sɛ. Ǹ gɑ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ di wɑɑzu tɛ kɑ cii lɑɑkɑli kɑne hunu Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ǹ kulu Kpe.
44010037	Wom bumbum bei hɛ kɑ tɛ Yude lɑɑbu kulu kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sinti zɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu fɛɛyom kɑ Yohɑnnɑ tɛ mirɑndiyom bɔm bɑndɑ.
44010038	Wom bei mɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ nɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ ndɑ dɑbɑri zumɑndi Yesu Nɑzɑrɛtu bɔm. À yɑɑli mɑ kɑ gbei hinno tɛ. À no beerem kulu mo kɑ Ibilisi gundɑ dɑbɑri ǹ bɔm no bɑɑni, domi Ikpɛ goono Yesu bɑndɑ.
44010039	I yom yɑ ci sɛdɑ yom ndɑ hɛ kulu kɑ Yesu tɛ Yuifu yom lɑɑbu kunɑ ndɑ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ kunɑ. Ǹ nɑ Yesu kɑnji bundu gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ wi.
44010040	Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi jiribi hinzɑntɛ hine. À tu mo ɑ̀ mɑ hunutɛrɛ.
44010041	À mɑnɑ ci jɑmɑ kulu sɛ nɑ ɑ̀ hunutɛrɛ bo ɑmmɑ sɛdɑ yom sɛ kɑ Ikpɛ jinɑ kɑ suubɑ. I yom mɑ kɑ i ŋmɑɑ kɑ hɑm ndɑ ɑ̀ tunuyom bukɔei gɑme bɑndɑ, ɑ̀ hunutɛrɛ i sɛ.
44010042	Yesu nɑ i no mei i mɑ bɑɑru di fɛɛ jɑmɑ sɛ. I mɑ tɛ sɛdɑ mo kɑ ngɑ yɑ ci Bɔrɔ kɑ Ikpɛ jisi ɑ̀ mɑ ci hundikoni yom ndɑ bukɔ yom ciitikɔ.
44010043	Andebi yom kulu go tɛ sɛdɑ kɑ cii ɑ̀ mɑɑ dɔ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ, ɑkpɛ du dulum yɑɑfɑyom.
44010044	Kɑ Piɛɛ goono sendɑ gɑɑ, Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ zumbu bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go mɑɑ sendɑ bɔm.
44010045	Beerem kɑ ǹ du bɑngudɑmyom, wɑtom Yuifu yom, wɔ kɑ yom go nɑɑne Yesu gɑɑ goono Piɛɛ bɑndɑ. Ǹ kulu mɑmɑci domi ǹ di Ikpɛ nɑ dimi cindei no Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ zɑngɑ noyom kɑ ɑ̀ zumɑndi ǹ bɔm mɑ.
44010046	Ǹ go ngɑ di bei zɑmɑ ǹ gɑ mɑɑ ǹ go sendi ndɑ cinɛ ŋmɑni ŋmɑni ko kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi.
44010047	À gɑɑ nɑ Piɛɛ tu kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ fɔ hini kɑ gɑnji ǹ mɑ beerem wɔ mirɑndi bɑ zɑ kɑ ǹ du Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ zɑngɑ i yom?
44010048	Piɛɛ bine nɑ ǹ nɑ mei kɑ cii ǹ mɑ ǹ mirɑndi Yesu Mɛsiyɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ. Ǹ nɑ Piɛɛ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ gɔrɔ ngei dɔ jiribi yom.
44011001	Diyɑ yom ndɑ nyɑize yom kɑ ǹ goono Yude lɑɑbu mɑɑ bɑɑru dimi cindei mɑ nɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ tɑ.
44011002	Sɑɑ kɑ Piɛɛ kpei Yerusɑlɛm nge yom kɑ ǹ go dɑmbɑngu fɔndɔ gɑnɑ, ǹ nɑ kɑkɔ tɛ ndɑ Piɛɛ.
44011003	Ǹ cii: N huro kɑ ŋmɑɑ ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ci dɑmbɑnguize yom.
44011004	Ammɑ Piɛɛ nɑ sendi feeri ǹ sɛ zɑ ɑ̀ sintiyom.
44011005	À cii: Yopɑ kpɑɑrɑ no ɑ goono ko kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ. Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ lɑɑkɑli zɑɑ kɑlɑ ɑ di diyom fɔ. A di hɛ fɔ zɑngɑ tɑɑfɛ bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ cɛnjɛ tɑɑci dii. À go zumbu zɑ bɛɛnɛ ko kɑɑ ɑ dɔ.
44011006	Bine, sɑɑ kɑ ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ gunɑ, ɑ nɑ lɑɑkɑli dɑm mo. Cɔfɔ ɑ di gɑndɑ cee tɑɑcikpɛ yom ndɑ gɑnjihɑm yom ndɑ nɑrɑntɛ yom ndɑ bɛɛnɛ fɑtɑkpɛ yom.
44011007	Cɔfɔ ɑ mɑɑ jinde fɔ gɑ cii ɑ sɛ: Piɛɛ, tunu. N mɑ wi kɑ ŋmɑɑ.
44011008	Ammɑ ɑ cii: À nɑ ci yɑ no Kpe, zɑmɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɑlɑli wɑlɑ hɛ ziibɔ mɑnɑ huro ɑ mee bɑ ce fɔ.
44011009	Cɔfɔ jinde fɔ tu ɑ sɛ. À hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ ce hinkɑntɛ kɑ cii: Hɛ kɑ Ikpɛ hinnɑndi, n mɑ si cii ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɑlɑli.
44011010	Jinde ngɑ di tɛ hɑli ce hinzɑ. Cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ tɑɑfɛ di cendi kɑ ye ndɑɑ̀ bɛɛnɛ kpɛɛnɛ.
44011011	Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ bɔrɔ hinzɑ fɔ kɑ ǹ dɔntɔm zɑ Kɑsɑriɑ wɑngɑrɑ kɑɑ cɛ hundi mee gɑɑ, hundi kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ɑ goono.
44011012	Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ mɑ cii ɑ sɛ yɑ ǹ gɑnɑ kɑ kpei. A mɑ si hɛ fɔ kulu siikɑ mɑ. Nyɑize idu di kpei ɑ bɑndɑ. I huro mo Koniliyu fuu kunɑ.
44011013	À deede i sɛ zɑngɑ ngɑ di Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize fɔ go cɛ ngɑ fuu kunɑ kɑ cii: N mɑ beerem dɔntɔm Yopɑ kpɑɑrɑ. Ǹ mɑ Simɔ cɛɛ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Piɛɛ.
44011014	Ngɑ mɑ, ɑ̀ sendi yom cii kɑ ǹ gɑɑ n du fɑɑbɑ, ni ndɑ n fuu kulu.
44011015	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ sinti kɑ sendi ǹ sɛ, cɔfɔ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ zumbu ǹ bɔm zɑngɑ ɑ̀ zumbu i bɔm sintine gɑɑ.
44011016	A bine hɔngɔ Kpe Sendɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ cii: Cimi no Yohɑnnɑ mirɑndi ndɑ hɑri. Ammɑ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ no ǹ kɑɑ wom mirɑndi.
44011017	Zɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ nɑ noyom nge yom kɑ ǹ nɑɑne Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gɑɑ zɑngɑ i yom, mee yɑ ci hɛɛ hɑli yɑ hungu Ikpɛ sɛ?
44011018	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ mɑɑ sendi nge yom di ǹ dɛnjɛ. Ǹ nɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi kɑ cii: Cimi nɑ, Ikpɛ nɑ dimi cindei mo no tuubiyom ǹ mɑ du hundi.
44011019	Guruguze kɑ ɑ̀ tunu Tifɑnu sɑbu sɛ nɑ Mɛsiyɑ gɑnɑkɔ yom seesee. Afɔ yom kpei hɑli Finiciɑ lɑɑbu ndɑ Kuburu hɔndɛ tɑɑsi ndɑ Antiɔku wɑngɑrɑ. Ǹ gɑ wɑɑzu Ikpɛ Sendɑ bɔm Yuifu yom hinne sɛ.
44011020	Ammɑ ǹ kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom goono kɑ ǹ ci Kuburu ndɑ Sileni bɔrɔ yom. Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ tɔ Antiɔku wɑngɑrɑ ǹ sendi Gɑrɛku yom sɛ kɑ Kpe Yesu bɑɑru fɛɛ ǹ sɛ.
44011021	Kpe kɑmbɛ dɑbɑri mo goono ǹ bɑndɑ. À sɛ no bɔrɔ boobo nɑɑne kɑ bɛrɛ Kpe dɔ.
44011022	Bɑɑru ngɑ di kpei hɑli Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ. Ngei mo nɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ dɔntɔm ɑ̀ mɑ kpei hɑli Antiɔku wɑngɑrɑ.
44011023	Sɑɑ kɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ tɔ Antiɔku, ɑ̀ di gomini kɑ Ikpɛ no gɑnɑkɔ yom sɛ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ fɑihã. À nɑ ǹ kulu no himmɑ kɑ cii ǹ mɑ gɔrɔ nɑɑnekpɛ yom Kpe sɛ ndɑ bine fɔ.
44011024	Bɑɑnɑbɑ wɔ bɔrɔ hinno no. À tɔ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ ndɑ nɑɑne. Bɔrɔ bɑɑbɑ mɑ tɔntɔnu Kpe gɑɑ.
44011025	Bɑɑnɑbɑ bine hunu kɑ kpei Tɑlisu wɑngɑrɑ kɑ Sɑuli ceeci.
44011026	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ di ɑ̀, Bɑɑnɑbɑ kɑɑndɑɑ̀ Antiɔku. À kɑɑ tɔ ǹ go meigu cɛrɛ bɑndɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ kunɑ kɑlɑ jiiri fɔ sukutum. Ǹ nɑ bɔrɔ boobo cooɑndi. Antiɔku wɑngɑrɑ nɑ ǹ sinti kɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom nɑ mɑɑ Mɛsiyɑ yom.
44011027	Jiribi nge yom di kunɑ ɑndebi yom mo hunu zɑ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ kɑ kɑɑ Antiɔku wɑngɑrɑ.
44011028	Ǹ kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Agɑbo tunu kɑ cɛ. À nɑ bɑɑru nɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ gɑɑ kɑ hɛrɛɛ bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ kɑɑ tɛ lɑɑbu yom kulu kunɑ. Hɛrɛɛ di bine jinɑ kɑ tɛ Kolodu Kɑisɑ zɑmɑni kunɑ.
44011029	Coobɑɑbɑize yom mo ɑfɔ kulu tu ngɑ hinɑ bɔm ǹ mɑ gɑɑkɑsine sɑmbɑ nyɑize yom sɛ kɑ ǹ goono ndɑ gɔrɛ Yude lɑɑbu.
44011030	Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ mɑ. Ǹ nɑ gɑɑkɑsine di sɑmbɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom sɛ Bɑɑnɑbɑ ndɑ Sɑuli kɑmbɛ gɑɑ.
44012001	Sɑɑ ngɑ di nɑ Hirodu kɑ ɑ̀ ci gɑndɑkpɛ sinti ko Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom guruguzɑndi.
44012002	À nɑ Yɑkɔfu, Yohɑnnɑ bɛɛrɛ wi ndɑ tɑkubɑ.
44012003	Kɑ ɑ̀ di Yɑkɔfu wiyom kɑɑni Yuifu yom sɛ cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ Piɛɛ mo dii. Buuru Kɑsɑmi Si jingɑru hine no, ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ.
44012004	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Piɛɛ dii ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm kɑsu. À nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm wɑnguize yom sɛtɛ tɑɑci kɑmbɛ kunɑ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ bɑtu. Hirodu miilɑ ngɑ mɑ kpeindɑ Piɛɛ jɑmɑ jine ciitiyom sɛ Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru bɑndɑ.
44012005	Ǹ bine nɑ Piɛɛ jɛ kɑsu di kunɑ. Ammɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ go kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ Ikpɛ gɑɑ ndɑ himmɑ.
44012006	Hɑnu kɑ Hirodu bɑ kpeindɑ Piɛɛ tɛrɛ ciitiyom sɛ, ciini di kunɑ Piɛɛ go kɑni wɑnguize hinkɑ gɑme. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɔ ndɑ seseri hinkɑ. Bɑtukɔ yom mo go cɛ kɑsu fuuɑ mee gɑɑ.
44012007	Cɔfɔ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize fɔ mɑ kɑɑ cɛ Piɛɛ jɛrɛ gɑɑ. Kɑɑri bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ mɑ tɛ kɑ fuuɑ hɑɑgɑndi. Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di nɑ Piɛɛ kɑru cɔrɔ gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi. À cii: Tunu kɑ cɛ ndɑ wɑɑsi. Cɔfɔ seseri yom di kulu feeri kɑ hunu ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ yom gɑɑ.
44012008	Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N kunɑcendi hɔ kɑ n tɑɑmu yom dɑm. Piɛɛ tɛ yɑ di. À ye kɑ cii Piɛɛ sɛ: N kpɛ dɑm kɑ ɑ gɑnɑ.
44012009	Piɛɛ hunu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ. À mɑnɑ bei kɑ cimi no hɛ kɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di go tɛ, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ tɑmmɑ hɑli ngɑ gɑ hɑndiri no.
44012010	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ bisɑ bɑtukɔ sintine ndɑ ihinkɑntɛ gɑɑ ǹ tɔ guuru gɑmbu fɔ dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ wɑngɑrɑ hɛrɛ gunɑ. Gɑmbuɑ feeri ngɑ bɔm sɛ. Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di nɑ Piɛɛ dum hɑli jinɑ fɔndɔ fɔ bɔm. Cɔfɔ mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Piɛɛ tɑm.
44012011	Piɛɛ lɑɑkɑli ye ɑ̀ gɑɑ. À cii: Mɑɑsɑ ɑ bei cimi nɑ Kpe yɑ nɑ ngɑ dɔntɔneize sɑmbɑ. À nɑ ɑ kɑɑ Hirodu kɑmbɛ ndɑ hɛ kulu kɑ Yuifu yom go bɑtu ngei mɑ tɛ ɑ sɛ.
44012012	Kɑ Piɛɛ go fɑhɑm ndɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ tɔ Mɑriɑmɑ fuu. Mɑriɑmɑ wɔ Yohɑnnɑ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Mɑɑku, ɑ̀ nyɑ no. Nungu di no bɔrɔ boobo meigu ko kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ.
44012013	Sɑɑ kɑ Piɛɛ nɑ hundi mee kɑru, gbeiize hundiyo fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Lɔdɑ kɑɑ kɑ tu ɑ̀ sɛ.
44012014	Kɑ ɑ̀ bei Piɛɛ jinde no, binekɑɑne sɑbu sɛ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ meeɑ feeri ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ zuuru kɑ kpei beerem no bɑɑru. À cii: Piɛɛ go cɛ hundi mee.
44012015	Ammɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N hɔllɔ no. Ammɑ hundiyɑ wɔ cii: Cimi no Piɛɛ no. Ǹ cii: Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize no.
44012016	Ammɑ Piɛɛ mɑnɑ cɛ ndɑ hundi mee di kɑruyom. Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ hundi meeɑ feeri ǹ di ɑ̀. Cɔfɔ mɑmɑci nɑ ǹ dii.
44012017	Piɛɛ mo nɑ kɑmbɛ sombu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii ǹ mɑ dɛnjɛ. À du kɑ deede ǹ sɛ zɑngɑ dimi Kpe nɑ ngɑ kɑɑ kɑsuɑ kunɑ. À cii ǹ sɛ: Wom mɑ Yɑkɔfu ndɑ nyɑize kulu no bɑɑru. À bɑndɑ ɑ̀ hunu kɑ kpei nungu fɔ.
44012018	À mo bo, kɔsɔngu bɑmbɑtɑ tunu wɑnguize yom gɑme kɑ simbɑ ndɑ Piɛɛ zɑngɑ hɛ fɔ tɛ Piɛɛ dɔ.
44012019	Hirodu nɑ ɑ̀ ceeci ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ di ɑ̀. Bine ɑ̀ nɑ bɑtukɔ yom di hã. À nɑ mei no ǹ mɑ bɑtukɔ yom wi. Hirodu mo tunu Yude lɑɑbu kɑ kpei gɔrɔ Kɑsɑriɑ wɑngɑrɑ.
44012020	Hirodu bine tɔ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ Tiru kpɑɑrɑ bɔrɔ yom sɛ ndɑ Sidom kpɑɑrɑ bɔrɔ yom sɛ. Ammɑ ngei wɔ nɑ mefɔ tɛ kɑ kɑɑ Hirodu dɔ. Ǹ nɑ kpɑɑsitɛrɛ tɛ ndɑ Bɑlɑtusu kɑ ɑ̀ ci Hirodu yerimɑ. Ǹ go ceeci bɑɑni mɑ tɛ ngei ndɑ Hirodu gɑme zɑmɑ Hirodu lɑɑbu no ǹ lɑɑbu go du ŋmɑɑri.
44012021	Hɑnu kɑ ǹ jisi, Hirodu nɑ ngɑ kpetɛrɛ kpɛ dɑm. À gɑ gɔrɔ ciiti kɑrigɑ bɔm kɑ sendi jɑmɑ sɛ.
44012022	Beerem hiyɑ kɑ kuwɑ. Ǹ cii: À mɑnɑ ci bɔrɔ yɑ go sendi, ikpɛ fɔ yɑ gɑ sendi.
44012023	Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ Kpe dɔntɔneize fɔ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑru zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi. Nɑni yom nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ bu.
44012024	Ikpɛ Sendɑ kɑru kɑ see kɑ tɔntɔnu kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
44012025	Sɑɑ kɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ ndɑ Sɑuli nɑ ngei gbei tɔnɑndi, ǹ bɛrɛ kɑ ye Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ. Ǹ kpeindɑ Yohɑnnɑ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Mɑɑku ngei bɑndɑ.
44013001	Andebi yom ndɑ cɛbɛkɔ yom goono Antiɔku Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ kunɑ. Ngei neyɑ, Bɑɑnɑbɑ ndɑ Simeyɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Biku ndɑ Lusiɑ, Sileni bɔrɔ ndɑ Mɑnɑhim kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ biiri mefɔ ndɑ gɑndɑkpɛ Hirodu ndɑ Sɑuli.
44013002	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ go gbei tɛ Kpe sɛ ko meehɔ, cɔfɔ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ ndɑ Sɑuli kɑɑ ɑ sɛ ŋmɑni, gbei kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ nɑ ǹ cɛɛ.
44013003	Ǹ bine nɑ ngei meehɔ tɛ kɑ beeni kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ. Ǹ nɑ ngei kɑmbɛ yom dɛcɛ Bɑɑnɑbɑ ndɑ Sɑuli bɔm kɑ ǹ fee ŋmɑni Ikpɛ gbei sɛ. À gɑɑ no ǹ nɑ ǹ tɑm.
44013004	Beerem wɔ kɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔntɔm, ǹ kpei Selusiɑ kpɑɑrɑ. Zɑ Selusiɑ ǹ huro hɑrihi kɑ kpei Kuburu hɔndɛ tɑɑsi bɔm.
44013005	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ tɔ Sɑlɑmi wɑngɑrɑ, ǹ nɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ fɛɛ Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu yom kunɑ. Yohɑnnɑ mo goono ǹ bɑndɑ ko kɑ ǹ gɑɑ.
44013006	Ǹ nɑ hɔndɛ tɑɑsɑ tɑɑru kɑ bisɑ kɑlɑ Pɑfusɑ kpɑɑrɑ, nungu kɑ ǹ nɑ mondɑbɑrukpɛ fɔ gɑru. Ngɑ wɔ ɑndebi tɑngɑri tɑngɑri no kɑ ɑ̀ ci Yuifu. À mɑɑ no Bɑsuwɑ.
44013007	À goono gɑɑbikoni fɔ dɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Sejisu Pɔlu, bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ fɑhɑm. À nɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ ndɑ Pɔlu cɛɛ ngɑ mɑ mɑɑ Ikpɛ Sendi.
44013008	Elimɑ mɑɑ di feeriji yɑ ci mondɑbɑrukpɛ. À gɑ gɑɑbɑ ndei. À gɑ ceeci ngɑ mɑ gɑɑbikoni di bɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ nɑɑne fɔndɔ gɑɑ.
44013009	Ammɑ Sɑuli kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Pɔlu tɔ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ. À nɑ moo sinji ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
44013010	À cii: Ni wɔ, n tɔ ndɑ gulinci ndɑ zɑmbɑ dimi kulu. Ni yɑ Ibilisi ize no. Ǹ ci cɛyom susu kulu ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ. N si cɛ bɑ, ndɑ Ikpɛ fɔndɔ cɛɑntei siirɑndiyom?
44013011	Mɑɑsɑ bine, gunɑ Kpe kɑmbɛ nɑ n dii. N kɑɑ dɑnɑ. N si di weenu hɑli lɔkɑci fɔ. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ budɑ ndɑ kube zumbu Elimɑ bɔm. À bibiri bibiri kɑ bɔrɔ ceeci ɑ̀ mɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ dii.
44013012	Kɑ gɑɑbikonɑ di hɛ kɑ tɛ, ɑ̀ nɑɑne. À gɑ mɑmɑci ndɑ Kpe cɛbɛ.
44013013	Pɔlu bine ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ hurɑ hɑrihi Pɑfusɑ kpɑɑrɑ kɑ kɑɑ Pɛligɑ kpɑɑrɑ, Pɑmfili lɑɑbu. Yohɑnnɑ hunu ǹ bɑndɑ kɑ ye Yerusɑlɛm.
44013014	Ammɑ Pɔlu yom bisɑ Pɛligɑ kɑ kɑɑ Antiɔku Pisidiɑ lɑɑbu wɑngɑrɑ fɔ kunɑ. Ǹ hurɑ Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu kunɑ hulonzom hɑnu hine kɑ gɔrɔ.
44013015	Moisi fɔndɑ ndɑ ɑndebi yom tirɑ yom cooyom bɑndɑ, Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu jinɑ yom nɑ bɔrɔ dɔntɔm ǹ gɑɑ. Ǹ cii: Nyɑize hɑibɔrɔ yom, de wom gundɑ sendi fɔ kɑ jɑmɑ wɔ no himmɑ, wɑ ɑ̀ cii.
44013016	Pɔlu bine tunu kɑ cɛ. À nɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ sombu. À cii: Isirɑilɑ hɑibɔrɔ yom ndɑ wom dimi cindei, wom kɑ wom go hɑmburu Ikpɛ, wɑ hɑngɑ dɑm.
44013017	Isirɑilɑ jɑmɑ wɔ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ yɑ nɑ i cɛɛ yom suubɑ. À nɑ jɑmɑ wɔ mo bɛɛrɑndi sɑɑ kɑ ǹ kpei yotɛrɛ kɑ gɔrɔ Eziputu lɑɑbu. À nɑ ǹ kɑɑ Eziputu lɑɑbu ndɑ kɑmbɛ dɑbɑri.
44013018	À suuru ndei mo gɑnji kunɑ jiiri weitɑɑci.
44013019	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ dimi iye hɑlɑci Kɑnɑnɑ lɑɑbu kunɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ lɑɑbu di no ngɑ jɑmɑ sɛ ǹ mɑ tubu.
44013020	Nge yom di tɛ zɑngɑ jiiri zɑngu tɑɑci ndɑ weigu. À bɑndɑ Ikpɛ nɑ jɑmɑ di nɑ ciitikɔ yom kɑlɑ ɑndebi Sɑmuɛli wɑtɛ.
44013021	Ngɑ di bɑndɑ no, ǹ nɑ gɑndɑkpɛ ŋmɑɑrɛ. Ikpɛ mo nɑ ǹ no Sɑuli kɑ ɑ̀ ci Kisu koo, Benzɑmim dimiize fɔ. Sɑmuɛli nɑ lɑɑbu kpetɛrɛ ŋmɑɑ jiiri wei tɑɑci.
44013022	Sɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ Dɑfidi tunɑndi ǹ sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ ci gɑndɑkpɛ. Dɑfidi bɔm nɑ Ikpɛ tɛ sɛdɑ kɑ cii: A di Dɑfidi kɑ ɑ̀ ci Yɑsɑi koo, bɔrɔ no kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ ndɑ ɑ bine. À gɑ ɑ binebɑɑ kulu tɛ mɑ.
44013023	Dɑfidi bɑndɑ yom kunɑ no ɑlikɑwɑli bɔm Ikpɛ nɑ Fɑɑbɑkɔ tunɑndi Isirɑilɑ sɛ. Ngɑ yɑ ci Yesu.
44013024	Zɑ Yesu mɑnɑ kɑɑ, Yohɑnnɑ jinɑ kɑ bɑɑru fɛɛ Isirɑilɑ jɑmɑ kulu sɛ. À cii ǹ sɛ ǹ mɑ tuubi kɑ du mirɑndiyom.
44013025	Kɑ Yohɑnnɑ go kɑ ngɑ bɑtɑ beeni, ɑ̀ cii beerem sɛ: Mee nɑ wom nɑ ɑ tɑmmɑ? Yɑ nɑ ci Bɔrɔ kɑ wom tɑmmɑ. Ammɑ gunɑ ɑ bɑndɑ, bɔrɔ fɔ gɑ kɑɑ kɑ yɑ nɑ tɔ yɑ ɑ̀ tɑɑmu kɑɑ.
44013026	Nyɑize hɑibɔrɔ yom, Abulɛmɑ dimiize yom ndɑ wom dimi cindei, wom go hɑmburu Ikpɛ, wom sɛ no ǹ nɑ fɑɑbɑ sendi wɔ sɑmbɑ.
44013027	Beerem kɑ ǹ goono Yerusɑlɛm ndɑ gɔrɛ ndɑ ǹ gɑɑbikoni yom mɑnɑ Yesu bei. Ǹ mɑnɑ ɑndebi yom sendi yom kɑ ǹ go coo hulonzom hɑnu kulu bei. Ammɑ ǹ nɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ tɔnɑndi kɑ ǹ nɑ Yesu ciiti kɑ zeeri.
44013028	Ǹ mɑnɑ du hɛ lɑlɔ fɔ kulu Yesu gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ tɔ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ wi. Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu ǹ nɑ Pilɑtu ŋmɑɑrɛ kɑ cii ɑ̀ mɑ nɑm ǹ mɑ Yesu wi.
44013029	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ǹ hɑntum Yesu bɔm tɔnɑndi, ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ zumɑndi kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ bundu gɑɑrɑntɑ gɑɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm sɑɑrɛ fɔ kunɑ mo.
44013030	Ammɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi bukɔ yom gɑme.
44013031	Jiribi boobo mo nɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɔm kɑɑtɛrɛ beerem sɛ, nge yom kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ zɑ Gɑlile lɑɑbu kɑ kpei Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ. Mɑɑsɑ beerem nge yom di yɑ ci Yesu sɛdɑ yom jɑmɑ dɔ.
44013032	I yom mo, i yom yɑ go Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu tɛ wom sɛ. Bɑɑru wɔ yɑ ci ɑlikɑwɑli kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ i cɛɛ yom sɛ.
44013033	Ikpɛ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli wɔ tɔnɑndi i sɛ, i yom kɑ i ci ǹ ize yom sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Yesu tunɑndi. Ǹ nɑ wɔne hɑntum Sɑmu hinkɑntɛ kunɑ kɑ cii: "Ni yɑ ɑ ize nɑ. Zɑ hunkunɑ hɛɛ yɑ ci Bɑɑbɑ n sɛ."
44013034	À cii yɑ zɑmɑ Ikpɛ nɑ Yesu tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme. À si ye fumbi dɔ kpɛɛnɛ. Yɑ mo no Ikpɛ Sendi cii: "A kɑɑ wom no Dɑfidi ɑlikɑwɑli hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom ndɑ tɑbɑtɑntɛ yom. "
44013035	À sɛ nɑ, Ikpɛ Sendi cii kpɛɛnɛ: "N si nɑm n ŋmɔne Hɑlɑɑlɑkpɛ mɑ fumbu".
44013036	Sɑɑ kɑ Dɑfidi nɑ gbei tɛ ngɑ zɑmɑni kunɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ miilɑ, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ɑ̀ kɑni. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ fiji ɑ̀ cɛɛ yom dɔ hɑli ɑ̀ fumbu.
44013037	Ammɑ Yesu wɔ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi mɑnɑ fumbu.
44013038	Ngɑ di sɛ nyɑize hɑibɔrɔ yom, wom mɑ bei kɑ Yesu wɔ dɔ ǹ go bɔrɔ dulum yɑɑfɑyom bɑɑru fɛɛ wom sɛ.
44013039	Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne Yesu gɑɑ, Ikpɛ go kɑ ɑkpɛ cɛɑndi susu hɛ kulu gɑɑ. À go wom cɛɑndi susu hɛ kulu gɑɑ kɑ Moisi fɔndɑ mɑnɑ hini kɑ bɔrɔ cɛɑndi susu.
44013040	Ngɑ di sɛ, wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ hɛ yom wɔ kɑ ɑndebi yom hɑntum ngei tirɑ yom kunɑ ǹ mɑ si kɑm wom bɔm. Ǹ cii:
44013041	"Gunɑ, wom fɛntɛkpɛ yom. Wɑ mɑmɑci kɑ hɑlɑci. A go gbei fɔ tɛ wom jiribi yom kunɑ, gbei kɑ wom si ɑ̀ cimɑndi pɑti pɑti, bɑ de bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ ɑ̀ deede wom sɛ."
44013042	Yuifu yom hunu ngei mɑrgɑ fuu. À gɑɑ no dimi cindei nɑ ǹ ŋmɑɑrɛ ǹ mɑ ye kɑ sendi yom di cii ngei sɛ kpɛɛnɛ hulonzom hɑnu teji.
44013043	Kɑ jɑmɑ di kɑru kɑ see, Yuifu boobo ndɑ wɔ kɑ yom bɛrɛ kɑ Yuifu yom fɔndɔ gɑnɑ ko tɑmtɛrɛ Ikpɛ sɛ, ǹ nɑ Pɔlu ndɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ gɑnɑ. Ngei mɑ sendi ǹ sɛ kɑ cii ǹ mo himmɑ dɑm Ikpɛ gomini gɑɑ.
44013044	Hulonzom hɑnu teji hine wɑngɑrɑ di bɔrɔ bɑyom kulu meigu kɑ mɑɑ Ikpɛ Sendi.
44013045	Ammɑ kɑ Yuifu yom di bɔrɔ boobo meigu, ǹ tɔ ndɑ cɛnsɛ ko kɑkɔ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ sendi yɑmu kɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ hɛ kɑ Pɔlu cii.
44013046	Ammɑ Pɔlu ndɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ sendi ndɑ yɑrutɛrɛ. Ǹ cii: Tilɑsi no i mɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ cii wom sɛ jinɑ. Ammɑ zɑ kɑ wom go hunguɑ̀, wom bumbum lɑsɑbu zɑngɑ wom mɑnɑ tɔ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni gɑɑ. Gunɑ, i gɑ bɛrɛ dimi cindei dɔ hɛrɛ.
44013047	Yɑ no Kpe nɑ i no mei kɑ cii: "A nɑ n tɛ nɑ n mɑ ci kɑɑri dimi cindei sɛ zɑmɑ n mɑ kpeindɑ fɑɑbɑ bɑɑru kɑlɑ hɑndunyɑ mee ndɑ mee".
44013048	Sɑɑ kɑ dimi cindei mɑɑ yɑ di, ǹ fɑihã kɑ Kpe Sendɑ bɛɛrɑndi. Beerem kulu mɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ jisi hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni sɛ, ǹ kulu nɑɑne.
44013049	Ikpɛ Sendɑ gɑ kɑru kɑ see lɑɑbu di kulu kunɑ.
44013050	Ammɑ Yuifu yom nɑ wɑngɑrɑ di weibɔrɔ hinno yom kɑ ǹ go kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi ndɑ wɑngɑrɑ bɔrɔ beeri yom zukum hɑli ǹ tunu Pɔlu ndɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ gɑɑ kɑ ǹ guruguzɑndi. Ǹ nɑ ǹ gɑɑrɛ kɑ kɑɑ ngei lɑɑbu kunɑ.
44013051	Ammɑ Pɔlu ndɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ tɛ, ngei cee si ngei kɑmbɛ si. À bɑndɑ ǹ kpei Ikoniɑ wɑngɑrɑ.
44013052	Coobɑɑbɑize yom mo tɔ ndɑ binekɑɑne ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ.
44014001	À kɑɑ tɔ Ikoniɑ wɑngɑrɑ kunɑ Pɔlu ndɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ huro Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu kunɑ. Ǹ sendi kɑlɑ Yuifu yom ndɑ Gɑrɛku boobo nɑɑne.
44014002	Ammɑ Yuifu yom kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ nɑɑne nɑ dimi cindei zukum kɑ ǹ bine yom bibɑndi nyɑize yom gɑɑ.
44014003	Pɔlu ndɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ goono Ikoniɑ kɑ jɛ ko sendi ndɑ yɑrutɛrɛ Kpe kunɑ. Kpe gɑ sɛdɑ tɛ ngɑ gomini Sendɑ bɔm kɑ nɑm ɑlɑmu yom ndɑ mɑmɑci yom mɑ tɛ ǹ kɑmbɛ yom dɔ.
44014004	Ammɑ wɑngɑrɑ di jɑmɑ fee ihinkɑ. Afɔ yom goono Yuifu yom bɑndɑ, ɑfɔ yom mo goono diyɑ yom bɑndɑ.
44014005	Dimi cindei ndɑ Yuifu yom ndɑ ǹ gɑɑbikoni yom tunu Pɔlu ndɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ gɑɑ ngei mɑ ǹ guruguzɑndi kɑ ǹ cetu cetu ndɑ tɑndi yom.
44014006	Kɑ Pɔlu ndɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ du bɑɑru, ǹ zuuru kɑ kpei Lisitɑ ndɑ Dɑlibɑ kpɑɑrɑ yom kunɑ Likoniɑ lɑɑbu ndɑ ǹ hundɑntɛ yom.
44014007	Nungu yom di mo ǹ go wɑɑzu Bɑɑru Hinno bɔm.
44014008	Lisitɑ kpɑɑrɑ kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ goono kɑ ɑ̀ cee yom si tɛ. À goono leebɑntɛ zɑ ɑ̀ nyɑ gunde. À mɑnɑ dirɑ bɑ ce fɔ.
44014009	À go hɑngɑ dɑm ko mɑɑ Pɔlu go sendi. Pɔlu mo nɑ ɑ̀ gunɑ. Pɔlu di bɔrɔ di gundɑ nɑɑne kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ no gɑɑhɑm bɑɑni.
44014010	À gɑɑ nɑ Pɔlu cii ndɑ jinde beeri: Tunu kɑ cɛ n cee gɑɑ. Cɔfɔ mɔngɔlɑ tunu finyɑ kɑ dirɑ.
44014011	Sɑɑ kɑ jɑmɑ di hɛ kɑ Pɔlu tɛ, ǹ nɑ jinde zɑɑ ndɑ Likoniɑ cinɛ kɑ cii: E, ikpɛ yom zumbu i dɔ kɑ ngei bɔm tɛ zɑngɑ bɔrɔ yom.
44014012	Ǹ nɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ cɛɛ Zɑfɑ. Pɔlu mɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ Hɛmɛ zɑmɑ ngɑ yɑ ci hɑikusu sendi kunɑ.
44014013	Zɑfɑ dɔ gɑrɑndikɔ kɑ ɑ̀ tooru fuu goono wɑngɑrɑ di birini mee jine kɑɑndɑ hɑuyeji yom ndɑ tuuri boosi yom wɑngɑrɑ birini mee yom gɑɑ. À gɑ bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ gɑrɑndi tɛ ndei jɑmɑ di bɑndɑ.
44014014	Ammɑ kɑ Pɔlu ndɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ kɑ ǹ ci diyɑ yom mɑɑ yɑ di, cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ ngei kpɛ yom kɔɔtu Ikpɛ cɛnɑndiyom sɑbu sɛ. Ǹ zuuru kɑ huro jɑmɑ di kunɑ. Ǹ go kuwɑ kɑ cii:
44014015	E iburɑdɑm yom, ifɔ sɛ no wom go hɛ yom wɔ tɛ? I yom mo iburɑdɑm yom no ndɑ hɑɑli zɑngɑ wom. Bɑɑru Hinno no i go wɑɑzu wom sɛ hɑli wom mɑ fee ndɑ hɛ kɔnu yom wɔ kɑ bɛrɛ Ikpɛ Hundikpɛ dɔ hɛrɛ. Ikpɛ wɔ nɑ bɛɛnɛ ndɑ gɑndɑ ndɑ tɛku ndɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono ǹ kunɑ tɑkɑ.
44014016	Zɑmɑni yom kɑ ǹ bisɑ kunɑ Ikpɛ nɑm hɑndunyɑ dimi yom kulu nɑ ngei bɔm fɔndɔ yom gɑnɑ.
44014017	Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ngɑ bɔm nɑm sɛdɑ si. À nɑ ihinno tɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ i no bɛɛnɛ hɑri ndɑ ɑliwɑti bɑrikɑntɛ yom zɑ bɛɛnɛ. À nɑ i no ŋmɑɑri hɑli i kungu kɑ i bine yom tɔnɑndi ndɑ binekɑɑne.
44014018	Bɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ hɛ nge yom di cii ǹ sɛ, kɑlɑ dɑcɑti ǹ du kɑ hungu jɑmɑ di sɛ ǹ mɑ gɑrɑndi di tɛ ngei sɛ.
44014019	Yuifu yom bine hunu zɑ Antiɔku ndɑ Ikoniɑ kɑ kɑɑ Lisitɑ kpɑɑrɑ. Ǹ nɑ jɑmɑ di bɛrɛ hɑli ǹ nɑ Pɔlu cetu ndɑ tondi yom. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ kukusu kɑ cendi wɑngɑrɑ bɑndɑ. Ǹ tɑmmɑ hɑli ɑ̀ bu nɑ.
44014020	Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom cɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hundi, ɑ̀ tunu. À huro wɑngɑrɑ kunɑ. À mo bo Pɔlu ndɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ kpei Dɑlibɑ wɑngɑrɑ.
44014021	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ wɑɑzu tɛ Dɑlibɑ wɑngɑrɑ kunɑ, ǹ du gɑnɑkɔ boobo. À bɑndɑ ǹ ye Lisitɑ ndɑ Ikoniɑ ndɑ Antiɔku.
44014022	Ǹ nɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom bine yom no gɑɑbi kɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ himmɑ ǹ mɑ moo yeti nɑɑne fɔndɔ gɑɑ. Ǹ mɑ bei mo kɑ tilɑsi no i mɑ tɑɑbi boobo hɑm hɑli i kɑɑ huro Ikpɛ kpetɛrɑ kunɑ.
44014023	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ beerem suubɑ ǹ mɑ ci mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ fuu yom kulu kunɑ, ǹ nɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ ndɑ meehɔ. Ǹ nɑ gɑnɑkɔ yom tɑlifi Kpe kɑ ǹ go nɑɑne gɑɑ.
44014024	Ǹ bisɑ Pisidiɑ lɑɑbu kɑ kpei Pɑmfili lɑɑbu.
44014025	Kɑ ǹ nɑ Pɛligɑ wɑngɑrɑ bɔrɔ yom wɑɑzu ndɑ Sendɑ mo, ǹ zuli kɑ kpei Atɑliɑ kpɑɑrɑ.
44014026	Kpɑɑrɑ di no ǹ huro hɑrihi kɑ kpei Antiɔku wɑngɑrɑ, nungu kɑ n nɑ ǹ tɑlifi Ikpɛ gomini gɑɑ, gbei kɑ ǹ tɔnɑndi di sɛ.
44014027	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ tɔ Antiɔku ǹ nɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ cɛɛ kɑ meigu. Ǹ deede hɛ kulu kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ ndɑ ngei ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ nɑ fɔndɔ feeri dimi cindei mo mɑ nɑɑne sɛ.
44014028	Ǹ gɔrɔ kɑ jɛ Antiɔku coobɑɑbɑize yom bɑndɑ.
44015001	Bɔrɔ fɔ yom mo hunu zɑ Yude lɑɑbu. Ǹ gɑ nyɑizei cooɑndi kɑ cii: De ǹ mɑnɑ wom dɑmbɑngu Moisi ɑlɑɑdɑ bɔm, kulu wom si hini kɑ du fɑɑbɑ.
44015002	Sendi ngɑ di sɛ no, kɑkɔ ndɑ kɔsɔngu bɑmbɑtɑ tunu Pɔlu ndɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ ndɑ beerem di gɑme. À sɛ no ǹ nɑ Pɔlu ndɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ ndɑ ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ yom dɔntɔm Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ. Ǹ mɑ kpeindɑ sendɑ diyɑ yom ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom dɔ.
44015003	Sɑɑ kɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ nɑ ǹ kɑmbɑzɑ, ǹ nɑ Finiciɑ lɑɑbu ndɑ Sɑmɑri lɑɑbu tɑɑru kɑ bisɑ. Ǹ gɑ dimi cindei bɛrɛyom bɑɑru deede. Bɑɑru di kɑɑndɑ binekɑɑne bɑmbɑtɑ nyɑizei kulu sɛ.
44015004	Kɑ ǹ tɔ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ ndɑ diyɑ yom ndɑ hɑikusu yom nɑ ǹ tɑ. Pɔlu ndɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ deede ǹ sɛ hɛ kulu kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ ndɑ ngei.
44015005	Ammɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ fɔ yom kɑ ǹ nɑɑne tunu kɑ cii tilɑsi no ǹ mɑ dimi cindei dɑmbɑngu. Ǹ mɑ ǹ dɑm mo ǹ mɑ Moisi fɔndɑ gɑnɑ.
44015006	Diyɑ yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom nɑ cɛrɛ meigu kɑ sendɑ gunɑ.
44015007	Kɑ kɑkɔ bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ tunu, Piɛɛ tunu kɑ cɛ. À cii ǹ sɛ: Nyɑize hɑibɔrɔ yom, wom bumbum bei zɑ dom no Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ suubɑ wom kunɑ. À nɑ ɑ suubɑ domi dimi cindei mɑ mɑɑ Bɑɑru Hinno sendi ɑ mee kunɑ hɑli ǹ mɑ nɑɑne.
44015008	Ikpɛ mo kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ bine yom bei, ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ sɛdɑ zɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ no Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ nɑ i no.
44015009	À bine mɑnɑ fɑyɑnkɑ yom fɔ mo kulu dɑm ngei ndɑ i yom gɑme. À nɑ ǹ bine yom hinnɑndi nɑɑne gɑɑ mo.
44015010	Ngɑ di sɛ, mɑɑsɑ ifɔ sɛ wom go kɑ Ikpɛ bubure ko zuu dɑm coobɑɑbɑize yom jinde gɑɑ? Zɑ i cɛɛ yom hɑli i yom, i mɑnɑ hini kɑ zuu wɔ zɑɑ.
44015011	I go nɑɑne kɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gomini dɔ i du fɑɑbɑ, zɑngɑ yɑ no ngei mo.
44015012	Jɑmɑ di kulu dɛnjɛ ko hɑngɑ dɑm Bɑɑnɑbɑ ndɑ Pɔlu sɛ. Ǹ go ɑlɑmu yom ndɑ mɑmɑci yom deede kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ ngei dɔ dimi cindei kunɑ.
44015013	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ dɛnjɛ, Yɑkɔfu mo tunu kɑ cii: Nyɑize hɑibɔrɔ yom, wɑ hɑngɑ dɑm kɑ mɑɑ ɑ sɛ.
44015014	Simɔ Piɛɛ nɑ bɑɑru deede zɑngɑ Ikpɛ jinɑ kɑ dimi cindei kunfɑ domi ɑ̀ mɑ jɑmɑ fɔ yom suubɑ ǹ kunɑ ngɑ bumbum mɑɑ sɛ.
44015015	Ngɑ di sɑbɑ mo ndɑ ɑndebei sendi yom ndɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii:
44015016	"Ngɑ di bɑndɑ, ɑ ye kɑ kɑɑ. Dɑfidi kuuru bukɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑm ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ yɑɑrɑ kɑ cini. A kɑɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ sɑɑrɑ yɑrɑ kɑ cini. A gɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi kɑ cɛɑndi.
44015017	A gɑ ɑ̀ tɛ zɑmɑ bɔrɔ cindei mɑ Kpe ceeci, bɑ ndɑ dimi cindei kulu kɑ ǹ cɛɛ ndɑ ɑ mɑɑ. Yɑ no Kpe cii, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go hɛ yom wɔ kulu tɛ.
44015018	Hɛ kɑ Ikpɛ cii noyɑ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ gbei kulu kɑɑtɛrɛ zɑ zɑmɑni sintiyom."
44015019	À sɛ no, ɑ diyom gɑɑ i mɑ si beerem kɑ ǹ bɛrɛ Ikpɛ sɛ dimi cindei kunɑ tɑɑbɑndi.
44015020	Ammɑ i mɑ hɑntum ǹ sɛ kɑ cii ǹ mɑ ǹ bɔm fee ndɑ tooru ŋmɔne ziibi ndɑ zinɑ ndɑ hɛ kɑ ǹ kɔtɛ kɑ wi ndɑ kuri.
44015021	Zɑ dom zɑmɑni yom kunɑ, Moisi gundɑ fɛɛkɔ yom wɑngɑrɑ fɔ fɔ kulu kunɑ. Ǹ gɑ Moisi fɔndɑ coo Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu yom kunɑ hulɑnzom hɑnu kulu.
44015022	À bine sɑbɑ diyɑ yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ kulu sɛ ǹ mɑ beerem suubɑ ngei kunɑ kɑ ǹ dɔntɔm Antiɔku wɑngɑrɑ Pɔlu ndɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ bɑndɑ. Ngei neyɑ, Yudɑ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Bɑɑsɑbɑ ndɑ Silɑ, wɔ kɑ yom gundɑ bɛɛrɛ nyɑizei kunɑ.
44015023	Ǹ nɑ tirɑ wɔ hɑntum kɑ dɑm ǹ kɑmbɛ kɑ cii. I yom diyɑ yom ndɑ hɑikusu yom ndɑ nyɑizei go wom dimi cindei nyɑize yom fɔɔ, wom kɑ wom goono Antiɔku ndɑ Siriɑ ndɑ Siliciɑ.
44015024	I mɑɑ bɑɑru bɔrɔ fɔ yom hunu i dɔ kɑ wom lɑɑkɑli tunɑndi ndɑ sendi yom. Ǹ go wom bine yom biriji kɑ cii kɑlɑ ǹ mɑ wom dɑmbɑngu. Wom mo Moisi fɔndɑ gɑnɑ. Wom mo bei i mɑnɑ ǹ no fɔndɑ.
44015025	Sɑɑ kɑ i kulu meigu mefɔ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ i sɛ i mɑ beerem suubɑ i kunɑ kɑ ǹ dɔntɔm wom dɔ i binebɑɑkɔ yom wɔ bɑndɑ, Bɑɑnɑbɑ ndɑ Pɔlu.
44015026	Ngei yɑ nɑ ngei hundi yom neerɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ mɑɑ sɑbu sɛ.
44015027	À sɛ no, i nɑ Yudɑ ndɑ Silɑ dɔntɔm ngei mo mɑ hɛ fɔlɔnku yom di bɑɑru cii wom sɛ.
44015028	À sɑbɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ sɛ, ɑ̀ sɑbɑ i yom mo i sɛ, i mɑ si time fɔ ŋmɑni kulu dɛcɛ wom bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ ci tilɑsi.
44015029	Wom mɑ wom bɔm fee hɛ yom kɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ gɑrɑndi tɛ tooru gɑɑ. Wɑ fee ndɑ kuri ndɑ hɛ kɑ ǹ kɔtɛ kɑ wi. Wɑ fee ndɑ zinɑ. De wom go wom bɔm jɛ hɛ nge yom di gɑɑ, kulu wom boori. Too. Wom mo gɔrɔ ndɑ bɑɑni.
44015030	Bine kɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ tɑm, ǹ kpei Antiɔku wɑngɑrɑ. Ǹ nɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ meigu kɑ tirɑ di no ǹ sɛ.
44015031	Ngei mo kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ coo, ǹ fɑihã ndɑ yɑmɑrɑndiyom kɑ ǹ kɑɑndɑ ǹ sɛ.
44015032	Yudɑ ndɑ Silɑ ngei yɑ ɑndebi yom no. Ǹ nɑ nyɑizei no himmɑ kɑ ǹ bine no gɑɑbi meecine boobo gɑɑ.
44015033	Ǹ nɑ jiribi yom tɛ nodi. À bɑndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne kunɑ no, nyɑizei nɑ ǹ tɑm ǹ mɑ ye diyɑ yom kɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ dɔntɔm dɔ. [
44015034	Ammɑ nungu di gɔrɛ kɑɑni Silɑ sɛ.]
44015035	Pɔlu ndɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ mo gɔrɔ Antiɔku. Ǹ go cooɑndi kɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu Kpe Sendɑ bɔm. Bɔrɔ fɔ yom mo goono ǹ bɑndɑ.
44015036	Sɑɑ kɑ jiribi fɔ yom bisɑ, Pɔlu cii Bɑɑnɑbɑ sɛ: Mɑɑsɑ i mɑ ye wɑngɑrɑ yom di kulu kunɑ nungu yom kɑ i jinɑ kɑ wɑɑzu Kpe Sendɑ bɔm. I mɑ nyɑize yom kunfɑ kɑ di zɑngɑ ǹ goono.
44015037	Bɑɑnɑbɑ bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ kpeindɑ Yohɑnnɑ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Mɑɑku ngei bɑndɑ.
44015038	Ammɑ Pɔlu di ɑ̀ mɑnɑ himɑ ǹ mɑ kpeindɑɑ̀ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ zuuru kɑ ngei nɑm Pɑmfili kpɑɑrɑ. À mɑnɑ kpei gbei tɛ ǹ bɑndɑ.
44015039	Kɔsɔngu bɑmbɑtɑ tɛ ǹ gɑme hɑli ɑ̀ tɔ ǹ fee ndɑ cɛrɛ. Bɑɑnɑbɑ kpeindɑ Mɑɑku ngɑ bɑndɑ kɑ kpei Kuburu hɔndɛ tɑɑsi.
44015040	Pɔlu mo kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Silɑ suubɑ kpei sɑɑ kɑ nyɑizei nɑ ǹ tɑlifi Kpe gomini gɑɑ.
44015041	Pɔlu nɑ Siriɑ lɑɑbu ndɑ Cilici lɑɑbu tooru kɑ bisɑ ko Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ yom no gɑɑbi.
44016001	Pɔlu tɔ Dɑlibɑ kpɑɑrɑ ndɑ Lisitɑ kpɑɑrɑ. Coobɑɑbɑize fɔ goono nungu di kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Timote. Yuifu weibɔrɔ nɑɑnekɔ fɔ koo no ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑbɑ mo Gɑrɛku no.
44016002	Nyɑize kɑ ǹ goono Lisitɑ kpɑɑrɑ ndɑ Ikoniɑ wɑngɑrɑ go tɛ sɛdɑ ɑ̀ bɔm ndɑ sɛdɑ hinnɑ.
44016003	Pɔlu bine gɑ bɑɑ Timote mɑ ngɑ gɑnɑ. À nɑ ɑ̀ dɑmbɑngu Yuifu yom kɑ ǹ goono nungu yom di sɑbu sɛ. À nɑ ngɑ di tɛ zɑmɑ ǹ kulu bei kɑ Timote bɑɑbɑ yɑ Gɑrɛku nɑ.
44016004	Kɑ ǹ gɑ bisɑ wɑngɑrɑ yom kunɑ ǹ nɑ nyɑize yom dɑm ǹ mɑ meire yom jɛ, wɔ kɑ diyɑ yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom kɑ ǹ goono Yerusɑlɛm jisi.
44016005	Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ yom bine sinji kɑ boori nɑɑne kunɑ. Ǹ gɑ bɑ kɑ tɔntɔnu mo hɑnu kɑ kɑɑ hɑnu.
44016006	Pɔlu yom nɑ Filiji lɑɑbu ndɑ Gɑlɑte lɑɑbu tɑɑru kɑ bisɑ, zɑmɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ hungu ǹ sɛ ǹ mɑ Sendɑ cii Azi lɑɑbu.
44016007	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ tɔ Misiɑ lɑɑbu, ǹ ceeci ǹ mɑ kpei Bitiniɑ lɑɑbu ɑmmɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ mɑnɑ tu ǹ sɛ.
44016008	Kɑ ǹ bisɑ Misiɑ lɑɑbu ǹ kɑɑ Toɑsɑ kpɑɑrɑ.
44016009	Ciini kunɑ Pɔlu di diyom fɔ. Mɑsedoni hɑibɔrɔ fɔ gɑ cɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ. À cii. Kɑɑ Mɑsedoni lɑɑbu kɑ I gɑɑ.
44016010	Sɑɑ kɑ Pɔlu di diyomɑ, mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ i nɑ Mɑsedoni kpeiyom fɔndɔ ceeci. I gɑ bei kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ i cɛɛ no i mɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu tɛ ǹ sɛ.
44016011	À sɛ nɑ kɑ i tunu Tɑɑsɑ kpɑɑrɑ i huro hɑrihi kɑ kpei susu kɑlɑ Sɑmetɑlɑci hɔndɛ tɑɑsi bɔm. À mo bo mo i kpei Niɑpoli kpɑɑrɑ.
44016012	Zɑ nungu di no i kpei Filipi kɑ ɑ̀ ci Mɑsedoni lɑɑbu wɑngɑrɑ nyɑ. Wɑngɑrɑ di goono Lome lɑɑbu meire kunɑ. I nɑ jiribi yom tɛ wɑngɑrɑ wɔ kunɑ.
44016013	Hulonzom hɑnu hine i hunu wɑngɑrɑ di kunɑ. I kpei isɑ fɔ mee gɑɑ, nungu kɑ beerem cini kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ. I gɔrɔ nungu di kɑ sendi weibɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ meigu sɛ.
44016014	Weibɔrɔ fɔ goono ǹ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Lidiɑ, tɑɑfɛ siini cɑɑdɑntɛ neerɑkɔ no. Tiyɑtire kpɑɑrɑ weibɔrɔ fɔ no kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi. À go mɑɑ i sendɑ. Kpe mo nɑ ɑ̀ bine feeri kɑlɑ ɑ̀ nɑ sɑɑle dɑm hɛ yom kɑ Pɔlu go cii gɑɑ.
44016015	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ mirɑndi, ngɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ fuu kulu ɑ̀ nɑ i ŋmɑɑrɛ kɑ cii: De wom nɑ ɑ lɑsɑbu Kpe nɑɑnekɔ, wɑ kɑɑ zumbu ɑ hundi. Lidiɑ nɑ i tilɑsi.
44016016	À kɑɑ tɔ bine, i go kpei ɑduwɑ tɛyom dɔ. Cɔfɔ hundiyo fɔ nɑ i kube kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ gondi beeri hɔllɛ zɑngɑ isiyɑbi. Gunɑyomɑ kunɑ no ɑ̀ go kɑɑndɑ liibɑ bɑɑbɑ ngɑ kpe yom sɛ.
44016017	À sinti kɑ i gɑnɑ, Pɔlu ndɑ i yom. À nɑ ngɑ jinde zɑɑ kɑ cii: Beerem wɔ Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɛ bisɑ ǹ kulu, ɑ̀ tɑm yom no. Ǹ go fɔndɔ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑndɑ fɑɑbɑ bɑɑru fɛɛ i sɛ.
44016018	Hɔllɛ di nɑ ngɑ di cii zɑngɑ jiribi yom. Ammɑ Pɔlu bine sɑrɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. À bɛrɛ kɑ cii hɔllɛ di sɛ: Yesu Mɛsiyɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ ɑ gɑ kɑ n mei, n mɑ hunu hundiyo wɔ bɑndɑ. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ lɔkɑci di bumbum hɔllɛ di hunu ɑ̀ bɑndɑ.
44016019	Ammɑ kɑ hundiyɑ kpe yom di ngei liibɑ sɑbɑbu beeni, ǹ nɑ Pɔlu ndɑ Silɑ dii. Ǹ nɑ ǹ cendi kɑ kpeindei hebu bɑtumɑ kunɑ hinikpɛ yom jine.
44016020	Ǹ kpeindei yerimɑ yom dɔ kɑ cii: Beerem wɔ Yuifu yom no. Ǹ bine go kɑ i wɑngɑrɑ butugu kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
44016021	Ǹ go ɑlɑɑdɑ yom fɛɛ kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ hɑlɑli i sɛ i mɑ ǹ tɑ wɑlɑ i mɑ ǹ gɑnɑ zɑ kɑ i yom yɑ Lomɑncɛ yom no.
44016022	Cɔfɔ jɑmɑ di tunu ǹ gɑɑ mefɔ. Yerimɑ yom di nɑ ǹ jiine yom wɑfɑ kɑ kɑɑ ǹ gɑɑ. Ǹ nɑ mei no ǹ mɑ ǹ bulɑɑlɑ.
44016023	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ bulɑɑlɑ ce boobo, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ dɑm kɑsu. Ǹ nɑ bɑtukɔ dɑm ɑ̀ mɑ ǹ bɑtu hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ boori.
44016024	Ngɑ mo zɑ kɑ ɑ̀ du meire wɔ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ dɑm kɑsuɑ kunɑ hɑli jinɑ hɛrɛ. À nɑ ǹ cee yom dɑm dibi.
44016025	Ciini bindi Pɔlu ndɑ Silɑ go kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ ko kɑ Ikpɛ sifɑ ndɑ betu yom. Kɑsuize cindei mo nɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ǹ sɛ.
44016026	Mefɔ mefɔ gɑndɑ zinji yom bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ tɛ kɑlɑ kɑsu fuuɑ kpɛsɛ zinji. Kɑsu mee yom kulu feeri. Kɑsuize yom mɑ kulu seseri yom feeri feeri.
44016027	Kɑsu bɑtukɔɑ mɑɑ hɛi kɑ di mee yom kulu goono feerɑntɛ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ tɑkubɑ hobu. À bɑ kɑ ngɑ bɔm wi zɑmɑ ɑ̀ tɑmmɑ kɑsuize yom zuuru no.
44016028	Ammɑ Pɔlu kuwɑ ndɑ jinde beeri kɑ cii: Si bɔnɛ tɛ n bɔm sɛ zɑmɑ i kulu goono nee.
44016029	Sɑɑ di gɑɑ bɑtukɔɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ ǹ mɑ kɑɑndɑ fitilɑ. À huro ndɑ wɑɑsi. À ye gɑndɑ Pɔlu ndɑ Silɑ jine. À go gɑsi ndɑ hɑmburu.
44016030	À nɑ ǹ kɑɑ tɛrɛ kɑ cii ǹ sɛ: A jinɑ yom, ifɔ no yɑ tɛ kɑ dɑ fɑɑbɑ?
44016031	Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N mɑ nɑɑne Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gɑɑ, n kɑɑ du fɑɑbɑ, ni ndɑ n fuu kulu.
44016032	Ǹ nɑ Kpe Sendɑ bɑɑru cii ɑ̀ sɛ, yɑ no beerem kulu sɛ kɑ ǹ goono ɑ̀ hundi kunɑ.
44016033	Sɑɑ ngɑ di ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ zɑɑ ciini kunɑ kɑ ǹ bi yom nyunu. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ mirɑndi, ngɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ fuu kulu.
44016034	Bɑtukɔɑ kpeindei ngɑ fuu kunɑ kɑ ǹ no ŋmɑɑri. À fɑihã kɑlɑ kɑlɑ, ngɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ fuu kulu, zɑmɑ ǹ go nɑɑne Ikpɛ gɑɑ.
44016035	Kɑ mo bo, yerimɑ yom nɑ dogɑri yom dɔntɔm kɑ cii: N mɑ beerem di tɑm ǹ mɑ kpei.
44016036	Kɑsu bɑtukɔɑ nɑ sendi yom yɑɑrɑ Pɔlu sɛ. À cii: Yerimɑ yom nɑ beerem dɔntɔm kɑ cii ǹ mɑ wom tɑm, wɑ kpei. Mɑɑsɑ wɑ hunu kɑ kpei ndɑ bɑɑni.
44016037	Ammɑ Pɔlu mo cii dogɑri yom sɛ: Tɛrɛkpɑrɛ no ǹ nɑ i bulɑɑlɑ, i yom Lomɑncɛ yom. Ǹ nɑ i dɑm kɑsu mo, ciiti si. Mɑɑsɑ no, ǹ gɑ i tɑm tugu kunɑ bɑ? Awo. À si ci yɑ. Ngei bumbum mɑ kɑɑ kɑ i tɑm.
44016038	Dogɑri yom di nɑ sendi yom wɔ yɑɑrɑ yerimɑ yom di sɛ. Ǹ hɑmburu kɑlɑ kɑlɑ kɑ ǹ mɑɑ Lomɑncɛ yom no.
44016039	À gɑɑ no ǹ kɑɑ kɑ ǹ suurɑndi. Kɑ ǹ tɑm ǹ nɑ ǹ ŋmɑɑrɛ ǹ mɑ hunu wɑngɑrɑ di kunɑ.
44016040	Pɔlu ndɑ Silɑ hunu kɑsuɑ kunɑ kɑ huro Lidiɑ hundi kunɑ. Kɑ ǹ di nyɑize yom, ǹ nɑ ǹ nɑ himmɑ. À bɑndɑ ǹ dirɑ.
44017001	Sɑɑ kɑ Pɔlu ndɑ Silɑ bisɑ Amfipoli wɑngɑrɑ ndɑ Apoloni wɑngɑrɑ ǹ kɑɑ Tesɑlonikɑ wɑngɑrɑ. Nungu di Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu fɔ goono.
44017002	Pɔlu bine huro mɑrgɑ fuu di kunɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ cini tɛ. Hulonzom hɑnu hinzɑ no ɑ̀ go kɑkɔ tɛ ndei Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ yom bɔm.
44017003	À go kɑ ǹ fɑhɑmɑndi kɑ cɛbɛ ǹ sɛ kɑ tilɑsi Mɛsiyɑ mɑ tɑɑbi. À mɑ bu mo kɑ ye kɑ tunu. À cii: Yesu wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑru ɑ go fɛɛ wom sɛ, Mɛsiyɑ no.
44017004	Bɔrɔ fɔ yom nɑɑne kɑ lɑmbɑ Pɔlu ndɑ Silɑ gɑɑ. Yɑ no Gɑrɛku tutumɑ fɔ mo kɑ ǹ go kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi ndɑ weibɔrɔ hinno boobo.
44017005	Ammɑ Yuifu yom kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ Sendɑ cimɑndi, ǹ tɔ ndɑ cɛnsɛ. Ǹ nɑ bɔrɔ lɑlɔ fɔ yom kɑ ǹ goono kpɑɑrɑ bɔrɔ yɑmɔ yom gɑme zɑɑ kɑ wɑngɑrɑ di butugu. Ǹ kpei Yɑso kpɑɑrɑ kɑ Pɔlu ndɑ Silɑ ceeci ngei mɑ kpeindei jɑmɑ di dɔ.
44017006	Ammɑ kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ di ei, ǹ nɑ Yɑso ndɑ nyɑize fɔ yom cendi kɑ kpeindei wɑngɑrɑ yerimɑ yom jine. Ǹ kuwɑ kɑ cii: Beerem kɑ ǹ nɑ hɑndunyɑ bɛrɛ ǹ kɑɑ nee wɔ mo.
44017007	Yɑso bine yɑ nɑ ǹ kube ngɑ kpɑɑrɑ. Ǹ kulu go gɑɑbɑ ndɑ Kɑisɑ meire yom. Ǹ go cii kpe ŋmɑni fɔ goono kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Yesu.
44017008	Kɑ jɑmɑ di ndɑ wɑngɑrɑ yerimɑ yom mɑɑ hɛ nge yom di, ǹ lɑɑkɑli tunu.
44017009	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ tɔlimɛ yom tɑ Yɑso ndɑ bɔrɔ cindei gɑɑ, ǹ nɑ ǹ tɑm.
44017010	Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ nyɑize yom nɑ Pɔlu ndɑ Silɑ dɔntɔm Beriɑ kpɑɑrɑ ciini kunɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ tɔ Beriɑ, ǹ hurɑ Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu kunɑ.
44017011	Yuifu nge yom di bine hɑɑli bisɑ Tesɑlonikɑ ŋmɔne yom zɑmɑ ǹ nɑ Sendɑ zɑɑ ndɑ bine fɔ. Hɑnu kulu mɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ yom gunɑ ndɑ himmɑ. Ǹ ceeci kɑ di hɑli yɑ no hɛ yom di goono.
44017012	À sɛ no ǹ kunɑ bɔrɔ boobo nɑɑne. Gɑrɛku weibɔrɔ bɛɛrɛkpɛ yom ndɑ hɑibɔrɔ bɑɑbɑ nɑɑne mo.
44017013	Ammɑ Tesɑlonikɑ wɑngɑrɑ Yuifu yom mɑɑ bɑɑru Pɔlu go kɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ fɛɛ Beriɑ wɑngɑrɑ kunɑ. À gɑɑ no ǹ kpei jɑmɑ zukum.
44017014	Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ nyɑizei mo nɑ Pɔlu dum hɑli tɛku mee. Ammɑ Silɑ ndɑ Timote gɔrɔ nungu di.
44017015	Beerem kɑ ǹ go Pɔlu dum, ǹ kpeindɑɑ̀ hɑli Atinɑ wɑngɑrɑ nyɑ. Kɑ Pɔlu nɑ ǹ dɑm kɑ cii Silɑ ndɑ Timote mɑ kɑɑ ngɑ dɔ ndɑ wɑɑsi, ǹ dirɑ.
44017016	Sɑɑ kɑ Pɔlu goono Atinɑ wɑngɑrɑ di ko kɑ ǹ bɑtu, ɑ̀ bine sɑrɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ di wɑngɑrɑ tɔ ndɑ tooru yom.
44017017	Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu kunɑ ɑ̀ kɑkɔ ndɑ Yuifu yom ndɑ dimi cindei kɑ ǹ go kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi. À cini kpei hebu bɑtumɑ hɑnu kulu kɑ kɑkɔ ndɑ beerem kɑ ɑ̀ go kube ndei.
44017018	Wɑlitɛrɛ fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom mo, Epikɑri yom ndɑ Sitoriɑ yom go sendi ndɑ Pɔlu. Afɔ yom cii: Ifɔ no meecinekpɛ wɔ go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ cii? Afɔ yom mo cii: À himɑ i sɛ ikpɛ ŋmɑni yotɛrɛ ŋmɔne yom bɔm no ɑ̀ go sendi. Ǹ cii yɑ di zɑmɑ Pɔlu go Yesu ndɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndiyom bukɔei gɑme bɑɑru fɛɛ ǹ sɛ.
44017019	Ǹ nɑ Pɔlu dii kɑ kpeindɑɑ̀ Aleopɑgu mɑrgɑ dɔ. Ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ cii: Cɛbɛ teji wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bɔm n go cooɑndi, i bɑɑ i mɑ bei.
44017020	N go kɑɑndɑ hɛ fɔ ŋmɑni yom i hɑngɑ sɛ. À sɛ no i go bɑɑ i mɑ bei hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci hɛ nge yom di feeriji.
44017021	Atinɑ bɔrɔ kulu ndɑ yo yom kɑ ǹ goono wɑngɑrɑ di sindɑ gbei fɔ kulu kɑlɑ ǹ mɑ cii wɑlɑ ǹ mɑ hɑngɑ dɑm bɑɑru teji yom sɛ.
44017022	Pɔlu cɛ Aleopɑgu mɑrgɑ bindi kɑ cii: Atinɑ hɑibɔrɔ yom, ɑ go di hɛ kulu kunɑ wom yɑ gɑnɑkɔ yom no.
44017023	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ go bisɑ, ɑ di hɛ yom kɑ wom go sɔmbu ǹ sɛ. A di bɑndɑ tɑndɑ fɔ zɑti kɑ ǹ hɑntum ɑ̀ gɑɑ kɑ cii: Ikpɛ kɑ ǹ si bei sɛ. Wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ wom go sɔmbu zɑm kɑ bei kunɑ, ɑ̀ bɑɑru no ɑ go wom no.
44017024	Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ hɑndunyɑ tɛ ndɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono ɑ̀ kunɑ, ngɑ yɑ ci bɛɛnɛ ndɑ gɑndɑ Kpe. À si gɔrɔ fuu kɑ ǹ tɛ ndɑ kɑmbɛ kunɑ.
44017025	À mɑnɑ ci ndɑ kɑmbɛ no bɔrɔ go tɑmtɛrɛ ɑ̀ sɛ, zɑngɑ de ɑ̀ go bɑɑ hɛ fɔ. Ngɑ bumbum yɑ go hɛ kulu no hundi ndɑ hulonzom yom ndɑ hɛ kulu.
44017026	Kuri fɔlɔnku gɑɑ no ɑ̀ nɑ dimi kulu tɛ ǹ mɑ gɔrɔ hɑndunyɑ kulu bɔm. À nɑ ɑliwɑti yom dumbu kɑ jisi ǹ sɛ mo ndɑ ǹ gɔrɛ dɔ yom kɔrɔme.
44017027	Ǹ mɑ Ikpɛ ceeci hɑnibɑ ǹ du kɑ tɔ ɑ̀ dɔ bɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ mooru i ŋmɔne fɔ fɔ kulu.
44017028	À kunɑ no i go hunɑ, i go yɔgɔi. I bɑrɑ mo zɑngɑ wom dɔɔnukɔ yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ yom cii: I yom yɑ ɑ̀ dimi yom no.
44017029	Ngɑ di sɛ zɑ kɑ i yom yɑ Ikpɛ dimi yom no, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ himɑ i mɑ tɑmmɑ kɑ Ikpɛ bɑrɑ zɑngɑ hɛ kɑ iburɑdɑm zozobu ndɑ wurɑ wɑlɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu wɑlɑ tondi ngɑ lɑsɑbu kunɑ.
44017030	Cimi no Ikpɛ mɑnɑ i dom zɑm kɑ bei mure ɑmmɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ iburɑdɑm kulu nungu kulu no mei ǹ mɑ tuubi kɑ bɛrɛ.
44017031	Ikpɛ nɑ hɑnu fɔ jisi kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ ciiti hɑndunyɑ kulu sɛ ndɑ cɛyom susu. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ jisi gɑɑ no, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ tɛ. Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tɑbɑtɑndi bɔrɔ kulu sɛ zɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Bɔrɔ di tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme.
44017032	Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ mɑɑ tunɑndiyom bukɔei gɑme sendi, ǹ kunɑ ɑfɔ yom hɑɑru. Ammɑ ɑfɔ yom cii: I kɑɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ǹ sɛ kpɛɛnɛ sendi wɔ bɔm.
44017033	Pɔlu bine hunu ǹ kunɑ.
44017034	Ammɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom nɑɑne kɑ lɑmbɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Ǹ kunɑ Dionisu, Aleopɑgu bɔrɔ fɔ ndɑ weibɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Dɑmɑriɑ ndɑ ɑfɔ yom kpɛɛnɛ.
44018001	Nge yom bɑndɑ Pɔlu tunu Atinɑ wɑngɑrɑ nyɑ kɑ kɑɑ Kɔlɛnte wɑngɑrɑ.
44018002	À nɑ Yuifu fɔ gɑru kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Akilɑ, Pontu lɑɑbu bɔrɔ no. À mɑnɑ jɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu Itɑli lɑɑbu, ngɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ wɛndɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Pirisilɑ. À hunu Itɑli lɑɑbu zɑmɑ gɑndɑkpɛ Kolodu nɑ fɔndɔ nɑ kɑ cii Yuifu yom kulu mɑ hunu Lome wɑngɑrɑ nyɑ kunɑ. Pɔlu mo kɑɑ ǹ dɔ.
44018003	Pɔlu gɔrɔ ǹ dɔ kɑ gbei tɛ ndei zɑmɑ ǹ kɑmbɛ gbei fɔlɔnku no. Kuuru bukɑ tɛyom yɑ ci ǹ gbei.
44018004	Hulonzom hɑnu kulu Pɔlu go kɑkɔ Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu kunɑ ko ceeci ngɑ mɑ Yuifu yom ndɑ Gɑrɛku yom bɛrɛ.
44018005	Sɑɑ kɑ Silɑ ndɑ Timote hunu zɑ Mɑsedoni lɑɑbu kɑ kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ, Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ nɑ Pɔlu fum ɑ̀ mɑ moo yeti sɛdɑ tɛyom gɑɑ. À cii Yuifu yom sɛ kɑ Yesu yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ.
44018006	Ammɑ Yuifu yom hunguɑ̀ kɑ sendi yɑmɔ cii. Pɔlu nɑ ngɑ jiine yom kɔkɔbɛ ǹ hunguyom sɑbu sɛ. À cii ǹ sɛ: Wom dulum bɑnɑndi go wom bɔm. Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ hinne. Zɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ go kpei dimi cindei dɔ.
44018007	À tunu nodi kɑ kpei huro bɔrɔ fɔ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Yusitu. Bɔrɔ di go kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi. À fuu go lɑmbɑ Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu gɑɑ.
44018008	Kilipu kɑ ɑ̀ ci Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu jinɑ nɑɑne Kpe gɑɑ, ngɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ fuu kulu. Kɔlɛnte bɔrɔ boobo mo kɑ ǹ mɑɑ wɑɑzuyom, ǹ nɑɑne. Ǹ nɑ ǹ mirɑndi mo.
44018009	Kpe bine sendi Pɔlu sɛ ciini hɑndiri kunɑ kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N mɑ si hɑmburu, n mɑ sendi. N mɑ si dɛnjɛ.
44018010	A goono n bɑndɑ. Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu si kɑm n bɔm kɑ hɛ lɑlɔ tɛ n sɛ, zɑmɑ ɑ gundɑ bɔrɔ boobo wɑngɑrɑ wɔ kunɑ.
44018011	Pɔlu mo gɔrɔ nungu di jiiri fɔ ndɑ hɑndu idu ko kɑ ǹ cooɑndi Ikpɛ sendɑ bɔm.
44018012	Sɑɑ kɑ Gɑliyo ci Akɑyɑ lɑɑbu gɑɑbikoni, Yuifu yom tunu mefɔ kɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ Pɔlu. Ǹ kpeindɑɑ̀ ciitiyom dɔ.
44018013	Ǹ cii: Bɔrɔ kpɛ wɔ go bɔrɔ boobo bɛrɛ ǹ mɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ si sɑbɑ ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ.
44018014	Ammɑ kɑ Pɔlu bɑ kɑ ngɑ mee feeri kɑ sendi, cɔfɔ Gɑliyo cii: E Yuifu yom, de ɑ̀ ci gbei lɑlɔ fɔ no wɑlɑ hɛ futu fɔ no, ɑ suuru ndɑ wom.
44018015	Ammɑ de kɑkɔ sendi bɔm wɑlɑ mɑɑ yom bɔm wɑlɑ wom fɔndɑ bɔm, ɑ̀ tɛ wom sendi. A si bɑɑ yɑ ci hɛ nge yom di ciitikɔ.
44018016	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ gɑɑrɛ ciitiyom dɔ jine.
44018017	À gɑɑ no Gɑrɛku yom kulu nɑ Sotɛnisu kɑ ɑ̀ ci Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu jinɑ dii. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑru ciitiyom dɔ jine. Ammɑ Gɑliyo mɑnɑ hɛ nge yom di dɑm sɑɑlu.
44018018	Pɔlu gɔrɔ kɑ jɛ Kɔlɛnte wɑngɑrɑ kpɛɛnɛ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ nyɑize yom too, ɑ̀ huro hɑrihi kɑ kpei Siriɑ lɑɑbu. Pirisilɑ ndɑ Akilɑ goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ. Pɔlu jinɑ kɑ ngɑ bɔm cobu Sɑnkɑriɑ kpɑɑrɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli zɑɑ.
44018019	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ Efese wɑngɑrɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ nɑm. À huro Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu kɑ kɑkɔ ndɑ Yuifu yom.
44018020	Cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ gɔrɔ ndɑ ngei kɑ jɛ ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ tu.
44018021	À nɑ ǹ too kɑ cii: Kɑlɑ de yɑ jingɑru kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ tɛ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ. A ye kɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ de Ikpɛ bɑɑ. À gɑɑ no Pɔlu huro hɑrihi kunɑ Efese wɑngɑrɑ kɑ kpei.
44018022	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ zumbu Kɑsɑriɑ wɑngɑrɑ ɑ̀ ziji kɑ kpei Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ fɔɔ. À bɑndɑ ɑ̀ zumbu kɑ kpei Antiɔku wɑngɑrɑ.
44018023	À nɑ jiribi yom tɛ Antiɔku mo. À bɑndɑ ɑ̀ tunu kɑ gɑnɑ Gɑlɑte lɑɑbu ndɑ Filiji lɑɑbu ko coobɑɑbɑize yom kulu no gɑɑbi.
44018024	Yuifu fɔ mo kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Apolo kɑɑ Efɛse wɑngɑrɑ. Alɛsɑndiɑ bɔrɔ no. Bɔrɔ wɔ sendi kɑɑnɔkpɛ no kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ beire kɑlɑ kɑlɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ yom kunɑ.
44018025	Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ cooɑndi Kpe fɔndɔ bɔm. À gundɑ niyɑ ngɑ bine kunɑ. À go sendi mo kɑ beerem cooɑndi cɑu cɑu hɛ yom kɑ simbɑ ndɑ Kpe. Ammɑ mirɑndiyom kɑ Yohɑnnɑ tɛ hinne no ɑ̀ go bei.
44018026	À sinti kɑ sendi ndɑ yɑrutɛrɛ Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu kunɑ. Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ Pirisilɑ ndɑ Akilɑ nɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ ǹ kpeindɑɑ̀ kɑ Ikpɛ fɔndɑ feeri ɑ̀ sɛ sã sã.
44018027	Kɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ bisɑ kɑ kpei Akɑyɑ lɑɑbu, nyɑizei mo nɑ ɑ̀ no himmɑ. Ǹ nɑ tirɑ hɑntum coobɑɑbɑize yom sɛ kɑ cii ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ kube. Ngɑ mo, sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ nungu di ɑ̀ nɑ wɔ kɑ yom go nɑɑne gomini dɔ gɑɑkɑsine kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
44018028	À nɑ Yuifu yom zeeri ndɑ gɑɑbi. À cɛbɛ ǹ sɛ tɛrɛkpɑrɛ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ yom kunɑ kɑ Yesu yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ.
44019001	À kɑɑ tɔ sɑɑ kɑ Apolo goono Kɔlɛnte wɑngɑrɑ, Pɔlu cɛsu lɑɑbu di sɛ bɛɛnɛ hɛrɛ kɑ kɑɑ Efɛse wɑngɑrɑ. À di coobɑɑbɑize fɔ yom nungu di.
44019002	À cii ǹ sɛ: Wom du Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ sɑɑ kɑ wom nɑɑne bɑ? Ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: I yom wɔ, i mɑnɑ bei hɑli Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ goono.
44019003	Pɔlu cii ǹ sɛ: Dee mirɑndiyom fɔ dimi no ǹ tɛ wom sɛ? Ǹ cii: Mirɑndiyomɑ dimi kɑ Yohɑnnɑ tɛ.
44019004	Pɔlu mo cii: Yohɑnnɑ mirɑndi no tuubiyom bɔm. À cii beerem sɛ mo ǹ mɑ nɑɑne wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ ngɑ bɑndɑ, wɑtom Mɛsiyɑ Yesu gɑɑ.
44019005	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ mɑɑ ngɑ di, ǹ nɑ ǹ mirɑndi Kpe Yesu mɑɑ gɑɑ.
44019006	Kɑ Pɔlu nɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ ǹ bɔm, Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ zumbu ǹ bɔm. À gɑɑ no, ǹ go sendi ndɑ cinɛ ŋmɑni ŋmɑni kɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ.
44019007	Hɑibɔrɔ yom di kulu tɔ zɑngɑ bɔrɔ wei cindi hinkɑ sɑrɑ.
44019008	Hɑndu hinzɑ cine Pɔlu go huro Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu kɑ sendi ǹ sɛ ndɑ yɑrutɛrɛ. À kɑkɔ ndei kɑ simbɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ hɛ yom ko wetere kɑ ǹ bɛrɛ.
44019009	Ammɑ kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom binesɛndi, ǹ hungu kɑ nɑɑne. Ǹ nɑ sendi futu yom cii Yesu fɔndɔ gɑɑ jɑmɑ jine. Pɔlu bine hunu jɑmɑ dɔ kɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom di mo fee ndei. Hɑnu kulu ɑ̀ cini kpei Tirɑno cooyom fuu kɑ kɑkɔ.
44019010	Ngɑ di tɛ zɑngɑ jiiri hinkɑ kɑlɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono Azi lɑɑbu mɑɑ Kpe Yesu sendɑ, zɑ Yuifu yom hɑli Gɑrɛku yom.
44019011	Ikpɛ nɑ dɑbɑri gbei ŋmɑni yom tɛ Pɔlu kɑmbɛ yom dɔ.
44019012	À tɔ mɑ wɑi yom ndɑ fɑtɑlɑ yom kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑhɑm hɑmɑ ndɑ, ǹ nɑ ǹ tɑ Pɔlu dɔ kɑ kpeindei doorikom yom dɔ. Ǹ nɑ ǹ dɑm ǹ gɑɑ. Doori ŋmɑni ŋmɑni gɑnɑ ǹ gɑɑ. Hɔllɛ yom mo hunu beerem bɑndɑ.
44019013	Yuifu fɔ yom mo goono kɑ ǹ go yɑɑli yɑɑli kɑ hɔllɛ yom gɑɑrɛ. Ǹ nɑ Kpe Yesu mɑɑ cɛɛ hɔllɛkpɛ yom gɑɑ. Ǹ cii: Wɑ hunu beerem bɑndɑ Yesu mɑɑ gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑru Pɔlu go fɛɛ.
44019014	Sewɑ, Yuifu yom gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ fɔ gundɑ koo hɑibɔrɔ iye kɑ ǹ go hɛ nge yom di tɛ.
44019015	Ammɑ hɔllɛ di tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: A go Yesu bei. A go Pɔlu bei mo. Ammɑ wom wɔ, wom no mee yom?
44019016	Cɔfɔ bɔrɔ di kɑ hɔllɛ goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ, ɑ̀ kɑm ǹ gɑɑ ndɑ gɑɑbi. À nɑ ǹ zeeri. Ǹ hunu fuuɑ kunɑ kɑ zuuru bumbum. Ǹ mɛrɛ mo.
44019017	Yuifu yom ndɑ Gɑrɛku yom kɑ ǹ goono Efese wɑngɑrɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ gundɑ bɑɑru ngɑ di beiyom. Hɑmburu nɑ ǹ kulu dii. Kpe Yesu mo mɑɑ du bɛɛrɛ.
44019018	Bɔrɔ boobo kɑ ǹ go nɑɑne mo kɑɑ kɑ ngei dulum yom cii. Ǹ go hɛ yom kɑ ngei cini tɛ deede.
44019019	Bɔrɔ boobo kɑ ǹ cini mondɑbɑru tɛ kɑɑndɑ ngei tirɑ yom kɑ ǹ tɔnu bɔrɔ kulu jine. Ǹ nɑ tirɑ yom di nooru yom lɑsɑbu. À tɔ ɑnzɛrɛfu nooru zɑngɑ fɔɔtɔ zɑngu hinkɑ ndɑ weigu.
44019020	Yɑ no Kpe Sendɑ kɑru kɑ see. À tɔntɔnu kɑ ngɑ dɑbɑri cɛbɛ.
44019021	Sɑɑ kɑ hɛ nge yom di tɛ, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ Pɔlu miilɑ ngɑ bine kunɑ ngɑ mɑ kpei Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ ɑmmɑ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ Mɑsedoni ndɑ Akɑyɑ lɑɑbu yom tooru kɑ bisɑ. À cii ǹ sɛ: Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ tɔ Yerusɑlɛm, tilɑsi kɑlɑ yɑ bisɑ kɑ kpei di Lome wɑngɑrɑ nyɑ mo.
44019022	Beerem kɑ ǹ go tɑmtɛrɛ ɑ̀ sɛ kunɑ, Pɔlu nɑ ihinkɑ fɔ dɔntɔm Mɑsedoni lɑɑbu, Timote ndɑ Alɑsitu. Ngɑ bumbum gɔrɔ bɑndɑ fɔ Azi lɑɑbu.
44019023	Sɑɑ ngɑ di no kɔsɔngu bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ tunu kɑ simbɑ ndɑ Yesu fɔndɑ.
44019024	Ngɑ di tɛ no ɑnzɛrɛfu zem fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Dimitiyo sɑbu sɛ. Tooru weibɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Atemi, ɑ̀ fuu no ɑ̀ cini tɛ ndɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu. À go kɑɑndɑ liibɑ bɑmbɑtɑ zem gbeiteeri yom sɛ.
44019025	Dimitiyo nɑ ǹ meigu ndɑ gbeiteeri yom kɑ ǹ go gbeiɑ dimi tɛ. À cii ǹ sɛ: Hɑibɔrɔ yom, wom fɑhɑm gbei wɔ gɑɑ no duure go huro i sɛ.
44019026	Wom go di, wom go mɑɑ kɑ Pɔlu nɑ bɔrɔ boobo cendi kɑ ǹ bɛrɛ. À go cii wɔne yom kɑ ǹ tɛ ndɑ kɑmbɛ mɑnɑ ci ikpɛ yom. À mɑnɑ ci Efɛse wɑngɑrɑ hinne no ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ, ɑmmɑ Azi lɑɑbu bɑyom kulu kunɑ no.
44019027	A sɛ no, ngɑ di kɑɑndɑ i sɛ kɑtɑru zɑmɑ hɑnibɑ i gbeiɑ kɑɑ kɑm hɑwi kunɑ. Ammɑ kɑ bisɑ yɑ, tooru weibɔrɔ Atemi fuuɑ tɛ kɔnu. Ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɛ mo zeeri, ngɑ kɑ Azi lɑɑbu kulu ndɑ hɑndunyɑ sukutum kulu go ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
44019028	Kɑ ǹ mɑɑ ngɑ di, ǹ bine futu. Ǹ kuwɑ kɑ cii: Ibeeri yɑ ci Atemi Efɛse ŋmɔne.
44019029	Wɑngɑrɑ di kulu butugu. Beerem tunu mefɔ ndɑ zuure kɑ kpei mɑrgɑ bɑtumɑ dɔ. Ǹ nɑ Mɑsedoni beerem, Gɑyu ndɑ Alisitɑku dii, nge yom kɑ ǹ ci Pɔlu bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ yom diro di kunɑ.
44019030	Pɔlu bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ huro jɑmɑ di kunɑ, ɑmmɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom hungu ɑ̀ sɛ.
44019031	Azi lɑɑbu jinɑ fɔ yom mo kɑ ǹ ci Pɔlu kpɑɑsi yom nɑ bɔrɔ fɔ dɔntɔm ɑ̀ dɔ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ si kpei mɑrgɑ bɑtumɑ di dɔ.
44019032	Bɔrɔ fɔ yom bine kuwɑ yɑ wɔ, bɔrɔ fɔ yom mo kuwɑ kɑ cii yɑ wɔ, zɑmɑ jɑmɑ di butugu. Bɔrɔ bɑyom mɑnɑ bei hɛ kɑ sɛ ngei meigu.
44019033	Ǹ nɑ Alɛsɑndi cendi kɑ kɑɑ jɑmɑ kunɑ. Yuifu yom nɑ ɑ̀ fum kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm jɑmɑ jine. Alɛsɑndi bine nɑ kɑmbɛ sombu zɑmɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ ngɑ jinde deede beerem sɛ.
44019034	Ammɑ kɑ ǹ bei Yuifu no, ǹ kulu sɑbɑ kɑ kuwɑ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ tɔ zɑngɑ guuru hinkɑ cine. À cii: Ibeeri yɑ ci Atemi fɑ, Efɛse ŋmɔne.
44019035	Wɑngɑrɑ di ŋmɔne hɑntumkɔ nɑ jɑmɑ di lɑɑkɑli kɑnɑndi. À cii ǹ sɛ: Efɛse hɑibɔrɔ yom, mee yɑ mɑnɑ bei kɑ Efɛse wɑngɑrɑ yɑ ci Atemi beeri fuu bɑtukɔ ndɑ ɑ̀ himɑi kɑ ɑ̀ kɑm zɑ bɛɛnɛ?
44019036	Zɑ kɑ hɛ nge yom di sindɑ kɑkɔ, ɑ̀ himɑ wom lɑɑkɑli mɑ kɑni. Wom mɑ si hɛ fɔ tɛ ndɑ sɑsɑ.
44019037	Wom kɑɑndɑ beerem wɔ kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ci tooru fuu zee yom. Ǹ mɑnɑ ci mo wom tooru weibɔrɔ di cɛnɑndikɔ yom.
44019038	À sɛ no de Dimitiyo ndɑ ɑ̀ gbeiteeri yom gundɑ ɑsiiri fɔ ndɑ bɔrɔ fɔ, ciiti fuu go feerɑntɛ. Ciitikɔ mo goono. Wɑ nɑm ǹ mɑ cɛrɛ beri nodi.
44019039	Ammɑ de wom gundɑ hãyom kɑ simbɑ ndɑ hɛ fɔ ŋmɑni, ciiti mɑrgɑ dɔ no ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ sɑsɑbɑndi.
44019040	I goono kɑtɑru kunɑ de ǹ nɑ i beri butugu wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ hunkunɑ sɑbu sɛ. Sɑbɑbu fɔ kulu si kɑ i mɑ tɛ kɔbɛ mɑrgɑ bɑmbɑtɑ wɔ sɛ.
44019041	Sendi nge yom di bɑndɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ mɑrgɑ di tɑm.
44020001	Sɑɑ kɑ kɔsɔnguɑ beeni, Pɔlu nɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom cɛɛ ngɑ dɔ kɑ ǹ too. À gɑɑ no ɑ̀ kpei Mɑsedoni lɑɑbu.
44020002	Kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ lɑɑbu yom yɑɑli kɑ gɑnɑkɔ yom no himmɑ ndɑ sendi boobo, ɑ̀ kɑɑ Gɑrɛku lɑɑbu.
44020003	À gɔrɔ nungu di hɑndu hinzɑ. À bɑ huro hɑrihi kɑ kpei Siriɑ lɑɑbu, cɔfɔ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Yuifu yom nɑ meetosi tɛ ngɑ bɔm. À miilɑ ngɑ mɑ bɛrɛ kɑ Mɑsedoni lɑɑbu fɔndɑ gɑnɑ kɑ ye.
44020004	Beerem kɑ ǹ nɑ Pɔlu dum kɑlɑ Azi lɑɑbu neyɑ, Sopɑtɑru kɑ ɑ̀ ci Beriɑ bɔrɔ ndɑ Alisitɑku ndɑ Sɑkundi Tesɑlonikɑ bɔrɔ yom, ndɑ Gɑyu Dɑlibɑ bɔrɔ fɔ, ndɑ Timote ndɑ Azi bɔrɔ yom Ticiku ndɑ Tofimu.
44020005	Beerem nge yom di huro i jine kɑ i bɑtu Toɑsɑ wɑngɑrɑ.
44020006	Ammɑ i yom mo, Buuru Kɑsɑmi Si jingɑru hɑnu yom bɑndɑ, i tunu Filipi wɑngɑrɑ hɑrihi kunɑ. Jiribi gu no i tɔ Toɑsɑ wɑngɑrɑ. I tɛ jiribi iye wɑngɑrɑ di.
44020007	Jiribi iye ŋmɔne hɑnu sintinɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑlɑhɑdi, coobɑɑbɑize yom meigu kɑ buuru zenji zenji. Pɔlu nɑ meecine fɔ tɛ ǹ sɛ zɑmɑ mo bo Pɔlu bɑ dirɑ. À nɑ sendɑ kukɑndi kɑlɑ ciini bindi.
44020008	Fitilɑ boobo goono jidɑmbisɑ di kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ǹ go meigu.
44020009	Hɑiwɑsu fɔ mo kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Etiku go gɔrɔ jidɑmbisɑ fineti fɔ bɔm. Jiibi timɔ nɑ ɑ̀ dii. Kɑ Pɔlu mo nɑ himmɑ dɑm meecine gɑɑ, cɔfɔ jiibi nɑ hɑiwɑsu di zɑɑ. À kɑm zɑ jidɑmbisɑ di ŋmɔne fuu hinzɑntɛ. Beerem nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ bukɔ.
44020010	Pɔlu zumbu gɑndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ ngɑ jɛndɛ kunɑ. À cii beerem sɛ: Wɑ si hɑmburu zɑmɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ hundi.
44020011	Pɔlu ye kɑ kɑɑru kpɛɛnɛ kɑ buuru kɑ ǹ zenji zenji ŋmɑɑ. À sendi ǹ sɛ kɑ jɛ kɑlɑ mo bo. À bɑndɑ no, ɑ̀ bisɑ.
44020012	Beerem kɑɑndɑ hɑiwɑsu di ndɑ hundi. Ǹ du yɑmɑrɑndiyom hɑli ǹ ci mɔsɔ.
44020013	I jinɑ kɑ huro hɑrihi kɑ kpei hɑli Aso kpɑɑrɑ, nungu kɑ i bɑ Pɔlu zɑɑ. Yɑ no i sɑwɑrɑ zɑmɑ Pɔlu cii ngɑ mɑ kpei cee gɑɑ.
44020014	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ i kube Aso kpɑɑrɑ, i nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ kɑ kpei Mitilem wɑngɑrɑ.
44020015	Zɑ Mitilem, mo bo i tɔ Cio hɔndɛ tɑɑsi jɛrɛ gɑɑ. Mo yɑɑrɑ kɑ bo i tɔ Sɑmosu hɔndɛ tɑɑsi. I gɔrɔ bɑndɑ fɔ Togilum kpɑɑrɑ. Jiribi hinzɑntɛ i tɔ Miletu wɑngɑrɑ.
44020016	Pɔlu nɑ guuri zɑɑ mo ngɑ mɑ cɛsu kɑ bisɑ Efɛse wɑngɑrɑ zɑmɑ ngɑ mɑ si ngɑ sɑɑlu wi Azi lɑɑbu. À gɑ sɑsɑ nɑ de ɑ̀ hini kɑ tɛ ngɑ mɑ tɔ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ Pɑntɛkotu jingɑru hine.
44020017	Zɑ Miletu wɑngɑrɑ Pɔlu nɑ bɔrɔ dɔntɔm ɑ̀ mɑ Efɛse Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom cɛɛ.
44020018	Kɑ ǹ kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Wom bei zɑngɑ dimi ɑ nɑ gɔrɛ tɛ sɑɑ kulu wom gɑme zɑ hɑnu kɑ ɑ nɑ cee dɑm Azi lɑɑbu.
44020019	Wom bei mo zɑngɑ ɑ tɑmtɛrɛ Kpe sɛ ndɑ bɔm yetiyom gɑndɑ kulu. A tɑmtɛrɛ mo ndɑ mundi ndɑ tɑɑbi kɑ ɑ du Yuifu yom meetosi yom sɑbu sɛ.
44020020	Wom bei kɑ yɑ nɑ hɛ fɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ ci bɑrikɑ gumɑndi wom sɛ. A nɑ ǹ cii wom sɛ kɑ cooɑndi hɛ kulu bɔm hebu bɑtumɑ kunɑ ndɑ wom fuu yom kunɑ.
44020021	A tɛ sɛdɑ ndɑ himmɑ Yuifu yom sɛ ndɑ Gɑrɛku yom sɛ ǹ mɑ tuubi kɑ bɛrɛ Ikpɛ dɔ. Ǹ mɑ nɑɑne mo i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gɑɑ.
44020022	Mɑɑsɑ bine, gunɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ hini hɛɛ. Yerusɑlɛm no ɑ go kpei yɑ ɑmmɑ ɑ si bei hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ tɔ hɛɛ nodi.
44020023	Ammɑ ɑ go bei Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ kɑɑbɑɑru kɑ cii seseri yom ndɑ tɑɑbi yom go kɑ ɑ bɑtu wɑngɑrɑ ndɑ wɑngɑrɑ.
44020024	Ammɑ yɑ nɑ ɑ hundi dɑm hɛ fɔ kulu zɑngɑ hɛ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ nɑfɑ kɑlɑ yɑ ɑ bɑtɑ tɔnɑndi ndɑ binekɑɑne. Yɑ tɔnɑndi mo gbei kɑ ɑ du Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ kɑ Ikpɛ gomini Bɑɑru Hinno sɛdɑ.
44020025	Ammɑ ɑ gɑnɑ wom dɔ kɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ bɑɑru fɛɛ. Mɑɑsɑ gunɑ, ɑ bei kɑ wom si di ɑ moodumɑ kpɛɛnɛ.
44020026	À sɛ no ɑ go sɛdɑ wom sɛ hunkunɑ kɑ cii ɑ hinne. Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu bu bɑnɑndi si ɑ bɔm.
44020027	A cii yɑ zɑmɑ ɑ nɑ wom no Ikpɛ cɛbɛ kulu bɑɑru. Yɑ nɑ hɛ fɔ kulu tugu ɑ̀ kunɑ.
44020028	Ngɑ di sɛ wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ wom bɔm ndɑ kuru kɑ ɑ̀ bɔm Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ nɑ wom jisi cendikɔ yom. Wom mɑ Ikpɛ mɑrgɑ kurum, mɑrgɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dei ndɑ ngɑ bumbum kuri.
44020029	A go wɔne bei kɑ ɑ diro bɑndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci bu iburɑdɑm zɑngɑ sɑgɑli futu yom kɑɑ huro wom kunɑ. Ǹ si kuru bɑkɑɑ.
44020030	Wom bumbum kunɑ mo, iburɑdɑm yom kɑɑ tunu kɑ hɛ yom siirɑndi zɑmɑ ngei mɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom cendi ngei bɑndɑ.
44020031	À sɛ no wom mo bɑtu. Wom mo hɔngɔ kɑ jiiri hinzɑ ɑ mɑnɑ cɛ ciini ndɑ zɑɑri ndɑ himmɑ noyom ɑfɔ fɔ kulu sɛ. A nɑ ngɑ di tɛ ndɑ mundi.
44020032	Nyɑizei, mɑɑsɑ ɑ go wom tɑlifi Ikpɛ gɑɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ gominɑ Sendi gɑɑ. Sendi wɔ gundɑ dɑbɑri kɑ wom nɑɑne cini. À gundɑ dɑbɑri mo kɑ wom no tubu hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kulu bɑndɑ.
44020033	Yɑ nɑ bɔrɔ kulu ɑnzɛrɛfu dɑm ɑ bine wɑlɑ ɑ̀ wurɑ wɑlɑ ɑ̀ jiine yom.
44020034	Wom bumbum bei kɑ ndɑ ɑ kɑmbɛ yom wɔ no, ɑ nɑ gbei tɛ kɑ du hɛ kɑ hɛɛ ndɑ ɑ bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ yom go bɑɑ.
44020035	A nɑ wom cɛbɛ kɑ gbei yɑ wɔ dimi gɑɑ i mɑ hinɑbunu yom gɑɑ. I mo hɔngɔ Kpe Yesu sendɑ kɑ ngɑ bumbum cii: Noyom bɑrikɑ bisɑ tɑyom.
44020036	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ sendi nge yom di beeni, ɑ̀ sɔmbu kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ ǹ kulu bɑndɑ.
44020037	Ǹ kulu hɛ ndɑ hɛni kɔnnɔ. Ǹ nɑ Pɔlu ku ngei jɛndɛ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ jɛrɛbɛ sumsum.
44020038	Ǹ bine sɑrɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ ndɑ sendɑ kɑ Pɔlu cii ǹ si di ngɑ moodumɑ kpɛɛnɛ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ dum kɑlɑ hɑrihi huroyom dɔ.
44021001	Sɑɑ kɑ lɔkɑci tɔ i mɑ huro hɑrihi, i fee ndɑ cɛrɛ. I huro hɑrihi kɑ kpei susu Kosi hɔndɛ tɑɑsi. À mo bo i tɔ Lodu hɔndɛ tɑɑsi. Zɑ Lodu mo i kɑɑ Pɑtɑlɑ wɑngɑrɑ.
44021002	Zɑ Pɑtɑlɑ mo i du hɑrihi fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go degɑndi kɑ kpei Finiciɑ lɑɑbu. I huro ɑ̀ kunɑ kɑ kpei.
44021003	Kɑ i nɑ Kuburu hɔndɛ tɑɑsi hunne i nɑ ɑ̀ cɛsu kɑ ɑ̀ nɑm kɑmbɛwo hɛrɛ kɑ Siriɑ lɑɑbu fɔndɑ gɑnɑ. I zumbu Tiru kpɑɑrɑ zɑmɑ nungu di no hɑrihiɑ go kɑ ngɑ jɛrɔ yom zumɑndi.
44021004	Kɑ i nɑ coobɑɑbɑize yom gɑru kpɑɑrɑ di, i gɔrɔ ndei jiribi iye. Ǹ cii Pɔlu sɛ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ gɑɑ ɑ̀ mɑ si kpei Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ.
44021005	Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ i nɑ jiribi iye tɔnɑndi, i tunu kɑ dirɑ. Ǹ kulu ndɑ ǹ wɛndɛ yom ndɑ ǹ koo yom nɑ i dum kɑlɑ wɑngɑrɑ bɑndɑ. I sɔmbu tɛkuɑ mee gɑɑ kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ.
44021006	À bɑndɑ kɑ i nɑ cɛrɛ too i huro hɑrihi kunɑ. Ngei mo ye fuu.
44021007	Sɑɑ kɑ i dirɑ kɑ hunu Tiru, i kɑɑ Putolomi kpɑɑrɑ. I nɑ kpɑɑrɑ di nyɑize yom fɔɔ. I gɔrɔ ǹ dɔ jiribi fɔ.
44021008	À mo bo i yom ndɑ Pɔlu tunu kɑ kɑɑ Kɑsɑriɑ wɑngɑrɑ. I huro kɑ zumbu Filipu hundi. Filipu yɑ ci wɑɑzukɔ, nyɑize iye di ŋmɔne ɑfɔ no.
44021009	À gundɑ koo hundiyo tɑɑci kɑ ǹ go ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ. Ǹ si hɑru bei.
44021010	I nɑ jiribi yom tɛ ko gɔrɔ nungu di. Andebi fɔ mo kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Agɑbo kɑɑ i dɔ.
44021011	Sɑɑ kɑ Agɑbo kɑɑ i dɔ ɑ̀ nɑ Pɔlu kunɑcendi zɑɑ kɑ ngɑ cee yom ndɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ yom hɔ. À cii: Yɑ no Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ cii, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɔne no kunɑcendi wɔ, zɑngɑ yɑ no Yuifu yom gɑ ɑ̀ hɔ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ. Ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ dɑm dimi cindei kɑmbɛ.
44021012	Sɑɑ kɑ i mɑɑ yɑ di i yom ndɑ hundi di kulu bɔrɔ yom nɑ Pɔlu ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ si kpei Yerusɑlɛm.
44021013	À gɑɑ no Pɔlu tu kɑ cii: Ifɔ sɛ wom go hɛ kɑ ɑ bine sɑrɑndi? Hɛɛ wɔ ɑ sɔlu ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ǹ mɑ ɑ hɔ hinne sɛ bo, ɑmmɑ kɑ yɑ bu Yerusɑlɛm kunɑ Kpe Yesu mɑɑ sɑbu sɛ.
44021014	Zɑ kɑ i mɑnɑ du kɑ ɑ̀ bɛrɛ, i dɛnjɛ kɑ cii: Kɑlɑ Kpe binebɑɑ mɑ tɛ.
44021015	Jiribi nge yom di bɑndɑ, i sɔlu kɑ kpei Yerusɑlɛm.
44021016	Kɑsɑriɑ wɑngɑrɑ coobɑɑbɑize fɔ yom mo nɑ i gɑnɑ. Ǹ kpeindɑ coobɑɑbɑize zeenɔ fɔ ngei bɑndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Mɑnɑsɔ i mɑ zumbu ɑ̀ dɔ. Kuburu hɔndɛ tɑɑsi bɔrɔ no.
44021017	Kɑ i tɔ Yerusɑlɛm, nyɑize yom nɑ i kube ndɑ fɑihã.
44021018	À mo bo Pɔlu huro ndɑ i yom Yɑkɔfu hundi. Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom mo kulu kɑɑ.
44021019	Sɑɑ kɑ Pɔlu nɑ ǹ fɔɔ, ɑ̀ deede ǹ sɛ ɑfɔ fɔ hɛ kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ dimi cindei dɔ ngɑ gbei gɑɑ.
44021020	Kɑ ǹ mɑɑ yɑ di ǹ nɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi. Ǹ cii Pɔlu sɛ: Nyɑize, n di zɑngɑ Yuifu yom kunɑ bɔrɔ dubu dubu yom nɑɑne. Ǹ kulu mo gundɑ himmɑ Moisi fɔndɑ kunɑ.
44021021	Ǹ bine mɑɑ kɑ n go Yuifu yom kulu kɑ ǹ goono dimi cindei lɑɑbu cooɑndi kɑ cii ǹ mɑ fee ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ. Ǹ mɑɑ bɑɑru mo kɑ n cooɑndi ǹ mɑ si ngei koo yom dɑmbɑngu. Ǹ mɑ si Yuifu yom ɑlɑɑdɑ yom gɑnɑ mo.
44021022	To. Mɑɑsɑ mɛtɛ i mɑ tɛ? Kɑlɑ de Yerusɑlɛm gɑnɑkɔ yom kulu mɑ meigu, zɑ kɑ ǹ mɑɑ n kɑɑ nee.
44021023	À sɛ no, n mɑ tɛ hɛ kɑ i go cii n sɛ. Bɔrɔ tɑɑci goono i sɛ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli zɑɑ ngei bɔm.
44021024	N mɑ huro ǹ kunɑ kɑ n bɔm hinnɑndi ndei. N mɑ ǹ gɑrɑndi hɛ yom bɑnɑ zɑmɑ ǹ mɑ du kɑ ngei bɔm yom cobu. À gɑɑ no bɔrɔ kulu kɑɑ du kɑ bei kɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ǹ cii n gɑɑ tɑngɑri no. Ammɑ ǹ mɑ di kɑ ni mo, n go lɑɑkɑli ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ ko kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ.
44021025	Ammɑ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ dimi cindei kɑ ǹ nɑɑne i hɑntum kɑ cii ǹ sɛ ǹ mɑ si wɔne tɛ. Ammɑ i nɑ ǹ dɑm ǹ mɑ ngei bɔm jɛ ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ gɑrɑndi tooru gɑɑ. Ǹ mɑ ngei bɔm jɛ mo ndɑ kuri ndɑ hɛ kɑ ǹ kɔtɛ kɑ wi ndɑ zinɑ.
44021026	À gɑɑ no ɑ̀ mo bo Pɔlu nɑ ngɑ bɔm hinnɑndi ndɑ bɔrɔ tɑɑcɑ. À bine huro ndei Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ. À nɑ bɑɑru no sɑɑ kɑ hinneyom hɑnu yom kube ǹ mɑ gɑrɑndi tɛ ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ fɔ kulu sɛ.
44021027	Sɑɑ kɑ jiribi iye di bɑ kube, cɔfɔ Azi Yuifu yom di Pɔlu Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ. Ǹ nɑ jɑmɑ kulu zukum ǹ nɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ Pɔlu bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ dii.
44021028	Ǹ kuwɑ kɑ cii: Isirɑilɑ hɑibɔrɔ yom, wɑ i gɑɑ. Bɔrɔ di neyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ beerem cooɑndi nungu kulu. À gɑ cii ǹ mɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ Isirɑilɑ jɑmɑ ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ ndɑ Nungu wɔ mɑ. Ngɑ mɑ yɑ kɑɑndɑ Gɑrɛku yom Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ kɑ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ wɔ ziibɑndi.
44021029	Ǹ nɑ ngɑ di cii nɑ zɑmɑ ǹ jinɑ kɑ di Tolifim Efese bɔrɔ fɔ wɑngɑrɑ di kunɑ Pɔlu bɑndɑ. Cɔfɔ ǹ tɑmmɑ hɑli Pɔlu kpeindɑ Tolifim Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ nɑ.
44021030	Wɑngɑrɑ di bɔrɔ kulu dirigo. Beerem gɑ zuuru kɑ kɑɑ kɑ meigu. Ǹ nɑ Pɔlu dii. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ cendi kɑ kɑɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ. Ǹ nɑ hundi mee yom dɑɑbu.
44021031	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ gɑ ceeci ngei mɑ ɑ̀ wi, bɑɑru tɔ wɑnguize yom ŋmɔne hɑikusu fɔ kɑ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ kulu butugu.
44021032	Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ wɑnguize hɑikusɑ nɑ wɑnguize yom ndɑ wɑnguize yom jinehune yom zɑɑ ngɑ bɑndɑ. Ǹ zuuru kɑ kpei jɑmɑ dɔ. Sɑɑ kɑ jɑmɑ wɔ di wɑnguize yom hɑikusu ndɑ wɑnguize yom kulu, ǹ cɛ ndɑ Pɔlu kɑruyomɑ.
44021033	Cɔfɔ wɑnguize yom hɑikusɑ mɑɑni kɑ Pɔlu dii. À nɑ wɑnguize yom nɑ mei ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ hɔ ndɑ nyɔri hinkɑ. À nɑ Pɔlu hã ngɑ yɑ mee nɑ ndɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ tɛ.
44021034	Ammɑ jɑmɑ di kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom kuwɑ kɑ hɛ fɔ cii. Bɔrɔ fɔ yom cii hɛ fɔ ŋmɑni. Wɑnguize yom hɑikusɑ si bei ndɑ cimi hɛ kɑ Pɔlu cii kɔsɔngu sɑbu sɛ. À nɑ ǹ nɑ mei ǹ mɑ kpeindɑ Pɔlu wɑnguize yom fuu kunɑ.
44021035	Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ tɔ ndɑ Pɔlu fuuɑ mee cee dɛcɛyom dɔ jine, cɔfɔ wɑnguize yom nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ jɑmɑ di bine bugubugu sɑbu sɛ.
44021036	À nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ zɑmɑ bɔrɔ bɑɑbɑ yɑ nɑ Pɔlu gɑnɑ. Ǹ gɑ kuwɑ kɑ cii: Wɑ kpeindɑɑ̀ kɑ ɑ̀ wi.
44021037	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ bɑ Pɔlu dɑm wɑnguize yom fuuɑ kunɑ, ɑ̀ cii wɑnguize yom hɑikusɑ sɛ: N tu ɑ sɛ yɑ hɛ fɔ cii n sɛ bɑ? Wɑnguize yom hɑikusɑ tu kɑ cii: N ŋmɑɑni Gɑrɛku cinɛ bɑ?
44021038	Ni yɑ ci Eziputu bɔrɔ di kɑ jiribi yom kɑ ǹ bisɑ kunɑ ɑ̀ nɑ jɑmɑ tunɑndi kɑlɑ n butugu. Ni yɑ ci bɔrɔ di kɑ ɑ̀ kpeindɑ bɔrɔ wikɔ dubu tɑɑci gɑnji kunɑ. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
44021039	Ammɑ Pɔlu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Hɛɛ wɔ Yuifu no, Tɑlisu wɑngɑrɑ bɔrɔ. Hɛɛ yɑ Cilici lɑɑbu wɑngɑrɑ bɔrɔ no, wɑngɑrɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ zɑm bɛɛrɛ. A go kɑ n ŋmɑɑrɛ n mɑ tu ɑ sɛ yɑ sendi jɑmɑ wɔ sɛ.
44021040	Wɑnguize yom hɑikusɑ tu ɑ̀ sɛ. Pɔlu cɛ fuuɑ mee cee dɛcɛyom dɔ bɔm kɑ kɑmbɛ sombu jɑmɑ di sɛ. Kɑ beerem dɛnjɛ sɑkɑi, ɑ̀ sendi ǹ sɛ ndɑ Ebulu cinɛ.
44022001	À cii: Nyɑize hɑibɔrɔ yom ndɑ bɑɑbɑ yom, wɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ sɛ yɑ ɑ jinde deede mɑɑsɑnkulu wom dɔ.
44022002	Sɑɑ kɑ jɑmɑ mɑɑ ɑ̀ sendi ngei sɛ ndɑ Ebulu cinɛ cɔfɔ ǹ hinsɑ kɑ dɛnjɛ kpɛɛnɛ.
44022003	Pɔlu cii: Hɛɛ yɑ Yuifu no, Tɑlisu wɑngɑrɑ no ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɛi, Cilici lɑɑbu. Ammɑ wɑngɑrɑ wɔ kunɑ no, ǹ nɑ ɑ biiri. Gɑmɑli yɑ nɑ ɑ cooɑndi cɑu cɑu ndɑ zɑngɑ i cɛɛ yom fɔndɑ goono ndɑ. Hɛɛ mo bine, ɑ gundɑ himmɑ Ikpɛ sɛ zɑngɑ wom kulu gundɑ hunkunɑ.
44022004	Hɛɛ mo, ɑ nɑ Mɛsiyɑ fɔndɔ gɑnɑkɔ yom guruguzɑndi kɑlɑ ǹ tɔ bu gɑɑ. A nɑ hɑibɔrɔ yom ndɑ weibɔrɔ yom hɔ kɑ ǹ dɑm kɑsu.
44022005	Yɑ no gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ bumbum go ci ɑ sɛdɑ ndɑ Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom kulu meiguɑntɛ. À du tirɑ yom ǹ dɔ Dɑmɑku nyɑize yom sɛ. A kpei Dɑmɑku kɑ gɑnɑkɔ yom kɑ ǹ goono hɔ. A kɑɑndei Yerusɑlɛm ǹ mɑ ǹ ciiti.
44022006	À kɑɑ tɔ ɑ goono fɔndɑ bɔm ko mɑɑni Dɑmɑku wɑngɑrɑ zɑɑri zɑkɑ. Mefɔ mefɔ kɑɑri bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ. À hɑɑgɑ kɑ ɑ hundi.
44022007	A kɑm fɔndɑ bɔm. Cɔfɔ ɑ mɑɑ jinde fɔ go cii ɑ sɛ: Sɑuli, Sɑuli, ifɔ sɛ n go kɑ ɑ guruguzɑndi?
44022008	A tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Ni no mee Kpe? À cii ɑ sɛ: Hɛɛ no Yesu Nɑzɑrɛtu kɑ n go guruguzɑndi.
44022009	Beerem kɑ ǹ goono ɑ bɑndɑ kɑ ǹ di kɑɑri di, hɑmburu nɑ ǹ dii. Ammɑ ǹ si mɑɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go sendi ɑ sɛ di jinde.
44022010	A cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ifɔ no yɑ tɛ Kpe? Kpe cii ɑ sɛ: Tunu kɑ cɛ. N mɑ kpei Dɑmɑku. Wɑngɑrɑ di ǹ kɑɑ cii n sɛ hɛ yom kulu kɑ ǹ jisi n mɑ tɛ.
44022011	Zɑ kɑ ɑ si hini kɑ di hɛ fɔ kulu kɑɑri di ŋmɔne deizɑ sɑbu sɛ, beerem kɑ ǹ goono ɑ bɑndɑ nɑ ɑ kɑmbɛ dii. Ǹ nɑ ɑ cendi kɑlɑ ɑ tɔ Dɑmɑku wɑngɑrɑ.
44022012	Bɔrɔ fɔ mo goono kɑ ǹ cii ɑ sɛ Anɑni. Ikpɛ gɑnɑkɔ fɔ no kɑ simbɑ ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ. À sɛdɑ boori ndɑ Yuifu yom kulu kɑ ǹ goono nungu di ndɑ gɔrɛ.
44022013	À kɑɑ ɑ dɔ kɑ cɛ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ɑ sɛ: Nyɑize Sɑuli, n mɑ moo feeri. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ nɑ moo feeri. A di ɑ̀.
44022014	À cii: I cɛɛ yom ŋmɔne Ikpɛ nɑ n dɑm n mɑ ngɑ binebɑɑ bei. À nɑ n dɑm n mɑ di Cɛsusukpɛ. N mɑ mɑɑ sendi yom kɑ ǹ hunu ɑ̀ mee mo.
44022015	N kɑɑ ci ɑ̀ sɛdɑ iburɑdɑm yom kulu dɔ, hɛ yom kulu kɑ n di ndɑ hɛ yom kulu kɑ n mɑɑ bɔm.
44022016	Mɑɑsɑ ifɔ n go bɑtu? Tunu kɑ Kpe mɑɑ cɛɛ. Ǹ mɑ n mirɑndi. Ǹ mɑ n nyume n dulum yom gɑɑ.
44022017	À kɑɑ tɔ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ ye Yerusɑlɛm ɑ go kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ. A di diyom fɔ.
44022018	A di Kpe. À go cii ɑ sɛ: Wɑɑsu, n mɑ hunu Yerusɑlɛm ndɑ wɑɑsi zɑmɑ beerem si n sɛdɑ kɑ simbɑ hɛɛ tɑ.
44022019	A cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpe, ngei bumbum bei kɑ ɑ cini huro Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu yom kunɑ kɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go nɑɑne n gɑɑ dii. A cini kɑ ǹ dɑm kɑsu kɑ ǹ kɑru.
44022020	Sɑɑ kɑ n sɛdɑ Tifɑnu kuri bɑmbɑri, hɛɛ bumbum ɑ go cɛ ɑ̀ jine no. A tu mo ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ wi. A go beerem kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ wi jiine yom jɛ ǹ sɛ.
44022021	Kpe cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpei, zɑmɑ ɑ gɑ n dɔntɔm nungu mooru dimi cindei dɔ.
44022022	Jɑmɑ nɑ hɑngɑ dɑm Pɔlu sɛ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ nɑ sendi ngɑ di cii. Cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ jinde zɑɑ kɑ cii: Ǹ mɑ bɔrɔ kpɛ dimi kɑɑ hɑndunyɑ kunɑ. À mɑnɑ himɑ ɑ̀ mɑ hunɑ.
44022023	Ǹ go kuwɑ. Ǹ go kɑ ngei jiine yom kɔɔtu ko lɑɑbu kuu kɑ see bɛɛnɛ binetɔnɛ sɑbu sɛ.
44022024	Wɑnguize yom hɑikusu di nɑ ǹ no mei ǹ mɑ kpeindɑ Pɔlu wɑnguize yom fuu. À cii ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ hã ndɑ bulɑɑlɑ kɑ du kɑ bei sɑbɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ǹ go kuwɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ yɑ wɔ dimi.
44022025	Ammɑ kɑ ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ hɔ ndɑ kuuru kɔrɔfɔ yom Pɔlu cii wɑnguize yom jinehune fɔ sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go cɛ ɑ̀ jɛrɛ gɑɑ: À hɑlɑli n mɑ Lomɑncɛ kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ ciiti kɑ zeeri bulɑɑlɑ bɑ?
44022026	Sɑɑ kɑ wɑnguize yom jinehune mɑɑ ngɑ di, ɑ̀ deede wɑnguize yom hɑikusɑ sɛ. À cii: N mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ hɛ kɑ n bɑ tɛ wɔ zɑmɑ bɔrɔ di Lomɑncɛ no.
44022027	À gɑɑ nɑ wɑnguize yom hɑikusɑ mɑɑni Pɔlu dɔ kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ni yɑ Lomɑncɛ no? Pɔlu cii: Oò.
44022028	Wɑnguize yom hɑikusɑ mo cii: Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ nɑ Lomɑncɛtɛrɛ dei no ndɑ nooru bɑmbɑtɑ. Pɔlu mo cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Hɛɛ wɔ, yɑ no ǹ nɑ ɑ hɛi.
44022029	Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ beerem kɑ ǹ bɑ hãyom di tɛ, sunsunu ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Hɑmburu nɑ wɑnguize yom hɑikusɑ dii zɑ ɑ̀ bei kɑ Lomɑncɛ no ndɑ mo kɑ ɑ̀ nɑm ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɔ.
44022030	À mo bo, kɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ bei cɑu cɑu hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ Yuifu yom nɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ feeri ŋyɔri yom gɑɑ. À nɑ fɔndɔ no gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Yuifu yom ciiti dumbukɔ kulu mɑ meigu. Ǹ nɑ Pɔlu zumɑndi kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm ǹ jine.
44023001	Pɔlu nɑ moo sinji Yuifu yom ciiti dumbukɔ yom gɑɑ kɑ cii: Nyɑize hɑibɔrɔ yom, bine kunɑ sendi hinno kunɑ no ɑ go dirɑ Ikpɛ jine kɑlɑ kɑ kɑɑ hɑnu wɔ.
44023002	Gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Anɑni nɑ beerem kɑ ǹ goono Pɔlu jɛrɛ gɑɑ no mei ǹ mɑ Pɔlu kɑru mee gɑɑ.
44023003	Pɔlu cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ikpɛ gɑ n kɑru, ni yɛmbɛ kɑ ǹ kpɑrɑndi. N go gɔrɔ ko ciiti ɑ sɛ ndɑ zɑngɑ Moisi fɔndɑ goono ndɑ. Ammɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ si sɑbɑ ndɑ fɔndɑ n nɑ ǹ no mei ǹ mɑ ɑ kɑru?
44023004	Beerem kɑ ǹ goono Pɔlu jɛrɛ gɑɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ikpɛ gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ no n go woo fɑ.
44023005	Pɔlu tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: Nyɑizei, yɑ nɑ bei no hɑli gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ no zɑmɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "N mɑ si hɛ lɑlɔ cii n jɑmɑ hinikpɛ sɛ."
44023006	Ammɑ zɑ kɑ Pɔlu bei ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ yom Sɑdusi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom no, cindei mo Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom, ɑ̀ sendi ndɑ jinde beeri Yuifu yom ciiti dumbukɔ yom jine. À cii: Nyɑize hɑibɔrɔ yom, hɛɛ yɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ no, Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ koo mo. Bukɔei tunɑndiyom bɛɛjɛ sɛ no ǹ go kɑ ɑ ciiti.
44023007	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ di cii cɔfɔ kɔsɔngu tunu Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom di ndɑ Sɑdusi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom gɑme. Jɑmɑ di fee ihinkɑ.
44023008	Kɔsɔnguɑ tunu zɑmɑ Sɑdusi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom go cii tunɑndiyom si, Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize si, biyɑ si. Ammɑ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ yom wɔ go cii ǹ kulu goono.
44023009	Kɔsɔngu bɑmbɑtɑ tunu. Moisi fɔndɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom kɑ ǹ ci Fɑrisi bɔrɔ yom tunu kɑ kɑkɔ. Ǹ cii: I yom wɔ, i mɑnɑ di hɛ fɔ lɑlɔ kulu bɔrɔ kpɛ gɑɑ. Ammɑ de biyɑ fɔ wɑlɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize fɔ yɑ sendi ɑ̀ sɛ, i mɑ si gɑɑbɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ.
44023010	Kɑ butugu bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ tunu, wɑnguize yom hɑikusɑ go hɑmburu hɑnibɑ ǹ mɑ Pɔlu pɑti. À sɛ nɑ ɑ̀ nɑ wɑnguize yom dɑm ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ ǹ bindi kunɑ. Ǹ mɑ kpeindɑ Pɔlu wɑnguize yom fuu dɔ.
44023011	À mo bo ciini cɔfɔ Kpe kɑɑ Pɔlu dɔ kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Pɔlu, n mɑ himmɑ dɑm zɑmɑ zɑngɑ n kɑɑndɑ sɛdɑ kɑ simbɑ hɛɛ Yerusɑlɛm, zɑngɑ yɑ n mɑ kpeindɑ ɑ sɛdɑ mo Lome wɑngɑrɑ.
44023012	Sɑɑ kɑ mo bo Yuifu fɔ yom nɑ meetosi tɛ kɑ cɛrɛ tilɑsi. Ǹ ze ngei bɔm gɑɑ kɑ ngei si ŋmɑɑ, ngei si hɑm kɑlɑ de ngei nɑ Pɔlu wi.
44023013	Ǹ bisɑ bɔrɔ weitɑɑci kɑ ǹ nɑ meetosi ngɑ di tɛ.
44023014	Cɔfɔ ǹ kɑɑ gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ hɑikusu yom dɔ. Ǹ cii: I nɑ i bɔm tilɑsi ndɑ zeyom kɑ i si hɛ fɔ kulu tɑbɑɑ kɑlɑ de i nɑ Pɔlu wi.
44023015	Mɑɑsɑ bine wom, ndɑ Yuifu yom ciiti dumbukɔ yom, wom mɑ sendi wɑnguize yom hɑikusɑ sɛ subɑ ɑ̀ mɑ Pɔlu zumɑndi wom sɛ. Wom mɑ tɛ zɑngɑ hɛ kɑ bɑɑru fɔ no wom go bɑɑ wom mɑ du ɑ̀ dɔ cɑu cɑu. Hɑli ɑ̀ mɑɑni i sɔlu i mɑ ɑ̀ wi.
44023016	Ammɑ Pɔlu weimɑ ize mɑɑ meetosi di. À kpei huro wɑnguize yom fuu kɑ ɑ̀ deede Pɔlu sɛ.
44023017	Pɔlu nɑ wɑnguize yom jinehune yom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ cɛɛ. À cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Kpeindɑ hɑiwɑsu wɔ wɑnguize yom hɑikusɑ dɔ. À gundɑ hɛ fɔ ɑ̀ deede ɑ̀ sɛ.
44023018	À kpeindɑ hɑiwɑsu di wɑnguize yom hɑikusɑ dɔ kɑ cii: Kɑsuize Pɔlu yɑ nɑ ɑ cɛɛ kɑ ɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ yɑ kɑɑndɑ hɑiwɑsu wɔ n dɔ. À gundɑ hɛ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cii n sɛ.
44023019	Wɑnguize yom hɑikusɑ mo nɑ ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ dii kɑ ye ndɑɑ̀ kɑmbu kɑ ɑ̀ hã: Ifɔ no n gundɑ n mɑ cii ɑ sɛ?
44023020	Hɑiwɑsu di cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Yuifu yom yɑ nɑ mefɔ tɛ ngei mɑ n ŋmɑɑrɛ n mɑ Pɔlu zumɑndi Yuifu yom ciiti dumbukɔ yom jine subɑ. Ǹ mɑ tɛ zɑngɑ hɛ kɑ bɑɑru fɔ no ǹ go bɑɑ ǹ mɑ du ɑ̀ dɔ cɑu cɑu.
44023021	Ammɑ ni wɔ, n mɑ si tu ǹ sɛ zɑmɑ ǹ bisɑ bɔrɔ weitɑɑci kɑ ǹ gɑ gum ko Pɔlu bɑtu. Ǹ nɑ ngei bɔm tilɑsi ndɑ zeyom kɑ ngei mɑ si ŋmɑɑ, ngei mɑ si hɑm kɑlɑ de ngei nɑ Pɔlu wi. Mɑɑsɑ ǹ sɔlu beeni. Alikɑwɑli kɑ ɑ̀ hunu n dɔ hinne no ǹ go bɑtu.
44023022	Wɑnguize yom hɑikusɑ bine nɑ hɑiwɑsu di tɑm. À nɑ ɑ̀ nɑ mei kɑ cii: Hɛ yom kɑ n deede ɑ sɛ, n mɑ si ɑ̀ cii bɔrɔ fɔ kulu sɛ.
44023023	À gɑɑ no, ɑ̀ nɑ wɑnguize yom jinehune yom ŋmɔne ihinkɑ cɛɛ. À cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ sɔlu ndɑ wɑnguize zɑngu hinkɑ. Ǹ mɑ kpei Kɑsɑriɑ wɑngɑrɑ ndɑ bɑrikɑri weiye ndɑ yɑɑjikpɛ zɑngu hinkɑ zɑ wiciri guuru ɛgɑ.
44023024	Ǹ mɑ bɑri yom sɔlu Pɔlu mɑ kɑɑru ɑfɔ bɔm. Ǹ mɑ kpeindɑ Pɔlu gɑndɑkpɛ Felisi dɔ bɑɑni.
44023025	Wɑnguize yom hɑikusɑ nɑ tirɑ wɔne hɑntum kɑ cii:
44023026	Hɛɛ Kolodu Liziɑ, hɛɛ yɑ go gɑɑbikoni Felisi hinno kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ ǹ kulu fɔɔ.
44023027	Yuifu yom yɑ nɑ bɔrɔ kpɛ dii. Ǹ bɑ kɑ ɑ̀ wi, cɔfɔ ɑ tɔ ɑ̀ dɔ ndɑ wɑnguize yom. A nɑ ɑ̀ tɑ ǹ kɑmbɛ gɑɑ zɑ kɑ ɑ mɑɑ Lomɑncɛ no.
44023028	Kɑ ɑ bɑɑ yɑ mɑɑ sɑbɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑ, ɑ kɑɑndɑɑ̀ ǹ ŋmɔne ciiti dumbukɔ yom jine.
44023029	A bine di kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑ no kɑ simbɑ ndɑ ǹ fɔndɑ. À mɑnɑ hɛ lɑlɔ fɔ kulu tɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ tɔ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ wi, wɑlɑ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ hɔ.
