44023030	A bine du bɑɑru Yuifu yom nɑ meetosi fɔ tɛ ɑ̀ bɔm ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ wi. À sɛ no ɑ wɑɑsu wɑɑsu kɑ ɑ̀ sɑmbɑ n dɔ. A nɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑkɔ yom mo no mei ǹ mɑ cii n jine hɛ kɑ sɛ ngei go kɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑ. Too. N mɑ gɔrɔ bɑɑni.
44023031	Wɑnguize yom bine nɑ Pɔlu zɑɑ mei kɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ no bɔm. Ǹ kpeindɑɑ̀ ciini kunɑ Antipɑti kpɑɑrɑ.
44023032	À mo bo ǹ nɑm bɑrikɑri yom kpei Pɔlu bɑndɑ. Wɑnguize yom mo ye ngei fuuɑ dɔ.
44023033	Sɑɑ kɑ bɑrikɑri yom tɔ Kɑsɑriɑ wɑngɑrɑ ǹ nɑ tirɑ di no gɑɑbikoni di sɛ. Ǹ nɑ Pɔlu mo cɛbɛ ɑ̀ sɛ.
44023034	Kɑ gɑɑbikonɑ nɑ tirɑ di coo ɑ̀ nɑ Pɔlu hã lɑɑbu kɑ bɔrɔ no. Kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Siliciɑ lɑɑbu bɔrɔ no cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ɑ̀ sɛ:
44023035	A kɑɑ hɑngɑ dɑm sã n sɛ sɑɑ kɑ n tɔnyɑkɔ yom kɑɑ.
44024001	À tɛ jiribi gu cɔfɔ Anɑni kɑ ɑ̀ ci gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ kɑɑ. Yuifu mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom ndɑ sendi ŋmɑɑnikɔ fɔ mo kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Tɛtule goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ. Tɛtule kɑɑndɑ tɔnyɑ gɑɑbikoni di jine kɑ simbɑ Pɔlu.
44024002	Kɑ ǹ nɑ Pɔlu cɛɛ, Tɛtule sinti ko Pɔlu tɔnyɑ. À cii: E Felisi, n dɔ no i du lɑɑkɑli kɑne bɑmbɑtɑ. N diyom gɑɑ mo n kɑɑndɑ hɑnfɑni i lɑɑbu wɔ kunɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
44024003	I go kɑ ǹ tɑ mo ndɑ sɑɑbuyom sɑɑ kulu nungu kulu kunɑ.
44024004	Ammɑ ɑ si bɑɑ yɑ n moorɑndi. A go kɑ n ŋmɑɑrɛ n bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ kunɑ n mɑ hɑngɑ dɑm i sɛ i mɑ sendi cɛnɑ cii.
44024005	I di bɔrɔ kpɛ wɔ sendi sɑrɑkɔ no kɑ ɑ̀ go lɑɑbuɑ fɔndɔ yom hunguɛ dɑm Yuifu yom kunɑ hɑndunyɑ kulu kunɑ. Ngɑ yɑ ci Nɑzɑrɛtu bɔrɔ di godo di ŋmɔne bɔm.
44024006	À wetere zɑti ngɑ mɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ ziibɑndi, cɔfɔ i nɑ ɑ̀ dii. I bɑɑ i mɑ ɑ̀ ciiti kɑ simbɑ ndɑ i fɔndɑ.
44024007	Ammɑ Liziɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci wɑnguize yom hɑikusu kɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ i kɑmbɛ kunɑ ndɑ gɑɑbi kɑ bisɑ ndɑɑ̀.
44024008	À bine nɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑkɔ yom no mei ǹ mɑ kɑɑ n dɔ. N hini kɑ ɑ̀ hã kɑ bei mɑm mɑm hɛ yom kulu kɑ ǹ sɛ i go kɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑ.
44024009	Cɔfɔ Yuifu yom kɑ ǹ goono nungu di nɑ mefɔ tɛ. Ǹ cii: Yɑ no sendɑ dirɑ ndɑ.
44024010	Gɑɑbikonɑ nɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ sombu Pɔlu sɛ kɑ cii ɑ̀ mɑ sendi. Pɔlu tu kɑ cii: A bei kɑ ni, n ci dimi wɔ ciitikɔ zɑ jiiri yom. A go kɑ ɑ jinde deede no ndɑ himmɑ.
44024011	Ni, n bumbum hini kɑ bei kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ bisɑ jiribi wei cindi hinkɑ zɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ kpei Yerusɑlɛm kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi.
44024012	Ǹ mɑnɑ di hɛɛ yɑ kɑkɔ ndɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ wɑlɑ kɑ jɑmɑ zukum. A mɑnɑ ngɑ di tɛ bɑ Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu yom kunɑ wɑlɑ wɑngɑrɑ di kunɑ.
44024013	Ǹ si hini kɑ tɑbɑtɑndi hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ǹ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑ mɑɑsɑ wɔ.
44024014	Ammɑ ɑ gɑ wɔne cii n sɛ. A gɑ kɑ ɑ cɛɛ yom ŋmɔne Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi ndɑ zɑngɑ fɔndɔ kɑ ǹ cɛɛ godo goono ndɑ. Hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono hɑntumɑntɛ Moisi fɔndɑ kunɑ ndɑ ɑndebi yom tirɑ yom kunɑ, ɑ gɑ nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
44024015	A gundɑ bɛɛjɛ Ikpɛ kunɑ. Bɛɛjɛ wɔ nɑ ngei bumbum gɑ bɑtu kɑ ɑ̀ ci Ikpɛ kɑɑ bukɔ yom tunɑndi, cɛɑntɛ susu yom ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ci cɛɑntɛ susu yom.
44024016	Ngɑ di sɛ nɑ ɑ gɑ kokɑri sɑɑ kulu yɑ du bine kunɑ sendi kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ tɑɑli Ikpɛ jine ndɑ iburɑdɑm yom dɔ.
44024017	Jiiri bɑɑbɑ bisɑ, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ nɑ ɑ kɑɑ kɑ sɑrɑɑ yom ndɑ gɑrɑndi yom tɛ ɑ dimi sɛ.
44024018	À kunɑ no Azi Yuifu fɔ yom nɑ ɑ gɑru hinnɑntɛ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ jɑmɑ si, kɔsɔngu si.
44024019	À himɑ Azi Yuifu yom mo mɑ kɑɑ nee n dɔ kɑ ɑ tɔnyɑ de ǹ gundɑ hɛ fɔ ndɑ hɛɛ.
44024020	Bɔrɔ wɔne yom mɑ cii de ǹ di gbei lɑlɔ fɔ ɑ gɑɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ go cɛ Yuifu yom ciiti dumbukɔ yom jine.
44024021	Ǹ mɑɑ ɑ jinde kɑ ɑ zɑɑ kɑ sendi fɔ wɔ cii zɑ kɑ ɑ go cɛ ǹ bindi kunɑ. A cii: Bukɔei tunɑndiyom sɑbu sɛ no ǹ go kɑ ɑ ciiti hunkunɑ wom jine.
44024022	Felisi go bei cɑu cɑu hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ goono kɑ simbɑ ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ fɔndɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go mɑɑ sendi nge yom di, ɑ̀ nɑ sendɑ jɛ kɑ cii: Sɑɑ kɑ Liziɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci wɑnguize yom hɑikusɑ kɑɑ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ wom ŋmɔne ɑsiirɑ guni.
44024023	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ wɑnguize yom jinehune fɔ dɑm ɑ̀ mo Pɔlu bɑtu. Ammɑ ɑ̀ mɑ cini kɑ ɑ̀ no dɑɑmɑ cɛnɑ. À mɑ si ɑ̀ beerem gɑnji ǹ mɑ tɑmtɛrɛ ɑ̀ sɛ mo wɑlɑ kɑ kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ.
44024024	Jiribi yom bisɑ, Felisi kɑɑ ndɑ ngɑ wɛndɛ Yuifu fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Dusilɑ. À cii ǹ mɑ Pɔlu cɛɛ. Ngɑ mo nɑ hɑngɑ dɑm Pɔlu sɛ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ gɑɑ nɑɑneyom.
44024025	Pɔlu nɑ himmɑ dɑm ndɑ sendi cɛyom susu bɔm ndɑ bɔm hiniyom bɔm ndɑ ciiti kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ bɔm. Cɔfɔ Felisi hɑmburu kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. À tu kɑ cii: Mɑɑsɑ n mɑ kpei jinɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ du lɔkɑci kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ ɑ cii ǹ mɑ n cɛɛ.
44024026	Felisi gundɑ kunguzuru mo kɑ Pɔlu go ngɑ no nooru ngɑ mɑ ɑ̀ tɑm. À sɛ no ɑ̀ cini Pɔlu cɛɛ ngɑ mɑ fɑɑji ndɑ.
44024027	Ammɑ ɑ̀ tɛ jiiri hinkɑ. Cɔfɔ Pɔrisu Fesitu nɑ Felisi bɑrime. Kɑ Felisi go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ kɑɑni Yuifu yom sɛ ɑ̀ nɑ Pɔlu nɑm kɑsu kunɑ.
44025001	Sɑɑ kɑ Fesitu tɔ ngɑ kpetɛrɛ lɑɑbu, jiribi hinzɑ bɑndɑ ɑ tunu Kɑsɑriɑ wɑngɑrɑ kɑ kpei Yerusɑlɛm.
44025002	Gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ bine ndɑ Yuifu yom jinɑ yom kɑɑndɑ tɔnyɑ Pɔlu bɔm.
44025003	Ǹ nɑ Fesitu ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ tu ǹ sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ Pɔlu sɑmbɑ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ. Ammɑ ǹ go meetosi fɔ tɛ ngei mɑ Pɔlu wi fɔndɔ bɔm.
44025004	Fesitu bine cii ǹ sɛ kɑ Kɑsɑriɑ no ǹ mɑ Pɔlu jɛ kɑ bɑtu zɑti. Ngɑ bumbum, ngɑ dirɑ Kɑsɑriɑ subɑsi.
44025005	À cii: Ngɑ di sɛ wom kunɑ dɑbɑrikpɛ yom mɑ kpei ɑ bɑndɑ. De tɑɑli fɔ goono bɔrɔ di gɑɑ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑ.
44025006	À mɑnɑ gɔrɔ ǹ dɔ kɑ bisɑ jiribi wei. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ kpei Kɑsɑriɑ wɑngɑrɑ. Mo bo sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɔrɔ ngɑ ciiti kɑrigɑ bɔm, ɑ̀ nɑ mei no ǹ mɑ kɑɑndɑ Pɔlu.
44025007	Kɑ ǹ kɑɑndɑ Pɔlu Yuifu yom kɑ ǹ hunu zɑ Yerusɑlɛm cɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hundi. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ beri ndɑ tɔnyɑ lɑlɔ boobo kɑ ǹ si hini kɑ ǹ tɑbɑtɑndi.
44025008	Pɔlu mo nɑ ngɑ jinde deede. À cii: Yɑ nɑ tɑɑli tɛ hɛ fɔ kulu gɑɑ, wɑlɑ Yuifu yom fɔndɑ gɑɑ wɑlɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ gɑɑ wɑlɑ Kɑisɑ gɑɑ.
44025009	Ammɑ Fesitu mo go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ kɑɑni Yuifu yom sɛ. A nɑ Pɔlu hã kɑ cii: N tu kɑ kpei Yerusɑlɛm bɑ, ǹ mɑ n ciiti wɑngɑrɑ di ɑ jine hɛ nge yom di bɔm?
44025010	Ammɑ Pɔlu tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: Kɑisɑ ciitiyom dɔ jine no ɑ go cɛ, nungu kɑ ɑ̀ himɑ ǹ mɑ ciiti ɑ sɛ. Yɑ nɑ tɑɑli fɔ kulu tɛ Yuifu yom sɛ. N bumbum, n go wɔne bei kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
44025011	De bine ɑ nɑ tɑɑli tɛ no wɑlɑ ɑ nɑ hɛ fɔ tɛ no kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ ǹ mɑ ɑ wi yɑ nɑ hungu buyom. Ammɑ de hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ǹ go kɑ ɑ tɔnyɑ wɔ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci cimi bɔrɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ ɑ dɑm ǹ kɑmbɛ. A kpeindɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ Kɑisɑ dɔ.
44025012	Fesitu bine sɑwɑrɑ ndɑ Yuifu yom ciiti dumbukɔ yom. À bɑndɑ ɑ̀ tu Pɔlu sɛ kɑ cii: N ŋmɑɑrɛ Kɑisɑ bɔm. N kɑɑ kpei Kɑisɑ jine.
44025013	À tɛ jiribi yom cɔfɔ gɑndɑkpɛ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Ajiripɑ ndɑ Belenise kɑɑ Kɑsɑriɑ wɑngɑrɑ kɑ Fesitu fɔɔ.
44025014	Ǹ nɑ jiribi yom tɛ ɑ̀ dɔ. Fesitu no Pɔlu sendɑ deede kpe di sɛ kɑ cii: Felisi nɑ kɑsuize fɔ nɑm nee wɔ.
44025015	Sɑɑ kɑ bɔrɔ wɔ goono Yerusɑlɛm, gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom ndɑ Yuifu mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom kɑɑndɑ ɑ̀ sendɑ ɑ dɔ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ ciiti.
44025016	Ammɑ ɑ tu ǹ sɛ kɑ cii: À mɑnɑ ci Lomɑncɛ ɑlɑɑdɑ ǹ mɑ bɔrɔ fɔ ciiti kɑ zeeri zɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ǹ tɔnyɑ di mɑnɑ di ngɑ tɔnyɑkɔ yom moo ndɑ moo. Zɑngɑ yɑ ɑ̀ mɑ du kɑ ngɑ jinde deede tɔnyɑ gɑɑ.
44025017	À sɛ no sɑɑ kɑ ǹ kɑɑ nee ɑ̀ mɑnɑ jɛ. À mo bo cɔfɔ ɑ gɔrɔ ɑ ciiti kɑrigɑ bɔm kɑ cii ǹ mɑ kɑɑndɑ bɔrɔ di.
44025018	Sɑɑ kɑ bɔrɔ di tɔnyɑkɔ yom go cɛ nungu di, ǹ mɑnɑ hɛ fɔ kulu cii kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ ɑ tɑmmɑ.
44025019	Ammɑ ǹ gundɑ kɑkɔ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ ǹ gɑnɑyom ndɑ Yesu fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bu kɑ Pɔlu cii siikɑ si, ɑ̀ go hunɑ.
44025020	A biti zɑngɑ ɑ tɛ kɑ du hɛ nge yom di bɑɑru. À sɛ no, ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ hã de ɑ̀ tu kɑ kpei Yerusɑlɛm ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ ciiti hɛ nge yom di bɔm.
44025021	Ammɑ Pɔlu ŋmɑɑrɛ ǹ mɑ ngɑ nɑm kɑsuɑ kunɑ hɑli Kpe Agusitu mɑ sendi dumbu ngɑ bɔm. To. A nɑ ǹ no mei ǹ mo kɑ ɑ̀ bɑtu hɑli ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ sɑmbɑ Kɑisɑ dɔ.
44025022	Ajiripɑ cii Fesitu sɛ: Hɛɛ bumbum ɑ bɑɑ yɑ hɑngɑ dɑm bɔrɔ di sɛ. Fesitu tu kɑ cii: Subɑ n hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ.
44025023	À mo bo Ajiripɑ ndɑ Belenise kɑɑ ndɑ kpetɛrɛ tɑkɑmɑ yom ndɑ lijimɑ. Ǹ huro fuu fɔ kunɑ kɑ ǹ cini gɔrɔ kɑ sɑwɑrɑ ndɑ wɑnguize yom hɑikusu yom ndɑ wɑngɑrɑ di jinɑ yom. Fesitu nɑ ǹ no mei ǹ mɑ kɑɑndɑ Pɔlu.
44025024	Fesitu cii: Kpe Ajiripɑ ndɑ hɑibɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono i kunɑ nee, wom go di bɔrɔ kpɛ. À bɔm no Yuifu tutumɑ zɑ Yerusɑlɛm kɑlɑ nee go cii ndɑ jinde beeri kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ himɑ ɑ̀ mɑ hunɑ.
44025025	Ammɑ ɑ mɑnɑ di hɛ fɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ tɔ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ wi. Ngɑ bumbum mo bine cii ngɑ mɑ kpeindɑ ngɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ Kpe Agusitu dɔ. À sɛ no, ɑ nɑ guuri zɑɑ yɑ ɑ̀ sɑmbɑ Agusitu dɔ.
44025026	Ammɑ ɑ sindɑ hɛ fɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ siikɑ kɑ yɑ hɑntum Kɑisɑ sɛ kɑ simbɑ bɔrɔ di. À sɛ nɑ ɑ kɑɑndɑɑ̀ wom jine hɑli yɑ mo ni Kpe Ajiripɑ, sɑɑ kɑ n nɑ ɑ̀ hã yɑ du hɛ kɑ ɑ hɑntum.
44025027	À mɑnɑ sɑbɑ ɑ sɛ bɔrɔ mɑ kɑsuize sɑmbɑ de ɑ mɑnɑ hɑntum kɑ cii hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɔnyɑ.
44026001	Ajiripɑ cii Pɔlu sɛ: Ǹ tu n sɛ n mɑ sendi n bɔm sɛ. Cɔfɔ Pɔlu nɑ kɑmbɛ sombu kɑ ngɑ jinde deede.
44026002	À cii: Kpe Ajiripɑ, ɑ kɑɑni ɑ sɛ yɑ ɑ jinde deede n jine hunkunɑ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ hɛ yom kulu kɑ Yuifu yom nɑ ɑ tɔnyɑ ndei.
44026003	Hɑli yɑ mo kɑ n gundɑ beire kɑlɑ kɑlɑ Yuifu yom ɑlɑɑdɑ yom ndɑ ǹ hãyom bɔm. À sɛ no, ɑ go kɑ n ŋmɑɑrɛ n mɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ sɛ ndɑ suuru.
44026004	Yuifu yom kulu go bei zɑngɑ ɑ goonoyom bɑrɑ zɑ ɑ goono hɑiwɑsu. Ǹ go bei zɑngɑ ɑ goono zɑ sintine ɑ dimi kunɑ Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ.
44026005	Ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ bei zɑ jɛyom. Ǹ hini kɑ cii mo de ǹ tu kɑ sɛdɑ, kɑ ɑ ci Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ ko gɔrɔ ndɑ zɑngɑ i gɑnɑyom cɑu cɑu goono ndɑ.
44026006	Mɑɑsɑ bine ɑ go cɛ nee ǹ mɑ ɑ ciiti ɑlikɑwɑli kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ i cɛɛ yom sɛ bɛɛjɛ bɔm.
44026007	Alikɑwɑli di sɛ i dimi wei cindi hinkɑ go bɛɛjɛ sinji ngei kɑɑ tɔ ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Ciini ndɑ zɑɑri mo no ǹ go tɑmtɛrɛ Ikpɛ sɛ. E Kpe Ajiripɑ, bɛɛjɛ wɔ sɛ no Yuifu yom go kɑ ɑ tɔnyɑ.
44026008	Ifɔ sɛ no wom kunɑ beerem si dɑhirɑndi kɑ Ikpɛ go bukɔ yom tunɑndi dɑ?
44026009	Ngɑ di sɛ no ɑ lɑsɑbu ɑ bine kunɑ yɑ hɛ boobo tɛ kɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ Yesu Nɑzɑrɛtu mɑɑ ndɑ himmɑ.
44026010	A nɑ hɛ yom wɔ tɛ Yerusɑlɛm kunɑ. A nɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ boobo dɑm kɑsu sɑɑ kɑ ɑ du hini gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom dɔ. Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ go kɑ ǹ wi mo ɑ nɑ ɑ mee dɑm ɑ̀ kunɑ.
44026011	Ce boobo mo ɑ nɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom bɔnɑndi mo Yuifu yom mɑrgɑ fuu yom kulu kunɑ. A nɑ ǹ tilɑsi ǹ mɑ Yesu mɑɑ cɛnɑndi. A bine futu mo ǹ gɑɑ kɑ ǹ guruguzɑndi kɑlɑ wɑngɑrɑ ŋmɑni yom kunɑ.
44026012	Sɑɑ di no ɑ go kpei Dɑmɑku wɑngɑrɑ ndɑ dɑbɑri ndɑ fɔndɔ kɑ ɑ du gɑrɑndikɔ jinɑ yom dɔ.
44026013	E Kpe Ajiripɑ, zɑɑri bɔm bindi ɑ di kɑɑri fɔ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ. À kɑɑri bisɑ weenu ŋmɔne. À nɑ ɑ hundi ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ goono ɑ bɑndɑ fɔndɑ bɔm.
44026014	I kulu kɑm gɑndɑ. Cɔfɔ ɑ mɑɑ jinde fɔ go sendi ɑ sɛ cinɛ kunɑ. À cii: Sɑuli, Sɑuli, ifɔ sɛ no n go kɑ ɑ guruguzɑndi? À gɑɑbu n sɛ n mɑ gooruyom hɛ zi.
44026015	A cii: Ni no mee, Kpe? Kpe mo cii: Hɛɛ no Yesu di kɑ n go guruguzɑndi.
44026016	Ammɑ n mɑ tunu kɑ cɛ n cee gɑɑ. À sɛ nɑ ɑ fɑitɑ n sɛ zɑmɑ yɑ n tɛ gbeiteeri ndɑ sɛdɑ mɑ. N mɑ tɛ sɛdɑ hɛ yom kɑ n di gɑɑ ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ ɑ gɑ ǹ kɑɑtɛrɛ n sɛ.
44026017	A gɑ n kɑɑ n dimi kɑmbɛ ndɑ dimi cindei kɑ ǹ dɔ ɑ gɑ kɑ n dɔntɔm mɑɑsɑ.
44026018	N mɑ ǹ mɑɑ yom feeri hɑli ǹ mɑ du kɑ bɛrɛ kɑ hunu kube kunɑ kɑ hurɑ kɑɑri kunɑ. Ǹ mɑ du kɑ hunu mo Setɑm dɑbɑri kunɑ kɑ ye Ikpɛ dɔ zɑmɑ ǹ mɑ du yɑɑfɑyom ngei dulum yom gɑɑ. Ǹ mɑ du tubu mo nɑɑnekɔ yom bɑndɑ, nge yom kɑ Ikpɛ go kɑ ǹ hɑlɑɑlɑndi.
44026019	À sɛ no Kpe Ajiripɑ, yɑ nɑ hungu kɑ diyom kɑ Ikpɛ cɛbɛ ɑ sɛ gɑnɑ.
44026020	Ammɑ ɑ cii Dɑmɑku wɑngɑrɑ bɔrɔ yom sɛ sintine ǹ mɑ tuubi kɑ bɛrɛ Ikpɛ dɔ. Yɑ no ɑ cii Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ beerem sɛ ndɑ Yude lɑɑbu kulu beerem sɛ ndɑ dimi cindei sɛ mo. A cii mo ǹ mɑ gbei tɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ ndɑ ǹ tuubiyom.
44026021	Ngɑ di sɛ no Yuifu yom nɑ ɑ dii Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ ko ceeci ngei mɑ ɑ wi.
44026022	Bine kɑ ɑ du gɑɑkɑsine zɑ Ikpɛ dɔ, ɑ go cɛ nee hɑli hunkunɑ ko tɛ sɛdɑ icɛnɑ yom sɛ ndɑ ibeeri yom sɛ. A si hɛ fɔ kulu cii mo kɑlɑ wɔ kɑ ɑndebi yom ndɑ Moisi cii kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑ.
44026023	Ngɑ yɑ ci kɑ kɑlɑ de Mɛsiyɑ mɑ guruguze. Ǹ mɑ jinɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme ɑ̀ mɑ bɑɑru kɑ ɑ̀ ci kɑɑri fɛɛ Isirɑilɑ ize yom sɛ ndɑ dimi cindei sɛ.
44026024	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ sendi zɑngɑ yɑ di kɑ ngɑ jinde deede, cɔfɔ Fesitu cii ndɑ jinde beeri: Pɔlu, n sindɑ bɔm. N beire boobo go kɑ n bɔm see.
44026025	Pɔlu mo cii: À mɑnɑ ci ɑ bɔm yɑ see, Fesitu bɛɛrɛkpɛ. Ammɑ cimi sendi yom no ɑ go cii ndɑ lɑɑkɑli hinnɑ.
44026026	Kpe Ajiripɑ, ni kɑ n jine ɑ go sendi ndɑ yɑrutɛrɛ, n go hɛ nge yom di bei. A tɑbɑi n mɑnɑ zɑm kɑ ǹ bei zɑ kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ hɛ wɔ tɛ tugu kunɑ.
44026027	E Kpe Ajiripɑ n go cimi no ɑndebi yom sɛ bɑ? A bei kɑ n go cimi no ǹ sɛ.
44026028	Cɔfɔ Ajiripɑ cii Pɔlu sɛ: N gɑ ɑ bɛrɛ hɑli cɛnɑ yɑ tɛ Mɛsiyɑ gɑnɑkɔ fɑ.
44026029	Pɔlu bine cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A go ŋmɑɑrɛ Ikpɛ gɑɑ hɑli bɑndɑ fɔ no wɑlɑ hɑli kɑ jɛ no, n mɑ ci zɑngɑ ɑ goono ɑmmɑ seseri yom bɑ si. À mɑnɑ ci n hinne, ɑmmɑ beerem kulu mo kɑ ǹ go hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ sɛ hunkunɑ.
44026030	Kɑ ɑ̀ sendi kɑ beeni, cɔfɔ Kpe Ajiripɑ tunu kɑ cɛ ndɑ Fesitu ndɑ Belenise ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ gɔrɔ ndei.
44026031	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ hunu ǹ cii ngei cɛrɛ sɛ: Bɔrɔ di mɑnɑ hɛ fɔ kulu tɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ tɔ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ wi wɑlɑ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ hɔ.
44026032	Ajiripɑ mo cii Fesitu sɛ: N hini kɑ bɔrɔ di tɑm de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ ǹ mɑ kpeindɑ ngɑ Kɑisɑ dɔ.
44027001	Ǹ sɑwɑrɑ kɑ cii i mɑ huro hɑrihi fɔ kunɑ kɑ kpei Itɑli lɑɑbu. Ǹ nɑ Pɔlu ndɑ kɑsuize fɔ yom dɑm wɑnguize yom jinehune fɔ kɑmbɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Yuli. Ngɑ yɑ ci Agusitu wɑnguize yom ŋmɔne kuru fɔ jinehune.
44027002	Kɑ i hurɑ Adɑrɑmiti hɑrihi fɔ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑ kpei Azi lɑɑbu cɛsu, i sinti ko dirɑ. Alisitɑku Tesɑlonikɑ wɑngɑrɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono Mɑsedoni lɑɑbu, ɑ̀ goono ndɑ i yom.
44027003	À mo bo i tɔ Sidom kpɑɑrɑ. Yuli nɑ Pɔlu dii ndɑ bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ. À cini tu ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ kpei ngɑ kpɑɑsi yom dɔ kɑ du sɑjoyom.
44027004	Kɑ i hunu nodi i nɑ Kuburu hɔndɛ tɑɑsi cɛsu kɑ bisɑ zɑmɑ hɛo yɑ go kɑ i kube.
44027005	Sɑɑ kɑ i nɑ tɛkuɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go mɑɑni Siliciɑ lɑɑbu ndɑ Pɑmfili lɑɑbu tooru kɑ bisɑ, i kɑɑ Milɑ kpɑɑrɑ Lisiɑ lɑɑbu.
44027006	Wɑnguize yom jinehune di nɑ Alɛsɑndiɑ hɑrihi fɔ gɑru nodi kɑ ɑ̀ go kpei Itɑli lɑɑbu. I huro ɑ̀ kunɑ.
44027007	I tɛ jiribi yom tɛku bɔm ko kpei mɔsɔ mɔsɔ. Kɑlɑ dɑcɑti i du kɑ tɔ Kinide kpɑɑrɑ zɑmɑ hɛo nɑ i gɑnji i mɑ kpei ndɑ wɑɑsi. I bisɑ Kɛlɛtu hɔndɛ tɑɑsi kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑni Sɑlimone lɑɑbu.
44027008	Kɑlɑ dɑcɑti no i nɑ ɑ̀ cɛsu kɑ bisɑ. I kɑɑ nungu fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Gumɑme dɔ Hinno kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑni kpɑɑrɑ fɔ mo kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Lɑse.
44027009	Lɔkɑci boobo bisɑ kɑ bɑ hɑrihi funuyom gundɑ kɑtɑru. Meehɔ wɑtɛ bisɑ kɔ. À gɑɑ no Pɔlu nɑ ǹ kɑɑbɑɑru.
44027010	À cii: Hɑibɔrɔ yom, ɑ go di kɑ hɑrihi wɔ funuyom gundɑ kɑtɑru. À kɑɑ kɑɑndɑ hɑsɑrɔ boobo, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci jɛrɔ yom sɛ ndɑ hɑrihiɑ hinne sɛ bo ɑmmɑ i hundi yom sɛ mo.
44027011	Ammɑ wɑnguize yom jinehune wɔ nɑ hɑngɑ dɑm funukɔɑ ndɑ hɑrihiɑ ŋmɔne hɑikusɑ sɛ kɑ bisɑ hɛ kɑ Pɔlu go cii sɛ.
44027012	Kɑ gumɑme di si boori konguzɑgɑ wɑtɛ, jɑmɑ di bɑyom sɑwɑrɑ kɑ cii ngei mɑ bisɑ nungu di. De ɑ̀ hini kɑ tɛ ǹ mɑ tɔ Finiciɑ Kɛlɛtu gumɑme kɑ yeeni tɛ nungu di. Kɛlɛtu gumɑme go gunɑ weenukɑne kɑ kpei kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ hɛrɛ cɛnɑ ndɑ weenukɑne kɑ kpei kɑmbɛwo hɛrɛ cɛnɑ.
44027013	Weenukɑne sɛ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ hɛrɛ hɛo bɑɑnɔ fɔ go fɑɑru mɔsɔ mɔsɔ. À gɑɑ no, ǹ tɑmmɑ hɛ kɑ ngei miilɑ di ngei hini kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ no. Ǹ nɑ kɔɔrɔ tunɑndi kɑ Kɛlɛtu hɔndɛ tɑɑsɑ jobu cɛsu kɑ bisɑ.
44027014	Hɑli cɛnɑ cɔfɔ hɛo futu fɔ mɑ tunu kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Elukilidom.
44027015	Hɛo di nɑ hɑrihi di zɑɑ kɑlɑ hɑrihiɑ bɔm si hini kɑ kpei jinɑ. I nɑm hɛo di kɑɑndɑ i yom.
44027016	I gɑnɑ hɔndɛ tɑɑsi cɛnɑ fɔ mɑ sɛ gɑndɑ hɛrɛ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Kolodɑ. I tɑɑbi kɑ du hɑrihi cɛnɑ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci fɑɑbɑ ŋmɔne.
44027017	I nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm hɑrihi beerɑ bɔm. À bɑndɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑbɑndi ndɑ kɔrɔfɔ yom kɑ ɑ̀ wuliwɑli. Ǹ go hɑmburu hɑnibɑ ngei mɑ kpei kɑm Siliti tɑɑsi kunɑ. À sɛ no ǹ nɑ hɑrihiɑ tɑɑfɛ yom zumɑndi kɑ nɑm hɛo di mɑ kpeindɑ ngei.
44027018	Ammɑ hɛo nɑ i teeni kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. À mo bo ǹ nɑ hɑri hi jɛrɔ fɔ yom kɑɑ kɑ turu.
44027019	Jiribi hinzɑntɛ i nɑ kɑmbɛ dɑm kɑ hɑrihi di jiine fɔ yom kɑɑ kɑ furu.
44027020	I tɛ jiribi boobo kɑ i mɑnɑ di weenu ndɑ hɑndɑriyɑize yom. Hɛo di gundɑ gɑɑbi kɑ i kɑru kɑlɑ i nɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑɑ fɑɑbɑ gɑɑ.
44027021	Zɑ jɛyom ǹ mɑnɑ ŋmɑɑ. Cɔfɔ Pɔlu cɛ ǹ bindi kunɑ kɑ cii. To. Hɑibɔrɔ yom, ɑ̀ himɑ dom wom mɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ sɛ. De yɑ no, dom wom si hunu Kɛlɛtu hɔndɛ tɑɑsɑ kunɑ kɑ huro hɑlɑciyom ndɑ hɑsɑrɔ wɔ kunɑ.
44027022	Mɑɑsɑnkulu ɑ go wom no himmɑ. Wom mɑ himmɑ dɑm zɑmɑ wom hundi bɑ ɑfɔ si hɑlɑci kɑlɑ hɑrihiɑ ngɑ hinne.
44027023	Hɛɛ yɑ ci Ikpɛ ŋmɔne. A go tɑmtɛrɛ ɑ̀ sɛ mo. Ciini wɔ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize fɔ yɑ kɑɑ ɑ dɔ.
44027024	A cii: Pɔlu, n mɑ si hɑmburu. Dɑhiri no n mɑ cɛ Kɑisɑ jine. Gunɑ, Ikpɛ nɑ n no beerem wɔ kulu kɑ ni ndei goono hɑrihi wɔ kunɑ.
44027025	À sɛ no hɑibɔrɔ yom, wɑ himmɑ dɑm zɑmɑ ɑ go nɑɑne Ikpɛ. A bine go bei mo kɑ hɛ ngɑ di kɑɑ tɛ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize nɑ ɑ̀ cii ɑ sɛ.
44027026	Ammɑ dɑhiri no ǹ mɑ i cetu hɔndɛ tɑɑsi fɔ bɔm.
44027027	Ciini wei cindi tɑɑcɑntɛ hɛo go kɑ i feeni Adiɑtiku tɛkuɑ bɔm. Ciini bindi hɑrihi di gbeiteeri yom tɑmmɑ hɑli i mɑɑni gɑndɑ fɔ dɔ no.
44027028	Cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ neesiji dɑm. À tɛ jɛndɛ wɑrɑnkɑ. Ǹ bisɑ kɑ tɔ jinɑ cɛnɑ. Ǹ nɑ neesiji dɑm kpɛɛnɛ. À ye jɛndɛ wei cindi gu.
44027029	Ǹ go hɑmburu hɑnibɑ hɑrihiɑ mɑ kpei gofu tondi gɑɑ. À gɑɑ no ǹ nɑ bɑndɑ di ŋmɔne kɔɔrɔ tɑɑci tɑm hɑri kunɑ ko lɑɑkɑli dɛcɛ mo boyom gɑɑ.
44027030	Ammɑ hɑrihiɑ gbeiteeri yom ceeci ngei mɑ zuuru. Ǹ nɑ hɑrihi cɛnɑ zumɑndi tɛkuɑ bɔm. Ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ zɑngɑ ǹ go bɑɑ ngei mɑ hɑrihiɑ bɔm dɔ hɛrɛ kɔɔrɔ yom zumɑndi tɛkuɑ kunɑ hɑli jinɑ.
44027031	Cɔfɔ Pɔlu cii wɑnguize yom jinehune ndɑ wɑnguize yom sɛ: De beerem wɔ si gɔrɔ hɑrihi wɔ kunɑ wom si hini kɑ du fɑɑbɑ.
44027032	Cɔfɔ wɑnguize yom nɑ hɑrihi cɛnɑ kɔrɔfɔ yom dumbu kɑ ɑ̀ tɑm.
44027033	Kɑ mo bɑ bo Pɔlu nɑ ǹ kulu suurɑndi ǹ mɑ ŋmɑɑ. À cii: Hunkunɑ wom jiribi wei cindi tɑɑcɑntɛ noyɑ kɑ wom mɑnɑ ŋmɑɑ, wom goono bɑtuyom gɑɑ. Wom mɑnɑ hɛ fɔ kulu zɑɑ.
44027034	À sɛ no, ɑ go wom suurɑndi. Wom mɑ ŋmɑɑ wom hundi yom sɑbu sɛ zɑmɑ wom bɑ ɑfɔ bɔm hɑmini fɔ si hɑlɑci.
44027035	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ hɛ nge yom di cii, ɑ̀ nɑ buuru zɑɑ. À nɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu ǹ kulu jine. À nɑ buuru zenji kɑ sinti kɑ ŋmɑɑ.
44027036	Ǹ kulu du kɑ himmɑ dɑm. Nge yom mo ŋmɑɑ.
44027037	I bɔrɔ zɑngu hinkɑ ndɑ weiye cindi idu bine no hɑrihi di kunɑ.
44027038	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ ŋmɑɑ kɑlɑ ǹ kungu, ǹ nɑ mɔsɔngu kɑɑ kɑ furu tɛkuɑ kunɑ ǹ mɑ hɑrihiɑ time zobu.
44027039	Mo bo ǹ mɑnɑ lɑɑbu di bei ɑmmɑ ǹ nɑ tɛku jinde fɔ hunne kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ tɑɑsi. À sɑbɑ ǹ sɛ de ɑ̀ hini kɑ tɛ ngei mɑ hɑrihiɑ cɛɑndi nungu di.
44027040	Ǹ nɑ kɔɔrɔ yom feeri kɑ tɑm tɛkuɑ kunɑ. Ǹ nɑ guuru fɔ yom mo dumbu kɑ filɑfili yom tɑm. Ǹ nɑ tɑɑfɛ fɔ mo hɔ hɑrihiɑ jine hɛo mɑ ɑ̀ fum gumɑme di dɔ hɛrɛ.
44027041	Ammɑ ǹ fɑku gɑndɑ fɔ gɑɑ tɛku jindɑ dɔ nungu kɑ tɛku hinkɑ meigu, cɔfɔ hɑrihiɑ gofu, jine di cɛ. Tɛku boosu yom futu mo nɑ bɑndɑ ceeri ceeri.
44027042	Wɑnguize yom lɑsɑbu ngei mɑ kɑsuize yom wi zɑmɑ ǹ hɑmburu hɑnibɑ ɑfɔ yom mɑ zi kɑ zuuru.
44027043	Ammɑ wɑnguize yom jinehunɑ go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ Pɔlu fɑɑbɑ. À hungu wɑnguize yom sɛ ǹ mɑ ngei miilɑ tɛ. Ammɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ no mei beerem kɑ ǹ ŋmɑɑni ziyom, ǹ mɑ sɑru kɑ huro tɛkuɑ kunɑ kɑ kpei jobu gɑɑ.
44027044	Cindei mo kpei kpɑtɑko yom bɔm. Afɔ yom mo kpei hɑrihiɑ zɛnjɛ fɔ yom bɔm. Yɑ no ǹ kulu tɛ kɑ tɔ tɛrɛ bɑɑni.
44028001	Sɑɑ kɑ i du kɑ hunu, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ no i du kɑ bei kɑ hɔndɛ tɑɑsi di mɑɑ no Mɑliti.
44028002	Mɑliti bɔrɔ yom nɑ i kube ndɑ bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ hinno. À mɑnɑ ci bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ kɑ beerem cini tɛ zɑmɑ ǹ nɑ nini funsu i sɛ hɑri kɑ ɑ̀ bɑ kɑm ndɑ yeeni sɑbu sɛ.
44028003	Pɔlu nɑ tuuri kɑmbɛ kɔgɔ fɔ yom kuu kɑ dɛcɛ ninɑ bɔm. Cɔfɔ gɑzɑmɑ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ nini dunguɛ hunu kɑ kɔtɔ Pɔlu kɑmbɛ gɑɑ.
44028004	Mɑliti bɔrɔ yom di gondi go kɔtɔ Pɔlu kɑmbɛ gɑɑ. Cɔfɔ ǹ cii ngei cɛrɛ ndɑ cɛrɛ sɛ: À sindɑ siikɑ bɔrɔ kpɛ wɔ bɔrɔ wikɔ no zɑmɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ fɑɑbɑ tɛkuɑ kunɑ, ciiti mɑnɑ tu ɑ̀ mɑ hunɑ.
44028005	Pɔlu nɑ gondɑ kɔkɔbɛ nini kunɑ. À mɑnɑ mɑɑ doori fɔ kulu.
44028006	Beerem bɑtu ɑ̀ mɑ funsu wɑlɑ mefɔ mefɔ Pɔlu mɑ kɑm bukɔ. Ammɑ kɑ ǹ bɑtu kɑ jɛ ǹ di hɛ fɔ kulu mɑnɑ du ɑ̀. Ǹ nɑ lɑsɑbu bɛrɛ kɑ cii Pɔlu yɑ ikpɛ fɔ no.
44028007	Gɑndɑ fɔ goono kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑni nungu di. Gɑndɑ di hɔndɛ tɑɑsɑ bɔrɔ beeri fɔ ŋmɔne no. Bɔrɔ di mɑɑ no Pubiliyu. Ngɑ yɑ nɑ i kubeni kɑ i zumɑndi ngɑ dɔ kɑlɑ jiribi hinzɑ. A nɑ i yotɛrɛ tɑ hinno.
44028008	Pubiliyu bɑɑbɑ bine go kɑni ndɑ gɑɑwɑse ndɑ nyɔnyɔ. Pɔlu kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ. À nɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ ɑ̀ bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ no bɑɑni.
44028009	Sɑɑ kɑ ngɑ di tɛ, cɔfɔ zɛnjɛkom cindei mo kɑ ǹ goono hɔndɛ tɑɑsɑ bɔm kɑɑ. Ǹ du bɑɑni mo.
44028010	Nge yom mo nɑ bɛɛrɛ bɑmbɑtɑ tɛ i sɛ. Bine, sɑɑ kɑ i tunu kɑ bɑ dirɑ hɑrihi fɔ kunɑ, ǹ kɑɑndɑ i sɛ hɛ yom kɑ i gundɑ ǹ bɑnji.
44028011	Hɑndu hinzɑ bɑndɑ i huro kɑ dirɑ Alɛsɑndiɑ hɑrihi fɔ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ yeeni tɛ nungu di. Hɑrihi di gundɑ sɛdɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Tɑwei sɛdɑ.
44028012	I tɔ Silɑkuze kpɑɑrɑ. I gɔrɔ kpɑɑrɑ di jiribi hinzɑ.
44028013	Zɑ Silɑkuze i hundi kɑ kɑɑ Lezium kpɑɑrɑ. Jiribi fɔ bisɑ, cɔfɔ weenuhune sɛ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ hɛrɛ hɛo di tunu. Jiribi hinkɑntɛ i kɑɑ Puteoli kpɑɑrɑ.
44028014	I nɑ nyɑize yom gɑru kpɑɑrɑ di. Ǹ nɑ i ŋmɑɑrɛ i mɑ gɔrɔ ngei dɔ jiribi iye. À gɑɑ nɑ, i kpei Lome wɑngɑrɑ nyɑ kunɑ.
44028015	Sɑɑ kɑ Lome nyɑize yom mɑɑ i bɑɑru, ǹ nɑ i kube. Ǹ hunu kɑ kɑɑ hɑli kpɑɑrɑ yom kɑ ǹ cii ǹ sɛ Apiyu Hebu ndɑ Yo Fuu Hinzɑ. Kɑ Pɔlu di ei ɑ̀ nɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu. À du himmɑ mo.
44028016	Sɑɑ kɑ i tɔ Lome wɑngɑrɑ wɑnguize yom jinehunɑ nɑ kɑsuize yom dɑm bɑtukɔ wɑnguize yom ŋɔne hɑikusu kɑmbɛ. Ammɑ ɑ̀ tu Pɔlu wɔ sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ gɔrɔ ngɑ fɔ ndɑ wɑnguize fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mo kɑ ɑ̀ bɑtu.
44028017	À tɛ jiribi hinzɑ, Pɔlu nɑ Yuifu yom jinɑ yom cɛɛ. Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ meigu ɑ̀ cii ǹ sɛ: Nyɑize hɑibɔrɔ yom, yɑ nɑ hɛ fɔ kulu tɛ i dimi gɑɑ wɑlɑ i cɛɛ yom ɑlɑɑdɑ yom gɑɑ. Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu, ǹ nɑ ɑ dɑm kɑsu Yerusɑlɛm kɑ ɑ dɑm Lomɑncɛ yom kɑmbɛ.
44028018	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ hã kɑ beeni, ǹ bɑɑ ngei mɑ ɑ tɑm zɑmɑ tɑɑli fɔ kulu si ɑ gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ tɔ ǹ mɑ ɑ wi.
44028019	Ammɑ Yuifu yom hungu. À tilɑsi ɑ gɑɑ yɑ kɑɑndɑ ɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ Kɑisɑ dɔ. Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu ɑ sindɑ hɛ fɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ yɑ ɑ dimi beri.
44028020	Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ nɑ wom cɛɛ noyɑ. Yɑ du kɑ di wom kɑ sendi wom sɛ zɑmɑ Isirɑilɑ bɛɛjɛ sɑbu sɛ no ǹ nɑ nyɔri wɔ dɑm ɑ gɑɑ.
44028021	Ngei mo cii ɑ̀ sɛ: I mɑnɑ du tirɑ yom zɑ Yuifu yom dɔ kɑ simbɑ ni. Nyɑize yom mo kɑ ǹ kɑɑ ǹ bɑ ɑfɔ mɑnɑ deede wɑlɑ kɑ hɛ lɑlɔ cii n bɔm.
44028022	Ammɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ i sɛ i mɑ mɑɑ n dɔ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci n lɑsɑbu. Kɑ simbɑ ndɑ godo wɔ i go bei kɑ nungu kulu no ǹ go hunguɑ̀.
44028023	Ǹ no hɑnu fɔ jisi Pɔlu sɛ. Bɔrɔ boobo bine kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ nungu kɑ ɑ̀ zumbu. À nɑ bɑɑru cii ǹ sɛ kɑ tɛ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ sɛdɑ. Zɑ susubɑ kɑlɑ wiciri ɑ̀ go ceeci ngɑ mɑ ǹ bɛrɛ kɑ simbɑ Yesu. À go kɑ ǹ cɛbɛ Yesu bɑɑru kɑ ɑ̀ goono Moisi fɔndɑ kunɑ ndɑ ɑndebi yom hɑntum yom kunɑ.
44028024	Hɛ yom kɑ Pɔlu cii nɑ ɑfɔ yom bɛrɛ. Cindei mo mɑnɑ nɑɑne.
44028025	Kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ sɑbɑ cɛrɛ ndɑ cɛrɛ, ǹ hunu Pɔlu dɔ. Kɑ ǹ gɑ kpei Pɔlu nɑ sendi fɔ wɔ cii: Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ sendi ihinno kɑ ɑ̀ cii ɑndebi Esɑyi dɔ i cɛɛ yom sɛ.
44028026	Esɑyi cii: "Kpei dimi wɔ dɔ kɑ cii: Mɑɑyom gɑɑ wom kɑɑ mɑɑ, ɑmmɑ wom si fɑhɑm bɑ cɛnɑ. Gunɑyom gɑɑ wom kɑɑ di, ɑmmɑ wom si fɑyɑnkɑ bɑ cɛnɑ.
44028027	Dimi wɔ bine yɑ sendi. Hɑngɑ sɛndɔ yom no. Ǹ nɑ ngei moo yom dɑɑbu. De ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci yɑ ǹ kɑɑ di ndɑ ngei mɑɑ yom. Ǹ kɑɑ mɑɑ mɑ ndɑ ngei hɑngɑ yom. Ǹ kɑɑ fɑhɑm mo ngei bine yom dɔ kɑ ye kɑ bɛrɛ ɑ dɔ hɑli yɑ ǹ nɑ bɑɑni."
44028028	Ngɑ di sɛ wom mɑ bei kɑ Ikpɛ fɑɑbɑ wɔ dimi cindei sɛ no ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ sɑmbɑ. Ǹ bine kɑɑ hɑngɑ dɑm bɑɑru wɔ sɛ. [
44028029	Sɑɑ kɑ Pɔlu nɑ nge yom di cii, Yuifu yom di hunu. Ǹ go kɑkɔ ndɑ cɛrɛ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.]
44028030	Pɔlu gɔrɔ jiiri hinkɑ sukutum fuu fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hɑyɑ kunɑ. À nɑ beerem kulu kɑ ǹ go kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ kube.
44028031	À go kɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ bɑɑru fɛɛ. À cooɑndi mo ndɑ yɑrutɛrɛ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ hɛ yom bɔm. Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑnɑ ɑ̀ gɑnji.
45001001	Hɛɛ Pɔlu, hɛɛ yɑ ci Yesu Mɛsiyɑ tɑm. Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ cɛɛ yɑ tɛ diyɑ. À nɑ ɑ hɑlɑɑlɑndi mo ngɑ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ sɛ.
45001002	Ikpɛ nɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɔ ɑlikɑwɑli tɛ zɑ dom ngɑ Sendi hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ ngɑ ɑndebi yom dɔ.
45001003	Bɑɑru di sendi Ikpɛ Ize bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ ci i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɛi Dɑfidi hɑɑmɑ gɑɑ gɑɑhɑm dɔ.
45001004	Ikpɛ nɑ Yesu dɑhirɑndi ndɑ dɑbɑri kɑ Yesu yɑ Ikpɛ Ize no Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ ɑ̀ tunɑndiyom bukɔei gɑme gɑɑ.
45001005	À dɔ no i du gomini ndɑ diyɑtɛrɛ hɑli hɑndunyɑ dimi kulu kunɑ beerem mɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ nɑɑne dɔ ɑ̀ mɑɑ sɑbu sɛ.
45001006	Wom goono ǹ kunɑ, wom kɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ cɛɛ.
45001007	A go wom kulu fɔɔ, wom kulu kɑ wom goono Lome wɑngɑrɑ nyɑ kunɑ. Wom kɑ wom ci Ikpɛ binebɑɑkɔ yom, Ikpɛ nɑ wom cɛɛ mo wom mɑ ci hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom. Gomini ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne mo goono wom bɑndɑ kɑ ǹ hunu i Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ dɔ ndɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ.
45001008	Sintine jinɑ, ɑ go kɑ ɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ sɑɑbu Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ wom kulu sɛ. A go kɑ ɑ̀ sɑɑbu ndɑ kɑ wom nɑɑne bɑɑru kpei nungu kulu hɑndunyɑ kunɑ.
45001009	A go tɑmtɛrɛ Ikpɛ sɛ ɑ bine kunɑ ɑ̀ Ize Bɑɑru Hinnɑ gbei kunɑ. Ikpɛ yɑ ci ɑ sɛdɑ kɑ ɑ si cɛ ndɑ ŋmɑɑrɛyom wom sɛ ɑ ŋmɔne ɑduwɑ yom kunɑ.
45001010	A go kɑ Ikpɛ ŋmɑɑrɛ mo sɑɑ kulu Ikpɛ binebɑɑ kunɑ ɑ̀ mɑ fɔndɔ feeri ɑ sɛ yɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ zɑngɑ no kulu.
45001011	A gundɑ guuri kɑlɑ kɑlɑ yɑ di wom. A go bɑɑ yɑ kɑɑndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ noyom fɔ wom sɛ, wom mɑ du kɑ sinji kɑ boori.
45001012	A go bɑɑ i mɑ cɛrɛ no himmɑ wom gɑme ndɑ nɑɑne fɔlɔnku kɑ go kɑ i meigu, hɛɛ ndɑ wom.
45001013	Nyɑizei, ɑ si bɑɑ wom mɑ zɑm kɑ ɑ miilɑ bei. Sɑɑ kulu ɑ go bɑɑ yɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ zɑmɑ yɑ du bɑrikɑ fɔ yom mɑ kɑ kɔsu wom kunɑ zɑngɑ ɑ du dimi cindei kunɑ. Ammɑ hɑli mɑɑsɑ yɑ nɑ du fɔndɔ.
45001014	Hɛɛ wɔ gɑrɔkoni no zɑ Gɑrɛku yom dɔ hɑli ɑnne yom dɔ hɑli hɑikusu yom dɔ hɑli fɑhɑm zɑmkɔ yom dɔ.
45001015	Zɑngɑ yɑ guuri kɑ ɑ gundɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ yɑ ci yɑ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ wɑɑzu wom sɛ mo, wom kɑ wom goono Lome wɑngɑrɑ.
45001016	A sindɑ hɑwi ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ Bɑɑru Hinno zɑmɑ ngɑ yɑ ci Ikpɛ dɑbɑri kɑ ɑ̀ fɑɑbɑ nɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne sɛ, sintine Yuifu yom, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ dimi cindei.
45001017	Bɑɑru Hinnɑ kunɑ no cɛɑndiyom susu kɑ Ikpɛ gɑ nɑ, ɑ̀ hunutɛrɛ. A sinti nɑɑne gɑɑ kɑ kpei hɑli beenɑntɛ nɑɑne kunɑ. Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: Bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu go hunɑ nɑɑne gɑɑ.
45001018	Ikpɛ gɑ kɑ ngɑ binetɔnɛ kɑɑtɛrɛ zɑ bɛɛnɛ beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ hungu ɑ̀ sɛ ndɑ zɑm kɑ cɛsusu sɛ. Beerem nge yom di yɑ go cimi nɑɑni ndɑ ngei zɑm kɑ cɛsusu.
45001019	Hɛ kɑ bɔrɔ hini kɑ bei Ikpɛ bɔm, ɑ̀ kpɑrɛ ǹ sɛ zɑmɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ ǹ sɛ.
45001020	Zɑ hɑndunyɑ tɑkɑyom Ikpɛ hɛ yom kɑ bɔrɔ si hini kɑ di zɑngɑ ɑ̀ dɑbɑri kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni, ndɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɔne ikpetɛrɛ tɛrɛkpɑrɛ no ǹ goono. Beerem go di ei tɑkɑhɛ yom gɑɑ hɑli ǹ sindɑ kɔbɛ.
45001021	Kɑ ǹ nɑ Ikpɛ bei ǹ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi zɑngɑ Ikpɛ. Ǹ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ sɑɑbu, ɑmmɑ ǹ tɛ kɔnu noyɑ ǹ lɑsɑbu yom kunɑ. Ǹ binei mo kɑ ǹ sindɑ lɑsɑbu, ǹ tɔ ndɑ kube.
45001022	Ǹ go cii ngei yɑ hɑikusu yom no, sɑmu yom bine no.
45001023	Ǹ nɑ Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ si hini kɑ bu kɑ fumbu deizɑ bɑrime ndɑ himɑi wɔne yom, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ ɑ̀ bu kɑ fumbu ndɑ ciro yom ndɑ ceetɑɑcikpɛ yom ndɑ nɑrɑntɛ yom.
45001024	À sɛ no Ikpɛ mo nɑ ǹ dɑm ziibi kunɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ ǹ bineibɑɑi goono ndɑ, hɑli ǹ gɑɑhɑm bɛɛrɛ mɑ kɑm ǹ bumbum gɑme.
45001025	Ǹ nɑ Ikpɛ cimi bɑrime ndɑ tɑngɑri. Ǹ nɑ tɑkɑhɛ bɛɛrɑndi kɑ tɑmtɛrɛ ɑ̀ sɛ Tɑkɑkɔ guribi, Tɑkɑkɔ kɑ sɑɑbuyom mɑ ci ɑ̀ ŋmɔne, beeniyom si. Ami.
45001026	À sɛ no, Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ dɑm bɑɑyom futu kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ hɑwi kunɑ. Bɑ weibɔrɔ yom fee ndɑ ngei ɑlɑɑdɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono hɑibɔrɔ ndɑ weibɔrɔ gɑme. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ bɑrime ndɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ si sɑbɑ ndɑ ǹ ŋmɔne ɑlɑɑdɑ.
45001027	Yɑ no hɑibɔrɔ yom mo fee ndɑ ɑlɑɑdɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono weibɔrɔ ndɑ hɑibɔrɔ gɑme. Hɑibɔrɔ go bine dɛcɛ hɑibɔrɔ gɑɑ hɑli bɑɑyom futu go kɑ ǹ tɔnu. Hɑibɔrɔ go hɑwi tɛ ndɑ hɑibɔrɔ kɑ du ngei dɛrɛyom bɑnɑndi ngei gɑɑhɑm kunɑ.
45001028	Zɑngɑ bine ǹ hungu kɑ Ikpɛ beiyom jɛ ngei lɑɑkɑli yom kunɑ, Ikpɛ mo nɑ ǹ dɑm lɑsɑbu lɑlɔ kunɑ ǹ mɑ tɛ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ sɑbɑ.
45001029	Ǹ tɔ ndɑ zɑm kɑ cɛsusu dimi kulu ndɑ zinɑ ndɑ hɑnyɑ fute ndɑ hɛ bɑɑyom futu ndɑ cɛmbɛrɛ cɛmbɛrɛ. Ǹ tɔ ndɑ cɛnsɛ ndɑ bɔrɔ wiyom ndɑ zoji ndɑ zɑmbɑ ndɑ ilɑlɔ ndɑ ciine ciine.
45001030	Kɔrɔmɔtɑntɛ yom no. Ǹ bine go hungu Ikpɛ mo. Dondɑ cɛrɛkpɛ yom no. Tɔtɔkpɛ yom no, fɑɑrekpɛ yom ndɑ hɑnyɑ lɑlɔkpɛ yom no. Ǹ si ngei bɑhɛi yom mo gɑnɑ.
45001031	Lɑɑkɑli zɑmkɔ yom no. Ǹ si ci nɑɑnekpɛ yom. Ǹ sindɑ bɑɑkɑsine. Ǹ si cɛrɛ yɑɑfɑ. Ǹ sindɑ suuji.
45001032	Ǹ gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ ciiti bei kɑ beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ hɛ nge yom di tɛ, ɑ̀ tɔ ǹ mɑ bu. Bɑ kɑ ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ bei ngei bumbum go hɛ nge yom di tɛ. Ǹ bine go yee mo ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ ǹ tɛ.
45002001	À sɛ nɑ, e iburɑdɑm kɑ n go ciiti tɛ zɑngɑ n bɑrɑ ndɑ kulu n sindɑ kɔbɛ. Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ n ciiti bɔrɔ fɔ sɛ n go kɑ n bɔm ciiti kɑ zeeri noyɑ zɑmɑ hɛ fɔlɔnku yom no ni mo, n go tɛ.
45002002	I bine bei Ikpɛ ciiti wɔ cimi bɔm no ɑ̀ goono beerem kɑ ǹ go hɛ nge yom dimi tɛ gɑɑ.
45002003	E iburɑdɑm ni, n go beerem ciiti ndɑ hɛ kɑ n go tɛ. Ni bumbum mo, n tɑmmɑ n kɔmɑ Ikpɛ ciiti kɑmbɛ nɑ dee?
45002004	N go kɑ Ikpɛ bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑ gumo fɛntɛ nɑ bɑ? N go kɑ ɑ̀ suuru ndɑ ɑ̀ bɑtuyom kuku fɛntɛ no bɑ? N mɑnɑ bei no hɑli Ikpɛ bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ wɔ ɑ̀ go kɑ n fum tuubiyom dɔ hɛrɛ no?
45002005	To. N gɔgɔsɛndi hɑli n hungu kɑ tuubi. N go binetɔnɛ meigu n bɔm sɛ noyɑ Ikpɛ binetɔnɛ hɑnu hine, hɑnu kɑ Ikpɛ gɑ ngɑ ciiti kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ cimi kɑɑtɛrɛ.
45002006	"Ikpɛ kɑɑ bɔrɔ fɔ fɔ kulu bɑnɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑkpɛ gbei yom goono ndɑ."
45002007	Beerem kɑ ǹ go gbei hinno yom tɛ ndɑ himmɑ ko deizɑ ndɑ bɛɛrɛ ndɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si bu ceeci, ǹ sɛ nɑ Ikpɛ kɑɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni no.
45002008	Ammɑ lijimɑntei mɑ kɑ ǹ si cimi gɑnɑ kɑlɑ zɑm kɑ cɛyom susu, ǹ bɔm no Ikpɛ kɑɑ binetɔnɛ ndɑ binefute cɛbɛ.
45002009	Tɑɑbi bɑmbɑtɑ ndɑ kɑnkɑmi goono bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hɛ lɑlɔ tɛ bɔm, sintine Yuifu yom bɔm, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ dimi cindei bɔm.
45002010	Ammɑ deizɑ ndɑ bɛɛrɛ ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne goono bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go gbei hinno tɛ sɛ, sintine Yuifu yom, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ dimi cindei.
45002011	Ikpɛ dɔ bɑɑbɑɑ si.
45002012	Beerem kulu mɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ dulum tɛ, kɑ ǹ sindɑ Moisi fɔndɑ ǹ kɑɑ hɑlɑci, Moisi fɔndɑ si. Beerem mɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ dulum tɛ Moisi fɔndɑ cire, Moisi fɔndɑ nɑ Ikpɛ gɑ ǹ ciiti ndɑ.
45002013	Ikpɛ jine ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ hɑngɑ dɑm Moisi fɔndɑ sɛ yɑ ci bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu yom. Ammɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go Moisi fɔndɑ dɑm ngei tɛyom kunɑ, ngei nɑ Ikpɛ kɑɑ cɛɑndi susu.
45002014	Dimi cindei sindɑ Moisi fɔndɑ. Bɑ kɑ ǹ sindɑ Moisi fɔndɑ, ǹ go fɔndɑ hɛ yom gɑnɑ zɑngɑ ngei hɑɑli. Ǹ ci ngei bɔm sɛ fɔndɔ.
45002015	Ǹ gɑ cɛbɛ kɑ fɔndɑ gbei goono hɑntumɑntɛ ngei bine yom kunɑ. Ǹ bine kunɑ sendi mo go tɛ sɛdɑ. Ǹ lɑsɑbu yom mo go kɑ ǹ beri wɑlɑ kɑ hurɑ ǹ sɛ.
45002016	À kɑɑ tɛ hɑnu kɑ Ikpɛ gɑ iburɑdɑm yom gunde yom kunɑ ɑsiiri yom ciiti Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ ɑ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ bɔm.
45002017	Gunɑ Yuifu mɑɑ no n gɑɑ. N gɑ gɔrɔ Moisi fɔndɑ bɔm. N gɑ fɑɑre ndɑ kɑ n gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ bei.
45002018	N go kɑ Ikpɛ binebɑɑ bei. N go hɛ yom kɑ ǹ gundɑ jirimɑ neesi kɑ kɑɑ cɛrɛ zɑmɑ n du cooɑndiyom ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ.
45002019	N go tɑbɑi n ci dɑnɑm yom cendikɔ kɑ tɛ kɑɑri beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ goono kube kunɑ.
45002020	N gɑ tɑmmɑ n go ci sɑmu yom cɛbɛkɔ, moobii yom coobɑɑbɑ zɑ kɑ n gundɑ beire ndɑ cimi fɔndɔ Moisi fɔndɑ kunɑ.
45002021	Ngɑ di sɛ, ni kɑ n gɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom cooɑndi, n go kɑ n bɔm cooɑndi fɑ? Ni kɑ n go bɑɑru fɛɛ kɑ cii bɔrɔ mɑ si zee, n gɑ zee fɑ?
45002022	Ni kɑ n go cii bɔrɔ mɑ si zinɑ, n gɑ zinɑ fɑ? Ni kɑ n gɑ tooru fɛntɛ, n go huro kɑ tooru ŋmɑɑri zee fɑ?
45002023	Ni kɑ n go fɑɑre ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ, n si kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi fɑ kɑ n gɑ bɑ si ndɑ fɔndɑ. À nɑ ci yɑ nɑ bɑ?
45002024	Zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Dimi cindei gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ mɑɑ cɛnɑndi wom sɑbu sɛ".
45002025	Bɑngudɑmyom gundɑ hɑnfɑni de n gɑ fɔndɑ gɑnɑ. Ammɑ de n gɑ fɔndɑ dɑɑrum, n bɑngudɑmyom di ye zɑm kɑ dɑmbɑngu.
45002026	Ngɑ di sɛ, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ zɑm bɑngudɑmyom, de ɑ̀ go Moisi fɔndɑ sendikpɑrɛ yom gɑnɑ, Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ zɑm kɑ dɑmbɑngu lɑsɑbu ɑ̀ sɛ zɑngɑ bɑngudɑmyom. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
45002027	Bɔrɔ kɑ gɑɑhɑm kunɑ ɑ̀ ci zɑm kɑ dɑmbɑngu ɑmmɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ Moisi fɔndɑ tɔnɑndi ngɑ hɑɑli gɑɑ, ɑ̀ gɑ n ciiti. N gɑ fɔndɑ tirɑ biiriize kulu gɑnɑ. N gundɑ bɑngudɑmyom ɑmmɑ n go bɑ si ndɑ fɔndɑ.
45002028	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ ngɑ Yuifutɛrɛ cɛbɛ gɑɑhɑm gɑɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Yuifu. Bɑngudɑmyom bine, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci bɑngudɑmyom hinne kɑ ɑ̀ goono gɑɑbɑsi kunɑ.
45002029	Ammɑ Yuifu yɑ ci wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ Yuifutɛrɛ bine kunɑ. Bɑngudɑmyom mo yɑ ci bine ŋmɔne biyɑ kunɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci fɔndɑ tirɑ biiriize kunɑ. Yuifu sifɑyom si hunu iburɑdɑm yom dɔ kɑlɑ Ikpɛ dɔ.
45003001	Dee ifɔ yɑ ci Yuifu yom hɑnfɑni wɑlɑ ifɔ yɑ ci bɑngudɑmyom hɑnfɑni?
45003002	Zɑngɑ nɑ kulu, hɑnfɑnɑ beeri. Sintine ǹ gɑɑ no Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ Sendɑ tɑlifi.
45003003	Ifɔ no? de bɔrɔ fɔ yom mɑnɑ nɑɑne, ǹ zɑm kɑ nɑɑne gɑ Ikpɛ nɑɑne tɛ kɔnu no?
45003004	Awo, ɑ̀ si tɛ. Ikpɛ mɑ ci cimikpɛ. Bɔrɔ kulu mɑ ci tɑngɑrikom. Zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Kɑlɑ n mɑ ci cimikpɛ n sendi yom kunɑ, n mɑ gɑɑŋmɑɑ mɑ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ go kɑ n ciiti."
45003005	Ammɑ de i zɑm kɑ cɛsusu gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ cɛyom susu feeri, ifɔ nɑ i mɑ cii? Ikpɛ mɑnɑ cɛsusu no sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ngɑ binetɔnɛ tɑm? À go sendi no ndɑ zɑngɑ iburɑdɑm go cii.
45003006	Awo. À si tɛ. De yɑ no, mɛtɛ no Ikpɛ kɑɑ hɑndunyɑ ciiti?
45003007	De ɑ tɑngɑri kunɑ Ikpɛ cimi bɑ kɑ tɔntɔnu Ikpɛ deizɑ sɛ, ifɔ sɛ hɛɛ mo Ikpɛ go kɑ ɑ ciiti zɑngɑ dulumkoni?
45003008	Zɑngɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom go wɔne hɑwɑ i gɑɑ kɑ cii i go cii: I mɑ ilɑlɔ tɛ hɑli ihinno mɑ du kɑ kɑɑ. Beerem nge yom di wɔ, ǹ ciitiyom kɑ zeeri sɑbɑ.
45003009	Mɛtɛ no? I gundɑ bɛɛrɛ fɔ kɑ bisei no? Bɑ cɛnɑ. I tɑbɑi Yuifu yom ndɑ dimi cindei kulu goono dulum cire.
45003010	Zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cɛsusu si, bɑ ɑfɔ.
45003011	Fɑhɑmkpɛ si, bɑ ɑfɔ. Bɔrɔ fɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ Ikpɛ ceeci.
45003012	Ǹ kulu kɑmbɑ, ǹ kulu meigu kɑ tɛ kɔnu. Bɑ ɑfɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ihinno tɛ, bɑ ɑfɔ.
45003013	Ǹ jinde kɑrɑ yom bɑrɑ no zɑngɑ sɑɑrɛ feerɑntɛ. Ǹ dɛɛnɛ yom mo no ǹ go gbei ndɑ, kɑ bɔrɔ zɑmbɑ. Gɑzɑmɑ nɑɑji nɑ ǹ mee yom kunɑ.
45003014	Ǹ mee yom tɔ mo no ndɑ lɑɑliyom ndɑ hɔɔti.
45003015	Ǹ cee yom wɑɑsu mɑ kɑ kpei bɔrɔ wi.
45003016	Hɑlɑciyom ndɑ kɑito goono ǹ fɔndɔ yom kunɑ.
45003017	Ǹ si lɑɑkɑli kɑne fɔndɔ bei.
45003018	Ikpɛ hɑmbure si ǹ mɑɑ yom jine."
45003019	I bine bei hɛ kulu kɑ Moisi fɔndɑ go cii, ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ̀ cii no beerem kɑ ǹ goono fɔndɑ cire sɛ. À go kɑ ɑ̀ cii no beerem kɑ ǹ goono fɔndɑ cire sɛ zɑmɑ iburɑdɑm mee kulu mɑ dɑɑbu, hɑndunyɑ mo kulu mɑ ye Ikpɛ ciiti cire.
45003020	À sɛ no fɔndɑ gɑnɑyom gɑɑ, bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ si kɑ Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ cɛɑndi susu ngɑ jine. Fɔndɑ dɔ no dulum beiyom hunu.
45003021	Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ Ikpɛ nɑ cɛɑndiyom susu kɑɑtɛrɛ, cɛɑndiyom susu kɑ ɑ̀ hunu Ikpɛ dɔ. À mɑnɑ hunu Moisi fɔndɑ dɔ. Moisi fɔndɑ ndɑ ɑndebei tirɑ yom tɛ ɑ̀ sɛdɑ.
45003022	Ikpɛ cɛɑndiyom susu kɑ ɑ̀ hunu Ikpɛ dɔ nɑɑne gɑɑ nɑ ɑ̀ goono Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ. À goono beerem kulu sɛ kɑ ǹ gɑ nɑɑne. Fɑyɑnkɑyom si.
45003023	Bɔrɔ kulu nɑ dulum tɛ. Ǹ bine gɑziɑ Ikpɛ deizɑ gɑɑ.
45003024	Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ cɛɑndi susu noyom bɔm ngɑ gominɑ gɑɑ fɑnsɑyom dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ.
45003025	Ngɑ nɑ Ikpɛ cɛbɛ zɑngɑ gɑrɑndi hɛ sɑsɑbɑndiyom sɛ ɑ̀ kuri dɔ, bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ nɑɑne sɛ. Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ kɑ ngɑ cɛɑndiyom susu kɑɑtɛrɛ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ suuru kunɑ ɑ̀ nɑ dɑm dulum yom kɔsu.
45003026	Zɑngɑ yɑ no mɑɑsɑ lɔkɑci wɔ kunɑ, ɑ̀ go kɑ ngɑ cɛɑndiyom susu cɛbɛ kɑ ngɑ yɑ Cɛsusu no. À go bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne Yesu gɑɑ mo cɛɑndi susu.
45003027	Dee mɑni sɑbɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ bɔrɔ mɑ fɑɑre? Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ. Ndɑ fɔndɔ fɔ? Ndɑ fɔndɑ gɑnɑyom tɛgbei yom? Awo, ndɑ nɑɑne fɔndɔ.
45003028	À sɛ no i go lɑsɑbu Ikpɛ gɑ bɔrɔ cɛɑndi susu no nɑɑne gɑɑ, Moisi fɔndɑ tɛgbei yom si.
45003029	Ikpɛ wɔ Yuifu yom hinne ŋmɔne no? À mɑnɑ ci dimi cindei mo ŋmɔne no? Oò, dimi cindei mo ŋmɔne Ikpɛ no.
45003030	Ikpɛ fɔlɔnku yɑ gɑ bɑnguize yom cɛɑndi susu nɑɑne gɑɑ. À go zɑm kɑ dɑmbɑnguize yom mo cɛɑndi susu nɑɑne gɑɑ.
45003031	Yɑ di gɑɑ, i gɑ fɔndɑ tɛ kɔnu nɑɑne dɔ no? Awo. Kɑlɑ i go fɔndɑ gɔrɛndi dee.
45004001	Ifɔ no i mɑ cii i cɛɛ Abulɛmɑ du kɑ simbɑ ndɑ gɑɑhɑm?
45004002	De Ikpɛ nɑ Abulɛmɑ cɛɑndi susu fɔndɑ tɛgbei gɑɑ, ɑ̀ tɔ ɑ̀ mɑ fɑɑre ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Ikpɛ jine.
45004003	Ifɔ no Ikpɛ Sendɑ cii? À cii: "Abulɛmɑ nɑɑne Ikpɛ. Ikpɛ nɑ cɛɑndiyom susu lɑsɑbu ɑ̀ sɛ".
45004004	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go gbei tɛ, ǹ si bɑnɑndi lɑsɑbu zɑngɑ gomini, ɑmmɑ zɑngɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tilɑsi ɑkpɛ mɑ du.
45004005	Ammɑ Ikpɛ go bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ cɛɑndi susu. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si gbei tɛ ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne Ikpɛ gɑɑ, Ikpɛ go cɛɑndiyom susu lɑsɑbu ɑ̀ sɛ.
45004006	Yɑ no Dɑfidi go bɔrɔ fɔ bɑrikɑ deede, bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ Ikpɛ go cɛɑndiyom susu lɑsɑbu ɑ̀ sɛ, fɔndɑ tɛgbei yom si. À cii:
45004007	"Binekɑɑnekpɛ yom no beerem wɔ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ yɑɑfɑ ndɑ ǹ ilɑlɔ tɛyom, beerem kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ dulum yom dɑɑbu mo.
45004008	Binekɑɑnekpɛ no, bɔrɔ kɑ Kpe si dulum lɑsɑbu ɑ̀ sɛ."
45004009	Sɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ gɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm zɑngɑ yɑ, ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm bɑnguize yom hinne sɛ no dee wɑlɑ ndɑ zɑm kɑ dɑmbɑnguize yom mo sɛ? I go cii Ikpɛ nɑ Abulɛmɑ nɑɑne lɑsɑbu ɑ̀ sɛ cɛɑndiyom susu.
45004010	Mɛtɛ no Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ lɑsɑbu ɑ̀ sɛ? À bɑngu huroyom bɑndɑ nɑ dee wɑlɑ zɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hurɑ bɑngu nɑ? Zɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hurɑ bɑngu no. À goono ngɑ zɑm kɑ dɑmbɑngu kunɑ.
45004011	À du bɑngudɑmyom ɑlɑmu zɑngɑ cɛɑndiyom susu sɛdɑ dɑmyom noyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ du nɑɑne gɑɑ ɑ̀ zɑm kɑ dɑmbɑngu kunɑ. À nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ no zɑmɑ beerem kulu kɑ ǹ nɑɑne kɑ ǹ goono zɑm kɑ dɑmbɑngu kunɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ ci ǹ sɛ bɑɑbɑ. Ikpɛ mɑ du kɑ cɛɑndiyom susu lɑsɑbu ngei mɑ sɛ.
45004012	À mɑ ci bɑɑbɑ bɑnguize yom sɛ mo. À mɑnɑ ci bɑnguize hinne sɛ bɑɑbɑ bɑ, ɑmmɑ ndɑ beerem mo kɑ ǹ go dirɑ kɑ i bɑɑbɑ Abulɛmɑ nɑɑne lɑwɑli gɑnɑ. Nɑɑne wɔ nɑ Abulɛmɑ gundɑ zɑ ɑ̀ goono zɑm kɑ dɑmbɑngu kunɑ.
45004013	Ikpɛ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli tɛ Abulɛmɑ sɛ ndɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ ci hɑndunyɑ tubukɔ. À mɑnɑ ɑlikɑwɑli di tɛ Moisi fɔndɑ dɔ ɑmmɑ cɛɑndiyom susu dɔ nɑɑne gɑɑ.
45004014	De Moisi fɔndɑ gɑnɑkɔ yom tɛ tubukɔ yom, nɑɑne tɛ kɔnu noyɑ. Alikɑwɑlɑ mo si hɛ fɔ kulu jɑrɑ.
45004015	Moisi fɔndɑ wɔ binetɔnɛ no ɑ̀ go kɑɑndɑ. Nungu kɑ Moisi fɔndɑ si, fɔndɑ dɑɑrumyom mo si nodi.
45004016	À sɛ no, ɑlikɑwɑli goono nɑɑne gɑɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ goono gomini dɔ hɑli ɑlikɑwɑli mɑ tɑbɑi ɑ̀ bɑndɑ kulu sɛ. À mɑnɑ ci beerem kɑ ǹ go Moisi fɔndɑ gɑnɑ hinne sɛ, ɑmmɑ ndɑ beerem mo sɛ kɑ ǹ go nɑɑne zɑngɑ Abulɛmɑ. Ngɑ yɑ ci i kulu sɛ bɑɑbɑ.
45004017	Zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "A nɑ n gɔrɛndi dimi boobo sɛ bɑɑbɑ". Abulɛmɑ ci i sɛ bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ jine, Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ ɑ̀ nɑɑne. Ikpɛ wɔ yɑ go bukɔ yom no hundi. À go hɛ yom kɑ ǹ si, cɛɛ zɑngɑ hɛ kɑ ǹ goono.
45004018	Abulɛmɑ gɑ bɛɛjɛ kɑ nɑɑne, bɑ kɑ bɛɛjɛ hɛ si. À gɑɑ no ɑ̀ tɛ dimi boobo sɛ bɑɑbɑ, hɛ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ bɔm: "Zɑngɑ n bɑndɑ yom kɑɑ bɑrɑ noyɑ".
45004019	Abulɛmɑ mɑnɑ zɑm gɑɑbi nɑɑne kunɑ. À mɑnɑ gunɑ ngɑ gɑɑhɑm bu kɔ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ tɔ zɑngɑ jiiri zɑngu. À mɑnɑ gunɑ mo kɑ Sɑhɑrɑ gunde bu, ɑ̀ si hɛi.
45004020	A mɑnɑ siikɑ kɑ zɑm kɑ nɑɑne Ikpɛ ɑlikɑwɑlɑ gɑɑ kɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ du gɑɑbi nɑɑne dɔ kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi.
45004021	À bei dɑhiri ɑlikɑwɑli kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ, Ikpɛ gundɑ dɑbɑri kɑ ɑ̀ tɔnɑndi.
45004022	À sɛ nɑ, Ikpɛ nɑ Abulɛmɑ nɑɑne lɑsɑbu ɑ̀ sɛ cɛɑndiyom susu.
45004023	À mɑnɑ ci ngɑ hinne sɛ nɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɑntum kɑ cii Ikpɛ nɑ cɛɑndiyom susu lɑsɑbu ɑ̀ sɛ.
45004024	Ammɑ i yom mo, i sɑbu sɛ Ikpɛ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ lɑsɑbu i sɛ, i yom kɑ i gɑ nɑɑne Ikpɛ gɑɑ. Ngɑ yɑ nɑ i Kpe Yesu tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme.
45004025	Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm kɑmbɛ i tɑɑli yom sɑbu sɛ. À nɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi mo zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ i cɛɑndi susu.
45005001	Ngɑ di sɛ, zɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ i cɛɑndi susu nɑɑne gɑɑ, bɑɑni tɛ i yom ndɑ Ikpɛ gɑme i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ.
45005002	À dɔ nɑ i yom mo i du fɔndɔ kɑ huro gomini kunɑ nɑɑne gɑɑ. Gominɑ kunɑ no i go sinji kɑ boori. I go fɑihã mo kɑ bɛɛjɛ sinji Ikpɛ deizɑ gɑɑ.
45005003	Bɑ ngɑ di bɑ si, i go fɑihã mo bɑ kɑnkɑmi yom kunɑ ko bei kɑ kɑnkɑmi wɔ kokɑri no ɑ̀ cini hɛi.
45005004	Kokɑri mo go kɑɑndɑ dɑɑ tɑbɑtɑntɛ bubure kunɑ. Dɑɑ tɑbɑtɑntɛ mo go kɑɑndɑ bɛɛjɛ.
45005005	Bɛɛjɛ bine si bɔrɔ dɑm hɑwi pɑi, zɑmɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ i no, ɑ̀ nɑ Ikpɛ bɑɑkɑsine dooru i bine yom kunɑ.
45005006	Sɑɑ kɑ i goono gɑɑbi si, lɔkɑci kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ no Mɛsiyɑ bu beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ si kɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ.
45005007	Kɑlɑ dɑcɑti bɔrɔ du kɑ bu bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cɛsusu sɛ, ɑmmɑ hɑnibɑ bɔrɔ yɑru kɑ bu bɔrɔ hinno sɛ.
45005008	Ammɑ Ikpɛ gɑ kɑ ngɑ bɑɑkɑsine cɛbɛ i sɛ, sɑɑ kɑ i goono ko ci dulumkoni yom, Mɛsiyɑ bu i sɛ.
45005009	Hɑli yɑ mɑ mɑɑsɑ Ikpɛ nɑ i cɛɑndi susu Mɛsiyɑ kuri gɑɑ. À sɛ no, Ikpɛ gɑ i fɑɑbɑ ngɑ binetɔnɛ kɑmbɛ Mɛsiyɑ dɔ.
45005010	Zɑ sɑɑ kɑ i gɑ ci Ikpɛ ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ yom ɑ̀ nɑ i yom ndɑ ngɑ sɑsɑbɑndi ɑ̀ Ize bu gɑɑ. Hɑli yɑ mɑ zɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ i sɑsɑbɑndi, ɑ̀ gɑ i fɑɑbɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ Ize hundi.
45005011	Bɑ nge yom di bɑ si mɑ, i gɑ fɑihã kpɛɛnɛ Ikpɛ kunɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ. Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ nɑ mɑɑsɑ Ikpɛ nɑ i sɑsɑbɑndi.
45005012	Bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku dɔ dulum huro hɑndunyɑ. Dulum mo sɑbu sɛ bu huro. À sɛ no zɑngɑ yɑ bu dirɑ bɔrɔ kulu bɔm zɑmɑ bɔrɔ kulu nɑ dulum tɛ.
45005013	Kɑlɑ Moisi fɔndɑ wɑtɛ dulum goono hɑndunyɑ kunɑ, ɑmmɑ ǹ si kɑ ɑ̀ lɑsɑbu zɑngɑ dulum sɑɑ kɑ Moisi fɔndɑ si.
45005014	Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu bu dɑbɑri zɑ Adɑmu bɔm kɑlɑ Moisi bɔm. Bu dɑbɑri beerem bɔm kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ dulum tɛ zɑngɑ Adɑmu ŋmɔne dimi. Adɑmu yɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ yɑ kɑɑ himɑi.
45005015	Ammɑ gomini noyom cɛ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci zɑngɑ dɛrɛyom wɔ. Bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku dɛrɛyom gɑɑ jɑmɑ bu. Hɑli yɑ mo Ikpɛ gomini ndɑ gomini noyom kɑ ɑ̀ hunu bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku dɔ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ, ngɑ di bɑ kɑ tɔntɔnu jɑmɑ sɛ.
45005016	Ikpɛ noyom wɔ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci zɑngɑ noyom kɑ ɑ̀ hunu bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ dulum tɛ. Bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku tɑɑli kɑɑndɑ ciiti kɑ zeeri. Ammɑ Ikpɛ gomini noyom kɑɑ dɛrɛyom boobo bɑndɑ kɑ kɑɑndɑ cɛɑndiyom susu.
45005017	Bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku dɛrɛyom gɑɑ bu go dɑbɑri bɔrɔ kulu bɔm. Yɑ mo beerem kɑ ǹ go du gomini ndɑ bɑyom ndɑ noyom kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑndɑ cɛɑndiyom susu, ǹ kɑɑ dɑbɑri hundi kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku dɔ, Yesu Mɛsiyɑ.
45005018	Yɑ di gɑɑ zɑngɑ dɛrɛyom fɔlɔnku gɑɑ ciiti kɑ zeeri kɑɑ bɔrɔ kulu gɑɑ. Yɑ no cɛyom susu tɛyom fɔlɔnku gɑɑ, cɛɑndiyom susu kɑ ɑ̀ go hundi no ɑ̀ tɔ bɔrɔ kulu gɑɑ.
45005019	Bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku zɑm kɑ gɑnɑ kunɑ bɔrɔ boobo tɛ dulumkoni. Yɑ mo no bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku ŋmɔne gɑnɑyom kunɑ, Ikpɛ kɑɑ bɔrɔ boobo tɛ cɛɑntɛ susu.
45005020	Moisi fɔndɑ kɑɑ no zɑmɑ dɛrɛyom mɑ bɑ. Ammɑ nungu kɑ dulum bɑ, gomini bɑ kɑ bisɑ.
45005021	Dulum dɑbɑri bu kunɑ. Yɑ no gomini mo mɑ dɑbɑri cɛɑndiyom susu kunɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni sɛ, i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ.
45006001	Yɑ di gɑɑ ifɔ i mɑ cii? I bo dulum tɛ zɑmɑ gomini mɑ bɑ sɛ?
45006002	Awo. À si tɛ. I yom kɑ i bu dulum sɛ, mɛtɛ i kɑɑ tɛ ko hunɑ kpɛɛnɛ dulum kunɑ?
45006003	Wom bei kɑ i kulu kɑ i du mirɑndiyom Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ, ɑ̀ bu kunɑ no i du mirɑndiyom. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
45006004	Yɑ di gɑɑ ǹ nɑ i fiji ɑ̀ bɑndɑ mirɑndiyom dɔ ɑ̀ bu kunɑ. Zɑngɑ ǹ nɑ Mɛsiyɑ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme Bɑɑbɑ dɑbɑri deizɑkpɛ gɑɑ, yɑ no i yom i mo dirɑ hundi teji kunɑ.
45006005	Zɑ kɑ i tɛ ɑfɔ ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ ɑ̀ bu himɑndi kunɑ, yɑ no i kɑɑ tɛ ɑfɔ ɑ̀ tunɑndiyom himɑndi kunɑ.
45006006	I gɑ bei kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ i bine kunɑ bɔrɔ zeenɔ kɑnji Mɛsiyɑ bɑndɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ dulum dɑbɑri hɑlɑci. Yɑ di gɑɑ i mɑ si tɑmtɛrɛ dulum sɛ kpɛɛnɛ.
45006007	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bu, ɑ̀ kɔmɑ dulum kɑmbɛ noyɑ.
45006008	Bine, zɑ kɑ i bu Mɛsiyɑ bɑndɑ, i gɑ nɑɑne i kɑɑ hunɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ mɑ.
45006009	I gɑ bei Mɛsiyɑ kɑ Ikpɛ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme, ɑ̀ si bu kpɛɛnɛ. Bu sindɑ dɑbɑri ɑ̀ bɔm kpɛɛnɛ.
45006010	Bu kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ, dulum sɛ no ɑ̀ bu ce fɔ pɑp. Ammɑ hunɑyom kɑ ɑ̀ go tɛ, Ikpɛ sɛ no ɑ̀ go hunɑ.
45006011	Zɑngɑ yɑ wom mo, wɑ wom bɔm lɑsɑbu zɑngɑ bukɔ yom dulum sɛ. Wɑ wom bɔm lɑsɑbu wom yɑ hundikoni yom no Ikpɛ sɛ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ.
45006012	Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ si nɑm dulum mɑ dɑbɑri wom gɑɑhɑm yom kɑ ǹ bu bɔm hɑli wom mɑ ǹ bineibɑɑi gɑnɑ.
45006013	Wɑ si wom dɔbu yom no dulum sɛ zɑngɑ ilɑlɔ tɛyom hɛ. Ammɑ wɑ wom bɔm no Ikpɛ sɛ zɑngɑ bukɔ yom kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ hunɑndi. Wom dɔbu yom mo, wɑ ǹ no Ikpɛ sɛ cɛyom susu tɛyom hɛ.
45006014	Dulum si ye kɑ dɑbɑri wom bɔm, zɑmɑ wom si fɔndɑ cire ɑmmɑ wom goono gomini cire.
45006015	Yɑ di gɑɑ, i mɑ dulum tɛ me, zɑmɑ i si fɔndɑ cire kɑlɑ gomini cire? Awo. À si tɛ.
45006016	Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ wom no wom bɔm no zɑngɑ tɑm yom kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ, wom tɛ bɔrɔ di kpɛ tɑm yom noyɑ. Wom go yɑ di bei bɑ? De dulum sɛ no wom go wom bɔm no, bu dɔ no ɑ̀ kpeindɑ wom. De bine Ikpɛ gɑnɑyom sɛ nɑ wom go wom bɔm no, cɛɑndiyom susu dɔ nɑ ɑ̀ kpeindɑ wom.
45006017	Ammɑ i mɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu zɑmɑ sɑɑ kɑ wom go ci dulum tɑm yom, wom nɑ cɛbɛ dimi fɔ gɑnɑ ndɑ bine fɔ, cɛbɛ kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ Ikpɛ nɑ wom dɑm.
45006018	Zɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ wom fɑnsɑ dulum gɑɑ, wom tɛ cɛɑndiyom susu tɑm yom noyɑ.
45006019	Wom hɑɑli yom kɑ ǹ sindɑ gɑɑbi, ɑ̀ sɑbu sɛ nɑ ɑ go sendi zɑngɑ iburɑdɑm yom go cii. Wom nɑ wom dɔbu yom no zɑngɑ tɑm yom ziibi sɛ ndɑ hɛ lɑlɔ sɛ kɑ kpei hɛ lɑlɔ boobo tɛyom kunɑ. Zɑngɑ yɑ mɑɑsɑ mɑ wom mɑ dɔbu yom no zɑngɑ tɑm yom cɛɑndiyom susu sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑndɑ hɑlɑɑlɑtɛrɛ.
45006020	Sɑɑ kɑ wom go ci dulum tɑm yom, cɛɑndiyom susu sindɑ dɑbɑri wom bɔm.
45006021	Ngɑ di sɛ, hɛ yom wɔ kɑ hɑwi go wom dii ndei mɑɑsɑ, dom di bɑrikɑ fɔ no wom du ǹ gɑɑ? Hɛ nge yom di beenɑntɛ yɑ ci bu.
45006022	Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ Ikpɛ nɑ wom fɑnsɑ dulum gɑɑ. Wom tɛ ɑ̀ tɑm yom. Wom gundɑ wom bɑrikɑ hɑlɑɑlɑtɛrɛ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑɑndɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni.
45006023	Dulum bɑnɑndi yɑ ci bu, ɑmmɑ Ikpɛ gomini noyom yɑ ci hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni i Kpe Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ.
45007001	Nyɑizei, Moisi fɔndɑ bo dɑbɑri bɔrɔ bɔm no kɑlɑ ɑ̀ hundi mee. Wom go yɑ di bei bɑ? Beerem kɑ ǹ go Moisi fɔndɑ bei, ǹ sɛ no ɑ go sendi.
45007002	Yɑ no Moisi fɔndɑ go weihiji hɔ ɑ̀ kunye gɑɑ de kunye di go hunɑ. Ammɑ de kunyɑ bu, wɛndɑ kɔmɑ fɔndɑ gɑɑ, fɔndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ̀ hɔ ndɑ kunyɑ.
45007003	Ammɑ kunyɑ bɑhune kunɑ, de ɑ̀ nɑ hɑibɔrɔ ŋmɑni fɔ hiji, zinɑteeri no ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ. Ammɑ de kunyɑ bu, ɑ̀ hunu fɔndɔ ngɑ di kunɑ noyɑ. À mɑnɑ ci zinɑ de ɑ̀ nɑ hɑibɔrɔ teji hiji.
45007004	A sɛ no ɑ nyɑizei, wom bu Moisi fɔndɑ sɛ Mɛsiyɑ gɑɑhɑm dɔ zɑmɑ wom mɑ tɛ bɔrɔ fɔ ŋmɑni ŋmɔne yom. Wom ci bɔrɔ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme ŋmɔne yom zɑmɑ i mɑ bɑrikɑ hɛi Ikpɛ sɛ.
45007005	Sɑɑ kɑ i goono dulum hɑɑli kunɑ dulum ŋmɔne bɑɑyom futei kɑ Moisi fɔndɑ nɑ ǹ fum, ǹ nɑ gbei tɛ i dɔbu yom kunɑ hɑli i mɑ nɑfɑ bu sɛ.
45007006	Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ, bu nɑ i feeri Moisi fɔndɑ gɑɑ zɑ kɑ fɔndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ i dii, i bu ɑ̀ dɔ. Ikpɛ nɑ i feeri i mɑ tɑmtɛrɛ ɑ̀ sɛ ndɑ fɔndɔ teji Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci fɔndɑ tirɑ biiriize yom kunɑ zɑngɑ dom di.
45007007	Yɑ di gɑɑ ifɔ i mɑ cii? Moisi fɔndɑ dulum no bɑ? Awo. À si tɛ. Ammɑ yɑ nɑ dulum bei de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Moisi fɔndɑ gɑɑ. Yɑ no ɑ mɑnɑ bɑɑyom futu bei de Moisi fɔndɑ mɑnɑ cii: "N mɑ si bɑɑyom futu tɛ".
45007008	Ammɑ kɑ dulum du dɑɑmɑ meire dɔ, ɑ̀ nɑ bɑɑyom futu dimi kulu hɛi ɑ̀ kunɑ. De Moisi fɔndɑ si, dulum mo si.
45007009	Hɛɛ wɔ, sɑɑ kɑ ɑ goono ɑ sindɑ Moisi fɔndɑ, ɑ gɑ hunɑ. Ammɑ kɑ meire kɑɑ, dulum tɛ hundi. Cɔfɔ ɑ bu.
45007010	Meire mo kɑ ɑ̀ ci hundi ŋmɔne, ɑ gɑru ɑ̀ tɛ ɑ sɛ bu ŋmɔne.
45007011	Kɑ dulum du dɑɑmɑ meire dɔ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ zɑmbɑ ndɑ meire kɑ ɑ wi ndɑ meire.
45007012	À sɛ no, Moisi fɔndɑ ci hɑlɑɑlɑ. Meire mo ci hɑlɑɑlɑ. À ci cɛsusu. À ci ihinno.
45007013	Yɑ di gɑɑ hɛ hinno di yɑ ye ɑ sɛ bu? Awo. À si tɛ. Ammɑ dulum dee, zɑmɑ dulum mɑ hunu tɛrɛ kɑ ngɑ yɑ ci dulum ɑ̀ kɑɑndɑ ɑ sɛ bu hɛ hinno gɑɑ. À nɑ ngɑ di tɛ hɑli meire dɔ dulum mɑ tɛ dulum hɑli ǹ ci mɔsɔ.
45007014	I go bei Ikpɛ dɔ no Moisi fɔndɑ hunu. Ammɑ hɛɛ wɔ bineibɑɑi gɑnɑkɔ no kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ neerɑ yɑ tɛ tɑm dulum sɛ.
45007015	Hɛ kɑ ɑ go tɛ, ɑ si kɑ ɑ̀ fɑhɑm. À si tɛ mo hɛ kɑ ɑ go bɑɑ. Hɛ kɑ ɑ bine go hungu, ngɑ nɑ ɑ gɑ tɛ.
45007016	De bine ɑ go tɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ si bɑɑ, ɑ go Moisi fɔndɑ tu noyɑ kɑ bei ihinno no.
45007017	Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci hɛɛ yɑ go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ, ɑmmɑ dulum kɑ ɑ̀ goono ɑ kunɑ nɑ.
45007018	À gɑ bei ihinno si ɑ kunɑ, wɑtom ɑ dulum hɑɑli kunɑ. À bine go bɑɑ ihinno tɛyom ɑmmɑ ɑ sindɑ ɑ̀ tɛyom dɑbɑri.
45007019	Ihinno kɑ ɑ go bɑɑ yɑ ɑ̀ tɛ, ɑ si kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ. Ilɑlɔ kɑ ɑ si bɑɑ, ngɑ no ɑ gɑ tɛ.
45007020	De ɑ go tɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ si bɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci hɛɛ yɑ go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ɑmmɑ dulum kɑ ɑ̀ goono ɑ kunɑ no.
45007021	Fɔndɑ kɑ ɑ du ɑ gɑɑhɑm kunɑ noyɑ. À gɑ bɑɑ ihinno tɛyom ɑmmɑ ilɑlɔ goono ɑ kunɑ.
45007022	A go fɑɑriŋmɑɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ fɔndɑ ɑ bine kunɑ.
45007023	Ammɑ ɑ go di fɔndɔ ŋmɑni fɔ ɑ dɔbei kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go tɑngɑm ndɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ fɑhɑm go gɑnɑ. À gɑ kɑ ɑ dɑm mo tɑmtɛrɛ kunɑ dulum fɔndɑ sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ goono ɑ dɔbei kunɑ.
45007024	Kɑito, hɛɛ. Mee yɑ gɑ ɑ kɑɑ gɑɑhɑm kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑɑndɑ bu wɔ kɑmbɛ?
45007025	A go kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu, ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ kɑɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ. À sɛ no fɑhɑm kunɑ ɑ tɑmtɛrɛ Ikpɛ fɔndɑ sɛ, ɑmmɑ dulum hɑɑli dɔ ɑ tɑmtɛrɛ dulum fɔndɑ sɛ.
45008001	À sɛ no, mɑɑsɑ ciiti kɑ zeeri si beerem sɛ no kɑ ǹ goono Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ, nge yom kɑ ǹ go dirɑ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ndɑ dulum hɑɑli.
45008002	Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ fɔndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni nɑ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ fɑnsɑ dulum fɔndɑ gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑndɑ bu.
45008003	Hɛ kɑ Moisi fɔndɑ si hini kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ gɑɑbi dulum hɑɑli dɔ, Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ. A nɑ ngɑ bumbum Ize dɔntɔm iburɑdɑm hɑɑli kunɑ zɑngɑ dulumkoni. À nɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔm ɑ̀ mɑ ci gɑrɑndi hɛ dulum sɛ kɑ dulum hɑɑli ciiti kɑ zeeri.
45008004	Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ di tɛ nɑ domi hɛ kɑ fɔndɑ go tilɑsi kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ tɔ i kunɑ, i yom kɑ i go dirɑ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ndɑ dulum hɑɑli.
45008005	Beerem kɑ ngei wɔ go dulum hɑɑli gɑnɑ, dulum hɑɑli hɛ yom bɔm no ǹ lɑsɑbu goono. Ammɑ beerem kɑ ngei wɔ gɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ gɑnɑ, Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ hɛ yom bɔm no ǹ lɑsɑbu goono.
45008006	Dulum hɑɑli wɔ lɑsɑbu yɑ ci bu. Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ mɑ lɑsɑbu yɑ ci hundi ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne.
45008007	Dulum hɑɑli lɑsɑbu wɔ ibɛrɛtɛrɛ nɑ Ikpɛ sɛ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ si bɔm yeti gɑndɑ Ikpɛ fɔndɑ sɛ. À si hini kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ mɑ.
45008008	À sɛ no, beerem kɑ ǹ go dulum hɑɑli gɑnɑ, ǹ si hini kɑ kɑɑni Ikpɛ sɛ.
45008009	Ammɑ wom wɔ, wom si dulum hɑɑli gɑnɑ. Wom go Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ gɑnɑ zɑ kɑ Ikpɛ Biyɑ goono wom kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ. Ammɑ de bɔrɔ fɔ sindɑ Mɛsiyɑ Biyɑ, ɑkpɛ wɔ mɑnɑ ci ɑ̀ ŋmɔne.
45008010	Ammɑ zɑ kɑ Mɛsiyɑ goono wom kunɑ, wom gɑɑhɑmei bu dulum sɑbu sɛ. Wom biyɑ mo go hunɑ no cɛɑndiyom susu sɑbu sɛ.
45008011	Ikpɛ Biyɑ nɑ Yesu tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme. Zɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono wom kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme, ɑ̀ kɑɑ wom gɑɑhɑmei kɑ ǹ goono bu bɔm hunɑndi mo. À gɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ ngɑ Biyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono wom kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ.
45008012	Ngɑ di sɛ nyɑizei, i mɑnɑ ci dulum hɑɑli gɑrɔkoni yom hɑli i mɑ hunɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ dulum hɑɑli goono ndɑ.
45008013	De wom go hunɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ dulum hɑɑli goono ndɑ, wom goono bu bɔm. Ammɑ de Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ gɑɑ wom go gɑɑhɑm tɛgbei yom wi, wom kɑɑ hunɑ.
45008014	Beerem kulu kɑ Ikpɛ Biyɑ go dɑm fɔndɔ, ngei wɔ Ikpɛ ize yom no.
45008015	À mɑnɑ ci tɑmtɛrɛ biyɑ no wom tɑ hɑli wom mɑ goono hɑmburu kunɑ kpɛɛnɛ. Ikpɛ Biyɑ kɑɑtɛrɛ dɑmyom no wom tɑ, wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ i go kuwɑ, Bɑɑbɑ, ɑ Bɑɑbɑ.
45008016	Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ bumbum ndɑ i biyɑ gɑ tɛ sɛdɑ kɑ i yom wɔ Ikpɛ ize yom no.
45008017	Zɑ kɑ i ci Ikpɛ ize yom, i ci tubukɔ yom mo. I ci Ikpɛ tubukɔ yom, tubukɔ yom mefɔ Mɛsiyɑ bɑndɑ. Hɑli kulu i go tɑɑbi mefɔ ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ, i yom mɑ Ikpɛ mɑ i nɑ deizɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ.
45008018	A diyom gɑɑ mɑɑsɑ lɔkɑci tɑɑbi yom mɑnɑ tɔ sɑsɑbɑndiyom ndɑ deizɑ kɑ yɑ kɑɑ. Deizɑ wɔ Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ i kunɑ.
45008019	Tɑkɑhɛ kulu gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ ize yom kɑɑyomtɛrɛ bɑtu ndɑ himmɑ.
45008020	Tɑkɑhɛ kulu ye gɑndɑ kɔnu cire. À mɑnɑ ye gɑndɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ binebɑɑ, ɑmmɑ Ikpɛ sɑbu sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ yeti gɑndɑ.
45008021	Tɑkɑhɛ kulu go bɛɛjɛ kɑ ngɑ bumbum mo Ikpɛ gɑ ngɑ fɑnsɑ tɑmtɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑndɑ fumbi gɑɑ. À gɑ ɑ̀ tɛ no domi ngɑ mɑ huro Ikpɛ ize yom bɔrɔcinitɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ deizɑ kunɑ.
45008022	I go bei tɑkɑhɛ kulu go dure ko tɑɑbi ndɑ hɛizɛnyɛ hɑli hɔ.
45008023	À mɑnɑ ci tɑkɑhɛ hinne. I yom mo, kɑ i gundɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ hɛijinɑ, i go dure i bumbum kunɑ. I go kootɛrɛ dɑmyom bɑtu wɑtom Ikpɛ gɑ i gɑɑhɑmei fɑnsɑ.
45008024	Bɛɛjɛ kunɑ nɑ Ikpɛ nɑ i fɑɑbɑ. Bɛɛjɛ bine kɑ bɔrɔ go di ndɑ moo ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci bɛɛjɛ. Hɛ kɑ bɔrɔ go di ndɑ moo, ifɔ sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛjɛ tɛ kpɛɛnɛ?
45008025	Ammɑ hɛ kɑ i si di ndɑ moo, de i go kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛjɛ tɛ i bɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑtu no ndɑ suuru.
45008026	Yɑ no Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ mo go kɑ i gɑɑ i mɔngɔnɛ kunɑ. I si bei zɑngɑ ɑ̀ himɑ i mɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑduwɑ kunɑ. Ammɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ bumbum gɑ hurɑ i sɛ ndɑ binejisiyom kɑ mee si hini kɑ ɑ̀ cii.
45008027	Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ bine yom kunɑ yɑɑse gunɑ, ɑ̀ go Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ lɑsɑbu mɑ bei. À gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bei zɑmɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ go huro hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom sɛ ndɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ binebɑɑ goono ndɑ.
45008028	Ammɑ i go bei Ikpɛ go hɛ kulu meigu kɑ tɛ bɑrikɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go bɑɑ Ikpɛ sɛ. Nge yom no Ikpɛ cɛɛ mo ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ miilɑ goono ndɑ.
45008029	Beerem kɑ Ikpɛ bei kɑ jisi ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ kɔdɔrɔ ǹ mɑ ci ngɑ Ize himɑi. À nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ no domi Izɑ mɑ ci sintine, nyɑize boobo kunɑ.
45008030	Beerem kɑ ɑ̀ kɔdɔrɔ, ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ cɛɛ mo. Beerem kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ cɛɛ, ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ cɛɑndi susu mɑ. Beerem kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ cɛɑndi susu, ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ no deizɑ.
45008031	Dee ifɔ i mɑ cii kɑ simbɑ ndɑ hɛ yom wɔ? Zɑ kɑ Ikpɛ cɛ i sɛ, mee yɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ i yom?
45008032	Cimi no, Ikpɛ mɑnɑ ngɑ bumbum Ize bɑkɑɑ. Ammɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm kɑmbɛ i kulu sɑbu sɛ. Yɑ di gɑɑ, mɛtɛ ɑ̀ tɛ ɑ̀ si i gomini hɛ kulu ɑ̀ bumbum Izɑ bɑndɑ?
45008033	Mee yɑ gɑ Ikpɛ suubɑntɛ yom beri? Ikpɛ yɑ gɑ cɛɑndi susu.
45008034	Mee yɑ gɑ i ciiti kɑ zeeri? Mɛsiyɑ bu. Hɑli yɑ mɑ, Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi mɑ. Ngɑ mo yɑ goono Ikpɛ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ kɑ hurɑ i sɛ.
45008035	Ifɔ yɑ gɑ i fee ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ bɑɑkɑsine kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ i sɛ? Tɑɑbi no, wɑlɑ kɑnkɑmi wɑlɑ guruguze, wɑlɑ hɛrɛɛ wɑlɑ bɑnji wɑlɑ kɑtɑru wɑlɑ tɑkubɑ?
45008036	Zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "N sɑbu sɛ ǹ go kɑ i dɑm bu kɑmbɛ mo kɑ ɑ̀ bo kulu. Ǹ go kɑ i himɑndi zɑngɑ fɑwɑ tɑndɑ feeji yom."
45008037	Ammɑ hɛ yom wɔ kulu kunɑ i gɑɑŋmɑɑ kɑ bisɑ gɑɑŋmɑɑyom, wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑ i yom dɔ.
45008038	A tɑbɑi hɛ kulu si hini kɑ i fee ndɑ Ikpɛ bɑɑkɑsine. Zɑ bu, zɑ hundi, zɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom, zɑ meire yom, zɑ dɑbɑri yom, zɑ mɑɑsɑ hɛ yom, zɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑɑ,
45008039	zɑ gure, zɑ lɔmɑ, zɑ tɑkɑhɛ ŋmɑni fɔ, ǹ bɑ ɑfɔ si hini kɑ i fee ndɑ Ikpɛ bɑɑkɑsine kɑ ɑ̀ goono i Kpe Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ.
45009001	Cimi no ɑ go cii Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ, ɑ si tɑngɑri bɑ. A bine kunɑ sendi yɑ go tɛ ɑ sɛdɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ.
45009002	A gundɑ binesɛrɛ bɑmbɑtɑ ndɑ doori kɑ ɑ̀ bo goono ɑ bine kunɑ.
45009003	Hɛɛ bumbum ɑ bɑɑ yɑ tɛ lɑɑli kɑ fee ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ ɑ nyɑize yom sɛ kɑ ǹ ci ɑ dimi yom gɑɑhɑm dɔ.
45009004	Ngei yɑ ci Isirɑilɑ ize yom. Ǹ ŋmɔne no kootɛrɛ dɑmyom kɑ ǹ mɑ ci Ikpɛ ize yom. Deizɑ ndɑ ɑlikɑwɑli hɔyom mo Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ no. À nɑ ǹ no Moisi fɔndɑ, ndɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom gbei ndɑ ɑlikɑwɑli yom mɑ.
45009005	Ǹ ŋmɔne mɑ nɑ cɛɛ kɑ cɛɛ yom. Ǹ gɑɑ nɑ Mɛsiyɑ hunu gɑɑhɑm dɔ, Ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ goono hɛ kulu bɔm. I go kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi, beeniyom si. Ami.
45009006	À mɑnɑ ci zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ tɛ kɔnu no. Beerem kulu kɑ ǹ hunu Isirɑilɑ gɑɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ci Isirɑilɑ ŋmɔne yom.
45009007	Yɑ nɑ bɑ ǹ ci Abulɛmɑ bɑndɑ yom, ǹ kulu mɑnɑ ci ɑ̀ ize yom. Ammɑ Ikpɛ cii: "Isɑɑkɑ kunɑ nɑ, n kɑɑ du bɑndɑ".
45009008	Wɑtom ize yom kɑ ǹ hɛi gɑɑhɑm dɔ ǹ mɑnɑ ci Ikpɛ ize yom. Ammɑ ɑlikɑwɑli ize yom no, Ikpɛ go lɑsɑbu zɑngɑ bɑndɑ yom.
45009009	Wɔne yɑ ci ɑlikɑwɑli sendi: "A kɑɑ kɑɑ yesi mɑɑsɑncine, Sɑhɑrɑ kɑɑ du kɑɑ hɑibɔrɔ fɔ".
45009010	Bɑ ngɑ di bɑ si mo, Lɑbekɑ tɛ gunde bɔrɔ fɔ sɛ, i bɑɑbɑ Isɑɑkɑ.
45009011	Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu zɑ Lɑbekɑ mɑnɑ kɑɑ yom di hɛi, Ikpɛ sendi ɑ̀ sɛ. À sendi zɑ koo yom di mɑnɑ hɛ fɔ kulu tɛ, ihinno wɑlɑ ilɑlɔ. À sendi hɑli Ikpɛ miilɑ mɑ sinji sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go suubɑ. À suubɑyom mɑnɑ ci tɛgbei yom bɔm, ɑmmɑ Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go beerem cɛɛ bɔm.
45009012	Ikpɛ cii Lɑbekɑ sɛ: "Ize jine kɑɑ tɑmtɛrɛ icɛnɑ sɛ".
45009013	Zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "A bɑɑ Yɑkɔfu, ɑmmɑ ɑ hungu Esɑu".
45009014	Yɑ di gɑɑ, ifɔ i mɑ cii? Cɛyom susu zɑm Ikpɛ kunɑ no? Awo. À si tɛ.
45009015	À cii Moisi sɛ: "A suuji tɛ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ go suuji miilɑ. A sisibi tɛ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ gundɑ sisibi."
45009016	Yɑ di gɑɑ ɑ̀ si hɛ kɑ bɔrɔ go bɑɑ gɑɑ wɑlɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kokɑri gɑɑ ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ goono Ikpɛ gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go suuji tɛ.
45009017	Ikpɛ Sendɑ cii Fɑrɑɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Eziputu lɑɑbukpɛ sɛ: "A mɑ ɑ dɑbɑri cɛbɛ n kunɑ. À sɛ no, ɑ nɑ n bɛɛrɑndi hɑli ɑ mɑɑ mɑ kpei hɑndunyɑ kulu kunɑ."
45009018	Yɑ di gɑɑ, Ikpɛ gɑ suuji tɛ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑ sɛ. À go gɔgɔsɛndɛ mo dɑm bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑ sɛ.
45009019	À sɛ no, n kɑɑ cii ɑ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ Ikpɛ gɑ kɑ ɑ beri hɑli mɑɑsɑ. Mee yɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ binebɑɑ?
45009020	Ammɑ e iburɑdɑm, ni no mee kɑ n go kɑkɔ ndɑ Ikpɛ? Hɛ kɑ bɔrɔ tɛ ɑ̀ gɑ ngɑ tɛkɔ hã: "Ifɔ sɛ no n nɑ ɑ tɛ zɑngɑ yɑ wɔ"?
45009021	Kusu tɛkɔ gundɑ dɑbɑri kusu lɑɑbu bɔm nɑ kɑ kusu bɛɛrɛkpɛ tɛ ndɑ kusu kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ bɛɛrɛ kusu lɑɑbu fɔlɔnku gɑɑ. À nɑ ci cimi nɑ bɑ?
45009022	Bine, ifɔ i mɑ cii, de Ikpɛ bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ ngɑ binetɔnɛ cɛbɛ hɑli beerem mɑ ngɑ dɑbɑri bei, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ suuru bɑmbɑtɑ cɛbɛ beerem kɑ ǹ sɛ Ikpɛ bine tɔ, ngei yom kɑ ǹ sɔlu hɑlɑciyom sɛ?
45009023	À nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ nɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ngɑ hɑizici deizɑkpɛ kɑɑtɛrɛ beerem kunɑ kɑ ǹ du suuji. À nɑ ǹ sɔlu deizɑ sɛ kɔ.
45009024	Yɑ no, ɑ̀ nɑ i cɛɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Yuifu yom dɔ hinne ɑmmɑ dimi cindei dɔ mo.
45009025	Zɑngɑ ɑ̀ cii tirɑ kɑ ɑndebi Ose hɑntum kunɑ: "Jɑmɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ɑ jɑmɑ, ɑ gɑ ǹ cɛɛ ɑ jɑmɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ɑ binebɑɑkɔ, ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ ɑ binebɑɑkɔ."
45009026	À kɑɑ tɔ nungu kɑ ǹ cii ǹ sɛ, "wom mɑnɑ ci ɑ jɑmɑ, nodi nɑ ǹ gɑ ǹ cɛɛ Ikpɛ Hundikpɛ ize yom."
45009027	Esɑyi mo kuwɑ Isirɑilɑ bɔm kɑ cii: "Bɑ kɑ Isirɑilɑ ize yom kɑɑ bɑ zɑngɑ tɛku tɑɑsi, jɛrɛ fɔ cɛnɑ hinne yɑ du fɑɑbɑ.
45009028	Kpe gɑ ngɑ sendɑ tɔnɑndi nɑ ndɑ wɑɑsi hɑndunyɑ bɔm."
45009029	Zɑngɑ Esɑyi jinɑ kɑ cii: "De Ikpɛ jɑmɑkpɛ mɑnɑ bɑndɑ nɑm i sɛ dɑm, i ye zɑngɑ Sodum wɑngɑrɑ, i kulu mɑ himɑ zɑngɑ Gomorɑ wɑngɑrɑ".
45009030	Dee ifɔ i mɑ cii? To. Dimi cindei kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ cɛɑndiyom susu ceeci ǹ du cɛɑndiyom susu. Cɛɑndiyom susu di hunu nɑɑne dɔ.
45009031	Ammɑ Isirɑilɑ ize yom nɑ cɛɑndiyom susu fɔndɑ ceeci, ǹ mɑnɑ tɔ cɛɑndiyom susu fɔndɑ gɑɑ.
45009032	Ifɔ sɛ? Isirɑilɑ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ ceeci no nɑɑne gɑɑ kɑlɑ fɔndɑ tɛgbei yom gɑɑ. Ǹ kɑti kɑtiyom tondi gɑɑ.
45009033	Zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Gunɑ, ɑ go kɑtiyom tondi ndɑ yɑnceyom tondi beeri jisi Sionɑ kunɑ. Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ si hɔɔ pɑi."
45010001	Nyɑizei, hɛ kɑ ɑ bine gɑ bɑɑ ndɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ kɑ ɑ gɑ tɛ Ikpɛ gɑɑ Isirɑilɑ ize yom sɛ, ngɑ yɑ ci ǹ mɑ du fɑɑbɑ.
45010002	A go sɛdɑ ǹ sɛ kɑ ǹ gundɑ himmɑ Ikpɛ sɛ ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci beire bɔm.
45010003	Ǹ mɑnɑ Ikpɛ cɛɑndiyom susu bei ɑmmɑ ǹ gɑ ceeci kɑ ngei bɔm cɛɑndiyom susu sinji. Ǹ mɑnɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ Ikpɛ cɛɑndiyom susu sɛ.
45010004	Mɛsiyɑ yɑ ci Moisi fɔndɑ mee cɛɑndiyom susu ŋmɔne bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne sɛ.
45010005	Moisi bine hɑntum kɑ simbɑ ndɑ cɛɑndiyom susu kɑ ɑ̀ hunu fɔndɑ dɔ kɑ cii: "Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hɛ nge yom di tɛ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ hunɑ ǹ kunɑ".
45010006	Ammɑ cɛɑndiyom susu kɑ ɑ̀ hunu nɑɑne gɑɑ, ɑ̀ go wɔne cii: "N mo si cii n bine kunɑ, mee yɑ kɑɑ kpei bɛɛnɛ kunɑ? Wɑtom zɑngɑ ǹ go Mɛsiyɑ zumɑndi noyɑ.
45010007	Wɑlɑ n mɑ si cii: Mee yɑ kɑɑ zumbu guusu kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ mee kunɑ? Wɑtom zɑngɑ ǹ go Mɛsiyɑ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme noyɑ."
45010008	Ammɑ ifɔ ɑ̀ go cii? "Sendɑ tɔ n gɑɑ. À goono n mee kunɑ ndɑ n bine kunɑ, wɑtom nɑɑne sendɑ kɑ i go kɑ ɑ̀ fɛɛ."
45010009	Sendɑ yɑ ci, de n yɔɔdɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ kɑ cii ndɑ n mee Yesu yɑ ci Kpe kɑ nɑɑne n bine kunɑ, Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme, Ikpɛ gɑ n fɑɑbɑ.
45010010	Bine dɔ no bɔrɔ go nɑɑne kɑ du cɛɑndiyom susu. Mee mo no bɔrɔ go sɛdɑ ndɑ, kɑ du fɑɑbɑ.
45010011	Ikpɛ Sendɑ cii: "Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ si hɔɔ".
45010012	Fɑyɑnkɑ si Yuifu yom ndɑ dimi cindei gɑme. Kpe fɔlɔnku yɑ ci ǹ kulu Kpe, hɑizicikpɛ no beerem kulu sɛ kɑ ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ.
45010013	Sendɑ cii: "Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go cɛɛ Kpe mɑɑ gɑɑ, Kpe gɑ ɑ̀ fɑɑbɑ".
45010014	Ngɑ di sɛ, beerem kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ mɛtɛ ǹ tɛ kɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ? Beerem kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ mɑɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑru, mɛtɛ ǹ tɛ kɑ nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ? Mɛtɛ ǹ tɛ kɑ mɑɑ de bɔrɔ fɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ fɛɛ?
45010015	Mɛtɛ ǹ bɑ tɛ kɑ ɑ̀ fɛɛ mo de ǹ mɑnɑ ǹ dɔntɔm? Zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Beerem go wɑɑzu Bɑɑru Hinno wɔ bɔm. Ǹ go cii bɑɑni tɛ i yom ndɑ Ikpɛ gɑme. Ǹ go kɑɑndɑ Bɑɑru fɑihã bɑmbɑtɑ ŋmɔne. Beerem di cee yom goono fɑɑrɑntɛ no fɑ."
45010016	Ammɑ ǹ kulu mɑnɑ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ gɑnɑ. Zɑngɑ Esɑyi cii: "Kpe, mee yɑ nɑɑne i bɑɑru gɑɑ"?
45010017	Yɑ di gɑɑ, nɑɑne hunu mɑɑyom gɑɑ. Hɛ kɑ i go mɑɑ mo hunu Ikpɛ Sendɑ gɑɑ.
45010018	Ammɑ ɑ cii yɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ci ǹ mɑɑ bɑ? Oò, ǹ mɑɑ. "Ǹ jinde yom kpei hɑli hɑndunyɑ mee. Ǹ sendei mo kpei kɑlɑ hɑndunyɑ mee ndɑ mee."
45010019	Ammɑ ɑ cii yɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ci Isirɑilɑ bei bɑ? Moisi kɑ ɑ̀ sendi sintine, ɑ̀ cii: "A wom zukum hɑli wom mɑ cɛnsɛ ndɑ dimi kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ɑ jɑmɑ. A wom binei tunɑndi ndɑ dimi kɑ ɑ̀ zɑm fɑhɑm."
45010020	Esɑyi yɑru kɑ wɔne cii: "Beerem kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ɑ ceeci, ǹ du hɛɛ. Beerem kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ, ɑ hunutɛrɛ ǹ sɛ."
45010021	Ammɑ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ Isirɑilɑ ɑ̀ cii: "Zɑɑri kuyom kulu ɑ nɑ ɑ kɑmbɛ sɛllɛ jɑmɑ gɑɑ, jɑmɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hungu kɑ ɑ gɑnɑ, jɑmɑ kɑ ǹ ci gɔgɔsɛndɔ yom".
45011001	Yɑ di gɑɑ, ɑ cii yɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ jɑmɑ furu no? Awo. À si tɛ. Hɛɛ mo Isirɑilɑ ize nɑ, Abulɛmɑ bɑndɑ, Benzɑmim dimiize.
45011002	Ikpɛ mɑnɑ ngɑ jɑmɑ furu, jɑmɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bei kɑ jisi. Wom bei hɛ kɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ go cii Eli bɑɑru kunɑ. À go wuuru wɔne tɛ ndɑ Isirɑilɑ Ikpɛ dɔ. À nɑ ci yɑ no bɑ? A cii:
45011003	"Kpe, ǹ nɑ n ɑndebi yom wi. Ǹ nɑ n gɑrɑndi bɑndɑ tɑndɑ yom zeeri. Hɛɛ hinne yɑ cindi. Ǹ bine go kɑ ɑ hundi ceeci."
45011004	Ammɑ ifɔ Ikpɛ tu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ yeti? À cii: "A nɑ hɑibɔrɔ dubu iye jisi ɑ bɔm sɛ, nge yom kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ sɔmbu tɑɑru jine, tooru kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Bɑɑlɑ".
45011005	Yɑ nɑ, mɑɑsɑ lɔkɑci wɔ kunɑ, jɛrɛ fɔ cɛnɑ goono ndɑ zɑngɑ gomini suubɑyom goono ndɑ.
45011006	Bine, de gominɑ gɑɑ nɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci tɛgbei yom gɑɑ. Yɑ di gɑɑ gomini mɑnɑ ci gomini kpɛɛnɛ. De bine tɛgbei yom gɑɑ nɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci gomini gɑɑ. Yɑ di gɑɑ, tɛgbei mɑnɑ ci tɛgbei kpɛɛnɛ.
45011007	Ifɔ bine yɑ tɛ? Hɛ kɑ Isirɑilɑ go ceeci, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ du ɑ̀ ɑmmɑ suubɑntɛ yom wɔ du ɑ̀. Ikpɛ nɑ cindɑ mo no gɔgɔsɛndɛ.
45011008	Zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ nɑ birikɑyom biyɑ. À nɑ ǹ nɑ moo yom kɑ ǹ si di, ndɑ hɑngɑ yom kɑ ǹ si mɑɑ hɑli kɑ kɑɑ hɔ."
45011009	Dɑfidi mɑ cii: "Kɑlɑ ǹ tɑbulu mɑ ci ǹ sɛ kuse, ɑ̀ mɑ tɛ ǹ sɛ tɑɑru. À mɑ tɛ ǹ sɛ kɑtiyom hɛ, ɑ̀ mɑ tɛ ǹ sɛ bɑnɑndi.
45011010	Ǹ moo yom mɑ tɛ ǹ sɛ kube hɑli ǹ si du kɑ di. Ǹ bɑndɑ dɑɑri yom mo mɑ goono kunkunɑntɛ wɑti kulu."
45011011	Yɑ di gɑɑ, ɑ cii yɑ, ǹ kɑti no ngei mɑ kɑm bɑ? Awo. À si tɛ. Ammɑ ǹ kɑtiyom gɑɑ no fɑɑbɑ tɔ dimi cindei dɔ kɑ ǹ zukum hɑli ǹ mɑ cɛnsɛ.
45011012	De bine, ǹ kɑtiyom tɛ hɑndunyɑ sɛ bɑrikɑ, ǹ zobuyom mo tɛ dimi cindei sɛ bɑrikɑ. Yɑ mo ǹ kɑɑ tɔ ndɑ bɑyom.
45011013	Dimi cindei, wom sɛ no ɑ go sendi zɑ kɑ hɛɛ yɑ ci dimi cindei diyɑ. A go kɑ ɑ gbei bɛɛrɑndi.
45011014	A go kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi hɑnibɑ ɑ hini kɑ ɑ dimi yom cɛnsɛ tunɑndi kɑ ǹ kunɑ ɑfɔ yom fɑɑbɑ.
45011015	De ǹ furuyom tɛ hɑndunyɑ sɑsɑbɑndiyom, mɛtɛ yɑ kɑɑ ci ǹ zɑɑyom kpɛɛnɛ de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci bukɔ yom gɑme hundi?
45011016	Zɑ kɑ hɛijinɑ tɛ hɑlɑɑlɑ, yɑ no jɑmɑ mo. Zɑ kɑ tuuri kɑɑji tɛ hɑlɑɑlɑ, yɑ no ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ yom mo bɑrɑ.
45011017	Ammɑ de ǹ nɑ olibe nyɑ kɑmbɛ fɔ yom dumbu, ni mo gɑnji olibe nyɑ, de Ikpɛ nɑ n dɔbu nyɑ hinno gɑɑ, n du bɑ kɑɑji gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ tuuri ŋmɑɑrɑndi.
45011018	À sɛ nɑ, n mɑ si fɑɑre zɑngɑ n bisɑ kɑmbei kɑ ǹ dumbu no. De n fɑɑre, n mɑ bei kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ni, n gɑ kɑɑjɑ jɛrɛ. Kɑɑjɑ yɑ gɑ kɑ n jɛrɛ.
45011019	Ngɑ di sɛ no, n kɑɑ cii Ikpɛ nɑ kɑmbɛ yom dumbu nɑ domi ɑ̀ mɑ ɑ dɔbu.
45011020	Ngɑ di cimi no. Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ dumbu nɑ zɑm kɑ nɑɑne sɑbu sɛ. Ni mɑ, n go sinji nɑɑne gɑɑ, n mɑ si fɑɑre ɑmmɑ n mɑ hɑmburu.
45011021	De Ikpɛ mɑnɑ olibe nyɑ hinno kɑmbɛ yom bɑkɑɑ, ni mo ɑ̀ si n bɑkɑɑ.
45011022	Yɑ di gɑɑ, n mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ Ikpɛ bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ ndɑ ɑ̀ hɑnyɑ fute. Hɑnyɑ fute nɑ kɑ simbɑ beerem kɑ ǹ kɑm, Ikpɛ bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ mo no kɑ simbɑ ni, de n gɑ himmɑ tɛ bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ kunɑ.
45011023	Ngei mo bine, de ǹ si kɔkɔrɔ zɑm kɑ nɑɑne kunɑ, Ikpɛ gɑ ǹ dɔbu zɑmɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ dɑbɑri kɑ ye kɑ ǹ dɔbu.
45011024	Ni, kɑmbɛ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ n dumbu gɑnji olibe nyɑ gɑɑ kɑ n dɔbu olibe nyɑ hinno gɑɑ, hɑli yɑ mo, cerem kɑ Ikpɛ gɑ ǹ dɔbu no ǹ bumbum nyɑ gɑɑ.
45011025	Nyɑizei, ɑ si bɑɑ wom mɑ zɑm kɑ duje wɔ bei, wɑtom Isirɑilɑ jɛrɛ fɔ ɑ̀ bo goono gɔgɔsɛndɛ kunɑ, kɑlɑ dimi cindei kɑ Ikpɛ suubɑ mee ndɑ mee mɑ huro. Wom mɑ si wom bɔm gunɑ zɑngɑ hɑikusu yom.
45011026	Yɑ wɔ no, Ikpɛ gɑ Isirɑilɑ kulu fɑɑbɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Fɑɑbɑkɔ kɑɑ hunu zɑ Sionɑ. Zɑm kɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ wɔ, ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ moorɑndi Yɑkɔfu.
45011027	Alikɑwɑli noyɑ kɑ ɑ tɛ ǹ sɛ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ gɑ ǹ dulum yom kɑɑ."
45011028	Kɑ simbɑ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ, ngei wɔ ibɛrɛ yom no wom sɑbu sɛ. Ammɑ kɑ simbɑ suubɑyom, Ikpɛ binebɑɑkɔ yom no ǹ cɛɛ yom sɑbu sɛ.
45011029	Ikpɛ gomini noyom ndɑ Ikpɛ cɛɛ yom, ǹ sindɑ no kɑ tɑ.
45011030	Wom mo, dom di wom mɑnɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ. Mɑɑsɑ bine, bɛɛrem wɔ zɑm kɑ gɑnɑ gɑɑ wom du suuji.
45011031	Yɑ no, mɑɑsɑ ǹ mɑnɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ domi suuji kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ wom sɛ gɑɑ ngei mo mɑ du suuji.
45011032	Ikpɛ nɑ hɑndunyɑ kulu dɑm kɑ dɑɑbu zɑm kɑ gɑnɑ kunɑ domi ɑ̀ mɑ suuji tɛ ǹ kulu sɛ.
45011033	E, Ikpɛ hɑizici ndɑ ɑ̀ hɑikusutɛrɛ ndɑ ɑ̀ beire, ǹ sindɑ mee fɑ. Bɔrɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sijirɑ bei. Bɔrɔ si fɑhɑm mo ndɑ ɑ̀ fɔndɔ yom.
45011034	Mee yɑ nɑ Kpe lɑsɑbu bei "wɑlɑ mee yɑ ci ɑ̀ cɛbɛkɔ?
45011035	Wɑlɑ mee yɑ jinɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ngɑ nɑ kɑ yeti?"
45011036	À dɔ nɑ, ɑ̀ gɑɑ nɑ, ɑ̀ sɛ no, hɛ kulu goono. Deizɑ mɑ ci ɑ̀ ŋmɔne jiiri dubu ndɑ dubu yom. Ami.
45012001	Ngɑ di sɛ nyɑizei, ɑ go wom ŋmɑɑrɛ Ikpɛ suujɑ gɑndɑ, wɑ wom gɑɑhɑmei no zɑngɑ gɑrɑndi hundikoni, hɑlɑɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑni Ikpɛ sɛ. Ngɑ yɑ ci wom gbei kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ.
45012002	Wom mɑ si ci ɑfɔ mo ndɑ mɑɑsɑ zɑmɑni ɑmmɑ wɑ nɑm Ikpɛ mɑ wom bɛrɛ kɑ wom fɑhɑm tejɑndi. À gɑɑ no, wom mɑ du kɑ bei hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Ikpɛ binebɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ihinno ndɑ ikɑɑnɔ ndɑ tɔɑntɛ.
45012003	Gomini kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ no kunɑ, ɑ go cii wom kunɑ ɑfɔ fɔ kulu sɛ, bɔrɔ mɑ si gundɑ bɔmbɛɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ himɑ. Ammɑ ɑ̀ mɑ lɑsɑbu kɑ ngɑ bɔm bɑɑnɑndi ndɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ nɑɑne neesiji goono ndɑ kɑ fɑrisi bɔrɔ fɔ fɔ kulu sɛ.
45012004	Zɑngɑ gɑɑhɑm fɔlɔnku kunɑ i gundɑ dɔbu boobo, dɔbu yom kulu mo gbei mɑnɑ ci ɑfɔ.
45012005	Yɑ no i yom, i goono iboobo ɑmmɑ i tɛ gɑɑhɑm fɔlɔnku Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ. I kulu go tɛ cɛrɛ dɔbu yom.
45012006	I kulu gundɑ noyom ŋmɑni ŋmɑni i mɑ gbei tɛ ndɑ, noyom kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ i gomini. De ɑndebitɛrɛ nɑ Ikpɛ nɑ i no, i mɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ ndɑ zɑngɑ cine nɑɑne goono ndɑ.
45012007	De tɑmtɛrɛ gbei no, i mɑ moo no tɑmtɛrɛ gbei sɛ. De cooɑndiyom no, i mo cooɑndi.
45012008	De himmɑ noyom nɑ, i mo himmɑ no. De noyom no i mɑ nɑ ndɑ bine fɔ. De ɑ̀ nɑ i nɑ i mɑ tɛ jinɑ, i mɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ himmɑ. De suuji dɑmyom no, i mɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ fɑihã.
45012009	Bɑɑkɑsine mɑ si gundɑ munɑficitɛrɛ. Wɑ ilɑlɔ fɛntɛ. Wɑ hɔ ihinno gɑɑ hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ boori.
45012010	Wɑ bɑɑni cɛrɛ sɛ zɑngɑ nyɑize yom gundɑ bɑɑkɑsine cɛrɛ sɛ. Bɛɛrɛ tɛyom dɔ hɛrɛ wɑ jinɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ cɛrɛ sɛ.
45012011	Wɑ himmɑ dɑm, wɑ si yofune. Wɑ tɛ bɔrɔ dungɔ yom bine dɔ kɑ tɑmtɛrɛ Kpe sɛ.
45012012	Wɑ fɑihã bɛɛjɛ kunɑ. Wɑ tɛ suurɑntɛ yom tɑɑbi kunɑ. Wo himmɑ dɑm ɑduwɑ gɑɑ.
45012013	Wom mo hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom gɑɑkɑsine ǹ bɑɑyom kunɑ. Wo yotɛrɛ tɑ mɑ.
45012014	Beerem kɑ ǹ go wom guruguzɑndi, wɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm ǹ gɑɑ. Wɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm, wɑ si lɑɑli.
45012015	Wɑ fɑihã ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go fɑihã. Wɑ hɛ ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go hɛ.
45012016	Wɑ bɑrɑ ndɑ lɑɑkɑli fɔlɔnku cɛrɛ gɑme. Wɑ si bine dɛcɛ hɛ beeri yom bɔm, ɑmmɑ wɑ lɑɑkɑli yeti icɛnɑ yom gɑɑ. Wɑ si wom bɔm gunɑ hɑikusu.
45012017	Wɑ si ilɑlɔ bɑnɑ ndɑ ilɑlɔ. Wɑ miilɑ hinno tɛ bɔrɔ kulu jine.
45012018	De ɑ̀ hini kɑ tɛ, zɑngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ hunu wom dɔ, wɑ gɔrɔ ndɑ bɑɑni wom ndɑ bɔrɔ kulu gɑme.
45012019	A bine bɑɑkɔei, wɑ si fɑɑsɑ wom bɔm sɛ. Wɑ nɑm binetɔnɛ di mɑ ngɑ gbei tɛ zɑmɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "A ŋmɔne no fɑɑsɑ. Hɛɛ yɑ kɑɑ bɑnɑ". Kpe cii yɑ di.
45012020	Ngɑ di sɛ, "de n ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ mɑɑ hɛrɛɛ, n mɑ ɑ̀ no ŋmɑɑri. De ɑ̀ mɑɑ jo, n mɑ ɑ̀ nɑ hɑri domi ngɑ di tɛyom gɑɑ, n gɑ denji gusɑm ɑ̀ bɔm kunɑ noyɑ.
45012021	N mɑ si nɑm ilɑlɔ mɑ gɑɑŋmɑɑ n bɔm, ɑmmɑ n mɑ gɑɑŋmɑɑ ndɑ ihinno tɛyom ilɑlɔ bɔm.
45013001	Bɔrɔ kulu mɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ gɑɑbikoni yom sɛ zɑmɑ dɑbɑri si kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Ikpɛ dɔ nɑ ɑ̀ hunu. Gɑɑbikoni yom kɑ ǹ goono, Ikpɛ yɑ nɑ ǹ jisi.
45013002	À sɛ no, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hungu hini, ɑ̀ go hungu Ikpɛ jisiri. Beerem kɑ ǹ go hungu mo, ǹ kɑɑ ciiti cendi ngei bɔm.
45013003	Gbei hinno tɛkɔ si hɑmburu gɑɑbikoni yom, ɑmmɑ gbei lɑlɔ tɛkɔ, ɑ̀ hɑmburei. N bɑɑ n mɑ si hɑmburu gɑɑbikoni bɑ? N mɑ ihinno tɛ, n kɑɑ du ɑ̀ gɑɑ sɑɑbuyom.
45013004	Gɑɑbikoni wɔ Ikpɛ gbeiteeri nɑ n hɑnfɑni sɛ. Ammɑ de n go kɑ ilɑlɔ tɛ, n mɑ hɑmburu. À mɑnɑ ci kɔnu kɔnu no ɑ̀ go ciiti tɑkubɑ zɑɑ. Ikpɛ gbeiteeri no, fɑɑsɑkɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ bine bɑnɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ilɑlɔ tɛ gɑɑ.
45013005	À sɛ no, ɑ̀ tilɑsi bɔrɔ mɑ ngɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci binetɔnɑ hinne sɛ bo, ɑmmɑ ndɑ bine kunɑ sendi mo sɑbu sɛ.
45013006	À sɛ nɑ, wom go jɑngɑli yom bɑnɑ mo domi gɑɑbikoni yom wɔ Ikpɛ gbeiteeri yom no kɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ dɑm ǹ mo gbei ngɑ di tɛ.
45013007	Wɑ bɑnɑ ǹ kulu sɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ǹ ŋmɔne. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɔne no jɑngɑli, wɑ jɑngɑli bɑnɑ ɑ̀ sɛ. Wɔ kɑ boode yɑ ci ɑ̀ ŋmɔne, wo ɑ̀ boode bɑnɑ ɑ̀ sɛ. Wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ hɑmbure, wɑ hɑmburɑ. Wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ bɛɛrɛ wɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ.
45013008	Wom mɑ si tɛ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu gɑrɔjindi, de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci cɛrɛ sɛ bɑɑkɑsine zɑmɑ beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ bɑɑ cɛrɛ, ǹ nɑ fɔndɑ tɔnɑndi.
45013009	Hɛ kɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii neyɑ: "N mɑ si zinɑ. N mɑ si bɔrɔ wi. N mɑ si zee. N mɑ si tɛ tɑngɑri sɛdɑ. N mɑ si bɑɑ kɑ futu." Meire ŋmɑni mo kulu kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ goono, ɑ̀ goono sendi wɔne kunɑ: "N mɑ bɑɑ n gɔrɔkɑsine zɑngɑ n bɔm".
45013010	Bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ bɔrɔ si ilɑlɔ tɛ gɔrɔkɑsine sɛ. Yɑ di gɑɑ, bɑɑkɑsine wɔ yɑ go Moisi fɔndɑ kulu tɔnɑndi.
45013011	Wom mɑ ngɑ di tɛ zɑ kɑ wom nɑ lɔkɑci bei. Lɔkɑci tɔ kɑ i mɑ tunu jiibi, zɑmɑ mɑɑsɑ i fɑɑbɑ mɑɑni i yom gumo kɑ bisɑ sɑɑ kɑ i nɑɑne.
45013012	Ciini beeri. Mo mɑɑni boyom. Yɑ di gɑɑ, i mɑ kube gbei furu kɑ kɑɑri wɑngu jiine yom zɑɑ.
45013013	I mɑ dirɑ ndɑ cimi zɑngɑ zɑɑri, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ndɑ hɑnɑsuɑ ndɑ bɑji hɑm kɑ bugu ndɑ zinɑ ndɑ bɑɑyom futu ndɑ zoji ndɑ cɛnsɛ.
45013014	Ammɑ wɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ fɑkɑ. Wɑ si sɑɑle dɑm bineibɑɑi gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑyom futu yom tɛ.
45014001	Bɔrɔ mɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ gɑɑbi nɑɑne kunɑ, wom mɑ ɑ̀ tɑ. Wom mɑ si ɑ̀ tɑ kɑ kɑkɔ ndɑ wom lɑsɑbu yom kunɑ.
45014002	Bɔrɔ fɔ go nɑɑne ngɑ hini kɑ hɛ kulu ŋmɑɑ. Bɔrɔ fɔ mɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ gɑɑbi nɑɑne kunɑ, ɑ̀ go kɔsu yom ŋmɑɑ.
45014003	Bɔrɔ di kɑ ɑ̀ go ŋmɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ si bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si ŋmɑɑ fɛntɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si ŋmɑɑ mɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ si bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ŋmɑɑ ciiti, domi Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tɑ.
45014004	Ni nɑ mee, ni kɑ n gɑ gbeiize ŋmɑni ciiti? À cɛyom wɑlɑ ɑ̀ kɑmyom ɑ̀ Kpe sendi nɑ. À kɑɑ cɛ bo zɑmɑ Ikpɛ gundɑ dɑbɑri kɑ ɑ̀ dii kɑ cɛɑndi.
45014005	Bɔrɔ fɔ mo, hɑnu fɔ beeri ɑ̀ dɔ kɑ bisɑ hɑnu fɔ. Afɔ mɑ hɑnu yom kulu ɑ̀ sɛ ɑfɔ nɑ. Bɔrɔ kulu mɑ ngɑ ŋmɔne tɑbɑtɑndi ngɑ bine kunɑ.
45014006	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hɑnu fɑyɑnkɑ, Kpe sɑbu sɛ nɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ̀ fɑyɑnkɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si hɑnu fɑyɑnkɑ, Kpe sɑbu sɛ no ɑ̀ si fɑyɑnkɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go ŋmɑɑ, Kpe sɑbu sɛ no ɑ̀ go ŋmɑɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si ŋmɑɑ mo, Kpe sɑbu sɛ no ɑ̀ si ŋmɑɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu.
45014007	I kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ go hunɑ ngɑ bɔm sɛ. Bɔrɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ bu ngɑ bɔm sɛ.
45014008	De i go hunɑ, Kpe sɛ no i go hunɑ. De bine i bu no, Kpe sɛ no i bu. Ngɑ di sɛ, de i gɑ hunɑ no, de i go bu no, i yom yɑ Kpe ŋmɔne yom no.
45014009	À sɛ no, Mɛsiyɑ bu kɑ ye kɑ hunɑ domi ɑ̀ mɑ ci Kpe bukɔ yom bɔm ndɑ hundikoni yom bɔm.
45014010	Ammɑ ni, ifɔ sɛ n gɑ kɑ n nyɑize ciiti? Wɑlɑ ni, ifɔ sɛ n gɑ kɑ n nyɑize fɛntɛ? I kulu kɑɑ cɛ Mɛsiyɑ ciiti kɑrigɑ jine.
45014011	Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "A go hunɑ, Kpe cii yɑ di. Cɛnjɛ kulu kɑɑ sɔmbu ɑ jine. Dɛɛnɛ kulu mo gɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi."
45014012	Yɑ di no, i kulu ɑfɔ fɔ, i gɑ i jinde deede Ikpɛ sɛ.
45014013	Ngɑ di sɛ, i mɑ si cɛrɛ ciiti kpɛɛnɛ, ɑmmɑ wɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ wɔne. Wɑ si tɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ nɑm wom nyɑize mɑ dɛrɛ wɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ tɑɑli tɛ.
45014014	A bei, ɑ tɑbɑi mo Kpe Yesu kunɑ hɛ fɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci hɑlɑli. Kɑlɑ de bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ lɑsɑbu hɛ fɔ mɑnɑ hɑlɑli, ɑ̀ si ci hɑlɑli bɔrɔ di sɛ.
45014015	De n nyɑize bine sɑrɑ ndɑ n ŋmɑɑri, n si dirɑ noyɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ bɑɑkɑsine goono ndɑ. N mɑ si bɔrɔ fɔ zeeri ndɑ n ŋmɑɑri, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ Mɛsiyɑ bu.
45014016	Ngɑ di sɛ nɑ, wom mɑ si nɑm ǹ mɑ ihinno kɑ ɑ̀ goono wom gɑɑ sendi yɑmu.
45014017	Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ wɔ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ŋmɑɑ ndɑ hɑm ɑmmɑ cɛɑndiyom susu ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne ndɑ fɑihã Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ.
45014018	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ tɑmtɛrɛ Mɛsiyɑ sɛ zɑngɑ yɑ, ɑkpɛ yɑ kɑɑni Ikpɛ sɛ kɑ sɑbɑ mo iburɑdɑm yom sɛ.
45014019	Yɑ di gɑɑ, i mɑ gɑnɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ go kpei lɑɑkɑli kɑne dɔ ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ nɑm i mɑ cɛrɛ nɑɑne cini.
45014020	I mɑ si Ikpɛ gbei zeeri ŋmɑɑri sɑbu sɛ. Dɑhiri hɛ kulu hɑlɑli. Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu, ɑ̀ si boori bɔrɔ sɛ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go ŋmɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ ci kɑtiyom hɛ.
45014021	À boori n mɑ si hɑm ŋmɑɑ, n mɑ si dufɛ hɑm, n mɑ si hɛ fɔ kulu tɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ nɑm n nyɑize mɑ kɑti wɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ dɛrɛ wɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ zɑm gɑɑbi.
45014022	N gundɑ nɑɑne bɑ? Ni, hɛ kɑ n gɑ tɑbɑi n mɑ ɑ̀ jisi n bɔm sɛ Ikpɛ jine. Binekɑɑnekpɛ no wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si ngɑ bɔm ciiti hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go tɑbɑtɑndi kunɑ.
45014023	Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ŋmɑɑ ndɑ siikɑ, ɑ̀ goono ciiti kɑ zeeri kunɑ domi ɑ̀ si tɛ ndɑ nɑɑne. Hɛ kulu bine kɑ bɔrɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ nɑɑne, dulum no.
45015001	I yom kɑ i gundɑ gɑɑbi nɑɑne kunɑ, i mɑ mɔngɔntɛ yom mɔngɔnɛ jɛrɛ. I mɑ si tɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑni i hinne sɛ.
45015002	I kulu ɑfɔ fɔ mɑ ceeci kɑ kɑɑni i gɔrɔkɑsine sɛ ihinno dɔ nɑɑne ciniyom sɛ.
45015003	Mɛsiyɑ mɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ceeci kɑ kɑɑni ngɑ bɔm sɛ, kɑlɑ hɛ kɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Beerem kɑ ǹ go kɑ n woo, ǹ woobi yom kɑm ɑ bɔm".
45015004	Hɛ kulu kɑ ǹ hɑntum zɑ dɑm jinɑ, ǹ nɑ ǹ hɑntum nɑ i cɛbɛ sɛ zɑmɑ i mɑ du bɛɛjɛ suuru gɑɑ ndɑ yɑmɑrɑndiyom gɑɑ kɑ i du Ikpɛ Sendɑ kunɑ.
45015005	Ikpɛ Suurukpɛ, Yɑmɑrɑndikɔ mo no, ɑ̀ mo wom no lɑɑkɑli fɔlɔnku wom cɛrɛ ndɑ cɛrɛ gɑme Mɛsiyɑ Yesu gɑɑ.
45015006	Ndɑ bine fɔ ndɑ mee fɔ wom mɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi, i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ Bɑɑbɑ.
45015007	Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ cɛrɛ tɑ zɑngɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑ nɑ i tɑ Ikpɛ deizɑ sɛ.
45015008	A go wɔne cii Yesu Mɛsiyɑ yɑ tɛ Yuifu yom gbeiize Ikpɛ cimi sɛ, ɑ̀ mɑ ɑlikɑwɑli kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ cɛɛ yom sɛ tɑbɑtɑndi.
45015009	Dimi cindei mɑ mɑ du kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi ɑ̀ suuji sɑbu sɛ. Zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "À sɛ no, ɑ gɑ n bɛɛrɑndi dimi cindei gɑme kɑ n mɑɑ deizɑkpɛ sifɑ."
45015010	À cii kpɛɛnɛ: "Wom mɑ dimi cindei, wɑ fɑihã ndɑ ɑ̀ jɑmɑ."
45015011	A ye kɑ cii: "Wɑ Ikpɛ sifɑ, wom kulu dimi cindei. Wɑ ɑ̀ sifɑ, wom jɑmɑ kulu."
45015012	Esɑyi mo cii: "Yɑsɑi kɑɑji bɔgu kɑ hunu tɛrɛ. À kɑɑ tunu kɑ dimi cindei mei. Dimi cindei gɑ ngei bɛɛjɛ dɛcɛ ɑ̀ bɔm."
45015013	Ikpɛ Bɛɛjɛkpɛ, ɑ̀ mɑ wom tɔnɑndi ndɑ binekɑɑne kulu ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑni nɑɑne kunɑ, wom mɑ du kɑ bɑ bɛɛjɛ kunɑ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɑbɑri.
45015014	A nyɑizei, ɑ tɑbɑtɑndi wom gɑɑ, wom mɑ wom tɔ ndɑ bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ. Wom tɔ ndɑ beire kulu. Wom hini mo kɑ cɛrɛ nɑ himmɑ.
45015015	Ammɑ nyɑizei, ndɑ yɑrutɛrɛ no ɑ hɑntum wom sɛ, kɑ wom hɔngɑndi gomini wɔne sɑbu sɛ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ gomini wɔ nɑ ɑ sɛ.
45015016	À nɑ gominɑ no ɑ sɛ yɑ tɛ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu gbeiteeri dimi cindei sɛ. A go kɑ Ikpɛ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ wɑɑzu tɛ domi dimi cindei mɑ bɑrɑ zɑngɑ sɑrɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑni Ikpɛ sɛ, sɑrɑɑ kɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ nɑ ɑ̀ hɑlɑɑlɑndi.
45015017	Yɑ di gɑɑ, ɑ̀ tɔ yɑ fɑihã Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ hɛ yom.
45015018	A si tu kɑ hɛ fɔ kulu cii de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ yɑ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ hɛɛ ɑ sendi dɔ ndɑ ɑ gbei dɔ hɑli dimi cindei mɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ.
45015019	À nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ɑ dɔ mɑ ndɑ ɑlɑmu yom ndɑ mɑmɑci yom Ikpɛ Biyɑ dɑbɑri gɑɑ. Zɑngɑ yɑ Yerusɑlɛm ndɑ ɑ̀ hundɑntɛ kulu kɑlɑ kɑ kpei Ileyɑ lɑɑbu, ɑ nɑ Mɛsiyɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu tɛ.
45015020	A nɑ niyɑ hɔ yɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu nungu kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ Mɛsiyɑ wɑɑzu tɛ jinɑ, domi yɑ si cini fuu kpɛsɛ ŋmɑni bɔm.
45015021	Zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Beerem kɑ ǹ sɛ ǹ mɑnɑ ɑ bɑɑru cii, ǹ kɑɑ di. Beerem mɑ kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ mɑɑ bɑ ce fɔ, ǹ kɑɑ fɑhɑm."
45015022	Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ gɑnji wom dɔ kɑɑyom noyɑ.
45015023	Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ lɑɑbu wɔne yom kunɑ sɑbɑbu fɔ si kpɛɛnɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ jɛ. Zɑ jiiri boobo no ɑ gundɑ wom dɔ kɑɑyom niyɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
45015024	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ kpei Esipɑni lɑɑbu, ɑ gɑnɑ wom dɔ kɑ fɑihã ndɑ wom. Ngɑ di bɑndɑ ɑ bɑɑ wom mɑ ɑ kɑmbɑzɑ ndɑ nodi kpeiyom.
45015025	Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ go kpei Yerusɑlɛm kɑ tɑmtɛrɛ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom sɛ.
45015026	Mɑsidoni ndɑ Akɑyɑ gɑnɑkɔ yom gɑ bɑɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ ngei mɑ gɑɑkɑsine tɛ tɑlikɑ yom sɛ kɑ ǹ goono Yerusɑlɛm hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kunɑ.
45015027	Ngɑ di yɑ kɑɑni ǹ sɛ. Ǹ ci mo Yuifu yom gɑrɔkoni yom. De dimi cindei du ngei bɑ Yuifu yom ŋmɔne Ikpɛ bɑrikɑ kunɑ, ɑ̀ tilɑsi dimi cindei mo gɑɑ ǹ mɑ Yuifu yom gɑɑkɑsine ndɑ hɑndunyɑ hɛ yom.
45015028	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ murɑdu ngɑ di beeni kɑ gomini wɔ no ǹ sɛ, ɑ kɑɑ gɑnɑ wom dɔ kɑ kpei Esipɑni lɑɑbu.
45015029	A bine bei sɑɑ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ ɑ kɑɑ ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ bɑrikɑ tɔnɑntɛ.
45015030	Ammɑ nyɑizei, ɑ gɑ wom ŋmɑɑrɛ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gɑndɑ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ bɑɑkɑsine gɑndɑ, wom mɑ tɑngɑm ɑ bɑndɑ wom ŋmɔne ɑduwɑ yom kunɑ ɑ sɛ kɑ wom go tɛ Ikpɛ gɑɑ.
45015031	Wom mɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ Ikpɛ mɑ ɑ kɑɑ Yude lɑɑbu zɑm kɑ nɑɑne ize yom kɑmbɛ. Gɑɑkɑsine mɑ kɑ ɑ kpeindɑ Yerusɑlɛm hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom sɛ mɑ kɑɑni ǹ sɛ.
45015032	Wom mɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ mo yɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ ndɑ fɑihã ndɑ Ikpɛ binebɑɑ yɑ hulɑnzom mefɔ ndɑ wom.
45015033	Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑɑndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne, ɑ̀ mɑ gɔrɔ wom kulu bɑndɑ. Ami.
45016001	A go kɑ i weimɑ Fibi sifɑ wom dɔ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono Sɑnkɑriɑ kpɑɑrɑ gbeiteeri.
45016002	Wom mɑ ɑ̀ kube Kpe kunɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ himɑ ndɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom. Wom mɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ ɑsiiri kulu kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ wom murɑdu zɑmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ jɑmɑ gɑɑ. Hɛɛ mo ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ gɑɑ.
45016003	Wom mɑ Pirisilɑ ndɑ Akilɑ fɔɔ, ɑ bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ yom Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gbei kunɑ,
45016004	Ǹ nɑ ngei jinde yom no ɑ hundi sɑbu sɛ. À mɑnɑ ci ɑ hinne yɑ go kɑ ǹ sɑɑbu ɑmmɑ ndɑ dimi cindei Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ yom kulu mo.
45016005	Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ mo kɑ ɑ̀ cini meigu ǹ hundi kunɑ, wom mɑ ɑ̀ fɔɔ. Wom mɑ ɑ binebɑɑkɔ Epenetu fɔɔ, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Mɛsiyɑ gɑnɑkɔ sintine Akɑyɑ lɑɑbu.
45016006	Wɑ Mɑriɑmɑ fɔɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ gbei tɛ gumo gumo i sɛ.
45016007	Wom mɑ Andɑlonikɑ ndɑ Yuniɑ fɔɔ, ɑ dimi yom, kɑ ǹ ci ɑ bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ yom kɑsu kunɑ. Diyɑ yom kunɑ mo ǹ mɑɑ yɑ hunu. Ǹ nɑ ɑ jinɑ mo Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ.
45016008	Wom mɑ Ampiɑtu fɔɔ, ɑ binebɑɑkɔ Kpe kunɑ.
45016009	Wom mɑ Yulubɑ fɔɔ, i bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ Mɛsiyɑ gbei kunɑ ndɑ ɑ binebɑɑkɔ Sitɑci.
45016010	Apɛlɛ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ tɑbɑtɑndi Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ, wom mɑ ɑ̀ fɔɔ. Wɑ Alitɑbule fuu mɑriyɑ yom fɔɔ.
45016011	Wom mɑ ɑ dimi Hirodiu fɔɔ. Wom mɑ Nɑsisu fuu mɑriyei kɑ ǹ goono Kpe kunɑ fɔɔ.
45016012	Wom mɑ Tifɑnu ndɑ Tifɑso fɔɔ, kɑ ǹ go gbei tɛ Kpe sɛ. Wɑ ɑ binebɑɑkɔ Pɛlisu fɔɔ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ gbei tɛ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ Kpe sɛ.
45016013	Lufu, Kpe kunɑ suubɑntɑ, wom mɑ ɑ̀ fɔɔ, ndɑ ɑ̀ nyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑ nyɑ mo.
45016014	Wom mɑ Asincitu fɔɔ ndɑ Felego ndɑ Hɛmɑsi ndɑ Pɑtobɑ ndɑ Hɛmɛ ndɑ nyɑizei kɑ ǹ goono ǹ dɔ.
45016015	Wom mɑ Filegu ndɑ Yuli fɔɔ ndɑ Neliyu ndɑ ɑ̀ weimɑ ndɑ Olɛmpu ndɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntei kulu kɑ ǹ goono ǹ dɔ.
45016016	Wɑ cɛrɛ fɔɔ ndɑ jɛrɛbɛ sumsumyom hinno bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ. Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ kulu go wom fɔɔ.
45016017	Nyɑizei, ɑ gɑ wom ŋmɑɑrɛ wom mo lɑɑkɑli ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑɑndɑ feefee ndɑ dɛrɛyom kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ sɑbɑ ndɑ cooɑndiyom kɑ wom du. Wom mɑ moorei mo.
45016018	Ngei wɔ, ǹ si tɑmtɛrɛ i Kpe Mɛsiyɑ sɛ kɑlɑ ngei bumbum gunde sɛ. Mee kɑɑne ndɑ sendi bɑɑnɔ bɑɑnɔ no ǹ go gɑnɑkɔ bɑɑnɔ yom zɑmbɑ ndɑ.
45016019	Beerem kulu sã mɑɑ wom gɑnɑyom bɑɑru. Ngɑ di sɛ, ɑ go fɑihã wom sɑbu sɛ ɑmmɑ ɑ go bɑɑ wom mɑ tɛ lɑɑkɑlɑntɛ yom kɑ simbɑ ndɑ ihinno, hinnɑntɛ yom mo kɑ simbɑ ndɑ ilɑlɔ.
45016020	Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne no ɑ̀ kɑɑ Setɑm tɛrɛsɛ wom cee yom cire, ɑ̀ si jɛ. I Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gomini mo gɔrɔ wom bɑndɑ. Ami.
45016021	Timote, ɑ bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ gbei kunɑ, ɑ̀ go wom fɔɔ ndɑ ɑ dimi yom Lusiɑ ndɑ Yɑso ndɑ Sosipɑto.
45016022	Hɛɛ mo, Tɛtisu kɑ ɑ ci tirɑ wɔ hɑntumkɔ, ɑ go wom fɔɔ Kpe kunɑ.
45016023	A fuukpɛ Gɑyu, wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hundi kunɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ cini tɛ, ɑ̀ go wom fɔɔ. Alɑsitu kɑ ɑ̀ ci wɑngɑrɑ nooru jisikɔ ndɑ i nyɑize Kɑlitu, ǹ go wom fɔɔ. [
45016024	I Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gomini mo gɔrɔ wom kulu bɑndɑ. Ami.]
45016025	Deizɑ mɑ ci Ikpɛ ŋmɔne. Ngɑ yɑ gundɑ dɑbɑri kɑ wom sinji ɑ̀ mɑ boori nɑɑne kunɑ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ kɑ ɑ fɛɛ bɔm ndɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ wɑɑzu bɔm. Ngɑ di tɛ nɑ Ikpɛ duje kɑɑyomtɛrɛ bɔm, duje kɑ ɑ̀ goono tugɑntɛ zɑ zɑmɑni yom sintiyom.
45016026	Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ duje di hunu tɛrɛ ɑndebei hɑntum yom dɔ hɑli hɑndunyɑ dimi kulu mɑ ɑ̀ bei ndɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ beeniyom meire goono ndɑ, hɑli ǹ mɑ nɑɑne gɑnɑ.
45016027	Ikpɛ ngɑ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci hɑikusu, deizɑ mɑ ci ɑ̀ ŋmɔne jiiri dubu ndɑ dubu yom, Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ. Ami.
46001001	Hɛɛ Pɔlu, Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ cɛɛ ngɑ binebɑɑ bɔm yɑ tɛ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu diyɑ. I nyɑize Sotɛnisu goono ndɑ hɛɛ.
46001002	I go kɑ Ikpɛ mɑrgɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono Kɔlɛnte wɑngɑrɑ fɔɔ. Ikpɛ nɑ wom hɑlɑɑlɑndi Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ kɑ wom cɛɛ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom. I go wom fɔɔ ndɑ beerem mo kɑ ǹ go kɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ mɑɑ cɛɛ nungu kulu, ngɑ yɑ ci ngei Kpe ndɑ i ŋmɔne.
46001003	Gomini ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne mo goono wom bɑndɑ kɑ ǹ hunu i Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ ndɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ.
46001004	A go kɑ ɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ sɑɑbu wom sɛ sɑɑ kulu Ikpɛ gomini sɑbu sɛ, gomini kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ wom no Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ.
46001005	A go kɑ ɑ̀ sɑɑbu ndɑ kɑ Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ Ikpɛ nɑ wom no bɑrikɑ hɛ kulu kunɑ sendi kulu dɔ ndɑ beire kulu dɔ.
46001006	Ikpɛ nɑ Mɛsiyɑ sɛdɑ tɑbɑtɑndi mo wom kunɑ.
46001007	À nɑ ɑ̀ tɑbɑtɑndi hɑli wom mɑ si zɑm noyom bɑ ɑfɔ zɑ kɑ wom go kɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kɑɑyomtɛrɛ bɑtu.
46001008	Ngɑ yɑ kɑɑ wom tɑbɑtɑndi kɑlɑ mee wom mɑ goono tɑɑli si i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ hɑnu hine.
46001009	Ikpɛ yɑ nɑɑnekpɛ no, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ wom cɛɛ wom mɑ meigu ndɑ bine fɔ ndɑ ngɑ Ize, i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ.
46001010	Nyɑizei, ɑ go wom no himmɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ, wom sendi mɑ ci ɑfɔ. Feefee mɑ si goono wom gɑme. Wom mɑ ci ɑfɔ lɑɑkɑli fɔlɔnku kunɑ ndɑ diyom fɔlɔnku.
46001011	A nyɑizei, Kolowe fuu bɔrɔ yom nɑ ɑ no wom bɑɑru. Ǹ cii feefee goono wom gɑme.
46001012	Ammɑ ɑ go wɔne cii, wom kulu ɑfɔ fɔ hɛ kɑ wom go cii neyɑ: Hɛɛ wɔ Pɔlu bɑndɑ no ɑ goono. Hɛɛ wɔ Apolo bɑndɑ no ɑ goono. Hɛɛ wɔ Sefɑ bɑndɑ no ɑ goono. Hɛɛ wɔ Mɛsiyɑ bɑndɑ no ɑ goono.
46001013	Ǹ nɑ Mɛsiyɑ feefee bɑ? Ǹ nɑ Pɔlu kɑnji wom sɛ bɑ? Wɑlɑ ndɑ Pɔlu mɑɑ no ǹ nɑ wom mirɑndi?
46001014	A go kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu ndɑ kɑ yɑ nɑ wom bɑ ɑfɔ mirɑndi, de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Kilipu ndɑ Gɑyu.
46001015	A mɑnɑ ngɑ di tɛ zɑmɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ si cii ɑ nɑ mirɑndiyom tɛ ndɑ ɑ mɑɑ.
46001016	A nɑ Tifɑnu fuu beerem mo mirɑndi. Beerem nge yom di bɑ si, ɑ si bei de ɑ nɑ bɔrɔ fɔ mirɑndi kpɛɛnɛ.
46001017	Mɛsiyɑ mɑnɑ ɑ dɔntɔm yɑ kɑɑ mirɑndi ɑmmɑ yɑ kɑɑ wɑɑzu Bɑɑru Hinno bɔm. A mɑnɑ wɑɑzu ndɑ hɑndunyɑ hɑikusutɛrɛ sendi zɑmɑ Mɛsiyɑ buyom bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ gɑɑ ɑ̀ mɑ si tɛ kɔnu.
