46001018	Bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ sendi wɔ sɑmutɛrɛ sendi nɑ ngei wɔ dɔ, nge yom kɑ ǹ go hɑlɑci. Ammɑ i yom kɑ i go du fɑɑbɑ, i dɔ Ikpɛ dɑbɑri no.
46001019	Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Hɑndunyɑ hɑikusu yom, ɑ gɑ ǹ hɑikusutɛrɛ zeeri. Hɑndunyɑ fɑhɑmkpɛ yom mo, ɑ gɑ ǹ gɑnɑndi."
46001020	Mɑni hɑikusu? Mɑni cooɑndikɔ? Mɑni zɑmɑni wɔ kɑkɔkpɛ? Ikpɛ nɑ hɑndunyɑ wɔ hɑikusutɛrɛ tɛ sɑmutɛrɛ. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
46001021	Zɑ kɑ Ikpɛ hɑikusutɛrɛ kunɑ hɑndunyɑ mɑnɑ Ikpɛ bei ɑ̀ ŋmɔne hɑikusutɛrɛ dɔ. À kɑɑni Ikpɛ sɛ mɑ ɑ̀ mɑ nɑɑnekɔ yom fɑɑbɑ sɑmutɛrɛ wɑɑzu gɑɑ.
46001022	Yuifu yom wɔ ɑlɑmu yom no ǹ go ŋmɑɑrɛ. Gɑrɛku yom mo go hɑndunyɑ hɑikusutɛrɛ ceeci.
46001023	Ammɑ i yom, Mɛsiyɑ kɑ ǹ kɑnji ɑ̀ bɑɑru no i go fɛɛ. I bɑɑru fɛɛyom wɔ yɑ tɛ Yuifu yom sɛ dɛrɛyom hɛ. À tɛ dimi cindei mo sɛ sɑmutɛrɛ.
46001024	Beerem kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ cɛɛ, zɑ Yuifu yom hɑli Gɑrɛku yom, ngei wɔ dɔ Mɛsiyɑ yɑ Ikpɛ dɑbɑri no. Ngɑ yɑ Ikpɛ hɑikusutɛrɛ mo no.
46001025	Ikpɛ sɑmutɛrɛ bisɑ iburɑdɑm yom hɑikusutɛrɛ. Ikpɛ hinɑbunutɛrɛ, ɑ̀ bisɑ iburɑdɑm yom gɑɑbi.
46001026	A nyɑizei, wɑ lɑsɑbu ndɑ zɑngɑ wom goono sɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ wom cɛɛ. Wom kunɑ bɔrɔ boobo mɑnɑ ci hɑikusu zɑngɑ iburɑdɑm yom go lɑsɑbu. Wom kunɑ iboobo mɑnɑ ci dɑbɑrikpɛ. Wom kunɑ bɔrɔ boobo mɑnɑ ci bɛɛrɛkpɛ.
46001027	Ammɑ Ikpɛ nɑ hɑndunyɑ sɑmutɛrɛ hɛ yom suubɑ hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ hɑndunyɑ hɑikusu yom hɑwɑndi. À nɑ hɑndunyɑ hinɑbunu yom mo suubɑ kɑ gɑɑbikoni yom hɑwɑndi.
46001028	Ikpɛ nɑ hɑndunyɑ hɛ kɔnu yom ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ hɑndunyɑ dondei suubɑ. Oò, ɑ̀ nɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ci suubɑ kɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ ci tɛ kɔnu.
46001029	Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ nɑ zɑmɑ bɔrɔ kulu mɑ si fɑɑre ngɑ jine.
46001030	Ikpɛ nɑ wom dɑm Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ. Ikpɛ nɑ Mɛsiyɑ tɛ i sɛ hɑikusutɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu ɑ̀ dɔ. Wɑtom ngɑ yɑ ci i cɛyom susu. Ngɑ yɑ ci i hɑlɑɑlɑndiyom. Ngɑ yɑ ci i fɑnsɑyom.
46001031	À nɑ ngɑ di tɛ no zɑmɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ mɑ tɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cii: "Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ fɑɑre, ɑ̀ mɑ ɑ̀ tɛ Kpe kunɑ".
46002001	Hɛɛ bumbum nyɑizei, sɑɑ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ kɑ Ikpɛ sɛdɑ wɑɑzu wom sɛ, yɑ nɑ kɑɑ ndɑ sendi ŋmɑni yom wɑlɑ ndɑ hɑikusutɛrɛ.
46002002	Yɑ nɑ guuri zɑɑ kɑ bei hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ goono wom gɑme de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Yesu Mɛsiyɑ, ngɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji.
46002003	Hinɑbunutɛrɛ kunɑ nɑ ɑ gɔrɔ wom dɔ ndɑ hɑmburu ndɑ gɑsiyom beeri.
46002004	A mee sendi ndɑ ɑ wɑɑzu mɑnɑ tɛ ndɑ hɑndunyɑ hɑikusutɛrɛ sendi kɑ bɔrɔ bɛrɛ. Ammɑ Ikpɛ Biyɑ cɛbɛ yom ndɑ ɑ̀ dɑbɑri gɑɑ no ɑ sendi kɑ wɑɑzu.
46002005	A nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ zɑngɑ yɑ zɑmɑ wom nɑɑne mɑ si gɔrɔ hɑndunyɑ hɑikusutɛrɛ bɔm ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ gɔrɔ Ikpɛ dɑbɑri bɔm.
46002006	Beerem kɑ ǹ kube ǹ gɑme no i go hɑikusutɛrɛ sendi tɛ. I si tɛ zɑmɑni wɔ hɑikusutɛrɛ bɔm wɑlɑ zɑmɑni wɔ kpe yom ŋmɔne bɔm kɑ ǹ bɑ bisɑ.
46002007	Ammɑ Ikpɛ hɑikusutɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ dom goono tugɑntɛ, ɑ̀ duje sendi no i go tɛ. Ikpɛ nɑ hɑikusutɛrɛ wɔ jisi i deizɑ sɛ zɑ zɑmɑni yom mɑnɑ tɛ.
46002008	Hɑikusutɛrɛ ngɑ di zɑmɑni wɔ kpe yom bɑ ɑfɔ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ bei, zɑmɑ de ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ bei dom, ǹ si Kpe Deizɑkpɛ kɑnji.
46002009	Ammɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Hɛ yom kɑ mɑɑ mɑnɑ di, ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ hɑngɑ yom mɑnɑ mɑɑ ǹ mɑnɑ hurɑ bɔrɔ bine kunɑ mo. Hɛ nge yom di no Ikpɛ sɔlu beerem kɑ ǹ go bɑɑ rɑ sɛ."
46002010	Ammɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ kɑɑtɛrɛ i sɛ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ. Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ go hɛ kulu yɑɑse gunɑ, bɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ duje yom.
46002011	Mee yɑ bei hɛ kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ gɑ lɑsɑbu de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci bɔrɔ bumbum biyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono ɑkpɛ kunɑ? Yɑ nɑ bɔrɔ si Ikpɛ lɑsɑbu yom bei de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Ikpɛ bumbum Biyɑ.
46002012	Ammɑ i yom, i mɑnɑ du hɑndunyɑ biyɑ. I du Biyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu Ikpɛ dɔ zɑmɑ i mɑ bei hɛ yom kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ i no ngɑ gomini kunɑ.
46002013	Nge yom di sendi mo no i go tɛ. I si sendi ndɑ hɑndunyɑ hɑikusutɛrɛ kɑ iburɑdɑm yom nɑ i cɛbɛ. Ammɑ i go sendi ndɑ sendi yom kɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ nɑ i cɛbɛ. I go Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ hɛ yom feeri ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ sendi yom.
46002014	Hɑndunyɑ bɔrɔ bine si Ikpɛ Biyɑ hɛ yom tɑ zɑmɑ ngɑ wɔ dɔ sɑmutɛrɛ hɛ yom no. À si hini kɑ ǹ bei mo zɑmɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ gɑ ǹ fɑyɑnkɑ.
46002015	Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ Ikpɛ Biyɑ, ɑ̀ go hɛ kulu fɑyɑnkɑ. Bɔrɔ kulu mɑ si ɑ̀ yɑɑse gunɑ.
46002016	Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Mee yɑ nɑ Kpe lɑsɑbu bei kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ Kpe cɛbɛ? Ammɑ i yom, i gundɑ Mɛsiyɑ lɑsɑbu."
46003001	Hɛɛ wɔ nyɑizei, yɑ nɑ hini kɑ sendi wom sɛ zɑngɑ beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ gɑ Ikpɛ Biyɑ gɑnɑ. Ammɑ ɑ sendi wom sɛ zɑngɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go hɑndunyɑ hɑɑli gɑnɑ, zɑngɑ Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ nɑɑnekɔ cɛnɑ yom sɛ.
46003002	A nɑ wom no woo kɑ hɑm, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ŋmɑɑri sɛndɔ, zɑmɑ wom si hini ŋmɑɑri sɛndɔ. Bɑ mɑɑsɑ mɑ wom si hinɑ̀.
46003003	Wom yɑ hɑndunyɑ hɑɑli gɑnɑkɔ yom no kpɛɛnɛ. Cɛnsɛ ndɑ kɑkɔ ndɑ feefee goono wom gɑme. Yɑ di gɑɑ wom yɑ hɑndunyɑ hɑɑli gɑnɑkɔ yom no. Wom go dirɑ zɑngɑ iburɑdɑm yom hɑɑli goono ndɑ. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
46003004	Wom kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ go cii: Hɛɛ wɔ Pɔlu bɑndɑ no ɑ goono. Afɔ mo cii: Hɛɛ wɔ Apolo bɑndɑ no ɑ goono. Yɑ di gɑɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ci wom tɛ iburɑdɑm hɑɑli gɑnɑkɔ yom bɑ?
46003005	Hɛɛ Pɔlu yɑ ci mee? Apolo yɑ ci mee? Gbeiteeri yom no kɑ ǹ dɔ wom nɑɑne kɑ simbɑ ndɑ gbei kɑ Kpe nɑ i ŋmɔne ɑfɔ kulu no.
46003006	Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ tilɑm no. Apolo hɑngɑndi. Ammɑ Ikpɛ mo nɑ ɑ̀ nɑm ɑ̀ mɑ beeri.
46003007	Zɑngɑ yɑ, tilɑmkɔ mɑnɑ ci hɛ fɔ. Yɑ no hɑngɑndikɔ mɑ, kɑlɑ Ikpɛ cɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑm ɑ̀ mɑ beeri.
46003008	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go tilɑm ndɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hɑngɑndi, ǹ kulu ɑfɔ no. Ammɑ ɑfɔ kulu kɑɑ du ngɑ tukunsi ngɑ gbei bɔm.
46003009	I yom yɑ Ikpɛ bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ yom no. Wom mo Ikpɛ fɑri ndɑ Ikpɛ cinɑri nɑ.
46003010	Zɑngɑ Ikpɛ gomini goono ndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ no, zɑngɑ cinikɔ hɑikusu kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ lɑɑkɑli, ɑ nɑ fuu kpɛsɛ furu. Bɔrɔ fɔ mo go cini ɑ̀ bɔm. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kulu mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ zɑngɑ ngɑ gɑ cini ɑ̀ bɔm.
46003011	Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu si hini kɑ fuu kpɛsɛ ŋmɑni fɔ furu kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑnɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ furu kɔ. Ngɑ yɑ ci Yesu Mɛsiyɑ.
46003012	Bɔrɔ kulu gɑ cini fuu kpɛsɛ wɔ bɔm. À go cini ndɑ wurɑ ndɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu ndɑ tondi dukusɑntɛ wɑlɑ ndɑ bundu ndɑ subu kɔgɔ ndɑ sumbɛ.
46003013	Ikpɛ kɑɑ bɔrɔ fɔ fɔ kulu gbei kɑɑtɛrɛ. Hɑnu di yɑ nɑm ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ bei, zɑmɑ nini kunɑ no ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ. Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci bɔrɔ fɔ kulu gbei, nini yɑ gɑ ɑ̀ neesi gbei kɑ ɑ̀ dimi nɑ.
46003014	De gbei kɑ bɔrɔ kɑɑ cini ɑ̀ bɔm cindi, ɑkpɛ wɔ kɑɑ du tukunsi.
46003015	De bɔrɔ fɔ gbei tɔnu mo, ɑkpɛ tukunsi kɑɑ dɛrɛ. Ammɑ ngɑ bumbum Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ fɑɑbɑ nini kunɑ pimpɑm.
46003016	Wom yɑ Ikpɛ gɔrɛ dɔ no. Ikpɛ Biyɑ mo goono wom kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ. Wom go yɑ di bei bɑ?
46003017	De bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ Ikpɛ gɔrɛ dɔ sɑrɑ, Ikpɛ gɑ ɑkpɛ zeeri zɑmɑ Ikpɛ gɔrɛ dɔ yɑ hɑlɑɑlɑ no. Wom bine yɑ ci ɑ̀ gɔrɛ dɔ.
46003018	Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ si ngɑ bɔm fɑfɑgu. De wom kunɑ ɑfɔ go kɑ ngɑ bɔm tɑmmɑ zɑmɑni wɔ hɑikusu, ɑ̀ mɑ bɛrɛ kɑ ci sɑmu ɑ̀ mɑ du kɑ ci hɑikusu.
46003019	Hɑndunyɑ hɑikusutɛrɛ wɔ sɑmutɛrɛ no Ikpɛ jine. Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Ikpɛ go hɑikusu yom dii ǹ ŋmɔne cɛmbɛrɛ kunɑ".
46003020	Ikpɛ Sendɑ cii kpɛɛnɛ: "Kpe gɑ hɑikusu yom lɑsɑbu yom bei. À bei lɑsɑbu kɔnu yom no."
46003021	À sɛ no, bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ si ngɑ bɔm bɛɛrɑndi ndɑ iburɑdɑm yom zɑmɑ wom ŋmɔne no hɛ kulu.
46003022	Zɑ Pɔlu, zɑ Apolo, zɑ Sefɑ, zɑ hɑndunyɑ, zɑ hundi, zɑ bu, zɑ mɑɑsɑ hɛ yom, zɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑɑ, ǹ kulu wom ŋmɔne yom no.
46003023	Wom mo Mɛsiyɑ ŋmɔne yom no. Mɛsiyɑ mɑ, Ikpɛ ŋmɔne nɑ.
46004001	Bɔrɔ kulu mɑ lɑsɑbu i gɑɑ zɑngɑ yɑ wɔ, i yom yɑ Mɛsiyɑ gbeiteeri yom nɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ duje bɑndɑbɔrɔ yom.
46004002	Ammɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ goono dee yɑ ci Ikpɛ duje bɑndɑbɔrɔ mɑ ci nɑɑnekpɛ.
46004003	Ammɑ hɛɛ wɔ, wom mɑ ɑ dɑmzɑkɑ wɑlɑ hɑndunyɑ kunɑ ciitikɔ mɑ ɑ dɑmzɑkɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ɑ sɛ hɛ fɔ. Hɛɛ bumbum mɑ, ɑ dee si ɑ bɔm dɑmzɑkɑ.
46004004	A sindɑ hɛ fɔ kulu ɑ bine kunɑ sendi bɔm. Ammɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ɑ cɛɑndi susu ngɑ di sɛ. Wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ ɑ neesi, ngɑ yɑ ci Kpe.
46004005	Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ si hɛ fɔ kulu ciiti zɑ lɔkɑci mɑnɑ tɔ. Wɑ ɑ̀ nɑm hɑli Kpe mɑ kɑɑ. Hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono tugɑntɛ kube kunɑ, Kpe gɑ ɑ̀ dɑm kɑɑri kunɑ. Bine kunɑ miilɑ yom mo ɑ̀ gɑ ǹ kɑɑtɛrɛ. À gɑɑ no, bɔrɔ fɔ fɔ kulu kɑɑ du ngɑ sɑɑbuyom Ikpɛ dɔ.
46004006	Nyɑizei, wom sɑbu sɛ nɑ ɑ kɑɑndɑ wɔne yom kulu kɑ cii hɛɛ ndɑ Apolo bɔm zɑmɑ wom mɑ dendeni i dɔ. A gɑ bɑɑ wom lɑsɑbu yom mɑ si bisɑ hɛ kɑ ǹ hɑntum. Wom mɑ si bɔmbɛɛrɛ mɑ tɛ kɑ bɑɑbɑɑ tɛ cɛrɛ sɛ.
46004007	Mee yɑ gɑ ni ndɑ bɔrɔ fɔ fɑyɑnkɑ? Ifɔ kulu nɑ n gundɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci noyom nɑ? Zɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ n no, ifɔ sɛ n go fɑɑre zɑngɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Ikpɛ noyom no?
46004008	Wom tɔ kɔ. Wom tɛ hɑibɑrikɑntɛ yom kɔ. Wom nɑ kpetɛrɛ ŋmɑɑ kɔ, i bɑ si ɑ̀ kunɑ. A go bɑɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ wom mɑ kpetɛrɛ ŋmɑɑ zɑmɑ i yom mo i mɑ kpetɛrɛ ŋmɑɑ wom bɑndɑ.
46004009	À himɑ ɑ sɛ Ikpɛ nɑ i yom kɑ i ci diyɑ yom dɑm kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ. I ci zɑngɑ beerem kɑ ǹ nɑ bu ciiti dumbu ǹ bɔm. Ikpɛ nɑ i tɛ gunɑyom hɛ hɑndunyɑ sɛ ndɑ ngɑ dɔntɔneize yom sɛ ndɑ iburɑdɑm yom sɛ.
46004010	I yom wɔ, i ci sɑmu yom Mɛsiyɑ sɑbu sɛ ɑmmɑ wom wɔ, wom yɑ hɑikusu yom no Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ. Hinɑbunu yom no i yom ɑmmɑ wom mo gɑɑbikoni yom. Wom du bɛɛrɛ. I mɑnɑ du bɛɛrɛ.
46004011	Hɑli mɑɑsɑ i go mɑɑ hɛrɛɛ, i gɑ mɑɑ jo. I go zɑm jiinei kɑ dɑm. Ǹ go kɑ i tɑɑbɑndi. I go dirɑ kɑ hundi.
46004012	I gɑ sunjɛ kɑ gbei tɛ ndɑ i kɑmbɛ yom. Ǹ go kɑ i woo, i go bɑrikɑ dɑm. Ǹ go kɑ i guruguzɑndi, i go bine nɑɑni.
46004013	Ǹ go kɑ i ciine. I go tu ndɑ sendi hinno. I ci zɑngɑ hɑndunyɑ beegunu yom. I goono ǹ sɛ zɑngɑ bɔtɔ yom hɑli mɑɑsɑ.
46004014	Yɑ nɑ hɛ yom wɔ hɑntum yɑ wom hɑwɑndi sɛ. Ammɑ ɑ go wom kɑɑbɑɑru zɑngɑ ɑ koo binebɑɑkɔ yom.
46004015	Bo de wom gundɑ cooɑndikɔ dubu wei Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ, wom dee sindɑ bɑɑbɑ boobo. Hɛɛ yɑ nɑ wom hɛi Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ dɔ.
46004016	Ngɑ di sɛ, ɑ go wom ŋmɑɑrɛ wom mɑ tɛ ɑ dendenikɔ yom.
46004017	À sɛ no, ɑ nɑ Timote dɔntɔm wom dɔ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑ koo binebɑɑkɔ, nɑɑnekpɛ mo Kpe kunɑ. À mɑ wom hɔngɑndi ɑ tɛrɑ yom Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ zɑngɑ ɑ gɑ beerem cooɑndi nungu kulu Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ kulu kunɑ.
46004018	Bɔrɔ fɔ yom bine go bɔmbɛɛrɛ tɛ zɑmɑ ǹ go tɑmmɑ hɑli ɑ si kɑɑ wom dɔ.
46004019	Hɑli cɛnɑ bine ɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ de Kpe bɑɑ. Beerem kɑ ǹ go bɔmbɛɛrɛ tɛ ɑ kɑɑ bei, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ǹ mee sendi yom hinne bo ɑmmɑ ǹ dɑbɑri.
46004020	Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ si mee sendi gɑɑ kɑlɑ dɑbɑri gɑɑ.
46004021	Ifɔ wom go bɑɑ? Yɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ ndɑ kɔnkɔmyom dee wɑlɑ ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine ndɑ bine bɑɑnɔ?
46005001	I gɑ mɑɑ nungu kulu ǹ go cii zinɑ goono wom kunɑ. Zinɑtɛrɛ dimi mo kɑ ɑ̀ si bɑ dimi cindei kunɑ. À tɔ hɑli wom kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ ngɑ bɑɑbɑ wɛndɛ zɑɑ.
46005002	Ammɑ bɔmbɛɛrɛ no wom go tɛ. À himɑ nɑ dom, wom bine mɑ sɑrɑ kɑ bɔrɔ di kɑɑ wom kunɑ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ gbei wɔ tɛ.
46005003	Hɛɛ wɔ ɑ dɔ, bɑ kɑ ɑ si nodi, ɑ bine goono nodi. A nɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ gbei ngɑ di tɛ ciiti kɔ zɑngɑ dee hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ goono nodi.
46005004	Sɑɑ kɑ wom meigu i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ, ɑ biyɑ goono ndɑ wom ndɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɑbɑri mɑ.
46005005	Wom mɑ bɔrɔ yɑ di dimi dɑm Setɑm kɑmbɛ. À mɑ ngɑ dulum hɑɑli hɑlɑci zɑmɑ ɑ̀ biyɑ mɑ du fɑɑbɑ Kpe Yesu hɑnu hine.
46005006	Wom fɑɑre mɑnɑ boori. Kɑsɑmi cɛnɑ yɑ buuru gɑɑtɑ kulu tunɑndi. Wom go yɑ di bei bɑ?
46005007	À sɛ no, wom mɑ kɑsɑmi zeenɔ ngɑ di kɑɑ, wom mɑ du kɑ tɛ buuru gɑɑtɑ teji zɑngɑ wom sindɑ kɑsɑmi. Mɛsiyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci i Bɔmdɑɑrum feeji, Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ gɑrɑndi tɛ i sɛ.
46005008	ɑ nɑ i mɑ jingɑrɑ tɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ndɑ kɑsɑmi zeenɔ wɑlɑ ndɑ kɑsɑmi kɑ ɑ̀ ci cɛmbɛrɛ cɛmbɛrɛ ndɑ hɑnyɑ fute. Ammɑ i mɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ buuru kɑsɑmi si kɑ ɑ̀ ci ihinno ndɑ cimi ŋmɔne.
46005009	A jinɑ kɑ hɑntum wom sɛ tirɑ fɔ kunɑ wom mɑ si kpɑɑsitɛrɛ tɛ ndɑ zinɑteeri yom.
46005010	À mɑnɑ ci ko fee pɑti pɑti ndɑ hɑndunyɑ wɔ zinɑteeri yom wɑlɑ ndɑ hɛ bɑɑkɔ futu yom wɑlɑ ndɑ kɔmkɔ yom wɑlɑ ndɑ tooru gɑnɑkɔ yom. De yɑ nɑ kɑlɑ de wom mɑ hunu hɑndunyɑ kunɑ.
46005011	Mɑɑsɑ mɑ, ɑ gɑ hɑntum wom sɛ de nyɑize ci zinɑteeri wɑlɑ hɛ bɑɑkɔ futu wɑlɑ tooru gɑnɑkɔ wɑlɑ bɔrɔ wookɔ wɑlɑ bɑjiwi wɑlɑ kɔmkɔ, wom mɑ si kpɑɑsitɛrɛ tɛ ndɑ. Wom mɑ si bɑ ŋmɑɑ ndɑ ɑkpɛ.
46005012	Hɑndunyɑ beerem ciitiyom ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ɑ sendi. Wom mɑ gɑnɑkɔ yom ciiti. À nɑ ci yɑ di nɑ bɑ?
46005013	Ammɑ hɑndunyɑ ŋmɔne yom wɔ Ikpɛ gɑ ǹ ciiti. Wom yɑ dee, wɑ bɔrɔ lɑlɔ wɔ kɑɑ wom kunɑ.
46006001	Wom kunɑ de bɔrɔ fɔ gundɑ hɛ fɔ ngɑ nyɑize fɔ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ tu kɑ kɑɑndɑ hɑndunyɑ ciitikɔ yom dɔ bɑ? Ammɑ ɑ̀ himɑ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑndɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom dɔ.
46006002	Hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kɑɑ hɑndunyɑ wɔ ciiti. Wom go yɑ di bei bɑ? De bine wom yɑ kɑɑ hɑndunyɑ ciiti, wom mɑnɑ tɔ wom mɑ ciiti cɛnɑ yom wɔ tɛ no?
46006003	I yom yɑ kɑɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom ciiti. Wom go yɑ di bei bɑ? Hɑli yɑ mɑ hɑndunyɑ wɔ ŋmɔne ɑsiiri yom, i yom yɑ gɑ ǹ ciiti.
46006004	Yɑ di gɑɑ, wom gundɑ hɑndunyɑ wɔ ciiti ɑsiiri yom. Wom go beerem kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ci hɛ fɔ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ jine zɑɑ kɑ ǹ dɑm ǹ mɑ ciiti tɛ bɑ?
46006005	A go wɔne cii no kɑ wom hɑwɑndi. Wom kunɑ hɑikusu bɑ ɑfɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ŋmɑɑni kɑ sendi wi ngɑ nyɑize yom gɑme?
46006006	Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ nyɑize fɔ gɑ kɑɑndɑ nyɑize fɔ ciiti dɔ. Wom go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ mo no zɑm kɑ nɑɑnekɔ yom jine fɑ.
46006007	Cimi no, ngɑ di zɑngɑ nɑ kulu ɑ̀ tɛ wom tɑɑli kɔ zɑ kɑ wom gɑ kpeindɑ cɛrɛ ciiti dɔ. Ifɔ sɛ no wom si bine nɑɑni ndɑ cimi zɑmyom dom? Ifɔ sɛ wom si bine nɑɑni ndɑ muruse dɑm?
46006008	Ammɑ wom wɔ, wom si cimi tɛ. Wom go muruse tɛ, ɑ̀ kulu mo nyɑize yom sɛ.
46006009	Beerem kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ cɛsusu si Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ tubu. Wom go yɑ di bei bɑ? Wɑ si wom bɔm dɛrɑndi. Zɑ hɑwiize yom, zɑ tɑɑru gɑnɑkɔ yom, zɑ zinɑteeri yom, zɑ hɑruciwei yom, zɑ bɑbɑrɑkpɛ yom,
46006010	zɑ zee yom, zɑ hɛ bɑɑkɔ futu yom, zɑ bɑjiwi yom, zɑ bɔrɔ wookɔ yom, zɑ kɔmkɔ yom, ǹ bɑ ɑfɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ tubu.
46006011	Yɑ bine no, wom kunɑ ɑfɔ yom gɔrɔ dom. Ammɑ Ikpɛ nɑ wom nyume. À nɑ wom hɑlɑɑlɑndi. À nɑ wom cɛɑndi susu Kpe Yesu mɑɑ gɑɑ ndɑ i ŋmɔne Ikpɛ Biyɑ dɔ.
46006012	Hɛ kulu hɑlɑli ɑ sɛ ɑmmɑ ǹ kulu sindɑ hɑnfɑni. Hɛ kulu hɑlɑli ɑ sɛ ɑmmɑ ɑ si tu hɛ fɔ kulu mɑ dɑbɑri ɑ bɔm.
46006013	Ŋmɑɑri yɑ gunde ŋmɔne no. Gunde mo ŋmɑɑri ŋmɔne nɑ. Ammɑ ɑfɔ fɔ Ikpɛ gɑ ǹ kulu hɑlɑci. Gɑɑhɑm wɔ mɑnɑ ci zinɑ ŋmɔne, Kpe ŋmɔne no. Kpe mo gɑɑhɑm ŋmɔne.
46006014	Ikpɛ nɑ Kpe tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme. I yom mo ɑ̀ gɑ i tunɑndi ngɑ dɑbɑri gɑɑ.
46006015	Wom gɑɑhɑmei yɑ Mɛsiyɑ dɔbu yom no. Wom go kɑ ngɑ di bei bɑ? Yɑ di gɑɑ, yɑ Mɛsiyɑ dɔbu yom zɑɑ kɑ tɛ weikuru dɔbu yom bɑ? Awo. À si tɛ.
46006016	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ meigu ndɑ weikuru, ngɑ ndɑ weikurɑ tɛ gɑɑhɑm fɔlɔnku noyɑ. Wom go yɑ di bei bɑ? Ikpɛ Sendɑ cii: "Ǹ bɔrɔ hinkɑ kɑɑ tɛ gɑɑhɑm fɔlɔnku".
46006017	Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ meigu ndɑ Kpe, ngɑ ndɑ Kpe tɛ biyɑ fɔlɔnku noyɑ.
46006018	Wɑ zuuru zinɑ sɛ. Dulum ŋmɑni fɔ kulu kɑ bɔrɔ tɛ ɑ̀ si kɑlɑ gɑɑhɑm sɛ tɛrɛ. Ammɑ zinɑteeri wɔ ɑ̀ bumbum gɑɑhɑm sɛ no ɑ̀ go dulum tɛ.
46006019	Wom gɑɑhɑmei yɑ ci Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ gɔrɛ dɔ. Biyɑ wɔ yɑ goono wom kunɑ. Wom du ɑ̀ Ikpɛ dɔ. Wom sindɑ wom bɔm bo. Mɛtɛ no wom mɑnɑ ngɑ di bei?
46006020	Ikpɛ nɑ wom dei ndɑ fɑnsɑyom bɑmbɑtɑ. Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi wom gɑɑhɑmei kunɑ ndɑ wom binei kunɑ kɑ ǹ ci Ikpɛ ŋmɔne yom.
46007001	Kɑ simbɑ ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ sɑbu sɛ wom hɑntum ɑ sɛ, ɑ̀ boori no bɔrɔ mɑ si lɑmbɑ weibɔrɔ gɑɑ.
46007002	Ammɑ zinɑ sɑbu sɛ hɑibɔrɔ kulu mɑ bɑrɑ ndɑ ngɑ bɔm wɛndɛ. Weibɔrɔ mo kulu mɑ bɑrɑ ndɑ ngɑ bɔm kunye.
46007003	Kunye mɑ ngɑ wɛndɛ no hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hegu ɑ̀ sɛ. Wɛndɛ mɑ tɛ yɑ di ngɑ kunye sɛ mo.
46007004	Wɛndɛ sindɑ hini ngɑ gɑɑhɑm bɔm. À kunye yɑ gundɑ hini ɑ̀ bɔm. Yɑ nɑ kunye mɑ sindɑ hini ngɑ gɑɑhɑm bɔm. À wɛndɛ yɑ gundɑ hini ɑ̀ bɔm.
46007005	Wom mɑ si hungu cɛrɛ sɛ de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci wom mɑɑ ndɑ cɛrɛ lɔkɑci fɔ bɔm kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ kɑ meehɔ zɑɑ. Wom mɑ yɑɑrɑ kɑ ye cɛrɛ gɑɑ hɑli Setɑm mɑ si wom sui, wom bɔm mɔngɔyom sɑbu sɛ.
46007006	Ikpɛ yɑ tu ɑ sɛ yɑ wɔne cii, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci zɑngɑ meire no.
46007007	A go bɑɑ no bɔrɔ kulu mɑ bɑrɑ zɑngɑ hɛɛ. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kulu gundɑ ngɑ noyom kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ no, bɔrɔ fɔ zɑngɑ yɑ wɔ, bɔrɔ fɔ mo zɑngɑ yɑ wɔ.
46007008	Hɑibɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ hiji ndɑ weibɔrɔ sokoni yom mo, ǹ sɛ no ɑ go cii ɑ̀ boori ǹ mɑ gɔrɔ zɑngɑ hɛɛ.
46007009	Ammɑ de ǹ si hini ngei bɔm, ǹ mɑ hiji. Bɔrɔ mɑ hiji, ɑ̀ bisɑ bɔrɔ guuri mɑ ɑ̀ tɔnu.
46007010	Beerem mo kɑ ǹ hiji, ɑ go kɑ ǹ no mei. Ammɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci hɛɛ bo, Kpe no. Wɛndɛ mɑ si ngɑ kunye fee.
46007011	De bine ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ fee ɑ̀ mɑ gɔrɔ ɑ̀ mɑ si hiji wɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ sɑbɑ dɑm ngɑ ndɑ ngɑ kunye gɑme. Kunye mo mɑ si ngɑ wɛndɛ fee.
46007012	Ammɑ ɑ go sendi bɔrɔ cindei sɛ. Hɛɛ yɑ go sendi, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Kpe bo. Zɑngɑ sendi, nyɑize fɔ gundɑ wɛndɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ nɑɑne. De wɛndɑ tu ngɑ mɑ gɔrɔ ndɑ kunyɑ, kunyɑ mɑ si ɑ̀ fee.
46007013	De wɛndɛ mo gundɑ kunye kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ nɑɑne, ɑmmɑ kunyɑ tu ngɑ mɑ gɔrɔ ndɑ wɛndɑ, wɛndɑ mɑ si ɑ̀ fee.
46007014	Wɛndɛ yɑ kunye kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ nɑɑne hɑlɑɑlɑndi. Kunye mɑ yɑ wɛndɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ nɑɑne hɑlɑɑlɑndi. De ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci yɑ, wom koo yom bo tɛ ziibɑntɛ yom, ɑmmɑ mɑɑsɑ hɑlɑɑlɑ yom no.
46007015	Ammɑ de bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ nɑɑne gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ fee, ɑ̀ mɑ ngɑ bɔm fee. Zɑngɑ yɑ, nyɑize hɑibɔrɔ wɔ wɑlɑ nyɑize weibɔrɔ wɔ ɑ̀ si hɔɑntɛ zɑmɑ Ikpɛ nɑ i cɛɛ no i mɑ gɔrɔ ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne.
46007016	Ni wɛndɛ, mɛtɛ n tɛ kɑ bei hɑli n gɑ n kunye fɑɑbɑ? Ni mo kunye, mɛtɛ n tɛ kɑ bei, hɑli n gɑ n wɛndɛ fɑɑbɑ?
46007017	Bɔrɔ fɔ fɔ kulu mɑ dirɑ hinne zɑngɑ Kpe nɑ ɑ̀ no kɑ simbɑ ndɑ cɛɛ yom kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ bɔrɔ kulu cɛɛ. Zɑngɑ yɑ no ɑ go Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ kulu nɑ fɔndɔ.
46007018	Ikpɛ nɑ dɑmbɑnguize fɔ cɛɛ bɑ? À mɑ si ci zɑngɑ zɑm kɑ dɑmbɑnguize. Ikpɛ nɑ zɑm kɑ dɑmbɑnguize fɔ cɛɛ bɑ? À mɑ si ci dɑmbɑnguize.
46007019	Bɑngudɑmyom mɑnɑ ci hɛ fɔ. Zɑm kɑ dɑmbɑngu mo mɑnɑ ci hɛ fɔ. Ammɑ Ikpɛ meire yom gɑnɑyom yɑ ci hɛ kulu.
46007020	Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ goono, goonoyom kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ɑ̀ goono sɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ.
46007021	Ni yɑ tɑm nɑ bɑ sɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ n cɛɛ? N mɑ si nɑm n lɑɑkɑli mɑ tunu. Ammɑ de n hini kɑ ye bɔrɔcini n mɑ tu, ɑ̀ bisɑ.
46007022	Tɑm kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ Kpe kunɑ, ɑ̀ tɛ bɔrɔcini noyɑ. À tɛ Kpe ŋmɔne. Yɑ nɑ bɔrɔcini kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ Kpe kunɑ, ɑ̀ tɛ Mɛsiyɑ tɑm noyɑ.
46007023	Ǹ nɑ wom dei ndɑ fɑnsɑyom bɑmbɑtɑ. Wɑ si ci iburɑdɑm yom sɛ tɑm yom.
46007024	Nyɑizei, bɔrɔ fɔ fɔ kulu mo gɔrɔ Ikpɛ jine ndɑ goonoyom kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ɑ̀ goono sɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ.
46007025	Kɑ simbɑ ndɑ wɔ kɑ yom mɑnɑ hiji yɑ nɑ du mei Kpe dɔ. Ammɑ ɑ diyom kunɑ zɑ kɑ ɑ du suuji Kpe dɔ kɑ tɛ nɑɑnekpɛ, ɑ gɑ sendi.
46007026	Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ ɑ sɛ neyɑ. Lɔkɑci gɑɑbɔ yom kɑ ǹ goono mɑɑsɑ sɑbu sɛ, ɑ̀ boori bɔrɔ mɑ gɔrɔ yɑ di.
46007027	N gundɑ wɛndɛ bɑ? N mɑ si ceeci n mɑ ɑ̀ fee. N sindɑ wɛndɛ bɑ? N mɑ si wɛndɛ ceeci.
46007028	Ammɑ bɑ de n hiji n mɑnɑ dulum tɛ. Hundiyo kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hiji, de ɑ̀ hiji ɑ̀ mɑnɑ dulum tɛ. Ammɑ beerem kɑ ǹ hiji, ǹ kɑɑ tɑɑbi hɑm hɑndunyɑ gɔrɛ kunɑ. Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ go bɑɑ yɑ wom bɑkɑɑ.
46007029	Nyɑizei, ɑ gɑ wɔne cii mo. Lɔkɑci mɑnɑ ku. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ wɛndɛ ɑ̀ mɑ gɔrɔ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ.
46007030	Beerem kɑ ǹ go hɛ ǹ mɑ tɛ zɑngɑ ǹ si hɛ. Beerem kɑ ǹ go fɑihã, ǹ mɑ tɛ zɑngɑ ǹ si fɑihã. Beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ dei, ǹ mɑ tɛ zɑngɑ hɛ kɑ ǹ sindɑ.
46007031	Beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ gbei ndɑ hɑndunyɑ hɛ yom, ǹ mɑ tɛ zɑngɑ ǹ gɑ sɑɑle kɑɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Hɑndunyɑ wɔ tɑkɑri gɑ bisɑ.
46007032	Ammɑ ɑ gɑ bɑɑ wom mo goono kɑrihã si. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hiji, ngɑ wɔ sɑɑlu goono Kpe hɛ yom dɔ zɑngɑ dimi ngɑ mɑ kɑɑni Kpe sɛ.
46007033	Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hiji mo, hɑndunyɑ hɛ yom bɔm no ɑ̀ sɑɑlu goono zɑngɑ dimi ngɑ mɑ kɑɑni ngɑ wɛndɛ sɛ.
46007034	Fɑyɑnkɑ goono wɛndɛ ndɑ weibɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hiji gɑme. Weibɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hiji, ngɑ wɔ bine dɛcɛ Kpe hɛ yom dɔ, ngɑ mɑ tɛ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ zɑ gɑɑhɑm dɔ hɑli bine dɔ. Weibɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hiji mo hɑndunyɑ hɛ yom bɔm no ɑ̀ go bine dɛcɛ zɑngɑ dimi ngɑ mɑ kɑɑni ngɑ kunye sɛ.
46007035	A nɑ ngɑ di cii nɑ wom hɑnfɑni sɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci kɑ hirime tɛ wom sɛ. Ammɑ ɑ gɑ cii hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hegu wom sɛ, gbei kɑ wom gɑ tɛ Kpe sɛ, hɛ fɔ ŋmɑni mɑ si wom lɑɑkɑli zɑɑ.
46007036	Ammɑ de bɔrɔ fɔ lɑsɑbu hɛ kɑ ngɑ gɑ tɛ ngɑ koo hundiyo sɛ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hegu zɑmɑ hundiyɑ hije lɔkɑci bisɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ, bine kɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ɑ̀ hijɑndi. À mɑ tɛ hɛ kɑ ngɑ bɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci dulum tɛyom.
46007037	Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sinji ngɑ bine kunɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ndɑ tilɑsi kulu, ɑ̀ gundɑ hini ngɑ miilɑ bɔm. De ɑ̀ suubɑ ngɑ bine kunɑ ngɑ koo hundiyo si hiji, ɑkpɛ gɑ tɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ boori.
46007038	Yɑ no bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hijɑndi, ɑ̀ nɑ hɛ hinno tɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ hijɑndi mo ɑ̀ bisɑ.
46007039	Wɛndɛ goono no hɔɑntɛ sɑɑ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ kunye gɑ hunɑ. Ammɑ de kunyɑ bu, ɑ̀ hunu hije kɔrɔfɔ kunɑ noyɑ. À hini kɑ hiji bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑ, ɑmmɑ Kpe kunɑ hinne fɑ.
46007040	Ammɑ ɑ diyom kunɑ, ɑ̀ gundɑ bɑrikɑ de ɑ̀ gɔrɔ yɑ di. A tɑmmɑ hɛɛ mɑ bine, ɑ gundɑ Ikpɛ Biyɑ.
46008001	Kɑ simbɑ ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ gɑ gɑrɑndi tɛ tooru yom gɑɑ, i go bei i kulu gundɑ beire. Beire go kɑɑndɑ bɔmbɛɛrɛ ɑmmɑ bɑɑkɑsine cɛ gɑ nɑɑne cini.
46008002	De bɔrɔ fɔ go tɑmmɑ ngɑ gɑ hɛ fɔ bei no, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɛ fɔ kulu bei jinɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ himɑ ɑ̀ mɑ bei.
46008003	Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ Ikpɛ, ɑkpɛ wɔ Ikpɛ go kɑ ɑ̀ bei.
46008004	Kɑ simbɑ ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ gɑ gɑrɑndi tɑɑru yom gɑɑ hɑli bɔrɔ mɑ ǹ ŋmɑɑ nɑ? To. I go bei kɑ tooru mɑnɑ ci hɛ fɔ kulu hɑndunyɑ kunɑ. Ikpɛ ŋmɑni fɔ mɑ kulu si kɑlɑ ɑfɔlɔnku.
46008005	Bɑ kɑ ɑfɔ yom goono kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ ǹ cɛɛ ikpɛ yom hɑli bɛɛnɛ nɑ wɑlɑ gɑndɑ nɑ ikpɛ bɑɑbɑ ndɑ kpe boobo yɑ goono.
46008006	Ammɑ i yom wɔ i dɔ Ikpɛ fɔlɔnku yɑ goono. Ngɑ yɑ ci Bɑɑbɑ, hɛ kulu Tɑkɑkɔ. I yom mo, ɑ̀ ŋmɔne yom no. Kpe fɔlɔnku mo yɑ goono, ngɑ yɑ ci Yesu Mɛsiyɑ, wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ dɔ hɛ kulu goono. I yom mo, i go hunɑ ɑ̀ dɔ.
46008007	Ammɑ beire ngɑ di si ǹ kulu sɛ. Afɔ yom kɑ ǹ gundɑ lɑsɑbu tooru bɔm hɑli mɑɑsɑ ǹ gɑ hɑm yom ŋmɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ gɑrɑndi tɑɑru gɑɑ. Ǹ bine kunɑ sendi kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ gɑɑbi mo ǹ nɑ ǹ ziibɑndi.
46008008	À mɑnɑ ci ŋmɑɑri yɑ nɑm i mɑ mɑɑni Ikpɛ dɔ. De i nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑ, ɑ̀ si hɛ fɔ kulu tɔntɔnu i gɑɑ. De i mɑnɑ ŋmɑɑ, ɑ̀ si hɛ fɔ kulu zobu i gɑɑ.
46008009	Ammɑ wɑ lɑɑkɑli wom bɔrɔcinitɛrɛ wɔ mɑ si tɛ zɑngɑ dɛrɛyom hɛ hinɑbunu yom sɛ.
46008010	Zɑngɑ sendi, ni kɑ n gundɑ beire ngɑ di, n gɑ gɔrɔ tooru fuu ko ŋmɑɑ. Akpɛ bine kunɑ sendi kɑ ɑ̀ ci hinɑbunu, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ nɑ himmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ hɛ kɑ ǹ gɑrɑndi tɑɑru gɑɑ ŋmɑɑ bɑ?
46008011	Nyɑize hinɑbunu wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ Mɛsiyɑ bu, n beire go nɑm ɑ̀ mɑ bu.
46008012	Wom go dulum tɛ zɑngɑ yɑ nyɑize yom sɛ. Wom go kɑ ǹ bine kunɑ sendi kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ gɑɑbi mɛrɛ. Wom go dulum tɛ Mɛsiyɑ sɛ noyɑ.
46008013	A sɛ no, de ŋmɑɑri yɑ ci ɑ nyɑize sɛ dɛrɛyom hɛ, ɑ si hɑm ŋmɑɑ pɑi zɑmɑ yɑ si tɛ dɛrɛyom hɛ ɑ nyɑize sɛ.
46009001	Hɛɛ Pɔlu, hɛɛ wɔ diyɑ nɑ. Hɛɛ wɔ bɔrɔcini nɑ. À nɑ ci yɑ no bɑ? A di i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ. Wom mo, wom yɑ ci ɑ gbei Kpe kunɑ. À nɑ ci yɑ no bɑ?
46009002	Bɑ de cindei dɔ yɑ nɑ ci diyɑ, ɑ dee ci diyɑ wom dɔ zɑmɑ wom yɑ ci ɑ diyɑtɛrɛ sɛdɑ Kpe kunɑ.
46009003	Wɔne yɑ ci ɑ jinde kɑ ɑ deede beerem dɔ kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ ɑ hã.
46009004	À nɑ ci i gundɑ hini kɑ ŋmɑɑ kɑ hɑm bɑ?
46009005	À nɑ ci i gundɑ hini kɑ kpeindɑ i wɛndɛ gɑnɑkɔ i bɑndɑ zɑngɑ diyɑ cindei gɑ tɛ ndɑ Kpe nyɑize yom ndɑ Sefɑ?
46009006	Hɛɛ ndɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ hinne gɑɑ nɑ ɑ̀ tilɑsi bɑ, i mɑ gbei tɛ ndɑ kɑmbɛ?
46009007	Mee yɑ huro wɑnguizetɛrɛ ko kɑ ngɑ bɔm bɑnɑ? Mee yɑ lɛzɛ lɑmbu dɑm ɑ̀ si ɑ̀ liibɑ ŋmɑɑ? Wɑlɑ mee yɑ memunu gɑɑ kurum, ɑ̀ si woo hɑm?
46009008	A gɑ hɛ yom wɔ cii no zɑngɑ iburɑdɑm dee wɑlɑ Moisi fɔndɑ mo go kɑ ɑ̀ fɔlɔnku di cii bɑ?
46009009	Moisi fɔndɑ kunɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɑntum kɑ cii: "N mɑ si tɑkumkumɛ dɑm hɑu mee gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go mɔsɔngu kɑru". Ikpɛ go lɑɑkɑli ndɑ hɑu yom hinne bɑ?
46009010	Dɑhiri i sɑbu sɛ nɑ ɑ̀ go sendi. À nɑ ci yɑ nɑ bɑ? Oò, i sɛ no ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɑntum. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ fɑri, ɑ̀ mɑ fɑri ndɑ bɛɛjɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go heeni wi mo, ɑ̀ mɑ wi ndɑ bɛɛjɛ. À kɑɑ du ngɑ bɑ gbei gɑɑ ndɑ bɛɛjɛ.
46009011	De i nɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ bɑrikɑ dumɑ wom sɛ, hɛ fɔ beeri no bɑ hɑli wom mɑ i jɛrɛ?
46009012	De bɔrɔ fɔ yom gundɑ hini wom bɔm, ɑ̀ nɑ ci i gundɑ hini wom bɔm kɑ bisei? Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu i mɑnɑ gbei tɛ ndɑ hini wɔ ɑmmɑ i nɑ hɛ kulu jɛrɛ zɑmɑ i mɑ si kpɛsɛrɛ fɔ kulu dɑm Mɛsiyɑ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ sɛ.
46009013	Wom mɑnɑ bei kɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go gbei hɑlɑɑlɑ tɛ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ ǹ gɑ du ngei ŋmɑɑri Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom dɔ bɑ? Beerem kɑ ǹ go gbei tɛ gɑrɑndi bɑndɑ tɑndɑ dɔ mo, ǹ go du ngei bɑ gɑrɑndi bɑndɑ tɑndɑ dɔ. À nɑ ci cimi nɑ bɑ?
46009014	Yɑ mo no, Kpe nɑ fɔndɔ no beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ wɑɑzu tɛ, ǹ mɑ hunɑ ndɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzɑ.
46009015	Ammɑ hɛɛ wɔ yɑ nɑ hɛ nge yom di bɑ ɑfɔ dɛcɛ beerem bɔm. Bine, yɑ nɑ wɔne yom hɑntum zɑmɑ ǹ mɑ ǹ tɛ ɑ sɛ. Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ̀ sɑbɑ ɑ sɛ yɑ bu, ɑ̀ bisɑ yɑ di bɔrɔ mɑ ɑ fɑihã tɛ kɔnu.
46009016	De ɑ go Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu tɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci hɛ fɔ kɑ yɑ bɔmbɛɛrɛ tɛ ndɑ, zɑmɑ tilɑsi no Ikpɛ dɛcɛ ɑ sɛ. Kɑito mo no, de yɑ nɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu tɛ.
46009017	De ɑ binebɑɑ kunɑ no ɑ go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ dom, ɑ gundɑ tukunsi. Ammɑ de ɑ̀ tilɑsi ɑ gɑɑ no, ɑ go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ zɑmɑ Ikpɛ nɑ gbeiɑ tɑlifi ɑ gɑɑ.
46009018	Ifɔ yɑ ci ɑ tukunsi? Ngɑ yɑ ci yɑ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ wɑɑzu tɛ beerem sɛ, yɑ si bɑnɑndi hã zɑmɑ yɑ si gbei tɛ ndɑ hini kɑ ɑ gundɑ Bɑɑru Hinno kunɑ.
46009019	Bɑ kɑ hɛɛ yɑ bɔrɔcini no ǹ kulu dɔ, ɑ nɑ ɑ bɔm tɛ ǹ kulu bɑnyɑ zɑmɑ yɑ du bɔrɔ jɑmɑ kɑ tɔntɔnu.
46009020	Yuifu yom mo dɔ ɑ ye zɑngɑ Yuifu zɑmɑ yɑ du Yuifu yom. Beerem kɑ ǹ goono Moisi fɔndɑ cire mo dɔ ɑ tɛ no zɑngɑ ɑ goono Moisi fɔndɑ cire zɑmɑ yɑ du ngei mo kɑ ǹ goono Moisi fɔndɑ cire.
46009021	Beerem mo kɑ ǹ si Moisi fɔndɑ cire dɔ, ɑ tɛ zɑngɑ ɑ si Moisi fɔndɑ cire zɑmɑ yɑ du ngei mo kɑ ǹ si fɔndɑ cire. À mɑnɑ ci ɑ sindɑ Ikpɛ fɔndɑ nɑ bɑ ɑmmɑ Mɛsiyɑ fɔndɑ cire no ɑ goono.
46009022	A nɑ ɑ bɔm tɛ hinɑbunu, hinɑbunu yom sɛ zɑmɑ yɑ du hinɑbunu yom mo. A nɑ ɑ bɔm tɛ hɛ yom wɔ kulu, ǹ kulu sɛ zɑmɑ zɑngɑ nɑ kulu, yɑ du ɑfɔ yom kɑ fɑɑbɑ.
46009023	A go kɑ nge yom di tɛ no Bɑɑru Hinno sɑbu sɛ zɑmɑ yɑ du bɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ.
46009024	Beerem kɑ ǹ go jilɑm jilɑm tɛ, ǹ kulu go zuuru no ɑmmɑ bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku yɑ du tukunsi kɑ ǹ jisi zuure di ŋmɔne. Wom gɑ kɑ ngɑ di bei bɑ? Tɑ. Wɑ zuuru zɑngɑ kɑ wom mɑ du zuure tukunsi.
46009025	Gurujekɑri kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go guruje, kɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ hini dɛcɛ ngɑ bɔm. À gɑ ɑ̀ dɛcɛ no zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ du kpe fulɑ, kpe fulɑ kɑ ɑ̀ si jɛ. Ammɑ i yom i mɑ hini dɛcɛ kɑ du Kpe fulɑ kɑ ɑ̀ si fumbu.
46009026	Ngɑ di sɛ, hɛɛ wɔ ɑ gɑ zuuru mɑɑ sinjɑntɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ gɑ gɑɑrɛ gɑɑ. A gɑ dɛmbɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci kɑ hɛo kɑru.
46009027	Ammɑ ɑ gɑɑhɑm nɑ ɑ gɑ tɑɑbɑndi kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm zɑngɑ tɑm hɑli bɑ de ɑ nɑ bɑɑru fɛɛ beerem sɛ, Ikpɛ mɑ si ɑ bumbum furu.
46010001	A nyɑizei, ɑ si bɑɑ wom mɑ zɑm kɑ bei kɑ i cɛɛ yom kulu dirɑ no buru cire hɑli ǹ kulu nɑ tɛku dem.
46010002	Ǹ kulu mɑ du mirɑndiyom Moisi kunɑ buru ndɑ tɛku dɔ.
46010003	Ǹ kulu mo yɑ nɑ ŋmɑɑri dimi fɔlɔnku ŋmɑɑ, ŋmɑɑri kɑ ɑ̀ hunu Ikpɛ dɔ.
46010004	Ǹ kulu mo yɑ nɑ hɑri dimi fɔ hɑm, hɑri kɑ ɑ̀ hunu Ikpɛ dɔ. Tondi beeri kɑ ɑ̀ hunu Ikpɛ dɔ, ɑ̀ goono ǹ bɑndɑ. Hɑri wɔ gɑɑ no ǹ kulu go hɑm. Tondi beerɑ mo yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ.
46010005	Ammɑ Ikpɛ bine mɑnɑ yee ndɑ ǹ bɑ yom. À sɛ no, ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ bukɔ yom seesee gɑnji kunɑ.
46010006	Hɛ yom wɔ kulu bine tɛ i sɛ deedɑndi kɑ i mɑ si du kɑ gundɑ guuri lɑlɔ yom zɑngɑ ngei.
46010007	Wɑ si tɛ tooru gɑnɑkɔ yom zɑngɑ ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ yom, zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Jɑmɑ gɔrɔ kɑ ŋmɑɑ kɑ hɑm. Ǹ tunu mo kɑ hooru."
46010008	I mɑ si zinɑ mo zɑngɑ ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ yom zinɑ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ tɔ bɔrɔ dubu wɑrɑnkɑ cindi hinzɑ bu zɑɑri fɔ.
46010009	I mɑ si Mɛsiyɑ bubure zɑngɑ ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ yom nɑ ɑ̀ bubure. Gondi yom no ǹ hɑlɑci.
46010010	Wɑ si gunugunu zɑngɑ ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ yom gunugunu. Hɑlɑcikpɛ nɑ ǹ hɑlɑci.
46010011	Hɛ wɔ kulu tɛ ǹ sɛ kɑ tɛ i sɛ deedɑndi. Ǹ nɑ ǹ hɑntum mo kɑ i kɑɑbɑɑru, i yom kɑ zɑmɑni yom beeniyom tɔ i gɑɑ.
46010012	Yɑ no bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ tɑmmɑ cɛɑntɛ no ngɑ goono, ɑ̀ mo lɑɑkɑli ɑ̀ mɑ si kɑm.
46010013	Suiyom fɔ kulu mɑnɑ kɑɑ wom gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci iburɑdɑm suiyom. Ammɑ Ikpɛ yɑ nɑɑnekpɛ no. À si tu wom mɑ du suiyom kɑ wom si hini kɑ jɛrɛ. Ammɑ kɑ suiyom kɑɑ wom gɑɑ, Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ fɑɑbɑ fɔndɔ tɛ wom sɛ wom mɑ du kɑ hinɑ̀.
46010014	À sɛ no ɑ bine bɑɑkɔei, wɑ zuuru tooru gɑnɑyom sɛ.
46010015	Fɑhɑmkpɛ yom sɛ no ɑ go sendi. Wom bumbum, wɑ lɑsɑbu wom binei dɔ hɛ kɑ ɑ gɑ cii.
46010016	Gulɑize fɔ hɑri bɑrikɑkpɛ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ i gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu, ngɑ yɑ ci meiguyom ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ kuri. Buuru kɑ i go zenji zenji yɑ ci meiguyom ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ gɑɑhɑm. À nɑ ci cimi nɑ bɑ?
46010017	Buuru fɔlɔnku yɑ goono bɑ kɑ i bɔrɔ jɑmɑ nɑ. I ci gɑɑhɑm fɔlɔnku zɑmɑ buuru fɔlɔnku gɑɑ nɑ, i kulu meigu kɑ ŋmɑɑ.
46010018	Wom mɑ Isirɑilɑ jɑmɑ gunɑ. Beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ gɑrɑndi hɛ yom ŋmɑɑ, ǹ gɑ meigu noyɑ ndɑ gɑrɑndi bɑndɑ tɑndɑ. À nɑ ci cimi nɑ bɑ?
46010019	Yɑ di gɑɑ, ifɔ nɑ ɑ gɑ cii yɑ? Tooru bumbum go ci hɛ fɔ? Hɛ kɑ ǹ gɑrɑndi tooru gɑɑ, ɑ̀ go ci hɛ fɔ? Awo.
46010020	Ammɑ hɛ yom kɑ dimi cindei go gɑrɑndi ǹ go kɑ ǹ tɛ no hɔllɛ yom gɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Ikpɛ gɑɑ. A bine si bɑɑ wom mɑ meigu ndɑ hɔllɛ yom.
46010021	Wom si hini kɑ Kpe gulɑize hɑri hɑm kɑ hɔllɛ yom mo gulɑize hɑri hɑm. Wom si hini kɑ Kpe ŋmɑɑri ŋmɑɑ kɑ hɔllɛ yom ŋmɑɑri mo ŋmɑɑ.
46010022	I mɑ Kpe dɑm ɑ̀ mɑ cɛnsɛ no? I gundɑ gɑɑbi ndɑ Kpe nɑ?
46010023	Hɛ kulu ci ɑ sɛ hɑlɑli ɑmmɑ hɛ kulu sindɑ hɑnfɑni. Hɛ kulu ci ɑ sɛ hɑlɑli, ɑmmɑ hɛ kulu si nɑɑne cini.
46010024	Bɔrɔ kulu mɑ si ngɑ bɔm cine tɛ kɑlɑ bɔrɔ fɔ cine.
46010025	Hɛ kulu kɑ ǹ go neerɑ fɑwɑ tɑndɑ, wom mɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑ. Wɑ si wom bɔm hã hɛ fɔ kulu, wom bine kunɑ sendi sɑbu sɛ.
46010026	Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Kpe ŋmɔne no hɑndunyɑ ndɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono ɑ̀ bɔm".
46010027	De zɑm kɑ nɑɑne bɔrɔ yom kunɑ ɑfɔ nɑ wom cɛɛ ndɑ ŋmɑɑri ngɑ no wom yɔɔdɑ kɑ kpei. Hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑndɑ wom sɛ, wom mɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑ. Wɑ si hãyom fɔ kulu tɛ, wom bine kunɑ sendi sɑbu sɛ.
46010028	Ammɑ zɑngɑ sendi, bɔrɔ fɔ cii wom sɛ, hɛ wɔ tɑɑru gɑɑ nɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ gɑrɑndi. Wom mɑ si ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑ bɔrɔ di kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ wom kɑɑbɑɑru sɑbu sɛ ndɑ bine kunɑ sendi sɑbu sɛ domi "Kpe ŋmɔne no hɑndunyɑ ndɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono ɑ̀ bɔm".
46010029	Bine kunɑ sendi wɔ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci n ŋmɔne di bɑ ɑmmɑ bɔrɔ fɔ ŋmɑni ŋmɔne. Ifɔ sɛ nɑ ǹ gɑ ɑ bɔrɔcinitɛrɛ neesi bɔrɔ fɔ bine kunɑ sendi bɔm?
46010030	Ammɑ de ɑ gɑ ŋmɑɑ ndɑ sɑɑbuyom ifɔ sɛ nɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ yɑnce hɛ fɔ kɑ ɑ gɑ sɑɑbu me?
46010031	Ngɑ di sɛ, de wom go ŋmɑɑ nɑ, de wom gɑ hɑm no, de hɛ fɔ no wom go tɛ, wɑ ɑ̀ kulu tɛ Kpe deizɑ sɛ.
46010032	Wɑ si tɛ dɛrɛyom sɑbɑbu Yuifu yom sɛ wɑlɑ dimi cindei sɛ wɑlɑ Ikpɛ mɑrgɑ sɛ.
46010033	Zɑngɑ hɛɛ mɑ, hɛ kulu kunɑ ɑ gɑ wetere yɑ kɑɑni ǹ kulu sɛ. A si kɑ ɑ bɔm nɑfɑ ceeci kɑlɑ jɑmɑ nɑfɑ zɑmɑ ǹ mɑ du fɑɑbɑ.
46011001	Wɑ tɛ ɑ dendenikɔ yom zɑngɑ hɛɛ mo, ɑ go ci Mɛsiyɑ dendenikɔ.
46011002	Ammɑ nyɑizei, ɑ go wom sɑɑbu ndɑ kɑ wom go hɔngɔ hɛɛ hɛ kulu kunɑ. Wom go lɑɑkɑli mo ndɑ ɑ cɛbɛ yom cɑu cɑu kɑ ɑ nɑ wom cooɑndi.
46011003	Ammɑ ɑ go bɑɑ wom mɑ wɔne yom bei. Mɛsiyɑ yɑ ci hɑibɔrɔ kulu bɔm. Hɑibɔrɔ mo yɑ ci weibɔrɔ bɔm. Ikpɛ mo yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ bɔm.
46011004	Hɑibɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ wɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ ndɑ fulɑ bɔm gɑɑ, ɑ̀ si bɛɛrɛ tɛ ngɑ Kpe sɛ.
46011005	Weibɔrɔ mo kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ wɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ, ɑ̀ bɔm si dɑɑbɑntɛ, ɑ̀ si bɛɛrɛ tɛ ngɑ kpe sɛ. Ngɑ ndɑ weibɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cobu korokoro, ǹ kulu ɑfɔ nɑ.
46011006	De weibɔrɔ mɑnɑ ngɑ bɔm dɑɑbu, ɑ̀ mɑ ngɑ bɔm hɑmini dumbu. De bine hɑwi no weibɔrɔ mɑ ngɑ bɔm hɑmini dumbu wɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ cobu korokoro ɑ̀ mo ngɑ bɔm dɑɑbu.
46011007	Cimi nɑ, hɑibɔrɔ mɑnɑ himɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ngɑ bɔm dɑɑbu zɑ kɑ hɑibɔrɔ yɑ ci Ikpɛ himɑndi ndɑ Ikpɛ deizɑ. Ammɑ weibɔrɔ wɔ, hɑibɔrɔ deizɑ nɑ.
46011008	Ǹ mɑnɑ hɑibɔrɔ kɑɑ weibɔrɔ gɑɑ, ɑmmɑ ǹ nɑ weibɔrɔ kɑɑ hɑibɔrɔ gɑɑ.
46011009	Bine mo, Ikpɛ mɑnɑ hɑibɔrɔ tɑkɑ weibɔrɔ sɑbu sɛ. Weibɔrɔ no Ikpɛ tɑkɑ hɑibɔrɔ sɑbu sɛ.
46011010	À sɛ no, Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom sɑbu sɛ ɑ̀ himɑ weibɔrɔ mɑ gundɑ hini sɛdɑ ngɑ bɔm gɑɑ.
46011011	Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu Kpe kunɑ weibɔrɔ si bɑrɑ hɑibɔrɔ bɑ si. Hɑibɔrɔ mɑ si bɑrɑ weibɔrɔ bɑ si.
46011012	Zɑngɑ ǹ nɑ weibɔrɔ kɑɑ hɑibɔrɔ gɑɑ, yɑ nɑ weibɔrɔ go hɑibɔrɔ hɛi. Ammɑ ǹ kulu Ikpɛ dɔ no ǹ go hunu.
46011013	Wom mo, wɑ gunɑ wom bine yom dɔ, ɑ̀ himɑ weibɔrɔ mɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ Ikpɛ gɑɑ de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ngɑ bɔm dɑɑbu?
46011014	Iburɑdɑm hɑɑli gɑ wom cɛbɛ kɑ de hɑibɔrɔ bɔm hɑmini ku, hɑwi hɛ nɑ. À nɑ ci yɑ nɑ bɑ?
46011015	Ammɑ de weibɔrɔ bɔm hɑmini ku deizɑ nɑ ngɑ wɔ sɛ zɑmɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ no bɔm hɑmini nɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ bɔm dɑɑbuyom hɛ.
46011016	Ammɑ de bɔrɔ fɔ tunu ndɑ kɑkɔ wɔne bɔm zɑ i yom hɑli Ikpɛ mɑrgɑ yom, i sindɑ ɑlɑɑdɑ ŋmɑni fɔ.
46011017	Ammɑ kɑ ɑ go wom dɑm wɔne ɑ si wom sɑɑbu. Ngɑ yɑ ci kɑ wom cini cɛrɛ meigu, ɑ̀ no ci ndɑ hɑnfɑni fɔ kulu kɑlɑ wom bɔm zeeriyom.
46011018	Sintine jinɑ, ɑ mɑɑ ǹ go cii feefee goono wom gɑme sɑɑ kɑ wom nɑ cɛrɛ meigu Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ fuu ɑmmɑ yɑ nɑ tu sã sã.
46011019	Kɑlɑ de godo yom mɑ tɛ wom kunɑ. Sɑɑ di gɑɑ beerem kɑ ǹ ci nɑɑnekpɛ yom wom kunɑ ǹ mɑ du kɑ hunutɛrɛ.
46011020	Yɑ di gɑɑ, sɑɑ kɑ wom nɑ cɛrɛ meigu nungu fɔlɔnku, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Kpe ŋmɑɑri ŋmɑɑyom sɛ nɑ.
46011021	Sɑɑ kɑ wom gɑ ŋmɑɑ kulu bɔrɔ kulu bɑ ŋmɑɑri kuriyo no. Bɔrɔ fɔ mɑnɑ kungu. Bɔrɔ fɔ mo hɑm kɑ bugu.
46011022	À nɑ ci wom gundɑ fuu yom bɑ nungu kɑ wom mɑ gɔrɔ kɑ ŋmɑɑ kɑ hɑm? Wɑlɑ wom go dondɑ Ikpɛ mɑrgɑ nɑ? Beerem kɑ ǹ sindɑ hɛ fɔ, ngei no wom go hɑwɑndi bɑ? Ifɔ ɑ bɑ cii wom sɛ? Yɑ wom sɑɑbu no? Wɔne wɔ kunɑ, ɑ si wom sɑɑbu.
46011023	Hɛ kɑ ɑ du Kpe dɔ, ngɑ no ɑ nɑ wom cooɑndi ndɑ yɑ. Ngɑ yɑ ci ciini kɑ ǹ nɑ Kpe Yesu dɑm kɑmbɛ, ɑ̀ nɑ buuru zɑɑ.
46011024	À sɑɑbu, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ zenji zenji kɑ cii: Wɔne yɑ ci ɑ gɑɑhɑm kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ pɑti pɑti wom sɑbu sɛ. Wom mɑ wɔne tɛ kɑ hɔngɔ hɛɛ.
46011025	Yɑ no, ɑ̀ no gulɑize fɔ hɑri mo zɑɑ ŋmɑɑrɑ bɑndɑ. À cii: Gulɑize fɔ hɑri wɔ yɑ ci ɑ kuri, ɑlikɑwɑli teji tɛyom ŋmɔne. Sɑɑ kulu kɑ wom go kɑ ɑ̀ hɑm wom mɑ wɔne tɛ kɑ hɔngɔ hɛɛ.
46011026	Sɑɑ kulu kɑ wom go buuru wɔ ŋmɑɑ kɑ gulɑize fɔ hɑri wɔ hɑm, wom go Kpe buyom wɑɑzu tɛ noyɑ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑ.
46011027	À sɛ no, bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go buuru wɔ ŋmɑɑ wɑlɑ ɑ̀ go gulɑize fɔ hɑri wɔ hɑm zɑm kɑ tɔ kunɑ, ɑkpɛ tɛ tɑɑliteeri Kpe gɑɑhɑm ndɑ ɑ̀ kuri dɔ.
46011028	Ngɑ di sɛ bɔrɔ kulu mɑ ngɑ bɔm neesi kɑ du kɑ buuru ŋmɑɑ kɑ gulɑize hɑri di mɑ hɑm.
46011029	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go buurɑ ŋmɑɑ ko hɑri di hɑm zɑm kɑ tɔ kunɑ ɑ̀ si Kpe gɑɑhɑm fɑyɑnkɑ. À gɑɑ nɑ ɑkpɛ gɑ ciiti dɛcɛ ngɑ bɔm ŋmɑɑ ndɑ hɑm wɔ kunɑ.
46011030	À sɛ no, wom kunɑ ɑfɔ yom tɛ hinɑbunu yom. Afɔ yom tɛ doorikom yom. Iboobo mo jiibi.
46011031	Ammɑ de i nɑ i bɔm neesi, Ikpɛ si i ciiti.
46011032	Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ gɑ i ciiti, ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ i dɑm fɔndɔ noyɑ zɑmɑ ǹ mɑ si i meigu ndɑ hɑndunyɑ kɑ i ciiti kɑ zeeri.
46011033	Yɑ di gɑɑ ɑ nyɑizei, sɑɑ kɑ wom go cɛrɛ meigu ko ŋmɑɑ, wom mɑ cɛrɛ bɑtu.
46011034	De bɔrɔ fɔ gɑ mɑɑ hɛrɛɛ ɑ̀ mɑ ŋmɑɑ zɑ ngɑ kpɑɑrɑ zɑmɑ wom mɑ si cɛrɛ meigu ǹ mɑ wom ciiti. Kɑ simbɑ ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ cindi mo, ɑ gɑ ǹ sɑsɑbɑndi sɑɑ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ.
46012001	Mɑɑsɑ nyɑizei, Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ noyom neyɑ. A si bɑɑ wom mɑ goono zɑm kɑ bei kunɑ.
46012002	Wom go bei sɑɑ kɑ wom gɔrɔ kɑ ci dimi cindei, ǹ nɑ wom dɛrɑndi ndɑ tɑɑru lutu yom gɑnɑyom.
46012003	À sɛ no, ɑ go bɑɑ wom mɑ bei bɔrɔ kulu kɑ Ikpɛ Biyɑ gɑ sendi ndɑ ɑ̀ bine, ɑ̀ si cii Ikpɛ mɑ lɑɑli Yesu. Bɔrɔ mee si hini kɑ cii mɑ Yesu yɑ ci Kpe de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ yɑ sendi ndɑ ɑ̀ bine.
46012004	Ikpɛ noyom ŋmɑni ŋmɑni goono iboobo. Ammɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ fɔlɔnku nɑ.
46012005	Ikpɛ gbei ŋmɑni ŋmɑni goono ɑmmɑ Kpe fɔlɔnku no.
46012006	Tɛyom ŋmɑni ŋmɑni goono ɑmmɑ Ikpɛ fɔlɔnku nɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hɛ kulu tɛ beerem kulu kunɑ.
46012007	Bɔrɔ fɔ fɔ kulu sɛ nɑ Ikpɛ Biyɑ nɑ noyom no ǹ mɑ ngɑ kɑɑtɛrɛ bɔrɔ kulu hɑnfɑni sɛ.
46012008	Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ nɑ bɔrɔ fɔ du hɑikusutɛrɛ sendi. Bɔrɔ fɔ mo du beire sendi Biyɑ fɔlɔnku dɔ.
46012009	Bɔrɔ fɔ mo du nɑɑne Biyɑ fɔlɔnku dɔ. Afɔ mo du bɑɑni noyom dɑbɑri Biyɑ fɔlɔnku dɔ.
46012010	Bɔrɔ fɔ mɑ du gbei dɑbɑri tɛyom. Afɔ mo du ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛyom. Afɔ mo du biyɑ yom fɑyɑnkɑyom. Afɔ mo du cinɛ ŋmɑni ŋmɑni yom. Afɔ mo du cinɛ yɑɑrɑyom.
46012011	Ammɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ fɔlɔnkuɑ yɑ go hɛ yom wɔ kulu tɛ. À go kɑ ǹ fɑrisi zɑngɑ ɑ̀ gɑ bɑɑ, bɔrɔ kulu ndɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɔne.
46012012	Zɑngɑ gɑɑhɑm fɔlɔnku gundɑ dɔbu boobo, ɑmmɑ gɑɑhɑm dɔbu yom kulu zɑngɑ ǹ bɑ kulu, gɑɑhɑm fɔlɔnku dee nɑ. Yɑ nɑ Mɛsiyɑ mo.
46012013	I yom mo, ǹ nɑ i mirɑndi ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ fɔlɔnku kɑ tɛ gɑɑhɑm fɔlɔnku. Zɑ Yuifu yom, zɑ dimi cindei, zɑ tɑm yom zɑ bɔrɔcini yom, ǹ nɑ i kulu hɑngɑndi Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ fɔlɔnku gɑɑ.
46012014	Gɑɑhɑm mɑnɑ ci dɔbu fɔlɔnku ɑmmɑ dɔbu bɑɑbɑ.
46012015	De cee cii: Zɑ kɑ yɑ nɑ ci kɑmbɛ, ɑ mɑnɑ ci gɑɑhɑm ŋmɔne. Ngɑ di yɑ nɑm ɑ̀ mɑ si ci gɑɑhɑm ŋmɔne dee?
46012016	De hɑngɑ cii: Hɛɛ wɔ, zɑ kɑ yɑ nɑ ci mɑɑ, ɑ mɑnɑ ci gɑɑhɑm ŋmɔne. Ngɑ di yɑ nɑm ɑ̀ mɑ si ci gɑɑhɑm ŋmɔne dee?
46012017	De gɑɑhɑm mee ndɑ mee kulu ci moo, mɑni hɑngɑ kɑ mɑɑ? De ɑ̀ kulu ci hɑngɑ, mɑni nune kɑ mɑni?
46012018	Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ Ikpɛ nɑ dɔbu fɔ fɔ kulu dɑm gɑɑhɑm kunɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ gɑ bɑɑ.
46012019	De bine ǹ kulu tɛ dɔbu fɔlɔnku, dom mɑni gɑɑhɑm?
46012020	Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ cimi no dɔbuei bɑ, ɑmmɑ gɑɑhɑm fɔlɔnku no.
46012021	Moo si hini kɑ cii kɑmbɛ sɛ: A sindɑ n murɑdu. Yɑ no bɔm si hini kɑ cii cee yom sɛ: A sindɑ wom murɑdu.
46012022	Yɑ nɑ gɑɑhɑm dɔbu fɔ yom kɑ ǹ hinɑbune kɑlɑ kɑlɑ, ǹ gundɑ nɑfɑ.
46012023	Yɑ no i gɑɑhɑmei bumbum dɔbu fɔ yom kɑ i lɑsɑbu ǹ sindɑ bɛɛrɛ, i go kɑ ǹ kɑimɑ kɑ bisɑ cindei. I dɔbu yom mo kɑ ǹ dɔbutɛrɛ mɑnɑ sɑbɑ moo gɑɑ, i gɑ kɑ ǹ booriɑndi.
46012024	I dɔbu yom mo kɑ ǹ dɔbutɛrɛ sɑbɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ, ngei wɔ si bɑɑ booriɑndiyom. Ammɑ Ikpɛ nɑ gɑɑhɑm tɛ nɑ kɑ bɛɛrɛ bɑmbɑtɑ no dɔbu yom sɛ kɑ ǹ zɑm bɛɛrɛ.
46012025	Feefee mɑ si tɛ gɑɑhɑm kunɑ ɑmmɑ dɔbuei mɑ cɛrɛ kɑimɑ, bɑɑbɑɑ si.
46012026	De dɔbu fɔ gɑ tɑɑbi, dɔbuei kulu gɑ meigu kɑ tɑɑbi ndɑ. De dɔbu fɔ du binekɑɑne, dɔbuei kulu go meigu kɑ fɑihã ndɑ.
46012027	Wom yɑ Mɛsiyɑ gɑɑhɑm no. Wom yɑ ɑ̀ dɔbu yom no, bɔrɔ kulu ndɑ ɑ̀ dɔ.
46012028	Ikpɛ nɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom dɑm Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ kunɑ. Sintine ɑ̀ nɑ diyɑ yom dɑm. Ihinkɑntɛ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑndebi yom dɑm. Ihinzɑntɛ ɑ̀ nɑ cɛbɛkɔ yom dɑm. À bɑndɑ ɑ̀ nɑ dɑbɑri gbei tɛkɔ yom dɑm, cɔfɔ bɑɑni nokɔ yom. À nɑ gɑɑkɑsineteeri yom ndɑ jinɑ yom dɑm ndɑ cinɛ ŋmɑni ŋmɑni sendikɔ yom.
46012029	Ǹ kulu diyɑ yom no bɑ? Ǹ kulu ɑndebi yom no bɑ? Ǹ kulu cɛbɛkɔ yom no bɑ? Ǹ kulu dɑbɑri gbei tɛkɔ yom no bɑ?
46012030	Ǹ kulu gundɑ bɑɑni noyom bɑ? Ǹ kulu go cinɛ ŋmɑni yom sendi bɑ? Ǹ kulu go cinɛ yɑɑrɑ bɑ?
46012031	Wom mɑ guuri kɑlɑ kɑlɑ Ikpɛ noyom kɑ ǹ boori ndɑ ǹ kulu. Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ go wom cɛbɛ fɔndɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ ǹ kulu.
46013001	Bɑ de ɑ go sendi iburɑdɑm cinɛ yom kunɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom cinɛ yom kunɑ, ɑmmɑ ɑ sindɑ bɑɑkɑsine hɛɛ yɑ ci zɑngɑ kɑnkɑm kɔgɔ kɑ ǹ go gumgure. Hɛɛ yɑ ci zɑngɑ guuru yom kɑ ǹ gɑ sɑm cɛrɛ gɑɑ.
46013002	Bɑ de ɑ gundɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ noyom hɑli yɑ fɑhɑm ndɑ duje kulu ndɑ beire kulu ɑmmɑ ɑ sindɑ bɑɑkɑsine, yɑ nɑ ci hɛ fɔ. Bɑ de ɑ gundɑ nɑɑne kulu mɑ hɑli ɑ hini kɑ tondi kuku yom gɑnɑndi ɑmmɑ ɑ sindɑ bɑɑkɑsine, yɑ nɑ ci hɛ fɔ.
46013003	Bɑ de ɑ nɑ ɑ hɑibɑrikɑ yom kulu fɑrisi tɑlikɑ yom sɛ, de ɑ gɑ kɑ ɑ gɑɑhɑm nɑ ǹ mɑ tɔnu, ɑmmɑ ɑ sindɑ bɑɑkɑsine, ǹ kulu kɔnu nɑ ɑ sɛ.
46013004	Bɑɑkɑsine gundɑ suuru kuku. À tɔ mo ndɑ bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ. Bɑɑkɑsine si cɛnsɛ. Bɑɑkɑsine si fɑɑre. À si bɔmbɛɛrɛ tɛ mɑ.
46013005	Bɑɑkɑsine si tɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ si hegu. Bɑɑkɑsine si ngɑ bɔm nɑfɑ ceeci. Bɑɑkɑsine sindɑ binewɑɑse. À si ilɑlɔ lɑsɑbu.
46013006	Bɑɑkɑsine si fɑihã ndɑ zɑm kɑ cɛsusu, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ fɑihã ndɑ cimi.
46013007	Bɑɑkɑsine gɑ bɑndɑdɑɑbe tɛ hɛ kulu kunɑ. À go nɑɑne hɛ kulu. Bɑɑkɑsine gɑ bɛɛjɛ hɛ kulu sɛ. À go bine nɑɑni ndɑ hɛ kulu.
46013008	Bɑɑkɑsine si gɑziɑ pɑi. Ammɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ gundɑ ngɑ mee. Cinɛ yom kɑɑ beeni. Beire mo gundɑ ngɑ mee.
46013009	Jɛrɛ fɔ no, i go bei. Jɛrɛ mo no i go ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ ndɑ.
46013010	Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ kɑɑ, ɑ̀ gɑɑ no hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci jɛrɛ di kulu kɑɑ tɔ ngɑ mee.
46013011	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ goono icɛnɑ, ɑ cini sendi no zɑngɑ koo cɛnɑ. A cini lɑsɑbu no zɑngɑ koo cɛnɑ. A meecine goono no zɑngɑ koo cɛnɑ. Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ tɔ ɑ bɔm bɔrɔ ɑ beeni ndɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci koo cɛnɑ ŋmɔne yom.
46013012	Mɑɑsɑ i gɑ hɛ fɔ gunɑ zɑngɑ diji kunɑ. I go di ɑ̀ kunɑ ɑ̀ go himɑ tɑkɑri bibi fɔ ɑmmɑ lɔkɑci ngɑ di i kɑɑ di ɑ̀ moo ndɑ moo. Mɑɑsɑ ɑ go jɛrɛ bei, ɑmmɑ lɔkɑci ngɑ di ɑ kɑɑ bei zɑngɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ bei.
46013013	Mɑɑsɑ bine hɛ hinzɑ wɔ goono, nɑɑne ndɑ bɛɛjɛ ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine. Ammɑ ǹ kulu kunɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ yɑ ci bɑɑkɑsine.
46014001	Wɑ bɑɑkɑsine hɑmine. Wɑ guuri Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ noyom ndɑ himmɑ, hɑli yɑ mo ɑndebitɛrɛ.
46014002	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go sendi ndɑ cinɛ ŋmɑni ɑ̀ si sendi iburɑdɑm yom sɛ ɑmmɑ Ikpɛ sɛ. Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu si fɑhɑm ndɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ cii, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ go duje yom cii Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ gɑɑ.
46014003	Ammɑ bɔrɔ cɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ, iburɑdɑm yom sɛ no ɑ̀ go sendi kɑ ǹ nɑɑne cini. À go kɑ ǹ nɑ himmɑ kɑ ǹ yɑmɑrɑndi.
46014004	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ sendi ndɑ cinɛ ŋmɑni, ɑ̀ bɔm nɑɑne no ɑ̀ go cini. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ, Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ nɑɑne nɑ ɑ̀ go cini.
46014005	A go bɑɑ ihinno wom kulu, wom mo sendi ndɑ cinɛ ŋmɑni yom. Ammɑ yɑ mɑ ɑ gɑ bɑɑ wom mɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ, ɑ̀ bisɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ sendi ndɑ cinɛ ŋmɑni yom de ɑkpɛ si cinɛ yɑɑrɑ hɑli Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ nɑɑne mɑ cini.
46014006	Nyɑizei, mɑɑsɑ de ɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ ko sendi ndɑ cinɛ ŋmɑni yom, hɑnfɑni fɔ nɑ ɑ tɛ wom sɛ? A si hɑnfɑni tɛ wom sɛ de ɑ si sendi hɛ kɑ Ikpɛ kɑɑtɛrɛ bɔm. A si hɑnfɑni tɛ wom sɛ kɑlɑ de ɑ go sendi ndɑ beire wɑlɑ ɑ go ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ wɑlɑ ɑ gɑ cooɑndi.
46014007	Bɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ sindɑ hundi gundɑ jinde, zɑngɑ gɑsiɑ ndɑ mɔlɔ. De ɑ̀ si hɛ kɑ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ jinde bei, mɛtɛ bɔrɔ tɛ kɑ bei hɛ kɑ ǹ go kɑru gɑsiɑ gɑɑ wɑlɑ mɔlɔ gɑɑ?
46014008	De wɑngu hɛrɛɛ jinde diibi, mee yɑ wɑngu sɔlu?
46014009	Yɑ no wom mo. De wom go sendi ndɑ cinɛ kɑ beerem si fɑhɑm, mɛtɛ bɔrɔ tɛ kɑ fɑhɑm ndɑ hɛ kɑ wom go cii? Kɔnu sɛ no wom go sendi.
46014010	Bɑ kɑ cinɛ ŋmɑni ŋmɑni boobo goono hɑndunyɑ kunɑ, ɑfɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ zɑm feeriji.
46014011	Ngɑ di sɛ, de ɑ si fɑhɑm ndɑ cinɛ ɑ himɑ zɑngɑ ɑnne, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go sendi sɛ. Ngɑ mo kɑ ɑ̀ go sendi, ɑnne no ɑ̀ himɑ ɑ sɛ.
46014012	Yɑ no wom mo. Zɑ kɑ wom go guuri Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ noyom ndɑ himmɑ, wɑ ceeci ndɑ bɑyom wɔ kɑ yom go Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ nɑɑne cini.
46014013	À sɛ no bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ sendi ndɑ cinɛ ŋmɑni, ɑ̀ mɑ Ikpɛ ŋmɑɑrɛ ngɑ mɑ du kɑ cinɛ yɑɑrɑ.
46014014	De ɑ go kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ ndɑ cinɛ ŋmɑni, ɑ biyɑ yɑ go kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ ɑmmɑ ɑ fɑhɑm sindɑ bɑrikɑ.
46014015	Yɑ di gɑɑ mɛtɛ ɑ tɛ? Biyɑ kunɑ no ɑ gɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ ɑmmɑ ɑ gɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ ndɑ ɑ fɑhɑm mo. A kɑɑ betu tɛ Biyɑ kunɑ. A kɑɑ betu tɛ mo ndɑ fɑhɑm.
46014016	Zɑngɑ sendi sɑɑ kɑ n go sɑɑbu biyɑ kunɑ, bɔrɔ fɔ goono kɑ ɑ̀ si ŋmɑɑni. À si fɑhɑm hɛ kɑ n go cii. Mɛtɛ ɑ̀ tɛ kɑ tu ɑmi sɑɑ kɑ n go sɑɑbu?
46014017	Ni, cimi no n go sɑɑbu ihinno ɑmmɑ hɑngɑ dɑmkɔ nɑɑne si cini.
46014018	A gɑ kɑ ɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ sɑɑbu kɑ ɑ gɑ sendi ndɑ cinɛ ŋmɑni ŋmɑni kɑ bisɑ wom kulu.
46014019	Ammɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ kunɑ ɑ bɑɑ yɑ sendi gu cii ndɑ ɑ fɑhɑm kɑ cindei fɑhɑmɑndi. Ngɑ di bisɑ yɑ sendi dubu wei cii cinɛ ŋmɑni ŋmɑni kunɑ.
46014020	Nyɑizei, wom lɑsɑbu yom kunɑ, wɑ si tɛ koo cɛnɑ yom. Ammɑ cɛmbɛrɛ cɛmbɛrɛ dɔ hɛrɛ, wɑ tɛ koo cɛnɑ yom. Wom lɑsɑbu yom kunɑ wɑ tɛ hinje wɑrɑnzɑkpɛ yom.
46014021	"Moisi fɔndɑ kunɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɑntum kɑ Ikpɛ cii: A kɑɑ sendi jɑmɑ wɔ sɛ ndɑ cinɛ ŋmɑni ŋmɑni yom A kɑɑ sendi ǹ sɛ yo yom mee gɑɑ. Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu, ǹ si bɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ sɛ."
46014022	Yɑ di gɑɑ, cinɛ ŋmɑni ŋmɑni yɑ ɑlɑmu nɑ. À nɑ ci nɑɑnekɔ yom sɛ ɑmmɑ zɑm kɑ nɑɑnekɔ yom sɛ. Andebitɛrɛ mo ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci zɑm kɑ nɑɑnekɔ yom sɛ ɑmmɑ nɑɑnekɔ yom sɛ.
46014023	Zɑngɑ sendi, Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ kulu meigu dɔ fɔ. Bɔrɔ kulu gɑ sendi ndɑ cinɛ ŋmɑni ŋmɑni yom. Bɔrɔ fɔ yom mo huro nodi kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ du cooɑndiyom wɑlɑ ǹ si nɑɑne. À nɑ ci beerem nge yom di cii wom sɛ hɔllɔkom yom?
46014024	Ammɑ zɑngɑ sendi mo wom kulu go ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si nɑɑne huro nodi. À mɑnɑ du cooɑndiyom. Andebitɛrɛ sendi kulu gɑ ɑ̀ zeeri. Andebitɛrɛ sendi gɑ ɑ̀ neesi mo.
46014025	À gɑɑ no, ɑ̀ bine kunɑ gundu yom kɑɑtɛrɛ. Bine ɑ̀ tɔ ɑ̀ mɑ jɛndɛbiri kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi. À kɑɑ cii: Hɑlɑbɑdɑ, Ikpɛ goono wom bɑndɑ.
46014026	A nyɑizei, mɛtɛ noyɑ dɑ? Sɑɑ kɑ wom meigu bɔrɔ fɔ kulu gundɑ Somu yom betu fɔ. À gundɑ cooɑndiyom. À gundɑ cinɛ ŋmɑni. À gundɑ kɑɑyomtɛrɛ bɑɑru. À gundɑ cinɛ yɑɑrɑyom. Ǹ kulu mɑ tɛ cɛrɛ nɑɑne ciniyom sɛ.
46014027	De bɔrɔ fɔ go sendi ndɑ cinɛ ŋmɑni, kɑlɑ ǹ mɑ tɔ ǹ bɔrɔ hinkɑ. À mɑ si bisɑ bɔrɔ hinzɑ mɑ. Ǹ kulu mɑ sendi kɑ furu cɛrɛ sɛ. Bɔrɔ fɔ mo cinɛ yɑɑrɑ.
46014028	De bɔrɔ fɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ cinɛ yom yɑɑrɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ dɛnjɛ. À mɑ si sendi Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ kunɑ. À mɑ sendi Ikpɛ sɛ ngɑ biyɑ kunɑ.
46014029	Andebi hinkɑ wɑlɑ ihinzɑ mo mɑ sendi. Cindei mɑ sendi yom fɑyɑnkɑ.
46014030	De bine, Ikpɛ nɑ hɛ fɔ kɑɑtɛrɛ bɔrɔ fɔ ŋmɑni sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ gɔrɔ nungu di, sintine bɔrɔ mɑ dɛnjɛ.
46014031	Wom kulu yɑ hini kɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ ɑfɔ fɔ. Wom mɑ tɛ yɑ di hɑli ǹ kulu mɑ dendeni, ǹ kulu mɑ du himmɑ.
46014032	Andebi yom mɑ gundɑ hini ngei biyɑ yom bɔm.
46014033	Ikpɛ wɔ, kɔsɔngu mɑnɑ hunu ɑ̀ dɔ ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ dɔ nɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne hunu. Zɑngɑ ɑ̀ cini tɛ hɑlɑɑlɑntei mɑrgɑ yom kulu kunɑ,
46014034	wɑ nɑm wom weibɔrɔ yom mɑ dɛnjɛ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ kunɑ. Ǹ mɑnɑ tu ǹ sɛ ǹ mɑ sendi. Ammɑ ǹ mɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ zɑngɑ Moisi fɔndɑ mo go kɑ ɑ̀ cii.
46014035	De ǹ go bɑɑ ngei mɑ fɑhɑm ndɑ hɛ fɔ, ǹ mɑ ngei kunye yom hã fuu. Hɑwi nɑ weibɔrɔ mɑ sendi Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ kunɑ.
46014036	Wom dɔ no Ikpɛ Sendɑ hunu dee, wɑlɑ wom hinne dɔ no ɑ̀ tɔ?
46014037	Bɔrɔ fɔ go tɑmmɑ ngɑ yɑ ɑndebi nɑ wɑlɑ ngɑ gundɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ noyom. Akpɛ mɑ bei hɛ wɔ kulu kɑ ɑ go hɑntum wom sɛ, Ikpɛ meire yom no.
46014038	Ammɑ de bɔrɔ bɑ si ndɑ, ǹ mɑ sɑɑle kɑɑ ɑkpɛ gɑɑ.
46014039	Ngɑ di sɛ nyɑizei, wɑ guuri ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛyom ndɑ himmɑ. Wɑ si hungu beerem mɑ sendi ndɑ cinɛ ŋmɑni ŋmɑni.
46014040	Ammɑ hɛ kulu mɑ tɛ ndɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ ɑ̀ fɔndɔ.
46015001	Nyɑizei, ɑ go wom hɔngɑndi Bɑɑru Hinno kɑ ɑ nɑ wom wɑɑzu ndɑ. Wom nɑ ɑ̀ tɑ. Bɑɑru Hinno kunɑ no wom go cɛ.
46015002	Bɑɑru Hinno wɔ dɔ no wom du fɑɑbɑ de wom nɑ Sendɑ kɑ ɑ nɑ wom wɑɑzu ndɑ jɛ ndɑ gɑɑbi. De ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci yɑ, wom nɑɑne tɛ kɔnu.
46015003	A no wom sɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ beeri kɑ bisɑ hɛ kulu kɑ hɛɛ mɑ, ɑ du. Ngɑ yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ bu i dulum yom sɛ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ yom bɔm.
46015004	Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ fiji. Jiribi hinzɑntɛ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi ngɑ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ yom bɔm.
46015005	À hunutɛrɛ mo Sefɑ sɛ ndɑ coobɑɑbɑize wei cindi hinkɑ sɛ.
46015006	À bɑndɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ nyɑize zɑngu gu kɑ ɑ̀ hunutɛrɛ ǹ sɛ mefɔ. Ǹ bɑ yom mo go hunɑ hɑli mɑɑsɑ. Afɔ yom mo jiibi kɔ.
46015007	À bɑndɑ Yɑkɔfu di ɑ̀. Diyɑ yom mɑ kulu di ɑ̀.
46015008	Ǹ kulu bɑndɑ, hɛɛ mo, ɑ̀ fɑitɑ ɑ sɛ, hɛɛ kɑ ɑ goono zɑngɑ gundehunu.
46015009	Diyɑ yom kulu kunɑ mɑ, hɛɛ yɑ ci ǹ ŋmɔne icɛnɑ. Yɑ nɑ tɔ ǹ mɑ ɑ cɛɛ diyɑ zɑmɑ ɑ nɑ Ikpɛ mɑrgɑ guruguzɑndi.
46015010	Ammɑ Ikpɛ gomini gɑɑ ɑ ci hɛ kɑ ɑ ci. À gomini mɑnɑ tɛ kɔnu ɑ dɔ hɛrɛ. A nɑ gbei tɛ ndɑ diyɑ yom kulu sã. À mɑnɑ ci hɛɛ bo ɑmmɑ Ikpɛ gomini yɑ goono ɑ bɑndɑ.
46015011	Ngɑ di sɛ, de hɛɛ no, de ngei no, yɑ no i go bɑɑru fɛɛ. Yɑ mo no wom nɑɑne.
46015012	I go bɑɑru fɛɛ kɑ cii Ikpɛ nɑ Mɛsiyɑ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme. Ifɔ sɛ wom kunɑ ɑfɔ yom go cii tunɑndiyom si bukɔei gɑme?
46015013	Ammɑ de tunɑndiyom si bukɔei gɑme, Mɛsiyɑ mɑnɑ tunu noyɑ me.
46015014	Ce bine, Mɛsiyɑ mɑnɑ tunu, i wɑɑzuyom tɛ kɔnu noyɑ. Wom nɑɑne mo tɛ kɔnu.
46015015	À bisɑ yɑ. I tɛ sɛdɑ Ikpɛ bɔm. I cii Ikpɛ nɑ Mɛsiyɑ tunɑndi. Ammɑ de bukɔei si tunu Ikpɛ mɑnɑ Mɛsiyɑ tunɑndi. Yɑ di gɑɑ i yom yɑ ci tɑngɑri sɛdɑ yom Ikpɛ dɔ.
46015016	De bukɔei si tunu, Mɛsiyɑ mɑnɑ tunu.
46015017	De bine Ikpɛ mɑnɑ Mɛsiyɑ tunɑndi, wom nɑɑne tɛ kɔnu noyɑ. Hɑli hɔ̃ mo wom goono wom dulum yom kunɑ.
46015018	Beerem mo kɑ ǹ bu Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ, ǹ hɑlɑci.
46015019	De hundi wɔ kunɑ no i go Mɛsiyɑ bɛɛjɛ tɛ, i tɛ sisibiize yom kɑ bisɑ bɔrɔ kulu.
46015020	Ammɑ cimi no Ikpɛ nɑ Mɛsiyɑ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme. Ngɑ yɑ ci hɛijinɑ beerem kɑ ǹ bu kunɑ.
46015021	Bu hunu bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku dɔ. Yɑ no tunɑndiyom bukɔei gɑme hunu bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku dɔ.
46015022	Zɑngɑ ǹ kulu gɑ bu Adɑmu dɔ, yɑ nɑ ǹ gɑ ǹ kulu hunɑndi mɑ Mɛsiyɑ dɔ.
46015023	Ammɑ bɔrɔ kulu gundɑ ngɑ sɛsɛrɛyom dɔ. Mɛsiyɑ yɑ ci hɛijinɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ Mɛsiyɑ kɑɑ, ɑ̀ gɑɑ no beerem kɑ ǹ ci Mɛsiyɑ ŋmɔne yom kɑɑ tunu.
46015024	Mɛsiyɑ kɑɑ meire ndɑ hini kulu ndɑ dɑbɑri kulu wi. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ kɑɑ kpetɛrɛ no Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ sɛ. À bɑndɑ, beenɑntɛ noyɑ.
46015025	Kɑlɑ de ɑ̀ mɑ kpetɛrɛ ŋmɑɑ hɑli ɑ̀ nɑ ibɛrɛ yom kulu dɑm ngɑ cee yom cire.
46015026	Kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ ibɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ wi, ngɑ yɑ ci bu.
46015027	Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Ikpɛ nɑ hɛ kulu dɑm ɑ̀ cee yom cire". Kɑ ɑ̀ cii Ikpɛ nɑ hɛ kulu dɑm Mɛsiyɑ cire, siikɑ si cɛ hinne bɑ yɑ si, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ hɛ kulu dɑm ɑ̀ cire.
46015028	Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ kɑɑ hɛ kulu dɑm ɑ̀ cire, ɑ̀ gɑɑ no Izɑ mo kɑɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ ɑ̀ sɛ. À nɑ hɛ kulu dɑm Izɑ cire zɑmɑ Ikpɛ mɑ ci ǹ kulu bɔm.
46015029	Bɔrɔ fɔ yom goono kɑ ǹ nɑ ngei bɔm mirɑndi bukɔ yom guribi. De bukɔ yom si tunu mɛtɛ beerem wɔ kɑɑ tɛ? De Ikpɛ si bukɔei tunɑndi ifɔ sɛ beerem wɔ gɑ kɑ ngei bɔm mirɑndi bukɔ yom guribi?
46015030	Ifɔ sɛ i yom mo lɔkɑci kulu i go kɑ i bɔm dɑm kɑtɑru kunɑ?
46015031	A go di bu dullu mo kɑ ɑ̀ bɑ kulu. A go wɔne dɑhirɑndi ɑ fɑihã bɔm kɑ ɑ gundɑ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ kɑ simbɑ wom.
46015032	A tɑngɑm ndɑ gɑnjihɑm yom Efese wɑngɑrɑ. De ɑ tɑngɑm ndɑ zɑngɑ hɑndunyɑ beerem miilɑ goono ndɑ, hɑnfɑni fɔ no ɑ du ɑ̀ kunɑ de bukɔei si tunu? Kɑlɑ de "i mɑ ŋmɑɑ, i mɑ hɑm zɑmɑ subɑ i bu no."
46015033	Wɑ si nɑm ǹ mɑ wom dɛrɑndi. Kpɑɑsi lɑlɔ yom cini dɑɑ hinno sɑrɑ.
46015034	Wɑ tɛ lɑɑkɑli zɑngɑ ɑ̀ hegu. Wɑ si dulum tɛ zɑmɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom goono zɑm kɑ Ikpɛ bei kunɑ. A go kɑ ɑ̀ cii wom sɛ no kɑ wom hɑwɑndi.
46015035	Ammɑ bɔrɔ fɔ go cii, mɛtɛ no ǹ go bukɔei tunɑndi? Gɑɑhɑm fɔ dimi nɑ ǹ go kɑɑ ndɑ?
46015036	Sɑmu wɔ, hɛ kɑ n go dumɑ ɑ̀ si ye hundi gɑɑ kɑlɑ de ɑ̀ bu.
46015037	Hɛ kɑ n go dumɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci dumɑiize ɑmmɑ n go dimiize dumɑ. Hɑnibɑ mɔsɔngu mogure no wɑlɑ dimiize ŋmɑni fɔ.
46015038	Ammɑ Ikpɛ yɑ gɑ dumɑiize no tɑkɑri zɑngɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑ, dumɑiize kulu ndɑ ɑ̀ tɑkɑri.
46015039	Gɑɑbɑsi yom kulu mɑnɑ ci gɑɑbɑsi dimi fɔ. Iburɑdɑm yom gundɑ gɑɑbɑsi dimi fɔ. Memunu yom gundɑ ngei ŋmɔne. Ciifi yom gundɑ ngei ŋmɔne. Ciro yom gundɑ ngei ŋmɔne.
46015040	Bɛɛnɛ tɑkɑri ndɑ gɑndɑ tɑkɑri mɑ goono. Ammɑ bɛɛnɛ deizɑ fɔ goono. Gɑndɑ deizɑ mo ŋmɑni no.
46015041	Afɔ yɑ ci weenu deizɑ, ɑfɔ hɑndu deizɑ, ɑfɔ mo hɑndɑriyɑize yom deizɑ. Bɑ hɑndɑriyɑize yom mo kulu mɑnɑ ci ɑfɔ deizɑ dɔ.
46015042	Zɑngɑ yɑ wɔ nɑ bukɔei mo tunɑndiyom. Ǹ go gɑɑhɑm dumɑ fumbi kunɑ. Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi ndɑ gɑɑhɑm kɑ ɑ̀ si hini kɑ fumbu.
46015043	Ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ dumɑ, bɛɛrɛ si kunɑ. Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi ndɑ deizɑ. Ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ dumɑ hinɑbunutɛrɛ kunɑ. Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi ndɑ dɑbɑri.
46015044	Ǹ go gɑɑhɑm hɑɑlikpɛ dumɑ. Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi biyɑ ŋmɔne. Gɑɑhɑm hɑɑlikpɛ goono. Biyɑ ŋmɔne mo goono.
46015045	À sɛ no ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɑntum kɑ cii: "Adɑmu, hɑibɔrɔ sintine tɛ hundikoni". Adɑmu kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ mo yɑ ci hundi nokɔ, biyɑ ŋmɔne.
46015046	Wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci biyɑ ŋmɔne, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci sintine, ɑmmɑ hɑɑlikpɛ di no. Biyɑ ŋmɔne mo dɛcɛ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ.
46015047	Ikpɛ nɑ hɑibɔrɔ sintine tɛ ndɑ gɑndɑ lɑɑbu. Gɑndɑ bɔrɔ no. Bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ mo yɑ Kpe no kɑ ɑ̀ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ.
46015048	Bɔrɔ kɑ ǹ tɛ ndɑ gɑndɑ lɑɑbu zɑngɑ ɑ̀ bɑrɑ, yɑ nɑ ngei mo bɑrɑ, nge yom kɑ ǹ ci gɑndɑ ŋmɔne yom. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ mo zɑngɑ ɑ̀ bɑrɑ, yɑ no ngei mo bɑrɑ, nge yom kɑ ǹ ci bɛɛnɛ ŋmɔne yom.
46015049	I nɑ gɑndɑ lɑɑbu bɔrɔ wɔ tɑkɑri zɑɑ. Yɑ no ngɑ mɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ i gɑ ɑ̀ tɑkɑri zɑɑ.
46015050	A nyɑizei, ɑ go wɔne cii. Gɑɑbɑsi ndɑ kuri si hini kɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ tubu. Fumbi mo si wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si hini kɑ fumbu tubu.
46015051	Gunɑ, ɑ go duje wɔne cii wom sɛ. I kulu si bu. Ammɑ Ikpɛ gɑ i kulu bɛrɛ.
46015052	À gɑ i bɛrɛ mefɔ mefɔ moo miilɑ fɔ, kuluu kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ jinde gɑɑ. Ǹ kɑɑ kuluu funsu. Cɔfɔ bukɔei kɑɑ tunu ndɑ gɑɑhɑm kɑ ɑ̀ si hini kɑ fumbu. I yom wɔ Ikpɛ gɑ i bɛrɛ.
46015053	Gɑɑhɑm kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ fumbu, kɑlɑ de ɑ̀ mɑ gɑɑhɑm kɑ ɑ̀ si hini kɑ fumbu dɑm. Gɑɑhɑm kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ bu mo, ɑ̀ mɑ gɑɑhɑm kɑ ɑ̀ si hini kɑ bu dɑm.
46015054	Gɑɑhɑm mo kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ fumbu kɑɑ gɑɑhɑm kɑ ɑ̀ si hini kɑ bu dɑm. Gɑɑhɑm kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ bu mɑ kɑɑ gɑɑhɑm kɑ ɑ̀ si hini kɑ bu dɑm. Sɑɑ di Ikpɛ Sendɑ kɑɑ tɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cii: "Ǹ nɑ bu gonu gɑɑŋmɑɑyom kunɑ".
46015055	"E bu, mɑni n nɑɑji? E ciyomɑ, mɑni n gɑɑŋmɑɑyom?"
46015056	Bu nɑɑji yɑ ci dulum. Dulum dɑbɑri mo yɑ ci Ikpɛ fɔndɑ.
46015057	Ammɑ i mɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu, Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ i no gɑɑŋmɑɑyom i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ.
46015058	Ngɑ di sɛ, ɑ nyɑize binebɑɑkɔei, wɑ cɛ ɑ̀ mɑ boori. Wɑ si zinji. Wɑ himmɑ dɑm kɑ tɔntɔnu Kpe gbei kunɑ zɑmɑ wom bei wom gbei mɑnɑ ci kɔnu Kpe kunɑ.
46016001	Kɑ simbɑ ndɑ noyom kɑ ǹ meigu hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom sɛ zɑngɑ ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm Gɑlɑte Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ yom sɛ, wom mo wɑ tɛ yɑ di.
46016002	Jiribi iye ŋmɔne hɑnu sintine kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑlɑhɑdi bɔrɔ fɔ fɔ kulu mɑ cini kɑɑ ngɑ nooru kunɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ nɑ bɑrikɑ. À mɑ ɑ̀ dɑm nooru jisiyom dɔ. Nooru meiguyom mɑ si tɛ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ.
46016003	Wom mɑ beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ tɑbɑi suubɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ kɑɑ, ɑ gɑ ǹ dɔntɔm Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ ndɑ tirɑ yom. Ǹ mɑ kpeindɑ wom noyom mɑ.
46016004	De bine, ɑ̀ kɑɑ sɑbɑ hɛɛ bumbum mɑ yɑ kpei, ǹ gɑ ɑ dum.
46016005	A kɑɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ gɑnɑ kɑ bisɑ Mɑsedoni lɑɑbu zɑmɑ Mɑsedoni lɑɑbu nɑ ɑ kɑɑ gɑnɑ kɑ bisɑ.
46016006	Hɑnibɑ mɑ, ɑ jiribi hinkɑ tɛ wom dɔ wɑlɑ mɑ yɑ hɑrigu tɛ wom dɔ nodi. Wom mɑ ɑ kɑmbɑzɑ nungu kɑ ɑ gɑ kpei.
46016007	Mɑɑsɑnkulu wɔ, ɑ si bɑɑ yɑ di wom bisɑyom gɑɑ. A gɑ bɑɑ yɑ jiribi yom tɛ wom dɔ de Kpe tu ɑ sɛ.
46016008	Ammɑ ɑ kɑɑ gɔrɔ Efese wɑngɑrɑ kɑlɑ Pɑntɛkotu jingɑru.
46016009	Ikpɛ nɑ fɔndɔ bɑmbɑtɑ feeri ɑ sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ nɑfɑ. Ammɑ bɔrɔ bɑɑbɑ gɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ hɛɛ.
46016010	De Timote kɑɑ, wom mɑ tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ goono wom gɑme hɑmburu si. Timote gɑ kɑ ngɑ bɔm nɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ Kpe gbei sɛ zɑngɑ hɛɛ.
46016011	Ngɑ di sɛ, bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ si ɑ̀ fɛntɛ. Wom mɑ ɑ̀ kɑmbɑzɑ ɑ̀ mɑ tɔ ɑ dɔ bɑɑni zɑmɑ ɑ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑtu, ngɑ ndɑ nyɑizei.
46016012	Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci nyɑize Apolo sendi, ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ ndɑ himmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ kpei wom dɔ ndɑ nyɑize yom. Ammɑ ɑ̀ si bɑɑ bɑ cɛnɑ ngɑ mɑ kɑɑ mɑɑsɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ du dɑɑmɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ kɑɑ.
46016013	Wɑ bɑtu. Wɑ cɛ ndɑ gɑɑbi nɑɑne kunɑ. Wɑ tɛ hɑibɔrɔ yom. Wɑ gɑɑbi dɑm wom bɔm gɑɑ.
46016014	Hɛ kulu mɑ tɛ wom gɑme kunɑ ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine.
46016015	Wom go bei Tifɑnu ndɑ ɑ̀ fuu bɔrɔ yom, ngei yɑ ci Akɑyɑ lɑɑbu gɑnɑkɔ sintine yom. Ǹ nɑ ngei bɔm no mo kɑ cini tɑmtɛrɛ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom sɛ. Mɑɑsɑ nyɑizei, hɛ fɔ himmɑ nɑ ɑ gɑ wom no.
46016016	Wom wɔ, wɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ bɔrɔ yɑ di dimi yom sɛ ndɑ beerem kulu sɛ kɑ ǹ go gbei tɛ cɛrɛ bɑndɑ.
46016017	A go fɑihã ndɑ Tifɑnu ndɑ Futɑnɑ ndɑ Akɑilɑ kɑɑyom zɑmɑ ǹ kɑɑndɑ ɑ sɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ gɑziɑ wom dɔ hɛrɛ.
46016018	Ǹ nɑ ɑ bine yeenɑndi ndɑ wom ŋmɔne yom mo. Ngɑ di sɛ, wom mɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ bɔrɔ wɔne dimi yom sɛ.
46016019	Azi lɑɑbu Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ yom go wom fɔɔ. Akilɑ ndɑ Pirisilɑ ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono ǹ hundi kunɑ, ngei mɑ go wom fɔɔ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ Kpe kunɑ.
46016020	Nyɑizei kulu gɑ wom fɔɔ. Wɑ cɛrɛ fɔɔ ndɑ jɛrɛbɛ sumsumyom hinno bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ.
46016021	Hɛɛ Pɔlu, ɑ gɑ wom fɔɔ mo. Ngɑ wɔ, hɛɛ bumbum yɑ nɑ ɑ̀ hɑntum ndɑ ɑ kɑmbɛ.
46016022	De bɔrɔ fɔ si bɑɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ci lɑɑliɑntɛ. E Kpe, kɑɑ.
46016023	Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gomini mo goono wom bɑndɑ.
46016024	A bɑɑkɑsine goono wom kulu dɔ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ. Ami.
47001001	Hɛɛ Pɔlu, hɛɛ yɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ diyɑ no Ikpɛ binebɑɑ dɔ. Hɛɛ ndɑ i nyɑize Timote, i yom yɑ go wom fɔɔ, wom kɑ wom ci Ikpɛ mɑrgɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono Kɔlɛnte wɑngɑrɑ. I go hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kulu kɑ ǹ goono Akɑyɑ lɑɑbu kulu fɔɔ.
47001002	Gomini ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne kɑ ǹ hunu zɑ i Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ ndɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ, ǹ mo goono wom bɑndɑ.
47001003	I mɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ Bɑɑbɑ sɑɑbu. Ngɑ yɑ ci Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ ndɑ suuji, Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ yɑmɑrɑndiyom kulu.
47001004	À go kɑ i yɑmɑrɑndi i tɑɑbi kulu kunɑ zɑmɑ i mɑ du kɑ beerem mo kɑ ǹ goono tɑɑbi ŋmɑni ŋmɑni kunɑ yɑmɑrɑndi. I mɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ yɑmɑrɑndiyom kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ i sɛ.
47001005	Zɑngɑ Mɛsiyɑ guruguze yom go bɑ i kunɑ, yɑ no i yɑmɑrɑndiyom mo go bɑ Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ.
47001006	Ammɑ kɑ i go kɑnkɑm, ngɑ di tɛ no wom yɑmɑrɑndiyom ndɑ wom fɑɑbɑ sɑbu sɛ. Zɑ kɑ Ikpɛ go kɑ i yɑmɑrɑndi, ngɑ di tɛ no wom yɑmɑrɑndiyom ndɑ wom fɑɑbɑ sɑbu sɛ mo. Yɑ no wom mɑ du yɑmɑrɑndiyom hɑli wom mɑ hini suuru ndɑ guruguze fɔlɔnkuei kɑ i yom mo, i go du wom yɑmɑrɑndiyom.
47001007	Bɛɛjɛ kɑ i gundɑ kɑ simbɑ wom, ɑ̀ sinji kɑ boori. I go bei de wom gundɑ bɑ ndɑ i yom kɑnkɑmi yom kunɑ, wom gundɑ bɑ mo ndɑ i yom yɑmɑrɑndiyom kunɑ.
47001008	Nyɑizei, i si bɑɑ wom mɑ goono zɑm kɑ bei kunɑ, kɑ simbɑ ndɑ i kɑnkɑmi kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ i sɛ Azi lɑɑbu. À nɑ i tɑɑni kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. À bisɑ i yom gɑɑbi hɑli ɑ̀ tɔ i lɑɑkɑli hunu i hunɑyom gɑɑ.
47001009	Ammɑ i bumbum, i bei i bɔm gɑɑ kɑ bu nɑ guuri zɑɑ i bɔm hɑli i mɑ si i bɔm nɑɑne. Ammɑ i go Ikpɛ nɑɑne, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go bukɔei tunɑndi.
47001010	Ikpɛ mo nɑ i kɑɑ bu bɑmbɑtɑ wɔ kunɑ. À go kɑ i kɑɑ mo. I nɑ i bɛɛjɛ sinji ɑ̀ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ gɑ i kɑɑ mo kpɛɛnɛ.
47001011	Wom mo, wom go kɑ i gɑɑ ndɑ wom ŋmɔne ɑduwɑ yom. Yɑ no Ikpɛ tu ndɑ gomini noyom kɑ i du bɔrɔ bɑɑbɑ ɑduwɑ yom sɑbu sɛ hɑli bɔrɔ boobo mɑ sɑɑbuyom tɛ kɑ simbɑ i yom.
47001012	Wɔne yɑ ci i bɛɛrɛ. I bine kunɑ sendi go tɛ sɛdɑ kɑ i gɔrɔ hɑndunyɑ kunɑ yɑ mo wom dɔ hɛrɛ ndɑ bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ ndɑ cimi kɑ ɑ̀ hunu Ikpɛ dɔ. I mɑnɑ i gɔrɛ tɛ ndɑ hɑndunyɑ hɑikusutɛrɛ ɑmmɑ i nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ Ikpɛ gomini.
47001013	I si hɛ fɔ ŋmɑni hɑntum wom sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑnɑ wɔ kɑ wom go coo. Wom go kɑ ɑ̀ fɑhɑm mɑ. A bɑɑ wom mɑ ɑ̀ fɑhɑm sã sã.
47001014	Zɑngɑ wom mo, wom fɑhɑm jɛrɛ fɔ kɑ i yom yɑ ci wom bɛɛrɛ sɑbɑbu. Yɑ no wom mo, wom ci i bɛɛrɛ sɑbɑbu Kpe Yesu hɑnu hine.
47001015	Nɑɑne wɔne kunɑ, ɑ bɑɑ yɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ jinɑ zɑmɑ wom mɑ du bɑrikɑ hinkɑntɛ.
47001016	Zɑ wom dɔ mo, yɑ bisɑ kɑ kpei Mɑsedoni lɑɑbu. Zɑ Mɑsedoni lɑɑbu kpɛɛnɛ yɑ ye kɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ. Wom mɑ ɑ kɑmbɑzɑ yɑ kpei Yude lɑɑbu.
47001017	Yɑ di gɑɑ, sɑɑ kɑ ɑ go wɔne miilɑ ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ cii ndɑ siikɑ siikɑ dee? Wɑlɑ hɛ yom kɑ ɑ gɑ miilɑ hɑndunyɑ lɑsɑbu bɔm nɑ ɑ go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ hɑli yɑ cii oò, oò ndɑ ɑwo, ɑwo?
47001018	Ammɑ Ikpɛ yɑ nɑɑnekpɛ no. À sɛ no, i sendɑ kɑ i tɛ wom sɛ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ tɛ ndɑ oò ndɑ ɑwo.
47001019	Hɛɛ ndɑ Silɑfim ndɑ Timote nɑ Ikpɛ Ize, Yesu Mɛsiyɑ bɑɑru fɛɛ wom gɑme. Wɑɑzu kɑ i tɛ i mɑnɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ oò ndɑ ɑwo. À tɛ ndɑ oò kɑ ɑ̀ goono Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ.
47001020	Ikpɛ ɑlikɑwɑli yom kulu, ɑ̀ dɔ no ǹ ŋmɔne oò goono. À dɔ mo no i go cii ɑmi kɑ kɑɑndɑ deizɑ Ikpɛ sɛ.
47001021	Wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ i tɑbɑtɑndi kɑ i suubɑ wom bɑndɑ Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ, ngɑ yɑ ci Ikpɛ.
47001022	Ngɑ mɑ yɑ nɑ sɛdɑ dɑm i gɑɑ. À nɑ i nɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ i bine yom kunɑ zɑngɑ deimi jɛrɛ.
47001023	Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ go kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ sɛdɑ ɑ hundi bɔm, wom bɑkɑɑyom sɛ nɑ yɑ nɑ kɑɑ Kɔlɛnte wɑngɑrɑ kpɛɛnɛ.
47001024	I sindɑ hini wom nɑɑne bɔm, ɑmmɑ i yom yɑ wom bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ yom no wom fɑihã sɑbu sɛ. Nɑɑne gɑɑ nɑ, wom go cɛ kɑ boori.
47002001	Ammɑ ɑ nɑ guuri zɑɑ ɑ bine kunɑ yɑ si ye wom dɔ ndɑ binesɛrɛ.
47002002	De ɑ nɑ wom bine sɑrɑndi, mee yɑ nɑm yɑ fɑihã, de ɑ̀ nɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ bine sɑrɑndi di?
47002003	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ kɑɑ ɑ bine mɑ si sɑrɑ ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ himɑ yɑ fɑihã ndei. A nɑ wɔne hɑntum nɑ zɑmɑ ngɑ di si tɛ. A gundɑ nɑɑne ngɑ di wom kulu gɑɑ kɑ ɑ fɑihã mɑ ci wom kulu ŋmɔne.
47002004	Kɑnkɑmi bɑmbɑtɑ kunɑ ndɑ binesɛrɛ ndɑ mundi boobo no ɑ hɑntum wom sɛ. À mɑnɑ ci zɑmɑ wom bine yom mɑ sɑrɑ ɑmmɑ zɑmɑ wom mɑ bei ɑ gundɑ wom bɑɑkɑsine hɑli ǹ ci mɔsɔ.
47002005	Ammɑ de bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ binesɛrɛ tɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci hɛɛ hinne bine nɑ ɑkpɛ sɑrɑ ɑmmɑ wom kulu bine no ɑ̀ sɑrɑ. Zɑngɑ jɛrɛ fɔ bine nɑ ɑ̀ sɑrɑ ɑmmɑ yɑ si cii kɑ bisɑ.
47002006	Ciiti kɑ jɑmɑ tɛ bɔrɔ sɛ, ɑ̀ wɑsɑ.
47002007	À sɛ no, mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ himɑ no dom, wom mɑ ɑ̀ yɑɑfɑ. Wom mɑ ɑ̀ nɑ himmɑ hɑli binesɛrɛ mɑ si ɑ̀ tɑɑni.
47002008	À sɛ nɑ, ɑ go wom ŋmɑɑrɛ wom mɑ cɛbɛ ɑ̀ sɛ bɑɑkɑsine.
47002009	À sɛ mo no ɑ hɑntum wom sɛ kɑ wom bubure yɑ bei hɑli wom go hɛ kulu gɑnɑ.
47002010	Bɔrɔ kɑ wom go yɑɑfɑ ndɑ hɛ fɔ, hɛɛ mo ɑ go kɑ ɑ̀ yɑɑfɑ. De ɑ nɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yɑɑfɑ ndɑ hɛ fɔ wom sɑbu sɛ no, ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ Mɛsiyɑ jine.
47002011	A mɑ ɑ̀ yɑɑfɑ zɑmɑ Setɑm mɑ si du i gɑɑ dɑɑmɑ. I gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sijirɑ yom bei.
47002012	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ Toɑsɑ wɑngɑrɑ kɑ Mɛsiyɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu tɛ, Kpe nɑ fɔndɔ feeri ɑ sɛ.
47002013	A lɑɑkɑli mɑnɑ kɑni zɑmɑ yɑ nɑ di ɑ nyɑize Titu. À sɛ no, ɑ nɑ ǹ too kɑ kpei Mɑsedoni lɑɑbu.
47002014	I mɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu zɑmɑ sɑɑ kulu ɑ̀ go kpeindɑ i yom jine i mo gɑɑŋmɑɑ Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ. Nungu kulu no ɑ̀ go kɑ ngɑ beiyom kɑɑtɛrɛ i dɔ zɑngɑ wɑidi bɑmbɑriyom.
47002015	I yom yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ wɑidi hɛo kɑɑnɔ Ikpɛ sɛ beerem kɑ ǹ go fɑɑbɑ ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go hɑlɑci gɑme kunɑ.
47002016	I bɑrɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom sɛ yɑ di zɑngɑ bu hɛo kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑɑndɑ bu. Cindei mo sɛ i bɑrɑ zɑngɑ hundi hɛo kɑ ɑ̀ go hundi no. Mee yɑ wɑsɑ hɛ nge yom di sɛ?
47002017	I si kɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ bɛrɛ zɑngɑ jɑmɑ gɑ tɛ liibɑ sɛ. Ammɑ i go sendi cimi kpɑrɛ tɛ Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ Ikpɛ jine.
47003001	I yom mo i sinti kɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ i bɔm sɛ kpɛɛnɛ noyɑ bɑ? Zɑngɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom go bɑɑ, ɑ̀ tɔ i mɑ bɛɛrɛ tirɑ yom hɑntum wom sɛ no wɑlɑ kɑ du bɛɛrɛ tirɑ yom wom dɔ?
47003002	Wom yɑ ci i tirɑ kɑ Ikpɛ hɑntum i bine yom kunɑ. Bɔrɔ kulu nɑ ɑ̀ bei. Bɔrɔ kulu nɑ ɑ̀ coo mo.
47003003	Wɔne wɔ tɛrɛkpɑrɛ no, wom yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ tirɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu i gbei tɛyom dɔ. À mɑnɑ ɑ̀ hɑntum ndɑ hɑntumyom hɛ ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ hɑntum ndɑ Ikpɛ Biyɑ hundikpɛ. À mɑnɑ ɑ̀ hɑntum tɑndi yom gɑɑ ɑmmɑ iburɑdɑm yom bine yom kunɑ.
47003004	Nɑɑne wɔne Mɛsiyɑ gɑɑ nɑ i gundɑ Ikpɛ dɔ hɛrɛ.
47003005	À mɑnɑ ci i bumbum i mɑ hini kɑ hɛ fɔ lɑsɑbu i bɔm gɑɑ no bo. I hinɑ kulu Ikpɛ dɔ nɑ ɑ̀ go hunu.
47003006	Ikpɛ yɑ nɑ i no hini i mɑ tɛ ɑlikɑwɑli teji gbeiteeri yom. I mɑnɑ ci tirɑ biiriize gbeiteeri yom ɑmmɑ i ci Ikpɛ Biyɑ gbeiteeri yom. Tirɑ biiriize gɑ wi nɑ ɑmmɑ Ikpɛ Biyɑ cɛ gɑ hunɑndi nɑ.
47003007	Moisi fɔndɑ gbei kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑndɑ bu, Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ jeeri ndɑ biiriize yom tondi yom gɑɑ. À tɛ deizɑ hɑli Isirɑilɑ ize yom mɑnɑ hini kɑ moo sinji Moisi moodumɑ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ moodumɑ deizɑ sɑbu sɛ. Deizɑ wɔ gundɑ beeniyom.
47003008	Yɑ mo Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ gbei tɛ deizɑ kɑ bisɑ.
47003009	Ciiti kɑ zeeri gbei tɛ deizɑ. Yɑ mo cɛɑndiyom susu gbei, ɑ̀ bisɑ fɑ kɑ bɑ deizɑ dɔ.
47003010	Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ deizɑ dom, ɑ̀ sindɑ bɛɛrɛ mɑɑsɑ zɑmɑ deizɑ goono kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ.
47003011	Wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ gundɑ deizɑ. Yɑ mo wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go gɔrɔ, cɛ tɛ deizɑ kɑ bisɑ fɑ.
47003012	À sɛ no, zɑ kɑ i gundɑ bɛɛjɛ ngɑ di, i go gbei tɛ ndɑ yɑrutɛrɛ bɑmbɑtɑ.
47003013	I si tɛ zɑngɑ Moisi kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ fɑtɑlɑ dɑm kɑ ngɑ moodumɑ dɑɑbu, zɑmɑ Isirɑilɑ ize yom mɑ si moo sinji kɑɑri bisɑntɛ gɑɑ.
47003014	Ammɑ ǹ lɑɑkɑli goono dɑɑbɑntɛ hɑli mɑɑsɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ go Alikɑwɑli Zeenɔ coo kulu fɑtɑlɑ goono ǹ sɛ. Ǹ mɑnɑ fɑtɑlɑ kɑɑ zɑmɑ Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ no ɑ̀ tɔ ngɑ mee.
47003015	Bɑ hunkunɑ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ go Moisi tirɑ yom coo, kulu fɑtɑlɑ goono ǹ bine yom bɔm.
47003016	Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kɑɑ bɛrɛ Kpe dɔ hɛrɛ Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ.
47003017	Kpe cɛ bine, Biyɑ no. Nungu kɑ Kpe Biyɑ goono, nodi no bɔrɔcinitɛrɛ goono.
47003018	Ammɑ i kulu kɑ i moodumɑ yom goono feerɑntɛ, i gɑ Kpe deizɑ gunɑ zɑngɑ diji kunɑ. Ikpɛ go kɑ i bɛrɛ zɑngɑ ngɑ tɑkɑri, deizɑ kɑ kpei deizɑ dɔ. Kpe Biyɑ dɔ no deizɑ wɔ go hunu.
47004001	I du suuji Ikpɛ dɔ. Ngɑ di sɛ, zɑ kɑ i gundɑ gbei wɔne mo i si fɑrigɑ.
47004002	Ammɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ ci hɑwi, hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ cini tɛ tugu kunɑ i nɑ ɑ̀ furu. I si dirɑ ndɑ cɛmbɛrɛ cɛmbɛrɛ. I si Ikpɛ Sendɑ mo siirɑndi ɑmmɑ i go cimi cii sã sã. I go kɑ i bɔm cɛbɛ iburɑdɑm bine kunɑ sendi dɔ Ikpɛ jine.
47004003	Ammɑ de ǹ nɑ i Bɑɑru Hinno wɔ dɑɑbu, beerem kɑ ǹ go hɑlɑci sɛ no ɑ̀ go dɑɑbu.
47004004	Zɑmɑni wɔ ŋmɔne ikpɛ nɑ dɑnɑmtɛrɛ dɑm beerem kɑ ǹ si nɑɑne fɑhɑm gɑɑ. À nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ hɑli Bɑɑru Hinno deizɑkpɛ kɑɑri mɑ si hɑɑgɑ ǹ gɑɑ. Bɑɑru Hinno deizɑ wɔ yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ, Mɛsiyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Ikpɛ tɑkɑri.
47004005	I si kɑ i bɔm bɑɑru fɛɛ, ɑmmɑ i gɑ wɑɑzu ko cii Yesu Mɛsiyɑ yɑ Kpe no. I go cii i yom yɑ ci wom tɑm yom Yesu sɑbu sɛ.
47004006	Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ cii, kɑɑri mɑ hɑɑgɑ kube bindi bindi, ɑ̀ nɑ kɑɑri dɑm i bine yom kunɑ. Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm nɑ zɑmɑ ngɑ mɑ ngɑ deizɑ beiyom hɑɑgɑndi i sɛ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ moodumɑ gɑɑ.
47004007	Ammɑ hɑizici wɔne goono i sɛ lɑɑbu kusu yom kunɑ zɑmɑ dɑbɑri bɑmbɑtɑ wɔ mɑ ci Ikpɛ ŋmɔne, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hunu i dɔ.
47004008	Kɑnkɑmi dimi dimi kulu nɑ i tɑɑni ɑmmɑ i mɑnɑ tutubu. I lɑɑkɑli tunu ɑmmɑ i mɑnɑ zɑm bɛɛjɛ.
47004009	Ǹ go kɑ i guruguzɑndi ɑmmɑ Ikpɛ mɑnɑ i furu. Ǹ go kɑ i zeeri ɑmmɑ i mɑnɑ hɑlɑci.
47004010	Sɑɑ kulu i go Yesu bu jɛrɛ i gɑɑhɑm yom kunɑ zɑmɑ Yesu hundi mo mɑ hunutɛrɛ i gɑɑhɑm yom kunɑ.
47004011	I yom kɑ i go hunɑ, sɑɑ kulu ǹ go kɑ i dɑm bu kɑmbɛ Yesu sɑbu sɛ. Ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ no zɑmɑ Yesu hundi mo mɑ hunutɛrɛ i gɑɑhɑm yom kunɑ kɑ ǹ goono buyom bɔm.
47004012	Yɑ di gɑɑ, bu go gbei tɛ i kunɑ ɑmmɑ hundi mo go gbei tɛ wom kunɑ.
47004013	Zɑngɑ i kulu gundɑ nɑɑne fɔlɔnku kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ kɑ ɑ̀ cii: "A nɑɑne. À sɛ no, ɑ sendi." I yom mo i go nɑɑne. À sɛ no, i go sendi.
47004014	I go bei wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Kpe Yesu tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme, ɑ̀ gɑ i tunɑndi Yesu dɔ. À gɑ i cɛɑndi ngɑ jine wom bɑndɑ.
47004015	Wom sɑbu sɛ no hɛ kulu goono hɑli gomini kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑ kɑ tɔntɔnu bɔrɔ boobo dɔ, ɑ̀ mɑ nɑm sɑɑbuyom mɑ bɑ Ikpɛ deizɑ sɛ.
47004016	À sɛ no, i si fɑrigɑ. Bɑ de i tɛrɛ bɔrɔ fɔ go sɑrɑ, ǹ go kɑ i bine yom kunɑ bɔrɔ tejɑndi hɑnu kɑ kɑɑ hɑnu.
47004017	I mɑɑsɑ kɑnkɑmi dɔgɔnɑntɛ go kɑɑndɑ i sɛ deizɑ ndɑ bɑyom kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni. Deizɑ wɔ kɑnkɑmi neesiji tɑɑbi dɔgɔnɑntɛ ŋmɔne no.
47004018	I moo yom si sinjɑntɛ hɛ yom kɑ mɑɑ go di gɑɑ kɑlɑ hɛ yom kɑ moo si di. Hɛ yom kɑ moo go di, bisɑntɛ yom no ɑmmɑ hɛ yom kɑ mɑɑ si di, ǹ sindɑ beeniyom.
47005001	I go bei hɑndunyɑ gɑɑhɑm wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ i goono ɑ̀ himɑ kuuru bukɑ. De ɑ̀ hɑlɑci i gundɑ cinɑri fɔ Ikpɛ dɔ, fuu kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ tɛ ndɑ kɑmbɛ. À goono bɛɛnɛ kunɑ, beeniyom si.
47005002	Cimi no, i go dure kuuru bukɑ wɔ kunɑ zɑmɑ i go bɑɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ Ikpɛ mɑ i fuu bɛɛnɛ ŋmɔne dɑm i sɛ.
47005003	Sɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ dɑm i sɛ, ǹ si i gɑru bumbum.
47005004	Cimi nɑ, i yom kɑ i goono gɑɑhɑm kuuru wɔ kunɑ i go dure ndɑ jɛɛjɛ. À mɑnɑ ci Ikpɛ mɑ i gɑɑhɑm wɔne hobu kɑ kɑɑ bɑ, ɑmmɑ i go bɑɑ Ikpɛ mɑ bɛɛnɛ ŋmɔne dɑm i sɛ. À mɑ ɑ̀ dɑm i sɛ hɑli hundi mo mɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ goono buyom bɔm gonu.
47005005	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ di tɛ i kunɑ, Ikpɛ no. À nɑ i nɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci i deimi jɛrɛ.
47005006	À sɛ no sɑɑ kulu i gundɑ himmɑ. I bei zɑ kɑ i goono gɑɑhɑm wɔne kunɑ i gɑ mooru ndɑ Kpe gɔrɛ dɔ.
47005007	Nɑɑne nɑ i gɑ dirɑ ndɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ndɑ diyom.
47005008	I gundɑ himmɑ. I bine gɑ bɑɑ i mɑ gɑɑhɑm wɔne nɑm kɑ gɔrɔ Kpe dɔ.
47005009	À sɛ nɑ, de gɑɑhɑm wɔne kunɑ no i bo gɔrɔ wɑlɑ i kɑɑ hunu ɑ̀ kunɑ no, i dee go wetere i mɑ kɑɑni ɑ̀ sɛ.
47005010	Tilɑsi no i kulu mɑ cɛ Mɛsiyɑ ciiti kɑrigɑ jine hɑli bɔrɔ kulu mɑ du ngɑ tɛyom bɔm kɑ simbɑ ndɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono gɑɑhɑm kunɑ, de ihinno no wɑlɑ ilɑlɔ nɑ.
47005011	Zɑ kɑ i go Kpe hɑmbure bei, ɑ̀ sɛ no i go ceeci i mɑ beerem bɛrɛ. Ammɑ i ci bɔrɔ kpɑrɛ yom Ikpɛ sɛ. A go tɑmmɑ mo i ci bɔrɔ kpɑrɛ yom wom bine kunɑ sendi kunɑ mo.
47005012	I si i bɔm sifɑ kpɛɛnɛ wom sɛ. Ammɑ i go wom no dɑɑmɑ wom mɑ fɑɑre ndɑ i yom. Wom mɑ du hɛ fɔ kɑ tu kɑ yeti beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ go fɑɑre ndɑ tɑkɑri, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ndɑ bine.
47005013	De i ci bɔmsikpɛ yom, i ci yɑ no Ikpɛ sɛ. De i ci bɔmkpɛ yom, i ci yɑ nɑ wom sɛ.
47005014	Mɛsiyɑ bɑɑkɑsine go kɑ i fum zɑmɑ i go wɔne bei siikɑ si zɑ kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ bu bɔrɔ kulu sɛ, yɑ di gɑɑ bɔrɔ kulu bu.
47005015	Mɛsiyɑ bine bu bɔrɔ kulu sɛ, zɑmɑ beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ hunɑ ǹ mɑ si hunɑ kpɛɛnɛ ngei bɔm sɛ. Ammɑ ǹ mɑ hunɑ ɑ̀ sɛ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bu kɑ tunu ǹ sɛ.
47005016	Hɑli ɑ̀ tɔ mɑɑsɑnkulu, i si bɔrɔ fɔ kulu bei zɑngɑ hɑndunyɑ go kɑ ɑ̀ bei. Ammɑ dom bɑ kɑ i nɑ Mɛsiyɑ bei zɑngɑ hɑndunyɑ, i si ɑ̀ bei kpɛɛnɛ zɑngɑ yɑ.
47005017	De bɔrɔ fɔ goono Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ, ngɑ yɑ ci tɑkɑhɛ teji. Hɛ zeenɔ yom bisɑ. Gunɑ, hɛ kulu tɛ iteji.
47005018	Hɛ kulu mo, Ikpɛ dɔ nɑ ɑ̀ go hunu. Ngɑ yɑ ɑ̀ nɑ sɑbɑ dɑm i yom ndɑ ngɑ gɑme Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ. A nɑ i no sɑsɑbɑndiyom gbei mo.
47005019	Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ no Ikpɛ goono ko sɑbɑ dɑm ngɑ ndɑ hɑndunyɑ gɑme. À si kɑ iburɑdɑm yom tɑɑli yom lɑsɑbu ǹ sɛ. À bine nɑ sɑsɑbɑndiyom sendi tɑlifi i gɑɑ.
47005020	Yɑ di gɑɑ i bɑrɑ nɑ beerem kɑ Ikpɛ sɑmbɑ Mɛsiyɑ sɑbu sɛ. Zɑngɑ Ikpɛ mee i go wom no himmɑ ko ŋmɑɑrɛ Mɛsiyɑ sɑbu sɛ, wom mɑ sɑbɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ fɑ.
47005021	Mɛsiyɑ mɑnɑ dulum bei. Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu, Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ i sɛ dulum zɑmɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ i mɑ tɛ Ikpɛ cɛɑndiyom susu.
47006001	I yom mo, i go gbei tɛ ndɑ Ikpɛ. À sɛ no, i go wom ŋmɑɑrɛ, wɑ si Ikpɛ gomini tɑ kɑ tɛ kɔnu.
47006002	À cii: "Lɔkɑci kɑ ɑ̀ hegu ɑ nɑ hɑngɑ dɑm n sɛ. Fɑɑbɑ hɑnu kunɑ mo, ɑ nɑ n gɑɑ." Gunɑ, mɑɑsɑnkulu lɔkɑci hegu. Mɑɑsɑnkulu fɑɑbɑ hɑnu nɑ.
47006003	I si dɛrɛyom hɛ sɑbɑbu dɑm bɔrɔ fɔ kulu jine zɑmɑ ǹ mɑ si i gbei yɑnce.
47006004	Ammɑ i go kɑ i bɔm cɛbɛ hɛ kulu kunɑ i yom yɑ Ikpɛ gbeiteeri yom no. I go gbei tɛ ndɑ suuru bɑmbɑtɑ. I goono tɑɑbi kunɑ. I goono zɑme kunɑ. I goono kɑnkɑmi kunɑ.
47006005	Ǹ go kɑ i bulɑɑlɑ mo. Ǹ go kɑ i dɑm kɑsu kunɑ. I goono kɔsɔngu kunɑ. I go gbei gɑɑbɔ yom tɛ. I go bɑtu ndɑ himmɑ. I go meehɔ zɑɑ.
47006006	I go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ hinneyom kunɑ. I gundɑ beiyom. I gundɑ suuru kuku. I go bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ cɛbɛ. I gundɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ. I gundɑ bɑɑkɑsine kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ munɑficitɛrɛ.
47006007	I go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ mo cimi sendi kunɑ. I gundɑ Ikpɛ dɑbɑri. I gundɑ cɛɑndiyom susu wɑngu jiine yom kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ ndɑ kɑmbɛwo gɑɑ.
47006008	I gɑ gbei tɛ bɛɛrɛ kunɑ ndɑ hɑwi kunɑ ndɑ sendi yɑmɔ ndɑ sendi hinno. Ǹ nɑ i gunɑ zɑngɑ zɑmbɑkpɛ yom, ɑmmɑ cimi no i go cii.
47006009	I yom yɑ ci zɑngɑ beerem kɑ ǹ si bei, ɑmmɑ bɔrɔ boobo go kɑ i bei. I ci zɑngɑ beerem kɑ ǹ bɑ bu ɑmmɑ gunɑ, i go hunɑ. I ci beerem kɑ ǹ bulɑɑlɑ ɑmmɑ ǹ mɑnɑ i wi.
47006010	I ci beerem kɑ ǹ bine gɑ sɑrɑ ɑmmɑ i go fɑihã sɑɑ kulu. I ci tɑlikɑ yom, ɑmmɑ i go bɑrikɑ dɑm jɑmɑ gɑɑ. I sindɑ hɛ fɔ kulu, ɑmmɑ hɛ kulu i ŋmɔne no.
47006011	To. Wom Kɔlɛntei, i sendi wom sɛ tɛrɛkpɑrɛ. I nɑ i bine yom feeri mo wom sɛ sã sã.
47006012	I mɑnɑ i bine yom dɑɑbu wom sɛ. Wom yɑ nɑ wom bine yom dɑɑbu i sɛ.
47006013	Wom mo, wɑ tɛ i sɛ yɑ di. A go sendi wom sɛ no zɑngɑ ɑ koo yom sɛ. Wom mo, wɑ wom bine yom feeri.
47006014	Wɑ si meigu zɑngɑ zuu fɔlɔnku kunɑ ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ si nɑɑne. Ifɔ yɑ goono Ikpɛ cɛɑndiyom susu ndɑ ilɑlɔ gɑme? Wɑlɑ ifɔ gɑɑ no kɑɑri ndɑ kube gɑ meigu?
47006015	Ifɔ yɑ goono Mɛsiyɑ ndɑ Beliɑ gɑme? Wɑlɑ ifɔ yɑ nɑɑnekɔ ndɑ zɑm kɑ nɑɑnekɔ meigu?
47006016	Ifɔ yɑ gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ gɔrɛ dɔ ndɑ tooru yom meigu? Wom yɑ ci Ikpɛ Hundikpɛ gɔrɛ dɔ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ cii: "A kɑɑ gɔrɔ ǹ kunɑ. A kɑɑ dirɑ ǹ bindi kunɑ. A kɑɑ ci ǹ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ. Ǹ kɑɑ tɛ ɑ jɑmɑ."
47006017	À sɛ nɑ Kpe cii: "Wɑ hunu ǹ bindi kunɑ. Wɑ fee ndei. Wɑ si lɑmbɑ hɛ ziibɔ gɑɑ. A kɑɑ wom tɑ.
47006018	Hɛɛ yɑ kɑɑ tɛ wom sɛ Bɑɑbɑ. Wom mo, wom kɑɑ tɛ ɑ sɛ koo yom, koo hɑibɔrɔ yom ndɑ koo weibɔrɔ yom. Kpe, hɛ kulu Dɑbɑrikpɛ cii yɑ di."
47007001	Yɑ di gɑɑ, ɑ bine bɑɑkɔei Ikpɛ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli nge yom di tɛ i sɛ. À sɛ no, i mɑ i bɔm hinnɑndi gɑɑhɑm ndɑ biyɑ ziibɑndikɔ kulu gɑɑ. I mɑ hɑlɑɑlɑtɛrɛ tɔɑndi Ikpɛ hɑmbure kunɑ.
47007002	Wɑ wom bine yom feeri i sɛ. I mɑnɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu dɛrɑndi. I mɑnɑ hɑsɑrɔ tɛ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu sɛ. I mɑnɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu ŋmɑɑ.
47007003	À mɑnɑ ci kɑ wom ciiti kɑ zeeri sɛ no ɑ go wɔne cii. A cii kɔ kɑ wom goono i bine yom kunɑ zɑ bu hɑli hunɑ.
47007004	A gundɑ nɑɑne bɑmbɑtɑ wom gɑɑ. A go fɑihã ndɑ wom kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. A bine du himmɑ wom sɑbu sɛ. A binekɑɑne go tɔntɔnu ndɑ bɑyom i tɑɑbi kulu bindi bindi.
47007005	Cimi no, sɑɑ kɑ i kɑɑ Mɑsedoni lɑɑbu mo i mɑnɑ du hulonzom kulu. I du kɑnkɑmi dimi boobo kɑmbu kulu gɑɑ. Beerem kɑkɔ ndɑ i yom. Hɑmburu mɑ goono i bine yom kunɑ.
47007006	Ammɑ Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go beerem kɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ cɛnɑndi yɑmɑrɑndi, ɑ̀ nɑ i yɑmɑrɑndi ndɑ Titu kɑɑyom.
47007007	À mɑnɑ ci ndɑ Titu kɑɑyomɑ hinne mo no, ɑmmɑ ndɑ yɑmɑrɑndiyom kɑ Titu bumbum du wom dɔ kpɛɛnɛ. Titu deede i sɛ bɛɛjɛ kɑ wom gundɑ ɑ sɛ. À deede i sɛ mo wom mundi ndɑ wom hɑnyɑ kɑ wom gundɑ ɑ sɛ. À sɛ no ɑ go fɑihã hɑli ǹ ci mɔsɔ.
47007008	Bɑ kɑ ɑ nɑ wom bine sɑrɑndi ndɑ ɑ tirɑ, ɑ mɑnɑ tɛ ɑ sɛ de ɑ dom bei. Bɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ɑ sɛ de ɑ dɑm bei, ɑ di no kɑ ɑ tirɑ nɑ wom bine sɑrɑndi bɑndɑ fɔ.
47007009	Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ go fɑihã. À mɑnɑ ci zɑmɑ ɑ nɑ wom bine sɑrɑndi ɑmmɑ zɑmɑ wom binesɛrɛ gɑɑ, wom tɔ tuubiyom dɔ. Wom bine sɑrɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ Ikpɛ sɛ hɑli hɛ kulu kunɑ wom mɑ si du muruse i dɔ.
47007010	Binesɛrɛ dimi kɑ Ikpɛ go bɑɑ, ɑ̀ go kɑɑndɑ bɔrɔ tuubi dɔ hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ du fɑɑbɑ sɛ. Tuubi mo no bɔrɔ si tunɑndi. Ammɑ binesɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu hɑndunyɑ dɔ, ɑ̀ go kɑɑndɑ bu.
47007011	Gunɑ, binesɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu Ikpɛ dɔ, wom nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ. À hɛi wom kunɑ kokɑri ndɑ wom bɔm hinnɑndiyom mo. Gunɑ, binetɔnɛ ndɑ hɑmburu ndɑ guuri ndɑ himmɑ ndɑ fɑɑsɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ. Hɛ kulu kunɑ wom nɑ wom bɔm cɛbɛ kɑ wom hinne ɑsiiri wɔ kunɑ.
47007012	Ngɑ di sɛ no ɑ hɑntum wom sɛ. A mɑnɑ hɑntum bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ tɑɑli tɛ sɑbu sɛ wɑlɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ̀ nɑ tɑɑli tɛ. Ammɑ ɑ hɑntum wom sɛ zɑmɑ kokɑri kɑ i gundɑ wom sɛ mɑ hunutɛrɛ wom sɛ Ikpɛ jine.
47007013	À sɛ no, wom nɑ i no himmɑ kɑ tɔntɔnu kpɛɛnɛ. I go fɑihã kɑlɑ kɑlɑ Titu binekɑɑne sɑbu sɛ zɑmɑ wom kulu nɑ ɑ̀ bine yeenɑndi.
47007014	A nɑ fɑɑri tɛ Titu gɑɑ ndɑ wom. Wom mɑnɑ ɑ hɑwɑndi. I nɑ hɛ kulu cii wom sɛ cimi bɔm. Yɑ nɑ i fɑɑri kɑ i go tɛ ndɑ wom Titu gɑɑ mo tɛ cimi.
47007015	Titu gundɑ wom binejijire kɑlɑ kɑlɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go hɔngɔ wom gɑnɑyom. Sɑɑ kɑ wom nɑ ɑ̀ kube wom hɑmburu kɑ gɑsi.
47007016	À sɛ no, ɑ go fɑihã ndɑ kɑ ɑ gundɑ nɑɑne wom gɑɑ hɛ kulu kunɑ.
47008001	Nyɑizei, i go bɑɑ wom mɑ bei Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ gomini no Mɑsedoni Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ yom sɛ.
47008002	Tɑɑbi suiyom boobo kunɑ ǹ fɑihã bɑ kɑ tɔntɔnu kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. Ǹ tɑlikɑtɛrɛ lɑlɔ kunɑ ǹ nɑ noyom tɛ ndɑ bine fɔ.
47008003	A gɑ ci sɛdɑ ǹ nɑ ngei hinɑ nɑ hɑli ɑ̀ bisɑ hɛ kɑ ǹ bumbum hini. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ no ndɑ bine fɔ.
47008004	Ǹ nɑ i ŋmɑɑrɛ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ i mɑ kpeindɑ gomini kɑ ngei tɛ kɑ meigu hɑlɑɑlɑntei sɛ.
47008005	Noyom kɑ ǹ tɛ bisɑ hɛ kɑ i tɑmmɑ. Sintine jinɑ ǹ nɑ ngei bɔm nɑ Kpe sɛ. À bɑndɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ binebɑɑ, ǹ nɑ ngei bɔm nɑ i yom mɑ, i sɛ.
47008006	À sɛ nɑ, i nɑ Titu nɑ himmɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ jinɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sinti ɑ̀ mɑ gomini gbei wɔ mɑ tɔnɑndi wom dɔ.
47008007	Ammɑ wom gɑ bɑ kɑ tɔntɔnu hɛ kulu kunɑ ndɑ nɑɑne kunɑ ndɑ sendi kunɑ. Wom gɑ bɑ kɑ tɔntɔnu beiyom kunɑ ndɑ himmɑ kulu kunɑ ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine kɑ wom gundɑ i sɛ kunɑ. Zɑngɑ yɑ wom mɑ bɑ kɑ tɔntɔnu gomini wɔ mɑ kunɑ.
47008008	A si sendi zɑngɑ kɑ meire nɑ bɑ. Ammɑ bɔrɔ cindei himmɑ sɑbu sɛ ɑ gɑ sendi kɑ wom bubure kɑ di hɑli wom bɑɑkɑsine gundɑ bine fɔ.
47008009	Wom gɑ kɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gomini bei. Bɑ kɑ bɑrikɑkpɛ no ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɔm tɛ tɑlikɑ wom sɑbu sɛ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ tɑlikɑtɛrɛ gɑɑ wom mo tɛ bɑrikɑkpɛ yom.
47008010	Wɔne kunɑ ɑ diyom no ɑ go cii yɑ zɑmɑ ɑ gundɑ wom sɛ hɑnfɑni. À mɑnɑ ci zɑmɑ wom sinti kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ hinne bo ɑmmɑ wom du binebɑɑ zɑ mɑnɑm.
47008011	Ngɑ di sɛ, mɑɑsɑ hɛ kɑ wom sinti, wɑ ɑ̀ tɔnɑndi. Zɑngɑ wom binebɑɑ tɔnɑndiyom goono, yɑ no tɛyom mo goono hɛ kɑ wom gundɑ bɔm.
47008012	De noyom goono ndɑ bine fɔ, hɛ kɑ bɔrɔ gundɑ bɔm ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci hɛ kɑ bɔrɔ sindɑ, ɑ̀ kɑɑni Ikpɛ sɛ.
47008013	À mɑnɑ ci i mɑ dɔgɔnɑndi cindei sɛ nɑ bo, wom wɔ, wom mo tɑɑbi ɑmmɑ kɑ wom mɑ sɑbɑ.
47008014	Hɑli sɑɑ kɑ wom goono bɑyom kunɑ wom mɑ hini kɑ beerem gɑɑ, nge yom kɑ ǹ goono bɑnji kunɑ. Hɑnu kɑ wom mo wom goono bɑnji kunɑ, ngei mo goono bɑyom kunɑ ǹ mɑ hini kɑ wom gɑɑ hɑli wom mɑ sɑbɑ.
47008015	Zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ kunnɑ iboobo, ɑ̀ wɑsɑ ɑkpɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ kunnɑ cɛnɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ gɑziɑ."
47008016	I mɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu ndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ himmɑ fɔlɔnku dɑm Titu bine kunɑ wom sɛ.
47008017	À nɑ i yɑmɑrɑndiyom tɑ. Zɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ himmɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ bumbum nufi ngɑ bine dɔ ngɑ mɑ kpei wom dɔ.
47008018	I go nyɑize fɔ dɔntɔm ɑ̀ bɑndɑ. Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ yom kulu go nyɑize di sɑɑbu ndɑ ɑ̀ gbei kɑ ɑ̀ go tɛ Bɑɑru Hinno kunɑ.
47008019	Ngɑ di bɑ si mo, Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ yom yɑ nɑ ɑ̀ suubɑ ɑ̀ mɑ nɑɑru i bɑndɑ gomini gbei wɔ kunɑ. I gɑ gbei wɔ tɔnɑndi kɑ kɑɑndɑ deizɑ Kpe sɛ kɑ cɛbɛ mɑ kɑ wom gundɑ bine fɔ ngɑ di kunɑ.
47008020	I gɑ lɑɑkɑli mɑ hɑli bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ si du kɑ i yɑnce kɑ simbɑ ndɑ nooru beeri wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono i kɑmbɛ.
47008021	Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ boori no i go ceeci, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Kpe hinne jine ɑmmɑ ndɑ iburɑdɑm yom mo jine.
47008022	I nɑ i nyɑize wɔne mo dɔntɔm ǹ bɑndɑ, ngɑ kɑ sɑɑ boobo i cini kɑ ɑ̀ himmɑ sui. Mɑɑsɑ mo ɑ̀ tɛ himmɑ kpɛɛnɛ kɑ tɔntɔnu nɑɑne bɑmbɑtɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ wom gɑɑ sɑbu sɛ.
47008023	Titu wɔ yɑ ci ɑ bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go gbei tɛ ndɑ hɛɛ wom sɑbu sɛ. I nyɑize yom mo kɑ ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ dum, Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ yom go kɑ ǹ sɑmbɑ no. Ǹ go kɑɑndɑ deizɑ Mɛsiyɑ sɛ mo.
47008024	Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ cɛbɛ ǹ sɛ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ yom jine wom bɑɑkɑsine ndɑ sɑbɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ i go fɑɑre ndɑ wom.
47009001	Kɑ simbɑ ndɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci gɑɑkɑsine hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom sɛ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ tɔ yɑ hɑntum wom sɛ.
47009002	A go wom bine fɔ bei, sɑbɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ go fɑɑre ndɑ wom Mɑsedoni beerem jine. A go cii kɑ Akɑyɑ beerem sɔlu beeni zɑ mɑnɑm. Wom himmɑ di bine nɑ nyɑize jɑmɑ zukum.
47009003	Ammɑ ɑ nɑ nyɑize yom dɔntɔm wom dɔ hɑli sɑbɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ i go fɑɑre ndɑ wom, ɑ̀ mɑ si tɛ kɔnu. A nɑ ǹ dɔntɔm zɑmɑ wom mɑ sɔlu mo zɑngɑ ɑ cii.
47009004	De Mɑsedoni beerem kɑɑ ɑ bɑndɑ ǹ mɑ si gɑru wom mɑnɑ sɔlu hɑli hɑwi gɑ i dii nɑɑne kɑ i gundɑ wom gɑɑ sɑbu sɛ. Yɑ mo no hɑwi kɑɑ wom dii.
47009005	À sɛ no, ɑ gunɑ ɑ̀ hegu ɑ sɛ yɑ nyɑizei nɑ himmɑ ǹ mɑ kpei wom dɔ jinɑ kɑ wom noyom kɑ ɑ̀ bɑ, kɑ wom nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɔne ɑlikɑwɑli tɛ kɔ meigu. À gɑɑ no sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ ɑ̀ mɑ goono sɔlɑntɛ zɑngɑ gomini hɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ndɑ tilɑsi.
47009006	Wom mɑ wɔne bei. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ dumɑ cɛnɑ, cɛnɑ no ɑ̀ kɑɑ wi. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ dumɑ iboobo mo, iboobo no ɑ̀ kɑɑ wi.
47009007	Bɔrɔ kulu mɑ no zɑngɑ ɑ̀ miilɑ ngɑ bine dɔ, binesɛrɛ mɑ si, tilɑsi mɑ si. Ikpɛ gɑ bɑɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go no ndɑ fɑihã.
47009008	Ikpɛ gundɑ dɑbɑri kɑ ngɑ gomini kulu tɔntɔnu wom sɛ ndɑ bɑyom, zɑmɑ hɛ kulu kunɑ wom mɑ gundɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ wɑsɑ sɑɑ kulu. Wom mɑ bɑ kɑ tɔntɔnu mo gbei hinno yom kulu sɛ.
47009009	Zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "À no kɑ dɑɑru. À nɑ tɑlikɑ yom no. À cɛɑndiyom susu goono, ɑ̀ sindɑ beeniyom."
47009010	Ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ dumɑkɔ nɑ dimi ndɑ ŋmɑɑri kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ŋmɑɑ, yɑ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ wom no dimi kɑ nɑm ɑ̀ mɑ bɑ kɑ tɔntɔnu. Wom cɛɑndiyom susu mo kɑɑ bɑrikɑ tɔntɔnu ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
47009011	À go nɑm wom mɑ tɛ bɑrikɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ hɑli wom hini kɑ noyom tɛ ndɑ bɑyom. À gɑɑ no, ǹ go kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu ndɑ noyom kɑ wom sɑmbɑ i dɔ.
47009012	Gɑɑkɑsine wɔ kɑ wom go tɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom zɑme hinne sɛ ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ nɑm mɑ bɔrɔ jɑmɑ gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
47009013	Gɑɑkɑsine wɔ gɑ cɛbɛ hɛ kɑ wom bɑrɑ. À sɛ nɑ, jɑmɑ gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu ndɑ kɑ wom nɑ Mɛsiyɑ Bɑɑru Hinno gɑnɑ. Ǹ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sɑɑbu mo ndɑ hɑibɑrikɑ yom kɑ wom fɑrisi ndei ndɑ cindei kulu.
47009014	Ǹ go kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ wom sɛ, ǹ gundɑ wom bɛɛjɛ mo gomini beeri kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ wom dɔ sɑbu sɛ.
47009015	I mɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu ɑ̀ noyom sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ cine.
47010001	Hɛɛ Pɔlu, ɑ gɑ wom ŋmɑɑrɛ ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ bɑɑniyom ndɑ ɑ̀ bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ goono wom bindi kunɑ ɑ bɑrɑ nɑ wom kulu ŋmɔne icɛnɑ, ɑmmɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ si wom dɔ ɑ bɑrɑ no yɑru.
47010002	A gɑ wom ŋmɑɑrɛ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ, wom mɑ si ɑ tilɑsi yɑ gbei ndɑ yɑrutɛrɛ. A go miilɑ yɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ i gunɑ zɑngɑ iburɑdɑm hɑɑli gɑnɑkɔ yom.
47010003	I go dirɑ gɑɑhɑm kunɑ ɑmmɑ i si tɑngɑm ndɑ zɑngɑ iburɑdɑm hɑɑli goono ndɑ.
47010004	I wɑngu jiine yom mɑnɑ ci hɑndunyɑ ŋmɔne yom. Ikpɛ wɑngu jiine dɑbɑrikpɛ yom no kɑ nungu gɑɑbikoni yom zeeri ndei.
47010005	I go lɑsɑbu kulu ndɑ fɑɑre kulu zeeri kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ ngei bɔm beerɑndi kɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ beiyom. I go lɑsɑbu kulu dɑm tɑmtɛrɛ kunɑ ɑ̀ mɑ Mɛsiyɑ gɑnɑ.
47010006	Sɑɑ kɑ wom gɑnɑyom kɑɑ kube, i sɔlu mɑ i mɑ beerem kulu kɑ ǹ si gɑnɑ bɑnɑ ǹ zɑm kɑ gɑnɑ sɛ.
47010007	Tɑkɑri nɑ wom gɑ gunɑ. De bɔrɔ fɔ gɑ nɑɑne ngɑ bɔm gɑɑ ngɑ yɑ Mɛsiyɑ ŋmɔne nɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ bei kɑ i yom mo Mɛsiyɑ bɔrɔ yom mo zɑngɑ nge yom.
47010008	Kpe nɑ i nɑ hini. À nɑ i nɑ ndɑɑ̀ zɑmɑ i mɑ wom nɑɑne cini. À mɑnɑ i nɑ hini zɑmɑ i mɑ wom zeeri. De ɑ go fɑɑre cɛnɑ fɔ ndɑ hini wɔ, hɑwi si ɑ dii.
47010009	A si bɑɑ beerem mɑ lɑsɑbu ɑ go wom hɑmburɑndi ndɑ ɑ tirɑ yom.
47010010	Bɔrɔ fɔ yom go cii: Pɔlu tirɑ yom gɑɑbu, ǹ futu mo. Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bumbum goono i kunɑ, ɑ̀ gɑɑhɑm bɑrɑ hinɑbunu no. À sendi mo mɑnɑ ci hɛ fɔ.
47010011	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ sendi zɑngɑ yɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ bei kɑ hɛ kɑ i gɑ hɑntum i tirɑ yom kunɑ de i si wom dɔ ndɑ hɛ kɑ i kɑɑ tɛ sɑɑ kɑ i kɑɑ wom dɔ, ǹ kulu ɑfɔ nɑ.
47010012	I si bɑɑ i mɑ i bɔm dɑm wɑlɑ i mɑ i bɔm sɑsɑbɑndi ndɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom kɑ ǹ go kɑ ngei bɔm sɑɑbu. Ngei wɔ neesiji nɑ ǹ tɛ ngei bɔm sɛ kɑ ngei bɔm neesi. Ǹ gɑ kɑ ngei bɔm sɑsɑbɑndi ndɑ ngei bɔm. Ǹ sindɑ fɑhɑm.
47010013	Ammɑ i yom, i si bɑɑ i mɑ fɑɑre kɑ bisɑ i kɔrɔme, kɔrɔme bɔm kɑ Ikpɛ Kɔrɔmekpɛ dumbu, i mɑ kpei hɑli wom dɔ.
47010014	Kɑ i kpei hɑli wom dɔ ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ, i mɑnɑ bisɑ i kɔrɔme.
47010015	I si fɑɑre ndɑ bɔrɔ fɔ gbei kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ i kɔrɔme. Ammɑ i gundɑ bɛɛjɛ wom nɑɑne mo tɔntɔnu kɑ beeri hɑli i bumbum gbei bɑ tɔntɔnu kɑ beeri wom gɑme i kɔrɔme kunɑ.
47010016	I mɑ wɑɑzu Bɑɑru Hinno bɔm lɑɑbu yom kɑ ǹ goono hɑli wom bisɑntɛ. Yɑ no i mɑ si fɑɑre ndɑ hɛ kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ ŋmɑni tɛ ngɑ kɔrɔme kunɑ.
47010017	Ammɑ "bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ fɑɑre, ɑ̀ mɑ fɑɑre Kpe kunɑ".
47010018	À mɑnɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ngɑ bɔm sifɑ nɑ, Ikpɛ go tɑbɑtɑndi bo, ɑmmɑ bɔrɔ kɑ Kpe go sifɑ.
47011001	A gɑ bɑɑ dee no wom mɑ ɑ sɑmutɛrɛ jɛrɛ ɑ sɛ cɛnɑ. Ammɑ cimi nɑ, wom mɑ suuru ɑ sɛ mo.
47011002	A go cɛnsɛ ndɑ wom ndɑ Ikpɛ cɛnsɛ dimi. A nɑ wom no kunye fɔlɔnku sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Mɛsiyɑ. A mɑ wom cɛɑndi ɑ̀ jine zɑngɑ weibɔrɔ hinno kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɑru bei.
47011003	Ammɑ ɑ go hɑmburu hɑli zɑngɑ gondi nɑ Efe zɑmbɑ ndɑ ngɑ cɛmbɛrɛ wom mo, wom lɑsɑbu yom mɑ si sɑrɑ. Wɑ si bɑndɑ bɛrɛ miilɑ hinno yom sɛ kɑ wom gundɑ Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ.
47011004	Ammɑ zɑngɑ sendi bɔrɔ go kɑɑ wom dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go Yesu fɔ ŋmɑni bɑɑru fɛɛ wom sɛ. À mɑnɑ ci wɔ kɑ i nɑ ɑ̀ fɛɛ wom sɛ di. Hɑnibɑ wom go biyɑ ŋmɑni fɔ tɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑnɑ wɔ kɑ wom tɑ dom. Hɑnibɑ wom du bɑɑru hinno ŋmɑni fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑnɑ wɔ kɑ wom tɑ. A go hɑmburu hɑli wom go suuru ndei kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
47011005	A go tɑmmɑ hɛ kulu gɑɑ no yɑ nɑ gɑziɑ diyɑ yom kɑ ǹ bisɑ ǹ kulu.
47011006	Ammɑ bɑ de ɑ si ŋmɑɑni sendi, ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu ɑ si zɑm beiyom. I bine nɑ ɑ̀ cɛbɛ wom gɑme hɛ kulu dɔ hɛ kulu kunɑ.
47011007	Wɑlɑ ɑ nɑ tɑɑli fɔ tɛ no kɑ ɑ nɑ ɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ hɑli ǹ mɑ wom bɛɛrɑndi zɑmɑ ɑ nɑ Ikpɛ Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu tɛ wom sɛ, bɑnɑndi si?
47011008	A nɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ fɔ yom kɔm kɑ du ǹ dɔ bɑnɑndi kɑ wom gɑɑ.
47011009	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ goono wom dɔ ɑ goono bɑɑyom kunɑ. Yɑ nɑ tɛ jɛrɔ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu sɛ. Nyɑize yom kɑ ǹ kɑɑ zɑ Mɑsedoni lɑɑbu, ǹ kɑɑndɑ ɑ sɛ hɛ kɑ gɑziɑ ɑ sɛ. Hɛ kulu gɑɑ nɑ, ɑ nɑ ɑ bɔm jɛ yɑ si tɛ wom sɛ jɛrɔ sɑbu sɛ. A gɑ ɑ bɔm jɛ mo.
47011010	Ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ cimi kɑ ɑ̀ goono ɑ kunɑ ɑ gɑ cii Akɑyɑ lɑɑbu kunɑ ǹ si kɑ ɑ gɑnji yɑ fɑɑre.
47011011	Ifɔ sɛ ɑ cii yɑ? A si bɑɑ wom sɛ no? Ikpɛ go bei kɑ ɑ gɑ bɑɑ wom.
47011012	Ammɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ go tɛ, ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ tɛ kpɛɛnɛ hɑli yɑ beerem wɔ kɔbɛ kɑɑ. Beerem wɔ go bɑɑ kɔbɛ ǹ mɑ fɑɑre kɑ cii ngei gɑ gbei tɛ zɑngɑ i yom.
47011013	Beerem nge yom di diyɑ tɑngɑri tɑngɑri yom nɑ. Ǹ ci gbeiteeri zɑmbɑntɛ yom. Ǹ go kɑ ngei bɔm tɛ zɑngɑ Mɛsiyɑ diyɑ yom.
47011014	À bine mɑnɑ ci mɑmɑci hɛ. Setɑm bumbum gɑ kɑ ngɑ bɔm tɛ zɑngɑ kɑɑri dɔntɔneize.
