47011015	À sɛ nɑ wɔne mɑnɑ ci hɛ fɔ de ǹ gbeiteeri yom mo go kɑ ngei bɔm tɛ zɑngɑ cɛɑndiyom susu gbeiteeri yom. Ǹ lɔkɑci beenɑntɛ ǹ kɑɑ du ngei gbei bɑnɑndi.
47011016	A go cii kpɛɛnɛ, bɑmee mɑ si ɑ gunɑ zɑngɑ sɑmu. De ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci yɑ, wɑ ɑ tɑ zɑngɑ sɑmu. Hɛɛ mo, yɑ fɑɑre cɛnɑ.
47011017	Hɛ kɑ ɑ go cii wɔ, ɑ si cii zɑngɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go hunu Kpe dɔ. Ammɑ zɑngɑ sɑmutɛrɛ kunɑ ɑ go sendi ndɑ yɑrutɛrɛ kɑ ɑ gundɑ ko fɑɑre.
47011018	Jɑmɑ go fɑɑre zɑngɑ iburɑdɑm hɑɑli goono ndɑ. Hɛɛ mɑ ɑ gɑ ɑ fɑɑri tɛ nɑ.
47011019	Zɑ kɑ wom yɑ hɑikusu yom no wom go suuru ndɑ sɑmu yom ndɑ bine fɔ.
47011020	Hɑnibɑ bɔrɔ fɔ go wom dɑm tɑmtɛrɛ wɑlɑ bɔrɔ fɔ gɑ wom ŋmɑɑ. Hɑnibɑ bɔrɔ fɔ gɑ wom dii wɑlɑ bɔrɔ fɔ gɑ kɑ ngɑ bɔm bɛɛrɑndi. Hɑnibɑ bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ wom sɑm moojine gɑɑ. Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu, wom go suuru ndɑ beerem di ndɑ bine fɔ.
47011021	Hɑwi gɑ kɑ ɑ dii ndɑ ɑ̀ ciiyom, zɑngɑ dee i yom wɔ i tɛ hinɑbunu yom nɑ. Ammɑ de bɔrɔ fɔ tu ngɑ mɑ fɑɑre ndɑ hɛ fɔ, hɛɛ mɑ, ɑ du ko fɑɑre kɑ bisɑɑ̀. A gɑ sendi no zɑngɑ sɑmutɛrɛ kunɑ.
47011022	Ebulu yom nɑ bɑ? Yɑ nɑ, hɛɛ mɑ. Isirɑilɑ ize yom no bɑ? Yɑ nɑ, hɛɛ mɑ. Abulɛmɑ bɑndɑ yom no bɑ? Yɑ no, hɛɛ mo.
47011023	Mɛsiyɑ gbeiteeri yom no bɑ? Yɑ no, hɛɛ mo kɑ bisei. A go sendi zɑngɑ sɑmu. A nɑ gbei tɛ kɑ bisei. Ǹ nɑ ɑ kɑru ce bɑɑbɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ dɑm kɑsu ce bɑɑbɑ. A di bu dullu ce boobo.
47011024	Ce gu yɑ nɑ, Yuifu yom nɑ ɑ bulɑɑlɑ ndɑ korongɑ mee weitɑɑci ɑfɔ si.
47011025	Ce hinzɑ yɑ no, ǹ nɑ ɑ kɑru ndɑ goobu. Ce fɔ mo ǹ nɑ ɑ cetu ndɑ tɑndi yom. Hɑsɑrɔ tɛ ɑ sɛ tɛku bɔm ce hinzɑ. A nɑ zɑɑri fɔ ndɑ ciini fɔ tɛ tɛku bɔm.
47011026	A gɑ nɑɑru ce bɑɑbɑ. A goono kɑtɑru kunɑ isɑ bɔm. A goono kɑtɑru kunɑ zee yom dɔ. A goono kɑtɑru kunɑ ɑ dimi yom dɔ. A goono kɑtɑru kunɑ dimi cindei dɔ. A goono kɑtɑru kunɑ wɑngɑrɑ yom kunɑ. A goono kɑtɑru kunɑ gɑnji yom kunɑ. A goono kɑtɑru kunɑ tɛku bɔm. A goono kɑtɑru kunɑ nyɑize tɑngɑri tɑngɑri yom dɔ.
47011027	Kɑnkɑmi kunɑ ɑ nɑ gbei futu yom tɛ. A zɑm jiibi ce boobo. A mɑɑ hɛrɛɛ. A mɑɑ jo. A nɑ meehɔ yom zɑɑ cɛrɛ bɔm. A mɑɑ yeeni. A gɔrɔ bumbum.
47011028	Afɔ yom kɑ yɑ nɑ cii bɑ si, hɑnu kulu mo ɑ go gɔrɔ ndɑ kɑrihã Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ yom kulu sɛ.
47011029	Mee yɑ ci hinɑbunu kɑ yɑ nɑ ci hinɑbunu? Mee no ǹ dɛrɑndi ɑ bine mɑnɑ kukure?
47011030	De ɑ̀ sɑbɑ bɔrɔ mɑ fɑɑre nɑ, ɑ hinɑbunutɛrɛ kunɑ no ɑ gɑ ɑ fɑɑri tɛ.
47011031	Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ Bɑɑbɑ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Bɑrikɑkpɛ beeniyom si, ɑ̀ go bei kɑ ɑ si tɑngɑri.
47011032	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ goono Dɑmɑku wɑngɑrɑ Kpe Aletɑ gbeiteeri gɑɑbikoni fɔ nɑ beerem dɑm kɑ hundi Dɑmɑku wɑngɑrɑ mee yom kulu gɑɑ ngɑ mɑ du kɑ ɑ dii.
47011033	Ammɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ zumɑndi cilɑ beeri fɔ kunɑ fune fɔ dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono yɛmbɛ gɑɑ hɑli ɑ du kɑ kɔmɑ ǹ kɑmbɛ.
47012001	Yɑ di gɑɑ, yɑ fɑɑri tɛ ɑ̀ sindɑ ɑ sɛ hɑnfɑni. Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu diyom ndɑ kɑɑyomtɛrɛ kɑ ɑ du Kpe dɔ, ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ sendi tɛ.
47012002	A gɑ Mɛsiyɑ bɔrɔ fɔ bei. Jiiri wei cindi tɑɑci goono mɑɑsɑ, Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ kɑ kpeindɑɑ̀ hɑli bɛɛnɛ hinzɑntɛ. Ammɑ ɑ si bei de cimi ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ gɑɑhɑm kunɑ kɑ kpeindɑ no, wɑlɑ de diyom fɔ no. Ikpɛ yɑ bei.
47012003	A go kɑ ɑkpɛ bei. Ammɑ ɑ si bei ndɑ cimi ɑ̀ goono gɑɑhɑm kunɑ no wɑlɑ diyom fɔ no. Ikpɛ yɑ bei.
47012004	Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ kɑ kpeindɑ Nungu Hinno bɛɛnɛ kunɑ. A mɑɑ sendi yom kɑ ǹ si cii kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ tu iburɑdɑm sɛ ɑ̀ mee mɑ ǹ sendi.
47012005	A gɑ ɑ fɑɑri tɛ ndɑ bɔrɔ ngɑ di. Ammɑ ɑ si fɑɑre ndɑ ɑ bɔm de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ndɑ ɑ hinɑbunutɛrɛ.
47012006	De ɑ gɑ bɑɑ yɑ fɑɑre dom, ɑ si ci sɑmu zɑmɑ cimi nɑ ɑ gɑ cii. Ammɑ ɑ gɑ kɑ ɑ bɔm fɑɑre nɑm. A si bɑɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ lɑsɑbu ɑ gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ bisɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ di ɑ gɑɑ wɑlɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ mɑɑ ǹ go cii ɑ gɑɑ.
47012007	Yɑ si bɔmbɛɛrɛ tɛ mo ndɑ kɑɑyomtɛrɛ bɑmbɑtɑ, Ikpɛ nɑ kɑriji fɔ dɑm ɑ gɑɑhɑm kunɑ. Kɑrijɑ yɑ ci hɛ kɑ Setɑm sɑmbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ gooru gooru zɑmɑ yɑ si bɔmbɛɛrɛ tɛ.
47012008	Ce hinzɑ no, ɑ nɑ Kpe ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ wɔne kɑɑ ɑ gɑɑ.
47012009	À bine cii ɑ sɛ: A gomini wɑsɑ ni zɑmɑ hinɑbunutɛrɛ kunɑ nɑ ɑ dɑbɑri cini tɔ. À sɛ no ɑ gɑ ɑ fɑɑri tɛ ihinno ndɑ ɑ hinɑbunutɛrɛ zɑmɑ Mɛsiyɑ dɑbɑri mɑ du kɑ gɔrɔ ɑ bɔm.
47012010	Ngɑ di sɛ no, ɑ̀ go kɑɑni ɑ sɛ hinɑbunutɛrɛ kunɑ ndɑ sendi yɑmɔ yom kunɑ ndɑ zɑme yom kunɑ ndɑ guruguze yom kunɑ ndɑ kɑnkɑmi yom kunɑ. À go kɑɑni ɑ sɛ Mɛsiyɑ sɑbu sɛ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ ci hinɑbunu, sɑɑ di gɑɑ dee no ɑ tɛ gɑɑbi.
47012011	Fɑɑre kunɑ ɑ tɛ sɑmu. Wom yɑ nɑ ɑ tilɑsi. Wom dɔ no ɑ himɑ yɑ du bɛɛrɛ. Yɑ nɑ gɑziɑ diyɑ yom kɑ ǹ bisɑ ǹ kulu. Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu yɑ nɑ ci hɛ fɔ kulu.
47012012	Cimi nɑ diyɑtɛrɛ ɑlɑmu yom ɑ nɑ ǹ tɛ wom bindi kunɑ. A nɑ ǹ tɛ ndɑ kokɑri kulu ndɑ ɑlɑmu yom ndɑ mɑmɑci yom ndɑ dɑbɑri gbei yom.
47012013	Ifɔ gɑɑ no wom gɑziɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ cindei? Yɑ nɑ tɛ wom sɛ jɛrɔ bɑ si, ɑ̀ gɑɑ nɑ wom gɑziɑ bɑ? Wom mɑ ɑ yɑɑfɑ ndɑɑ̀.
47012014	Gunɑ, ce hinzɑntɛ neyɑ kɑ ɑ sɔlu yɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ. A bine si gɔrɔ wom jɛsɛ bɔm zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci wom hɑibɑrikɑ yom nɑ ɑ go ceeci. Ammɑ ɑ go bɑɑ wom bumbum. À mɑnɑ ci koo yom yɑ meigu bɑhɛi yom sɛ ɑmmɑ bɑhɛi yom yɑ meigu ngei koo yom sɛ.
47012015	À sɛ no hɛɛ wɔ, ndɑ fɑihã no ɑ gɑ ɑ hɑibɑrikɑ kulu wi. A gɑ ɑ bumbum mɑ no wom hundi yom sɑbu sɛ. Bɑ de kɑ ɑ gɑ bɑɑ wom kɑlɑ kɑlɑ, wom bɑɑkɑsine ɑ sɛ gɑziɑ.
47012016	Tɑ. Yɑ nɑ gɔrɔ wom jɛsɛ bɔm. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑɑ tɑmmɑ cɛmbɛrɛ nɑ ɑ tɛ kɑ du wom.
47012017	Beerem kɑ ɑ dɔntɔm wom dɔ, ɑ nɑ ǹ dɑm ǹ mɑ wom ŋmɑɑ nɑ?
47012018	A nɑ Titu dɑm ɑ̀ mɑ kpei wom dɔ. A nɑ nyɑize fɔ mɑ dɑm ɑ̀ bɑndɑ. Titu nɑ wom ŋmɑɑ bɑ? Bine fɔ kunɑ nɑ i dirɑ. Turubɑ fɔlɔnkuei kunɑ no i dirɑ. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
47012019	Zɑ jɛyom wom go lɑsɑbu zɑngɑ wom dɔ nɑ i gɑ kɑ i bɔm hinnɑndi. Ikpɛ jine no i go sendi Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ. Hɛ wɔ kulu mo, ɑ bine bɑɑkɔei, i go kɑ ɑ̀ cii no wom nɑɑne ciniyom sɛ.
47012020	A go hɑmburu sɑɑ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ yɑ wom gɑru zɑngɑ ɑ si bɑɑ. Hɛɛ mo, wom gɑ ɑ gɑru zɑngɑ wom si bɑɑ. À mɑ si ci yɑ gɑru wom gɑme zoji wɑlɑ cɛnsɛ wɑlɑ binefute wɑlɑ kɑkɔ wɑlɑ sendi yɑmɔ wɑlɑ ciine wɑlɑ bɔmbɛɛrɛ wɑlɑ kɔsɔngu.
47012021	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ kpɛɛnɛ, ɑ̀ mɑ si tɛ Ikpɛ mɑ ɑ cɛnɑndi wom jine. A bine mo mɑ si sɑrɑ bɔrɔ boobo sɛ kɑ ǹ jinɑ kɑ dulum tɛ. Ǹ mɑnɑ tuubi mo kɑ fee ndɑ ziibi ndɑ zinɑ ndɑ hɑwizetɛrɛ kɑ ǹ tɛ.
47013001	A ce hinzɑntɛ neyɑ kɑ ɑ go kɑɑ wom dɔ. "Sɛdɑ hinkɑ wɑlɑ ihinzɑ gɑ ɑsiiri kulu gɔrɛndi".
47013002	A jinɑ kɑ wom kɑɑbɑɑru sɑɑ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ ce hinkɑntɛ. Mɑɑsɑ ɑ si wom dɔ, ɑ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cii kpɛɛnɛ kɑ jisi. A gɑ hɑntum beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ jinɑ kɑ dulum tɛ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ ye kɑ kɑɑ kpɛɛnɛ ɑ si ǹ bɑkɑɑ. A si cindei mɑ kulu bɑkɑɑ.
47013003	Wom gɑ sɛdɑ fɔ ceeci kɑ Mɛsiyɑ go sendi ɑ kunɑ. Tɑ. Mɛsiyɑ mɑnɑ tɛ wom sɛ hinɑbunu, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ ci gɑɑbikoni wom gɑme.
47013004	Hinɑbunutɛrɛ dɔ ǹ nɑ Mɛsiyɑ kɑnji. Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu, ɑ̀ gɑ hunɑ Ikpɛ dɑbɑri gɑɑ. I yom mo, i tɛ hinɑbunu yom ɑ̀ kunɑ. Ammɑ i kɑɑ hunɑ ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ Ikpɛ dɑbɑri gɑɑ wom hɑnfɑni sɛ.
47013005	Wo wom bɔm neesi ko wom bumbum gunɑ kɑ di hɑli wom goono nɑɑne kunɑ. Wom go bei kɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ goono wom kunɑ bɑ? De ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci yɑ, wom si hini kɑ wom nɑɑne cɛbɛ.
47013006	Ammɑ ɑ gɑ bɑɑ wom mɑ bei kɑ i yom wɔ, Ikpɛ mɑnɑ i furu.
47013007	Ammɑ ɑ gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ ŋmɑɑrɛ wom mɑ si hɛ lɑlɔ kulu tɛ bɑ cɛnɑ. À mɑnɑ ci zɑmɑ beerem mɑ di Ikpɛ nɑ i tɑbɑtɑndi, ɑmmɑ kɑ wom mo kɑ ihinno tɛ, i yom mo i mɑ ci zɑngɑ furɑntɛ yom.
47013008	I sindɑ dɑbɑri fɔ kɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ cimi. Ammɑ i mɑ cimi gbei tɛ.
47013009	I go fɑihã sɑɑ kɑ i tɛ hinɑbunu yom. Wom go tɛ gɑɑbikoni yom. I gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ ŋmɑɑrɛ wom mɑ ci tɔɑntɛ yom.
47013010	À sɛ nɑ, kɑ ɑ si wom dɔ ɑ nɑ hɛ yom wɔ hɑntum wom sɛ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ yɑ si futu wom gɑɑ. Kpe nɑ ɑ nɑ hini wom nɑɑne ciniyom sɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci wom zeeriyom sɛ.
47013011	Kɑ beeni ndɑ nyɑizei, wɑ fɑihã. Wɑ wom nɑɑne tɔɑndi. Wɑ cɛrɛ nɑ himmɑ. Wɑ gundɑ lɑsɑbu fɔlɔnku. Wɑ gɔrɔ ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne. Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Bɑɑkɑsinekpɛ ndɑ Lɑɑkɑli Kɑnekpɛ, ɑ̀ mɑ gɔrɔ ndɑ wom.
47013012	Wɑ cɛrɛ fɔɔ ndɑ jɛrɛbɛ sumsumyom hinno bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ. Hɑlɑɑlɑntei kulu gɑ wom fɔɔ.
47013013	Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gomini ndɑ Ikpɛ bɑɑkɑsine ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ bine fɔ meiguyom, ǹ mɑ gɔrɔ ndɑ wom kulu. Ami.
48001001	Hɛɛ Pɔlu, hɛɛ yɑ ci diyɑ. A diyɑtɛrɛ mɑnɑ hunu iburɑdɑm yom dɔ. A mɑnɑ du ɑ̀ bɔrɔ fɔ dɔ mo. Ammɑ ɑ tɛ diyɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ ndɑ Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ dɔ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Yesu tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme.
48001002	Hɛɛ ndɑ nyɑizei kulu kɑ ǹ goono ɑ dɔ, i go Gɑlɑte Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ yom kulu fɔɔ.
48001003	Gomini ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑni kɑ ǹ hunu Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ dɔ ndɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ, ǹ mo goono wom bɑndɑ.
48001004	Yesu wɔ nɑ ngɑ bɔm no i dulum yom sɑbu sɛ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ i kɑɑ mɑɑsɑ zɑmɑni lɑlɔ wɔ kunɑ i Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ binebɑɑ bɔm.
48001005	Deizɑ mɑ ci ɑ̀ ŋmɔne jiiri dubu ndɑ dubu yom. Ami.
48001006	A go mɑmɑci ndɑ kɑ wom go wɑɑsu kɑ fee ndɑ Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ wom cɛɛ Mɛsiyɑ gomini gɑɑ. Wom kpei bɑɑru hinno ŋmɑni fɔ dɔ.
48001007	Ammɑ Bɑɑru Hinno ŋmɑni fɔ si. Ammɑ beerem yɑ goono kɑ ǹ go wom bitɑndi. Ǹ go bɑɑ ngei mɑ Mɛsiyɑ Bɑɑru Hinno biriji.
48001008	Ammɑ bɑ i yom wɑlɑ bɛɛnɛ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu bɛɛnɛ yɑ nɑ bɑɑru ŋmɑni fɔ fɛɛ wom sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑnɑ wɔ kɑ i wɑɑzu wom sɛ, ɑkpɛ mɑ ci lɑɑliɑntɛ.
48001009	Zɑngɑ i jinɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cii, ɑ go kɑ ɑ̀ yɑɑrɑ kɑ cii mɑɑsɑ. De bɔrɔ fɔ go bɑɑru hinno ŋmɑni fɛɛ wom sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑnɑ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ kɑ wom tɑ kɔ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ci lɑɑliɑntɛ.
48001010	Mɑɑsɑ, ɑ go wetere beerem mɑ tu ɑ sɛ no, wɑlɑ Ikpɛ mɑ tu ɑ sɛ? Yɑ kɑɑni iburɑdɑm yom sɛ no ɑ go ceeci bɑ? De ɑ kɑɑni iburɑdɑm yom sɛ kpɛɛnɛ, dom ɑ si ci Mɛsiyɑ tɑm.
48001011	Nyɑizei, ɑ go bɑɑ wom mɑ bei Bɑɑru Hinno kɑ ɑ fɛɛ wom sɛ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ sɑbɑ ndɑ iburɑdɑm lɑsɑbu yom.
48001012	Yɑ nɑ du ɑ̀ iburɑdɑm dɔ wɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dendenɑndi bo. Yesu Mɛsiyɑ yɑ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ ɑ sɛ.
48001013	Wom mɑɑ ɑ gɔrɛ bɑɑru sɑɑ kɑ ɑ goono Yuifu yom gɑnɑyom kunɑ. A nɑ Ikpɛ mɑrgɑ guruguzɑndi hɑli ǹ ci mɔsɔ ko kɑ ɑ̀ hɑlɑci.
48001014	Wom mɑɑ mo zɑngɑ ɑ kpei jine Yuifu yom gɑnɑyom kunɑ kɑ bisɑ sɑrɑ boobo ɑ dimi kunɑ. A tɛ himmɑntɛ kɑ bisei, i cɛɛ yom ɑlɑɑdɑ yom gɑɑ.
48001015	Ammɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ jisi kɑmbu zɑ ɑ nyɑ gunde kunɑ kɑ ɑ cɛɛ ngɑ gomini gɑɑ.
48001016	À kɑɑni Ikpɛ sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ ngɑ Ize kɑɑtɛrɛ ɑ kunɑ zɑmɑ yɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑru fɛɛ dimi cindei sɛ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ di tɛ, mefɔ mefɔ yɑ sɑwɑrɑ ndɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu.
48001017	A bine mɑnɑ kpei Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ beerem dɔ kɑ ǹ jinɑ kɑ tɛ ɑ sɛ diyɑ. Ammɑ ɑ kpei Alɑbi lɑɑbu. À bɑndɑ ɑ ye kɑ kɑɑ Dɑmɑku wɑngɑrɑ kpɛɛnɛ.
48001018	Jiiri hinzɑ bɑndɑ ɑ kpei Yerusɑlɛm zɑmɑ ɑ mɑ Piɛɛ bei. A gɔrɔ ɑ̀ kpɑɑrɑ jiribi wei cindi gu.
48001019	Ammɑ yɑ nɑ di diyɑ yom bɑ ɑfɔ kɑlɑ Yɑkɔfu, Kpe cɛɛnɛ.
48001020	Hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ gɑ hɑntum wom sɛ, gunɑ Ikpɛ jine ɑ si tɑngɑri pɑi.
48001021	À bɑndɑ ɑ kpei Siriɑ lɑɑbu ndɑ Siliciɑ lɑɑbu.
48001022	Yude lɑɑbu Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ yom kunɑ ǹ si ɑ bei mɑɑ gɑɑ.
48001023	Ǹ mɑɑ hinne nɑ ǹ gɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ i guruguzɑndi, mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne fɔndɔ bɑɑru fɛɛ kɑ sɑɑ fɔ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hɑlɑci.
48001024	Ǹ nɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi ɑ sɑbu sɛ.
48002001	Jiiri wei cindi tɑɑci bɑndɑ ɑ ziji Yerusɑlɛm wɑngɑrɑ kpɛɛnɛ ndɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ. A nɑ Titu mɑ zɑɑ ɑ bɑndɑ.
48002002	A kpei nodi nɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ ɑ sɛ. A Bɑɑru Hinnɑ kɑ ɑ gɑ fɛɛ dimi cindei sɛ, ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ feeri ǹ sɛ. Ammɑ beerem kɑ ǹ ci jinɑ yom, ǹ sɛ no ɑ feeri kɑmbu zɑmɑ yɑ si gbei kɔnu tɛ wɑlɑ kɑ jinɑ kɑ gbei kɔnu tɛ.
48002003	Ammɑ bɑ Titu kɑ ɑ̀ goono ɑ bɑndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Gɑrɛku ǹ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ tilɑsɑndi kɑ dɑmbɑngu.
48002004	Sendi wɔ tɛ no nyɑize tɑngɑri tɑngɑri yom sɑbu sɛ kɑ ǹ mɔnɔ kɑ hurɑ i kunɑ. Ǹ huro kɑ i bɔrɔcinitɛrɛ kɑ i gundɑ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ gunɑ gunɑ hɑli ngei mɑ du kɑ i dɑm tɑmtɛrɛ kunɑ.
48002005	I bine i mɑnɑ tu kɑ i bɔm yeti gɑndɑ ǹ sɛ bɑ lɔkɑci cɛnɑ zɑmɑ Bɑɑru Hinno ŋmɔne cimi mo gɔrɔ wom gɑme.
48002006	Ammɑ beerem kɑ ǹ cii ǹ gundɑ bɛɛrɛ zɑngɑ ǹ bɑrɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu, ɑ bɑ si ndɑ ngɑ di. Ikpɛ si bɑɑbɑɑ tɛ. Bɔrɔ beeri yom mɑnɑ hɛ fɔ kulu tɔntɔnu ɑ sɛ.
48002007	Ammɑ ǹ di Ikpɛ nɑ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ tɑlifi ɑ gɑɑ yɑ fɛɛ dimi cindei sɛ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ tɑlifi Piɛɛ gɑɑ ɑ̀ mɑ fɛɛ Yuifu yom sɛ.
48002008	Ikpɛ nɑ gbei tɛ Piɛɛ kunɑ ɑ̀ mɑ tɛ diyɑ Yuifu yom sɛ. Yɑ mo no Ikpɛ nɑ gbei tɛ hɛɛ mo, ɑ kunɑ yɑ tɛ diyɑ dimi cindei sɛ.
48002009	Yɑkɔfu ndɑ Sefɑ ndɑ Yohɑnnɑ kɑ beerem cii ngei yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ kɑɑsɑ yom, ǹ di gomini kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ nɑ. Ǹ nɑ i no nyɑizetɛrɛ dɑmyom kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ, hɛɛ ndɑ Bɑɑnɑbɑ sɛ zɑmɑ i mɑ kpei dimi cindei dɔ, ngei mo mɑ kpei Yuifu yom dɔ.
48002010	Ǹ cii i sɛ hinne i mɑ hɔngɔ tɑlikɑ yom. Ngɑ di niyɑ no ɑ gundɑ.
48002011	Ammɑ kɑ Piɛɛ kɑɑ Antiɔku ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ kɔnkɔm moo ndɑ moo zɑmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ tɑɑli tɛ.
48002012	Zɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom mɑnɑ hunu Yɑkɔfu dɔ, Piɛɛ cini ŋmɑɑ ndɑ dimi cindei. Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ kɑɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɔm cendi kɑ hunu ŋmɑni, zɑmɑ ɑ̀ hɑmburu Yuifu yom.
48002013	Yuifu yom mo ndɑ Piɛɛ nɑ munɑficitɛrɛ tɛ hɑli Bɑɑnɑbɑ mo ye ǹ bɑndɑ ǹ munɑficitɛrɛ kunɑ.
48002014	Ammɑ kɑ ɑ di ǹ si dirɑ susu ndɑ zɑngɑ Bɑɑru Hinno cimi goono ndɑ, ɑ sendi Piɛɛ sɛ ǹ kulu jine. À cii: De ni, kɑ n ci Yuifu n goono zɑngɑ dimi cindei ɑ̀ nɑ ci zɑngɑ Yuifu yom, mɛtɛ n tɛ kɑ dimi cindei tilɑsɑndi ǹ mɑ Yuifu yom fɔndɑ gɑnɑ?
48002015	Ǹ nɑ i hɛi Yuifu yom, ɑ̀ nɑ ci dulumkoni yom dimi cindei kunɑ.
48002016	I go bei mo kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ci Moisi fɔndɑ tɛgbei yom gɑɑ no, Ikpɛ go bɔrɔ cɛɑndi susu. Ammɑ ɑ̀ go bɔrɔ cɛɑndi susu nɑɑne gɑɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ. I yom mo i nɑɑne Mɛsiyɑ Yesu gɑɑ zɑmɑ i mɑ du cɛyom susu nɑɑne gɑɑ Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ. I si du ɑ̀ Moisi fɔndɑ tɛgbei yom gɑɑ. Sɑbɑbu yɑ ci kɑ bɔrɔ si kɑ Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ cɛɑndi susu fɔndɑ tɛgbei yom gɑɑ.
48002017	De i go ceeci i mɑ du cɛyom susu Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ ɑmmɑ beerem di i yom yɑ dulumkoni yom no, Mɛsiyɑ nɑ i dɑm i mɑ dulum tɛ bɑ? Awo. À si tɛ.
48002018	De ɑ yɑɑrɑ kɑ cini hɛ yom kɑ ɑ zeeri, ɑ go kɑ ɑ bɔm cɛbɛ fɔndɑ dɑɑrumkɔ noyɑ.
48002019	Hɛɛ wɔ, fɔndɑ dɔ nɑ ɑ bu fɔndɑ sɛ zɑmɑ yɑ hunɑ Ikpɛ sɛ.
48002020	Ǹ nɑ ɑ kɑnji Mɛsiyɑ bɑndɑ. Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu ɑ go hunɑ ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci hɛɛ yɑ gɑ hunɑ. Mɛsiyɑ yɑ go hunɑ ɑ kunɑ. Hundi wɔ kɑ ɑ go hunɑ ndɑ mɑɑsɑ gɑɑhɑm kunɑ, ɑ go hunɑ no ndɑ nɑɑne. A go nɑɑne Ikpɛ Ize gɑɑ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑ hɛɛ kɑ ngɑ bɔm no kɑ bu ɑ sɑbu sɛ.
48002021	A si Ikpɛ gomini yeti kɔnu zɑmɑ de Moisi fɔndɑ gɑnɑyom dɔ no cɛyom susu goono, Mɛsiyɑ bu no kɔnu.
48003001	E Gɑlɑte sɑmu yom kɑ wom bɑrɑ, mee yɑ nɑ wom dɛrɑndi hɑli wom si cimi gɑnɑ? Wom moo jine no ǹ nɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ cɛbɛ tɛrɛkpɑrɛ kɑnjɑntɛ.
48003002	Hɛ kɑ ɑ gɑ bɑɑ yɑ bei wom dɔ hinne neyɑ. Fɔndɑ gbei yom bɔm no wom du Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dee wɑlɑ zɑmɑ wom mɑɑ Bɑɑru Hinno kɑ nɑɑne nɑ?
48003003	Wom sɑmutɛrɛ tɔ hɑli yɑ wɔ? Wom sinti ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ. Mɑɑsɑ wom yɑ wom bɔm tɔɑndi ndɑ wom bɔm gɑɑbi bɑ?
48003004	Wom nɑ tɑɑbi boobo hɑm nɑ kɔnu bɑ? Awo, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci kɔnu.
48003005	Ikpɛ bine go wom no Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kɑ dɑbɑri gbei yom tɛ wom gɑme. Fɔndɑ tɛgbei bɔm no ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ dee wɑlɑ zɑmɑ wom mɑɑ Bɑɑru Hinno kɑ ɑ̀ nɑɑne?
48003006	Zɑngɑ yɑ no Abulɛmɑ nɑɑne Ikpɛ, Ikpɛ nɑ nɑɑne lɑsɑbu ɑ̀ sɛ cɛyom susu kunɑ.
48003007	Ngɑ di sɛ, wom mɑ bei beerem kɑ ǹ gundɑ nɑɑne, ngei yɑ ci Abulɛmɑ koo yom.
48003008	Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ bine jinɑ kɑ jisi kɑ Ikpɛ mɑ dimi cindei cɛɑndi susu nɑɑne gɑɑ. À gɑɑ no Ikpɛ jinɑ kɑ Bɑɑru Hinno fɛɛ Abulɛmɑ sɛ kɑ cii: "Hɑndunyɑ dimi yom kulu kɑɑ du bɑrikɑ n dɔ."
48003009	Zɑngɑ Ikpɛ nɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm Abulɛmɑ gɑɑ dom ɑ̀ nɑɑne sɑbu sɛ, yɑ no beerem kulu kɑ ǹ gɑ nɑɑne, Ikpɛ gɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm ǹ gɑɑ.
48003010	Beerem kulu kɑ ǹ go nɑɑne fɔndɑ gɑnɑyom gɑɑ, ǹ goono lɑɑli cire. Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Lɑɑliɑntɛ nɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ si moo dɑm ko tɛ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ goono hɑntumɑntɛ fɔndɑ tirɑ kunɑ".
48003011	Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu si kɑ ɑ̀ du cɛyom susu Ikpɛ jine fɔndɑ bɔm. Ngɑ di tɛrɛkpɑrɛ no, domi "nɑɑne bɔm no bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cɛsusu kɑɑ hunɑ".
48003012	Bɑ kɑ fɔndɑ si nɑɑne bɔm Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go fɔndɑ meire yom gɑnɑ, ɑkpɛ kɑɑ hunɑ ǹ gɑɑ".
48003013	Mɛsiyɑ nɑ i fɑnsɑ fɔndɑ lɑɑli gɑɑ zɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ lɑɑliɑntɛ i sɑbu sɛ. Zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Lɑɑliɑntɛ no bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ kɔtɔ tuuri gɑɑ".
48003014	Ngɑ di tɛ mo no zɑmɑ bɑrikɑ kɑ Ikpɛ no Abulɛmɑ sɛ mɑ tɔ dimi cindei gɑɑ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu dɔ. À tɛ mo hɑli i mɑ du Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ nɑɑne dɔ wɔ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli tɛ i mɑ du.
48003015	Nyɑizei, ɑ gɑ sendi no ndɑ zɑngɑ iburɑdɑm kulu go fɑhɑm ndɑ. Bɑ iburɑdɑm ɑlikɑwɑli kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑhirɑndi, bɔrɔ fɔ kulu si kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi wɑlɑ kɑ tɔntɔnu ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
48003016	Ikpɛ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli yom tɛ Abulɛmɑ sɛ ndɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ sɛ. À mɑnɑ cii bɑndɑ yom sɛ zɑngɑ bɔrɔ boobo no, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ cii "n bɑndɑ sɛ" zɑngɑ bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku noyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Mɛsiyɑ.
48003017	A go wɔne cii. Ikpɛ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli dɑhirɑndi Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ dɑm. Fɔndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ jiiri zɑngu tɑɑci ndɑ wɑrɑnzɑ bɑndɑ, ɑ̀ si hini kɑ ɑlikɑwɑlɑ tunɑndi kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ kɔnu.
48003018	De fɔndɑ dɔ nɑ tubu go hunu, dom ɑ̀ si hunu ɑlikɑwɑli dɔ. Ammɑ Ikpɛ nɑ Abulɛmɑ nɑ tubu ngɑ ɑlikɑwɑli gɑɑ.
48003019	Yɑ di gɑɑ, ifɔ sɛ no fɔndɑ goono? Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tɔntɔnu nɑ fɔndɑ dɑɑrumyom sɑbu sɛ kɑlɑ bɑndɑ mo kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑlɑ tɛ mɑ kɑɑ. Ikpɛ nɑ fɔndɑ sɑmbɑ ngɑ dɔntɔneize yom dɔ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci sɑsɑbɑndikɔ fɔ kɑmbɛ kunɑ.
48003020	Sɑsɑbɑndikɔ wɔ mɑnɑ ci bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku sɑsɑbɑndikɔ. Ammɑ Ikpɛ wɔ ngɑ fɔ nɑ.
48003021	Ngɑ di sɛ, fɔndɑ go gɑɑbɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ ɑlikɑwɑli yom no bɑ? Awo. À si tɛ. De Ikpɛ nɑ fɔndɑ no kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ hini kɑ hundi nɑ, dom cɛyom susu hunu fɔndɑ gɑɑ.
48003022	Ammɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: Ǹ nɑ bɔrɔ kulu dɑm kɑ dɑɑbu dulum dɑbɑri cire zɑmɑ ɑlikɑwɑli kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ no beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ go nɑɑne Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gɑɑ.
48003023	Hɑli nɑɑne kɑɑ Ikpɛ nɑ i jisi kɑ dɑɑbu fɔndɑ cire nɑɑne sɛ, nɑɑne kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑtɛrɛ.
48003024	Yɑ di gɑɑ fɔndɑ tɛ i sɛ zɑngɑ koo bɑtukɔ noyɑ kɑlɑ Mɛsiyɑ kɑɑ zɑmɑ i mɑ du cɛyom susu nɑɑne gɑɑ.
48003025	Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ kɑ nɑɑne kɑɑ i si kɑɑ bɑtukɔ dɑbɑri cire kpɛɛnɛ.
48003026	Wom kulu Ikpɛ ize yom no nɑɑne dɔ zɑmɑ wom go nɑɑne Mɛsiyɑ gɑɑ.
48003027	Wom kulu kɑ ǹ nɑ wom mirɑndi Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ, wom nɑ Mɛsiyɑ fɑkɑ zɑngɑ tɑɑfɛ.
48003028	Mɑɑsɑ fɑyɑnkɑ si Yuifu ndɑ dimi cindei gɑme wɑlɑ tɑm ndɑ bɔrɔcini gɑme wɑlɑ hɑibɔrɔ ndɑ weibɔrɔ gɑme. Wom kulu ci ɑfɔ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ.
48003029	De wom ci Mɛsiyɑ ŋmɔne yom, wom ci Abulɛmɑ bɑndɑ yom noyɑ. Wom ci tubukɔ yom mo ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑlikɑwɑli goono ndɑ.
48004001	Ammɑ ɑ gɑ cii wom sɛ, sɑɑ kulu kɑ tubukɔ goono koo cɛnɑ, fɑyɑnkɑ si ngɑ ndɑ tɑm gɑme, bɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ci hɛ kulu kpe.
48004002	Ammɑ ɑ̀ goono koo bɑtukɔ yom ndɑ bɑndɑbɔrɔ yom kɑmbɛ kɑlɑ lɔkɑci kɑ bɑɑbɑ jisi.
48004003	Yɑ nɑ i yom mo. Sɑɑ kɑ i goono koo cɛnɑ yom, i goono tɑmtɛrɛ kunɑ hɑndunyɑ hɛ yom sɛ.
48004004	Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ lɔkɑci tɔ, Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ Ize dɔntɔm, Ize kɑ weibɔrɔ fɔ hɛi. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɛi fɔndɑ cire.
48004005	À kɑɑ domi ɑ̀ mɑ wɔ kɑ yom goono fɔndɑ cire fɑnsɑ hɑli i mɑ du kootɛrɛ dɑmyom kɑ ci Ikpɛ ize yom.
48004006	Zɑ kɑ wom ci koo yom Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ Ize Biyɑ dɔntɔm wom bine yom kunɑ. À go kuwɑ kɑ cii: Bɑɑbɑ, ɑ Bɑɑbɑ.
48004007	Zɑngɑ yɑ n mɑnɑ ci tɑm kpɛɛnɛ ɑmmɑ n ci ize. Zɑ kɑ n ci ize, n tɛ Ikpɛ tubukɔ mo Mɛsiyɑ dɔ.
48004008	Sɑɑ di wom mɑnɑ Ikpɛ bei ɑmmɑ wom tɑmtɛrɛ tooru yom sɛ wɔ kɑ yom ǹ hɑɑli gɑɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ci ikpɛ yom.
48004009	Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ, wom go kɑ Ikpɛ bei, hɑli yɑ mo Ikpɛ go wom bei. Mɛtɛ wom tɛ kɑ ye hɑndunyɑ hɛ yom gɑɑ, hɛ kɔnu yom kɑ ǹ sindɑ gɑɑbi? Wom bɑɑ wom mɑ ye hɛ nge yom di tɑm yom kpɛɛnɛ?
48004010	Wom go hɑnu yom ndɑ hɑndu yom ndɑ Iɔkɑci yom ndɑ jiiri yom lɑsɑbu kɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ ǹ sɛ.
48004011	Wom tɛyom wɔ sɑbu sɛ ɑ go hɑmburu, hɑnibɑ gbei kɔnu nɑ ɑ tɛ wom gɑme.
48004012	Nyɑizei, ɑ go wom ŋmɑɑrɛ, wom mɑ goono zɑngɑ hɛɛ zɑmɑ hɛɛ mo ɑ goono zɑngɑ wom. Wom mɑnɑ dɛrɛ ɑ sɛ bɑ ce fɔ.
48004013	Ammɑ wom go bei gɑɑhɑm hinɑbunu kunɑ nɑ ɑ nɑ wom wɑɑzu ndɑ Bɑɑru Hinno zɑ sintine.
48004014	Bɑ kɑ ɑ hinɑbunutɛrɛ ci suiyom hɛ wom sɛ, wom mɑnɑ ɑ fɛntɛ. Wom mɑnɑ hungu hɛɛ. Ammɑ wom nɑ ɑ tɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize, zɑngɑ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu cine.
48004015	Bine, ifɔ yɑ ci wom bɑrikɑ? A go wom sɛdɑ kɑ cii de ɑ̀ hini kɑ tɛ, dom wom mɑ wom moo yom kɑɑ kɑ ɑ nɑ ndei.
48004016	Yɑ di gɑɑ, wom go kɑ ɑ lɑsɑbu zɑngɑ wom ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ no zɑmɑ ɑ gɑ cimi cii wom sɛ?
48004017	Beerem di kɑ ǹ gɑ wom dɛrɑndi gundɑ himmɑ kɑ simbɑ wom, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci himmɑ hinno. Ǹ go bɑɑ nɑ ngei mɑ wom kɑɑ ŋmɑni i sɛ zɑmɑ wom mɑ gundɑ himmɑ ngei dɔ hɛrɛ.
48004018	À boori bɔrɔ mɑ gundɑ himmɑ hɛ hinno gɑɑ sɑɑ kulu. À si boori bɔrɔ mɑ gundɑ himmɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ goono wom dɔ hinne.
48004019	A koo yom, ɑ gɑ mɑɑ doori wom sɛ kpɛɛnɛ zɑngɑ weibɔrɔ gɑ hɛizɛnyɛ tɛ kɑlɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑ tɛ kɑ boori wom kunɑ.
48004020	Oò, bɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ go bɑɑ yɑ goono wom bɑndɑ kɑ ɑ jinde bɑɑnɑndi. Ammɑ ɑ gundɑ kɑrihã wom sɑbu sɛ.
48004021	Wom mɑ cii ɑ sɛ, wom kɑ wom go bɑɑ wom mɑ goono Moisi fɔndɑ cire, wom si fɑhɑm hɛ kɑ fɔndɑ gɑ cii bɑ?
48004022	Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii Abulɛmɑ du koo hɑibɔrɔ hinkɑ. Afɔ kɔngɔ gɑɑ no, ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɛi, ɑfɔ mɑ bɔrɔcini weibɔrɔ gɑɑ.
48004023	Wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu kɔngɔ di gɑɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ hɛi no ndɑ zɑngɑ gɑɑbɑsi goono ndɑ. Wɔ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɛi bɔrɔcini weibɔrɔ di gɑɑ mɑ, ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɛi no ɑlikɑwɑli gɑɑ.
48004024	Hɛ nge yom di ŋmɔne yɑɑse yom neyɑ. Weibɔrɔ hinkɑ di himɑ ɑlikɑwɑli hinkɑ no. Afɔ Sinɑi tɑndi kuku dɔ nɑ ɑ̀ hunu. Tɑmtɛrɛ sɛ no, ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɛi. Ngɑ yɑ ci Agɑi.
48004025	Agɑi wɔ Alɑbi lɑɑbu kunɑ Sinɑi tondi kuku no ɑ̀ himɑ. Agɑi sɑbɑ mɑ ndɑ Yerusɑlɛm mɑɑsɑ ŋmɔne, zɑmɑ ɑ̀ goono tɑmtɛrɛ kunɑ ndɑ ngɑ kɑɑ yom.
48004026	Ammɑ Yerusɑlɛm bɛɛnɛ ŋmɔne kɑ ɑ̀ ci bɔrɔcini, ngɑ yɑ ci i kulu nyɑ.
48004027	Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "E weibɔrɔ, ni kɑ n mɑnɑ hɛi, n mɑ fɑihã ndɑ binekɑɑne kɑ kuwɑ. Ni kɑ n mɑnɑ hɛiyom dɑɑri bei domi weibɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ kunyɑ fee ndɑ, ɑ̀ koo yom bɑ kɑ bisɑ kunyekpɛ koo yom."
48004028	Ammɑ nyɑizei, i yom yɑ ɑlikɑwɑli ize yom no zɑngɑ Isɑɑkɑ.
48004029	Ammɑ wɔ kɑ ǹ hɛi gɑɑhɑm dɔ ɑ̀ nɑ wɔ kɑ ǹ hɛi Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ guruguzɑndi. Yɑ nɑ ɑ̀ goono bɑ mɑɑsɑ mɑ.
48004030	Ammɑ ifɔ nɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ gɑ cii? "N mɑ kɔngɔ gɑɑrɛ ndɑ ɑ̀ koo zɑmɑ kɔngɔ koo si tubu pɑi ndɑ weibɔrɔ bɔrɔcini koo".
48004031	À sɛ no nyɑizei, i mɑnɑ ci kɔngɔ ize yom ɑmmɑ i yom yɑ weibɔrɔ bɔrɔcini ize yom no.
48005001	Mɛsiyɑ nɑ i fɑnsɑ kɑ i nɑ bɔrɔcinitɛrɛ. Ngɑ di sɛ wom mo cɛ kɑ boori bɔrɔcinitɛrɛ wɔ kunɑ fɑ. Wom mɑ si nɑm bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ wom dɑm tɑmtɛrɛ zuu kunɑ kpɛɛnɛ.
48005002	Gunɑ, hɛɛ Pɔlu ɑ go sendi wom sɛ, de wom tu ǹ mɑ wom dɑmbɑngu, Mɛsiyɑ si hɛ fɔ kulu hinsɑ wom sɛ.
48005003	A go sɛdɑ mo kpɛɛnɛ kɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ tu ǹ mɑ ngɑ dɑmbɑngu ɑ̀ ci gɑrɔkoni kɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ fɔndɑ kulu tɔnɑndi.
48005004	Wom kulu kɑ wom go cɛyom susu ceeci fɔndɑ gɑɑ, wom fee ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ. Wom dɛrɛ gomini gɑɑ.
48005005	I gundɑ bɛɛjɛ Ikpɛ gɑ i cɛɑndi susu ngɑ jine. I go kɑ ngɑ di bɑtu Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɑbɑri gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go gbei tɛ i nɑɑne dɔ.
48005006	Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ zɑ bɑngudɑmyom hɑli zɑm kɑ dɑmbɑngu, ǹ bɑ ɑfɔ sindɑ nɑfɑ. Ammɑ nɑɑne kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ gbei tɛ bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ gundɑ nɑfɑ.
48005007	Dom di, wom go zuuru ihinno. Mee yɑ nɑ wom dii kɑ jɛ wom mɑ si cimi gɑnɑ?
48005008	Bɔrɔ bɛrɛyom wɔne mɑnɑ hunu Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ wom cɛɛ dɔ fɑ.
48005009	Buuru hɑmine kɑsɑmi cɛnɑ go buuru gɑɑtɑ kulu tunɑndi.
48005010	A gundɑ nɑɑne wɔne wom gɑɑ Kpe kunɑ kɑ wom si lɑsɑbu ŋmɑni tɛ. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go wom lɑɑkɑli tunɑndi, bɔrɔ kɑ dimi no kulu kɑlɑ Ikpɛ mɑ bɑnɑ ɑ̀ sɛ.
48005011	Ammɑ nyɑizei, de ɑ go bɑngudɑmyom sendi wɑɑzu kpɛɛnɛ, ifɔ sɛ ǹ go kɑ ɑ guruguzɑndi kpɛɛnɛ? Bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ si tɛ kɑtiyom hɛ kpɛɛnɛ.
48005012	A go bɑɑ beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ wom lɑɑkɑli tunɑndi, ǹ mɑ ngei bɔm dumbu dumbu kɑ ye zɑngɑ bɔrɔ mɑntɑm yom.
48005013	Nyɑizei, Ikpɛ nɑ wom cɛɛ bɔrɔcinitɛrɛ sɛ. Ammɑ wom mɑ si bɔrɔcinitɛrɛ wɔ tɛ kɔbɛ bineibɑɑi sɛ. Ammɑ wɑ tɑmtɛrɛ cɛrɛ sɛ bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ.
48005014	Moisi fɔndɑ kulu sendi fɔlɔnku kunɑ no ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɔnɑndi. Ngɑ neyɑ: "N mɑ bɑɑ n gɔrɔkɑsine zɑngɑ n bɔm".
48005015	Ammɑ de wom go cɛrɛ nɑmɑ ko cɛrɛ ŋmɑɑ zɑngɑ gɑnjihɑm yom, wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli wom mɑ si cɛrɛ ŋmɑɑ sã sã.
48005016	Ammɑ ɑ go cii no, wom mo dirɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ gɑɑ. À gɑɑ no wom si bineibɑɑi tɔnɑndi.
48005017	Bineibɑɑi go gɑɑbɑ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ. Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ go gɑɑbɑ ndɑ bineibɑɑi. Ǹ go gɑɑbɑ ndɑ cɛrɛ hɑli hɛ kulu kɑ wom go bɑɑ mɑ si tɛ, wom si hini kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ mo.
48005018	Ammɑ de Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ go wom cendi, kulu wom si Moisi fɔndɑ cire.
48005019	Bineibɑɑi gbei yom bine tɛrɛkpɑrɛ no ǹ goono. Ngei neyɑ, zinɑ ndɑ meiguyom zɑ ǹ mɑnɑ hiji ndɑ ziibi ndɑ hɑwizetɛrɛ,
48005020	ndɑ tɑɑru gɑnɑyom ndɑ zimɑtɛrɛ ndɑ ibɛrɛtɛrɛ ndɑ zoji ndɑ cɛnsɛ ndɑ bine fute, kɑkɔ ndɑ feefee ndɑ fɔndɔ ŋmɑni ŋmɑni,
48005021	ndɑ molɑgɑ, ndɑ bɔrɔ wiyom ndɑ bɑji hɑm kɑ bugu ndɑ hɑnɑsuɑ ndɑ hɛ nge yom di dimi kulu. Kɑ simbɑ hɛ nge yom di, ɑ go wom kɑɑbɑɑru kɑ jisi zɑngɑ ɑ jinɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cii kɔ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hɛ nge yom di dimi tɛ, ɑkpɛ si Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ tubu pɑi.
48005022	Ammɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ hɑnfɑni neyɑ, bɑɑkɑsine ndɑ binekɑɑne, ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne ndɑ suuru kuku ndɑ bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ ndɑ booriyom ndɑ nɑɑne,
48005023	ndɑ bɑɑniyom ndɑ bɔm hiniyom. Fɔndɑ kulu si kɑ ɑ̀ go hɛ nge yom di gɑnji.
48005024	Beerem kɑ ǹ ci Mɛsiyɑ ŋmɔne yom ǹ nɑ ngei dulum hɑɑli kɑnji ndɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑyom futu yom ndɑ ɑ̀ bineibɑɑi.
48005025	Zɑ kɑ i gɑ hunɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ, i mɑ dirɑ mo Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ.
48005026	I mɑ si ci fɑɑrikpɛ yom ko cɛrɛ zukum kɑ cɛnsɛ cɛrɛ gɑɑ.
48006001	Nyɑizei, de wom bei bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ tɑɑli tɛ, wom kɑ wom tɔ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ wom mɑ ɑkpɛ dɑm fɔndɔ. Ammɑ wom mɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ bɑɑniyom. Ni mɑ, n mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ n bɔm, n mɑ si du suiyom.
48006002	Wom mɑ cɛrɛ time jɛrɛ. Zɑngɑ yɑ wom go Mɛsiyɑ fɔndɑ tɔnɑndi noyɑ.
48006003	De bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci hɛ fɔ go tɑmmɑ ngɑ yɑ hɛ fɔ no, ɑ̀ bɔm no ɑ̀ go zɑmbɑ.
48006004	Ammɑ bɔrɔ kulu mɑ ngɑ bɔm gbei yɑɑse gunɑ. À gɑɑ no ɑ̀ hini kɑ fɑihã ngɑ bɔm hinne sɛ. À nɑ ci bɔrɔ fɔ ŋmɑni ŋmɔne gɑɑ.
48006005	Bɔrɔ kulu gɑ ngɑ bɔm jɛrɔ jɛrɛ no.
48006006	Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ cooɑndi ndɑ Ikpɛ Sendi, ɑ̀ mɑ ngɑ cooɑndikɔ nɑfɑ ngɑ hɛ hinno yom kulu kunɑ.
48006007	Wɑ si nɑm ǹ mɑ wom zɑmbɑ. Bɔrɔ si Ikpɛ hɑɑru. Hɛ kɑ bɔrɔ go dumɑ, ngɑ no ɑ̀ kɑɑ wi.
48006008	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ dumɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑni ngɑ bineibɑɑi sɛ, fumbi nɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ wi bineibɑɑi dɔ. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go dumɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑni Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ sɛ, hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni no ɑ̀ kɑɑ wi Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ.
48006009	I mɑ si fɑrigɑ ndɑ ihinno tɛyom. Lɔkɑci kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ gɑɑ, i kɑɑ bɑrikɑ wi de i mɑnɑ ɑ̀ nɑm.
48006010	Ngɑ di sɛ, kɑ i gundɑ dɑɑmɑ i mɑ ihinno tɛ bɔrɔ kulu sɛ, hɑli yɑ mo nyɑize yom sɛ kɑ ǹ goono nɑɑne fɔndɔ kunɑ.
48006011	Wɑ gunɑ biiriize beeri yom kɑ ɑ hɑntum wom sɛ ndɑ ɑ bumbum kɑmbɛ.
48006012	Beerem kulu kɑ ǹ go bɑɑ ngei mɑ booriyom cɛbɛ moo diyom gɑɑ, ǹ go wom tilɑsi nɑ ǹ mɑ wom dɑmbɑngu. Ǹ go tɛ yɑ di no domi ǹ mɑ si ngei guruguzɑndi hinne Mɛsiyɑ bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ sɑbu sɛ.
48006013	Nge yom kɑ ǹ dɑmbɑngu, ngei bumbum si Moisi fɔndɑ gɑnɑ. Ammɑ ǹ gɑ bɑɑ ǹ mɑ wom dɑmbɑngu domi ngei mɑ du kɑ fɑɑre ndɑ wom gɑɑhɑm.
48006014	Ammɑ hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ̀ mɑ si kɑɑ ɑ gɑɑ yɑ fɑɑre ndɑ hɛ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ndɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ. À dɔ no Ikpɛ nɑ hɑndunyɑ kɑnji ɑ sɛ, hɛɛ mɑ hɑndunyɑ sɛ.
48006015	Zɑ bɑngudɑmyom hɑli zɑm kɑ dɑmbɑngu, ǹ bɑ ɑfɔ sindɑ nɑfɑ. Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ nɑfɑ yɑ ci tɑkɑyom teji.
48006016	Bɔrɔ kulu mo kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ dirɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ fɔndɔ wɔ goono ndɑ, lɑɑkɑli kɑne ndɑ suuji mɑ goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ ŋmɔne Isirɑilɑ bɑndɑ mɑ.
48006017	À mɑ si filɑ kpɛɛnɛ bɔrɔ mɑ ɑ tɑɑbɑndi zɑmɑ hɛɛ wɔ ɑ gundɑ Kpe Yesu bidɑlɑ yom ɑ gɑɑhɑm gɑɑ.
48006018	A nyɑizei, i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gomini mo gɔrɔ ndɑ wom biyɑ. Ami.
49001001	Hɛɛ Pɔlu, hɛɛ yɑ ci Yesu Mɛsiyɑ diyɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ binebɑɑ. A gɑ tirɑ wɔ hɑntum wom hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom sɛ kɑ wom goono Efɛse wɑngɑrɑ. Wom yɑ ci nɑɑnekpɛ yom Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ.
49001002	Gomini ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne kɑ ǹ hunu i Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ ndɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ, ǹ mo goono wom bɑndɑ.
49001003	I mɑ Ikpɛ, i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ Bɑɑbɑ sɑɑbu. À nɑ ngɑ bɑrikɑ dimi kulu dɑm i gɑɑ, bɑrikɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ bɛɛnɛ kunɑ nungu yom dɔ.
49001004	Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ no Ikpɛ nɑ i suubɑ zɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɑndunyɑ sinji. À nɑ i suubɑ zɑmɑ i mɑ ci hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom, beerem kɑ ǹ sindɑ tɑɑli ngɑ jine.
49001005	Bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ ɑ̀ nɑ i kɔdɔrɔ mɑ i mɑ tɛ ngɑ ize yom kootɛrɛ dɑmyom dɔ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ. À nɑ ngɑ di tɛ nɑ ɑ̀ binebɑɑ bɔm zɑmɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑni ɑ̀ sɛ no.
49001006	À nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ no i mɑ ngɑ gomini deizɑkpɛ sifɑ, gomini kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ i sɛ Binegɑnji kunɑ.
49001007	Yesu kunɑ mo i gundɑ fɑnsɑyom ɑ̀ kuri gɑɑ. À go kɑ i yɑɑfɑ mɑ ndɑ i dulum yom ndɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ gomini hɑizici goono ndɑ.
49001008	À nɑ i nɑ ngɑ gomini ndɑ bɑyom hɑikusutɛrɛ ndɑ fɑhɑm dimi kulu kunɑ.
49001009	À nɑm i nɑ ngɑ binebɑɑ duje bei ɑ̀ miilɑ kunɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑni ɑ̀ sɛ.
49001010	Ikpɛ gbei yɑ ci ngɑ mɑ tɑkɑhɛ kulu meigu sɑɑ kɑ zɑmɑni yom kube kɑ tɛ ɑfɔ Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ, hɛ yom kɑ ǹ goono bɛɛnɛ kunɑ ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ goono hɑndunyɑ bɔm.
49001011	Ikpɛ go hɛ kulu tɛ ngɑ binebɑɑ sɑwɑri bɔm. À jinɑ kɑ i kɔdɔrɔ ngɑ miilɑ bɔm i mɑ ci tubu hɛ Ikpɛ sɛ Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ.
49001012	À nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ no zɑmɑ i yom kɑ i jinɑ kɑ bɛɛjɛ sinji Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ, i mɑ ci sifɑyom hɛ Ikpɛ deizɑ sɛ.
49001013	À kunɑ no wom mo, wom nɑɑne sɑɑ kɑ wom mɑɑ cimi sendi. Cimi sendi yɑ ci Bɑɑru Hinnɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑɑndɑ fɑɑbɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ wom nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ, Ikpɛ nɑ sɛdɑ dɑm wom gɑɑ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ ɑlikɑwɑli ngɑ mɑ no.
49001014	Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ yɑ ci i tubu sɛ deimi jɛrɛ. Hɑnu go kɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ kɑɑ hɛ kɑ ngɑ dei fɑnsɑ, i mɑ ci sifɑyom hɛ ɑ̀ deizɑ sɛ.
49001015	A mɑɑ bɑɑru kɑ wom nɑɑne Kpe Yesu gɑɑ. A mɑɑ mo wom gundɑ bɑɑkɑsine hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kulu sɛ.
49001016	À sɛ no, ɑ si cɛ ndɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbuyom wom sɛ ko hɔngɔ wom ɑ ŋmɔne ɑduwɑ yom kunɑ.
49001017	A go kɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ ɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Bɑɑbɑ deizɑkpɛ ŋmɑɑrɛ wom sɛ. A go kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ wom no hɑikusutɛrɛ biyɑ ndɑ ndɑ kɑɑyomtɛrɛ biyɑ hɑli wom mɑ Ikpɛ bei gumo gumo.
49001018	A go ŋmɑɑrɛ mo ɑ̀ mɑ wom bine yom kpɑrɑndi hɑli wom mɑ bɛɛjɛ bei kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ Ikpɛ nɑ wom cɛɛ. Wom mɑ bei mo hɑizici dimi kɑ ɑ̀ ci tubu deizɑkpɛ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kunɑ.
49001019	A go ŋmɑɑrɛ wom mɑ bei mo hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑ̀ dɑbɑri gɑɑbikoni bɑmbɑtɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go tɛ i kunɑ, i yom kɑ i go nɑɑne.
49001020	À nɑ dɑbɑri cɛbɛ Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme. À nɑ ɑ̀ gɔrɛndi mo ngɑ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ bɛɛnɛ kunɑ nungu yom dɔ.
49001021	À nɑ ɑ̀ gɔrɛndi meire kulu bɔm ndɑ hini kulu bɔm ndɑ gɑɑbi kulu bɔm ndɑ dɑbɑri kulu bɔm. À nɑ ɑ̀ gɔrɛndi mɑɑ kulu kɑ ǹ gɑ cɛɛ bɔm, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci zɑmɑni wɔ hinne kunɑ bo ɑmmɑ ndɑ zɑmɑni kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ kunɑ mo.
49001022	Ikpɛ nɑ hɛ kulu dɑm ɑ̀ cee cire. À nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm mɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ci hɛ kulu bɔm Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ sɛ.
49001023	Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ yɑ ci ɑ̀ gɑɑhɑm. Mɛsiyɑ go hɛ kulu tɔnɑndi sã sã. Ngɑ yɑ ci mɑrgɑ tɔnɑndikɔ.
49002001	Wom mo, dom wom gɔrɔ bukɔ yom wom tɑɑli yom ndɑ wom dulum yom sɑbu sɛ.
49002002	Ǹ kunɑ nɑ wom jinɑ kɑ dirɑ sɑɑ fɔ ndɑ zɑngɑ hɑndunyɑ wɔ zɑmɑni goono ndɑ. Wom dirɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ bɛɛnɛ bɑtumɑ dɑbɑrikpɛ goono ndɑ. Biyɑ no kɑ ɑ ci Ibilisi, ɑ̀ go gbei tɛ mɑɑsɑ bɔrɔ yom kunɑ kɑ ǹ hungu kɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ.
49002003	Beerem di kunɑ nɑ i yom mo, i jinɑ kɑ dirɑ i bineibɑɑi bɔm. I nɑ i bineibɑɑi ndɑ ɑ̀ lɑsɑbu yom tɔnɑndi. Dulum hɑɑli kɑ ǹ nɑ i hɛi ndɑ dɔ, i tɛ beerem kɑ Ikpɛ bine tɔ ǹ sɛ zɑngɑ cindei.
49002004	Ammɑ Ikpɛ gundɑ suuji bɑɑbɑ ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine bɑmbɑtɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑ i yom ndɑ.
49002005	À bɑɑkɑsine sɑbu sɛ ɑ̀ nɑ i hunɑndi ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ bɑ kɑ i tɑɑli yom kunɑ i gɔrɔ bukɔ yom. Gomini dɔ no Ikpɛ nɑ wom fɑɑbɑ.
49002006	À nɑ i tunɑndi mefɔ Mɛsiyɑ bɑndɑ. À bine nɑ i gɔrɛndi mefɔ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ bɛɛnɛ kunɑ nungu yom dɔ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ.
49002007	À nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ nɑ zɑmɑ zɑmɑni yom kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑɑ kunɑ Ikpɛ mɑ ngɑ gomini hɑizici bɑmbɑtɑ cɛbɛ ɑ̀ bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ i sɛ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ.
49002008	Gomini dɔ no Ikpɛ nɑ wom fɑɑbɑ nɑɑne gɑɑ. À bine mɑnɑ hunu wom dɔ. Ikpɛ noyom no.
49002009	À mɑnɑ ci mɑ tɛgbei yom dɔ no fɑɑbɑ hunu hɑli bɔrɔ mɑ si ngɑ bɔm bɛɛrɑndi.
49002010	I yom yɑ ci Ikpɛ gbei. À nɑ i tɑkɑ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ gbei hinno yom sɛ. Ikpɛ jinɑ kɑ gbei hinno yom sɔlu zɑmɑ i mɑ dirɑ ǹ kunɑ.
49002011	À sɛ nɑ, wɑ hɔngɔ wom jinɑ kɑ gɔrɔ dimi cindei gɑɑhɑm dɔ. Bɑnguize yom go ci wom sɛ zɑm kɑ dɑmbɑngu ize yom, dumbuyom kɑ ǹ tɛ ndɑ kɑmbɛ gɑɑbɑsi gɑɑ.
49002012	Wɑ hɔngɔ lɔkɑci ngɑ di wom sindɑ Mɛsiyɑ. Wom sindɑ lɑɑbuizetɛrɛ gɑɑbi Isirɑilɑ lɑɑbu kunɑ. Wom tɛ yo yom ɑlikɑwɑli ŋmɔne ɑlikɑwɑli tɛyom gɑɑ. Wom sindɑ bɛɛjɛ. Wom sindɑ Ikpɛ mɑ hɑndunyɑ kunɑ.
49002013	Wom jinɑ kɑ felem ɑmmɑ mɑɑsɑ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ Ikpɛ nɑ wom mɑɑnɑndi Mɛsiyɑ kuri gɑɑ.
49002014	Ngɑ yɑ ci bɑɑni kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ i gɑme. À nɑ dimi hinkɑ tɛ ɑfɔ. À nɑ kpɛsɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ i fee ndɑ cɛrɛ zeeri.
49002015	À nɑ ɑ̀ zeeri kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ibɛrɛtɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Moisi fɔndɑ meire yom, wɑtom sendikpɑrɛ yom wi ngɑ gɑɑhɑm gɑɑ. À nɑ ngɑ di tɛ no zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ dimi hinkɑ tɑkɑ ngɑ bumbum kunɑ kɑ tɛ bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku teji. À gɑɑ no ɑ̀ nɑ bɑɑni tɛ.
49002016	À nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ nɑ hɑli gɑɑhɑm fɔlɔnku kunɑ ngɑ mɑ ǹ bɔrɔ hinkɑ sɑsɑbɑndi mo Ikpɛ dɔ bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ gɑɑ. Bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ gɑɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ibɛrɛtɛrɛ di wi.
49002017	Yɑ no Mɛsiyɑ kɑɑ kɑ Bɑɑru Hinno kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑndɑ bɑɑni tɛyom fɛɛ wom sɛ. À nɑ bɑɑni tɛ wom kɑ wom felem ndɑ Ikpɛ ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ mɑɑni Ikpɛ sɛ, gɑme.
49002018	À gɑɑ no i kulu ɑfɔ fɔ gundɑ huroyom Bɑɑbɑ dɔ ndɑ Biyɑ fɔlɔnku.
49002019	Ngɑ di sɛ, wom mɑnɑ ci yɑ yom kpɛɛnɛ wɑlɑ ceeyo yom. Ammɑ ndɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntei wom tɛ bɛɛnɛ bɔrɔ yom. Wom tɛ Ikpɛ fuu bɔrɔ yom mo.
49002020	Ikpɛ nɑ wom cini diyɑ yom ndɑ ɑndebi yom bɔm, nge yom kɑ ǹ ci fuu kpɛsɛ. Yesu Mɛsiyɑ bumbum mo yɑ ci mimbɑri tɑndi.
49002021	À kunɑ no cinɑri kulu kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ kɑ boori, ɑ̀ go tunu kɑ tɛ nungu hɑlɑɑlɑ Kpe kunɑ.
49002022	À kunɑ no wom mo Ikpɛ go wom cini mefɔ wom mɑ tɛ Ikpɛ gɔrɛ dɔ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ.
49003001	À sɛ no, hɛɛ Pɔlu kɑ ɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kɑsuize wom dimi cindei sɑbu sɛ, ɑ gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ ŋmɑɑrɛ.
49003002	Wom mɑɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ nɑ ngɑ gomini yɑ gbei tɛ wom sɑbu sɛ.
49003003	Kɑɑyomtɛrɛ gɑɑ nɑ ɑ du duje beiyom. A jinɑ kɑ sendi cɛnɑ fɔ hɑntum wɔne bɔm kɔ.
49003004	Sɑɑ kɑ wom go tirɑ di coo, wom hini kɑ fɑhɑm kɑ ɑ gundɑ Mɛsiyɑ duje beiyom.
49003005	Zɑmɑni yom kɑ ǹ bisɑ Ikpɛ mɑnɑ dujɑ kɑɑtɛrɛ iburɑdɑm yom sɛ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ bei zɑngɑ mɑɑsɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ ngɑ diyɑ hɑlɑɑlɑ yom sɛ ndɑ ɑndebi yom sɛ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ.
49003006	Duje di neyɑ. Dimi cindei ci tubukɔ yom ndɑ Isirɑilɑ ize yom. Ǹ tɛ gɑɑhɑm fɔlɔnku. Ǹ huro mo mefɔ Ikpɛ ɑlikɑwɑli kunɑ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu dɔ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ gɑɑ.
49003007	A tɛ gbeiteeri Bɑɑru Hinnɑ sɛ zɑmɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ gomini no ɑ sɛ ɑ̀ dɑbɑri gɑɑbikoni bɔm.
49003008	Hɛɛ kɑ ɑ ci hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kulu ŋmɔne icɛnɑ, ɑ sɛ nɑ Ikpɛ nɑ gomini wɔne no yɑ Mɛsiyɑ hɑizici bɑɑru wɑɑzu dimi cindei sɛ. Hɑizici wɔ bɔrɔ si hini kɑ fɑhɑm ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu.
49003009	Ikpɛ nɑ gominɑ no mo yɑ cɛbɛ bɔrɔ kulu sɛ ǹ mɑ duje di tɔnɑndiyom bei. Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ hɛ kulu tɑkɑ nɑ duje di tugu ngɑ dɔ zɑ zɑmɑni yom kɑ ǹ bisɑ.
49003010	À nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ no hɑli Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ dɔ mɑɑsɑ meirekpɛ yom ndɑ hinikpɛ yom kɑ ǹ goono bɛɛnɛ kunɑ nungu yom dɔ ǹ mɑ Ikpɛ hɑikusutɛrɛ ŋmɑni ŋmɑni bei.
49003011	À nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ no ngɑ miilɑ kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni bɔm, miilɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ i Kpe Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ.
49003012	À kunɑ no i gundɑ yɑrutɛrɛ zɑ kɑ i nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ kɑ huro Ikpɛ dɔ, hɑmbure si.
49003013	À sɛ no, ɑ go wom ŋmɑɑrɛ wɑ si wom yɑrutɛrɛ nɑm guruguze yom kɑ ɑ go mɑɑ wom sɑbu sɛ. Ngei yɑ ci wom deizɑ.
49003014	Ngɑ di sɛ nɑ, ɑ gɑ sɔmbu i ŋmɔne Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ Bɑɑbɑ jine.
49003015	À dɔ no fuu kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ kunɑ ndɑ fuu kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono hɑndunyɑ kunɑ go du ngei mɑɑ.
49003016	A go ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ wom no gɑɑbi ndɑ dɑbɑri ɑ̀ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ gɑɑ wom bine yom kunɑ ɑ̀ deizɑ hɑizicikpɛ bɔm.
49003017	À mɑ wom nɑ gɑɑbi hɑli Mɛsiyɑ mɑ gɔrɔ wom bine yom kunɑ nɑɑne dɔ. Wom mɑ tɛ kɑɑji kɑ sinji bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ.
49003018	À sɛ no ɑ gɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ wom mɑ hini kɑ fɑhɑm ndɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kulu, hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Mɛsiyɑ bɑɑkɑsine tɛfɛyom ndɑ ɑ̀ kuuyom ndɑ ɑ̀ guuse ndɑ ɑ̀ gure yom.
49003019	Wom mɑ Mɛsiyɑ bɑɑkɑsine wɔ bei, bɑɑkɑsine kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ beiyom kulu. Wom mɑ tɔ mɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ bɑyom kulu.
49003020	Ikpɛ hini kɑ tɛ ndɑ bɑyom gumo gumo kɑ bisɑ hɛ kulu kɑ i go kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɛ wɑlɑ hɛ kulu kɑ i go lɑsɑbu. À gɑ ɑ̀ tɛ no ndɑ zɑngɑ dɑbɑri kɑ ɑ̀ go tɛ i kunɑ goono ndɑ.
49003021	Deizɑ mɑ ci ɑ̀ ŋmɔne Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ kunɑ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu dɔ zɑmɑni yom kulu gɑɑ jiiri dubu ndɑ dubu yom. Ami.
49004001	Ngɑ di sɛ, hɛɛ kɑsuize Kpe sɛ, ɑ gɑ wom no himmɑ, wom diro mɑ sɑbɑ ndɑ cɛɛ yom kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ wom cɛɛ.
49004002	Wom mɑ dirɑ ndɑ bɔm yetiyom gɑndɑ kulu ndɑ bɑɑniyom kulu ndɑ suuru dimi kulu. Wom mɑ cɛrɛ kɔtɔ bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ.
49004003	Wom mɑ wetere kɑ gɔrɔ ndɑ bine fɔ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne kɑ ɑ̀ go wom hɔ gɑɑ.
49004004	Gɑɑhɑm fɔlɔnku goono ndɑ Biyɑ fɔlɔnku zɑngɑ Ikpɛ nɑ wom cɛɛ bɛɛjɛ fɔlɔnku kunɑ wom cɛɛ yom gɑɑ.
49004005	Kpe fɔlɔnku yɑ goono ndɑ nɑɑne fɔlɔnku ndɑ mirɑndiyom fɔlɔnku.
49004006	Ikpɛ fɔlɔnku yɑ goono kɑ ɑ̀ ci hɛ kulu Bɑɑbɑ. Ngɑ yɑ goono hɛ kulu bɔm. À goono ǹ kulu gɑme. À goono wom kulu kunɑ.
49004007	Ammɑ Ikpɛ nɑ gomini no i ŋmɔne ɑfɔ fɔ kulu sɛ Mɛsiyɑ noyom neesiji bɔm.
49004008	À sɛ no, Ikpɛ Sendɑ hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑru bɛɛnɛ ɑ̀ kpeindɑ tɑm boobo ngɑ bɑndɑ. À nɑ noyom tɛ beerem sɛ."
49004009	Ifɔ yɑ ci ɑ̀ kɑɑru bɛɛnɛ de ɑ̀ nɑ ci kɑ ɑ̀ jinɑ kɑ zumbu hɑli gɑndɑ ŋmɔne nungu guusɔ yom kunɑ?
49004010	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ zumbu, ngɑ yɑ kɑɑru bɛɛnɛ hɑli bɛɛnɛ yom kulu bɔm zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ hɛ kulu tɔnɑndi.
49004011	À nɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom no ǹ mɑ ci diyɑ yom. Afɔ yom ci ɑndebi yom. Afɔ yom ci Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzukɔ yom. Afɔ yom tɛ kurukɔ yom kɑ ǹ ci cɛbɛkɔ.
49004012	À nɑ ǹ nɑ hɑli hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom mɑ tɔ gbei tɛyom sɛ kɑ Mɛsiyɑ gɑɑhɑm mɑ du kɑ kpei moojine.
49004013	À nɑ ǹ nɑ mɑ i kulu mɑ du kɑ ci ɑfɔ nɑɑne dɔ Ikpɛ Ize beiyom kunɑ. I mɑ tɔ bɔrɔ mo kɑ tɔ Mɛsiyɑ hɑɑli tɔnɑntɛ cine.
49004014	Yɑ di gɑɑ i mɑ si ci koo cɛnɑ yom kpɛɛnɛ hɑli cɛbɛ ŋmɑni ŋmɑni mɑ i fum nee hɛrɛ, ɑ̀ mɑ i feeni yɑ hɛrɛ zɑngɑ tɛku boosu yom, zɑngɑ hɛo mo go fɑɑru. Cɛbɛ wɔ hunu iburɑdɑm yom fɑfɑguɛ kunɑ kɑ i dɛrɑndi ndɑ ngei cɛmbɛrɛ.
49004015	Ammɑ kɑ i gɑ cimi cii bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ i mo beeri hɛ kulu kunɑ Mɛsiyɑ dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci bɔm.
49004016	À dɔ no, gɑɑhɑm dɔbu yom kulu go meigu hɑli ɑ̀ boori kɑ hɔ cɛrɛ gɑɑ. Kɑ dɔbu fɔ fɔ kulu go kɑ ngɑ ŋmɔne gbei tɛ, ɑ̀ gɑɑ nɑ gɑɑhɑm go beeri kɑ ngɑ bɔm cini bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ dɔbu fɔ fɔ kulu go kɑ ngɑ gbei tɛ.
49004017	Ngɑ di sɛ, hɛ kɑ ɑ go cii kɑ sɛdɑ Kpe kunɑ neyɑ. Wɑ si dirɑ kpɛɛnɛ zɑngɑ dimi cindei kɑ ǹ go dirɑ ngei lɑsɑbu kɔnu yom kunɑ.
49004018	Kube kunɑ no ǹ fɑhɑm goono. Ǹ tɛ zɑngɑ yo yom hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni kɑ Ikpɛ go no sɛ. Ǹ si ngɑ di bei ǹ binesɛndɛ yom sɑbu sɛ.
49004019	Ǹ bine kunɑ sendi si hɛ fɔ cii kɑlɑ ǹ huro hɑwizetɛrɛ kɑ ziibi dimi dimi kulu tɛ ndɑ himmɑ.
49004020	Ammɑ wom wɔ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci yɑ no wom nɑ Mɛsiyɑ dendeni.
49004021	Dɑhiri wom nɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ. Ǹ nɑ wom cooɑndi ɑ̀ kunɑ cimi bɔm Yesu kunɑ.
49004022	Kɑ simbɑ ndɑ wom sintine gɔrɛ, wom mɑ bine kunɑ bɔrɔ zeenɔ kɑɑ, wɔ kɑ bɑɑyom futu zɑmbɑntɛ go hinɑ.
49004023	Wɑ nɑm Ikpɛ mɑ wom tejɑndi mɑ wom bine lɑsɑbu yom kunɑ.
49004024	Wɑ bine kunɑ bɔrɔ teji fɑkɑ, wɔ kɑ Ikpɛ tɑkɑ ngɑ himɑndi bɔm. À nɑ ɑ̀ tɑkɑ cɛyom susu ndɑ hɑlɑɑlɑtɛrɛ kunɑ kɑ cimi gɑnɑyom go kɑɑndɑ.
49004025	À sɛ no, wom mɑ tɑngɑri kɑɑ. Bɔrɔ kulu mɑ cimi sendi ngɑ gɔrɔkɑsine sɛ zɑmɑ i kulu bɑrɑ no cɛrɛ dɔbu yom.
49004026	Sɑɑ kɑ wom bine tɔ, wɑ si dulum tɛ. Weenu mɑ si kɑm wom binetɔnɛ bɔm.
49004027	Wom mɑ si Ibilisi mɑ nɑ dɑɑmɑ.
49004028	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cini zee, ɑ̀ mɑ si zee kpɛɛnɛ ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ gbei tɛ. À mɑ tɛ ndɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ boori, zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ du hɛ kɑ ngɑ no bɔrɔ sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɑnji kunɑ.
49004029	Sendi fumbɔ bɑ ɑfɔ mɑ si hunu wom mee kunɑ. Sendi kɑ ɑ̀ boori gɑɑkɑsine sɛ mɑ hunu zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑndɑ gomini beerem kɑ ǹ go mɑɑ sɛ.
49004030	Wom mɑ si Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ bine sɑrɑndi mɑ, Biyɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ sɛdɑ dɑm ndɑ wom gɑɑ fɑnsɑyom hɑnu sɛ.
49004031	Hɔɔtɛ kulu ndɑ bine futu kulu ndɑ binetɔnɛ ndɑ kɔsɔngu kulu ndɑ sendi yɑmɔ kulu ndɑ cɛmbɛrɛ cɛmbɛrɛ dimi kulu mo, ǹ kulu mɑ hunu wom bindi kunɑ.
49004032	Wom mo bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ tɛ cɛrɛ sɛ. Wo suuji cɛbɛ cɛrɛ sɛ. Wo cɛrɛ yɑɑfɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ nɑ wom yɑɑfɑ Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ.
49005001	Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ Ikpɛ dendeni zɑngɑ kɑɑ binebɑɑkɔ yom.
49005002	Wo dirɑ bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ zɑngɑ Mɛsiyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑ i yom kɑ ngɑ bɔm dɑm kɑmbɛ i sɑbu sɛ. À nɑ ngɑ bɔm nɑ zɑngɑ sɑrɑɑ ndɑ gɑrɑndi hɛ wɑidi hɛo kɑɑnɔ Ikpɛ sɛ.
49005003	Ammɑ zɑ zinɑ zɑ ziibi wɑlɑ hɛ bɑɑyom futu ǹ mɑ si bɑ ǹ ciine tɛ wom bindi kunɑ. Wɑ si ɑ̀ tɛ zɑmɑ ǹ mɑnɑ hegu hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom sɛ.
49005004	Yɑ no, zɑ hɑwi sendi zɑ sendi yɑmɔ wɑlɑ hɑnɑsuɑ sendi kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ himɑ, ɑmmɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ yɑ ci sɑɑbuyom.
49005005	Wom gɑ wɔne bei zinɑteeri kulu wɑlɑ ziibɑntɛ wɑlɑ hɛ bɑɑkɔ futu kɑ ɑ̀ ci tooru gɑnɑyom dimi fɔ, ǹ bɑ ɑfɔ sindɑ tubu Mɛsiyɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ kunɑ.
49005006	Bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ mɑ si wom zɑmbɑ ndɑ sendi kɔnu yom zɑmɑ hɛ nge yom di sɑbu sɛ no Ikpɛ binetɔnɛ go kɑɑ beerem kɑ ǹ si kɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ bɔm.
49005007	Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ si meigu ndei.
49005008	Sɑɑ fɔ wom gɔrɔ kube ɑmmɑ mɑɑsɑ wom tɛ kɑɑri Kpe kunɑ. Wɑ dirɑ zɑngɑ kɑɑri ize yom.
49005009	Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ hɑnfɑni goono bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ kulu kunɑ ndɑ cɛɑndiyom susu ndɑ cimi kunɑ.
49005010	Wom mɑ ceeci kɑ bei hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑni Kpe sɛ.
49005011	Wom mɑ si meigu hɛ fɔ kulu gɑɑ ndɑ kube gbei yom kɑ ǹ si hɛi ɑmmɑ zɑti wɑ bɔgu ǹ bɔm.
49005012	Hɛ yom kɑ ǹ go tɛ tugu kunɑ, ǹ ciiyom zɑti hɑwi nɑ.
49005013	Ammɑ hɛ kulu kɑ kɑɑri hɑɑgɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ tɛ tɛrɛ hɛ. Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hɛ kulu kɑɑtɛrɛ, ngɑ yɑ ci kɑɑri.
49005014	À sɛ no ǹ cii: Tunu, ni kɑ n go jiibi. Tunu bukɔei gɑme, Mɛsiyɑ kɑɑ kɑɑri n bɔm.
49005015	Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ zɑngɑ wom go dirɑ. Wɑ si ci zɑngɑ sɑmu yom ɑmmɑ zɑngɑ hɑikusu yom.
49005016	Wɑ lɔkɑci zɑɑ zɑmɑ hɑnu lɑlɔ yom no.
49005017	À sɛ no, wom mɑ si ci zɑngɑ sɑmu yom ɑmmɑ wom mɑ fɑhɑm ndɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Kpe binebɑɑ.
49005018	Wɑ si bɑji hɑm kɑ bugu kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ hɑwizetɛrɛ goono, ɑmmɑ wɑ tɔ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ.
49005019	Wɑ cɛrɛ dii ndɑ Somu yom betu yom ndɑ mɑrgɑ betu yom ndɑ dɔɔni yom kɑ ǹ hunu Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ. Wɑ betu Kpe sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ dɔɔnu wom bine kunɑ.
49005020	Wo Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu sɑɑ kulu hɛ kulu sɛ, i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ.
49005021	Wɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ cɛrɛ sɛ Mɛsiyɑ hɑmbure kunɑ.
49005022	Wɛndɛ yom, wɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ wom kunye yom sɛ zɑngɑ wom go tɛ Kpe sɛ.
49005023	Kunye yɑ ci wɛndɛ ŋmɔne bɔm zɑngɑ Mɛsiyɑ ci mɑrgɑ ŋmɔne bɔm, mɑrgɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Mɛsiyɑ gɑɑhɑm. Mɛsiyɑ bumbum mo ci ɑ̀ fɑɑbɑkɔ.
49005024	Zɑngɑ bine Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ gɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ Mɛsiyɑ sɛ, wɛndɛ yom mo mɑ tɛ ngei kunye yom sɛ zɑngɑ yɑ hɛ kulu gɑɑ.
49005025	Wom mo kunye yom, wom mɑ bɑɑ wom wɛndɛ yom zɑngɑ Mɛsiyɑ bɑɑ ngɑ mɑrgɑ kɑ ngɑ bɔm no ngɑ mɑ bu ɑ̀ sɑbu sɛ.
49005026	À nɑ ngɑ bɔm nɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ɑ̀ hɑlɑɑlɑndi ngɑ bɔm sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hinnɑndi nyumeyom gɑɑ Sendɑ dɔ.
49005027	À nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ no zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ mɑrgɑ jisi ngɑ jine, mɑrgɑ deizɑkpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ bɑ tombi fɔ. Suugu yom mɑ si, wɑlɑ hɛ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ himɑ nge yom di, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ tɛ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ, tɑɑli si.
49005028	Yɑ no kunye yom mo, ɑ̀ himɑ ǹ mɑ bɑɑ ngei wɛndɛ yom zɑngɑ ǹ gɑ bɑɑ ngei gɑɑhɑm. Wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ ngɑ wɛndɛ, ɑ̀ go bɑɑ ngɑ bɔm.
49005029	Bɔrɔ fɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ bine hungu ngɑ gɑɑhɑm ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɑndi kɑ ɑ̀ kɑimɑ zɑngɑ Mɛsiyɑ gɑ tɛ ngɑ mɑrgɑ sɛ.
49005030	I bɑrɑ no ɑ̀ gɑɑhɑm dɔbu yom ndɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑbɑsi ndɑ ɑ̀ biri yom.
49005031	"À sɛ no hɑibɔrɔ gɑ ngɑ bɑɑbɑ ndɑ ngɑ nyɑ nɑm kɑ dɔbu ngɑ wɛndɛ gɑɑ. Ǹ bɔrɔ hinkɑ kɑɑ tɛ gɑɑhɑm fɔlɔnku."
49005032	Duje wɔne beeri, ɑmmɑ hɛɛ wɔ ɑ go sendi no kɑ simbɑ ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ mɑrgɑ.
49005033	Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu, wom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ fɔ kulu mɑ bɑɑ ngɑ wɛndɛ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ ngɑ bɔm. Wɛndɛ mɑ mɑ ngɑ kunye dɑm.
49006001	Wom mo koo yom, wɑ wom bɑhɛi yom gɑnɑ Kpe kunɑ zɑmɑ ngɑ yɑ sɑbɑ.
49006002	"N mɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ n bɑɑbɑ ndɑ n nyɑ sɛ." Ngɑ yɑ ci meire sintine kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ ɑlikɑwɑli.
49006003	Alikɑwɑli di neyɑ: "N mɑ gɔrɔ ndɑ bɑɑni. N mɑ hunɑ kɑ jɛ hɑndunyɑ kunɑ mo".
49006004	Wom mo bɑɑbɑ yom, wɑ si kɑm wom kɑɑ yom gɑɑ hɑli ǹ bine mɑ tɔ. Ammɑ wɑ ǹ biiri foorɑyom kunɑ ndɑ cɛbɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hunu Kpe dɔ.
49006005	Wom mo tɑm yom, wɑ wom hɑndunyɑ kpe yom gɑnɑ ndɑ hɑmburu ndɑ gɑsiyom ndɑ bine fɔ zɑngɑ wom go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ Mɛsiyɑ sɛ.
49006006	Wom mɑ si ǹ gɑnɑ ndɑ ǹ moo diyom kɑ kɑɑni iburɑdɑm yom sɛ. Ammɑ wɑ ǹ gɑnɑ zɑngɑ Mɛsiyɑ tɑm yom kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ binebɑɑ tɛ ndɑ bine fɔ.
49006007	Wɑ tu tɑmtɛrɛ zɑngɑ wom go tɑmtɛrɛ Kpe sɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci iburɑdɑm yom sɛ.
49006008	Wom bei kɑ ihinno kulu kɑ bɔrɔ tɛ, Kpe gɑ ɑ̀ yeti ɑ̀ sɛ bɑ ɑ̀ ci tɑm wɑlɑ bɔrɔcini.
49006009	Wom mo kpe yom, wom mɑ tɛ tɑm yom mo sɛ zɑngɑ yɑ di. Wɑ fee ndɑ deeniyom zɑmɑ wom go bei wom kulu ŋmɔne Kpe goono bɛɛnɛ. Bɑɑbɑɑ si ɑ̀ dɔ.
49006010	À bɑndɑ, ɑ nyɑizei, wɑ gɑɑbi dɑm Kpe kunɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ dɑbɑri gɑɑbikoni kunɑ.
49006011	Wom mɑ wɑngu jiinei kulu dɑm kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ wom no. A gɑɑ no wom du kɑ hini kɑ cɛ kɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ Ibilisi cɛmbɛrɛ yom.
49006012	I si guruje ndɑ iburɑdɑm. Ammɑ i go guruje ndɑ meirekpɛ yom ndɑ hinikpɛ yom ndɑ zɑmɑni wɔ kube dɑbɑrikpɛ yom. I go guruje ndɑ biyɑ hɑnyɑ futu yom mɑrgɑ yom kɑ ǹ goono bɛɛnɛ kunɑ nungu yom dɔ.
49006013	Ngɑ di sɛ wom mɑ wɑngu jiine kulu zɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ wom no. À gɑɑ nɑ, wom hini kɑ cɛ ndɑ gɑɑbi hɑnu lɑlɔ hine. Sɑɑ kɑ wom nɑ hɛ kulu tɔnɑndi, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ wom du kɑ cɛ ɑ̀ mɑ boori.
49006014	Wɑ cɛ kɑ boori fɑ. Wom mɑ cimi zɑɑ kɑ tɛ kunɑcendi zɑ kɑ wom nɑ cɛɑndiyom susu fɑkɑ zɑngɑ jɛndɛ kpɛsɛrɛ.
49006015	Wom mɑ Bɑɑru Hinno kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑndɑ bɑɑni tɛyom i yom ndɑ Ikpɛ gɑme sɔlu dɑm wom cee yom gɑɑ zɑngɑ tɑɑmu.
49006016	Ǹ kulu bɔm yɑ ci wɑ nɑɑne zɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci zɑngɑ kɔrɛ. Ndɑ nɑɑne di wom hini kɑ hɑngo ninikpɛ yom kɑ Ilɑlɔ go biri wi.
49006017	Wom mɑ fɑɑbɑ mo zɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci zɑngɑ guuru fulɑ. Wɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ zɑɑ mo kɑ ɑ̀ ci zɑngɑ tɑkubɑ kɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ nɑ wom no.
49006018	Lɔkɑci kulu wom mɑ ɑduwɑ dimi kulu tɛ ndɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ yom dimi kulu Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ. Wom mɑ moo no ngɑ di sɛ ndɑ himmɑ kulu ko ŋmɑɑrɛ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kulu sɛ.
49006019	Wɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ ɑ sɛ mo zɑmɑ Ikpɛ mɑ ɑ no mee yɑ sendi ndɑ yɑrutɛrɛ beerem mɑ Bɑɑru Hinno duje bei.
49006020	Bɑɑru Hinnɑ sɑbu sɛ nɑ ɑ goono hɔɑntɛ kɑsu kunɑ, hɛ kɑ Ikpɛ sɑmbɑ. Wɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ sɛ mɑ yɑ ɑ̀ sendi ndɑ yɑrutɛrɛ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ himɑ.
49006021	Ammɑ wom mo, kɑ wom mɑ du bɑɑru kɑ simbɑ hɛɛ, i nyɑize Ticiku, i binebɑɑkɔ ndɑ gbeiteeri nɑɑnekpɛ Kpe kunɑ, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ bɑɑru kulu cii wom sɛ.
49006022	Ngɑ di sɛ no, ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔm wom dɔ wom mɑ du kɑ bei zɑngɑ i goono. À mɑ wom bine yom yɑmɑrɑndi mɑ.
49006023	Lɑɑkɑli kɑne mɑ goono nyɑize yom gɑɑ. Bɑɑkɑsine ndɑ nɑɑne mo mɑ goono ǹ gɑɑ zɑ Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ ndɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ.
49006024	Gomini mo gɔrɔ ndɑ beerem kulu kɑ ǹ go bɑɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine kɑ ɑ̀ si sɑrɑ. Ami.
50001001	Hɛɛ Pɔlu ndɑ Timote, i yom yɑ ci Yesu Mɛsiyɑ tɑm yom. I go wom hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kulu Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ fɔɔ. Wom kulu kɑ wom goono Filipi kpɑɑrɑ ndɑ cendikɔ yom ndɑ gɑɑkɔ yom, i go wom fɔɔ.
50001002	Gomini ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne kɑ ǹ hunu i Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ ndɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ, ǹ mo goono wom bɑndɑ.
50001003	A go kɑ ɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ sɑɑbu sɑɑ kulu kɑ ɑ gɑ hɔngɔ wom.
50001004	Wɑti kulu ɑ gɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ wom kulu sɛ ndɑ binekɑɑne ɑ ŋmɔne ɑduwɑ yom kulu kunɑ.
50001005	A go kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu wom bine fɔ meiguyom Bɑɑru Hinnɑ sɑbu sɛ zɑ hɑnu sintinɑ kɑlɑ mɑɑsɑ.
50001006	A tɑbɑi wɔne yɑ cimi nɑ. Wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ gbei hinno wɔ sinti wom bine yom kunɑ, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ tɔnɑndi kɑlɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ hɑnu.
50001007	À sɑbɑ mo yɑ lɑsɑbu wom kulu gɑɑ zɑngɑ yɑ di domi wom goono ɑ bine kunɑ. Wom goono ɑ bine kunɑ zɑmɑ ɑ sesere yom kunɑ ndɑ Bɑɑru Hinno kɔrɛ kunɑ ndɑ Bɑɑru Hinno tɑbɑtɑndiyom mo, wom kulu meigu gomini kunɑ ndɑ hɛɛ.
50001008	Ikpɛ yɑ ci ɑ sɛdɑ kɑ ɑ gundɑ wom kulu cewɑ ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu binejijire.
50001009	A go wɔne ŋmɑɑrɛ Ikpɛ gɑɑ. Wom bɑɑkɑsine mɑ tɔntɔnu ndɑ bɑyom kpɛɛnɛ beiyom kunɑ ndɑ fɑhɑm kulu kunɑ.
50001010	À gɑɑ no wom mɑ hɛ hinno yom bei. Wom mɑ hinne mɑ kɑ zɑm tɑɑli kɑlɑ Mɛsiyɑ hɑnu.
50001011	Wom mɑ tɔ mɑ ndɑ bɑrikɑ yom kɑ cɛɑndiyom susu go hɛi Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ. Ngɑ di yɑ kɑɑndɑ deizɑ ndɑ sifɑyom Ikpɛ sɛ. Hundi yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ
50001012	Nyɑizei, wɔne no ɑ go bɑɑ wom mɑ bei. Hɛ yom wɔ kɑ ǹ tɔ hɛɛ, ǹ tɛ no domi Bɑɑru Hinno mɑ kpei moojine.
50001013	À hunu tɛrɛ mo dogɑri yom kulu sɛ ndɑ cindei kulu sɛ hɑli ǹ gɑ bei kɑ ɑ goono sesere yom kunɑ Mɛsiyɑ sɑbu sɛ.
50001014	A seseri yom mo nɑ nyɑizei boobo kɑ ǹ goono Kpe kunɑ no himmɑ. À gɑndɑ sɛ ǹ gundɑ binesɛndɛ bɑmbɑtɑ kɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ wɑɑzu tɛ, hɑmburu si.
50001015	Cimi no bɔrɔ fɔ yom go Mɛsiyɑ bɑɑru wɑɑzu tɛ ndɑ molɑgɑ ndɑ kɔsɔngu ɑmmɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom mo go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ bine fɔ.
50001016	Molɑgɑkpɛ yom feefee kunɑ no ǹ go Mɛsiyɑ wɑɑzu tɛ. Ǹ mɑnɑ tɛ ndɑ bine hinne zɑmɑ ǹ go tɑmmɑ ngei go binesɛrɛ tɔntɔnu ɑ sɛ no kɑ ɑ goono hɔɑntɛ kɑsu kunɑ.
50001017	Bine fɔ kpɛ yom wɔ, bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ no ǹ go wɑɑzu. Ǹ bei kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ jisi fɑɑsɑkɔ Bɑɑru Hinno sɛ.
50001018	Ifɔ bine no? Zɑngɑ no kulu, de munɑficitɛrɛ kunɑ no wɑlɑ de cimi no ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu, ǹ go Mɛsiyɑ wɑɑzu tɛ. A go fɑihã ndɑ ngɑ di. A kɑɑ fɑihã mɑ.
50001019	A bei kɑ ngɑ di gɑ ɑ kɑɑ kɑmbɛ wom ŋmɔne ɑduwɑ yom gɑɑ ndɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ Biyɑ gɑɑkɑsine gɑɑ.
50001020	Hɛ kɑ ɑ gɑ bɑɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ ndɑ ɑ bɛɛjɛ mo yɑ ci hɛ kulu kunɑ yɑ si hɔɔ. Ammɑ sɑɑ kulu hɑli yɑ mo mɑɑsɑ kpɛɛnɛ yɑ Mɛsiyɑ bɛɛrɑndi ndɑ binesɛndɛ kulu ɑ gɑɑhɑm kunɑ, bɑ de ɑ gɑ hunɑ wɑlɑ bɑ de ɑ bu.
50001021	Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ sɛ hunɑyom yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ. Buyom mɑ yɑ ci liibɑ.
50001022	Ammɑ de yɑ hunɑ gɑɑhɑm kunɑ, ngɑ di yɑ ci ɑ gbei bɑrikɑ. A si bei hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ himɑ yɑ suubɑ.
50001023	Ammɑ ɑ go sɑsɑ nungu hinkɑ kulu. A gundɑ guuri yɑ hunu kɑ kpei gɔrɔ Mɛsiyɑ bɑndɑ zɑmɑ ngɑ di bisɑ ɑ sɛ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
50001024	Ammɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ wom sɛ yɑ gɔrɔ gɑɑhɑm kunɑ.
50001025	Zɑ kɑ ɑ go wɔne tɑbɑi ɑ bei ɑ bo hunɑ kɑ gɔrɔ wom kulu bɑndɑ hɑli wom mɑ kpei jinɑ. Wom mɑ du binekɑɑne nɑɑne kunɑ mo.
50001026	Wom fɑihã mo mo bɑ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ ɑ sɑbu sɛ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ ye kɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ.
50001027	Kɑlɑ de, wom mo dirɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ Bɑɑru Hinno. Bɑ de ɑ kɑɑ di wom wɑlɑ yɑ nɑ kɑɑ kɑɑ, yɑ mɑɑ wom go cɛ kɑ boori bine fɔlɔnku kunɑ. Yɑ mɑɑ mo wom go meigu kɑ guruje ndɑ nɑɑne Bɑɑru Hinno gɑɑ. Wom go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ lɑɑkɑli fɔlɔnku mɑ.
50001028	Wom mɑ si nɑm beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ wom ǹ mɑ wom hɑmburɑndi bɑ cɛnɑ. Ngɑ di bine tɛ ǹ sɛ hɑlɑciyom sɛdɑ, ɑmmɑ wom sɛ ɑ̀ ci sɛdɑ kɑ simbɑ fɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu Ikpɛ dɔ.
50001029	Ikpɛ nɑ wom no ngɑ gomini kunɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci wom mɑ nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ hinne sɛ no ɑmmɑ wom mɑ mɑɑ tɑɑbi ɑ̀ sɑbu sɛ mo.
50001030	À gɑɑ no, wom go meigu kɑ guruje ndɑ hɛɛ, guruje kɑ wom di ɑ̀ goono ɑ kunɑ. Wom go mɑɑ mo ɑ̀ goono ɑ gɑɑ bɑ mɑɑsɑ.
50002001	À sɛ no, i go bei yɑmɑrɑndiyom goono Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ. Bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ himmɑ noyom goono mo. Bine fɔ meiguyom goono Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ. I go bei mo bɑkɑre ndɑ suuji goono Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ.
50002002	Nge yom di sɑbu sɛ, wom mɑ ɑ binekɑɑne tɔnɑndi. Wɑ gundɑ lɑsɑbu fɔ ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine fɔ ndɑ lɑɑkɑli fɔ kɑ lɑsɑbu hɛ fɔlɔnku gɑɑ.
50002003	Wɑ si hɛ fɔ kulu tɛ ndɑ feefee wɑlɑ ndɑ bɔmbɛɛrɑndiyom kɔnu ɑmmɑ ndɑ bɔm yetiyom gɑndɑ bɔrɔ kulu mɑ ngɑ bɔm gunɑ zɑngɑ bɔrɔ fɔ bisɑ ngɑ.
50002004	Wom kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ si lɑɑkɑli ndɑ ngɑ bɔm murɑdu yom hinne, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ lɑɑkɑli mɑ ndɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom ŋmɔne.
50002005	Wɑ bɑrɑ ndɑ lɑsɑbu wɔne kɑ ɑ̀ goono Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ.
50002006	Ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑrɑ ɑfɔ ndɑ Ikpɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ngɑ sɑrɑfɔtɛrɛ ndɑ Ikpɛ lɑsɑbu zɑngɑ hɛ fɔ kɑ jɛ ndɑ gɑɑbi.
50002007	À tu ngɑ mɑ ikpɛtɛrɛ hini dɑbɑri nɑm. À nɑ ngɑ bɔm ci tɑm kɑ ye iburɑdɑm cine.
50002008	À hunu tɛrɛ zɑngɑ bɔrɔ. À nɑ ngɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ mo. À tu ngɑ mɑ kpei buyom gɑɑ, bɑ bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ gɑɑ bu.
50002009	À sɛ no, Ikpɛ mo nɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi kɑ bisɑ hɛ kulu. À nɑ mɑɑ fɔ dɑm ɑ̀ gɑɑ, mɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ mɑɑ yom kulu.
50002010	Ngɑ di sɑbu sɛ no Yesu mɑɑ gɑɑ cɛnjɛ kulu mɑ sɔmbu, bɛɛnɛ ŋmɔne yom ndɑ hɑndunyɑ ŋmɔne yom ndɑ gɑndɑ cire ŋmɔne yom.
50002011	Dɛɛnɛ kulu mo mɑ sɛdɑ kɑ cii Yesu Mɛsiyɑ yɑ ci Kpe, kɑ kɑɑndɑ deizɑ Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ sɛ.
50002012	A bine bɑɑkɔei, wom go kɑ ɑ sendi gɑnɑ sɑɑ kulu. À mɑnɑ ci ɑ jine hinne ɑmmɑ, hɑli yɑ mɑ mɑɑsɑ kɑ ɑ si nodi wom go kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ. Ngɑ di sɛ no, gbei kɑ wom go tɛ zɑmɑ wom jinɑ kɑ du fɑɑbɑ, wom mɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ hɑmburu ndɑ gɑsiyom.
50002013	Ikpɛ yɑ gɑ gbei tɛ wom kunɑ hɑli wom binebɑɑ ndɑ wom tɛgbei mɑ kɑɑni ɑ̀ sɛ.
50002014	Wɑ hɛ kulu tɛ, gunu ndɑ kɑkɔ mɑ si.
50002015	À gɑɑ no, beerem mɑ si wom yɑnce. Wom mɑ gɔrɔ ihinno, Ikpɛ ize yom kɑ ǹ sindɑ tɑɑli zɑmɑni beerem siirɑntɛ ndɑ ilɑlɔ wɔ kunɑ. Ǹ gɑme kunɑ mo wom go kɑɑri zɑngɑ fitilɑ hɑndunyɑ kunɑ.
50002016	Wom go hundi sendɑ sombu mo. À gɑɑ no ɑ kɑɑ fɑihã Mɛsiyɑ hɑnu hine zɑmɑ yɑ nɑ zuuru kɔnu wɑlɑ kɑ gbei tɛ kɔnu.
50002017	A go kɑ ɑ hundi lɑsɑbu zɑngɑ sɛjɛntɛ sɑrɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ munu Ikpɛ sɛ. Bɑ de ǹ gɑ ɑ hundi no zɑngɑ yɑ wom sɑrɑɑ ndɑ wom gbei bɔm, sɑrɑɑ ndɑ gbei kɑ wom go tɛ nɑɑne kunɑ, ɑ bine yee. A go fɑihã mo wom kulu bɑndɑ.
50002018	Wom mo, wom bine mɑ yee yɑ di, wɑ fɑihã mefɔ ndɑ hɛɛ.
50002019	Ammɑ ɑ gundɑ niyɑ Kpe Yesu kunɑ yɑ Timote dɔntɔm wom dɔ hɑli cɛnɑ zɑmɑ hɛɛ mo yɑ du himmɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ kɑɑ du wom bɑɑru.
50002020	A sindɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu zɑngɑ ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ sududu ndɑ wom goonoyom.
50002021	Ǹ kulu ǹ bɔm cini no ǹ go tɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Yesu Mɛsiyɑ ŋmɔne.
50002022	Ammɑ wom go Timote sɛdɑ bei zɑngɑ ɑ̀ tɑmtɛrɛ ndɑ hɛɛ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ kunɑ zɑngɑ koo cini mei ngɑ bɑɑbɑ sɛ.
50002023	Ngɑ di sɛ, ɑ gundɑ niyɑ yɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔm ndɑ wɑɑsi zɑ ɑ di zɑngɑ ɑ goonoyom bɑrɑ.
50002024	Ammɑ ɑ gundɑ nɑɑne wɔne Kpe kunɑ mɑ. Hɛɛ bumbum ɑ kɑɑ di wom hɑli cɛnɑ.
50002025	À gunɑ ɑ̀ hegu ɑ sɛ mo yɑ ɑ nyɑize Epɑfiru mo dɔntɔm wom dɔ. Ngɑ yɑ ci ɑ bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ gbei kunɑ ndɑ tɑngɑmi kunɑ, cɛ kɑ wom dɔntɔm ɑ dɔ. À nɑ sɑjo gbei kulu tɛ ɑ sɛ.
50002026	A gundɑ wom kulu cewɑ. À bine sɑrɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ ndɑ kɑ wom mɑɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ zɛnjɛ.
50002027	À zɛnjɛ fɑ hɑli ɑ̀ mɑɑni bu gɑɑ ɑmmɑ Ikpɛ sisibi ɑ̀ sɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ngɑ hinne sɛ ɑmmɑ ndɑ hɛɛ mo zɑmɑ yɑ si du binesɛrɛ binesɛrɛ bɔm.
50002028	À sɛ no, ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔm ndɑ wɑɑsi hɑli de wom yɑɑrɑ kɑ di ɑ̀, wom mɑ fɑihã. Hɛɛ mo, ɑ binesɛrɛ mɑ tɛ dɑɑmɑ.
50002029	Ngɑ di sɛ, wom mɑ ɑ̀ tɑ Kpe kunɑ ndɑ fɑihã zɑllɑ. Bɔrɔ zɑngɑ yɑ dimi wom mɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ.
50002030	Wom mɑ ngɑ di tɛ zɑmɑ Mɛsiyɑ gbei sɛ no ɑ̀ mɑɑni bu gɑɑ. À nɑ ngɑ hundi neerɑ zɑmɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑziɑ wom gbei kunɑ ɑ dɔ hɛrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ ɑ̀ tɔnɑndi.
50003001	A nyɑizei, mɑɑsɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ cindi neyɑ. Wom mɑ fɑihã Kpe kunɑ. Bɑ kɑ ɑ gɑ hɛ fɔlɔnkuei hɑntum wom sɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ɑ sɛ kɑnkɑmi, ɑmmɑ wom hɑlɑsiyom sɛ no.
50003002	Wɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ iburɑdɑm hɑnsi yom, beerem nɑ kɑ ǹ ci gbeiteeri lɑlɔ yom no. Wɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ beerem nge yom di kɑ ǹ ci dumbukɔ yom.
50003003	I yom yɑ ci bɑnguize yom. I go kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ ko fɑihã Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ. I sindɑ gɑɑhɑm gɑɑ nɑɑne.
50003004	A sindɑ gɑɑhɑm nɑɑne mɑ, bɑ kɑ hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ gundɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ hini kɑ nɑɑne gɑɑhɑm gɑɑ. De bɔrɔ fɔ ŋmɑni go tɑmmɑ ngɑ hini kɑ nɑɑne gɑɑhɑm gɑɑ, yɑ no hɛɛ mo, ɑ bisɑ ɑkpɛ.
50003005	Ǹ nɑ ɑ dɑmbɑngu no jiribi ɑhɑkuɑntɛ. Isirɑilɑ dimi gɑɑ no ɑ hunu, Benzɑmim kundɑ kunɑ mo. Hɛɛ yɑ ci Ebulu bɔrɔ, nyɑ hɑli bɑɑbɑ. Moisi fɔndɑ dɔ hɛrɛ Fɑrisi fɔndɔ bɔrɔ nɑ, hɛɛ.
50003006	Himmɑ mɑ dɔ hɛrɛ ɑ nɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ guruguzɑndi. Cɛɑndiyom susu dɔ hɛrɛ fɔndɑ gɑɑ, ɑ sindɑ tɑɑli.
50003007	Ammɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ gɑ tɛ ɑ sɛ liibɑ, ɑ nɑ ǹ lɑsɑbu zɑngɑ muruse Mɛsiyɑ sɑbu sɛ.
50003008	Yɑ mo no, ɑ gɑ hɛ kulu lɑsɑbu zɑngɑ muruse zɑmɑ yɑ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu bei kɑlɑ kɑlɑ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑ ŋmɔne Kpe. À sɑbu sɛ ɑ nɑ hɛ kulu muruse tɛ. A nɑ ǹ lɑsɑbu mo zɑngɑ beegunu zɑmɑ yɑ du Mɛsiyɑ.
50003009	Hɛɛ mo yɑ bɑrɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ndɑ cɛɑndiyom susu kɑ ɑ̀ hunu Ikpɛ dɔ nɑɑne gɑɑ. A mɑnɑ du cɛɑndiyom susu Moisi fɔndɑ gɑnɑyom dɔ, ɑmmɑ bɔrɔ du ɑ̀ Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ nɑɑne dɔ.
50003010	A bɑɑ yɑ du kɑ Mɛsiyɑ bei mo, ngɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ dɑbɑri kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme. A bɑɑ yɑ meigu ndɑɑ̀ kɑ tɛ ɑfɔ ɑ̀ guruguze yom kunɑ. Yɑ himɑ Mɛsiyɑ mo ɑ̀ bu kunɑ.
50003011	A go bɑɑ nge yom di zɑmɑ zɑngɑ no kulu yɑ tɔ bukɔei tunɑndiyom gɑɑ.
50003012	A mɑnɑ tɔ doyom dɔ jinɑ. Ikpɛ mɑnɑ ɑ tɔɑndi mo jinɑ ɑmmɑ ɑ go hɑmine ko du hɛ kɑ sɛ Mɛsiyɑ jinɑ kɑ ɑ dii kɔ.
50003013	Nyɑizei, ɑ si lɑsɑbu ɑ jinɑ kɑ du ɑ̀, ɑmmɑ hɛ fɔlɔnku nɑ ɑ go tɛ. A go dinigɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ goono bɑndɑ. A go kpei susu ndɑ himmɑ kɑ tɔ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ goono jinɑ dɔ.
50003014	A go zuuru susu kɑ kpei doyom dɔ kɑ du tukunsi. Tukunsi di yɑ ci Ikpɛ cɛɛ yom kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ.
50003015	Ngɑ di sɛ, i kulu kɑ i ci tɔɑntɛ yom, i mɑ gundɑ lɑɑkɑli wɔne. De bine hɛ fɔ kunɑ wom gundɑ lɑɑkɑli ŋmɑni fɔ, ngɑ mo Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ wom sɛ.
50003016	Ammɑ nungu kɑ i jinɑ kɑ tɔ kɔ, i mɑ dirɑ fɔndɔ fɔlɔnku bɔm ndɑ lɑɑkɑli fɔlɔnku.
50003017	A nyɑizei, wom kulu mɑ tɛ ɑ dendenikɔ yom. Wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go dirɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ deedɑndi kɑ wom du i dɔ goono ndɑ.
50003018	Bɔrɔ boobo go dirɑ kɑ ǹ ci ibɛrɛ yom Mɛsiyɑ bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ sɛ. A jinɑ kɑ ǹ bɑɑru cii ce boobo. Bɑ mɑɑsɑ mo ɑ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cii wom sɛ ndɑ hɛ̃ni.
50003019	Ǹ beenɑntɛ nɑ hɑlɑciyom. Ǹ ŋmɔne ikpɛ mo yɑ ci ǹ gunde yom. Ǹ deizɑ mo goono ǹ hɑwi kunɑ. Ǹ lɑsɑbu yom goono hɑndunyɑ hɛ yom bɔm.
50003020	Ammɑ i yom wɔ, bɛɛnɛ ize yom no. I go kɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ i fɑɑbɑkɔ bɑtu ɑ̀ mɑ hunu zɑ nodi.
50003021	Mɛsiyɑ gɑ i gɑɑhɑm bunɔ bɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ himɑndi zɑngɑ ngɑ gɑɑhɑm deizɑkpɛ. À gɑ ɑ̀ bɛrɛ ndɑ ngɑ dɑbɑri zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ hɛ kulu dɑm ngɑ meire cire.
50004001	À sɛ nɑ, ɑ nyɑize bine bɑɑkɔei, wom mɑ cɛ ɑ̀ mɑ boori Kpe kunɑ. A gundɑ wom cewɑ. A binebɑɑkɔ yom, wom yɑ ci ɑ binekɑɑne ndɑ ɑ tukunsi fulɑ.
50004002	A go Efodiɑ yɑmɑrɑndi, yɑ no Sintici mo. Ǹ mɑ gɔrɔ ndɑ lɑɑkɑli fɔlɔnku Kpe kunɑ.
50004003	Oò ni mo, bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ nɑɑnekpɛ gbei kunɑ, ɑ go kɑ n ŋmɑɑrɛ n mɑ weibɔrɔ yom di gɑɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ gɑɑ kɑ tɑngɑm ɑ bɑndɑ Bɑɑru Hinno kunɑ. Cilimɑ mo ndɑ bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ cindei kɑ ǹ mɑɑ yom goono Hundi Tirɑ kunɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ gɑɑ weibɔrɔ yom di bɑndɑ.
50004004	Wɑ fɑihã Kpe kunɑ sɑɑ kulu. A go kɑ ɑ̀ cii wom sɛ kpɛɛnɛ, wo fɑihã.
50004005	Wom bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ mɑ hunutɛrɛ bɔrɔ kulu sɛ. Kpe mɑɑni.
50004006	Wɑ si kɑrihã ndɑ hɛ fɔ kulu ɑmmɑ hɛ kulu kunɑ, wɑ wom bɑɑyom cɛbɛ Ikpɛ sɛ ɑduwɑ yom ndɑ ŋmɑɑrɛyom gɑɑ ndɑ sɑɑbuyom.
50004007	Ikpɛ lɑɑkɑli kɑne mo kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ fɑhɑm kulu kɑɑ wom bine yom ndɑ wom lɑsɑbu yom bɑtu Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ.
50004008	À bɑndɑ nyɑizei, wom mɑ lɑsɑbu hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ ci cimi bɔm ndɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ bɛɛrɛ. Wɑ lɑsɑbu hɛ yom kulu bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ ci cɛyom susu ndɑ hɛ yom kulu kɑ ǹ ci ihinno ndɑ hɛ yom kulu kɑ ǹ ci bɑɑkɑsine hɛ. Wɑ lɑsɑbu hɛ yom bɔm kɑ ǹ gundɑ sɛdɑ hinno mo. De hɛ nge yom di gundɑ booriyom wɑlɑ sɑɑbuyom, wom mɑ lɑsɑbu ǹ bɔm.
50004009	Hɛ yom kɑ wom dendeni kɑ tɑ kɑ mɑɑ ɑ dɔ kɑ di ɑ kunɑ, wom mɑ ǹ tɛ. Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne no, ɑ̀ bo goono wom bɑndɑ.
50004010	A fɑihã kɑlɑ kɑlɑ Kpe kunɑ ndɑ kɑ mɑɑsɑ wom yɑɑrɑ kɑ lɑsɑbu ndɑ hɛɛ. Bɑ kɑ wom lɑsɑbu ndɑ hɛɛ mo ihinno no ɑmmɑ dɑɑmɑ nɑ wom gɑziɑ.
50004011	A si sendi kɑ simbɑ ndɑ ɑ bɑɑyom bo zɑmɑ ɑ nɑ binekɑɑne dendeni goonoyom dimi kulu kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ɑ goono.
50004012	A ŋmɑɑni zɑme gɔrɛ. A ŋmɑɑni gɔrɛ bɑyom kunɑ mo. Nungu kulu ndɑ hɛ kulu kunɑ ɑ dendeni kɑ goono kungi kunɑ kɑ mɑɑ hɛrɛɛ mo. A dendeni kɑ goono bɑyom kunɑ ndɑ zɑme kunɑ.
50004013	Mɛsiyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ no gɑɑbi kunɑ no, ɑ hini kɑ hɛ kulu tɛ.
50004014	Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu, wom tɛ ihinno ndɑ kɑ wom nɑ ɑ gɑɑkɑsine ɑ kɑnkɑmi kunɑ.
50004015	Wom mo, Filipi bɔrɔ yom, wom bei zɑ wom sinti kɑ mɑɑ Bɑɑru Hinno, ɑ hunu kɑ gɑnɑ Mɑsedoni lɑɑbu. Sɑɑ ngɑ di Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ bɑ ɑfɔ mɑnɑ huro kɑ ɑ gɑɑ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ noyom ndɑ tɑyom kɑlɑ wom hinne.
50004016	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ goono Tesɑlonikɑ wɑngɑrɑ ce fɔ fɔ hɑli ce hinkɑ wom nɑ sɑmbɑ tɛ ɑ sɛ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ ɑ bɑɑyom.
50004017	A si noyom ceeci ɑmmɑ ɑ go ceeci kɑ nɑm wom bɑrikɑ jisɑntɛ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ kunɑ mɑ bɑ kɑ tɔntɔnu.
50004018	A du ɑ̀ kulu, ɑ goono bɑyom kunɑ. A kungu ndɑ hɛ kɑ wom sɑmbɑ ɑ sɛ Epɑfiru bɑndɑ. À ci zɑngɑ wɑidi hɛo kɑɑnɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɑrɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ tu. À kɑɑni ɑ̀ sɛ mo.
50004019	Wom bɑɑyom kulu mo, ɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ bɑnɑ ngɑ hɑizici deizɑkpɛ bɔm Mɛsiyɑ Yesu dɔ.
50004020	Deizɑ mɑ ci i Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ ŋmɔne jiiri dubu ndɑ dubu yom. Ami. Kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ fɔɔyom neyɑ
50004021	Wom mɑ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kulu fɔɔ. Nyɑizei mo kɑ ǹ goono ɑ dɔ go wom fɔɔ.
50004022	Hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kulu gɑ wom fɔɔ, hɑli yɑ mɑ Kɑisɑ fuu ŋmɔne yom.
50004023	Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gomini mo gɔrɔ wom bɑndɑ. Ami.
51001001	Hɛɛ Pɔlu, hɛɛ yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ Yesu diyɑ Ikpɛ binebɑɑ dɔ. I nyɑize Timote goono ɑ bɑndɑ.
51001002	I go wom hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom fɔɔ. Nyɑize nɑɑnekpɛ yom Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ, wom kɑ wom goono Kolose wɑngɑrɑ, i go wom fɔɔ. Gomini ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne kɑ ǹ hunu i Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ ndɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ, ǹ mo goono wom bɑndɑ.
51001003	I go kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ Bɑɑbɑ ko kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ wom sɛ sɑɑ kulu.
51001004	Zɑ kɑ i mɑɑ wom nɑɑne bɑɑru Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine kɑ wom gundɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kulu sɛ, i go kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu.
51001005	Wom nɑɑne ndɑ wom bɑɑkɑsine go sinji bɛɛjɛ bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ goono jisɑntɛ bɛɛnɛ kunɑ wom sɛ. Wom gundɑ bɛɛjɛ wɔ kɑ wom jinɑ kɑ mɑɑ cimi sendɑ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Bɑɑru Hinno.
51001006	Bɑɑru Hinno kɑɑ wom dɔ. Hɑndunyɑ kulu kunɑ ɑ̀ go bɑrikɑ hɛi kɑ hɑnfɑni tɔntɔnu. Zɑngɑ yɑ no ɑ̀ go tɛ wom kunɑ zɑ hɑnu kɑ wom mɑɑ kɑ fɑhɑm ndɑ Ikpɛ gomini cimi kunɑ.
51001007	Wom nɑ ɑ̀ dendeni mo Epɑfɑru dɔ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci i nyɑize binebɑɑkɔ, i bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ tɑmtɛrɛ kunɑ. Ngɑ yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ gbeiteeri nɑɑnekpɛ wom sɛ.
51001008	À nɑm mo i nɑ wom bɑɑkɑsine bɑɑru bei kɑ wom gundɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ.
51001009	À sɛ no, i yom mo zɑ hɑnu kɑ i mɑɑ wom bɑɑru, i mɑnɑ cɛ ndɑ ɑduwɑ tɛyom wom sɛ. I go ŋmɑɑrɛ wom mɑ tɔ ndɑ Ikpɛ binebɑɑ beiyom hɑikusutɛrɛ kulu kunɑ ndɑ fɑhɑm kulu mo kɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ go no.
51001010	I go ŋmɑɑrɛ mo wom mɑ dirɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ Kpe sɛ hɑli wom mɑ kɑɑni ɑ̀ sɛ hɛ kulu kunɑ. Gbei hinno kulu kunɑ mɑ bɑrikɑ mɑ tɔntɔnu wom sɛ. Wom mɑ beeri mɑ Ikpɛ beiyom kunɑ.
51001011	I go ŋmɑɑrɛ Ikpɛ mɑ wom no gɑɑbi, gɑɑbi dimi kulu kunɑ ɑ̀ dɑbɑri deizɑkpɛ bɔm hɑli wom mɑ hini suuru hɛ kulu kunɑ ndɑ binekɑɑne.
51001012	Wom mo Bɑɑbɑ sɑɑbu, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ i tɔ i mɑ du bɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom tubu gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono kɑɑri kunɑ.
51001013	À nɑ i kɑɑ kube hini kunɑ kɑ kpeindɑ i yom ngɑ Ize Binegɑnji kpetɛrɛ kunɑ.
51001014	À Izɑ kunɑ mɑ i du fɑnsɑyom ɑ̀ kuri dɔ, wɑtom ɑ̀ go kɑ i yɑɑfɑ ndɑ i dulum yom.
51001015	Bɔrɔ si du kɑ di Ikpɛ, ɑmmɑ Mɛsiyɑ yɑ Ikpɛ fɔlɔnku no kɑ ɑ̀ hunutɛrɛ i sɛ. Ngɑ yɑ goono zɑ ǹ mɑnɑ hɛ fɔ kulu tɑkɑ.
51001016	A nɑ hɛ kulu tɑkɑ. À nɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ goono bɛɛnɛ ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ goono gɑndɑ tɑkɑ. À nɑ hɛ yom kɑ bɔrɔ hini kɑ di ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ moo si di tɑkɑ, zɑ kpetɛrɛ yom zɑ dɑbɑri yom zɑ meire yom zɑ hini yom. À dɔ nɑ Ikpɛ nɑ hɛ kulu tɑkɑ. A sɛ mo no hɛ kulu goono.
51001017	Ngɑ yɑ goono zɑ hɛ kulu mɑnɑ tɛ. À gɑ hɛ kulu hɔ cɛrɛ gɑɑ.
51001018	Ngɑ yɑ ci gɑɑhɑm bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑ̀ mɑrgɑ. Ngɑ yɑ ci sintine ndɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ jinɑ kɑ tunu bukɔei gɑme domi hɛ kulu kunɑ ɑ̀ mɑ tɛ jinɑ.
51001019	À kɑɑni Ikpɛ sɛ ngɑ hɑɑli tɔyom kulu mɑ gɔrɔ Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ.
51001020	À kɑɑni ɑ̀ sɛ mɑ ngɑ mɑ hɛ yom kulu sɑsɑbɑndi ndɑ ngɑ, Mɛsiyɑ dɔ. Zɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ goono gɑndɑ hɑli hɛ yom kɑ ǹ goono bɛɛnɛ, ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ kulu sɑsɑbɑndi ɑ̀ dɔ. Mɛsiyɑ nɑ bɑɑni tɛ bɔrɔ ndɑ Ikpɛ gɑme ɑ̀ kuri dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ munu bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ gɑɑ.
51001021	Wom mo, dom wom gɔrɔ yobi yom ndɑ ibɛrɛ yom wom lɑsɑbu yom kunɑ wom gbei lɑlɔ yom gɑɑ.
51001022	Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ Mɛsiyɑ nɑ wom sɑsɑbɑndi ngɑ gɑɑhɑm kunɑ ɑ̀ buyom dɔ domi ngɑ mɑ wom cɛɑndi ngɑ jine hɑlɑɑlɑ yom, tɑɑli si. Beriyom mɑ si ɑ̀ jine.
51001023	À go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ de wom bo gɔrɔ nɑɑne kunɑ zɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ wom sinjɑndi kɑ wom cɛɑndi. À nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ mɑ hɑli wom mɑ si bɛrɛ bɛɛjɛ gɑɑ, bɛɛjɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu Bɑɑru Hinno dɔ kɑ wom mɑɑ. Bɑɑru Hinno beerem wɑɑzu hɑndunyɑ kulu kunɑ. Hɛɛ Pɔlu, Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ tɛ Bɑɑru Hinno gbeiteeri.
51001024	Mɑɑsɑ ɑ go fɑihã ndɑ ɑ guruguze yom wom sɑbu sɛ. A go tɔnɑndi mo ɑ gɑɑhɑm kunɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑziɑ Mɛsiyɑ kɑnkɑmi kunɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑhɑm sɑbu sɛ, gɑɑhɑm di kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑ̀ mɑrgɑ.
51001025	Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ sɛ no ɑ tɛ gbeiteeri kɑ simbɑ ndɑ gbei kɑ Ikpɛ dɛcɛ ɑ bɔm wom dɔ hɛrɛ yɑ Ikpɛ Sendi tɔnɑntɛ tɛ.
51001026	Sendi tɔnɑntɛ di yɑ ci duje kɑ zɑ jiiri dubu ndɑ dubu yom, zɑ cɛɛ kɑ cɛɛ yom ɑ̀ goono tugɑntɛ. Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ ngɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom sɛ.
51001027	Ikpɛ bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ kɑɑtɛrɛ i sɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci duje wɔ ŋmɔne hɑizici deizɑkpɛ dimi cindei gɑme. Duje wɔ yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ goono wom kunɑ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci bɛɛjɛ deizɑkpɛ.
51001028	Mɛsiyɑ wɔ bɑɑru wɑɑzu no i go tɛ. I go bɔrɔ kulu kɑɑbɑɑru kɑ bɔrɔ kulu cooɑndi hɑikusutɛrɛ kulu kunɑ. I go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ no zɑmɑ i mɑ bɔrɔ kulu cɛbɛ tɔɑntɛ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ.
51001029	Ngɑ di sɛ nɑ, ɑ gɑ gbei tɛ kɑ tɑngɑm ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ gbei dɑbɑri goono ndɑ, dɑbɑri kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ gbei tɛ ɑ kunɑ.
51002001	A go bɑɑ wom mɑ bei tɑngɑmi kɑ ɑ gɑ tɛ wom sɛ ndɑ wɔ kɑ yom goono Lɑudise kpɑɑrɑ ndɑ beerem kulu sɛ mo kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ moo tɑɑci tɛ ndɑ hɛɛ.
51002002	A go tɑngɑm zɑmɑ ǹ bine yom mɑ du himmɑ. Ǹ mɑ meigu mefɔ mɑ bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ hɑli ǹ mɑ du hɑizici kulu kɑ ɑ̀ hunu fɑhɑm tɔnɑntɛ tɑbɑtɑndiyom kunɑ. À gɑɑ nɑ ǹ mɑ Ikpɛ duje bei sã sã, wɑtom Bɑɑbɑ ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ bumbum.
51002003	Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ no hɑikusutɛrɛ hɑizici ndɑ beiyom hɑizici kulu goono tugɑntɛ.
51002004	A go wɔne cii no zɑmɑ bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ mɑ si wom zɑmbɑ ndɑ ngɑ meecine kɑ ɑ̀ go bɔrɔ dɛrɑndi.
51002005	Bɑ kɑ ɑ si wom dɔ mɑɑ ndɑ moo, ɑ goono wom dɔ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ. A gɑ fɑihã kɑ ɑ di wom go sɛsɛrɛ kɑ cɛ cɛrɛ bɑndɑ ndɑ gɑɑbi wom nɑɑne dɔ Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ.
51002006	Ngɑ di sɛ zɑngɑ wom nɑ Kpe Mɛsiyɑ Yesu tɑ, wom mo dirɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ yɑ di.
51002007	Wom nɑ kɑɑji tɛ ɑ̀ kunɑ. Wom go cini ɑ̀ bɔm mo hɑli wom go sinji kɑ boori nɑɑne kunɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ ǹ nɑ wom cooɑndi ndɑ. Wom nɑɑne go bɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ndɑ sɑɑbuyom.
51002008	Wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli mo bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ si wom dɛrɑndi ndɑ wɑlitɛrɛ ndɑ zɑmbɑ kɔnu. Cɛbɛ nge yom di hunu iburɑdɑm yom ɑlɑɑdɑ yom dɔ ndɑ hɑndunyɑ hɛ yom dɔ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ dɔ.
51002009	Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ no Ikpɛtɛrɛ tɔyom kulu goono ko gɔrɔ ɑ̀ gɑɑhɑm kunɑ.
51002010	À kunɑ no wom tɛ tɔɑntɛ yom, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci meire kulu bɔm ndɑ hini kulu bɔm.
51002011	À kunɑ no Ikpɛ nɑ wom dɑmbɑngu. À mɑnɑ tɛ ndɑ bɑngudɑmyom kɑ ǹ tɛ ndɑ kɑmbɛ. Ammɑ Ikpɛ nɑ wom dɑmbɑngu ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ bɑngudɑmyom kɑ ɑ̀ ci dulum hɑɑli dɑbɑri kɑɑyom.
51002012	Ǹ nɑ wom fiji ɑ̀ bɑndɑ mirɑndiyom kunɑ. Ǹ nɑ wom tunɑndi ɑ̀ bɑndɑ mefɔ wom nɑɑne gɑɑ Ikpɛ dɑbɑri gbei kunɑ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Yesu tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme.
51002013	Wom dom gɔrɔ bukɔ yom wom tɑɑli yom ndɑ wom dulum hɑɑli zɑm kɑ dɑmbɑngu sɑbu sɛ. Ikpɛ nɑ wom hunɑndi Mɛsiyɑ bɑndɑ mefɔ. À nɑ wom yɑɑfɑ ndɑ wom tɑɑli yom kulu.
51002014	À nɑ i yɑɑfɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ tilɑsi yom kɑ ǹ goono fɔndɔ hɑntumɑntɛ kunɑ tusu. Tilɑsi yom wɔ goono i gɑɑ kɑ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ i yom, Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ kɑɑ kɑ ǹ kɑnji bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ gɑɑ.
51002015	Bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ gɑɑ no ɑ̀ nɑ meire yom ndɑ hinikpɛ yom kɑɑ ǹ dɑbɑri gɑɑ. À nɑ ǹ tɛ no jɑmɑ bindi bindi kɑ gɑɑŋmɑɑ ǹ bɔm ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
51002016	Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ si nɑm bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ mɑ wom ciiti kɑ simbɑ ndɑ ŋmɑɑ wɑlɑ ndɑ hɑm. Wɑ si nɑm mo ǹ mɑ wom ciiti ndɑ jingɑru wɑlɑ ndɑ hɑndu teji wɑlɑ ndɑ hulɑnzom hɑnu yom.
51002017	Nge yom di, hɛ yom kɑ ǹ go kɑɑ ǹ ŋmɔne biyɑ nɑ, ɑmmɑ gɑɑhɑm di yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ.
51002018	Akpɛ wɔ go fɑɑriŋmɑɑ nɑ ndɑ ngɑ bɔm cɛnɑndiyom ko kɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom bɛɛrɑndi. À go huro hɛ yom kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ di hɑli iburɑdɑm hɑɑli lɑsɑbu gɑɑ, ɑ̀ go kɑ ngɑ bɔm beerɑndi kɔnu, sɑbɑbu si. Wɑ si nɑm bɔrɔ kpɛ dimi mɑ wom ciiti kɑ cii wom si tɔ wom bɑtɑ tukunsi gɑɑ.
51002019	Bɔrɔ kpɛ dimi fee noyɑ kɑ hunu bɔm gɑɑ. Bɔm gɑɑ no gɑɑhɑm kulu go beeri ko hɔ cɛrɛ gɑɑ dɔbu yom gɑɑ ndɑ linji yom gɑɑ. À go du beere kɑ ɑ̀ hunu Ikpɛ dɔ.
51002020	Wom bu Mɛsiyɑ bɑndɑ kɑ fee ndɑ hɑndunyɑ hɛ yom. To. Ifɔ sɛ wom go wom gɔrɛ tɛ hɑndunyɑ kunɑ ko kɑ ɑ̀ sendikpɑrɛ yom gɑnɑ?
51002021	Zɑngɑ ǹ cii: Si zɑɑ. Si tɑbɑɑ. Si hɑmɑ.
51002022	Hɛ nge yom di kulu kɑɑ hɑlɑci ngei gbei tɛyom gɑɑ, domi ǹ nɑ ǹ sinji iburɑdɑm yom fɔndɔ yom ndɑ ǹ cooɑndiyom bɔm.
51002023	Sendikpɑrɛ yom di himɑ zɑngɑ ǹ gundɑ hɑikusutɛrɛ zɑmɑ ǹ gɑnɑyom hunu iburɑdɑm binebɑɑ dɔ ndɑ bɔm cɛnɑndiyom ndɑ gɑɑhɑm tɑɑbɑndiyom kunɑ. Ammɑ nge yom di sindɑ hɑnfɑni bineibɑɑi bɔm hiniyom sɛ.
51003001	Zɑkɑ Ikpɛ nɑ wom tunɑndi Mɛsiyɑ bɑndɑ, wom mɑ hɛ yom ceeci kɑ ǹ goono bɛɛnɛ. Nodi no Mɛsiyɑ goono kɑ gɔrɔ Ikpɛ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ.
51003002	Wom mɑ lɑsɑbu ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ goono bɛɛnɛ, ɑ̀ nɑ ci hɛ yom kɑ ǹ goono gɑndɑ.
51003003	Wom bu. Wom hundi yom bine goono tugɑntɛ ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ Ikpɛ dɔ.
51003004	Mɛsiyɑ yɑ ci i hundi. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hunutɛrɛ, ɑ̀ gɑɑ nɑ wom mo wom kɑɑ hunutɛrɛ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ, deizɑ kunɑ
51003005	Ngɑ di sɛ wom mɑ hɑndunyɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ go gbei tɛ wom gɑɑhɑm dɔbu yom kunɑ wi. Ngei neyɑ, zinɑ ndɑ ziibi ndɑ cɛnsɛ futu ndɑ bineibɑɑi ndɑ hɛ bɑɑyom futu kɑ ɑ̀ ci tooru gɑnɑyom dimi fɔ.
51003006	Nge yom di sɑbu sɛ no Ikpɛ binetɔnɛ gɑ kɑɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go hungu Ikpɛ gɑnɑyom bɔm.
51003007	Beerem wɔ kunɑ no wom dom gɔrɔ kɑ dirɑ sɑɑ kɑ wom go hunɑ hɛ nge yom di kunɑ.
51003008	Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ, wom mɑ wɔne yom kulu nɑm, binetɔnɛ ndɑ binefute ndɑ cɛmbɛrɛ cɛmbɛrɛ ndɑ sendi yɑmɔ ndɑ hɑwi sendi yom kɑ ǹ donɑ kɑ hunu wom mee yom kunɑ.
51003009	Wom mɑ si tɑngɑri cɛrɛ sɛ zɑ kɑ wom nɑ bine kunɑ bɔrɔ zeenɔ kɑɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ gbei yom.
51003010	Wom nɑ bine kunɑ bɔrɔ teji fɑkɑ. Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑ̀ tɑkɑkɔ, ɑ̀ go bɔrɔ ngɑ di tejɑndi beire kunɑ ngɑ himɑndi bɔm.
51003011	Bɔrɔ tejitɛrɛ wɔ dɔ fɑyɑnkɑ si. Gɑrɛku si wɑlɑ Yuifu wɑlɑ bɑnguize wɑlɑ zɑm kɑ dɑmbɑnguize. À sindɑ yobi wɑlɑ Sitɑncɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci yobi ɑnne wɑlɑ tɑm wɑlɑ bɔrɔcini. Ammɑ Mɛsiyɑ yɑ ci hɛ kulu. À goono hɛ kulu kunɑ mo.
51003012	Wom ci Ikpɛ ŋmɔne suubɑntɛ yom. Wom ci ɑ̀ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom mo ndɑ ɑ̀ binebɑɑkɔ yom. À sɛ no, wɑ suuji ndɑ bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ ndɑ bɔm yetiyom gɑndɑ ndɑ bɑɑniyom ndɑ suuru hiniyom dɑm zɑngɑ jiine.
51003013	Wɑ suuru ndɑ cɛrɛ. Wɑ cɛrɛ yɑɑfɑ mo de bɔrɔ fɔ go wuuru ndɑ ngɑ kpɑɑsi. Zɑngɑ Mɛsiyɑ nɑ wom yɑɑfɑ, wom mo wɑ tɛ yɑ di.
51003014	Ǹ kulu bɔm yɑ ci wɑ gundɑ bɑɑkɑsine domi ngɑ yɑ gɑ wom hɔ cɛrɛ gɑɑ hɑli wom mɑ ci ɑfɔ.
51003015	Wɑ nɑm Ikpɛ lɑɑkɑli kɑne mɑ mɑ wom bine yom mei. Wom mɑ ɑ̀ tɛ domi lɑɑkɑli kɑne wɔ no, Ikpɛ nɑ wom cɛɛ ndɑ, gɑɑhɑm fɔlɔnku kunɑ. Wom mɑ sɑɑbu mo.
51003016	Mɛsiyɑ sendi mo gɔrɔ wom bine yom kunɑ ndɑ bɑyom hɑikusutɛrɛ kulu kunɑ. Wom mɑ cɛrɛ cooɑndi. Wom mɑ cɛrɛ no himmɑ ndɑ Sɑmu yom betu yom ndɑ sɑɑbuyom betu yom ndɑ dɔɔni yom kɑ ǹ hunu Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ. Wɑ betu tɛ Ikpɛ sɛ mo ndɑ gomini wom bine yom kunɑ.
51003017	Hɛ kulu mɑ kɑ wom go tɛ sendi dɔ wɑlɑ gbei dɔ, wɑ ɑ̀ kulu tɛ Kpe Yesu mɑɑ gɑɑ kɑ Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu ɑ̀ dɔ.
51003018	Wɛndɛ yom, wɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ wom kunye yom sɛ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ himɑ Kpe kunɑ.
51003019	Wom mo kunye yom, wɑ bɑɑ wom wɛndɛ yom. Wɑ si kutɑ ndei.
51003020	Wom mo koo yom, wɑ wom bɑhɛi yom gɑnɑ hɛ kulu kunɑ domi ngɑ di yɑ kɑɑni Kpe sɛ.
51003021	Wom mo bɑɑbɑ yom, wɑ si kɑm wom koo yom gɑɑ hɑli ǹ hɛo mɑ hunu.
51003022	Wom mo tɑm yom, wɑ wom hɑndunyɑ kpe yom gɑnɑ hɛ kulu kunɑ. Wɑ si tɛ ndɑ ǹ moo diyom hɑli wom mɑ kɑɑni iburɑdɑm yom sɛ bo ɑmmɑ wɑ tɛ ndɑ bine fɔ Ikpɛ hɑmbure kunɑ.
51003023	Hɛ kulu kɑ wom go tɛ, wɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ bine fɔ zɑngɑ Kpe sɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci iburɑdɑm yom sɛ.
51003024	Wom go bei kɑ wom kɑɑ du tubu kɑ ɑ̀ ci wom tukunsi Kpe dɔ. Mɛsiyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Kpe, ɑ̀ sɛ no wom go tɑmtɛrɛ.
51003025	Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ilɑlɔ tɛ, ilɑlɔ no ɑ̀ du. Bɑɑbɑɑ si Ikpɛ dɔ.
51004001	Hɑndunyɑ kpe yom, wom mo wɑ tɛ wom tɑm yom sɛ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci cɛɑntɛ susu ndɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ. Wɑ bei kɑ wom mɑ, wom gundɑ Kpe fɔ bɛɛnɛ kunɑ.
51004002	Wo himmɑ dɑm ɑduwɑ gɑɑ. Wɑ sɑɑle dɑm ɑ̀ gɑɑ ndɑ sɑɑbuyom mɑ.
51004003	Wo kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ i sɛ mɑ Ikpɛ mɑ fɔndɔ feeri ngɑ Sendɑ sɛ hɑli i mɑ hini kɑ Mɛsiyɑ duje sendi cii. Duje wɔ sɑbu sɛ nɑ ɑ goono kɑsu.
51004004	Wom mɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ yɑ du kɑ ɑ̀ cii tɛrɛkpɑrɛ mo ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ himɑ yɑ sendi.
51004005	Wom mo dirɑ ndɑ hɑikusutɛrɛ beerem kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ nɑɑne jine. Wɑ lɔkɑci zɑɑ ndɑ lɑɑkɑli.
51004006	Sɑɑ kulu wom sendi mɑ ci ihinno kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ nɑfɑ zɑngɑ ŋmɑɑri kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ ciiri. Yɑ nɑ hɑli wom mɑ bei zɑngɑ ɑ̀ himɑ wom mɑ sendi kɑ yeti bɔrɔ sɛ.
51004007	I nyɑize binebɑɑkɔ Ticiku yɑ gbeiteeri nɑɑnekpɛ no. Ngɑ yɑ ci i bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ tɑmtɛrɛ kunɑ Kpe sɛ. À kɑɑ deede wom sɛ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono kɑ simbɑ hɛɛ.
51004008	À sɛ nɑ, ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔm wom dɔ ɑ̀ mɑ du kɑ wom ŋmɔne ɑsiiri yom bei ɑ̀ mɑ wom bine yom mo no himmɑ.
51004009	A nɑ Onezim dɔntɔm ɑ̀ bɑndɑ. Onezim yɑ ci nɑɑnekpɛ, i nyɑize binebɑɑkɔ no. Ngɑ mo, wom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ no. Ǹ kɑɑ wom no nee hɛ kulu bɑɑru.
51004010	Alisitɑku, ɑ kpɑɑsi kɑsuize go wom fɔɔ. Mɑɑku, Bɑɑnɑbɑ weimɑ ize mɑ go wom fɔɔ. Wom jinɑ kɑ du ɑ̀ bɔm kɔ fɔndɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ cii, de ɑ̀ kɑɑ wom dɔ wom mɑ ɑ̀ tɑ.
51004011	Yɑsuwɑ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Yusitu, ɑ̀ go wom fɔɔ mo. Ǹ kulu Yuifu yom no. Ngei hinne yɑ ci ɑ bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ yom gbei kunɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ sɛ. Ngei mo yɑ nɑ ɑ yɑmɑrɑndi.
51004012	Epɑfɑru mo kɑ ɑ̀ ci wom nmɔne ɑfɔ, Mɛsiyɑ tɑm, ngɑ mo go wom fɔɔ. À go tɑngɑm mo wom sɛ sɑɑ kulu ndɑ ɑduwɑ yom zɑmɑ wom mɑ du kɑ cɛ tɔɑntɛ yom ndɑ tɑbɑtɑntɛ yom Ikpɛ binebɑɑ kulu kunɑ.
51004013	A gɑ sɛdɑ ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go himmɑ dɑm kɑlɑ kɑlɑ wom sɛ ndɑ beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ goono Lɑudise kpɑɑrɑ ndɑ Hiyɑpoli kpɑɑrɑ.
51004014	Lukɑ i lokotoro binebɑɑkɔ ndɑ Demɑ, ǹ go wom fɔɔ.
51004015	Wom mɑ nyɑizei kulu kɑ ǹ goono Lɑudise kpɑɑrɑ fɔɔ. Wom mɑ Nimfɑ ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono ɑ̀ hundi kunɑ fɔɔ.
51004016	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ tirɑ wɔ coo wom kulu jine, wom mɑ nɑm ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ coo Lɑudise Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ bɔrɔ yom mo sɛ. Tirɑ kɑ Lɑudise Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ bɔrɔ yom mo du, wom mɑ ɑ̀ coo.
51004017	Wom mɑ cii Alicipu sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ gbei di kɑ ɑ̀ du Kpe kunɑ domi ɑ̀ mɑ ɑ̀ tɔnɑndi.
51004018	Hɛɛ mɑ Pɔlu, hɛɛ yɑ nɑ fɔɔyom wɔ hɑntum ndɑ ɑ bumbum kɑmbɛ. Wom mo hɔngɔ ɑ goono hɔɑntɛ kɑsu kunɑ. Gomini mo gɔrɔ wom bɑndɑ. Ami.
52001001	Hɛɛ Pɔlu ndɑ Silɑfim ndɑ Timote, i yom yɑ go wom Tesɑlonikɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ fɔɔ, mɑrgɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ ndɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ. Gomini ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne kɑ ǹ hunu i Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ dɔ ndɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ, ǹ mɑ goono wom bɑndɑ.
52001002	I go kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu wom sɛ sɑɑ kulu kɑ i hɔngɔ wom i ŋmɔne ɑduwɑ yom kunɑ.
52001003	I go hɔngɔ cɛyom si, wom gbei kɑ wom go tɛ nɑɑne kunɑ ndɑ tɛgbei kɑ wom go tɛ bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ. I go hɔngɔ wom suuru bɛɛjɛ kunɑ mo kɑ ɑ̀ goono i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ i Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ jine.
52001004	Nyɑize binebɑɑkɔ yom, i go bei Ikpɛ nɑ wom suubɑ nɑ.
52001005	I go bei i Bɑɑru Hinno mɑnɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ mee sendi gɑɑ hinne ɑmmɑ ndɑ dɑbɑri ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ ndɑ tɑbɑtɑndiyom kɑlɑ kɑlɑ mo. Zɑngɑ yɑ wom go bei i gɔrɛ kɑ i tɛ wom jine noyɑ wom sɑbu sɛ.
52001006	Wom tɛ i dendenikɔ yom ndɑ Kpe ŋmɔne yom mɑ. Wom nɑ Sendɑ tɑ kɑnkɑmi boobo kunɑ. Wom nɑ ɑ̀ tɑ ndɑ fɑihã kɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ go no.
52001007	Yɑ no wom tɛ deedɑndi nɑɑnekɔ yom kulu sɛ kɑ ǹ goono Mɑsedoni lɑɑbu ndɑ Akɑyɑ lɑɑbu.
52001008	Zɑ wom dɔ no, Kpe Sendɑ dundum. A mɑnɑ ci Mɑsedoni lɑɑbu ndɑ Akɑyɑ lɑɑbu hinne no ɑmmɑ nungu kulu no wom nɑɑne bɑɑru kɑ wom gundɑ Ikpɛ gɑɑ kɑru kɑ see. À sɛ no, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ tɔ i mɑ hɛ fɔ cii kpɛɛnɛ.
52001009	Ngei bumbum gɑ kɑ i deede ndɑ kubeyom kɑ i du wom dɔ. Ǹ go kɑ i deede mo zɑngɑ wom fee ndɑ tooru yom kɑ bɛrɛ Ikpɛ dɔ. Wom bɛrɛ kɑ tɑmtɛrɛ Ikpɛ Hundikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Cimikpɛ sɛ.
52001010	Wom bɛrɛ ko kɑ ɑ̀ Ize bɑtu kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ zɑ bɛɛnɛ. Ize wɔ nɑ Ikpɛ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme. Ngɑ yɑ ci Yesu kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ i kɑɑ binetɔnɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ kɑmbɛ.
52002001	Nyɑizei, wom bumbum bei kubeyom kɑ i du wom dɔ mɑnɑ ci kɔnu.
52002002	Wom bei Filipi kpɑɑrɑ bɔrɔ yom nɑ i guruguzɑndi kɑ i sendi yɑmu zɑ i mɑnɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ. Ammɑ i du binesɛndɛ i ŋmɔne Ikpɛ kunɑ kɑ sendi wom sɛ Ikpɛ Bɑɑru Hinno bɔm, bɑ ndɑ tɑngɑmi boobo.
52002003	I himmɑ noyom si dɛrɛyom kunɑ wɑlɑ ziibi kunɑ wɑlɑ gulinci kunɑ.
52002004	Ammɑ Ikpɛ nɑ i tɑbɑtɑndi kɑ Bɑɑru Hinno tɑlifi i gɑɑ. Zɑngɑ yɑ no, i go sendi. À mɑnɑ ci i go sendi hɑli i mɑ kɑɑni iburɑdɑm yom sɛ ɑmmɑ i mɑ kɑɑni Ikpɛ sɛ, Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ i bine yom neesi.
52002005	Wom go bei kɑ i mɑnɑ sendi kɑɑnɔ yom cii bɑ ce fɔ. Wom go wɔne bei mo kɑ i mɑnɑ sendi ndɑ hɛ bɑɑyom kɔbɛ. Ikpɛ yɑ ci i sɛdɑ.
52002006	I bine mɑnɑ bɛɛrɛ ceeci iburɑdɑm yom dɔ wɑlɑ wom dɔ wɑlɑ bɔrɔ cindei dɔ. Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu i hini kɑ tɛ wom sɛ jɛrɔ ndɑ dɑbɑri zɑngɑ Mɛsiyɑ diyɑ yom.
52002007	Ammɑ i tɛ bɔrɔ bɑɑnɔ yom wom kunɑ zɑngɑ ize nyɑ cini kɑ ngɑ koo yom tɛlɛtɛlɛ.
52002008	Yɑ no i yom mo i gundɑ wom bɛɛjɛ. À mɑnɑ ci Ikpɛ Bɑɑru Hinno hinne no ɑmmɑ ndɑ i bumbum mo domi wom tɛ i binebɑɑkɔ yom.
52002009	Nyɑizei, wom go hɔngɔ gbei kɑ i tɛ ciini ndɑ zɑɑri ndɑ i tɑɑbi hɑli i mɑ si tɛ jɛrɔ wom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ fɔ kulu sɛ. Yɑ no i nɑ Ikpɛ Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu fɛɛ wom sɛ.
52002010	I nɑ i gɔrɛ hɑlɑɑlɑ tɛ kɑ ci cɛɑntɛ susu wom jine. I sindɑ tɑɑli wom jine, wom nɑɑnekɔ yom. Wom yɑ ci sɛdɑ yom ngɑ di bɔm, yɑ nɑ Ikpɛ mɑ.
52002011	Wom go bei mo zɑngɑ i gɔrɔ wom bɔrɔ fɔ fɔ kulu sɛ zɑngɑ bɑɑbɑ ndɑ koo. I nɑ wom no himmɑ kɑ wom lɑɑkɑli kɑnɑndi.
52002012	I nɑ wom no himmɑ kɑ cii wom goonoyom mɑ sɑbɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndiyom, Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go wom cɛɛ ngɑ bumbum kpetɛrɛ ndɑ ngɑ deizɑ dɔ.
52002013	Wom no Ikpɛ Sendi tɑ, Sendɑ kɑ wom mɑɑ i dɔ. Wom nɑ ɑ̀ tɑ mo ko bei ndɑ cimi ngɑ yɑ ci Ikpɛ Sendɑ. Wom mɑnɑ ɑ̀ tɑ zɑngɑ iburɑdɑm sendi. Sendi di go gbei tɛ wom kunɑ mo, wom kɑ wom ci nɑɑnekɔ yom. À sɛ no i yom mo, i go kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu, cɛyom si.
52002014	Wom mo nyɑizei, wom tɛ dendenikɔ yom Ikpɛ mɑrgɑ yom kɑ ǹ goono Yude lɑɑbu Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ sɛ. Wom guruguze mo wom dimi yom kɑmbɛ kunɑ zɑngɑ ngei mɑ guruguze Yuifu yom dɔ.
52002015	Yuifu yom nɑ Kpe Yesu ndɑ ngei ɑndebi yom wi. Ǹ nɑ i yom mo guruguzɑndi. Ǹ si kɑɑni Ikpɛ sɛ. Ǹ go gɑɑbɑ ndɑ bɔrɔ kulu mo.
52002016	Ǹ hungu i mɑ sendi dimi cindei sɛ hɑli Ikpɛ mɑ ǹ fɑɑbɑ. Zɑngɑ yɑ, ǹ go kɑ ngei dulum yom tɔnɑndi cɛyom si. À sɛ no, Ikpɛ binetɔnɛ tɔnɑntɛ zumbu ǹ bɔm.
52002017	Nyɑizei, i fee ndɑ wom lɔkɑci cɛnɑ fɔ. I si wom bɑndɑ ɑmmɑ i bine yom goono wom gɑɑ. I go guuri kɑlɑ kɑlɑ i mɑ di wom moodumɑ kpɛɛnɛ.
52002018	À sɛ nɑ, i bɑɑ i mɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ. Hɑli yɑ mɑ hɛɛ Pɔlu, ɑ bɑɑ yɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ ce fɔ yom, ɑmmɑ Setɑm nɑ i gɑnji.
52002019	Ifɔ yɑ ci i bɛɛjɛ wɑlɑ i binekɑɑne wɑlɑ i fulɑ tukunsi kɑ ɑ̀ ci i fɑihã? Wom yɑ ci i fulɑ tukunsi sɑɑ kɑ i goono i Kpe Yesu jine ɑ̀ kɑɑyom wɑtɛ. À nɑ ci yɑ no bɑ?
52002020	Wom mo, wom yɑ ci i deizɑ ndɑ i fɑihã.
52003001	À sɛ no kɑ i mɑnɑ ye kɑ hini suuru kpɛɛnɛ, ɑ̀ sɑbɑ i sɛ i yom hinne mɑ gɔrɔ Atinɑ wɑngɑrɑ nyɑ kunɑ.
52003002	I nɑ i nyɑize Timote kɑ ɑ̀ ci Ikpɛ gbeiteeri dɔntɔm wom dɔ. Timote yɑ ci i bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ Mɛsiyɑ Bɑɑru Hinno kunɑ. I nɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔm ɑ̀ mɑ wom sinji ɑ̀ mɑ boori kɑ wom no himmɑ wom nɑɑne kunɑ.
52003003	I nɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔm zɑmɑ wom mɑ sinji hɑli bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ si kɑmbɑ tɑɑbi wɔne yom sɑbu sɛ. Wom bumbum go bei kɑ tɑɑbi nge yom di sɛ no Ikpɛ nɑ i jisi.
52003004	Sɑɑ kɑ i goono wom dɔ i jinɑ kɑ cii wom sɛ kɑ tɑɑbi bɑ kɑɑ i dɔ. À kɑɑ kɔ zɑngɑ wom gundɑ ɑ̀ beiyom.
52003005	À sɛ no hɛɛ mo, yɑ nɑ du kɑ hini suuru kpɛɛnɛ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ Timote dɔntɔm wom dɔ yɑ du kɑ wom nɑɑne bei. A gɑ hɑmburu hɑnibɑ suikɔ nɑ wom sui hɑli i gbei tɛ kɔnu.
52003006	Mɑɑsɑ kɑ Timote hunu wom dɔ kɑ kɑɑ i dɔ, ɑ̀ kɑɑndɑ i sɛ bɑɑru hinno wom nɑɑne ndɑ wom bɑɑkɑsine bɔm. À cii wom gundɑ hɔngɔyom hinno i sɛ sɑɑ kulu. À cii mo wom go bɑɑ wom mɑ di i yom zɑngɑ i go bɑɑ i mɑ di wom.
52003007	À sɛ no nyɑizei, i tɑɑbi kulu kunɑ ndɑ i kɑnkɑmi kulu kunɑ i gundɑ yɑmɑrɑndiyom kɑ simbɑ wom, wom nɑɑne sɑbu sɛ.
52003008	Zɑ kɑ wom go cɛ ihinno Kpe kunɑ, mɑɑsɑ i go hunɑ.
52003009	Sɑɑbuyom dimi fɔ i mɑ tɛ Ikpɛ sɛ wom sɑbu sɛ, binekɑɑne kɑ wom kɑɑndɑ i sɛ Ikpɛ jine?
52003010	Ciini ndɑ zɑɑri i gɑ kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ kɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ i mɑ di wom moodumɑ. I go ŋmɑɑrɛ i mɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑziɑ wom nɑɑne kunɑ tɔnɑndi mɑ.
52003011	Mɑɑsɑ Ikpɛ bumbum kɑ ɑ̀ ci i Bɑɑbɑ ndɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ mɑ fɔndɔ kɑ ɑ̀ kpei wom dɔ feeri.
52003012	Kpe mo bɑɑkɑsine kɑ wom gundɑ cɛrɛ sɛ ndɑ ǹ kulu sɛ tɔntɔnu ndɑ bɑyom zɑngɑ bɑɑkɑsine kɑ i gundɑ wom sɛ.
52003013	Yɑ nɑ, Ikpɛ mɑ wom bine yom no gɑɑbi wom mɑ gɔrɔ tɑɑli si hɑlɑɑlɑtɛrɛ kunɑ i Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ jine sɑɑ kɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ go kɑɑ ndɑ ngɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kulu.
52004001	À bɑndɑ nyɑizei, wom dendeni i dɔ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ himɑ wom mɑ dirɑ hɑli wom mɑ kɑɑni Ikpɛ sɛ. I go wom ŋmɑɑrɛ kɑ wom no himmɑ Kpe Yesu mɑɑ gɑɑ wom mo tɛ yɑ di kɑ tɔntɔnu.
52004002	Wom go bei hɛ yom kɑ i nɑ wom dɑm Kpe Yesu dɔ.
52004003	Ikpɛ binebɑɑ yɑ ci wom hɑlɑɑlɑtɛrɛ. Zɑngɑ yɑ, wom mɑ wom bɔm fee zinɑ dimi kulu.
52004004	Wom bɔrɔ fɔ fɔ kulu mɑ ŋmɑɑni mɑ ngɑ gɑɑhɑm diiyom hɑlɑɑlɑtɛrɛ kunɑ ndɑ bɛɛrɛ kunɑ.
52004005	Wom mɑ si tu bineibɑɑi mɑ wom gɑɑhɑm dii zɑngɑ dimi cindei kɑ ǹ si Ikpɛ bei gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ.
52004006	Wom bɔrɔ fɔ fɔ kulu mɑ si ngɑ nyɑize dɑrigɑ kɑ ɑ̀ zɑmbɑ hɛ wɔ kunɑ. Kpe yɑ ci fɑɑsɑkɔ hɛ nge yom di kulu kunɑ. I bine jinɑ kɑ cii wom sɛ kɔ kɑ ɑ̀ fɑyɑnkɑ wom sɛ.
52004007	Ikpɛ mɑnɑ i cɛɛ i mɑ gɔrɔ ziibi kunɑ ɑmmɑ i mɑ gɔrɔ hɑlɑɑlɑtɛrɛ kunɑ.
52004008	Ngɑ di sɛ, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hungu cɛbɛyom di, ɑ̀ si hungu bɔrɔ. Ikpɛ no ɑ̀ go hungu, Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go wom no ngɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ.
52004009	Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci nyɑize bɑɑkɑsine, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ tilɑsi yɑ ɑ̀ hɑntum wom sɛ. Wom mo, Ikpɛ nɑ wom cɛbɛ wom mɑ bɑɑ cɛrɛ.
52004010	Wom bine go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ Mɑsedoni lɑɑbu nyɑizei kulu. Ammɑ nyɑizei, i gɑ wom no himmɑ, wom mo bɑ kɑ tɔntɔnu kpɛɛnɛ.
52004011	Wɑ himmɑ tɛ kɑ gɔrɔ kɑlɑmbɑɑni si. Wɑ moo dɑm wom ŋmɔne ɑsiiri yom gɑɑ. Wɑ gbei tɛ ndɑ wom kɑmbɛ yom zɑngɑ i nɑ wom dɑm.
52004012	Wom mɑ wom gɔrɛ tɛ ndɑ booriyom tɛrɛ bɔrɔ yom jine hɑli wom si tɛ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu sɛ jɛrɔ.
52004013	Nyɑizei, ɑ bine si bɑɑ wom mɑ goono zɑm kɑ bei kunɑ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ kɑni. A si bɑɑ wom bine yom mɑ sɑrɑ zɑngɑ cindei kɑ ǹ sindɑ bɛɛjɛ.
52004014	Zɑ kɑ i go nɑɑne kɑ Yesu bu kɑ tunu kpɛɛnɛ, yɑ nɑ i gɑ nɑɑne mo kɑ beerem kɑ ǹ bu Yesu kunɑ, Ikpɛ kɑɑ kɑɑndei ngɑ bɑndɑ.
52004015	I go wɔne cii wom sɛ Kpe Sendɑ kunɑ. I yom kɑ i cindi ko hunɑ kɑlɑ Kpe kɑɑyom, i si jinɑ wɔ kɑ yom kɑni sɛ pɑi.
52004016	Ǹ kɑɑ mɑɑ jinde gɑ kuwɑ. Ǹ kɑɑ mɑɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize jinɑ jinde. Ǹ kɑɑ mɑɑ mo Ikpɛ kɑkɑji gɑ funsu. À gɑɑ nɑ, Kpe bumbum kɑɑ zumbu zɑ bɛɛnɛ. Bukɔ yom mo kɑ ǹ goono Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ, ǹ kɑɑ jinɑ kɑ tunu.
52004017	Cɔfɔ i yom mo kɑ i cindi kɑ hunɑ, ǹ gɑ i kɔm kɑ i meigu ndei buru yom kunɑ kɑ Kpe kube bɛɛnɛ bɑtumɑ kunɑ. Yɑ no i bo goono Kpe bɑndɑ, beeniyom si.
52004018	À sɛ no, wɑ cɛrɛ yɑmɑrɑndi ndɑ sendi nge yom di.
52005001	Ammɑ nyɑizei, hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci lɔkɑci nge yom di ndɑ ɑliwɑti nge yom di wom gɑ kɑ ǹ bei. À sɛ nɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ tilɑsi yɑ ɑ̀ hɑntum wom sɛ.
52005002	Wom bumbum, wom go bei cɑu cɑu kɑ Kpe hɑnuɑ kɑɑ nɑ zɑngɑ zee cini kɑɑ ciini kunɑ.
52005003	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ kɑɑ cii bɑɑni goono, kɑtɑru si, cɔfɔ wup hɑlɑciyom go kɑm ǹ bɔm mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ zɑngɑ hɛizɛnyɛ doori kɑɑ weibɔrɔ gɑɑ. Ǹ bine si kɔmɑ pɑi.
52005004	Ammɑ nyɑizei, wom si kube kunɑ hɑli hɑnu bɑ wom jirisi zɑngɑ zee.
52005005	Wom kulu kɑɑriize yom no ndɑ hɑnuize yom. I mɑnɑ ci ciini ŋmɔne yom wɑlɑ kube ŋmɔne yom.
52005006	Ngɑ di sɛ, i mɑ si jiibi zɑngɑ cindei go tɛ. Ammɑ i mo lɑɑkɑli kɑ i bɔm ci bɔrɔ.
52005007	Beerem kɑ ǹ go jiibi, ciini no ǹ go jiibi. Beerem kɑ bɑji go wi, ciini no bɑji go kɑ ǹ wi.
