52005008	Ammɑ i yom kɑ i ci hɑnuize yom, i mɑ hini i bɔm zɑ kɑ i nɑ nɑɑne ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine dɑm zɑngɑ jɛndɛkpɛrɛ. I mɑ fɑɑbɑ bɛɛjɛ tɛ ɑ̀ mɑ ci i sɛ zɑngɑ guuru fulɑ.
52005009	Ikpɛ mɑnɑ i jisi binetɔnɛ sɛ. À nɑ i jisi no i mɑ du fɑɑbɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ.
52005010	Ngɑ wɔ bu i guribi domi bɑ i goono moo hɛi no wɑlɑ bɑ i kɑni nɑ, i mɑ hunɑ mefɔ ndɑɑ̀.
52005011	À sɛ nɑ, wom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ fɔ kulu mɑ cɛrɛ no himmɑ kɑ cɛrɛ nɑɑne cini ndɑ zɑngɑ wom go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ.
52005012	Nyɑizei, i go wom ŋmɑɑrɛ, wɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ gbei tɛ wom gɑme sɛ. Ngei yɑ ci wom jinɑ yom Kpe kunɑ ko wom kɑɑbɑɑru.
52005013	Wɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ ǹ sɛ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ ǹ gbei sɑbu sɛ. Lɑɑkɑli kɑne mɑ goono wom cɛrɛ ndɑ cɛrɛ gɑme.
52005014	Nyɑizei, i go wom no himmɑ mo, wɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go yofune tɛ kɑɑbɑɑru. Wɑ bɔrɔ yeenɔ yom no himmɑ. Wɑ hinɑbunu yom gɑɑ ǹ zɑme kunɑ. Wɑ hini ǹ kulu suuru.
52005015	Wɑ lɑɑkɑli bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ si ilɑlɔ bɑnɑ ndɑ ilɑlɔ bɔrɔ fɔ gɑɑ. Ammɑ wɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ihinno hɑmine sɑɑ kulu cɛrɛ sɛ ndɑ bɔrɔ kulu sɛ mo.
52005016	Wo fɑihã sɑɑ kulu.
52005017	Wo kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ, cɛyom si.
52005018	Wom mo sɑɑbu hɛ kulu kunɑ domi ngɑ yɑ ci Ikpɛ binebɑɑ wom sɛ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ.
52005019	Zɑngɑ ǹ gɑ nini wi, wɑ si Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ wi.
52005020	Wɑ si ɑndebitɛrɛ fɛntɛ.
52005021	Wɑ hɛ kulu neesi kɑ ihinno dii kɑ jɛ.
52005022	Wɑ fee ndɑ hɛ lɑlɔ dimi kulu.
52005023	Mɑɑsɑ Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go lɑɑkɑli kɑne no, ngɑ bumbum mɑ wom hinnɑndi sã sã. Wom bɔrɔtɛrɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ ci biyɑ ndɑ hundi ndɑ gɑɑhɑm, Ikpɛ mɑ ǹ jɛ kɑ ǹ mɑ sindɑ tɑɑli i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kɑɑyom hɑnu.
52005024	Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ wom cɛɛ, Nɑɑnekpɛ no. À gɑ ngɑ di tɛ mo.
52005025	Nyɑizei, wɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ i sɛ.
52005026	Wɑ nyɑizei kulu fɔɔ ndɑ jɛrɛbɛ sumsumyom hinno bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ.
52005027	A gɑ wom ŋmɑɑrɛ Kpe mɑɑ gɑɑ, wom mɑ tirɑ wɔ coo nyɑize hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kulu jine.
52005028	I Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gomini mɑ gɔrɔ wom bɑndɑ. Ami.
53001001	Hɛɛ Pɔlu ndɑ Silɑfim ndɑ Timote, i yom yɑ go wom Tesɑlonikɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ fɔɔ, mɑrgɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono i Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ ndɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ.
53001002	Gomini ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne kɑ ǹ hunu Ikpɛ i Bɑɑbɑ ndɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ, ǹ mo goono wom bɑndɑ.
53001003	Nyɑizei, ɑ̀ himɑ i mɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu wom sɛ sɑɑ kulu. Ngɑ yɑ ci hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ zɑmɑ wom nɑɑne di gɑ beeri kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. Bɑɑkɑsine kɑ wom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ fɔ kulu gundɑ cɛrɛ sɛ mɑ, ɑ̀ go tɔntɔnu.
53001004	À sɛ no i yom mo, i go wom sifɑ Ikpɛ mɑrgɑ yom kunɑ wom suuru sɑbu sɛ. I gɑ wom sifɑ mo nɑɑne kɑ wom gundɑ ko guruguze yom ndɑ kɑnkɑmi yom jɛrɛ sɑbu sɛ.
53001005	Ngɑ yɑ ci sɛdɑ Ikpɛ ciiti cɛɑntɛ susu bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ nɑm Ikpɛ mɑ lɑsɑbu wom tɔ wom mɑ hurɑ ngɑ kpetɛrɛ kunɑ. Kpetɛrɛ di sɛ no wom go tɑɑbi.
53001006	À sɑbɑ Ikpɛ sɛ no ɑ̀ mɑ kɑnkɑmi yeti beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ wom kɑnkɑm bɔm.
53001007	À sɑbɑ mɑ wom kɑ wom goono kɑnkɑmi kunɑ Ikpɛ mɑ wom no hulonzom i bɑndɑ. Ngɑ di kɑɑ tɛ sɑɑ kɑ Yesu hunutɛrɛ zɑ bɛɛnɛ ndɑ ngɑ dɔntɔneize dɑbɑrikpɛ yom.
53001008	Ǹ kɑɑ nini bɛllɛ kunɑ kɑ fɑɑsɑ beerem gɑɑ kɑ ǹ si Ikpɛ bei ndɑ beerem gɑɑ kɑ ǹ si kɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ Bɑɑru Hinno gɑnɑ.
53001009	Beerem nge yom di kɑɑ du bɑnɑndi kɑ ɑ̀ ci hɑlɑciyom, beeniyom si. Ǹ gɑ ǹ fee ndɑ Kpe moodumɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑbi deizɑkpɛ mo.
53001010	Ngɑ di kɑɑ tɛ Hɑnu di sɑɑ kɑ Yesu kɑɑ kɑ du bɛɛrɛ ngɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kunɑ. Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ nɑɑne, ɑ̀ kɑɑ mɑmɑci ndɑ Yesu ngei bɑndɑ. Wom mo, wom kɑɑ mɑmɑci ndɑɑ̀ zɑmɑ wom cimɑndi i sɛdɑ gɑɑ kɑ i tɛ wom sɛ.
53001011	À sɛ no, i go kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ wom sɛ sɑɑ kulu ko kɑ i ŋmɔne Ikpɛ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ wom lɑsɑbu kɑ wom tɔ cɛɛ yom wɔ. I go ŋmɑɑrɛ mɑ Ikpɛ mɑ ngɑ bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ miilɑ kulu tɔnɑndi wom nɑɑne gbei dɔ ngɑ dɑbɑri gɑɑ.
53001012	Yɑ no i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ mɑɑ mɑ du bɛɛrɛ wom kunɑ. Wom mo wom mɑ du bɛɛrɛ ɑ̀ kunɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ i ŋmɔne Ikpɛ ndɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gomini goono ndɑ.
53002001	Mɑɑsɑ nyɑizei, i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kɑɑyom gɑɑ ndɑ i meiguyom ɑ̀ dɔ, i gundɑ ŋwɑɑrɛyom wɔne.
53002002	Wom mɑ si nɑm ǹ mɑ wom biriji ndɑ wɑɑsi wom lɑsɑbu yom kunɑ. Wom lɑɑkɑli mɑ si tunu mo biyɑ fɔ sɑbu sɛ wɑlɑ sendi fɔ sɑbu sɛ wɑlɑ tirɑ fɔ sɑbu sɛ. Wom lɑɑkɑli mɑ si tunu zɑmɑ beerem cii bɑɑru wɔ hunu i dɔ kɑ cii Mɛsiyɑ Hɑnu kɑɑ kɔ.
53002003	Wɑ si nɑm bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ wom zɑmbɑ ndɑ hɛ fɔ, domi Hɑnu wɔ si kɑɑ kɑlɑ de hunguɛ mɑ kɑɑ jinɑ. À si kɑɑ kɑlɑ de Ikpɛ fɔndɑ dɑɑrumkɔ mɑ jinɑ kɑ hunutɛrɛ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci hɑlɑciize.
53002004	Ngɑ yɑ kɑɑ hungu hɛ kulu kɑ beerem cii Ikpɛ no kɑ ngɑ bɔm bɛɛrɑndi. Hɛ kulu kɑ beerem go bɛɛrɑndi mo, ɑ̀ hunguɑ̀. Kɑ jɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ kulu, ɑ̀ kɑɑ gɔrɔ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ ko cii ngɑ yɑ Ikpɛ no.
53002005	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ goono wom dɔ, ɑ nɑ hɛ yom wɔ cii wom sɛ. Wom go hɔngɔ ngɑ di bɑ?
53002006	Mɑɑsɑ wom bei wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go ko ngɑ wɔ gɑnji ɑ̀ mɑ si hunutɛrɛ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ lɔkɑci kunɑ.
53002007	Ikpɛ fɔndɑ dɑɑrumyom duje go gbei tɛ kɔ. Kɑlɑ de, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnji mɑɑsɑ, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ tɛ hɑli ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ hɑndunyɑ kunɑ.
53002008	Sɑɑ di gɑɑ, Ikpɛ fɔndɑ dɑɑrumkɔ du kɑ hunutɛrɛ. Kpe gɑ ɑ̀ zeeri ndɑ ngɑ mee funsuyom. Kpe kɑɑyom kɑɑri mo gɑ ɑ̀ hɑlɑci.
53002009	Ikpɛ fɔndɑ dɑɑrumkɔ gɑ kɑɑ ndɑ Setɑm dɑbɑri kɑ gbei dɑbɑri dimi dimi kulu tɛ ndɑ ɑlɑmu yom ndɑ mɑmɑci tɑngɑri tɑngɑri yom.
53002010	À kɑɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ cɛsusu dimi tɛ kɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go hɑlɑci fɑfɑgu. Ǹ go hɑlɑci zɑmɑ ǹ hungu kɑ bɑɑ cimi hɑli ǹ mɑ du fɑɑbɑ.
53002011	À sɛ no, Ikpɛ mo nɑ dɛrɛyom dɑbɑrikpɛ tɑm ǹ gɑɑ hɑli ǹ mɑ nɑɑne tɑngɑri gɑɑ.
53002012	À gɑɑ no, beerem kulu kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ nɑɑne cimi gɑɑ ɑmmɑ ǹ bine go kɑɑni ndɑ gbei lɑlɔ tɛyom, Ikpɛ gɑ ǹ ciiti kɑ zeeri.
53002013	Ammɑ nyɑizei, Kpe binebɑɑkɔ yom, ɑ̀ himɑ i mɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu sɑɑ kulu wom sɑbu sɛ. I gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu zɑmɑ Ikpɛ nɑ wom suubɑ zɑ sintine wom mɑ du fɑɑbɑ sɛ. Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ di tɛ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ wom hɑlɑɑlɑndi. Wom mo nɑɑne cimi gɑɑ.
53002014	Fɑɑbɑ dɔ no ɑ̀ nɑ wom cɛɛ i Bɑɑru Hinno dɔ hɑli wom mɑ du i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ deizɑ mo.
53002015	Ngɑ di sɛ nyɑizei, wom mɑ cɛ ɑ̀ mɑ boori kɑ cɛbɛyom jɛ kɑ i nɑ wom cooɑndi i mee sendi gɑɑ wɑlɑ i tirɑ gɑɑ.
53002016	I Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ bumbum ndɑ i Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ bɑɑ i yom kɑ i nɑ yɑmɑrɑndiyom kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ beeniyom ndɑ bɛɛjɛ hinno ngɑ gomini gɑɑ.
53002017	À mɑ wom bine yom no gɑɑbi kɑ wom sinji sendi hinno kulu ndɑ gbei hinno kulu kunɑ.
53003001	À bɑndɑ nyɑizei, wom mo kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ i sɛ Kpe Sendɑ mɑ kɑru kɑ see ndɑ wɑɑsi nungu kulu. Sendi wɔ mɑ du bɛɛrɛ mo zɑngɑ ɑ̀ tɛ wom dɔ.
53003002	Wɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ mo i mɑ hunu bɔrɔ siirɑntɛ ndɑ bɔrɔ lɑlɔ yom kunɑ zɑmɑ bɔrɔ kulu mɑnɑ ci nɑɑnekɔ yom.
53003003	Ammɑ Kpe yɑ Nɑɑnekpɛ no kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ wom sinji ɑ̀ mɑ boori kɑ wom woo Ilɑlɔ.
53003004	I gundɑ nɑɑne Kpe kunɑ kɑ simbɑ wom ko bei hɛ kulu kɑ i go cii wom go kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ. Wom gɑ ɑ̀ tɛ mɑ.
53003005	Mɑɑsɑ, Kpe mɑ wom bine yom cendi kɑ kɑɑndɑ wom Ikpɛ bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ suuru kunɑ mɑ.
53003006	Nyɑizei, i go wom dɑm i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ. Wom mɑ fee ndɑ nyɑize kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go yofune gɔrɛ tɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci zɑngɑ cɛbɛ kɑ wom du i dɔ.
53003007	Wom bumbum go bei zɑngɑ ɑ̀ himɑ wom mɑ i dendeni. I mɑnɑ yofune gɔrɛ tɛ wom gɑme kunɑ.
53003008	I mɑnɑ ŋmɑɑ wom dɔ zɑngɑ binikom yom. Ammɑ tɑɑbi ndɑ fɑrigɑ kunɑ i nɑ gbei tɛ ciini ndɑ zɑɑri, domi i mɑ si tɛ zɑngɑ jɛrɔ wom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ fɔ kulu sɛ gɑndɑ.
53003009	À mɑnɑ ci i sindɑ hini kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ nɑ ɑmmɑ domi i mɑ i bɔm no wom sɛ zɑngɑ deedɑndi sɛ nɑ, wom mɑ i dendeni.
53003010	Yɑ no, sɑɑ kɑ i goono wom dɔ, i nɑ wom dɑm wɔne kɑ cii de bɔrɔ fɔ hungu kɑ gbei tɛ, ɑ̀ mɑ si ŋmɑɑ.
53003011	I mɑɑ kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom goono wom kunɑ ndɑ yofune kɑ ǹ si gbei tɛ pɑi. I mɑɑ kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ ngei bɔm dɑm hɛ kulu kunɑ.
53003012	Beerem kɑ ǹ goono zɑngɑ yɑ, i go kɑ ǹ dɑm kɑ ǹ no himmɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gɑɑ ǹ mɑ gbei tɛ ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne kɑ ngei bɔm ŋmɑɑrɑndi.
53003013	Ammɑ nyɑizei, wɑ si fɑrigɑ ndɑ ihinno tɛyom.
53003014	Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ i sendi gɑnɑ kɑ i gɑ cii tirɑ wɔ kunɑ, wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ bɔrɔ di. Wɑ si kpɑɑsitɛrɛ tɛ ndɑ ɑkpɛ domi hɑwi mɑ ɑ̀ dii.
53003015	Ammɑ wɑ si ɑ̀ lɑsɑbu zɑngɑ wom ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ. Wom mɑ ɑ̀ kɔnkɔm zɑngɑ nyɑize.
53003016	Mɑɑsɑ Ikpɛ bumbum kɑ ɑ̀ ci Lɑɑkɑli Kɑnekpɛ, mo wom no lɑɑkɑli kɑne sɑɑ kulu, zɑngɑ nɑ kulu. Kpe mɑ goono wom kulu bɑndɑ.
53003017	Hɛɛ Pɔlu, ɑ go wom fɔɔ. Ngɑ yɑ ci jeeri kɑ ɑ bumbum cini tɛ ndɑ ɑ kɑmbɛ ɑ tirɑ yom kulu kunɑ. Yɑ nɑ ɑ cini hɑntum.
53003018	I Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gomini mo gɔrɔ wom kulu bɑndɑ. Ami.
54001001	Hɛɛ Pɔlu, hɛɛ yɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ diyɑ no Ikpɛ i Fɑɑbɑkɔ meire bɔm ndɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci i bɛɛjɛ bɔm.
54001002	Hɛɛ yɑ go tirɑ wɔ hɑntum n sɛ Timote, ni ɑ ize ndɑ cimi nɑɑne kunɑ. Gomini ndɑ suuji ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne kɑ ǹ hunu Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ ndɑ i Kpe Mɛsiyɑ Yesu dɔ ǹ mo goono n bɑndɑ.
54001003	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ go kpei Mɑsedoni lɑɑbu zɑngɑ ɑ nɑ n ŋmɑɑrɛ di, n mɑ gɔrɔ Efese wɑngɑrɑ domi n mɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom dɑm ǹ mɑ si cooɑndi cɛbɛ ŋmɑni yom bɔm.
54001004	Ǹ mɑ si ngei bɔm hɔ jendi yom gɑɑ mo ndɑ cɛɛ kɑ cɛɛ yom gɑɑ kɑ ǹ sindɑ mee. Kɔsɔngu no ǹ cini kɑɑndɑ. Ǹ si nɑm Ikpɛ gbei mɑ kpei moojine nɑɑne kunɑ.
54001005	Meire wɔ sɑbɑbu yɑ ci bɑɑkɑsine kɑ ɑ̀ hunu bine hinno gɑɑ ndɑ bine kunɑ sendi hinno gɑɑ ndɑ nɑɑne kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ munɑficitɛrɛ.
54001006	Bɔrɔ fɔ yom nɑ hɛ nge yom di hɑitɑ kɑ kɑmbɑ. Ǹ huro sendi kɔnu yom kunɑ.
54001007	Ǹ go bɑɑ ngei mɑ tɛ Moisi fɔndɑ cooɑndikɔ yom. Ammɑ ǹ si fɑhɑm ndɑ hɛ kɑ ǹ gɑ cii ndɑ hɛ kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dɑhirɑndi.
54001008	Ammɑ i bei kɑ Moisi fɔndɑ yɑ ihinno nɑ de bɔrɔ go gbei tɛ ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ himɑ.
54001009	I gɑ bei kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ fɔndɑ tɛ bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu sɛ kɑlɑ fɔndɑ dɑɑrumkɔ yom sɑbu sɛ ndɑ hini hunguɛkpɛ yom sɑbu sɛ. Ǹ nɑ fɔndɑ tɛ beerem kɑ ǹ si kɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ ndɑ dulumkoni yom sɑbu sɛ ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ci hɑlɑɑlɑ yom sɛ ndɑ hɑndunyɑ hɛ bɑɑkɔ yom sɑbu sɛ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ bɑɑbɑ wikɔ yom ndɑ nyɑ wikɔ yom ndɑ bɔrɔ wikɔ yom sɑbu sɛ mo.
54001010	Ǹ nɑ fɔndɑ tɛ zinɑteeri yom sɛ ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go bɑbɑrɑ yom sɑbu sɛ ndɑ bɔrɔ zeekɔ yom ndɑ tɑngɑrikom yom sɑbu sɛ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ beerem kɑ ǹ go ze tɑngɑri bɔm ndɑ hɛ kulu kpɛɛnɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑbɑ ndɑ cɛbɛ hinno sɑbu sɛ.
54001011	Cɛbɛ wɔ yɑ ci Bɑɑru Hinno ŋmɔne, Bɑɑru Hinno deizɑkpɛ kɑ Ikpɛ Bɑrikɑkpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tɑlifi ɑ gɑɑ.
54001012	A go sɑɑbu i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ sɛ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ no gɑɑbi. A gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sɑɑbu domi ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ lɑsɑbu nɑɑnekpɛ kɑ ɑ dɑm ngɑ gbei kunɑ.
54001013	À nɑ ɑ dɑm gbei kunɑ bɑ kɑ ɑ ci Ikpɛ cɛnɑndikɔ ndɑ guruguzɑndikɔ ndɑ bɔrɔ futu. Ammɑ ɑ du suuji domi zɑm kɑ bei kunɑ nɑ ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ zɑm kɑ nɑɑne kunɑ.
54001014	Ammɑ i Kpe gomini tɔntɔnu ndɑ bɑyom ndɑ nɑɑne ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine kɑ ɑ̀ goono Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ.
54001015	Sendi wɔne nɑɑnekpɛ no kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ bɔrɔ kulu mɑ ɑ̀ tɑ. Ngɑ yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kɑɑ hɑndunyɑ kunɑ kɑ dulumkoni yom fɑɑbɑ. Hɛɛ mo yɑ ci dulumkoni yom kulu ŋmɔne ibeeri.
54001016	Ammɑ ɑ sɛ no Ikpɛ nɑ suuji tɛ hɑli Yesu Mɛsiyɑ nɑ ngɑ suuru kuku kɑɑtɛrɛ ɑ kunɑ. À nɑ suuji wɔ tɛ ɑ sɛ kɑ ɑ ci dulumkoni yom ŋmɔne ibeeri domi yɑ tɛ deedɑndi beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ bɑ nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ kɑ du hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni.
54001017	Mɑɑsɑ, Kpe kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ sintiyom, ɑ̀ sindɑ beeniyom, ɑ̀ si sɑrɑ, mɑɑ si di, Ikpɛ ngɑ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci hɑikusu, bɛɛrɛ ndɑ deizɑ mɑ ci ɑ̀ ŋmɔne yom jiiri dubu ndɑ dubu yom. Ami.
54001018	A gɑ kɑ n dɑm wɔne ɑ kɑɑ Timote, ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ yom kɑ ǹ dɑm jinɑ kɑ tɛ n bɔm goono ndɑ. N mɑ tɑngɑmi hinno tɛ ɑndebitɛrɛ sendi yom wɔ bɔm.
54001019	N mɑ nɑɑne jɛ ndɑ bine kunɑ sendi hinnɑ. Nɑɑne di no bɔrɔ fɔ yom furu kɑ ɑ̀ jisɑndi zɑngɑ hi go sɑrɑ kɑ jisi hɑri kunɑ.
54001020	Ǹ kunɑ ɑfɔ yom yɑ ci Himene ndɑ Alɛsɑndi kɑ ɑ nɑ ǹ dɑm Setɑm kɑmbɛ domi ǹ mɑ dendeni kɑ si Ikpɛ cɛnɑndi.
54002001	Ngɑ di sɛ, himmɑ kɑ ɑ go kɑ n no sintine yɑ ci, wo ŋmɑɑrɛ Ikpɛ gɑɑ. Wo kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ ndɑ ŋmɑɑrɛyom beerem sɛ ndɑ sɑɑbuyom mo bɔrɔ kulu sɛ.
54002002	Wo kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ lɑɑbu gɑndɑkpɛ yom ndɑ gɑɑbikoni yom sɛ domi i mɑ du kɑ i gɔrɛ tɛ ndɑ bɑɑni lɑɑkɑli kɑne kunɑ, Ikpɛ gɑnɑyom kulu kunɑ ndɑ booriyom.
54002003	Ngɑ yɑ boori. À kɑɑni mo Ikpɛ i Fɑɑbɑkɔ sɛ.
54002004	Ikpɛ miilɑ yɑ ci bɔrɔ kulu mɑ du fɑɑbɑ kɑ kɑɑ cimi bei.
54002005	Ikpɛ yɑ ngɑ fɔlɔnku no. Sɑsɑbɑndikɔ yɑ ngɑ fɔlɔnku no Ikpɛ ndɑ iburɑdɑm gɑme. Ngɑ yɑ Bɔrɔ no, Yesu Mɛsiyɑ.
54002006	A nɑ ngɑ bɔm no kɑ ci fɑnsɑyom hɛ bɔrɔ kulu sɛ. Sɛdɑ ngɑ di yɑ tɛ sɛdɑ ɑ̀ bumbum lɔkɑci gɑɑ.
54002007	Sɛdɑ ngɑ di sɛ no, Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ dɑm yɑ tɛ Mɛsiyɑ bɑɑru fɛɛkɔ ndɑ diyɑ. A go cimi cii Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ. A si tɑngɑri. Hɛɛ yɑ ci dimi cindei cɛbɛkɔ nɑɑne ndɑ cimi kunɑ.
54002008	Ngɑ di sɛ, ɑ go bɑɑ hɑibɔrɔ kulu mo kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ nungu kulu. Ǹ mɑ kɑmbɛ hinno yom sombu, binetɔnɛ mɑ si wɑlɑ kɑkɔ.
54002009	Yɑ no ɑ go bɑɑ weibɔrɔ yom mo ǹ mo jiine kɑ ɑ̀ hegu dɑm ndɑ bɔm bɑɑnɑndiyom ndɑ lɑɑkɑli. À mɑnɑ ci ǹ mɑ ngei bɔm tɑɑlɑm ndɑ turu ndɑ wurɑ wɑlɑ ndɑ tondi kpɑrɛ cɑɑdɑntɛ yom wɑlɑ ndɑ jiine cɑɑdɑntɛ yom.
54002010	Ammɑ ǹ mɑ tɑɑlɑm ndɑ gbei hinno yom zɑngɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ ndɑ weibɔrɔ yom noyɑ kɑ ǹ go kɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ.
54002011	Wɑ nɑm weibɔrɔ mɑ dendeni dɛnjɛyom kunɑ ndɑ bɔm yetiyom gɑndɑ.
54002012	Ammɑ yɑ nɑ tu weibɔrɔ mɑ cooɑndi wɑlɑ kɑ hini hɑibɔrɔ bɔm, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mo goono ndɑ gɔrɛ dɛnjɛyom kunɑ.
54002013	Adɑmu nɑ Ikpɛ jinɑ kɑ tɛ, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ Efe.
54002014	Ibilisi mɑnɑ Adɑmu zɑmbɑ ɑmmɑ Ibilisi nɑ weibɔrɔ zɑmbɑ hɑli ɑ̀ nɑ fɔndɑ dɑɑrum.
54002015	Ammɑ ǹ kɑɑ weibɔrɔ hɑlɑsi hɛiyom kunɑ de ǹ go himmɑ tɛ ndɑ lɑɑkɑli nɑɑne ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine ndɑ hɑlɑɑlɑtɛrɛ kunɑ.
54003001	Sendi wɔne nɑɑnekpɛ no. De bɔrɔ fɔ go guuri ngɑ mɑ tɛ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ cendikɔ, ɑkpɛ go gbei hinno guuri.
54003002	Ammɑ cendikɔ wɔ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ ǹ si di tɑɑli. A mɑ ci wɛndɛ fɔ kpɛ. À mɑ hini ngɑ bɔm. À mɑ ci lɑɑkɑlɑntɛ. À mɑ ci bɔrɔ bɑɑnɔ. À mɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ yo kube. À mɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑni cooɑndiyom.
54003003	À mɑ si ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɔm no dufɛ sɛ. À mɑ si ci bine wɑɑsɔkpɛ. À mɑ si ci nooru bɑɑkɔ. À mɑ ci bɔrɔ suurɑntɛ. À mɑ si ci fɑsɑdɑntɛ wɑlɑ hɛ bɑɑkɔ.
54003004	À mɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hini ngɑ fuu hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ boori kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ koo yom cɛbɛ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ sendi gɑnɑ kɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ.
54003005	De bɔrɔ si ŋmɑɑni kɑ hini ngɑ fuu, mɛtɛ ɑkpɛ tɛ kɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ Ikpɛ mɑrgɑ?
54003006	À mɑ si ci gɑnɑkɔ teji domi ɑ̀ mɑ si ngɑ bɔm bɛɛrɑndi kɑ kɑm Setɑm ciiti dimi kunɑ.
54003007	Ammɑ ɑ̀ mɑ gundɑ sɛdɑ hinno mo beerem kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ gɑnɑkɔ yom dɔ hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ si kɑm hɑwi kunɑ ndɑ Setɑm hirime kunɑ.
54003008	Yɑ no kɑlɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ gɑɑkɔ yom mo, ǹ mɑ ngei bɔm ci bɔrɔ. Ǹ mɑ si ci sendi hinkɑkpɛ yom. Ǹ mɑ si ci beerem kɑ ǹ nɑ ngei bɔm no dufɛ sɛ kɑ bisɑ. Ǹ mɑ si ci nooru bɑɑkɔ yom.
54003009	Ammɑ ǹ mɑ ci beerem kɑ ǹ nɑ nɑɑne ŋmɔne duje jɛ bine kunɑ sendi hinno kunɑ.
54003010	Ǹ mɑ ci beerem kɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ bubure kɑ di ǹ mɑ du kɑ tɛ mɑrgɑ gɑɑkɔ yom zɑ kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ di ǹ gɑɑ tɑɑli.
54003011	Yɑ no wɛndɛ yom mo, ǹ mɑ ngei bɔm ci bɔrɔ. Ǹ mɑ si ci kɔrɔmɔtɑntɛ yom. Ǹ mɑ ci weibɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ hini ngei bɔm. Ǹ mɑ ci nɑɑnekpɛ yom hɛ kulu gɑɑ.
54003012	Mɑrgɑ gɑɑkɔ yom mɑ ci wɛndɛ fɔ kpɛ yom kɑ ǹ go ŋmɑɑni kɑ hini ngei koo yom ndɑ ngei fuu yom hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ boori.
54003013	Beerem kɑ ǹ nɑ mɑrgɑ gɑɑkɔ gbei tɛ hɑli ɑ̀ boori, ǹ du ngei bɛɛrɛ nungu. Ǹ du yɑrutɛrɛ mo nɑɑne kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ.
54003014	A go wɔne yom hɑntum n sɛ nɑ bɑ kɑ ɑ gundɑ n dɔ kɑɑyom bɛɛjɛ subɑsi.
54003015	De ɑ go jɛ n mɑ bei zɑngɑ n gɑ n bɔm dii Ikpɛ fuu kunɑ, fuu kɑ ɑ̀ ci Ikpɛ Hundikpɛ mɑrgɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci cimi kɑɑsɑ ndɑ cimi tɛmbɛ.
54003016	Siikɑ si, Ikpɛ gɑnɑyom duje beeri. Ikpɛ hunutɛrɛ gɑɑhɑm kunɑ. Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ nɑ ɑ̀ cɛbɛ cɛyom susukpɛ. Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom di ɑ̀. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑru fɛɛ dimi cindei sɛ. Beerem nɑ ɑ̀ nɑɑne hɑndunyɑ kunɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ kɑ kpeindɑɑ̀ bɛɛnɛ deizɑ kunɑ.
54004001	Ammɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ bine cii tɛrɛkpɑrɛ no kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ lɔkɑci kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom kɑɑ kɑmbɑ nɑɑne gɑɑ. Ǹ kɑɑ biyɑ fɑfɑguɛkpɛ yom ndɑ hɔllɛ yom cɛbɛ yom gɑnɑ.
54004002	Ngei yɑ gɑ tɑngɑri cii ndɑ munɑficitɛrɛ, beerem kɑ ǹ bine kunɑ sendi tɛ tiinɑ zɑngɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɔnu ndɑ nini.
54004003	Ngei yɑ gɑ gɑnɑkɔ yom nɑ mei ǹ mɑ si hiji. Ǹ go cii mo ǹ mɑ si ŋmɑɑri fɔ yom ŋmɑɑ, ŋmɑɑri kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ nɑɑnekɔ yom kɑ ǹ go cimi bei mɑ ŋmɑɑ ndɑ sɑɑbuyom.
54004004	Ikpɛ nɑ hɛ kulu tɑkɑ ihinno no. Afɔ mo kulu si ɑ̀ kunɑ kɑ bɔrɔ mɑ hungu de bɔrɔ nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑ ndɑ sɑɑbuyom.
54004005	À hɑlɑli no Ikpɛ Sendɑ ndɑ ɑduwɑ dɔ.
54004006	De n nɑ hɛ nge yom di feeri nyɑize yom sɛ, n kɑɑ tɛ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gbeiteeri hinnɑ. N gɑ kɑ n bɔm ŋmɑɑrɑndi ndɑ nɑɑne sendi ndɑ cɛbɛ hinno kɑ n nɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ susu.
54004007	Ammɑ n mɑ hungu weizeenɔ yom jendi yom kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ci Ikpɛ ŋmɔne yom. N mɑ n bɔm kokɑri tɛ Ikpɛ gɑnɑyom kunɑ.
54004008	Gɑɑhɑm dungɑndiyom gundɑ bɑrikɑ cɛnɑ, ɑmmɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑyom gundɑ bɑrikɑ hɛ kulu kunɑ, zɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ ɑlikɑwɑli mɑɑsɑ hundi sɛ ndɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ kɑɑ ŋmɔne mo sɛ.
54004009	Sendi ngɑ di nɑɑnekpɛ no kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ bɔrɔ kulu mɑ ɑ̀ tɑ.
54004010	Ngɑ di sɛ nɑ i gɑ gbei tɛ ko goono hɑwi kunɑ domi i go bɛɛjɛ dɑm Ikpɛ Hundikpɛ kunɑ, Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci bɔrɔ kulu Fɑɑbɑkɔ hɑli yɑ mo nɑɑnekɔ yom.
54004011	N mɑ hɛ nge yom di dɑm kɑ cooɑndi ǹ bɔm.
54004012	N mɑ si tu bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ dondɑ ni, n hɑiwɑsutɛrɛ sɑbu sɛ. Ammɑ n mɑ ci deedɑndi nɑɑnekɔ yom sɛ sendi kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine ndɑ biyɑ ndɑ nɑɑne ndɑ bine hinneyom.
54004013	Hɑli ɑ kɑɑ n mo coo. N mo himmɑ nɑ. N mɑ cɛbɛ tɛ.
54004014	N mɑ si sɑɑle kɑɑ noyom gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono n kunɑ. Noyom wɔ no Ikpɛ no n sɛ ɑndebitɛrɛ gɑɑ sɑɑ kɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom nɑ ngei kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ n gɑɑ.
54004015	N mɑ sɑɑle dɑm hɛ nge yom di gɑɑ. N mɑ n bɔm no ǹ sɛ domi n jinɑ kpeiyom mɑ hunu tɛrɛkpɑrɛ bɔrɔ kulu sɛ.
54004016	N mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ n bɔm ndɑ cɛbɛyom di. N mo himmɑ dɑm hɛ nge yom di gɑɑ. Yɑ di tɛyom gɑɑ, n gɑ n bɔm fɑɑbɑ ndɑ beerem mo kɑ ǹ go hɑngɑ dɑm n sɛ.
54005001	N mɑ si bɔgu hɑizeenɔ bɔm ɑmmɑ n mɑ ɑ̀ nɑ himmɑ zɑngɑ n bɑɑbɑ yom. N mɑ hɑiwɑsu yom mɑ no himmɑ zɑngɑ n bumbum cɛɛnɛ yom.
54005002	N mɑ wei zeenɔ yom mo no himmɑ zɑngɑ n nyɑ yom, hundiyo yom mo zɑngɑ n weimɑ yom hinneyom kulu kunɑ.
54005003	N mɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ weibɔrɔ sokoni yom sɛ kɑ ǹ ci sokoni yom ndɑ cimi.
54005004	Ammɑ de sokoni gundɑ koo yom wɑlɑ hɑɑmɑ yom, nɑm ǹ mɑ dendeni kɑ cɛbɛ ngei fuu sɛ jinɑ kɑ ngei go kɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ. Ǹ mɑ bɑnɑ ngei bɑhɛi yom ndɑ ngei cɛɛ yom sɛ domi ngɑ yɑ boori. À kɑɑni Ikpɛ sɛ mo.
54005005	Weibɔrɔ sokoni wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci sokoni ndɑ cimi goono no ngɑ fɔ. À go kɑ ngɑ bɛɛjɛ dɛcɛ Ikpɛ bɔm. À go himmɑ dɑm ndɑ ŋmɑɑrɛyom ndɑ ɑduwɑ yom gɑɑ ciini ndɑ zɑɑri.
54005006	Ammɑ sokoni kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bine dɛcɛ hɑndunyɑ fɑɑriŋmɑɑyom bɔm, bukɔ no zɑ ɑ̀ go hunɑ.
54005007	N mɑ hɛ nge yom di dɑm ǹ mɑ du kɑ zɑm tɑɑli.
54005008	Ammɑ de gɑnɑkɔ si lɑɑkɑli ndɑ ngɑ ŋmɔne yom hɑli yɑ mo ɑ̀ fuu bɔrɔ yom, ɑkpɛ nɑ nɑɑne ze. À jɑɑsɑ mo bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ zɑm kɑ nɑɑne.
54005009	Hɑli n bɑ sokoni zɑɑ kɑ hɑntum kɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ci weibɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ kɑm jiiri weidu bɑndɑ. À mɑ ci weibɔrɔ kɑ kunye fɔlɔnku no ɑ̀ gɔrɔ ndɑ.
54005010	À mɑ ci weibɔrɔ kɑ gbei hinno yom yɑ ci ɑ̀ sɛdɑ. Koo yom mo tunu ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ. À mɑ ci weibɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ yo kube. À mɑ ci weibɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom cee yom nyunu. À mɑ ci weibɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑnkɑm gɑɑkɑsine. À mɑ ci weibɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go himmɑ dɑm gbei hinno dimi dimi kulu kunɑ.
54005011	Ammɑ n mɑ si sɑtɑrɑ sokoni yom hɑntum domi sɑɑ kɑ ǹ guuri go kɑ ǹ fum, ǹ gɑ bɑɑ ngei mɑ hiji. À gɑɑ no, ǹ fee ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ fɔndɔ.
54005012	Ǹ kɑɑndɑ ciiti ngei bɔm domi ǹ nɑ ngei sintine ɑlikɑwɑli ceeri.
54005013	Lɔkɑci ngɑ di kunɑ mo no ǹ bo ceeci ngei mɑ tɛ dɑɑmɑntɛ yom ko huro fuu fuu. À mɑnɑ ci ǹ tɛ dɑɑmɑntɛ yom hinne no bo ɑmmɑ ǹ tɛ kɔrɔmɔtɑntɛ yom ndɑ mimɑndɑkpɛ yom mo ko hɛ yom cii kɑ ǹ si sɑbɑ.
54005014	À sɛ no, ɑ go bɑɑ sɑtɑrɑ yom mɑ hiji kɑ du koo yom. Ǹ mɑ ngei fuu yom dii. À gɑɑ no ǹ si gurujekɑri no dɑɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ i mɑɑ sɑrɑ.
54005015	Afɔ yom kɑmbɑ kɑ dɛcɛ Setɑm bɑndɑ kɔ.
54005016	De hɑibɔrɔ wɑlɑ weibɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ nɑɑne gundɑ weibɔrɔ sokoni yom, ɑ̀ mɑ cini kɑ ǹ gɑɑkɑsine. À mɑ si ci Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ jɛrɔ, domi Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ mɑ du kɑ weibɔrɔ sokoni cimi cimi yom gɑɑkɑsine.
54005017	Mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom kɑ ǹ go Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ cendi hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ boori ǹ mɑ ǹ lɑsɑbu kɑ ǹ tɔ ǹ mɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ ǹ sɛ ce hinkɑ. Yɑ mo hɑikusu yom kɑ ǹ go gbei tɛ kɑ wɑɑzu Ikpɛ Sendɑ bɔm ko cooɑndi.
54005018	Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "N mɑ si tɑkumkumɛ dɑm hɑu mee gɑɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go dɑsɑyom gbei tɛ". À cii mo: "Gbeiteeri tɔ ɑ̀ mɑ du ngɑ bɑnɑndi".
54005019	N mɑ si beriyom fɔ kulu kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ tɛ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu fɔ bɔm tu, de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ǹ mɑɑ sɛdɑ hinkɑ wɑlɑ sɛdɑ hinzɑ mee gɑɑ no.
54005020	Mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom kɑ ǹ gɑ dulum tɛ, n mɑ ǹ kɔnkɔm mɑrgɑ kulu jine, cindei mo mɑ du kɑ hɑmburu.
54005021	A go kɑ n dɑm Ikpɛ ndɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize suubɑntɛ yom jine, n mɑ hɛ nge yom di jɛ. N mɑ si hɛ fɔ kulu tɛ mo ndɑ bɑɑbɑɑ.
54005022	N mɑ si sɑsɑ kɑ Kpe ŋmɔne gbei kɑmbɛ dɛcɛyom tɛ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu sɛ. N mɑ si huro bɔrɔ fɔ kulu dulum yom kunɑ. N mɑ n bɔm kɑimɑ hinnɑntɛ.
54005023	N mɑ si bo hɑri bii hinne hɑm, n mɑ tɛ ndɑ dufɛ cɛnɑ n gunde sɛ ndɑ n gɑɑhɑm kɔbɑkɔbɑ sɛ.
54005024	Beerem goono kɑ ǹ dulum yom goono tɛrɛkpɑrɛ kɔ hɑli ǹ gɑ ǹ ciiti. Ammɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom ŋmɔne yom si hunutɛrɛ kɑlɑ hɑli kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ.
54005025	Yɑ no gbei hinno yom goono tɛrɛkpɑrɛ. Wɔ kɑ yom mɑnɑ ci yɑ mɑ, ǹ si hini kɑ gɔrɔ tugɑntɛ.
54006001	Tɑm yom mo kulu kɑ ǹ goono tɑmtɛrɛ zuu kunɑ ǹ mɑ lɑsɑbu ngei kpe yom tɔ bɛɛrɛ kulu domi ǹ mɑ si Ikpɛ mɑɑ ndɑ cɛbɛ sendi yɑmu sɛ.
54006002	Tɑm yom kɑ ǹ kpe yom ci nɑɑnekɔ yom, ǹ mɑ si dondei domi nyɑize yom no. Ammɑ ǹ mɑ tɑmtɛrɛ ǹ sɛ ihinno zɑmɑ ǹ ci nɑɑnekɔ yom ndɑ binebɑɑkɔ yom. Ǹ kpe yom mo go lɑɑkɑli ndei kɑ hɛ hinno tɛ ngei mo sɛ. N mɑ cɛbɛ tɛ hɛ nge yom di bɔm kɑ himmɑ nɑ.
54006003	Bɔrɔ fɔ yom go cɛbɛyom ŋmɑni tɛ kɑ ɑ̀ si kɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ sendi hinno yom tu, ndɑ cɛbɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑyom.
54006004	Akpɛ wɔ go kɑ ngɑ bɔm bɛɛrɑndi. À si hɛ fɔ bei ɑmmɑ hãyom kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ siikɑ ndɑ kɑkɔ sendi yom no ɑ̀ go bɑɑ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. Nge yom di kɑɑndɑ cɛnsɛ ndɑ zoji ndɑ sendi yɑmɔ yom ndɑ ciine lɑlɔ yom
54006005	Ǹ kɑɑndɑ kɑkɔ kɔnu yom kɑ ǹ hunu beerem dɔ kɑ ǹ fɑhɑm sɑrɑ. Ǹ si cimi bei kpɛɛnɛ. Ǹ gɑ tɑmmɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑyom yɑ ci fɔndɔ kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ngei du liibɑ. Timote, n mɑ fɛɛ ndɑ bɔrɔ yɑ di dimi yom.
54006006	De bɔrɔ bine gɑ cii hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ ɑ̀ wɑsɑ ɑ̀ sɛ, Ikpɛ gɑnɑyom yɑ liibɑ bɑmbɑtɑ no.
54006007	I mɑnɑ huro hɑndunyɑ kunɑ ndɑ hɛ fɔ. Yɑ no i si hini kɑ hunu ɑ̀ kunɑ ndɑ hɛ fɔ.
54006008	Zɑ kɑ i gundɑ ŋmɑɑri ndɑ jiine kɑ dɑm, ngɑ di mɑ i wɑsɑ.
54006009	Beerem kɑ ǹ go guuri ngei mɑ tɛ hɑibɑrikɑntɛ yom ǹ go kɑm suiyom kunɑ ndɑ hirime kunɑ. Ǹ gɑ kɑm mo bineibɑɑi kɔnu bɑɑbɑ kunɑ ndɑ hɛ lɑlɔ yom kɑ ǹ gɑ beerem cendi kɑ ǹ miri bu ndɑ hɑlɑciyom kunɑ.
54006010	Nooru bɑɑkɑsine yɑ ci hɛ lɑlɔ dimi dimi kulu kɑɑji. Nooru ceeciyom dɔ no bɔrɔ fɔ yom dɛrɛ kɑ kɑmbɑ nɑɑne gɑɑ. Ǹ nɑ ngei bɔm bine gooru ndɑ binesɛrɛ boobo.
54006011	Ammɑ ni wɔ, e Ikpɛ bɔrɔ, n mɑ zuuru hɛ nge yom di sɛ. N mɑ cɛyom susu ndɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑyom ndɑ nɑɑne ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine ndɑ suuru ndɑ bɑɑniyom hɑmine.
54006012	N mɑ tɑngɑmi hinno tɛ nɑɑne kunɑ. N mɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni dii ɑ̀ mɑ boori, hundi kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ Ikpɛ nɑ n cɛɛ kɑ n tɛ fɑsɑlikɔ hinno sɛdɑ boobo jine.
54006013	A go kɑ n dɑm Ikpɛ jine, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hɛ kulu hunɑndi ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu jine mɑ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ fɑsɑli hinno tɛ Pɔnse Pilɑtu jine.
54006014	N mɑ meire wɔ jɛ, ziibi si, tɑɑli si kɑlɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kɑɑyomtɛrɛ.
54006015	Lɔkɑci kɑ ɑ̀ jisi kunɑ Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ. Ngɑ yɑ ci Dɑbɑrikpɛ fɔlɔnku ndɑ Bɑrikɑkpɛ, Dɑbɑrikpɛ yom kulu Dɑbɑrikpɛ, Kpe yom kulu Kpe.
54006016	Ngɑ hinne yɑ si hini kɑ bu. À goono kɑɑri kunɑ, kɑɑri kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu si hini kɑ mɑɑni ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ mɑnɑ di ɑ̀ bɑ ce fɔ. Bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ si hini kɑ di ɑ̀ mɑ. Bɛɛrɛ ndɑ dɑbɑri kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni mɑ ci ɑ̀ ŋmɔne yom. Ami.
54006017	N mɑ beerem kɑ ǹ gundɑ hɑibɑrikɑ mɑɑsɑ zɑmɑni wɔ kunɑ dɑm ǹ mɑ si bɔmbɛɛrɛ tɛ. Ǹ mɑ si ngei bɛɛjɛ dɛcɛ hɑibɑrikɑ yom kɑ ǹ si jɛ bɔm. Ammɑ ǹ mɑ bɛɛjɛ dɛcɛ Ikpɛ Hundikpɛ bɔm, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ i no hɛ kulu ndɑ bɑyom domi i bine mɑ kɑɑni.
54006018	N mɑ ǹ dɑm ǹ mɑ ihinno tɛ. Gbei hinno tɛyom mɑ ci ǹ hɑibɑrikɑ. Ǹ mɑ gundɑ noyom niyɑ. Ǹ mɑ sɔlu kɑ beerem gɑɑkɑsine.
54006019	Zɑngɑ yɑ ǹ go bɑrikɑ jisi ngei bɔm sɛ kɑ kpɛsɛ hinno tɛ zɑmɑni kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ kunɑ. Yɑ no ǹ kɑɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni dii.
54006020	E Timote, n mɑ hɛ kɑ Ikpɛ tɑlifi n gɑɑ jɛ. N mɑ bɑndɑ bɛrɛ meecine kɔnu yom sɛ kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ci Ikpɛ ŋmɔne yom. N mɑ bɑndɑ bɛrɛ beire kɑkɔ ŋmɔne yom sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci beire cimi cimi, ɑmmɑ tɑngɑri no.
54006021	Bɔrɔ fɔ yom go cii ngei go beire wɔ gɑnɑ ɑmmɑ ǹ kɑmbɑ nɑɑne fɔndɔ sɛ. Gomini mo gɔrɔ ndɑ ni. Ami.
55001001	Hɛɛ Pɔlu, hɛɛ yɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ diyɑ no Ikpɛ binebɑɑ dɔ. Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ dɑm yɑ hundi bɑɑru fɛɛ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɔne ɑlikɑwɑli tɛ, hundi kɑ ɑ̀ goono Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ. A go tirɑ wɔ hɑntum n sɛ Timote, ni ɑ ize binebɑɑkɔ.
55001002	Gomini ndɑ suuji ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne kɑ ǹ hunu Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ ndɑ i Kpe Mɛsiyɑ Yesu dɔ, ǹ mo goono n bɑndɑ.
55001003	A gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu. A go tɑmtɛrɛ ɑ̀ sɛ ndɑ bine kunɑ sendi hinno, zɑngɑ ɑ cɛɛ yom tɛ. Sɑɑ kulu ciini ndɑ zɑɑri ɑ cini hɔngɔ ni ɑ ŋmɔne ɑduwɑ yom kunɑ.
55001004	A go hɔngɔ n mundi mo. A go bɑɑ yɑ di ni kɑlɑ kɑlɑ yɑ du kɑ tɔ ndɑ binekɑɑne.
55001005	A go hɔngɔ mo nɑɑne kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ munɑficitɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ goono n kunɑ. Nɑɑne di jinɑ kɑ gɔrɔ n cɛɛ weibɔrɔ Lusi kunɑ ndɑ n nyɑ Yɑnusi kunɑ. A go tɑbɑi mo kɑ nɑɑne ngɑ di yɑ goono ni mo, n kunɑ.
55001006	Ngɑ di sɛ nɑ, ɑ go kɑ n hɔngɑndi Ikpɛ noyom kɑ n du ɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛyom gɑɑ, n mo kɑ ɑ̀ hɛo dɑm.
55001007	Ikpɛ mɑnɑ i no hɑmburu bine ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ i nɑ dɑbɑri ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine ndɑ bɔm hiniyom bine.
55001008	Ngɑ di sɛ n mɑ si nɑm hɑwi mɑ n dii ndɑ i Kpe sɛdɑ wɑlɑ ndɑ hɛɛ kɑ ɑ ci kɑsuize ɑ̀ sɑbu sɛ. Ammɑ n mɑ n bɑ zɑɑ ɑ bɑndɑ tɑɑbi yom kunɑ Bɑɑru Hinno sɑbu sɛ ndɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ dɑbɑri goono ndɑ.
55001009	Ikpɛ nɑ i fɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ i cɛɛ ndɑ cɛɛ yom hɑlɑɑlɑ. À mɑnɑ i cɛɛ i gbei yom bɔm bɑ ɑmmɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ bumbum miilɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ gomini bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ i no Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ zɑ zɑmɑni yom mɑnɑ sinti.
55001010	Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ i sɛ i Fɑɑbɑkɔ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kɑɑyomtɛrɛ gɑɑ. Ngɑ wɔ nɑ bu dɑbɑri wi. À nɑ hundi ndɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ si sɑrɑ kɑɑtɛrɛ Bɑɑru Hinno dɔ.
55001011	Bɑɑru Hinno wɔ sɛ no Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ dɑm fɛɛkɔ ndɑ diyɑ ndɑ dimi cindei cɛbɛkɔ.
55001012	À sɛ no, ɑ go tɑɑbi hɛ nge yom di sɛ. Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu hɑwi si ɑ dii. A go bei wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ ɑ go nɑɑne. A go tɑbɑi mo kɑ Ikpɛ gundɑ dɑbɑri kɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɑlifi ɑ gɑɑ bɑtu hɑli Hɑnu ngɑ di.
55001013	Sendi hinno yom kɑ n mɑɑ ɑ dɔ n mɑ ǹ jɛ nɑɑne ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ kɑ ǹ goono Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ.
55001014	Jisiri hinno kɑ Ikpɛ tɑlifi n gɑɑ n mo kɑ ɑ̀ bɑtu Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ, Biyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono i kunɑ.
55001015	N bei kɑ beerem kulu kɑ ǹ goono Azi lɑɑbu, ǹ kulu nɑ bɑndɑ bɛrɛ ɑ gɑɑ. Ǹ kunɑ ɑfɔ yom yɑ ci Figelu ndɑ Hemojene.
55001016	Kpe mo suuji cɛbɛ Onesifoli hundi sɛ domi ɑ̀ cini kɑ ɑ bine yeenɑndi. Hɑwi mɑnɑ ɑ̀ dii ndɑ ɑ seseri yom.
55001017	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ Lome wɑngɑrɑ nyɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ ceeci ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑlɑ ɑ̀ di hɛɛ.
55001018	Kpe mɑ tu ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ du suuji Kpe dɔ Hɑnu ngɑ di. Ni mɑ, n bei kɑlɑ kɑlɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ tɑmtɛrɛ ɑ sɛ Efese wɑngɑrɑ kunɑ.
55002001	Ngɑ di sɛ ɑ ize, n mɑ du gɑɑbi gomini gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ.
55002002	Hɛ yom kɑ n mɑɑ ɑ dɔ sɛdɑ bɑɑbɑ jine, n mɑ ǹ tɑlifi hɑibɔrɔ nɑɑnekpɛ yom gɑɑ hɑli ǹ mɑ hini kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ ŋmɑni yom mo cooɑndi ndei.
55002003	Ngɑ di sɛ, n mɑ n bɑ zɑɑ ɑ bɑndɑ tɑɑbi kunɑ zɑngɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ wɑnguize hinnɑ.
55002004	Wɑnguize kulu si wuluwɑli hɑndunyɑ ŋmɔne ɑsiiri yom kunɑ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑni wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ suubɑ sɛ.
55002005	Zuurukɔ kɑ ɑ̀ huro jilɑm jilɑm kunɑ mɑ ɑ̀ si hini kɑ du ɑ̀ tukunsi, kɑlɑ de ɑ̀ zuuru ndɑ zɑngɑ zuure di fɔndɔ yom goono ndɑ.
55002006	À himɑ hɑifɑri kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ gbei dungɔ tɛ, ɑ̀ mɑ jine kɑ du kediɑ bɑrikɑ.
55002007	N mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ gɑ cii. À gɑɑ nɑ Kpe gɑ n no hɛ kulu fɑhɑm.
55002008	N mɑ hɔngɔ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kɑ Ikpɛ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme kɑ ɑ̀ ci Dɑfidi bɑndɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ goono ndɑ.
55002009	Bɑɑru Hinno di sɑbu sɛ no ɑ gɑ tɑɑbi hɑli ǹ nɑ ɑ hɔ zɑngɑ ilɑlɔ tɛkɔ. Ammɑ ǹ mɑnɑ Ikpɛ Sendɑ hɔ fɑ.
55002010	À sɛ no, ɑ go tɑɑbi kulu jɛrɛ beerem kɑ Ikpɛ suubɑ sɑbu sɛ. A go kɑ ɑ̀ jɛrɛ zɑmɑ ngei mo mɑ du fɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ ndɑ deizɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ beeniyom.
55002011	Sendi wɔne nɑɑnekpɛ no. "Zɑ kɑ i bu Mɛsiyɑ bɑndɑ, i kɑɑ hunɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ.
55002012	De i go suuru, i kɑɑ kpetɛrɛ ŋmɑɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ. De i gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ze, ngɑ mo gɑ i ze.
55002013	De i mɑnɑ nɑɑne, ngɑ wɔ goono ko ci nɑɑnekpɛ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ si hini kɑ ngɑ bɔm ze."
55002014	N mɑ kɑ ǹ hɔngɑndi nge yom di kɑ ǹ dɑm Ikpɛ jine, ǹ mɑ si kɑkɔ sendi yom bɔm. Kɑkɔ sindɑ fɔ kulu de ɑ̀ nɑ ci hɑlɑci beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ hɑngɑ dɑm sɛ.
55002015	N mɑ guruje kɑ ci tɑbɑtɑntɛ Ikpɛ jine. N mɑ ci gbeiteeri kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ hɑwi ndɑ ngɑ gbei kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ Sendi cimikpɛ fɑsɑli zɑngɑ ɑ̀ himɑ.
55002016	N mɑ fee ndɑ meecinɛ kɔnu yom ndɑ sendi yom kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ci Ikpɛ ŋmɔne yom. Beerem kɑ ǹ go sendi zɑngɑ yɑ ǹ gɑ tɔntɔnu kɑ kpei jinɑ no Ikpɛ hunguɛ kunɑ.
55002017	Ǹ cɛbɛ himɑ no zɑngɑ bi kɑ ɑ̀ bo gɑɑbɑsi ŋmɑɑ. Beerem nge yom di, ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ yom yɑ ci Himene ndɑ Filetu.
55002018	Ngei yɑ nɑ cimi fɔndɔ hɑitɑ. Ǹ go cii kɑ bukɔei tunɑndiyom tɛ kɔ kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom nɑɑne zeeri.
55002019	Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu kpɛsɛ gɑɑbikoni kɑ Ikpɛ furu si zinji. À gundɑ sɛdɑ dɑmyom kɑ ɑ̀ cii: Kpe go bei beerem kɑ ǹ ci ngɑ ŋmɔne yom. Kpɛɛnɛ ɑ̀ cii: Bɔrɔ kulu mo kɑ ɑ̀ go Mɛsiyɑ mɑɑ cɛɛ, ɑ̀ mɑ fee ndɑ gbei lɑlɔ.
55002020	Fuu beeri kunɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci wurɑ ndɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu gbei jiine yom hinne yɑ goono ɑmmɑ tuuri ŋmɔne yom mo ndɑ lɑɑbu ŋmɔne yom goono. Afɔ yom goono gbei bɛɛrɛkpɛ sɛ, ɑfɔ yom goono gbei kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ bɛɛrɛ sɛ.
55002021	Ngɑ di sɛ, de bɔrɔ nɑ ngɑ bɔm kɑimɑ ihinno kɑ fee ndɑ bɛɛrɛ zɑmkɔ yom ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ tɛ zɑngɑ jiine bɛɛrɛkpɛ gbei tɛyom sɛ. Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ hɑlɑɑlɑndi mo ɑ̀ mɑ gundɑ nɑfɑ Kpe sɛ. Yɑ no ɑ̀ goono sɔlɑntɛ gbei hinno kulu sɛ.
55002022	Ammɑ n mo zuuru hɑiwɑsutɛrɛ bineibɑɑi sɛ. N mo cɛyom susu hɑmine ndɑ nɑɑne ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne beerem bɑndɑ kɑ ǹ gɑ Kpe mɑɑ cɛɛ ndɑ bine hinno yom.
55002023	N mo hungu sɑmutɛrɛ hãyom sɛ ndɑ hãyom kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ yɑɑse. N go bei kɑ zoji no ɑ̀ gundɑ.
55002024	Ammɑ ɑ̀ himɑ Kpe tɑm mɑ si zogu. Kpe tɑm mɑ bɑɑni bɔrɔ kulu sɛ. À mɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ cooɑndi. À mɑ ci suurɑntɛ.
55002025	À mɑ ngɑ kɑkɔkɔ yom cɛbɛ bɑɑniyom kunɑ zɑmɑ hɑnibɑ Ikpɛ nɑm ǹ mɑ bɛrɛ kɑ tuubi hɑli ǹ mɑ du kɑ cimi bei.
55002026	Ǹ lɑɑkɑli mɑ mɑ ye ǹ gɑɑ mɑ. Ǹ mɑ hunu Ibilisi hirime yom kunɑ, Ibilisi kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ dii kɑ ǹ tilɑsi ǹ mɑ ngɑ binebɑɑ tɛ.
55003001	N mo bei kɑ kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ hɑnu yom kunɑ, lɔkɑci gɑɑbɔ yom kɑɑ goono.
55003002	Iburɑdɑm bɔm bɑɑkɔ yom yɑ kɑɑ goono ndɑ nooru bɑɑkɔ yom ndɑ fɑɑrikpɛ yom ndɑ tɔtɔkpɛ yom ndɑ Ikpɛ cɛnɑndikɔ yom. Ǹ kɑɑ hungu ngei bɑhɛi yom sɛ. Ǹ si sɑɑbu. Ǹ si bɑrɑ hɑlɑɑlɑ.
55003003	Ǹ si gundɑ bɑɑkɑsine hɑɑli. Ǹ sindɑ suuji. Ǹ ci kɔrɔmɔtɑntɛ yom, beerem kɑ ǹ si hini ngei bɔm. Binesendɔ yom mo no, beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ ihinno fɛntɛ.
55003004	Ǹ ci ɑmɑɑnɑ ŋmɑɑkɔ yom ndɑ hɑribɔm wɑɑsekpɛ yom ndɑ bɔm bɛɛrɑndikɔ yom, beerem kɑ ǹ go bɑɑ hɑndunyɑ kɑɑne kɑ bisɑ zɑngɑ ǹ gɑ bɑɑ Ikpɛ.
55003005	Ǹ himɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑkɔ yom mo ɑmmɑ ǹ gɑ gɑnɑyom dɑbɑri ze. N no zuuru bɔrɔ yɑ di dimi yom sɛ.
55003006	Ǹ kunɑ no bɔrɔ fɔ yom goono kɑ ǹ go mɔnɔ kɑ huro fuu yom kunɑ. Ǹ gɑ weibɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ sindɑ gɑɑbi lɑɑkɑli kunɑ dɑm tɑmtɛrɛ kunɑ. Weibɔrɔ yom wɔ tɔ ndɑ dulum yom, nge yom kɑ bineibɑɑi dimi ŋmɑni ŋmɑni nɑ ǹ dɛrɑndi.
55003007	Sɑɑ kulu weibɔrɔ yom wɔ go ceeci ko dendeni ɑmmɑ ǹ si hini kɑ tɔ kɑ cimi bei pɑi.
55003008	Bine zɑngɑ dimi Yɑne ndɑ Yɑmbe gɑɑbɑ ndɑ Moisi, yɑ dimi mɑ nɑ iburɑdɑm wɔne yom go gɑɑbɑ ndɑ cimi. Ngei yɑ sɑrɑ ngei fɑhɑm kunɑ. Ǹ mɑnɑ ci bɔrɔ tɑbɑtɑntɛ yom mo kɑ simbɑ ndɑ ǹ nɑɑne.
55003009	Ǹ si kpei jinɑ domi ǹ sɑmutɛrɛ hunutɛrɛ bɔrɔ kulu sɛ zɑngɑ Yɑne ndɑ Yɑmbe.
55003010	Ammɑ ni wɔ Timote, n nɑ ɑ cɛbɛ yom gɑnɑ ndɑ ɑ gɔrɛ kɑ ɑ tɛ. N nɑ ɑ miilɑ gɑnɑ mɑ ndɑ ɑ nɑɑne ndɑ ɑ suuru ndɑ ɑ bɑɑkɑsine ndɑ ɑ himmɑ.
55003011	N nɑ ɑ guruguzɑndiyom gɑnɑ mo ndɑ ɑ tɑɑbi yom. N bei guruguze yom ndɑ tɑɑbi yom kɑ ǹ tɔ hɛɛ Antiɔku wɑngɑrɑ ndɑ Ikoniɑ kpɑɑrɑ ndɑ Lisitɑ kpɑɑrɑ. Kpe bine nɑ ɑ kɑɑ ǹ kulu kunɑ.
55003012	Yɑ no beerem mo kulu kɑ ǹ go bɑɑ ngei mɑ hunɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑyom bɔm Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ, ǹ gɑ ǹ guruguzɑndi.
55003013	Ammɑ bɔrɔ lɑlɔ yom ndɑ zɑmbɑntɛ yom hɛ lɑlɔ kunɑ no ǹ bo kpei jinɑ. Gbei lɑlɔ kunɑ no ǹ go beerem dɛrɑndi ko kɑ ngei bɔm dɛrɑndi mo.
55003014	Ammɑ hɛ yom kɑ n dendeni kɑ cimɑndi, n mɑ kɑ ǹ gɑnɑ. N mɑ bei mo bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ dɔ n nɑ ǹ dendeni.
55003015	Zɑ n koo cɛnɑtɛrɛ n nɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ hɑlɑɑlɑ yom bei. Sendi yom di hini kɑ n no hɑikusutɛrɛ kɑ kpeindɑ ni fɑɑbɑ dɔ nɑɑne gɑɑ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ.
55003016	Ikpɛ hulonzomyom dɔ no Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ kulu hunu. À gundɑ nɑfɑ cɛbɛ sɛ ndɑ hinsɑyom sɛ ndɑ dɑmyom fɔndɔ sɛ ndɑ cɛyom susu ŋmɔne foorɑyom sɛ.
55003017	À gundɑ nɑfɑ hɑli Ikpɛ bɔrɔ mɑ bɑrɑ tɔɑntɛ. À mɑ ci sɔlɑntɛ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ mo gbei hinno tɛyom kulu sɛ.
55004001	À sɛ no, ɑ go kɑ n dɑm Ikpɛ ndɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ jine, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑ hundikoni yom ndɑ bukɔ yom ciiti. A go kɑ n dɑm Mɛsiyɑ kɑɑyomtɛrɛ ndɑ ɑ̀ kpetɛrɛ bɔm.
55004002	N mɑ wɑɑzu Ikpɛ Sendɑ bɔm. N mɑ ɑ̀ fɛɛ tɑkɑkɑ, dɑɑmɑ goono, dɑɑmɑ si. N mɑ kɔnkɔm. N mɑ kɑɑbɑɑru. N mɑ himmɑ nɑ ndɑ suuru kulu ndɑ cɛbɛ cɑu cɑu.
55004003	Lɔkɑci fɔ go kɑɑ kɑ iburɑdɑm yom si bɑɑ ngei mɑ cɛbɛ hinno jɛrɛ. Ammɑ ǹ bineibɑɑi bɔm no ǹ kɑɑ cɛbɛkɔ boobo meigu ngei bɔm sɛ. Ǹ cooɑndiyom mo ci hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑni beerem hɑngɑ sɛ.
55004004	Ǹ kɑɑ hɑngɑ dɑɑbu cimi sɛ no kɑ ngei lɑɑkɑli kulu no jendi yom sɛ.
55004005	Ammɑ ni wɔ Timote, n mɑ n bɔm ci bɔrɔ hɛ kulu kunɑ. N mɑ tɑɑbi yom jɛrɛ. N mɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzukɔ gbei tɛ. N mo kɑ n gbei tɔnɑndi mɑm mɑm.
55004006	Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ go ci zɑngɑ hɑmyom sɑrɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ munu kɔ. A buyom mo bine lɔkɑci tɔ.
55004007	A nɑ tɑngɑmi hinno tɛ. A nɑ ɑ bɑtɑ tɔnɑndi. A nɑ nɑɑne jɛ.
55004008	Mɑɑsɑ Ikpɛ nɑ tukunsi fulɑ cɛyom susu ŋmɔne jisi ɑ sɛ. Kpe yɑ Ciitikɔ cɛɑntɛ susu no kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ no ndɑɑ̀ Hɑnu ngɑ di. À mɑnɑ ci ɑ hinne bo ɑmmɑ ndɑ beerem mo kulu kɑ ǹ go bɑɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑyomtɛrɛ.
55004009	Timote, n mɑ wɑɑsu kɑ kɑɑ ɑ dɔ subɑsi.
55004010	Demɑ zuuru ɑ gɑɑ mɑɑsɑ zɑmɑni bɑɑkɑsine sɛ. À kpei Tesɑlonikɑ wɑngɑrɑ. Kesɑm mo kpei Gɑlɑte lɑɑbu. Titu mo kpei Dɑlɑmɑti lɑɑbu.
55004011	Lukɑ ngɑ fɔ yɑ goono ɑ dɔ. N mɑ kɑɑ ndɑ Mɑɑku zɑmɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ ɑ sɛ gbei sɛ.
55004012	A nɑ Ticiku dɔntɔm Efese wɑngɑrɑ.
55004013	Sɑɑ kɑ n kɑɑ tunu kɑ kɑɑ, n mɑ kɑɑndɑ ɑ sɛ kpɛ kuku kɑ ɑ jisi Toɑsɑ kpɑɑrɑ Kɑpu dɔ. N mɑ kɑɑndɑ tirɑ yom mo hɑli yɑ mo kuuru ŋmɔne yom di.
55004014	Alɛsɑndi guuru ciire zem di, ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ cɛbɛ hɑnyɑ fute boobo. Kpe mɑ bɑnɑ ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ gbei yom.
55004015	Ni mo, n mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ bɔrɔ di, zɑmɑ ɑ̀ bine gɑɑbɑ ndɑ i sendi yom.
55004016	Bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ mɑnɑ cɛ ɑ sɛ ɑ sintine jinde deedeyom gɑɑ ɑmmɑ ǹ kulu zuuru ɑ gɑɑ. Ikpɛ mɑ si ɑ̀ lɑsɑbu ǹ sɛ.
55004017	Ammɑ Ikpɛ cɛ ɑ sɛ. À nɑ ɑ no gɑɑbi mo hɑli ɑ hini kɑ Bɑɑru Hinnɑ wɑɑzu cɑu cɑu, dimi cindei mo kulu mɑ mɑɑ. Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ kɑɑ muusu beeri mee kunɑ.
55004018	Kpe gɑ ɑ kɑɑ gbei lɑlɔ kulu kɑmbɛ kɑ ɑ hɑlɑsi ngɑ bɛɛnɛ kpetɛrɛ sɛ. Deizɑ mɑ ci Ikpɛ ŋmɔne jiiri dubu ndɑ dubu yom. Ami.
55004019	N mɑ Pirisilɑ ndɑ Akilɑ fɔɔ, ndɑ Onesifoli fuu kulu.
55004020	Alɑsitu gɔrɔ Kɔlɛnte wɑngɑrɑ, ɑmmɑ ɑ nɑ Tofimu mo nɑm Miletu wɑngɑrɑ ndɑ zɛnjɛ.
55004021	N mɑ wetere kɑ kɑɑ hɑli yeeni. Ebulu ndɑ Pudɑm ndɑ Linu ndɑ Kolodiɑ ndɑ nyɑizei kulu go kɑ n fɔɔ.
55004022	Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ mo gɔrɔ ndɑ n biyɑ. Gomini mɑ gɔrɔ n bɑndɑ. Ami.
56001001	Hɛɛ Pɔlu, hɛɛ yɑ ci Ikpɛ tɑm ndɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ diyɑ. Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ dɑm yɑ kpeindɑ Ikpɛ ŋmɔne suubɑntɛ yom nɑɑne dɔ kɑ ǹ cɛbɛ ǹ mɑ cimi bei Ikpɛ gɑnɑyom bɔm.
56001002	Ǹ goono hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni bɛɛjɛ kunɑ. Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ si tɑngɑri, ɑ̀ nɑ hundi wɔ ɑlikɑwɑli tɛ zɑ zɑmɑni yom mɑnɑ sinti.
56001003	Lɔkɑci kɑ ɑ̀ jisi kunɑ, Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ Sendɑ kɑɑtɛrɛ Bɑɑru Hinno fɛɛyom dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ tɑlifi ɑ gɑɑ i Fɑɑbɑkɔ Ikpɛ meire bɔm.
56001004	Hɛɛ yɑ go tirɑ wɔ hɑntum n sɛ Titu, ni ɑ ize ndɑ cimi i meiguɑntɛ nɑɑne bɔm. Gomini ndɑ suuji ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne kɑ ǹ hunu Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ ndɑ i Fɑɑbɑkɔ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ, ǹ mɑ goono n bɑndɑ.
56001005	A sɛ nɑ, ɑ nɑ n nɑm Kɛlɛtu hɔndɛ tɑɑsi n mɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ cindi ndɑ hinsɑyom sɑsɑbɑndi. N mɑ hɑikusu yom jisi Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ yom kunɑ wɑngɑrɑ kulu kunɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ nɑ n nɑ mei.
56001006	Jinɑ himɑ no ɑ̀ mɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ di ɑ̀ gɑɑ tɑɑli. À mɑ ci wɛndɛ fɔ kpɛ. À kɑɑ yom mɑ ci nɑɑnekɔ yom, koo yom kɑ bɔrɔ si ǹ beri ndɑ hɑwizetɛrɛ wɑlɑ ndɑ hungu sendi.
56001007	Cendikɔ mɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ǹ si yɑnce zɑngɑ ɑ̀ himɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ bɑndɑbɔrɔ noyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ gbei tɑlifi. À mɑ si ci fɑɑrekpɛ wɑlɑ binekpɛ. À mɑ si ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɔm no dufɛ sɛ wɑlɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bine futu wɑlɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go liibɑ ziibɔ ceeci ndɑ himmɑ.
56001008	Ammɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ yo yom kube. À mɑ ci hɛ hinno tɛkɔ yom kpɑɑsi. À mɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ngɑ bɔm ci bɔrɔ. À mɑ ci bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu. À mɑ ci hɑlɑɑlɑ. À mɑ ci bɔm hinikɔ.
56001009	À mɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Sendi nɑɑnekpɛ dii kɑ boori kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ ndɑ cɛbɛ. Zɑngɑ yɑ, ɑ̀ hini kɑ beerem no himmɑ ndɑ cɛbɛ hinno, ɑ̀ mɑ hini gɑɑbɑkpɛ yom mo.
56001010	Bɔrɔ boobo goono, hɑli yɑ mo nge yom kɑ ǹ goono bɑngudɑmyom fɔndɔ kunɑ, kɑ ǹ ci hunguɛkpɛ yom. Meekpɛ yom no, ǹ go sendi boobo cii kɑ ǹ sindɑ nɑfɑ. Ǹ ci zɑmbɑkpɛ yom mo no.
56001011	Beerem nge yom di n mɑ ǹ mee yom dɑɑbu zɑmɑ ǹ gɑ fuu sukutum yom zeeri. Ǹ go cooɑndi hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ himɑ bɔm domi ǹ mɑ du liibɑ ziibɔ sɛ.
56001012	Kɛlɛtu beerem kunɑ ɑfɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ǹ ŋmɔne wɑli cii: Kɛlɛtu hɔndɛ tɑɑsi bɔrɔ yom tɑngɑrikom yom no sɑɑ kulu. Ǹ goono no zɑngɑ gɑnjihɑm lɑlɔ yom. Yofuno ŋmɑɑri bɑɑkɔ yom no.
56001013	Sɛdɑ wɔ cimi nɑ. À sɛ no, n mɑ ǹ kɔnkɔm ifutu futu hɑli ǹ mɑ du gɑɑbi nɑɑne kunɑ.
56001014	N mɑ si hɑngɑ dɑm Yuifu yom jendi yom sɛ ndɑ iburɑdɑm meire yom sɛ kɑ ǹ hunu beerem dɔ kɑ ǹ nɑ bɑndɑ bɛrɛ cimi sɛ.
56001015	Cimi nɑ, hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom dɔ hɛ kulu hinne no. Ammɑ ziibɑntɛ yom kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ nɑɑne dɔ, hɛ fɔ kulu si ci hɑlɑɑlɑ. Ǹ fɑhɑm ndɑ ǹ bine kunɑ sendi ǹ kulu iziibɔ yom no.
56001016	Ǹ go cii ngei go kɑ Ikpɛ bei ɑmmɑ ǹ gbei yom gɑɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ ze. Fɛntɛkpɛ yom no, hunguɛkpɛ yom mo no. Ǹ si hini kɑ gbei hinno fɔ kulu tɛ.
56002001	Ammɑ ni wɔ, hɛ yom kɑ ǹ sɑbɑ ndɑ cɛbɛ hinno, n mɑ sendi ǹ bɔm.
56002002	N mɑ cii hɑizeenu yom sɛ ǹ mɑ hini ngei bɔm. Ǹ mɑ nge bɔm ci bɔrɔ. Ǹ mɑ ci lɑɑkɑlɑntɛ yom. Ǹ mɑ ci gɑɑbikoni yom nɑɑne kunɑ ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ ndɑ suuru kunɑ.
56002003	Yɑ no n mɑ cii weizeenu yom sɛ ǹ mɑ bɑrɑ yɑ di ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ ndɑ weibɔrɔ kɑ ǹ ci Ikpɛ gɑnɑkɔ yom. Ǹ mɑ si tɛ kɔrɔmɔtɑntɛ yom. Ǹ mɑ si ngei bɔm no dufɛ sɛ. Ǹ mo cɛbɛ tɛ hɛ hinno yom bɔm.
56002004	Ǹ mɑ sɑtɑrɑ yom cɛbɛ ǹ mɑ bɑɑ ngei kunye yom. Ǹ mɑ bɑɑ ngei koo yom mo.
56002005	Ǹ mɑ ci lɑɑkɑlɑntɛ yom. Ǹ mɑ ci hinnɑntɛ yom. Ǹ mo lɑɑkɑli ndɑ ngei fuu yom. Ǹ mɑ ci bɔrɔ hinno yom. Ǹ mɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ ngei kunye yom sɛ domi bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ si Ikpɛ Sendɑ sendi yɑmu.
56002006	Yɑ no, n mɑ hɑiwɑsu yom mo no himmɑ ǹ mɑ ci lɑɑkɑlɑntɛ yom.
56002007	Ni mo, n bumbum n mɑ n bɔm tɛ gbei hinno tɛkɔ deedɑndi hɛ kulu kunɑ. N mɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ cooɑndi cɑu cɑu cimi kunɑ ndɑ lɑɑkɑli.
56002008	N mɑ sendi hinno yom cii, sendi yom kɑ ǹ sindɑ tɑɑli domi hɑwi mɑ gurujekɑri dii. À mɑ si du hɛ fɔ lɑlɔ kulu kɑ cii n gɑɑ.
56002009	N mɑ tɑm yom mo no himmɑ ǹ mɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ ngei kpe yom sɛ. Ǹ mɑ kɑɑni ǹ sɛ hɛ kulu gɑɑ. Ǹ mɑ si ǹ kɑkɔ.
56002010	Ǹ mɑ si ǹ zee mɑ. Ammɑ ǹ mɑ cɛbɛ sɑɑ kulu kɑ ngei yɑ nɑɑnekpɛ hinno yom no. À gɑɑ nɑ ǹ gɑ i Fɑɑbɑkɔ Ikpɛ bɔm cɛbɛ di booriɑndi hɛ kulu kunɑ.
56002011	Ikpɛ gomini kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑɑndɑ fɑɑbɑ, ɑ̀ hunutɛrɛ bɔrɔ kulu sɛ.
56002012	Gomini ngɑ di go kɑ i cɛbɛ i mɑ fee ndɑ Ikpɛ hunguɛ ndɑ hɑndunyɑ hɛ bɑɑyom futu. I mɑ hunɑ mo ndɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ cɛyom susu ndɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑyom mɑɑsɑ zɑmɑni wɔ kunɑ.
56002013	Gomini di go kɑ i cɛbɛ mɑ i mɑ gɔrɔ yɑ di kɑ kɑɑyomtɛrɛ deizɑkpɛ bɑtu kɑ ɑ̀ ci i bɛɛjɛ bɑrikɑkpɛ. Kɑɑyomtɛrɛ deizɑkpɛ wɔ yɑ ci Ikpɛ bɛɛrɛkpɛ, i Fɑɑbɑkɔ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ ŋmɔne kɑ i go bɑtu.
56002014	À nɑ ngɑ bɔm no kɑ bu i sɑbu sɛ, zɑmɑ ngɑ mɑ i fɑnsɑ hɛ lɑlɔ kulu gɑɑ. À mɑ i hinnɑndi mo kɑ i tɛ ngɑ ŋmɔne jɑmɑ, i mɑ ci himmɑntɛ yom gbei hinno yom sɛ.
56002015	N mɑ sendi hɛ nge yom di bɔm. N mɑ himmɑ nɑ. N mɑ kɔnkɔm ndɑ hini kulu. N mɑ si nɑm bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ dondɑ ni.
56003001	N mɑ ǹ hɔngɑndi mɑ ǹ mɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ meirekpɛ yom sɛ ndɑ hinikpɛ yom sɛ. Ǹ mɑ n sendi gɑnɑ. Ǹ mo goono sɔlɑntɛ gbei hinno kulu tɛyom sɛ.
56003002	Ǹ mɑ si bɔrɔ ciine. Ǹ mɑ ci bɔrɔ bɑɑnɔ yom. Ǹ mɑ ci bɔrɔ bɑɑnɔ yom kɑ bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ kulu cɛbɛ beerem sɛ.
56003003	Yɑ no i yom mo, sɑɑ di i gɔrɔ sɑmu yom ndɑ hunguɛkpɛ yom. I ci zɑmbɑntɛ yom. I ci bineibɑɑi ndɑ hɛ bɑɑyom dimi kulu tɑm yom. I gɔrɔ cɛmbɛrɛ cɛmbɛrɛ kunɑ ndɑ molɑgɑ. I ci mo bine hunguɛkpɛ yom kɑ hungu cɛrɛ ndɑ cɛrɛ.
56003004	Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ i Fɑɑbɑkɔ, ɑ̀ bɔrɔhinnotɛrɛ ndɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑkɑsine kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ iburɑdɑm kulu sɛ kɑɑtɛrɛ, ɑ̀ nɑ i fɑɑbɑ.
56003005	À nɑ i fɑɑbɑ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci cɛyom susu gbei kɑ i tɛ sɑbu sɛ bo. Suuji kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ i sɛ bɔm no ɑ̀ nɑ i fɑɑbɑ. À nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ nɑ hɛiyom teji kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ i nyume dɔ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ i tejɑndi dɔ.
56003006	Ikpɛ nɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ zumɑndi i bɔm ndɑ bɑyom i Fɑɑbɑkɔ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ.
56003007	Ikpɛ nɑ i fɑɑbɑ zɑmɑ i mɑ ci tubuize yom hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni bɛɛjɛ bɔm zɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ i cɛɑndi susu ɑ̀ gomini gɑɑ.
56003008	Sendi ngɑ di yɑ nɑɑnekpɛ no. A go bɑɑ n mɑ tɑkɑkɑ hɛ nge yom di gɑɑ hɑli beerem kɑ ǹ nɑɑne Ikpɛ gɑɑ ǹ mɑ moo dɑm gbei hinno yom gɑɑ. Hɛ nge yom di boori. Ǹ gundɑ hɑnfɑni iburɑdɑm yom sɛ.
56003009	Ammɑ n mɑ fee ndɑ sɑmutɛrɛ hãyom, ndɑ cɛɛ kɑ cɛɛ yom ndɑ zoji ndɑ kɑkɔ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ Moisi fɔndɑ zɑmɑ ǹ sindɑ nɑfɑ. Kɔnu yom mɑ nɑ.
56003010	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ feefee dɑm mɑrgɑ kunɑ n mɑ ɑkpɛ moorɑndi n gɑɑ sɑɑ kɑ n nɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑbɑɑru ce fɔ fɔ hɑli ce hinkɑ de ɑ̀ hungu.
56003011	N mɑ bei kɑ iburɑdɑm yɑ di dimi, bɔrɔ siirɑntɛ no. Dulum no ɑ̀ go tɛ ko kɑ ngɑ bɔm ciiti kɑ zeeri.
56003012	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ gɑ Alitemɑ wɑlɑ Ticiku dɔntɔm n dɔ, n mɑ wetere kɑ kɑɑ ɑ dɔ Nikɑpoli kpɑɑrɑ. Kpɑɑrɑ di no yɑ nɑ guuri zɑɑ yɑ yeeni tɛ.
56003013	N mɑ lɑɑkɑli tɛ Zenɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ciitikɔ sɛ ndɑ Apolo sɛ kɑ ǹ kɑmbɑzɑ ǹ diro di kunɑ, hɛ fɔ mɑ si du kɑ ǹ gɑziɑ sɛ.
56003014	Nɑm i ŋmɔne jɑmɑ mɑ dendeni kɑ moo dɑm gbei hinno yom gɑɑ gudumuɑ sɛ domi ǹ gɔrɛ mɑ si ci kɔnu.
56003015	Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono ɑ bɑndɑ go kɑ n fɔɔ. Beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ bɑɑ i yom nɑɑne kunɑ, n mɑ ǹ fɔɔ. Gomini mo gɔrɔ wom kulu bɑndɑ. Ami.
57001001	Hɛɛ Pɔlu, hɛɛ yɑ kɑsuize no Mɛsiyɑ Yesu sɛ. Hɛɛ ndɑ i nyɑize Timote go kɑ n fɔɔ Filimɔ, ni i binebɑɑkɔ, i bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ gbei kunɑ.
57001002	I go Afiɑ i binebɑɑkɔ fɔɔ mo ndɑ Alicipu, i bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ tɑngɑmi kunɑ ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go meigu n hundi kunɑ.
57001003	Gomini ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne kɑ ǹ hunu i Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ ndɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ, ǹ mo goono wom bɑndɑ.
57001004	A go kɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu n sɛ sɑɑ kulu kɑ ɑ go kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ n sɛ.
57001005	A mɑɑ n bɑɑru kɑ simbɑ n nɑɑne kɑ n gundɑ Kpe Yesu kunɑ ndɑ n bɑɑkɑsine mo kɑ n go cɛbɛ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kulu sɛ.
57001006	A go kɑ Ikpɛ ŋmɑɑrɛ n huroyom nɑɑne kunɑ ndɑ i yom, ɑ̀ mɑ tɔntɔnu hɑli n mɑ fɑhɑm sã sã ndɑ ihinno kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono n kunɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ sɑbu sɛ.
57001007	A nyɑize, i gundɑ binekɑɑne bɑmbɑtɑ ndɑ yɑmɑrɑndiyom mo n bɑɑkɑsine sɑbu sɛ zɑ kɑ n nɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom bine yom yeenɑndi.
57001008	À sɛ no, ɑ̀ gundɑ yɑrutɛrɛ kɑ sendi n sɛ Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ kɑ n dɑm hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ.
57001009	Ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu, ɑ̀ bisɑ yɑ n ŋmɑɑrɛ bɑɑkɑsine sɑbu sɛ zɑ kɑ hɛɛ Pɔlu ɑ goono hɑizeenɔ, mɑɑsɑ mo kɑsuize Yesu Mɛsiyɑ sɑbu sɛ.
57001010	A gɑ kɑ n ŋmɑɑrɛ Onezim sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ɑ ize Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ goono kɑsu kunɑ.
57001011	Dom ɑ̀ sindɑ nɑfɑ n sɛ ɑmmɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ nɑfɑ n sɛ ndɑ ɑ sɛ mo.
57001012	A go kɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔm n dɔ mɑɑsɑ. N mɑ ɑ̀ tɑ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑ gɑɑ jɛrɛ fɔ.
57001013	Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ bine go bɑɑ nɑ yɑ ɑ̀ jɛ ɑ dɔ. A go bɑɑ ɑ̀ mɑ tɑmtɛrɛ ɑ sɛ n gurubi zɑ kɑ ɑ goono kɑsu kunɑ Bɑɑru Hinno sɑbu sɛ.
57001014	Ammɑ ɑ si bɑɑ yɑ hɛ fɔ tɛ yɑ sɑwɑrɑ n gɑɑ. Hɛ hinno kɑ n go tɛ ɑ̀ mɑ si ci zɑngɑ tilɑsi gɑndɑ, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ci ndɑ wom binebɑɑ.
57001015	Hɑnibɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑndi n dɔ bɑndɑ fɔ domi n mɑ ye kɑ du ɑ̀, beeniyom si sɑbu sɛ.
57001016	À mɑnɑ ci zɑngɑ tɑm kpɛɛnɛ no n mɑ du ɑ̀. À bisɑ tɑm zɑmɑ ngɑ yɑ ci nyɑize Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ. Ngɑ yɑ ci ɑ nyɑize binebɑɑkɔ ɑmmɑ hɑli yɑ mo n sɛ, n tɑm ndɑ n nyɑize mo Kpe kunɑ.
57001017	Ngɑ di sɛ, de n go kɑ ɑ dii zɑngɑ n bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ, n mɑ ɑ̀ tɑ zɑngɑ hɛɛ bumbum no.
57001018	Ammɑ de ɑ̀ nɑ n zɑmbɑ hɛ fɔ kunɑ wɑlɑ hɛ kɑ n go kɑ ɑ̀ gɑihã goono ɑ̀ dɔ, n mɑ ɑ̀ dɛcɛ ɑ bɔm.
57001019	Hɛɛ Pɔlu, hɛɛ yɑ go wɔne hɑntum ndɑ ɑ bumbum kɑmbɛ, ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ bɑnɑ. A si n hɔngɑndi ni mo, ɑ go kɑ n gɑihã n bumbum hundi.
57001020	Oò, nyɑize, n mɑ ngɑ di tu ɑ sɛ Kpe kunɑ. N mɑ ɑ bine yeenɑndi Kpe kunɑ.
57001021	Nɑɑne kɑ ɑ gundɑ n gɑɑ sɑbu sɛ no ɑ go wɔne hɑntum n sɛ. A go bei mo kɑ n kɑɑ tɛ kɑ bisɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ go ŋmɑɑrɛ.
57001022	Mɑɑsɑ mo, n mɑ zumbuyom dɔ hinsɑ ɑ sɛ domi ɑ gundɑ bɛɛjɛ kɑ wom ŋmɔne ɑduwɑ yom gɑɑ Ikpɛ kɑɑ fɔndɔ feeri ɑ sɛ yɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ.
57001023	Epɑfɑru kɑ ɑ̀ goono kɑsu kunɑ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu sɑbu sɛ gɑ kɑ n fɔ.
57001024	Mɑɑku mɑ ndɑ Alisitɑku ndɑ Demɑ ndɑ Lukɑ, ɑ bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ yom gbei kunɑ, ǹ kulu gɑ kɑ n fɔɔ.
57001025	I Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gomini mo gɔrɔ ndɑ wom biyɑ. Ami.
58001001	Zɑ dɑm dɑm Ikpɛ sendi i cɛɛ yom sɛ. À sendi ǹ sɛ ce boobo ndɑ fɔndɔ ŋmɑni ŋmɑni ɑndebi yom dɔ.
58001002	Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ jiribi yom wɔ kunɑ, Ikpɛ sendi i sɛ ngɑ Ize dɔ. Ngɑ no Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm hɛ kulu tubukɔ, wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ dɔ mo ɑ̀ no zɑmɑni yom kulu tɛ.
58001003	Ize di yɑ ci Ikpɛ deizɑ kɑɑri ndɑ Ikpɛ tɑkɑri cɑu cɑu. À go hɛ kulu jɛrɛ mo ngɑ sendi dɑbɑrikpɛ gɑɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ i hinnɑndi i dulum yom gɑɑ ngɑ bumbum dɔ, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ɑ̀ gɔrɔ bɛɛnɛ kunɑ Ikpɛ Bɛɛrɛkpɛ beeri kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ.
58001004	À bɛɛrɛ bisɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom bɛɛrɛ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ nɑ mɑɑ tubu kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɛ bisɑ ǹ mɑɑ yom.
58001005	Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom kunɑ, wɔ fɔ sɛ nɑ bɑ cɛ fɔ Ikpɛ nɑ wɔne cii? "Ni, n cii ɑ ize. Hunkunɑ no ɑ nɑ n hɛi." Wɔ fɔ sɛ mo no ɑ̀ cii: "Hɛɛ yɑ ci Bɑɑbɑ ɑ̀ sɛ. Ngɑ mɑ yɑ ci Ize ɑ sɛ."
58001006	À bɑndɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Ize sintine dɑm hɑndunyɑ ɑ̀ cii: "Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom kulu mɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi."
58001007	Kɑ simbɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom mo ɑ̀ cii: "À go kɑ ngɑ dɔntɔneize yom tɛ biyɑ yom. À go kɑ ngɑ gbeiteeri yom mɑ tɛ nini bɛllɛ."
58001008	Ammɑ Ikpɛ cii ngɑ Ize bɔm: "E Ikpɛ, n kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ beeniyom pɑi. N kpetɛrɛ goobu yɑ goobu cɛɑntɛ susu no.
58001009	N bɑɑ cɛyom susu. N bine hungu mo Ikpɛ fɔndɔ hunguyom. À sɛ no, Ikpɛ n ŋmɔne Ikpɛ nɑ n suubɑ kɑ bisɑ n bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ yom. À nɑ jii tusu n bɔm ndɑ jii kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑndɑ fɑihã beeri."
58001010	À cii mo: "E Kpe, sintine gɑɑ n nɑ gɑndɑ sinji. Bɛɛnɛ yom mo n kɑmbɛ gbei no.
58001011	Ǹ kulu kɑɑ hɑlɑci ɑmmɑ ni wɔ, n bo goono beeniyom si. Bɛɛnɛ yom kulu kɑɑ zeeni zɑngɑ jiine yom cine.
58001012	Ǹ gɑ ǹ kunkuni zɑngɑ zɑrɑ cine. Ǹ gɑ ǹ bɛrɛ. Ammɑ ni wɔ, n bɑ goono. N si bɛrɛ. N jiiri yom sindɑ beeniyom."
58001013	Ammɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom kunɑ, wɔ fɔ sɛ nɑ bɑ cɛ fɔ Ikpɛ nɑ wɔne cii? "N mo gɔrɔ ɑ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ hɑli yɑ n ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ yom tɛ n cee dɛcɛyom dɔ."
58001014	Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom kulu yɑ biyɑ yom no. Gbeiteeri yom mo no kɑ Ikpɛ gɑ kɑ ǹ sɑmbɑ ko gbei tɛ beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ bɑ fɑɑbɑ tubu. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
58002001	À sɛ nɑ, ɑ̀ himɑ i mɑ lɑɑkɑli dɑm kɑ tɔntɔnu hɛ yom kɑ i mɑɑ gɑɑ. I mɑ lɑɑkɑli dɑm zɑmɑ i mɑ si du kɑ moorei.
58002002	Zɑ kɑ sendi kɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom cii ǹ tɑbɑi, fɔndɑ dɑɑrumyom mɑ ndɑ zɑm kɑ gɑnɑ kulu du bɑnɑndiyom kɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ.
58002003	Yɑ di gɑɑ, mɛtɛ i tɛ kɑ kɔmɑ de i gɑ sɑɑle kɑɑ fɑɑbɑ beeri wɔ gɑɑ? Fɑɑbɑ wɔ Kpe sinti kɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑru cii. Beerem kɑ ǹ mɑɑ yom mo, ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɑbɑtɑndi i sɛ.
58002004	Ikpɛ mɑ sɛdɑ ndei ndɑ ɑlɑmu yom ndɑ mɑmɑci yom ndɑ dɑbɑri gbei ŋmɑni ŋmɑni yom. À mo sɛdɑ ndei mo ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ noyom kɑ ɑ̀ go fɑrisi Ikpɛ binebɑɑ bɔm.
58002005	Hɑndunyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ, hɑndunyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɔm i go kɑ ɑ̀ sendi tɛ, Ikpɛ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ dɑm ngɑ dɔntɔneize yom meire cire.
58002006	Ammɑ bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ sɛdɑ wɔne cii: "Ifɔ yɑ ci iburɑdɑm kɑ n go hɔngɔ ndɑɑ̀ wɑlɑ ifɔ yɑ ci ɑdɑmize kɑ n mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑɑ̀?
58002007	N nɑ ɑ̀ zobu lɔkɑci bɑndɑ fɔ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom gɑɑ icɛnɑ. N nɑ deizɑ ndɑ bɛɛrɛ dɑm ɑ̀ bɔm gɑɑ zɑngɑ fulɑ tukunsi. N nɑ ɑ̀ dɛcɛ n kɑmbɛ gbei yom bɔm.
58002008	N nɑ hɛ kulu dɑm ɑ̀ cee yom cire." Zɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ hɛ kulu dɑm ɑ̀ cee cire, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɛ fɔ cindi kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ ɑ̀ sɛ. Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ i si di hɛ kulu goono ɑ̀ cee cire jinɑ.
58002009	Ammɑ i go di Yesu kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ deizɑ ndɑ bɛɛrɛ dɑm ɑ̀ bɔm gɑɑ ɑ̀ bu guruguze bɔm sɑbu sɛ. Ikpɛ nɑ Yesu zobu bɑndɑ fɔ ngɑ dɔntɔneize yom gɑɑ icɛnɑ zɑmɑ Ikpɛ gomini gɑɑ ɑ̀ mɑ bu tɑbɑɑ bɔrɔ kulu gurubi kunɑ.
58002010	Hɛ kulu goono ɑ̀ sɑbu sɛ. À dɔ nɑ mo hɛ kulu bɑrɑ. À sɛ nɑ ɑ̀ hegu ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go kpeindɑ ize boobo ngɑ deizɑ dɔ, Ikpɛ mɑ Yesu, ǹ fɑɑbɑ jinɑ bɔrɔ tɔɑndi guruguze dɔ.
58002011	Yɑ nɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hɑlɑɑlɑndi ndɑ beerem kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ hɑlɑɑlɑndi, ǹ kulu bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku dɔ nɑ ǹ hunu. À sɛ nɑ, hɑwi mɑnɑ ɑ̀ dii ɑ̀ mɑ ǹ cɛɛ ngɑ nyɑize yom.
58002012	À cii: "A gɑ n mɑɑ fɛɛ ɑ nyɑizei sɛ. A gɑ n sifɑ kɑ betu mɑrgɑ gɑme."
58002013	À cii kpɛɛnɛ: "A go nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ." À ye kɑ cii: "Gunɑ, hɛɛ ndɑ ize yom kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ no neyɑ."
58002014	À sɛ no, zɑ kɑ ize yom gundɑ bɑ kuri ndɑ gɑɑbɑsi kunɑ, ngɑ bumbum mo meigu ndei nge yom di gɑɑ. À nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ zɑmɑ bu dɔ ɑ̀ mɑ Ibilisi kɑ ɑ̀ ci bu dɑbɑrikpɛ tɛ kɔnu.
58002015	Beerem mo kɑ bu hɑmbure sɛ ǹ nɑ ngei hundi wɑtɛ tɛ tɑmtɛrɛ kunɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ ǹ fɑnsɑ mo.
58002016	Siikɑ si ɑ̀ nɑ ci Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom sɛ no ɑ̀ go kɑɑndɑ gɑɑkɑsine ɑmmɑ Abulɛmɑ bɑndɑ sɛ no, ɑ̀ go kɑɑndɑ gɑɑkɑsine.
58002017	Ngɑ di sɛ no, ɑ̀ tilɑsi ɑ̀ mɑ gundɑ ngɑ nyɑize yom tɑkɑi hɛ kulu kunɑ, zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ci gɑrɑndikɔ beeri, suujikpɛ ndɑ nɑɑnekpɛ mo Ikpɛ gbei kunɑ. À mɑ ci sɑsɑbɑndiyom gɑrɑndi hɛ beerem dulum yom ŋmɔne sɛ mo.
58002018	Zɑ kɑ ngɑ bumbum guruguze ndɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ sui, ɑ̀ hini kɑ beerem kɑ ǹ goono suiyom kunɑ gɑɑkɑsine.
58003001	Nyɑize hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom, Ikpɛ nɑ wom cɛɛ wom mɑ du bɑ bɛɛnɛ ŋmɔne cɛɛ yom kunɑ. À sɛ no, wɑ moo sinji Diyɑ ndɑ Gɑrɑndikɔ Beeri gɑɑ, kɑ ɑ̀ ci Mɛsiyɑ Yesu wɔ kɑ i go ci ɑ̀ sɛdɑ yom.
58003002	Ngɑ yɑ ci nɑɑnekpɛ Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ gɔrɛndi sɛ, zɑngɑ Moisi tɛ nɑɑnekpɛ jɑmɑ kulu kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Ikpɛ gɔrɛ dɔ.
58003003	Ikpɛ nɑ Yesu lɑsɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ deizɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ Moisi. À bisɑ Moisi zɑmɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ fuu cini gundɑ bɛɛrɛ kɑ bisɑ fuu bumbum.
58003004	Fuu kulu bɔrɔ fɔ yɑ nɑ ɑ̀ cini. Ammɑ hɛ kulu cinikɔ, ngɑ yɑ ci Ikpɛ.
58003005	Moisi bine tɛ nɑɑnekpɛ Ikpɛ jɑmɑ kulu kunɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ gbeiteeri. À tɛ sɛdɑ hɛ yom kulu kɑ ǹ kɑɑ cii sɛ.
58003006	Ammɑ Mɛsiyɑ yɑ ci Ize kɑ ɑ̀ goono Ikpɛ fuuɑ bɔm. I yom bine yɑ ci Ikpɛ fuuɑ, de i gɑ kɑ i nɑɑne ndɑ i bɛɛjɛ jɛ ndɑ gɑɑbi kɑlɑ beenɑntɛ.
58003007	À sɛ no, zɑngɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ gɑ cii: "Hunkunɑ de wom go mɑɑ ɑ̀ jinde,
58003008	wɑ si bɑ wom bine yom sendɑndi. Wɑ si ǹ sendɑndi zɑngɑ ǹ hungu Ikpɛ hɑnu kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ sui gɑnji kunɑ.
58003009	Nungu kɑ wom cɛɛ yom nɑ ɑ sui kɑ ɑ bubure, ǹ di ɑ gbei yom hɑli jiiri weitɑɑci.
58003010	À sɛ no, ɑ bine tɔ zɑmɑni wɔne sɛ. Cɔfɔ ɑ cii, sɑɑ kulu ǹ bine yom go dɛrɛ. Ǹ mɑnɑ ɑ fɔndɔ yom bei mo.
58003011	Binetɔnɛ kunɑ bine ɑ̀ nɑ ze wɔne tɛ kɑ cii: Ǹ si huro ɑ hulonzom kunɑ."
58003012	Nyɑizei, wɑ lɑɑkɑli wom bɑ ɑfɔ mɑ si gundɑ bine lɑlɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si nɑɑne hɑli wom gɑ bɑndɑ bɛrɛ Ikpɛ Hundikpɛ sɛ.
58003013	Ammɑ wom mo cɛrɛ no himmɑ mɑ bɑ yom kulu kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ hunkunɑ. À mɑ si tɛ wom kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ nɑm dulum mɑ ngɑ fɑfɑgu kɑ ngɑ bine sendɑndi zɑngɑ tiinɑ.
58003014	I gundɑ bɑ Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ no, de i go kɑ i nɑɑne kɑ i gundɑ zɑ sintine jɛ kɑlɑ beenɑntɛ.
58003015	Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Hunkunɑ de wom mɑɑ Ikpɛ jinde, wɑ si wom bine sendɑndi zɑngɑ ǹ tɛ hɑnu kɑ ǹ hungu Ikpɛ".
58003016	Mee yom yɑ mɑɑ ɑ̀ jinde kɑ ǹ hungu ɑ̀ sɛ? Ngei yɑ ci beerem kɑ ǹ hunu Moisi bɑndɑ Eziputu lɑɑbu di kunɑ. À nɑ ci cimi nɑ bɑ?
58003017	Mee yom sɛ no Ikpɛ bine tɔ hɑli jiiri weitɑɑci? Ngei yɑ ci beerem kɑ ǹ nɑ dulum tɛ kɑ ǹ bukɔei dɑɑru gɑnji kunɑ. À nɑ ci cimi nɑ bɑ?
58003018	Mee yom gɑɑ no Ikpɛ ze kɑ cii ǹ si hurɑ ɑ̀ hulɑnzom kunɑ? Ngei yɑ ci beerem kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ sendi gɑnɑ.
58003019	I bine di mo kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ hini kɑ huro hulonzom kunɑ zɑmɑ ǹ mɑnɑ nɑɑne.
58004001	Ikpɛ ɑlikɑwɑli goono i sɛ hɑli hɔ̃ i mɑ du kɑ hurɑ ɑ̀ hulɑnzom kunɑ. À sɛ no i mɑ hɑmburu ɑ̀ mɑ si tɛ wom bɑ ɑfɔ mɑ lɑsɑbu wom gɑziɑ wɑlɑ wom kɑɑ kɔkɔrɔ.
58004002	Cimi no ǹ nɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɔ wɑɑzu tɛ i sɛ zɑngɑ ǹ tɛ dɑm beerem sɛ. Ammɑ sendɑ kɑ ǹ mɑɑ mɑnɑ nɑfɑ fɔ kulu tɛ ǹ sɛ, zɑmɑ ǹ mɑnɑ nɑɑne gɑru ǹ gɑɑ, nge yom kɑ ǹ mɑɑ.
58004003	Ammɑ i yom kɑ i go nɑɑne, i go huro hulonzom di kunɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ cii: "A bine yɑ tɔ. A nɑ ze wɔne tɛ kɑ cii beerem wɔ si huro hulonzom kunɑ." Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ di cii nɑ bɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gbei kube zɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ hɑndunyɑ sinji.
58004004	Nungu fɔ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ kunɑ ɑ̀ nɑ wɔne cii jiribi iyɑntɛ wɔ bɔm: "Ikpɛ hulɑnzom ndɑ ngɑ gbei yom kulu jiribi iyɑntɛ hine".
58004005	À cii kpɛɛnɛ: "Ǹ si hurɑ ɑ̀ hulonzom kunɑ".
58004006	Tɑ. Beerem kɑ ǹ sɛ ǹ jinɑ kɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu tɛ, ǹ mɑnɑ huro hulonzom kunɑ ǹ hungu kɑ gɑnɑ sɑbu sɛ. Bine, bɔrɔ fɔ yom kɑ ǹ cindi ǹ mɑ du kɑ hurɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ.
58004007	À sɛ nɑ, Ikpɛ mo nɑ hɑnu fɔ jisi kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ hunkunɑ. Lɔkɑci boobo bɑndɑ ɑ̀ sendi Dɑfidi dɔ kɑ cii: "Hunkunɑ, de wom mɑɑ ɑ jinde, wɑ si wom bine yom sendɑndi."
58004008	De Yɑsuɑ nɑ ǹ no hulonzom, dom Ikpɛ si hɑnu fɔ kpɛɛnɛ sendi tɛ ngɑ di bɑndɑ.
58004009	À sɛ nɑ, hulonzom lɔkɑci cindi Ikpɛ jɑmɑ sɛ.
58004010	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ huro Ikpɛ hulonzom kunɑ, ɑkpɛ hulonzom ndɑ ngɑ gbei yom zɑngɑ Ikpɛ hulonzom ndɑ ngɑ ŋmɔne yom.
58004011	Ngɑ di sɛ, i mɑ himmɑ tɛ kɑ huro ɑ̀ hulonzom kunɑ. Yɑ nɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ si kɑm zɑm kɑ gɑnɑ deedɑndi di bɔm.
58004012	Ikpɛ Sendi yɑ hundikoni no, dɑbɑrikpɛ mo no. À mee kɑɑni kɑ bisɑ tɑkubɑ. Zɑngɑ tɑkubɑ hini kɑ bɔrɔ gooru kɑ dumbu, Ikpɛ Sendi gooru kɑ tɔ bine dɔ ndɑ biyɑ dɔ ndɑ dɔbu yom dɔ ndɑ lonti yom dɔ. À go bɔrɔ lɑsɑbu yom ndɑ bine miilɑ yom gunɑ kɑ fɑyɑnkɑ.
58004013	Tɑkɑhɛ bɑ ɑfɔ si tugɑntɛ Ikpɛ jine, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ ǹ kɑɑtɛrɛ. Tɛrɛkpɑrɛ nɑ ǹ kulu goono. À moo goono ǹ kulu gɑɑ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ tilɑsi i mɑ i tɛgbei deede.
58004014	Yɑ di gɑɑ, i gundɑ Gɑrɑndikɔ Beeri kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɛ bisɑ ǹ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ huro bɛɛnɛ kunɑ. Ngɑ yɑ ci Yesu, Ikpɛ Ize. Ngɑ di sɛ i mo i sɛdɑ jɛ ndɑ gɑɑbi.
58004015	I gundɑ Gɑrɑndikɔ Beeri kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ sisibi i sɛ ndɑ i hinɑbunutɛrɛ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ sui mo hɛ kulu gɑɑ zɑngɑ i yom, ɑmmɑ ngɑ wɔ mɑnɑ dulum tɛ.
58004016	Ngɑ di sɛ i mɑ mɑɑni kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ dɔ, nungu kɑ gomini goono ndɑ yɑrutɛrɛ. I mɑ mɑɑni ɑ̀ dɔ zɑmɑ i mɑ du suuji ndɑ gomini kɑ ǹ mɑ i gɑɑ lɔkɑci kɑ ɑ̀ hegu.
58005001	Ikpɛ nɑ gɑrɑndikɔ beeri kulu suubɑ iburɑdɑm yom kunɑ. Iburɑdɑm yom sɛ mo no Ikpɛ go kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm ngɑ gbei kunɑ hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ sɑrɑɑ yom ndɑ gɑrɑndi hɛ yom cɛbɛ dulum yom sɑbu sɛ.
58005002	À hini kɑ suuru ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ zɑm kɑ bei ndɑ beerem kɑ kɑ ǹ gɑ dɛrɛ zɑ kɑ ngɑ bumbum gundɑ londibunɔ kɑmbu kulu gɑɑ.
58005003	Hinɑbunutɛrɛ di sɑbu sɛ ɑ̀ himɑ ɑ̀ mɑ gɑrɑndi tɛ ngɑ bumbum dulum yom sɑbu sɛ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ mɑ tɛ jɑmɑ mo dulum yom sɑbu sɛ.
58005004	Bɔrɔ kulu si kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ bɛɛrɛ wɔ zɑɑ ngɑ bɔm sɛ ɑmmɑ Ikpɛ mɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Aɑrɔ mɑ cɛɛ.
58005005	Mɛsiyɑ bine mɑnɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ ngɑ bɔm sɛ kɑ ngɑ mɑ tɛ gɑrɑndikɔ beeri. Ammɑ Ikpɛ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: "Ni yɑ ɑ Ize no. Zɑ hunkunɑ hɛɛ yɑ ci Bɑɑbɑ n sɛ."
58005006	À cii mo Somu yom tirɑ kunɑ: "Ni, n bɑ ci gɑrɑndikɔ, beeniyom si, zɑngɑ Mɛkizɑdɛkɑ gɑrɑndikɔtɛrɛ cine."
58005007	Yesu wɔ, sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono hɑndunyɑ bɔm ɑ̀ nɑ ɑduwɑ yom tɛ ndɑ ŋmɑɑrɛyom. À nɑ ɑduwɑ yom tɛ ndɑ jinde beeri ndɑ mundi Ikpɛ gɑɑ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ ɑ̀ fɑɑbɑ bu kɑmbɛ. Ikpɛ bine tu ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ̀ gɑnɑyom sɑbu sɛ.
58005008	Bɑ kɑ hɑɑli dɔ ngɑ yɑ ci Ize, ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu ɑ̀ nɑ gɑnɑyom dendeni tɑɑbi yom kɑ ɑ̀ hɑm gɑɑ.
58005009	Sɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tɔɑndi tɑɑbi kunɑ, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ Mɛsiyɑ tɛ beerem kulu kɑ ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ sɛ fɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni Kpe.
58005010	Ikpɛ fɛɛ kɑ gɑrɑndikɔ beeri no zɑngɑ Mɛkizɑdɛkɑ gɑrɑndikɔtɛrɛ cine.
58005011	I gundɑ ciiyom boobo ngei di bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ feeriji gɑɑbu zɑmɑ wom tɛ beerem kɑ ǹ tɑru kɑ mɑɑ.
58005012	Wom himɑ wom mɑ tɛ cɛbɛkɔ yom, zɑmɑ zɑ jɛyom wom go du cooɑndiyom. Ammɑ hɑli hɔ̃ wom go bɑɑ bɔrɔ fɔ mɑ wom cooɑndi kpɛɛnɛ Ikpɛ meecine kulu hɛ sintine yom bɔm. Wom ci beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ bɑɑ woo, ɑ̀ nɑ ci ŋmɑɑri sɛndɔ.
58005013	Bɔrɔ kulu bine kɑ woo no ɑ̀ go hɑm, izecire no. À sindɑ beire kɑ simbɑ ndɑ bɑɑru cɛɑntɛ susu.
58005014	Ammɑ ŋmɑɑri sɛndɔ beerem kɑ ǹ tɔ bɔrɔ, ǹ ŋmɔne no. Nge yom di tɛyom gɑɑ, ǹ nɑ nge lɑɑkɑli yom dɔnɑndi ihinno ndɑ ilɑlɔ beiyom kɑ kɑɑ cɛrɛ.
58006001	À sɛ nɑ i mɑ Mɛsiyɑ cɛbɛ sendi sintine yom nɑm ko kpei jinɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ gɑɑ. I mɑ si ye kɑ sendi kɑɑji sinji kpɛɛnɛ, wɑtom i mɑ si gbei bukɔ ŋmɔne tuubiyom kpɛsɛ furu iteji ndɑ Ikpɛ gɑɑ nɑɑneyom.
58006002	I mɑ si ye kɑ kɑɑji sinji kpɛɛnɛ mɑ wɑtom cɛbɛ nyunu nyunu ŋmɔne bɔm ndɑ kɑmbɛ dɛcɛyom bɔm gbei sɛ ndɑ bukɔei tunɑndiyom bɔm ndɑ ciiti kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni bɔm.
58006003	I gɑ ngɑ di tɛ, de Ikpɛ tu.
58006004	Mɛtɛ ɑ̀ kɑɑ tɛ beerem kɑ ǹ bɑndɑ bɛrɛ sɛ? Ǹ du kɑɑri ce fɔ. Ǹ nɑ bɛɛnɛ gomini tɑbɑɑ. Ǹ du bɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ.
58006005	Ǹ nɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hinno tɑbɑɑ. Ǹ di zɑmɑni kɑ ɑ̀ bɑ kɑɑ dɑbɑri yom mo.
58006006	Cɔfɔ de ǹ nɑ bɑndɑ bɛrɛ Ikpɛ gɑɑ, ǹ si hini kɑ ye kɑ bɛrɛ kpɛɛnɛ ǹ mɑ tuubi. Beerem nge yom di go kɑ Ikpɛ Ize kɑnji kpɛɛnɛ ko kɑ ɑ̀ hɑwɑndi tɛrɛkpɑrɛ.
58006007	Sɑɑ kɑ gɑndɑ nɑ hɑri kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑm ɑ̀ bɔm hɑm ɑliwɑti kɑ kɑɑ ɑliwɑti, dumɑiize zei. À kɑɑndɑ nɑfɑ beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ fɑri. Gɑndɑ mo goono Ikpɛ bɑrikɑ kunɑ.
58006008	Ammɑ de ɑ̀ go kɑriji ndɑ kɑriji nyɑ yom zei, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ furu. Lɑɑliyom bɑ tɔ ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Kɔkɔikɔkɔi nini no, ǹ kɑɑ dɑm ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
58006009	Ammɑ i binebɑɑkɔ yom, bɑ kɑ i go sendi zɑngɑ yɑ, i go wom tɑbɑtɑndi no. I bei kɑ wom goono fɔndɔ hinno bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ ci fɑɑbɑ ŋmɔne.
58006010	Ikpɛ cɛsusu no, kɑ ɑ̀ si dinigɑ gbei kɑ wom tɛ ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine gbei kɑ wom cɛbɛ ɑ̀ mɑɑ gɑɑ sɑɑ kɑ wom nɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom gɑɑkɑsine. Wom go kɑ ǹ gɑɑ kpɛɛnɛ hɑli hɔ̃.
58006011	I gɑ bɑɑ mo wom bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ himmɑ fɔlɔnku di cɛbɛ zɑmɑ wom nɑɑne mɑ gɔrɔ bɛɛjɛ tɔnɑntɛ kɑlɑ beenɑntɛ.
58006012	I si bɑɑ wom mɑ yofune. Wom mɑ beerem dendeni, beerem kɑ ǹ nɑɑne ndɑ ǹ suuru kuku gɑɑ ǹ go ɑlikɑwɑli yom tubu.
58006013	Ikpɛ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli tɛ Abulɛmɑ sɛ. Zɑ kɑ ɑ̀ si hini kɑ ze ndɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ beeri kɑ bisɑ ngɑ, ɑ̀ ze ndɑ ngɑ bɔm.
58006014	A cii: "Dɑhiri no, ɑ kɑɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm n gɑɑ. A kɑɑ nɑm n bɑndɑ mo mɑ bɑ."
58006015	Zɑngɑ yɑ, kɑ Abulɛmɑ bɑtu ndɑ suuru kuku ɑ̀ du hɛ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɔne ɑlikɑwɑlɑ tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ di.
58006016	Iburɑdɑm yom cini ze ndɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ beeri kɑ bisɑ ngei. Ze wɔ bine tɑbɑtɑndiyom no kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑkɔ kulu wi iburɑdɑm yom gɑme.
58006017	À sɛ nɑ Ikpɛ guuri dɑm ngɑ mɑ ngɑ ɑlikɑwɑli cɛbɛ tubukɔ yom sɛ tɛrɛkpɑrɛ kɑ ngɑ sɑwɑri si tunu. À sɛ no, ɑ̀ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli tɛ ndɑ zeyom.
58006018	Hɛ hinkɑ goono kɑ ǹ sindɑ bɛrɛyom kɑ ǹ kunɑ Ikpɛ si hini kɑ tɑngɑri. Ngɑ di sɛ nɑ i yom kɑ i gundɑ tuguyom dɔ fɔ ɑ̀ kunɑ, hɛ hinkɑ di gɑ kɑ i yɑmɑrɑndi kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. I mɑ doyom dɔ kɑ Ikpɛ jini kɑ jisi i sɛ bɛɛjɛ dii ndɑ gɑɑbi.
58006019	Bɛɛjɛ wɔ i gundɑ nɑ zɑngɑ hundi sɛ jɛyom hɛ. Sinjɑntɛ nɑ. À gundɑ gɑɑbi mɑ. À nɑm i mɑ hurɑ nungu kɑ Ikpɛ goono, wɑtom lɑbude jine.
58006020	Nungu di no Yesu huro i sɛ jine kɑ fɔndɔ feeri i sɛ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ ci Gɑrɑndikɔ Beeri, beeniyom si zɑngɑ Mɛkizɑdɛkɑ gɑrɑndikɔtɛrɛ cine.
58007001	Mɛkizɑdɛkɑ wɔ, Sɑlim wɑngɑrɑ kpe nɑ. Ngɑ yɑ ci gɑrɑndikɔ Ikpɛ sɛ, Ikpɛ bɛɛrɛkpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɛ bisɑ ǹ kulu. Sɑɑ kɑ Abulɛmɑ gɑ kɑɑ zɑ kpe yom wɑngu kɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑ dɔ, Mɛkizɑdɛkɑ kpei kɑ ɑ̀ kube. À nɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm Abulɛmɑ gɑɑ.
58007002	Cɔfɔ Abulɛmɑ nɑ ɑ̀ no zɑkɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ du wɑngu di dɔ. Sintine jinɑ Mɛkizɑdɛkɑ mɑɑ feeriji yɑ ci cɛsusukpɛ. Sɑlim wɑngɑrɑ kpe no, lɑɑkɑli kɑnekpɛ noyɑ.
58007003	Mɛkizɑdɛkɑ sindɑ bɑɑbɑ. À sindɑ nyɑ. À sindɑ cɛɛ kɑ cɛɛ yom. À sindɑ hɑnu kɑ ɑ̀ sinti, ɑ̀ hundi sindɑ mee. À himɑ nɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Ize. Mɛkizɑdɛkɑ wɔ gɔrɔ nɑ gɑrɑndikɔ gɔrɛ, beeniyom si.
58007004	Gunɑ, bɔrɔ kpɛ bɛɛrɛ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ Abulɛmɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci cɛɛ zeenu nɑ zɑkɑ kɑɑ hɛ yom bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ wɑngu ŋmɑɑ.
58007005	Lefi bɑndɑ yom kɑ ǹ gundɑ gɑrɑndikɔtɛrɛ du fɔndɔ kɑ zɑkɑ tɑ beerem gɑɑ Moisi fɔndɑ bɔm. Ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ tɑ beerem dɔ kɑ ci ǹ nyɑize yom, bɑ kɑ Abulɛmɑ bɑndɑ yom no.
58007006	Ammɑ Mɛkizɑdɛkɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Lefi bɑndɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ zɑkɑ tɑ Abulɛmɑ gɑɑ. À nɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm bɔrɔ di gɑɑ, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli yom tɛ.
58007007	Kɑkɔ si, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci icɛnɑ du bɑrikɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ beeri ndɑ, ɑ̀ dɔ.
58007008	Nee wɔ beerem kɑ ǹ bu go zɑkɑ yom tɑ iburɑdɑm yom gɑɑ. Ammɑ yɔngɔ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ zɑkɑ tɑ, Ikpɛ Sendɑ tɛ sɛdɑ kɑ ɑkpɛ go hunɑ.
58007009	Ǹ hini kɑ cii mo Lefi kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ zɑkɑ tɑ, ngɑ bumbum nɑ zɑkɑ no mo sɑɑ kɑ Abulɛmɑ nɑ ɑ̀ no.
58007010	Sɑɑ kɑ Mɛkizɑdɛkɑ nɑ Abulɛmɑ kube, ǹ mɑnɑ Lefi hɛi jinɑ. À goono ngɑ cɛɛ cɛntɛ cire.
58007011	Moisi fɔndɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ jɑmɑ no, Lefi gɑrɑndikɔtɛrɛ bɔm no ɑ̀ goono. Ngɑ di sɛ, de tɔɑndiyom goono Lefi gɑrɑndikɔtɛrɛ kunɑ, ɑ̀ si himɑ ǹ mɑ gɑrɑndikɔ ŋmɑni fɔ dɑm zɑngɑ Mɛkizɑdɛkɑ cine kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Aɑrɔ cine.
58007012	Zɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ gɑrɑndikɔtɛrɛ bɛrɛ tilɑsi ǹ mɑ fɔndɑ mo bɛrɛ.
58007013	Kɑ simbɑ bɔrɔ di kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ ǹ go hɛ yom wɔ cii, dimi ŋmɑni fɔ bɔrɔ no. Dimi wɔ kunɑ bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ mɑnɑ hini kɑ mɑɑni gɑrɑndi bɑndɑ tɑndɑ dɔ kɑ gbei tɛ.
58007014	Bɔrɔ kulu go bei kɑ Yudɑ gɑɑ no i Kpe hunu. Yudɑ dimi wɔ bɔm Moisi mɑnɑ hɛ fɔ kulu cii kɑ simbɑ ndɑ gɑrɑndikɔtɛrɛ.
58007015	Hɛ kɑ i go bei cɑu cɑu kɑ tɔntɔnu neyɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ gɑrɑndikɔ ŋmɑni fɔ mɑ tunu, ɑ̀ himɑ Mɛkizɑdɛkɑ cine.
58007016	Ngɑ wɔ, Ikpɛ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ gɔrɛndi ndɑ zɑngɑ iburɑdɑm yom meire goono ndɑ. À nɑ ɑ̀ gɔrɛndi hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si hini kɑ beeni dɑbɑri bɔm.
58007017	Ikpɛ sɛdɑ ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ cii: "Ni, n bo ci gɑrɑndikɔ, beeniyom si, zɑngɑ Mɛkizɑdɛkɑ gɑrɑndikɔtɛrɛ cine".
58007018	Zɑngɑ yɑ nɑ Ikpɛ nɑ dom fɔndɑ yeti kɑmbu ɑ̀ hinɑbunutɛrɛ ndɑ ɑ̀ zɑm kɑ tɛ sɑbu sɛ.
58007019	Fɔndɑ mɑnɑ kɑɑndɑ hɛ fɔlɔnku tɔyom dɔ. Ikpɛ kɑɑndɑ bɛɛjɛ hinno, bɛɛjɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑm i go mɑɑni Ikpɛ gɑɑ.
58007020	Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ mɑ ndɑ zeyom.
58007021	Lefi bɑndɑ yom mo mɑnɑ tɛ gɑrɑndikɔ yom zeyom bɔm. Ammɑ Yesu ci gɑrɑndikɔ Ikpɛ zeyom bɔm. Kpe cii ɑ̀ sɛ: "Kpe ze, ɑ̀ bine si tunɑndi pɑi. Ni, n bɑ ci Gɑrɑndikɔ sɑɑ kulu, beeniyom si, zɑngɑ Mɛkizɑdɛkɑ gɑrɑndikɔtɛrɛ cine."
58007022	Zeyom di bɔm no Yesu ci zɑngɑ tɔlimɛ ɑlikɑwɑli teji sɛ, ɑlikɑwɑli kɑ ɑ̀ boori kɑ bisɑ izeenɑ.
58007023	Lefi dimi gɑrɑndikɔ yom di bine bɑ bututu, zɑmɑ bu nɑ ǹ gɑnji.
58007024	Ammɑ Yesu wɔ, zɑmɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bo goono beeniyom si sɛ, ɑ̀ gundɑ gɑrɑndikɔtɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ si ye bɔrɔ ŋmɑni fɔ dɔ.
58007025	Ngɑ di sɛ mo no, ɑ̀ hini kɑ beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ mɑɑni Ikpɛ gɑɑ ngɑ dɔ, ɑ̀ hini kɑ ǹ no fɑɑbɑ tɔnɑntɛ zɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hunɑ ko huro ǹ sɛ Ikpɛ dɔ.
58007026	À sɑbɑ ɑ̀ sɛ i mɑ du gɑrɑndikɔ beeri fɔ zɑngɑ ngɑ, hɑlɑɑlɑ, bɑɑnikom, ziibi si. Ikpɛ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ lɑsɑbu dulumkoni yom kunɑ kɑ kpeindɑ hɑli bɛɛnɛ sɑmɑu.
58007027	À mɑnɑ ci zɑngɑ gɑrɑndikɔ beeri ŋmɑni yom. À mɑnɑ tɔ ɑ̀ mɑ gɑrɑndi tɛ hɑnu kulu, sintine ngɑ bumbum dulum yom sɑbu sɛ, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ beerem ŋmɔne yom sɑbu sɛ. Yesu wɔ nɑ gɑrɑndi tɛ cefɔ pɑp kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɔm tɛ gɑrɑndi hɛ.
58007028	Moisi fɔndɑ go gɑrɑndikɔ beeri yom dɑm, beerem kɑ ǹ si hini ngei bɔm. Ammɑ Ikpɛ zeyom bɔm Moisi fɔndɑ bɑndɑ, Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ Ize kɑ ɑ̀ ci tɔɑntɛ beeniyom si dɑm Gɑrɑndikɔ.
58008001	Sendi kɑ i go cii wɔ kɑɑji neyɑ. I gundɑ Gɑrɑndikɔ Beeri wɔne dimi. À gɑ gɔrɔ Ikpɛ Bɛɛrɛkpɛ kɑrigɑ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ bɛɛnɛ kunɑ.
58008002	Ngɑ yɑ go gɑrɑndikɔtɛrɛ gbei tɛ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci kuuru bukɑ, cimi ŋmɔne. Bukɑ di Kpe bumbum yɑ nɑ ɑ̀ sinji, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci iburɑdɑm.
58008003	Ikpɛ nɑ gɑrɑndikɔ beeri kulu dɑm nɑ ɑ̀ mɑ sɑrɑɑ yom ndɑ gɑrɑndi hɛ yom cɛbɛ Ikpɛ sɛ. Ngɑ di sɛ ɑ̀ tilɑsi i gɑrɑndikɔ beeri mɑ mɑ gundɑ hɛ fɔ kɑ cɛbɛ.
58008004	Bɑ de ɑ̀ goono hɑndunyɑ ɑ̀ si tɛ gɑrɑndikɔ zɑ kɑ gɑrɑndikɔ yom goono kɑ ǹ cini sɑrɑɑ nɑ Ikpɛ sɛ Moisi fɔndɑ bɔm.
58008005	Gbei kɑ gɑrɑndikɔ nge yom di tɛ yɑ bɛɛnɛ hɛ yom himɑi yom ndɑ ǹ biyɑ yom no. Ngɑ yɑ ci zɑngɑ Ikpɛ nɑ Moisi cɛbɛ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kuuru bukɑ tɛ. Ikpɛ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: "N mɑ tɛ lɑɑkɑli kɑ deedɑndi wɔ gɑnɑ kɑ ɑ cɛbɛ n sɛ tɑndi kuku bɔm".
58008006	Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ Ikpɛ nɑ gbei fɔ dɛcɛ Yesu sɛ. Gbei di boori kɑ bisɑ ǹ ŋmɔne di zɑ kɑ ngɑ yɑ ci sɑsɑbɑndikɔ ɑlikɑwɑli sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ boori kɑ bisɑ izeenɔ. Alikɑwɑlɑ wɔ nɑ Ikpɛ tɛ ɑlikɑwɑli yom bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ boori kɑ bisɑ izeenɔ yom.
58008007	De sintine ɑlikɑwɑli sindɑ tɑɑli, dɑm ǹ si ceeci ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ bɛrɛ ndɑ hinkɑntɛ.
58008008	Ammɑ zɑ kɑ Ikpɛ di tɑɑli ǹ dɔ ɑ̀ cii: "Hɛɛ Kpe, ɑ gɑ cii, Gunɑ, hɑnu yom go kɑɑ kɑ ǹ gɑɑ ɑ gɑ ɑlikɑwɑli teji tɛ ndɑ Isirɑilɑ jɑmɑ ndɑ Yudɑ dimi.
58008009	À nɑ ci zɑngɑ ɑlikɑwɑli kɑ ɑ hɔ ndɑ ǹ cɛɛ yom, hɑnu kɑ ɑ nɑ ǹ kɑmbɛ yom dii kɑ ǹ kɑɑ Eziputu lɑɑbu di. Ǹ mɑnɑ himmɑ tɛ ɑ ŋmɔne ɑlikɑwɑli di kunɑ. Hɛɛ mo, yɑ nɑ sɑɑle dɑm ǹ gɑɑ. Kpe cii yɑ di.
58008010	Alikɑwɑli wɔne, ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ tɛ Isirɑilɑ fuu sɛ hɑnu nge yom di bɑndɑ. A gɑ ɑ fɔndɔ yom dɑm ǹ lɑsɑbu yom kunɑ. A gɑ ǹ jeeri mo ǹ bine yom gɑɑ. Hɛɛ yɑ kɑɑ ci ǹ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ. Ngei mo kɑɑ ci ɑ jɑmɑ. Yɑ no Kpe cii.
58008011	Bɔrɔ si ko ɑ̀ gɑ ngɑ gɔrɔkɑsine wɑlɑ ngɑ dimi cɛbɛ kɑ cii: N mɑ Kpe bei. Ǹ si cii yɑ zɑmɑ ǹ kulu yɑ kɑɑ kɑ ɑ bei, zɑ ǹ kulu ŋmɔne icɛnɑ kɑlɑ kɑ kpei ǹ kulu ŋmɔne ibeeri.
58008012	A kɑɑ suuji cɛbɛ ǹ zɑm kɑ cɛsusu sɛ. A si hɔngɔ ǹ dulum yom ndɑ ǹ ilɑlɔ tɛyom pɑi."
58008013	Zɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cii ɑlikɑwɑli teji sendi, yɑ di gɑɑ sintine ŋmɔne no Ikpɛ yeti izeenu. Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci dom ŋmɔne kɑ ɑ̀ go zeeni, ɑ̀ mɑɑni beeniyom.
58009001	Alikɑwɑli sintine wɔ gundɑ sendikpɑrɛ yom no kɑ simbɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ gbei yom. À gundɑ nungu hɑlɑɑlɑ mo, hɑndunyɑ ŋmɔne dimi.
58009002	Ǹ nɑ kuuru bukɑ tɛ. À gundɑ kpɛsɛndi fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ. Bukɑ di kunɑ fitilɑ dɛcɛyom dɔ fɔ goono ndɑ tɑbulu fɔ ndɑ buuru jisɑntɛ.
58009003	Lɑbude hinkɑntɛ bɑndɑ gundɑ nungu fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ yom ŋmɔne Hɑlɑɑlɑ.
58009004	À kunɑ wɑidi tɔnuyom dɔ kɑ ǹ tɛ ndɑ wurɑ goono ndɑ ɑlikɑwɑli ɑdɑkɑ fɔ kɑ ǹ nɑ wurɑ hɑri munu ɑ̀ gɑɑ. Adɑkɑ di kunɑ gundɑ wurɑ kusu fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ gundɑ mɑɑnɛ, ŋmɑɑri fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ. À kunɑ Aɑrɔ goobu kɑ ɑ̀ boosu goono ndɑ tondi tɑbulu cɛnɑ cɛnɑ yom kɑ ǹ gɑɑ, ǹ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli sendi yom hɑntum.
58009005	Adɑkɑ di bɔm bɛɛnɛ gundɑ himɑndi hinkɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize deizɑkpɛ yom kɑ ǹ go tɛ sɑsɑbɑndiyom dɔ sɛ bicire. À nɑ ci lɔkɑci wɔ no i gɑ ɑ̀ fɑsɑli.
58009006	To. Zɑ kɑ hɛ yom di goono sɔlɑntɛ, gɑrɑndikɔ yom go huro kuuru bukɑ kpɛsɛndi sintinɑ kunɑ sɑɑ kulu kɑ Ikpɛ gbei tɔnɑndi.
58009007	Ammɑ kpɛsɛndi hinkɑntɛ di mo kunɑ, gɑrɑndikɔ beeri ngɑ hinne yɑ hurɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ce fɔ jiiri kunɑ. Ngɑ mo mɑnɑ hini kɑ hurɑ de ɑ̀ mɑnɑ kpeindɑ kuri kɑ nɑ Ikpɛ sɛ ngɑ bumbum tɑɑli yom sɑbu sɛ ndɑ jɑmɑ tɑɑli yom kɑ ǹ tɛ zɑm kɑ bei kunɑ.
58009008	Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ go cɛbɛ ngɑ di gɑɑ kɑ fɔndɔ kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ yom ŋmɔne Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ mɑnɑ feeri jinɑ. À mɑnɑ feeri jinɑ zɑ kɑ sintine kuuru bukɑ gbei go hegu.
58009009	Kuuru bukɑ yɑ deedɑndi nɑ mɑɑsɑ jinɑ. Wɑtom ɑ̀ go cii noyom ndɑ gɑrɑndi hɛ yom kɑ ǹ gɑ nɑ Ikpɛ sɛ, ǹ si hini kɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ gbei yom wɔ tɛ bine kunɑ sendi tɔɑndi.
58009010	Kuuru bukɑ gbei goono ŋmɑɑ ndɑ hɑm ndɑ nyunu nyunu dimi kulu bɔm ndɑ sendikpɑrɛ yom kɑ simbɑ ndɑ gɑɑhɑm. Ǹ nɑ ǹ jisi kɑlɑ lɔkɑci kɑ Ikpɛ mɑ hɛ kulu hinsɑ.
58009011	Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ Mɛsiyɑ kɑɑ, ɑ̀ ci Gɑrɑndikɔ Beeri hɛ hinno yom kɑ ǹ bɑ kɑɑ sɛ. À huro kuuru bukɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ bɛɛrɛ kɑ bisɑ sintine ŋmɔne. À kube kɑ bisɑɑ̀ mo. Kuuru bukɑ wɔ kɑ Mɛsiyɑ huro ɑ̀ kunɑ, iburɑdɑm kɑmbɛ yom mɑnɑ ɑ̀ tɛ. À mɑnɑ ci hɑndunyɑ wɔ ŋmɔne tɑkɑyom.
58009012	Zɑ kɑ ɑ̀ du i sɛ fɑnsɑyom kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ beeniyom, ɑ̀ huro Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ yom ŋmɔne Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ ce fɔ pɑp. À mɑnɑ huro ndɑ hɑncine kuri wɑlɑ ndɑ hɑuize kuri ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ huro ndɑ ɑ̀ bumbum kuri.
58009013	Hɑuyeji yom kuri ndɑ hɑncine yom kuri ndɑ hɑuize zɑnu boosu no ǹ go see beerem kɑ ǹ ziibi gɑɑ. À gɑɑ nɑ, ǹ go kɑ ǹ hɑlɑɑlɑndi kɑ kɑ ǹ gɑɑhɑm hinnɑndi.
58009014	De ngɑ di ci cimi, hɑli yɑ mɑ Mɛsiyɑ kuri go wom bine kunɑ sendi hinnɑndi gbei bukɔ yom gɑɑ wom mɑ du kɑ tɑmtɛrɛ Ikpɛ Hundikpɛ sɛ. Mɛsiyɑ nɑ ngɑ bɔm sɑrɑɑ Ikpɛ sɛ, tɑɑli fɔ kulu si. À nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ beeniyom dɔ.
58009015	À sɛ no, Mɛsiyɑ tɛ sɑsɑbɑndikɔ ɑlikɑwɑli teji ŋmɔne hɑli beerem kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ cɛɛ mɑ du tubu kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni. À hini kɑ tɛ nɑ zɑmɑ Mɛsiyɑ bu gɑɑ ɑ̀ nɑ beerem fɑnsɑ, wɔ kɑ yom nɑ fɔndɑ dɑɑrum sɑɑ kɑ ǹ goono ɑlikɑwɑli sintine cire.
58009016	Nungu kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli tɛ tubu ŋmɔne, tilɑsi kɑlɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ di mɑ bu jinɑ.
58009017	Tubu tirɑ mɑnɑ tɛ bɛɛrɛ kɑlɑ bu gɑɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ gɑɑbi sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛkɔ gɑ hunɑ.
58009018	À sɛ nɑ bɑ ɑlikɑwɑli sintine mo ǹ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ sinji kɑlɑ de ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ kuri.
58009019	Sɑɑ kɑ Moisi nɑ fɔndɑ meire kulu cii jɑmɑ kulu jine, ɑ̀ nɑ hɑuize yom kuri ndɑ hɑncine kuri zɑɑ ndɑ hɑri ndɑ soofu ciire ndɑ tuurinyɑ cɛnɑ fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ hisope. À nɑ kuri wɔ seesee tirɑ di bumbum gɑɑ ndɑ jɑmɑ di kulu gɑɑ.
58009020	À cii: "Wɔne yɑ ci kuri, ɑlikɑwɑli ŋmɔne kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ fɔndɑ no wom sɛ".
58009021	Yɑ no ɑ̀ nɑ kuri di seesee kuuru bukɑ mo gɑɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ gbei jiine yom kulu gɑɑ.
58009022	Bɔrɔ hini kɑ cii kɑ ǹ go hɛ yom bɑyom hinnɑndi ndɑ kuri Moisi fɔndɑ bɔm. Bine, de kuri mɑnɑ dooru mo, yɑɑfɑ si.
58009023	Ngɑ di sɛ ɑ̀ tilɑsi bɛɛnɛ hɛ yom himɑi yom mɑ du hinnɑndiyom zɑngɑ yɑ di. Ammɑ bɛɛnɛ hɛ yom bumbum, kɑlɑ ǹ mɑ du ǹ hinnɑndiyom ndɑ gɑrɑndi yom kɑ ǹ bisɑ wɔne yom.
58009024	Mɛsiyɑ wɔ mɑnɑ hurɑ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ kɑ iburɑdɑm tɛ ndɑ kɑmbɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci cimi ŋmɔne deedɑndi. Bɛɛnɛ bumbum kunɑ nɑ ɑ̀ huro ko cɛ i sɛ mɑɑsɑ Ikpɛ jine.
58009025	Ammɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ huro mo hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ ngɑ bɔm sɑrɑɑ ce boobo zɑngɑ gɑrɑndikɔ beeri cini hurɑ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ yom ŋmɔne Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ kɑ memunu ŋmɑni ŋmɑni kuri sɑrɑɑ jiiri kɑ kɑɑ jiiri.
58009026	De yɑ di no dom tilɑsi Mɛsiyɑ mɑ tɑɑbi ce boobo zɑ hɑndunyɑ sinjiyom. Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ zɑmɑni beeniyom mee gɑɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ kɑ dulum kɑɑ ce fɔ ɑ̀ bɔm gɑrɑndiyom gɑɑ.
58009027	Bine, zɑngɑ ǹ jisi iburɑdɑm yom sɛ, ǹ mɑ bu ce fɔlɔnku, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ciiti mɑ kɑɑ.
58009028	Yɑ nɑ Mɛsiyɑ mo nɑ ngɑ bɔm no ce fɔ ɑ̀ mɑ bɔrɔ boobo dulum yom jɛrɛ. À kɑɑ hunutɛrɛ ce hinkɑntɛ, ɑ̀ nɑ ci kɑ dulum kɑɑ ɑmmɑ kɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ bɑtu fɑɑbɑ.
58010001	Moisi fɔndɑ gundɑ hɛ hinno yom biyɑ kɑ ǹ bɑ kɑɑ. À sindɑ ǹ tɑbɑiyom deidei. Gɑrɑndi nge yom di kɑ beerem go sɑrɑɑ cɛrɛ bɔm cɛrɛ bɔm jiiri kɑ kɑɑ jiiri, ǹ si hini kɑ ǹ tɔɑndi pɑi.
58010002	De ɑ̀ nɑ ci yɑ, dom ǹ cɛ ndɑ gɑrɑndi tɛyom. Beerem kɑ ǹ go kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi, zɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ hinnɑndi ce fɔ pɑp, dom ǹ si bo hɔngɔ ndɑ ngei dulum yom kpɛɛnɛ. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
58010003	Ammɑ gɑrɑndi hɛ nge yom di kunɑ ǹ bo hɔngɔ dulum yom jiiri kɑ kɑɑ jiiri kulu.
58010004	Yɑ no hɑuyeji yom kuri ndɑ hɑncine kuri si hini kɑ dulum yom kɑɑ.
58010005	À sɛ no, kɑ Mɛsiyɑ kɑɑ hɑndunyɑ ɑ̀ cii: "N si bɑɑ gɑrɑndi hɛ, n si bɑɑ sɑrɑɑ. Ammɑ n nɑ gɑɑhɑm sɔlu ɑ sɛ.
58010006	Zɑ sɑrɑɑ kukurɑntɛ, zɑ gɑrɑndi hɛ yom dulum ŋmɔne, ǹ bɑ ɑfɔ si kɑɑni n sɛ.
58010007	Bine, hɛɛ mo ɑ cii: E Ikpɛ, ɑ go kɑɑ kɑ n binebɑɑ tɛ zɑngɑ ǹ hɑntum ɑ bɔm n tirɑ kunkunɑntɛ kunɑ."
58010008	À jinɑ kɑ cii: N si bɑɑ gɑrɑndi hɛ. N si bɑɑ sɑrɑɑ. N si bɑɑ sɑrɑɑ kukurɑntɛ. N si bɑɑ gɑrɑndi hɛ dulum ŋmɔne. Ǹ bɑ ɑfɔ si kɑɑni n sɛ. Nge yom di kulu ǹ cini tɛ no ndɑ zɑngɑ Moisi fɔndɑ goono ndɑ.
58010009	À gɑɑ no ɑ̀ cii kpɛɛnɛ: "E Ikpɛ, ɑ go kɑɑ kɑ n binebɑɑ tɛ". Ikpɛ bine nɑ sintine ŋmɔnɑ kɑɑ hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ ihinkɑntɑ gɔrɛndi.
58010010	Binebɑɑ ngɑ di tɛyom sɛ no Ikpɛ nɑ i hɑlɑɑlɑndi beeniyom si Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gɑɑhɑm sɑrɑɑyom ce fɔ pɑp gɑɑ.
58010011	Gɑrɑndikɔ kulu go cɛ ko gɑrɑndikɔtɛrɛ gbei tɛ hɑnu kulu. Gɑrɑndi hɛ fɔlɔnku yom no ǹ cini sɑrɑɑ, sɑrɑɑ fɔ yom kɑ ǹ si hini kɑ dulum kɑɑ pɑi.
58010012	Ammɑ Gɑrɑndikɔ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Mɛsiyɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ gɑrɑndi hɛ fɔlɔnku duumiɑntɛ tɛ ce fɔ pɑp dulum yom sɑbu sɛ. À bɑndɑ ɑ̀ gɔrɔ Ikpɛ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ.
58010013	Zɑ sɑɑ di gɑɑ ɑ̀ go bɑtu kɑlɑ ngɑ ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ yom kulu mɑ tɛ ngɑ cee dɛcɛyom dɔ.
58010014	Sɑrɑɑ fɔlɔnku dɔ no ɑ̀ nɑ beerem tɔɑndi, tɔɑndiyom duumiɑntɛ, ngei kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ hɑlɑɑlɑndi.
58010015	Ngɑ di no, Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ mo go tɛ sɛdɑ i sɛ ngɑ di bɔm. Sintine ɑ̀ cii:
58010016	"Wɔne yɑ ci ɑlikɑwɑli kɑ ɑ kɑɑ tɛ ǹ sɛ hɑnu nge yom di bɑndɑ. Kpe cii yɑ di. A gɑ ɑ fɔndɔ yom dɑm ǹ bine yom kunɑ. A gɑ ǹ jeeri mɑ ǹ lɑsɑbu yom gɑɑ."
58010017	À ye kɑ cii: "A si kɑɑ hɔngɔ ǹ dulum yom wɑlɑ ǹ tɑɑli yom pɑi."
58010018	Bine, kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ dulum yom yɑɑfɑ tɛ, gɑrɑndi tɛyom dulum sɛ si kpɛɛnɛ.
58010019	Ngɑ di sɛ nyɑizei, i gundɑ yɑrutɛrɛ Yesu kuri dɔ i mɑ du kɑ huro Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ yom ŋmɔne Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ.
58010020	Yesu nɑ fɔndɔ teji wɔ feeri i sɛ, fɔndɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ hundi hɑli i mɑ hurɑ lɑbude gɑɑ, wɑtom ɑ̀ gɑɑhɑm noyɑ.
58010021	I gundɑ Gɑrɑndikɔ Beeri mo kɑ Ikpɛ jisi ɑ̀ mɑ ci ngɑ fuu ŋmɔne bɔm.
58010022	Ngɑ di sɛ, i mo mɑɑni Ikpɛ gɑɑ ndɑ bine fɔ nɑɑne tɔnɑntɛ kunɑ. I mo mɑɑni zɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ kuri seesee i bine yom gɑɑ kɑ i bine kunɑ sendi hinnɑndi ilɑlɔ gɑɑ ndɑ gɑɑhɑm kɑ Ikpɛ nyume ndɑ hɑri hinnɑ.
58010023	I bɛɛjɛ kɑ i gɑ sɛdɑ ndɑ i mee, i mɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dii kɑ jɛ zɑmɑ Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli tɛ, nɑɑnekpɛ nɑ.
58010024	I mo lɑɑkɑli ndɑ cɛrɛ ko cɛrɛ zukum bɑɑkɑsine dɔ ndɑ gbei hinno yom dɔ.
58010025	I mɑ si Mɛsiyɑ jɑmɑ meiguyom mure zɑngɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom dɔnɑ kɑ cini tɛ. Ammɑ i mɑ cɛrɛ no himmɑ, hɑli yɑ mo mɑɑsɑ kɑ wom gɑ di Kpe Hɑnu go mɑɑni mɑ.
58010026	De i bɑ dulum tɛ ndɑ i binebɑɑ, zɑ kɑ i du cimi beiyom, gɑrɑndi hɛ kulu si cindi dulum yom sɛ kpɛɛnɛ.
58010027	Ammɑ hɛ kɑ cindi i sɛ i mɑ bɑtu ndɑ hɑmburu, ciiti ndɑ nini dungɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑ gɑɑŋmɑɑ zojikɑri yom bɔm.
58010028	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ Moisi fɔndɑ dɑɑrum, ɑ̀ mɑ bu sisibi si, bɔrɔ hinkɑ wɑlɑ bɔrɔ hinzɑ sɛdɑ bɔm.
58010029	Dee mɛtɛ nɑ ɑ̀ himɑ ǹ mɑ tɛ bɔrɔ kpɛ sɛ, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ Ize fɛntɛ? Dee mɛtɛ no ɑ̀ himɑ ǹ mɑ tɛ bɔrɔ kɑ kuri ɑlikɑwɑli ŋmɔne kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ hinnɑndi gunɑ zɑngɑ kɔnu? Mɛtɛ no ǹ tɛ bɔrɔ mo kɑ ɑ̀ go Biyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑndɑ gomini wɔ lɑlɑce?
58010030	Ammɑ i gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bei, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ cii: "Hɛɛ yɑ fɑɑsɑ. Hɛɛ yɑ kɑɑ bɑnɑ." À cii kpɛɛnɛ: "Kpe gɑ ngɑ jɑmɑ ciiti".
58010031	Ikpɛ Hundikpɛ kɑmbɛ kunɑ kɑmyom, hɑmburu hɛ fɔ fɑ.
58010032	Wom mo hɔngɔ hɑnu sintine yom, hɑnu yom kɑ ǹ kunɑ wom du Ikpɛ kɑɑri. À bɑndɑ mo, wom suuru kɑ tɑngɑmi beeri fɔ tɛ guruguze yom bindi bindi.
58010033	Nee hɛrɛ no ǹ nɑ wom tɛ hɑwi gunɑyom hɛ woobi gɑɑ ndɑ kɑnkɑmi gɑɑ. Yɑ hɛrɛ mo wom goono beerem gɑme kɑ ǹ du tɑɑbɑndiyom zɑngɑ yɑ.
58010034	Wom nɑ binejijire tɛ ɑ sɛ ɑ seseri yom kunɑ. Ǹ nɑ wom hɑibɑrikɑ yom tɑ wom gɑɑ. Wom tu ndɑ ngɑ di ndɑ fɑihã zɑ kɑ wom go bei kɑ wom gundɑ hɑizici yom bɛɛnɛ kunɑ kɑ ǹ boori kɑ bisɑ wɔne yom. Ǹ sindɑ beeni yom mo.
58010035	Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ si wom yɑrutɛrɛ furu, yɑrutɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ bɑnɑndi beeri.
58010036	À himɑ wom mɑ hini suuru hɑli sɑɑ kɑ wom nɑ Ikpɛ binebɑɑ tɛ wom mɑ du Ikpɛ ɑlikɑwɑli tɔnɑndiyom.
58010037	Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Hɑli cɛnɑ fɔ ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑ. À si jɛ mɑ.
58010038	Bɔrɔ bine kɑ ɑ̀ ci cɛɑntɛ susu, ɑ̀ go hunɑ nɑɑne gɑɑ. Ammɑ de ɑ̀ ye bɑndɑ mɑ, ɑ bine si mɑɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑne."
58010039	Ammɑ i yom wɔ, i si bɔrɔ wɔne yom kunɑ, nge yom kɑ ǹ go ye bɑndɑ kɑ tɔ hɑlɑciyom dɔ. Beerem kɑ ǹ gundɑ nɑɑne kɑ ngei hundi yom fɑɑbɑ, ǹ kunɑ no i goono.
58011001	Nɑɑne bine yɑ ci hɛ kɑ bɔrɔ go bɛɛjɛ tɛ ndɑ, ɑ̀ tɑbɑtɑndiyom. Nɑɑne wɔ go hɛ yom kɑ moo si di dɑhirɑndi.
58011002	Dom cɛɛ yom nɑɑne dɔ nɑ ǹ du sɛdɑ hinno.
58011003	Nɑɑne gɑɑ no i go fɑhɑm Ikpɛ nɑ hɑndunyɑ tɑkɑ nɑ ndɑ ngɑ mee sendi. I gɑ fɑhɑm mo hɑndunyɑ wɔ kɑ i go di, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ tɛ ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ i hini kɑ di.
58011004	Nɑɑne gɑɑ no Abɛli nɑ gɑrɑndi tɛ Ikpɛ sɛ, gɑrɑndi kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ Kɑinu ŋmɔne. Sɑrɑɑ di gɑɑ no Ikpɛ nɑ Abɛli cɛɑndi susu ngɑ jine zɑmɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ gɑrɑndi yom tɑ. Nɑɑne ngɑ di gɑɑ no, bɑ kɑ Abɛli bu ɑ̀ go sendi hɑli hɔ̃.
58011005	Nɑɑne gɑɑ no, Ikpɛ nɑ Henoku zɑɑ hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ si di bu sɛ. Beerem mɑnɑ di ɑ̀ kpɛɛnɛ zɑmɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ. Hɑli Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ zɑɑ, Henoku gundɑ sɛdɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go cii ɑ̀ go kɑɑni Ikpɛ sɛ.
58011006	De bine nɑɑne si, bɔrɔ si hini kɑ kɑɑni Ikpɛ sɛ pɑi. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go mɑɑni Ikpɛ gɑɑ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ nɑɑne kɑ Ikpɛ goono. Ngɑ mo yɑ ci beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ceeci bɑnɑkɔ.
58011007	Nɑɑne gɑɑ no, Ikpɛ nɑ Nowe kɑɑbɑɑru ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ moo mɑnɑ di jinɑ. Ikpɛ hɑmbure sɑbu sɛ Nowe nɑ hɑrihi tɛ kɑ ngɑ fuu kulu dɑm ɑ̀ kunɑ ǹ mɑ kɔmɑ. Nɑɑne di gɑɑ nɑ, Nowe nɑ hɑndunyɑ ciiti kɑ zeeri. À ci cɛyom susu tubukɔ kɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ nɑɑne go du.
58011008	Nɑɑne gɑɑ no, sɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ Abulɛmɑ cɛɛ ɑ̀ nɑ Ikpɛ sendi gɑnɑ. À kpei nungu fɔ dɔ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ no ɑ̀ mɑ tubu. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu kɑ kpei, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ bei nungu kɑ ngɑ go kpei.
58011009	Nɑɑne gɑɑ no, Abulɛmɑ gɔrɔ zɑngɑ yɑ nungu di kunɑ, lɑɑbu wɔ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɔne ɑlikɑwɑli tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ. Kuuru bukɔ yom kunɑ nɑ Abulɛmɑ gɔrɔ, ngɑ ndɑ Isɑɑkɑ ndɑ Yɑkɔfu. Nge yom yɑ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli fɔlɔnku tubu Abulɛmɑ bɑndɑ.
58011010	Abulɛmɑ gɑ wɑngɑrɑ kɑ ɑ̀ du kpɛsɛ sinjiyom hinno bɑtu. Wɑngɑrɑ wɔ Ikpɛ bumbum yɑ ci ciisɑkpɛ ndɑ ɑ̀ cinikɔ.
58011011	Nɑɑne gɑɑ nɑ Sɑhɑrɑ bumbum du dɑbɑri kɑ tɛ gunde. Bɑ kɑ ɑ̀ zeeni, ɑ̀ ŋmɔne ɑliwɑti mɑ bisɑ, ɑ̀ hɛi. Sɑhɑrɑ lɑsɑbu Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli tɛ ngɑ sɛ, nɑɑnekpɛ nɑ.
58011012	À sɛ no bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku gɑɑ, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ zeeni kɑlɑ ɑ̀ si hini kɑ ize hɛi, ɑ̀ gɑɑ no bɑndɑ yom hunu. Bɑndɑ yom di hunu no zɑngɑ bɛɛnɛ hɑndɑriyɑize yom, zɑngɑ tɛku mee gɑɑ tɑɑsi kɑ ǹ si kɑbu.
58011013	Nɑɑne kunɑ no ǹ kulu bu. Ǹ mɑnɑ du hɛ yom kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɔne ɑlikɑwɑli tɛ ǹ sɛ ɑmmɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ hunne hɑli jinɑ. Ǹ nɑ ǹ kube. Ǹ cii ndɑ mee ngei yɑ yɑ yom no, ngei yɑ ceeyo yom no hɑndunyɑ bɔm.
58011014	Beerem kɑ ǹ go sendi zɑngɑ yɑ, ǹ go cɛbɛ tɛrɛkpɑrɛ kɑ lɑɑbu fɔ no ngei go ceeci.
58011015	De ǹ lɑsɑbu ndɑ lɑɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ǹ hunu, dɑm ǹ bɑ du fɔndɔ kɑ bɛrɛ kɑ ye nodi.
58011016	Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ ǹ go guuri lɑɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ boori kɑ bisɑ ngɑ di. Ngɑ yɑ ci bɛɛnɛ. À sɛ nɑ Ikpɛ mɑnɑ hɑwi tɛ ndei ǹ mɑ ngɑ cɛɛ ngei ŋmɔne Ikpɛ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ wɑngɑrɑ fɔ sɔlu ǹ sɛ.
58011017	Nɑɑne gɑɑ nɑ Abulɛmɑ nɑ Isɑɑkɑ sɑrɑɑ Ikpɛ sɛ sɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ bubure. Abulɛmɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli yom tɛ, ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ koo fɔlɔnku sɑrɑɑ zɑngɑ gɑrɑndi hɛ.
58011018	Ikpɛ cii Abulɛmɑ sɛ: "Isɑɑkɑ gɑɑ no, n bɑndɑ kɑɑ hunu".
58011019	Abulɛmɑ lɑsɑbu kɑ Ikpɛ gundɑ dɑbɑri kɑ Isɑɑkɑ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme. À sɛ nɑ deedɑndi ngɑ di gɑɑ Abulɛmɑ ye kɑ du ngɑ koo.
58011020	Nɑɑne gɑɑ nɑ, Isɑɑkɑ nɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm Yɑkɔfu ndɑ Esɑu gɑɑ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ go kɑɑ.
58011021	Nɑɑne gɑɑ nɑ, sɑɑ kɑ Yɑkɔfu bɑ bu, ɑ̀ nɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm Yosɛfu koo hɑibɔrɔ hinkɑ kulu gɑɑ. À nɑ goobu nɑɑni ko kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi.
58011022	Nɑɑne gɑɑ nɑ, sɑɑ kɑ Yosɛfu bɑ bu, ɑ̀ sendi Isirɑilɑ ize yom bɔm ǹ mɑ hunu Eziputu lɑɑbu. À nɑ ǹ nɑ mei kɑ simbɑ ndɑ ngɑ biri yom.
58011023	Nɑɑne gɑɑ nɑ, sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ Moisi hɛi, ɑ̀ nyɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑbɑ nɑ ɑ̀ tugu kɑlɑ hɑndu hinzɑ zɑmɑ ǹ di izecire booriyɑm. Ǹ mɑnɑ hɑmburu gɑndɑkpɛ fɔndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ no.
58011024	Nɑɑne gɑɑ nɑ, sɑɑ kɑ Moisi tɔ bɔrɔ, ɑ̀ hungu ǹ mɑ ngɑ cɛɛ Fɑrɑɔ koo hundiyo koo.
58011025	Moisi suubɑ ǹ mɑ ngɑ guruguzɑndi Ikpɛ jɑmɑ bɑndɑ kɑ bisɑ ngɑ mɑ dulum fɑrinmɑɑ bɑndɑ fɔ.
58011026	Moisi nɑ yɑnce gunɑ Mɛsiyɑ sɑbu sɛ zɑngɑ hɑibɑrikɑ kɑ ɑ̀ beeri kɑ bisɑ Eziputu lɑɑbu hɑibɑrikɑ. Ngɑ di tɛ no zɑmɑ Moisi moo goono Ikpɛ bɑnɑndi gɑɑ.
58011027	Nɑɑne gɑɑ no Moisi hunu Eziputu lɑɑbu. À mɑnɑ hɑmburu Eziputu gɑndɑkpɛ bine futu mo. Ammɑ ɑ̀ cɛ ndɑ gɑɑbi zɑmɑ ɑ̀ go di Bɔrɔ kɑ moo si di.
58011028	Nɑɑne gɑɑ no, Moisi nɑ Bɔmdɑɑrum jingɑru tɛ. À nɑ kuri seesee hɑli hɑlɑcikɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ koo hɑibɔrɔ sintine yom hɑlɑci mɑ si kɑmbɛ dɛcɛ Isirɑilɑ ŋmɔne yom gɑɑ.
58011029	Nɑɑne gɑɑ no, ǹ nɑ Tɛku Ciire dem zɑngɑ nungu kɔgɔ. Ammɑ Eziputu ize yom kɑ ǹ bɑɑ ngei mɑ dem, tɛkuɑ nɑ ǹ ŋmɑɑ.
58011030	Nɑɑne gɑɑ nɑ, Yeriko wɑngɑrɑ yɛmbɛ yom kɑm sɑɑ kɑ Isirɑilɑ ize yom nɑ ɑ̀ hundi hɑli jiribi iye.
58011031	Nɑɑne gɑɑ no Lɑhɑbu weikuru fɔ mɑnɑ hɑlɑci ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ hungu Ikpɛ, zɑmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ceekpɛrɛtɑɑsi yom kube ndɑ bɑɑni.
58011032	Ifɔ yɑ cii kpɛɛnɛ? Lɔkɑci gɑziɑ kɑ yɑ Gideyɔ ndɑ Bɑrɑkɑ ndɑ Sɑmsɔ ndɑ Yɛfɛtɑ ndɑ Dɑfidi ndɑ Sɑmuɛli ndɑ ɑndebi yom bɑɑru cii.
58011033	Nɑɑne gɑɑ nɑ, ǹ nɑ gbei wɔne yom tɛ. Ǹ gɑɑŋmɑɑ kpetɛrɛ yom bɔm. Ǹ nɑ cɛyom susu gbei tɛ. Ǹ du hɛ yom kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ ɑlikɑwɑli tɛ ǹ sɛ. Ǹ nɑ muusu beeri yom mee yom dɑɑbu.
58011034	Ǹ nɑ nini dɑbɑri wi. Ǹ kɔmɑ tɑkubɑ meekɑɑnɔkpɛ kɑmbɛ. Bɑ kɑ hinɑbunu yom nɑ, ǹ du gɑɑbi. Ǹ gundɑ gɑɑbi wɑngu kunɑ. Ǹ nɑ yo wɑngɑri kuru yom gɑɑrɛ kɑlɑ ǹ zuuru.
58011035	Weibɔrɔ fɔ yom du ngei bukɔ yom kɑ ǹ tunu kpɛɛnɛ. Ammɑ ɑfɔ yom bu bɔnɛ futu kunɑ zɑmɑ ǹ mɑnɑ tu ǹ mɑ kɔmɑ bɔnɛ di kunɑ hɑli ǹ mɑ du tunɑndiyom kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ wɔne.
58011036	Ǹ dondɑ ɑfɔ yom mo kpɛɛnɛ. Ǹ nɑ ǹ bulɑɑlɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑfɔ yom hɔ ndɑ seseri yom kɑ dɑm kɑsu.
58011037	Ǹ nɑ cetu ndɑ tɑndi yom kɑ wi. Ǹ nɑ ɑfɔ yom dumbu ihinkɑ ndɑ gɑrize. Ǹ nɑ ǹ sui. Ǹ nɑ ǹ wi ndɑ tɑkubɑ. Ǹ kpei nee, ǹ ye nee ndɑ hɑncine ndɑ feeji kuru bɛntɛ. Ǹ go bɑnji kunɑ. Ǹ nɑ ǹ guruguzɑndi. Ǹ nɑ ǹ tɑɑbɑndi.
58011038	Ammɑ hɑndunyɑ mɑnɑ tɔ beerem di fɑ. Ǹ tɛ ceeyo yom gɑnji yom kunɑ ndɑ tondi kuku yom bɔm. Ǹ gɔrɔ gɔlɔ yom kunɑ ndɑ guusu yom kunɑ.
58011039	Beerem wɔ kulu, bɑ kɑ ǹ du sɛdɑ hinno nɑɑne dɔ, ǹ mɑnɑ du ɑlikɑwɑli tɔnɑndiyom.
58011040	Ikpɛ bine nɑ hɛ fɔ hinno jisi i sɛ hɑli ǹ mɑ si ci tɔɑntɛ yom, i si ǹ bɑndɑ.
58012001	Ngɑ di sɛ, zɑ kɑ sɛdɑ mɑrgɑ bɑkɑrɑ goono ko kɑ i hundi, i mɑ jɛrɔ timɔ kulu furu ndɑ dulum kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ i kɑlikɑli fɑɑlɑ fɑɑlɑ. I mɑ zuure kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm i jine tɛ ndɑ himmɑ.
58012002	I mɑ moo sinji Yesu gɑɑ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci i nɑɑne ŋmɔne bɔm ndɑ ɑ̀ tɔnɑndikɔ. Binekɑɑne kɑ Ikpɛ jisi Yesu jine sɑbu sɛ ɑ̀ nɑ tɑɑbi hɑm bundu gɑɑrɑntɛ gɑɑ. À mɑnɑ gunɑ kɑ bu zɑngɑ yɑ di, hɑwi no. À gɔrɔ mo Ikpɛ kɑrigɑ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ.
58012003	Wom mɑ lɑsɑbu ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ suuru ndɑ dulumkoni yom gɑɑbɑ kɑ ǹ tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ, zɑmɑ wom bine yom mɑ si fɑrigɑ kɑ tɑm.
58012004	Wom mɑnɑ tɑngɑm hɑli kuri mɑ munu jinɑ kɑ guruje ndɑ dulum.
58012005	Wom dinigɑ himmɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ wom no zɑngɑ ɑ̀ ize yom kɑ cii: "A koo, n mɑ si dondɑ Kpe foorɑyom. N mɑ si zɑm himmɑ mo sɑɑ kɑ ɑ gɑ kɑ n kɔnkɔm.
58012006	Bɔrɔ kɑ Kpe go bɑɑ, ɑkpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ foorɑ. Ize yom kulu kɑ ɑ̀ tɑ, ngei no ɑ̀ sɔtɛ."
58012007	Wom mɑ suuru ndɑ Kpe foorɑyom. Ikpɛ go wom dii no zɑngɑ ngɑ ize yom. Bɑɑbɑ go kɑ ngɑ kɑɑ foorɑ. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
58012008	Ammɑ de wom mɑnɑ du foorɑyom zɑngɑ koo kulu du, wom tɛ zinɑ ize yom noyɑ. Wom mɑnɑ ci Ikpɛ ize cimi cimi yom.
