58012009	Zɑti i gundɑ bɑɑbɑ yom kɑ ǹ nɑ i hɛi, ǹ nɑ i foorɑ. I bine nɑ ǹ dɑm. Hɑli yɑ mo i Bɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ̀ himɑ i mɑ i bɔm yeti gɑndɑ kɑ hunɑ.
58012010	Bɑndɑ fɔ nɑ, i bɑɑbɑ yom nɑ i foorɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ ǹ sɛ. Ammɑ Ikpɛ wɔ, ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ i foorɑ nɑ i hɑnfɑni sɛ zɑmɑ i mɑ du bɑ ɑ̀ hɑlɑɑlɑtɛrɛ kunɑ.
58012011	Cimi nɑ, foorɑyom kulu sintine, ɑ̀ himɑ nɑ zɑngɑ binesɛrɛ hɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci binekɑɑne hɛ. Ammɑ kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ gɑɑ, foorɑyom ngɑ di kɑɑndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne bɑrikɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci cɛyom susu beerem kɑ ǹ go dendeni ɑ̀ dɔ sɛ.
58012012	À sɛ no, wom kɑmbɛ yom kɑ ǹ fɑrigɑ ndɑ wom cɛnjɛ hinɑbunu yom, wom mɑ gɑɑbi dɑm ǹ gɑɑ.
58012013	Wom mo fɔndɔ cɛɑntɛ yom tɛ wom cee yom sɛ zɑmɑ cee kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ sumbɑru, ɑ̀ mɑ si du kɑ gbeeri ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ du bɑɑni.
58012014	Wom mo lɑɑkɑli kɑne hɑmine bɔrɔ kulu gɑme. Wɑ hɑlɑɑlɑtɛrɛ hɑmine mɑ wɔ kɑ de ɑ̀ si, bɔrɔ fɔ kulu si di Kpe.
58012015	Wom mo lɑɑkɑli bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ si gɑziɑ Ikpɛ gomini gɑɑ. De ɑ̀ nɑ ci yɑ, kɑɑji hɔɔtɔ kɑɑ zei wom bine yom kunɑ kɑ wom kɑnkɑm. À gɑɑ no ɑ̀ kɑɑ bɔrɔ boobo ziibɑndi.
58012016	Wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli zinɑteeri mɑ si goono wom gɑme wɑlɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si kɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ zɑngɑ Esɑu. Esɑu wɔ nɑ ngɑ dɑudutɛrɛ neerɑ ŋmɑɑri combu fɔ sɛ.
58012017	Wom bei kɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ Esɑu bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ du bɑrikɑ di. Ǹ mɑnɑ tu ɑ̀ sɛ, zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hini kɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ bɛrɛ, bɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ tuubi ceeci ndɑ hɛni.
58012018	Wom mɑnɑ mɑɑni tondi kukuɑ gɑɑ kɑ bɔrɔ hini kɑ hɑmɑ, tondɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go dii. Wom mɑnɑ mɑɑni kube gɑɑ ndɑ kube bi ndɑ hɛo futu gɑɑ.
58012019	Wom mɑnɑ mɑɑni kuluu hɛni gɑɑ. Wom mɑnɑ mɑɑni jinde kɑ ɑ̀ sendi gɑɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ beerem mɑɑ rɑ, ǹ ŋmɑɑrɛ jinde di mɑ si sendi ngei sɛ kpɛɛnɛ.
58012020	Ǹ mɑnɑ hini kɑ meire wɔne jɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ cii: "Bɑ de gɑnjihɑm yɑ lɑmbɑ tɑndi kuku di gɑɑ, ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ cetu ndɑ tondi wɑlɑ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ biri."
58012021	Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ di futu kɑlɑ ɑ̀ tɔ Moisi cii: "A hɑmburu kɑlɑ ɑ go gɑsi."
58012022	Wom mɑnɑ kɑɑ tɑndi kuku di dɔ ɑmmɑ wom mɑɑni Sionɑ tondi kuku dɔ. Wom mɑɑni Ikpɛ Hundikpɛ wɑngɑrɑ mo kɑ ɑ̀ ci Yerusɑlɛm bɛɛnɛ ŋmɔne ndɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize bɑkɑrɑ fɑihã bɑtu dɔ.
58012023	Wom mɑɑni Ize sintine mɑrgɑ gɑɑ, nge yom kɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ mɑɑ yom hɑntum bɛɛnɛ kunɑ. Wom mɑɑni Ikpɛ gɑɑ, Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci hɛ kulu ciitikɔ. Wom mɑɑni bɔrɔ yom kɑ ǹ ci cɛɑntɛ susu yom, nge yom kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ tɔɑndi.
58012024	Wom mɑɑni Yesu gɑɑ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci sɑsɑbɑndikɔ ɑlikɑwɑli teji ŋmɔne. Wom mɑɑni Yesu kuri seeseeyom dɔ mo, kuri seeseeyom kɑ ɑ̀ go sendi hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ boori kɑ bisɑ Abɛli sɑrɑɑ ŋmɔne.
58012025	Wom mo lɑɑkɑli fɑ. Wom mɑ si hungu kɑ mɑɑ Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ sendi sɛ. Beerem kɑ ǹ hungu kɑ hɑngɑ dɑm ɑ̀ sɛ, Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ kɑɑbɑɑru. Ǹ mɑnɑ kɔmɑ. Hɑli yɑ mo i yom. I si hini kɑ kɔmɑ de i nɑ bɑndɑ bɛrɛ ɑ̀ sɛ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go sendi i sɛ zɑ bɛɛnɛ.
58012026	À jindɑ yɑ nɑ gɑndɑ zinji. Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ ngɑ yɑ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli wɔ tɛ kɑ cii: "Ce fɔ kpɛɛnɛ, ɑ kɑɑ zinjiyom tɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci gɑndɑ hinne ɑmmɑ bɛɛnɛ mo."
58012027	Sendi gureyom wɔ mo kɑ ɑ̀ cii, ce fɔ kpɛɛnɛ, ɑ̀ go cɛbɛ kɑ tɑkɑhɛ kulu Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ zinji ɑ̀ mɑ bisɑ. À gɑ ɑ̀ tɛ hɑli hɛ yom kɑ Ikpɛ si zinji mɑ du kɑ gɔrɔ.
58012028	À sɛ no, zɑ kɑ i du kpetɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ si zinji, i mo kɑ i sɑɑbuyom cɛbɛ. I mɑ ɑ̀ cɛbɛ ndɑ i gbei kɑ i go tɛ Ikpɛ sɛ hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑni ɑ̀ sɛ. I mɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ gɑnɑyom hinno ndɑ hɑmburu.
58012029	I ŋmɔne Ikpɛ mɑ, nini no kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ŋmɑɑ kɑ tusu.
58013001	Wom mo gundɑ nyɑizetɛrɛ bɑɑkɑsine.
58013002	Wom mɑ si dinigɑ yotɛrɛ tɑyom. Yɑ di tɛyom gɑɑ, bɔrɔ fɔ yom mɑnɑ bei ǹ nɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom tɑ kɑ dɑm ngei hundi yom kunɑ.
58013003	Wom mɑ hɔngɔ kɑsuize yom zɑngɑ wom goono hɔɑntɛ ǹ bɑndɑ. Wɑ hɔngɔ mɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go kɑ ǹ guruguzɑndi, zɑngɑ wom goono gɑɑhɑm kunɑ.
58013004	Ǹ kulu mɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ hije sɛ. Hije dɑɑri mɑ si bɑrɑ ziibikpɛ. Beerem kɑ ǹ go bɛnɛbɛnɛ tɛ ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go zinɑ, Ikpɛ gɑ ǹ ciiti.
58013005	Wom mɑ si wom bɔm no nooru bɑɑkɑsine sɛ. Wom bine mo yee ndɑ hɛ kɑ wom gundɑ. Ikpɛ bumbum cii: "A si n nɑm pɑi. A si zuuru n gɑɑ pɑi."
58013006	Ngɑ di sɛ, i hini kɑ wɔne cii ndɑ yɑrutɛrɛ: "Kpe yɑ ci ɑ gɑɑkɔ, ɑ si hɑmburu. Ifɔ nɑ iburɑdɑm hini kɑ tɛ ɑ sɛ?"
58013007	Wom mo hɔngɔ wom jinɑ yom kɑ ǹ nɑ Ikpɛ Sendi fɛɛ wom sɛ. Wom mɑ hɔngɔ ǹ hɑndunyɑ gɔrɛ kɑ ǹ nɑɑne dimi dendeni.
58013008	Yesu yɑ ɑfɔlɔnku nɑ, bii ndɑ hunkunɑ. Yɑ mɑ no, ɑ̀ sindɑ beeniyom.
58013009	Wɑ si nɑm ǹ mɑ wom bine yom cendi nee hɛrɛ wɑlɑ yɑ hɛrɛ ndɑ cɛbɛ teji ŋmɑni ŋmɑni yom. À boori gomini mɑ bɔrɔ bine sinjɑndi, ɑ̀ mɑ si ci ŋmɑɑri kɑbiɑyom. Ŋmɑɑri kɑbiɑyom sɛ nɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom nɑ ngei bɔm no, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ tɛ ǹ sɛ hɑnfɑni.
58013010	I gundɑ gɑrɑndi bɑndɑ tɑndɑ kɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go gbei tɛ kuuru bukɑ kunɑ, ǹ sindɑ fɔndɔ ǹ mɑ ŋmɑɑ.
58013011	Memunu yom kɑ ǹ kuri gɑrɑndikɔ beerɑ cini kpeindɑ Nungu Hɑlɑɑlɑ ŋmɔne hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ dulum sɛ, dɛbɛrɛ bɑndɑ no ǹ cini memunu yom di tɔnu.
58013012	À sɛ no Yesu mo guruguze dɛbɛrɛ kɔrɔme bɑndɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ jɑmɑ hɑlɑɑlɑndi Ikpɛ sɛ ngɑ bumbum kuri dɔ.
58013013	Ngɑ di sɛ i mɑ hunu kɑ kpei ɑ̀ dɔ dɛbɛrɛ di bɑndɑ. I mɑ ɑ̀ hɑwi jɛrɛ.
58013014	Nee hɑndunyɑ wɔ kunɑ i sindɑ kpɑɑrɑ kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni, ɑmmɑ i go ceeci no wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑ kɑɑ.
58013015	À sɛ no i mo kɑ Ikpɛ sifɑ zɑngɑ sɑrɑɑ Yesu dɔ. Ngɑ di yɑ ci i mee sendi yom kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ i go sɑɑbuyom tɛ ɑ̀ mɑɑ sɛ.
58013016	Ammɑ wom mɑ si dinigɑ ihinno tɛyom ndɑ wom cɛrɛ ndɑ cɛrɛ gɑɑkɑsine zɑmɑ sɑrɑɑ wɔ dimi yɑ kɑɑni Ikpɛ sɛ.
58013017	Wom mo wom jinɑ yom gɑnɑ. Wom mo bɔm yeti gɑndɑ ǹ sɛ zɑmɑ ǹ go lɑɑkɑli ndɑ wom hundi yom. Jinɑ yom wɔ kɑɑ kpeindɑ ngei tɛgbei yom kɑ ǹ deede Ikpɛ sɛ. Wɑ nɑm ǹ mɑ du kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ binekɑɑne, ɑ̀ mɑ si ci ndɑ binesɛrɛ zɑmɑ ngɑ di si hɑnfɑni fɔ kulu tɛ wom sɛ.
58013018	Wom mɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ i sɛ. I gɑ bei siikɑ si i gundɑ bine kunɑ sendi hinno. I go bɑɑ i mɑ diro hinno tɛ hɛ kulu kunɑ.
58013019	Hɑli yɑ mɑ ɑ̀ gɑ wom ŋmɑɑrɛ ndɑ himmɑ wom mɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ i sɛ hɑli yɑ ye kɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ ndɑ wɑɑsi.
58013020	Ikpɛ Lɑɑkɑli Kɑnekpɛ nɑ i Kpe Yesu kɑ ɑ̀ ci feeji Kurukɔ Beeri tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme ɑlikɑwɑli kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni kuri dɔ.
58013021	Ikpɛ mɑ wom tɔɑndi hɛ hinno kulu sɛ wom mɑ ɑ̀ binebɑɑ tɛ. Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑni ɑ̀ sɛ ɑ̀ mɑ tɛ wom kunɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gɑɑ. Deizɑ mɑ ci Yesu Mɛsiyɑ ŋmɔne jiiri dubu ndɑ dubu yom. Ami.
58013022	Nyɑizei, ɑ go wom ŋmɑɑrɛ, wom mɑ himmɑ noyom sendi wɔ zɑɑ, zɑmɑ yɑ nɑ hɑntum wom sɛ iboobo.
58013023	Wom mɑ bei kɑ ǹ nɑ i nyɑize Timote tɑm. De ɑ̀ go kɑɑ subɑsi, ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ kɑ kɑɑ di wom.
58013024	Wom mɑ wom jinɑ yom kulu fɔɔ ndɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kulu. Itɑli lɑɑbu hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kulu mo go wom fɔɔ.
58013025	Gomini mo gɔrɔ wom kulu bɑndɑ. Ami.
59001001	Hɛɛ nɑ Yɑkɔfu, Ikpɛ tɑm. Hɛɛ yɑ ci Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ ŋmɔne mɑ. A gɑ tirɑ wɔ hɑntum wom dimi wei cindi hinkɑ sɛ, wom kɑ wom goono seeɑntɛ hɑndunyɑ kunɑ. A go wom fɔɔ.
59001002	A nyɑizei, sɑɑ kɑ tɑɑbi ŋmɑni ŋmɑni du wom, wom mɑ ɑ̀ lɑsɑbu binekɑɑne no kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ.
59001003	Wom mɑ bei kɑ wom nɑɑne bubureyom go kɑɑndɑ suuru.
59001004	Ammɑ wɑ nɑm suuru mɑ ngɑ gbei tɔnɑndi domi wom mɑ bɑrɑ tɔɑntɛ kɑ si zɑm hɛ fɔ kulu.
59001005	De wom kunɑ ɑfɔ zɑm hɑikusutɛrɛ, ɑ̀ mɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ Ikpɛ gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ bɔrɔ kulu nɑ ndɑ bɑyom. À si deeni mo. À gɑ ɑ̀ no ɑkpɛ sɛ.
59001006	Ammɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ ndɑ nɑɑne, siikɑ mɑ si. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ siikɑ, ɑ̀ himɑ nɑ zɑngɑ tɛku boosu yom kɑ hɛo go teeni ɑ̀ mɑ ɑ̀ fum nee hɛrɛ, ɑ̀ mɑ ɑ̀ fum yɑ hɛrɛ.
59001007	Bɔrɔ yɑ di dimi mɑ si tɑmmɑ ngɑ du hɛ fɔ Kpe dɔ.
59001008	À si du zɑmɑ binehinkɑkpɛ no kɑ ɑ̀ ci bɛrɛbɛrɛkpɛ ɑ̀ fɔndɔ yom kulu kunɑ.
59001009	Nyɑize tɑlikɑ mɑ fɑihã ndɑ ngɑ beeriyom.
59001010	Hɑibɑrikɑntɛ mo mɑ fɑihã ndɑ ngɑ cɛnɑndiyom zɑmɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ bisɑ nɑ zɑngɑ subu boosi.
59001011	Weenu go hunu ndɑ ngɑ hɛo dungɔ kɑ subu kɔgɑndi. À boosi mo kɑm. À boori tɑkɑri gɑ hɑlɑci. Yɑ no hɑibɑrikɑntɛ mo kɑɑ kɑm ɑ̀ murɑdu yom kunɑ.
59001012	Binekɑɑnekpɛ nɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ suuru tɑɑbi kunɑ, zɑmɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci tɑbɑntɛ suiyom gɑɑ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ du tukunsi fulɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci hundi ŋmɔne. Fulɑ di ɑlikɑwɑli no Ikpɛ tɛ ngɑ mɑ nɑ beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ gɑ bɑɑ ngɑ.
59001013	Sɑɑ kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ goono suiyom kunɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ si cii, Ikpɛ dɔ no suiyom hunu zɑmɑ ilɑlɔ si hini kɑ Ikpɛ sui. Ikpɛ bumbum mo si bɔrɔ sui.
59001014	Ammɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu goono suiyom kunɑ sɑɑ kɑ bɔrɔ bumbum bineibɑɑi nɑ ɑ̀ cendi kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm kuse.
59001015	À gɑɑ no, bineibɑɑi kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ gunde ɑ̀ go dulum hɛi. Dulum mo kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ, ɑ̀ go kɑɑndɑ bu.
59001016	A nyɑize binebɑɑkɔ yom, wɑ si wom bɔm dɛrɑndi.
59001017	Noyom hinno kulu ndɑ noyom tɔɑntɛ kulu gɑ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ Ikpɛ dɔ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci kɑɑri yom Bɑɑbɑ. Ikpɛ dɔ bɛrɛyom si, bicire si bɛrɛ.
59001018	À nɑ i hɛi iteji ɑ̀ bumbum binebɑɑ bɔm ɑ̀ cimi Sendi gɑɑ domi i mɑ bɑrɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ tɑkɑhɛ yom ŋmɔne sintine.
59001019	Yɑ no ɑ nyɑize binebɑɑkɔ yom, kɑlɑ bɔrɔ kulu mɑ wɑɑsu kɑ hɑngɑ dɑm. À mɑ si wɑɑsu ndɑ sendi ciiyom. À mɑ si wɑɑsu mɑ ndɑ binetɔnɛ.
59001020	Bɔrɔ binetɔnɛ si Ikpɛ cɛyom susu gbei tɛ.
59001021	À sɛ no, wom mɑ ziibi kulu ndɑ cɛmbɛrɛ cɛmbɛrɛ kulu nɑm. Wom mɑ Sendi kɑ Ikpɛ dɑm wom bine yom kunɑ tɑ ndɑ bɑɑniyom. Sendi ngɑ di hini kɑ wom hundi yom fɑɑbɑ.
59001022	Ammɑ wom mɑ Sendi di dɑm tɛyom kunɑ. Wɑ si wom bɔm nɑ hɑngɑ dɑmyom hinne sɛ kɑ wom bɔm zɑmbɑ.
59001023	De bɔrɔ nɑ hɑngɑ dɑm Sendɑ sɛ ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ dɑm tɛyom kunɑ, ɑ̀ himɑ nɑ zɑngɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ngɑ moodumɑ tɑkɑri gunɑ diji kunɑ.
59001024	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɔm gunɑ kɑ beeni, ɑ̀ bisɑ. Mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ dinigɑ zɑngɑ ngɑ moodumɑ bɑrɑ.
59001025	Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ moo dɑm Ikpɛ fɔndɔ tɔɑntɛ gɑɑ, fɔndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑndɑ bɔrɔcinitɛrɛ, ɑ̀ mɑ si ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hɑngɑ dɑm kɑ dinigɑ. Kɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ̀ dɑm tɛyom kunɑ. Akpɛ wɔ binekɑɑnekpɛ no ɑ̀ gbei yom kunɑ.
59001026	De wom gɑme kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ tɑmmɑ ngɑ yɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑkɔ no, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ si hini ngɑ mee, ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ ngɑ bɔm zɑmbɑ. Bɔrɔ ngɑ di wɔ, ɑ̀ gɑnɑyom ci kɔnu.
59001027	Gɑnɑyom hinno kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ ziibi i Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ jine yɑ ci bɔrɔ mɑ kɔyɔ yom ndɑ weibɔrɔ sokoni yom kunfɑ ǹ tɑɑbi kunɑ. À mɑ ngɑ bɔm jɛ mɑ hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ si hurɑ hɑndunyɑ ziibi kulu kunɑ.
59002001	A nyɑize yom, wɑ si nɑɑne kɑ wom gundɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ deizɑkpɛ gɑɑ tɛ ndɑ bɑɑbɑɑ.
59002002	Zɑngɑ sendi, bɔrɔ fɔ hurɑ wom mɑrgɑ kunɑ ndɑ wurɑ kɔlɔbɛ yom ndɑ jiine hinnɑ. Alifukɑru fɔ mɑ hurɑ ndɑ zɑrɑzɑrɑ ziibɔ.
59002003	Cɔfɔ wom nɑ wom moo yom sinji jiine hinno dɑmkɔ gɑɑ kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: Ni, n mɑ gɔrɔ nee gɔrɛ dɔ hinno wɔ bɔm. Wom cii ɑlifukɑru mo sɛ: Ni, n mɑ cɛ nodi wɑlɑ gɔrɔ ɑ cɛ dɛcɛyom dɔ wɔ bɔm.
59002004	Yɑ di gɑɑ, wom go bɑɑbɑɑ tɛ wom gɑme noyɑ hɑli wom bɑrɑ ciitikɔ yom kɑ ǹ gundɑ lɑsɑbu lɑlɔ yom. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
59002005	A nyɑize binebɑɑkɔ yom, wɑ hɑngɑ dɑm. Beerem kɑ hɑndunyɑ go lɑsɑbu tɑlikɑ yom, ngei nɑ Ikpɛ dɑm ǹ mɑ ci hɑizicɑntɛ yom nɑɑne kunɑ kɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ tubu. Kpetɛrɛ wɔ ŋmɔne ɑlikɑwɑli nɑ, Ikpɛ tɛ beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ go bɑɑ rɑ. À nɑ ci cimi nɑ bɑ?
59002006	Ammɑ wom wɔ, wom nɑ ɑlifukɑru fɛntɛ. Hɑibɑrikɑntɛ yom yɑ go wom kɑnkɑm kɑ wom cendi kɑ dɑm ciitiyom dɔ jine.
59002007	Ngei mo yɑ gɑ Mɑɑ bɛɛɛrɛkpɛ wɔ kɑ ǹ gɑ wom cɛɛ ndɑ cɛnɑndi. À nɑ ci cimi nɑ bɑ?
59002008	De wom go kɑ Ikpɛ fɔndɑ tɔnɑndi ndɑ cimi zɑngɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ gɑ cii: "n mɑ bɑɑ n gɔrɔkɑsine zɑngɑ n bɔm", wom go kɑ ihinno tɛ.
59002009	Ammɑ de wom go bɑɑbɑɑ tɛ wom gɑ dulum tɛ. À gɑɑ nɑ fɔndɑ gɑ wom zeeri zɑngɑ fɔndɑ dɑɑrumkɔ yom.
59002010	Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ fɔndɑ kulu gɑnɑ ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑfɔ hɑitɑ, ɑ̀ tɛ ǹ kulu hɑitɑkɔ.
59002011	Yɑ nɑ Ikpɛ cii: "N mɑ si zinɑ". À cii mo: "N mɑ si bɔrɔ wi". De bine n mɑnɑ zinɑ ɑmmɑ n nɑ bɔrɔ wi, n tɛ fɔndɑ dɑɑrumkɔ.
59002012	Wom mɑ sendi, wom mɑ tɛ mɑ zɑngɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ǹ bɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ciiti ndɑ fɔndɔ di kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑndɑ bɔrɔcinitɛrɛ.
59002013	Ciiti sindɑ suuji bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ suuji cɛbɛ sɛ. Suuji gɑ gɑɑŋmɑɑ ciiti bɔm.
59002014	A nyɑizei, de bɔrɔ fɔ cii ngɑ gundɑ nɑɑne ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ si nɑɑne di cɛbɛ gbei yom gɑɑ, ifɔ nɑ ɑ̀ hinsɑ bɔrɔ di sɛ? Nɑɑne ngɑ di hini kɑ ɑ̀ fɑɑbɑ bɑ?
59002015	Zɑngɑ sendi, de nyɑize fɔ, weibɔrɔ wɑlɑ hɑibɔrɔ gɑ bumbum, ŋmɑɑri mo nɑ ɑ̀ gɑziɑ hɑnu kulu.
59002016	Cɔfɔ wom kunɑ ɑfɔ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N mɑ kpei bɑɑni. N mɑ si mɑɑ yeeni. N mɑ kungu. Ammɑ wom mɑnɑ ɑ̀ no hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ himɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑhɑm, ifɔ nɑ ɑ̀ go hinsɑ?
59002017	Yɑ nɑ nɑɑne bɑrɑ ngɑ hinne. De nɑɑne sindɑ gbei yom, bukɔ no.
59002018	Ammɑ bɔrɔ fɔ mɑ cii: Ni, n gundɑ nɑɑne, hɛɛ mo ɑ gundɑ gbei yom. N mɑ ɑ cɛbɛ n nɑɑne, gbei yom si. Hɛɛ mo ɑ gbei yom gɑɑ, ɑ gɑ n cɛbɛ ɑ nɑɑne.
59002019	N gɑ tu cimi Ikpɛ ngɑ fɔ no? To. À boori. Ammɑ bɑ hɔllɛ yom mo go tu cimi, ǹ bine go gɑsi.
59002020	E bɔrɔ yɑmɔ, n bɑɑ n mɑ bei kɑ nɑɑne kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ gbei, kɔnu nɑ bɑ?
59002021	Ikpɛ nɑ i bɑɑbɑ Abulɛmɑ cɛɑndi susu gbei yom gɑɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ kɑɑ Isɑɑkɑ dɛcɛ bɑndɑ tɑndɑ bɔm. À nɑ ci cimi nɑ bɑ?
59002022	N di kɑ ɑ̀ nɑɑne go dirɑ nɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ gbei yom. À nɑɑne tɔ no ɑ̀ gbei yom gɑɑ.
59002023	À gɑɑ nɑ, Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ tɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cii: "Abulɛmɑ nɑɑne Ikpɛ. Ikpɛ mɑ nɑ ngɑ di lɑsɑbu ɑ̀ sɛ cɛɑndiyom susu." Ikpɛ nɑ Abulɛmɑ cɛɛ ngɑ kpɑɑsi.
59002024	Wom di kɑ gbei yom gɑɑ no Ikpɛ go bɔrɔ cɛɑndi susu, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci nɑɑne hinne gɑɑ.
59002025	Yɑ no Ikpɛ nɑ weikuru Lɑhɑbu cɛɑndi susu gbei yom gɑɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ beerem kɑ ǹ sɑmbɑ tɑ kɑ ǹ kɑɑ tɛrɛ ndɑ fɔndɔ ŋmɑni fɔ. À nɑ ci cimi nɑ bɑ?
59002026	Zɑngɑ gɑɑhɑm kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ hundi bukɔ no, yɑ no nɑɑne mo kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ gbei yom bukɔ no.
59003001	A nyɑizei, wom kunɑ bɔrɔ boobo mɑ si tɛ cɛbɛkɔ yom zɑ kɑ wom go bei i yom kɑ i go cɛbɛ tɛ i kɑɑ du ciiti kɑ ɑ̀ jɑɑsɑ ǹ kulu.
59003002	I kulu go hɑitɑ hɛ boobo kunɑ. De bɔrɔ fɔ mɑnɑ hɑitɑ sendi gɑɑ, ɑkpɛ wɔ tɔɑntɛ nɑ. À gundɑ hini ngɑ gɑɑhɑm kulu bɔm.
59003003	Wɑ gunɑ, i go ɑlinzom yom dɑm bɑri yom mee domi ǹ mɑ i gɑnɑ. I go kɑ ǹ gɑɑhɑm yom kulu bɛrɛ bɛrɛ mɑ.
59003004	Wɑ gunɑ, bɑ hɑrihi yom kɑ ǹ beeri, hɛo futu yom go kɑ ǹ fum ɑmmɑ filɑfili cɛnɑ pititi yɑ gɑ kɑ ǹ dɑm fɔndɔ zɑngɑ hɑrihikpɛ gɑ bɑɑ.
59003005	Yɑ nɑ dɛɛnɛ bɑrɑ hɛ fɔ cɛnɑ. À bine go fɑɑre hɛ beeri yom gɑɑ. Gunɑ zɑngɑ nini cɛnɑ gɑ hini kɑ gɑnji beeri kulu tɔnu.
59003006	Dɛɛnɛ bɑrɑ nɑ zɑngɑ nini. Hɛ lɑlɔ nungu no. Dɛɛnɛ goono i gɑɑhɑm dɔbu yom kunɑ kɑ gɑɑhɑm kulu sɑrɑ zɑngɑ nini kɑ i bɑhune mee ndɑ mee kulu tɔnu. Ngɑ bumbum mɑ ciiti beenɑntɛ ŋmɔne nini gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ diiɑndi.
59003007	Ǹ cini gɑnjihɑm dimi kulu ndɑ ciro yom ndɑ nɑrɑntɛ yom ndɑ tɛku hɑm yom foorɑ. Iburɑdɑm yom mo yɑ nɑ ǹ foorɑ.
59003008	Ammɑ dɛɛnɛ wɔ bɔrɔ si kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ ɑ̀ foorɑ. Dɛɛnɛ yɑ hɛ lɑlɔ nɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ ndɑ nɑji futu.
59003009	Ndɑ dɛɛnɛ no i go kɑ i Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu. Ndɑ dɛɛnɛ mo no i go iburɑdɑm yom lɑɑli, beerem kɑ Ikpɛ tɑkɑ ngɑ himɑndi bɔm.
59003010	Yɑ nɑ, mee fɔlɔnku kunɑ sɑɑbuyom ndɑ lɑɑliyom go hunu. A nyɑizei, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ himɑ ɑ̀ mɑ goono yɑ di.
59003011	Fɔci fɔlɔnku gɑɑ hɑri hinno ndɑ hɑri hɔɔtɔ hunu bɑ?
59003012	A nyɑizei, jee nyɑ hini kɑ hɛi olibe bɑ? Lɛzɛ̃ nyɑ hini kɑ jee hɛi bɑ? Yɑ no fɔci hɑri kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ciiri ciiri, ɑ̀ si hini kɑ tɛ hɑri kɑɑnɔ pɑi.
59003013	Wom kunɑ, mee nɑ hɑikusu? Mee no fɑhɑmkpɛ? À mɑ ngɑ gbei yom cɛbɛ gɔrɛ hinno gɑɑ bɑɑniyom kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu hɑikusutɛrɛ dɔ.
59003014	Ammɑ de wom gundɑ cɛnsɛ hɔɔtɔ ndɑ kɑkɔ wom bine yom kunɑ, wɑ si fɑɑre ko tɑngɑri cimi bɔm.
59003015	Hɑikusutɛrɛ ngɑ di mɑnɑ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ, gɑndɑ ŋmɔne nɑ, iburɑdɑm hɑɑli ŋmɔne no, Ibilisi ŋmɔne no.
59003016	Nungu kɑ cɛnsɛ ndɑ kɑkɔ bine goono, kɔsɔngu ndɑ gbei lɑlɔ dimi dimi kulu mo goono nodi.
59003017	Ammɑ hɑikusutɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu bɛɛnɛ sintine jinɑ ihinno no, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑnekpɛ nɑ. Boorikpɛ ndɑ bɑɑniyomkpɛ nɑ. À tɔ ndɑ suuji ndɑ gbei hinno yom. À sindɑ bɑɑbɑɑ. À sindɑ munɑficitɛrɛ.
59003018	Beerem kɑ ǹ go lɑɑkɑli kɑne ceeci, lɑɑkɑli kɑne kunɑ no ǹ go cɛɑndiyom susu bɑrikɑ wi.
59004001	Zɑ mɑni no wɑngu yom go hunu? Zɑ mɑni zoji go hunu kɑ kɑɑ wom kunɑ? Wom bineibɑɑi dɔ no ǹ go hunu kɑ tɑngɑm wom dɔbu yom kunɑ. À nɑ ci cimi no bɑ?
59004002	Wom go hini ɑmmɑ wom sindɑ. Wom go bɔrɔ wi, wom go cɛnsɛ. Wom bine si hini kɑ du ɑ̀. Wom go zogu, wom go wɑngu, ɑmmɑ wom sindɑ domi wom si ŋmɑɑrɛ.
59004003	Wom go ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑmmɑ wom si du zɑmɑ wom gɑ hɑitɑ nɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ kunɑ zɑmɑ wom mɑ wom bineibɑɑi tɔnɑndi.
59004004	Wom ci zɑngɑ zinɑteeri yom zɑmɑ wom go kpɑɑsitɛrɛ tɛ ndɑ hɑndunyɑ. Ngɑ yɑ ci ibɛrɛtɛrɛ ndɑ Ikpɛ. Wom go kɑ ngɑ di bei bɑ? Ngɑ di sɛ, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ tɛ hɑndunyɑ kpɑɑsi, ɑ̀ go kɑ ngɑ bɔm tɛ Ikpɛ ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ.
59004005	Wom tɑmmɑ sendi kɔnu nɑ bɑ kɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii, "Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono i kunɑ ɑ̀ cini guuri ndɑ cɛnsɛ wom sɑbu sɛ"?
59004006	Ammɑ Ikpɛ go gomini bɑmbɑtɑ no. À sɛ no, ɑ̀ go cii: "Ikpɛ hungu bɔmbɛɛrɛkpɛ yom ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ go gomini no bɔrɔ bɑɑnɔ yom sɛ."
59004007	Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ Ikpɛ sɛ. Wɑ hungu Ibilisi, ɑ̀ zuuru kɑ mooru wom.
59004008	Wɑ mɑɑni Ikpɛ, ngɑ mɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑni wom. Wɑ wom kɑmbɛ yom nyunu, dulumkoni yom. Wɑ wom bine yom hinnɑndi, wom binehinkɑkpɛ yom.
59004009	Wom bine yom mɑ sɑrɑ. Wɑ bɛrɛɛ tɛ. Wɑ hɛ. Wom hɑɑri mɑ ye bɛrɛɛ. Wom binekɑɑne mɑ ye binesɛrɛ.
59004010	Wɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ Kpe sɛ, ɑ̀ kɑɑ wom bɛɛrɑndi.
59004011	Nyɑizei, wɑ si cɛrɛ sendi yɑmu. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ngɑ nyɑize fɔ sendi yɑmu wɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ciiti, ɑ̀ go fɔndɑ sendi yɑmu. À go fɔndɑ ciiti mo. De bine n go fɔndɑ ciiti, n mɑnɑ ci fɔndɑ gɑnɑkɔ ɑmmɑ n tɛ ɑ̀ ciitikɔ.
59004012	Bɔrɔ fɔlɔnku yɑ ci fɔndɑ nokɔ. Ngɑ yɑ hini kɑ bɔrɔ fɑɑbɑ, ngɑ yɑ hini kɑ bɔrɔ hɑlɑci. Ammɑ ni, ni no mee kɑ n mɑ ciiti n gɔrɔkɑsine sɛ?
59004013	Mɑɑsɑnkulu ɑ kɑɑ wom gɑɑ, wom kɑ wom cini cii, hunkunɑ wɑlɑ subɑ i kpei kpɑɑrɑ wɔ, i jiiri fɔ tɛ nodi. I tenku, i du liibɑ.
59004014	Wom si bei hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ tɛ subɑ. Ifɔ yɑ ci wom hundi yom? Ǹ bɑrɑ no zɑngɑ dullu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hunu bɑndɑ fɔ, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ɑ̀ mɑ dɛrɛ.
59004015	Dom wɑ cii, de Ikpɛ bɑɑ, i hunɑ kɑ wɔne tɛ wɑlɑ wɔ.
59004016	Ammɑ mɑɑsɑ wom go wom bɔm bɛɛrɑndi wom fɑɑre kunɑ. Bɔm bɛɛrɑndiyom zɑngɑ yɑ, ilɑlɔ no.
59004017	Ngɑ di sɛ, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ ihinno bei ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ si kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ, ngɑ wɔ dɔ dulum no.
59005001	Mɑɑsɑnkulu ɑ kɑɑ wom gɑɑ, hɑibɑrikɑntɛ yom. Wɑ hɛ, wɑ wuuru bɔnɛ yom kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑɑ wom bɔm sɑbu sɛ.
59005002	Wom hɑibɑrikɑ yom fumbu. Nɑnɑbɑnu yom mo nɑ wom jiine yom ŋmɑɑ.
59005003	Wom wurɑ ndɑ wom ɑnzɛrɛfu kɛdiɑ nɑ ǹ dii. Kɛdiɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ dii, ɑ̀ kɑɑ tunu kɑ tɛ wom gɑɑ sɛdɑ kɑ wom gɑɑhɑm yom mo ŋmɑɑ zɑngɑ nini. Wom nɑ hɑibɑrikɑ meigu kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ jiribi yom kunɑ.
59005004	Wɑ gunɑ, gbeiteeri yom kɑ ǹ nɑ wom fɑri yom wi ǹ go hɛ bɑnɑndi kɑ wom hungu kɑ ǹ bɑnɑ sɑbu sɛ. Fɑriwikɔ yom di hɛni tɔ kɑlɑ Ikpɛ Kundɑkpɛ hɑngɑ dɔ.
59005005	Wom nɑ wom wɑtɛ tɛ hɑndunyɑ kɑɑne ndɑ fɑɑriŋmɑɑyom kunɑ. Wom nɑ wom bine yom kungɑndi zɑngɑ wiyom zɑɑri hine.
59005006	Wom nɑ bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu ciiti kɑ zeeri. Wom nɑ ɑ̀ wi, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hungu wom.
59005007	Ngɑ di sɛ nyɑizei, wɑ tɛ suurɑntɛ yom kɑlɑ Kpe kɑɑyom. Wɑ gunɑ hɑifɑri go kɑ ngɑ dumɑiize hɛiyom hinno bɑtu kɑ suuru ndɑ, kɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑ du sintine hɑri yom ndɑ kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ hɑri yom.
59005008	Wom mo, wɑ tɛ suurɑntɛ yom. Wɑ wom bine yom dɑhirɑndi domi Kpe kɑɑyom mɑɑni.
59005009	Nyɑizei, wɑ si gunu ndɑ cɛrɛ zɑmɑ Ikpɛ mɑ si wom ciiti kɑ zeeri. Wɑ di, Ciitikɔ go fuu mee.
59005010	A nyɑizei, ɑndebi yom kɑ ǹ sendi Kpe mɑɑ gɑɑ, wom mɑ ǹ tɑɑbi ndɑ ǹ suuru dendeni.
59005011	Wɑ gunɑ, i go cii binekɑɑnekpɛ yom no beerem kɑ ǹ go suuru tɑɑbi kunɑ. Wom mɑɑ Yobu suuru bɑɑru. Wom bine di hɛ kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ zɑmɑ Kpe tɔ no ndɑ sisibi ndɑ suuji.
59005012	Ammɑ ɑ nyɑizei, hɛ kulu sintine yɑ ci, wɑ si ze ndɑ bɛɛnɛ. Wɑ si ze ndɑ gɑndɑ. Wɑ si ze ndɑ zeyom dimi kulu. Ammɑ wom oò mɑ ci oò, wom ɑwo mɑ ci ɑwo domi wom mɑ si kɑɑ kɑm ciiti kunɑ.
59005013	Wom kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ goono tɑɑbi kunɑ bɑ? À mɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ. Bɔrɔ fɔ goono binekɑɑne kunɑ bɑ? À mɑ sɑɑbuyom betu tɛ.
59005014	Wom kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ sindɑ bɑɑni bɑ? À mɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom cɛɛ ǹ mɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ kɑ jii toli ɑ̀ bɔm Kpe mɑɑ gɑɑ.
59005015	Aduwɑ kɑ ǹ tɛ nɑɑne kunɑ zɛnjɛkom sɛ, ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ nɑ bɑɑni. Kpe gɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi. De ɑ̀ nɑ dulum yom tɛ mo, Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ yɑɑfɑ ndei.
59005016	Wɑ wom tɑɑli yom cii cɛrɛ sɛ. Wɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ cɛrɛ sɛ domi wom mɑ du bɑɑni. Bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu ɑduwɑ gundɑ dɑbɑri kɑlɑ kɑlɑ, ɑ̀ tɛ mo.
59005017	Eli yɑ bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ hɑɑli zɑngɑ i yom. À nɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ no ndɑ niyɑ hɑri mɑ si kɑm. Hɑri mɑnɑ kɑm mɑ hɑli jiiri hinzɑ ndɑ hɑndu idu.
59005018	À ye kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ kpɛɛnɛ, bɛɛnɛ hɑri kɑm. Gɑndɑ nɑ ngɑ hɑibɑrikɑ hɛi.
59005019	A nyɑizei, de wom kunɑ ɑfɔ kɑmbɑ cimi gɑɑ, bɔrɔ fɔ gɑ ɑ̀ yeti cimi di dɔ, ɑ̀ mɑ wɔne bei.
59005020	Bɔrɔ di kɑ ɑ̀ go dulumkoni yeti fɔndɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ ɑ̀ kɑmbɑ, ɑ̀ go dulumkoni di hundi fɑɑbɑ bu gɑɑ. À gɑ ɑ̀ dulum boobo mo dɑɑbu.
60001001	Hɛɛ Piɛɛ, hɛɛ yɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ diyɑ no. A go tirɑ wɔ hɑntum wom suubɑntɛ yom sɛ, wom kɑ wom kɑru kɑ see ko ci ceeyo yom dimi cindei lɑɑbu yom kunɑ. Wom kɑ wom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ yom goono Pontu lɑɑbu, ɑfɔ yom Gɑlɑte lɑɑbu, ɑfɔ yom Kɑpodoce lɑɑbu, ɑfɔ yom Azi lɑɑbu, ɑfɔ yom Bitiniɑ lɑɑbu.
60001002	Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ nɑ wom suubɑ ngɑ beiyom kɑ jisi bɔm. Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ nɑ wom hɑlɑɑlɑndi Ikpɛ sɛ. À nɑ wom suubɑ wom mɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ sendi gɑnɑ ko du hinnɑndiyom ɑ̀ kuri kɑkɑsuyom gɑɑ. Gomini ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne mɑ tɔntɔnu wom sɛ ndɑ bɑyom.
60001003	I mɑ Ikpɛ sɑɑbu, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ Bɑɑbɑ. À suuji beeri kunɑ i du hɛiyom teji bɛɛjɛ hundikoni sɛ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ tunɑndiyom bukɔei gɑme dɔ.
60001004	I mɑ du mo tubu kɑ ɑ̀ si sɑrɑ, kɑ ɑ̀ si ziibi, kɑ ɑ̀ si dɛrɛ. Ikpɛ nɑ tubu di jisi wom sɛ bɛɛnɛ kunɑ.
60001005	Ikpɛ dɑbɑri go wom bɑtu nɑɑne dɔ fɑɑbɑ sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sɔlu ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑtɛrɛ kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ lɔkɑci kunɑ.
60001006	Wom go fɑihã kɑlɑ kɑlɑ wɔne sɑbu sɛ, ndɑ ɑ̀ kulu kɑ mɑɑsɑ wom bine go sɑrɑ bɑndɑ fɔ ndɑ bubureyom dimi ŋmɑni ŋmɑni.
60001007	Nɑɑne kɑ wom gundɑ, ɑ̀ bubureyom bɛɛrɛ bisɑ wurɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hɑlɑci, kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm tɑɑbi zɑngɑ nini kunɑ kɑ gunɑ. À bubureyom wɔ mɑ kɑɑndɑ sɑɑbuyom ndɑ bɛɛrɛ ndɑ deizɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kɑɑyomtɛrɛ hine.
60001008	Wom go bɑɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ, bɑ kɑ wom mɑnɑ di ɑ̀. À kunɑ mo wom go fɑihã ndɑ binekɑɑne deizɑkpɛ kɑ mee si hini kɑ cii. Wom go kɑ ɑ̀ nɑɑne mɑ, bɑ kɑ wom si di ɑ̀.
60001009	Wom kɑɑ du wom hundi yom fɑɑbɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci hɛ kɑ wom nɑɑne gɑ gɑɑrɛ.
60001010	Fɑɑbɑ wɔ ɑndebi yom nɑ ɑ̀ ceeci kɑ ɑ̀ gunɑ ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ gomini kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ wom sɛ bɔm.
60001011	Ǹ ceeci kɑ bei zɑmɑni fɔ no wɑlɑ lɔkɑci fɔ no Mɛsiyɑ Biyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono ǹ kunɑ cɛbɛ. Biyɑ wɔ jinɑ kɑ tɛ sɛdɑ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ guruguze ndɑ deizɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑ guruguze bɑndɑ.
60001012	Ikpɛ bine nɑ wɔne kɑɑtɛrɛ ɑndebi yom sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci ǹ bɔm sɛ no ǹ nɑ ngei gbei tɛ, ɑmmɑ wom sɛ nɑ Mɑɑsɑ fɛɛkɔ yom nɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu tɛ wom sɛ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ gɑɑ, wɔ kɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔm zɑ bɛɛnɛ. Hɛ nge yom di kunɑ no, Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom go guuri ngei mɑ moo dɑm.
60001013	À sɛ no, zɑngɑ bɔrɔ gɑ ngɑ kunɑcendi hɔ gbei sɛ, zɑngɑ yɑ wɑ wom fɑhɑm sɔlu. Wɑ wom bɔm ci bɔrɔ. Wɑ wom bɛɛjɛ kulu dɛcɛ gomini bɔm, gomini kɑ Ikpɛ bɑ kɑɑndɑ wom sɛ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kɑɑyomtɛrɛ wɑtɛ.
60001014	Zɑngɑ koo yom go kɑ ngei bɑɑbɑ gɑnɑ, wɑ si wom bɔm no wom dom bineibɑɑi sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ wom gɔrɔ sɑɑ fɔ zɑm kɑ bei kunɑ.
60001015	Ammɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑkpɛ nɑ wom cɛɛ, wom mo wɑ bɑrɑ hɑlɑɑlɑ yom wom gɔrɛ kulu kunɑ.
60001016	Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Wɑ ci hɑlɑɑlɑ yom zɑmɑ hɛɛ yɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑkpɛ no".
60001017	Wom go kɑ Ikpɛ cɛɛ wom Bɑɑbɑ, Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ si ciiti ndɑ bɑɑbɑɑ tɛyom ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ go bɔrɔ kulu ciiti ɑ̀ gbei bɔm. À sɛ no wom mo wom hɑndunyɑ ceeyotɛrɛ tɛ ndɑ Ikpɛ hɑmbure.
60001018	Wom go bei mo zɑngɑ Ikpɛ nɑ wom fɑnsɑ wom goonoyom kɔnu gɑɑ, goonoyom kɑ wom tubu wom cɛɛ yom dɔ. À mɑnɑ wom fɑnsɑ ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ hɑlɑci zɑngɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu wɑlɑ wurɑ.
60001019	Ammɑ ɑ̀ nɑ wom fɑnsɑ no ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ kuri bɛɛrɛkpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ himɑ zɑngɑ feejiize kuri, feejiize kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ mɛrɛyom dɔ, ɑ̀ sindɑ tombi bɑ nungu fɔ.
60001020	Ikpɛ yɑ nɑ Mɛsiyɑ suubɑ zɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hɑndunyɑ sinji, ɑmmɑ wom sɑbu sɛ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ wom sɛ lɔkɑci beenɑntɛ yom.
60001021	À dɔ nɑ, wom go nɑɑne Ikpɛ gɑɑ. Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme kɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ hɑli wom nɑɑne ndɑ wom bɛɛjɛ mɑ gɔrɔ Ikpɛ bɔm.
60001022	Wom nɑ wom hundi yom hinnɑndi cimi gɑnɑyom gɑɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ dɔ hɑli wom mɑ du bɑɑkɑsine nyɑizei sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ munɑficitɛrɛ. À sɛ no wɑ bɑɑ cɛrɛ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ ndɑ bine fɔ.
60001023	Ǹ nɑ wom hɛi iteji, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci dimiize kɑ ɑ̀ sɑrɑ gɑɑ ɑmmɑ dimiize kɑ ɑ̀ si sɑrɑ gɑɑ. Dimiize di yɑ ci Ikpɛ Sendi hundikoni kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ beeniyom.
60001024	Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Iburɑdɑm kulu goono no zɑngɑ subu. Iburɑdɑm deizɑ kulu mo goono zɑngɑ subu boosi. Subu kɔgu, boosi mo kɑm.
60001025	Ammɑ Kpe Sendi wɔ, ɑ̀ bo goono no, ɑ̀ sindɑ beeniyom." Ngɑ di yɑ ci Bɑɑru Hinno Sendɑ kɑ i nɑ wom wɑɑzu ndɑ.
60002001	Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ fee ndɑ cɛmbɛrɛ cɛmbɛrɛ kulu ndɑ gulinci kulu ndɑ munɑficitɛrɛ ndɑ molɑgɑ ndɑ sendi yɑmɔ yom kulu.
60002002	Zɑngɑ izecire yom gɑ bɑɑ woo, wom mɑ bɑɑ Ikpɛ Sendi zɑngɑ woo hinno hɑli wom mɑ du kɑ beeri.
60002003	Wom mɑ bɑɑ rɑ zɑngɑ yɑ zɑ kɑ "wom tɑbɑɑ kɑ Kpe yɑ Gominikpɛ no".
60002004	Wom go kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci tɑndi hundikoni. Dɑhiri beerem hunguɑ̀ ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ ci suubɑni, bɛɛrɛkpɛ no Ikpɛ jine.
60002005	Wom mo wom bɑrɑ zɑngɑ tɑndi hundikoni yom kɑ Ikpɛ go cini ndɑ. À go fuu cini zɑngɑ Biyɑ kunɑ ŋmɔne hɑli wom mɑ ci jɑmɑ gɑrɑndikɔ hɑlɑɑlɑ yom. Wom mɑ sɑrɑɑ Biyɑ kunɑ ŋmɔne yom tɛ mo kɑ Ikpɛ gɑ ǹ tɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ.
60002006	À gɑɑ nɑ, ǹ cii Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ kunɑ: "Gunɑ, ɑ go mimbɑri cire tɑndi sinji Sionɑ kunɑ. Tɑndi suubɑntɛ, bɛɛrɛkpɛ nɑ. Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go nɑɑne ɑ̀ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ si hɔɔ pɑi."
60002007	À sɛ nɑ, tondi hundikoni di gundɑ bɛɛrɛ wom dɔ, wom kɑ wom go nɑɑne. Ammɑ beerem kɑ ǹ hungu kɑ nɑɑne, ngɑ yɑ ci "tondi kɑ cinikɔ yom hungu, ngɑ yɑ tɛ mimbɑri cire tondi sintine".
60002008	À cii kpɛɛnɛ: "Kɑtiyom tondi ndɑ dɛrɛyom tondi beeri mo no". Ǹ go kɑti ɑ̀ gɑɑ zɑmɑ ǹ mɑnɑ Sendi di gɑnɑ. Ǹ sɛ nɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ di jisi.
60002009	Ammɑ wom wɔ, wom yɑ dimi suubɑntɛ no. Wom yɑ Kpe ŋmɔne jɑmɑ sɑrɑɑ tɛkɔ yom no. Wom yɑ dimi hɑlɑɑlɑ nɑ. Wom yɑ ci jɑmɑ kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ ngɑ ŋmɔne. I ci yɑ zɑmɑ Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ wom cɛɛ kɑ kɑɑ kube kunɑ kɑ wom dɑm ngɑ kɑɑri hinno kunɑ, wom mɑ ɑ̀ hɑnyɑ hinno fɛɛ.
60002010	Sɑɑ di wom mɑnɑ ci jɑmɑ, ɑmmɑ mɑɑsɑ wom ci Ikpɛ ŋmɔne jɑmɑ. Wom mɑnɑ du suuji dom, ɑmmɑ mɑɑsɑ wom du suuji.
60002011	A binebɑɑkɔ yom, ɑ go wom no himmɑ wom kɑ wom ci ceeyo yom, yo yom hɑndunyɑ kunɑ. Wom mɑ fee ndɑ bineibɑɑi hɛ yom kɑ go gɑɑbɑ ndɑ hundi.
60002012	Wom mɑ gundɑ gɔrɛ hinno dimi cindei kunɑ. Hɛ kulu kunɑ kɑ ǹ gɑ wom ciine ndɑ bɔrɔlɑlɔtɛrɛ, ǹ mɑ di wom gbei hinno yom. Cɔfɔ ǹ mɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi hɑnu kɑ Ikpɛ gɑ ngɑ suuji cɛbɛ ǹ sɛ.
60002013	Kpe sɑbu sɛ, wom mɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ iburɑdɑm yom ŋmɔne hini kulu sɛ zɑngɑ gɑndɑkpɛ sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ goono hɛ kulu bɔm.
60002014	Wɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ mɑ gɑɑbikoni yom sɛ kɑ ǹ ci beerem kɑ gɑndɑkpɛ cini dɔntɔm ǹ mɑ wɔ kɑ yom go hɛ lɑlɔ tɛ tɑɑbɑndi kɑ ihinno tɛkɔ yom sɑɑbu.
60002015	Wɔne yɑ Ikpɛ binebɑɑ no. Wom mɑ ihinno tɛ. Wom mɑ sɑmu yom kɑ ǹ goono zɑm kɑ bei kunɑ sendi yom denjɑndi gbei hinno tɛyom gɑɑ.
60002016	Wɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ zɑngɑ bɔrɔcini yom. Wɑ si wom bɔrɔcinitɛrɛ tɛ zɑngɑ dɑɑbiri kɑ cɛmbɛrɛ cɛmbɛrɛ dɑɑbu, ɑmmɑ wɑ gɔrɔ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ tɑm yom.
60002017	Wɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ iburɑdɑm kulu sɛ. Wɑ bɑɑ nyɑizei. Wɑ hɑmburu Ikpɛ. Wɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ lɑɑbu gɑndɑkpɛ sɛ.
60002018	Gbeiize yom, wom mɑ ye gɑndɑ wom kpe yom sɛ hɑmburu kunɑ. Wɑ ɑ̀ tɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci kpe hinno yom sɛ wɑlɑ kpe bɑɑnɔ yom hinne sɛ ɑmmɑ ndɑ kpe gɑɑbɔ yom mo sɛ.
60002019	Ngɑ di yɑ sɑbɑ de bɔrɔ go tɑɑbi jɛrɛ bine kunɑ sendi sɑbu sɛ Ikpɛ jine, ɑ̀ nɑ ci ɑ̀ tɑɑli sɑbu sɛ.
60002020	Bɛɛrɛ fɔ yɑ goono de wom tɑɑli sɑbu sɛ ǹ gɑ wom lunkutɛ, wom gɑ hini suuru? Ammɑ de wom go hini suuru tɑɑbi kunɑ ihinno kɑ wom go tɛ sɑbu sɛ, ngɑ yɑ sɑbɑ Ikpɛ dɔ.
60002021	Ngɑ di sɛ nɑ, Ikpɛ nɑ wom cɛɛ zɑmɑ Mɛsiyɑ mo tɑɑbi i sɛ. À nɑ deedɑndi nɑm i sɛ kɑ wom mɑ ngɑ cee lɑwɑli yom gɑnɑ.
60002022	À mɑnɑ dulum fɔ kulu tɛ, ɑ̀ mee kunɑ mo gulinci sendi mɑnɑ hunu.
60002023	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ woo, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ woo kɑ bɑnɑ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɑɑbɑndi, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ tu ifutu. Ammɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɔm tɑlifi no Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go ciiti ndɑ cɛyom susu gɑɑ.
60002024	Ngɑ bumbum nɑ i dulum yom jɛrɛ ngɑ gɑɑhɑm kunɑ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑnji tuuri gɑɑ zɑmɑ i mɑ bu dulum yom sɛ kɑ hunɑ mo cɛyom susu sɛ. Wom du bɑɑni mo ɑ̀ bulɑɑlɑ mee yom gɑɑ.
60002025	Dom wom gɔrɔ bibirɑntɛ yom zɑngɑ feeji yom, ɑmmɑ mɑɑsɑ wom ye Kurukɔ dɔ, wom hundi yom Bɑtukɔ.
60003001	Yɑ nɑ wom mo wɛndɛ yom, wɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ wom kunye yom sɛ. Bɑ de ɑfɔ yom goono kɑ ǹ si Sendɑ bɛɛrɑndi, wom gɔrɛ gɑɑ bɑ mee sendi si, wom mɑ ǹ cendi.
60003002	Wom gɑ ǹ cendi sɑɑ kɑ ǹ di wom gɔrɛ hinno ndɑ wom bɔrɔ dɑmyom.
60003003	Wom tɑɑlɑm mo ɑ̀ mɑ si ci mɑɑ gɑɑ tɑɑlɑm zɑngɑ turu ndɑ wurɑ kɔlibɛ yom ndɑ jiine cɑɑdɑntɛ yom.
60003004	Ammɑ wom tɑɑlɑm mɑ ci bine kunɑ ŋmɔne. Ngɑ yɑ ci bine bɑɑnɔ ndɑ bine bɑɑni kɑ ɑ̀ si sɑrɑ. À gundɑ bɛɛrɛ mo Ikpɛ jine.
60003005	Dom di, wɛndɛ hɑlɑɑlɑ yom nɑɑne Ikpɛ gɑɑ kɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ ngei kunye yom sɛ. Yɑ nɑ ǹ gɔrɔ kɑ ngei bɔm tɑɑlɑm.
60003006	Zɑngɑ yɑ Sɑhɑrɑ nɑ Abulɛmɑ sendi gɑnɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛ kpe. Sɑhɑrɑ gɑɑ bine no wom weibɔrɔ yom, wom hunu kɑ tɛ koo weibɔrɔ yom ko kɑ ihinno tɛ. Hɑmburu fɔ kulu mɑ si wom dii kɑ wom lɑɑkɑli tunɑndi.
60003007	Yɑ no wom mo kunye yom, wɑ gɔrɔ ndɑ wom wɛndɛ yom ndɑ lɑɑkɑli ko fɑhɑm ǹ sindɑ gɑɑbi zɑngɑ hɑibɔrɔ. Wom mo bɛɛrɛ tɛ ǹ sɛ zɑmɑ ngei mo go gomini kɑ ɑ̀ ci hundi tubu ndɑ wom mefɔ. Wom mɑ ngɑ di tɛ zɑmɑ hɛ fɔ kulu mɑ si du kɑ tɛ kpɛsɛrɛ wom ŋmɔne ɑduwɑ yom sɛ.
60003008	À bɑndɑ wom kulu, wɑ gundɑ lɑɑkɑli fɔlɔnku. Wɑ tɔ ndɑ sisibi cɛrɛ sɛ. Wɑ bɑɑkɑsine cɛbɛ nyɑizei sɛ. Wɑ ci suujɑntɛ yom, bɔrɔ bɑɑnɔ yom.
60003009	Wɑ si ilɑlɔ bɑnɑ ndɑ ilɑlɔ. Wɑ si woobi bɑndɑ ndɑ woobi. Ammɑ wɑ bɑrikɑ dɑm zɑmɑ ɑ̀ sɛ no Ikpɛ nɑ wom cɛɛ hɑli wom mɑ bɑrikɑ di tubu.
60003010	Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cii: "Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ bɑɑ ngɑ hundi kɑ bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ di hɑnu hinno yom, ɑ̀ mɑ ngɑ dɛɛnɛ jɛ ilɑlɔ gɑɑ. À mee mɑ mɑ si gulunci sendi yom cii.
60003011	À mɑ bɑndɑ bɛrɛ ilɑlɔ sɛ kɑ ihinno tɛ. À mɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne ceeci kɑ ɑ̀ hɑmine.
60003012	Bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu gɑɑ no Kpe moo goono. À hɑngɑ mo goono ǹ ŋmɔne ɑduwɑ yom gɑɑ. Ammɑ Kpe moodumɑ bɛrɛ kɑ hungu wɔ kɑ yom gɑ kɑ ilɑlɔ tɛ."
60003013	Mee bine yɑ go hɛ lɑlɔ tɛ wom sɛ de wom gundɑ ihinno tɛyom himmɑ?
60003014	Ammɑ bɑ de wom go tɑɑbi cɛyom susu gbei tɛyom sɑbu sɛ, wom ci bɑrikɑkpɛ yom. Wɑ si hɑmburu iburɑdɑm yom sendi futu yom. Wom lɑɑkɑli mɑ si tunu mo.
60003015	Wɑ Mɛsiyɑ hɑlɑɑlɑndi kɑ ɑ̀ ci Kpe wom bine yom kunɑ. Sɑɑ kulu wom mo goono sɔlɑntɛ mo kɑ tu kɑ yeti beerem kulu sɛ, nge yom kɑ ǹ gɑ wom hã bɛɛjɛ sɑbɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ goono wom kunɑ. Wom mɑ ngɑ di tɛ ndɑ bɑɑniyom ndɑ hɑmburu.
60003016	Wɑ gundɑ bine kunɑ sendi hinno mo. Yɑ no sɑɑ kɑ ǹ go wom ciine ndɑ bɔrɔlɑlɔtɛrɛ, beerem kɑ ǹ go wom gɔrɛ hinno kɑ wom gundɑ Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ sendi yɑmu, ɑkpɛ yom mɑ hɔɔ.
60003017	De Ikpɛ binebɑɑ no bɔrɔ mɑ tɑɑbi ihinno tɛyom sɛ, ɑ̀ bisɑ bɔrɔ mɑ tɑɑbi ilɑlɔ tɛyom sɛ.
60003018	Mɛsiyɑ mo bu ce fɔ pɑp dulum yom sɑbu sɛ. Ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Cɛsusukpɛ bu beerem kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ cɛsusu sɛ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ kpeindɑ i yom Ikpɛ dɔ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ wi gɑɑhɑm kunɑ ɑmmɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ nɑ ɑ̀ hunɑndi.
60003019	Biyɑ wɔ kunɑ no ɑ̀ kpei wɑɑzu biyɑ yom sɛ kɑ ǹ goono jisɑntɛ kɑsu kunɑ.
60003020	Beerem wɔ mɑnɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ dom sɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ gundɑ suuru kuku ko bɑtu Nowe wɑtɛ. Sɑɑ di no, Nowe go hɑrihi tɛ, wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ǹ nɑ bɔrɔ cɛnɑ fɔ, wɑtom bɔrɔ ɑhɑku, fɑɑbɑ hɑri kɑmbɛ.
60003021	Hɑri ngɑ di mirɑndiyom yɑɑse no kɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ go wom fɑɑbɑ. À mɑnɑ ci gɑɑhɑm hinnɑndiyom ziibi gɑɑ no, ɑmmɑ sɛdɑ no kɑ ɑ̀ hunu bine kunɑ sendi hinno gɑɑ Ikpɛ dɔ hɛrɛ. À go wom fɑɑbɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ tunuyom bukɔei dɔ.
60003022	À kpei bɛɛnɛ, ɑ̀ goono Ikpɛ kɑmbɛ ŋmɑɑ gɑɑ. Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ dɔntɔneize yom ndɑ hinikpɛ yom ndɑ dɑbɑrikpɛ yom kulu yeti gɑndɑ ɑ̀ cire.
60004001	Ngɑ di sɛ zɑ kɑ Mɛsiyɑ guruguze i sɛ gɑɑhɑm kunɑ, wom mo wɑ niyɑ fɔlɔnku hɔ wom gɑɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ guruguze gɑɑhɑm kunɑ, ɑkpɛ nɑ dulum nɑm.
60004002	À sɛ no, ɑ̀ gɑɑhɑm hundi kɑ ɑ̀ cindi kunɑ ɑ̀ mɑ si hunɑ kɑ iburɑdɑm bineibɑɑi gɑnɑ kpɛɛnɛ. Ammɑ ɑ̀ mɑ hunɑ kɑ Ikpɛ binebɑɑ tɛ.
60004003	À wɑsɑ i sɛ lɔkɑci kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ i gɔrɔ kɑ dimi cindei binebɑɑ tɛ. Dom i dirɑ hɑwizetɛrɛ kunɑ ndɑ bineibɑɑi ndɑ bɑji hɑm kɑ bugu ndɑ hɑnɑsuɑ ndɑ bɛnɛbɛnɛ yom ndɑ tooru gɑnɑyom kɑ Ikpɛ fɛntɛ.
60004004	Mɑɑsɑ mɑ beerem mɑmɑci ndɑ wom zɑmɑ wom si meigu ndei ko bɛnɛbɛnɛ tɛ kɑ bisɑ. Cɔfɔ ǹ go wom woo.
60004005	Beerem wɔ gɑ ngei tɛgbei yom deede Ikpɛ sɛ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sɔlu kɑ hundikoni yom ndɑ bukɔ yom ciiti.
60004006	À sɛ no ǹ nɑ Bɑɑru Hinno wɑɑzu tɛ beerem wɔ sɛ kɑ mɑɑsɑ ǹ bu, zɑmɑ ǹ mɑ du ciitiyom iburɑdɑm yom dɔ gɑɑhɑm kunɑ, ɑmmɑ ǹ mɑ hunɑ ngei biyɑ kunɑ Ikpɛ jine.
60004007	Bine hɛ kulu beeniyom mɑɑni. Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ wom bɔm ci bɔrɔ kɑ sɑɑle dɑm ɑduwɑ tɛyom gɑɑ.
60004008	Ammɑ ǹ kulu bɔm yɑ ci wɑ gundɑ cɛrɛ bɑɑkɑsine kɑlɑ kɑlɑ, zɑmɑ dulum boobo no bɑɑkɑsine gɑ dɑɑbu.
60004009	Wɑ yɑrɛ tɛ cɛrɛ sɛ, gunugunu mɑ si.
60004010	Zɑngɑ wom ŋmɔne ɑfɔ fɔ kulu du Ikpɛ noyom, wɑ ɑ̀ dɑm cɛrɛ gɑɑkɑsine kunɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ gomini dimi ŋmɑni ŋmɑni bɑndɑbɔrɔ hinno yom.
60004011	De bɔrɔ fɔ go sendi, ɑ̀ mɑ sendi ndɑ Ikpɛ meecine. De bɔrɔ fɔ gɑ tɑmtɛrɛ, ɑ̀ mɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ gɑɑbi kɑ Ikpɛ go kɑɑndɑ, hɑli ǹ mɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi hɛ kulu kunɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ. Ngɑ wɔ deizɑ ndɑ dɑbɑri mɑ goono ɑ̀ sɛ jiiri dubu ndɑ dubu yom. Ami.
60004012	A binebɑɑkɔ yom guruguze kɔnnɔ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ tɛ kɑ wom bubure, wɑ si nɑm ɑ̀ mɑ wom mɑmɑci.
60004013	Ammɑ zɑ kɑ wom gundɑ bɑ Mɛsiyɑ guruguze kunɑ, wɑ fɑihã zɑmɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ deizɑ kɑɑ hunutɛrɛ mo wom mɑ hurɑ fɑihã ndɑ munyɑ kunɑ.
60004014	De beerem nɑ wom yɑnce Mɛsiyɑ mɑɑ sɑbu sɛ, wom ci binekɑɑnekpɛ yom. Biyɑ deizɑkpɛ mɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Ikpɛ Biyɑ ɑ̀ goono wom bɔm. Cimi no, ngei wɔ ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ sendi yɑmu kɑ cɛnɑndi ɑmmɑ wom wɔ, wom gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ.
60004015	Ammɑ wom kunɑ, bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ mɑ si tɑɑbi zɑngɑ bɔrɔ wikɔ wɑlɑ zee, wɑlɑ zɑngɑ hɛ lɑlɔ tɛkɔ wɑlɑ zɑngɑ ɑsiiri ŋmɑni yom kunɑ mee dɑmkɔ.
60004016	De bɔrɔ go tɑɑbi zɑmɑ ɑ̀ ci Mɛsiyɑ gɑnɑkɔ, hɑwi mɑ si ɑ̀ dii, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi ngɑ di sɑbu sɛ.
60004017	Lɔkɑci bɑ kɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ mɑ sinti ciitiyom ndɑ Ikpɛ fuu. Ammɑ de ɑ̀ sinti ndɑ i yom, mɛtɛ yɑ kɑɑ ci beerem wɔ kɔkɔrɔ, nge yom kɑ ǹ si kɑ Ikpɛ Bɑɑru Hinno gɑnɑ?
60004018	"De kɑlɑ dɑcɑti no bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cɛsusu du fɑɑbɑ, mɛtɛ no bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hungu Ikpɛ ndɑ dulumkoni mo kɑɑ bɑrɑ?"
60004019	À sɛ no, beerem kɑ ǹ go tɑɑbi Ikpɛ binebɑɑ bɔm, ǹ mɑ ngei hundi tɑlifi Tɑkɑkɔ nɑɑnekpɛ gɑɑ ko kɑ ihinno tɛ.
60005001	Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom kɑ ǹ goono wom kunɑ, ɑ go kɑ ǹ no himmɑ, hɛɛ mo kɑ ɑ bɑrɑ hɑikusu zɑngɑ ngei. A go tɛ Mɛsiyɑ guruguze sɛdɑ. A gundɑ bɑ mo deizɑ kɑ Ikpɛ bɑ kɑɑtɛrɛ kunɑ.
60005002	A gɑ wom no himmɑ wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ Ikpɛ kuru kɑ ɑ̀ tɑlifi wom gɑɑ zɑngɑ kurukɔ. Wom mɑ si tɛ mo ndɑ tilɑsi ɑmmɑ ndɑ binebɑɑ Ikpɛ sɛ. Wom mɑ si tɛ mo liibɑ ziibɔ sɛ ɑmmɑ ndɑ bɔm noyom.
60005003	Wom mɑ si dɑbɑri kuru di bɔm kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm wom kɑmbɛ ɑmmɑ wom mɑ ci deedɑndi kuru di sɛ.
60005004	Sɑɑ kɑ Kurukɔ Beeri kɑɑ hunutɛrɛ, wom kɑɑ du tukunsi fulɑ deizɑkpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ si sɑrɑ.
60005005	Yɑ no wom mo hɑiwɑsu yom, wɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ mɑrgɑ hɑikusu yom sɛ. Wom kulu, wɑ bɔm yeti gɑndɑ cɛrɛ sɛ. Wɑ bɑɑniyom dɑm zɑngɑ jiinei dɑmyom zɑmɑ "Ikpɛ go hungu bɔmbɛɛrɛkpɛ yom ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ go gomini no bɔrɔ bɑɑnɔ yom sɛ."
60005006	Ngɑ di sɛ, wɑ nɑm Ikpɛ kɑmbɛ dɑbɑrikpɛ mɑ wom yeti gɑndɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ wom bɛɛrɑndi sɑɑ kɑ lɔkɑci kɑɑ.
60005007	Wɑ wom kɑrihã kulu dɛcɛ ɑ̀ bɔm, zɑmɑ ɑ̀ lɑɑkɑli bo goono wom gɑɑ.
60005008	Wɑ wom bɔm ci bɔrɔ. Wɑ bɑtu. Wom zojikɑri, Ibilisi go wom hundi kɑ dure zɑngɑ muusu beeri. À go ceeci bɔrɔ kɑ ngɑ mɑ ŋmɑɑ.
60005009	Wɑ hungu ɑ̀ sɛ zɑ kɑ wom sinji kɑ boori nɑɑne kunɑ. Wom go bei tɑɑbi fɔlɔnku yom yɑ go tɛ wom nyɑize yom kunɑ kɑ ǹ goono hɑndunyɑ.
60005010	Ammɑ Ikpɛ, gomini kulu Kpe, ɑ̀ no wom cɛɛ ngɑ deizɑ kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni dɔ Mɛsiyɑ Yesu kunɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ wom tɑɑbi bɑndɑ fɔ, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ngɑ bumbum yɑ kɑɑ wom tɔɑndi. À kɑɑ wom tɑbɑtɑndi kɑ wom bine yom no gɑɑbi. À kɑɑ wom sinji mo.
60005011	Deizɑ ndɑ dɑbɑri mɑ ci ɑ̀ ŋmɔne yom jiiri dubu ndɑ dubu yom. Ami.
60005012	A nɑ tirɑ cɛnɑ wɔ hɑntum wom sɛ ndɑ Silɑfim gɑɑkɑsine, ngɑ kɑ ɑ lɑsɑbu nyɑize nɑɑnekpɛ. A go wom no himmɑ ko tɛ sɛdɑ wom sɛ kɑ wɔne yɑ ci Ikpɛ gomini cimi cimi. Wom mɑ cɛ ɑ̀ kunɑ hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ boori.
60005013	Mɑrgɑ suubɑntɛ kɑ ɑ̀ goono Bɑbiloni kpɑɑrɑ ɑ̀ go wom fɔɔ. Yɑ no ɑ ize Mɑɑku.
60005014	Wɑ cɛrɛ fɔɔ ndɑ jɛrɛbɛ sumsumyom hinno bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ. Lɑɑkɑli kɑne mɑ bɑrɑ ndɑ wom kulu Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ. Ami.
61001001	Hɛɛ Simɔ Piɛɛ, hɛɛ yɑ ci Yesu Mɛsiyɑ tɑm ndɑ ɑ̀ diyɑ. A go tirɑ wɔ hɑntum wɔm sɛ wom kɑ wom du nɑɑne bɛɛrɛkpɛ ndɑ i yom, i ŋmɔne Ikpɛ ndɑ i Fɑɑbɑkɔ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ cɛyom susu gɑɑ.
61001002	Gomini ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne mɑ tɔntɔnu wom sɛ Ikpɛ ndɑ i Kpe Yesu beiyom kunɑ.
61001003	Mɛsiyɑ Ikpɛtɛrɛ dɑbɑri nɑ i nɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ tilɑsi i mɑ hunɑ ndɑ, ɑ̀ beiyom dɔ. Ngɑ yɑ nɑ i cɛɛ ngɑ deizɑ dɔ ndɑ ngɑ booriyom dɔ.
61001004	Yɑ mo no ɑ̀ nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli bɛɛrɛkpɛ bɑmbɑtɑ bɑmbɑtɑ yom tɛ i sɛ. À nɑ ɑlikɑwɑli yom di no zɑmɑ wom mɑ meigu ndɑ Ikpɛ hɑɑli zɑ kɑ wom kɔmɑ fumbi wɔne gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono hɑndunyɑ kunɑ bineibɑɑi sɑbu sɛ.
61001005	Ngɑ di bumbum sɛ mo no, wom kulu wɑ himmɑ dɑm kɑ booriyom tɔntɔnu wom nɑɑne gɑɑ, booriyom gɑɑ mo beire.
61001006	Beire gɑɑ mo wɑ bɔm hiniyom tɔntɔnu. Bɔm hiniyom gɑɑ mo, wɑ suuru tɔntɔnu. Suuru gɑɑ mo, wɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑyom tɔntɔnu.
61001007	Ikpɛ gɑnɑyom gɑɑ mo, wɑ nyɑize bɑɑkɑsine tɔntɔnu. Nyɑize bɑɑkɑsine gɑɑ mo wɑ bɑɑkɑsine tɔntɔnu.
61001008	À himɑ hɛ nge yom di mɑ goono wom gɑɑ kɑ bɑ kɑ tɔntɔnu mo zɑmɑ ǹ nɑm wom mɑ si gɔrɔ kɔnu. Ǹ nɑm wom mɑ si zɑm bɑrikɑ mɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ beiyom kunɑ.
61001009	Bɔrɔ kɑ hɛ nge yom di si ɑ̀ gɑɑ, diyom dumbɔkpɛ no zɑngɑ dɑnɑm no. À dinigɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ hinnɑndi ngɑ dom dulum yom gɑɑ.
61001010	À sɛ no, nyɑizei, wɑ himmɑ dɑm kɑ bei ndɑ cimi Ikpɛ nɑ wom cɛɛ, ɑ̀ nɑ wom suubɑ. Ngɑ di tɛyom gɑɑ, wom si kɑti pɑi.
61001011	Yɑ no Ikpɛ kɑɑ tu wom sɛ wom mɑ huro ndɑ bɛɛrɛ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Fɑɑbɑkɔ, ɑ̀ kpetɛrɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ beeniyom kunɑ.
61001012	À sɛ no, ɑ go wetere kɑ wom hɔngɑndi hɛ nge yom di sɑɑ kulu. Wom go hɛ nge yom di bei zɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ wom sinji kɑ boori cimi kunɑ.
61001013	Oò, ɑ go lɑsɑbu ɑ̀ sɑbɑ sɑɑ kulu kɑ ɑ goono gɑɑhɑm kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci zɑngɑ kuuru bukɑ, yɑ wom hɔngɑndi hɛ nge yom di.
61001014	A bei kɑ ɑ buyom mɑɑni kɑ yɑ fee ndɑ kuuru bukɑ wɔ zɑngɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ nɑ ɑ cɛbɛ.
61001015	Ammɑ ɑ go kɑ ɑ̀ wetere kulu tɛ hɑli bɑ ɑ dirɑ bɑndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci bu, wom mo hɔngɔ hɛ nge yom di lɔkɑci kulu.
61001016	Hɛ kɑ sɛ ɑ gɑ kɑ nge yom di cii yɑ ci kɑ i mɑnɑ jendi cɛmbɛrɛkpɛ yom gɑnɑ. Ammɑ i nɑm wom nɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɑbɑri ndɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑyom bei. I tɛ sɛdɑ mo ndɑ moo, i yom kɑ i di ɑ̀ bɛɛrɛ bɑmbɑtɑ.
61001017	À du bɛɛrɛ ndɑ deizɑ Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ dɔ, sɑɑ kɑ jinde fɔ hunu zɑ deizɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ deizɑ kulu dɔ kɑ sendi ɑ̀ bɔm. À cii: Bɔrɔ wɔne yɑ ci ɑ Ize Binegɑnji, kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ ɑ du binekɑɑne.
61001018	I yom mɑ, i mɑɑ jinde ngɑ di kɑ ɑ̀ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ sɑɑ kɑ i goono Yesu bɑndɑ tɑndi kuku hɑlɑɑlɑ bɔm.
61001019	I gundɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ sendi mo kɑ ɑ̀ tɑbɑi kɑ bisɑ hɛ kɑ i di. Wom go tɛ ihinno kɑ wom go lɑɑkɑli yeti ɑ̀ gɑɑ zɑngɑ wom gɑ lɑɑkɑli yeti fitilɑ gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑri kube kunɑ. À gɑ kɑɑri kɑlɑ mɑ mɑ sinti boyom, susubɑ hɑndɑriyɑize mo mɑ tunu kɑ kɑɑri wom bine yom kunɑ.
61001020	Wom mɑ wɔne bei mɑ jinɑ, Ikpɛ Sendi kunɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ kulu sindɑ fɑsɑliyom bɔrɔ fɑhɑm bɔm.
61001021	Andebitɛrɛ mɑnɑ hunu bɔrɔ fɔ binebɑɑ dɔ, bɑ ce fɔ. Ammɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ yɑ nɑ Ikpɛ ŋmɔne bɔrɔ hɑlɑɑlɑ yom fum hɑli ǹ nɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ sendi yom cii.
61002001	Andebi tɑngɑri tɑngɑri yom goono jɑmɑ di kunɑ dɑm. Zɑngɑ yɑ mɑɑsɑ cooɑndikɔ tɑngɑri tɑngɑri yom kɑɑ goono wom gɑme kunɑ. Ǹ kɑɑ mɔnɔ kɑ huro kɑ kɑɑndɑ cɛbɛ yom kɑ ǹ sindɑ cimi, cɛbɛ yom kɑ ǹ kɑɑndɑ hɑlɑciyom. Bɑ Kpe mo kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ dei, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ ze. Ǹ kɑɑ hɑlɑciyom cendi ndɑ wɑɑsi ngei bɔm.
61002002	Bɔrɔ boobo bine gɑ ǹ gɑnɑ ǹ hɑlɑciyom kunɑ. Ǹ sɑbu sɛ no, ǹ go cimi fɔndɔ di sendi yɑmu.
61002003	Hɛ bɑɑyom futu gɑɑ no cooɑndikɔ tɑngɑri tɑngɑri yom kɑɑ wom fɑfɑgu ndɑ ngei sendi zɑmbɑkpɛ yom. Ammɑ zɑ dom Ikpɛ jisi kɑ ǹ ciiti, ɑ̀ si jɛ. Ǹ hɑlɑciyom bɑ tɔ.
61002004	Ikpɛ mɑnɑ ngɑ dɔntɔneize yom kɑ ǹ nɑ dulum tɛ bɑkɑɑ, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ cetu ciyomɑ guusu guusɔ kunɑ. Ǹ goono hɔɑntɛ nungu kɑ kube goono. À nɑ ǹ jisi ciiti kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑɑ sɛ.
61002005	Bine, Ikpɛ mɑnɑ dɑm jinɑ hɑndunyɑ bɑkɑɑ kɑlɑ Nowe kɑ ɑ̀ ci cɛɑndiyom susu fɛɛkɔ. À nɑ Nowe fɑɑbɑ ndɑ bɔrɔ iye fɔ mɑ sɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ tunfɑnɑ hɑri tɑm hɑndunyɑ beerem bɔm kɑ ǹ hungu kɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ.
61002006	Sodum kpɑɑrɑ ndɑ Gomorɑ kpɑɑrɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ ciiti kɑ ǹ hɑlɑci. À nɑ ǹ zeeri kɑ ǹ yeti boosu. À gɑɑ nɑ, Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ tɛ deedɑndi beerem sɛ, beerem kɑ ǹ si kɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ.
61002007	À nɑ Lotu kɑ ɑ̀ ci bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu kɑɑ. Lotu bine sɑrɑ ndɑ ilɑlɔ tɛkɔ yom hɑwizetɛrɛ gɔrɛ.
61002008	Bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu wɔ, ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ gɔrɛ tɛ ǹ gɑme. À nɑ ngɑ hundi cɛɑntɛ susu tɑɑbɑndi mɑ ifutu futu mɑ kɑ bɑ kulu beerem kɑ ǹ bɑ si ndɑ Ikpɛ fɔndɑ, ǹ tɛyom kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ di kɑ mɑɑ sɑbu sɛ.
61002009	Zɑngɑ Kpe nɑ ngɑ di tɛ Lotu sɛ, ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑni kɑ ngɑ gɑnɑkɔ yom kɑɑ tɑɑbi kunɑ. À ŋmɑɑni kɑ beerem kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ cɛɑndi susu jisi ciiti hɑnu sɛ ǹ mɑ du bɔnɑndiyom.
61002010	Yɑ mɑ Ikpɛ kɑɑ tɛ beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ ngei bineibɑɑi gɑnɑ kɑ bɑɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ ǹ bine ziibɑndi. Ǹ gɑ meirekpɛ fɛntɛ mɑ. Binesɛndɔkpɛ yom nɑ, tɔtɔkpɛ yom. Ǹ si hɑmburu kɑ gɑsi mɑ ndɑ kɑ ǹ gɑ bɛɛnɛ deizɑ kpɛ yom woo.
61002011	Bɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom kɑ ǹ gundɑ gɑɑbi ndɑ dɑbɑri kɑ bisei ǹ si kɑɑndɑ woobi ciiti ǹ bɔm Kpe jine.
61002012	Ammɑ bɔrɔ nge yom di zɑm lɑsɑbu nɑ zɑngɑ gɑnjihɑm yom kɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ hɛi ǹ mɑ dii kɑ hɑlɑci sɛ. Beerem wɔ gɑ sendi kɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ si fɑhɑm woo. Ǹ kɑɑ hɑlɑci nɑ ngei hɑsɑrɔ sɑbu sɛ.
61002013	Ǹ bɑ du ngei tɛyom kɑ ǹ sindɑ cɛyom susu bɑnɑndi. Ǹ ci beerem kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑni ǹ sɛ ǹ mɑ ngei bineibɑɑi tɛ ko fɑɑriŋmɑɑ zɑɑri kpɑrɛ kunɑ. Beerem nɑ kɑ ǹ ci zɑngɑ tombi yom ndɑ ziibi yom. Ǹ go fɑɑriŋmɑɑ ngei zɑmbɑ kunɑ kɑ jingɑru ŋmɑɑ ndɑ wom.
61002014	Zinɑ mookpɛ yom no kɑ ǹ si cɛ mo ndɑ dulum tɛyom pɑi. Ǹ go beerem kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ sinji kɑ boori hiri kɑ dii. Ǹ nɑ ngei bine dɔnɑndi hɛ bɑɑyom futu. Lɑɑliize yom mo no.
61002015	Ǹ nɑ fɔndɔ cɛɑntɛ nɑm kɑ dɛrɛ. Bine, ǹ go ɑndebi Bɑlɑm, Bezo koo fɔndɔ gɑnɑ, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑ gbei kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ cɛyom susu bɑnɑndi.
61002016	Ammɑ fɑrikɑ fɔ nɑ Bɑlɑm dulum bɔgu ɑ̀ bɔm. Fɑrikɑ kɑ ɑ̀ si sendi, sendi ɑ̀ sɛ ndɑ iburɑdɑm jinde. À nɑ ɑndebi di hɔllɔkomtɛrɛ jɛ.
61002017	Bɔrɔ nge yom di bɑrɑ no zɑngɑ tondi guusu fɔci yom kɑ ǹ sindɑ hɑri, buru yom kɑ hɑri hɛo feeni. Ikpɛ nɑ kube bi tici tici nungu kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ beeniyom jisi ǹ sɛ.
61002018	Ǹ go fɑɑre sendi kɔnu yom cii. Ǹ go beerem hiri kɑ dii bineibɑɑi gɑɑ ndɑ hɑwizetɛrɛ tɛyom gɑɑ, nge yom kɑ ǹ kɔmɑ wɔ kɑ yom goono dɛrɛyom kunɑ dɔ.
61002019	Ǹ gɑ bɔrɔcinitɛrɛ ɑlikɑwɑli tɛ ǹ sɛ bɑ kɑ ngei bumbum gɑ ci fumbi tɑmtɛrɛ kunɑ. Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑŋmɑɑ bɔrɔ bɔm, bɔrɔ ci ɑ̀ sɛ tɑm noyɑ.
61002020	Ǹ kɔmɑ hɑndunyɑ ziibi yom gɑɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Fɑɑbɑkɔ ɑ̀ beiyom dɔ. À bɑndɑ de ǹ kɑɑ yɑɑrɑ kɑ wuluwɑli hɑndunyɑ ziibi yom kunɑ, hɑndunyɑ wɔ gɑɑŋmɑɑ ǹ bɔm. Ǹ kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ goonoyom, ɑ̀ jɑɑsɑ sintine gɔrɛ.
61002021	Ǹ mɑ si cɛyom susu fɔndɔ bei ɑ̀ bisɑ, de sɑɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ bei, ɑ̀ bɑndɑ ǹ mɑ bɑndɑ bɛrɛ ɑ̀ gɑɑ ndɑ meire hɑlɑɑlɑ kɑ ǹ jinɑ kɑ no ǹ sɛ.
61002022	Hɛ kɑ yɑɑse wɔne gɑ cii, dɑhiri no ɑ̀ tɔ ǹ gɑɑ. "Hɑnsi go ye hɛ kɑ ngɑ bumbum yeeri gɑɑ". Kpɛɛnɛ, "kpisɔ nyɑ kɑ ǹ nyume, ɑ̀ ye kɑ bimbilo bɔtɔgɔ kunɑ".
61003001	A binebɑɑkɔ yom, ɑ go tirɑ hinkɑntɛ wɔ hɑntum wom sɛ. Tirɑ wɔne kunɑ hɑli wɔ di kunɑ, ɑ gɑ wom fɑhɑm hinno yom tunɑndi ko wom hɔngɑndi.
61003002	Wom mɑ hɔngɔ sendi yom kɑ ɑndebi hɑlɑɑlɑ yom jinɑ kɑ cii. Wom mɑ hɔngɔ mo Kpe kɑ ɑ̀ ci Fɑɑbɑkɔ ɑ̀ meire kɑ i yom, ɑ̀ diyɑ yom cii.
61003003	Wɑ wɔne bei jinɑ kɑ kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ hɑnu yom kunɑ, dondɑcɛrɛkpɛ yom kɑɑ kɑɑ kɑ ngei bineibɑɑi yom gɑnɑ.
61003004	Ǹ kɑɑ cii: Sɑɑ fɔ ɑ̀ kɑɑyom ɑlikɑwɑli tɔ? Sɑbɑbu kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ i go hã yɑ ci kɑ zɑ sɑɑ kɑ cɛɛ yom bu, hɛ kulu goono zɑngɑ ǹ goono zɑ Ikpɛ sinti kɑ hɛ yom tɑkɑ.
61003005	Mure kunɑ no, ǹ go dinigɑ kɑ Ikpɛ mee sendi bɔm no bɛɛnɛ goono zɑ dɑm. Yɑ no gɑndɑ mɑ tɛ kɑ hunu hɑri kunɑ kɑ goono hɑri bindi bindi Ikpɛ Sendɑ gɑɑ.
61003006	Yɑ no, hɑndunyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono dom, ɑ̀ hɑlɑci sɑɑ kɑ tunfɑnɑ hɑri nɑ ɑ̀ gɔnu.
61003007	Ammɑ ndɑ sendi fɔlɔnku Ikpɛ nɑ mɑɑsɑ bɛɛnɛ ndɑ mɑɑsɑ gɑndɑ jisi nini sɛ. À go kɑ ǹ jɛ ciiti hɑnu sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ beerem kɑ ǹ si kɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ ciiti kɑ ǹ hɑlɑci.
61003008	Ammɑ ɑ binebɑɑkɔ yom, wom mɑ si dinigɑ hɛ fɔlɔnku. Ngɑ neyɑ. Hɑnu fɔlɔnku Kpe dɔ zɑngɑ jiiri dubu fɔ no. Jiiri dubu mo zɑngɑ hɑnu fɔlɔnku nɑ.
61003009	Kpe si mure pɑi ndɑ ngɑ ɑlikɑwɑli tɔnɑndiyom, zɑngɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom go kɑ ɑ̀ tɑmmɑ. Ammɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ suuru kuku i sɛ. À si bɑɑ bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ mɑ hɑlɑci, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ gɑ bɑɑ bɔrɔ kulu mɑ tuubi kɑ bɛrɛ.
61003010	Ammɑ Kpe Hɑnu bɑ kɑɑ no, zɑngɑ zee cini kɑɑ ciini kunɑ. Hɑnu ngɑ di, bɛɛnɛ kɑɑ bisɑ ndɑ kɔsɔngu bɑmbɑtɑ. Hɛ yom kulu kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ hɑndunyɑ tɛ ndei, ǹ kɑɑ dungu kɑ mɛnɛ. Gɑndɑ mɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ gbei yom kɑ ǹ goono ɑ̀ kunɑ, nini gɑ ǹ kulu ŋmɑɑ.
61003011	Zɑ kɑ hɛ nge yom di kulu kɑɑ hɑlɑci zɑngɑ yɑ di, ɑ̀ himɑ wom mɑ bɑrɑ gɔrɛ hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑyom kunɑ.
61003012	À himɑ wom mɑ Ikpɛ Hɑnu bɑtu ndɑ bɛɛjɛ kɑ kɑ ɑ̀ sɑsɑ. Hɑnu ngɑ di wɔ ɑ̀ kɑɑyom sɑbu sɛ, bɛɛnɛ kɑɑ dii ndɑ nini kɑ hɑlɑci. Bɛɛnɛ hɛ yom mo kɑɑ mɛnɛ ndɑ dunguɛ.
61003013	Ammɑ Ikpɛ ɑlikɑwɑli bɔm, i go bɛɛnɛ teji yom ndɑ gɑndɑ teji bɑtu, nungu yom kɑ cɛɑndiyom susu goono ndɑ gɔrɛ.
61003014	A binebɑɑkɔ yom, zɑ kɑ wom go hɛ nge yom di bɑtu ndɑ bɛɛjɛ wɑ himmɑ dɑm. Kpe mɑ wom gɑru tombi si, tɑɑli si lɑɑkɑli kɑne kunɑ.
61003015	Wɑ i Kpe suuru kuku lɑsɑbu zɑngɑ fɑɑbɑ lɔkɑci. Ngɑ nɑ i nyɑize binebɑɑkɔ Pɔlu hɑntum wom sɛ hɑikusutɛrɛ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ɑ̀ no bɔm.
61003016	Yɑ mɑ nɑ Pɔlu hɑntum ngɑ tirɑ yom kulu kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ hɛ nge yom di sendi tɛ. Hɛ fɔ yom mo goono ɑ̀ tirɑ yom kunɑ kɑ ǹ fɑɑhɑmyom gɑɑbu. Hɛ yom wɔ beerem kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ du cooɑndiyom ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ sinji kɑ boori go kɑ ǹ siirɑndi. Zɑngɑ yɑ no ǹ go kɑ Ikpɛ Sendi hɑntumɑntɛ cindei mɑ siirɑndi ko kpei ngei bɔm hɑlɑciyom gɑɑ.
61003017	Ngɑ di sɛ ɑ binebɑɑkɔ yom, zɑ kɑ wom jinɑ kɑ hɛ nge yom di bei, wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli. Wɑ lɑɑkɑli zɑmɑ beerem kɑ ǹ bɑ si ndɑ Ikpɛ fɔndɑ mɑ si wom cendi dɛrɛyom kunɑ hɑli wom kɑɑ kɑm wom sinjiyom kunɑ.
61003018	Ammɑ wo beeri i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Fɑɑbɑkɔ ɑ̀ gomini ndɑ ɑ̀ beiyom kunɑ. Deizɑ mɑ bɑrɑ ɑ̀ sɛ, mɑɑsɑ kɑlɑ kɑ kpei, beeniyom si. Ami.
62001001	I go hɑntum wom sɛ Sendi hundikpɛ bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ goono zɑ sintine kom, wɔ kɑ i mɑɑ, wɔ kɑ i di ndɑ i moo yom, wɔ kɑ i gunɑ, wɔ kɑ i kɑmbɛ yom nɑ ɑ̀ hɑmɑ.
62001002	Hundi di bine hunutɛrɛ. I di ɑ̀ mo. I go tɛ ɑ̀ sɛdɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑru cii, Hundi di kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni kɑ ɑ̀ goono Bɑɑbɑ dɔ. Ngɑ nɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ i sɛ.
62001003	Wɔ kɑ i di, wɔ kɑ i mɑɑ, ngɑ no i go kɑ ɑ̀ bɑɑru cii wom sɛ domi wom mo, wom mɑ ci ɑfɔ meiguyom kunɑ ndɑ i yom. Ndɑ cimi i go ci ɑfɔ meiguyom kunɑ ndɑ Bɑɑbɑ no ndɑ ɑ̀ Ize Yesu Mɛsiyɑ.
62001004	I bine go hɛ nge yom di hɑntum wom sɛ no domi wom binekɑɑne mɑ tɔ.
62001005	Bɑɑru di bine neyɑ kɑ i mɑɑ Izɑ dɔ kɑ i go fɛɛ wom sɛ: Ikpɛ yɑ Kɑɑrikpɛ no. Kube si ɑ̀ kunɑ bɑ cɛnɑ.
62001006	De i gɑ cii i ci ɑfɔ meiguyom kunɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ ɑmmɑ i gɑ dirɑ kube kunɑ, i go tɑngɑri. I si bo cimi gbei tɛ.
62001007	Ammɑ de i go dirɑ kɑɑri kunɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ bumbum goono kɑɑri kunɑ, i ci ɑfɔ meiguyom kunɑ ndɑ cɛrɛ. À Ize Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kuri mo, ɑ̀ go kɑ i hinnɑndi dulum kulu gɑɑ.
62001008	De i go cii i sindɑ dulum, i gɑ kɑ i bɔm zɑmbɑ. Cimi si i kunɑ.
62001009	De i gɑ kɑ i dulum yom cii, ngɑ wɔ Nɑɑnekpɛ no, Cɛsusukpɛ mo no, ɑ̀ gɑ i yɑɑfɑ ndɑ i dulum yom. À gɑ i hinnɑndi mɑ i tɛyom kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ cɛsusu gɑɑ.
62001010	De i go cii i mɑnɑ dulum tɛ, i go kɑ Ikpɛ tɛ tɑngɑrikpɛ noyɑ. À Sendɑ mo si i kunɑ.
62002001	A koo cɛnɑ yom, ɑ gɑ wɔne yom hɑntum wom sɛ nɑ domi wom mɑ si dulum tɛ. De bine mɑ bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ dulum tɛ, i gundɑ Gɑɑkɔ fɔ Bɑɑbɑ dɔ, ngɑ yɑ ci Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Cɛsusukpɛ.
62002002	Ngɑ mɑ yɑ ci sɑsɑbɑndiyom hɛ i dulum yom sɛ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci i ŋmɔne yom hinne sɛ bo, ɑmmɑ hɑndunyɑ kulu sɛ mɑ.
62002003	De i go kɑ ɑ̀ meire yom gɑnɑ, ɑ̀ gɑɑ no i tɑbɑtɑndi kɑ i nɑ ɑ̀ bei.
62002004	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go cii ngɑ nɑ ɑ̀ bei, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ si kɑ ɑ̀ meire yom gɑnɑ, tɑngɑrikom no, cimi si ɑkpɛ kunɑ.
62002005	Ammɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ̀ Sendi gɑnɑ, Ikpɛ bɑɑkɑsine kube ɑkpɛ kunɑ. Wɔne gɑɑ no, i bo bei i goono ɑ̀ kunɑ.
62002006	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go cii ngɑ goono Ikpɛ kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ, ɑkpɛ mo dirɑ zɑngɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dirɑ.
62002007	A nyɑizei, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci meire teji nɑ ɑ go hɑntum wom sɛ, ɑmmɑ meire zeenu no kɑ wom du zɑ sintine. Meire zeenɔ yɑ ci Sendɑ kɑ wom mɑɑ zɑ sintine.
62002008	Bine ɑ gɑ meire teji hɑntum wom sɛ, meire kɑ ɑ̀ ci cimi Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ ndɑ wom kunɑ. Kube go bisɑ, cɔfɔ kɑɑri cimi cimi hɑɑgɑ kɔ.
62002009	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go cii ngɑ goono kɑɑri kunɑ, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ bine hungu ngɑ nyɑize, kube kunɑ nɑ ɑ̀ goono hɑli mɑɑsɑ.
62002010	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ bɑɑ ngɑ nyɑize, ɑ̀ goono kɑɑri kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ. Hɛ fɔ kulu si ɑ̀ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ nɑm ɑ̀ mɑ hɑitɑ.
62002011	Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bine hungu ngɑ nyɑize, ɑkpɛ goono kube kunɑ. À gɑ dirɑ mɑ kube kunɑ. À si bei nungu kɑ ngɑ go kpei zɑmɑ kube nɑ ɑ̀ dɑnɑndi.
62002012	Koo cɛnɑ yom, ɑ go hɑntum wom sɛ no domi Ikpɛ nɑ wom yɑɑfɑ ndɑ wom dulum yom Mɛsiyɑ mɑɑ sɑbu sɛ.
62002013	Bɑɑbɑ yom, ɑ go hɑntum wom sɛ no domi wom go bei wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono zɑ sintine kom. Hɑiwɑsu yom, ɑ go hɑntum wom sɛ no, domi wom gɑɑŋmɑɑ Ilɑlɔ bɔm. Koo cɛnɑ yom, ɑ gɑ hɑntum wom sɛ no domi wom nɑ Bɑɑbɑ bei.
62002014	Bɑɑbɑ yom, ɑ gɑ hɑntum wom sɛ no domi wom nɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono zɑ sintine kom bei. Hɑiwɑsu yom, ɑ gɑ hɑntum wom sɛ no domi wom gundɑ gɑɑbi. Ikpɛ Sendɑ mo goono wom kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ. Wom gɑɑŋmɑɑ mɑ Ilɑlɔ bɔm.
62002015	Wɑ si bɑɑ hɑndunyɑ wɑlɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ goono hɑndunyɑ. Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ hɑndunyɑ, bɑɑkɑsine Bɑɑbɑ sɛ si ɑkpɛ kunɑ.
62002016	Hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono hɑndunyɑ kunɑ, ǹ bɑ ɑfɔ mɑnɑ hunu Bɑɑbɑ dɔ kɑlɑ hɑndunyɑ dɔ. Ngei yɑ ci bineibɑɑi ndɑ hɛ kɑ moo di kulu ɑ̀ mɑ bɑɑ, ndɑ hundi ibɑɑi fɑɑre.
62002017	Hɑndunyɑ ndɑ ngɑ bineibɑɑi go beeni. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ binebɑɑ tɛ, ɑkpɛ bɑ gɔrɔ beeniyom si.
62002018	Koo cɛnɑ yom, kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ guuru nee. Wom mɑɑ ǹ cii Mɛsiyɑ zojikɑri go kɑɑ. Bɑ mɑɑsɑ Mɛsiyɑ zojikɑri boobo tunu. À sɛ no i bei kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ guuru di no.
62002019	Ǹ hunu i kunɑ ɑmmɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ci i ŋmɔne yom. De i ŋmɔne yom no, dom ǹ go gɔrɔ i gɑme. Ammɑ ǹ fee ndɑ i yom zɑmɑ ǹ mɑ cɛbɛ tɛrɛkpɑrɛ kɑ ǹ kulu mɑnɑ ci i ŋmɔne yom.
62002020	Wom wɔ, wom du jii toliyom kɑ ɑ̀ ci suubɑyom sɛdɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu Hɑlɑɑlɑkpɛ dɔ. Wom go hɛ kulu bei mo.
62002021	Yɑ nɑ hɑntum wom sɛ zɑmɑ kɑ wom si cimi bei bo, ɑmmɑ kɑ wom go kɑ ɑ̀ bei sɛ no. Wom go bei mo tɑngɑri bɑ ɑfɔ si hunu cimi kunɑ.
62002022	Mee yɑ ci tɑngɑrikpɛ? Ngɑ yɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go cii Yesu mɑnɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ. Akpɛ yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ zojikɑri kɑ ɑ̀ go Bɑɑbɑ ndɑ Ize ze.
62002023	Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ Izɑ ze, ɑkpɛ sindɑ Bɑɑbɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ cii ndɑ ngɑ mee ngɑ wɔ Ize di ŋmɔne nɑ, ɑkpɛ gundɑ Bɑɑbɑ mo.
62002024	À sɛ no, hɛ kɑ wom mɑɑ zɑ sintine, wɑ nɑm ɑ̀ mo goono wom kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ. De hɛ kɑ wom mɑɑ zɑ sintine goono wom kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ, wom mo, wom kɑɑ goono ndɑ gɔrɛ Ize ndɑ Bɑɑbɑ kunɑ.
62002025	Alikɑwɑli kɑ ngɑ bumbum tɛ i sɛ, ngɑ yɑ ci hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni.
62002026	A nɑ wɔne yom hɑntum wom sɛ mo kɑ simbɑ ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ wom dɛrɑndi.
62002027	Wom wɔ, toliyom suubɑyom sɛdɑ kɑ wom du Hɑlɑɑlɑkpɛ dɔ ɑ̀ goono wom kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ hɑli wom si bɑɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ wom cɛbɛ. Ammɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ toliyom suubɑyom sɛdɑ go wom cɛbɛ hɛ kulu, ngɑ mo yɑ ci cimi. À mɑnɑ ci tɑngɑri. Ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ nɑ wom cɛbɛ, wom mo goono ɑ̀ kunɑ yɑ di ndɑ gɔrɛ.
62002028	Mɑɑsɑ koo cɛnɑ yom, wom mo goono ɑ̀ kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ domi sɑɑ kɑ Mɛsiyɑ hunu tɛrɛ i mɑ yɑru. Hɑwi mɑ si i dii ɑ̀ jine ɑ̀ kɑɑyom gɑɑ.
62002029	De wom go bei ngɑ yɑ cɛsusu no, wom mɑ bei mo bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go cɛyom susu gbei tɛ, ɑ̀ dɔ no ǹ nɑ ɑkpɛ hɛi.
62003001	Wɑ gunɑ fɑ bɑɑkɑsine dimi kɑ Bɑɑbɑ nɑ i no hɑli ǹ mɑ i cɛɛ Ikpɛ ize yom. À sɛ no, hɑndunyɑ si i bei domi hɑndunyɑ mɑnɑ Ikpɛ bei.
62003002	A bine bɑɑkɔ yom, mɑɑsɑ i bɑrɑ nɑ Ikpɛ ize yom. Hɛ kɑ i kɑɑ ci, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ hunutɛrɛ jinɑ. Ammɑ i go bei sɑɑ kɑ Mɛsiyɑ hunutɛrɛ i kɑɑ bɑrɑ zɑngɑ ngɑ domi i kɑɑ di ɑ̀ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ goono.
62003003	Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ bɛɛjɛ ngɑ di Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ, ɑkpɛ go kɑ ngɑ bɔm hinnɑndi zɑngɑ Mɛsiyɑ hinne.
62003004	Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ bo dulum tɛ, ɑkpɛ go kɑ Ikpɛ fɔndɑ tɑɑmu. Dulum bine yɑ ci bɔrɔ bɑ si ndɑ fɔndɑ.
62003005	Wom bine go bei kɑ Mɛsiyɑ hunutɛrɛ nɑ domi ɑ̀ mɑ i dulum yom kɑɑ. Dulum mo si ɑ̀ kunɑ bɑ cɛnɑ.
62003006	Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono ɑ̀ kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ, ɑ̀ si bo dulum tɛ. Bɔrɔ kulu mo kɑ ɑ̀ bɑ dulum tɛ, ɑkpɛ mɑnɑ di Mɛsiyɑ no, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ bei mo.
62003007	Koo cɛnɑ yom, bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ si wom dɛrɑndi. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bo cɛyom susu gbei tɛ, ngɑ yɑ ci bɔrɔ cɛɑntɛ susu zɑngɑ Yesu ci Cɛsusukpɛ.
62003008	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑ dulum tɛ, Ibilisi dɔ nɑ ɑ̀ hunu. Zɑ sintine no Ibilisi cini ko dulum tɛ. À sɛ no, Ikpɛ Ize hunutɛrɛ ɑ̀ mɑ Ibilisi gbei yom hɑlɑci.
62003009	Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɛi Ikpɛ dɔ, ɑ̀ si bo dulum tɛ domi Ikpɛ dumɑi goono ɑkpɛ kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ. À si hini ko dulum tɛ domi ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɛi Ikpɛ dɔ.
62003010	Wɔne gɑɑ no, ǹ go kɑ Ikpɛ ize yom ndɑ Ibilisi ize yom fɑyɑnkɑ. Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ si bɑ cɛyom susu gbei tɛ, ɑkpɛ mɑnɑ ci Ikpɛ ŋmɔne. Yɑ nɑ, bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si bɑɑ ngɑ nyɑize mo.
62003011	Bɑɑru kɑ wom mɑɑ zɑ sintine, ngɑ neyɑ. I mɑ bɑɑ cɛrɛ.
62003012	À mɑnɑ ci zɑngɑ Kɑinu kɑ ɑ̀ ci Ilɑlɔ ŋmɔne. À bine tɔ hɑli ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ cɛɛnɛ wi. Ifɔ sɛ no ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ wi? À nɑ ɑ̀ wi nɑ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ gbei yom bɑrɑ ilɑlɔ yom ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ cɛɛnɛ gbei yom cɛyom susu ŋmɔne yom no.
62003013	Nyɑizei, wɑ si mɑmɑci de hɑndunyɑ bine go hungu wom.
62003014	I go bei i bisɑ bu gɑɑ kɑ tɔ hundi dɔ domi i go bɑɑ i nyɑize yom. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ bɑɑkɑsine ngɑ nyɑize sɛ, ɑkpɛ goono bu kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ.
62003015	Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ bine go hungu ngɑ nyɑize, bɔrɔ wikɔ no. Wom go bei kɑ bɔrɔ wikɔ bɑ ɑfɔ sindɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni ngɑ kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ.
62003016	Wɔne gɑɑ nɑ i go kɑ Ikpɛ bɑɑkɑsine bei domi Mɛsiyɑ nɑ ngɑ hundi no i sɑbu sɛ. À himɑ i mɑ i hundi yom mɑ no nyɑize yom sɑbu sɛ.
62003017	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ wɑsɑ hundi sɛ, ɑ̀ gɑ di mo ngɑ nyɑize bɑnji kunɑ ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ sisibi ɑ̀ sɛ, zɑngɑ mɛtɛ dimi nɑ Ikpɛ bɑɑkɑsine goono ɑkpɛ kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ?
62003018	A koo cɛnɑ yom, i bɑɑkɑsine mɑ si tɛ sendi gɑɑ wɑlɑ ndɑ hinje kpɑrɛ hinne, ɑmmɑ tɛyom gɑɑ cimi kunɑ.
62003019	Ngɑ di gɑɑ no, i go bei i yom yɑ cimi bɔrɔ yom nɑ. I gɑ i bine tɑbɑi Ikpɛ jine mo.
62003020	Bɑ de i bine go kɑ i ciiti kɑ zeeri, i go bei Ikpɛ beeri kɑ bisɑ i bine yom. À go hɛ kulu bei mo.
62003021	A binebɑɑkɔ yom, de i bine si kɑ i ciiti kɑ zeeri kulu i yɑru Ikpɛ jine.
62003022	Hɛ kulu kɑ i go ŋmɑɑrɛ i go du ɑ̀ Ikpɛ dɔ, zɑmɑ i go kɑ ɑ̀ meire yom gɑnɑ. I go tɛ mo hɛ yom kulu kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑni ɑ̀ sɛ.
62003023	Wɔne yɑ ci ɑ̀ meire. I mɑ nɑɑne ɑ̀ Ize Yesu Mɛsiyɑ mɑɑ gɑɑ. I mɑ bɑɑ cɛrɛ mo ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ meire kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ i nɑ goono ndɑ.
62003024	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ̀ meire yom gɑnɑ, ɑkpɛ goono Ikpɛ kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ. Ikpɛ mo goono ɑkpɛ kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ. Wɔne gɑɑ no i go bei kɑ Ikpɛ goono i kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ i no gɑɑ.
62004001	A binebɑɑkɔ yom, wɑ si cimɑndi biyɑ kulu gɑɑ ɑmmɑ wɑ biyɑ yom bubure kɑ di hɑli de Ikpɛ ŋmɔne yom no. Wom mɑ ɑ̀ tɛ domi ɑndebi tɑngɑri tɑngɑri boobo go seesee hɑndunyɑ kunɑ.
62004002	Wɔne gɑɑ no wom go kɑ Ikpɛ Biyɑ bei. Biyɑ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go cii Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kɑɑ no gɑɑhɑm kunɑ, biyɑ ngɑ di Ikpɛ ŋmɔne nɑ.
62004003	Biyɑ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ si cii Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kɑɑ no gɑɑhɑm kunɑ, biyɑ ngɑ di mɑnɑ ci Ikpɛ ŋmɔne. Biyɑ di yɑ Mɛsiyɑ zojikɑri nɑ kɑ wom mɑɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ gɑ kɑɑ, kɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ goono hɑndunyɑ kunɑ kɔ.
62004004	Koo cɛnɑ yom, wom yɑ Ikpɛ ŋmɔne yom no. Wom gɑɑŋmɑɑ ǹ bɔm, zɑmɑ ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono wom kunɑ, ɑ̀ beeri kɑ bisɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono hɑndunyɑ kunɑ.
62004005	Ngei wɔ hɑndunyɑ ŋmɔne yom no. À sɛ no ǹ go sendi hɑndunyɑ hɛ yom bɔm. Hɑndunyɑ mɑ go hɑngɑ dɑm ǹ sɛ.
62004006	I yom wɔ, Ikpɛ ŋmɔne yom nɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ bei, ɑ̀ hɑngɑ dɑm i sɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci Ikpɛ ŋmɔne mo ɑ̀ si hɑngɑ dɑm i sɛ. Ngɑ di gɑɑ no, i go cimi biyɑ ndɑ dɛrɛyom biyɑ fɑyɑnkɑ.
62004007	A binebɑɑkɔ yom, i mɑ bɑɑ cɛrɛ domi bɑɑkɑsine wɔ Ikpɛ dɔ nɑ ɑ̀ hunu. Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ bɑɑkɑsine, ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɛi Ikpɛ dɔ. À go kɑ Ikpɛ bei mo.
62004008	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ bɑɑkɑsine, ɑ̀ si Ikpɛ bei no domi Ikpɛ cɛ bɑɑkɑsinekpɛ nɑ.
62004009	Wɔne gɑɑ no Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ bɑɑkɑsine kɑɑtɛrɛ i sɛ kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ Ize fɔlɔnku dɔntɔm hɑndunyɑ kunɑ domi i mɑ hunɑ ɑ̀ dɔ.
62004010	Wɔne yɑ ci bɑɑkɑsine, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci i go bɑɑ Ikpɛ bo, ɑmmɑ ngɑ yɑ bɑɑ i yom kɑ ngɑ Ize dɔntɔm ɑ̀ mɑ ci sɑsɑbɑndiyom hɛ i dulum yom sɑbu sɛ.
62004011	A binebɑɑkɔ yom, zɑ kɑ Ikpɛ bɑɑ i yom zɑngɑ yɑ, ɑ̀ himɑ i yom mo i mɑ bɑɑ cɛrɛ.
62004012	Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑnɑ di Ikpɛ bɑ ce fɔ. De i go bɑɑ cɛrɛ Ikpɛ bo goono i kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ. À bɑɑkɑsine mo goono i kunɑ kɑ kube.
62004013	À gɑɑ nɑ i gɑ bei i goono Ikpɛ kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ, ngɑ mo goono i kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ zɑmɑ i gundɑ ɑ̀ Biyɑ.
62004014	I di ko tɛ sɛdɑ kɑ Bɑɑbɑ nɑ ngɑ Ize dɔntɔm no ɑ̀ mɑ ci hɑndunyɑ Fɑɑbɑkɔ.
62004015	Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go tu kɑ Yesu yɑ Ikpɛ Ize no, Ikpɛ goono ɑkpɛ kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ. Akpɛ mo goono Ikpɛ kunɑ.
62004016	I nɑ bɑɑkɑsine bei kɑ Ikpɛ gundɑ i sɛ. I go nɑɑne bɑɑkɑsine di gɑɑ mo. Ikpɛ yɑ ci bɑɑkɑsinekpɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ, ɑkpɛ goono Ikpɛ kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ. Ikpɛ mɑ goono ɑkpɛ kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ.
62004017	Zɑngɑ Mɛsiyɑ goono, yɑ no i yom mo, i goono hɑndunyɑ wɔ kunɑ. À dɔ no bɑɑkɑsine kube i kunɑ hɑli i mɑ yɑru ciiti hɑnu hine.
62004018	Hɑmburu si bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ. Ammɑ bɑɑkɑsine kɑ ɑ̀ kube, ɑ̀ go hɑmburu gɑɑrɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hɑmburu, ciiti sɑbu sɛ no ɑ̀ go hɑmburu. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hɑmburu mo, ɑkpɛ mɑnɑ kube bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ.
62004019	I yom wɔ, i gundɑ bɑɑkɑsine Ikpɛ sɛ no domi ngɑ yɑ jinɑ kɑ bɑɑ i yom.
62004020	De bɔrɔ fɔ go cii ngɑ gɑ bɑɑ Ikpɛ, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ bine gɑ hungu ngɑ nyɑize, tɑngɑrikom nɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si bɑɑ ngɑ nyɑize kɑ ɑ̀ moo go di, mɛtɛ ɑ̀ tɛ kɑ bɑɑ Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ si di?
62004021	Mɛsiyɑ dɔ nɑ i du meire wɔne. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ Ikpɛ, ɑ̀ mɑ bɑɑ ngɑ nyɑize mo.
62005001	Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go cimɑndi Yesu gɑɑ kɑ ngɑ yɑ ci Mɛsiyɑ, ǹ nɑ ɑkpɛ hɛi Ikpɛ dɔ. Bɔrɔ kulu mo kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ bɑɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ hɛi, ɑkpɛ go bɑɑ ize yom mo kɑ ɑ̀ hɛi.
62005002	Wɔne gɑɑ no i bei kɑ i gɑ bɑɑ Ikpɛ ize yom kɑ i go bɑɑ Ikpɛ kɑ kɑ ɑ̀ meire yom gɑnɑ.
62005003	Wɔne yɑ ci bɑɑkɑsine Ikpɛ sɛ, i mɑ ɑ̀ meire yom gɑnɑ. À meire yom bine si tim mo.
62005004	Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɛi Ikpɛ dɔ, hɑndunyɑ gɑɑŋmɑɑkɔ no. Gɑɑŋmɑɑyom yɑ ci i nɑɑne kɑ ɑ̀ go gɑɑŋmɑɑ hɑndunyɑ bɔm.
62005005	Mee yɑ ci gɑɑŋmɑɑkɔ hɑndunyɑ bɔm? Ngɑ yɑ ci bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go cimɑndi Yesu gɑɑ kɑ Yesu yɑ Ikpɛ Ize no.
62005006	Ngɑ yɑ ci Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ hɑri ndɑ kuri dɔ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci hɑri dɔ hinne ɑmmɑ hɑri ndɑ kuri dɔ. Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ mo go tɛ sɛdɑ domi Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ yɑ ci cimi.
62005007	Ihinzɑ wɔ yɑ go tɛ sɛdɑ bɛɛnɛ kunɑ, Bɑɑbɑ ndɑ Sendɑ ndɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ. Ihinzɑ wɔ yɑ ɑfɔ no.
62005008	Ihinzɑ bine yɑ go tɛ sɛdɑ hɑndunyɑ kunɑ. Ngei yɑ ci Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ ndɑ hɑri ndɑ kuri. Ihinzɑ wɔ kulu tu mefɔ.
62005009	De i go beerem sɛdɑ tɑ, Ikpɛ sɛdɑ beeri kɑ bisɑ. Ikpɛ yɑ tɛ sɛdɑ ngɑ Ize bɔm.
62005010	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ nɑɑne Ikpɛ Ize gɑɑ, ɑkpɛ gundɑ sɛdɑ wɔne ngɑ bumbum kunɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si nɑɑne Ikpɛ gɑɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ Ikpɛ tɛ tɑngɑrikom, domi ɑkpɛ si nɑɑne sɛdɑ kɑ Ikpɛ kɑɑndɑ ngɑ Izɑ bɔm.
62005011	Sɛdɑ di bine neyɑ. Ikpɛ nɑ i nɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni. À Ize kunɑ bine no hundɑ goono.
62005012	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ Ize, ɑ̀ gundɑ hundi di. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ Ikpɛ Ize, ɑ̀ sindɑ hundi di.
62005013	A nɑ wɔne yom hɑntum wom sɛ no, wom kɑ wom gɑ nɑɑne Ikpɛ Ize mɑɑ gɑɑ domi wom mɑ bei wom gundɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni. Wom mo nɑɑne Ikpɛ Ize mɑɑ gɑɑ.
62005014	I gɑ wɔne tɑbɑi ɑ̀ dɔ. De i go hɛ fɔ ŋmɑɑrɛ ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ binebɑɑ goono ndɑ, ɑ̀ go hɑngɑ dɑm i sɛ.
62005015	Zɑ kɑ i go bei Ikpɛ go hɑngɑ dɑm i sɛ hɛ fɔ kulu kɑ i gɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ, i go bei kɑ i du hɛ kulu kɑ i ŋmɑɑrɛ.
62005016	De bɔrɔ fɔ go di ngɑ nyɑize go dulum tɛ, dulum kɑ ɑ̀ si kpeindɑ bɔrɔ bu dɔ, ɑ̀ mɑ Ikpɛ ŋmɑɑrɛ ɑ̀ sɛ. Ikpɛ mɑ gɑ ɑ̀ no hundi. À gɑ ɑ̀ no beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ go dulum tɛ, dulum kɑ ɑ̀ si kpeindɑ bɔrɔ bu dɔ. Dulum goono kɑ ɑ̀ kpeindɑ bɔrɔ bu dɔ. Yɑ nɑ cii ɑ̀ mɑ ŋmɑɑrɛ dulum ngɑ di sɛ.
62005017	Zɑm kɑ cɛsusu kulu dulum nɑ Dulum mo goono kɑ ɑ̀ si kpeindɑ bɔrɔ bu dɔ.
62005018	I go bei kɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɛi Ikpɛ dɔ, ɑ̀ si bo dulum tɛ. Ammɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ hɛi Ikpɛ dɔ, ɑ̀ bo kɑ ngɑ bɔm jɛ no. Ilɑlɔ si ɑ̀ dii.
62005019	I go bei i yom wɔ Ikpɛ ŋmɔne yom no. Hɑndunyɑ mo kulu goono Ilɑlɔ dɑbɑri cire.
62005020	I bine go bei Ikpɛ Ize kɑɑ. À bine nɑ i no fɑhɑm hɑli i mɑ Ikpɛ cimi cimɑ bei. I bine goono ko gɔrɔ Cimi cimɑ kunɑ, ɑ̀ Ize Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kunɑ. Ngɑ yɑ ci Ikpɛ cimicimɑ ndɑ hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni.
62005021	Koo cɛnɑ yom, wɑ wom bɔm jɛ tooru yom gɑɑ. Ami.
63001001	Hɛɛ hɑikusu, hɛɛ yɑ go tirɑ wɔ hɑntum n sɛ weibɔrɔ suubɑntɛ, ni ndɑ n koo yom kɑ ɑ go bɑɑ cimi kunɑ. À bine mɑnɑ ci ɑ hinne yɑ go bɑɑ wom, ɑmmɑ bɔrɔ kulu mɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ cimi bei.
63001002	I kulu go bɑɑ wom, cimi kɑ ɑ̀ goono i kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ sɑbu sɛ. Cimi wɔ goono i bɑndɑ, beeniyom si.
63001003	Gomini ndɑ suuji ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne kɑ ǹ hunu zɑ Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ ndɑ Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Bɑɑbɑ Ize cimi kunɑ ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ, ǹ mo goono wom bɑndɑ.
63001004	A fɑihã kɑlɑ kɑlɑ ndɑ kɑ ɑ nɑ n ŋmɔne ize fɔ yom gɑru ǹ go dirɑ cimi kunɑ meire kɑ i du Bɑɑbɑ dɔ bɔm.
63001005	Mɑɑsɑ ni mo wei wɔ, ɑ go kɑ n ŋmɑɑrɛ i mɑ bɑɑ cɛrɛ. À mɑnɑ ci meire teji no ɑ gɑ hɑntum n sɛ, ɑmmɑ wɔne kɑ i du zɑ sintine no.
63001006	Wɔne yɑ ci bɑɑkɑsine, i mɑ dirɑ ɑ̀ meire yom bɔm. Meire noyɑ kɑ wom mɑɑ zɑ sintine wom mo dirɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ.
63001007	Zɑmbɑntɛ boobo huro hɑndunyɑ kunɑ, beerem kɑ ǹ si cii Yesu Amɑsihu kɑɑ no gɑɑhɑm kunɑ. Bɔrɔ yɑ di dimi zɑmbɑntɛ no, Amɑsihu zojikɑri no.
63001008	Wom mɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ wom bɔm hɑli hɛ kɑ i tɛ ɑ̀ mɑ si dɛrɛ i sɛ ɑmmɑ i mɑ du bɑnɑndi kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ.
63001009	Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑ si ndɑ Ikpɛ fɔndɑ, ngɑ ɑ̀ si gɔrɔ Mɛsiyɑ cɛbɛ kunɑ ɑkpɛ sindɑ Ikpɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono Mɛsiyɑ cɛbɛ kunɑ ndɑ gɔrɛ, ɑkpɛ wɔ gundɑ Bɑɑbɑ ndɑ Izɑ.
63001010	De bɔrɔ fɔ go kɑɑ wom dɔ, ngɑ ɑ̀ si kɑɑ ndɑ cɛbɛ ngɑ di, wom mɑ si ɑ̀ tɑ wom fuu kunɑ. Wom mɑ si ɑ̀ too mo ndɑ bɑrikɑ.
63001011	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑ̀ too ndɑ bɑrikɑ, ɑkpɛ huro ɑ̀ gbei lɑlɔ yom kunɑ noyɑ.
63001012	A gundɑ hɛ boobo kɑ hɑntum wom sɛ ɑmmɑ ɑ si bɑɑ yɑ ɑ̀ tɛ ndɑ tirɑ ndɑ hɑntumyom hɛ. A go bɑɑ yɑ kɑɑ wom dɔ kɑ sendi wom sɛ mee ndɑ mee domi i binekɑɑne mɑ tɔ.
63001013	N weimɑ suubɑntɛ, ɑ̀ koo yom go kɑ n fɔɔ. Ami.
64001001	Hɛɛ hɑikusu, hɛɛ yɑ go tirɑ wɔ hɑntum n sɛ Gɑyu, ni ɑ bine bɑɑkɔ kɑ ɑ gɑ bɑɑ cimi kunɑ.
64001002	A binebɑɑkɔ, ɑ go ŋmɑɑrɛ n mɑ du bɑrikɑ hɛ kulu kunɑ. N mo goono mo ndɑ gɑɑhɑm bɑɑni zɑngɑ n hundi goono bɑɑni kunɑ.
64001003	A fɑihã kɑlɑ kɑlɑ sɑɑ kɑ nyɑize yom kɑɑ kɑ tɛ sɛdɑ kɑ cii ni wɔ, n go cimi fɔndɑ gɑnɑ.
64001004	A sindɑ fɑihã bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bisɑ yɑ mɑɑ bɑɑru ɑ ize yom go dirɑ cimi kunɑ.
64001005	A binebɑɑkɔ, n ci nɑɑnekpɛ hɛ kulu kunɑ kɑ n go tɛ nyɑize yom sɛ, yɑ no bɑ nyɑize yo yom sɛ.
64001006	Ǹ nɑ n bɑɑkɑsine sɛdɑ tɛ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ jine. N gɑ kɑ ihinno tɛ de n go kɑmbɑzɑ tɛ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ sɑbɑ Ikpɛ sɛ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ tunu.
64001007	Ǹ go diro tɛ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ mɑɑ sɑbu sɛ. Ǹ mɑnɑ gɑɑkɑsine fɔ kulu tɑ dimi cindei dɔ.
64001008	Ngɑ di sɛ, ɑ̀ himɑ i yom mo i mɑ bɔrɔ yɑ di dimi yom gɑɑkɑsine domi i mɑ ci ǹ bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ yom ǹ gbei kunɑ cimi sɛ.
64001009	A nɑ tirɑ cɛnɑ fɔ hɑntum Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ sɛ ɑmmɑ Diotɑfɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ ci ǹ jinɑ, ɑ̀ si kɑ i sendi tɑ.
64001010	À sɛ no de ɑ kɑɑ, ɑ kɑɑ hɔngɔ gbei lɑlɔ yom kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ tɛ. À nɑ i sendi yɑmu kɑ futu i sɛ. Ngɑ di bine mɑnɑ wɑsɑ ɑ̀ sɛ, kɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ si nyɑize yom tɑ mo. Beerem kɑ ǹ go bɑɑ ngei mɑ ǹ tɑ mo, ɑ̀ go kɑ ǹ gɑnji kɑ ǹ gɑɑrɛ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ kunɑ.
64001011	A binebɑɑkɔ, n mɑ si ilɑlɔ dendeni ɑmmɑ n mɑ dendeni hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ boori. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go gbei hinno tɛ, Ikpɛ ŋmɔne no. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go gbei lɑlɔ tɛ mo, Ikpɛ no ɑ̀ mɑnɑ di.
64001012	Ǹ kulu tɛ sɛdɑ Dimitiyo sɛ ndɑ cimi bumbum mo. I yom mo i go tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ sɛdɑ. N bine bei i sɛdɑ yɑ cimi no.
64001013	A gundɑ hɛ boobo kɑ yɑ hɑntum n sɛ ɑmmɑ ɑ si bɑɑ yɑ hɑntum n sɛ ndɑ hɑntumyom hɑri ndɑ hɑntumyom hɛ.
64001014	A go bɛɛjɛ yɑ di ni, ɑ si jɛ, hɑli i mɑ sendi mee ndɑ mee.
64001015	Lɑɑkɑli kɑne mɑ goono n gɑɑ. I kpɑɑsi yom go kɑ n fɔɔ. N mɑ i kpɑɑsi yom kulu fɔɔ ndɑ ǹ mɑɑ yom.
65001001	Hɛɛ Yudɑ, Yesu Mɛsiyɑ tɑm ndɑ Yɑkɔfu nyɑize mɑ. Hɛɛ yɑ go tirɑ wɔ hɑntum beerem sɛ kɑ Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ cɛɛ. À nɑ ǹ hɑlɑɑlɑndi ko kɑ ǹ jɛ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ sɛ.
65001002	Suuji ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne ndɑ bɑɑkɑsine mo tɔntɔnu wom sɛ.
65001003	A binebɑɑkɔ yom, ɑ nɑ himmɑ kulu dɑm yɑ hɑntum wom sɛ fɑɑbɑ bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ i meigu cɛrɛ. À bine tilɑsi ɑ gɑɑ yɑ hɑntum wom sɛ kɑ wom no himmɑ wom mɑ tɑngɑm nɑɑne sɛ. Nɑɑne wɔ no Ikpɛ tɑlifi hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom gɑɑ ce fɔ pɑp.
65001004	Bɔrɔ fɔ yom mɔnɔ kɑ huro i gɑme kunɑ, beerem kɑ zɑ jɛyom ǹ ciitiyom kɑ zeeri goono hɑntumɑntɛ. Ngei yɑ ci beerem kɑ ǹ si kɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ. I ŋmɔne Ikpɛ gomini mo, ǹ go kɑ ɑ̀ bɛrɛ ndɑ hɑwizetɛrɛ. Ǹ go Kpe Ikpɛ fɔlɔnku kɑ ɑ̀ ci i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ ze.
65001005	Ammɑ bɑ kɑ wom jinɑ kɑ wɔne yom kulu bei, ɑ go bɑɑ mo yɑ wom hɔngɑndi Kpe nɑ ngɑ jɑmɑ fɑɑbɑ kɑ kɑɑ Eziputu lɑɑbu kɑmbɛ. À bɑndɑ ɑ̀ nɑ beerem kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ nɑɑne hɑlɑci.
65001006	Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom mo mɑnɑ lɑɑkɑli ndɑ ngei bɔm meire yom kɑlɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ngei bɔm gɔrɛ dɔ nɑm. Kpe nɑ ǹ jisi seseri yom gɑɑ, beeniyom si kube kunɑ ciiti hɑnu bɑmbɑtɑ sɛ.
65001007	Wɑ hɔngɔ mɑ Sodum kpɑɑrɑ ndɑ Gomorɑ kpɑɑrɑ ndɑ ǹ hundɑntɛ kpɑɑrɑ yom. Ǹ nɑ ngei bɔm dɑm zinɑ kunɑ zɑngɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize wɔne yom kɑ ceeci ngei mɑ kɑni ndɑ bɔrɔ yom kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ sɑbɑ ndɑ iburɑdɑm hɑɑli. Ǹ goono i jine zɑngɑ deedɑndi kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ ciiti ndɑ nini kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ beeniyom.
65001008	Yɑ no, beerem kɑ ǹ hɑndiri go kɑ ngei bineibɑɑi tunɑndi kɑ bɑ ǹ gɑɑhɑm yom ziibɑndi. Ǹ gɑ meire fɛntɛ ko bɛɛnɛ deizɑkpɛ yom woo.
65001009	Ammɑ sɑɑ kɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize beeri kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Misɛli kɑkɔ ndɑ Ibilisi kɑ simbɑ ndɑ Moisi bukɔ, ɑ̀ mɑnɑ tu kɑ kɑɑndɑ woobi ciiti ɑ̀ bɔm. Ammɑ ɑ̀ cii: Kɑlɑ Kpe mɑ ɑ̀ bɔgu ǹ bɔm.
65001010	Ammɑ beerem wɔ, hɛ yom kɑ ǹ si ǹ bei no ǹ go sendi yɑmu. Hɛ fɔ yom mo kɑ ǹ fɑhɑm hɑɑli gɑɑ zɑngɑ gɑnjihɑm yom kɑ ǹ sindɑ lɑɑkɑli, beerem ngei yom di go kɑ ngei bɔm fumbɑndi ǹ dɔ.
65001011	Kɑito beerem wɔ, domi Kɑinu fɔndɑ no ǹ gɑnɑ. Ǹ go zuuru mo kɑ huro Bɑlɑm dɛrɛyom kunɑ bɑnɑndi sɛ. Ǹ hɑlɑci mo Korɑ hunguyom kunɑ.
65001012	Ngei wɔ bɑrɑ no zɑngɑ tondi tugɑntɛ yom hɑri kunɑ wom nyɑizetɛrɛ jingɑru yom kunɑ. Ǹ si hɑmburu mo sɑɑ kɑ ǹ go jingɑru ŋmɑɑ ndɑ wom. Kurukɔ yom no kɑ ǹ go kɑ ngei bɔm hinne kurum. Ǹ goono no zɑngɑ buru yom kɑ ǹ sindɑ hɑri kɑ hɛo go feeni. Tuuri yom no kɑ ǹ sindɑ ize hemɑru wɑtɛ, ǹ dɔgu mo no. À sɛ no, ǹ bu ce hinkɑ.
65001013	Ǹ himɑ mɑ no zɑngɑ tɛku boosu yom futu ko kɑ ngei bɔm hɑwi kufu kɑɑtɛrɛ. Ǹ bɑrɑ zɑngɑ hɑndɑriyɑize bibirɑntɛ yom. Ikpɛ nɑ kube bi tici tici nungu kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ beeniyom jisi ǹ sɛ mo.
65001014	Ǹ sɛ no Henoku kɑ ɑ̀ ci Adɑmu hɑɑmɑ yom ŋmɔne bɔrɔ iyɑntɛ, ɑ̀ nɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ beerem sɛ kɑ cii: Gunɑ, Kpe go kɑɑ ndɑ ngɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ bɑkɑrɑ.
65001015	À gɑ kɑɑ nɑ kɑ ciiti ǹ kulu sɛ. À go kɑɑ kɑ beerem kulu kɑ ǹ si kɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ gbei lɑlɔ yom bɔgu ǹ bɔm. À go kɑɑ sendi futu yom kulu bɔgu ǹ bɔm kɑ dulumkoni yom kɑ ǹ si kɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ.
65001016	Ngei wɔ, gunugunukpɛ yom no ndɑ wuurukɔ yom. Ǹ gɑ kɑ ngei bineibɑɑi gɑnɑ. Fɑɑre sendi yom yɑ cini hunu ǹ mee yom kunɑ. Liibɑ fɔ sɛ no ǹ go meekɑɑne tɛ beerem sɛ.
65001017	Ammɑ wom wɔ, ɑ binebɑɑkɔ yom, wɑ hɔngɔ sendi yom kɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ diyɑ yom jinɑ kɑ cii.
65001018	Ǹ cii wom sɛ kɑ lɔkɑci beenɑntɛ dondɑcɛrɛkpɛ yom kɑɑ goono ko dirɑ ndɑ zɑngɑ ǹ zɑm kɑ Ikpɛ gɑnɑ ŋmɔne bɑɑyom futu goono ndɑ.
65001019	Ngei yɑ go feefee dɑm. Ǹ gɑ kɑ ngei dulum hɑɑli gɑnɑ. Ǹ sindɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ mo.
65001020	Ammɑ wom wɔ, ɑ binebɑɑkɔ yom, wɑ wom bɔm cini wom nɑɑne hɑlɑɑlɑ bɔm. Wɑ kɑ ɑduwɑ tɛ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ.
65001021	Wɑ wom bɔm jɛ Ikpɛ bɑɑkɑsine kunɑ ko kɑ i Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ suuji bɑtu hundi kɑ ɑ̀ si beeni sɛ.
65001022	Wɑ suuji cɛbɛ bɔrɔ fɔ yom kɑ ǹ go siikɑ sɛ.
65001023	Afɔ yom mo wɑ ǹ fɑɑbɑ ndɑ hɑmburu kɑ ǹ kɔm nini gɑɑ. Wo hungu bɑ ǹ jiine yom sɛ kɑ bineibɑɑi nɑ ǹ ziibɑndi.
65001024	Ikpɛ gundɑ dɑbɑri kɑ wom jɛ hɑli wom mɑ si kɑti. À gundɑ dɑbɑri kɑ wom cɛɑndi ngɑ deizɑ jine, tɑɑli si fɑihã bɑmbɑtɑ kunɑ.
65001025	Ikpɛ ngɑ fɔ yɑ ci hɑikusu, i Fɑɑbɑkɔ mo no. Deizɑ ndɑ bɛɛrɛ ndɑ dɑbɑri ndɑ hini, ǹ mo bɑrɑ ɑ̀ sɛ mɑɑsɑ ndɑ jiiri dubu ndɑ dubu yom. Ami.
66001001	Kɑɑyomtɛrɛ bɑɑru neyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go hunu Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ. Ikpɛ yɑ nɑ ɑ̀ no ɑ̀ mɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑtɛrɛ ngɑ tɑm yom sɛ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ ɑ̀ himɑ ǹ mɑ kɑɑ. À si jɛ mɑ. Mɛsiyɑ nɑ ngɑ dɔntɔneize sɑmbɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ǹ feeri ngɑ tɑm Yohɑnnɑ sɛ.
66001002	Yohɑnnɑ tɛ sɛdɑ hɛ kulu bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ di, wɑtom Ikpɛ Sendɑ ndɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ sɛdɑ.
66001003	Binekɑɑnekpɛ yom no beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ tirɑ wɔ coo ndɑ wɔ kɑ yom go mɑɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ sendi yom wɔ. Binekɑɑnekpɛ yom no zɑmɑ ǹ go sendi yom kɑ ǹ hɑntum tirɑ wɔ kunɑ zɑɑ kɑ gɑnɑ, domi lɔkɑci mɑɑni.
66001004	Hɛɛ Yohɑnnɑ, ɑ gɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ iye kɑ ǹ goono Azi lɑɑbu fɔɔ. Gomini ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne mo gɔrɔ wom bɑndɑ kɑ ǹ hunu ɑ̀ dɔ. À goono mɑɑsɑ. À goono dom. À go kɑɑ mɑ. Gomini ndɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne wɔ hunu mo Biyɑ iyɑ dɔ kɑ ǹ goono ɑ̀ kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ jine.
66001005	Ǹ hunu mo Yesu Mɛsiyɑ dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci sɛdɑ nɑɑnekpɛ. Bɔrɔ sintine kɑ Ikpɛ tunɑndi bukɔei gɑme. Ngɑ yɑ gundɑ dɑbɑri hɑndunyɑ wɔ kpe yom kulu bɔm. A go bɑɑ i yom. À nɑ i nyume i dulum yom gɑɑ ndɑ ngɑ kuri.
66001006	À nɑ i dɑm i mɑ tɛ kpe yom ndɑ gɑrɑndikɔ yom ngɑ Bɑɑbɑ Ikpɛ sɛ. Deizɑ ndɑ dɑbɑri mɑ ci ɑ̀ ŋmɔne yom jiiri dubu ndɑ dubu yom. Ami.
66001007	Gunɑ, ɑ̀ go kɑɑ ndɑ bɛɛnɛ buru yom. Moo kulu kɑɑ di ɑ̀, bɑ wɔ kɑ yom nɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑru. Hɑndunyɑ dimi kulu kɑɑ wuuru ɑ̀ sɑbu sɛ. Oò. Ami.
66001008	Hɛɛ yɑ ci A ndɑ Z, sintine ndɑ beenɑntɛ. Kpe kɑ ɑ̀ ci Dɑbɑri kulu Kpe cii yɑ di, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono mɑɑsɑ. À goono dom. À go kɑɑ mɑ.
66001009	Hɛɛ Yohɑnnɑ wom nyɑize, ɑ̀ gundɑ bɑ wom bɑndɑ guruguze kunɑ ndɑ Yesu Mɛsiyɑ kpetɛrɛ kunɑ ndɑ suuru hiniyom kɑ ɑ̀ goono Yesu kunɑ. A goono ndɑ gɔrɛ hɔndɛ tɑɑsi kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Pɑtɛmosi Ikpɛ Sendɑ ndɑ sɛdɑ tɛyom Yesu bɔm sɑbu sɛ.
66001010	Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ nɑ ɑ dii Kpe Hɑnu hine, cɔfɔ ɑ mɑɑ jinde beeri fɔ ɑ bɑndɑ zɑngɑ kuluu.
66001011	À cii: Hɛɛ yɑ ci A ndɑ sintine ndɑ beenɑntɛ. Hɛ kɑ n go di, n mɑ ɑ̀ hɑntum tirɑ kunɑ. N mɑ ɑ̀ sɑmbɑ Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ iye wɔ sɛ kɑ ǹ goono Azi lɑɑbu, wɑtom Efese mɑrgɑ ndɑ Siminu mɑrgɑ ndɑ Pɛgɑmi mɑrgɑ ndɑ Tiyɑtire mɑrgɑ ndɑ Sɑdisu mɑrgɑ ndɑ Filɑdɛlifi mɑrgɑ ndɑ Lɑudise mɑrgɑ.
66001012	A zogu kɑ gunɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ jinde sendi ɑ sɛ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ zogu, cɔfɔ ɑ di wurɑ fitilɑ dɛcɛyom dɔ iye.
66001013	Fitilɑ dɛcɛyom dɔ iye di bindi kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ goono zɑngɑ Adɑmize. À gundɑ kpɛ kuku fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ kɑlɑ ɑ̀ cee tɑɑmu gɑɑ. Wurɑ kunɑcendi goono ɑ̀ jɛndɛ bɔm.
66001014	À bɔm ndɑ ɑ̀ bɔm hɑmini kulu kpɑrɛ zɑngɑ hɑɑbu tɑɑfɑ, ikpɑrɛ tɑi tɑi tɑi. À moo yom mo goono zɑngɑ nini bɛllɛ.
66001015	À cee yom go nɛɛrɛ zɑngɑ guuru cire kɑ ǹ deni. À jinde mo himɑ zɑngɑ hɑri bɑmbɑtɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go dendi.
66001016	À gundɑ hɑndɑriyɑize iye ngɑ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ kunɑ. Hɛ fɔ go hunu ɑ̀ mee kunɑ zɑngɑ tɑkubɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑni kɑlɑ kɑlɑ. À moodumɑ himɑ zɑngɑ weenu kɑ ɑ̀ goono ngɑ dɑbɑri kunɑ ko kɑɑri.
66001017	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ di ɑ̀, ɑ kɑm ɑ̀ jine zɑngɑ bukɔ. À nɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ dɛcɛ ɑ bɔm kɑ cii: Si hɑmburu. Hɛɛ yɑ ci Sintine ndɑ Beenɑntɛ.
66001018	Hɛɛ yɑ ci Hundikpɛ. A bu no dom, mɑɑsɑ bine ɑ bo hunɑ jiiri dubu ndɑ dubu yom. Ami. A gundɑ ciyomɑ ndɑ bu lɑntɑnɑize yom.
66001019	N mɑ hɑntum hɛ kɑ n di ndɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ goono mɑɑsɑ ndɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ bɑ kɑɑ hɛ yom di bɑndɑ.
66001020	Hɑndɑriyɑize iye wɔ kɑ n di ɑ̀ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ kunɑ ndɑ wurɑ fitilɑ dɛcɛyom dɔ iye wɔ, ǹ duje neyɑ. Hɑndɑriyɑize yom di Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ iye di ŋmɔne dɔntɔneize yom no. Fitilɑ dɛcɛyom dɔ iye wɔ mo Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ iyɑ noyɑ.
66002001	N mɑ wɔne hɑntum Efese Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ dɔntɔneize sɛ kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hɑndɑriyɑize iyɑ dii ngɑ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ kunɑ ko dirɑ wurɑ fitilɑ dɛcɛyom dɔ iye di bindi kunɑ. À sendi kɑ cii:
66002002	A go bei hɛ yom kɑ n cini tɛ ndɑ gbei gɑɑbɔ ndɑ n suuru. A go bei kɑ n si hini kɑ hɑnyɑ futu yom jɛrɛ. Beerem mo kɑ ǹ gɑ cii nge yom yɑ diyɑ yom no, ǹ bine mɑnɑ ci diyɑ yom. N nɑ ǹ bubure. N bine nɑ ǹ gɑru tɑngɑrikom yom.
66002003	A bei mo n nɑ himmɑ dɑm. N gundɑ suuru mɑ. N mo gbei dungɔ tɛ ɑ mɑɑ sɑbu sɛ. N bine mɑnɑ fɑrigɑ.
66002004	Ammɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ si sɑbɑ hɛɛ ndɑ ni gɑme yɑ ci kɑ n fee ndɑ n sintine bɑɑkɑsine.
66002005	N mɑ hɔngɔ n kɑmyom dɔ kɑ tuubi. N mɑ sintine gbei yom tɛ. De ɑ̀ nɑ ci yɑ, ɑ go kɑɑ n dɔ mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ kɑ n fitilɑ gɑnɑndi ɑ̀ gurubi kɑlɑ de n tuubi.
66002006	Ammɑ wɔne goono n gɑɑ. Ngɑ yɑ ci kɑ n bine hungu Nikolɑte yom gbei, gbei kɑ hɛɛ bumbum ɑ bine go hungu.
66002007	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ hɑngɑ dɑm kɑ mɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ mɑɑ fɑ hɛ kɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ gɑ cii Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ yom sɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ gɑɑŋmɑɑ, ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ no fɔndɔ ɑ̀ mɑ ŋmɑɑ tuuri kɑ ɑ̀ hundi no gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono Nungu Hinno bɛɛnɛ kunɑ Ikpɛ dɔ.
66002008	N mɑ wɔne hɑntum Siminu Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ dɔntɔneize sɛ kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Sintine ndɑ Beenɑntɛ, wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bu kɑ ɑ̀ ye kɑ hunɑ go sendi.
66002009	À go cii: A go kɑ n gbei yom ndɑ n tɑɑbi ndɑ n tɑlikɑtɛrɛ bei, ɑmmɑ n gundɑ hɑibɑrikɑ. Beerem go cii ngei yɑ Yuifu yom no, ǹ bine mɑnɑ ci Yuifu yom. A bei woobi kɑ ǹ go tɛ n sɛ. Beerem nge yom di Setɑm mɑrgɑ bɔrɔ yom no.
66002010	N mɑ si hɑmburu hɛ yom kɑ n bɑ guruguze ndei. Gunɑ, wom kunɑ ɑfɔ yom Ibilisi bɑ kɑ ǹ dɑm kɑsu zɑmɑ ǹ mɑ wom bubure. Wom kɑɑ mɑɑ tɑɑbi jiribi wei. N mɑ gɔrɔ nɑɑnekpɛ kɑlɑ bu. A gɑ n no hundi tukunsi fulɑ.
66002011	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ hɑngɑ dɑm kɑ mɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ mɑɑ fɑ hɛ kɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ gɑ cii Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ yom sɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ gɑɑŋmɑɑ, ɑ̀ si tɑɑbi pɑi ndɑ bu hinkɑntɛ.
66002012	N mɑ wɔne hɑntum Pɛgɑmi Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ dɔntɔneize sɛ kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ tɑkubɑ meekɑɑnɔkpɛ, ɑ̀ gɑ sendi.
66002013	À go cii: A go kɑ n gbei bei ndɑ nungu kɑ n goono ndɑ gɔrɛ. Nodi no Setɑm kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ goono. N go kɑ ɑ mɑɑ jɛrɛ. N mɑnɑ ɑ nɑɑne ze bɑ hɑnu kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ sɛdɑ nɑɑnekpɛ Antipɑsu wi. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ wi wom gɑme, nungu kɑ Setɑm goono ndɑ gɔrɛ.
66002014	Ammɑ ɑ gundɑ hɛ fɔ yom kɑ ǹ si sɑbɑ hɛɛ ndɑ ni gɑme. N gundɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go Bɑlɑm cɛbɛ gɑnɑ. Bɑlɑm yɑ nɑ Bɑlɑki dendenɑndi ɑ̀ mɑ dɛrɛyom hɛ jisi Isirɑilɑ ize yom jine. À nɑ ǹ dɛrɑndi hɑli ǹ mɑ hɑm kɑ ǹ sɑrɑɑ tooru yom gɑɑ ŋmɑɑ kɑ zinɑ tɛ mɑ.
66002015	Yɑ no, ni mo n gundɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go Nikolɑte yom cɛbɛ gɑnɑ, cɛbɛ di kɑ ɑ bine go hungu.
66002016	N mɑ tuubi fɑ. De ɑ̀ nɑ ci yɑ, ɑ gɑ kɑɑ n dɔ mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ yɑ wɑngu ndei, ɑ mee sendi kɑ ɑ̀ ci zɑngɑ tɑkubɑ gɑɑ.
66002017	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ hɑngɑ dɑm kɑ mɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ mɑɑ fɑ hɛ kɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ go cii Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ yom sɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go gɑɑŋmɑɑ, ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ no mɑɑnɛ tugɑntɛ kɑ ɑ̀ ci ŋmɑɑri dimi fɔ. A gɑ ɑkpɛ no tondiize kpɑrɛ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ ǹ nɑ mɑɑ teji fɔ hɑntum kɑ bɔrɔ kulu si hini kɑ ɑ̀ bei kɑlɑ ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ du ɑ̀.
66002018	N mɑ wɔne hɑntum Tiyɑtire Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ dɔntɔneize sɛ kɑ cii: Ikpɛ Ize kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ mɑɑ yom zɑngɑ nini bɛllɛ, ɑ̀ cee mɑ go nɛɛrɛ zɑngɑ guuru ciire kɑ ǹ deni, ɑ̀ go sendi.
66002019	A go cii: A go kɑ n gbei yom bei ndɑ n bɑɑkɑsine ndɑ n tɑmtɛrɛ ndɑ n nɑɑne ndɑ n himmɑ. A bei kɑ n go gbei tɛ kɑ bisɑ sintine ŋmɔne yom.
66002020	Ammɑ ɑ gundɑ hɛ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ si sɑbɑ hɛɛ ndɑ ni gɑme. Weibɔrɔ wɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Yezɑbɛli kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ cii ngɑ yɑ ɑndebi nɑ, n gɑ nɑm ɑ̀ mɑ ɑ tɑm yom cooɑndi. À nɑ ǹ dɛrɑndi hɑli ǹ nɑ zinɑ tɛ kɑ hɛ kɑ ǹ gɑrɑndi tɑɑru yom gɑɑ ŋmɑɑ.
66002021	A nɑ ɑ̀ nɑ dɑɑmɑ hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ tuubi. À bine si bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ tuubi kɑ fee ndɑ zinɑ.
66002022	Gunɑ, ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ cetu dɑɑri bɔm, ngɑ ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go zinɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ. A gɑ ǹ cetu tɑɑbi bɑmbɑtɑ kunɑ de ǹ si tuubi kɑ fee ndɑ ngei gbei lɑlɔ yom.
66002023	A gɑ ɑ̀ koo yom kɑru kɑ wi. Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ yom kulu kɑɑ bei hɛɛ yɑ ci wɔ kɑ ɑ go bine ndɑ lɑsɑbu gunɑ. A kɑɑ wom bɔrɔ fɔ fɔ kulu bɑnɑ ɑ̀ gbei yom bɔm.
66002024	Ammɑ ɑ gɑ sendi wom sɛ ndɑ Tiyɑtire mɑrgɑ bɔrɔ cindei sɛ, wom kɑ wom mɑnɑ cɛbɛ wɔ gɑnɑ. Wom mɑnɑ bei mo hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ǹ cini cii Setɑm gunde guuse yom. Ammɑ ɑ si jɛrɔ ŋmɑni fɔ dɛcɛ wom bɔm.
66002025	Hɛ kɑ wom gundɑ di, wom mo kɑ ɑ̀ jɛ hɑli yɑ kɑɑ.
66002026	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go gɑɑŋmɑɑ kɑ ɑ gbei yom jɛ hɑli beenɑntɛ, ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ no hini dimi yom bɔm.
66002027	Ikpɛ go ǹ kurum ndɑ guuru goobu kɑ ǹ tutubu zɑngɑ lɑɑbu kusu yom. Hɛɛ bumbum, ɑ du hini wɔ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ dɔ.
66002028	À gɑ ɑ no mo boyom hɑndɑriyɑize mo.
66002029	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ hɑngɑ dɑm kɑ mɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ mɑɑ fɑ hɛ kɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ go cii Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ yom sɛ.
66003001	N mɑ wɔne hɑntum Sɑdisu Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ dɔntɔneize sɛ kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ Ikpɛ biyɑ iyɑ ndɑ hɑndɑriyɑize iyɑ gɑ sendi. À go cii: A go kɑ n gbei yom bei. N gundɑ mɑɑ kɑ ni yɑ hundikoni no, ɑmmɑ ni yɑ bukɔ no.
66003002	N mɑ bɑtu fɑ. Hɛ yom kɑ ǹ cindi kɑ ǹ bɑ bu, n mɑ ǹ gɑɑbɑndi. A mɑnɑ n gbei yom gɑru tɔɑntɛ Ikpɛ jine.
66003003	Ngɑ di sɛ, n mɑ hɔngɔ hɛ kɑ n du ndɑ hɛ kɑ n mɑɑ. N mɑ ǹ jɛ. N mɑ tuubi mɑ. Bine, de n mɑnɑ bɑtu, ɑ go kɑɑ zɑngɑ zee. N si bei mo guuru kɑ ɑ go kɑɑ kɑ n jirisi.
66003004	Ammɑ ɑ go bɔrɔ fɔ yom mɑɑ bei Sɑdisu mɑrgɑ kunɑ kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ngei jiine yom ziibɑndi. Ǹ kɑɑ dirɑ ɑ bɑndɑ ndɑ jiine kpɑrɛ yom, zɑmɑ ǹ tɔ ɑ̀ tɛyom.
66003005	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ gɑɑŋmɑɑ, ɑ̀ gɑɑ no ɑ kɑɑ jiine kpɑrɛ dɑm. A si ɑkpɛ mɑɑ tusu kɑ wi pɑi Hundi Tirɑ kunɑ. A gɑ ɑkpɛ mɑɑ cii ɑ Bɑɑbɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔneize yom jine.
66003006	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ hɑngɑ dɑm kɑ mɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ mɑɑ fɑ hɛ kɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ gɑ cii Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ yom sɛ.
66003007	N mɑ wɔne hɑntum Filɑdɛlifi Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ dɔntɔneize sɛ kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Hɑlɑɑlɑkpɛ, kɑ ɑ̀ ci Cimikpɛ mo, ɑ̀ gundɑ Dɑfidi kpetɛrɛ lɑntɑnɑize. À go sendi. Hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go feeri, bɔrɔ fɔ kulu si hini kɑ ɑ̀ dɑɑbu. Hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go dɑɑbu, bɔrɔ fɔ kulu si hini kɑ ɑ̀ feeri.
66003008	À go cii: A go kɑ n gbei yom bei. Gunɑ, ɑ nɑ fɔndɔ mee feerɑntɛ dɑm n jine kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu si hini kɑ ɑ̀ dɑɑbu. A nɑ ɑ̀ dɑm zɑmɑ n gundɑ dɑbɑri cɛnɑ, n nɑ ɑ sendɑ jɛ. N mɑnɑ ɑ mɑɑ ze.
66003009	Gunɑ, Setɑm mɑrgɑ kunɑ bɔrɔ fɔ yom goono kɑ ǹ gɑ cii ngei yɑ Yuifu yom no, n bine mɑnɑ ci Yuifu yom. Ammɑ ǹ go tɑngɑri tɛ. A gɑ ǹ dɑm ǹ mɑ kɑɑ sɔmbu n jine ǹ mɑ bei kɑ ɑ bɑɑ ni.
66003010	Zɑ kɑ n nɑ ɑ sendɑ jɛ ko himmɑ dɑm, ɑ gɑ n jɛ bubureyom lɔkɑci kɑ ɑ̀ bɑ kɑɑ hɑndunyɑ mee ndɑ mee bɔm kɑ hɑndunyɑ beerem bubure.
66003011	Gunɑ, ɑ go kɑɑ mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ. N mɑ hɛ kɑ n gundɑ dii kɑ jɛ hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ boori zɑmɑ bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ mɑ si n tukunsi fulɑ kɔm.
66003012	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go gɑɑŋmɑɑ, ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ tɛ kɑɑsɑ ɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ goonoyom dɔ kunɑ. À bine si hunu kpɛɛnɛ. A gɑ ɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ mɑɑ hɑntum ɑ̀ gɑɑ ndɑ ɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ wɑngɑrɑ mɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Yerusɑlɛm teji kɑ ɑ̀ zumbu zɑ bɛɛnɛ ɑ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ dɔ. A gɑ ɑ mɑɑ teji hɑntum ɑ̀ gɑɑ mo.
66003013	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ hɑngɑ dɑm kɑ mɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ mɑɑ fɑ hɛ kɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ go cii Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ yom sɛ.
66003014	N mɑ wɔne hɑntum Lɑudise Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ dɔntɔneize sɛ kɑ cii: Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Ami, sɛdɑ nɑɑnekpɛ ndɑ cimikpɛ, kɑ ɑ̀ ci Ikpɛ tɑkɑhɛ kulu kɑɑji go sendi.
66003015	À go cii: A go kɑ n gbei yom bei. A bei kɑ n mɑnɑ yee, n mɑnɑ dungu. A go bɑɑ n mɑ yee wɑlɑ n mɑ dungu.
66003016	Zɑ kɑ n goono bindi bindi, n mɑnɑ yee, n mɑnɑ dungu, ɑ bɑ kɑ n yeeri kɑ kɑɑ ɑ mee kunɑ.
66003017	Ammɑ n go cii: A gundɑ hɑibɑrikɑ. A go tɔntɔnu ɑ hɑibɑrikɑ gɑɑ. A sindɑ hɛ kulu murɑdu. Ammɑ n si bei mɑ kɑ ni yɑ ɑlfukɑru no. Ni yɑ sisibiize no. Ni yɑ tɑlikɑ no, dɑnɑm mo. N goono bumbum.
66003018	A go kɑ n nɑ sendi n mɑ wurɑ kɑ ǹ bubure nini kunɑ dei ɑ dɔ n mɑ du kɑ ci hɑibɑrikɑntɛ. N mɑ jiine kpɑrɛ dei ɑ dɔ mɑ kɑ dɑm beerem mɑ si di n hɑwi kɑ n gundɑ zɑmɑ n goono bumbum. N mɑ mɑɑ sɑfɑri mo dei ɑ dɔ kɑ dɑm n moo kunɑ zɑmɑ n mɑ du kɑ di.
66003019	Beerem kulu kɑ ɑ go bɑɑ, ɑ go kɑ ǹ kɔnkɔm. A gɑ kɑ ǹ foorɑ. Ngɑ di sɛ n mɑ tɛ himmɑ kɑ tuubi.
66003020	Gunɑ, ɑ gɑ cɛ gɑmbu mee gɑɑ kɑ kɑru. De bɔrɔ fɔ mɑɑ ɑ jinde kɑ ngɑ gɑmbu mee feeri, ɑ kɑɑ huro ɑ̀ dɔ kɑ ŋmɑɑ ndɑ. Akpɛ mo mɑ ŋmɑɑ ndɑ hɛɛ.
66003021	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go gɑɑŋmɑɑ, ɑ gɑ ɑkpɛ gɔrɛndi ɑ bɑndɑ ɑ kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ bɔm zɑngɑ hɛɛ mo, ɑ gɑɑŋmɑɑ kɑ gɔrɔ ɑ Bɑɑbɑ bɑndɑ ɑ̀ kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ bɔm.
66003022	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ hɑngɑ dɑm kɑ mɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ mɑɑ fɑ hɛ kɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ gɑ cii Mɛsiyɑ mɑrgɑ yom sɛ.
66004001	Nge yom di bɑndɑ ɑ gunɑ. Cɔfɔ ɑ di gɑmbu feerɑntɛ fɔ bɛɛnɛ kunɑ. Sintine jinde kɑ ɑ mɑɑ goono zɑngɑ kuluu jinde kɑ ɑ̀ go sendi ɑ sɛ. À go cii: Kɑɑru kɑ kɑɑ nee. Yɑ n cɛbɛ hɛ yom kɑ tilɑsi ǹ mɑ kɑɑ tɛ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ.
66004002	Mefɔ mefɔ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ nɑ ɑ dii. Cɔfɔ kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ fɔ goono bɛɛnɛ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ bɔm Bɔrɔ fɔ gɑ gɔrɔ.
66004003	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ gɔrɔ di tɑkɑi goono zɑngɑ tondi fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ yɑsipi ndɑ ɑfɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ sɑdisu. Sɛjɛrɛ fɔ mɑ nɑ kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ koli kɑ hundi. Sɛjɛrɑ himɑ zɑngɑ tondi boogu fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ emelodu.
66004004	Kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ di hundɑntɛ, ɑ di kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ wɑrɑnkɑ cindi tɑɑci kpɛɛnɛ. Ǹ bɔm mɑ ɑ di hɑikusu wɑrɑnkɑ cindi tɑɑci gɑ gɔrɔ. Ǹ nɑ kpɛ kpɑrɛ yom dɑm. Ǹ bɔm yom gɑɑ mɑ ɑ di wurɑ kpetɛrɛ fulɑ yom.
66004005	Kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ kunɑ jinde yom ndɑ bɛɛnɛ kɑɑti yom ndɑ nyɑlɑu yom go hunu. Yugulɑ iye mo go di ɑ̀ jine. Ikpɛ biyɑ iye di nɑ.
66004006	Kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ jine hɛ fɔ goono zɑngɑ bɑngu hɑri kɑ ɑ̀ kɑni yelem yelem zɑngɑ diji kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ kilisitɑli tondi. Kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ bindi ndɑ ɑ̀ hundɑntɛ hundikoni tɑɑci goono kɑ ǹ gundɑ mɑɑ yom jine ndɑ bɑndɑ.
66004007	Sintine hundikonɑ himɑ muusu beeri, ihinkɑntɛ mɑ himɑ zɑngɑ hɑuize. Hundikoni hinzɑntɛ gundɑ moodumɑ zɑngɑ bɔrɔ. Itɑɑcɑntɛ di mɑ goono zɑngɑ zebɑni kɑ ɑ̀ go deesi.
66004008	Hundikoni tɑɑci di ɑfɔ kulu gundɑ fɑtɑ idu. Ǹ gundɑ mɑɑ yom mo nungu kulu. Ciini ndɑ zɑɑri ǹ cini ko cii, cɛyom si: "Ikpɛ Dɑbɑri kulu Kpe, n ci hɑlɑɑlɑ, hɑlɑɑlɑ, hɑlɑɑlɑ. N goono zɑ dom. N goono mɑɑsɑ, N gɑ kɑɑ mɑ."
66004009	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ gɔrɔ kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ di bɔm bɑ hunɑ no jiiri dubu ndɑ dubu yom. Hundikoni tɑɑci di go kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi kɑ bɛɛrɛ tɛ ɑ̀ sɛ ndɑ sɑɑbuyom.
66004010	Sɑɑ ngɑ di hɑikusu wɑrɑnkɑ cindi tɑɑci di mo go jɛndɛbiri Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go gɔrɔ kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ di bɔm sɛ. Ǹ gɑ wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hunɑ jiiri dubu ndɑ dubu yom di bɛɛrɑndi kɑ ngei kpetɛrɛ fulɑ yom jindo ɑ̀ jine.
66004011	Ǹ go cii: "Kpe, n tɔ n mɑ du deizɑ ndɑ bɛɛrɛ ndɑ dɑbɑri zɑmɑ ni, n nɑ hɛ kulu tɑkɑ. N binebɑɑ kunɑ mo no ǹ goono. N binebɑɑ kunɑ nɑ n nɑ ǹ tɑkɑ."
