66005001	A di tirɑ kunkunɑntɛ fɔ mɑ Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go gɔrɔ kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ bɔm ɑ̀ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ. Ǹ hɑntum tirɑ di kunɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ gɑɑ. Ǹ nɑ sɛdɑ iye mo dɑm kɑ ɑ̀ dɑɑbu.
66005002	A di Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize gɑɑbikoni fɔ mo kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kuwɑ ndɑ jinde beeri. À cii: Mee yɑ tɔ ɑ̀ mɑ tirɑ wɔ feeri kɑ ɑ̀ sɛdɑ yom pɑti?
66005003	Ammɑ bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ bɛɛnɛ kunɑ, wɑlɑ gɑndɑ wɔ bɔm wɑlɑ gɑndɑ wɔ cire mɑnɑ hini kɑ tirɑ di feeri wɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ coo wɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gunɑ.
66005004	Cɔfɔ ɑ gɑ hɛ kɑlɑ kɑlɑ ndɑ kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ du bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ hini kɑ tirɑ di feeri kɑ kɑ ɑ̀ coo wɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gunɑ.
66005005	Hɑikusu yom di kunɑ ɑfɔ bine cii ɑ sɛ: Si hɛ. Gunɑ, Muusu Beeri kɑ ɑ̀ ci Yudɑ dimi, Dɑfidi kɑɑji, ɑ̀ gɑɑŋmɑɑ hɑli ɑ̀ hini kɑ tirɑ di feeri kɑ ɑ̀ sɛdɑ iyɑ pɑti.
66005006	A di Feejiize fɔ zɑngɑ hɛ kɑ ǹ nɑ dumbu no. À go cɛ kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ ndɑ hundikoni tɑɑcɑ ndɑ hɑikusu yom di bindi bindi. À gundɑ hilli iye ndɑ moo iye kɑ ǹ ci Ikpɛ biyɑ iye kɑ Ikpɛ sɑmbɑ gɑndɑ wɔ kulu bɔm.
66005007	Feejiize di kɑɑ. Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ tirɑ di zɑɑ, tirɑ di kɑ ɑ̀ goono Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go gɔrɔ kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ bɔm kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ.
66005008	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ tirɑ di zɑɑ, hundikoni tɑɑcɑ ndɑ hɑikusu wɑrɑnkɑ cindi tɑɑcɑ jɛndɛbiri Feejiize di jine. Ǹ kunɑ ɑfɔ kulu gundɑ mɔlɔ ndɑ wurɑ combu yom kɑ ǹ tɔ ndɑ wɑidi tɔnuyom. Wɑidi wɔ himɑ zɑngɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom ɑduwɑ yom.
66005009	Ǹ gɑ betu teji fɔ tɛ ko cii: Ni, n tɔ n mɑ tirɑ di zɑɑ kɑ sɛdɑ yom pɑti, zɑmɑ ǹ nɑ n dumbu. N kuri gɑɑ no n nɑ i fɑnsɑ Ikpɛ sɛ dimi kulu kunɑ ndɑ dɛɛnɛ kulu kunɑ ndɑ jɑmɑ kulu kunɑ ndɑ lɑɑbu kulu kunɑ.
66005010	N nɑ i tɛ kpe yom ndɑ gɑrɑndikɔ yom i ŋmɔne Ikpɛ sɛ. I kɑɑ kpetɛrɛ ŋmɑɑ gɑndɑ wɔ bɔm.
66005011	A gunɑ kpɛɛnɛ. Cɔfɔ ɑ mɑɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize bɑɑbɑ jinde kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ hundɑntɛ ndɑ hundikoni yom ndɑ hɑikusu yom di. Ǹ tɔ bɔrɔ dubu ndɑ dubu wei yom.
66005012	Ǹ go cii ndɑ jinde beeri: Feejiize kɑ ǹ dumbu yɑ tɔ ɑ̀ mɑ du dɑbɑri ndɑ hɑibɑrikɑ ndɑ hɑikusutɛrɛ ndɑ gɑɑbi ndɑ bɛɛrɛ ndɑ deizɑ ndɑ sɑɑbuyom.
66005013	Tɑkɑhɛ kulu mo kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ kunɑ ndɑ gɑndɑ wɔ bɔm ndɑ gɑndɑ wɔ cire ndɑ tɛku bɔm ndɑ hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono hɑndunyɑ bɔm, ǹ kulu cii: Sɑɑbuyom ndɑ bɛɛrɛ ndɑ deizɑ ndɑ dɑbɑri mɑ bɑrɑ ɑ̀ sɛ, Ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go gɔrɔ kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ bɔm ndɑ Feejiize di mo sɛ jiiri dubu ndɑ dubu yom.
66005014	Cɔfɔ hundikoni tɑɑci di sɑbɑ kɑ cii: Ami. Hɑikusu wɑrɑnkɑ cindi tɑɑci di mɑ jɛndɛbiri Hundikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ beeniyom sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi.
66006001	A di Feejiize go sɛdɑ iye di kunɑ ɑfɔ pɑti. Cɔfɔ ɑ mɑɑ hundikoni tɑɑci di ǹ ŋmɔne ɑfɔ jinde zɑngɑ bɛɛnɛ kɑɑtiyom. À cii: Kɑɑ di.
66006002	A gunɑ. Cɔfɔ ɑ di bɑri kpɑrɛ fɔ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑru di gundɑ biro fɔ. Ǹ nɑ kpetɛrɛ fulɑ fɔ nɑ ɑ̀ sɛ. À hunu gɑɑŋmɑɑkɔ gɑɑŋmɑɑyom sɛ.
66006003	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ sɛdɑ hinkɑntɛ pɑti, ɑ mɑɑ hundikoni hinkɑntɛ cii: Kɑɑ di.
66006004	Bɑri ŋmɑni fɔ mɑ hunu. Iciire zɑngɑ nini no. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɔrɔ ɑ̀ bɔm di, ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ nɑ dɑbɑri ɑ̀ mɑ lɑɑkɑli kɑne kɑɑ hɑndunyɑ wɔ bɔm zɑmɑ beerem mɑ cɛrɛ wi. Ǹ nɑ tɑkubɑ beeri fɔ nɑ ɑ̀ sɛ.
66006005	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ sɛdɑ hinzɑntɑ pɑti, ɑ mɑɑ hundikoni hinzɑntɑ cii: Kɑɑ di. A gunɑ. Cɔfɔ ɑ di bɑri bi fɔ hunu. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑru di gundɑ neesiji fɔ ngɑ kɑmbɛ gɑɑ.
66006006	Cɔfɔ ɑ mɑɑ jinde fɔ hundikoni tɑɑcɑ bindi. A cii: mɔsɔngu tongolo fɔ yɑ sɑbɑ ndɑ zɑɑri fɔ gbei bɑnɑndi. Mɔsɔngu dimi ŋmɑni tongolo hinzɑ mɑ yɑ sɑbɑ ndɑ zɑɑri fɔ gbei bɑnɑndi, ɑmmɑ jii ndɑ dufɛ wom mɑ si ǹ sɑrɑ.
66006007	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ sɛdɑ tɑɑcɑntɑ pɑti, ɑ mɑɑ hundikoni tɑɑcɑntɑ jinde cii: Kɑɑ di.
66006008	A gunɑ. Cɔfɔ ɑ di bɑri kpɑrɛ kpɑrɛ fɔ hunu. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑru di, ɑ̀ mɑɑ no bu. Ciyomɑ mo go kɑ ɑ̀ dum. Ǹ nɑ ǹ nɑ hini gɑndɑ wɔ fɑrisime tɑɑcɑntɛ bɔm ǹ mɑ beerem wi ndɑ tɑkubɑ ndɑ hɛrɛɛ ndɑ bu ndɑ gɑndɑ wɔ gɑnjihɑm futu yom.
66006009	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ sɛdɑ guɑntɛ pɑti, beerem kɑ Ikpɛ Sendi sɑbu sɛ ndɑ sɛdɑ kɑ ǹ tɛ sɑbu sɛ ǹ nɑ ǹ wi, ɑ di ǹ hundi yom bɑndɑ tɑndɑ gɑrɑndi tɛyom dɔ cire.
66006010	Ǹ kuwɑ ndɑ jinde beeri kɑ cii: E Kpe beeri, ni yɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑkpɛ ndɑ Cimikpɛ nɑ. Hɑli sɑɑ fɔ no n kɑɑ hɑndunyɑ bɔrɔ yom ciiti kɑ fɑɑsɑ i sɛ ndɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ i kuri munu?
66006011	Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ kulu no kpɛ kpɑrɛ kuku. Ǹ cii ǹ sɛ ǹ mɑ hulonzom lɔkɑci cɛnɑ fɔ hɑli ǹ bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ yom gbei kunɑ ndɑ ǹ nyɑize yom kɑ ǹ bɑ kɑ ǹ wi zɑngɑ yɑ, jɑmɑ di kulu mɑ kube.
66006012	A gunɑ. A di ɑ̀ go sɛdɑ iduɑntɛ pɑti. Cɔfɔ gɑndɑ zinjiyom bɑmbɑtɑ tɛ. Weenu ye ibi zɑngɑ zɑrɑ kɑ ǹ tɛ ndɑ hɑmini bi. Hɑndu mo bɛrɛ zɑngɑ kuri.
66006013	Bɛɛnɛ hɑndɑriyɑize yom mo kɑm gɑndɑ bɔm zɑngɑ jee ize gɑɑni kɑ hɛo nɑ ɑ̀ dooru.
66006014	Bɛɛnɛ mo kunkuni zɑngɑ tirɑ kɑ ǹ go kunkuni. Ǹ nɑ tondi kuku yom kulu ndɑ hɔndɛ tɑɑsi yom kulu gɑnɑndi ǹ gurubi.
66006015	Hɑndunyɑ wɔ kpe yom ndɑ bɔrɔ beeri yom ndɑ hɑibɑrikɑntɛ yom ndɑ wɑnguize hɑikusu yom ndɑ gɑɑbikoni yom ndɑ bɑnyɑ yom ndɑ bɔrɔcini yom nɑ ngei bɔm tugu guusu yom kunɑ ndɑ tondi kuku yom gɑme.
66006016	Ǹ cii tondi kuku yom sɛ ndɑ tondi beeri yom sɛ: Wɑ kɑm i bɔm kɑ i tugu Bɔrɔ di kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ gɔrɔ kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ bɔm moodumɑ sɛ ndɑ Feejiize binetɔnɛ sɛ.
66006017	À binetɔnɛ hɑnu beeri kɑɑ. Mee bine yɑ cindi kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ hini kɑ cɛ ɑ̀ jine?
66007001	Nge yom di bɑndɑ ɑ di Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize tɑɑci go cɛ hɑndunyɑ cɛnjɛ tɑɑci gɑɑ. Ǹ gɑ hɛo tɑɑci kɑ ǹ gɑ fɑɑru zɑ hɑndunyɑ cɛnjɛ tɑɑci jɛ zɑmɑ hɛo mɑ si fɑɑru bɑ gɑndɑ wɔ bɔm, bɑ tɛku bɔm, bɑ tuuri nyɑ kulu bɔm.
66007002	A di Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize ŋmɑni fɔ mɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go ziji zɑ weenuhune hɛrɛ. À go kɑ Ikpɛ Hundikpɛ sɛdɑ dɑmyom jɛ. À kuwɑ ndɑ jinde beeri kɑ sendi Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize tɑɑci di sɛ, ngei kɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ no mei ǹ mɑ hɛ lɑlɔ tɛ gɑndɑ ndɑ tɛku sɛ.
66007003	À cii: Wɑ si hɛ lɑlɔ tɛ gɑndɑ wɑlɑ tɛku wɑlɑ tuurinyɑ yom sɛ kɑlɑ i mɑ sɛdɑ dɑm jinɑ i ŋmɔne Ikpɛ tɑm yom sukutu yom gɑɑ.
66007004	A mɑɑ bɔrɔ mɛrɛjɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑ ǹ nɑ sɛdɑ dɑm. Bɔrɔ dubu zɑngu fɔ ndɑ weitɑɑci cindi tɑɑci nɑ Isirɑilɑ ize yom dimi kulu kunɑ.
66007005	Yudɑ dimi kunɑ bɔrɔ dubu wei cindi hinkɑ gɑɑ no, ǹ nɑ sɛdɑ dɑm. Lubɑm dimi kunɑ mo bɔrɔ dubu wei cindi hinkɑ gɑɑ ndɑ Gɑɑdu dimi kunɑ bɔrɔ dubu wei cindi hinkɑ gɑɑ no ǹ nɑ sɛdɑ dɑm.
66007006	Asɑre dimi kunɑ bɔrɔ dubu wei cindi hinkɑ gɑɑ nɑ ǹ nɑ sɛdɑ dɑm. Ǹ nɑ sɛdɑ dɑm mo Nɛfitɑli dimi kunɑ bɔrɔ dubu wei cindi hinkɑ gɑɑ ndɑ Mɑnɑse dimi kunɑ bɔrɔ dubu wei cindi hinkɑ gɑɑ.
66007007	Simeyɔ dimi kunɑ bɔrɔ dubu wei cindi hinkɑ gɑɑ no ǹ nɑ sɛdɑ dɑm. Lefi dimi kunɑ bɔrɔ dubu wei cindi hinkɑ gɑɑ ndɑ Isiɑko dimi kunɑ bɔrɔ dubu wei cindi hinkɑ gɑɑ no ǹ nɑ sɛdɑ dɑm.
66007008	Zɑbulu dimi kunɑ bɔrɔ dubu wei cindi hinkɑ gɑɑ no ǹ nɑ sɛdɑ dɑm. Yosɛfu dimi kunɑ bɔrɔ dubu wei cindi hinkɑ gɑɑ ndɑ Benzɑmim dimi kunɑ bɔrɔ dubu wei cindi hinkɑ gɑɑ no ǹ nɑ sɛdɑ dɑm.
66007009	Nge yom di bɑndɑ ɑ gunɑ. Cɔfɔ ɑ di bɔrɔ bɑkɑrɑ kɑ bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ si hini kɑ ɑ̀ kɑbu. Ǹ hunu kundɑ kulu ndɑ dimi kulu ndɑ jɑmɑ kulu ndɑ dɛɛnɛ kulu. Ǹ go cɛ kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ jine ndɑ Feejiize jine. Ǹ nɑ kpɛ kpɑrɛ kuku yom dɑm. Ǹ gundɑ dɑbinɑ nyɑ kɑmbɛ yom ngei kɑmbɛ yom kunɑ.
66007010	Ǹ gɑ kuwɑ ndɑ jinde beeri kɑ cii: Fɑɑbɑ yɑ i ŋmɔne Ikpɛ ŋmɔne nɑ, Ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go gɔrɔ kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ bɔm. Fɑɑbɑ yɑ Feejiize nmɔne mɑ nɑ.
66007011	Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize yom kulu ndɑ hɑikusu yom di ndɑ hundikoni tɑɑci di mo go cɛ kɑ kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ hundi. Ǹ jɛndɛbiri kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ jine ko kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi.
66007012	Ǹ gɑ cii: Ami. Bɛɛrɑndiyom ndɑ deizɑ ndɑ hɑikusutɛrɛ ndɑ sɑɑbuyom ndɑ bɛɛrɛ ndɑ dɑbɑri ndɑ gɑɑbi, mɑ bɑrɑ i ŋmɔne Ikpɛ sɛ jiiri dubu ndɑ dubu yom. Ami.
66007013	Cɔfɔ hɑikusu yom di kunɑ ɑfɔ cii ɑ sɛ: Beerem kɑ ǹ gundɑ kpɛ kpɑrɛ kuku yom wɔ, mee yom no? Mɑni ǹ hunu?
66007014	A cii ɑ̀ sɛ: A hɑikusu, n go bei. À cii ɑ sɛ: Beerem nɑ kɑ ǹ go hunu zɑ tɑɑbi bɑmbɑtɑ kunɑ. Ǹ nɑ ngei kpɛ yom nyunɑ kɑ ǹ kpɑrɑndi Feejiize di kuri kunɑ.
66007015	À sɛ no ǹ goono Ikpɛ kɑrigɑ jine ko tɑmtɛrɛ ɑ̀ sɛ ciini ndɑ zɑɑri Ikpɛ goonoyom dɔ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ gɔrɔ kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ wɔ bɔm mo, ngɑ yɑ go kɑ ǹ hɑlɑsi ǹ goonoyom gɑɑ.
66007016	Ǹ si mɑɑ hɛrɛɛ kpɛɛnɛ. Ǹ si ye kɑ mɑɑ joo. Weenu mo si ǹ kɑru wɑlɑ dunguɛ dimi kulu.
66007017	Feejiizɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ bindi, ngɑ yɑ gɑ ǹ kurum. À gɑ ǹ boi kɑ kpeindei hundi hɑri fɔci yom dɔ. Ikpɛ mo yɑ gɑ ǹ mundi kulu hɑɑbu ǹ moo yom gɑɑ.
66008001	Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ sɛdɑ iyɑntɛ pɑti, cɔfɔ nungu tɛ sɑkɑi bɛɛnɛ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɔ guuru jɛrɛ fɔ.
66008002	Cɔfɔ ɑ di Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize iye go cɛ Ikpɛ jine. Ǹ sɛ no ǹ nɑ kuluu iye no.
66008003	Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize ŋmɑni fɔ mo kɑɑ kɑ cɛ gɑrɑndi bɑndɑ tɑndɑ bɔm. À gundɑ wurɑ comcombu. Ǹ nɑ wɑidi boobo no ɑ̀ sɛ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ǹ sɑrɑɑ ndɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kulu ɑduwɑ yom wurɑ bɑndɑ tɑndɑ di bɔm kɑ ɑ̀ goono kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ jine.
66008004	Wɑidi yom di dullu ziji ndɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom ɑduwɑ yom zɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize kɑmbɛ Ikpɛ jine.
66008005	Cɔfɔ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di nɑ comcombu di zɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɔnɑndi ndɑ gɑrɑndi bɑndɑ tɑndɑ dɔ nini. À nɑ ɑ̀ jindo hɑndunyɑ bɔm. Cɔfɔ jinde yom ndɑ bɛɛnɛ kɑɑtiyom ndɑ bɛɛnɛ nyɑlɑu ndɑ gɑndɑ zinjiyom tɛ.
66008006	Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize iye kɑ ǹ gundɑ kuluu iye di go sɔlu ǹ mɑ kuluu funsu.
66008007	Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize sintine nɑ ngɑ kuluu funsu. Cɔfɔ gɑri ndɑ nini ndɑ kuri meigu cɛrɛ bɑndɑ. Ǹ nɑ ǹ jindo hɑndunyɑ wɔ bɔm. Tuurinyɑ yom fɑrisime hinzɑntɛ ndɑ subu gɑni kulu dii kɑ tɔnu.
66008008	Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize hinkɑntɛ mɑ nɑ ngɑ kuluu funsu. Hɛ fɔ zɑngɑ tɑndi kuku beeri kɑ nini gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dii, ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ jindo tɛku kunɑ. Tɛku fɑrisime hinzɑntɛ bɛrɛ kuri.
66008009	Tɑkɑhɛ hundikoni fɑrisime hinzɑntɛ kɑ ɑ̀ goono tɛku kunɑ kulu bu. Hɑrihi yom fɑrisime hinzɑntɛ kulu mɑlɑkɑ.
66008010	Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize hinzɑntɛ nɑ ngɑ kuluu funsu. Cɔfɔ hɑndɑriyɑize beeri fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hɑɑgɑ zɑngɑ yugulɑ kɑm zɑ bɛɛnɛ. À kɑm isɑ fɑrisime hinzɑntɛ fɔ bɔm ndɑ hɑri fɔci yom bɔm.
66008011	Hɑndɑriyɑize di mɑɑ nɑ Abisɑntɛ, hɔɔti dimi fɔ. Hɑri di fɑrisime hinzɑntɛ kulu bɛrɛ kɑ hɔɔtu. Bɔrɔ bɑɑbɑ bu hɑri di sɑbu sɛ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ hɔɔtu.
66008012	Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize tɑɑcɑntɛ nɑ ngɑ kuluu funsu. Cɔfɔ kube nɑ weenu fɑrisime hinzɑntɛ kɑru. Yɑ mɑ nɑ hɑndu fɑrisime hinzɑntɛ ndɑ hɑndɑriyɑize yom fɑrisime hinzɑntɛ hɑli fɑrisime hinzɑntɛ yom kulu tɛ kube. Zɑɑri kɑɑri fɑrisime hinzɑntɛ mo dɛrɛ, yɑ mɑ no ciini.
66008013	A gunɑ. Cɔfɔ ɑ mɑɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize fɔ go deesi bɛɛnɛ bindi bindi. À go cii ndɑ jinde beeri: Kɑito, kɑito hɑndunyɑ bɔrɔ yom sɛ kuluu hinzɑ kɑ ǹ cindi sɑbu sɛ kɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize hinzɑ wɔ bɑ funsu.
66009001	Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize guɑntɛ nɑ ngɑ kuluu funsu. Cɔfɔ ɑ di hɑndɑriyɑize fɔ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ kɑ kɑm hɑndunyɑ bɔm. Ǹ nɑ guusu kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ mee lɑntɑnɑize nɑ ɑ̀ sɛ.
66009002	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ nɑ guusu di feeri. Dullu fɔ mɑ go hunu ɑ̀ kunɑ zɑngɑ dudɑli nini dullu. Weenu ndɑ hɛo kulu mo bɛrɛ kɑ bi ndɑ dullu di zɑngɑ buudɑ.
66009003	Doo yom go hunu zɑ dullu kunɑ kɑ see hɑndunyɑ kulu bɔm. Ǹ nɑ ǹ nɑ dɑbɑri fɔ mɑ zɑngɑ gɑndɑ dem yom dɑbɑri.
66009004	Ǹ cii ǹ sɛ ǹ mɑ si hɛ lɑlɔ fɔ kulu tɛ gɑndɑ wɔ subu sɛ, bɑ kɔsu gɑni fɔ sɛ, bɑ tuurinyɑ fɔ sɛ. Ammɑ ǹ mɑ ilɑlɔ tɛ beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ du Ikpɛ sɛdɑ dɑmyom ngei sukutu yom gɑɑ.
66009005	Ǹ nɑ ǹ nɑ mei ǹ mɑ si ǹ wi, ɑmmɑ ǹ mɑ ǹ bɔnɑndi zɑngɑ hɑndu gu. Bɔnɑndiyom kɑ ǹ go tɛ ǹ sɛ di goono zɑngɑ bɔnɛ kɑ bɔrɔ mɑɑ sɑɑ kɑ dem nɑ ɑ̀ tɔnu.
66009006	Jiribi nge yom di kunɑ beerem kɑɑ bu ceeci, ɑmmɑ ǹ si du ɑ̀. Ǹ guuri ngei mɑ bu ɑmmɑ bu zuuru kɑ mooru ndei.
66009007	Doo nge yom di himɑ nɑ zɑngɑ bɑri yom kɑ ǹ sɔlu wɑngu tɛyom sɛ. Ǹ bɔm yom gɑɑ gundɑ zɑngɑ kpetɛrɛ fulɑ kɑ ɑ̀ himɑ wurɑ. Ǹ moodumɑ yom goono no zɑngɑ bɔrɔ.
66009008	Ǹ bɔm hɑmini goono zɑngɑ weibɔrɔ ŋmɔne. Ǹ hinje yom mo goono zɑngɑ muusu beeri ŋmɔne.
66009009	Ǹ jɛndɛ yom gɑɑ gundɑ guuru kɔrɛ. Ǹ fɑtɑ yom kɔsɔngu himɑ no zɑngɑ tɔrɔkɔ yom kɑ bɑri boobo go cendi ko zuuru kɑ kpei wɑngu dɔ.
66009010	Ǹ gundɑ lɑɑce nɑɑjikpɛ yom zɑngɑ dem. Ǹ lɑɑce yom kunɑ no ǹ gundɑ dɑbɑri kɑ ǹ mɑ beerem no doori hɑli hɑndu gu.
66009011	Ǹ gundɑ kpe fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci guusu kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ mee Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize. Ebulu cinɛ kunɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Abɑdom, Gɑrɛku cinɛ kunɑ mɑ Apoliyom. Mɑɑ di feeriji yɑ ci Hɑlɑcikɔ.
66009012	Sintine bɑlɑu bisɑ. Gunɑ, ngɑ di bɑndɑ bɑlɑu hinkɑ gɑ kɑɑ kpɛɛnɛ.
66009013	Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize iduɑntɛ nɑ ngɑ kuluu funsu. Cɔfɔ ɑ mɑɑ jinde fɔ gɑ hunu hilli tɑɑci dɔ kɑ ǹ goono wurɑ bɑndɑ tɑndɑ bɔm Ikpɛ jine.
66009014	À cii Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize iduɑntɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ kuluu di sɛ: N mɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize tɑɑci kɑ ǹ goono hɔɑntɛ Yufɑtu isɑ mee gɑɑ feeri.
66009015	À nɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize tɑɑci di feeri mɑ, ngei kɑ ǹ sɔlu guuru sɛ ndɑ hɑnu sɛ ndɑ hɑndu sɛ ndɑ jiiri sɛ, zɑmɑ ǹ mɑ iburɑdɑm fɑrisime hinzɑntɛ kulu wi.
66009016	Wɑngu bɑrikɑri yom goono zɑngɑ ǹ bɔrɔ dubu zɑngu hinkɑ hɑli ce dubu wei. Yɑ nɑ ɑ mɑɑ.
66009017	Zɑngɑ yɑ no diyom di kunɑ ɑ di bɑri yom ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go gɔrɔ ǹ bɔm. Ǹ gundɑ kɔrɛ ngei jɛndɛ yom gɑɑ, iciire zɑngɑ nini ndɑ iboogu ndɑ dɔsɔ zɑngɑ ɑlibɑro. Ǹ bɑri yom bɔm goono no zɑngɑ muusu beeri bɔm. Ǹ mee yom kunɑ nɑ nini gɑ hunu ndɑ dullu ndɑ ɑlibɑro kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ di.
66009018	Aliwɑbɑ hinzɑ wɔ, nini ndɑ dullu ndɑ ɑlibɑro kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hunu bɑri yom di mee kunɑ, yɑ nɑ hɑndunyɑ beerem fɑrisime hinzɑntɛ wi.
66009019	Bɑri yom di dɑbɑri goono ǹ mee yom kunɑ ndɑ ǹ lɑɑce yom gɑɑ. Ǹ lɑɑce yom di himɑ no zɑngɑ gondi yom kɑ ǹ gundɑ bɔm yom. Nge yom mo no ǹ go bɔrɔ doorɑndi ndɑ.
66009020	Bɔrɔ cindei kulu kɑ ɑliwɑbɑ yom di mɑnɑ ǹ wi, ǹ mɑnɑ tuubi ndɑ ngei kɑmbɛ gbei yom. Ǹ mɑnɑ fee ndɑ hɔllɛ gɑnɑyom ndɑ tooru yom kɑ ǹ tɛ ndɑ wurɑ ndɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu ndɑ guuru ciire ndɑ tondi ndɑ tuuri, tooru yom kɑ ǹ si hini kɑ di. Ǹ si hini kɑ mɑɑ. Ǹ si hini kɑ dirɑ.
66009021	Beerem mɑnɑ tuubi mo ndɑ ǹ bɔrɔ wiyom ndɑ ǹ dɑbodɑbo ndɑ ǹ zinɑtɛrɛ ndɑ ǹ zeetɛrɛ.
66010001	A di Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize gɑɑbikoni ŋmɑni fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go zumbu zɑ bɛɛnɛ buru dɑɑbɑntɛ kunɑ. Sɛjɛrɛ fɔ mo goono ɑ̀ bɔm bɛɛnɛ. A moodumɑ goono no zɑngɑ weenu, ɑ̀ cee yom mɑ zɑngɑ nini kɑɑsɑ yom.
66010002	Tirɑ feerɑntɛ cɛnɑ fɔ goono ɑ̀ kɑmbɛ kunɑ. À nɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ cee dɛcɛ tɛku bɔm, ɑ̀ kɑmbɛwo cee mɑ gɑndɑ bɔm.
66010003	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ kuwɑ ndɑ jinde beeri zɑngɑ muusu beeri dureyom. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kuwɑ, bɛɛnɛ kɑɑtiyom iye tɛ.
66010004	Sɑɑ kɑ bɛɛnɛ kɑɑtiyom iye di tɛ, ɑ bɑ hɑntum. Ammɑ jinde fɔ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ kɑ cii ɑ sɛ: N mɑ hɛ yom kɑ bɛɛnɛ kɑɑti yom iye di cii kɑ dɑɑbu ndɑ sɛdɑ dɑmyɑm. N mɑ si ǹ hɑntum.
66010005	Cɔfɔ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize kɑ ɑ di ɑ̀ go cɛ tɛkuɑ bɔm ndɑ gɑndɑ bɔm, ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ sɔmbu bɛɛnɛ ngɑ mɑ ze.
66010006	À ze ndɑ Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hunɑ jiri dubu ndɑ dubu yom, ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ bɛɛnɛ tɑkɑ ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ goono ɑ̀ kunɑ. Ngɑ mɑ nɑ gɑndɑ tɑkɑ ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ goono ɑ̀ bɔm. À nɑ tɛku mɑ tɑkɑ ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ goono ɑ̀ kunɑ. Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di cii: Dɑɑmɑ si kpɛɛnɛ.
66010007	Ammɑ lɔkɑci kɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize iyɑntɛ bɑ kɑ ngɑ kuluu funsu, sɑɑ ngɑ di no Ikpɛ duje go kube zɑngɑ ɑ̀ jinɑ kɑ ɑ̀ fɛɛ ngɑ tɑm yom sɛ kɑ ǹ ci ɑndebi yom.
66010008	Jinde kɑ ɑ mɑɑ zɑ bɛɛnɛ gɑ sendi ɑ sɛ kpɛɛnɛ kɑ cii: Kpei, tirɑ feerɑntɛ cɛnɑ tɑ kɑ ɑ̀ goono Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di kɑmbɛ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go cɛ tɛku ndɑ gɑndɑ bɔm.
66010009	Cɔfɔ ɑ kpei Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di dɔ kɑ cii ɑ̀ sɛ: N mɑ tirɑ cɛnɑ di no ɑ sɛ. À cii ɑ sɛ: À zɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gonu. Àɑ hɔɔtu n gunde kunɑ ɑmmɑ n mee kunɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑni no zɑngɑ yu.
66010010	A nɑ tirɑ cɛnɑ di zɑɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di kɑmbɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gonu. À kɑɑni ɑ mee kunɑ zɑngɑ yu ɑmmɑ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ nɑ ɑ̀ gonu ɑ̀ hɔɔtu no ɑ gunde kunɑ.
66010011	Cɔfɔ ɑ̀ cii ɑ sɛ: Kɑlɑ n mɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ kpɛɛnɛ bɔrɔ boobo ndɑ dimi yom ndɑ dɛɛnɛ yom ndɑ gɑndɑkpɛ yom jine.
66011001	Ǹ nɑ sɑɑri fɔ nɑ ɑ sɛ zɑngɑ gɑɑbu kɑ cii ɑ sɛ: Tunu kɑ cɛ kɑ Ikpɛ gɔrɛ dɔ ndɑ gɑrɑndi bɑndɑ tɑndɑ dɔ neesi. N mɑ beerem kulu kɑbu kɑ ǹ goono Ikpɛ goonoyom dɔ kɑ kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi.
66011002	Ammɑ n mɑ Ikpɛ goonoyom dɔ hundi bɑtumɑ nɑm, n mɑ si ɑ̀ neesi. N mɑ si ɑ̀ neesi zɑmɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ no dimi cindei sɛ. Ǹ kɑɑ wɑngɑrɑ hɑlɑɑlɑ tɑɑmu nge cee cire hɑndu weitɑɑci cindi hinkɑ.
66011003	A gɑ ɑ sɛdɑ hinkɑ dɔntɔm soojiine kunɑ ǹ mɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ tɛ jiribi dubu fɔ ndɑ zɑngu hinkɑ ndɑ weidu.
66011004	Sɛdɑ yom di yɑ ci olibe nyɑ hinkɑ ndɑ fitilɑ hinkɑ kɑ ǹ go cɛ gɑndɑ wɔ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ jine.
66011005	De bɔrɔ fɔ go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ ilɑlɔ fɔ tɛ ǹ sɛ, nini kɑɑ hunu ǹ mee yom kunɑ kɑ ǹ ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ yom wi. Zɑngɑ yɑ no ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ wi wɔ kɑ go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ hɛ lɑlɔ tɛ ǹ sɛ.
66011006	Ǹ gundɑ hini kɑ bɛɛnɛ dɑɑbu hɑli hɑri mɑ si kɑm ǹ ŋmɔne ɑndebitɛrɛ jiribi yom kulu kunɑ. Ǹ gundɑ hini mo kɑ hɑri yom bɛrɛ kuri. Ǹ gundɑ hini mo kɑ ɑliwɑbɑ dimi ŋmɑni ŋmɑni yom tɑm hɑndunyɑ wɔ bɔm sɑɑ kɑ ǹ go bɑɑ kulu.
66011007	Sɑɑ kɑ ǹ beeni ndɑ ngei sɛdɑ, gɑnjihɑm futu go hunu zɑ guusu kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ mee kunɑ. À kɑɑ wɑngu tɛ ndei. À gɑɑŋmɑɑ ǹ bɔm kɑ ǹ wi.
66011008	Ǹ bukɔ yom mɑ kɑɑ goono wɑngɑrɑ beeri bɑtumɑ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ zɑngɑ yɑɑse Sodum ndɑ Eziputu, nungu kɑ ǹ nɑ i Kpe kɑnji.
66011009	Beerem kɑ ǹ hunu jɑmɑ kulu ndɑ kundɑ kulu ndɑ dɛɛnɛ kulu ndɑ hɑndunyɑ dimi kulu, ǹ kɑɑ di ǹ bukɔ yom zɑngɑ jiribi hinzɑ ndɑ jɛrɛ. Ǹ bine si tu ǹ mɑ bukɔ yom dɑm sɑɑrɛ yom kunɑ.
66011010	Ǹ sɑbu sɛ bine, hɑndunyɑ beerem kɑɑ fɑihã ndɑ ǹ buyom. Ǹ kɑɑ goono bine yeene kunɑ. Ǹ kɑɑ cɛrɛ no noyom zɑmɑ ɑndebi hinkɑ di nɑ hɑndunyɑ beerem bɔnɑndi.
66011011	Jiribi hinzɑ ndɑ jɛrɛ bɑndɑ, Ikpɛ ye kɑ hundi dɑm ǹ kunɑ. Cɔfɔ ǹ tunu kɑ cɛ. Beerem kulu kɑ ǹ di ei, hɑmburu nɑ ǹ dii kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
66011012	Ǹ mɑɑ jinde fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu bɛɛnɛ go cii ǹ sɛ: Wɑ kɑɑru nee dɔ. Cɔfɔ ǹ kɑɑru bɛɛnɛ buru kunɑ. Ǹ ŋmɔne ibɛrɛ yom di ei mo.
66011013	Guuru ngɑ di kunɑ gɑndɑ zinjiyom beeri fɔ tɛ. Wɑngɑrɑ di fɑrisime weiɑntɛ kɑm. Bɔrɔ dubu iye yɑ bu gɑndɑ zinjiyom ngɑ di kunɑ. Cindei mo hɑmburu kɑlɑ kɑlɑ kɑ bɛɛrɛ no Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ sɛ.
66011014	Bɑlɑu hinkɑntɛ bisɑ. Gunɑ, ihinzɑntɛ go kɑɑ mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ.
66011015	Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize iyɑntɛ nɑ ngɑ kuluu funsu. Cɔfɔ jinde beeri fɔ yom hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ kɑ cii: Ǹ nɑ hɑndunyɑ kpetɛrɛ yeti i Kpe ndɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɔne Mɛsiyɑ sɛ. À kɑɑ kpetɛrɛ ŋmɑɑ mɑ, beeniyom si.
66011016	Hɑikusu wɑrɑnkɑ cindi tɑɑci di mɑ kɑ ǹ go gɔrɔ Ikpɛ jine nge kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ yom kunɑ, ǹ jɛndɛbiri kɑ kɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi.
66011017	Ǹ go cii: "E Kpe Ikpɛ, Dɑbɑri kulu kpe, i go sɑɑbu n sɛ. Ni, n goono mɑɑsɑ. N goono zɑ dom. Ni, n go kɑɑ mo. N nɑ n dɑbɑri beeri zɑɑ kɑ kpetɛrɛ ŋmɑɑ kɑ mei.
66011018	Hɑndunyɑ dimi yom bine tɔ. N ŋmɔne binetɔnɛ kɑɑ. Lɔkɑci tɔ kɑ n mɑ bukɔ yom ciiti. Lɔkɑci mo tɔ n mɑ n bɑnyɑ yom kɑ ǹ ci ɑndebi yom bɑnɑ, ndɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ hɑmburu n mɑɑ sɛ, icɛnɑ ndɑ ibeeri. Lɔkɑci tɔ mo kɑ beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ hɑndunyɑ hɑlɑci, n mɑ ǹ hɑlɑci mo."
66011019	Ikpɛ goonoyom dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ kunɑ feeri. Cɔfɔ ǹ di ɑ̀ ŋmɔne ɑlikɑwɑli ɑdɑkɑ goono ɑ̀ kunɑ. Cɔfɔ nyɑlɑu yom ndɑ jinde yom ndɑ bɛɛnɛ kɑɑtiyom ndɑ gɑndɑ zinjiyom ndɑ gɑri beeri tɛ.
66012001	Alɑmu bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ hunutɛrɛ bɛɛnɛ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci weibɔrɔ fɔ kɑ weenu nɑ ɑ̀ dɑɑbu. Hɑndu goono ɑ̀ cee yom cire. Hɑndɑriyɑize wei cindi hinkɑ mo goono ɑ̀ bɔm gɑɑ zɑngɑ bɔmtɔbɛ.
66012002	À gundɑ kunu. À go kuwɑ mɑ ndɑ hɑizɛnyɛ ndɑ hɛiyom dɑɑri.
66012003	Alɑmu ŋmɑni fɔ mɑ hunutɛrɛ bɛɛnɑ kunɑ. Gunɑ, kɑndɑmɑ ciire beeri fɔ nɑ. À gundɑ bɔm iye ndɑ hilli wei. À bɔm yom gɑɑ mo kpetɛrɛ fulɑ iye yɑ goono.
66012004	À lɑɑce mo go hɑndɑriyɑize yom fɑrisime hinzɑntɛ cendi zɑ bɛɛnɛ. À gɑ kɑ ǹ jindo hɑndunyɑ bɔm. Kɑndɑmɑ di go cɛ weibɔrɔ di kɑ ɑ̀ bɑ hɛi jine zɑmɑ ngɑ mɑ ɑ̀ koo di ŋmɑɑ sɛ sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hɛi.
66012005	À nɑ koo hɑibɔrɔ fɔ hɛi kɑ ngɑ yɑ dimi kulu kurum ndɑ guuru goobu. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ koo di kɔm kɑ kpeindɑ Ikpɛ dɔ ɑ̀ kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ dɔ.
66012006	Cɔfɔ weibɔrɔ di zuuru kɑ kpei gɑnji kunɑ, nungu kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ tɛrɛ hinsɑ ɑ̀ sɛ. À kpei gɑnji kunɑ zɑmɑ ǹ mɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɑndi zɑngɑ jiribi dubu fɔ ndɑ zɑngu hinkɑ ndɑ weidu.
66012007	Wɑngu tɛ mo bɛɛnɛ kunɑ. Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize beeri kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ Misɛli ndɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔneize yom no tɑngɑmi tɛ ndɑ kɑndɑmɑ. Kɑndɑmɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɔne dɔntɔneize yom nɑ tɑngɑmi tɛ ndei mo.
66012008	Ammɑ kɑndɑmɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔneize yom mɑnɑ gɑɑŋmɑɑ. Ǹ mɑnɑ tu ǹ sɛ ndɑ gɔrɛ bɛɛnɛ kunɑ kpɛɛnɛ.
66012009	Ǹ nɑ kɑndɑmɑ cetu tɛrɛ, ngɑ yɑ ci zɑ dɑm dɑm gondi zeenu kɑ ǹ cɛɛ Ibilisi wɑlɑ Setɑm kɑ ɑ̀ go hɑndunyɑ wɔ kulu dɛrɑndi. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ jindo gɑndɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ dɔntɔneize yom kulu ɑ̀ bɑndɑ.
66012010	Cɔfɔ ɑ mɑɑ jinde beeri fɔ zɑ bɛɛnɛ ɑ̀ go cii: Mɑɑsɑnkulu fɑɑbɑ ndɑ dɑbɑri ndɑ i ŋmɔne Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ kube. À ŋmɔne Mɛsiyɑ hini mo tɔ. I nyɑize yom tɔnyɑkɔ kɑ ciini ndɑ zɑɑri ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ tɔnyɑ i ŋmɔne Ikpɛ jine, ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ zeeri.
66012011	I nyɑizei gɑɑŋmɑɑ ɑ̀ bɔm Feejiize kuri sɑbu sɛ ndɑ ǹ sɛdɑ sendi sɑbu sɛ. Ǹ mɑnɑ bɑɑ ngei hundi hɑli ǹ mɑnɑ hungu ǹ mɑ bu.
66012012	À sɛ no, bɛɛnɛ yom ndɑ wom kɑ wom goono ndɑ gɔrɛ bɛɛnɛ kunɑ, wom mɑ fɑihã. Ammɑ kɑito beerem kɑ ǹ goono hɑndunyɑ kunɑ ndɑ tɛku bɔm zɑmɑ Ibilisi zumbu wom dɔ. À tɔ ndɑ binefute zɑmɑ ɑ̀ bei kɑ ngɑ sindɑ dɑɑmɑ boobo.
66012013	Sɑɑ kɑ kɑndɑmɑ di kɑ ǹ nɑ ngɑ cetu gɑndɑ, ɑ̀ nɑ weibɔrɔ di kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ koo hɑibɔrɔ hɛi gɑɑrɛ.
66012014	Ammɑ ǹ nɑ zebɑni beeri fɑtɑ hinkɑ nɑ weibɔrɔ di sɛ hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ deesi kɑ kpei ngɑ nungu dɔ gɑnji kunɑ. À kpei nungu kɑ ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑrɑndi ɑliwɑti fɔ ndɑ ɑliwɑti hinkɑ ndɑ jɛrɛ zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ mooru gondi di.
66012015	Hɑri hunu gondi di mee kunɑ zɑngɑ isɑ weibɔrɔ di bɑndɑ zɑmɑ hɑri di mɑ ɑ̀ ŋmɑɑ.
66012016	Ammɑ weibɔrɔ di du fɑɑbɑ gɑndɑ dɔ zɑmɑ gɑndɑ feeri. À nɑ ngɑ mee feeri kɑ hɑri kɑ ɑ̀ go hunu zɑ gondi di mee kunɑ hɑm.
66012017	Kɑndɑmɑ bine tɔ ndɑ weibɔrɔ di. À kpei wɑngu tɛ ndɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ bɔrɔ cindi yom ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ go kɑ Ikpɛ meire yom gɑnɑ, beerem kɑ ǹ go Yesu Mɛsiyɑ sɛdɑ jɛ.
66012018	A ye kɑ cɛ tɛku tɑɑsi bɔm.
66013001	A di gɑnjihɑm fɔ mo kɑ ɑ̀ go hunu tɛku kunɑ. À gundɑ bɔm iye ndɑ hilli wei. Hilli yom di kulu bɔm gundɑ kpetɛrɛ fulɑ fɔ. Ǹ nɑ mɑɑ yom hɑntum ɑ̀ bɔm yom gɑɑ, mɑɑ yom kɑ ǹ go kɑ Ikpɛ sendi yɑmu kɑ ɑ̀ cɛnɑndi.
66013002	Gɑnjihɑm di kɑ ɑ go di himɑ no zɑngɑ mooru. À cee yom mo himɑ zɑngɑ urusu, gɑnjihɑm dimi ŋmɑni fɔ cee yom. À mee himɑ zɑngɑ muusu beeri mee. Kɑndɑmɑ di nɑ ngɑ dɑbɑri ndɑ ngɑ kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ ndɑ ngɑ hini beeri nɑ ɑ̀ sɛ.
66013003	A di ɑ̀ bɔm yom di kunɑ ɑfɔ zɑngɑ hɛ kɑ ɑ̀ mɛrɛ kɑ tɔ bu gɑɑ, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ bu di bii ye. Hɑndunyɑ kulu mɑmɑci ndɑ gɑnjihɑm di kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ.
66013004	Ǹ kulu nɑ kɑndɑmɑ di kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ gɑnjihɑm di nɑ hini bɛɛrɑndi. Ǹ nɑ gɑnjihɑm di bɛɛrɑndi mo kɑ cii: Mee yɑ himɑ gɑnjihɑm wɔ? Mee bine yɑ hini kɑ ɑ̀ wɑngu?
66013005	Ǹ nɑ gɑnjihɑm di nɑ mee ɑ̀ mɑ tɔtɔ sendi yom tɛ ndɑ woobi sendi yom Ikpɛ gɑɑ. À du hini ko kɑ ngɑ gbei tɛ zɑngɑ hɑndu weitɑɑci cindi hinkɑ.
66013006	À gɑ sendi yɑmu tɛ Ikpɛ gɑɑ ko kɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ woo. À go kɑ Ikpɛ goonoyom dɔ woo ndɑ beerem kulu kɑ ǹ goono ndɑ gɔrɛ bɛɛnɛ kunɑ.
66013007	À du fɔndɔ kɑ wɑngu ndɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kɑ gɑɑŋmɑɑ ǹ bɔm. À du hini kundɑ kulu bɔm, dɛɛnɛ kulu bɔm ndɑ dimi kulu bɔm.
66013008	Beerem kulu mɑ kɑ ǹ goono hɑndunyɑ kunɑ gɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi. Ǹ mɑnɑ beerem di mɑɑ yom hɑntum Feejiize Hundi Tirɑ kunɑ, Feejiize di kɑ ǹ wi zɑ hɑndunyɑ sinjiyom gɑɑ.
66013009	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ hɑngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ hini kɑ mɑɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ mɑɑ fɑ.
66013010	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ bɔrɔ dii tɑmtɛrɛ sɛ ɑ̀ kpei tɑmtɛrɛ kunɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go bɔrɔ wi ndɑ tɑkubɑ, ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ wi ndɑ tɑkubɑ. Sɑɑ ngɑ di kunɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom mɑ hini suuru kɑ nɑɑne.
66013011	A di gɑnjihɑm ŋmɑni fɔ mɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go hunu gɑndɑ kunɑ. À gundɑ hilli hinkɑ zɑngɑ feejiize hilli, ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ gɑ sendi zɑngɑ kɑndɑmɑ di.
66013012	À nɑ sintine gɑnjihɑm di hini kulu tɛ ɑ̀ jine. À go hɑndunyɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ beerem kulu dɑm ǹ mɑ sintine gɑnjihɑm di bɛɛrɑndi, gɑnjihɑm kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ bu bii yeenɑndi.
66013013	À go kɑ ɑlɑmu beeri yom tɛ hɑli ɑ̀ go nini zumɑndi zɑ bɛɛnɛ kɑ kɑɑndɑ hɑndunyɑ bɔrɔ kulu jine.
66013014	À go hɑndunyɑ beerem dɛrɑndi ndɑ ɑ̀ ɑlɑmu yom kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ no fɔndɔ ɑ̀ mɑ tɛ gɑnjihɑm di jine. À cii hɑndunyɑ beerem di sɛ ǹ mɑ gɑnjihɑm kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ mɛrɛ ndɑ tɑkubɑ, kɑ ɑ̀ go hunɑ, himɑi tɛ.
66013015	À du dɑbɑri kɑ gɑnjihɑm di himɑi no hundi hɑli ɑ̀ mɑ sendi zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ du kɑ beerem kɑ ǹ si kɑ ɑ̀ himɑi bɛɛrɑndi wi.
66013016	À nɑ beerem tilɑsi hɑli icɛnɑ ndɑ ibeeri, hɑibɑrikɑntɛ ndɑ tɑlikɑ, bɔrɔcini ndɑ bɑnyɑ, ǹ kulu mɑ du sɛdɑ dɑmyom ǹ kulu kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ gɑɑ wɑlɑ ǹ sukutu yom gɑɑ.
66013017	Bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ si hini kɑ dei wɑlɑ kɑ neerɑ kɑlɑ de wɔ kɑ yom gundɑ sɛdɑ kɑ ǹ dɑm wɑlɑ gɑnjihɑm di mɑɑ wɑlɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ lɑmbɑ.
66013018	Wɔne yɑ ci hɑikusutɛrɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ fɑhɑm, ɑ̀ mɑ gɑnjihɑm di lɑmbɑ hɛ lɑsɑbu. Ngɑ yɑ ci ɑdɑmize lɑmbɑ. À lɑmbɑ yɑ ci zɑngu idu ndɑ weidu cindi idu.
66014001	A gunɑ. Cɔfɔ ɑ di Feejiize di gɑ cɛ Sionɑ tondi kukuɑ bɔm. Bɔrɔ dubu zɑngu fɔ ndɑ weitɑɑci cindi tɑɑci goono ɑ̀ bɑndɑ, wɔ kɑ yom gundɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ Bɑɑbɑ mɑɑ hɑntumɑntɛ ngei sukutu yom gɑɑ.
66014002	A mɑɑ jinde fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu bɛɛnɛ zɑngɑ hɑri boobo kɑ ǹ gɑ dendi kɔsɔngu, zɑngɑ bɛɛnɛ kɑɑtiyom beeri. Jinde wɔ kɑ ɑ go mɑɑ mɑ goono zɑngɑ mɔlɔ yom kɑ ǹ go kɑru.
66014003	Ǹ go betu teji tɛ kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ ndɑ hundikoni tɑɑci ndɑ hɑikusu yom di jine. Bɑ bɔrɔ fɔ si hini kɑ betu di dendeni kɑlɑ bɔrɔ dubu zɑngu fɔ ndɑ weitɑɑci cindi tɑɑci di, beerem kɑ Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ fɑnsɑ hɑndunyɑ bɔm.
66014004	Ngei yɑ ci beerem kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ngei bɔm ziibɑndi ndɑ weibɔrɔ yom ɑmmɑ ǹ nɑ ngei bɔm dii hinnɑntɛ. Ǹ go Feejiize di gɑnɑ nungu kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go kpei. Ikpɛ nɑ ǹ fɑnsɑ hɑibɔrɔ yom gɑme kɑ ǹ mɑ ngei bɔm no sintine Ikpɛ sɛ ndɑ Feejiizɑ sɛ.
66014005	Tɑngɑri mɑnɑ hunu ǹ mee bɑ ce fɔ zɑmɑ ǹ goono no tɑɑli si Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ jine.
66014006	A di Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize ŋmɑni fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go deesi bɛɛnɛ bindi bindi. À gundɑ Bɑɑru Hinno kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ beeniyom. À go Bɑɑru Hinno di fɛɛ beerem sɛ kɑ ǹ goono hɑndunyɑ kunɑ, bɑ dimi kulu sɛ ndɑ jɑmɑ kulu sɛ ndɑ dɛɛnɛ kulu sɛ ndɑ kundɑ kulu sɛ.
66014007	À go cii ndɑ jinde beeri: Wɑ hɑmburu Ikpɛ. Wɑ bɛɛrɛ no ɑ̀ sɛ mo zɑmɑ ɑ̀ ciiti lɔkɑci tɔ. Ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ bɛɛnɛ ndɑ gɑndɑ ndɑ tɛku ndɑ fɔci hɑri yom tɛ, wɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi.
66014008	Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize hinkɑntɛ fɔ mo nɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ gɑnɑ ko cii: À kɑm. Bɑbiloni beeri kɑm. À nɑ hɑndunyɑ dimi kulu no binefute zɑngɑ dufɛ ǹ mɑ hɑm kɑ ɑ̀ ci ɑ̀ ŋmɔne zinɑtɛrɛ.
66014009	Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize hinzɑntɛ fɔ mo goono ǹ bɑndɑ. À go cii ndɑ jinde beeri: Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ go gɑnjihɑm di ndɑ ɑ̀ himɑi bɛɛrɑndi ko du sɛdɑ dɑmyom ngɑ sukutu gɑɑ wɑlɑ ngɑ kɑmbɛ gɑɑ, ɑkpɛ gɑ Ikpɛ binefute hɑm.
66014010	À gɑ ɑ̀ hɑm zɑngɑ dufɛ. Binefute di no Ikpɛ dooru ngɑ dukuri gulɑize kunɑ, meigɑ meigɑ si. Ǹ gɑ ɑkpɛ bɔnɑndi nini ndɑ ɑlibɑro gɑɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom ndɑ Feejiize jine.
66014011	Ǹ bɔnɑndiyom di go ziji bɛɛnɛ zɑngɑ dullu jiiri dubu ndɑ dubu yom. Beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ gɑnjihɑm di ndɑ ɑ̀ himɑi bɛɛrɑndi kɑ du ɑ̀ mɑɑ sɛdɑ dɑmyɑm, ǹ sindɑ hulɑnzom bɑ zɑɑri bɑ ciini.
66014012	Sɑɑ ngɑ di kunɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom mɑ hini suuru kɑ Ikpɛ meire yom ndɑ Yesu nɑɑne fɔndɔ gɑnɑ.
66014013	A mɑɑ jinde fɔ mo hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ kɑ cii ɑ sɛ: Wɔne hɑntum. Binekɑɑnekpɛ yom no beerem kɑ ǹ bu zɑ mɑɑsɑ Kpe kunɑ. Oò, yɑ nɑ Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ cii zɑmɑ ǹ kɑɑ hulɑnzom ndɑ ngei gbei gɑɑbɔ yom. Ǹ gbei tɛyom mo go kɑ ǹ gɑnɑ.
66014014	A gunɑ. Cɔfɔ ɑ di buru kpɑrɛ fɔ. Bɔrɔ fɔ go gɔrɔ ɑ̀ bɔm zɑngɑ Adɑmize. À gundɑ wurɑ kpetɛrɛ fulɑ ngɑ bɔm gɑɑ. À kɑmbɛ kunɑ gundɑ kɔmɑ mee kɑɑnɔkpɛ fɔ.
66014015	Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize ŋmɑni fɔ mɑ hunu zɑ Ikpɛ goonoyom dɔ kɑ kuwɑ ndɑ jinde beeri. À cii Bɔrɔ di kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ gɔrɔ buru di bɔm sɛ: N kɔmɑ cendi kɑ wi zɑmɑ wiyom lɔkɑci tɔ. Gɑndɑ dumɑiizei nini.
66014016	Cɔfɔ Bɔrɔ di kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ gɔrɔ burɑ bɔm nɑ ngɑ kɔmɑ cendi hɑndunyɑ bɔm. À nɑ hɑndunyɑ dumɑiizei wi mo.
66014017	Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize fɔ mo hunu Ikpɛ goonoyom dɔ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ. Ngɑ mɑ gundɑ kɔmɑ mee kɑɑnɔkpɛ fɔ.
66014018	Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize fɔ mɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ hini nini bɔm hunu zɑ gɑrɑndi bɑndɑ tɑndɑ dɔ. À sendi ndɑ jinde beeri bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ kɔmɑ mee kɑɑnɔkpɛ di sɛ kɑ cii: N mɑ kɔmɑ mee kɑɑnɔkpɛ wɔ cendi hɑndunyɑ bɔm kɑ lɛzɛ cɛtɛ yom wɔ wi zɑmɑ ǹ nini.
66014019	Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di nɑ ngɑ kɔmɑ cendi hɑndunyɑ bɔm. À nɑ hɑndunyɑ lɛzɛ yom wi. À nɑ ǹ cetu lɛzɛ hɑri kɑɑyom hɑmburu beeri kunɑ, wɑtom Ikpɛ binefute hɑmburu noyɑ.
66014020	Wɑngɑrɑ di bɑndɑ no ǹ nɑ lɛzɛ hɑri tɑɑmutɑɑmu kɑ kɑɑ hɑmburu di kunɑ. Kuri gɑ hunu zɑ hɑmburɑ kunɑ kɑ dendi zɑngɑ kilomɛti zɑngu hinzɑ. À guuse mɑ tɔ zɑngɑ bɑri yom mee gɑɑ.
66015001	A di ɑlɑmu ŋmɑni fɔ mo bɛɛnɛ kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ beeri. À tɛ mɑmɑci hɛ mo. Ngɑ yɑ ci Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize iye kɑ ǹ gundɑ bɑlɑu iye, kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ bɑlɑu noyɑ zɑmɑ Ikpɛ binefute kube ǹ kunɑ.
66015002	A di hɛ fɔ zɑngɑ bɑngu hɑri kɑ ɑ̀ kɑni yelem yelem. À himɑ zɑngɑ diji. À meigu ndɑ nini mo. Bɔrɔ wɔne yom go cɛ ɑ̀ bɔm ndɑ Ikpɛ mɔlɔ yom. Ngei yɑ gɑɑŋmɑɑ gɑnjihɑm di ndɑ ɑ̀ himɑi bɔm ndɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ lɑmbɑ bɔm.
66015003	Ǹ gɑ Moisi kɑ ɑ̀ ci Ikpɛ tɑm, ɑ̀ betu tɛ ndɑ Feejiize betu ko cii: "E Kpe Ikpɛ, Dɑbɑri kulu Kpe n gbei yom beeri. Mɑmɑci hɛ yom no. N fɔndɔ yom cɛsusukpɛ yom no. Fɔndɔ cimikpɛ yom mo no. Ni, n ci hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kulu Kpe.
66015004	Mee yɑ si hɑmburu ni, Kpe? Mee yɑ si kɑ n mɑɑ bɛɛrɑndi? Ni hinne yɑ ci hɑlɑɑlɑ. Dimi kulu go kɑɑ kɑ n bɛɛrɑndi mo, zɑmɑ n nɑ n cɛsusu kɑɑtɛrɛ."
66015005	Ngɑ di bɑndɑ ɑ di Ikpɛ goonoyom dɔ goono feerɑntɛ bɛɛnɛ kunɑ. Ngɑ yɑ ci kuuru bukɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci sɛdɑ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ Ikpɛ.
66015006	Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize iyɑ kɑ ǹ gundɑ bɑlɑu iye hunu Ikpɛ goonoyom dɔ. Ǹ nɑ tɑɑfɛ bɑɑnɔ kpɑrɛ tɑi tɑi, hinnɑntɛ fɔ yom dɑm. Ǹ nɑ wurɑ kunɑcendi hɔ ngei jɛndɛ yom bɔm.
66015007	Hundikoni tɑɑci di ŋmɔne ɑfɔ nɑ wurɑ gɑɑsiɑ iye nɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize iye di sɛ. Gɑɑsiɑ yom di tɔ mo ndɑ Ikpɛ binefute, Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go hunɑ jiiri dubu ndɑ dubu yom.
66015008	Ikpɛ goonoyom dɔ tɔ ndɑ dullu Ikpɛ deizɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ dɑbɑri sɑbu sɛ. Bɔrɔ fɔ kulu mɑ si hini kɑ hurɑ Ikpɛ goonoyom dɔ kɑlɑ de ǹ nɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize iye di bɑlɑu iyɑ tɔnɑndi.
66016001	A mɑɑ jinde beeri fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go hunu zɑ Ikpɛ goonoyom dɔ. À go cii Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize iye di sɛ: Wɑ kpei kɑ Ikpɛ binefute gɑɑsiɑ iye munu hɑndunyɑ bɔm.
66016002	Sintine kpei kɑ ngɑ gɑɑsiɑ munu hɑndunyɑ bɔm. Cɔfɔ jomboyesɑ lɑlɔ kɑm beerem bɔm kɑ ǹ gundɑ gɑnjihɑm di sɛdɑ dɑmyom ko kɑ ɑ̀ himɑi bɛɛrɑndi.
66016003	Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize hinkɑntɛ nɑ ngɑ gɑɑsiɑ munu tɛkuɑ kunɑ. Tɛku bɛrɛ kɑ tɛ kuri zɑngɑ bukɔ kuri. Hundikoni kulu kɑ ɑ̀ goono tɛkuɑ kunɑ bu.
66016004	Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize hinzɑntɛ nɑ ngɑ gɑɑsiɑ munu isɑ yom ndɑ fɔci hɑri yom kunɑ. Ǹ kulu bɛrɛ kɑ tɛ kuri.
66016005	A mɑɑ hɑri yom di ŋmɔne Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize go cii: E Kpe, Ni kɑ n goono mɑɑsɑ, n goono zɑ dɑm, n gɑ kɑɑ mɑ. Ni yɑ cɛsusukpɛ susu nɑ zɑmɑ n nɑ nge yom di ciiti.
66016006	Zɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom ndɑ ɑndebi yom kuri munu Ni wɔ, n nɑ ǹ nɑ kuri ǹ mɑ hɑm. Ǹ tɔ ɑ̀ hɑmyom mɑ.
66016007	A mɑɑ jinde fɔ kpɛɛnɛ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu bɑndɑ tɑndɑ dɔ kɑ cii: Oò, Kpe Ikpɛ Dɑbɑri kulu Kpe, n ciiti yom cimikpɛ yom nɑ. Cɛsusukpɛ yom mɑ nɑ.
66016008	Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize tɑɑcɑntɛ mɑ nɑ ngɑ gɑɑsiɑ munu weenu bɔm. À du fɔndɔ ɑ̀ mɑ beerem tɔnu ndɑ nini.
66016009	À nɑ beerem tɔnu mɑ ndɑ dunguɛ bɑmbɑtɑ. Beerem di gɑ kɑ Ikpɛ sendi yɑmu kɑ ɑ̀ cɛnɑndi, Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ hini bɑlɑu nge yom di bɔm. Ǹ si tuubi kɑ bɛrɛ. Ǹ si bɛɛrɛ nɑ ɑ̀ sɛ mɑ.
66016010	Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize guɑntɛ mɑ nɑ ngɑ gɑɑsiɑ munu gɑnjihɑm di kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ bɔm. À kpetɛrɛ tɔ ndɑ kube. Beerem nɑ ngei dɛɛnɛ nɑmɑ dɑɑri sɑbu sɛ.
66016011	Ǹ nɑ Ikpɛ kɑ ɑ̀ goono bɛɛnɛ sendi yɑmu kɑ ɑ̀ cɛnɑndi, ǹ dɑɑri ndɑ ǹ jomboyesɑ yom sɑbu sɛ. Ǹ mɑnɑ tuubi kɑ bɛrɛ mɑ ǹ tɛgbei yom gɑɑ.
66016012	Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize iduɑntɛ nɑ ngɑ gɑɑsiɑ munu isɑ beeri kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Yufɑtu kunɑ. Isɑ kɔgu kɑ fɔndɔ tɛ hɑndunyɑ kpe yom di sɛ kɑ ǹ gɑ hunu zɑ weenuhune.
66016013	A di biyɑ ziibɔ hinzɑ gɑ hunu zɑ kɑndɑmɑ mee kunɑ ndɑ gɑnjihɑm di mee kunɑ ndɑ ɑndebi tɑngɑri tɑngɑri mee kunɑ. Ǹ himɑ nɑ zɑngɑ kɔɔmɑtɑ yom.
66016014	Hɔllɛ yom biyɑ yom yɑ gɑ ɑlɑmu yom tɛ. Ǹ gɑ kpei huro hɑndunyɑ kpe yom kulu kunɑ nungu kulu kɑ beerem goono. Ǹ meigu ngei mɑ wɑngu Ikpɛ Dɑbɑrikpɛ Hɑnu beerɑ hine.
66016015	Gunɑ, ɑ go kɑɑ zɑngɑ zee. Binekɑɑnekpɛ no bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑtu. À go lɑɑkɑli ndɑ ngɑ jiine yom zɑmɑ ngɑ mɑ si dirɑ bumbum hɑli beerem go di ngɑ hɑwi.
66016016	Ikpɛ nɑ hɔllɛ biyɑ yom meigu nungu fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Ebulu cinɛ kunɑ Hɑmɑgedom.
66016017	Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize iyɑntɛ nɑ ngɑ gɑɑsiɑ munu hɛo kunɑ. Cɔfɔ jinde beeri fɔ hunu Ikpɛ goonoyom dɔ bɛɛnɛ kunɑ ndɑ kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ dɔ. À cii: À tɛ fɑ.
66016018	Cɔfɔ jinde yom ndɑ bɛɛnɛ kɑɑtiyom ndɑ bɛɛnɛ nyɑlɑu yom tɛ. Gɑndɑ zinjiyom beeri tɛ, zinjiyom kɑ ɑ̀ dimi mɑnɑ tɛ bɑ ce fɔ zɑ bɔrɔ tɑkɑyom hɑndunyɑ wɔ bɔm. Gɑndɑ zinjiyom wɔ beeri fɑ.
66016019	À nɑ wɑngɑrɑ beeri fee fɑrisime hinzɑ. Dimi yom wɑngɑrɑ yom kɑm. Ikpɛ hɔngɔ Bɑbiloni beeri zɑmɑ ngɑ mɑ ɑ̀ no ngɑ binefute dungɔ di zɑngɑ dufɛ gɑɑsiɑ ɑ̀ mɑ hɑm.
66016020	Hɔndɛ tɑɑsi yom kulu dɛrɛ zɑngɑ ǹ zuuru. Tɑndi kuku yom mɑ si.
66016021	Gɑri bɑmbɑtɑ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ kɑ kɑm beerem bɔm, ɑfɔ kulu time tɔ cilɑ wɑrɑnzɑ cindi gu. Beerem mo nɑ sendi yɑmu tɛ Ikpɛ sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ cɛnɑndi bɑlɑu di sɑbu sɛ zɑmɑ bɑlɑu di beeri gumo.
66017001	Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize iye kɑ ǹ gundɑ gɑɑsiɑ iyɑ, ǹ kunɑ ɑfɔ sendi ɑ sɛ kɑ cii: Kɑɑ nee. A gɑ n cɛbɛ ciiti kɑ ɑ go tɛ weikuru beeri kɑ ɑ̀ go gɔrɔ hɑri boobo wɔ bɔm sɛ.
66017002	Hɑndunyɑ kpe yom zinɑ ndɑ weikuru di. Hɑndunyɑ beerem mɑ tɔ ndɑ ɑ̀ weikurutɛrɛ zɑngɑ dufɛ gɑ kɑ ǹ wi.
66017003	Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ nɑ ɑ dii. Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di kpeindɑ hɛɛ gɑnji fɔ kunɑ. Cɔfɔ ɑ di weibɔrɔ fɔ gɑ gɔrɔ gɑnjihɑm ciire fɔ bɔm. Mɑɑ yom kɑ ǹ go kɑ Ikpɛ cɛnɑndi ndei, ǹ goono gɑnjhɑm di gɑɑ nungu kulu. À gundɑ bɔm iye ndɑ hilli wei.
66017004	Weibɔrɔ di nɑ tɑɑfɛ siini ciire fɔ dɑm. À nɑ ngɑ bɔm tɑɑlɑm ndɑ wurɑ ndɑ tɑndi cɑɑdɑntɛ yom ndɑ kɔlibɛ kpɑrɛ cɑɑdɑntɛ yom. À gundɑ wurɑ gɑɑsiɑ fɔ ngɑ kɑmbɛ kunɑ. Gɑɑsiɑ di tɔ ndɑ fɛntɛ hɛ yom kɑ Ikpɛ bine go hungu ndɑ ɑ̀ zinɑtɛrɛ ziibiyom.
66017005	Ǹ nɑ mɑɑ wɔne hɑntum ɑ̀ sukutu gɑɑ kɑ bɔrɔ si fɑhɑm: DUJE NO BABILONI BAMBATA WEIKURU YOM NDA HANDUNYA FƐNTƐ HƐ YOM NYA NO.
66017006	A di weibɔrɔ di bugu ndɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kuri ndɑ Yesu sɛdɑ yom kuri zɑngɑ bɑjiwi. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ di ɑ̀, cɔfɔ mɑmɑci nɑ ɑ dii kɑlɑ kɑlɑ.
66017007	Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di cii ɑ sɛ: Ifɔ sɛ nɑ mɑmɑci nɑ n dii? Yɑ weibɔrɔ wɔ duje cii n sɛ ndɑ gɑnjihɑm wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ bɔm ɑ̀ goono, gɑnjihɑm kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ bɔm iye ndɑ hilli wei.
66017008	Gɑnjihɑm wɔ kɑ n di, ɑ̀ goono zɑ dom ɑmmɑ mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ si. À bɑ hunu guusu kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ mee kunɑ kɑ kpei hɑlɑciyom dɔ. Hɑndunyɑ wɔ beerem kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ǹ mɑɑ hɑntum Hundi Tirɑ kunɑ zɑ hɑndunyɑ sinjiyom, mɑmɑci gɑ ǹ dii sɑɑ kɑ ǹ di gɑnjihɑm wɔ. Ǹ go mɑmɑci kɑ ǹ di gɑnjihɑm di kɑ ɑ̀ goono zɑ dom, mɑɑsɑ ɑ̀ si ɑmmɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑ mo.
66017009	Fɑhɑm neyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ hɑikusutɛrɛ. Bɔm iye di yɑ ci tondi kuku iye kɑ ǹ bɔm weibɔrɔ di go gɔrɔ.
66017010	Gɑndɑkpɛ iye mo goono. Igu kɑm. Afɔ goono. Afɔ mɑnɑ kɑɑ jinɑ. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ ɑ̀ himɑ ɑ̀ mɑ gɔrɔ lɔkɑci cɛnɑ fɔ.
66017011	Gɑnjihɑm di kɑ ɑ̀ goono zɑ dom, kɑ ɑ̀ si mɑɑsɑ, ngɑ mɑ gɑndɑkpɛ ɑhɑkuɑntɛ no. À goono kpe iye di kunɑ. À go kpei hɑlɑciyom dɔ.
66017012	Hilli wei di kɑ n di, gɑndɑkpɛ wei nɑ kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ du ngei kpetɛrɛ jinɑ. Ammɑ ǹ kɑɑ du hini zɑngɑ kpe guuru fɔlɔnku, ngei ndɑ gɑnjihɑm di.
66017013	Lɑsɑbu fɔlɔnku goono ǹ sɛ. Ǹ kɑɑ gɑnjihɑm di nɑ ngei dɑbɑri ndɑ ngei hini.
66017014	Ngei yɑ kɑɑ wɑngu ndɑ Feejiize. Feejiize di kɑɑ gɑɑŋmɑɑ ǹ bɔm zɑmɑ ngɑ yɑ ci Kpe yom kulu Kpe, Dɑbɑrikpɛ yom kulu Dɑbɑrikpɛ. Beerem kɑ ǹ goono Feejiize di bɑndɑ, ngei yɑ ci beerem kɑ Ikpɛ cɛɛ. Ǹ ci suubɑntɛ yom ndɑ nɑɑnekpɛ yom.
66017015	Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize cii ɑ sɛ: Hɑri yom kɑ n di nungu kɑ ɑ̀ bɔm weikuru wɔ go gɔrɔ, kundɑ yom no ndɑ jɑmɑ bɑkɑrɑ ndɑ dimi yom ndɑ dɛɛnɛ yom.
66017016	Hilli wei di kɑ n di gɑnjihɑm di gɑɑ, ǹ bine kɑɑ hungu weikuru di. Ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ hɑlɑci. Ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑ bumbum. Ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ gɑɑbɑsi kulu ŋmɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tusu ndɑ nini.
66017017	Ikpɛ dɑm ǹ bine yom kunɑ ǹ mɑ ngɑ miilɑ tɛ ndɑ bine fɔ. Ǹ mɑ ngei kpetɛrɛ dɑbɑri mɑ nɑ gɑnjihɑm di sɛ kɑlɑ Ikpɛ Sendi mɑ kube.
66017018	Weibɔrɔ di kɑ n di mo, wɑngɑrɑ beeri nɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ dɑbɑri hɑndunyɑ kpe yom bɔm.
66018001	Ngɑ di bɑndɑ ɑ di Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize ŋmɑni fɔ go zumbu zɑ bɛɛnɛ. À gundɑ hini beeri. À deizɑ mo nɑ hɑndunyɑ wɔ kulu hɑɑgɑndi.
66018002	À kuwɑ ndɑ jinde beeri kɑ cii: À kɑm. Bɑbiloni beeri kɑm. À ye hɔllɛ yom gɔrɛ dɔ, biyɑ ziibɔ yom tuguyom dɔ, ciro ziibɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci fɛntɛ ciro tuguyom dɔ.
66018003	Hɑndunyɑ dimi kulu nɑ ɑ̀ zinɑtɛrɛ futu hɑm zɑngɑ dufɛ. Hɑndunyɑ wɔ kpe yom mɑ nɑ zinɑ tɛ ndɑɑ̀. Hɑndunyɑ tenkuize yom mo nɑ ngei bɔm tɛ hɑibɑrikɑ ɑ̀ hɑizici bɑyom dɔ.
66018004	Cɔfɔ ɑ mɑɑ jinde ŋmɑni fɔ mɑ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ kɑ cii: A jɑmɑ, wɑ hunu ɑ̀ kunɑ zɑmɑ wom mɑ si hurɑ ɑ̀ dulum yom kunɑ. Wom mɑ si kɑɑ du bɑ ɑ̀ bɑlɑu yom gɑɑ.
66018005	À dulum yom bɑɑru tɔ kɑlɑ bɛɛnɛ. Ikpɛ bine hɔngɔ ɑ̀ gbei lɑlɔ yom.
66018006	Wɑ ɑ̀ bɑnɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ nɑ wom bɑnɑ. Wɑ ɑ̀ cine hinkɑ bɑnɑ ɑ̀ sɛ ndɑ zɑngɑ ɑ̀ gbei yom goono ndɑ. Gɑɑsiɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ ɑ̀ diibi, wom mɑ ɑ̀ cine hinkɑ diibi ɑ̀ sɛ.
66018007	Zɑngɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɔm bɛɛrɑndi kɑ ngɑ gɔrɛ tɛ kɑɑne kunɑ, zɑngɑ yɑ wom mɑ ɑ̀ nɑ bɔnɛ ndɑ bɛrɛɛ. À go cii ngɑ bine kunɑ: A gɑ gɔrɔ zɑngɑ weibɔrɔ gɑndɑkpɛ. Hɛɛ wɔ, ɑ mɑnɑ ci sokoni. A si di bɛrɛɛ pɑi.
66018008	Ngɑ di sɑbu sɛ, hɑnu fɔlɔnku no ɑ̀ bɑlɑu yom gɑ kɑɑ. Ngei yɑ ci bu ndɑ bɛrɛɛ ndɑ hɛrɛɛ. Ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ tusu mo ndɑ nini. Kpe Ikpɛ yɑ gɑɑbikoni no kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ ɑ̀ ciiti.
66018009	Hɑndunyɑ kpe yom kulu mɑ kɑ ǹ nɑ ngei bɔm dɑm zinɑ ndɑɑ̀ kɑ gɔrɛ kɑɑnɔ tɛ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ, ǹ kɑɑ hɛ kɑ bɛrɛɛ ɑ̀ sɑbu sɛ sɑɑ kɑ ǹ di ɑ̀ gobɑrɑ dullu.
66018010	Ǹ kɑɑ cɛ nungu mɔɔrɔ, ɑ̀ bɔnɛ hɑmbure sɑbu sɛ kɑ cii: Kɑito, kɑito, Bɑbiloni wɑngɑrɑ beeri, wɑngɑrɑ gɑɑbikoni no. Guuru fɔlɔnku no n ciiti kɑɑ.
66018011	Hɑndunyɑ wɔ tenkuize yom kulu kɑɑ hɛ kɑ bɛrɛɛ ɑ̀ sɛ zɑmɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu si kɑ ǹ bɔriji yom wɔ dei kpɛɛnɛ.
66018012	Bɔriji yom di neyɑ. Wurɑ ndɑ ɑnzɛrɛfu ndɑ tondi cɑɑdɑntɛ yom ndɑ kɔlibɛ kpɑrɛ cɑɑdɑntɛ yom goono. Ǹ kunɑ tɑɑfɛ bɑɑnɔ cɑɑdɑntɛ yom goono mo ndɑ tɑɑfɛ siini ndɑ tɑɑfɛ hinno cɑɑdɑntɛ yom ndɑ tɑɑfɛ ciire yom. Bɔrijei kunɑ mo bundu kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ hɛo kɑɑnɔ goono ndɑ jiine yom kɑ ǹ tɛ ndɑ tɑkunde hinje ndɑ jiine yom kɑ ǹ tɛ ndɑ bundu bɛɛrɛkpɛ yom ndɑ guuru ciire ndɑ guuru ndɑ tondi kpɑrɛ ŋmɑni fɔ.
66018013	Bɔriji yom di kunɑ mɑ cirinfi goono ndɑ yɑzi yom ndɑ wɑidi ndɑ mire kɑ ɑ̀ ci wɑidi dimi fɔ ndɑ dufɛ ndɑ jii ndɑ hɑmini bɑɑnɔ ndɑ mɔsɔngu ndɑ hɑu ndɑ feeji ndɑ bɑri ndɑ tɔrɔkɔ yom ndɑ tɑm yom, wɑtom iburɑdɑm hundi yom.
66018014	Bɑrikɑ yom kɑ ni Bɑbiloni, n bine gɑ bɑɑ ǹ dɛrɛ n sɛ. Noorukpɛ yom jiinei ndɑ hɛ yom kulu kɑ n cini tɑɑlɑm ndɑ, ǹ kulu mo dɛrɛ n sɛ. N bine si di ei kpɛɛnɛ pɑi.
66018015	Hɛ nge yom di tenkuize yom kɑ ǹ tɛ hɑibɑrikɑ ǹ gɑɑ, ǹ kɑɑ felem ɑ̀ bɔnɛ hɑmbure sɑbu sɛ. Ǹ kɑɑ hɛ, ǹ bine kɑɑ goono bɛrɛɛ kunɑ.
66018016	Ǹ gɑ cii: Kɑito, kɑito wɑngɑrɑ beeri wɔ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɑɑlɑm ndɑ tɑɑfɛ bɑɑnɔ ndɑ tɑɑfɛ siini ndɑ tɑɑfɛ ciire. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɑɑlɑm ndɑ wurɑ ndɑ tondi cɑɑdɑntɛ yom ndɑ kɔlibɛ kpɑrɛ cɑɑdɑntɛ yom.
66018017	Guuru fɔlɔnku no ɑ̀ hɑibɑrikɑ bɑɑbɑ tɛ kɔnu. Hɑrihi funukɔ yom kulu ndɑ beerem kulu kɑ ǹ go nɑɑru kɑ kpei hɑrihi kunɑ ndɑ hɑrihi gbeiteeri yom ndɑ beerem kulu kɑ ǹ go ŋmɑɑ tɛku gɑɑ, ǹ kulu felem kɑ cɛ nungu mɔɔrɔ.
66018018	Kɑ ǹ di ɑ̀ gobɑrɑ dullu, ǹ go kuwɑ kɑ cii: Wɑngɑrɑ fɔ yɑ himɑ wɑngɑrɑ beeri wɔ?
66018019	Ǹ nɑ lɑɑbu kuu kɑ see ngei bɔm gɑɑ bɛrɛɛ sɑbu sɛ. Ǹ go hɛ. Ǹ goono bɛrɛɛ kunɑ. Ǹ go kuwɑ kɑ cii: Kɑito, kɑito, wɑngɑrɑ beeri di, nungu kɑ tɛku bɔm hɑrihikpɛ yom kulu tɛ hɑibɑrikɑ ɑ̀ hɑizici dɔ. Guuru fɔlɔnku no ɑ̀ kɑɑ hɑlɑci.
66018020	E bɛɛnɛ, n mɑ fɑihã ɑ̀ bɔm. Wom mo diyɑ hɑlɑɑlɑ yom ndɑ ɑndebi yom, wɑ fɑihã zɑmɑ Ikpɛ fɑɑsɑ wom sɛ ɑ̀ gɑɑ.
66018021	Cɔfɔ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ gɑɑbi nɑ tondi fɔ zɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ himɑ zɑngɑ fufuyom tondi beeri. À nɑ ɑ̀ jindo tɛku kunɑ kɑ cii: Yɑ no ǹ kɑɑ Bɑbiloni wɑngɑrɑ beeri jindo gɑndɑ ndɑ gɑɑbi. Ǹ si ye kɑ di ɑ̀ mo pɑi.
66018022	Ni Bɑbiloni wɑngɑrɑ beeri, ǹ si kɑɑ mɑɑ mɔlɔ kɑrukɔ yom jinde n kunɑ. Ǹ si kɑɑ mɑɑ konkombɑize yom ndɑ gɑɑsiɑ kɑruyom ndɑ kuluu funsukɔ yom jinde n kunɑ. Ǹ si kɑɑ du bɑ kɑmbɛ gbeiteeri fɔ n kunɑ. Ǹ si kɑɑ mɑɑ fufuyom tondi mo yɔgɔi kpɛɛnɛ.
66018023	Fitilɑ si kɑɑri n kunɑ kpɛɛnɛ. Ǹ si mɑɑ weihiji ndɑ hɑruhiji jinde n kunɑ kpɛɛnɛ. N kunɑ mɑ n tenkuize yom yɑ ci hɑndunyɑ wɔ bɔrɔ beeri yom. N mondɑbɑru tɛyom gɑɑ n nɑ dimi kulu dɛrɑndi.
66018024	Bɑbiloni kunɑ mo ǹ nɑ ɑndebi yom ndɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom kuri gɑru ndɑ beerem kulu kɑ ǹ wi hɑndunyɑ kunɑ.
66019001	Nge yom di bɑndɑ ɑ mɑɑ jɑmɑ bɑkɑrɑ jinde bɛɛnɛ kunɑ. Ǹ gɑ cii: Aleluyɑ! Fɑɑbɑ ndɑ deizɑ ndɑ bɛɛrɛ ndɑ dɑbɑri, ǹ kulu goono i ŋmɔne Ikpɛ sɛ.
66019002	À ciiti yom cimikpɛ yom no. Cɛsusukpɛ yom mo no. À nɑ weikuru beeri ciiti, wɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ hɑndunyɑ sɑrɑ ndɑ ngɑ zinɑ. À fɑɑsɑ ngɑ tɑm yom kuri sɛ ɑ̀ gɑɑ mɑ.
66019003	Ǹ ye kɑ cii kpɛɛnɛ: Aleluyɑ. À dullu gɑ ziji bɛɛnɛ, jiiri dubu ndɑ dubu yom.
66019004	Hɑikusu wɑrɑnkɑ cindi tɑɑci di ndɑ hundikoni tɑɑci di, ǹ jɛndɛbiri Ikpɛ sɛ Ngɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ gɔrɔ kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ bɔm, kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi. Ǹ go cii: Ami. Aleluyɑ.
66019005	Jinde fɔ hunu zɑ kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ dɔ kɑ cii: Wɑ i ŋmɔne Ikpɛ sifɑ, wom kulu kɑ wom ci ɑ̀ tɑm yom, wom kɑ wom go hɑmburɑ, icɛnɑ ndɑ ibeeri.
66019006	Cɔfɔ ɑ mɑɑ jɑmɑ bɑkɑrɑ jinde zɑngɑ hɑri gɑɑbikoni kungu, zɑngɑ bɛɛnɛ kɑɑtiyom beeri jinde. À go cii: Aleluyɑ. Kpe Ikpɛ Dɑbɑri kulu Kpe, ɑ̀ go mei.
66019007	I mɑ fɑihã. I mɑ goono binekɑɑne kunɑ. I mɑ bɛɛrɛ no ɑ̀ sɛ, zɑmɑ Feejiize hije wɑtɛ tɔ. À weihiji nɑ ngɑ bɔm sɔlu.
66019008	Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ no tɑɑfɛ bɑɑnɔ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci hinnɑntɛ ndɑ nɛɛrɑntɛ ɑ̀ mɑ dɑm. Tɑɑfɛ bɑɑnɔ wɔ yɑ ci hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom gbei yom kɑ ǹ ci cɛɑntɛ susu.
66019009	Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di cii ɑ sɛ: Wɔne hɑntum. Binekɑɑnekpɛ yom no beerem kɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ cɛɛ Feejiize di hije ŋmɑɑri dɔ. À ye kɑ cii ɑ sɛ: Sendi yom wɔ Ikpɛ Sendi yom no, cimi ndɑ ɑfɔ.
66019010	À gɑɑ nɑ, ɑ jɛndɛbiri Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi. Ammɑ ɑ̀ cii ɑ sɛ: N mɑ si tɛ yɑ di. Hɛɛ wɔ, n bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ no gbei kunɑ ndɑ n nyɑize yom kɑ ǹ gɑ Yesu sɛdɑ jɛ. N mɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi zɑmɑ Yesu sɛdɑ yɑ ɑndebitɛrɛ biyɑ nɑ.
66019011	A di bɛɛnɛ goono feerɑntɛ. Cɔfɔ bɑri kpɑrɛ fɔ gɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑru, ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ Nɑɑnekpɛ ndɑ Cimikpɛ. À go ciiti ndɑ wɑngu tɛ cɛyom susu kunɑ.
66019012	À moo yom goono no zɑngɑ nini bɛllɛ. À bɔm gɑɑ gundɑ kpetɛrɛ fulɑ boobo. À gundɑ mɑɑ fɔ hɑntumɑntɛ kɑ bɔrɔ fɔ kulu si ɑ̀ bei kɑlɑ ngɑ.
66019013	À nɑ kpɛ fɔ mɑ dɑm kɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ miti kuri kunɑ kɑ kɑɑ. À mɑɑ yɑ ci Ikpɛ Sendɑ.
66019014	Wɑngɑri yom mo kɑ ǹ goono bɛɛnɛ go kɑ ɑ̀ gɑnɑ bɑri kpɑrɛ yom bɔm. Ǹ nɑ tɑɑfɛ bɑɑnɔ kpɑrɛ hinnɑntɛ fɔ yom dɑm.
66019015	Tɑkubɑ colicoli mee kɑɑnɔkpɛ fɔ gɑ hunu ɑ̀ mee yom kunɑ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑ hɑndunyɑ dimi yom beri ndɑ À gɑ ǹ mei ndɑ guuru goobu. Ngɑ bumbum gɑ ǹ tɑɑmutɑɑmu zɑngɑ lɛzɛ hɑri kɑnkɑmyom dɔ. Kpe Ikpɛ Dɑbɑrikpɛ binefute dungɔ ŋmɔne noyɑ.
66019016	À kpɛ ndɑ ɑ̀ tɛnjɛ gɑɑ, ǹ nɑ mɑɑ wɔne hɑntum: DABARIKPƐ YOM KULU DABARIKPƐ NDA KPE YOM KULU KPE.
66019017	Cɔfɔ ɑ di Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize fɔ go cɛ weenu kunɑ. À kuwɑ ndɑ jinde beeri kɑ cii ciro yom kulu kɑ ǹ go deesi bɛɛnɛ bindi bindi sɛ: Wɑ kɑɑ meigu Ikpɛ ŋmɑɑri beeri sɛ kɑ Ikpɛ sɔlu wom sɛ.
66019018	Wom mɑ hɑndunyɑ kpe yom gɑɑbɑsi ŋmɑɑ ndɑ wɑnguize hɑikusu yom gɑɑbɑsi ndɑ gɑɑbikoni yom gɑɑbɑsi ndɑ bɑri yom gɑɑbɑsi ndɑ bɑrikɑri yom gɑɑbɑsi ndɑ bɔrɔ kulu gɑɑbɑsi, zɑ bɔrɔcini yom zɑ bɑnyɑ yom, icɛnɑ ndɑ ibeeri.
66019019	Cɔfɔ ɑ di gɑnjihɑm di ndɑ hɑndunyɑ wɔ kpe yom ndɑ ǹ wɑngɑri yom kulu meigu ko wɑngu tɛ ndɑ Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go gɔrɔ bɑri di bɔm ndɑ ɑ̀ wɑngɑri yom.
66019020	Ǹ nɑ gɑnjihɑmɑ dii ndɑ ɑndebi tɑngɑri tɑngɑri kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ɑlɑmu yom tɛ ɑ̀ moojine. Alɑmu yom di gɑɑ ɑ̀ nɑ beerem kɑ ǹ du gɑnjihɑm di sɛdɑ dɑmyom dɛrɑndi, ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ ɑ̀ himɑi bɛɛrɑndi. Ǹ nɑ ǹ bɔrɔ hinkɑ kulu jindo bɑhunɑ buulɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go dii ndɑ nini ndɑ ɑlibɑro kunɑ.
66019021	Tɑkubɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hunu zɑ Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ gɔrɔ bɑri di bɔm, ɑ̀ mee nɑ bɔrɔ cindei wi. Ciro yom di kulu kungu ndɑ ǹ gɑɑbɑsi.
66020001	A di Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize fɔ go zumbu zɑ bɛɛnɛ. À gundɑ guusu kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ mee di lɑntɑnɑize ndɑ nyɔri bɑmbɑtɑ fɔ ngɑ kɑmbɛ kunɑ.
66020002	À nɑ kɑndɑmɑ dii, zɑ dom dom gondi kɑ ɑ̀ ci Ibilisi wɑlɑ Setɑm. À nɑ ɑ̀ hɔ kɑlɑ jiiri dubu fɔ.
66020003	À nɑ ɑ̀ jindo guusu kɑ ɑ̀ sindɑ mee kunɑ kɑ guusu di mee dɑɑbu. À nɑ sɛdɑ dɑm meeɑ gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ dɑɑbu zɑmɑ ɑ̀ mɑ si hɑndunyɑ dimi yom dɛrɑndi kpɛɛnɛ kɑlɑ jiiri dubu fɔ di mɑ beeni. Ngɑ di bɑndɑ ǹ gɑ ɑ̀ feeri bɑndɑ fɔ.
66020004	A di kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ yom mɑ ndɑ beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ gɔrɔ ǹ bɔm. Ǹ nɑ ǹ nɑ dɑbɑri ǹ mɑ ciiti tɛ. A di beerem hundi yom, beerem kɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ bɔm yom dumbu Yesu sɛdɑ sɑbu sɛ ndɑ Ikpɛ Sendi sɑbu sɛ. Beerem nge yom di mɑnɑ gɑnjihɑm di bɛɛrɑndi wɑlɑ ɑ̀ himɑi. Ǹ mɑnɑ du sɛdɑ dɑmyom ngei sukutu yom gɑɑ wɑlɑ ǹ kɑmbɛ yom gɑɑ. Ǹ ye kɑ hunɑ ko kpetɛrɛ ŋmɑɑ Mɛsiyɑ bɑndɑ zɑngɑ jiiri dubu fɔ.
66020005	Ammɑ bukɔ cindei mɑnɑ ye hundi gɑɑ kɑlɑ jiiri dubu fɔ di beeni. Bukɔei tunɑndiyom sintinɑ noyɑ.
66020006	Binekɑɑnekpɛ ndɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ no bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ bɑ sintine bukɔei tunɑndiyom gɑɑ. Bu hinkɑntɛ sindɑ dɑbɑri ǹ bɔm, ɑmmɑ ǹ kɑɑ bɑrɑ Ikpɛ ndɑ Mɛsiyɑ gɑrɑndikɔ yom. Ǹ kɑɑ kpetɛrɛ ŋmɑɑ ɑ̀ bɑndɑ jiiri dubu fɔ.
66020007	Sɑɑ kɑ jiiri dubu fɔ beeni, ǹ kɑɑ Setɑm kɑɑ ɑ̀ kɑsu kunɑ.
66020008	À kɑɑ hunu kɑ hɑndunyɑ dimi yom kɑ ǹ goono hɑndunyɑ cɛnjɛ tɑɑci gɑɑ dɛrɑndi, wɑtom Gɔgu ndɑ Mɑgɔgu. À gɑ ǹ meigu wɑngu tɛyom sɛ. Ǹ bɑyom bisɑ tɛku tɑɑsi.
66020009	Ǹ gɑnɑ kɑ bisɑ hɑndunyɑ kulu kunɑ kɑ hɑlɑɑlɑntɛ yom dɛbɛrɛ hundi ndɑ wɑngɑrɑ di kɑ Ikpɛ gɑ bɑɑ. Ammɑ nini fɔ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ Ikpɛ dɔ kɑ ǹ kulu ŋmɑɑ.
66020010	Ǹ nɑ Ibilisi kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ǹ dɛrɑndi jindo buulɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ dii ndɑ nini ndɑ ɑlibɑro kunɑ, nungu kɑ gɑnjihɑm di ndɑ ɑndebi tɑngɑri tɑngɑrɑ goono. Ǹ gɑ kɑ ǹ bɔnɑndi mo ciini ndɑ zɑɑri jiiri dubu ndɑ dubu yom.
66020011	A di kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ kpɑrɛ beeri fɔ ndɑ Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ gɔrɔ ɑ̀ bɔm. Gɑndɑ ndɑ bɛɛnɛ go zuuru ɑ̀ moodumɑ sɛ. Ǹ si di ei kpɛɛnɛ.
66020012	A di bukɔ yom mɑ, icɛnɑ ndɑ ibeeri, gɑ cɛ Ikpɛ jine. Ǹ nɑ tirɑ yom feeri. Ǹ nɑ tirɑ fɔ ŋmɑni feeri kɑ ɑ̀ ci Hundi Tirɑ. Ǹ bine nɑ bukɔ yom ciiti kɑ simbɑ ndɑ ǹ gbei yom kɑ ǹ hɑntum tirɑ yom di kunɑ.
66020013	Tɛku mɑ nɑ bukɔ yom kɑ ǹ goono ngɑ kunɑ no. Bu ndɑ ciyomɑ mɑ nɑ bukɔ yom kɑ ǹ goono ngei kunɑ no. Ǹ nɑ ǹ kulu ciiti mo kɑ simbɑ ndɑ ǹ gbei yom.
66020014	Cɔfɔ ǹ nɑ bu ndɑ ciyomɑ jindo buulɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go dii ndɑ nini kunɑ. Ngɑ yɑ ci bu hinkɑntɛ.
66020015	Bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ǹ mɑnɑ ɑ̀ mɑɑ hɑntum Hundi Tirɑ kunɑ, ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ jindo buulɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go dii ndɑ nini kunɑ.
66021001	A di bɛɛnɛ teji ndɑ gɑndɑ teji zɑmɑ bɛɛnɛ sintine ndɑ gɑndɑ sintine bisɑ. Tɛku mo si kpɛɛnɛ.
66021002	Hɛɛ Yohɑnnɑ, ɑ di wɑngɑrɑ hɑlɑɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Yerusɑlɛm teji. À go hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ Ikpɛ dɔ. Ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ sɔlu zɑngɑ weihiji kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɔm tɑɑlɑm ngɑ kunye sɛ.
66021003	A mɑɑ jinde beeri fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ hunu zɑ bɛɛnɛ. À go cii: Gunɑ, Ikpɛ gɔrɛ dɔ goono ndɑ beerem. Ikpɛ kɑɑ gɔrɔ ǹ bɑndɑ. Ǹ kɑɑ ci ɑ̀ jɑmɑ. Ikpɛ bumbum kɑɑ goono ndei. À kɑɑ ci ǹ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ.
66021004	À gɑ ǹ mundi kulu hɑɑbu ǹ sɛ ǹ moo yom gɑɑ. Bu mo si kpɛɛnɛ. Yɑ no bɛrɛɛ. Yɑ no hɛni. Yɑ nɑ dɑɑri mɑɑyom. Ǹ si kpɛɛnɛ zɑmɑ sintine hɛ yom bisɑ.
66021005	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go gɔrɔ kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ bɔm mɑ cii: Gunɑ, ɑ gɑ hɛ kulu tɛ iteji. À cii ɑ sɛ: N mɑ hɑntum zɑmɑ sendi nge yom di cimikpɛ ndɑ nɑɑnekpɛ yom.
66021006	À cii ɑ sɛ: À tɛ kɔ. Hɛɛ nɑ A. Hɛɛ nɑ Z, sintine ndɑ beenɑntɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go mɑɑ jo, ɑ gɑ ɑ̀ no hɑri fɔci gɑɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑndɑ hundi. Noyom no, ɑ̀ si bɑnɑ.
66021007	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go gɑɑŋmɑɑ yɑ hɛ yom kulu tubu. A ci ɑkpɛ ŋmɔne Ikpɛ, ngɑ mo kɑɑ ci ɑ ize.
66021008	Ammɑ beerem kɑ ǹ hɑmburu ndɑ zɑm kɑ nɑɑnekɔ yom ndɑ bɔrɔ yom kɑ Ikpɛ fɛntɛ ndɑ bɔrɔ wikɔ yom ndɑ zinɑteeri yom ndɑ mondɑbɑru tɛkɔ yom ndɑ tooru gɑnɑkɔ yom ndɑ tɑngɑrikom yom kulu, ǹ bɑ goono buulɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go dii ndɑ ɑlibɑro nini kunɑ. Ngɑ yɑ ci bu hinkɑntɛ.
66021009	Cɔfɔ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize iye di kɑ ǹ gundɑ gɑɑsiɑ iye ngei kɑmbɛ yom kunɑ ǹ kunɑ ɑfɔ kɑɑ ɑ̀ dɔ. Gɑɑsiɑ iye di tɔ ndɑ kɔkɔrɔ bɑndɑ bɑlɑu iye. Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di cii ɑ sɛ: Kɑɑ. A gɑ n cɛbɛ weihiji kɑ ɑ̀ ci Feejiize di wɛndɛ.
66021010	Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ nɑ ɑ dii, cɔfɔ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize kpeindɑ hɛɛ tɑndi kuku beeri fɔ bɔm. À nɑ ɑ cɛbɛ wɑngɑrɑ beeri hɑlɑɑlɑ kɑ ɑ̀ ci Yerusɑlɛm. À go zumbu zɑ bɛɛnɛ Ikpɛ dɔ.
66021011	À gundɑ Ikpɛ deizɑ. À kɑɑri himɑ zɑngɑ tondi cɑɑdɑntɛ kɑɑri, zɑngɑ tɑndi fɔ kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ yɑsipi. Ǹ hini kɑ di ɑ̀ yɑ hɛrɛ zɑngɑ kilisitɑli tondi.
66021012	Yerusɑlɛm teji di gundɑ birini kuku beeri fɔ. À gundɑ mee wei cindi hinkɑ. Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize wei cindi hinkɑ goono ǹ kulu gɑɑ kɑ bɑtu. Ǹ nɑ Isirɑilɑ ize wei cindi hinkɑ di mɑɑ fɔ kulu hɑntum mee fɔ kulu gɑɑ.
66021013	Weenuhune hɛrɛ mee hinzɑ goono. Weenuhune sɛ kɑmbɛwo hɛrɛ ihinzɑ goono. Weenuhune sɛ kɑmbɛŋmɑɑ hɛrɛ mee hinzɑ goono. Weenukɑne hɛrɛ ihinzɑ goono.
66021014	Wɑngɑrɑ di birini gundɑ kpɛsɛ wei cindi hinkɑ. Afɔ kulu bɔm mo ǹ nɑ Feejiize ŋmɔne diyɑ wei cindi hinkɑ di mɑɑ fɔ kulu hɑntum.
66021015	Ngɑ mɑ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ sendi ɑ sɛ gundɑ wurɑ goobu ɑ̀ mɑ wɑngɑrɑ di ndɑ ɑ̀ mee yom ndɑ ɑ̀ birini yom neesi.
66021016	Wɑngɑrɑ di birini cɛnjɛ tɑɑci di kulu sɑbɑ no, ɑ̀ kuyom ndɑ ɑ̀ hɛyom kulu sɑrɑ fɔ no. À nɑ wɑngɑrɑ neesi ndɑ gɑɑbu di. À tɔ zɑngɑ kilomɛti dubu hinkɑ sɑrɑ. À kuyom ndɑ ɑ̀ hɛyom ndɑ ɑ̀ gureyom kulu sɑbɑ nɑ.
66021017	À nɑ birini di neesi. À du kɑmbɛ kɑru zɑngu ndɑ weitɑɑci cindi tɑɑci kɑ ɑ̀ ci bɔrɔ neesiji. Zɑngɑ yɑ nɑ Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di nɑ ɑ̀ neesi.
66021018	Tondi kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ yɑsipi nɑ ǹ nɑ birini di cini ndɑ. Wɑngɑrɑ mɑ wurɑ hinno nɑ ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ cini ndɑ. À himɑ zɑngɑ diji hinnɑ.
66021019	Tondi cɑɑdɑntɛ ŋmɑni ŋmɑni yom no ǹ nɑ wɑngɑrɑ birini kpɛsɛ yom tɑɑlɑm ndɑ. Kpɛsɛ sintine tɑndi yɑsipi no ǹ nɑ ɑ̀ tɑɑlɑm ndɑ, ihinkɑntɛ ndɑ sɑfiri tɑndi, ihinzɑntɛ ndɑ kɑlisedoni tɑndi, itɑɑcɑntɛ ndɑ emelodu tɑndi.
66021020	Ǹ nɑ iguɑntɛ tɑɑlɑm ndɑ sɑdinu tɑndi, iduɑntɛ ndɑ sɑdisu tondi, iyɑntɛ ndɑ kiliselitu tondi. Ǹ nɑ ɑhɑkuɑntɛ tɑɑlɑm ndɑ belilu tondi, ɛgɑntɛ ndɑ topɑzi tondi, iweiɑntɛ ndɑ kilisopɑsu tondi. Ǹ nɑ iwei cindi fɔɑntɛ tɑɑlɑm ndɑ yɑsintu tondi, iwei cindi hinkɑntɛ ndɑ ɑmesitu tondi.
66021021	Birini wei cindi hinkɑ kulu tondi kpɑrɛ cɑɑdɑntɛ wei cindi hinkɑ no. Mee yom di kunɑ, ɑfɔ kulu tondi kpɑrɛ cɑɑdɑntɛ fɔlɔnku no. Wɑngɑrɑ bɑtumɑ kulu wurɑ hinno no zɑngɑ diji hinno kɑ ǹ di ɑ̀ yɑ hɛrɛ.
66021022	Ammɑ ɑ mɑnɑ di Ikpɛ goonoyom dɔ wɑngɑrɑ di kunɑ zɑmɑ Kpe Ikpɛ Dɑbɑrikpɛ ndɑ Feejiize di mo yɑ ci ɑ̀ gɔrɛ dɔ.
66021023	Wɑngɑrɑ di si bɑɑ weenu kɑɑri. À si bɑɑ hɑndu kɑɑri mɑ zɑmɑ Ikpɛ deizɑ go kɑ ɑ̀ hɑɑgɑndi. Feejiize di mɑ yɑ ci ɑ̀ fitilɑ.
66021024	Hɑndunyɑ dimi yom kɑ ǹ du fɑɑbɑ kɑɑ dirɑ wɑngɑrɑ di kɑɑri kunɑ. Hɑndunyɑ wɔ kpe yom mo kɑɑ kɑɑndɑ ngei hɑibɑrikɑ yom ndɑ ngei bɛɛrɛ ɑ̀ kunɑ.
66021025	Ǹ si wɑngɑrɑ mee yom dɑɑbu zɑɑri. Ciini si kɑɑ goono nodi.
66021026	Hɑndunyɑ dimi yom kɑɑ huro ɑ̀ kunɑ ndɑ ngei deizɑ ndɑ ngei bɛɛrɛ.
66021027	Hɛ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ si hɑlɑli si huro wɑngɑrɑ di kunɑ pɑi wɑlɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ nɑ ngɑ bɔm dɑm fɛntɛ hɛ kunɑ wɑlɑ tɑngɑri kunɑ. Ammɑ beerem kɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ mɑɑ yom hɑntum Feejiize Hundi Tirɑ kunɑ hinne yɑ hurɑ ɑ̀ kunɑ.
66022001	Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di nɑ ɑ cɛbɛ isɑ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gundɑ hɑri hundikpɛ. À gɑ kɑɑri zɑngɑ tɑndi kɑ ǹ cii ɑ̀ sɛ kilisitɑli. À go hunu zɑ Ikpɛ kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ dɔ ndɑ Feejiize di dɔ.
66022002	Hɑri gɑ dendi wɑngɑrɑ di fɔndɔ beeri bindi bindi. Jobu hinkɑ kulu gɑɑ gundɑ tuurinyɑ fɔ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑndɑ hundi. À cini hɛi nɑ ce wei cindi hinkɑ jiiri kulu ce fɔ hɑndu kulu. À kɔsu mo yɑ hɑndunyɑ dimi yom no bɑɑni.
66022003	Lɑɑli fɔ mo kulu si kpɛɛnɛ. Ikpɛ ndɑ Feejiize kpetɛrɛ kɑrigɑ kɑɑ goono wɑngɑrɑ kunɑ. À tɑm yom kɑɑ tɑmtɛrɛ ɑ̀ sɛ.
66022004	Ǹ kɑɑ di ɑ̀ moodumɑ. À mɑɑ mɑ kɑɑ goono ǹ sukutu yom gɑɑ.
66022005	Ciini si kɑɑ goono nodi. Ǹ si bɑɑ fitilɑ. Ǹ si bɑɑ weenu kɑɑri zɑmɑ Kpe Ikpɛ gɑ ǹ hɑɑgɑndi. Ǹ kɑɑ kpetɛrɛ ŋmɑɑ jiiri dubu ndɑ dubu yom.
66022006	À cii ɑ sɛ: Sendi yom wɔ nɑɑnekpɛ ndɑ cimikpɛ yom no. Andebi hɑlɑɑlɑ yom ŋmɔne Kpe Ikpɛ nɑ ngɑ dɔntɔneize fɔ sɑmbɑ ɑ̀ mɑ ngɑ tɑm yom cɛbɛ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ bɑ kɑɑ. Ǹ si jɛ mo.
66022007	Gunɑ, ɑ go kɑɑ mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ. Binekɑɑnekpɛ nɑ bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ tirɑ wɔ ɑndebitɛrɛ sendi yom jɛ.
66022008	Hɛɛ Yohɑnnɑ, ɑ mɑɑ hɛ nge yom di. A di ei mo. Sɑɑ kɑ ɑ mɑɑ kɑ di, ɑ jɛndɛbiri Ikpɛ dɔntɔneize di sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ bɛɛrɑndi ndɑ kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑ ɑ cɛbɛ hɛ nge yom di.
66022009	À cii ɑ sɛ: Cɛ. N mɑ si tɛ yɑ. Hɛɛ yɑ n bɔrɔ hinkɑntɛ nɑ gbei kunɑ ndɑ ɑndebi yom kɑ ǹ ci n nyɑize yom ndɑ beerem kulu kɑ ǹ go tirɑ wɔ sendi yom jɛ. N mɑ Ikpɛ bɛɛrɑndi.
66022010	À cii ɑ sɛ: N mɑ si tirɑ wɔ ɑndebitɛrɛ sendi dɑɑbu ndɑ sɛdɑ dɑmyom zɑmɑ lɔkɑci mɑɑni.
66022011	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ mɑnɑ ci cɛɑntɛ susu, nɑm ɑ̀ mɑ ci zɑm kɑ cɛɑntɛ susu kpɛɛnɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ziibi, nɑm ɑ̀ mɑ ziibi kpɛɛnɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ cɛɑntɛ susu nɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ ci cɛɑntɛ susu kpɛɛnɛ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ ci hɑlɑɑlɑ, ɑ̀ mɑ ci hɑlɑɑlɑ kpɛɛnɛ.
66022012	Gunɑ, hɛɛ wɔ ɑ gɑ kɑɑ mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ. A bɑnɑndi goono ɑ sɛ kɑ ɑ bɔrɔ fɔ fɔ kulu bɑnɑ kɑ simbɑ ndɑ ɑ̀ gbei yom.
66022013	Hɛɛ nɑ A. Hɛɛ no Z, jinɑ ndɑ bɑndɑ, sintine ndɑ beenɑntɛ.
66022014	Binekɑɑnekpɛ yom no beerem kɑ ǹ gɑ kɑ ɑ meire yom gɑnɑ zɑmɑ ǹ mɑ du hini hundi tuurinyɑ di gɑɑ, tuurinyɑ kɑ ɑ̀ kɑɑndɑ hundi. Ǹ mɑ hurɑ ndɑ wɑngɑrɑ mee yom.
66022015	Ammɑ hɑnsi yom, wɑtom iburɑdɑm fɛntɛkpɛ yom ndɑ mondɑbɑru tɛkɔ yom ndɑ zinɑteeri yom ndɑ bɔrɔ wikɔ yom ndɑ tooru tɛkɔ yom ndɑ bɔrɔ kulu kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ bɑɑ tɑngɑri kɑ kɑ ɑ̀ tɛ, tɛrɛ nɑ ǹ goono.
66022016	Hɛɛ Yesu, ɑ nɑ ɑ dɔntɔneize sɑmbɑ ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑ hɛ nge yom sɛdɑ wom sɛ mɑrgɑ yom kunɑ. Hɛɛ yɑ ci Dɑfidi Kɑɑji ndɑ ɑ̀ Bɑndɑ mɑ. Hɛɛ yɑ ci Mo Bɑyom Hɑndɑriyɑize kɑ ɑ̀ go kɑɑri.
66022017	Biyɑ Hɑlɑɑlɑ ndɑ weihiji di mo cii: Kɑɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go mɑɑ mo ɑ̀ mɑ cii, kɑɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go mɑɑ jo mo, ɑ̀ mɑ kɑɑ. Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ go bɑɑ ngɑ mɑ hɑri hundikpɛ hɑm, ɑ̀ mɑ ɑ̀ tɑ. À si bɑnɑ.
66022018	A go tɛ sɛdɑ mo bɔrɔ kulu sɛ kɑ ɑ̀ go mɑɑ tirɑ wɔ ɑndebitɛrɛ sendi yom. De bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ hɛ fɔ tɔntɔnu ɑ̀ gɑɑ, Ikpɛ kɑɑ bɑlɑu yom tɔntɔnu ɑ̀ sɛ, bɑlɑu yom kɑ ǹ nɑ ǹ sendi tɛ tirɑ wɔ kunɑ.
66022019	De bine bɔrɔ fɔ nɑ hɛ fɔ zobu tirɑ wɔ ɑndebitɛrɛ sendi yom kunɑ, Ikpɛ gɑ ɑ̀ bɑ kɑɑ Hundi Tirɑ di kunɑ ndɑ wɑngɑrɑ hɑlɑɑlɑ kunɑ ndɑ hɛ yom kɑ ǹ hɑntum tirɑ wɔ kunɑ.
66022020	Bɔrɔ kɑ ɑ̀ gɑ hɛ nge yom di sɛdɑ tɛ, ɑ̀ gɑ cii: Oò, ɑ gɑ kɑɑ mɑɑsɑ mɑɑsɑ. Ami. Kɑɑ Kpe Yesu.
66022021	Kpe Yesu Mɛsiyɑ gomini mɑ gɔrɔ wom kulu bɑndɑ. Ami.
